column2: content

Aap ne ye sabd to bhut baar suna hoga Facebook Hacking. or ye sabd sunte hi aapke dimag me aata hoga ki kisi ke account ka ID or Password mil jaye matlab uska account Hack. Iss Post me Facebook Account ko kaise Hack karte hai FB Fake App se uski jankari share kar raha hu. Agar aapko Lagta hai ki ID or Password ho jab hi account hack hota hai to aap bilkul galat hai. or wo kaise usko me aage sabit karne wala hu. Sabse phele to aapko ye pata hona bhut jaruri hai Facebook Account ko hack hone se kaise bachaye, agar aapko nahi pata to phele aap ye post read kare. Chaliye ham Ye Jaanne kaise FB App se Hack hota hai account uske phele ye jaan lete akhir koi q karega kisi ka FB Account Hack Facebook Account Hack karne ka sirf ye karan nahi hai ki badla lena ho ya fir uski personal chat padna ho. Iske aalawa bhi hota hai ki Apne kisi Product ka uski ID se Promotion karna ho or apni link uski ID se share karke apna promotion karna ho facebook par. Ye Hacking nahi hai par log isko Apne Faide ke liye Hacking ki trha use kar rahe hai. Mene apne Bhut se Friends ki ID ko dekha hai jinko pata bhi nahi hota ki wo Facebook par kya kya share kar rahe hai, Q ki unko pata hi nahi hota. Q ki wo Apni ID ko bina kisi dikkat ke chala rahe hote hai to wo soch bhi nahi sakte ki koi unki ID ka galat istmal bhi kar raha hai. ye aapko sunne me thoda aajib lag sakta hai ki bina kisi ki ID or password pata kiye ham kaise kisi ki ID se kuch bhi share kar sakte hai. Par aesa kar sakte hai, bhut log kar bhi rahe hai. Ye jo tarika hai isme jo Hack karne ka usme Facebook App ki madad li jati hai. Ye to aap jante hi hoge ki Facebook kitni popular Site hai jispar lagbhag har bande ka account hota hai. or aapne bhut si site par ye bhi dekha hoga ki agar hame login karna hota hai to bha ek LoginSign in with Facebook ka option bhi hota hai. Jese hi ham login with facebook karte hai hamare facebook account ki detail ki madad se hamara account ban jata hai. Jab ham click karte hai to facebook ki site open hoti hai or hame facebook se permission allow karna padta hai. jo ye Facebook Account se connect karke hamare account ko manage karna, ye pura kaam Facebook App ka hota hai. Facebook App ke liye hamare account ki bhut si permission hoti hai, jo agar kisi galat hatho me chali jaye to wo hamare account se kuch bhi kar sakta hai. Facebook App kya kya Permission deta hai chaliye wo jan lete hai q ki jaruri nahi har App ko same permission chaiye ho. Ye Permission mil sakti hai Facebook App ko connect karne par Ye jo list hai is trha ki or bhi permission hai jo Facebook App ki madad se koi bhi le sakta hai. to ab aap samaj hi gaye hoge ki agar ye permission kisi galat hatho me chali jaye to kya ho sakta hai. Hamare Account me Agar jo App connect hai agar wo jarurat ke hai to koi dikkat nahi par agar koi aesa App jike bare me hame koi jankari nahi to usko turant remove karne me hi bhalai hai. Ye jo Jankari me share kar raha hu iske bare me muje abhi pata chala or mene dekha is problem se bhut log gujar rahe hai jisko pata bhi nahi chal pa raha ki aakhir ho kya raha hai. Kuch logo ki ID ki kisi Porn Site ki Link Share ki jati hai to kisi ki ID se fake Offer wali website to kisi se virus ki website ki link. jiske account se post hoti jab koi unse kheta hai ki ye sab galat chije share mat karo jab unko pata chalta hai ki ye sab unko id se share ho raha hai. Automatic agar kuch share karna hai to Kisi bhi account se kuch bhi share karne ke liye uske account ki permission chaiye jo Facebook App ki madad se aasani se le sakte hai. To Ab aap ye to jaan chuke hai ki kaise kisi ki bhi ID se kuch bhi share kiya ja sakte hai. to chaliye ab jaan lete hai kaise Is problem se nipta jaye, iske liye hame hamare facebook account me jitne bhi aese app hai jinko ham use nahi karte ya ham uske bare me nahi jante unko remove karna hai. EK baat yaad rakhe, jo trusted site hai sirf unke fb App allow kare. Ye Process bhi nhut aasan hai, Step 1 Facebook account me login karne ke baad account ki setting me jana hai fir App ke section me jana hai. Yaha click karke Direct App ke setting me ja sakte hai Step 2 Ab aapko Apps ki puri list dikh jayegi. isme se dekhe agar koi aesa App hai jisko aap use nahi karte ya fir jiske bare me nahi jaante usko remove karde. Remove karne ke liye mouse uspar lejaye, fir x ke icon par click kare. Step 3 ab ek Popup aayega. usme remove ki button par click kare. is trha aap jitne bhi app hai unko remove karde. or agar koi aesa App bhi hai jo farji to nahi hai, par aap unko bhi kya kya permission dena chate ho to uspar click karke set kar sakte ho. App ko jo bhi Permission dena hai uspar tikh rhane de. or last me Save ki bhutton par click karde. To Friends me aapse bilkul khena chahuga ki aap apne account me ek baar Apps me ja kar jarur check kare ki kahi koi aesa app to connect nahi hai account me jiski aapko koi jarurat nahi hai ya dhoke se ho gaya ho. ye sabal bhi aapke dimag me aa sakta hai to uska sidha sidha jabab hai, Autoliker se. koi bhi aesi site jo dekhne me sahi nahi lage to uske app ko facebook se kabhi connect nahi kare. or agar Majburi me karna bhi pad raha ho to baad me us apps ko account se remove karde. jese upar bataya gaya hai. Jab bhi kisi App ko Facebook se connect kare to usko kya kya permission mil rahi hai jarur ckeck karle. Allow karne ke phele. Is Trha ki Hack se bachne ka sirf ye tarika hai ki jo Website achi naa ho uske app ko kabhi account se connect na kare or agar galti se ho bhi jata hai to account ki setting me ja kar apps ko remove karde. Ummid hai dosto aapko ye jankari pasand aai hogi, or agar aap chate hai ki aapke dosto ko bhi iske bare me pata ho ki kaise Fake app se facebook account hack ho sakta hai to aap ye jankari unse jarur share kare. Aapke Account me jo email use kiya hai wo bhi secure hona bhut jaruri hai, Gmail 2 step verification se security kaise badaye uski info aapko yaha milegi.

Jabse facebook ne dastak diya tha, uske bad koi nahi janta tha. sabhi ki life online ho jayegi. 10 50-60 , Jo kabhi doston ke sath baithkar guftgu kiya karte the, aaj facebook jaise online medium se dur baithe guftagu kar sakte hai. Uske bad whatsapp aaya, vo to har pal ke liye friend ko behad hi najdik le aaya. Isse bahut se people jud gaye. Jisse unka bahut bada market bana gaya. Is business idea se Indian entrepreneur Kavin Bharti Mittal bhi inspired hue aur 12 December 2012 ko launch kar diya. Hike Messenger. Yah messenger purely Indian messenger hai, jo aaj world ke 200 se jyada countries me daily use ki jati hai. Kavin Bharti Mittal Bharti Airtel ke Founder and Chairman Sunil mittal ke son hai. Isliye unhen is messaging app ke liye Bharti Enterprises se support milta hai. Bharti Enterprises ne is app ke behatar development and marketing ke liye SoftBank se collaborate kar li. Hike Messenger Kya Hai Hike messenger sabse modern messenger app hai, jisme aap text chat, video chat, video conference, group chat freely kar sakte hai. Iske alava aap bill payment, recharge, money transfer, send money, receive money, game, news, bus ticke booking kar sakte hai. Vaise hike ki meaning vridhhi increasement hota hai. Hike Messenger Ko PCLaptop Me Kaise Chalaye Hike Messenger Ki Khasiyat 1.20,000 Free Sticker Aapne Whatsapp aur facebook par bahut se smiley ko use kiya hoga, jo ab boring sa lagte hai. Par hike par aapko 20,000 se jyada attractive free stickers milenge. Jise dekhte hi aap impressed ho jayenge. 2.Full Privacy Security Hike 128 bit ki SSL layer use karti hai, jo third party ko aapke data dekhne se rokta hai. Sath hi hike aapko puri tarah ye setting bhi deta hai ki kaun aapko profile dekh sakta hai aur kaun nahi. 3.Awesome Group Chats Hike group me aap 1000 people ko include kar sakte hai. Jinke sath text video conferencing kar sakte hai. Is group me DOC, MP3, Zip aur split bills ko share kar sakte hai. Jab aapko koi decision lena ho to Poll create kar turant group decision jan sakte hai. Yaha tak group member ke sath teen patti bhi khel sakte hai. 4.Popular Games Hike messenger Word rush, India Puzzle, Word Search, Number Rush, Sudoku, Snake, Solitaire, Connect, Run Bhai Run, Dash, Race Teen Patti Nights, Jalebi jaisi popular games free available karta hai. Jise khel aap khub enjoy kar sakte hai. 5.Hike Wallet Hike Bhim UPI use karta hai. Iska mataba aap hike se money transfer, add money, receive money kar sakte hai. 6.Blue Packets Kisi birthday ya anniversary par gift dena hai to hike aapki help kar sakta hai. Hike ka blue packet ek beautiful digital envelope hai, jiske dvara aap money gift kar sakte hai. 7.News Hike 9 se adhik language me latest news provide karta hai. yani hike ko use karte hue duniya ke sath updated rah sakte hai. 8.Cricket Score Commentary Cricket India ka religion hai. isliye hike is bat ko care kiya hai. Match ke din hike live match scores ke sath live commentary bhi available karta hai. 9.Voice Video Call Other social sites ki tarah aap hike se free voice video call bhi kar sakte hai. 10.Chatting Bot Natasha Aap akele hai ya aapke friends available nahi hai to koi baat nahi. Aap Natasha se chat kar sakte hai. Ye aapki help bhi kar sakti hai. Natasha ek talking bot hai, jo bahut hi friendly hai. 11.Bus Ticket, Mobile Recharge Food Is app se aap bus ticket book, mobile recharge aur food order bhi kar sakte hai. Iske alava aap hike se dhero rupye kama sakte hai, ye every friend invite par 51 rupees deta hai. Yadi aapke contact list me bahut se friend hai to aapki bahut kamai ho sakti hai. Internet Se Paise Kamane Ke 10 Best Trike Free Bitcoin Kaise Kamaye Blog Se Kaise Kamaye ? Best 7 Tarike Affiliate Marketing Kya Hai Aur Isse Paise Kaise Earn Karte Hai Hike Se Kaise Kamaye 1. Hike app install kare 2.niche me par click kare 3. Book, Pay Earn section me Rewards par jaye. 4. Invite Now click aur yes kare. Ab mobile contact list me maujud sabhi friends ke pas aap SMS mil jayega. Jaise hi ve 24 hours ke andar us link ki help se hike install karte hai aapko Rs51 per friends milega. Ye post aapko kaise laga, comment me jarur bataye aur share karana na bhule

Hello Friends, Sayad aap ko pata ho par ek baar fir se me aapko bata du ki WhatsApp mobile par use hone wala sabse popular App hai. Iski madad se ham apni Family ko, apne dosto ko message kae sakte hai ya fir apne busness keliye bhi isko use karte hai. Ham WhatsApp ki madad se Text message, Photo, Video, or MP3 send kar sakte hai. jese ki ham jaante hai abhi ke time me whatsapp ek badiya option hai apne message ko dusro tak phuchane ka, Isme SMS charge se kam charge lagta hai or SMS se jada futures bhi hame milte hai. Ham WhatsApp par Group bana sakte hai or Broadcast bhi bana sakte hai jiski madad se ham ek sath kai logo ko ek hi message send kar sakte hai. Bhut bar hamare saamne ek dikkat aati hai or bo ye ki hame hamari personal life or hamari professional life ko alag alag rakhna hota hai uske liye hame 2 whatsapp number chaiye. ek se ham hamare dosto or family member se jude rha sake or dusre number se ham apne business ka kaam kar sakte. Uske liye hame do mobile rakhna padta hai, par inki koi jarurat nahi hai aaj me aapko is post me bataoga kaise ham ek mobile me 2 nahi 3 whatsapp chala sakte hai. Aapko 3 WhatsApp ko install karne ke liye aapko alag alag 3 app install karne hoge. 1. com.whatsapp WhatsApp Default Ye official Apk hai whatsapp ka. 2. com.whatsfapp WhatsFapp Agar 2 whatsapp chalana hai to phele com.whatsapp or com.whatsfapp apk install kare. 3. com.whatsfapp wFapp Agar 3 whatsapp chalana hai to com.whatsapp apk fir com.whatsfapp apk fir cum.whatsfapp apk Also Read Android Mobile me Free Balance kaise Kamaye ye jo taika bataya gaya hai is Post me usse aapka Whatsapp account block bhi ho sakta hai. agar aapko bina risk ke legal tarike se 1 mobile me 2 whatsapp use karna hai to aap yaha jaye. Aap meri steps ko Follow kare, agar koi bhi step sahi se nahi ki to ho sakta hai aapke mobile me 3 whatsapp naa chale. Apne Mobile Me Official WhatsApp ka App PlayStore se Download kare or apne Phela Number Register karke thode der chate kare. Ho sakta ho aapke mobile me phele se whatsapp install ho to aap is step ko skip kar de. Phele kuch Chat kare, Ab apne WhatsApp ke message ka backup kar le. Settings Chat Settings Back up Chats Ab aap apne Mobile ki setting me jaa kar Apps WhatsApp Clear Data par click kare. Ye Step Sabse Jada Jaruri hai Ab aapko Dusra WhatsApp Download karke Install karna hai. Yaha par click karke com.whatsfapp Apk Download kare fir usko Install kare. 3 WhatsApp Group Me Share Kare! Downoad com.WhatsFApp.com Install karte samay aapko apna phela number register karna hai jo aapne Official Whatsapp par kiya tha. Insall hone par back chat ka option aayega. aap uspar click karke apne message bapas aa jayege. Ab Jo Official WhatsApp hai usko Open kare or ab usme 2nd Mobile Number se register kare. Install karne ke baat thodi der chat kare Note Agar aap Sirf 2 WhatsApp Chalana chate ho to aapko aage ki steps karne ki koi jarurat nahi hai. 3 WhatsApp Install karne ke liye Bapas se Step 2 or Step 3 dhoraye, ye bhut jaruri hai. Step 2, 3 ko bapas karne ke baad ab aap cum.whatsfapp apk Download karke install kare or isme jo 2nd mobile number hai jo aapne abhi official whatsapp me use kiya tha dusri baar wo register kare. Ab Official WhatsApp me apna 3rd Number register kare. Ye jo Trick Hai, iske bare me muje Mere Dost Akash Nema ne bataya jo Master hai Android me. Me usko Thanks Khana chahuga . Ye Bhi Pade Official WhatsApp ke 5 New Future jo abhi PlayStore me nahi aaye. Official Whatsapp ki site se download kare Friends Official WhatsApp ke aalawa jo WahtsApp ke aap hai wo Whatsapp ki team ne nahi banaye hai to agar aapka number block ho ya koi bhi dikkat aati hai to uske jimmedaar aap Kud hoge. Thanks

Adsense par account banate same ek option aata hai jispar hame tik karna hota hai, or uss tik ka matlab hota hai ki ham usko maan rahe hai. Tik karke Google AdSense Program Policies ko maanna hota hai, sab jaldi se tik kar dete hai koi padta nahi hai par wo bhut jaruri hota hai ki hame pata ho ki hamne kya baat mani hai. To chaliye agar aapne jab nahi padha to ab padh lijiye AdSense Program Policies ko Hindi me Adsense ke Sare Publishers jo Adsense ko use karte hai usko Adsense ki Policies ko Follow karna padega. Agar koi bhi kisi bhi policies ko follow nahi karta hai to uske Adsense Account ko kabhi bhi DisabledBand kiya ja sakta hai, or uske baad aap adsense use nahi kar payege. Adsense ki jo policies hai wo badalti rheti hai time to time, to agar koi change ho to aapko uski jankari uske Official Blog par mil jayegi. Adsense Sabal or jabab aapko yaha milege, or unke aalawa koi sabal hai to aap direct bhi puch sakte hai. AdSense ke Publisher khud ke ads par kabhi click naa kare or naa kisi Software ya Script ki madad se Ads par click kare. Aesa karne par Adsense account Band kar diya jayega. Ads par fake click naa karne hai or naa karwane hai, jo bhi ads aate hai wo agar kisi user ke interest ke hoge to khud uspar click karega. Agar koi user war war bhi ads par click kar raha hai to wo invalid click me aayega, aesa karne par account risk me aa sakta hai or block bhi ho sakta hai. Aap kisi ko bhi nahi khe sakte ki ads par click kare, ye tarika bhi galat hai. Agar koi aese click karta hai to Google ko uska aasani se pata chal jata hai, wo dekhte hai ki jo user hai wo kya search kar ke site par aaya tha or usne ads par click karke jo dusri site open hui usko open kiya ke nahi. is trha ki bhut si chijo ka calculation karte hai to agar koi fake click karta hai to uska aasani se pata lagaya ja sakta hai. Aap Adsense Ads ke Code ko kisi bhi aesi site par nahi laga sakte jo Adsense ki Content Guidelines ko follow naaa karti ho. Jese Agar koi Page hai jispar Adult content hai, Gambling ke ware me hai, Hacking ke ware me hai, Crack Software ya koi bhi illegal chij hai to Adsense Ads nahi laga sakte. jitni bhi ye sab chije hai ye naa aapki site par honi chaiye or naa aesi kisi bhi site ki link honi chaiye aapki site ar jinpar ye ho. Aap Adsense ke ads aesi site par nahi dikha sakte jispar copyright material ho kisi dusri site ka. Aap jis Page par Adsense ke Ads use kar rahe hai uspar naa koi copyright content hona chaiye or naa hi aese kisi page ki link usme honi chaiye jisme copyright content ho. Agar aap Adsense use kar rahe hai or aapke pass koi notification aata hai kisi copyright content ko le kar jo aapka hi hai ya aapke pass usko share karne ki permission hai to aap ye Adsense Form Fill karke Request kar sakte hai. iski or jankari aapko unke Official Blog par milegi. Agar aapko kisi Page par Adsense ke Ads dikhe jo Adsense ki policy ke khilaf hai to aap unki report bhi kar sakte hai is Form ko Fill karke. Ye Bhi Padhe Aap Adsense ke Ads aesi kisi bhi site par nahi use kar sakte jo kisi Product ko sale karti ho or uski brand kisi Brand ki copy ko . uska Trademark or logo kisi dusri company ka ko. Aap Adsense ads ussi site par use kar sakte hai ko Webmaster Quality Guidelines ko follow karti ho. Google Ads aap in site par nahi laga sakte jaha traffic jawar justi jai jati ho. Jese aap aesi site par ads nahi laga sakte jaha paid traffic aati ho, jese email send kara logo ko or jab wo open kare to ads dikhae, ye sab allow nahi kiye jate. Traffic kaise Badaye uski Jankari share ki hai, aap wo read kare iske sath sath 50 tarike Blog ko popular karne ke bhi read kare. Aap Adsense ke Ads ko Modefications kar sakte hai par usme koi aesa kaam nahi karna hai jisse jo ads hai wo bhi badal jaye. Aap ads ka Size, color, formate wagera change kar sakte hai. Visitor aapki site par kya karte hai or kya dekhte hai wo sab dekhne ke liye aap Google Analytics add kare Blog me Adsense ke Ads kaha or kaise lagana hai wo bhi jaruri hai, aap aesi jagha ads nahi laga sakte jo Google Adsense Ad Placement Policies ke khilaf ho. Google Adsense Ads Policy in Hindi Aap jarur read kare, isse aapko pura idea ho jayega ads ko kaha or kaise use karna hai taki aapko koi problem naa aaye. Jis Site par Adsense ke Ads dikh rahe hai uska navigation acha hona chaiye or usko chalana aasan hona chaiye. Site me aesa nahi hona chaiye ki wo automatic kisi dusri site par regirect ho rahi ho. usme kuch bhi automatic download nahi hona chaiye, jada popup nahi hona chaiye, Clean or Fast hona chaiye. Apni website Virus check kare online website ki madad se, agar koi galat chij ho to usko turant remove kare. Adsense Publishers ko unki Privacy Policy me ye batana padega apne visitor ko ki aapki sites cookies use karti hai browser ki badiya Ads dikhane ke liye. Aap jis sitep ar ads laga rahe hai uspar jo content hai wo bacho ke liye bhi safe hona chaiye. Aap Adsense ke ads kisi bhi Gamblingsatte ki site par nahi laga sakte ya uski jankari deti ho uspar bhi nahi. At Last Friends aapne ab jaan liya hai ki agar aapko Google Adsense use karna hai to aapko konsi Term n Condition ka khayal rakhna hai. Iske sath sath, Google Adsense ads Placement Policy bhi jarur read kare, taki invalid click jesi problem se bach sake. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi wo aap comment karke bataye or agar aapka koi sabal hai to aap comment karne puch sakte hai.

Hello Friends, Agar aap ye Post Padh rahe hai iska Matlab aapka Facebook par account to jarur hoga or Facebook Page Kya hai or Facebook Group kya hai wo bhi aapko pata hoga. Is Article me me aapko bataoga ki aap kaise Facebook Profile ko Page me Badal sakte hai. Facebook Profile kya hoti hai wo to aapko pata hoga or uski kuch limitation bhi hoti hai jese aap Facebook Profile me 5000 se jada friends nahi bana sakte. FB Profile ko Page me badalne ke ye karan ho sakte hai ki aap koi badi hasti hai jisko log follow karna chate hai to wo Facebook par aapko Friends nahi bana sakte 5000 ke baad par aap agar apna Page banate hai to aapko kitni bhi log follow kar sakte hai Aapke Page ko Like karke. Profile ko bhi Follow kar sakte hai, par kuch privacy ki maja se aap Profile nahi chala sakte, jese aap kab online aate ho. Agar aapka koi Business hai tobhi aapko ye future kaam aa sakta hai, aapke jitne bhi friends hoge wo Profile se Page me badalne par Page Likes me badal jayege, or iss trha aapko starting me hi 5000 likes mil sakte hai Page par agar aap 5000 Friends banane ke baad Page me convert karte hai to. Ye Bhi Padhe Facebook Se Paise Kaise Kamaye uske tarike in Hindi Agar aap Chate hai ki ye sab naa ho to aap ek kaam kar sakte hai ki ek New Facebook Page Banaye or apne Followers ko kahe ki Page ko like kare or Profile bhi rhene de. Also Read Aap apni Profile ko Page me badalne se phele in Steps ko jarur pura kar le. Ab aap Facebook Profile ko Page me convert karne ke liye teray hai. Ab agar aap soch chuke hai ki aapko Apni Facebook Profile ko Page me convert karna hi to chaliye dekh lete hai uski steps. Important Note Ek war Facebook Profile ko Page me Convert karne ke baad aap Wapas usko Page ko Profile me Convert nahi kar sakte. Apne Facebook Account me Login karne ke baad button par click kare Convert Facebook Profile to Page Ab aapko Simple Jo Process hai Facebook Page banane ki wo Follow karna hai, Aapse Profile ko Page me Convert karne ke liye aapka Facebook Account ka Password bhi Pucha jayega. Agar aapko Facebook Profile ko Page me convert karne me koi Problem aa rahi ha ya aapka koi sabal hai to aap comment me puch sakte hai. Ye Bhi Padhe
chahe apne doston se paise udhaar magne padein, maang lo, aur kisi raaja ki tarah us par paisa udao, baad mein tumhara baaja bajega iski 100 taka zimmedari hamari.
kintu facebook mein ladki se dosti hote hi usse aise baatein karo jaise tum is duniya ke sabse shareef insaan ho. Aur tum hi uske sapho ke rajkumar ho.
phir bhi din mein kam se kam 5-10 angrezi gaane post karte jao, use lagna chahiye ki tum lambi race ke ghode ho.
sabse pehle uska phone kam se kam 100 se recharge kara daalo. Paise mein badi taakat hoti hai bhakton, uske baad dekho kamaal.
chahe wo tumhari friend list mein hon ya nahi, har ek ko poke kar daalo, jiska-jiska poke waapas aaya samjho waha sambhavna poori hai.
kintu unhe safalta nahi mili. Aur hamare hote hue hamare bhakt safal na hon ye ho sakta hai? Isiliye hum le aaye hain 10 laajawaab tarike, jinse ladki to kya uski saheli bhi patgi.

kabhi bhi breakup hone ki sambhavna hamesha bani rehti hai. Isiliye kam se kam 10-11 facebook account bana daalo, aur har ek ac se kam se jitna ho sake utni ladkiyon ko request bhejo, kahin na kahin to safalta milegi.
isliye aksar unhe unki khubsurti par koi Shayari sunate rahe, aisa karte rahne se wo aapke pyaar me pagal ho jayegi.
issliye koi achchi si Gym me exercise kar apni Body ko attractive banaye. isse Ladkiyan aapko dekhte hi impress ho jaengi.
to aksar usko Funny SMS yaa Love SMS yaa Friendship SMS bhejte rahe. aisa karne se aap unki yaado me bane rahenge.
ager wo agree ho jaye to unke pasand ke hotel me unke pasand ki dish order kare. wo turant aap par fida ho jayegi.

aur aise react kare jaise aap bahut jaruri kaam se ja rahe the Lekin unke liye aapne jaruri kaam chhod kar unhe Lift di, isse wo aap se Impress hue bina nahi rah sakegi aur aap use aasani se pata lenge.
Pehle uske bhai se Dosti karo, uske bhai ki nazaro me aap ek samajhdar Ladke ki tarah raho, isse aapka unke ghar aana jana laga rahega.
aap unka ek hath pakadkar unhe Red Rose dekar Propose kare. wo aap ka Proposal jarur accept kar legi.
aap sabse pehle unse jakar mile aur apna Introduction de, isse dhire-dhire baat chit ka silsila shuru hoga aur aap use Pata lenge.
Romantic Ring tone sunkar Ladkiyan jarur impress hoti hai. Ladkiyon ko Patane ke liye unhe impress karna bahut hi jaruri hai.
issliye unhe Patane ke liye unke Julfon par Shayari sunaye yaa tarif kare. click here for Tarif Shayari

Google Adsense jyadatar bloggers aur webmaster ke liye online paisa kamane ka sabse badiya method me se ek hota hai. Kisi bhi online business me google adsense ek bahut hi importent role play karta hai. Bahut se log hai jo bahut hi badiya paisa google adsense se kamate hai. India me ab hindi bloggers ki sankhya bahut hi tezi se badh rhi hai iska main reason Google Adsense hi hai kyoki Jab se google adsense Ne hindi language ko support karna suru kiya hai tab se logo ka hindi me blogging karne ka interest bhi badh gaya hai. Muje lagta hai ke hindi bloggers apne blog se paisa kamane ke liye google adsense ka hi prayog karte hai. Mai khud bhi Hindimehelp par google adsense ka upyog karta hu. Jab baat kisi blog, website se paisa kamane ki Ati hai to sabhi Bloggers aur webmaster google adsense ko hi paisa kamane ke liye chunte hai. Kyoki google adsense Jo Jo subidha humko deta hai woh dusari Ads Network Program nahi dete. Aaj ka hmara Jo topic hai woh bahut hi intresting topic hai Kyoki aaj hum iss article me ye baat janane ki kosish karege ki aakhir google adsense ko hi humko apne blog se paisa kamane ke liye kyo paryog karna cahiye aur google adsense ka prayog karne se humko kya kya fayda hota hai, To chalo dekhte hai ki woh kon kon se point hai jo google adsense ko number1 ads network program banati hai. Ye Bhi Pade 1000 Visitor Per Google Adsense Se Kitni Income Hoti Hai Google Adsense program ka sabse badiya feature ye hai ki aap kewal ek hi google adsense acount me apne sabhi blog, website ko Manage kar sakte hai. Maine aur bhi kuch ads program ko dekha hai lekin unme ye feature nahi hota hai. Agar aapke pass 2-4 blog hai to aapko har ek blog ke liye alag alag google adsense acount nahi approved karana hoga aap kewal ek hi adsense acount se un sabhi website par adsense ka ads laga sakte hai aur sabhi blog ke income ko ek hi jagah se apne bank acount me transfer kar sakte hai. Ek adsense acount me unlimited blog ko access karne ka feature muje adsense Program ka sabse acha feature lagta hai Isiliye google adsense ke top fayde me Maine isko number 1 par rakha hai. Yadi aap ek naye bloggers hai aur aap ne abhi tak kabhi bhi google adsense ko prayog nahi kiya hai aur aapko lagta hai ki adsense ka prayog karna bahut hi technical hai tab aap Galat soch rahe hai kyoki google adsense program se easy sayad hi koi aur program hoga. Aap isko bina kisi technical jankari ke Aasani se prayog kar sakte hai. Google adsense ko prayog karne ke liye aapko kisi bhi prakar ki coding ki jarurat nahi hoti hai Balki ye bahut hi Easy hota hai aur aap iske har ek function ko Aasani se smjh Sakte hai. Mera yakin maniye aap google adsense ko apne computer me bahut hi comfortable tarike se prayog kar sakte hai. muje lagta hai Google Adsense ke sabhi function ko smjhne me aapko aapko 20min bhi nahi lagega. Google Adsense ke New Ad type add kiye hai uski jankari yaha hai. Ye Bhi Pade 5 Karan Adsense Se Paisa Kamane Me Q Fail Hote Hai Log Maine aapko pahle hi bata diya hai ki google adsense ko paryog karna bahut hi Aasan hota hai. Iss par acount bana kar Usko Setup karna bhi bahut hi Easy hota hai. Lekin agar aapko adsense prayog karte time me kisi bhi parkar ki koi bhi problem Aaye To aap uss problem ko google par search kar le aapke problem ka 100 Upaye mil jayega, kyoki google adsense se related hajaro tutorial internet par uplabdh hai. Aur Iske Sath Sath adsense acount prayog karte samye ane wali sabhi problem ka bhi tutorial internet par Uplabdh hai. Agar iske baad bhi aapka problem nahi solved ho raha hai to aap Google adsense ke support team se contect karke aapne problem ko bataye woh aapke problem ko turant solved kar dege. Google adsense ki support team bahut hi fast response deti hai aur woh aapke problem ko solved karne ke liye hmesa Ready rahta hai. Aap Google Adsense ka jo Forum hai usko bhi join kare jaha aapko bhut si jankari mil jayegi adsense se sambandit or aap wha help le bhi sakte hai or dusre logo ki help kar bhi sakte hai. Google Adsense Forum Join kare Google Adsense Forum Google Adsense apne user ko kisi bhi parkar ki koi bhi product sell karne ke liye nahi bolta hai. Ek website, blog Bana kar aap information share karke bhi google adsense se paisa kama sakte hai. Matlab aapko adsense se paisa kamane ke liye kisi bhi product ko nahi sell karna padega. Google Adsense ka ye ek acha future hai earning ko badane ka. Agar hamari site par Adsense approve hai to ham hamari site par jo kuch search hota hai usse bhi ham income kar sakte hai. Search me ads laga kar. uske liye hame hamari site me Google Custom search use karna padega. Google Custom Search, Google ki hi ek service hai jisme jisko ham apni site par search karne ke liye use karte hai. or aagar hamare blog par adsense approve hai to ham hamare search result me bhi ads enable kar sakte hai. Google Custom search me ads enable karne ke baad jese Google Search me ads aate hai aese hi ads hamari site par search karne par bhi aate hai or agar kpoi unpar click karta hai to usse hamario income hoti hai. Sabhi ads network program apne user ko ads starting se bana kar put karne ka option dete hai lekin google adsense me aisa nahi hai. Google Adsense aapke hisab se kuch relevant ads website ke liye provide karta hai aur usme option bhi deta hai ki agar aap ads me kuch changing karna cahte hai to kar sakte hai. Ye ads khash karke content ke liye hota hai. Ye Bhi Pade Adsense Account Approved Karane ke 11 Tarike Hindi Me Kisi bhi website, blog ka Design ek importent point hota hai. Agar hum baat kare Kuch Dusare ads network program ki to un program me Customize ads ka option sabhi me nahi hota hai Jisse unka ads apne blog, website me Lagane par pure website ka Desgin bekar ho jata hai. Google Adsense me aisa nahi hai kyoki iske har ke ads ko Customize kar sakte hai iss option ko edit karke aap apna ads apne website ke hisab se Design kar sakte hai. Aisa karne par aapke website ka Desgin bhi accha dikhega aur ads bhi. Jarur Pade Adsense Se Paisa Q nahi kama pate log uske karan Google Adsense me Responsive ads to hai ho jo har screen me fit ho jate hai par abhi abhi Adsense me ek new future add huaa hai jiska naam hai Page Level Ads ye Mobile site ke liye hai. isme ham Adsense ke ads Mobile site me niche dikha sakte hai. Adsense hame ye option bhi deta hai ki ham chahe un ads ko disable kar sakte hai. To hame jin ads se low CPC milta hai ham unko disable karke apni adsense ki income bada sakte hai. Ye Future bhi muje bhut acha laga Adsense ka. Isse income nahi hoti par iski madad se ham apni site ke Page Views bada sakte hai. Matched Contant Ads me hamari site ki hi post dikhti hai, par wo visitor ke interest ke hisab se dikhti hai to uska hame fayda milta hai. Adsense me ek option natice ad ka hai, jisme jo ad hai wo bilkul website se matching aate hai, to aese me jo visitor hai unko koi paresani bhi nahi hoti or click bhi jada hote hai. Native Ads kya hai or kaise use kare uski jankari aapko yaha mil hayegi. Google Adsense ka ye sabse unique feature hai, isme hame sirf ek code website me ad karna hota hai, uske baad adsense ke ad automatic website me jaha jaha sahi jagha hai waha aane lagte hai. naa to war war jagha jagha ad code lagane ki dikkat or naa iss baat ki ke konsi location par jada click aayege. sara kaam automatic ho jata hai. Google Adsense ke ads se jitni income hoti hai utni income kisi dusre ads network se nahi hoti. mene bhut se ads network tri kiye par adsense ki takkar ka koi nahi mila Ye Bhi Sabse acha Future laga Adsense ka ki hamari jo Income hai wo direct hamare Bank account me aa jati hai. Jo Hamari Income hoti hai agar wo $100 se jada ho jati hai to har mahine ki 21 tarikh ko hamara bank account me wo paise aa jate hai. Google Adsense ka Mobile App bhi hai or Browser ke liye extension bhi hai. Mobile App ki madad se ham Hamari jo inocme hai usko Mobile me kahi bhi dekh sakte hai. App Download Kare Apne Mobile me Adsense Android App Chrome Browser ke liye extension bhi hai jiski madad se ham hamari income kabhi bhi dekh sakte hai, or uske liye hame adsense account me login karne ki jarurat nahi padti. Chrome Extension Download kare Install Adsense Chrome Extension Google Adsense ek bahut hi trusted compnay hai aur ye aapko kabhi bhi dhoka nahi degi kyoki google adsense ko banane wala koi aur nahi hum sab ka Google hai. Hum sab jante hai ki google kya hai isliye hum google adsense par trust kar sakte hai. Lekin aisa nahi hai ki sabhi ads network google adsense ki tarah trusted hai kyoki maine bahut se logo se suna hai ki bahut se aise scam ads network internet par hai jo apna kaam karwa lete hai lekin jab paise dene ka time ata hai tab paise nahi deti hai aise ads network program se aap door hi rahe. Ji haa google adsense ek free service hai aur aapko isko prayog karne ke liye kisi bhi parkar ki koi bhi paisa kisi ko nhi dena padhega. Ek aur baat dusare ads network ki apeccha google adsense ads Click par jyada paise deta hai. Yadi aap apne blog par ek badiya aur trusted advertiser netwok dhudh rahe hai to google adsense aapki pahli psand honi cahiye. Google adsense ke aur bhi bahut se fayde hai Jisko hum sabdo me nahi bata sakte hai. kul milakar google adsense ek free, trusted aur high paying ads network hai jo aapke website,blog ke liye ek best option hoga. Google Adsense Kaam kaise karta hai, kaha se ad aate hai or kaha se paise uski puri jankari aapko yaha milegi. jisme starting se leke last tak ki adsense process ke ware me bataya hai. At Last Muje ummed hai google adsense ke bare me ye jaankari aapko acchi lagi Hogi. Yadi aapka google adsense se related koi sawal ya phir confusion hai to commnet box me aap puch sakte hai humko aapke question ka answer dene me bahut khushi hogi.

Dosto Agar aapko apni Life me kuch karna hai or aesa karna hai, jisko duniya aapke jane ke baad bhi yaad rakhe, to wass apne aap par bharosa rakho or mera yakin karo aap wo kar sakte hai jo duniya ka koi banda nahi kar paya, wass aap apne aap par bharosa rakho or har naa mano, Wass ek baat ka dhiyan rakho sabkuch Aashan hai , Ye jo bate mene kahi ye meri soch hai or meri iss soch ka credit jata hai Sandeep Maheshwari ji ko. Aaj ka Ye article aap Pura jarur read karna, me dabe ke sath khe sakta hu, aap iss article ko read karne ke phele jese hai, isko read karne ke baad apne aap me jarur ek positive badlab mhesus karege. Agar aap inke ware me nahi jante to aapke mind me sabal aa rahe hoge, Kon Hai Sandeep Maheshwari ?, Ye karte kya hai, inhone kiya hai ? to wass aap aage iss article ko read karte jaye. me isme bhut si Motivation Video, Quotes Share karne wala hu. jo aapko jarur boost karegi. to chaliye start karte hai. Sandeep Maheshwari ek India ke Top Entrepreneur hai, jo ki ek Business Man, Motivation Speaker bhi hai. Inhone apni Study bich me se hi chor di jo ki Kirori Mal College se B.Com kar rahe the. Study chorne ke unke kuch personal reasons the, par wo ye jante the ki unko Life me kuch karna hai, or unka motto tha Success hona. Har ek ki life me ek turning point jarur aata hai, or agar ham sirf waha sabhal jaye to ha jo chate hai wo hame naa mile aesa ho hi nahi sakta. Aap kuch bhi kaam kare, usme fail hone se mat daro, q ki agar aap fail ho rahe ho, or uske baad bhi haar nahi maan rahe ho iska matlab hai aap apne aapko or majbut bana rahe ho. Sandeep Maheshwari Aaj ek Successful insan hai, jinko lakho log follow bhi karte hai, par kya aapko pata hai unki iss success ke piche kitne failure hai. chaliye jante hai Sandeep Maheshwari ki Life ke ware me. Inki family ka Aluminum business tha, jo ki puri trha se thap ho gaya, to iska aasar ghar ke 19 saal ke ladke Sandeep par bhi padha. Or Ghar ki iss situation me help karne ke liye ek Multi Level Marketing MLM join ki, jisme wo kuch hadd tak success bhi hue. Par agar aapne kabhi MLM try kiya ho to aapko bhi pata hoga, MLM me ham Long tarm tak kaam nahi kar sakte. aesa hi Sandeep Masheshwari ke sath huaa. Unhone bhi usko chor diya. MLM company ko to unhone chor diya, par jitne time tak wo usme kaam kar rahe the, usme unhone bhut si chije sikhi, or sambe main baat jab wo MLM kar rahe the to unhone Marketing ki bhut books bhi padhi. Marketing ka unko itna knowledge ho gaya tha ki unhone, Marketing ke upar ek Book bhi likh di, lekin Book bhi ek Failure hi sabit hui. Jo sandeep maheshwari book likhi thi, uski bhi ek khas baat thi, wo ulti open hoti thi matlab piche se or uske sabse phele Page par hi likha tha agar aap apne padhne ka tarika nahi badal sakte, to aap apni soch ko kaise badal sakte ho. Ye jo Book likhi, Marketing ke upar bhale wo success nahi hui, par usko likhne se jo Sandeep Maheshwari ko mila wo sabse badke tha. Q ki unhone ek book likhne ke chakkar me pata nahi kitni marketing ki book badh dali, jisse unko marketing ka acha khasa knowlage ho gaya. Sandeep Ka Interest Modeling me bhi tha, to unhone in sab ke baad modeling me try karne ka socha or apna ek portfolio banbaya, Yaha bhi unhe bhut si problem ka samna karna padha q ki koi bhi acha Photographer 50 hajar ke aas pass charge karta hai ek portfolio ke jo ki unke liye bhut jada tha. Fir bhi jese tese banbaya or try kiya par usme bhi unko koi acha response nahi mila. Ab Sandeep ne socha jo mere jese Models hai jo Paise ke karan apna portfolio nahi banwa pa rahe hai, me unki help karu or portfolio banao, or unhone Camera leke ye kaam start kiya. Camera liya or ek photograph ka course kiya. or kisi ka bhi wo portfolio banate to sirf Camera Real ke paise usse lete or thoda bhut extra. Iske baad unhone apne 3 dosto ke sath milke ek company bhi start ki jo 6 mahine me hi band karni padi, q ki unke dost usko chor ke chale gaye. Yani ek or aasafalta hath lagi. Ab Sandeep Maheshwari ne Models ke Photo khichna bhi start kar diya tha, jo advertisement company ko sale karke paise kama sakte hai, or agar koi photo sale hota tha to jo uska model hota tha usko bhi uska percent milta tha. Ab Uske pass clint to aa rahe the, par unko apna business badana tha to unko kuch aesa karna tha jisse wo sabki najar me aa jaye, q ki phele se bhut se photographer the par unko unsab me highlight hona tha. Sandeep ne Limca Book of World Record se contact kiya, or 10 ghanto me lagatar 100 se jada models ke 10000 photo khich kar World Record bana diya. jisse unki News TV or Paper me aai to wo sabki najro me aa gaye. ab Sandeep ko idea aaya ki wo ek website banaye jisme wo apne khiche hue photo ko online sale kar sake. unhone web Developer se ek website banwai jiska naam tha imagesbazaar.com, jisko pura teyar karne me lagbhag ek saal laga, par ye website apni trha ki pheli website thi jisme Indian Models ke photo the jo kisi bhi Advertisement ya marketing ke liye use kiye ja sakte the. Website banne ke baad, ek sabse badi problem aai, wo ye ki website load hone me 2-3 minute laga rahi thi, or itni slow site par koi aake image ko kaise kharid sakta tha. jisse fir ek time aesa aa gaya ki lagne laga ye website ka idea bhi galat hi raha. q ki jo Developer the unhe bhi kya dikkat hai wo samaj nahi aa rahi thi. Par yaha Sandeep Maheshwari ne iss idea ko drop karne se phele socha q naa me khud isko solve karu, iske liye unhe programming nahi aati thi to unhone online or books se read karke itni programming sikh li ki kis code ka kya matlab hai samaj me aa jaye. or uske baad kaha kya dikkat thi wo bhi unko samaj me aa gaya. Ab Sandeep Maheshwari ne jo website ke developer the uske pass gaye or bole, ye hai problem imagesbazaar.com me, karo isko tikh. or uske baad website ki loading speed bhut fast hogai or uspar visitor bhi aane lage. Aaj ImagesBazaar.com India ki Top Image website hai jispar 15 lakh se jada High Quality Photo or Video hai. Is website par duniya bhar se clint image ko kharidte hai jinki sankhiya 7000 hai. Hamesa Yaad rakho, Aap apni Problem se kaiguna bade ho. Aapko khud ki najar me uthna hai, jo insan khud ki najar me uth gaya wo duniya ki najar me apne aap uth jata hai. Jis wait aap uss chij ko dekhte jo jab wo aapke pass nahi hai, uss time aapki kismat buri hoti hai. or jis time aap uss chij ko dekhte ho jis pal wo aapke pass hai, uss time aapki kismat achi hoti hai. Sabse phele aapko apne commitment pure karne hai, Jab aap khud ke commitment pure nahi kar pa rahe ho to dusro ke diye huee commitment kaise pure karoge. Aap apne Dimag ko control kare, nahi to wo aapko control karega. Agar aapne apni aadate badli, to aapki jindgi bhi badlegi. nahi to jindgi me wahi hoga jo hota aaya hai. Kamyabi anubhab se aati hai or anubhav galtiyo se yani kharab anubhav se. Aapko Powerful banna hai, isliye nahi ki kisi ko dawa sake, Aapko powerful banna hai taki koi aapko dawa naa sake. Desire chunna hai to bada chuno, bade se bada. Iss Duniya ka sakbse bada. Jisko pata hai wo kya kaam kar rahe hai, Q kar rahe hai. unko koi nahi hila sakta. ek taraf wo hai jo aap karna chate ho, banna chate ho or dusri taraf wo hai jo duniya aapko banana chaiti hai. Agar koi vyakti aapse ye khe rahe hai aap ye nahi kar sakte, to wo wass ye khena cha rahe hai ki wo ye nahi kar sakte. Jindgi Cricket Ball ki trha hai, jo ek ke baad ek awsar deti hai, Agar ek Ball chut jaye to dusri ball par najar honi chaiye. Har ek ke andar ek aesi sakti hoti hai jo or kisi ke andar nahi hai, wass aapko unko phechanna hai. Har roj apne aap se ye sabal karo ki me abhi kya sikh raha hu, or har roj kuch na kuch naya sikhne ki aadat bana lo. Gyan ko badao par ahnkar ko nahi, yahi ahankar bada to uske baad aap or gyan nahi le paoge. Ek baat hamesa apne aap se bole, Me Puri Duniya ka ek matra Greatest Person hu . Apne aapko apni Filed me Mahan samje, dusre kya samajte hai usse koi fark nahi padta. Duniya aapko Cadayegi or Girayegi, Duniya ka kaam hi ye hai, wass aapko inn bato se fark nahi padna chaiye. jitni bhi chije aapke aaspas hai un sabse sikhe. Apne aapse mukabla karte jao, waha koi risk nahi hai, Hare tab bhi aap jitoge or jite tab bhi. Jisko Sabal karne ki aadat hai wo kisi bhi fild me jaye success hi hoge. 2 Option hai aapke pass Muje Jindgi katna hai ya Muje Jindgi ko Jina hai. Ek daraf Maja hai or dusri taraf dard, inme balance hona jaruri hai. Aap Job karo ya koi Business, ek skill aesi hai unke bina ham aage nahi bad sakte wo hai Communication Skill . Jitna aap Burai ko dekhoge utna hi dukhi houge, or Jitna aap Dukhi houge utna hi dusro ko dukhi karoge. Jine ki bajha agar badi ho, to apne aap bade bade kaam karwate chali jayegi. Duniya ko aap jab tak nahi badal sakte jab tak aap apne aapko nahi badal lete. Agar aapne thaan liya ki muje iss problem ka sloution nikalna hai to Solution khud wa khud aapke pass chal kar aa jayega. Problem me hi Solution chupa hota hai. jindgi me kuch bhi karna hai to Sach bol do . Agar aapke andar dherya hai to apni jindgi me har fesle sahi tarike se lege. Ek war apna Learning Attitude ban gaya. Fir paise ka kya hai aap kitna bhi kama loge. Iss duniya me Magic naam ki koi chij nahi hai. India ki jansankhiya 120 Crore se jada hai or inme se jo 60 log hai unki umar age 30 ke aas pass hai. ye jo Jansankiya hai usme se 80 se jada log kaam karne wale hai hai. Maltab wo Naukri hi karte hai ya karna chate hai. Aese me Manchahi naukri milna bada hi muskil ho jata hai or agar job ki vacancy ke ware me pata chalna bhi bhut jaruri hai, uske liye aap Online Naukri Website ki madad le sakte hai. Sabhi ka sapna hota hai ki ki ek badiya Naukri kare or acha Paise kamaye, Job achi jagha lage uske liye sab log khub mhenat kar padai karte hai or Naukri ki teyari karte hai. Ye to sabko pata hai ki achi Job ke liye kitna Computation hai. To aese me aap chalege ki agar aapke layak koi Naukri Job ho to uski jankari aapko sahi time par mile. Kuch Time Piche jaye to Jab bhi koi Job vacancy nikalti thi to usko Newspaper me diya jata tha par ab sab kuch bhut fast ho gaya hai or iss fast speed jindgi me aapko bhi fast hona padega jab hi aap kuch badiya kar sakte hai. Agar aapki Padai Puri ho chuki hai or aap ab Naukri Talas kar rahe hai to aapko Internet ki madad leni hi padegi. Aap Badi aasani se internet par apki qualification ke hisab se Job ko Search kar sakte hai. Internet Par Bhut se aesi website hai jo Job ki jankari deti hai, aapko sirf karna hai ye un websites par ja kar dekhna hai ki aapke liye abhi konsi Jobs uplabd hai. In websites ko Job Portal bhi kaha jata hai Q ki unpar naukri ki har jankari di jati hai. Mene Internet Par Search karke Aapke liye Top Job Websites ki list banai hai jiski madad se aap badi aasani se sab website par ja kar apne liye koi Job hai to search kar sakte hai. Also Read Micro Job Website Se Online Paisa Kaise Kamaye in Hindi Naukri.com India ki Top Job Portal hai jo 1997 me banai gai thi. Is website par 80hajar se jada Jobs ki jankari hai jo bhut hi jada hai or agar aap uspar regiester karte hai to aapko jab bhi aapke liye koi Naukri niklegi to uski jankari aapko Email par mil jayegi. Alexa Rank Global Rank 420, Rank in India 33 Naukri.com Indeed.co.in ek or dusri India ki Famus Job Website hai jo 2004 me start hui thi. Is website par Aap apna Resume submit karke Job ke liye online bhi apply kar sakte hai wo bhi bilkul free. Is website ka Mobile App bhi hai to aap uski madad se Mobile par bhi wo sari jankari pa sakte hai. Alexa Rank Global Rank 1,545, Rank in India 105 Indeed.co.in Shine.com bhi ek badi website hai jo 2008 me start hui thi or ye Hindustan Time Group ki hai. Is website par 2 lakh se jada Jobs ki jankari hai jo lagbhag 9400 Companies me hai. Is Website par jo regiester user hai uski sankiya bhi 1 crore se jada hai. Aap iski help le sakte hai apne liye badiya Job search karne me. Alexa Rank Global Rank 2,257, Rank in India 170 Shine.com Timesjobs 2004 me start hui thi or iss website ka bhi acha naam hai JoB Portals website me. Is website par 2.5 lakh se jada Jobs ki information is website par hai. Iss website me 1000 log kaam karte hai or Jobs ki jaankari la kar uspar dalte hai. Alexa Rank Global Rank 2,709, Rank in India 197 TimesJobs.com Ye bhi ek bhut badi Portal hai Jobs information ke liye, jisme aap Job ko search karne ke liye alag filter se search kar sakte hai jese, Experience, location, income kitni chaiye, konsi fild or bhi bhut hai. Aap ispar apna account bana kar apna resume bhi submit kar sakte hai to fir jab bhi koi New Job aayegi to uski jankari aapko apne email par mil jayegi. Alexa Rank Global Rank 2,728, Rank in India 192 Monsterindia.com Glassdoor bhi ek Job site hai jisme Company ke ware me reviews ke sath sath Jobs ki information bhi di jati hai or iske aalawa bhi bhut kuch hai. Glassdoor 2007 se banai gai thi or is website me Engineering, Marketing, Architecture, Management, etc fields ki jobs ki jankari milti hai. Inka Android App bhi hai to mobile par bhi information le sakte hai. Alexa Rank Global Rank 2,827, Rank in India 185 GlassDoor.co.in FreshersWorld bhi ek Top Website hai jispar Job Vacancy ki jankari milti hai or ye website Freshers ke liye or jada achi hai, jinhone abhi apni padai complete ki hai or ab job search kar rahe hai unko isse help mil sakti hai. Alexa Rank Global Rank 4,484, Rank in India 344 FreshersWorld.com Careesma.in 2010 me banai gai thi or ye bhi Jobs ki jankari ki achi website hai. Is Site par lagbhag 70,000 jobs ki jankari uplabd hai. Aap ispar apni profile bana kar Job ke liye apply kar sakte hai. Alexa Rank Global Rank 6,779, Rank in India 499 Careesma.in FreshersLive bhi aesa naam hai jo Jobs Information ki fild me suna hoga, Is website par bhut jobs ki jankari di jati hai jisme ye kuch main category Technology, Banking, Finance, Marketing, Human Resource, Management, etc. FreshersLive par har mahine 50,000 log apna resume submit karte hai isse aap andaja laga sakte hai is website ki popularity ka. Alexa Rank Global Rank 9,265, Rank in India 692 FreshersLive.com Placementindia.com year 1997 me launched hui thi jo Weblink.in Pvt. Ltd. company ki hai.
