Hum internet par hmesa in word ko padhte hai ki blogging me kaise success ho, ek successfull bloggers kaise bane etc. lekin aaj hum jiss topic par baat karege woh isse bahut alag hai kyoki aaj hum blogging me hone wali galtiyo ke bare me padhege ki ek bloggers blogging me kyo fail hota hai aur woh kon kon si aisi galti karta hai jiske karan woh ek fail bloggers kahlata hai. Aaj kal india me bloggers ki sankya bahut teji se badh rahi hai aur jo bhi naye bloggers blogging start kar rahe hai unme se kuch hi success ho paa rahe hai baki sab fail ho rahe hai. Akhir log blogging me fail kyo hote hai unhi kuch karan par hum iss article me baat karege ki ek aasafal bloggers hone ke kya kya karan ho sakte hai. To chalo dekhte hai ki ek aasafal bloggers apne blogging career me kya kya galtiya karta hai. Ye ek aisi galti hai jo bahut se new blogger karte hai. Maine bhi starting me ye galti ki thi ki mai bhi apne post ka heading bina kuch soche samjhe kuch bhi rakh deta tha leking baad me muje iska anubhao hua ki article ka heading bhi ek bahut hi importent role play karta hai. ek accha bloggers apne blog post ki heading hmesa seo friendly rakhta hai. Isliye apne article ka heading hmesa seo friebdly rakhe. Seo friendly heading rakhne ka mtlab SEO Friendly Title Kaise Likhe uski Detail me jankari yaha di hui hai or Blog Post Title Likhne Ke 6 Badiya Tips bhi jarur pade. Ye ek bahut hi common baat ho gai hai aur sabhi new bloggers ye mistake karte hai kyoki maine dekha hai ki bahut se new blogger apna bahut jyada time facebook, whatsup par Waste kar dete hai unko lagta hai ki social media par full day active rahna unke blog ke liye fhyade ke kaam hai to mai unko bata du ki agar aap apna jyada time Bina kisi fhayde ke social media par Waste kar rahe hai. Yadi aap apna time social media par Waste karte hai to iska mtlab aap apne blog ko Aage lekar jane ke liye nahi soch Rahe hai. Aapne notice kiya hai ki nahi lekin maine notice kiya hai ki sabhi top bloggers apna jyada time social media par nahi Waste karte hai balki woh apna jyada time apne kaam par lagte hai. Mai aapse ye nahi kah raha hu ki aap social media use karna hi band kar de mai aapse ye kah raha hu ki aap social media par ek limit ke sath time spend kare. Aap jitna time social media par par Waste karte hai agar utna hi time aap apne blog par focus kare to mai yakin ke sath kah sakta hu ki aapka blog aur teji se improved hoga. Isliye social media par apna jyaad time naa Waste kare aap ek din me 1-2hour se jyada time social media par naa spend kare. Ye Jarur Pade Jaha tak mera manana hai new bloggers ka blogging me fail hone ka sabse bada karan yahi hai ki woh bina menhat kiye hue article ko Copy Pasting karte hai. ek baat aap apne man me bhaitha le aap kabhi bhi Copy Pasting karke blogging me success nahi ho sakte. Aap kintne bhi smart tarike se Copy Pasting kare ek na ke din google aapko find kar hi lega aur jiss din aapka blog ko google spam ki list me daal diya uss din se hi aapke blog ka future ka the end ho jayega. Yadi aapko blogging me success hona hai to article ko copy pasting karna band karna padege. agar aap article ko copy past kar rahe hai to aap kewal apna time Waste kar rahe hai kyoki copy past article ka koi future nahi hota hai kyoki iss tarah ke article ko nahi google me rank milta hai aur naa hi iss tarah ke article se traffic ata hai. isliye blogging me success hone ke liye apne khud ka article likhna start karo. Ye Bhi Jarur Padna Chaiye Aapko Bina article ko padhe publish karna ek aur impotent issu hai. Jab hum koi article ko likh kar publish karne jate hai to hum uss time usko acchi tarah se nahi padhte hai Jiss karan bahut se word me kuch naa kuch mistake rah jata hai. Ye aapke sath hi nahi mere sath bhi hota hai. lekin mai isko hmesa sudhrane ki kosih karta hu kyoki aapke article me hue ek bhi mistake aapke reader ko confused karta hai. Agar aap apne article me kuch mistake karke publish kar diya to jab koi reader uss article ko pdhega aur jab usko woh mistake word milega to woh sochega ki isko to word hi sahi sahi likhne nahi aa raha hai blogging kya khak ayega. Isi tarah aur bhi bahut tarah ke khayal hmaare reader par mistake kiye gaye word ko padh kar ata hai. Isliye kisi bhi article ko publish karne se pahle ussko acchi tarah se padh le har ek word ko aachi tarah se padh kar hi article ko publish kare. Article ko Likh kar turant Publish naa kare. Pure Article ko likh kar Draft me save karde. fir kuch time baad apba minf fresh karke fir pure article ko achi se pade. or jitno bhi galtiya aapne ki hai unko sahi karke Article ko Publish karde. Also Read kisi bhi comment ka response dena Ya naa dena ek bahut hi importent part hota hai blogging me. Ek bloggers ke taur par aapko har ke comment ka aachi tarah se answer dena cahiye kyoki aap ek blogger hai. Kuch logo ko dekha jata hai ki woh apne comment ka lazy response dete hai. Response commentinh ke aisi value hai jo aapka trust aapke reader ke upar badhti hai. Agar aap apne har ek reader ke comment ka Answer dete hai to uss reader ka aapke upar trust badh jata hai Aur woh reader bhi aapse kush hota hai ki mere comment ka value blog founder smjh raha hai. Commenting Response ek tarah ka mind game hai jisko hum apne raeder ke upar kehalte hai. Isliye har ek comment ka answer bahut hi smart tarike se de. Must Read Badiya Comment karte Samay Rakhe in Baat ka Dhyan Comment Tips jab ek naya bloggers apne blogging Jurney ko start karta hai to woh apne traffic status ko kam se kam daily 50 se bhi jyada baar dekhta hai. Agar aap bhi aisa kar rahe hai to aap ek bahut badi mistake kar rahe hai, kyoki agar aap apne traffic ko baar baar dekhte hai to iska sidha Asar aapke dimak par jata hai agar aapka traffic thik ata hai tab to aapka dimak normal rahega lekin agar aapka traffic kam ata hai tab aapko tension hoga aur aapke dimak me bhi pata nahi kis kis type ke khayal ayege aur Aisi condition me aap apne blogging work ko bhi acchi tarah se nahi kar payege. kyoki aapke dimak me hmesa kam traffic hone ka tension cahlega. Isliye kabhi bhi traffic ke bare me jyada naa soche balki aapne kaam ke bare me soche agar aapka kaam badiya hoga to traffic yakinna ayegi. daily baar baar traffic status ko dekhna band kare aur uniqe aur fresh content likhne ke bare me soche. Yadi aap uniqe aur fresh content likhte hai to aapke article ko aapke visitor bahut pasnd karege aur agar aapke article ko log psand karege to woh visitor aapke blog par dubara jarur ayege. Also Read Apne Naye Blog me Traffic Kaise Badaye Maine bahut se bloggers ko dekha hai ki woh daily article ko publish karte phir bhi unke blog par traffic nahi ata hai. mere pass kuch mail bhi aya tha ki dear sir hum regulary apne blog ko update karte hai phir bhi mere blog ka traffic kam hai. in sabka main karan hai promoting kewal article ko pulish kar dene se sab kuch nahi hota hai usko badiya tarike se promote bhi karna hota hai. Pade Post ko Publish karne ke baad kaha kaha Promote kare Achi Traffic ke liye. India me jitna time hum article ko likhne me lagate hai usse 2guna time humko usko promote karne me lagna cahiye. Iska mtlab jab aap naya article ko publish kare phir uske baad uski jamkar promotion kare. Aur apne article ko internet ke har ke jagah par promote kare jaise ki apne article ko facebook page, facebook group, google plus twitter etc jagah par promote kare, Ek naya blog post publish karne ke baad uska kaha kaha promote kare uske bare me maine pahle hi article publish kiya hai unko follow kare. Bhut log Blog bana to lete hai par usko achi se disign nahi karte usse hota ye hai ki visitor usko achi se chala nahi pate or ye bhi ek bada karan hai ki fir us blog par visitor nahi aate. Badiya design ke liye blog me acha template use kare jo Mobile Friendly bhi ho taki mobile me bhi achi se khule. Upar bataye gaye sabhi reason ek fail bloggers hone ki Nisani deta hai! Ab aapko Deside karna hai ki aapko ek successfull bloggers banana hai ya phir fail bloggers. Agar hum in sabhi chizo ko dhyaan me rakh kar blogging kare to sayad hum ek acche bloggers ban sakte hai . Ek fail bloggers hi Aage chal kar ek supper successfull bloggers banata hai. Aapko mere ye article kaisa laga apna view comment box me jaura de aur iss post ko share kare taki dusare bloggers ko bhi isse help mil sake. AGar aapko inke aalawa koi Karan Pata hai jo Un Successful blogger karte hai to wo bhi comment karke jarur bataye. Ye Bhi Pade

Jada-tar log apne Computer me ke Internet WiFi se hi chalate hai, Bhut bar aesa ho jata hai ki hame apna Mobile bhi Wifi se connect karna hai par hame Password yaad nahi rhata, Aaj ham ussi ke bare me baat karege ki kaise Connected WiFi ka Password pata kiya jaye Computer me or Mobile me bhi. or kaise wifi ka password kaise pata kare. WiFi ka Password pata karna bhut aasan hai bas hame uski process pata hona chaiye ki pata kese karte hai. to chaliye jante hai wifi ka password kaise pata kare. Also Read Mobile se Paise Kamaye 55 Hajar App Download karke Agar aapke Computer me WiFi Connect to hai par aapko uska Password kya hai wo nahi pata to aap apne Computer me Command Prompt ki madad pata kar sakte ho. Chaliye dekhte hai step by step kaise wifi password kaise pata kare Step 1 Start Menu me ja kar Search kar CMD or Fir Command Prompt Open kare Step 2 Command Prompt Open karne ke baad usme ye Code dale netsh wlan show profile nameHindiMeHelp.com keyclear Jo Code hai usme HindiMeHelp.com ki jagha apne WiFi ka Naam ya fir SSID jarur badal de. Step 3 Ab Command Prompt me Code Dalne ke baad Enter kare.

Dosto mera naam Govind hai aur main www.kyakyukaise.com ka founder hu. Is article mein main aapke sath 6 mahine mein blog ko successful banana ke tips share kar rha hu. Mere blog ko abhi 6 month hi hue hai aur ye sabhi tips mene apne blog par apply kiye hai aur aaj mere blog ka daily pageview 18000 se adhik hai. Vese to mujhe ye point sab se akhri me likhna chahiye tha par sabse pahle batane ka reason ye hai ki aapne agar blog shuru kiya hai ya blogging shuru karne ke bare mein soch rahe ho to ye point sab se important hai. Aksar hum kuch blogs ki earning dekh kar usse inspire hote hai aur mann banate hai ki ab main bhi blogging shuru karunga. Par jadatar log karte kya hai, jis blog se inspire hue usi blog se milta julta naam le kar usi ke articles apne blog mein ghuma fira kar daalna shuru kar dete hai. Ye bilkul nahi sochte ki us topic ke bare mein knowledge hai bhi ya nahi. Dosto jis cheej se bhi life mein inspiration mile jaruri nahi ki success ke liye aapko bhi wahi karna hoga. Aap us blogger ke idea ko nahi balki uski mehnat, dedication aur passion ko copy karo aur apne interest, knowledge ke anusar blog banao. Aap kin kin topics par blog bana sakte hai uski list yaha hai, unme se aap dekhe ki aapka interest kis chij me hai jispar aap likh sakte hai, uspar apna blog banaye. kisi Website se Copy karne ke kya faide hai or kya nuksan hai wo bhi aapko pata hona cjhaiye. Chalo is baat ko technically smjhne ki koshish karte hai. Agar aap pahle se chal rahe kisi bhi blog ke articles copy paste karoge to vo google mein acha rank nahi kar payenge kyuki jo website pahle se acha kaam kar rahi hai uski page authority aapki site se kahi jada hai, aur jab aap ki posts rank nahi karengi tab aapko traffic bhi nahi milega. Search Engine me Post ko Rank dilane ke liye ye post bhi jarur padhe Blogging ke shuruati samay mein bahut se blogger design par dhyaan dete hai aur jada se jada attractive banana me time lagate hai. Mera ye manana hai ki jo visitor aap ki site par aa rha hai vo aapka content padhne aa rha hai site ka design dekhne nahi. Ek kahawat to aapne suni hi hogi mitthi dukan fika pakwan aap is ka meaning bhi smjhte hi honge. Aap site ka design kitna bhi acha kar lo agar quality content par dhyan nahi doge to vo turant aapki site se chla jayega or aapka site ka Bounce Rate bad jayega jo bilkul bhi acha nahi hai SEO ki najar se. Aesa bhi nahi ki aap apne blog ko design hi naa kare, par ek war badiya design karke Blog par Daily New Post dale. Aap apni site me badiya Mobile Friendly, SEO Friendly Template use kare or usko badiya se setup karke apni Blog ke contant par dhiyan de or badiya SEO Friendly Post Dale. SEO ki Puri Jankari aapko yaha Milegi Naye bloggers ki sab se badi pareshani yahi hoti hai ki kya likhu. Dosto content likhne se pahle kisi notebook par kuch points likhe. Aap ko kis topic mein knowledge hai, aaj kal us topic se related latest trend kya hai. Agar aap country specific content likh rahe hai to us country mein is topic par kya chal rha hai iski jankari le. Ab aap apne topic se related dusri sites search kare aur jane ki dusri sites kya cheej cover nahi kar rahi, aap us par focus kare, kyuki jo dusri site information pahle se hi de rahi hai aap bhi same wahi bataoge to koi fayda nahi. Visitors ko kuch naya aur different batane ki koshish kare. Ye sirf ek example tha aap content likhne ke apne bhi tarike tyar kar sakte ho. Also Read Jis keyword par post likh rahe hai usse milte julte dusre keywords ko bhi post mein shamil kare. Dusre keywords janne ke liye aap google search ki madad le aur apna keyword type kare fir jo keyword search mein suggest hote hai unhe likh le aur posts mein add kare. Ye Bhi Padhe Aajkal naye bloggers ek post likhte hai aur teji se uske link facebook groups aur dusre forums par post karne lagte hai. Is cheej se time ke sath aap apni energy bhi waste kar rahe ho, isse badhiya hoga ki kuch ache backlink banaye jaye, jisse site ko rank karne mein fayda hoga. Agar aapko Apni Post Promote hi karni hai to aap ye padiye New Blog Post ko Promote karne ke 15 Tarike Backlinking off page SEO mein aata hai jo ki ek important part hai. Aaj ke samay mein google ne apni algorithms mein aese badlav kiye hai ki agar aap spamming karoge to vo pakad lega. Yakin maniye dosto ye changes hum bloggers ke liye faydemand sabit hue hai, kyuki ab aap ko backlink ki quantity nahi quality badhani hai. 100 bad quality link se behtar 10 quality link hai. Aaiye backlink banana ki strategy tips padhe Backlink Kya hai or wo SEO ke liye Q jarur hai uski jankari yaha hai. or Backlink banane ke liye Web Directory me blog ko submit kare. Jin logo ne abhi blogging shuru ki hai aur jo shuru karna chahte hai unse yahi salah hai ki aap jitna sikh sakte ho sikho. Sikhne ke liye google, youtube aur Social Media ki madad le sakte hai. Dosto Ummid hai aapko is article me jarur kuch aesa mila hoga jiski madad se aap aapni blogging me acha karege or apne blog ko Success taraf le jayege. Ye ek Guest Post hai, HMH.pe Guest Post karne ke liye yaha click kare

facebook se paise kaise kamaye ye sabal aapke mind me jarur aaya hoga, agar aap FB hadd se jada use karte hoto. taki jo time aap timepass ke liye bita rahe ho usse paise bhi kama pao. Facebook jo sirf Naam hi khafi hai, isse Jada logo ko batane ki jarurat nahi padti hai Facebook kya hai. Agar koi Internet use karta hai to uska Facebook par Account hoga hi hoga. Facebook se ham apne Disto or Ristedaro se to jude rha sakte hai, par kya aapko pata hai fb se paise kaise kamaye ja sakte hai. Kuch Log Facebook jitna kaam hota hai utna use karte hai par kuch logo ki to aadat hoti hai ki jo bhi karte hai wo facebook par share karte hai, Ghanto Facebook open karke bethe rhate hai. Facebook chalana buri baat nahi hai par ek limit se jada Facebook chalana apne dusre kaamo ko chaodd kar wo galat hai. Agar ham kuch bhi karte hai jisme hamara time barbad ho or hame usse kuch nahi mile to wo karna bewakufi hai, par agar hame jisme maja aata hai or ham wo hi kare or agar usse ham paise bhi kamaye to uska maja hi alag hai. Logo ka Sapna hota hai ki wo wahi kaam kare jisme unka interest ho or ussi se acha paisa bhi kamaye. To Agar aapko Facebook chalane me bada maja aatas hai or aap ghanto facebook chalate hai to aapko ye jarur pata hona chaiye ki Facebook se kaise paise kama sakte hai. to chaliye Jaante hai Facebook se paise kamane ke tarike. Ye Bhi Pade Whatsapp Se Paise Kaise Kamaye Uski Jankari in Hindi Facebook Free hai wo naa hamse paise leta hai account banane ka or naa hame facebook chalane ka ek rupaa milta hai, Par ham ye jaante hai ki Facebook par kitne logo ke account hai to ham facebook ki madad se un logo tak phuch sakte hai or uske jariye paise jarur kama sakte hai. Ek Baat me aapko sabse phele clear kar du ek war or ki Facebook hame kabhi koi paisa nahi degi, par Ham Facebook ke jariye paise kama sakte hai. Simple sa fanda hai, Agar hame kahi bhi paise kamana hai to hamare pass uske liye log hona chaiye jinke jariye ham paise kama sake. Tikh ussi trha agar ham facebook par paise kamane ka soch rahe hai to hamare pass bhut se facebook par log hona chaiye jinke jariye hame paise kamana hai. Facebook par Apni ek Community banaye jisko Log Follow kare or join kare. To sab se Pheli chij jo aapke pass hona chaiye wo hai Facebook Page ya Facebook Group. or isme ache jada Like or Followers bhi hona chaiye jab koi kuch soch sakte hai. jitne jada user utne jada paise kamane ka moka. To Facebook par paise kamane ke liye Facebook Page ya Group hai aapke pass or usme bhut sare members bhi hai. to ab chaliye dekh lete hai kya kya tarike ho sakte hai Facebook se paise kamane ke. Kisi bhi Product ko Affiliate link share kar sakte hai Facebook par. Fir agar koi uspar click karke kharidta hai to hame uska commission milega. Ham Apni Affiliate link Agar hamara Facebook Page hai to ham uspar share kar sakte hai, ya fir Facebook par jo Groups hai unme share kare. jitni bhi e-commerce websites hai hamm unpar apna Affiliate account bana kar aasani se kisi bhi product ki Affiliate link pa sakte hai, or us link ko share karke paise kama sakte hai. Tip Jis Bhi Product ki Affiliate link share kare wo interesting hona chaiye, ya uspar acha discount mil raha ho taki log uspar click karke turant usko kharid le or hame uska commission mil jaye. Aapne Dekha hoga Facebook par kitne sare Page hai. Facebook Page Jadatar to Time Pass karne ke liye ya fir kisi chij ka promotion karne ke liye banaye jate hai. taki jisne hamare Page ko Like kiya ho usko hamari jankari mil jaye. Bhut war hota hai kuch company apne promotion karne ke liye Facebook Page ko Kharid leti hai jinpar phele se bhut sare like ho. taki wo apna promotion jada logo tak kar sake. To agar aapke Pass Facebook Page hai to aap suko sell karke paise kama sakte hai. Par sart ye hai ki uspar bhut jada like hona chaiye or Page active hona chaiye jisme har post par bhut sare like or comment aate ho. Jese Facebook Page ham sell kar sakte hai wese hi Facebook Groups bhi ham sell kar sakte hai agar usme members ki sankiya achi hai to. Also Read Facebook Par Single Name kaise Set kare uski Trick Internet par bhut si badi badi website hai jo apne promotion ke liye bhut kharch karti hai, wo dekhte hai ki jis Facebook Page par jada like hai uspar apni site ki link share karwai jaye taki or jada visitor unki site aaye. To agar aapke Pass koi Facebook Page hai or uspar lakho me likes hai to aap post share karke unse paise le sakte ho. shopsomething.com ek achi website hai, jispar ham account bana kar apne page ke liye website ki link paa sakte hai. jinko page par share karne par hame paise milege. Short link kya hai or usse kaise paise kamaye uski jankari yaha hai. Aap kisi bhi Important link ko short karke Groups or Facebook page par share kar sakte hai. to jin logo ko uski jarurat hogi or uss link par click karege or usse aapki income hogi. PPD matlab Pay Per Download. isme hame aesi download links ko share karna hai jispar se agar koi download kare to uske hame paise mile. Internet par aesi bhi bhut si websites hai jo PPD ke hisab se hame paise deti hai. Agar aapke Pass koi Talent hai, koi aesi chij hai jisko aap logo ko sikha sakte hai, to Facebook ek acha jariya ho sakta hai aapko online pada kar paise kamane ka. Facebook par Padha kar paise kamane ke liye aap Facebook par Secret Group Banaye or usme Members ko Join karne ke paise le. iss trha ham Facebook Group ki madad se unhe padha sakteh or paise kama sakte hai. Jarur Pade Online Teaching Padha karke Paise kaise kamaye Facebook par kya hota hai wo to aapko pata hi hoga. Like, Comment, Share . to agar aap ye sab karke paise kamana chate hai to aapko uske liye ek website hai jiski madad leni padegi. Like Comment Share karke paise kaise kamaye uski puri jankari yaha par hai. Agar Aapka koi Business hai ya Website hai to Facebook ek bhut acha platform hai logo tak usko phuchane ka. uske liye hame hamare Business ka Page banana hoga, to jitne bhi log usko like karege to hamari jankari untak unke facebook account me phuchti rahegi jab bhi ham post karege page me. Website ke liye to Facebook Page bhut hi jaruri hai, Q ki Facebook se direct wo hamari site par aa jayege link par click karke. New Post Publish karne par ham uski jankari Link Share karke de sakte hai Page ki madad se. To agar ham hamare Website or Business ko badayege facebook ki madad se to ham kha sakte hai ki ham Facebook se paise kama rahe hai. Agar aapka Facebook Page hai, to aap usse bhi ache khase paise kama sakte hai. Q ki agar jada Like hote hai Page par to bhut si website ya companys hoti hai jo apne promotion karane ke liye paise deti hai. jisme sirf hame FB Page par uske ware me post dalni hoti hai. To Friends in Tariko ko jaan kar aapko jarur kuch na kuch aesa pata chala hoga jo aapko nahi pata tha. Or agar Aap Facebook bhut jada chalate hai to me aapse khanna chauga ki aap in tariko ko use kare taki aapki Facebook se income bhi ho sake. Aapke jarur aese Friends hoge jo Facebook bhut jada use karte hai to aap unse ye Post jarur share kare. Aapke ek Share se kya pata kisi Facebook user ka najariya hi badal jaye Facebook chalane ka or wo kuch paise kama le facebook ki madad se. Ye Bhi Pade

Jab tak koi bhi article meaningful or helpful nahi hota, koi bhi visitors apke blog par dubara ana pasand nahi karega, aur yah SEO ke liye bhi bad effect hai ki apke blog ki return visitors bahut hi kam hai. Agar apko apne blog ke visitors ko apne blog ke article ke jariye se kuch wakt tak rokana chahte hai aur chahte hai ki dubara aaye aur apke blog ke sath me jude rahe to uske liye apko apne article me Jaan dalni hogi. Maine is post me kuch esi tips ko share ki hai jiske jariye se aap apne article ko professional bana sakte hai aur agar apka article apke blog ke visitors ki help kar rha hai to apko apne blog ka koi bhi SEO karne ki jarurat nah hia. Kyonki, User ki help karne wala article likhne se acha SEO koi ho bhi nahi sakta. To chaliye shuru karte hai is article ka main topic. Aap apne article ko kitne time me likh dete hai? Kya apko bar-bar article likhne ke bich me sochna padata hai ki ab aage konsa point sahi hoga? Outline create karne se apko yah sochne ki jarurat nahi hogi ki ab aage apko kya type karna hai kyonki outline me apko pure article ka ek model taiyar kiya jata hai. Outline create karne ke liye MS word ya apna koi bhi Editor open kare. Mere Pass WhiteBoard hai to me uska use karta hu is kaam ke liye. Phir kuch is tarah se apne content ki outline create kare. Outline create karke article ko meaningful bana sakte hai, article ka point ko achhe tarike se samjha sakte hai. Article likhne ki direction pata chal jati hai, andhere me teer marne wale kam khatam ho jate hai. Outline create karne karne ke liye dusre article ki bhi madad le sakte hai. Outline ko simply Subheading bana kar article likhna bhi shuru karde. Ye Bhi Pade Kam time me jyada likhne se apka sara time type karne me nahi jayega, kuch wakt article ki quality ko badhane me bhi de sakte hai. Article ke outline create karne me time dena profitable hai. Lekin typing me bahut time dene se apka time waste hoga. Aap Online Type Tools ki madad se bhi apni typting speed bada sakte hai. Jab ek article ko likhane baithate hai tab us article ko likhne ke bich me kitne break lete ho? Almost people ek article ko pura hi bina break liye likh dete hai jo ek bad idea hai. Agar article ko likhna ke bich me break liya jaye to article ko aur bhi quality kar sakte hai. Abhi me ek technique batane wale hu jiska name hai pomodoro technique. Jisme article ko continue 25 minute tak likha jata hai aur bich me 5 minutes ka break liya jata hai. Yah isi tarah agar 4 break lete ho to total 20 minutes ka break hota jata hai. Jisse har break ke bad me focus karne ki energy badhati hai. Pomodoro technique ko online tool se bhi kiya ja sakta hai, yah tool ki kafi help kar sakta hai. Pomodoro ki online tool ki webiste tomato-timer.com Ye Bhi Pade Ek image article ke topic ko explain karti hai, apko ek meaningful professional image ko use karna chahiye jo eye caching ho. kai log image ko Google pe search karke hi lete hai lekin in me se kai to copy rights ke hote hai jiski wajah se apke Google AdSense ke BAN hone ka khatra hota hai aur SEO ke liye copy image use karna sahi nahi hai. Free image without copy right aap in sites se download kar sakte hai, Google se Free image kaise download kre uski jankari yaha hai. Ye bhi Kaam ki Post Ye technique aur tips maine apke sath me share kiye hai, jiska use karke apne article ko aur bhi better aur meaningful kar sakte hai. Agar iske alawa bhi apke pas me better tips hai to jo aap apne blog article ke liye use karte hai to use comment ke madhyam se bataye.

Zee News ke editor in chief Sunil Chaudhary ne kaha tha ki yadi Internet koi country man liya jaye to to Bitcoin uski currency hogi. 10 50-60 , Bitcoin Kya Hai ? Isse Kaise Kamaye Free Bitcoin Kaise Kamaye Ye baat sahi sabit ho rahi hai. Aaj people bitcoin me itna jyada invest kar chuke hai ki bitcoin ko invent karane vale Satoshi Nakamoto World Richest Person ki list me 247 ve place par aa chuke hai. J0 ab Samsung Group ke vice chairman Jay Y Lee se keval 9 place piche rah gaye hai. Satoshi Nakamoto at 247 in List of Richest Person in World Jabki 9 year pahle koi unhen janata bhi nahi tha. Vaise personally unhen abhi tak koi nahi jan saka. Is baat ko main yahi chhodta hun aur post topic ki baat karte hai. India me Bicoin Kaise Buy Sell kare ya Trading Kare Main aapko bata dun ki bitcoin buy ya sell karana Bitcoin Trading kahlata hai . Jo bilkul hi simple. Yah bilkul usi tarah jaise aap koi chij online kharidate hai ya sell kar dete hai. Bas isme thoda antar ye hai ki bitcoin ki price every minutes me up-down hoti rahti hai. Aise me aapko bitcoin ki price every hours janate rahana behad jaruri hai. Taaki aap badhe hue price par bitcoin sell kar big profit earn kar sakte hai. Vahi iske ult bhi ho sakta hai. isliye bitcoin ki price check karte rahana , bitcoin trading ki sabse important task hai. Ab main aapko India ke No-1 Bitcoin Exchange Jaha biotin buy sell karte hai Zebpay se kaise Bitcoin trading karte hai vo batayunga. Uske sabse pahle jaruri hai. Zebpay par Account Create Kaise Kare 1. Zebpay app ko install kare. 2.ab mobile number enter kare, OTP dal kar verify kare Verify Mobile No 3. Account PIN setup kare. Aisa PIN set kare, jo difficult ho. Yah future me Bitcoin Transaction me use hoga. Ab aapka Zebpay Account ban chukka hai. Ab Bitcoin buy karane ke liye Account Verification ki jarurat hogi. Zebpay Account Kaise Verify Kare 1. Menu icon se Verification par click kare. Verify Account 2.Ab Email-address verify kare 3. PAN Card details enter kare PAN Card copy upload kare aur Next kare 4. Bank Account details enter kare Bank Passbook copy upload kar aur Next kare 5.Ab Aadhar card ka front page aur back page upload kar aur details dale aur submit kare. Important PAN, Aadhar Card aur Bank Account aapka same name hona chahiye. Aadhar card verify turant hi ho jata hai. Par PAN Card aur Bank Account Verification me 3 day ka time lag sakte hai. Jab aapka account fully verified ho jayega tab aap bitcoin buy Sell kar sakte hai. Zebpay par Bitcoin Kaise Buy Kare Zebpay par Bitcoin buy karane se pahle Amount deposit karana hoga. Important Bitcoin buy karte time REF48992964 code enter kare. Aapko Free Rs 100 milega. 1. Deposit par click kare Deposit Amount Buy Bitcoin 2.Amount enter kare 3.Ab Payment mode select kare. Important RTGSNEFTIMPS se amount transfer me ek din lag jata hai. Jabki Payment Gateway yani Netbanking se 30 minutes lagte hai. Jab payment successfully ho jaye to aap Buy button par click kar bitcoin buy kar sakte hai. Zebpay Par Bitcoin Kaise Sell Kare Sell button par click kare aur us time ki bitcoin price ke base par aapko sell ki gai bitcoin ki sold amount milega. Jise aap Withdraw par click bank me transfer kar sakte. Sell Bitcoin Aapka amount 24 hours me transfer ho jayega. Zebpay par Smart Bitcoin Trading Kaise Kare Generally bitcoin buy sell karana, bitcoin trading kahalata hai. Is tarike se trading karane se aap jyada profit kamayenge, iski possibility bahut hi kam hai. Because kab bitcoin ki price increase hogi ya decrease hogi, koi nahi janata. Ye price aapke sone ke bad bhi badh sakti hai aur highest ho sakti hai. tab to aap big profit earn se rah jayenge. Isi situation me lowest price me bitcoin buy nahi kar sakenge. Par aap Smart Bitcoin Trading se big profit earn kar sakte hai. Isme is baat ki koi matter nahi karta hai ki aap so rahe ya jag rahe hai. Aaiye janate hai Lowest Price Par Bitcoin Buy Karana 1.Aap Zebpay App ke home page par bid hammer icon ko click kare. Bidding on Zebpay Bidding option on Zebpay 2.ab rate me, jis rate par bitcoin buy karana chahte hai, use enter kare. 3.ab amount enter kare 4.quantity box ko change naa kare. 5. Confirm bid kare. 6.ab PIN dale, aapka order confirm ho jayega. Jab aapka order current bitcoin rate se match ho jayega to Zebpay use automatically execute kar dega. Highest Price Par Bitcoin Sell Karna Isi tarah aap ask hand icon par click kar bitcion ko highest rate par automatically sell ke liye set kar sakte hai. Important Ab aap bitcoin trading karane se pahle jan le ki world ke popular economic experts kah chuke hai ki bitcoin price predict karana impossible hai. Iski price minutes me bhi down ho sakti hai. Aise me yadi koi advise deta hai ki bitcoin ki price keval badhegi to vo bilkul galat hai. Isliye aap apni sense ke base par bitcoin trading kare. Have Good Luck !! Hope ye post aapko pasand aaya hoga. Vaise Aapko kya lagta hai, Online Money earn karne ke liye Bitcoin behatar option hai?

Hi Friends, Mera naam Vivek Darji he or Me Besthinditricks ka Owner hu jo motivational story ka blog he. aur ye ek Guest Post he. aur aaj hum baat karenge ki mobile hang problem solution in hindi aapke liye ek best news he kyuki ye post aapke liye bahot kaam aane wali he muje laga mere bahot se friends phone karke bolte he ki mobile hang ho rahahe kuch kardo ab unko bolta hu ki yaha baithe me aapke mobile ko kese thik karu aap hi batao isliye me ye post update kar rahahu ki yahape wo dekhle unko link yaha se hi me link bhej dunga. Main point pe hum jaate he to pehle to hamara android mobile hona chahiye kyuki mera exprience sirf android ka hi he or jyada tar log android hi use kar rahe he. Read Internet se Free Call kare kisi bhi Number par hang phone ko kaise thik kare agar aapko ye janna hai to aapko pata hona chaiye mobile hang kyu hota hai, taki jitne bhi karan hai Mobiole Hang hone ke unse bach kar rhe sake or apne Mobile ko Hang hone se bacha sake. Tip 1 aapke mobile me jo bhi anti virus or jo cleaning ke apps installed he unhe pehle hi uninstall karde kyuki mera jab tak ka exprience he tab tak ka mene kitne ke mobile ese hi thik kiye he. Tip 2 ab aapke mobile me to n jaane bahot se apps honge ab aap ko jitne kam kaam aate he unko bhi saath me uninstall karde kyuki ki ye apps aapke liye khatarnaakh ban sakte he kyuki unke dhire dhire data storage badhte jaate he or aapko pata bhi nahi chalega aapka mobile kyu hang ho rahahe. Tip 3 ye ek main point he ab aap jo bhi apps ka use nahi karte ho use force stop kardo kyuki agar wo running me hoga to aapka mobile bahoti hang hoga Tip 4 or kuch kuch apps ke data bhi clear karte raho kyuki time pe data badh jaane pe mobile hang nahi hoga kuch lemete rakho. Tip 5 ab aage kuch aapne naya phone liya ho to aapke mobile me dhada dhad app mat install kare kyuki esa karne se naya naya mobile load nahi kar sakta or kuch hi dino baad aapka mobile hang hone lag jaata he Tip 6 jyada tar log internal storage me apps install karte he to esa karne se RAM pe bhi dabaw badhega or mobile hang hone lag jaayega isliye jydatar apps ko aap ko memory card me install kare or jo bhi aapne internal me install kiya he use aap memory card me transfer karde. Tip 7 ho sake tab tak aapka internal storage ko clear rakhe mens ki aapke phone memory me mat bhariye kuch bhi or memory card me bhi kuch space rakhe jese ki aapke paas agar 16 GB ka momery card he to aapko 2-3 GB tak ki to space rakhni hi hogi. Tip 8 Agar aap internet chala te he to Data On kerne ke baad kuch der ke liye kahabhi tuch mat kariye kyuki aap jab bhi data on karte ho tab bahot si proccess on ho jaati he jese ki Whatsapp , Facebook notifications , hike ,any update etc or agar aap kahipe touch karenge to system bahoti hang hogi kyuki saamne bahot si process chal rahihe or aap or bhi chalana chahte ho to kuch notifications ko full aa jaane ka wait kare baadme unko open karle baadme hi kuch kaam kare Tip 9 baar aar aapke Memory Or Phone Memory ko pc me connect karke scan karte rahe kyoki kuch viruses hoge to wo nikaal denge Tip 10 or aap bahoti high leval ke browser use karte ho jese ki Google Chrome, morzila, ese high leval ke jo bhi browser ke clear data jarur kare kyoki jyada tar aapke mobile ko ye hi browser hang karte he un sabhi ke andar se clear cookies, clear data, clear history ye sub jarur kare kyuki aapke Mobile ki system pe bahoti kam load ho. mobile hang karne ka tarika bhi jaan lijiye, jisse koi jaan bhuj kar aapka mobile hang bhi kar sakta hai. Agar koi special cerector ka message limit se jada send karne par mobile hang ho jata hai. ye message Whatsapp par bhut chalta hai, jispar click karte hi mobile hang ho jata hai. agar aapko wo message chaiye to aap simple google par search kar lijiye Whatsapp Mobile Hang Message mene ye 10 Best tips di he ye aapke liye or aapke frds ke liye bahoti jaruri tips he kyoki aaj kal dekhe jaaye to achhe se achhe mobile isi tarah se hang ho jaate he to frds bolte rehte he ki yaar mobile hang ho rahahe Mobile hang ho rahahe. to frds is post ko aap aapke Family or Frds ke saath jarur share karna kyuki wo esi parishthi se bach sake.

Friends aaj Is Post me Mai aapko bataunga Google ke Ek New Project ke Baare me Jisko naam Diya gya hai Google AMP Google Accelerated Mobile Pages. Google AMP kya hai? AMP ko Kis liiye bnaya gya hai? And Google AMP use karne ke kya fayde hain or Google AMP Use kaise kare. Agar aap nahi jante ki Google Accelerated Mobile Pages kya hai to is Post ko padhne ke baad aap achi tarah se samajh jayenge ki Google AMP kya hai. AMP Google ka ek Open Source project hai jise PublishersBloggersWebsite Owners ke liye bnaya gya hai. AMP ki help se har koi Website Owner apni Site me Mobile-Optimized contents create kar sakta hai jo ki sabhi Devices Phone, Tablet me fast Load ho jata hai. Ham sabhi jante hai ki aaj ke time me Smartphone ek Popular Device hai and har koi Smartphone ko sabse jyada Use me lata hai. Websites me aane vala mostly traffic bhi mobile devices se hi aata hai. Isiliye Google ne apna New Project AMP start kiya because Website ka Loading time se bhi uske Traffic par bahut jyada affect padta hai. Google ka AMP project ko start karne ka main Goal ye hi hai ki vo apne users ko ek Best Mobile experience de sake and kisi bhi Type ki Website har kisi Mobile Device me bahut ki kam Time me load ho jaye taaki Users ko Site open hone ke liye wait na krna pade. Google AMP product manager ke according ek AMP-coded page ka load time 0.7 seconds hota hai jabki Non-AMP pages ko open hone me maximum 22 Seconds lagte hain jiske karan Site ke Traffic bahut hi Low ho jata hai. Google AMP ek Open Source framework hai, basically ye HTML ka faster version hai jise AMP HTML kaha jata hai. AMP pages ko javascript se Optimize ,CSS3 se customize kiya jata hai and Sabhi AMP Pgaes cached hote hai yaniki Jab bhi Website me AMP Pages enable hote hai to Website ko open karne par site ke Sirf main Contents hi load hote hai jisse Site fast load ho jati hai. AMP Page me jitne bhi extra widgets hote hai wo load nahi hote, usse site ki speed bhut fast ho jati hai. AMP ko 3 Parts me Divided kiya gya hai. AMP Html bhi ek Html language ki tarah hai but AMP Html ko customize karke Tyaar kiya gya hai. AMP Html page me bhi Regular Html tags add kiye gye hai but kuch Html tags ko AMP Specific tags se Replaced kiya gya hai. EX. img ko amp-img se replace kiya jata hai in Custom Tags ko AMP Html Components ka name diya gya hai.

Hello Blogger or Website Owners. Agar aapki website WordPress par ya self hosted hai to sidhi si baat hai aap Hosting ka use to karte hi hoge. or, agar aap lambe time se hosting use kar rahe hai to aapko kuch na kuch problem ka samna bhi karna pada hoga. or aapke mind me ye sabal bhi jarur aaya hoga. Best Hosting konsi hai , jo sasti bhi ho, Fast bhi ho, Secure bhi ho or jinki support bhi achi ho. To aaj aapko aapke iss sabal ka jabab milne wala hai, q ki me apne 6 saal ke Blogging career me bhut si hosting use ki, mhegi se mhegi bhi. sab ki kuch khasiyat to rheti hi hai, par uske sath sath kuch problem bhi hoti hai hai. par abhi jo Hosting me use kar raha hu, usko use karte hue muje 8 month ho chuke hai, or muje kisi bhi problem ka samna nahi karna pada. to ab me pure confidance ke sath khe sakta hu ki mere hisab se sabse best hosting Cloudways hai. Chaliye jante hai Cloudways kya hai or Q me isko use kar raha hu. Cloudways ek managed Cloud hosting platform hai, jisme ham jitni bhi popular Cloud Hosting Amazon, Google Cloud, Digital Ocean, Kyup, Linode or Vultr hai unko badi aasani se bina kisi technical knowledge ke use kar sakte hai. Cloudways Note Signup karte time 10HMH coupon dale, jisse extra 10 Discount mil jayega. 3 mahino ke liye. Agar Aap koi share hosting use karte hai, to unme aesa hota hai, ki jitne data ki hame jarurat hi nahi hoti utna ham le lete hai jiske paise bhi jada lagte hai or hame website ki sahi speed bhi nahi milti. Par agar aap meri trha in sab ka itna Technical knowledge nahi karte to Cloud Hosting ek sar dard ho skta hai, q ki waha naa hame cpanel milta hai, or naa my SQL, isliye jada paise dekar share hosting use karna hi sahi rheta hai. par wahi sar-dard ko khatam kiya Cloudways ne. Cloud Ways me simple clicks me ham apni site bana sakte hai Cloud Hosting me. Wese to jitni me khasiyat batao utni kam hai jab tak aap khud se use karke naa dekhe. par agar aap thode time se website chala rahe hai to aapko pata hoga kya kya chije hai jo jaruri hai ek badiya hosting me. ye upr jo point mene bataye wo sab mere hisab se ek badiya hosting me hone chaiye, jo sab muje mile cloudways me. Speed Agar aap koi dusri hosting use kar rahe hai to aapko yaha usse double speed to aaram se milegi. Dedicated Environment Aap yaha jo bhi service use karna chahe uspar pura control rahega, ki kitni memory or kitne Apps use karna hai, jo Share hosting me nahi rheta. SSD Based Hosting Powerful of simple service hai jiska response time best hai, jisko koi bhi bina technical knowledge ke use kar sakte hai. Built-in Advance Caches Caches bhi puri trha se optimize hai, jisme Memcached, Varnish and Nginx and Redis ki madad se bhut fast response milta hai. PHP 7 Ready Servers PHP 7 sabse letest or sabse fast predecessor hai, jo iss service me defult aata hai. Free WordPress Cache Plugin Website ki speed bhut jada mayne rakhti hai, or ham jo plugin use karte hai bhut war aesa hota hai ki wo sahi se supprt nahi karti to hame kuch nuksan bhi hote hai. par inki Free or sabse best cache plugin bhi hai. jiska naam hai Breeze jisko use karte hi aap apni site ki speed me fark mhesus karege. CloudwaysCDN CDN website ki speed ko badane me or server load ko kam karne me bhut kaam aate hai, or aap yaha simple click me CDN ko on kar sakte hai. or yaha sabse khas baat iski wo ye ki ye bhut sasta bhi hai agar dusre CDN se compare kare to. Automated Backups Server or site ka backup kitna jaruri hai, wo to aap jante hi hoge, q ki pata nahi kab kya badwad ho jaye or harama pura data chala jaye ya hack ho jaye. to uske liye bhi hame yaha ye faida hai ki automatic hamare server ka backup liya jada hai daily, or simple click me ham wo apne computer me bhi download kar sakte hai. Free SSL in 1 Click SSL certificate ranking factor hai ye google ne officially kaha hai, matlab ab wenbsite me HTTPS hona jaruri hai. or agar ye sahi se naa lagaye to bhut error bhi aati hai. par wo kaam yaha bhut aasan ho jata hai, q ki ham simple 1 click me SSL certificate install kar sakte hai. Dedicated Firewall Cloudways ke sabhi server protracted hai jisse agar kahi se fake traffic aaye, ya kuch attack ho site par to wo usse site ko nuksan hone se bachata hai. Regular Security Patching System regular or automatic scan karte rheta hai server ko, or agar kahi kuch gadwad dikhti hai to turant hame usko notification mil jata hai. Auto-Healing Servers Bhut war servers me kuch error bhi aa jati hai, par aapko uski bhi yaha tension lene ki jarurat nahi hai, wo automatic tikh ho jati hai. Two-Factor Authentication TFA aaj ke time me bhut jaruri hai, taki agar koi kisi trha se hamara password pata kar bhi le, jab bhi hamara account secure rahe. to aese me hame yaha ye subhida bhi milti hai ki ham 2 step verification on karke apne account ki security bada sake. Up-To-Date Application yaha jo bhi application hai unko ham ek click me install to kar hi sakte hai, uske sath sath hame yaha ye tension bhi nahi rheti ki application update hai ke nahi. q ki wo automatic update hoti hai. Live Billing koi bhi hosting use karte hai, to uska ek war paisa le liya jata hai. par hame pata nahi chalta ki hamne kitni memory use ki ya kitne paise ka hamara bill bana, par ham yaha wo sab kuch detail me dekh sakte hai. Easy to Upgrade

WordPress ko Install karna yaha sirf kuch clicks ka kaam hai. chaliye dekhte hai. Agar aapki phele se WordPress site hai, or aapko wahi transfer karna hai Cloudways par to wo bhi aasan hai. uske liye Cloudways ki plugin hai, jiski madad se aasani se apni WordPress site ko Cloud ways par transfer kar sakte hai. WordPress site ko Cloudways par banane ke liye in Steps ko Follow kare Cloudways WordPress Install Tutorial in Hindi Video Step 1 Cloudways me login karne ke baad, aapne samne Server Install karne ke liye aa jayega, agar aapne abhi tak nahi kiya hai. simple uspar click kare. upar server ke option par click karke bhi waha ja sakte hai. Step 2 Lanuch par click karne ke baad, Aapne samne Server or usme Application ke liye kuch options aayege, jo aapko fill karna hai. Step 3 Ab next step me Server ka size select karna hai, agar aapki New site hai to 1GB RAM or 25GB SSD Disk tikh hai.

Google Kya hai wo to aapko pata hi hoga, Sabse Pupular Search Engine jisme ham Duniya Bhar ki chij search kar sakte hai. Par aaj me Google Search Engine ki kuch Tricks bataoga jo aapko abhi tak nahi pata hogi. Pichli Post me mene bataya tha ki Google me I m Feeling Lucky Button q hoti hai or uska kya kaam hai, wo bhi aapko padna chaiye. Chaliye Jaante hai Google ki kuch Rochak Search Tricks ke ware me jo aapko nahi pata abhi tak. Google me serch kare atari breakout fir image select kare, Image ko select karne ke baad jo search page hai usme ek game aa jayega. Atari Breakout Also Read Google Gmail 2 Step Verification Enable kare Double Security ke liye Security Tips Agar aapko Time ya Stopwatch ki jarurat hai to aap google me direct search kare. Timer ya fir Stopwatch. Timer StopWatch Also Read Google Search Results Me Top Par Kaise Laye Blog Post Ko Sikke se hai Tos karte hai ki kon, par bhut war aesa ho jata hai ki kisi ke pass koi sikka nahi hota to ham google search ki madad se tos kar sakte hai. Google me hame search karna hai Flip A Coin fir ham Tos kar sakte hai or Head or tail select karke apna fesla le sakte hai. Flip A Coin Ye Bhi Padhe 7 Tarike Apni Google Plus Profile Par Followers Badhane Ke Mosam ki jankari ke liye ham Google me search kar sakte hai weather. Agar kisi particular jagha ke mosam ki jankari chaiye to ham us jagha ke naam ke sath weather search karke pata kar sakte hai. Weather Jarur Padhe Google Hum Par Kaise Rakhta hai Najar Google Tracking Agar aapko koi calculation karna hai, to aap google ke calculator ka use kar sakte hai. Google me search kare Calculator ya fir calc uske baad search me calculator aa jayega, jisme ham apna calculation kar sakte hai. Calculator Agar aapko Direct hi kisi chij ko jodna ya ghatana hai to aap direct bhi google me search karke uska answer dekh sakte hai. Jese 22 search karege to uska answer 4 aa jayega search me.

Hello Friends, kya aapke sath kabhi aisa hua hai ki aapko apni post publish karne ke baad usmen koi kami lagti hai, ya fir aap apni post likhne ke baad sochte hai ki ismen koi galti to nahi reh gayi? To aapko apni is problem ka solution is post ke jariye mil jayega kyonki is post me main aapko btaunga ki aapko apni blog post ki publish button dabane se pehle kin kin baaton ka dhyan rakhna chahiye. Agar aap apne blog par behtar posts publish karna chahte hai to apni har ek post ko publish karne se pehle niche di gayi sabhi Points ko apni post-publish checklist me shamil kar le. To fir aaiye doston shuru karte hai Jab bhi ham hamare Blog ko Post likhte hai to uska ek format hota hai ki hame sabse phele kya karna hai fir uske baad kya or kis flow me chalna hai. Agar aap ek Step by step chalege to aapki har post bhut badiya hogi or usme koi kami nahi hogi. Puri kosis kare ki post ko Publish karne ke baad edit karne ki jarurat naa padhe, or puri trha se post teyar hone ke baad hi publish kare. Par agar kahi koi edit karne ki jarurat padti hai baad to kar sakte hai usme bhi koi burai nahi hai. Post likhne ki starting hoti hai Keyword se, jispar aapko post likhni hai. Sabse phele to aap jis Topic par post likhne ja rahe hai agar aapko uski achi jankari nahi hai to sabse phele aap uski puri jankari le. Fir Post ko likhna start kare. Phele Short me dekh lete hai kaise kya karna hai Post Publish karne ke liye jesa mene bataya agar aap is process se chalege to aapki har post lajabab hogi. Post Publish karne se phele ek war On-Page SEO bhi jarur check kar le Chaliye ab sab Points ko Detail me samaj lete hai jinhe hame check karna hai har ek post ko publish karne ke phele. Post publish karne se pehle ye conform kare ki kya aapki post ka title aapki post ke content ko darshata hai. Aapki post ka title aakarshak hona chahiye, kyonki agar aapki post ka title hi boring hoga to is baat ke bahut jyada chances hai ki aapki post ko koi open hi nahi karega. Is baat ka bhi dhyan rakhen ki aap apni post ke title ko itna badha chada kar bhi na likhen ki readers ko post me apni asha ke anusar content na milen, isse readers gussa ho sakte hai joki aapke blog ke liye kisi bhi parkar se faydemand nahi hoga. Ek behtar post title kaise likhen, uske ware me detail me jaanne ke liye ye post jarur padhe Post publish karne se pehle apni post me grammatical or spelling mistakes ko sudhare. Kai bloggers kya karte hai ki apni post ki spelling mistakes par dhyan nahi dete lekin jab readers post ko padhte aur un mistakes ko dekhte hai to ek galat impression banta hai. Aap chahe to apne kisi dost ya family member ko apni post ko proofread karne ke liye keh sakte hai taki vo aapko un mistakes ke baare me bta saken. Ya Fir aap Post ko ek war likh kar Draft me Save karde fir 3-4 Hours baad fresh mind se post ko ek reader ke jese pura padhe. fir jaha bhi koi galti hogi aapko samaj aa jayegi. Apni post ko short paragraphs me likhne ki koshish kare, isse readers ko post padhne me asaani hoti hai, aur apni post me Headings, Sub Heading ka use bhi jarur kare, isse aapki post badiya lagti hai aur isse readers bhi acche se post ka samajh paate hai. Post me aap jo jankari dena chate hai usko clear tarike se de. Text me highlight, Blod, Italic ka bhi use kare. Badiya Post kaise likhe uski tips ke liye ye post bhi padhe Apni post me interlinking karna n bhulen. Interlinking matlab Post me apne blog ki dusri posts ka link add karna. Interlinking karna SEO ke liye bhi kaafi faydemand hota hai. Is baat ka dhyan rakhen ki Interlinking ka use readers ki suvidha anusaar kare yani ki us jgah par post ko link de jhan par jarurat hai. Interlinking Bounce Rate kam karne me bhi madad karti hai. Apni post ke liye suitable Category aur Tags ka use kare. Aisa karne se aapke readers ko aapka blog asaani se navigate karne me madad milegi aur sath hi search engine ko bhi isse aapki post ke topic ka pata karne me madad milegi. Kai bloggers ye bhi galti karte hai ek hi post me bahut saari categories and tags ka use karte hai, koshish kare ki ek post ke sath 2-3 se jyada categories and 4-6 tags se jyada use n kare. Sabse pehle to ye dhyan rakhen ki apni post me kam se kam 1 image jarur add kare aur usmen Alt Tags bhi jarur use karen. Alt Tags Search Engine ko btata hai ki image kis baare me hai, Search Engine images ko apne aap read nahi kar sakta. Isliye apni post images me alt tags jarur use karen. Aapki image post ke content ke anusaar honi chahiye. Post me bahut saari images add karne se bhi bachen, Post ke liye Free Stock image ka use kare jo aap yaha se download kar sakte hai. Image alt tag ki better understanding ke liye ye post padhe SEO friendly image kaise bnaye Post likhte samay aapki post ka ek focus keyword jarur hona chahiye. Aapki post search engine me acchi ranking hasil kar sakti hai agar aap Foucs Keyword ko sahi jgah par place kare. Apni post ke focus keyword ko Post ke title, Permalink, Meta Discription aur post ke first paragraph me specially add karen. or jankari ke liye ye post padhe Apni post ke last me CTA yani Call-to-action ka use karna n bhulen. Call-to-action ka matlab hai ki aap apne readers se us post ko padhne ke baad kya karana chahte hai. Matlab ki agar aapne motivation post likhi hai to aap chahenge ki aapke readers post padhne ke baad positive action len. Agar aapne kisi product ki review post likhi hai to aap chahenge ki post padhne ke baad aapke readers us product ko purchase kare. Ya fir aap Call-to-action ka use readers ko post par comment karne, aapke blog ko subscribe karne, Social media par follow karne ke liye kar sakte hai. Call to Action ka example Aapko ye post kaisi lagi, hamen comment ke jariye jarur btaye. Kya aapko ye post pasand aayi? Aisi hi aur bhi post paane ke liye hmara free email subscription le. Etc. Call-to-Action bhut jarur part hota hai hamari post ka, agar aapko ispar detail me jankari chaiye to aap comment me bataye. Upar jitne bhi Point bataye wo post me hona jaruri hai par ye jo point hai Copy Contant wo post me bilkul naa ho uska bhi dhiyan rakhe. Aap Jab Post likhe to dyan rakhe ki wo aap kahi se copy naa kare, jo image ho wo bhi copyrighted naa ho. Padhe Dusare Website Se Copy karne ke Faide or Nuksan Post me kabhi bhi Hacking, Cracking ya fir aesi jankari naa de jisse kisi ka bhi nuksan ho sakta ho. Isse ho sakta hai kuch visitor aa jaye aapki site par, Par aap adsense se earning nahi kar payege To doston ye thi wo points jinhen aapko apni post publish karne se pehle jarur check karna hai. Agar aap in tips ko follow karenge to aapki post na kewal aapke readers ko pasand aayegi balki search engine me bhi uska faida milega. Post Publish karne se phele kya kare wo to aapne jaan liya ab Post Publish karne ke baad kya kare jaanne ke liye yaha click kare

SEO sabse Main hota hai Blog ke liye, Agar Sahi Tarike se SEO nahi kiya jaye to bhale kitni achi post daldo usko koi padne hi nahi aayega. Isef ek Badiya Post Likhna Blog ka sirf 10 hota hai, baki ka Promotion, Advertisement, Social Share, SEO hota hai. Sabse main hai SEO Post me. Apni Post ko Search Engine me Top par kaise laya jaye uske upar phele bhi post likhi hai, jo agar aapne nahi padhi to aapko padni chaiye Agar aapko Apbe Blog ko Success karna hai to aapka Blog jis Topic par hai aapko uski puri jankari to rakhni hi hai, sath sath aapko SEO ki bhi jankari rakhni hogi. SEO ki Puri Jankari aapko yaha milegi. Or SEO ki jankari ke liye aap HMH.pe SEO ki jitni bhi Post hai sabko padhe aapko bhut kuch sikhne ko milega. Is Post Me, me Aapko Aisi Tips Or Tricks Ke Baare Me Bataoga, Jinhe Follow karke Aap Aasani se SEO Ko Samaj Kar Apne Blog ko High-Rank Dila Sakte Ho. 1. Optimize Image Jab Bhi Aap Koi Image Upload Karte Ho Too Usse SEO Friendly Banane Ke Liye Image ko Compress Kare, Caption Likhe, ALT Tag Add Kare. Search Engine jese Google inhi Tags se samajta hai ki wo image kis ware me hai. 2. Proper Anchor Link Interlink achi se kare, Jese agar aap kisi Post ko link apne kisi post me de rahe hai to Click Here, There, Go Link, Etc ke aalawa agar aap jo post ka Title hai usko likhege to jada acha hoga. Interlink karne se Website ka Bounce Rate bhi kam hota hai. 3. SEO Permalinks Permalinks Post ka URL ko chota or clean rakhe or uske koi Special Word jese , ? , ! ka istmal naa kare. Example se samje kesi permalink honi chaiye www.HMH.peseo-ki-jankari 4. Underscores Ka istamal Na Kare URL Me Underscores Ka kabhi bhul kar bhi Prayog Naa Kare, q ki iska use karne se jitne bhi sabd hai wo aalag alag read nahi hote. Jese agar SEOKIJANKARI hai to search engine samaj nahi payega ki seo ki jankari likha huaa hai or wo usko pura ek hi sabd samjega or jab koi aese searc karega Underscores laga kar jab search me dikhayega. Aap Hypens - Use Kare link me. 5. Write Search Description High-Rank or Visitor pane ke liye Description bhi bhut jaruri hai. Description hi hai jo SEarch engine or Visitor ko shot me batata hai ki post me kya hai or wo kis ware me hai. Aapne dekha hoga jab aap koi chij search karte ho Google me to search me Post ke Title or uske niche 2 line likhi hoti hai, wo hi hota hai Description. Or uski ko padne ke baad koi uspar click karta hai pura padne ke liye. 6. Use H1,h2,h3 Tags in Post Post Me kam se kam Ek H1,h2,h3 Heading Tags Jarur use kare. Diyan rakhe ki sabse phele H1, fir H2, fir H3 use kare sahi formate me. 7. Use main keyword On-Page ranking factor Ke Liye Bahut Mahatvpurna He Keyword ka sahi jagha use karna. Kosis kare jitni bhi jagha possible ho apne main keyword ko waha use kare. Title, Description, Permalink, Image, paragraph har jagha use kare main keyword ko. Keyword Kya hai or Keyword ki kya quantity honi chaiye wo bhi jarur padhe. 8. Remove or Update Duplicate Content Aapka Blog jese jese purana hota jayega or aap regular new article dalte jayege, Bhut war aesa hota hai ki ham jo article dalte hai wo change ho jata hai, to ham new article likh dete hai. Aesa karne par Search engine confuse ho jata hai ki konsa sahi hai, jo hamare liye bilkul acha nahi hai. aesa hone par purani post ko hi update kare ya fir purani post ko delete karke uski link ko 301 redirect karde new post par. 9. Don t Copy From Other Site Kabhi kisi website se kuch bhi copy naa kare, aesa karne se aapkoi faida to kuch nahi hai par nuksan bhut sare hai. SEO ki najar se dekhe to Search Engine jo copy content dalte hai un blog ko kuch time baad search me dikhana band kar dete hai. 10. Create Video Embed Blog Post Post ko rank dilane ke liye usme Video add kare. Video ko Post me kaise Add Embed karte hai uski jankari yaha hai. 11. Use Google Keyword Tool Google Keyword Tool Ek List Deta he Jo Words Aap Search karte ho uski. 12. Avoid Many Ads Apne Visitors ko ekdum Fresh Clean content de, or diyan rakhe Ads jada naa lagaye or sahi jagha lagaye. 13.Set-up And Use Search Console jab aap apni site ko search console me add karenge tabhi aapki site Google ke Search Page se sahi se aa payegi. Isliye Sabse Phele Google Search Console Par Account bana Kar Blog Ko usme Add Kare. Fir Search Console me Blog ka SiteMap bhi Jarur add kare. Agar website me koi problem ho jiski baja se search me naa aa parahi ho to search console me message aa jata hai, fir ham usko dekh kar sahi kar sakte hai. 14. Set-up And Use Google Analytics Apne Blog Ki Activity Dekhne ke Liye Google Analytics Jarur Add kare. Isme aap Sab Kuch Dekh Sakte He Jaise Ki Konsa Visitors kaha Se Aaya Kitne Der Blog Par Rukha Konse Page Par Rukha. or bhi bhut kuch. 15. Get Keyword Idea than Analysis Sabse phele to Keyword select kare ki aapko kispar post likhni hai. Idea lene ke liye aap apne Dosto, Visitor, Ristedaro se madad le sakte ho. Jab koi badiya Topic mil jaye fir usko pura analyse kare Google Keyword Planner use kar sakte ho uske liye or uski puri jankari nikal ka fir post likhe. 16. Add Social Button Website me Share Button or Social Follow Button jarur add kare, Taki jo Visitor hai wo unki madad se aapki site ko follow kar sake or agar koi post pasand aaye to usko share bhi kare social network websites par. 17. Blog Ki Loading Speed Website ki loading time hai wo kam hona chaiye, Q ki agar wo jada huaa to sabse bada nuksan to ye ki koi aapki website ko open karna pasand nahi karega. or Loading time ko SEO ki najar se dekhe to search me bhi phele wo site dikhai jati hai jo jaldi load ho. Aap Apni Website ki Loading Time Google Page Speed ki madad se dekh sakte hai. 18. Badiya Comment Dusre Blog par Aap Jab bhi Dusre kisi blog par koi article padhe, uske baad uspar aapka kya sujab hai ya aap jo bhi sochte hai wo comment jarur kare. Isse aapko SEO ke sath sath direct bhi bhut faida hoga. SEO ki or Jankari ke liye yaha click kare To Dosto Kaise Lagi Aapko Yeh jankari SEO ki Comment Karke Jarur Bataye or agar aapko lagta hai ki isme koi point hai jo add hona tha to wo bhi bataye.

Isme koi shaqdaubt nahi ki jada tar blogger sirf paise kamane ke liye blogging karta hai. Par kuch hi aise bloggers hote hai jo isme success hopate hai. baki bache blogging chhod dete hai. Jiska main reason apne blog se income na hona hota hai. Lakin kya aapne kabhi socha hai, ki jitne bhi successful bloggers hai unki success ka raaj secret kya hai? Woh apne blogs se income kaise kar rahe hai? Or woh aisa kya karte hai jiski vajah se unke articles search engine me high ranking position par show hote hai per apke kyu nahi? Agar apke mann me bhi aise swaal hai toh aaj me apko blog se income generate na hone ke inhi reasons ke bare me bta raha hu. Isiliye is post ko pura padhe or apne blog ki kamiyo weakness ko dur karke paise kamaye. Aapko Ye Post bhi Jarur Padni Chaiye Hum sabko pta hai hai ki aaj ke time me blogging karna ek profession ban chuka hai. Or har koi blogging se paise kamana chahta hai. Lakin yeh itna bhi asaan nahi hai ki apne ek blog bana liya or apki income shuru ho jayagi. Bahut se new bloggers me aisa normally dekha gaya hai, ki woh blogging start karte hi sirf paise kamane ke bare me sochte hai. Yeh bilkul galat baat hai. Kyuki sach yahi hai ki pure world me koi bhi aisi online company ya organisation nahi hai jo apko rato raat amir bna degi. Agar internet se paise kamana itna hi easy hota toh aaj sari duniya job karne ke bajaye apne computers per online beth kar lakho croro rupees kama rahi hoti. Apne blog se income karne ke liye apko din raat mehnat karni padhegi. Logo ko apna talent dikha kar attract karna hoga. Agar aap aisa krne me safal hote hai toh me dava karta hu ki 100 apko saflta milegi. Sirf blog bna lene or usper kuch articles likh lene se, yeh sochna ke ab ache paise kama sakte hai, bilkul galat soch hai. Iske liye apne blog ke niche se related sahi or puri jankari hona bahut jaruri hai. Kis Kis Topic Par Aap Blog bana sakte hai uski jankari yaha hai Agar apko blog nicheTopic ki sahi jankari nahi hai. Toh apke visitors ka ap per se trust nahi banega. Or blog se income karne ke liye traffic kitni important hoti hai. Yeh baat har ek blogger ko achi tarah se pta hai. Blogging karna koi aasan rasta nahi hai. Jaise jaise din prati din competition badhta ja raha hai. Uske chalte blogging karne wale har shaqs ke raste me aye din musibte ati rehti hai. Aise me bahut se bloggers musibato ke dar se blogging chhod dete hai. Agar aapko blog se income karni hai toh self confident insaan bne. Agar aap chahe to is duniya me se impossible word ko hamesha ke liye khatam kar sakte hai. Bas jarurt hoti hai positive thought ke sath agey badhne ki soch rakhne ki. Bahut se bloggers ek se adhik paise kamane ke options try karte hai. Jo ki ek common mistake hoti hai. Specially aisi galti mistakes newbies karte hai. Apne blog ki monetization karne ke liye multiple ads networks use kar lete hai. Jisse kisi ek advertising program per focus karna newbies ke liye asaan nahi hota. Kuch bloggers adsense jaise popular advertising programs ke sath dusre ads networks jaise chitika, infolinks ets. ki ads lagate hai. Jisse adsense CPC low ho jati hai. Or blog se income kam hone ka pramukh kaaran banta hai. Blog se income karne ke liye best tarika yahi hai ki aap ek time par ek hi making money product use kare. Agar apko usme saflta nahi milti toh tab hi dusra try kare. Jisse 101 apko success milegi. Sirf blogging karne se hi aap paise nahi kama sakte. Iske liye aapka interest logo ki help karne me hona chahye. Agar aap dusro ki madad krne me intrested nahi hai toh apne blog se income karne ka toh swaal hi peda nahi hota. Ek blogger ke liye blogging me interest ke sath positive energy ka hona bahut jaruri hota hai. Tabhi log apki site per visit karna pasand karege. Blog me traffic sabse jaruri hoti hai. Iske bina apke blogging karne ka koi fayda nahi hai. Or na hi aap blog se income kar payge. Jaha tak me manta hu, uper di hui kamaiyo weaknesses ko dur karke aap blog se income karne me safal honge. Apke iske bare me kya views hai? Comment karke jarur bataye. Agar apke liye yeh post useful rahi ho toh apne social networking sites par jarur share kare. Guest Author Harpreet Kumar ke duaara ki gai hai. Agar aapko bhi Guest Post karna hai to uski Jankari yaha hai. Ye bhi Aapko Padna chaiye

Agar site par organic traffic acha aa raha ho, or achanak kisi change ke karan traffic bhut kam ho jaye, ye koi nahi chata. or aesa bhut logo ke sath hota hai. Jab bhi Search engine algorithm me koi update karte hai to traffic me badlab aata hi hai, agar traffic bad rahi hai to wo to achi baat hai par agar kam ho jaye to aapko kya karna hai wahi me is post me aapko batane wala hu. Abhi kuch time se Google me real-time algorithm updates chal rahi hai, jo kisi bhi site owner ke liye achi news nahi hai. Isme Google alag alag test karta hai jiske karan achi site ki rank bhi achanak down ho jati hai. fir wapas tikh bhi ho jati hai par aapki traffic me aapko uthar chdav to dekhne ko to milega hi. Kaise pata kare agar traffic kam ho rahi hai to uska karan kya hai, uske me steps aapko bata raha hu, aap in sabhi steps ko follow kare or agar kahi kuch gadwad mile to usko turant tikh karne ki kosis kare, taki aapki site ki rank fir se sahi ho sake, or aapki post google me top par aa sake. Webse phele aapko apni website me check karna hai kahi kisi code ki baja se koi error to nahi hai, ya kahi kuch aesi setting galti se ho gai ho jiske karan aapki rank down hui hai. Aapko On Page SEO ko bhi check karna hai, jis page par jada traffic loss hua hai uske aapne bad link to add nahi ki hai. aapko apni website ka HTTP stutas check karna hai, isme aapko ye pata chal jayega ki aapki website agar koi open karna cha raha hai to open ho rahi hai ya nahi. Status code 200 aane ka matlab hai aapki site badiya se load ho rahi hai. Isko check karne ke liye aap HTTP Status Code Checker ka use kare. simple aapko isme apni website or page ka URL dalkar check karna hai. Search engine Bots site ko crawl karte hai uske baad hi site ko search me dikhagaya jata hai, aese me ye bhi ho sakta hai galti se robots.txt se aapne bots ko block kar diya ho or search engine aapki site ko crawl hi nahi kar pa rahe ho. Robot.txt me to koi gadwad nahi hai wo aap Google ke Free Robots Testing Tool me dekh sakte hai. Traffic achanak loss hone ka ye bhi ek karan ho sakta hai google me koi bada algorithm update kiya ho, uski jankari ke liye online kuch popular blog hai waha dekh sakte hai. Sabse best tarika kisi bhi update ko pata katne ka twitter hai, q ki yaha aapko sabhi top seo mil jayege. Ab Twitter par kisi bhi Update ko dekhne ke liye aap simple search kar sakte hai, google algorithm update jese aap screenshot me dekh sakte hai. Google Search console me aapne apni site ko to add kiya hi hoga, agar nahi kiya hai to abhi add kare wo bhut jaruri hai. Jab bhi koi update aata hai or uski baja se site par koi bhi dikkat hoti hai to waha hame error message mil jata hai, or ham unke bataye tarike ko follow karke usko sahi kar sakte hai. Aap Search console me check kare kahi koi error to nahi aa rahi hai aapki site ko crawl karne me, or ye bhi check kare aapki site ki kitni post index hai. Google Search Console important settings karna bhi jaruri hai, agar aapne abhi tak nahi ki to wo bhi jarur kare. website ki traffic kam hone ka karan aap google analytics se bhi laga sakte hai, aap site ka google analytics open karke uska traffic graph dekhe, isse aapko bhut si jankari mil jayegi. Jese example google ka ek update aaya tha jisme mobile friendly site ko top par dikhate hai, to aese me agar aap google analytics me dekhte to aapki computer ki traffic to same rheti par agar aapki site mobile friendly nai hoti to aapki mobile ki traffic kam hoti. Iss trha ki bhut si chijo ko dekh kar bhi aap google analytics se pata laga sakte hai, akhir traffic kam hone ka karan kya hai. Agar aapne Google analytics add nahi kiya hai to abhi kare, Google Analytics kaise add kare site me uski jankari yaha di hui hai. Website ki speed ek ranking factor hai google me, or agar aapki site ki speed slow hai to ye bhi ek main karan ho sakta hai aapki traffic ka achanak kam hone ka. Website ki speed kaise improve kare uski tips mene share ki hai, unko follow kare uske sath agar kuch bhi aesi chije ho jiske karan aapki site ki speed kam ho rahi hai to unko bhi tikh kare. website ki speed check karne ke liye Google s PageSpeed Insights ka use kar sakte hai, isme kaha kya gadwad hai wo bhi pata chal jati hai. Google ne ye saaf kar diya hai, ki Mobile ke liye phele Mobile friendly site hi dikhai jayegi or unko ko jada value di jayegi, to hamare liye ye bhut jaruri hai ki site mobile me achi trha se open ho. blog Mobile me achi trha se open ho uske liye aap ek badi Mobile Friendly Template use kare. website Mobile Friendly hai ya nahi wo aap Google ke Mobile-Friendly Test tool ki madad se pata kar sakte hai. Backlink wo link hoti hai jo kisi dusri site par hamari kisi page ki link add ki gai ho. Badiya High Quality Backlink se search engine me site ki value or trust badta hai. Par iska ulta bhi hai, matlab agar backlink Low Quality site se mile, ya kisi spam site se to isse hamari site ko nuksan bhi ho sakta hai. Backlink kya hai or isse kya hota hai uski jankari aapko mere purane article me mil jayegi, iske baad bhi agar aapko koi doubt ho to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. Ab aap kuch had tak to samaj hi gaye hoge, aapki site ki traffic achanak kam hone ka kya karan hai. Aap in steps ko follow karke jo bhi problem hai unko solve kar sakte hai. Yaha aap ek baat dhiyan rakhe aap kuch bhi change karege site me uska aasar aapko turant dekhne ko nahi milega search engine me ki aapne aaj kuch update kiya or kal se aapki site par jada traffic aane lage iske sath sath Google Rank ke Top 10 Ranking Factor bhi aapko pata hona chaiye jo 2017 me bhut important hai website ki badiya ranking ke liye. Hope aapko ye jankari kaam aayegi, or agar aapki traffic achanak down hui hai to usko sahi karne me bhi help milegi. Inke aalawa bhi agar koi karan ho sakta hai achanak traffic down hone ka to aap comment me jarur share kare.

Agar aap blogger hai to aapko pata hoga ki blog par daily Post Publish karna or usko update karna kitna jaruri hai or uske kya faide hai. jisse hamare blog par visitor regular aate rhete hai or blog ki rank bhi badthi jati hai or SEO me bhi uska faida milta hai. Aap abhi aesa karte hoge ki Post likhi or usko publish kardi, par aesa naa karte huaa agar aap Post ko pura teyar karne ke baad usko kisi fix time par publish karege to aapko uske bhut faide hoge. Jarur Padhe Post Publish karne ke phele kya kare Blog Post ko kisi fix time par publish karne ke liye ham usko schedule kar sakte hai jisme ham time or date set kar sakte hai or fir uss time wo post automatic publish ho jati hai. Blog Post ko agar ham schedule karte hai to uske faide to bhut hai unme se kuch me aapko batata hu aapke blog ke liye post publish karne ka sabse acha time wo hai jab aapke blog par jada visitor aate ho, or ye pata karne ke liye aap google analytics ki madad le sakte hai. or Jis time aapke blog par sabse jada traffic aati ho uske thoda phele apni post ko publish kare. Also Read Sehedule karne ke liye hamare jo post editor hai uske bagal me aata hai uska option, jisme ham time or date select karke post ko schedule kar sakte hai or fir post us time automatic publish ho jati hai. Step 1 Post ko Pura teyar karne ke baad, right side me sehedule likha huaa hai uspar click kare Step 2 Ab Time or Date select kare jis time aap post ko publish karna chate hai. Step 3 Ab Post ko Publish kar dijiye, Post fir automatic us time Publish hojayegi jo time aapne select kiya hai. Step 1 Sabse Pehle aap apna post likhe aur publish karne ke pehle aap Publish option ke upar aapko Publish Immediately ka option hoga to uske right me Edit pe click kare. Step 2 Ab apna Date aur Time select kare aur phir Ok pe click karde. Step 3 Ab schedule pe click kar de. Ab aapka post schedule gaya hai ab aapka post ussi time au date pe publish hoga jaise aapne set kiya hoga. Note Aap Apne blog ki setting me BLog ka Time Zone jarur check karle warna ho sakta hai India ka 9 baje ka time aap set kare Post Schedule karne ke liye or wo kisi or time publish ho. Dosto aap is Trha apne blog par Post Schedule kar sakte hai or apne blog ko regular update kar sakte hai. Ye Jankari aapko kesi lagi or agar isse sambandit koi sabal hai to aap comment karke jarur bataye. alert-noteYe ek Guest Post hai jo Manish Singh ne ki hai jo howinhindi.com ke owner hai.
