Kya aap ye jaanna chate hai ki online paise kaise kamaye, Aap agar Online paise kamana chate hai to ye jaankari aapke liye bhut badiya sabit hone wali hai. Isme me aapko bataoga ki ham kaise Google Adsense se Paise kama sakte hai or uski kya process hai. Online Internet se Paise kamana bhut logo ka sapna hota hai or hajaro lakho log uske liye tri bhi kar rahe hai, bhut log online kaam karke bhut acha paisa kama hi rahe hai. Is Post me ham dekhege ki ham kaise Google Adsense se Paise kama sakte hai detail me. Ye bhi jarur Padhe Google Adsense Use Karne Ke Fayde in Hindi Google Adsense ek free service hai Google ki, jisme content publishers apne content ko monetize karke paise kama sakte hai. Google Adsense se paise kamane ke liye koi Blog, Website, Youtube Channel hona chaiye, matlan ham khe sakte hai ki koi bhi online platform hona chaiye hamare pass. Google Adsense hamesa se logo ki pheli pasand rahi hai online paise kamane ki, uske karan bhi hai ki usko istmal karna, manage karna bhut aasan hai or sabse main baat jo adsense me income hoti hai to time par aati hai or kisi farjiwade ka bhi koi khatra nahi. Google Adsense se start karne ke liye sabse phele aapke pass koi online platform hona jaruri hai jispar aap adsense ki madad se paise kamayege, To sabse phele Apna Blog banaye ya fir Youtube channel banaye. Ab Google Adsense ke liye apply kare, fir jab adsense account approve ho jayega to aap adsense me Ads Code generate karke apne blog me lagaye. fir Aapke blog me ads dikhege to jo bhi visitor aapke blog par aayege wo agar ads par click karege to usse aapki income hogi. Jitne jada visitor utni jada income. Agar aap ye soch rahe hai ki ye bhut aasan hai or isme jaldi bhut sara paisa kama sakte hai to aap galat soch rahe hai q ki ye koi jaldi amir banne ka tarika nahi hai. Agar aapko paise kamana hai to aapko kaam to karna padega. Agar aap soch rahe hai ki me apne blog par ads laga kar apne friends ya relative se kheduga ki wo ads par click kare to isse aapka adsense account block ho sakta hai, to aesa karne ka soche bhi nahi. Agar ek war adsense account disable ho gaya to usko wapas pana bhut muskil hota hai. Sabse phele aapko Adsense se paise kamane ke liye aapke pass koi platform hona chaiye, jese koi blog, website ya fir youtube channel. agar aapke pass ye phele se hai to achi baat hai or agar nahi hai to kaise banate hai uski jankari mene HMH.pe di hui hai. Abhi me aapko 3 Platform bataoga jaha aap adsense se paise kama sakte hai, jo Free bhi hai or agar aap thoda investment kar sakte hai to or jada future bhi aapko mil sakte hai. Blogger Google ki Service hai jo bilkul free hai or ham iski madad se apna Free Blog bana sakte hai. Blog kaise banaye Blogger par uski jankari yaha hai. Blogger ki jankari ke liye yaha jaye. WordPress bhi ek blog platform hai, jiski madad se ham apna blog ya website bana sakte hai. Duniya me jitni bhi website hai usme se 21 website wordpress par hi bani hai. WordPress ki jankari ke liye yaha jaye. Youtube Google ki service hai or ye bhi bilkul free hai or Youtube ek Video website hai jispar aap video upload kar sakte hai or video dekh bhi sakte hai. Youtube par video upload karke, video ko monetize karna hota hai fir video ke upar ads aate hai or usse hamari income hoti hai. jo ads aate hai wo Google adsense se hi lagaye jate hai. Youtube ki jankari ke liye yaha jaye. Ab aapke pass Platform hai jaha aap adsense se paise kamayege. Youtube par to aapko apne video upload karke adsense ke liye apply kar sakte hai par agar aapka blog hai to aapko apply karne ke phele kuch bate hai jo diyan me rakhni hai or uske baad hi apply karna hai adsense account ke liye. Adsense se jo income hoti hai wo dusre kisi bhi ads network se jada hoti hai, fir bhi bhut log adsense se paise nahi kama pate uske kya karan hote hai wo jaanne ke liye yaha click kare Agar aapne sab kuch sahi se kiya or aapke adsense ke ads bhi dikhne lage to fir aapko apni income badane par focus karna hai, uske liye aapko high quality post dalni hogi or usme High CPC keyword ka use kare. Agar aapki Blog hai to Aap Blog me search ke liye Google Custom search use kare or usme aap adsense ke ads enable karke apni adsense ki income bada sakte hai. 1000 Visitor Per Google Adsense Se Kitni Income Hoti Hai uski jankari yaha hai, jisse aap andaja laga sakte hai ki aap usse kitne paise kama sakte hai, or agar aap ye soch rahe hai ki aap isse kitne paise kama sakte hai to wo jaanne ke liye yaha click kare Friends ye Jankari Google Adsense ki aapko clear ho gai hogi ki akhir adsense hai kya or isse aap kaise paise kama sakte hai. Agar aapka koi sabal hai to aap comment me puch sakte hai.

Aajkal ham dekhte hai ki bhut se aese Tyohar manaye jate hai jinke bare me bhut logo ko unke bare me sahi pata bhi nahi hota hai, ki uska maksad kya hai or usko q manate hai. Aese hi ek Tyohar Hai Valentine s Day jo USA se start huaa tha par Aaj ki tarikh me iskop lagbhag puri duniya me manaya jata hai. Is Post me ham Janege Valentine s Day se sambandit bhut si jankari jinke bare me bhut logo ne to socha bhi nahi hota. To jada Time west na karte huee line Apni Post par aate hai. Valentine s Day wo din hai Jab log apni Pyaar, Snha or Dosti ki Feelings Share karte hai ek Dusre se. Valentine s Day ko 14 February ko manaya jata hai har saal. Valentine ek Rom ke pujari ka naam tha, jo 270 A.d mai Ek roman Empire Claudius Hota tha Jiski hakumat pure rajya me thi or wo Saddi ke sekht Khilaf tha jiske karan usne apne saniko ko Saadi nahi karne di or uska ek niyam bhi tha Agar kisi ne mere samne Saadi ki to usko jail ke kaid or uske baad fasi de di jayegi. Valentine ne chori chupe un sainiko ki Saadi karwai to kaise he Roman Empire Claudius ko pata chala to Usne Valentine ko giraftar kar liya or uspar niyamo ka ulanghan karne ke aarop lagaya or Suko Fasi ki saja sunai gai. Valentine ne Roman Empire Claudius ke beti se Pyaar kiya tha to fasi de jani thi uske phele usne apnipyaar ka ijhaar ek greeting Card ke jariye kiya. Uske Baad Valentine ko fasi de di gai. Valentine ko 14 February ko di gai thi to log usdin ko yaad rakhne ke liye Valentine s Day manane lage. Valentine Day waise to pyar karne wale logo ke liye hai, Par isko alag alag tarike se alag logo ke sath manate hai. In Din Sab alag alag Roop mai manate hai. Jese Agar koi kisi se yaar karta hai to wo usko Gift de kar apne dil ki baad batata hai. Valentine s Day ko aese din ke najariye se dekha jata hai jis din log apne feeling ko share karte hai jinse wo Pyaar, Snha karte hai ya fir acha dost maante hai. Valentine s Day wese start to 2 Lovers ke liye tha par Pyaar sirf unme nahi hota to ham is din ko alag tarike se bhi mana sakte hai. adsbygoogle window.adsbygoogle .push Is Din ko manane ke bhi bhut se trike ho sakte hai, wese in din ka main motive hota hai ki ham apne feelings ko share kare. ye kuch is trha se mana sakte hai Jo Gift Dete hai unme Greeting Card, Choclate, Rose main hai. baki to kuch bhi de sakte hai. Wese jo Valentine s Day hai wo 14 Feb ko manaya jata hai par uske phele se pure hafte ke din ko alag alag din me baat diya gaya hai. Is Din log apne chane walo ko Rose Gulab ka Phool dete hai. Propose Day ke din agar koi kisi se pyar karta hai to wo uske pyaar ka ijhar karta hai, ki wo usko pyaar karta hai. Chocolate Day ke din jishe log chate hai usko chocolate dete hai. Teddy bear gift me dete hai, iss din or jisse pyaar karte hai usko ye ahsas dilate hai ki aap bhi itne cute ho. Promise Day ke jin promise karte hai jisse pyaar karte hai usse ki wo jo bhi bada kar rahe hai usko hamesa nibhayege. Hug day, me jisse pyaar karte hai usko hug kiya jada hai, matlab gale milaya jata hai. Isme to batane layak kuch hai nahi, aap naam se sam,aj gaye hoge. jisse pyaar karte hai usko kiss karte hai. Valentine Hafte ke last day ko Valentine s Day manaya jata hai jisme jisse pyar karte hai uske sath acha time spend kiya jata hai. Ab ye to hui Valentine s Day ki jankari. ab agar aap kisi ko wish karna chate hai to aap usko Whatsapp, facebook, SMS ke jariye bhi kar sakte hai ache message send karke. adsbygoogle window.adsbygoogle .push

WordPress site Hack kaise hoti hai or Kaise WordPress site ko hack hone se bacha sakte hai, iske ware me detail me aapko batane wala hu, jisme me aapko bataoga wordpress secure karne ke liye aap kya kya kar sakte hai. WordPress Security Tips dene se phele me aapko bata du Internet par 73 website wordpress par hai, jisse aap ye andaja laga sakte hai, WordPress kitni popular hai. or ye Secure bhi bhut hai jab hi itne log use karte hai, fir bhi ham iss baad se bhi mana nahi kar sakte, Internet par kuch bhi secure nahi hai jo hack nahi ho sakti. Agar aapki site Blogger par hai to aap usko kaise secure kar sakte hai uski Tips menen phele share ki hai, jisme mene bataya hai Blogger Blog ko Hacker se kaise bachaye. ek baat jo me aapko sabse phele batana chahuga, kisi bhi chij ko hack karna aasan nahi hota, Agar aapko ye pata ho ki iss trha se site hack ho sakti hai to aap apni site ko or jada secure kar sakte hai, khene ka matlab agar aapko apni site hack hone se bacha hai to aapko pata hona chaiye kya kya tarike hai site ko hack karne ke, jab hi aap unse kaise bacha jaye uspar action le sakte hai or apni WordPress Security badha sakte hai. Ye sabse main hai, ki aap apni site ka backup regular le. Q ki kab aapki site ke sath kuch gadwad ho jaye wo koi nahi janta, to sabse phela kaam hai aage hone wali kisi bhi gadwad ke liye phele se teyar rhena. Agar hamare pass backup rahega or hamari site ke sath kuch badwad hoti hai, to ham turant hamare backup ko restore karke site ko sahi kar sakte hai. WordPress site ka Backup lene ke liye bahtu se tarike hai, jinse aap Online or Offline puri site ka backup le sakte hai. WordPress site ka backup lene ke liye aap Hosting account se Database or file manager se site ki files ko download kar sakte hai. WordPress site ka regular backup lene ke liye kuch plugins bhi hai, jinki madad se wordpress site ka backup automatic regular hota rheta hai. Ek jo badiya pligin hai uska naam hai updraft, iski madad se site ka backup direct Google Drive, Dropbox me le sakte hai or backup offline bhi download kar sakte hai. Note Site me kuch bhi edit karne se phele backup jarur le, taki kisi bhi gadwad hone par site ko restore kiya ja sake. kisi bhi chij ka update aata hai to wo purane version se acha hi hota hai, aese me ho sakta hai purane version me koi kami ho jiske karan usko hack kiya ja sake, to update karke wah kami puri ki ja sakti hai. Aap WordPress blog ko or usme jitni bhi Plugin aap use karte hai hamesa sabko update rakhe. WordPress site me login karne ke liye username or password ki jarurat padti hai, ye to aap jante hi hoge. wordpress site ko secure karne me sabse phela step hai aap ek secure username use kare jiska koi andaja naa laga sake aasani se. Jadatar log username me Admin , ya fir apna naam username daal dete hai, jese rohitmewada , aese me agar koi hacker aapki site ko hack karna cha raha hai to uska adha kaam to aapne hi aasan kar diya apna username itna aasan rakh kar. username me kuch bhi aesa rakhe jisko koi andaja naa laga sake, taki usko login karne ke liye sirf password nahi username bhi pata karna pade, jo itna aasan nahi hai. Agar aapne username aesa kuch select kiya hai jo koi bhi pata kar sakta hai to aap usko abhi change kare. WordPress site ka username change karne ke liye aap apni Database se user ki row ko edit karke kar sakte hai, ya fir aap direct wordpress plugin ki madad se bhi kar sakte hai. WordPress username change karne ke liye aapko Username Changer plugin ko install karna hai uske baad aap direct wordpress deshboard se username change kar sakte hai, Username change karne ke baad aap plugin ko uninstall kar dijiye. Wese iss point ko muje batane ki jarurat to nahi hai, agar aap website chala rahe hai to itna to aap jante hi hoge, ek strong password hi use karna chaiye. Aap WordPress site ka password aesa rakhe jo koi spne me bhi nahi guess sake, Aap WordPress password generator ka bhi use kar sakte hai password banane ke liye. Jese Gmail me 2 step verification ka option hota hai, jisme ham password dalte hai uske baad hame ek secutiry code bhi dalna padta hai login karne ke liye, wahi option aap wordpress site me bhi add kar sakte hai. WordPress me 2 step verification enable karne ke liye aapko Google Authenticator plugin install karna hoga. Agar aapko kaise setup kare Google Authenticator ko usme paresani aa rahi hai to aap yaha read kar sakte hai. WordPress site ki security ke liye badiya hosting bhi bhut jaruri hai, q ki hosting account ke jariye bhi bhut se attack kiye jate hai or agar aap ek badiya WordPress managed hosting use karte hai to aapki site jada secure rahegi, Agar aap managed WordPress hosting use karte hai to wo aapki site ka backup bhi rakhte hai, jisse hamare site ki security level or bad jati hai. me aapko suggest karuga aap Hostgator ya Bluehost hosting use kare, jo mere hisab se badiya hai or mene inko use kiya hai. Limit login attempt bhi ek badiya tarika hai apni site ko brute force attack se bachane ka. brute force attacks me hota ye hai automatic kisi software ki madad se alag alag combination ka username or password dale jate hai, jisse site ka sahi username or password bhi pata chal sakta hai agar ham secure username or password use naa kare to. Iss attack se bachne ke liye Login LockDown plugin ko install kare, jisme ham set kar sakte hai, ki kitne war galat password dalne par uss ip ko block kar diya jaye kuch time ke liye. WordPress ko secure karne ke liye security question bhi add kar sakte hai, jisse jab bhi login karege to username or password dalne ke sath sath jo security question aapne set kiya hai uska answer bhi type karna hoga. Login page par security question add karne ke liye aapko WP Security Questions plugin use karna hoga. Install karne ke baad iski setting karna naa bhule. Security question set karne ke baad iss trha ka login page aayega. Agar aapki wordpress par site hai to aap jante hi hoge, WordPress site me login karne ke liye jo url hota hai wo www.website.comwp-login.php hota hai. Agar jo Login URL hai usko change kar diya jaye to hamari site ki jo security hai wo or thodi bad jati hai, q ki ab kisi ko login karne ke liye username or password ke sath sath usko login page bhi pata karna padega. WordPress site ka Login URL change karke ke liye WPS Hide Login plugin install karni hogi. Install karne ke baad Settings General me login page ko edit karne ka option bhi aa jayega, jisme aap apne hisab se kuch bhi url set kar sakte hai login page ke liye. WordPress site me multi user bhi add kar sakte hai, aese me aap kisi bhi user ko add karne se phele jarur dekhe ki unko site ki kitni permission rahegi or wo kya kya kar sakte hai. WordPress user ke types or unki ability aap wordpress.org ke article me check kar sakte hai. jisme WordPress user Roles and Capabilities ke ware me detail me bataya hai. WordPress site me default jo database Prefix name ke aage use kiya jata hai wp , jiske karan hacker ko table name guess karne me aasani ho jati hai, me aapko suggest karuga aap isko change kare. Database Prefix change karna thoda technical hai, me aapko suggest karuga isme kuch bhi edit karne se phele backup jarur le. Kaise edit karte hai wordpress me database prefix wo aap wpbigner par dekh sakte sakte hai. Agar Hacker kisi trha website ki file ko access kar leta hai, to wo badi aasani se files ko edit kar sakta hai Appearance Editor me ja kar. Isse bachne ke liye ham file editing ko disable kar sakte hai. File editing ko disable karne ke liye aapko apne wordpress files me wp-config.php file ko edit karna hoga, or usme ek code add karna hoga. ab agar aapko koi file edit karni hogi to aap FTP ka use kar sakte hai ya cpannel me file manager me edit kar sakte hai. Yaha mera Best WordPress theme se matlab hai ek badiya theame, ab wo paid ho ya free ho usse koi fark nahi padta wass aap jaha se bhi theme le wo secure ho. Yaha sabse jada log galti karte hai, lagbhag 80 log wo ye ki jo Paid Theme hai, unka crack theme version use karte hai, jo bhut badi galti hai. jo crack theme use karte hai wo ek trha se aesa kar rahe hai ki ek GUN ko load karke apne sar par lagali or samne wale se khe rahe hai jo unko marna hi chata hai ki uska trigger daba do, khene ka matlab khud marne ki puri teyari karli. Aap khud socho koi bhi jo chij paise me milti hai wo free me q dega, or sabse main baat agar koi crack theme use karta hai to uski site sirf hack hone ka khatra nahi iske aalawa bhi bhut nuksan hai. Crack theme use karne se jo hosting bandwidth hai wo bhut jada use hoti hai jiske karan hosting account suspend ho sakta hai or jo developer hote hai wo bhi itni mhenat karte hai theme ko banane me to wo bhi kisi ko unki mhenat free me use to karne dege nahi, wo aesi script bhi use karte hai jiske karan aapki site google me penalize google se remove bhi ho sakti hai. mene bhut logo ko dekha jo paise nahi hone ke karan crack theme use karte hai, me aapko bata du, ek war crack theme install karne ke baad wo aasani se remove nahi hoti hai, uske kuch harmful files ko chor hi deti hai site me, to kabhi main site me crack theme install karke bhi naa dekhe. Hindi Me Help par Newspaper theme hai, agar aapko ye pasand hai to aap yaha se kharid sakte hai. Ye Point bhi same upar wale point ki trha hai, matlab naa aapko Crack plugin use karni hai or naa aesi jagha se download karna hai jo trusted naa ho. Kisi bhi plugin ko install karne se phele uski rating or uski downloads bhi jarur check kare, jisse aapko andaja lag jayega wo plugin badiya hai ya nahi. Online kisi bhi file ko download karne se phele aap usko scan bhi kar sakte hai, jisse aapko ye conform ho jayega isme koi virus nahi hai. Online Virus kaise scan kare uski jankari yaha hai. WordPress site me jitni bhi plugin ya theme hai jo aap use nahi karte, matlab active nahi hai unko delete karde. Ye Security or Website speed dono ke najariye se bhut jaruri hai. Agar aapki wordpress site par user register band hai or aap ek hi jagha se apni site ko manage karte hai to ye option aapke kaam aa sakta hai, iske aap only apni IP ko allow kare Admin area ke access ke liye, jisse or koi isko access hi nahi kar payege. Iss setting ko karne ke liye aapko .htaccess file me ek code add karna hoga, jisme aapko apni IP dalni hai. sabse phele to aap apni IP Address pata kar lijiye, uske liye aap whatismyip.com site ka use kar sakte hai. iss code me jo xx.xxx.xxx.xxx hai uski jagha aapko apni IP address dalna hai, agar aap ek se jada jagha apni site ko use karte hai jese Office, Home to aap Allow karke wo IP bhi daal sakte hai. Iss Code ko .htaccess me dalkar save kar dijiye. Note ye jo option hai IP address ko allow karne ka wo aapke liye jab hi useful hai jab aap fix IP par kaam karte hai, nahi to aapko apni site ko access karne me problem hogi. Ye bhi ek extra security level hai, jisme aap apni wordpress site ki jo admin directory hai usko password laga kar protact kar sakte hai, jisse agar koi bhi usko access karna chahega to phele uska username or password dalna hoga. Ye Process thodi technical hai, par agar aap isko thoda samaj kar karege to aasani se ho jayegi. aap iska tutorial yaha dekh sakte hai. Aapki jo Email ID hai usko secure karna bhi bhut jaruri hai, nahi to pata chale aapne website ki security to bhut tight rakhi par koi aapke email id ko hack karke aapki website hack karle. Email ID ko secure karne ke liye email 2 step verification on jarur kare. Tip jo email aap site ko access karne ke liye se karte hai wo kisi se share naa kare, taki ye risk naa rahe ki agar kisi ko aapke email ka access mil jaye, nahi to wo aapki site bhi hack kar sakte hai. Website ki security ko banaye rakhne ke liye ye bhi jaruri hai ki aapka computer bhi secure rahe, iske liye apne computer ko bhi up to date rakhe taki koi uske jariye kuch naa kar paye. Simple se baat hai, agar koi Virus aapke computer me aa gaya to wo bhi aapko nuksan phucha sakta hai, wo kya nuksan phuchayega wo to iss baat par depend karta hai ki wo virus kis type ka hai. isliye aese risk se bachne ke liye badiya antivirus use kare. To ab aap ye to jaan chuke hai kaise aap apni wordpress site ko secure kar sakte hai or kaise usko Hacker se bacha sakte hai. Lekin in sab bato ke baad bhi jo sabse important hai wo ye ki aap hamesa alert rahe or up-to-date rahe. Agar aapki site hack hogi, to ho sakta hai uske hack hone ke piche aapki kisi chij me dhil ho, jese mere se huaa. Hindi Me Help Hack hui uska karan meri laparwahi thi, jo mene security par achi se dhiyan nahi diya or site hack ho gai. Aapko ye Detail Post kesi lagi, jisme mene WordPress Security Tips aapse share ki wo comment karke jarur bataye, or agar aapko koi bhi doubt hai ya kahi kuch problem aa rahi hai to wo bhi aap comment karke puch sakte hai.

Bahut se log blogging ke bare me ye sochte hai ki blogging ke dwara woh bahut hi jaldi aur kam time me amir ho jayege. lekin aisi baat nahi hai jiss tarah aap kisi dusare work me menahat karte hai ussi prakar ki menhat aapko blogging me bhi karni padhti hai. Aapko ye jaan kar bahut dukh hoga ki blogging start karne wale logo me se 99 log blogging me fail ho jate hai aur only 1 log blogging me success hote hai. blogging ke bare me ye ek kadwa such jisko aap mane yaa naa mane lekin ye such hai ki only 1 log blogging me success hote hai. aaj hum jiss topic par baat karege woh topic bahut hi interesting hai aur iss topic ko maine bahut soch smjh kar select kiya hai. yadi aap ek blogger hai aur aap blogging ko long time tak karna chate hai to aapko kuch chizo ka dhyaan rakhna hoga. aaj hum isi baat ko janege ki long term blogging me success hone ke liye kin kin chizo ko follow karna hoga. chalo dosto dekhte hai ki woh kon kon si chize hai jisko humko long term blogging me follow karna hai. Bhut se Blogger starting me jo galti karte hai wo ye ki wo dusre blog ko dekh kar ussi topic par apna blog bana lete hai ki ye itna popular hai to ham bhi aese hi popular ho jayege. par ye unki sabse pheli or sabse badi galti hoti hai. Starting me jos rhata hai or Post bhi dalte hai par kuch time baad ye samaj nahi aata ki kis topic par post dale or aage kya kare or is trha dihre dhire ek din aesa aata hai ki wo hamesa ke liye blogging ko Good Bye bol dete hai. Aap Apna Blog kisi bhi Topic par bana sakte hai aesa jaruri nahi hai ki jo phele se hai ussi par aap apna blog banaye, Sabse Phele Apna Interest ka Pata kare kis chij me hai or fir ye soche ki me usme kya kar sakta hu jisse logo ki help ho or jiski logo ko jarurat bhi ho. Aapne Blog Bana liya jisme aapka Interest hai to ye bhut achi baat hai, Q ki agar aapka Interest hai us chij me to aap hamesa kuch na kuch naya sikhne ki kosis karte rahege. Sikhna Band to Success Khatam Agar aapne Sikhna Band kar diya to ek din aesa aayega jab aapke pass kuch hoga hi nahi apne blog par dalne ko. To hamesa kuch na kuch sikhte rahe or usko apne tarike se use karte rahe. Aapka Blog jis topic par hai aap uske har topic ki nai jankari aapko pata hona chaiye, uske liye jitni bhi jagha hai jaha se uski jankari mil sakti ho, wo use kare. Abhi Sikhe Blogging me sabse important ye hai ki aapko apne upar dhairy rakhna hoga. blogging ek din ka job nahi hai. blogging me aapko samarpan, dhairy aur haosale ki jarurt padti hai. Agar aapka blog Dhire Dhire aage badh raah hai to iska ye mtlab nahi ki aap blogging me fail ho rahe hai balki iska ye mtlab hai ki aap blogging me long term success ke liye jaa rahe hai. Yadi aapne apna blog start kar diya aur 1-2 month tak aapke blog par traffic nahi aa raha hai to aapko ghbarane ke jarurt nahi hai balki aapko apne kaam par aur focus karne ki jarurt hai kyoki long term blogging me success hone ke liye time to legega hi isliye aapko apna dhairy banaye rakhna hoga. Ye Jarur Pade Blogging Ke Starting 30 Din Tak Kya Kya Karna Chahiye Yaha me aapko ek baat batana chahuga ki duniya me koi bhi aese 2 insaan nahi hai jiski finger prints milti ho, tikh ussi trha har insan ka alag alag talent hota hai, alag alag chamta hoti ahi or har ek ki alag alag limit hoti hai. To agar aap apne aapko kisi dusre blogger se compare karege jo phele se success hai or bhut time se blogging kar raha hai to aapko lagega aap ye nahi kar payege or is trha aap blogging ko choadne ki disa me badne lagege. Aap ye dekhe ki saamne wali ne kitne time tak kitni mhanat ki jab wo is mukam par hai to aapko bhi mhanat to karni padegi. koi bhi ek Raat me aamir nahi ban sakta, agar koi ban bhi jata hai to wo aamiri bhi sirf ek raat ki hi rhati hai, jab uski nind khulti hai to wo wahi hota hai jaha wo tha. Ye sab khane ka mera sirf itna matlab hai ki aapka jo talent hai usko aap or improve kare or logo ke saamne usko rakhe. aapko dhire dhire hi sahi par Success jarur milegi. Agar aapne Apna Blog Bana liya hai or aap uspar kaam bhi kar rahe hai or bhut mhanat bhi kar rahe hai par uske sath sath aapko apni blog ki puri gati bidhiyo par bhi najar rakhni hai. Aap dekhe ki aapke blog ke visitor kaha se aa raha hi, Kitne Visitor aa rahe hai, wo kya padna jada pasand karte hai, kis chij me ao aapki site open karte hai, kha ke hai wo visitor, kitni der wo aapki site ko open karke rakhte hai, site ka bounce rate kya hai. aesi or bhi bhut si chije hai jinpar aapko najar rakhni hai or dekhte rhana hai ki kya acha ho raha hai or kya bura. Aap ye Puri Jankari Google Analytics ki madad se le sakte hai apni site ki. Apne Blog ke Comments ko bhi dekhe usse bhi aapko apne visitor ke interest ke ware or acha idea ho jayega ki unko kesi jankari chaiye or unko kya pasand hai or kya nahi wo bhi pata chal jayega. Ye Point bhi Important hai, Hame apne blog ki design or uski loading speed par diyan dena bhut jaruri hai. Agar hamare blog ki design achi nahi hogi to visitor uspar double se aana pasand nahi karege jo hamare blog ke liye bilkul bhi acha nahi hai Is liye Ec acha Template use kare apne blog me jo Mobile or Computer dono me achi se khulta ho. Loading Speed bhut bhut maine rakhti hai, Q ki agar hamari site jada time legi open hone me to koi usko open hone ka intjar nahi karega or site ko open hone se phele hi band kar dega. is trha se to hamari mhanat hi barbad ho sakti hai. Is liye Blogging ki design or uski Speed par jarur dhiyan de. Ye Kuch Post wese to is Point me kuch safai dene ki jarurat nahi hai muje ki Q acha Contant dale. Ye to sabko pata hai sabko achi chij hi pasand aati hai to agar aapka jo contant Post wo achi hogi to log usko pasand karege or aapke blog par war war aayege. Jo Bhi Contant dale, sabse phele uski puri jankari khud lele. kahi aesa naa ho aapko adhuri jankari ho or uski baja se kuch galat chij share karde. isse aapko aage chal kar bhari nuksan ho sakta hai. Ye Kuch Chije jo aapko Post karte same dhiyan me rakhna hai Ye Pade Evergreen Content ka mtlab fresh content jo naya ho acha ho or kahi dusri jagha naa ho, jiski jarurat lambe time tak padti rahe. Evergreen Content long term blogging me success karane me ek aham bhumika nibhate hai. To Jitne bhi aese topics hai aapke blog ke topic se sambandit uspar badiya post jarur likhe. Ham Simple Sabdo me kha sakte hai ki agar aapke blog par aese post hai jo hamesa kaam aani hai to hamesa us post par traffic aati rahegi Agar aap badiya badiya ever green post karte rahege to aapko long time blog me usko bhut hi bada faida hone wala hai. to ab se is baat ka bhi dhiyan rakhe ki ever Green contant bhi bhut jaruri hai. Blog Banane ka Jada tar logo ka Maksad hota hai usse paise kamana, Par bhut se blogger yaha bhut badi galti kar dete hai jo uske Blogging ko Good Bye khane ka karan banti hai. Hota hai ye ki jo New Blogger hai wo Blog banaye to der nahi hui or paise dekhne lagte hai ki meri itni earning hogi, ye hoga wo hoga. Paisa Sirf Uske Pass Aata Hai Jo Us Paise ke Layak ho. Par asliyat me aapko batata hu Paise aapke pass jab hi aayege jab aap paise ke layak hoge. Agar aapke Blog par bhut jada Traffic aati hai to hi aap acha Paisa Kama sakte ho usse. Ab agar aap Apne Traffic ko Badane ki bajaye sirf apni earning dekhege to usse earning me koi badotri to hogi nahi, balki aapka Blogging se Interest hatta jayega. Isliye Earning par bhi dhiyan de par usse phele un chijo par dhiyan de jinse aapki earning honi hai. Ye Post Pade aapko jarur inse Help Milegi Regular rhana bhi bhut jaruri hai agar aapko blogging me long time tak tikhe rhana hai to. Regular se ye matlab hai ki aap bhale do din me ek post dale ya 4 din me par ye fix rakhe. Isse ye faida hai ki jin logo ko aapki post pasand aati hai unko pata rahega ki aaj bhi kuch New Post aai hogi or fir wo aapke blog ko open karke dekhege. Agar Aapka Blog hai or aapko usko logo tak phuchana hai to aapko Social Media ki madad leni padegi or uske liye aapko inpar bhi active rhana padega. Aap apne blog ke liye Facebook Page, Twitter Page, Google Plus Page Banaye or jab bhi koi New Post kare apne blog par in sab par usko share kare. jisse jin bhi logo ne usko Like ya Follow kiya hoga unko aapki New Post ki Jankari Mil Jayegi. Hindi Me Help ka FB Group Jarur Join Kare SEO ka Matlab Search Engine Optimization. SEO me ham apne blog or uski post ko is trha se likhte hai or set karte hai jiski baja se wo search me aasani se aa jaye or jab koi search kare Google me to hamaro post SEPR Search Engine Page Result par hamari Post dikhe or wo uspar click karke hamare blog par aaye. Agar hamara Blog search me hi nahi aayega to ham kitni bhi acha content likhe wo sahi logo tak phuch hi nahi payega or hamari mhanat ka mahe pura fal nahi mil payega. jo Long Term blogging ke hisab se bilkul bhi acha nahi hai. SEO ki Bhut ki Post mene HMH Par Share ki hai jo Aap yaha dekh sakte hai, Ye Kuch SEO Ki Posts Agar aapka Blog hai to aap sirf apna faida naa dekhe ki aapke visitor bade, aapki income bade. Me ye nahi kha rhaha aap apne ware me naa soche par agar aapko lambe time tak blogging me bane rhana hai to aapko apne sath sath dusre logo ke ware me bhi sochna padega. Aap Apne Visitor ko kaise achi se achi subhida de sakte hai uske ware me soche or wo kare. Dusre Blog par jab bhi koi post pade to post ko padne ke baad ek acha comment kare jarur kare. Agar kisi site ki koi Post Pasand aati hai to ye nahi ki usko apni khud ki site par dale, balkul us Post ko Share kare Social Network par. Isse aapka us website ke owner ke sath ache relationship to banega hi sath sath aapke jo visitor hai agar unko bhi usse faida hoga to wo bhi aapki ijjat karege. Ye Galti bhi bhut log kar dete hai or fir unko iska uska parinaam bhugatna bhi padta hai. Kuch Blogger kya karte hai ki wo dekhte hai ki is site par ye jada popular hai to usko thoda bhut change karke apni site par daal dete hai. par aesa karne se ho sakta hai unko thode time ke liye faioda ho jaye, par lambe time ke hisab se wo bhut badi galti kar rahe hai. Agar ham kahi se copy karke koi post dalege to kon hoga jo hamare blog par aayega original contant ko choadd kar. or Google Search Engine bhi din wa din smart hota ja raha hai to copy karne walo ke hath akhri me nirasa hi hath lagni hai. Ye Jarur Pade Copy Karne ke Faide or Niksan jaanne ke liye yaha click kare Network Banane se khane ka matlab dusre logo se apna acha relationship banaye, Dusre logo ki Help kare taki wo bhi aapki help kar sake. Acha Network banane ke liye Hamesa Dusro ki Help kare, or kabhi bhi koi galat chij naa bataye kisi ko bhi. Hamesa Blog par agar koi comment aaye to usko acha sa reply kare, or agar koi question hai to uska jabab jarur de. isse jisne comment kiya hai usko to help milegi hi sath sath dusre jab us comment ko padege to wo bhi aapko pasand karne loagege. Is Trha se Bana sakte hai dusre logo ke sath ache Relation Logo ke sath judav se aapko bhut hi faida hone wala hai. Udharan ke liye aap Hindi Me Help ko hi dekh lijiye. Hindi Me Help par koi bhi galat chij share nahi ki jati or jitna bhi possible hai sabki achi se help ki jati hai, or ye ussi ka karan hai ki log Hindi Me Help ko itna pasand karte hai. Yadi aapke blog par traffic nahi aa raha hai aur aap sortcut tarika dhudh rahe hai blog par traffic lane ke liye to ye aapke liye sahi rasta nahi hai. Aapko ek baat ko dhyaan me rakhna hoga ki sortcut traike se aap lambe time tak blogging nahi kar sakte hai. blogging me success hone ke liye aapko blogging ke rule ko follow karna cahiye aur aapko blogging ke rule follow karne me time to lagega lekin iske sath sath aapko iska badiya result bhi milega. Yadi aap blogging me apna career banana cahate hai to aapko kabhi bhi jaldi baaji nahi karna hoga. Kabhi bhi dusre ki success dekh kar bheraye nahi, balki or acha kaam kare to aapko bhi success jarur milegi. Hamne Blogging me kya karna hai or kaise karna hai wo to sab dekh liya, Par unke sath sath hame apne blog ki security par bhi dhiyan dena bhut hi jaruri hai. Nahi to Pata chale kisi choti si galti ki baja se ham apni puri mhanat ko gava bethe. Hamesa Apne Blog ka Backup le kar rakhe, Taki agar kabhi hamare sath galti se koi gadbad ho jaye to ham usko aasani se tikh kar sake. Apni Blog ki security par bhi dhiyaan dena bhut jaruri hai. warna koi hamare blog ke sath kuch galat bhi kar sakta hai wese agar ham kisi ka galat nahi karte to koi hamara galat karega to nahi. Par jitna hamare hath me hai security ka usko hame dhiyan dena bhut jaruri hai. Blogger Blog ki security kaise badaye or kaise hack hone se bachaye uski jankari mene phele hi share ki hai aapko wo padni chaiye. or aapne jo blogger me email use kiya hai usme Google Gmail 2 Step Verification Enable jarur kare security double karne ke liye. WordPress ki security kaise badaye uski detail me jankari aapko mil jayegi, iske sath sath aap HMH Hack hui thi uska kya karan tha wo bhi read kar sakte hai taki aap wo galti naa kare. Ek baat or jo me aapse khena chahuga ki ham koi bhi kaam kare usme ham jab hi acha kaam kar sakte hai jab ham us kaam ke liye motivate ho. To Agar aapko Motivate hona hai to aap yaha click karke Articles Pad sakte hai. Ye Kuch Tips thi jinko agar aap follow kare to aap Long Term Blogging me ek acha mukam pa sakte hai or success ho sakte hai. Apni ek alag phechan bana sakte hai. kabhi bhi risk lene se naa dare aur apna jyada time sochne me naa west kare. jiss bhi bare me aap sochte hai uske bare me turant action le. Muje Ummid hai aapko ye Article Jarur pasand aaya hoga or isme mene jo jankari aap logo ke sath share ki hai usse aapko log term blogging me jarur faida hoga. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi or aap kya sochte hai long term Blogging me success hone ke liye wo comment me jarur bataye. Muje khusi hogi aapke bichar jaan kar.

Aapne kabhi socha hai ki agar internet par koi bhi website nahi hota to kya hota. Simple si baat hai ki agar website nahi hoti to internet itna papular nahi hota. Internet par har rooj hajaro website aur blog bante aur delete hote hai. lekin kuch aise bhi website hai jo bahut pahle se abhi tak run kar rahe hai. aur wohi sab website hm sab ki life ko easy bana dete hai. Aajka jo post hai woh bahut hi intresting post hai kyoki aaj mai aapke sath kuch aise usefull website share karuga jiske bina hmara bahut sa kaam nahi ho pata ya aasani se nahi ho pate. to chalo dekhte hai ki woh kon kon se website hai jo hamare kaam ko internet par Aaasan bana dete hai. Ye ek bahut hi intresting website list hai aur muje ummid hai aapko isme bhut si wesi website ke bare me pata chala hoga jo usefull to hai par aapko unke bare me phele nahi pata tha. Jesa ki mene phele hi bataya har hin hajaro lakho new website banti hai. To aesa to hai nahi ki jitni bhi jaruri website hai unko list me add kiya ho. par agar aapko koi aesi website ke bare me pata hai jo usefull ho sakti hai hamare lkiye to comment karke bataye. Aapko ye list kesi lagi or aap inme se kitni website ko use karte hai. ya aapki sabse manpasand website konsi hai wo bhi bataye. Ye bhi Pade

Hello Friend, Aap ye to jaante hi hoge Internet ka istmaal kitna badta ja raha hai, aaj kal har kaam Internet se hoja hai. Mobile Net se recharge ho jata hai, Online ham Shopping kar sakte hai, Online Result dekh sate hai, or bhi Bhut Kuch. Internet ka jis trha se istmaal badta jaa raha hai agar aesa hi raha to thode time baad sare kaam Internet ki hi madad se hoge. Q ki Internet har chij ko aasani se kr sakte hai. Online Paise kamane ke option bhi badte jaa rahe hai . Ham Internet ki Madad se Ghar Baithe Aasani se paise kama sakte hai. Internet se paise kamane ke to bhut tarike hai par aaj me aapko 2 tariko ke bare me bataoga jinki madad se me paise kama raha hu or inme koi risk bhi nahi hai. Kaise Net se Paisa kamaye usse phele. Que 1. Kya Net se paise kama sakte hai, isme koi risk to nahi? Ans. Haa, Aap bilkul kama sakte hai aasani se. or agar risk ki baat kare to Internet par bhut si sites farji bhi hai jo aapke sath dhoka kar sakti hai, isliye aapko sabdhaan rahna hoga. Que 2. Net se Paise Kamane ke liye koi Degree ki jarurat padti hai? Ans. Net se paise kamane ke liye koi Degree ki Jarurat nahi padti, Par haa Aap net se jabhi paise kama sakte ho jab aapka Interestlagav. Maan lijiye aapko Khana banane me interest hai to aap uski website banakar apni recipes ko uspar daal sakte hai. Que 3. Net se kitne Paise kama sakte hai? Ans. Net se kitne paise kama sakte hai ye sabaal mujse mera har milne wala puchta hai, mumkin hai aapka bhi ye sabaal ho. iska sidha Jabaab hai Koi Limit nahi hai Internet se Paisa kamane ki. Iska karan ye hai ki ye koi Job nahi ye ek Business hai jisme aap lakho-croro bhi kama sakte ho ya fir ho sakta hai kuch bhi naa kamao. par yaha par faida ye hai ki aapko koi ghata nahi hoga or kuch na kuch naya sikhne ho hi milega. Que 4. Kya Mobile ki madad se paise kamaya ja sakta hai ya Computer bhi jaruri hai ?

Yaha aapko Blogger Ki Puri Jaankari Milegi

Agar aap nahi jante me to aapko bata du ham jis app ki baat karne wale hai PhonePe App wo Flipkart ne kharid liya hai to aap samaj sakte hai jo App hai wo farji to nahi ho sakta q ki flipkart jesi badi company ka hai. PhonePe ek mobile app hai jiski madad se ham payment kar sakte hai or payment recive bhi kar sakte hai. Aap PhonePe app ki madad se online bhi payment kar sakte hai or ye UPI par par bhi work karta hai to aap badi aasani se iski madad se apne bank account me bhi paise transfer kar sakte hai. Agar Aap blogging karte hai to hmesa kahi na kahi keyword ke bare me jarur sunte honge. Keyword bhut jaruri hota hai, Keyword Kaise search kare, Keyword kaise use kare etc. iss trha ke bhut se topic hai Keyword se related or in sab ki sirubad hoti hai Keyword kya hai? Yadi aap blogging me naye hai tab aapko keyword ke bare Me nahi pata hoga. aapko keyword ke bare me nahi pata hai ki keyword kya hota hai aur hum isko apne blog or website me kaise use karte hai. to ye article aapke liye helpful hoga kyoki iss article me hum janege ki ek keyword kya hota hai aur ek badiya keyword ko kaise choose karte hai, iske sath sath ye bhi ki keywords kitne prakar ke hote hai. Keyword sabd search engine ko ye batata hai ki aapka blog or website kiss bare me hai. Search Engine iska calculating karne ke liye dekhta hai ki woh particular word Jisko hum keyword kehte hai kisi bhi article me kitni baar use kiya gaya hai. Example ke taur par agar apne blog ke article me make money 2-4 baar likhte hai to search engine ko iss baat ka anubhao ho jayega ki aapka article make money ke upar hi hai. Aur jab koi visitor make money ya phir isse related koi word Google par search karega tab post top search page par show hogi. Kisi bhi Keyword ko jisko aap target kar rahe hai search engine ke liye usko ek limit se jada war use naa kare nahi to wo keyword stuffing khelata hai jisko google Spamming bhi samaj sakta hai. Iss baat ko or achi se samajne ke liye aap yaha padhe kaise ek post likhe jo User or Search Engine dono ko pasand aaye, or uske sath sath aapko keyword density ka bhi dhiyan rakhna hai ki aapko kitni war apna keyword use karna hai. Aap ye to samaj gaye hoge, blogging me keyword ka matlab hai wo sabd jispar ham post likh rahe hai or ham chate hai ki agar koi usko search kare to hamari post search me aaye. Post likhne ke liye sirf ek keyword kafi nahi hai, ek badiya keyword hona jaruri hai. Keyword search karne ke liye aap Google Keyword Planner ka use kar sakte hai jo bilkul free hai, uske sath sath aap Google Search ka bhi use kar sakte hai, jisme automatic jo suggestion aate hai usse andaja laga sakte hai log kaise search karte hai. Keywords 2 trha ke hote hai Short Keyword Ham jab post likhne ke liye koi keyword select karte hai to usme jo hamara main target hota hai jisko hame rank karna hai, agar wo main topic hi hai to wo hamara keyword hoga. Short Keyword me dikkat ye hai, usme computation bhut jada rheta hai, or agar phele se badiya tarike se achi website par diya huaa hai to aapki post rank hi nahi kar payegi. par agar aap short keyword ko bhi rank kara de to aapko traffic achi mil sakti hai. Long Tail Keyword koi topic hai jiske sath kuch extra keyword bhi add ho jaye to wo long tail keyword hota hai. Example se samajte hai Paise kaise kamaye Short Keyword Online Ghar Bhethe Paise kaise kamaye Long Tail Keyword Ab aapko clear ho gaya hoga, kya hai Short Keyword or Long tail keyword. or aap samaj hi gaye hoge long tail keyword use karne se kya faida hai, waha computation kam hoga, q ki jaruri nahi jitni bhi site ho un sabne wahi long tail keyword use kiya ho. To mera suggestion rahega aap aesa keyword select kare, jiska computation kam ho, matlab phele se uspar post naa likhi ho kisi blog par, Short Keywords ke sath aese words bhi jarur add kare ki wo ek long tail keyword ki trha bhi kaam kare. Badiya Keyword ko select karne ke baad us keyword ko sahi tarike se use karna bhi jaruri hai, jab hi aapko uska sahi result milega. kaha kaha or kaise use karna hai uske kuch point iske or badiya tarike se samajne ke liye aap On Page SEO ko samje, usme aapko or achi se clear ho jayega aapko apna Keyword kaha or kaise use karna hai. Post ko Popular karna hai to aapko SEO ka to pura dhiyan rakhna hi padega, jab hi aapke blog par traffic aayega. Ummid hai ab aapko clear ho gaya hoga keyword kya hai or uska kya use hai, iske baad bhi agar aapka koi sabal hai to aap comment karke puch sakte hai.

Blog par traffic tabhi aata hai jab apke blog ka content achha ho, lekin bahut kam log is baat ko follow karte hai. Aap Ke blog ka traffic pura depend karta hai ki aap kis tarah se likhte hai. Kyonki log apke blog par kuch information lene ya apni problem ka solution karne ke liye aate hai. Na ki ye dekhte ne ke liye ki ap regular koi na koi article likhte hai. Is article me apki sabse badi problem ka solution mil sakta hai wo hai apke article ke sath me log attach kyon nahin hote hai? Yah baat to har koi janta hai ki agar apke blog ke contents quality hai to apko apne blog ka SEO bhi karne ki jarurat nahi hoti hai. Kyonki Google almost unhe hi ranking deta hai jo quality provide karte hai, jo Google ke searchers ko achha content dete hai, jabki dusre taraf agar apka content quality nahi hai tab kitna bhi SEO karlo aap ko mili hui ranking bhi hath se chali jaegi. iske ware me or jada jankari ke liye aap Google Important Ranking factor padh sakte hai. Agar mera vote sunna chahte hai to main kahuga off course readers ke liye hi likhe, par Google me ranking lene ke liye Keyword target karna ya aur bhi On-Page SEO karna thik hai lekin almost koshish honi chahiye ki readersvisitors apke blog par kuch waqt ke liye ruke. Isse pehle ke ham baat kare kaise quality content likhte hai, me aapko bata du google hamari or jo internet use karte hai uski har harkat par najar rakhta hai. Google Kaise hampar najar rakhta hai or kya kya track karta hai wo aap yaha dekh sakte hai. Google ko ye pata karna jada muskil nahi hota ki konsa article high quality hai or konsa nahi, kaise bata karta hai uske kuch point me aapse share kar saha hu. Maine pichli post perfect on page seo kaise kare par discuss kiya tha ki jab apke bounce rate achi hoti hai yani kam hoti hai to apka blog ka yah positive result ha. Kyonki bounce rate ka percentage jitna high hota hai readers apke blog ko utna hi ignore kar rhe hai. Bounce rate kya hai iske ware me detiail me article hai aap usko bhi jarur read kare, agar aap nahi jante bounce rate ke ware me or uski importance ke ware me. Yani ke readers apke content par kitne waqt ke liye thehar raha hai. Agar readers jyada waqt ke liye apke content par rahega to apke high change hoge ranking milne ki. Aur isi wajah se bade content jyada high rank karte hai kyonki aise content ko padhne ke liye readers content par jyada wakt spend karta hai. Alexa Ranking me bhi ye bhut jaruri hai. or Alexa Rank Widget kaise add kare uski jankari yaha hai CTR Click through rate ke percentage jitna jyada hone ka yah means hota hai ki log search engine me search karte hai tab top results me unhe aap ki site jyada pasand aa rahi hai. Jitne aapke social share hoge utne hi apke ranking ke change bhi high hoge, Google kisi bhi content ke social share high hone par yeh samjhta hai ki yah content user ke liye jyada friendly hai. Facebook, Twitter, Google, Pinterest jesi sites par jarur share kare. Iske alawa aur bhi kai factor hain jiske madhyam se Google content ki quality ka pata lagata hai. Aapke blog Bounce rate, time on page Google analytics se dekha ja sakta hai. Aur CTR ko dekhne ke liye Google webmaster me login kar sakte hai aur social share dekhne ke liye kai tools free online available hai. Ab tak aap yah samjh gaye hai ki quality content ka pata kaise lagate hai to ab aata hai ki quality content ko kaise likhe? Niche kuch tips hai jisse aapki content writing skill kafi approve ho sakti hai. In sabko follow karke aap apne article ko kafi better kar sakte hai, mujhe ummid hai is content ko padhne ke bad me apka new content pichle sab content se quality hoga.
to ek badiya sujhaav hai. Uski contact list mein hahakar macha do. Jaise Saurav ke naam ke aage Dhoni ka no daal do aur Harbhajan ke naam ke aage Sreesanth ka mobile no daal do.
to apne kisi dost se office mein phone karwao. Use kehna chahiye ki use tumse baat karni hai. Aur use har ek ghante baad phone karne ko kaho.
phir dekho unka nritya. Thoda nritya karne ka naatak tum bhi kar lena nahi to kisi ko tum par shak ho jayega.

Hello Blogger, Is Post me ham Blogger ki baat karege jo bhut basic hai par important hissa hota hai hamare blogger blog ka. Jese ki Aap jante hi hoge Blogger me ham apni hisab se jo chahe wo add kar sakte hai layout me widget add karke. jese Facebook Like Box add karne ke liye ham HTMLJavaScript Widget ka use karte hai. Mene phele hi bhut se Widgets ke bare me bata chuka hu or is post me jis widget ki baat karege wo Popular Posts Widget hai jo bhut jaruri hota hai ek blog ke liye. Popular Posts Widget ki madad se ham apne blog ki jo Popular Post hai unko Dikha sakte hai, jisse agar koi visitor hamare blog par aaye to wo un popular post ko bhi pade, jisse hamare blog ke Page Views bad jate hai. To Chaliye dekhete hai kaise Is Widget ko add kar sakte hai apne blog me. jese ki mene post ke starting me hi kha tha ki ye ek basic jankari hai, Q ki is widget ko add karna bhut aasan hai. Aap meri steps ko follow kare. Step 1 Blogger.com me Login kare fir apne Blog ke Deshboard me jaye Step 2 ab hame Blogger ke Layout ke section me jana hai. Step 3 layout me aane ke baad, Jaha aapko Popular Posts Widget ko add karna hai wha par Layout me Add a Gadget par click kare. Step 4 Ab ek Popup Window khulegi, jisme bhut se widget ki list hogi jo ham apne blog me add kar sakte hai. Scroll Down karke Popluar Posts Widget par click kare. Step 5 Ab Popular Posts Widget ki setting ka Page aayega. Usme aap kesa dikhana chate hai blog me aesi setting kare. AB aap apne blog ko Open karke dekhe Widget dikhne laga hoga or jo aapke blog ki popular post hai wo bhi usme dikhne ladi hogi. Agar isme aapko koi doubt ho to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. Ye Post Bhi Pade Happy Blogging

Hello Blogger Adsense kya hai or usse kaise paise kamate hai blog par wo to aapko pata hi hoga. Adsense se jada earning karne ke liye hame ads ko aesi jagha lagana hota hai jada visitor uspar jada click kare or wo jagha hai Post ke bich me. Agar Adsense se jada earning karni hai to aapko adsense ke jo ads hai wo post ke bich me lagana hoga. aapko ye bhi jarur padhna chaiye ki akhir Q Fail hote hai adsense se paise kamane me log Agar aapka Blog WordPress par hai to aapko bhut se plugin mil jayege jinki madad se aap adsense ke ads kahi bhi laga sakte hai. jese Quick Adsense. par agar aapka blog Blogger par hai to ye Tutorial aapke liye hai jisme ham dekhege, Kaise Adsense ke Ads ko Blog Post ke Bich me kahi bhi lagaya jata hai. Agar aapne abhi apne blog post me ads lagaye hoge to aapne ye kiya hoga ki jo Ads ka code hai usko Post ke HTML me dala hoga, ham aese bhi kar sakte hai par isme hame war war code ko copy karke dalna padta hai jo bhut matha pachi wala kaam hai. Chaliye dekhte hai kaise Ham Badi aasani se Adsense ads jaha chahe waha kaise laga sakte hai badi aasani se. Ye Bhi Padhe Ab aapko simple muje follow karna hai or jese jese me kar raha hu aapko karna hai. Yaha ek baat diyan rakhe ham blog ke template me kuch code edit karege to ye sab kaam fresh mind se hi kare. Chaliye start karte hai. Step 1 Sabse Phele blogger.com me login karne ke baad Apne blog ke deshboard me jaye, fir Template ke section me jaye. Note Template edit karne me ho sakta hai kuch gadwad ho jaye isliye phele template ka backup jarur lele. Kaise lete hai backup uski jankari yaha hai. Step 2 Template ke section me aane ke baad Edit HTML par click kare. Step 3 Ab Editor me Click karke CtrlF dabaye or fir ye code search kare Step 4 Ab Code ko search kare template me. ye jo code hai wo bhut war ho sakta hai aapke template me, jo 2nd number par hai usko select karege. Note Agar 2nd wala code kaam naa kare to 3rd wala code hai template me usko use kare. Step 5 ab hamne datapost.body search kiya tha usko replace karna hai hamare new code se. 1 Sabse Phele top Adsense ke Code ko encode kar lijiye niche diye tool ki madad se or fir usko kahi notepad me save kar lijiye. Code ko convert karke niche jo code diya hai usme jaha likha huaa hai ! Adsense ka jo Code hai usko yaha dalna hai us jagha par apne adsense ke convert code ko dale. Step 6 jo Code hai usme adsense ka encoded code add karke ab hamne jo code search kiya hai template me datapost.body uski jagha replace karna hai code ko fir template save karna hai. Step 7 Ab Jab bhi Post likhe to post likhne ke baad Post Editor ke HTML View me ja kar hame jaha bhi adsense ke ads dikhana hai waha ye code dalna hai. Note Agar aap ye Short Code use nahi karege Post me to jo Ads hai wo Title ke niche automatic dikhne lagega. To Firends is Trha aap badi aasani se Apni Blogger ki Bog Post me jaha chahe ads laga sakte hai or apni earning badha sakte hai. Mene is Post me bataya ki aap adsense ke ads aese kahi bhi laga sakte hai par agar aapke pass kisi or company ke ads hai to aap unko bhi aese hi laga sakte hai. To Friends aapko ye jankari kesi lagi comment karke jarur bataye or agar aapko kahi koi dikkat aa rahi hai to aap comment karke wo bhi bata sakte hai.

Kya aap bhi apne android mobile ke pure features ko use karna chahte hain aur apne android smartphone ko root karna chahte hain? Agar aapka jawab hai YES to aap ekdum sahi jagah hai. Bahut se log android mobile ko root karne se darte hain. Kyuki unhe aisa lagta hai ki android root karne se unke mobile ko problem ya fir mobile kharab ho sakta hai. Lekin dosto aisa kuchh bhi nahi hai. Rooting ek bahut hi simple aur safe process hai. Ye Bhi Padhe Rooting ek process hai jiski madad se aap pane mobile ke bahut se functions ko unlock kar sakte hain, aur apne mobile ke sath various experiment kar sakte hain, Jaise ki system apps ko uninstall karna, customize karna, aur bhi bahut si chiz. Apne android mobile ko root karne se pehle advantages aur disadvantages of rooting jan le. Aur fir me aapko kuchh best apps android mobile ko root karne ke liye bataenge. Har chiz ke nuksan aur fayde advantages hote hain. Usi tarah android mobile root karne ke bhi kuchh nuksan aur fayde hain. To chaliye sabse pehle ham rooting ke advanatages aapko batate hain. Disadvantages of rooting bhi zarur padhe. Also Read 10 Tarike Mobile Ko Hang Hone Se Rokene ke Ye Bhi Pade Computer se Android Mobile ko kaise Root karte hai uski jankari Kya aapke pas ComputerPC nahi hai? aur aap apna android mobile ko root karne ke liye soch rahe to koi bat nahi. Kyuki aaj me aapko bataenge 5 Apps Android Phone ko root karne ke without PC 2 minutes me. To chaliye ab jante hain in apps ke bare mein aur kaise inhe use karte hain. Ye ek bahut hi simple app hai jiski madad se aap apne android mobile ko easily root kar sakte hain. Ye app apke mobile ko kuchh hi seconds me root kar deta hai. Aur agar aapka mobile root nahi hota hai to ye aapko ek message show karega. Ye ek abhut hi safe aap hai aur isko use karna bhi easy hai. Aap yah se Framaroot Supported Devices Dekh sakte hain. Download Framaroot App Also Read WhatsApp Hack kaise kare or WhatsApp Hack se Kaise Bachaye 6 Tarike Ye app bhi one click root app hai. Jab aap apne mobile ko is app se root karenge to aapka mobile ek bar reboot hoga. Isiliye ise hamne 2nd number par rakha hai. Aap yaha se Vroot ke supported devices ki list dekh sakte hain. So, ye bhi ek bahut hi badhiya app hai. Download Vroot Ye bhi Padhe Mobile Se Free Calling Kaise Kare kisi bhi Number Par Ye bhi ek rooting app hai aur ye bahut se devices ko support karta hai. Aur agr aap chinese android smartphone use kar rahe hain to ye aap aapke liye bilkul perfect hai. Is s app me root karne ke 2 methods hain pehla temporary method aur dusra permanent method. Agar aap temporary root karte hain to mobile restart karne ke bad aapka mobile unroot ho jayega. Permanent root karne par aapka mobile permanently root ho jayega. Download z4Root App Also Tri Mobile Me App Install karke Paise Kaise Kamaye Top 6 App Ye app bhi Vroot ki tarah hai lekin isme kuchh updates huye hain. Is app se bahut se android mobile root huye hai jo ki MediatekMTK par run karte hain. So, ye bhi ek bahut hi safe aur easy app hai MTK chipset mobiles ko root karne ke liye. Download KingRoot Also Read king Root se kaise Ro Phone Root Kare uski step by step process Ye app bhi bahut hi badhiya hai jo ki Kitkat version ke liye banaya gaya hai. Ye app Samsung ke smartphones par bhi work karta hai. Aur ye app ekdum FREE hai. To chaliye iss apko ek try zarur de. Download Towl Root Ye Bhi Dekhe Android Mobile App Kaise Banaye 5 Minute Me in Hindi So friends, in apps ko zarur try kare aur agar aapke pas koi aur badhiya one click rooting app hai to use dusro ke sath zarur sahre kare. Aur agar aap kisi topic par help ya article chahte hain to niche comment kare. Ye ek Guest Post hai HMH.pe jo Md Saban ne ki hai jo HelpMeMore.com ke Founder hai. Agar aap bhi Guest karna chate hai to yaha click kare Dusri Guest Post padhne ke liye yaha click kare Ye Bhi Padhe

Hello Blogger s, Hope aap sab badiya hoge, or aapki Website bhi badia hogi, or jo HMH ke sath huaa, wo aapki site ke sath kabhi nahi hoga, HMH kaise Hack hui or kya galti rahi meri wo sab me aapko is post me batane wala hu, taki aap ye galti naa kare. HMH Hack hui thi, ye sayad aapko pata hoga, or ye pure 31 Hours Down rahi, jisme mera sirf site se jo earning hoti thi sirf wo nuksan nahi huaa, uske sath mera bhut sa nuksan huaa jiske ware me abhi me bataoga. HMH Hack hone ka karan tha muje VPS ki sahi jankari naa hona or uske sath hi usme kuch Bug hone ke karan hacker ko uske through hack karne me aasani hona.

Excel ek world famous Microsoft ka software hai, jis par data ka kaam kiya jata hai. Is post me ham Excel ko Hindi me kaise sikhte hai ke bare me janege. Excel ham Video ki madad se sikh sakte hai, main best YouTube ki playlist channels share karu, usse pahle yah samjh lete hai ki excel kay kam ka hai aur kaise ek blogger ke liye bhi important hai. Jab baati hai blogging ki tab iske liye excel main bhi use karta hu. Excel me apne blog ke content ko manage kiya ja sakta hai. Excel me data ko save ke use achhe se analyse kar sakte hai jo apko blog business ko aage badhaega. Itna hi nahi apne bloggig ke future ke bare me To do list bhi taiyar kar sakte hai. Jaise aap apne blog post ko one month me set kar sakte hai ki is-is day ye wala post ko publish karna hai kyonki us din ye wali hi post set hogi. Iske sath me sabse badi baat hai wo hai keyword. Agar aap har post ki keyword list bhi taiyar karte hai tab ye bahut hi achha hoga jisse ye pata lagaya ja sakta hai ki itne keyword apne target kiye hai aur uski monthly searches yeh hai. Jisse ye hoga ki future me kitna traffic ho sakta hai ko analyze kar sakte hai. Agar aap Google keyword planner use karte hai to apko jarur pata hoga ki ap kisi keyword ki puri detail ko excel me download kar sakte hai. Fir us excel file ko edit bhi kiya ja sakta hai. To is tarah se dekh sakte hai ki listing ke sab kaam me execl ka hi use hota hai. Jiske liye apko excel ana hi hoga. Agar aap ek blogger ho tab bhi apke liye important hai aur nahi bhi ho tab bhi. Kyonki apni life style ko better karne ke liye usko bhi analyze karna bahut important hai. Ab jab HindiMeHelp ke bloggers ke liye blog hai. To is post me main bat karuga ki kaise life style ko excel work karke apni life style ko professional me change kar sakta hai. Chalo ab jan lete hai ki kaise ise sikht hai. Pahle to main apko yah bata deta hono ki excel ka basic koi itna tough nahi hai. Lagbhag sabhi computer user ko excel ka basic to ata hi hai but Excel me bahut features, techniques, formulas hai jisse apne data ko achhe tarike se manage kar sakte hai. Isme kai mathematic formulas lagte aur bahut better features hai. Jin mese kuch featues ko aage se hi sikhna hota hai. Jo maine apke sath me playlist share ki hai ye sab YouTube pe Hindi Excel sikhane me bahtu popular hai. To main ummid karta hu ye apki kuch help kare. Mene Ek Post Me PhotoShop sikhne ke liye bhi Youtube ki achi channel share ki thi, jinki madad se aap PhotoShop sikh sakte hai. Ye Bhi Pade

Hello Friends ye Post Father s ko dedicated hai, Father jisko or bhi kai naam hai jisse pukara jata hai, Papa, Dad, Pitaji etc. Har Saal June ke mahine me 3rd Sunday ko fathers day manaya jata hai. jo ke iss saal 17 June 2018 ko hai. Me apne Papa ko apna Guru maanta hu or aaj jo me hu wo unhi ki baja se hu, ye mene apni one year success story me bhi bataya tha. Mere Papa ji mere liye Adarsh hai, q ki wo ek adarsh Pitaa hai. wo aese insan hai jinme wo sari khubiya hai jo ek mhan insaan me hoti hai. Wo Mere Liye kebal Papa nahi hai, wo mere dost hai, Kya acha hai kya bura hai in baato ka aabhas karate hai. Kabhi bhi Haar naa maanna sikhate hai or aage badne ka hosla dete hai. Papa se acha koi or sahi hame rasta dikhane wala nahi ho sakta. Har bacha apne Papa se hi sikhta hai jo usko jindgi bhar kaam aata hai ache or buri dono time me. Papa ke pass hamesa dene ke liye amulya bhandar hota hai gyaan ka jo kabhi khatam nahi ho sakta. Unki Kuch Bate unko or khas banati hai Papaji kabhi apni paresani ko ghar par nahi batate, balki ghar ki har jarurat or taklif ka pura dhiyan rakhte hai. Inhi karano ki baja se unki tulna duniya ke or kisi insan se nahi ki ja sakti. Pitaji is duniya me Bhagwan ka hi roop hote hai apne bacho ke liye, jo apni jarurato ko kam karke apne bacho ki jarurat phele pura karte hai or chate hai ki wo hamesa khus rahe. Kai war kam income ki baja se wo apne bacho ke liye loan lete hai taki wo achi se padai kar sake or uska bhabisya acha ho or khud apni paresani bada lete hai, Sayad hi koi or ho duniya me jo Pitaji ki jagha le sake, ye Duniya ke sabse mahatvapurn insan hai hamari jindgi ke. Dosto wese to hame hamare Pitaji ka kya mhatv hai hamari jandgi me wo kabhi nahi bhulna chaiye or Fathers Day ke Special Day par ham unke liye kya kar sakte hai acha jisse unko khusi hai wo jarur soche. Mene aaj uthe hi Apne Papa ji ka Caran chue or unse aasirbad liya iske aalawa mere pass unko khane ke liye kuch sabd hi nahi the. Agar aap apne Papa ko Wish karna chate hai to ye kuch Messeage ka collection aapke liye Neendein Bhula Kar Apni Sulaaya Hamko, Apne Aansu Bhula kar Hansaya Hamko, Dena Na Dukh Kabhi bhi Rabb Ke Us Roop Ko, Kehta Ha Sara Zamana Maa Baap Jinko Jisne mera jeevan sawaara woh rahat ho tum, Sapno mein jiskaa chehra dikhaa wo chahat ho tum, Basi hai jo mere mann mandir me wo surat ho tum, Puja hai jisko mene shaam sawere wo murat ho tum Mujhe mohabbat hai, Apne hath ki sab ungliyoon se, Na jaane kis ungli ko pakad ke, Pita ne chalna sikhaya hoga Love you papa! No love is greatest than mom s love No care is greatest than dad s care Happy father day Dad I owe You the debt of life . Its infinity colors sounds feelings I experience Please accept my gratitude on this very special day . Although every moment of my life is a gift from you . Some things are just better the way they are like you! Happy Father s Day! The Only Thing Better Than Having You As A Dad Is My Children Having You As Their Grandpa . Do u know whats the meaning of FATHER? F Forever With His Family A Always There For You No Matter What T The Only One Who s There H He s My Hero Till The End E Encouraging In Everything I Do R Really The Only One Maa hoti hai apne baccho ke liye thandi chaaon ke tarah, Aur baap hota hai ek ghane darkhat ki tarah, Maa aur Baap dono hee hameshaa apne baccho ka achaa chahte hai, Happy fathers day mere pyaare papa Manzil Door aur Safar Bohat Hai, Chhoti si Zindagi Ki Fiqar Bahot Hai, Maar Dalti Yeh Duniya Kab Ki Hame, Lakin Papa Ke Pyar Mein Asar Bahot Hai !!! Man Ki Baat Jan Le Jo, Ankhon Se Padh Le Jo, Dard Ho Chahe Khushi, Ansoo Ki Pehchan Krle Jo, Woh Hasti Jo Bepanah Pyar Kre, Papa hi Hai Wo Jo Bachoon Ke Liye Jiye.!!! 1 aakash me bhagvaan rehte hain, aur ek hamare samaksh hamare pita jo bhagvaan se bhi badhkar hei hamaari liye . Happy father s day Meri pehchan hai mere papa, Mere aasman hai mere papa, Jo hai lakhon mein ek, Wo meri jaan hai mere papa I Love You Papa Jinki ungli tham ke chalna sikha hai, Jaana har mushkil se baher niklna, Karte hain ek din unke naam, Pyare papa ko hamara salaam.!! Hey bhagwan meri ye zamanat Teri is adalat mein rakhna, Main is duniya me rahu na rahu Mere pyare papa ko sahi salamat rakhna . Happy Fathers Day Papa

Aaj Kal Har ek vyakti ke paas Phone to hota hi hai, or Phone ab hamari jindgi ka aesa hissa ban chuka jo agar naa ho to hamare bhut kaam bigad jate hai. Hamare Liye kisi bure sapne se kamm nahi hota ki hamara Phone Pani me gir jaye. Bhut war galti se Mobile Pani me gir jata hai to chaliye jante hai sabse acha tarika apne Pani me Gire Mobile ko sahi karne ka. Agar Aapka Phone Pani me gir gaya hai to aap service center bhi le jayege to wo aapke phone se sayad sahi karne se mana kar de. Q ki bhut si companies pani me girne ke baad warranty khatam kar deti hai. Abhi ke jitne bhi Smartphones aa rahe hai unme to water sticker bhi laga hota hai, to jab Phone pani me girta hai to jo sticker hai uska color badal jata hai or badi aasani se pata kiya ja sakt ahai usko dekh kar ki Phone kabhi pani me gira hai ki nahi. Ye Bhi Pade Online Mobile Recharge Kaise Karte Hai Agar Mobile Pani me Gir gaya hai to kya karna hai or kya nahi aaiye jaante hai. Ab hame apne mobile ko gila ho chuka hai usko sukhane ke liye aesi trick tri karna hai jo lagbhag har Mobile par work karti hai. Kisi wartan me bina pake chawal Rice le, Jo Aapka Mobile ko usko upar se jitna pani hai wo phele kisi kapde se saaf kare, Fir Mobile or Battery ko Chawal ke andar pura dhak kar rakh de. Mobile ko 24 Hours tak aese hi rakha rhane de. Mobile ko Chawal me rakhne par jo Chawal hai wo uska pura pani sokh lege or is trha aapka Mobile bilkul tikh jo jayega. Ye Jankari aapko kesi lagi wo aap comment me bataye, or is trick ko apne dosto ko bhi jarur pataye. Sayad aapke batane se kisi ka Mobile kharab hone se bach jaye. Ye Bhi Pade

Har ek New Blogger ka jo blogging se paise kamana chata hai uska uska ye sabal jarur hota hai ki ham Online blogging se kitna paisa kama sakte hai. Ham Blog banate hai or uspar visitor aate hai or unke jariye ham apne blog se paise kamate hai Ads ki madad se, Affiliate Marketing ki madad se, or koi bhi tarike se. Agar ham us fild me hai to hame new new bate pata chati rhati hai jisse ham apne aapko improve karke or jada paise kama sakte hai. Kuch Blogger hai jo har din $100 kamate hai or kuch hai jo ek mahine me bhi $100 nahi kama pate, khane ka matlab hai agar ham apne blog par achi se kaam kare or regular post dale to hame uska faida jarur milega. Agar Aap Blogging me apna career banana chate hai to aapko meri purini kuch post hai wo jarur padni chaiye agar abhi tak nahi padi hai to Bhut log Jab karte hai or unki ek fix income hoti hai per month. Par agar koi Business karta hai to uski koi fix income nahi hoti or naa ki uske liye paise kamane ki koi limit hoti hai. Tikh ussi trha blogging bhi ek business hai, jisme ham jitni jada mehnat karenge utne jada paise ham kama sakte hai. jiski koi limit nahi hai. Duniya me bhut se log hai jo blogging se lakho caroro kama rahe hai, un sabka naam to aapko yaha nahi bata sakta par ek Infographic ki madad se Top 12 Blogger ke naam jarur bata sakte hai jo bhut hi achi income kar rahe hai.

Bitcoin ko lekar world ke people 2014 me hi aware ho chuke the. Tab bitcoin Google Search ka Top fourth search keyword tha. 10 50-60 , Par hamesha ki tarah ham Indian ab bitcoin ko janane ki koshish kar rahe hai. because world ki technology ko late accept karana hamari habbit hai. Isliye filhal ye keyword Google India aur Youtube ka hottest keyword bana hua hai. People Google Search aur Youtube video se janane ki koshish kar rahe hai Bitcoin Kya Hai ? Bitcoin Kisne Invent Kiya Tha ? New Bitcoin Kaise Banta Hai ? Bitcoin Kyu Banaya Gaya? Bitcoin Kaise Work Karta Hai ? Block Chain Kya Hai ? Bitcoin Minining Kya Hai ? India Me Bitcoin Kaise Kharid Sakte Hai ? Bitcoin se kya fayade hai ? Bitcion Ke Kya Nuksan Hai ? Aaiye janate hai, in popular question ke answer details men Bitcoin Kya Hai ? Bitcoin electronic decentralized crypto currency hai aur ise P2P currency bhi kaha jata hai. Bitcoin ko BTC se ingit kiya jata hai. Ise details me samjhte hai. Electronic Bitcoin ko coding aur difficult mathematical calculation ke dvara banaya jata hai, jise mining kahte hai. Isliye ye puri tarah se digital hoti hai. Jise aap dekh aur touch nahi kar sakte hai. Bus number me gin sakte hai. Decentralized Bitcoin duniya ki ekmatr aisi currency hai, jispar koi bhi Government Bodies control nahi kar sakti hai. Isliye bitcoin peer to peer coin bhi kaha jata hai. Normally jab hame kisi ko money send karana hota hai to ise ham kisi bank dvara send karte hai. Par bitcoin transaction me keval sender aur receiver hi hote hai. Crypto Currency Army ya terrorist apni secret mission achieve karane ke liye secret code use karte hai, taki koi bahari people na samjhe. Jise cryptography kaha jata hai. Bitcoin bhi thik aisi hai. Isliye bitcoin transaction karane vale person ki identity hide rahti hai. P2P Currency Jaise pahle hi bata chukka hu bitcoin se hone vale transaction me keval receiver aur gainer hote hai aur koi bhi bank jaise institutions nigrani nahi karti hai. Isliye ise P2P Currency kahte hai. In simple word, Bitcoin ko aap koi App ya koi Software samajh sakte hai , because ise coding aur mathematical problem solution dvara banaya jata hai. Jise e-wallet me store kiya jata hai. Is tarah e-wallet aap apne computer me create sakte hai. Par cloud e-wallet me bitcoin rakhana sabse safe mana jata hai. Bitcoin Ko Kisane Invent Kiya Tha ? Kuch source se bata chala hai, 2009 me Japanese citizen aur Irish student Satoshi Nakamoto ne bitcoin banaya tha. Par ye keval dava hai. Personally is vykti koi bhi nahi janata hai. Nakamoto ne bitcoin system ko open source software ke rup me release kiya tha. Isliye uske 2010 me chale jane ke bad kai developers bitcoins par work kare rahe hai. Aaj bitcoin revolutionary currency ban chukka hai. New Bitcoin Kaise Banata Hai ? New bitcoin mining se banta hai. Mining kya hai, ise aage janege. Filhal Market me kitna bitcoin aa sakta hai, ye Rupees, dollor jaise currenty ki tarah limited hai. World me 21 million bitcoin banaye jaa sakte hai. ab tak 13 million bitcoin ban chukka hai. Bitcoin Kyu Banaya Gaya Hai ? Payment system ko easy aur cost free banana hi bitcoin invent karane ka main maksad tha. Taki do person bina kisi authority institutions ke apas me len den kar sake Par aaj people paise kamane ki chaht me buy kar ise e-wallet me store kar rahe hai. Satoshi Kya Hai ? Jis tarah rupee ka chota rup paisa hota hai. Usi tarah satoshi bitcoin ka chota rup hai. 1 bitcoin me 10 crore satoshi hote hai. Aise me yadi apke pas bitcoin buy karane ke liye jyada money nahi hai to satoshi buy kar sakte hai. Bitcoin Kaise Work Karta Hai ? Simply aap bitcoin exchange se bitcoin buy kar sakte hai. Jo aapke e-wallet me store ho jayega. Ab aap apne e-wallet se kisi dusre vykti ko send kar sakte hai. Bas aapko use vykti ke e-wallet ka address chahiye. Bitcoin Wallet Address Ye pura process Paytm wallet se money send karane jaisa hai. Bitcoin Mining Kya Hai ? Do person ke bich hue bitcoin transaction ko jo verify karta hai, use bitcoin miner kahte hai aur is process ko bitcoin mining kahte hai. Bitcoin miner mining software se bitcoin transaction ko test karte hai. Bitcoin transaction ko test karane ke liye bahut se complex mathematical equation solve karane padte hai aur coding bhi karna padta hai. Jo ye sab mining software ke dvara kiya jata hai. Jab ye process complete ho jata hai, tab miner use public ledger sarvjanik bahi me transaction ko shamil kar deta hai. Jise koi bhi dekh sakta hai. Is public ledger ko block chain kahte hai. Iske badale miners ko new bitcoins milte hai. Bitcoin Value First bitcoin transaction 12 January 2009 ko Satoshi Nakamoto aur Hal Finney ke bich hua tha. Par public me first transaction 22 may 2010 ko hua tha. Jab Jacksonville, Florida programmer ne ek pizza ke liye 10,000 BTC pay kiye the. Us pizza ki price $25 thi. Yani us vakt BTC ke bare me jayda janakari nahi hone ke karan BTC ki koi jyada value na thi. Par 19 November 2013 me ek BTC ki price $1000 ko par kar gai. Jo 20 may 2017 ko $2000, june 17 me $3000 aur December 17 me $11000 ko touch kar gai. India me Bitcoin Kaise Kharid Sakte Hai ? 1.Bitcion Exchange aap bitcoin exchange se bitcoin easily buy kar sakte hai. Bitcoin exchange se bitcoin kharidane ke liye bank se online payment ki jarurat hoti hai. India me Zebpay aur unocoin sabse popular bitcoin exchange hai. 2.Product Selling aap aise customer ko product sell kare, jiske bad bitcoin ho. Aap ye transaction offline aur online dono tarah se kar sakte hai. 3.Bitcoin Mining Bitcoin mining se bitcoin kama sakte hai. Par ye bahut hi competitive ho gaya hai. Jiske karan yadi aap mining ke liye ordinary hardware use karte hai to aapko jyada benefit nahi hoga. Bitcoin Ke Kya Fayade Hai ? Bitcoin ek secret currency hai, jo normal persons ke sath terrorist jaise people ke liye bhi useful hai. 1.Low Transaction Fees bitcoin transaction karane me charges behad kam lagta hai, jo ordinary money transaction ki tulana me kafi bachat hoti hai. 2.Privacy Maintain bitcoin transaction me keval wallet address ka use kiya jata hai. Jisse receiver aur gainer ki real identity unhide nahi hoti hai. 3.Any time aur Any where Generally holidays me banks se money sending jaise transaction nahi kar sakte hai. Par bitcoin transaction me aisi koi bat nahi hai. Aap bitcoin transaction kabhi bhi kahi bhi kar sakte hai, because transaction ko verify karane vale miners puri duniya me faile hue hai, jo hamesha available hote hai. 4.No Account Frozen Bitcoin par kisi governing authorities ka control nahi hai. Isliye bitcoin account ko freeze bhi nahi kiya jaa sakta hai. Bitcoin Se Nuksan Kya Kya Hai ? Bitcoin teji se ubharata hua currency hai. Islye ye jitana aapko lubhavana lag raha hai. Yah utan hi risky hai. 1.Risky Bitcoin ki young economy hai. Jo kabhi bhi down ho sakta hai ya kabhi bhi up ho sakta hai. Ise koi bhi predict nahi kar sakta hai. 2.Non-formatable transaction ek bar complete hua bitcoin transaction me changes nahi kiya jaa sakta hai. agar aise me aapne kisi galat vykti ko bitcoin send kar diye hai. to aap use return nahi pa sakte hai. 3.Heaven Currency For Bad Person bitcoin transaction me real identity reveal nahi hoti hai. Isliye bitcoin ko sabse jyada bad person use kar rahe hai. Kya Bitcoin Me Invest Karana Beneficial Hai ? Yadi aap short term ke liye bitcoin me invest kar rahe hai, to ye aapke liye beneficial ho sakta hi. Par long term ke liye invest karana bahut hi risky ho sakta hai. Because Bitcoin ki economy bahut hi young hai, jo kuch hi minutes me down bhi sakti hai. Ise koi bhi predict nahi kar sakta hai. Isliye Bitcoin me invest soch samajh kar kare. Kya aap bitcoin money kamane ka behatar tarika manate hai ? Yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai to jarur share kare aur comment kare.

Mobile Balance kamane ke liye hame apps install karna padta hai uski jankari yaha hai.
