Jahan ek taraf online banking paiso ka lenden karne ke liye ek behad suvidhajanak sadhan hai, vahin dusri taraf iske sath kyi suraksha sambandhi chintaye aur jokhim bhi jude hain. Online Banking dhokadhadi ko rokne ke liye main aapko kuch bhaut upyogi online suraksha yuktiyan pesh karna chahti hun Aapke online banking passwords, ATM machine ka PIN number, credit ya debit card number aur aise credentials agar kissi ke sath share kiye jaye to appko bhaari jokhim me daal skte hain. Isliye aisi information kabhi kisi ke sath share na kare. Agar aapko aisa lagta hai ki koi apke credentials jaanta hai to jaldi se jaldi inko badal de. Jab bhi koi password banaye to neeche diye gye rules ko dhyan me rakhein Jab aapka computer ya mobile phone internet se connected hota hai to ye online khatron ka shikaar ban skta hai. Isliye aapke mobile aur PC par total security antivirus software intsall karna bhaut zaroori hai kyunki isme anti-spam aur anti-phishing jaisi techniques aapke device aur data ko surakshit rakhte hai. Agar kisi aesi website par jaye jaha aapko kuch gadbad lage to aap online antivirus ka use karke check kar sakte hai. Windows aur Mac operating system samay-samay par security updates release karte hain jisse aapke system ko naye online khatron se bachne me help milti hai. Aap in updates ko manually or automatically bhi install kar skte hain. Abhi jo WanaCry Ransomware Virus aaya tha uska bhi Windows ne patch nikala tha, usse bachne ke liye. Jab bhi aap computer par online banking ka upyog karne vale ho, to in points ko zaroor dimaag me rakhe Also Read Slow Computer ki Speed Badane ke 9 Bhetrin Tips Agar aap kisi public computer ka upyog kar chuke hain to hamesha browser cache clear kar le. Aisa karna isliye zaroori hai taaki aapke login credentials browser me save na ho jaye. Hacker se kaise bacha jaye aapko ye pata hona chaiye, q ki ek hacker Cache ki madad se bhi account ko hack kar sakta hai. Kayi online hackers khud ko bank ke naam jaisa btakar fraud email bhejte hain, jisme aapko inaam diye jaane ke baare me likha hota hai. Inaam paane ke liye bahut se users apni personal jaankari, jaise bank account details, hackers ko de dete hain aur hamle ka shikaar ban jate hai. Isliye kisi bhi email ka reply karne se pehle use achi tarah jaanch le. Also Read Temporary Email ID Kaise Banaye Bahut se online banking services kuch tarah ki transactions hone par aapke registered mobile number ya email par notification bhejte hai. Is tarah aap apne bank account me hone vali transactions par up-to-date reh sakte hain aur agar koi transaction apki anumati ke bina hui ho to turant bank ko bta skte hai. Kya aap online banking security par humse discussion karna chahenge? Apne sujhav comments me likhe! Kanika Sharma REVE Antivirus ke liye likhti hain. Pichle 4 saal se content developer ke roop me Kanika bahut se technology blogs ke liye likh chuki hain. Free time me Kanika ko pahado pe jana pasand hai. Ye ek Guest Post hai, HMH.pe Guest post karna hai to uski jankari yaha hai.

Agar aap Indian hai, to aapko pata hi hoga Aadhaar Card kya hai or ye kitna jaruri hai. Q ki Agar hame kahi bhi ID Proof ki jarurat hoti hai waha Aadhaar Card ki jarurat padti hai. Agar aapko aadhar card ki jada jankari nahi hai, ya aapko aadhaar card ki kam jankari hai to aap bilkul sahi website par aaye hai, yaha aapko ye sab janne ko milega Aadhar Card ek ID Proof hai jisme Aapka Naam, Aapka Pata, Date of Birth, Pita ka naam jesi jankari hoti hai jo har vyakti ki alag alag hoti hai. Aap ID Proof ke liye Voter ID, Driving License, PAN Card use kar sakte hai par inke aalawa ek or Card hai jo Indian Government ki taraf se har ek Indian ke liye banaye gaye hai wo hai Aadhaar Card, jisko ham kahi bhi ID Proof ya Address Proof me istmal kar sakte hai. Aadhaar Card me 12 number hote hai jisko Unique IDUID khete hai. Unique Identification Authority of India ke jariye Indian Government ki taraf se sabko banbaye ja rahe hai. Sabka UID Number alag alag hoti hai or ussi se hamari phechan hoti hai. Ye jo Aadhaar Card hai usko ham apni Identity Phechan or Address proof ke liye kahi bhi use kar sakte hai. Aadhaar Card Banbana bhut hi aasan hai wass aapko kuch process hai wo follow karni hai. Chaliye dekh lete hai Step by Step Aadhaar Card online kaise apply karte hai Step 1 Sabse phele aapko Apna Appointment lena hai UIDAI ki website se, uske liye website par jaye. appointments.uidai.gov.in Step 2 Ab aapke samne ek form aayega wo aapko pura bharna hai. Form ko dhiyan se sahi sahi bhare. Step 3 Ab jese hi aap Fix Appointment par click karege, ek new page aayega, jisme aapki kuch detail rahegi. Ye jo Page hai aap isko Print out nikal le ya fir PDF me save karke rakhle. Step 4 Ab aapne jo Date, Time, Location select ki hai Aadhaar Card ki appointment ke liye aapko uss time Aadhaar Card Center jana hai. Aadhaar Card Center aapko Apna koi pariche patra ID Proof leke jana hai jese Voter ID, Driving License, PAN Card. Aadhaar Card Center phuchne ke baad phele aap apna jo Appointment ka token number hai wo batana hai. Fir aapki bha Photo liya jayega, ugliyo ko scan kiya jayega, Akho ko bhi scan kiya jayega. Sari Process hone ke baad aap ek acknowledgement milega usme aapki jankari hogi ki aapne Aadhaar card ke liye aaply kiya hai. Aadhaar Card ke liye Apply karne ke baad aapko kuch iss trha ka Form milega jisko Enrollment Form bhi khete hai. Form me aapki Puri Jankari rahegi jo aapne Aadhaar Card ke liye di hai. Form me EID Enrollment ID bhi rahegi jiski madad se ham apne Aadhaar Card ko Track kar sakte hai or Online Aadhaar Card ko Download bhi kar sakte hai. Aadhaar Card Center me Kya hota hai aap Video ko dekh kar or achi se samaj sakte hai. Iss Trha aapne Aadahar Card ke liye Apply kar diya hai or ab wo aapke diye huee pate par 60-90 Din me aa jayega. Aapne Aadhaar Card ke liye Apply kar diya hai or ab Aadhaar card aapke pate par 60-90 dino me aa jayega. Agar aapko check karna hai ki aapka Aadhaar card abhi konsi process me hai or kab tak aapke pass aayega to aap wo bhi kar sakte hai. Online Check karne ke liye aapko Aadhaar Card ki website par jana hoga fir wala apni EID dal kar aap check kar sakte hai Aadhaar card ka Status Step 1 Sabse Phele Website par jaye Aadhaar Card Status Step 2 Ab aapke saamne ek form aayega Ab aapke saamne Aadhaar aapki Detail aa jayegi ki wo kaha hai or uski kya process chal rahi hai. Aapko agar Mobile par SMS ke jariye Aadhaar card ki detail nikalni hai to aapko ek SMS send karna hoga 51969 par. Message me ye type karna hai UID STATUS 14 DIGIT ENROLLMENT NUMBER Note Enrollment Number aapko jo Form mila hai uspar likha huaa hai. Jese hi aap SMS send karege aapke pass ek SMS aayega jisme Aadhaar card ki jankari hogi ki wo abhi kaha hai or kab tak aayega. Simple aapko jo Aadhaar Card ki help line hai uspar call karke puchna hai. Toll Free Helpline 1800-300-1947 Aapne Aadhaar card ki jankari ke liye uski EID puchi jayegi, wo aap bata dege uske baad aapko Aadhaar card ki puri jaankari mil jayegi. Video me dekhe kaise Track kare or Download kare Aadhaar Card ko Aapne Aadhaar Card Apply bhi kar diya par kabhi kabhi aesa ho jata hai hamare diye huee pate par nahi aa pata to aese me ghabrane ki koi jarurat nahi hai, aap apne Aadhaar card ko online bhi Download karke nikal sakte hai. Online Aadhaar Card ko Download karne ke liye aapko Apni EID ya fir UID pata hona chaiye. Step 1 Sabse Phele Aadhaar Card ki website par jaye Download Aadhaar Card Step 2 Ab aapke samne ek form aayega jisko fill karke aap Aadhaar Card Download kar sakte hai. Step 3 Ab aapke Mobile par ek OTP aayega, wo aapko dalna hai. Step 4 Ab aap Apne Aadhaar Card ko Download karke Print Out Nikal sakte hai. Agar aapka Aadhaar Card ban chuka hai, par usme kuch information sahi nahi hai, to aap baad me bhi usko sahi kar sakte hai. Ek tarika to ye hai, ki aap Aadhaar Card center jakar waha se infomation update karaye, or agar aap khud se online update karna chate hai to website se bhi kar sakte hai. Aadhaar Card Correction Link par jaye, waha apna Aadhar Card Number daal kar Phone par aaye OTP se Login kare. Aadhaar Card Update Agar aap online correction karte hai aadhar card me to ye 4 steps ki process hai, isme aapko jo bhi correnction karna hai usse related document upload karke submit karna hoga. Last Words Dosto Muje Ummid hai aapko ye jaankari pasand aai hogi or aapko puri process bhi samaj aa gai hogi. Aadhar Card kaise Apply kare, Kaise status track kare or kaise Online aadhar Card ko Download karke Nikale hamne sab kuch jaan liya hai. Agar aapka koi Sabal hai to aap Comment me bilkul puch sakte hai, or aapko ye jankari kesi lagi wo bhi comment me jarur bataye. Also Read Online Security ke liye Tips in Hindi

Back-link Kya hai or ye kitni jaruri hai hamare BlogSite ke liye wo to aap jante hi hoge. Agar aapki site par Backlinks nahi hai to aap bhale kitna hi achi post likh le aapki site ko top par aane me bhut khathinai hogi. par agar aapki site par Quality Backlink hai to aapki site Top par aane ke chance badd jate hai. Google me Top par kaise aaye or kya kare Search Engine me Sabse upar aane ke liye inke upar me phele hi detail post likh chuka hu, jo aapko jarur read karna chaiye. Agar aapko blog ki traffic badani hai or Apne Blog ki SERP me position ko acha karna chate hai to website ke liye Backlinks bhut hi jaruri hai. Backlink Off Page SEO me aati hai, or ye SEO ka ek Part hai. Agar aapko SEO ki sahi jankari nahi hai to aap wo bhi le sakte hai, mene inke upar detail article phele hi share kiye hai. To Dosto iss article me jada idhar udhar ki baat naa karte huee, apne main point par aate hai or jante hai kaise apni site ke liye Quality Backlink bana sakte hai. Iss Post ko aage read karne se phele me aapko suggest karuga aap Backlink kya hai nahi jante to phele wo jane uske baad aage read kare. Sabse Phela aata hai jo Popular or reputed website hai unse backlink banaye. Jo Site jitni popular hogi Google or other search engine uspar utna hi jada bharosa karte hai ki in site par jo bhi hoga acha hi hoga. to aese me agar unn Popular website se hamari site par Backlink aati hai to usse hamari site ko bhut faida hota hai. Popular sites me News Website, Wikipedia jese sites aati hai. par yaha ek baat or hai jitni Badi website hogi utna hi jada muskil hota hai unse backlink pana. or uske liye hame hamare blog par Quality Post likhna to bhut hi jaruri ho jata hai. Aap Website kitni Popular hai or kitni Reputed hai wo jaanne ke liye website ka Page Authority or Domain Authority Check kar sakte hai, Authority Jitni jada hogi Google unpar utna hi jada bharosa karta hai. High PR se matlab hai, Jis Page ki Rank High ho. Aese Page se backlink aana jo Google search me top par aata hai usse hamare site ko bhi bhut faida milta hai agar ham compare kare kisi Low PR page se. Yaha aesa nahi hai ki Low PR Page ki Backlink ki Value nahi rahegi. par ham yaha Quality Backlink ki baat kar rahe hai to High PR se hi hame High Quality Backlink mil sakti hai. Ye Backlink bhi bhut hi jada effective hai, isme aapke Page ka jo content hai agar kisi dusri site ke ussi category ke content se backlink aati hai to uski value bhi bhut hoti hai. Page Authority or High PR se Backlink pana thoda muskil padta hai, par aap same content se backlink aasani se pa sakte ho. iske liye aap apni jesi website se contact kare or aapki post ko uske article me backlink dene ko kahe. Yaha sabse main hai ki aapki jo post hai wo achi to honi hi chaiye, jab hi koi aapko backlink dega. or aap bhi dusri site ko backlink do jo bhi aapko lage ki ye acha hai or isse aapke readers ko bhi faida hoga. Yaha bhut se Blogger kya galti karte hai agar kisi site par koi acha article dikha to copy karke khud ki website par dal dete hai, aese me wo Google ki najar me or jo visitor hai unki site ke unki najar me bhi gir jate hai. to agar aap bhi aesa karte hai to band karde abhi se. Aap Apne Same Content wali site par Guest Post karke bhi Backlink pa sakte ho, jo ki sabse effective or best tarika hai backlink pane ka.

PayPal kya hai or Paypal se kya hota hai sayad aapko pata hoga, or nahi pata to bhi koi baat nahi me abhi aapko uske ware me puri jankari dene wala hu or batane wala hu Kaise Paypal par account banaye or kaise Paypal se paise kamaye. Paypal par account banana bhut hi aasan hai, bas aap meri steps by steps ko follow kare Step 4. Aapka Paypal account bankar teyaar hai Paypal me bank account ko verify karne ki process hai wo thodi alag hai, q ki isme hame paypal se kuch paise aate hai points me wo check karke paypal account me dalna hota hai jab hamara bank account paypal me verify hota hai. Bank account paypal me verify karne ke liye phele aap apni bank ki detail apne paypal account me dale, uske baad aapke bank account me kuch paise aayege. 0.123 rupee jitne bhi paise aaye point me. aapko wo check karke paypal account me dalna hai fir aapka bank account paypal me verify ho jayega.

Hi friends mera naam kunal jadhav hai aur me AllHindiTricks.Com ka founder hu ye meri life ki aur HMH.pe pahali guest post hai, muje ummid hai isse aapko jarur kuch na kuch sikhne ko milega. Me HMH ki post regularly padhta hu aur isse me kafi kuch sikh bhi chukka hu. Dosto aaj me aapko fiverr ke bare me kuch tips batane wala hu jo aapke bahut kaam aane wale hai, khas karke jinhone new account banaya unke liye. Fiverr kya hai ye to aapne HMH pe to padha hi hoga agar nahi to Fiverr kya hai, fiverr se paise kaise kamaye is post ko padh lijiye. Fiverr ek online market site hai jaha par aap kuch bhi sell kar sakte hai aur kharid sakte ho. Jaise ki logo design, Programming, Graphics Design aur SEO Jaise service aap de sakte ho. Yaha par har product ki price 5$ se shuru hoti hai usme se 1$ company kat leti hai aur hume 4$ milte hai. To dosto ye thi fever ke bare me kuch basic jaankari, puri jaankari padhne ke liye HMH site par jakar padh sakte hai. Agar aapka Fiverr par account nahi hai to abhi bana lijiye, Q ki aap waha sirf paise kama nahi sakte. apna kaam kara bhi sakte hai. me bhi apna kaam wahi se karata hu saste me. Create Fiverr Account Aaj ki post un fiverr users ke liye hai jo fiverr se kuch nahi kama rahe hai, unke gigs par jada views nahi aarahe hai aur orders na ke barabar hai aisa jada se jada new fiverr users ke sath hota hai mere sath bhi hua tha lekin ab nahi aaj me fiverr se acchi earning kar bhi leta hu. Aaj me un logo ke liye kuch tips batane wala hu jiska use karke aap fiverr se kuch had tak kama sakte hai. To chaliye shuru karte hai Kuch log fiverr account banana ke bad selling karne lagte hai aur unke product jada sell nahi ho pate, un logo ko ye nahi pata hota ki buyer sabse pahale aapki profile dekhte hai agar aapki profile puri tarah se empty ho to kaise koi aapse product kharidega. To me kahata hu ki fiverr account banane ke baad sabse pahale aapni profile puri tarah se update kare. Sabse pahahle profile photo se start karte hai, Kuch log apni profile photo ki jagaha kisi actor ya name logo ki photo chipka dete hai, lekin dosto ye galat hai aapko apni hi original photo fiverr profile me set karni hogi. Profile name aapna real naam hi rakhe na ki aapki website ya blog ka. Aapke naam se hi aapki pahachan hoti hai aur logo ko bhi pata chalta hai ki aap kon hai. Apni skill dale, aap jis skill me acche ho vo skill apne profile me dale taki log aapse impress ho aur aapko orders milne ki jada chances ho. Aur uske baad aap padhai kar rahe hai to aap education bhi daal sakte ho. Profile me contact number aur email id jarur set kare ye bahut jaruri point hai taki aapke costumer aapse contact kar sake aur aapko order de sake. Agar aapke profile me contact number aur email id nahi hogi to aapki earning na ke barabar hogi, to is baat ka dhayn rakhe. Aur last me description ki baat aati hai, aapko apne profile me apne bare me bilkul sahi sahi description dalni hai, jaise ki aap kya karte ho, aap kis skill me acche ho, apne bare me kuch info, Aap logo ko kya kya servie de sakte ho ye sab aapko apne description me dalna hai. Lekin is baat ka pura dhyan rahe ki aapko srif English me hi description dalna hai na ki hindi ya hinglish me qki aapko orders india se hi nahi milne wale bahar ke country se bhi aapko orders mil sakte hai isiliye English me description dalna bahut jaruri hai. Ab baat aati hai gig title ki, jab aap gig ke liye title likhte hai to bilkul target title hona chaiye matlab aapke gig me kya hai aur aap kya gig sell kar rahe ho uske bare me hi title likhe. Title puri tarah se English me hona chaiye. Agar aap koi logo gig post kar rahe hai to example ke liye aapka gig title kuch is tarah hona chaiye, is tarah se aap title de sakte ho. Gig title se pahale I Will is tarah ka word aata hai to aapko ye wala word nahi likhna hai qki is tarah ka word gig title box me pahale se hi likha aata hai. Gig title dene ke baad aap gig category par dhayn de, aapka gig kis category me aata hai us hisaab se category select kare, Taki buyer ko search karne me asaani ho. Gig tag ka bhi bahut important roll play karta hai ye bilkul youtube tag ki tarah kaam karta hai farak keval itna hai ki aap isme srif 5 hi tag de sakte ho. Apka gig kis bare me hai us hisaab se gig tag de sakte ho, kuch bhi mat dale vaise tag dete waqt vo aapko suggest karta hai ki aapko konsa tag dena hai, to aap us hisaab se gig tag dijiyega. Vaise har gig ki price 5$ se start hoti hai, lekin kuch log kya karte hai unke gig price jada rakh dete hai aur unka gig koi nahi kharidta. Agar aap bh iasia karte hai to ye galat hai aapke har gig ki price 5$ shuru honi chaiye tabhi log aapsae kuch kharid payenge. Apne service ke hisaab se price kam jada kar sakte ho, lekin soch samaj kar. Agar aapka work kuch jada hi hard hai to aap gig price badha sakte ho isse buyer ko bhi koi problem nahi hogi. Lekin apne gig ke hisaab se hi price set kare. Aapka gig kis bare me hai uski puri jaankari aap description me de, gig ke liye description bahut hi jaruri hota hai taki buyer aapka gig kharidne se pahale gig ke bare me puri information jaan sake. Kuch log description me kuch bhi type karke aage badhte hai aur inki earning bhi nahi hoti, qki description se hi aapke product ki sahi jaanakri buyer ko mil jaati hai aur sahi jaanakri milne ke baad vo aapse gig kharid bhi leta hai. Aap chahae to gig description ke sath apna phone number aur email id bhi de sakte ho taki buyer aapse direct contact kar sake. Dosto gig description me jada se jada 1200 word type kare qki description ki limit 1200 word ki hai isse kam description hua to aap age ki process nahi kar sakte. Agar aapke gig ka description kam shabdo me hai to aap bachi hui khali jagah me is tarah ke word type karke description pura kar sakte hai, lekin description me 100 info honi chaiye. Gig gallery me kam se kam 3 photos jarur dale taki buyer ko gig choose karne ke liye aur option mile. Agar aap photo ke alawa video upload kar rahe hai to kam se kam 3 videos dale. Agar aap PDF par kaam kar rahe hai to aap PDF file bhi upload kar sakte hai aisa karne par isme aapika faida hai. Kisi ka copyright gig use karne par aapika hi nuksaan hai, kisi ka copyright gig use karna ye fiverr allow nahi karta. Agar aapne kisi ka copyright gig use to fiverr kuch dino me aapka gig delete kar diya jata hai. Maire sath bhi aisa hua tha jab me fiverr me new tha to main ek intro video upload kiya tha, aur kuch din me muje fiverr se Email aaya, aur mail tha aapka gig copyright hai aur usko humne delete kar diya hai kuch is tarah ka email tha. To dosto apna khud ka hi gig post kare kisi ka copyright nahi, aur aisa bar bar karne par aapka fiverr account humsha ke liye block bhi ho sakta hai. Apne gig ko promte karne ke liye aap kisi Professional SEO ki help bhi le sakte ho, aapko fiverr par hi asie Professional SEO mil jayenge aap unko pay karke Apne gig ke liye SEO help le sakte ho. Aisa karne par aapko bahut bada benefit milega aur aapki earning bhi acchi hogi. Agar aap chahe to apne hisaab se bhi SEO kar sakte ho iske liye aapko Facebook, Whatsapp, twitter jaise social network par bhi share kar sakte ho aur iski permission khud fiverr deta hai. Aagr aap kisi ka order lete hai to uski Delivery bilkul time to time honi chaiye aisa nahi ki aapne 1 din ka time liay aur aap 3 din me Delivery karte ho isse buyer aapar ghussa bhi ho sakta hai aur vo wapas aapse gig nahi kharidta. Agar aap sahi samay par Delivery karte hai to isme aapki ka hi faida hai. Ye sabse Jada Important hai, q ki agar aapki rating achi nahi hogi to koi aapko order nahi karega. to puri kosis kare jo bhi order aaye wo aap achi se ache or time par de, taki ko buyer hai wo aapko 5 Start de. Jitni jada rating or achi rating hogi utni hi high rank aapke Gig ko milegi agar koi search karege to. To dosto ye thi fiverr ke bare me kuch basic tips in sab ka use karke aap fiverr se acchi earning kar sakte ho. Agar aapko ye post pasand aaye to is post ko share karna na bhoole. Ye ek Guest post hai, Agar aapko HMH.pe Guest Post karna hai to yaha jaye.

Online Paisa Kamana har ek internet marketer aur blogger ki pehli psand hoti hai. Jab baat online paisa kamane ki aati hai to hmare mann me ek sawal ata hai ki akhir kon kon se tariko se online paisa kaman sakte hai. Online paisa kamane ke tariko me ek tarika micro job sites ka bhi ata hai. Har koi Cahata hai ki woh apna khud ka boss bane aur ek free life Jiye. Agar hum micro job sites ki baat kare to latest technology ke badalte jamane ke hisab se micro job sites pehle se jyada simple aur Easy ho gya hai. micro job ek aisa job hai jaha aap apne skills aur talent ke hisab se dusre logo ki madad kar ke online badiya paise kama sakte hai. Yadi aap blogging ke line me hai aur aap Jaldi online kuch paise kamane ka try kar rahe hai. To aap ekdum sahi jagah par hai. Yaha par aap kuch badiya tarike ke dwara online paise kama sakte hai Also Read Micro Job ek trha ka chota mota kaam hai jo log online karwate hai Micro Jab Website ki madad se. Wo koi bhi kaam ho sakta hai jese web designing, logo design, video editing, ya kuch bhi kisi bhi category ka. Micro job ek bahut hi easy aur Aasan tarika hai apne skills ke hisab se online paisa kamane ka. Micro job ka work karke aap ghar par bhaith kaam kar sakte hai. India me bahut se student aur homeworker micro job sites ka job ghar par bhaith kar Rahe hai. Aur micro job sites platform ko hi apna careers bana chuke hai. Jo website micro job ka job karne ka offer deti hai, Aise website ek best tarika hota hai online paisa kamane ka. Micro-job ka job karne ke liye aapko bahut jyada time ki jarurat nahi padti hai Bus ek din Me agar aapke pass 2-3 hour hai to aap itne time me bahut se micro job sites Par kaam kar ke online badiya paise kama sakte hai. Also Read Internet se Paise kaise Kamaye Full Guide in Hindi Agar aapke Pass koi Talent hai to aap apne uss talent ki madad se paise kama sakte hai dusre logo ke kaam karke. aese kaam aapko Micro Job Website par aaram se mil jayega. or jese hi aap kisi ka koi kaam karege aapko uska paise mil jayege. Top 5 Micro Job Websites Fiverr ek bahut hi purana aur trusted micro-job offer karne wali website hai. Fiverr ek marketplace jaha par aap apne skills ko $5 me sell karke koi bhi onlineoffline job le sakte hai. Aap Fiverr par $5 me kuch bhi buy aur sell kar sakte hai. aap fiverr par jiss chiz ka offer logo ko karte hai usko GIG bolte hai. yadi aapke dwara provid kiya gaya koi kaam kisi ko jarurt hai to woh aapke skill ko $5 me buy kar lega phir aapko uska kaam karna padhega aur badle me woh aapko $5 dega. fiverr internet marketer aur blogger ke liye best place hai kyoki iske bahut se GIGS social media, graphics design, video, writting, advertising, building, backlink, blog, logo design, business cards, seo, copy writting aadi chizo se related hai. Aap in product me se kisi bhi product ka GIGS Buy kar Usko promote kar ke selling ke dwara bahut hi badiya commission kama sakte hai. Ye sab karne ke liye aapko fiverr par acount banana hoga. simply fiverr par apna profile banao aur apne service ka offer dena start kar do. Ek baar aap apne service ke selling apne customer s ke responses ke hisab se start kar dege phir aapke customer aapke service ko rating denge. fiverr apne sellers ke service ke selling ke hisab se leval banata hai. first level seller, 2nd level seller, aur top rated seller. ek baar aap kisi badiye level par pahuch jaye phir uske fiverr apko aur bhi chiz dega selling karne ke liye. jitna jyada aapko fiverr par kaam milega utna hi jyada aap fiverr ke dwara paise kamayege. Fiverr Also Read SEOClerks ek badiya online micro jobs place hai. Jaha par aap apne product Or service ko kisi bhi price me sell kar sakte hai. Ye website bhi same fiverr ke jaise hi kaam karti hai. Aapke dwara sell kiye gaye har ek GIG par 20 commission SEOClerks leta hai. Ye ek badiya website hai micro job ke dwara online paisa kamane ka. Aap SEOClerks marketplace me Article writing, Link Building, Logo designing, Article read-proofing, Blog commenting, Social media aur bhi tarah ke GIG Find Karke online sell kar sakte hai. Ek baar aap acchi tarah se SEOClerks par apne service ki selling karne lagege Phir uske baad SEOClerks aapko Badiya visibility dene lagega. SEOClerks GigBucks ek asia place hai jaha par aap apna service $5-$50 bucks tak me sell kar sakte hai. dusare micro site ke jaise hi ye bhi internet marketing ke service ko offer karta hai. Iske sath sath iske aur bhi categories jaise- Advertising, Business, Graphics, Music, Programming, Technology aadi. Aap in categories me se kisi bhi service ko buy karke online sell kar sakte. jitna jyada aap apne service ko sell karege utna hi badiya commision aur impression Aapka banega. GigBucks Microlancer Iss naam ko log bahut hi pasand karte hai, kyoki iss par micro job karna bahut hi Aasan hota hai. Microlancer par aap apne auidence ko bahut hi smart tarike se target kar sakte hai. Microlancer par aapko dusari site ki tulna me bahut hi professional log milege kyoki bahut se online companies apne service ko Microlancer ke dwara apna kaam karwati hai. yadi aapka skill bahut hi badiya aur professional hai to aap Microlancer ke dwara apne service ko buy and sell karke acche paise kama sakte hai Microlancer Yaha par aap apne service ko $2-$100 tak Buy aur sell kar sakte hai. Aur sath hi sath iss website ki quality aur service bhi bahut badiya hai. dusare site ki tarah iss site me bhi aapko categories aapke interest ke hisab se milegi. Zeerk Yadi aap micro job ke dwara online paisa kamane ke bare me serious hai To Ye list Apke Liye best option hai Apne product or service ko choose karke buy and sell karne ke liye. Google Adsense ek bhetrin tarika hai website se paise kamane ka ye to aap jante ho hoge, or ye achhi khabar hai jo adsense use karte hai unke liye, ab se Google Adsense Native Ads bhi use kar sakte hai, jisse jo ads hai wo site se bilkul milte julte aayege. Google Adsense me abhi kuch time phele hi Urdu language ko support karna start kiya hai, or uske baad ye ek or bada or acha update hai jo Adsense Publiser hai unke liye. Native ads ka matlab aese ads jo site se bilkul milte julte hote hai, Design me or uske content me. jisse jo bina interest ke ads dekhne me paresani hoti hai visitor ko ab wo nahi hogi, q ki jis category ka content ko read kar rahe hai ussi se related ads unke samne aayege wo bhi bilkul ussi format me jese website ka baki content hai. AdSense Native ads 3 categories aate hai Adsense In-feed Ads wo ads hai jo website ki feeds hai unme use kar sakte hai. Jese site ka jo home page hota hai jisme article ki list hoti hai, to ham same ussi trha se Adsense in-feed Ads bana kar bich me laga sakte hai, jo disign me bhi bilkul same rahega. Ads Code batane time ham usko puri trha se customize bhi kar sakte hai, taki wo bilkul website ke design se match kar sake, or visitor ko usse koi problem naa ho. Article ke biche me jo ads use karte hai, wo agar in-article ads use kare jo wo puri trha se article me fit ho jate hai, jisse Ads ki jo quality hai wo bhi high ho jati hai or visitor ko article read karne me bhi dikkat nahi hoti. Blogger Post ke bich me ads kaise lagaye agar aap nahi jante to aap uske upar jo article hai wo read karke jaan sakte hai. Matched content Ads wo ads hai jo bilkul match hote hai hamare article se design me. Matched content Ads ko post ke niche use kar sakte hai. Iss me Ads ke sath hamare blog ke article bhi aate hai or ads bhi aate hai, jo dekhne me bilkul same hote hai. Matched content Ads use karne se ek fayda ye bhi hai, jo usme hamare blog ke post dikhte hai wo bhi visitor ke interest ke hisab se disply hoti hai, jisse site ka bounce rate kam hone me bhi help milti hai or user jada der tak site par rheta hai. Aap ye jankari Google Adsense Blog par bhi read kar sakte hai. Native Ads ko use karna bhi phele ki trha aasan hai wass hame, New Ads Unit banani hai or usko customize karke site me add karna hai. 1 Adsense Account me Sign in kare 2 left side navigation me, My ads par click kare 3 New ad unit par click kare 4 ab aapko Ads type select karna hai or usko custmize karke uska code site me lagana hai. To Friends ummid karte hai in ads se hamari jo adsense ki earning hai wo bade, or jo user experience hai hamare visitor ka wo or acha ho. Mene abhi kuch time phele Adsense Low CPC Keyword jinko block karke bhi muje thoda fayda mila tha aap bhi try karke dekh sakte hai. iske aalawa mene bhut se Google Adsense tips site par phele share ki hai wo bhi aap jarur read kare. Agar aapka koi sabal hai ya koi Doubt hai to aap comment karke puch sakte hai.

Hello Friends, Agar Aap WordPress par apni site banana chate hai to jo sabse phela kaam hai web hosting kharidna. Web hosting kya hai or iskya kya use hai or konsi web hosting sabse achi rahegi in sab baato ke bare me ham baat karege. Sayad aapko pata hi ho ki Hindi Me Help phele Blogger platform par thi par ab WordPress par hai, or mera blogger se wordpress par sift karne ka karan tha ki muje or jada option chaiye the apni site me jo blogger me muskil the. To agar aap abhi apni badiya site banana chate hai to aap wordpress par bana sakte hai. Agar aap janna chate hai WordPress ya Blogger kon jada bhetar hai to meri iss detail post ko jarur read kare, aapko idea ho jayega ki aapke liye konsa platform jada sahi rahega. WordPress par Website banane ke liye aapko in chijo ki jarurat hai To jada time na barbad karte huee apne point par aate hai or jante hai Webhosting ke bare me Detail ke sath. Ham jada technical Words me baat nahi karege, to simple sabdo me kahu to Jese hamare Mobile me memory card hota hai or ham usme apni file save kar sakte hai tikh ussi trha Web Hosting online memory hoti hai, jisme website ki sabhi file upload kar sakte hai. Jesa ki mene bataya Web Hosting me ham apni site ki file ko upload karke online save kar sakte hai. Iska ye hi kaam hota hai. Internet par Hajaro ki sankiya me Hosting Companya hai to unme se kaise achi company ko select kare Mene jo galti ki thi Hosting kharidte same wo me aapko nahi karne duga. Mene jada na search karte hue India ki ek local hosting company se hosting ki, Q ki wo thoda sasta de rahe the or mene unse contact kiya to kha rahe the ki agar koi dikkat aai to aapke paise bapas kar dege. par naa to paise mile or naa hi me hosting ka use kar paya. site din me 10-12 bar down ho jati thi or muje ek mahine baad hi dusri hosting leni padi or wo paise bhi dub gaye. Jis Company se hosting li thi wo India me Top par hai par service muje bilkul pasand nahi aai. me us company ka naam nahi bataoga. Hosting aesi hona chaiye ki bas ek bar website uspar bana de to koi dikkat naa aaye or website badiya tarike se chalti rahe, or jisme website bhi teji se load ho. To Dosto abhi me jis hosting ko use kar raha hu usme muje koi dikkat nahi aa rahi hai to me aapko wo hi suggest karuga ki aap bhi ye hi use kare. ye meri 3rd hosting hai. Pichli hosting me muje bhut paresani aai thi. Hindi Me Help ki Hosting Hostgator par hai jo Hosting ki Company me top par hi aati hai. To ab aapko ye to conform ho gaya ki Hostgator se hosting lena hai par Hosting ke bhi bhut se type hote hai Par ham new wordpress site bana rahe hai uske liye Shared Hosting sahi rahega jiske 3 Plan hai. Plan me kya kya mil raha hai wo aap image me to dekh hi sakte hai, inka main difference bata deta hu taki aapko inme se select karne me aasani ho. Is Plan me ham sirf ek website hi bana sakte haior isme hame milta hai Unlimited File Transfer, Unlimited EMail or Unlimited Disk Space. Matlab sirf ek website bana sakte hai par uske liye jin chijo ki jarurat hai wo unlimited hai. jo Hatchling Plan hai usse sirf ye fark hai ki ham isme unlimited website bhi bana sakte hai. Agar aap koi business ke liye site bana rahe hai to aapke liye ye plan sahi rahega isme hame SSL Certificate or Website ke liye Dedicated IP bhi milti hai. Aap jo website banane wale ho wo business ke liye nahi hai to Business Plan ko hata do. Ab agar aap ek se jada website banana chate hai to Baby Plan sahi rahega. par agar aapko sirg ek hi website banani hai to aap Hatchling Plan bhi select kar sakte hai. Mera Suggestion hai ki aap Baby Plan le q ki agar aapke dimag me agar or koi bhi site banane ka Idea aaya to aap ek hi hosting me bana sakoge. To ab aapko Clear ho chuka hai ki kis hosting Company se Hosting kharide or konsa plan aapko liye sahi rahega. to chaliye ab jaan lete hai hosting ko kaise kharide saste me. Step 1 Sabse Phele aapko Hostgator ki site par jana hai, Agar aapko 20 Discount or ek Free .Website Domain chaiye to aap is Button par click karke hi hostgator ki site par jaye. Hostgator Web Hosting 20 Coupon Step 2 Button par click karne par Hostgator ki site khul jayegi. Thoda Niche Scroll karke Plan Select kare. Step 3 Ab ek Popup aayega. Domain hai ya nahi select karna. Yes agar phele se Domain le rekha hai to Yes par click kare. No Agar Hosting ke sath Domain bhi lena hai to No par click kare. Step 4 ab ek agla page aayega, usme Domain name dalna hai. Also Read Domain Godaddy se kaise lete hai uski jankari yaha par di hui hai Step 5 Ab New Page Khulega jisme kuch jankari hogi. Step 6 Ab 2 step me Account open karna hai. Step 7 ab ye Form khulega Form me apni puri jaankari sahi sahi bhar kar Last me Create an account ki button par click kare. Step 8 ab iski 3 process aayegi.

Hello dosto mera name Hardeep hai aur main BlogforIndia.com ka owner hu and yeh meri first Guest Post hai jis me hum janege Wifi se android phone connect kaise kare without password QR code scan karke. Dosto jab hamare ghar me koi guest ja koi friend aata hai toh hame uske saath apna password share karna padta hai aur kayi baar hum wifi hacking se bachne ke liye itna strong password rakh lete hai jo hum khud bhi yaad nahi rakh paate. Is liye agar aap wifi ke liye ek QR code bana laye jiski maddad se koi bhi is code ko scan karke asani se wifi se connect ho sakta hai aur aapko baar password type karne aur yaad karne ki jarurat nahi hogi simply aap QR code ka printout nikaal kar kahi par laga le fir jis kisi ko bhi wifi se connect hona hai woh code scan karke asani se connect ho sakta hai. Basic Requirement QR Code Kya hai usse Kya hota hai, Kaise QR Code ko istmaal karte hai or kaise QR Code Banate hai agar aap ye nahi jaante to aapko yaha click karke jarur padna chaiye Sabse Pehle aap qrcode.hindimehelp.com website open kare, Fir aapke Samne ek page khulega QRCode.HindiMeHelp.com Ab QR Code Banane ke liye apni detail dale. Ab QR Code ban chuka hai, usko Download karne ke liye QR Code ki image par right click karke Save karle. Ab aap is QR Code ki Iamge ko Computer me apne Mobile me jagah chahe rakh sakte hai, or fir jis bhi Mobile me wifi connect kana hai usme hame simple QR Code Scanner se is Code ko Scan karna hai, to ham bina Password dale apne wifi se connect ho jayege. Agar aapke Mobile me QR Code Scanner nahi hai to aap yaha se Download kare. Download QR Code Scanner Jese hi Aap QR Code ko Apne Mobile me scan karege to ek popup aayega. or uske baad Wifi se hamara Mobile Connect ho jayega. Dosto umid karta hu aapko yeh post achi lagi hogi or isse aapko apne kaam me jarur help milegi. agar aapko is poore process me koi problem aaye toh aap comment karke puch sakte hai Ye ek Guest Post hai HMH.pe agar aap bhi Guest post karna chate hai to yaha click kare Dusri Guest Post Padne ke liye yaha click kare Ye Bhi Pade

Hacking, Hacker jaise word sun ke man me ek hi khyal aata hai wo hai Security. Aaj internet ki dunia me hackers itne active hain ki agar aap thodi si bhi galti karte hain toh aapka Data , Account , Privacy hack hone me time nahi lgega. Mai aaj iss post me inhi Hackers se bachne ke 10 Tips btaunga, jisko follow karke aap apne Online Data, Account, Email etc ko secure kar sakte hain. Ye Post Bhi Jarur Pade Online koi bhi kaam karne ke liye hume Username aur Password ki jarurat padti hai. Aur Password aisa chiz hai jo hum kisi dusre ke sath share nahi kar sakte hain. Lekin fir bhi kuch log password ko halke me lekar aisa password daalte hai jo bilkul easy hota hai aur koi bhi hacker uss password ko bade hi aasani se pata laga sakta hai. Bahut se user apna Date of Birth, Mobile Number, Ya Name ke sath 123 jaise simple password choose karte hain. Aur jo bahut hi aasani se koi bhi thoda sa dimag laga ke hack kar sakta hai. Simple Password Example Aise password aap use karne se bache. Aapko apne password me special character ke sath kuch digit ka use karna chahiye. Password Majbut rakhe, or agar aapko password yaad rakhne me paresani hoti hai to aap LastPass ka use kar sakte hai. Tip Kabhi bhi Sabhi account par ek hi Password use naa kare, Har account ke liye naya password banaye. Maine apne pichle article me two-step authentication ke bare me detail se bataya tha. Iss feature ko use karne par aapke password ko koi pata bhi kar le toh aapka account access nahi kar payega. Jab bhi aap Two-Step Authentication ka use karte hain toh aapke Phone par OTP aata hai jisko enter karne ke baad hi aaapka account open hota hai. agar aap apna phone kho jate hai toh aap apne password ko recover bhi kar sakte hain. Agar aapko lubhane wale emails aate hai ya phone par messages aate hain ki aap Lucky Draw winner hain aur aapko 10 Crore INR milenge. To iss tarah ke links ko aap ignore kar dijiye. Aap Milte julte naam wale websites par koi username aur password nahi dale. Ho sakta hai ki wo Phishing Page ho. Jisme aap jaise hi Username aur Password enter karenge, aapka Password hack ho jayega. Aap jab bhi Online Recharge ya shopping karte hain toh aapko yah dhyan me rakh ke payment karna chahiye ki aap jis website par payment kar rhe hain uska web address HTTPS se shuru ho rha hai ya nahi. Agar usme HTTPS par cut ka nishan laga hua hai toh aap uss site par payment mat kijiye. Aap kabhi bhi Free wala Anti-Virus mat use kijiye. Agar aapko anti-virus software nahi kharidna hai toh aap Windows-Defender ya Microsoft Security Essentials use kar sakte hain. Aur apne Anti-Virus ko hamesa update karte rahiye. Free Wale Anti-Virus ya Cracked Anti-Virus ko Bilkul bhi apne Computer me install nahi karna chahiye. Ye virus ko aur badhawa dete hain. Ye Bhi Pade Waise toh aapke Windows Computer me Firewall toh diya hota hai. Lekin mai aapko suggest karunga ki aap koi third party ka Fire-wall software install kijiye. Aap Zone Alarm FireWall install kar sate hain. Yah free software hai lekin bahut hi jyada effective hota hai. Firewall farzi links, Malware , Aur unauthorized access se bachata hai. Aur agar aapke computer me firewall nahi toh aapka data aasani se hack ho sakta hai. Aajkal sabhi log Smartphones use kar rahe hain. Aur Smartphones me Email, Whatsapp, Facebook jaise account hamesa login rhta hai aur koi logout bhi nahi karta. Iss tarah se agar aap kisi dusre person ko phone use karne ke liye dete hain toh wo aapke Facebook, Email Ka password ko change kar sakta hai. Aur iss tarah se aapka personal data bhi unsecure ho jayega. Aaj ke time me aap kisi par bhi bharosha nahi kar sakte hai. Isliye koshish yah kare ki phone ka Lock karke rakhe strong Password ya pattern se. Agar hame Bina password wala koi wifi-hotspot mil jaye to ham jaldi se bina kuch soche samjhe usko connect karke internet use karna chalu kar dete hain. Toh ab se aap sawdhan ho jaiye. Public wifi se agar wo hacker bhi connected hoga toh aasani se aapka data hack sakta hai. Mai iske bare me detail se jankari nahi de raha hun kyuki iska process thoda long hai. Filhal aapko yahi suggest karunga ki aap Jab bhi Public Wifi ka Use kare toh koi VPN application install karke hi use kijiye. Play store Search kare VPN bhut sare Application aa jayege. Ye Bhi Pade Agar aapke pass internet connection nahi hai aur aap Aksar Cyber Caf jate hain toh aapko in tips ko jarur follow karna chahiye. Aap Pen-Drive ko jitni baar chahe format kar de. Agar koi banda usko recovey software se chahe toh sb kuch recovery kar sakta hai aur aapka data dekh sakta hai. Isliye aap apna pendrive kisi ko bhi share nahi kare. Agar aapko yakin nahi ho rha hai toh aap Recuva Recovery use karke dekh sakte hain. Dosto ! Ummed hai ki yah post aapko pasand aaya hoga. Agar aapke pass bhi koi aisi tarkeeb hai jisse hacker se bacha ja sakta hai toh aap comment me jarur bataye. Hume khusi hogi. Aur is post ko apne dosto or Family Members se share kare jisse unko bhi Hacker se bachne ki jankari mil paye.

Hello Dear Readers and friends , Mera Naam Deepak Shrivastav Hai Aur Mera Blog Ankk.in , jaha par mai Blogging, SEO, Aur Internet Tips Tricks ki jaankari share karta hu. Ye Meri Pehli Guest-Post Hai HMH.pe Par Mujhe Umeed hai ki Ye Post Aapke Liye Helpful Sabit Hogi. Jab ham ek new blog banate hai, to starting me hamare dimag me kuch questions ghumte rehte hai jaise ki , Blog ka traffic kaise badhaye , Blog ke liye Backlink Kaise banaye, Blog Ki rank kaise Improve kare ? , iske liye ham SEO ki alag-alag techniques ka istemal karte hai jaise, ki Guest-post, Blog Commenting, community forums me active rehna etc. lekin ham Directory submission ki importance ko bhul jate hai, jabki ye SEO ka important factor hai. Web directory , high PR Page Rank websites hoti hai, jaha par bahut sari websites ko unke Content aur detail ke according, Unhe Category aur subcategory me Blogs ya websites ko list me add kiya jata hai. Koi bhi blogger ya website owner apni website link aur uski detail ke sath , Web directory me website ko Submit kar sakta hai. Web directories submission 3 types ke hote hai, Paid Listing Is tarah ke Link Submission me ham Web directory ko paise dekar apne blog ya website link submit karte hai. Isme directory hamare blog ya website ko turant approve kar dete hai submit karne ke liye. Free ya Regular Listing Is tarah ke Submission me hamare link ko web directories free me add kr leti hai, lekin jisme kuch directories hamare blog link ko turant approve kardeti hai or kuch directories link ko approve karne me thoda time leti hai. Regular Link with Reciprocal link Reciprocal listing me hame web directories ka link apne blog me add karna hota hai, to jab ham apne blog me directories ka link add kar lete hai, tb wo hamare link ko bhi approve kar dete hai aur ham apna blog asani se submit kar sakte hai. Web directories me blog ko submit karne ke liye ek simple tip, jo mai aapko batane jar raha hu jo ki bahut hi easy hai. Aap Computer me Notepad ko open karle or usme neeche batai details ko likh le, kyuki aapko ye bar bar karna hai, to agar aap in details ko likh lenge to aapka kaafi samaye bachega. Website Directory submission me apne blog ko submit karne se hamare blog ko bahot fayde hai jaise ki In Sab Sites par apni site ko submit kare. Jaruri nahi aap ek din me hi kare. aap thodi thodi karke kar sakte hai. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi or agar isse sabbandit koi sabal ya sujab hai to aap comment ke de sakte hai. Ye ek Guest post hai HMH.pe , agar aap bhi Guest post karna chate hai to yaha click kare Dusri Guest Post padne ke liye yaha click kare Ye Bhi Pade

Agar kisi ka Janm Din ho or uspar koi unko Happy Birthday Wishes karde, to unki jo khusi hoti hai, uska koi thikana nahi rheta, q ki unko lagta hai unke liye aap ahmiyat rakhte ho . or aajki iss post me ham ussi khusi ko double karne ki baat karne wale hai. Abhi me aapse ek pura collection share karuga Happy Birthday Wishes in Hindi ka, jisme jitne bhi trha ke message or tarike hai jisse aap kisi ko wishe kar sakte ho wo sab dekhege. Aap chahe to Name ki Ringtone bhi bana sakte hai, kisi ke b day par. wo kaise banaye uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi.

Agar aapki WebsiteBlog hai to aapko ye to pata hi hoga, Search Engine me aapki site kesa perform kar rahi hai. iske liye Google ne ek Tool bhi provide kar rakha hai jiska naam hai Google Search Console, jisme ham apni site ko add karke uski puri detail me jankari dekh sakte hai ki hamari site google me kesi perform kar rahi hai. Ham Google Search Console ki madad se site ki bhut si chijo ko dekh sakte hai, jese hamari site me koi error to nahi hai, kitni post google me index hai, visitor kya search karke hamari site par aate hai, Blog hacker se kaise bachaye, iske aalawa bhi bhut si chijo ko ham detail me dekh sakte hai. Mene apni ek post me bataya hai kaise ham apne BlogWebsite ko Google Search Console me account bana kar Submit kare, par sirf Blog ko add karne se hamara kaam khatam nahi hota, Agar aapko Search Console ka pura faida uthana hai to aapko kuch settings hai wo aapko karni hogi apne search console account me. To agar aapne Google Search Console me Account bana kar usme apni site ko add kar diya hai to aap iss article me aage badh sakte hai, jisme aapko uski kya kya setting karni hai uske ware me batane wala hu. Sabse phele to aapko apna Search console account ko open karke, aapki website property par jana hai jo aapne add ki hai. uske baad aapko ye sab setting karni hai jo me niche bata raha hu. Aapko apni site ko Search Console me www, non-www, http or https ke sath add karni hai. taki kisi bhi version me agar koi problem ho to uska pata aapko chal sake. Note agar aap apni site par HTTPs use karte hai jab hi aapko https ke sath add karne ki jarurat hai. Blogspot domain me HTTPS kaise enable kare uski jankari yaha hai. Aap apni site ka jo url hai wo www ke sath ya bina www ke use karte hai wo select kare, taki google site ko ussi format me dikhaye search me. iske liye aapko search console me setting me jakar select karna hai. Aap site ko jisme open karna chate hai wo select kar lijiye, uske baad save kar dijiye. jese aap dekh sakte hai HindiMeHelp.com ko mene without www select kiya hai. isse jada kuch fark nahi padta aap kuch bhi select kar sakte hai. wass iss baat ka dhiyan rakhe jese aapki website open hoti hai aap wahi select kare. Agar aapka Blog Blogspot par hai to without www kaise open kare uski jankari yaha hai. Aapki jo website hai, uska main target konsi country hai aap wo select kare, taki jo data aapko dikhaya jaye Search Console me wo ussi ke hisab se ho. Target country add karne ke liye aapko Search Traffic International Targeting Country par jana hai, fir apni jo bhi target country hai wo select karke save karna hai. Note Agar aap Country Specific Domain extension use karte hai, jese .in, .pk, .us to usme automatic country aa jayegi or aapko yaha country select karne ka option nahi aayega. Website ka Sitemap Submit karna bhi bhut jaruri hai, q ki issi ki madad se search engine ko pata karne me aasani hoti hai ki hamari site par kitni post hai, kitne page hai. or ham Sitemap submit karne ke baad ye bhi dekh sakte hai ki hamari kitni post Google me index hui hai. Site Map Add karne ke liye aapko Crawl Sitemaps par jana hai, uske baad AddTest SITEMAP par click karke .XML Sitemap ki link submit karna hai. Agar aapka Blogger par Blog hai to uski Sitemap link kya hogi or wo kaise banate hai uski jankari aapko yaha milegi, jisme mene bataya hai Blogspot Blog ka .xml Sitemap kaise banate hai Agar aapka Blog WordPress par hai to aap sitemapindex.xml submit kar dijiye. jo .XML sitemap hai wo search engines ke liye hai, aap HTML Sitemap bhi bana sakte hai jo blog ke readers bhi samaj sakge or puri post ko ek jagha dekh sakege. Agar aap Team me work karte hai, ya aap chate hai ki koi or bhi aapke Search console ke data ko access kar sake to aap user add kar sakte hai. New User ko add karne ke liye setting ke icon par click kare fir Users and Property Owners par jaye. ab aapko Add user par click karke new user ki Email ID dalni hai or aap Full access dena chate hai ya kuch limitation ke sath wo bhi aap select kar sakte hai. Note agar full access di to aapko wo remove bhi kar sakte hai. Aapne Website ko Google Search Console me add kar diya or muje pata hai aapne Google Analytics ko site me add jarur kiya hoga, jaha ham apni site ke visitor ko puri trha se analyse kar sakte hai. Agar aap Google Search Console or Google Analytic ko add kar dege to aap Analytics ke account me ye bhi dekh payege ki visitor aapki site par kya search karke aa rahe hai. Search Console se Google Analytics ko connect karke me liye is link par jaye. Connect Search Console to Google Analutics Ab aapko sabse phele apni site ko select karna hai jo Search Console me add hai or uske baad Google analytics ke uss account ko select karna hai jo aapki iss website me add hai. To Ab aap Jaan chuke hai, Search Console me account banane ke baad aapko kya kya setting karni hai, or unka kya kaam hai. Agar aapka koi Doubt hai to comment karke jarur puche or ye jankari kesi lagi wo bhi comment karke jarur bataye.

Slow Computer abhi ke Time ki bekar samasya hai, jiski maja se hame bhut paresani ka samna uthana padta hai. Slow Computer hone ka main karan hota hai Computer ki RAM ka kamm hona. Is Post me ham sikhege ki ham kaise apne computer ki RAM ko 16GB tak bada sakte hai apne computer ki Hard Disk ki memory use karke. Computer ki speed badane ke liye hame simple hamare computer ki Virtual Memory Badana hai. Uske liye hame Apne Computer ki setting me ja kar Virtual RAM ko badana hai jo kisi bhi windows Computer me badi hi aasani se kar sakte hai. Ye Bhi Pade Slow Computer ki Speed Badane ke 9 Tips Kaise RAM Bada kar Computer ki Speed Badegi wo jaanne se phele thoda RAM ke ware me jaan lere hai akhir ye hai kya or isse hota kya hai. RAM Random Access Memory Computer ki wo jagha hai jaha jo bhi Chije chal rahi hai hamare computer me koi Application Program to wo bha rhata hai, taki jaldi se Process ho sake. Jo bhi Ham Copy, Paste karte hai wo bhi ussi me rheta hai. RAM ki memory jaldi read hoti hai Hard Disk, Floppy ya CD ROM se. RAM me jo Data hota hai wo temporary hota hai, Jese hi Ham Computer ko Band karte hai uska sara Data chala jata hai. RAM ka use jo Software ya Process chal rahi hai usme hota hai, to agar ham koi Bada Software chalaye to hame uske liye Jada RAM ki jarurat padti hai warna computer bhut solw work karta hai. Step 1 Start Menu par ja kar Computer par Right click kare fir Properties par click kare Ye Bhi Pade Computer me Android App kaise Install kare or Chalaye Best Software Step 2 Ab hamare Computer ki Details aa jayegi. Advanced system settings par click kare. Apne Computer ki settine me jane ke liye aap ye address se bhi ja sakte hai. Control Panel\System and Security\System Ye bhi Pade ComputerLaptop Me Fast Tarike Se Screen Shot Le Step 3 Ab ek popup khulega. Advanced me jane ke baat settings ki button par click kare. Must Read Slow Computer ki Speed Badane ke 9 Tips Step 4 Ab Fir ek Popup khulega. Advanced par jane ke baad Virtual memory me Change ki button par click kare. Ye Bhi Jane Pendrive Se Shortcut Virus kaise Htaye Hamesa ke liye Step 5 Ab jo popup khulega, usme hame RAM ki setting karni hai. To is trha aap apne Computer ki RAM ko bada sakte hai, ye jo Trick hai wo Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 me kaam karti hai. Agar aap koi Bade Software chalate hai, ya koi Heavy Game khelte hai apne computer me or jab aapka computer slow ho jata hai to ab nahi hoga. Aap Iss setting me apne Computer ki RAM ko 16GB tak bada sakte hai or itni RAM kisi bhi software ko chalane ke liye kafi hai. Aapko ye Jankari kesi lagi ya kahi koi Problem aaye to aap comment karke bata sakte hai. Ye bhi Pade

Hello Friends, Agar aapki blogwebsite hai to ye post aapke liye hai. Ji haa aap ye to jante hi hoge ki me blogger se sambandit post dalta hu site par. or mene bhut se widget bhi share kiya hai jese Type Hindi in English, Flying Airplane, inke aalawa bhi bhut se widget jinki blog me jarurat hoti hai. Jab bhi Ham log khus hote hai, ya fir koi tohar manate hai to ham Bamb-Patako se Atisabaji karte hai to Q na apni Site par bhi Atisabaji ki jaye, Issi liye me laya hu ek Widget jiski madad se aap apni site par Atisabaji kar sakte hai. or Apni Khusi Apne site ke visitor ke sath mana sakte hai. Atisabaji Widget ko Jadatar ham New Year par, Diwali par, Site ki Saalgira par Add kar sakte hai, par ham or kabhi bhi use kar sakte hai, jese hamari site ko koi nai uplabdhi mile tab. Is Widget ko add karne ke liye aapko simple ek code hai jo aapko apni site ke HTML me add karna hai. Step 1 Apne Blogger Account me Login karke Deshboard me jaye. Step 2 Deshboard Layout Add Gadget HTMLJavaScript me jaye. Tip Agar aap apne blog me phele se HTMLJavascript widget use karte hai to usko edit karke usme is code ko bhi dale, jisse aapke blog me extra widget nahi badege. Step 3 Ab aapko HTMLJava Script Widget ke title me kuch nahi dena hai or Bade hisse me is Code ko dale. Code Copy Kare Select karke CtrlC dabaye

Android Mobile Aaj ke Time me sabse jada use hone wala Operating System hai Smartphone me 90 Mobile User Android OS hi use kar rahe hai. Aap Apna Android App Bana kar Google Play Store par Daal sakte hai. Is Post me aapko bataya jayega kaise aap apna Khud ka Andoird App Bana sakteh hai Bina Coding or Programming ke. Android App Banane ke liye, Online bhut sare Tools or Sites hai jinki madad se badi aasani se bina Coding ke App Banaya ja sakta hai. App Banane ke liye Simple hame Apna Account banana hai or apni information fill karke badi hi simple process ke jaruye ham App Bana sakte hai. Ye Bhi Pade Android App Banane ke liye hame simple Andoird App Banane wali website ki jarurat hai, uski madad se koi bhi badi aasani se apni jarurat ke hisab se apna App Bana sakta hai. Appsgeyser ek number company hai android app banane ke liye bina coding ke. Is Website me ham apna App 2-3 Minute me bana sakte hai. Is Site par ham apna app free me bana sakte hai, par agar hame us app ko playstore me publish karna hai to hame thode paise dene padte hai. PlayStore me Upload karne ke kitne paise lagte hai wo aap Website ke Price ke section me dekh sakte hai. Aap App se paise bhi kama sakte hai usme ads laga kar, or agar aapki website hai to aap uske liye bhi App bana sakte hai. appsgeyser.com Ye WordPress User ke liye hai. Mobiloud ki madad se WordPress site ke liye Android App bana sakte hai. Agar aapki WordPress Site hai to aap Mobiloud ki madad se bina coding ki madad se Android App bana sakte hai. mobiloud.com Ibuild app ek or website hai Android app banane ke liye bina coding or programing ke. Isme hame bhut sate design milte hai Android App ke liye. Aap iski madad se ek professional App bana sakte hai bina coding ke. ibuildapp.com Andromo me koi bhi Professional Android App bana sakta hai. Isme ham jo App bana sakte hai usko banane me bhut coding ki jarurat padti hai jo ham yaha bina coding ke bana sakte hai. Hamm Andromo me App bana kar Apna Business, Event, News ya kuch bhi share kar sakte hai. Isme bhut jaldi or badi aasani se ham Android App bana sakte hai. andromo.com Mobincube me Andoird Application bana ek acha edia hai q ki isme ham badi hi aasani se Advanced App bana sakte hai SmartPhone or Tablets ke liye bina technical knowlage ke. Agar Aap HTML Page use karna chate hai apna khud ka design kiya huaa to aap bhi kar sakte hai. Is Site me kuch Futures hai jo Paise se use kar sakte hai. mobincube.com Appyet ki madad se aap ek Professional Android App bana sakte hai. Isme aapko bilkul bhi Programming ki jarurat nahi padegi or Aap ek Minute me apna Phela Android App bana kar teyar kar sakte hai. Hame App Banane ke liye website ke RSSAtom feed ki jarurat padegi, jisko ek badiya Android App me badi achi tarike se badal diya jata hai. App Bana kar Aap PlayStore or Dure Platform par upload kar sakte hai. or Ads laga kar ache paise bhi kama sakte hai agar Aapke app ko hajaro log Download karle to. appyet.com Agar aap Coding sikh kar ek acha Android App bana sakte hai, Android App Banana sikhna chate hai to aap Android App Developer ko join kare jo Free Course hai Google ke duaara. Aap Is Course ko Udacity.com par dekh sakte hai. What is programming language yane programming language kya hoti hai, iske bare me aaj hum janane wale hai. Post ko shuru karane ke pahale mai aapko batadu ye meri pheli Guest post hai HMH.pe, ummid karte hai aapko pasand aayegi or kuch naya sikhne ko milega. Programming language me computer ke liye instruction hoti hai. Programming language ek formal language hoti hai, jisme set of instruction hoti hai to kisi task ko complete karke output provide karati hai. Developers programming language ka use software, game, and script develop karane ke liye karate hai. Computer humari bhasha ko samaj nahi sakta hai. Computer ko sirf binary language yane 0,1 ki bhasha hi samaj me aati hai. Computer ko humari bhasha samaj nahi aati usko sirf machine language samaj me aati hai. Computer programs different language me likhe jata hai, jaise C, C, and java but computer isko directly understand nahi kar sakata. Computer program ko pahale compile kiya jata hai. Compile karane ke bad hi computer usko samaj sakata hai. Assembly language low level programming language hai. Assembly language me commands, ka istmaal kiya jata hai. Jabki machine language me sirf numbers 0,1 ka istmaal hota hai. Lekin assembly language me programmer number ke badale name command use karata hai. Assembly langue processor yane CPU ke liye hoti hai. Yane Each assembly language is specific to a particular computer architecture kah sakate hai. Assembly language ko symbolic machine code bhi kaha jata hai. Command e.g. MOV CL, AL Isko HLL bhi kaja jata hai. High level language humari human language ki tarah hoti hai jo kisi particular computer par depend nahi hoti hai. As compare with low level language machine, assembly high level language write, read, maintain karane ke liye easy hoti hai. High level language me likha hua program computer ko understand karane ke liye usko compiled karake machine language me convert kiya jata hai. First high level language 1950 me introduce hui uske bad bahut si high level languages market me aayi jisme C, C, Java, PHP, Ruby, visual basic etc. Ab in programming languages ka istmaal kaha hota hai ye hum janate hai. Hum computer me daily jo bhi application, program, software use karate hai jaise browser Google chrome, Mozilla, Ms-word, in sabko create karane ke liye in programming language ka istmaal hota hai. Jisme niche di gayi languages mostly used hoti hai. C, C, Java, Visual Basic, D, and C Hum apne computer me games khelate hai unko banane ke liye bhi inhi programming languages ka use hota hai. Jisme C, C, Java and C ka use hota hai. Script kya hoti hai? Script yane ek prakar ka program hi hota hai, jisko kisi specific task ko complete karane ke liye create kiya jata hai. Hume agar ek hi kaam bar bar karana padata hai to hum uske liye code ke jariye script bana skate hai, aur humara time save kar sakate hai. Agar script develop karani ho to hum Perl, python, batch file in programming ka use kar sakate hai. Internet par hum jo nayi nayi website dekhate hai wo bhi alag alag programming, scripting langue s ki help se banayi jati hai. Web designing me sabse basic language jo hai wo HTML Hypertext markup Language use hoti hai. Uske bad CSS Cascading Style sheet. PHP Hypertext Preprocessor, ASP Active Server Pages Inka prayog dynamic website ko create karane ke liye kiya jata hai. Wese aapko bhut thoda knowledge ho fir bhi aap Blogger par Blog bana sakte hai badi aasani se free me. Android app develop karane ke liye Java with Android SDK use ki jati hai. Aur sath me C, C ka bhi istmaal app development ke liye kiya jata hai. Also Read Android Mobile App Kaise Banaye 5 Minute Me Agar aap bhi koi programming language ghar baite sikhna chahte hai to aap w3schools.com, tutorialspoint.com in 2 sites par jake sikh sakate hai. W3schools world top most site hai jaha par aapko har programming ke tutorial milenge. To tutorialspoint India ki topmost programming tutorial ki site hai, jaha aapko easy languages me tutorial mil jayenge. Agar aapko humari ye post acchi lage to aap isko share bhi jarur kare. Guest Author Bio Mera Naam Umesh Chavan Hai, aur mai www.HindiMeEarn.com ka owner hu. Computer Science me master degree M.C.S hasil ki hai, aur computer programming language, web design, blogging me interest hai. Agar aapko bhi Guest Post karna hai to uski Jankari yaha hai.

Aapke Pass Phone to hoga hi or uspar Call bhi aate hi hoge, kuch aapke phechan ke hote hoge jinka number aapke mobile me save bhi raheta hoga par kuch unknown number se bhi aate hoge jo number aapke number me save nahi hai. aese time par kaam aata hai Truecaller jo hame unknown number ki bhi detail bata deta hai ki ye number kiska hai. Phone ke liye jaruri App me se ek hai TrueCaller App jo har ek smartphone user ke phone me hona hi chaiye. Agar aap janana chahte hai ki TrueCaller kya Hai aur Truecaller kaam Kaise Karta Hai to aap sahi jagah par hai, me aapko iske ware me puri jankari dene wala hu. Sabse pehle hum jan lete hai ki TrueCaller kya hai ? TrueCaller ek trha ki service khe sakte hai, jo kisi bhi Mobile Number ki detail bata deti hai ki kon uss number ko use kar rahe hai, iske Mobile Application hai or Website bhi hai jiski madad se ham kisi bhi number ki detail check kar sakte hai. Truecaller ka jo data base hai usme 3 billion Number 3,000,000,000 ki detail hai. jinko kam search kar sakte hai. Jisase aapko agar koi call karta hai aur aapke phone me wo number save nahi hai lekin aapke phone me TrueCaller ka Application install hai. To yaha pe hota yeh hai ki jaise hi aapko koi call aati hai waise TrueCaller ka Application aapko bata deta hai ki aapko kon call kar raha hai. Agar aapne abhi tak TrueCaller Install nahi kiya hai to aap abhi kar lijiye, uske baad simple setup karke Truecaller chalu kar lijiye. Download TrueCaller App To TrueCaller Ye Kam karta hai. Ab jaldi se jaan lete hai ki TrueCaller Work Kaise Karta hai? Kaise TrueCaller kisi bhi number ki jankari provide karta hai ? Agar aapne TrueCaller use kiya hai to aapke mind me bhi ye sabal aaya hoga ki TrueCaller number ki detail lata kaha se hai or ye work kaise karta hai. Truecaller ka kaam karne ka tarika bhut simple hai, wo kisi bhi number ki detail batane ke liye uske database me uss number ko search karta hai. or jesa ki mene bataya 300 crore se jada number ki detail truecaller ke pass hai. Truecaller jo number ki detail collect karta hai unke kuch tarike hai, jinki madad se wo pata karte hai ki konsa number kon use kar rahe hai. To ab aapko ye to clear ho gaya hoga ki Truecaller number ki detail lata kaha se hai. To ab aage se kabhi bhi kisi ko call kare to ye naa soche ki aapka number unke pass save nahi hai to wo pata nahi kar payege ki aap kon ho. Aapka jo Mobile number hai wo aapne Social Media par to use kiya hoga, ya kisi aese user ke mobile me save hoga jo Truecaller use karte hai ya aap khud Truecaller App use karte hai. to koi bhi badi aasani se aapne number ko search karke dekh sakta hai ki ye number kon use kar rahe hai. Sabse Important Baat TrueCaller ka kisi bhi Telecom company se koi sampark nahi hai, aesa bilkul bhi nahi hai ki jo naam truecaller me bataye ussi naam se Number register ho. Q ki ye bhi to ho sakta hai jo number use kar rahe hai unki kisi family ya friend ke naam par wo number register ho. Truecaller kaha se detail lata hai wo aapko pata chal gaya hai to ab aap samaj hi gaye hoge jo detail Truecaller me batai jati hai wo 100 sahi ho ye jaruri nahi. TrueCaller Starting me kuch number ki detail nahi patata tha ya galat detail bhi bhut aati thi, par ab jo Truecaller ka Database hai wo itna bada ho cuka hai or isko use bhi itne log karte hai ki aaj ki tarikh me aesa koi number nahi hai jinki detail Truecaller ke pass naa ho. TrueCaller ki Vajah se Aapki Privacy Ko Kya Hoga ? Aap ye to samaj hi gaye hoge Truecaller ki phuch itni jada ho chuki hai ki wo aapke number ki detail bhi aasani se pata kar sakte hai q ki aapka number jitne logo ke pass hai unme se bhut log truecaller use karte hi hoge. To ab baat aati hai agar hame apna number ki detail Truecaller me nahi dikhani to ham kya kare or Truecaller se apna number kaise remove kare. to me aapko bata du Truecaller ne iske liye bhi aasan tarika diya hua hai. TrueCaller se aapna number or naam remove karne ke liye aapko TrueCaller ke Unlist me number ko submit karna hoga. Truecaller Unlist Agar aapka number TrueCaller me register hai to pehle aapko us number ke TrueCaller Account ko Deactivate karna hoga. Apne account ko deactivate karke ke baad aapko apna number Truecaller unlist me submit karna hai, isko process hone me 24 hours lag sakte hai, uske baad aapke number ki koi detail truecaller me nahi aayegi search karne par. At Last Dosto aap samajh gaye honge ki TrueCaller kya Hai, Truecaller kaise work karta hai. Aur kaise aap Truecaller App ki madad se kisi bhi number ki detail nikal sakte hai or kaise apne Number ko Truecaller me unlist karte hai taki koi hamari detail dekh sake.

Hello Friends ham is post me baat karege security ki jo bhut hi jaruri hai har ek ke liye. Aapne HackingHack sabd to suna hoga, jiska matlab hota hai kisi dusre ke account ko uski permission ke bina open karna or usko use karna. Khane ka Matlab agar koi hamara account hack kar leta hai to wo hamare account se kuch bhi kar sakta hai. Mene apni Pichi ek Post me bataya tha ki ham kaise Facebook Account ko Hack hone se bachye or aaj ham is Post me dekhege kaise ham Apni Gmail Account ko Hack hone se bacha sakte hai or kaise uski security bada sakte hai jo bhjut jaruri bhi hai. Gmail Account ki Security kitni jaruri hai wo aapko pata to hoga par ek war me or bata du ki agar hamari gmail ID ko koi hack kar leta hai to wo hamari id se kuch bhi kar sakta hai. or agar aap Online kaam karte hai or agar aapka Important data online rhata hai to security aapke liye bhut jaruri hai. Agar hamari Gmail ID ko agar koi hack kar leta hai to wo hamare Google ki jitne bhi account hai unko use kar sakta hai, unse kuch bhi kar sakta hai. Hamari koi bhi ID Hack ho usse faida to kuch hona hai nahi, par fir bhi dekh lete hai kya kya nuksan ho sakta hai hamari gmail id agar hack ho jati hai to. Khane ka matlab hai agar hamari Email ID Hack ho jati hai or kisi ka usko password pata chal jata hai to wo hamare google ki jitni bhi service hai or jitni bhi jagha hamne hamari Email ID se account banaya hai wo sab hack ho jayegi. Simple Sabdo me kahe to hamari Online jitni bhi ID ya Account hai un sab ko ham kho dege. To agar aap chate hai aesa kabhi na ho to aapko ye post puri padni padegi jisme ham dekhege kaise ham apne gmail account ki security bada sakte hai or usko hack hone se bacha sakte hai Ye Bhi Pade Online Internet Par Aise Safe Reh Sakte hai Internet Safety Ek Baat me aapko bata du online kuch bhi 100 secure nahi hai, bhale wo kisi ka normal account ho ya fir Bank Account. Hame hamari Security ka Diyan khud hi rakhna padta hai jab hi ham apne account ko bacha sakte hai hacking se. To Chaliye dekh lete hai kya kya kar saktehai ham apne Gmail Account ko Hack hone se bachane ke liye. Ye sabse phela Point hai ki hame apne Account ka Password majbut rakhna hai, bhut log yaha kya galti kar dete hai wo koi aasan password rakh lete hai ya fir khud ka hi mobile number rakh lete hai. jo ki bhut badi bebakufi hoti hai. To agar aapko Lagta hai ki aapka Gmail ka Password Aasan hai to aap usko turant Change kare. Bhut log kya karte hai ki apna jo password hota hai wo har jagha same rakhte hai, taki bhule naa. Par aese me agar aapne kisi site par apna account banaya or wo hi password use kiya to site ke owner aapka gmail account hack kar sakte hai ya wo aapki information kisi se bhi share kar sakte hai jo ham kabhi nahi chate. to Hamesa Alag alag password use kare. Agar aap Password Bhul Jate hai to aap kuch software ka use kar sakte hai jese LastPass Kabhi kabi Ham apne acount me sign karte hai or sign out karna bhul jate hai, aese me bhi koi hamare account ka galat use kar sakta hai. to hamesa Sign Out kare Aapne agar kahi login kiya hai or aap logout karna bhul gaye hai to aap remotely bhi kahi se bhi logout kar sakte hai. Remotely Logout ke liye GMail account me sabse niche corner me Detail ke option par click kare, uske baad ek popup open hoga, jisme aap jaha jaha bhi login hai wo aa jayega, jisme Sign Out All Web session par click karke Logout kar sakte hai. Agar Gmail Account ko hack hone se bachana hai, to Strong Password ke sath sath 2 step verification on hona bhi bhut jaruri hai. taki Password pata hone ke baad bhi koi account ko access naa kar paye. Gmail 2 Step Verification kaise On kare uski jankari yaha di hui hai. Phishing Hacking ka sabse popular tarika hai, jisme Hacker bilkul same dikhne wala fake login page banata hai, jaha jese hi user apna ID or Password dalte hai wo Hacker ke pass chale jate hai. Phishing se Bachne ka tarika haim hamesa login karne se phele URL ko achi se check kare. or kisi bhi anjan link par click karke Login naa kare. Account secure hai ke nahi, or kahi kuch risk to nahi wo check karne ke liye Google Account Security Check kare. iske liye niche diye link par jaye. Google Security Check-up Yaha sabse phele aapko GMail Account me login karna hai, uske baad sabse phela option hai Third Party Access. Yaha jitne bhi Apps hai jo account ko access kar sakte hai, unki list aa jayegi. agar koi aesa App ho jisko aap use nahi karte ya jo trusted naa ho usko Remove Access kare. Ab Login Device check kare, jisme Login hai. agar koi aesa device ho jo aapka nahi hai to turant remove kare. Ye check karne ke baad, recent Account activity check kare. kahi kuch aesa to nahi hua account me jisme risk ho. jese agar last me recover option check kiya ho, ya password bagera change hue hai to yaha aa jayega. jo bhi aaye agar wo aapne hi kiya hai to koi tension wali baat nahi hai. Last me 2 Step Verification On hai ke nahi wo check kare. yaha 2 Step verification ke liye other Backup option hai wo bhi jarur on kare. taki account ko dusre tarike se bhi access kiya ja sake. Iss trha aap apne Gmail Account ko secure rakh sakte hai or Hack hone se bacha sakte hai. Upar bataye points ko to hamesa dhiyan rakhna hi hai. uske sath iss bato ka bhi dhiyan rakhe. At Last Ab aap Jaan chuke hai GMail Account kaise Hack ho sakta hai or kaise Gmail Account ko Hack hone se bacha sakte hai or kitna jaruri hai google account ko secure rakhna. Agar aapka Gmail account hack hua to samjo aapke sabhi account hack ho sakte hai, isliye isko normally naa le or apne account ki security bilkul tight rakhe. Aapko kya lagta hai, gmail account ko hack karna possible hai ke nahi wo comment me share kare. or agar aapka koi sabal ho to jarur puche.
