Youtube Kya hai ye to sbko pata hai or Youtube se paise bhi kamaye ja sakte hai ye bhi me phele bata chuka hu. Bhut se Youtube par channel hai jo acha paisa bhi kama rahe hai. Youtube par ham apni channel ka sari detail to dekh sakte hai jese kitne views, kitni earning, kitne subscriber bagera bagera. Par kyaa aap jante hai ham kisi dusre ki channel ka analytics data bhi dekh sakte hai or pata kar sakte hai ki unki kitni income hoti hai us channel se. Kisi bhi Channel ki Information pata karne ke liye hame ek website hai jiski jarurat padegi. To chaliye dekhte hai kaise kya karna hai kisi bhi Youtube Channel ki Puri Information nikalne ke liye. Kisi bhi Channel ka Analitics Data dekhne ke liye in Steps ko Follow kare Step 1 Sabse Phele Socialblade.com website ko open kare. SocialBlade Step 2 Ab Website open hone ke baad aapko uspar ek search Box deihega. usme aap kis channel ka data dekhna chate hai wo search kare. Step 3 Ab aapne jo channel search ki hai uski detail aapke saamne aa jayegi. Jese aap dekh sakte hai mene setindia Channel ko search kiya tha to uski detail kuch is prakar hamare saamne aai. Note ispar jo Channel ki earning dikhai jati hai wo estimated hoti hai. Matlab wo ek andaja hai views ko dekhne ke baad. Ho sakta hai usse jada ya usse kam earning ho. To Friends Ab aap Jaan chuke hai ki Youtube par kisi bhi channel ka analytics data pata kar sakte hai. Agar aapka isse sambandit koi sabal hai to aap comment karke puch sakt hai. or ye jankari kesi lagi wo bhi jarur bataye. Ye ek Guest post hai jo Kiran Parmar Vasarda ne ki hai jo hindimehelpindia.blogspot.com ke Founder hai. Aap bhi agar HMH.pe Guest post karna chate hai to yaha click kare. Dusri Guest Post padne ke liye yaha click kare. Ye Bhi Pade

Agar aap Website banana chate hai to aap Blogger par Free me bana sakte hai, par agar aap thode series hai or ek badiya website banana chate hai to aapko WordPress par website banani hogi. WordPress par Website banane ke liye Hosting or Domain ki jarurat padti hai. to chaliye jante hai aap kaise ek badiya or sasti wordpress site bana sakte hai.

Google me Top par rank kaise kare, ye sabal har ek website owner ke mind me hota hai, or hamesa wo ye jaanne ki kosis karta hai ki wo kya improvement kare jisse unki site Top result me aaye or wahi bani rahe, to agar aapke mind me bhi ye sabal gumta rheta hai to aap is post ko pura read kare. Google me Top par kaise aaye or Kaise SEO ki madad se Top kare par phele post share kar chuka hu, par aaj iss post me thoda hatke baat karege, SEO Google intelligence ka use karke kaise search me result aate hai. Ye sayad aapko pata hoga, Google me kisi bhi result ko dikhane se phele 200 chijo ko check kiya jata hai uske baad result show hote hai. Ham Iss post me un 200 ranking factors me se jo 10 sabse jada jaruri hai 2017 me unke ware me baat karege or janege kaise unki madad se post ko rank kara ja sakta hai. Page Authority ko short me samje to jo aapki site ke page hai unki kya value hai, or ye jitni jada hoti hai utna hi Search Engines usko value deta hai. Page Authority badane ka simple sa fanda hai aapko Page ko sahi tarike se manage karna hoga, usme sab kuch format me rakhna hoga, or jo bhi content aap usme use kare wo bhi ek flow me. jisme Image, Video, bagera ho. Simple sabdo me kahu to aapko Page ki value badani hogi, iske liye aap apni site ke dusre page se unko link kare, or is page ko backlink bhi dilaye. Aap ye to jante hi hoge Backlink kya hai or wo kitni jaruri hai, or mene apni pichli post me ye bhi bataya tha High Quality Backlink kaise banaye. par backlink banane ke sath sath uski relevancy bhi bhut jaruri hai. Backlink se faida to milta hai, par jo link aapke page par aa rahi hai wo usse related nahi hogi to Google usko jada value nahi dega, isliye kosis kare aapka jo page hai usse related pages me hi link add kare. Google ki abhi new update me bhi bataya gaya hai ki backlink kis trha se banaye, or jo Guest Post karte hai unke liye bhi warning di hai. Agar aap Guest post karte hai to aap Google Guest Post Guidelines jarur padhe. Aapne Apne Blog ki post ko internal link bhi jarur karte hoge, usme bhi iss baat ka dhiyan rakhe jo link usse related ho sirf wo add kare. Agar aapko SERP par top karna hai to aapko long article likhna hoga, ye baat bhut se Top blogger ne servey karke kahi hai, or ye baat sach hai ki google me long content jaldi rank karta hai. Long content ko jaldi rank karne ka karan ye hai ki Google ko samajne me aasani hoti hai ki jo wo page hai wo kis ware me hai. par agar jada jankari nahi hogi or thoda bhut likha hoga to google tikh se samaj nahi pata ki page kis ware me hai, isliye wo unko jada jaldi rank nahi deta. To aapko iss baat ka dhiyan rakhna hai ki Good length article likhna hai. Ab aapke mind me ye sabal bhi aa gaya hoga, kitne sabd ka ek article likhe. to ye depend karta hai, or aap isko iss trha se le ki aap jo bhi jankari de rahe hai wo puri ho or detail ke sath ho.

Abhi ek Sabse Bada Ransomware attack hua tha jiska Naam tha Wannacry, jiske ware me aapko pichli post me puri jankari di thi ki Wannacry Ransomware kya hai, kaise kaam karta hai, kaise isse bacha jaye or agar ye computer me aa jaye to uske baad kya kare. ye sab Points mene usme clear kar diye the. to agar aapne wo read nahi ki hai to please phele usko read kare. Iss Post me me aapko 6 aesi website or Tools ke ware me bataoga jinki madad se aap jo ye Ransomware hai isse nipat sakte hai bina paise diye or jo bhi aapka important data hai wo aap wapas pa sakte hai bina kisi ko paise diye. Agar Ye Ransomware Wannacry Virus aapke computer me aa chuka hai ya abhi tak nahi bhi aaya hai to bhi aapko usse kaise bachna hai ye pata hona bhut jaruri hai. to chaliye jaan lete hai kya kya option hai hamare pass isse ladne ke liye. No More Ransom ye ek website hai jo National High Tech Crime Unit of the Netherlands police, Europol s European Cybercrime Centre or two cyber security companies Kaspersky Lab and Intel Security ne milkar banai hai. Iss website banane ka maksabd hai logo ko Ransom ware ke ware me puri information dena lo wo kya hai kaise kaamkarta hai or kaise usse bacha jaye. taki or uske prati jagruk ho sake or usse bach sake. Jo in Virus me firoti magi jari hai Files ko wapas lotane me usme bhi koi guarantee nahi hoti ki files wapas milegi hi, Iss Site par Wanacry jese jitne or bhi rensomeware hote hai uski decrypt key bhi share ki jati hai. No More Ransom Jab koi Ransomware Virus kisi computer me aata hai to wo sabhi file ko encrypt kar deta hai or waha hame kuch aesi files bhi dekhne ko milti hai jinme ye information hoti hai ki kaise files ko wapas paya ja sakta hai Paise dekar. inke aalawa bhi kuch file hoti hai. Jo Files lock hiti hai unko open karne ke liye ek decrypt code ki jarurat padti hai, jo Hacker ke mutabik hame paise dene ke baad milega. par aap bina paise diye apni file ko open kar sakte hai iss website ki madad se. Aapko system me jo Files hai wo aapko iss website par upload karna hai, uske baad ye website usko scan karegi or dekhegi konsa ransom ware hai or jo usko code hoga wo hame mil jayega. malwarehunterteam.com Avast ne jo Ransomware Virus ke sikar hai unko usse bachane ke liye Free Decryption tool banaye hai jinki madad se jo files hai unko wapas tikh kiya ja sakta hai. Jo abhi Tools hai unke naam hai Alcatraz Locker, Apocalypse, BadBlock, Bart, Crypt888, CryptoMix offline, CrySiS, FindZip, Globe, HiddenTear, Jigsaw, Legion, NoobCrypt, StampadoPhiladelphia, SZFLocker, and TeslaCrypt. Jinhe simpel aap run kar dijiye or aapki file tikh ho jayegi. Avast Ransomware Decryption Tools RansomFree Windows computer ke liye free tool hai jo Ransomware WannaCry ke bachane ke liye double protection karta hai or 99 sabhi type ke Ransom ware Virus ko computer me aane se rokta hai. Agar koi Ransomware Virus computer me aa jaye or jese hi wo run hota hai or file ko encrypt karna start karna hai ye software us virus ko turant delete kar deta hai or is trha jo file hai wo bach jati hai. RansomFree Bitdefender ek acha antivirus hai or inhone bhi Ransom ware se bachne ke liye Anti-Ransomware software banaya hai jo bilkul free hai. Iss software ko windows me run karne ke baad me backgroup me run hota rheta hai or koi bhi aesi process jo sko sahi nahi lagti ye usko block kar deta hai. Isme jo sabse main virous se bachata hai wo hai CTB-Locker, Locky, Petya or TeslaCrypt crypto ransomware families. Anti Ransomware Tool HitmanPro ek badiya anti virus hai jo Ransomware Wanna Cry ko to computer me aane se rokta hai uske aalawa bhi bhut se dusre khatarnak virus ko aane se rokta hai jo hamare computer ka data ko remotely access kar sakte hai. Ye jo Software Free nahi hai par iska 30 Day Trial hai wo try karke dekh sakte hai. HitmanPro.Alert To Friends, aap in Tools or Website ki Help se Is Khatarnak Virus se nipat sakte hai or apna jo bhi important data hai usko bacha sakte hai bina paise diye. Agar aapka isse sambandit koi sabal to aap comment karke puch sakte hai.

Dosto aap HMH.pe youtube se related post ko toh pdhe hi honge. aur agar aap bhi youtube par videos upload karte hai aur uspe views nahi aate hai toh ab aapko kuch Youtube ke basic par sabse important bate btane ja rha hu jisse aapke videos pr view aane lagenge or usse aapki income bhi badegi. Aesa nahi hota ke Video Dale or ek dam bhut se Views aa jaye jese Dusri Popular Channel par aate hai. Dekhiye ye koi shortcut nahi hai. yah ek strategy hai jisko Technical language me Youtube SEO Search Engine Optimization kaha jata hai . Toh agar aap inn simple Points ko Diyan me rakhte huee apne youtube videos upload karege toh aapke videos pr ache Views bhi aane lagege or sath sath aapki Channel bhi Dhire dhire Popular hogi bilkul sahi tarike se. Also Read Youtube se sambandit kuch Basic Sabal or unke jabab aapka video jis bhi topic par ho ,uska Title short and video se related hona chahiye. Matlab ki agar aap kisi cat ka video upload kar rahe hai toh apka Title ho skta hai Funny Cat Video . Title likhte samay aapko dhyan me yah rkhna hai ki aapka Title aapke Video Content ke according hi hona chahiye. Aisa nahi ki apka video cat ke bare mai hai aur aapne Title likha hai Hot Sunny Leone Video . agar aap aisa karte hai toh apka video ek spam video mana jayega aur yah video search engine me ignore kiya ja skta hai. Agar Lambe time tak aapko Video par kaam karna hai to aesa karne se aapki phele hi image kharab ho jayegi fir koi aapki channel par aane ka sochega bhi nahi. to kuch bhi galat or shortcut apnane ki naa soche. Also Read SEO Title likhne ke 5 Eye Chatching tips Dekhiye, Youtube ne hamare video ke liye ek Description Box banaya hai iska matlab hme uska utilize krna bahut hi Important hai . Kuch log hote hai Bss Video Upload karte hai aur Description mein Kuch Nahi Likhte hai . Agar aap description me video ke andar jo content hai uske bare me 200-300 words likhte hai toh yah search engine me show krne lgta hai . Jisse aapke video ki ranking better ho jati hai aur aapke video par views aane lagte hai. Description ki starting ki 2 line achi se likhna bhut jaruri hai, Q ki hamare Video ke sath wo bhi search me dikhti hai jisko log padkar video par click karte hai. Apke video ko famous krne ke liye keywords bahut hi Important hota hai. Aap soch rahe honge ki kon sa keyword daala jay ki video adhik se adhik search ho. Iske liye aapko Google ke Keyword Planner Tool me aap apne video se related keyword ko search kijiye. Fir usme aapko ek monthly search ka data milta hai. Usme Low aur Medium Competition aur adhik bids CPC cost per click wale keyword ko choose kijiye aur apne Video me Tag mein Use kare. Isse aapki video pr views bhi milenge aur earning bhi jyada hogi. Keywords dalne se ek or faida hota hai ki agar koi kisi Video ko dekh raha hai or jo tag usme hai wo hi tag hamare video me bhi hai to side me jo suggestion Video aate hai usme hamara video bhi aa sakta hai, jisse bhi hamare Video ke Views badne me madad mil sakti hai. Read Apne Blog me Youtube Video ko kaise add kare Thumbnail ka matlab toh aapko pta hi hoga. agar nahi pta hoga toh mai aapko btata hu, Dekhiye jab hmara video Suggested Video ki list me show krta hai toh uss video pr jo image show karti hai usko Thumbnail kahte hai. Toh agar hum Thumbnail ko Manually design aur edit karke purane wale thumbnail ko change kr denge toh uspe viewer ki najar padegi. Aur video ko dekhne ke liye bechain ho jayega. ek Servay me aaya tha ki jo log youtube par aese hi kisi video ko dekhna chate hai to wo Video ki Thumbnail ko dekh kar hi uspar click karte hai. Matlab agar Thumbnail achi nahi to Views nahi. Youtube SEO ke najariye se Video thumbnail sabse important hai. Aapke video ka Thumbnail aapke video se hi related hona chahiye. Koi sexual image bhi nahi lagana chahiye. Coustom Thumbnail use karne ke liye Channel ko Verify karna jaruri hai, Janiye kaise kare Youtube Channel ko Verify. Agar aapka video unique hai aur aapke viewer ko video pasand aaya lekin aapne video mein me aapne subscribe karne ke liye bola hi nahi toh ho sakta hai viewer aapke channel ko subscribe na kare. Toh agar apko subscriber ki numbers badhane hai toh video ki last me logo ko subscribe krne ke liye boliye.

Hindi blogging me kamai karane ka sabse popular trika Google Adsense hai. Iska karan bhi hai ki Adsense dusre Ad Network ki tulana me publisher blogger ko jyada pay karta hai. 10 50-60 , Lekin Adsense ko lekar Ek badi hi interesting fact hai- 1.Blog start karte hi blog par Adsense Ad lagana beginner bloggers ka dream ban jata hai. Jab ye pura nahi hota hai to 50-60 new bloggers blogging karna hi chhod dete hai. 2.Jab Adsense Account approve ho jata hai to invalid actions se account ban hone ki chinta satane lagata hai. Yani jinke blog par Adsense Ad show nahi ho raha hai, vo bhi sad hote hai aur jinke blog par show ho raha hai. Vo bhi andar hi andar worried hote hai. Aise me jo blogger full time blogging karana chahte hai. Unke liye keval adsense par depend rahana thik nahi. Aisa karane se unka future unsecure ho sakta hai. Isliye unhen reliable and long term income method find karana chahiye, Jo Affiliate Marketing hai. Affiliate Marketing customers par depend karta hai aur jab tak earth rahega, tab tak customers rahenge. Aur isme adsense ki tarah account ban hone ka risk bhi nahi , Isliye Affiliated Marketing ko Lifetime Income Source banaya ja sakta hai. Aage jante hai in details, Affiliate Marketing Kya Hai Affiliate Marketing Cycle Jab kisi merchandise website ki product ko blog par promote karte hai aur koi visitor use buy kar leta hai. Tab uske badale commission milata hai. Is process ko Affiliate Marketing kahte hai. Jaise aap Amazon ke kisi product ko apne blog promote kare aur koi use buy kar le to aapko income hogi. Affiliate Marketing Kaise Work Karta Hai Merchandise website blog par kisi product ko promote karane ke liye ek special link deta hai, jismen product aur blogger ki ID code hoti hai. Jise Affiliate Link kaha jata hai. Jab koi visitor us link par click karta hai to merchandise website par us product ka page open hota hai. Jaise hi visitor use buy kar leta hai. Merchandise website affiliate id dvara us transaction ko track kar leta hai aur blogger ke affiliate account me commission product price ka kuch partishat bhag credit kar deta hai. Affiliate Marketing Se Kya Fayade Hai Affiliate Marketing ek slow income method hai, lekin ye future me bahut hi beneficial hota hai. Jise points me jante hai 1.Lifetime Income Source, jab tak duniya rahegi, tab tak customers rahenge. Isliye Affiliate Marketing bhi bani rahegi. 2. SEO and User Friendly, Google affiliate marketing ko support karta hai aur affiliated marketing user experience aur blog speed par koi bad impact bhi nahi dalata. 3.Secure Future, Affiliated marketing ko lifetime kiya ja sakta hai, jisse future ko behatar banaya ja sakte hai. 4.Big Leverage Income, Affiliate marketing me income Rs1-Rs 6000 per product ho skati hai. Ye aap per depend karta hai ki aap kis price ke product ko promote karte hai aur dusri bat yadi aap referrel ID se kisi blogger ko affiliate program join karvate hai to aap us blogger ke sells se bhi kamai kar sakte hai. Bilkul MLM ki tarah. Affiliate Marketing Ke Liye Jaruri Chije Quality Traffic Affiliate marketing me successful honge ya fail, initially ye type of traffic se hi pata chal jayega. Jaise- yadi Bluehost affiliated post ka title is tarah banaya jaye About Bluehost in Hindi Bluehost Information in Hindi Bluehost Wiki in Hindi To us post ko achchi traffic mil sakti hai, par sell mushkil se hi mile, because title se visitors ke intention clear ho raha hai, unhen Bluehost ke bare me janana hai, na ki uska plan buy karana hai. Isliye it post ka title is tarah banaya ja sakta hai Bluehost Hosting Plan Review Buy Bluehost Hosting Plan Isliye Affiliated Post ka title selling ke intention se banana chahiye, jisme ye word include kiye ja sakte hai- 1.Review 2.Buy 3.Discount 4.Promo Code Coupon Quality Post Vaise successful blogging ke liye quality post likhana jaruri hai. Lekin affiliate marketing ke liye quality ki ek level upar convenience post likhana jaruri hai. Jo visitor ko product buy karne ke liye push karta hai. Professional Blog Look English me kahawat hai, well begun is half done . Yahi kaam blog ke professional look ka hai. Blog ki professional look ke liye jaruri chije 1.Premium Theme 2.HD Logo 3.Impressive About Me Page Author Profile with Picture. 4.Fast Blog Speed Experience Kisi bhi product ki genuine details tabhi likhi ja sakti hai, jab us product ke bare me interest aur experience ho. Link Cloaking Naturally affiliate link ugly hoti hai. Jo seo ke liye suitable nahi hai. Jise user friendly banane aur search engine se hide karane ke liye link cloaking jaruri hai. Original Affiliated URL httpbluehost.inaffiliateid234512 Cloaking Affiliated Link httpsbloggingfirst.comgobluehost Cloaking url me nofollow tag use kare aur robots.txt me block kare- User-agent Disallow go Link Cloaking ke liye Thirsty Affiliate Plugin use kar sakte hai. Affiliate Marketing Kaise Kare Affiliate marketing start karane ke liye kisi merchandise website ki affiliate marketing program ko join karana hoga. India ke popular affiliate marketing program 1.Amazon Affiliate Marketing Program 2.Flipkart Affiliate Marketing Program 3.Hostgator 4.Bluehost Kuch merchandise website sidhe taur par affiliate program offer nahi karti hai. Jaise Paytm aur Godaddy. Par Affiliate Marketplace Jaise Cuelinks , Vcommission , Viglink se in merchandise website ke affiliate program ko join kar skate hai. Four Tarike Se Affiliate Product Ko Blog Par Promot Kar Sakte Hai 1.DealCoupon Post likh kar 2.Review post likh kar 3.Banner 4.Link Affiliate Marketing Se Related FAQ 1.AffiliateLink Product ke liye jo special link diya jata hai, jiske dvara sell ko track kiya jata hai. 2.Affiliate ID Affiliate Link me publisher ki pahchan ke liye Unique ID code provide kiya jata hai. 3.Link Cloaking Affiliate link ko SEO aur user friendly banana. 4.Cookie Period Website se related data browser me offline store hoti hai, jise Cookie kaha jata hai. Is cookie me affiliate id bhi store hoti hai. Yani yadi koi visitor apka affiliate link use kar kisi merchandise website par visit karta hai. Lekin us din vah kuch bhi buy nahi karta hai aur agle 7 din bad buy karta hai. to uska aapko commission mil jayega Ise cookie period kaha jata hai. Generally merchandise website 60 din ki cookie period offer karti hai. 5.Sub Affiliate Referral link se kisi dusre blogger ko affiliate program join karvana. Isse us blogger ki sells par kuch extra earning bhi hoti hai. 6.Adsense Affiliate Dono ko use kiya ja sakta hai. Bas Affiliate Product Po naa ho. 7.Payment Mode India based affiliate merchandise website sidhe bank account me payment send karte hai. Par yadi aap international affiliation karte hai to PayPal me income receive kar sakte hai. Ye post aapko kaise laga, Comment me jarurat bataye aur ise share kare.

Computer Tips in Hindi me janna hai to aap bilkul sahi jagha aaye hai, Iss article me aapko Computer Tips n Tricks or Computer Shortcut Key ke ware me bhut kuch naya sikhne ko milne wala hai. 1 Window snapping Yah Trick specially blogger or un logo ke liye jyada kam ki hai jinahe bar-bar ek window se dusare window me switching karni parti hai.
to unhe aap ye gyarah kaaran bata dein. In gyarah kaarano ko sunkar logon ko unke sabhi sawaalon ka jawab mil jayega. Aur wo bhi aapki hi tarah hamare bhakt ban jayenge.

Jarur India ki national language hindi hai, lekin lagabhag sabhi official work English me hote hai. 10 50-60 , Yahan tak ki, Society me alag pahchan banana ho, Office me promotion pana ho, Friendsgroup me apni dhaak jamana ho, Koi new modern Business setup karana ho, To English aana behad jaruri hai, kam se Fluent English bolana aana chahiye. Chaliye aaj ham batayenge English Kaise Sikhe Fluent English sikhane ke liye ye tips follow kare 1.Long English Words Ko Tukadon Men Ucharan Kare Main aapko suggest karunga ki shuruat me long English words ko avoid kare. But long English words ko avoid bhi nahi kiya ja sakta hai. Isliye ise bad me try kare. Long English words ko yaad rakhane se pahle usaka pronounce karana hi behad mushkil hota hai. Isliye ye kam tukado me karenge to bahut saral hoga. Jaise Circumstances Tukada Circumstances Pronounce Sarkmstensej 2.Phrase Ko Yaad Rakhe Aap jane le English ratu language hai. Isme hindi ki tarah bolane ke liye words banane nahi padte hai. English me spelling aur phrase certain hote hai. Ye phrase kai words se milkar bane hote hai. Ye phrase itne powerful hote hai to ki yadi aap inhe clear kar lete to aap basic English bolana turant sikh sakte hai. Kuch phrase ke example 1.Excume me. 2.Thanks so much. 3.I really appreciate 4.I am sorry. 5.What do you think? 6.never mind 7.watch out. 3. Grammar Me Na Uljhe Jaise main pahle hi kaha English ratu language hai. Isliye yadi aap phrase ko clear kar lete hai to basically fluent English bol sakte hai. Vaise Grammarke taur par Tense, Would, Should, ka knowledge jaruri hai. 4.TongueTwister Ka Practice Kare Actually ye tongue twister kisi language ke liye jibh ki exercise karte hai. Aise me English sikh rahe hai to jibh ki exercise jaruri hai. Example 1.Betty Botter bought some butter But she said the butters bitter If I put it in my batter, it will make my batter bitter But a bit of better butter will make my batter better So twas better Betty Botter bought a bit of better butter 2.Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers A peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked If Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers Wheres the peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked? 5.Popular English Songs Sune aur Sing Kare English songs me popular phrase aur words ka use hota hai aur sunane se chije jaldi yad hoti hai. Isliye pahle us popular songs ka google me lyrics me find kare. Fir sath-sath gaye. Tab dekho aapko khub maja aayega. Vaise main aapko suggest karunga ki aap koi Indian singer ki English songs par practice kare. Result jaldi achcha mil sakta hai. 6.Subtitle Ke Sath English Movies Dekhe Movies hamare aur logo ki life ko show karti hai. Yani English movie se kafi had tak life se judi baton ko English me jan sakte hai. Isliye subtitle ke sath English movie dekhana start kar de. Vaise Kids English Movie se easy English sikh sakte hai, because kid movie ki story school, home and family se related hoti hai. 7.English Newspaper Read Kare Latest English janana hoto to English newspaper se behatar tarika nahi sujhata. English newspaper me English News sabse easy write ki jati hai. taki sabh level ke English reader padh aur samjh sake. Yadi aap new hai to English newspaper me aise khabar ko padhe, jo aapki favorite ya pahle se jante ho. 8.English Blog Padhe Blogger easy English ka use karte hai, taki unke sabhi readers easily read kar sake. Aise me aapke liye English blog ki help lena English sikhne ke liye behatar option ho sakta hai. 9.Friends Ke Sath Practice Kare Kisi bhi art ya passion ke liye practice behad hi jaruri hai, jo na keval yad rakhane me madad karti hai, balki usme improvement bhi lati hai. Isliye friends ke sath English practice kare. Yadi friends ke samane jhijhakte hai to shuruat me aaine ke samne practice kar sakte hai. Par bad me doston ke sath jarur kare. 10.English Books Padhe Books ko gyan ki ganga mana jata hai. Isliye English learn ke liye English books padhna jaruri hai. aap apni ruchi ke ansuar aise books padh sakte hai, jo love story, success story ya ghost story ki ho. Ant Me Friends, English angrejo ki language hai, hamari nahi. Isliye yadi aap teji nahi sikh pa rahe hai to aapki galati nahi hai. Bas aapko ise time dena hoga. Matalab dhire hi sahi but regular English learn karte rahana jaruri hai aur aap tamam tips ki helps se English sikh jayenge. Yadi aap is post ko pasand karte hai to jarur share and comment kare

Hello Guys ! agar apke pass ek accha sa domain hai, jiska ap use nahi kar rahe ho to us domain ko sale karke paise kamaye. is post me main apko domain ko kaise Sell kare Auction yani Nimali me, taki jada se jada paise uss domain ke mil sake. yaha main apko godaddy auction me biding ke jariye apne domain ko kaise sale karte hai, iske bare me batane wala hu. so guys agar apke ek website chalate ho to apko pata hi hoga ki domain kya hota hai. agar ap ek beginner ho to main apko bata du ki domain apke website ka name Address hota hai. jaise facebook.com, google.com hindimehelp.com ye sare ek domain hai. jise kharidna padta hai, aur jab ye domain bahut popular ho jate hai to inki prize bhi market me bahut hi jyada ho jati hai. to agar apke pass ek badiya domain hai to ap use sale karke ache khase paise kama sakte hai. Badiya Domain Name kaise select kare uski Tips yaha hai. so guys ab apke mind me ye question a raha hoga, ki ham apne domain ko kitne me bhech sakte hai, to ye apke upar domain pe depend karta hai. ki apka domain kis leval ka hai. agar apke domain thoda purana hai ya popular hai to us domain ka sale hone ka bahut jyada chance ho jata hai. aur agar apke domain new hai lekin unique hai to bhi ap use asani se godaddy auction ya other plateform me sale kar sakte hai. ap apne domain ko 1000 rupye se lekar million me sale kar sakte ho. dosto godaddy me apne domain ko auction me sale karne ke liye godaddy ka auction membership lena padta hai. jo ki $3-$4 me 1 year ke liye hota hai. 1 sabse pahle apne goaddy account me login kare. Godaddy Account 2 login karne ke bad ap domain ke section me jaye waha apko domain auction ka option milega. waha click kare. uske bad auction karne ka option milega. waha click kare. 3 join now me click karne ke bad apko godaddy ke terms and condition ko padne ke liye ek aur page me le jayga. to ap us terms and condition ko read kar le. uske bad join me click kare. 4 ab apko membership lene ke liye payment karna padega. apko yaha 400 rupye lag jayga. to ap payment kar le. payment hone ke bad godaddy ke taraf se apko auction membership mil jayga. ab ap apne domain ko auction me sale kar sakte hai. I hope apne membership le liya hoga ab apko apna domain sale karna hai Nilami me, uske liye aap in steps ko follow kare. 1 sabse pahle godaddy auction me jaye, waha apko list a domain ka option milega waha click kare. 2 apne domain ka name dale. aur listing type me 7 days public auction me click kare. 3 domain ka prize dale, ap minimum $20 se start kar sakte ho. category me general select kare. apne domain ka description bhi dal sakte ho. 4 uske bad apna payment option select kare. aur terms and condition me i agree me click karke finish button me click kare. uske bad apko kuch der wait karna hai. apko godaddy ke taraf se confirmation mail ayga. so friend is tarah se ap apna koi bhi domain list kar sakte ho. uske bad ab koi bhi apke domain me bidding kar sakta hai. aur apka domain le sakta hai. 1 auction membership lekar domain ko public auction me dalne me apka domain auction page me show nahi karega. agar ap chahte hai, ki apka domain home page me show ho to apko 1200 rupye aur charge dena padega. 2 apka domain jis prize me bikta hai, us prize ka 20 godaddy rakhega aur apko 80 milega. Godaddy waise bahut charge leti hai, leiki godaddy me domain sale hone ka chance bahut jyada rahta hai kyoki godaddy abhi sabse badi domain selling company hai aur goaddy me bahut sare log domain purches karne ate hai to ho sakta hai. ki apka domain kabhi na kabhi bik jaye. Aap Godaddy se Badiya Expire Domain kaise kharide or paise kamaye, uski information pichli ek post me aapko mil jayegi. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi, Comment karke jarur bataye. or agar aapka koi sabal hai Domain auction se sambandit to jarur puche. Duniya me sabse zyada use kiya jane wala app whatsapp hai. ye bat to sabko pata hi hai. par aap sab ye zarur janna chanhge ke WhatsApp Kisne Banaya aur whatsapp ki khoj kisne ki. WhatsApp ek aisi app hai. jiski help se log mahine hazaro rupay kamate hain. google 2014 ki report ke hisab se whatsapp par har mahine 60 crore user add hote hain. whatsapp ki madad se log asani se apna business aage badha rahe hain. Agar aapko jannna hai Whatsapp se paise kaise kamaye to yaha par jaye. Chaliye Ab Jaan lete hai jo Itna Popular App hai akhir uski khanani kya hai, Kaise Whatsapp ka Idea aaya, kaise or kisne Whatsapp ko banaya. Kya Whatsapp ki Success Story hai. Most Popular messaging app whatsapp ko do dosto ne mil kar banaya tha. jinme se ek achi family se the aur ek gareeb ghar se the. par duniya me bahut ucha naam kamana chahte the 2007 se pahle ye ek normal insan the. aur aj ye dono duniya me top ameero me aate hain. ab to aap zarur janna chahnge ki WhatsApp Kisne Banaya. To is post me ham janenge ki kis tarah log agar sache dil se mehnat kare koi bhi kaam kar sakte hain. Kamyabi jitni bhi mushkil ho, insan se badh kar nahi hoti hai. agar aapne koshish nahi ki to aap man se hare hue insan hain. jise koi taqat jita nahi sakti. Agar aapne Jeck Ma ki Success Story abhi tak read nahi ki hai to aapko wo bhi jarur read karna chaiye, hinhone alibaba.com website banai hai. wo bhi bhut garib the or aaj Chaina ke sabse Amir insan hai. Gareeb Paida Hona Tumhari Galti Nahi Hai, Gareeb Marna Tumhari Galti Hai . whatsapp banane wale ka naam hai Brian Acton or Jan Kaum. Chaliye phele thoda dono ke ware me jaan lete hai. Brian Acton Brian Acton Central Florida me rahte the. ye Foreign Country ke hisab se ek middle class insan the. inhone 1994 me Stanford University se Computer science se apna graduation complete kiya. padhai me ache hone ki wajah se inhe Apple company me as a engineer job mil gai. usko chhod kar inhone Yahoo company as a engineer join ki. aur is tarah ye apni life spend karte the. Jan kaum Jan kaum ek bahut hi gareeb ghar me paida hue the. inka janm 1976 me ukraine shahar ke ek chhote se gaw me hua tha. inke father ek construction company me kaam karte the. Jan Kaum ne apni padhai Son jos state university se math aur computer science se ki, fir inhe ek hacking company WOOWOO me job mil gai. aur ye apni normal life jine lage. Dono ko computer se bahut lagaw tha. isiliye dono ne compter se judi companies me hi job karne ka faisala liya. Brian Actom aur Jan kaum Ki mulakat yahoo office me hui. brian acton ne pahli nazar me hi pahchan liye ki jan kaum ek bahut mehanati insan hain. In dono ki mulakat dosti me badal gai. aur fir dono ne yahoo me 10 saal tak kaam kiya. aur uske baad yahoo ko chhod diya 2007 me. aur travel ke liye nikal gaye. aur fir sath me west america ki travel ki. 2009 me Jan kaum ko movie dekhte time khyal aaya ki kyu na aisa app banaya jaye, jiski help se mai apne dosto ko bata du ki movie me kya ho raha hai. Jisse koi charge bhi nahi lagta ho. Kaum ne is idea ko Acton ko bataya. starting me Acton ne mushkil samjh kar na kahna chaha. par uske baad han kah diya. Ye dono Coding Master the. fir dono is mission ko pura karne me jee jaan se lag gaye. aur finally inhone ye Whatsapp bana liya. Ye to Aap jante hi hoge, koi bhi kaam karo problems to aati hi hai, or jitna bada kaam ho utni badi problems aati hai, tikh ussi trha Whatsapp me bhi aai, unme se kuch niche bata raha hu. 1st Problem App ban kar taiyar ho chuki thi, is app ko banane me dono ke paas jitna bhi paisa bacha tha lagbhag khatm ho chuka tha. par agar koi user whatsapp par registration karne ke liye apna number dalta tha to OTP ka charge Kaum ke bank account se kat jate the, or iske liye unko paise ki bhut jarurat thi take new user Whatsapp me account bana sake. 2nd Problem whatsapp ki setting puri tarh se nahi ho pai thi aur unke paise bhi khatm ho chuke the. whatsapp message kabhi aata tha kabhi nahi aata tha. jisse unki app success nahi ho paa rahi thi. 3rd Problem sabse badi problem yah thi ke unke paas paise khatam hogaye the. wo bank se loan lena chahte the par interest zyada hone ki wajah se loan nahi lipa rahe the. Ek Time ye bhi aaya ki unko lagne laga ki ab WhatsApp ka kuch nahi ho sakta or Jan kaum ne Whatsapp Choddne ka socha, aur acton se kaha ki kyu na ise chhod kar koi job ki jaye. par acton ne kaum ko rokte hue kaha ki is tarah bich me chhodna bewakufi hai hame isme thodi or mhenat karne ki jarurat hai. Dono ne kuch mahine aur whatsapp ko banane me kaam kiya. kaam karte karte dono ka bank account khali ho gaya. ab dono ko naukari ki talash thi. Kaum aur acton job ki talash me facebook aur twitter ke head quarter gaye. par dono jagah inhe asafalta mili. WhatsApp ke kaam ko pura karne ke liye unhe abhi bahut paiso ki zarurat thi. kyuki app ko banane ka adha kaam hi abhi hua tha. Par dono ne haar nahi mani. Acton ne socha ki kyu na dosto ki madad li jaye. tbhi acton ne yahoo me kaam kar rahe apne dosto ko apne projuct ke bare me bataya. bat ko samjh kar unhone han kah diya. Sabne mil kar $2500.00 collect kiye. aur fir se whatsapp par kaam karna shuru kar diya. WhatsApp ka kaam 2010 me complete hua, or iss App ko iss trha se customize kiya ki sabse zyada fast messaging service dene wali app whatsapp bangai. 2010 me whats app ki shuruat se lekar 2014 tak whatsapp ki unbelievable roop se tarakki hui. 2014 me whatsapp ke monthly user 60 crore se zyada hone lage. matlab har mahine 2.5 carore new user whatsapp par add hone lage. Is waqt sabse zyada active rahne wae user whatsapp ke hain. china ke wechat aur japan ke Line app ko whatsapp bahut pahle hi piche chhod chuka hai. is samay india me whatsapp ke daily active user 10 carore se bhi zyada hain. WhatsApp ki is taraki ko dekh kar Facebook ke Founder ne whatsapp ko kharidna ki baat jan kaum se kahi aur deal pakki kar li. aur $19billion doller me whatsapp ko Facebook se kharid liya. 2016 ki Forbes report ke hisab se jan kaum aaj duniya ke ameero ki list me 50 we number par hain. unki sampatti 8.3 billion doller hai. jo ki 2014 me 6.8 billion doller thi. Is tarah jan kaum ne apni ghareeb si zindagi ko apni mehnat aur kabiliyat ke dam se zero se hero bana liya. tabhi log kahte hain ki. Tab Tak Koshish Karo Jab Tak Kamyab Na Ho Jao Yahi Safalata Ka Raaz Hai. To Friends ye rahi WhatsApp ki kahani, jisme aapne jana kaise ek chota sa Idea Duniya ki sabse Popular Messaging Aap bana or unke Founder Duniya ke Amiro ki List me samil hue.

Yadi aap ek blogger hai to aapne jarur Copy Copyright content ka naam suna hoga aur aap daily dekhte honge ki bahut se bloggers dusare Website ke content ko copy karke apne website me daal dete hai. Aap Post ke Title ko dekh kar samaj sakte hai ki Nuksan to tikh hai par kya Faide bhi hai Copy karne ke. To me aapko Simple ek sabd me khana chahuga ki Copy karne me 1 bhi Faida nahi hai. Note Faida Sabd sirf jo Copy karte hai uske liye add kiya gaya hai jiska Is Post se koi samband nahi hai. Copyright content aaj kal blogging ki dunia me ek bahut hi Hot topic Ban gaya hai. Mai bhi copyright content ke bare me daily kuch naa kuch sunta rahta hu. Yadi aap bhi dusare ke website se content ko copy karke apne Website me dalte hai to aapko ye sunane me bahut bura lagega ki aap apna time blogging me west kar rahe hai. Kyoki copyright content ka koi future nahi hai. Copyright content kewal aapka time barbad karta hai aur uska koi benfit nahi milta hai. copyright content se naa kamai hoti hai aur nahi website par traffic aati hai. Pahle ki Tulna me internet aur bhi latest aur smart ho gaya hai Khas kar Google. Blog Me Copy karke Dalne Par ya Fir Koi Galat Chij Dalne Par Google Panda aesa karta hai hamari sath. Posted by Hindi Me Help on Monday, January 11, 2016 Jo bloggers content copy Karke apne website me publish karte hai. Unke liye Google ne Google Panda ko launch kiya hai. Google Panda copyright content ko Aasani se Pehchan kar uski report google ko deta hai. Isliye mai aapse yahi kahuga ki Agar aap internet par kuch karna cahte hai to Copyright karna Band kar de. Jo aapko ata hai usko kare. Ye jaruri nahi sab blogging se related hi website banye aur bhi bahut se topic hai jin par website karke acche paise kama sakte hai. Aap Bollywood, Sport, Health, Khana Banana, Education, Fitnes, Travel, Motivation, etc. topic par bhi apna blog bana sakte hai. Chaliye ab Dusare ke website se content copy karne se hone wale nuksaan ke bare me Jaan lete hai. Yadi aap content ko copy karke usme thoda bahut changing bhi karke publish karege tab bhi aapka woh content copyright hoga aur uss content ka koi future nahi hoga. Kyoki aapke uss content ko google find kar lega. aur aapke uss content ko woh google par rank nahi dega. Yadi aap 1-2 mahine tak content ko copy karke publish karte hai to bahut hi jaldi google panda aapke website ko penelize kar dega. iske alawa yadi aap apne website me adsense Use kar rahe hai tab aapke copyright content ki wajah se aapke google adsense ka acount bhi block ho jayega. Aur bhi bahut se nukasan hai copyright content. Mai pure yakin ke sath kah sakta hu ki agar aap content ko copy karke publish karte hai to kabhi bhi aapka website long term tak nahi jayega. Aur aapke website ka koi badiya future nahi hoga. Isliye content ko copy karna band kare aur kuch internet par accha kare. Yadi aap kisi bade website se content ko copy karte ho to uss website ka owner aapke khilaf DMCA Digital Millennium Copyright Act, Ko Report kar sakta hai. Agar aapki koi report DMCA par karta hai to woh aapke website ke against action bahut hi jaldi lega. Yadi aap ka website blogger par hai to DMCA aapke website ko blogger se delete kar diya jayega. aur Aapke Ip Address ko bhi black listed kar diya jayega. Agar aapka ip address lock ho gaya tab aap uss computer se kabhi bhi dusara website nahi bana paoge. Isliye copyright content karna band kar de. Agar aapki site se koi copy kar raha hai to aap uski Google se DMCA report kare, uske liye aap is link par jakar foll fill kare. Yadi aap koi popular post ko copy karke apne website par publish karte hai to aapko uss post se koi traffic nahi milegi kyoki woh post already publish Kiya hua hai. Yadi aapke website par traffic nahi ayega to aapke website ki ranking bhi nahi improved hogi. SEO Tips Rank badane ke liye jo aapko pata hona chaiye agar aap top rank chate hai google me. I think aapko Illegal work ke bare me pata hoga, Illegal ka mtlab against the rule hota hai. Mtlb aap rule ke khilaf kaam kar rahe hai. Yadi aap apne website ko rule ke khilaf run kara rahe hai to search engine aapko negative mark dega, or yadi aapko negative marke milte hai tab aapki website search engine ke top par kabhi bhi nahi ayegi. Aapke reader ko ye pata chal gaya ki aap content ko copy karke publish karet hai tab unka aap par se trust khtam ho jayega aur aap apna respect bhi kho dege. Isliye kabhi bhi ek Copy Cat naa bane kyoki ye ek tarah ki gali hai. Hmesa apne visitor ko read helpful information dene ki kosis kare. Aur internet par legal work kare. Bhut se Blogger ye galti bhi kar dete hai, wo Post to original likhte hai, par image Google se download karke use kar lete hai, jisse bhi unka nuksan ho jata hai. par isse bachne ka bhi ek badiya tarika hai aap Royalty Free Image use kare jime copyright ka koi lafda nahi. Google me Copyright Free Image kaise Search kare uske ware me mene bataya hai aap usko read kar sakte hai. Ek successful blogger banane ke liye aapko apne passion ke sath kaam karna cahiye. Yadi aap ek quality aur unique post likhte hai tab uss content ko aapke user bhi pasand karege aur search engine me bhi woh content fresh hoga aur usko badiya rank nhi milega. Kabhi bhi content copy karne ke liye hard work naa kare kyoki aisa karne par aapko kuch bhi nahi milega Only Time West Hoga. To dosto maine aapko copyright content ke bare me bataya ki Ye aapko kaise nuksaan pahuchta hai. Yadi aap original, genuine honest ke sath content likh kar publish karte hai to mai yakin ke sath kah sakta hu ki aapke Earning, traffic aur high rank sabhi milege. Muje ummed hai ki aap ab dusare ke website se content ko copy nahi karege or agar kiye hoge to unko Delete karke ek Nai Sirubad karege. Happy Blogging Yadi aapke pass copyright content ke bare me aur koi idea aur experience hai woh mujse comment box me jarura share kare aur please is Post ko apne dosto ke sath share kare taki wo bhi Blogging ka ek phelu jaan sake or blogging me kuch acha kar sake. Ek Baat or me sirf un Blogger se khana chahuga jo Mhanat karke likhte hai or koi dusra usko copy karke apne blog me daal deta hai to aapko tension lene ki koi jarurat nahi hai, Google wese bhi aapka sath dega or ham DMCA ki madad se uske Blog ko Delete bhi karba sakte hai jiske bare me ham aage janege.

Hello Friends Internet ne hamari Jiondgi ko kitna aasan kar diya wo to sab jaante hai or Internet ke itne sare faide ke sath kuch nuksan bhi hai. Hacking. Ji Haa Agar koi Hamara Account Hack karle to usse hamara acha khasa nuksan bhi ho sakta hai. Ye Jarur Pade Online Internet Par Aise Safe Reh Sakte hai Internet Safety Google Gmail Account kitna Jaruri hota hai or uska kitni jagha use hota hai wo batane ki jarurat nahi. Facebook par account banane me, Twitter Par account banane me ya fir kisi bhi site par account banene me hame email id ki jarurat padti hai jo ham Gmail par banate hai. Agar ham kisi bhi account ka password bhul jate hai to ham forgot password karte hai, or fir hamare account ka password change karne ki link hamare email par aati hai. Mtlab agar hamara Gmail Account Hack ho jaye to hamare sare ke sare account hack ho sakte hai. Ye ham kabhi nahi chahege ki hamara koi bhi Account Hack ho. To uske liye hame hamare Google Gmail account ki security ko double karna padega. Gmail Account ki security ko double karne ke liye hame Gmail account me 2-step Verification enable karna padega. fir ham jab bhi login karege to hamare Mobile par ek OTP aayega or usko dalne ke baad hi ham login kar payege. Special Note Agar aap online koi bhi Kaam karte hai, Jese Youtube par Channel hai, Blogger par aapka Blog hai, ya Internet par koi bhi Account jo aapne apni Google Gmail ki ID se banaya hai wo sab hack ho sakte hai. To hamare liye Google Account ko Secure karna thoda jada jaruri ho jata hai, Ek Aam Vyakti se. Step 1 Sabse Phele hame hamare Google ke 2 Step Verification Page par jana hai. 2-Step Verification Step 2 Ab Apne Google me Login karna hai Step 3 2-Step Verification chalu karne ke liye SET STARTED ki button par click kare Step 4 Ab fir se apne Account ka Password dale Step 5 Ab New Page Open hoga Step 6 Ab New Page Open hoga Step 7 Ab jo New Page aayega usme TURN ON par click kare to ab hamara 2-Step Verification chalu ho chuka hai hamare Google account me, wo aap dekh sakte hai. Agar Off karna hai 2 Step Verification to button par click karke kar sakte hai. Important Note Kabhi aesa bhi ho sakta hai ki aap kahi apne Google Account me sign in kar rahe ho or aapke pass aapka Mobile naa ho ya wo chori ho ho gaya ho jispar wo OTP Code aata hai. aese me to ham apne account me Sign in hi nahi kar payege. Isse bachne ke liye hame 2 Step Verification ke Dusre option hai unko bhi chalu jarur kare. To Friends ab aapne apne Google Account ki security ko double kar liya hai.

Jaisa ki aap sab jaante hai wordpress ek blogging platform hai jaha log apna blog banate hai. WORDPRESS par blog banane ke liye aapko ek hosting kharidna hoga. Isse pahle bhi HMH.pe aapko bataya hai WordPress Par Hosting Kaise le Par Naye blogger ke liye $2-5 hosting par spend karna Possible nahi hai. Isiliye aaj mai apke liye ek naya post laya hu. Is post me mai apko 5 alag alag Hosting companies ka naam batauga jo apko free me hosting dete hai. Mere dosto Mai apko batana chahuga ki agar aap apka professional blog banana chahate hai to aap free hosting na le q ki free host me aapko wo help nahi milegi jo premium host me milegi. Aur jab apka blog achi Traffic anaa hogi tab aapko Free host waale unke blog se hata dege. Isiliye mai apko batana chahuga ki Apke proffesional blog ke liye hosting kaise le wo yaha padhe WordPress Par Hosting Kaise le. Agar Aap Hosting nahi lena chate or Aap chate hai ki aap ek Professional Blog banaye jisme bhut jada tarffic aaye fir bhi wo site down na ho to aap Blogger par apna blog banaye jo chalane me aasan bhi hai or usme hosting ki koi jarurat bhi nahi hai. Blogger par blog kaise banaye uski jankari yaha hai Jyda time waste na karte hue mai apko free host ke baare me batata hu WPNode apko free wordpress hosting deta hai. Is hosting company ka ek fayada hai ki wo apke blog me koi ads nahi lagata aur koi extra fees nahi leta. WPNode Par Account Banaye Biz.nf ek easy aur free hosting company hai Jo apko One click WordPress Installation deta hai. Jisse apko fayada hai ki aap ek hi click me wordpress install karta hai Biz.nf ek bohot hi jyda famous Hosting Company hai. Biz.nf Par Account Banaye Jaisa ki naam me hi likha hai apko free hosting milegi jisme wo unki ads nahi lagaege. FreeHostingNoAds apko PHP 5, MySQL, FTP, Filemanager aur bohot kuch deta hai. Is hosting company me apko online support bhi milta hai jo apko dusre kisi free host me nahi milta. FreeHostingNoAds Par Account Banaye Awardspace ek free hosting company hai jo apko free hosting deti hai aur apko Acchi service bhi milti hai. AwardSpace Par Account Banaye freehosting ek bohot hi acchi hosting company hai jo apko free service ke sathsath 247 ka support bhi deti hai. Ye hosting apko instant hosting ki suvidha bhi deti hai. Mai apko batanachahuga ki ye hosting comany me bohot se experts jo apko 24 ke andar apko question ka answer dene wale kaam karte hai. FreeHosting Par Account Banaye To Dosto ab Aap WordPress Website bhi bana sakte hai bina hosting kharide, Par yaha me aapse ek baat khana chahuga ki aap in free hosting ka use sirf wordpress site kaise use karte hai unkeliye kare. agar aap soch rahe hai ki aap free hosting site par apni main site banaye to ye mumkin nahi hai. Q ki free hosting sites par jada traffic aane par wo war war down hoti hai. Mera Suggestion hai ki aap phele wordpress site kaise chalate hai wo in site par bana kar sikh le fir yaha se hosting kharid kar apni main site banaye. Aapko Ye Jankari kesi lagi wo comment karke jarur bataye, or agar aapka koi sabal hai to aap wo bhi comment me puch sakte hai. Ye eK Guest Post hai jo Shantanu P. Yadi aap ek blogger hai to aap ye jarur sochte honge ki aap jo blog post likhe hai woh google ke top rank par Aaye. Lekin aapko Ek baat yaha par jan lena cahiye ki apne blog post ko google ke top rank par lane ke liye koi shortcut tarika nahi hai. Yadi aap Blackhate seo ki madad se apne blog post ko google ke top par rank karane ki kosish karte hai to blackhate seo se aapke blog ko bahut nuksaan ho sakta hai. Aane wale time me hum blackhate seo kya hota hai uske bare me ek details post me janege. Sabhi Professional blogger ek strategy bana kar apne post ko google ke top par rank krate jiske bare me woh aapne reader ko nahi batate hai. Aaj ke post mai aapko un sabhi secrets ke bare me batane ki kosish karuga jinka upyog karke professional blogger apne blog post ko google ke top rank par late hai. Mai ummed karta hu ki aapko iss post se jarur kuch uniqe chiz sikhne ko milega. Content ek aisa powerfull tarika hai jo logo ko aapke upar khichkar lata hai? Yadi aap apne audience ke liye Useful content likhte hai to aapke content ko Apki audience pasand karege. yadi aap search engine ke liye content likhte hai to aapke iss baat ka bhi dhyaan dena cahiye ki aapka content search engine optimization ke sath sath logo ke liye bhi helpful ho. Search engine hmesa organic content ko bahut pasand karta hai. Isliye apne content ko bina kisi copywrite ke 100 Original rakjhe. or Detail me jaanne ke liye ye bhi jarur pade Badiya Blog Content Kaise Likhe Google or Visitor dono ke liye. Ye Bhi Pade Content Ko Viral Kaise Kare? Hajaro Traffic Lane Ka Tarika Infographic Hard Work Naa Karke Smart Work Kare Iska Sidha saa mtlab hai ki kaam ke sath sath dimak ka bhi prayog kare. Maine dekha hai ki bahut se bloggers Apne content ko google ke top rank ke liye sabhi chize sahi tarike se karte hai Lekin galti woh ye karte hai ki woh apne content ko bina keyword research kiye hue publish kar dete hai Jiski Wajah se woh post search engine se jada traffic nahi paa pate hai, q ki us keyword ki jada search hi nahi hai. Jo log Aisa karte hai Unko mai yahi kahna cahuga ki bina keyword research kiye hue aap search engine se achi traffic nahi paa sakte hai. Google Keyword Planner ek aisa free tool hai jiski madad se hum apne content ke liye faidemand keyword find kar sakte hai. Ye Bhi Aapko Pata hona chaiye Sabse pahle aapko ye samjhna hoga ki ye Keyword Decoration hota kya hai. Jab hum kisi keyword ke weigh, Size, Color Etc chizo ko change karte hai Usko hum Keyword Decoration kahte hai. Apne content ko google par rank pane ke liye aapko apne content me Keyword Decoration karna hoga. Content me Keyword Decoration karne ka mtlab aapko apne main keyword jisko aapne target kiya hai usko bold yaa italic karna hoga. Aisa Karne se jab google ka bot aapke content ko read karega to usko aasani se pata chal jayega ki aapne kiss keyword ko target kiya hai. Content me Keyword Decoration karna ek advance tarika hai aur ye bahut madad karta hai aapke content ko google me rank dilane ke liye. Google Hmesa Long in Depth, problem-solving aur keyword rich content ko pasand karta hai. Jiss tarah se Google par rank pane ke liye quality content ki jarurt padhti hai ussi parkar jab tak aapka content long nahi hoga tab tak aapka content google par achi rank nhi karega. Isliye apne content jitna ho sake utna long rakhe. Content ko long rakhne ka ye mtlab nahi hai ki aap usme kuch bhi likh de. Jab tak aapka pura content aapke title se related nahi rahega tab usse aapko fayada nahi mlega. Aapka har ek content kam se kam 800 word kaa hona cahiye. Blog ka Sidebar search engine optimization me ek bahut hi importent role play karta hai. jab tak aapke blog ka sidebar search engine ke liye optimize nahi hoga tab tak aapke content ko rank milne me muskil hogi. Apne blog ke sidebar ko optimize karne ke liye in chizo ka upyog kare. Off Page SEO ki suruwat backlink se hoti hai aur khatam bhi backlink se hoti hai. High-Quality backlinks aapke blog content ko rank karane me bahut jyada importent hota hai. High-Quality backlinks ka mtlab ye hota hai ki aapke blog ki link aisi website se hui ho jisko domain authority , page rank, jaisi chize bahut high ho. Jiski domain authority , page rank high hota hai usko High authority blogwebsite kaha jata hai aur agar aise blog se aapko backlink milta hai to usko High-Quality backlinks kaha jayega. Ye bhi Jarur pade Bad Link Building Strategies se Kaise Bachaye Site SEO Tips Social Sharing ka mtlb ye hota hai ki aapke content ko kitni baar social media par share kiya gaya hai. Search Engine me Raking pane ke liye social sharing ek bahut bada role play karta hai. agar aapka koi aisa content hoga jisko social media par bahut jyada baar share kiya gaye to uss content ko google par top ranking milti hai. Isliye jitna ho sake ye kosish kare ki aapka content jyada se jyada social media par share kiya jaye. Agar aap cahate hai ki aapne content ko social media par jyada share kiya jaye to aapka apne content ko social media ke liye optimize karna hoga aur uske liye aapko kuch baato par dhyaan dena hoga jaise Aapki Site ka in Social Networking Site par Page Jarur Hona Chaiye, agar nahi hai to aap abhi bana lijiye Jab aap apne post ko publish karne jaye to aapko apne pure post ki on-page seo ko cheack kar lena cahiye. Kisi bhi content ko google me rank karane ke liye on-page ki bahut jaruri hota hai. isliye bina op-page kiye hue kabhi bhi apne content ko publish naa kare. On-page seo ke bare me maine aapko pahle hi bata diya hai. bus aap un step ko follow kare. bahut se blogger aise hote hai jinko seo ke bare me utni jankari nahi hoti hai jiski wajah se woh apne blog post ko Over Optimization kar dete hai jiski wajah se google unke content ko spam ki list me daal deta hai. kabhi bhi apne blog post me Over Optimization naa kare. Over Optimization ka sidha saa mtlab hota hai ki bahut jyada . jab bhi aap blog post me kuch bhi seo karne ke liye jaye to aapko utna hi seo karna cahiye jitna ki usko jarurt hai agar aap jarurt se jyada seo kar denge to woh Over Optimization ho jayega. Seo ek bahut hi easy task hai bus aapko isko samjhne ki jarurt hai. Jiss din aapne seo ko acchi tarah se smjh liya uss din se aapki blogging life me ek naya moad aa jayega. Blogging me success hone ke liye SEO bahut hi jaruri hai. Isliye seo ke bare me jyada se jyada sikhne ki kosish kare Mai ummed karta hu aapko saflta jarur milegi. Ye ek Aisa post tha jisme seo ke dwara apne blog ko top rank par kaise laye bataya gaya hai. Me ummed karta hu ki aapko iss post se kuch na kuch sikhne ko jarur mila hoga. Aap humko comment karke bataye ki aapko ye post kaisa lagi aur aapne iss post se kya sikha. Hum aapke comment ka wait karege.

Agar Aapka Blog ya Website hai to aapko apni site ki puri jaankari hona chaiye, or ye bhi pata hona chaiye ki site me kuch improvement ho raha hai ya nahi. or bhi bhut si bate hai jinke bare me hame pata hona chaiye jo ham Google Analytics ki madad se pata kar sakte hai. ham ye to phele jaan chuke hai kaise Google Search Console me site ko add kare. jaha ar ham apni site ko search me improve kar sakte hai. Ham kuch bhi kaam karte hai to hame pata hona chaiye ki ham ye q kar rahe hai, jab hi ham usko achi se kar sakte hai. To chaliye phele jaan lete hai Google Analytics kya hai or iski kya jarurat hai. Ye Google ki ek service hai jiski madad se ham apni site ke visitor ko track kar sakte hai. Hamari site ki kesi performance hai uska pata kar sakte hai or bhi bhut se important futures hai. Mai kuch futures ko share kar raha hu inke aalawa bhi bhutsi baate ham jaan sakte hai Google Analytics par. Blogger me Stats ka ek option rhata hai usme bhi ham dekh sakte hai kitne Visitor aaye or konse page jada dikhe. Par Detail me jaanne ke liye or Live dekhne ke liye Google Analytics jaruri hai. Ab aap Google analytics kya hai kitna jaruri hai wo to samaj gaye hoge to chaliye jaante hai kaise banate hai Analytics par account or kaise add karte hai blog ko isme. Jese ki iska jo naam hai usse hi aap samaj gaye hoge ki ye bhi Google ki ek service hai. to hamari jo Gmail ID hai, hame usse hi ispar login karna hai. Step 1 Blogger ke account me Login kare. fir ek new tab me Step 2 Google Analytics ki site par jaye fir Sign up Google Analytics par click kare kare ab ek new Page Khulega ise kuch steps diye hai, kaise kya karna hai. Simple aap Sign up ki button par click kare Ab agar aap login nahi kiye hai to aapko login karna padega, agar aap Blogger me phele se login hai to yaha double se login karne ki jarurat nahi padegi. Step 3 Ab hamare Saamne ek Form aayega, Usme hame apni site ki jaankari daalni hai jisko hame add karna hai. Jesa Image me diya hai bo sab daalne ke baad Get Tracking ID ki button par click kare. Step 4 Ab ek Popup Window khulega Step 5 Ab aapke saamne ek Page khulega uske ek tracking ID hogi, usme Blogger me add karna hai Tracking ID ko Copy karle Step 6 Ab Blogger me jaye Settings Others Google Analytics Apna Code daalne ke baad Save setting par click karde. To ab aapka Blog Google Analytics se add ho chuka hai or ab aap apne blog ki puri jaankari uspar ekh sakte hai. Ye mera ek screen Shot Dekh sakte hai aap, kesa dikhta hai. Jese ki aap dekh sakte hai, meri site par kitni visitor hai, me live per second ke hisab se dekh sakta hu.

Blogging aur youtube dono hi paisa aur naam kamane ke liye best maane jate hai. India me bhi bahut se log in dono se acha-khasa paisa kama rahe hai aur aajkal to inhe full-time job ki tarah bhi liya ja raha hai. Par ek newbie ko ye topic Blogging vs Youtube hamesha se hi confuse karta raha hai. Isliye aaj me aapko in dono ke baare me detail se hindi me bataunga. Itna to aap jante hi honge ki blog aur youtube channel kya hai aur inhe kaise banaya jata hai. Agar aap nahi bhi jante to ye post padhkar aap in dono ke baare me detail se jaan sakte hai. To friend ab jante hai ki blogging aur youtube channel banane ke liye kya-kya chahiye ? Agar aapke mind me bhi ek sabal ghumta rheta hai or aap confuse hai ki kispar work kare to aap is post ko pura read kare, isme mene har point ko cover karne ki kosis ki hai jo aapko pata hona chaiye. In dono ki requirement janne se pata chalta hai ki youtube channel banana thoda aasan hai. Ab jannte hai ki in dono ke plus point aur negative point kya hai. Blog aur Youtube channel me earning ke liye Jyadatar Adsense hi paryog kiya jata hai. Adsense me earning 2 chijo par depend rahti hai View Youtube par blogger ke mukable 10 se 15 guna jyada view aate hai but ad view ki baat karen to ek blog page par hum kayi ad laga sakte hai jisse iske view bhi pageview se 5-6 guna ho sakte hai. CPC aur RPM CPC Cost per click aur RPM 1000 ad view par earning ke maamle me blogging jyada best hai kyonki blog ka CPC aur RPM Youtube se high hota hai. uska karan ye hai yaha jo main High CPC Keywords hai ham unko achi se use kar sakte hai. Ab baat aati hai ki dono me se best kaun sa hai aur hume kise chunna chahiye to mein aapko vahi chunne ko kahunga jisme aapka jyada interest hai. Yani ki Jis me aap aaj ya 2 saal baad bhi baur na ho. Aur best bhi vahi hai jis par daily naya de sako aur apne visitor ko khus rakh sako. Iske sath sabse best option hai dono ko ek sath paryog karna. Isse aapko aur adhik fayda hoga. Aapko karna ye hai ki ek hi topic se related blog aur Youtube channel banaye aur dono par daliy same post karen. Isse aapka double promotion hoga. To friends, Ye post aapko kaisi lagi comment karke jaroor batayen aur post ko share bhi karen. Ye ek guest post hai. Mera naam BS Bhati Neemla hai aur HMH.pe ye meri pahli guest post hai. Last me aap sabhi se ek request hai ki aap mere blog Webgro.in Hindi blog on internet tools par visit karen aur agar aapko lage ki vahan par di gayi jankari aapke liye usefull ho sakti hai to please blog ko Bookmark jaroor karen. Aap meri Blogging kya hai or q kare wali post jarur read kare. Thanks. Agar aapko bhi HMH.pe Guest Post karna hai to aap yaha jaye.

Hello! Mera naam Virendar Singh hai aap mujhe Virendar Warwal bhi bula sakte hain, jo aapko sahi lage, me apne vichar aur sujhav apne blog TruHindi ke jariye share karta hun. Maine bahut se naye bloggers ko dekha hai content toh achha likhte hai par ek chiz me maar kha jaate hain, wo hai images ka sahi dhang se upyog nahi karna matlab jaisa bhi image unko online mila waisa hi upload kar dete hai bina kuch modify kiye. Is topic par Hindi bloggers me se kisi ne achhe tarike se post bhi nahi bnayi jinse naye bloggers ko kuch sahayta mil sake. Toh aaj me aapko btaunga kaise aap catchy images bana sakte hain apne blog posts aur social media profiles ke liye. Sabse pehle toh aap jo article likhne wale hain us se related kuch copyright free images download karle. Aap Free Image 11 free stock images site se bhi kar sakte hai jo mene share ki hai. Agar aap Canva ka naam pehli bar sun rhe hai toh me aapko thoda overview de deta hun Canva hai kya? Canva ek online image editor tool hai jo ki aap web browser ke jariye Canva.com par jaa kar kuch bhi graphics create kar sakte hain, jaise ki apne Facebook page ke liye cover photo bnana ho, blog post ke liye featured image bnana ho, Pinterest ke liye, music album cover, etc. Canva.com par jis chaahe platform ke liye aap images bna sakte hain. Sabse pehle toh Canva.com par jaa kar naya account bna le. More par click karke neeche scroll down kare Blogging eBooks section me Blog Title naam ka design type milega jo ki optimal size hai 560X315 pixels uspe click karne par new tab open hoga. Aur yeh maine featured image bnaya hai is post ke liye. Kaisa lga? Comments ke madhyam se hume btaye Tip Apne design me icons ya illustrations ka istemal karna chahte hain toh illustrio.com se .png format me download kar Canva par upload karke istemal kar le aur ye copyright free hai. Filhal android users ke liye Canva ki app aayi nahi hai, iPhone aur iPad users ke liye app store me mil jayegi jisse aap Mobile me bhi aaran se edit kar payege Image ko.

Blog create karte hi sabse jaruri hai, Blog Design 10 50-60 , Because 1.High Competition Ab Hindi blogging me competition kafi badh chukka hai. Jiske karan ab minutes me hundred post publish hote hai. Aise me visitors ko attract karane ke liye content hi enough nahi hai. Balki stunning blog design ki jarurat hai. 2.First Thing English me kahawat hai Well begun is half done . aur Blog ko open karte hi visitors sabse pahle kya dekhate hai ? Human Brain Blog Design! Yani blog design achcha hai to sabkuch achcha hone vala hai. 3.First Impression Aapka koi favorite actor ya actress hoga. Right! Aap unse first impressed kaise hue honge ? Actress Unke beautiful handsome face, stylish cloth etc, jise aap bhulaye nahi bhul sakte hai. Ise First Impression kahte hai. Isi tarah attractive blog design bhi work karta hai. Vo visitor ke minds se hote hue heart me bas jata hai. Bilkul boyfriend girlfriend ki tarah. 4.High Bounce Rate Kya aap high bounce rate se suffered hai? Poor content aur slow blog speed ke bad blog design hi jo bounce rate ko increase karta hai. Bounce Rate Well, aapne jan liya hoga, Blog Designing kyu hai jaruri ? Ab janate hai, Blog Design Kaise Kare Site Wide Design 1.Premium Theme Free nahi premium theme use kare , jo free theme ke compare adhik SEO Speed optimized aur stunning designed hoti hai. Jo user experience ke liye best suitable hote hai. Iske alava Premium Theme ki coding secure and trusted hoti hai, jisse aapka blog 60 hack proof ho jata hai. 2.Theme Color Kya aapne kabhi socha hai, Facebook ka default color blue ya twitter ka color sky-bluekyu hai? Actually color ke dvara ye website user ko apni emotion show karana chahte hai. Jaise Facebook blue color se trust show karta hai. Ise color psychology kahte hai. Jise aap bhi behatar result ke liye use kar sakte hai. Color Psychology 3.Logo Logo professionalism ko show karta hai, jo blog ko ek brand blog ki identity deta hai. Isliye blog par HD logo lagaye, jise aap blog ke social pages par bhi same update kar den. 4.Navigation Bar Navigation bar yani menu bar Premium theme me do tarah ke navigation bars hote hai, jo mobile-responsive hote hai. Navigation Bar 1.Primary Navigation 2.Secondary Navigation Ye navigation bars sticky bhi hote hai. Inme important links add kare. Jisse user quickly important content ko access kar sake. 5.Pagination Ek page se dusre page par jane ke liye pagination use kiya jata hai, jo blog ke old post read karane ke liye suitable path banata hai. Pagination 6.Sidebar Kisi bhi theme ki do sidebars, left sidebar aur right sidebar hote hai. Most of bloggers important widget aur ad show karane ke liye right sidebar use karte hai. But ad per high CTR click pane ke hisab se left sidebar behatar mana jata hai. 7.Fevicon Logo ki tarah Fevicon bhi work karta hai, jo unique identity provide karta hai. Fevicon Blog par 6464 ya 128128 pixel ka fevicon lagaye. Mainly Fevicon Browser Tab, History, Bookmark List me show hota hai. Sidebar Design 1.Social Follow Buttons Social signals Google ka important ranking factor hai. Isliye Blog par attractive social follow buttons lagaye, jisse maximum readers social followers ban sake. Social Follow Button 2.Search Bar Search bar se quickly kisi bhi post ko search kiya ja sakta hai, jo trouble shooting blog ke liye must hai. Search Bar Iske alava search bar se mile data se aap jan sakenge ki aapke readers aapke blog par kya search kar rahe hai. Isse aapko apne audience ko easily understand kar sakenge. 3.Subscription Blog create karane ke pahle din se readers ko subscription offer karana chahiye. Jisse frequent readers regular readers ban sake. Subscription service ke liye Feedburner ya Mailchimp ko use kar sakte hai. Subscription Box FeedBurner Ko Blog Per Kaise Lagaye? 4.Popular Post widget Popular chije hamesha achcha impression dalati hai. Yehi work popular post widget karta hai, jo popular post show kar readers ko read karane ke liye attract karta hai. Popular Post 5.Latest Post Widget Latest post widget regular readers ke liye best work karta hai, jo freshness feel karata hai. Jisse new post par views increase hote hai. Latest Post 6.Category Category wise information pane ke liye category widget useful hai. jo user experience ke liye essential hai. Post Design 1.Font Size Font size optimum rakhe, jo jyada small na ho aur na hi jyada big ho. Most of blogger font size 16 pixel rakhte hai. Warning-Yadi aapke blog ka font size optimum nahi hai to use post editor dashboard se font size set na kare, jise inline CSS kaha jata hai, jo SEO friendly nahi hai. Theme ke style sheet me font-size change kare. 2.Font Family Font family readership par bahut impact dalata hai. Isliye aise font-family use kare, jise comfortably read kiya ja sake. Open Sans aur sans-serif font most comfortable font family hai. Aap chahe to heading aur post ke different font family use kar sakte hai. 3.Meta Data- Aise data, jo information provide karte hai, use Meta data kahte hai. Blog me post published date, post modified date, author, comment meta data hote hai. Meta Data Ise post ke shuruat me show kare, jo readers aur search engines ko post related important info deta hai. 4.Image Ek Image hounded words ke equal hote hai, jo text ke compare enjoyable aur easy understandable hote hai. But post me image HD quality vala lagana hoga, tabhi benefits milega. Tip -HD image ko offline aur online dono method se optimize kare, blog speed par bad impact nahi padega Post Ke Liye HD Image Kaise Create Kare 16 Tariko Se Blog Ki Speed Badhaye 5.Feature Image Feature image keval blog ke homepage par hi show nahi hota hai, balki jab post ko social sites par share kiya jata hai to feature image hi post ke sath share hoti hai. Isliye Feature Image HD quality ke sath big size ki lagaye, jo sabhi social sites ke wall par fit ho jaye. 6.Author Box Author box se na keval post author ka introduction hota hai, balki reader ka belief create karta hai. Jo kisi bhi reader ko regular reader banane ka important factor hai. Isliyep post ke ant me ya sidebar me Author Box add kare. Jisme apni smart looking picture lagaye aur apni short impressive author bio likhe. 7.Subscription Box Post ke bad subscription box place karane se satisfied readers ko subscribers me fast convert kar sakte hai. After Post Subscription 8.Comment Box Comment box blog ka important part hai, jo user ke sath search engines par bhi impact dalata hai. Isliye blog me comment box show karna must hai. 9.Social Share Button Kisi bhi blog ke liye social share button essential hai. Jo social traffic drive karane ke liye blog aur social sites ke bich bridge ki tarah work karta hai. Blog me do tarah ke social share button laga sakte hai- 1.Post social share button 2.Sideber social share button Social Marketing Kya Hai? Isse Kaise Traffic Paye Best 12 Methods Footer Design Footer me About me, Contact me, Privacy Policy, Term of service, Disclaimer jaise page ke link aur copyright text add kare. Koi bhi design permanent fashionable nahi hota, jo ek time ke bad outdated ho jati hai. Isliye blog design regular update karana jaruri hai. Jiske bare me ham yahan update karte rahenge. Thanks to read this post. Iske alava aap blog design kaise karte hai? comment box me jarur bataye. Yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai to social sites par share karen.

Hi Friends, aaj main aapke sath ek bahut hi inspirational success story share kar rha hu joki ek indian ki hai. ye story hai world ke World s Youngest CEO Suhas Gopinath ki. ji haan Suhas gopinath joki banglore se hai unhone kewal 14 varsh ki aayu me apni khud ki company bnayi- Global inc. Aaj ye ek muti- million dollar company hai, Suhas ne apni company ek chote se cyber- cafe me baithkar bnayi thi aur us time unhen khud nahi pta tha ki ve world ke Youngest CEO ban gaye hai. kya aapko aschary hua? to fir aaiye jante hai unki puri khaani Suhas ka janam banglore me 4 november 1986 ko ek middle class family me hua tha unke pita indian army me ek scientist. Bachpan me inka interest computer aadi me nahi tha balki inka interest to veterinary science me tha. Lekin jab ye apne doston ko computers aadi ke baare me sunte the to inka bhi computers me interest banna shuru hua. ye middle class family se the to inki family computer afford nahi kar sakti thi, us time unhen 15 rupye har ek mahine pocket money ke rup me milte the. Ve internet cafe par jakar internet surf karte the lekin 15 rupye me ve roj internet surf nahi kar sakte the isliye unhone cafe ke mailk ke sath ek deal ki ki main apne school se aane ke baad 1 se 4 baje tak aapke cafe ko kholunga aur aapke customers ka dhyan rakhunga kyonki veh cafe 1-4 baje tak band rehta tha. iske badle me cafe ka malik use free me internet surf karne dega. Cafe ke mailk ne uski yeh baat swikar kar lia. ab Suhas ki internet aur computers me ruchi kafi badh gayi aur unhone dhire dhire websites bnani shuru ki. unhone apne aap ko freelancing websites par ek web-developer ke rup me register kar liya. unhone apni pehli website free me bnayi kyonki unke pass apna refrence dikhane ke liye kuch nahi tha. fir unhone ek aur client ke liye website bnayi jisse inhen $100 ki kmai hui. Read Website banane ke liye kya kya chaiye Suhas ke pass koi bank account nahi tha isliye unhone iske baare me apne pita ko btaya. unke pita ne to unka virodh kiya lekin unke bhai ne unhe protsahit kiya. iske baad Suhas ke pass website bnane ke liye kai offers aane lage. Tab unhone apni khud ki ek website bnayi coolhindustan.com ke naam se. Websites bnane se Suhas ke pass itne paise ikatthe ho gaye the ki ab ve apna khud ka computer kharid sakte the. thode hi din me unhone ek computer kharid liya. jab Suhas 14 saal ke the to US ki ek company ne Suhas ko part time job ka offer diya aur ve Suhas ki eduacation bhi sponsar karne ke liye taiyaar the. lekin Suhas ne unka offer thukra diya. jab Suhas ne microsoft company ke baare me padha to unhone apni khud ki ek company start karne ke baare me socha. jab unki 9th class ki chuttiyan khatam hui to unhone apni company Global inc. ki shuruaat ki, unhone apni company ko US me registered kraya kyonki india me 18 saal se kam umar ke log company nahi register kar sakte. unhone apne ek amiriki dost ko apni company ka board member bna diya. Ve apni company ko lekar bahut hi jyada excited the, aur ve apni company ko microsoft jitni badi bnane ke sapne dekhne lage. Pehle hi saal me unki company ka turn- over 1 lakh ho gya. Is karan se ve apne pre-board exams me mathematics me fail ho gaye. Isliye unki maa ne unse kasam li ki veh ab padhai par pura dhyan dega, isliye unhone 4 mahine tak apni company par koi kaam nahi kiya aur unhone apne exams first class me pass ki. ve apni company ko other countries tak bhi bdhaana chahte the, unka apni company ko europe me focus karne ke baare me socha. Inhone apna sabse pehle office spain me bnaya aur iske baad italy me. tab tak inki company kafi famous ho chuki thi. Germany ke ek school ne ihne apne students ko enterprenuership par speech dene ke liye invite kiya. apni 12 class pass karke inhone engineering college me admission le liya. 18 saal ka hone par inhone apni company ko india me register kar liya aur apna office us cafe ke pass hi khola. ek baar banglore ke indian institute of science me desh ke sabhi CEO ko bulaya gya tha isliye Suhas bhi vha par gaye aur jab ve ander jane lage to gate par khade security guards ne unhe pakad liya aur kha ki tum bacche ho, bade logo ke karykaram me khaa ja rahe ho . Fir Suhas ne aayojakon ko phone lgaya to aayojak bhage bhage aaye aur Suhas ko aadarpurvak ander le gaye. Mark Zukerberg success Story yaha read kar sakte hai. To doston aapne dekha ki kaise ek middle class family ka ek baccha apni mehnat ke bal par duniya ka sabse youngest CEO ban gya. agar aap bhi isi prkar se apne interest ke kaam me mehnet karen to yakinan hi aap success prapt karenge. Suhas ne ye sabit kar diya ki agar aapme apne kaam ke prti lagan hai to success prapt karne ke liye umar koi maayne nahi rakhti. agar aapko ye post acchi lagi hai to please ise social media par share kare. Aisi hi aur bhi posts ke updates paane ke liye hmara free email subscription le aur Facebook, Twitter, Google par follow karen. Agar aapke pass Android App hai to Hindi Me Help ka Android App Play Store se Download kare.

Agar aap Adsense use karte hai to ye jankari aapko jarur khus kar degi, Google Adsense ne abhi kuch change kiye hai apni Policy s me. Ab kisi site par koi page hai jispar Policy ke khilaf koi content hai to ab sirf uss page par ads dikhna band hoge, jo ki abhi tak puri site par hi ads dikhna band ho jate the. Agar aapko Adsense ki Policy ke ware me sahi jankari nahi hai or aap adsense use karte hai to aapko uske ware me jankari hona bhut jaruri hai. mene Adsense policy in hindi me bataya hai. or uske sath sath aapko Adsense ads kaise use karna hai wo bhi pata hona chaiye, nahi to wo bhi ek karan ho sakta hai aapka adsense account ban hone ka. To Chaliye ab jaan lete hai kya change huaa hai Adsense Policy me or uska hame kya faida hone wala hai. Google Blog par is jankari ko share kiya hai jo me aapse share share kar raha hu. Ye to aapko pata hoga, jitni bhi badi company hai wo apne user se regular feedback leti rheti hai, issi trha Google Adsense ne bhi apne Publishers se feedback liya to usme jo sabse badi problem aa rahi thi publishers ko wo ye ki sahi traha se pata hi nahi chal pata tha ki agar koi policy ka ulaghan huaa hai to uska sahi karan kya hai or usko kaise tikh kare. or agar website par kisi ek page me bhi koi galat chij hoti thi to puri site ko ban kar diya jata tha. jisse publisher ko bhut dikkat ka samna karna padta tha. Google Adsnese ki jo policy hai usko ab or transparent kar diya gaya hai, or ab puri jankari hame mil payegi, agar kahi hamari site par koi policy violations hoti hai to. or ab sirf ussi page par ads dikhna band hoge. Policy me jo sabse achi baat wo ye hai, ki agar ads ko kahi se remove kiya jayega. to uska kya karan hai wo puri detail me bataya jayega, jo abhi nahi bataya jata tha. isse jo Publisher hai unko bhut faida milne wala hai. Google Adsense me 2 Updates announce kiye hai. Google adsense ne new technology ko laye hai jisme policy violations ka pata or achi se chal payega, jisse us page se ads ko remove karne me aasani hogi jo violates kar raha hai policies ka. Google Adsense page-level policy ko laye hai, to ab site par jo acha content hai uspar ads dikhna band nahi hoge site me. Lekin aesa nahi hai ki page-level policy hai to puri site block nahi ho sakti. agar aap war war policy violation karege to aapki site block bhi ho sakti hai. agar war war koi galti karege jo adsense allow nahi karta to adsense account block hone ke chance badh jate hai. Google Adsense se q paise nahi kama pate wo me phele bata chuka hu. Ek baat jo mene phele kisi se share nahi ki jo me aaj karta hu mene ek Post dali thi, jisme India me 250 Pron sites ko block kiya tha uski list thi, meri uss post par 5000 visitor aa rahe the per day. par wo Google ki policy ka ulaghan kar rahi thi, to muje adsense me warning mili thi, jisme baad muje wo post delete karni pade. Ek New Policy Center laye hai jisme sabkuch ek jagha mil jayega jo Publisher jaanna chate hai ya pata hona chaiye Policy ke ware me. Waha hajaro Adsense publishers hoge, jinke feedback ki madad se policy ko or improve or transparent banaya jayega. Kuch time me sabhi Publishers ko sab kuch clear ho jayega, kaise kisi page me violations ka pata chalta hai or waha puri steps bhi batai jayegi kaise kisi violation ko hataya jaye agar kisi page par aata hai to. Ye jo New Policy hai usse lag to aesa hi raha hai, ki ab jo account ban ho jate the, hamari choti si galti se ab wo hona band ho jayege, or iss new update ka kya sahi aasar padta hai to wo time aane par hi pata chalega. New Ab Native Ads bhi use kar sakte hai Adsense me To Friends, me aapse wass itna khena chahuga, agar aap sahi tarike se kaam karege to Google aapko full support karega or aapki badiya earning bhi hogi.

Keyword kya hai or uska kya Importance hai wo to hamne pichi post me jaan liya tha, aaj ham uske ware me thodi detail me janege ki Jis Keyword ko ham target kar rahe hai search engine me rank karne ke liye uski Density kya honi chaiye. Hum sab tou keywords ke baare me jaante hai ki ye aise internal words hote hai jinki madad se hum apne articlepost ka SEO develop karte hai. Aur SEO se humare site me visitors badhte hai aur humara site search engine ke top ranks me pahuch jata hai. Agar Keyword King hai to Keyword Density Queen Lekin sirf keywords ko article ke andar mention kar dene se SEO nahi hota! Balki ek achhe SEO strategy ke liye hume keyword density par bhi dhyan rakhna padta hai. Keyword density ka matlab hai, jitne baar hum apne keywords ko ek article me mention likh rahe hai karte hai uuse keyword density kehte hai. Keyword density nirbhar karta hai aapne apne articles me kitne words likhe hai. Commonly ye dekha gaya hai ki keyword density kabhi bhi 3 se jyada nahi hona chahiye. For example 100 words ke article me 3 baar se jyada aap keywords use naa kare tou behtar hai. For example aapka blog weight loss tips ke upar hai jisme hindi weight loss tips aapke primary keywords hai. Ab agar aap iske upar koi article likhte hai 100 words me then aap 3 times hindi weight loss tips keyword ko uus article me use karee. Agar aap 3 se jyada baar keywords use karte hai then search engines like google and bing aapke articlepost ko spam list me daal sakta hai, jis se aapke search engine rank me effect padega. Aur agar search engine rank me effect pada tou aapko organic traffic and visitors nahi mil payega. Jada bar ek hi Keyword ko use karna ko keyword stuffing khalata hai, jo purane dinome to search me rank dilane me kaam aata tha. par ab usse koi faida nahi hota. Q ki ab Search Engines bhut advance ho chuke hai. KeyWord ko kaha or kaise use kare uski detail me jankari ke liye aapko On Page SEO ke ware me pata hona jaruri hai. Ab sochiye aapne search engine google ke keyword density ke criteria ko maante hue weight loss tips in hindi ke upar article likhna suru kiya. Ab jab koi user google par hindi weight loss tips enter karega, tou google ke spidersweb crawlers aapke blogsite ko scan karenge aur agar aapka article google ke index me fit baith gaya to fir google aapke article ko search result me show karega, aur wo user aapke blog me visit karega. Aur agar aapne keyword density ko follow nahi kiya then google aapke post ko over lap kar dega jis se aap search engine ranking kho denge. Aur yaad rakhiye khoye hue rank ko pana phir naamumkin sa ho jayega. Isliye hamesha keyword density ko maintain karte hue humee articles likhna chahiye. Tou iis tarah se kaam karta hai keyword density! SEO ki or Post yaha hai. Ye Bhi Pade

Mera Naam Saddam Husen Hai, Aur Mai allblogtips.in Ka Founder Hu Aap Mere Blog Par Visit Karke Blogging Se Related Har Ek Nayi Aur Advance Chiz Sikh Sakte Hai.
