SEO friendly blog post ka mtlab ye hota hai ki aap artical to apne reader ke liye likhte ho lekin usko search engine optimize ke liye karte ho. agar aap ek SEO optimization blog post likte ho to aapke bahut sara traffic search engine se milta hai. SEO friendly blog post me aap apne artical me SEO ke kuch aise techniqe ko paryog kate hai jo aapke artical ko search optimization par jyada value milta hai aur aapka blog post search engine par turant aa jata hai! jab bhi aap koi post likhne jaye to ye kosish kare ki aapka post SEO optimization rahe. aaj mai aapko kuch aise badiya method ko batauga jiska pryog karke aap apne blog post ko SEO friendly likh kar search engine par high rank paa sakte hai- jab bhi aap apne blog ka koi bhi artical likhne jaye to sabse pehle uss arical ke target keyword ko jaan le. bina post ke keyword jane article na likhe. aapko apne post ka keyword janane ke liye google adword tool ka use karna cahiye. google adword tool ke madhyam se aap apne post ke liye target keyword select karke usko apne post me optimize kar de. jab bhi aap apne blog post ke keyword ko select kare to ye dhyaan de ki aapko popular keyword ko na select kare kyoki papular keyword already optimize hote hai isliye kam traffic wale keyword ko select kare. kam traffic keyword ka mtlb keyword ka view kam se kam 3500-4000 monthly search ho. iss trah aap kuch badiya low traffic keyword ko select karke paper me likh le aur jab artical likhna suru kare to aap un keyword ko article me kahi na kahi set karte jaye iss traah se karne par aapko search optimization se badiya traffic milegi aur aapka post bhi SEO friendly hoga. Keyword kya hai or Post me Keyword density kya rakhe uski jankari bhi aapko mil jayegi agar aapko nahi pata hai to. Jab aap apna keyword select kar le aur usko paper par note karke usko hmesa apne artical ke best place par add karna cahiye. wese to jitna jyada aap keyword apne post me add karege utna hi jyada badiya aapka post SEO optimization hoga lekin mai aapko kuch badiya jagah batata hu jaha par aapko apna best wala keyword plce karna hoga- Isko or achi se samanje ke liye aapko ye pata hona bhut jaruri hai ki On Page optimization kaise karte hai. Jab aap apna blog post likh kar publish kar de to ye kosish kare ki aapke blog post ka jyada se jyada backlink banaye aap apne blog post ka backlink commenting or guest posting ke dwara bna sakte hai. apne post ko apne niche blog par comment kare aur ho sake to aapko uss topic par ek nya article likh kar guest post kare. aur guest post wale blog post me apne blog post ka interlink add karna naa bhule. Guest Posting ke kya fayde hai wo bhi aapko pata hona chaiye, taki aap inka sahi use kar sake. sath sath Google ke mutabik Guest Post kaise kare wo bhi jarur read kare. Article ko popular social media site par share karna na bhule isse bhi aapke blog post ka backlink banega. apne blog post ko social bookmarking site aur high rank wale article submission site par bhi publish karna na bhule. Backlink pane ke aur bhi bahut se tarike hai. aapko blog post ke backlink ke liye legal method ko hi use karna hai. iss tarh aapko apne blog post ko SEO friendly banane ke liye post ka jyda se jyda backlink banana hoga, lekin ek baat ka dhiyan rakhe, High Quality baklink ki jada value rheti hai! Backlink Kya hai or kaise High Quality Backlink banaye. aapko apna keyword ka chunao keyword adword tool se hi karni cahiye agar aapko kuch paise invest karke keyword research karna hai tab aap Long Tail Keyword Use kar sakte hai. agar aap naye blogger hai to aapke liye google adword tool badiya hoga kyoki ye aapke liye free me uplabadh hai aur iske keyword jyada search visibility hoti hai! google adword ko use karna bhi bahut asaan hota hai. aur isko koi bhi use kar skta hai. agar aap bina keyword research kiye bina blog post kitna bhi bdiya likh le magar aapko search engine optimization par uska badiya result nhi milega isliye hmesa keyword search karke hi blog post likh. aur aapko keyword research ke liye google adword tool hi chune. Aap keywordtool.io website ka bhi use kar sakte hai, agar aapko Google Keyword Tool pasand nahi hai to. aapke blog post ka image aapko google, bing se badiya traffic dila sakta hai aur aapke blog post ko ek perfect SEO friendly post bhi bna sakta hai. iske liye aapko apne blog post ke image ko search engine ke liye optimize karna hoga. apne blog post ke image ko optimize karne ke liye apne image me ALT tag Description dena hoga. apne blog image ke ALT tag Description me apne dwara search kiya hua badiya wala keyword add karna hoga. Image ke ALT tag me jitna badiya wala keyword rahega utna jyada traffic aapko search engine se milega. blog post ka imagi optimize bhi aapke blog post ko SEO friendly post bnanta hai. Kaise SEO Optimization Image banaye uski jankari yaha hai. Image ko Blog me use karne se phele Image compress jarur kare taki uska size thoda kam jo jaye or aapki site fast load ho. SEO ki Puri Jankari aapko yaha milegi, jisme mene SEO ke har topic ke ware me bataya hai. or Blogger ki or jaankari ke liye yaha click kare Agar aapke Pass iske aalawa koi Tip ya Trick hai jisse apni Post ko Search Engine me rank dila sakte hai to Comment karke jarur bataye or ye jankari kesi lagi wo bhi bataye. Ye ek Guest Post hai, Aap bhi agar apni Post Hindi Me Help par post karna chate hai to yaha click kare.

Agar aap blogging karna chate hai or apni Blogwebsite banana chate hai to ho sakta hai aap confuse ho ki Blogger par apna blog banaya ya WordPress par, To Tension naa le me aapko apne Experience se aapko batauga ki konsa Best hai or Q taki aap aasani se decide kar paye aapke liye konsa sahi rahega Blogger ya Wordpress apna BlogWebsite banane ke liye. Sabse phela jo Question hai wo ye ki Aap websiteblog banana q chate hai, uske bhut se karan ho sakte hai jese Online Paise Kamane ke liye, Aapka jo Talent hai usko duniya se share karne ke liye, ya kuch bhi. Me aapko har Point par Compare karke aapko bataoga ki konsa Platform sahi hai or Q taki aap apni Jarurat or Condition ke hisab se select kar paye ki aapko kis par apna blogwebsite banana hai. Agar aap New hai or aapko technical knowledge kam hai to aapko blogger ko use karne me koi paresani nahi aayegi q ki isme aapko koi bhi aesa technical kaam jada nahi karna. sirf thoda sa hai wo bhi Menu add karna jesa chota mota kaam. WordPress use karne ke liye thoda technical knowledge hona jaruri hai. Q ki isme hame WordPress ko hosting me install karna hota hai or uske sath sath kuch technical terms bhi aa jati hai. par agar aap unke bare me search karege to aapko unke tutorial bhi mil jayega. Simple Sabdo me kahu to Blogger me Blog banane me aapko koi error ka samna nahi karna padega. or normal jese facebook account banate hai utni hi aasani se aap blogger par apna blog bana sakte hai par WordPress me ye process thodi si complicated hai. Blogger bilkul free hai or usme hame ek rupaa bhi nahi denaa. matlab ham bina kharch ke apna Blogspot Blog bana sakte hai. WordPress bhi open source software hai par hame wordpress par blog banane ke liye hosting kharidni padti hai jisme paise lagte hai. WordPress Site me kitne paise lagte hai or kaha kaha uski puri jankari yaha di hui hai. Agar aap blog par article dalte hai to itna kaam dono par aaram se kar sakte hai, par agar aapko jada feature chaiye to wo aapko wordpress me milege or blogger me jo features hai sirf unko use kar sakte hai par khud se kuch naya add nahi kar sakte. WordPress me ham plugin install karke uske features ko bada sakte hai. SEO yani Search Engine Optimization ki baat kare to dono hi barabar hai, q ki search me post ko lane ke liye jaruri hai or Sab chije dono me ho jati hai or unme koi antar nahi hai. to ye khene galat hoga ki ek jada SEO Friendly hai or dusra nahi. Par Wordpress me jesa ki mene bataya ham isme extra feature bhi add kar sakte hai. to unhi me se ek ham Yoast Plugin, jiski madad se Keyword set karke post likh sakte hai jisse hame automatic pata chal jada hai ki hamare keyword ki density kya hai post me jisko ham target kar rahe hai. Keyword Density kya rakhni chaiye post me jo SEO ke hisab se sahi ho uski jankari bhi mene di hai. To agar simple kaha jaye to SEO ka dono me koi fark nahi hai par SEO karne me WordPress me ham Plugins ka istmal kar sakte hai. Security ki baat kare to puri duniya me pura 100 secure to koi bhi website nahi hai. Government Sites tak hack ho jati hai. Hacking se apni site ko bachana hai to sabse main hai jitne bhi security badane wale kadam hai wo ham uthaye. Blogger par blog banane ke liye hame simple hamare Gmail ID se login karna hota hai uske baad ham blog bana sakte hai. par WordPress me hame bhut si configuration karni hoti hai or agar kahi kuch hamare hath gadbad ho jaye to hacker ke liye aasan ho jata hai hamari site ko hack karna. Khene ka matlab hai agar ham security ke sare kadam tikh se uthaye to hack karna kisi ke liye itna aasan bhi nahi hai. Aap WordPress me Security ko or jada badane ke liye Plugins use kar sakte hai. jese Wordfence. Blogger site ko hack karna itna aasan nahi hai, agar compare kare wordpress site se. Blogger ki security badane ke liye aapne jis Gmail se blog ko banaya hai wo kisi ko naa bataye or apna main email alag rakhe to kisi ke liye aapki site ko hack karna ek tarike se impossible hi hai. Blogger blog ki security kaise badhaye uski or jankari mene phele share ki hai agar aapka blogger par blog hai to unko jarur read kare. Also Read EK Normal Website jiska badiya design ye banana to dono par hi aasan hai par agar aapko ek aesi website chaiye jisme bhut se features ho to aapko wordpress hi select karna padegaa. Blogger par ham jda extra kuch add nahi kar sakte. Blogger me design ke liye to ham usme bhi badiya Blogger Templates ko upload kar sake hai. Jesa ki aapne dekha dono hi platform lagbhag barabar hai kisi me kuch acha to to kisi me kuch. Par ab aapko andaja to lag hi gaya hoga ki aapko kis par apni site banana hai. Mera Suggestion hai Agar aap New hai to aap Blogger par apna Blog banaye Q ki ye aasan hai or Free bhi or fir aesa to hai nahi ki agar aapne Blogger par blog banaya to aap usko WordPress par transfer nahi kar sakte. Blogger ko WordPress par kaise transfer karte hai uske bare me mene detail me bataya hai to aap jab chahe ki yaar thode jada features chaiye muje or me unke liye thode paise bhi kharch kar sakta hu to aap sift kar lijiye. Blogger Q hai sabse Best uske 13 karan yaha hai To Dosto ab aapko clear ho gaya hoga, ki kon Best hai Blogger ya WordPress. iske aalawa bhi agar aapka koi sabal hai to aap comment karke puch sakte hai or aapko ye jankari kesi lagi wo batana naa bhule.

Hello Blogger s, Aaj ham is Post me dekhege kaise apni Post me Youtube Video ko add karte hai. Me phele hi bata chuka hu ki ham video ko direct post editor se kaise add kar sakte hai, is post me, jisme mene Post editor ke sare option ke bare me batya hai. Sayad aapko pata hi hoga ki ham youtube se bhi badiya paise kama sakte hai, or agar hamara blog bhi hai to usse hamare video ke views to badege hi sath hi sath income bhi badegi. blog or Youtube dono ki. Start karne ke phele me samajta hu aapne apna video youtube me upload kar diya hai, or agar aap koi or ka video add karna chate hai to wo bhi kar sakte hai. Youtube Video ko add karne ke liye phele hame Youtube Video ka Embed code lena hoga fir ham usko Apne Blog ke HTML me daal kar Video Add kar sakte hai. Sabse phele aap jis video ko add karna chate hai usko youtube me khole. Ab niche aap dekhege Share ka Option hai, uspar click kare, Fir Embed par click kare Ab ek code aa jayega jisko ham kahi bhi HTML me add karke video ko add kar sakte hai. Agar aap video ko apne hisab se customize karna chate hai to aap SHOW MORE par click kare. Ab kuch or Option aayege, jinko ham apne video me set kar sakte hai. Apni setting karne ke baad aap code copy kare. Hamare Pass jo Code hai wo HTML me hai to ham usko kahi bhi HTML me add kar sakte hai. Blogger ki Post me Youtube Video Add karne ke liye. Sabse phele HTML section me jaye. Pjir jaha Video ko Add karna hai Bha Code ko Paste karde. Post likhne ke liye bapas Compose section me chale jaye. Ye sirf ek example hai ki Video ko kaise HTML me add kare. Aap Chate to isko HTMLJavascript widget me bhi add kar sakte hai, ya fir agar aap Blogger ke page me add karna chate to bha bhi kar sakte hai. Agar aap Youtube ya Blogging ko lekar confuse hai ki kispar kaam kare, konsa jada sahi rahega or kisme jada income hogi to aap dono ko compare karke batay hai wo jarur read kare. Sabal, Sujab or jaankari kesi lagi Comment kare

Hello Friends Wellcome to another Awsome article jisme ham janege kaise ham Mobile ki sabse Popular App Whatsapp se Paise Kaise Kamaye. Whatsapp Lagbhag har Smartphone use karne wale ke mobile me mil jayega or aap ye to jaante hi hoge ye ek messanger app hai jiski madad se ham chat kar sakte hai, Video, Audio, File, Text link send kar sakte hai. Aap ye bhi jaante hi hoge ki log WhatsApp kitna jada use karte hai, To agar ham jo whatsapp user hai un ko Whatsapp par target karke paisa kamaye to kesa rahega. Ye bhut logo ka Sabal hota hai, or kuch logo ne mujse bhi pucha hai ki ham Whatsapp se paise kaise kamaye, to aaj me uska jabab is post me dene wala hu. Sabse main baat wo me aapko sabse phele bata du ki whatsapp hame koi paisa nahi dega or naa hamse koi paisa lega, par ham Whatsapp ki madad se Paisa jarur kama sakte hai. Ye Bhi Pade WhatsApp Hack kaise kare or WhatsApp Hack se Kaise Bachaye 6 Tarike Whatsapp se paise kaise kamaye usse phele hame kya kya chaiye wo jaan lete hai fir ham dekhe kya tarike ho sakte hai whatsapp se paise kamane ke. Aap ye to jaante hi hoge ki Whatsapp par ham Mobile number par message send kar sakte hai, Matlab agar hame Whatsapp se paise kamana hai to hamare pass Whatsapp ke bhut sare number hona chahiye jinse ham paise kama sake. Hoga ye ham hamara message send karege whatsapp users ke pass fir wo agar hamare us message ka jo ham chate hai agar wo karega to usse hamari income bhi hogi. Whatsapp se paise kamane ke liye ham kuch jada nahi was Whatsapp number chaiye bhut sare, fir ham un whatsapp number se paise kama sakte hai. Agar aapke pass Jada Whatsapp Number nahi hai to aap Facebook ki madad le sakte hai. Whatsapp number ko ikkatta karne ke liye. Aap Facebook par jis catogery ke log chaiye wo group search kare, fir us group me post kare ki agar aap ye information chate hai to apna whatsapp number de. Isse jo bhi usme interested hoge wo apna number comment karege. or iss trha hamare pass Whatsapp ke number ka collection ban jayega. Whatsapp user ke Number jitne Jada Income hone ke chance utne hi jada Aapke Pass jo Whatsapp ke Number hai aap unka Broadcast bana sakte hai or ek broadcast me 256 number add hote hai. Broadcast ki madad se ham ek sath 256 whatsapp number par ek hi message ek sath send kar sakte hai. Ye Bhi Pade Whatsapp se paisa ham kaise kamana chate hai wo hamare upar hai, was isme sabse main hai ki hamare pass jo whatsapp number hai ham unse kya karaye jisse hamari income ho. Affiliate Marketing me hame Product sale karana padta hai jiska hame commission milta hai agar koi hamare khane par us product ko kharidta hai hamari affiliate link se. Ham Sabse phele apna affiliate account banayege Flipkart, Amazone jesi sites par, fir Jis Product ko hame sale karna hai uski affiliate link bana kar ham Whatsapp par send kar sakte hai. Fir jitne bhi log us link par click karke us puroduct ko kharidege hame uska commission milega. Amazon Affiliate Program se Paise kaise kamaye uski puri jankari yaha aapko milegi, jisme aap jaan payege kaise aap amazon ke saman ko sell kara kar acha paisa kaise kamaye. Agar aapke pass koi talent hai or aap wo logo ko sikha sakte hai to aap Whatsapp ki madad se bhi logo ko sikha sakte hai. Is tarike se paise kamane ke liye jo log aapse sikhna chate hai aap unse charge paise le sakte hai sikhane ka. jo url hote hai unko ham chote karke paise kama sakte hai uski jankari me phele hi de chuka hu proof ke sath, to ham wo short link ko whatsapp par logo ko send karke bhi pase kama sakte hai agar wo us link ko open kare to. Agar aapka koi Product hai ya fir aapki dukan hai to aap uski jankari logo ko whatsapp par send karke apne product ko sale kar sakte hai. Simple aapka jo Product hai uski photo, detail send kare logo ko or jo kharidna chahege wo aapse contact karke wo aap se kharid lege. PPD matlab Pay Per Download. Matlab jitni war bhi hamari link se koi download karega uska hame paisa milega. To ham aese PPD ki link bhi logo ko send kar sakte hai jisse agar wo download karege to hamari income hogi. Agar aapka koi bunsiess hai, koi website hai ya fir kuch bhi jiska aap promotion kar sakte hai whatsapp par. usse aapka jo bhi business hai usme faida hoga or aap jada paise kamayege apne business me Agar aapke Pass Whatsapp Number ke bhut acha collection hai to aap dusre logo ka promotion kar sakte hai or unse uska charge le sakte hai.

Agar aapke pass computer hai or aap uske Internet use karte hai to ye jankari aapke liye bhut jaruri hai. Abhi ek new Virus aaya hai jiska naam hai Wanna Cry Ransomware Virus jisse 2,00,000 computers affected huee hai world wild, or ye abhi tak ka sabse bada cyber attack bataya ja raha hai. Chaliye Jaan lete hai akhir kya hai Wanna Cry Ransomware Cyber Attack or isse kaise bacha jaye or agar ye virus computer me aa gaya hai to usse kaise nipta jaye. ye ek virus hai jo computer me aane par computer ki sabhi files ko encrypt kar deta hai or files par ek lock lag jata hai, or uske baad agar aapko wo file wapas chaiye to aapko uske paise dene hoge, jo $100-$1000 s tak ho sakte hai. Ransomware ke computer me aane par computer ki jitni bhi Files, data, documents hai wo kuch bhi open nahi hoti. Jo Rensom firoti magi jati hai agar wo bataye time me nahi de pate hai to wo or bad jati hai, or waha ek ye warning bhi aati hai jisme likha hota hai ki agar itne time me paise nahi diye gaye to files ko delete kar diya jayega. Agar aapko apni files wapas chaiye to aapko paise dene hoge or jo payment send karni hai wo bitcoins me karni hai josko koi trace bhi nahi kar sakta ki kon paise de raha hai or kiske pass paise ja rahe hai. Ye jo sabd hai Ransom iska hindi matlab hota hai firoti. Matlab kisi chij ki kidnapingchurakar karke usko wapas karne ke paise magna. or jo ye Ransomware Virus hai wo yahi kaam karta hai. Hamara jo bhi data hai unko block kar deta hai or usko wapas lene ke liye paise magta hai. News ke mutabik Ransomware Attack ka sabse jada aasar UK ke Hospitals par huaa hai, jaha iske baja se 1000s marijo ka ilaj nahi ho paya q ki unki sabhi detail locked ho gai. Is Attack ka aasar kuch badi badi origination par bhi pata hai jese Renault, Telephonica, Germany railways, FedEx, Russian Central Bank etc. To ab aap itna to samaj hi gaye hoge ki ye jo Virus hai wo kitna khatarnak hai, or ye abhi tak ka sabse bada Cyber Attack kaha ja raha hai. Agar aapko dekhna hai isse or konse server affected huee hai wo aap Google Dork ki madad se search karke dekh sakte hai. Wanna Cry Ransomware Google Dork Search intitle Index of .WNCRY Ye jo Virus hai wo Online servers ke aalawa aapke computer or laptop me bhi aa sakta hai. Is Virus ka naam WannaCrpyt WannaCry hai. Jab Virus Computer me aa jata hai to kesa message aata hai wo aap niche ki pic me dekh sakte hai, jisme dikh raha hai ki files encrypted ho gai hai or unko wapas pane ke liye pay karna hoga.

Agar aap ek Blogger hai or aapki koi BlogWebiste hai to aapko Guest Post ke Kya faide hai wo pata hona bhut jaruri hai. Ya fir aapka koi Blog nahi hai par aapka ek Author hai or aap apni online ek phechan banana chate hai uske liye bhi Guest Post ek Best tarika hai. Guest Posting ki madad se aapki Reputation or Popularity bada sakte hai online, Jiska Sidha Sidha faida aapki brand ko hoga. Aap isko Guest Blogging bhi bol sakte hai ya Fir aap apne aapko Guest Author bhi khe sakte hai agar aap kisi site par post karte hai to. Guest Post karne ke bhut faide hai jo me aapko abhi bataoga, par usse phele thoda ye jaan lete hai Guest Post hota kya hai or isme karna kya hota hai. Agar aap ek BloggerWriter hai to Post kya hoti hai ye to aap jante hoge jisko Article bhi khete hai. or agar aap kisi dusre ki site par Post karege to aap unke Guest khelayege or jo Post aap karege wo Guest Post khalayegi. Jo Post kar rahe hai kisi site par us author ko Guest Author bhi khe hai. Guest Post karne ke faide to hai par agar iska sahi tarike se use kiya jaye tab, Aapko ye bhi pata hona jaruri hai Google Webmaster ke Mutabik Guest Post kaise kare. Agar aap ek Blogger hai ya Freelancer Writer hai to Guest Post aapke liye bhut hi jaruri hai or iske aapko faide bhi bhut hai. Chaliye Jaan lete hai kya kya faide hai Guest Post karne ke. Ye Sabd sunn kar aapke dimag me to ladoo foot gaye hoge, ki Backlink. Q ki Backlink ek website ke liye kitni jaruri hai wo to aap jante hi hoge. Backlink ki madad se Aapki jo site hai uski authority Improve hogi or aapki site ki search ranking badegi. Backlink kya hoti hai or High Quality Backlink kaise banaye agar aapko nahi pata hai to mene jo article likhe hai aap unko jarur read kare. Traffic yani Visitor ye bhi ek website ke liye kitne jaruri hai wo muje batane ki jarurat nahi hai. Agar koi website hai or uspar koi visitor hi nahi aa rahe hai to website ka koi faida hi nahi hai. Traffic lane ke bhut se tarike hai jisme SEO sabse main hai or aap Post share karke bhi Promote kar sakte hai. Par Guest Post ki madad se aap jis Blog par Post kar rahe hai waha se bhi traffic pa sakte hai. Phechan banani kisi bhi jagha kitni jaruri hai wo sab jante hai, agar aap kisi field me hai to ye bhut jaruri hai ki uss field se jude jitne bhi log hai wo aapko phechane, or apni phechan badane ke liye Guest Posting ek best option hai. Post karke aap jo blog hai unke samne apna talent share kar sakte hai, jisse jo uss blog ke readers hoge wo bhi aapko phechanne lagege. Aapko kisi bhi field me success hona hai to sabko sath lekar chalna bhut jaruri hai, taki aapko kahi koi dikkat aaye to sab aapko support kare, aapki help kare. iske liye aapko sabse contact karke ache riste rakhne hoge. Dusre Ache Blogger se acha Rista banane ka isse acha or koi tarika nahi ho sakta ki aap ek High Quality Post unke Blog par kare, isse wo aapse khus bhi hoge or aapko support bhi karege. Ye ek aesa sabd hai, jo Success hona chata hai unke mind me to jarur ghumta hoga. Q ki agar kuch bada karna hai to ek Brand banana bhut jaruri hai, taki aapki ek alag phechan ban sake. Agar aap Guest Post karte hai to waha aapke naam ke sath aapki website ka naam bhi bataya jata hai, jisse aapki jo Brand Value hai wo bhi badegi. Aap kesa likhte hai or wo logo ko kitna pasand aata hai uska pata bhi aap Guest post karke kar sakte hai, Q ki jab aap kisi blog par Post karege to uske jo readers hai wo aapki post par comment bhi karege jisse aapko ye samaj aa jayega ki aapka jo Post likhne ka tarika hai wo kitna badiya hai or aapko usme kya improve karna chaiye. Agar aapka Kisi chij me talent hai or aap uske ware me acha likh sakte hai to Guest post ki madad se aap apna Talent uss website ke users ko dikha sakte hai. To Friends ab aap ye to jaan gaye hai Guest Post karne ke kya faide hai or aapko isse kitna faida ho sakta hai, par kuch baat or jo aapko pata honi chaiye Guest Blogging ke ware me agar aap Guest Blogging karna chate hai to. Aap badiya article likh lete hai or aap Guest Blogging karna chate hai to aapko kuch chije hai phele wo jarur check karni chaiye taki aapko aapki Guest Post karne ka pura faida mile. Agar aap Guest Post kar rahe hai kisi Blog par, matlab aap unke mehman hai to aapko ye jo moka hai uska puri trha se faida uthana hai, isme aapko apna sabse best to dena hai hi, uske sath sath kya kya karna hai chaliye jan lete hai. Agar aap kisi site par Guest Post karna chate hai to uske liye kya kare, ye sabal bhi aapke dimag me aa sakta hai to me aapko bata du agar aapko Guest Post karna hai kisi Blog par to sabse phele to aap site ko check kare. Agar wo Guest Post Accept karte hai to unki site par aapko Guest Post Request Page mil jayega. Jesa HMH par bhi hai, jisme Puri Guide Lines di hui hogi kaise Post karna hai or kis type se karna hai. Aap jo Site ke Admin se unse contact kare, or unse discus kare or apni jo Post hai wo aap unko send kar dijiye. Hope ab aapko Guest Post kya hai, kya iske faide hai or kaise Guest Post karte hai ye sab samaj aa gaya hoga. iske baad bhi agar aapka koi sabal hai Guest Post se sambandit to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. HMH Guest Post s aap yaha read kar sakte hai.

Twitter kya hai or Twitter par account kaise banate hai iske bare me ham phele jaan chuke hai. Twitter par sabki ek alag Profile hoti hai, jisme hamari jaankari di huii hoti hai. Chaliye dehte hai kaise Apni Account ki jaankari ko Update kiya jaye or apna Photo Upload kiya jaye. Apne Account ko sahi se set karne ke liye aapko Apni Profile Photo or Header Image Upload karni hogi. Thoda apne bare me, aapki janmththi, Aapki website or Twitter Profile ke liye Color set karna hai. Ye bhi Pade Sabse Phele Twitter.com me Login kare. Apni Twitter ki Profile par jaye. Ab Edit Profile ki button par click kare, uske baad aap apne account ki Detail ko Edit kar sakte ho. Puri Detail Daalne ke baad Save Changes ki button par click kare. To Ab aap Twitter ki Profile ki detail kaise update karte hai, ye aap jaan chuke hai. OR kaise Image Upload karte hai Twitter par ye bhi aap jaan chuke hai. Agar aapki Blog hai uske liye bhi Twitter account to jaruri hai hi, sath me Facebook Page or Google Page bhi jaruri hai. Apne Sabal, Sujab Comment karke bataye. or hamara Hindi Me Help ka Facebook Group bhi join kare. Ye bhi pade

Dosto me aapko ek baar fir se yaad diladu ki blogger ek aesa platfom hai jiski madad se ham free me website bana sakte hai. Agar aapko nahi pata kaise banaye to aap yahadekh sakte hai kaise free website banti hai Blogger par usko agar ham kisi ko bataye to bo aasani se samaj jayega ki ye to free ki hai, or ek professional look nahi aata. Ham aaj ussi topic par baat karege, or wo hai website ka address. jese ki aap jaante hi hai blogger par jo hamari websiteblog hai uska address kuch is prakar hota hai. hindimehelp.blogspot.com jisko ham domain add karke hindimehelp.com me badal sakte hai. www.HindiMeHelp.blogspot.com or isko dekh kar koi bhi kha dega ki ye to free hai or isme kya badi baat hai. Par agar ham kisi ko bataye ki hamari website hai www.HindiMeHelp.com to 99 log jarur impress hoge or aapse jaanne ki kosis karege ki aapne kaise banai. or unka najariya aapke liye badal jayega. Domain Lene se Phele Ye Jaankari Jarur Pade, Kaise Badiya Domain Select kare. Is post me ham janege ki ham kaise apni blog ke address se blogspot ko hata kar website me badal sakte hai. ye kuch chije hai jo aapke pass honi chaiye To blog ko website me badane se phele aapko ek acha sa Domain register karna hoga.

Ab internet keval entertainment ka chij nahi rah gaya hai, balki aap chahe to ise earning ka jariya bana sakte hai. Jiske bare me main pahle hi bata chukka hun, jise aap is post me padh sakte hai. Internet Se Paise Kamane Ke 10 Best Tarike Internet se paise kamane ke kai tarike hai, but usme sabse behatar tarika hai Blogging karana Because- 1.Blogging se aap Fast Online Identity bana sakte hai. Jaise Labnol.org Founder Amit Agrawal aur Shoutmeloud.com Founder Harsh Agrawal ke bare me most Indian bloggers janate hi hai aur unke bare me kai Technology Magazine print karti hai. Isi tarah Supportmeindia.com Founder Jume Deen Khan ke bare me 24 -12-16 ko Indore Patrika ne mention kiya tha. Jabki Jume deen Khan SMI ko October 2015 ko found kiya tha. Indore Patrika Mention SMI, Source- Indore Patrika 2.Blogging se earning karane ke liye kai tarike Adsense, Affiliate Marketing etc. available hai. 3.Yadi aap seriously blogging karte hai to ek din aapki income itni ho jayegi ki aap kisi other general job se nahi pa sakte. Jaise Shoutmeloud.com ke founder Harsh Agrawal study se engineer hai, but ve blogging se per month 34 lac rupees earn lete hai. Shoutmeloud July 17 Income, Source Shoutmeloud Really me blogging new generation ka new business idea hai . Jise Professionally kiya jaye to big income ke sath big identity bhi milti hai. But Ye Blogging ya Blog Hai Kya ? Blogging online knowledge provide kar earning karane ka behatarin tarika hai . aap kisi bhi topic par blogging kar sakte hai, jisme aapko knowledge aur interest ho. Lekin topic select karte time hamesha dhyan rakha jaye ki jis topic ko select kar rahe, use people search karte ho. Blogging karane ke liye blog ki jarurat hoti hai. Jise aap free aur premium tarike se bana sakte hai. Blog ek weblog hai, jise HTML, CSS, PHP, Javascript language se banaya jata hai. But ab blogger aur WordPress platform ke use se non technical people bhi blog bana sakte hai. Free Blog Kaise Banaye World popular platform WordPress aur blogger par free blog bana sakte hai. Jisme sabse pahle janate hai Blogger Par Blog Kaise Banate Hai. Blogger Google ka free blogging platform hai. Jise millions of people use karte hai. Blogger Par Blog Banane Ke Fayade- 1.Adsense Ad laga sakte hai. 2. Affiliate Marketing se earning kar sakte hai. 3.Direct Ad se earning kar sakte hai. 4.Free hosting milati hai. 5. Blog ki speed fast hoti hai. 6. Free HTTPs milata hai, jo Google ka ranking factor hai. Nuksan 1.Blogger ka permalink SEO friendly nahi hai. Isliye Google SERP me only 2 blogger blog ke post show hote hai. 2.Google kabhi bhi aapke blog ko delete kar sakta hai, jab aap rules ko violate karte hai. 3.Google hamesha fresh content like karta hai, but aap blogger par post update karenge to permalink change ho jayega. Jisse aapki traffic down ho jayegi. Chaliye ab jante hai, Kaise blogger Par Blog Banaye Aap video bhi dekh sakte hai 1. Blogger.com par visit kare 2. Create Your Blog par click kare. 3.Ab Gmail account banakar Sign kare, ya existing Gmail Account se bhi sign in kar sakte hai. 4.Ab Google Plus Profile ya Blogger Profile banaye. Blogger Profile keval aapke blog ke reader ko show hoga, jabki Google Plus Profile apke blog reader ke sath Google ke sabhi service jaise Gmail, Drive ke liye equal show hoga. Blogger Profile me keval Display name enter karana hota hai, jabki Google Plus Profile me Name, Gender, Date of birth. Yadi aap blogger profile create karana chahte hai to Create a limited Blogger profile par click kare. Isme bas aapko Display Name dalana hoga. Ab continue to blogger kare 5.Now Create New Blog par click kare Ab ek box open hoga. Blog Title Dale Blog Address enter kare. Aapke keval blog ka name dalana hoga, .blogspost.com automatically add ho jayega. Ye aapke blog ka address hai. Ise subdomain bhi kaha jata hai. Theme select kare. Aapka blog ka look kaisa hoga, usi ke anusar select kare. Ab Create Blog! Par click kare. 6.Ab Google Domains Box pop up hoga. Use No Thanks kare. Ab Google bhi domain sell karta hai. Aap custom domain buy kar blog se setup kar sakte hai. Jise next tutorial me janege. 7.New post par click. Post Title and Post likhe aur Publish kare. Blogger Overview 1.Post Yaha aap published aur draft post check aur new post kar sakte hai. 2.Stats Kitne people ne aapke blog par visit kiya hai. Uska information yahan milega. 3.Comments Aapka post kaisa hai, isko lekar readers comment karte hai. Jo yaha check kar sakte hai. 4.Earnings Jab aap Google Adsense ka ad blog par lagaye to usse ki gai earning yahan check kar sakte hai. 5.Campaigns Traffic pane ke liye paid campaigns run kar sakte hai. Jo aap yahan se kar sakte hai. 6.Pages Yahan se pages create kar sakte hai. 7.Layout Present Template ki layout ko change kar sakte hai. 8.Theme Blog ki theme change kar sakte hai. 9.Settings Blog ki important setting kar sakte hai. WordPress Par Free Blog Kaise Banaye World ke 28 blogs powered by wordpress hai, jo batata hai ki WordPress kitana popular hai. WordPress.com Par Free Blog Banane Ke Fayade 1.Free Hosting 2.Free SSL certificate 3.Affiliate Marketing aur direct ad se money earn sakte hai. Nukasan 1.Permalink SEO friendly nahi hota hai. 2.Yoast, W3Total jaise important plugin install nahi kar sakte hai, jo SEO ke liye jaruri hai. 3.Premium Theme upload nahi kar sakte hai. 4.Google Adsense support nahi karta hai. Chaliye ab jante hai WordPress.com Par Blog Kaise Banate Hai Aap Video bhi dekh sakte hai 1. WordPress.com par visit kare. 2. Get Started par click kare 3.Click on Get Start With Blog 4.Search blog address aur address.wordpress.com ko select kare. 5.Select Free Plan 6. Create account. Ab aapka blog ready hai. 7.Write par click kar, new post write kare aur publish kare. WordPress Overview 1.View Site Blog par ja sakte hai. 2.Stats Visitors report dekh sakte hai. 3.Site pages Pages dekha aur new page create kar sakte hai. 4.Blog Posts Post dekh aur create kar sakte hai. 5.Media Image upload kar sakte hai. 6.Comment Reader comment check kar sakte hai. 7.Theme Theme change aur customize kar sakte hai. 8.Sharing Isse blog par social sharing button add kar sakte hai. 9.People Author, subscriber add kar sakte hai. 10.Plugins blog par essential plugin install kar sakte hai. But ye pro feature hai. 11.Settings Blog ki Title , Language, Timezone jaise important setting kar sakte hai. Hope apne blog successfully bana liya hoga, yadi koi problem face kar rahe hai to jarur share. Post helpful pate hai to social sites par share karana na bhule.

Aaj Google har ek blogger, web master, internet user and marketer ke liye bahut bada tool hai. Agar kisi ko Kuch bhi jaanna hai to Sabse aasan tarika hai Google. Google aaj interet ka dusra name hai. Aaj Google kewal search engine hi hai. Google advertisement, business, promotion, tool, software etc. me bhi sabse aage hai. To isi tarah is post me laye hai Google ke amazing, interesting and mind blowing facts. Beginning me Google ke founder ko HTML Jo web page banane ke kaam aati hai achhe se nahi aati thi. Aur isliye Google ka Hompage jo ham Google.com open karke dekhte hai wo bilkul simple hai. Itna hi nahi, kitne time tak Google par search button bhi nai bana tha. Google company ka name Googol rakhna tha, aur spelling galti ki wajah se Google pad gaya, galat name Google se puri duniya janane lag gai to aaj bhi iska name Googel hi hai. Agar aap Googol search karte hai tab bhi related search Google hi show hoga. Google par per day aap kitni bar search karte hai? Lekin kya apko pata hai, aap hi ki tarah is duniya ke log har second 40,000 se bhi jyada bar Google par search karte hai. Also Read Google Search result me dikhane ke liye kya karta hai Google ke itne success ke reason me ek reason yah bhi hai ki Google ne kai company ko kharida hai. Fact yah hai ki 2010 ke bad se Google ne min average per week 1 company ko kharida hai. Rajen Sheth jab Google me interview dene ke liye gaye the tab inhone Google ko Gmail ka idea diay tha. Aur jab Gmail launch karna tha tab ise 2 years tak check karne ke liye internally use kiya gaya tha, taki koi error kami lack remove kiya ja sakte. Gmail ke 1 April 2004 me launch hone ke bad iski mailing speed se log attract ho gaye the, aur bahut jaldi user badhne lag gaye the. Also Read Gmail ki security badane ke tarike 2005 me Google ne android karida, jiska use aaj bahut jyada hota hai. Market me android ki itni demand hai ki 80 log smartphone me android hi use karte hai. Yaani har 10 me se 8 smartphone user, android hi choose karte hai. Amazing fact to yah hai ki har din 15 lac se bhi jyada log new android device purchase kar rhe hai. Also Read 5 Minute me Android App kaise banaye Jab aap Google par koi bhi search karte hai to kitne time me result show hota hai? yah result 1 sec. ke bhi kam hisse me show hota hai. Lekin fact to yah hai ki Google yah result show karne ke liye pahle 200 se bhi jyada baato ka dhyan rakhta hai yah set karne me ki konsa result pahle dikhae aur konsa badme. Kya aap ek blogger aur developer hai? to apka jaurr yah aim hota hai ki apki site par user jyada se jyada wakt tak rahe. Lekin Google ka aim iska ulta hai, Google yah chahta hai ki Google par aane wale user ko kam se kam time me achha result mile. Google se aap Digital Marketing bhi sikh sakte hai with certificate Google company har second 50,000 Indian rupees kamati hai, yaani ki har din 5 billion Indian rupees se bhi jyada. Aur in me se 90 income advertisement se hoti hai. Apni Website par Google adsense laga kar ham bhi paise kama sakte hai Google ne baki product ki tarah YouTube ko bhi 2006 me kharida. Google ke kharida hua YouTube par aaj har minute me 60 hours ki video upload hoti hai jo bahut hi bada target hai. Jab yah calculate kiya gaya ki video ko kitna dekha jata hai to pata laga ki per month 60 billions se bhi jyada hours ki video dekhi jati hai. Jisse yah pata lagta hai ki Google YouTube ka hosting server bahut hi jyada bada hoga, jaha YouTube ka program aur itni videos rakhi gai hai. Youtube ki or jankari hi aapko HMM.pe mil jayegi Dosto jab main ye facts padhe to mujhe bhi bahut heraani hui thi, aur chaha ki ise apke sath me share karu, ab aap bhi apne dosto ke sath me Facebook, twitter, Google etc. social profile par share kare. Ye Bhi Pade

Youtube par video upload kaise karte hai computer se or ham kaise youtube se paise kaise kamaye ye hamne hamari pichli kuch post me jana or aaj ham janege ki ham kaise apne android mobile se youtube par apna video upload kar sakte hai. Youtube Google se 2006 se sath me hai or youtube me bhi aaye din kuch na kuch naya aata rhata hai. Google ne hi Youtube ke liye ek Android App banaya hai jiski madad se ham youtube ko badi aasani se istmaal kar sakte hai. Ham iski madad se video bhut aasani se upload kar sakte hai. Youtube ka Android App Download karne ke liye PlayStore me ja kar Youtube search kare fir youtube ke aap ko install karle. Jada tar mobile me phele se hi youtube ka App install aata hai. Download Youtube App Ab Youtube ke app ko install karne ke baad kya karna hai video upload karne ke liye aap step by step aap dekh sakte ho Agar aap youtube par video upload karna chate ho to aapko phele sign in karna padega. Sign in karne ke liye aapko uper sidhe haath side 3 dots hai un par click karna hai fir aapko sign in par click karna hai. Ab aapko apna account select karna hai jispar aap video ko upload karna chate ho. Aap jis account ko is mobile me use karte ho bo ya fir aapka youtube par koi dusre account hai to aap usme bhi sign in kar sakte ho. Ab Sign in karne ke baad uper ulte haath side jo 3 line ki button hai us par click karna hai. ab jo uploads ka icon hai uspar click karo Ab aapko video upload karne ke liye jo upload ka icon hai us par click karna hai. Pheli baar jab aap video ko upload karege to aapke saamne ek setting aayegi. usme aap select kar sakte ho ki aapko video kis network me upload karna hai. agar aapke mobile me data kam rhata hai to aap wifi select kar sakte ho. jisse aapka mobile data bachega or jab aap wifi se connect karoge to video apne aap upload hona start ho jayega. Video ko mobile me se select kare fir aapka video aa jayega. agar aap apne select kiye video ko chota karna chate ho to aap kar sakte ho Ab aapko apne video ki jaankari bharni hai Ab aapka video upload hona suru ho jayega bo aap dekhsakte ho. To ab aapne sikh liya hai ki Apna Android Mobile se kaise Youtube par video upload karte hai. Agar aap youtube se paise kamana chate hai isliye agar aap video upload kar rahe hai to is post ko jarur pade Youtube par video upload karne ke baad paise kaise kamaye uski jankari yaha hai. Youtube ki or adhik jankari aapko yaha milegi. Aap ka agar koi bhi sabaal ho youtube se sambandit to aap comment karke puch sakte ho. muje aapke bichaar jaankar bhut khusi hogi.

Viral ka means hota hai felna, aur content apka blog ka post hi hota hai. Viral content se aap apne blog par kafi traffic laa sakte hai, viral content ko bhi likhne ke kuch techniques hoti hai jiski wajah se wo viral hota hai ya jiski wajah se wo aage felta hai. Ab sawal yah hai ki felta kaise hai? Obviously hai social media me hi viral hoga, lekin uske ke liye apka content bhi esa hona chahiye ki jyada se jyada user apke content ko apne social network profile par share kare ya aur bhi dusre tarike se apne relative tak pahuchaye. To yah SEO ke liye kaise profitable hai? Chalo viral content ke bare me discuss kare usse pahle me apko yah samjha deta hu ki yah SEO ke liye kaise achaa hai? Yah content apko 100 tabhi samjhna aa sakta hai jab apne mera previous content On-Page SEO optimization par padha hai. Nahi padha hai to yaha click karke padh le then again is post ko yaha se padhna shuru kare. Chalo On-page SEO optimization ko thik se samjhne ke bad ata hai ab content ko User ke liye kese banaye? Yani On-page SEO optimization wale post me hamne sikha ta ki Google me rank hone layak ya kah sakte hai search engine ke liye content kese likhe? Is post me janege ki user ke liye content kaise likhe taki wo viral ho? To isme SEO me kya profit hai? Wait, mujhe ek-ek step ko thik se samjhene do, pahle is chij ko dhyan se samjho maine On-page SEO optimization wale content me bataya tha ki Social Share Google ranking ke liye better, right? To isi tarah viral content likhne se apke content par high social share hoge. High social share High ranking on Google. To kya Viral content se kewal Social Share badhate hai? No.!! Kyonki social share se to apka content viral ho raha hai, wo ek rasta hai viral hone ka na ki End Jitna user friendly content hoga viral hone ki wajah se us par comment aayegi.

Hello dosto ummid hai aap ache hoge. Aaj me aapko bataoga ki Facebook par account kaise banaye. Aaj ki tarik me agar kisi ki facebook par account nahi to iska matlab bo abhi bhi purane jamaane me ji raha hai.

Hi Friends, is post me main aapke sath facebook ke founderOwnerCEO Mark Zuckerberg ki success story share kar rha hoon ki kaise unhone duniya ke sabse bade social network ki shuruaat ki. Mark Zuckerberg duniya ke sabse yuva billionaire hai. To fir aaiye jante hai Mark Zuckerberg ki success story ke baare me. Zuckerberg ka pura naam hai- Mark Elliot Zuckerberg. Mark ka janam 14 may 1984 ko New York me hua tha. Ve 4 bhai behan the aur mark inmen se akele ladke the. Inke pita ek denstist the aur inki maa ek manochikitsak. Mark ko programming ka shauk bachpan me hi ho gya tha. Unki programming me ruchi tab bani jab unhen 10 varsh ki umar me unka pehla computer liya. Unhen programming languages ki basic jankaari unke pita ne unhen di, isse unhone 12 varsh ki umar me ek messenger ka nirman kiya jiska naam tha- ZuckNet . Unke pita ne ye messenger apne dentist office ke computer me install kiya, jab bhi koi patient aata to receptionist unhen is messenger ke jariye inform kar deta tha. Mark ne aur bhi bahut saare games aur communication tools ka nirman kiya, ve yeh kaam kewal apne maje ke liye karte the. Unke pita ne unki programming languages me jyada ruchi ko dekhker unke liye ek computer tutor ko bhi hire kiya jo mark ko programming languages ke baare me lessons deta tha. Jab mark apne high school me the to unhone Media players ke liye ek aise software ka nirman kiya joki users ki ruchi ke hisaab se unke aage songs present karta tha. Microsoft jaise company is tool ko kharidna chahti thi, lekin Mark ne ise thukra diya aur usne un companies ke sath bhi kaam karne se mna kar diya jo ki mark ko apni company me kaam dene ke liye taiyaar thi. 2003 me ek din ki shaam ko Mark bimaar the us time unhen ek site bnane ka idea aaya. aur vo site thi Facemash. aur iske liye mark ne apne college Harvard ka database hack karne ki sochi jhan par students apni profile pictures upload karte the. Tab mark ne aisa program bnaya joki kinhi do vyaktiyon ki tasviren select karke unmen se kaun behter hai is par voting dene ka feature deta tha. Kuch hi dino me is site ko bahut se harvard s students use karne lage aur isse us site ka server crash ho gya. Harvard college ki jankaari hack karne ke jurm me Mark ko computer hacking ki community ke aage pesh kiya gya. Aur ye btaya gya ki is trh ki harkaton se society me burai failti hai. us time Mark ko chod diya gya. Mark ke dwara Facemash ka nirman karne se pehle hi Harvard ke ek student Divya Narendra ke dimaag me specially harvard ke students ke liye ek social networking site bnane ka idea aaya tha. Is site ke dwara Harvard ke students aaps me baatein kar sakte the. Narendra ke is kaam me do judvaa bhai- Tyler aur Cameron Winklevoss unke sath the. In judvaa bhaiyon ke pita Howard Winklevoss ek successfull financial salahkaar the. Is kaam me inhone apne beton ko pura shyog diya. Isse is social networking site ko banane me kafi madad mili. Narendra ne decide kiya ki is project ka naam hoga- Harvard Connection jise baad me badalkar ConnectU kar diya gya. Is site ke member aaps me apni personal information, photos aur important links asaani se share kar sakte the. Is site ki programming ka kaam Mark ko saunpa gya, Mark ne ise savikaar kar liya. Jab Mark Harvard Connection par kaam kar rahe the to unhen khud ka ek social network bnane ka behtrin idea aaya. facebook kab launch hua tha Mark ne 4 february 2004 ko TheFacebook.com domain register kar liya. Jise ki aaj Facebook ke naam se jana jata hai lekin tab tak yeh kewal Harvard ke students ke liye hi thi. jab unke social network par 4000 se jyada users registered ho gaye to Mark aur unke partner Eduardo Saverin ne ye mehsoos kiya ki ab unhen apne social network ke liye aur jyada Programmers ki aavshyakta hai. Isliye unhone aur programmers ko bhi apni team me select kiya. Inmen se ek tha Mark ka padosi Darren Moskowitz, jisne Facebook Service ko Columbia University ke students ke liye bhi uplabdh karaya. Ab ke smay me Facebook ke 60 shares Mark Zuckerberg ke naam, 35 Eduard Saverin ke naam aur 5 shares Darren Moskowitz ke naam hai. Mark ke ek friend Chris Hughes ko facebook ka press attache bnaya gya tha. Kuch hi smay baad Facebook ki service Harvard ke students ke liye open ho gayi, lekin is par register hone ke liye .edu zone ka ek email address jaruri tha joki ye darshata hai ki student Education field se hai. jab bhi koi nya user is par register hota tha to use apne baare me detailed jankaari, .edu zone ka ek email address aur apna ek real photo add karna padta tha. Agar koi user apna real photo add karne ke bjaye koi avtaar add karta to uski profile ko delete kar diya jata. Facebook jyada se jyada popular hota ja rha tha. Isliye Mark ne Facebook ke liye investors ko tlashna shuru kar diya. Mark ko Facebook ke liye sabse pehli investment mili Paypal ke co-Founder Peter Thiel se. Peter Thiel ne Facebook me $5 lakh ka nivesh kiya. Us time par ye Facebook ke liye kafi the. Facebook ki lokpriyta teji se badhne lagi. Facebook ki shuruaat ke 1 saal se bhi kam smay me Facebook par 1 million users join ho gye the. Facebook ki aur development ke liye unhen aur investment ki avshyakta thi. Aur fir Accel Partners ne Facebook me $12.7 million ki aur Greylock partners ne Facebook me $27.5 million ka nivesh kiya. 2005 tak Facebook USA ki lagbhag sabhi universities ke students ke liye available ho chuka tha. Tab tak Mark bhi ise students ke liye hi social network mante the. Lekin Facebook ki lokpriyta ko dekhte hue Mark ne is social network ko sabhi logon ke liye open karne ke baare me socha aur yahin se iska naam TheFacebook ki jgah par Facebook pad gya. Facebook ki lokpriyta bahut teji se badhti ja rahi thi, lekin abhi tak ye tay nahi ho paya tha ki Facebook ko monetize kaise kiya jayen. Pehle vichaar tha ki Context Advertisement Facebook ki monetization ke liye behter rahegi kyonki Users Facebook par apni detailed profile daalte the jisse unhen unke interests ke hisaab se advertisements dikhai jaa sakti thi. Lekin Facebook apne users me ijafa karne par focus karti rahi. Jab Facebook ke users ki sankhya 50 million se jyada par pahunch gayi to badi badi companiyan Mark ko apna project bechne ke liye offer karne lage. Yhan tak ki Yahoo! ne bhi Facebook ke liye $900 million dollar dene ka offer kiya, joki ek bahut hi badi rakam thi. Lekin Mark ne iske liye mna kar diya. ghotalo ke aarop lagne lage. Dono judva bhai Cameron aur Tyler Winklevoss aur Divya Narendra ne Mark par unke project HarvardConnection.com ka idea churane ka aarop lgaya. Unhone dava kiya ki Mark ne HarvardConnection ke Source Code ko Facebook ke liye istemaal kiya hai. Usi Varsh dono judva bhaiyon aur Divya Narendra ne apna ek network launch kiya jiska naam rkha gya- ConnectU. Mark ne btaya ki HarvardConnection ka Facebook ki development se koi lena dena nahi hai. Dono bhaiyon aur Divya Narendra ne Mark par unka idea churane ko lekar mukadama dayar kiya lekin unke claim ko court dwara reject kar diya gya. Fir unhone ek aur mukadma dayar kiya- unke Source Code ko churane ka. Is baar Court ne Source Codes ko acche se check kiya ki kya ye vakai me churaye gye hai. Lekin iske Results ko ghosit nahi kiya gya. 2009 me Mark 45$ million dollar unhen dene ke liye raji ho gye. Mark ne unhen $20 million cash ke rup me diye aur baki ke Facebook ke shares ke rup me. Case tab band ho gya. Us time par ConnectU ke users 100.000 ke se bhi kam the jabki Facebook ke users ki sankhya 150 million se bhi jyada ho chuki thi. April 2012 me Mark ne Instagram ko $1 billion me kharid liya joki ek Photo Sharing App tha. Yeh app pehle kewal Ios ke liye uplabdh tha lekin ab yeh Android users ke liye bhi uplabdh hai. Iske Founder hai- Kevin Systrom aur Mike Krieger. March 2014 me Mark ne Oculus Rift ka $2 billion me adhigrahn kiya joki ek Virtuality Reality Hardware hai. Ise Oculus VR Company dwara bnaya gya tha jiske founder the Palmer Freeman Luckey. October 2014 me Mark ne $22 billion me Whatsapp ko kharid liya. Yeh ek instant messaging app hai jiske founder hai- Jan Koum aur Brian Acton. Whatsapp ko 2009 me shuru kiya gya tha. Aap Whatsapp ki Success Story Yaha Read kar sakte hai. January 2010 me Mark ko Time Magazine dwara Person of the Year khitaab se nwaja gya. 2010 me Forbes dwara Mark ko World s youngest billionare ka khitaab diya gya. 19 May 2012 ko Mark ne apni girlfriend Priscilla Chan se Palo Alto me shaddi ki. Priscilla Chan China se hai. 1 December 2015 ko Mark ek bacchi ke pita ban gaye. Is khushi me Mark ne Facebook ke apne 99 shares duniya ki bhalayi ke liye daan karne ka faishla kiya hai. In shares ki keemat karib $45 billion hai. Mark filhaal apni family ke sath Palo Alto me reh rahe hai.

Kya aap new business setup karna chahte hai ? ya apne old business ko growth ki speed dena chahte hai? Kya aap higher education ya high skilled course karna chahte hai ? 10 50-60 , But aapke paas enough money nahi hai right? Dont worry aaj ke time me bahut se banks aur financial institutions easily loan provide karti hai. Jaise Dhani App , LIC Loan , SBI Loan, inhi sabme Bangalore Based startup Money View bhi popular hai, jo apna pura business Money View app se karti hai. Dhani App Kya hai Kaise 3 Minute Me Loan Le Sakte Hai ? Yah app na keval aapke liye Loan Assistant prove ho sakti hai, balki ye aapka money manager bhi ban sakti hai. Chaliye aage jante hai, Money View App Se Kaise Loan Ke Liye Apply Kare Money View app ko WhizDM Innovations Pvt Limited ne January 2015 ko launch kiya tha. Jiske founder Sanjay Aggarwal aur Puneet Agarwal hai. Pahle is company ne financial adviser aur money manager ke taur par app launch kiya tha, jisse mili success se loan provider ke rup me is app ko launch kiya. Jiske bad achchi service ke karana India ki top loan provider private institution ban chuki hai. Isse aap Rs25,000 se lekar 3 lac tak loan le sakte hai. aise hi important baton ko is FAQ se jante hai- LIC Se Online Loan Kaise Le Payment Kare? 1.Kuan Loan Le Sakta Hai? -Aise People jo employed Self employed hai. Employed person ki minimum monthly salary Rs 15000 ho aur self employed ki minimum Rs 25000 per month ho. But currently Money View self employed loan provide nahi kar rahi hai -Jinka CIBIL Credit Information Bureau India Limited score 650 se jyada ho. -Salary aur income ko bank account me receive karte ho 2.Kitana Loan Amount Mil Sakta Hai? -Ye Rs 25000 se 3,00,000 tak loan provide karti hai. lekin currently maximum Rs 50,000 hi provide kar rahi hai. 3.Loan Interest Kitna Hai? 16 SBI Saral Kya Hai Apply Kaise Kare 4.Loan Lene Ke liye Fees Chukana Hoga? Ha, ye dynamic charges honge, jo loan amount par depend karta hai. Jaise 50000 ke loan par Rs1000 charge lagta hai. 5.Loan Kaise Received Hoga? Loan aapke bank account me transfer kiya jayega. 6.Loan Ka Payment Kaise Hoga? Loan ka payment aapke bank account se hoga, jo EMI ke rup me every month kuch amount deduct ho jayega. 7.Loan Payment Period Kya Hoga? 3, 6, 9, 12 months. 8.Loan Apply Karne Ke Liye Kin Documents Ki Jarurat Padegi? -Pan Card -Bank Account Statement PDF -Aadhar Card -Your Selfie Photo Video -Your Signature Ab jante hai- Marksheet Loan Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare Money View Par Loan Apply Ke Liye Kya Process Hai Money view app par loan apply karne ka process long hai, jise fast karane ke liye aap required document pahle hi ready rakhe. 1. Money View App install kare. 2. Get Started par click kare. 3.Permission continue kare. 4. Email id aur contact number enter kare aur register kare. 5.Ab Salaried ya self employed select kare. currently self employed person ko loan nahi deti hai. 6.Salaried select kare, yadi aap kisi company me work karte ho to. 7. Company Name, work email id, salary amount, salary bank account choose kare. 8. Purpose of the loan, education level, number of active loans select kare. 9. Gender, PAN, date of birth enter kare aur Get Offer par click kare. 10.Ab aapko loan amount ke liye eligibility offer show hoga. 11.Enter Aadhaar card number. 12.Ab A adhaar card, signature ki copy, apna photo video upload kare aur bank details bhi submit kare. 13.Ab aap Money view team aapke application ki review karenge. 14. Loan ka automatic payment NACH ke liye aapke bank se request karenge. 15.Sabkuch sahi hone par loan amount ko bank account me transfer kar diya jayega. PM Mudra Scheme Ke Tahat Loan Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare In Last Word Yadi me vakai me kuch karna chahte hai to aapko loan lena chahiye, Money View instantly loan provide karta hai, jisse app jaldi se apna business, education etc start kar sakte hai. Disclaimer Is post ko educational purpose ke liye write kiya hai, naa hi financial advising ke liye. Isliye aap Money View se loan lene ke liye apne sense ka use kare aur aapke kisi bhi loss ke liye Bloggingfirst.com responsible nahi hoga.

Agar aapka Blog hai or aapne Blogging Sabd to jarur suna hoga. Or aap ye bhi jarur chate hoge ki aap bhi ek Successful Blogger bane or aapke blog par bhut acha Traffic bhi aaye. Aaj Ham is Post de janege ki ek Successful Blogger banne ke liye hame kya kya chaiye or hame kya kya aana chaiye or hamari kya Adate honi chaiye jo ki ek Successful Blogger ki phechan hoti hai. Blogging ek aesi field hai, agar isme interest aa jaye to isse achi field nahi hai mere hisab se to q ki isme paise ke sath sath Naam bhi hai or Time bhi. or jada jaanne ke liye pade Blogging ke 7 Faide. Blogging me bhut si chije hai jo ek blogger ko pata hona chaiye jo mene phele share ki bhi hai, jo agar ek blogger me dimag me clear hai to wo Jarur success hoga. Wese Pata hai mujse bhut log puchte hai ki ek blog banane or usko chalane ke liye kya kya aana chaiye to mera jabab hota hai kuch bhi nahi chaiye. Par agar koi mujse puche ki ek successful blogger banne ke liye kya kya chaiye to kuch chije hai jo hamare andar honi chaiye jiske bare me ham abhi baat karne wale hai. Blogging me jo sabse Jaruri hai wo hai Writing Skill likhne ka tarika. Agar aapke pass acha likhne ka talent hai to ye aapke liye bhut hji achi baat hai par agar aapko acha likhna nahi haata to aapko apni likhabat par kaam karne ki jarurat hai or usko sahi karne ki jarurat hai. Agar aap ache article likhege jo logo ko padne me ache lage jab hi aap apne blog me success ho sakte ho nahi to hoga ye ki aapke blog par koi double se aana nahi chahega jo ek blogger to kabhi nahi chahega. Jo writing skill hai wo meri bhi jada achi nahi ahi par me usko har par improve karne ki kosis karta hu or kosis karta hu ki phele se or acha kar saku. aesa hhi aapko karna hoga taki log aapke blog ko pasand kare or bar bar aapke blog par aaye. Agar aapko apna writing skill ko impoved karna hai tab aapko daily basic par book padhni hogi. Book padhne se aapko hmesa writing ke kuch na kuch style aur skill jaruar milege. daily kam se kam kisi bhi book ko 1-2houre jarur padhe. Jo Famous Writers or Books hai unko pade or unke likhne ka tarike ko samajne ki kosis kare. Aapko daily likhne ki practice karni cahiye isse aapke writing style badiya hoga. aapko daily ek notebook par kisi bhi chiz ke bare me apne hisab se likhna cahiye. likhe ki practice karne se aapko bahut hi fhyada hoga kyoki blogging me uniqe aur creative chize jyada pasnd kiya jata hai aur agar aap daily likhne ki pratice karege tab aap creative content ki likhne skill aur badiya hogi. wese bhi logo ko jo chaij achi or sanse hatkar hoti hai wo hi pasand aati hai. ye kuch post hai jo aapko padni chaiye Aapko yaha lag sakta hai ki yaar muje to koi technical jankari nahi hai to koi gabrane ki baat nahi hai, koi bhi siru baad me hi sab kuch nahi janta par jab aap usme work karege to aapko samajne ki chamta honi chaiye ki aap apne blog ko or aage bada soko. Jese Maan lijiye aapne koi Motivational BLog banaya jispar aap Motivational Story bagera dalte ho. par iske sath sath BLog ke kuch technical chije bhi hai jo aapko pata hona chaiye or aapko aana chaiye. jese mene kuch article dale hai jo aapko inme thodi help kar sakte hai ot aapke blog ko improve kar sakte hai- is type ki bhut si jankari hai jo me HMH par share karta hu or jo aapko pata honi chaiye bhale aapka blog kisi bhi category ka ho. Ye jo Point hai isme aap thoda confuse ho sakte ho ki ab ye kya hai. to me aapko Simple sabdo me batana chahu ki kuch na kuch naya karne ki aadat honi chaiye aapne. Q ki agar aap hamsa kuch na kuch naya nahji karege to log aapse kuch din me bor ho jayege. ab iska bhi aesa hai aap sirubad me to ho sakta ho aap jada naa soch pao ki kya kare or kaise kare par jab aap is fileld me aa jaoge to aapko har jagha se kuch na kuch sikh kar apne aapko improve karna hai or fir usko apne blog par implement karna hai. Hamesa kuch na kuch naya karne ki kosis kare jisse aapko bloging karne me maja bhi aayega or uska faida bhi aapko milega. Yaha par sabse Important Baat diyan dene wali hai wo ye ki kisi ko bhi copy naa kare or kuch se kuch naya kare. Mene dekha hai bhut log kya karte hai dusro ka copy kar lete hai or Article ka nahi kha raha hu. wo unke blog ka design or unka idea copy kar lete hai. par aesa karne me bhi koi faida nahi hai q ki aap usme jada din nahi tik payege agar aapme wo talent nahi hai. Agar aap acha article likhte hai, achi jankari share karte hai jo logo ko pasand bhi aaye. uske baad bhi agar aapke pass apne blog ko promote karne ki skill nahi hai to bhi aap ki jo success ki taraf ka rasta hai wo lambha ho sakta hai. Khane ka matlab hai Main focus to Ache article likh kar publish karne par hio hona chaiye par publish karne ke baad usko logo tak kaise phuchaya jaye wo bhi bhut jaruri point hai. Post ko Publish karne ke baad Facebook Page, Twitter Page, Google Page, Pinterest jesi or bhi jitni jagha aap usko share kar sake kare or jada se jada logo tak usko phuchane ki kosis kare. Fir agar aap acha likhte ai to dusri bar wo log khud aapke blog par aane lagege. Ye bhi Jarur pade pade ki ham kaise New Blog Post ko Promote kar sakte hai 15 Tarike Agar aapne Hindi Me Help ki Success Story nahi padi to aapko wo bhi jarur padni chaiye. usse aapko bhut kuch sikhne ko milega. Conclusion

Internet is word se sayad hi koi Anajaan hoga! Jab se intenet aya hai tab se puri dunia ka Najariya hi badal gya hai. Internet ke ane ke baad bahut se kaam Asan ho gye hai. Yadi aap bhi internet Use karte hai to Jara sochiye ki yadi Internet nahi hota tab aapka kya hota aap apne information kaha par jaa kar dudhte aur bahut se apne kaam internet ke bina kaise karte, Facebbok aur twitter jaise social media Website nahi hota tab aap apne dosto ke contact me kaise rahte. aaj ke time me internet ke bina rahana bahut hi muskil hai. Kull mila kar internet ke Ane se hamare Jiwan me bahut Changing ayi hai Jaise Internet ke hone Se hum apna jyada se jyada kaam ghar par bhaith kar hi kar lete hai. Fact 8 Youtube par sabse jyada baar dekha gya video hai Gangnam Style Jisko abhi tak 2,573,367,187 se bhi jyada baar dekha gya hai. Fact 9 Twitter ki Kuch bate Twitter par account kaise banaye uski jankari yaha hai Fact 10 India me 25 crore se bhi jayda log Internet ka prayog karte hai. Fact 11 Mark ZuckerbergFounder Of Facebook ke Original Facebook profile number id 4 hai. Fact 12 Internet par First Email 1971 ko Ray Tomlinson ke dawra send kiya gaya tha. Fact 13 Internet par pahla Registed Domain Name symbolics.com hai. Fact 14 Facebook par har 1 secound me 50000 se bhi jyada Like kiye jate hai. Fact 15 Internet par 37 se bhi jyada Porn Website hai.
