Google, jiska naam sunte hi, mind me Internet aa jata hai. or Internet ka sagar itda bada hai jo kabhi khatam nahi ho sakta. Mene apni ek post me bataya tha kaise Google ham par najar rakhta hai, jisme wo hamari online har ek choti se choti baat ko track karta hai jo aap soch bhi nahi sakte. Iss Post me ham Google ke aese hi kuch Top Secret URLs ke ware me janege jo hame pata hona chaiye. Jo URLs me batane wala hu, wo secret to nahi hai, par me dabe ke sath khe sakta hu, aapko unke ware me nahi pata hoga. Chaliye Jaan lete hai Google ke Important URLs ke ware me or uska kya use hai. Agar aap Google Chrome or Android Mobile me kisi account me login karte hai, to ek popup aata hai, jisme ham apne password ko save kar sakte hai, taki jab next time ham login karna chahe to automatic ID or Password dal jaye. Jo hamare Password save hote hai usko Google Smart Lock khete hai, jisme hamare password save ho jate hai. or ham uss ID se jaha bhi login karte hai unn password ko access kar sakte hai. passwords.google.com Agar aap Internet use karte hai to aapke samne ads to aate hi goge, ab chahe wo Google search Page ho ya koi Website. Ads aapke samne aate hai, jo bhut war aapki pasand ke hote hoge, par bhut war aese ads bhi aa jate hoge jo aapko pasand nahi aate hoge. or aese me aapko thodi problem bhi hoti hai. Agar aap chate hai ki aapke samne sirf aapki pasand ki category ke hi ads aaye to aap uski setting bhi kar sakte hai. Jisme aap Apne aap Google account se kya karte hai uske base par or aapki pasand ki jo category hai uske ads aayege. www.google.comsettingsads Ye jo Ads ki setting hai wo sirf Google Adsense ke ads par apply hogi, baki agar kisi site par koi dusri company ke ads hai to unpar iss setting kakoi aasar nahi padega. Agar aapka content kisi or website par koi aapki permision ke bina use kare to aap uski DMCA complaint google me submit kar sakte hai, jisse Google us content ko remove kar deta hai. or jis website par iss type sabhi content copy hote hai Google uss site ko bhi Search engine se remove kar sakta hai. Agar aapka Content koi copy kar raha hai to aapko uske liye kya karna hai or kaise report karni hai uski jankari yaha hai. support.google.comlegal

YouTube par videos dekhne ka silsila badhta hi jaa rha hai kisi movie ka trailer dekhna ho to turant YouTube par search karte hai, Padhai me kuch samjh nahi aye to Tutorial dekh liya aur ispe posted DIY ke to sabhi fan hai. YouTube ka har ek part bahut hi simplicity se develop kiya gaya hai par isme bhi kuch hidden features aur tricks hai jo har koi nahi janta, Un Tricks or future ki madad se ham Youtube ko or achhi trha use kar sakte hai. Also Read Youtube ke Basic Sabalo ke Jabab Youtube par Video dekh sakte hai ye to batane ki jarurat nahi, par kya aapko pata hai jo Youtube Video player hai usko bina Mouse ke bhi operatechalaya kiya ja sakta hai. Player ko control karne ke liye kuch keyword short hai M Video ko mute karne ke liye. K Spacebar Pauseplay karne ke liye. L 10 seconds video ko Fast forward karne ke liye J 10 second video ko rewind karne ke liye.

Image kya hai ye to aapko pata hi hoga or ye kitni powerful hoti hai ye bhi batane ki jarurat nahi hai, khane ka matlab hai Aap 1000 Sabd bolo ya lokho kuch samjane ke liye usse jada aasar karti hai ek Image. Agar aapki Koi site hai to aap usme image to jarur add karte hoge, kaise Image ka SEO kare uske bare me phele bhi bata chuka hu. Image agar kisi ko send karni hai ya fir apni site me use karni hai to uska jo size hota hai wo bhut maine rakhta hai, uski quality ke sath. Agar Image ka Size jada hai to site par load hone me bhi time lagta hai. jisse site ka loging time bad jata hai. Apni site ka loging time 2-3 second se jada nahi hona chaiye. Image ki size ko kam karne ki bhut si online site bhi hai or kuch software bhi hai, Jinki madad se ham Image Size kam kar sakte hai. Meri jo sabse madpasand site hai, jisko me har post ki image ko compress karne ke liye use karta hu wo hai kraken.io. 1 Simple Sabse phele kraken.io site ko Open kare 2 Ab Site Khulegi, Hame Free Interface par click karna hai. 3 Ab Alga Page khulega Option me 1st or 3rd ke liye hame paise dene hogi, uski jarurat nahi hai. 2nd me hai LossyLossless. Jo mene image me erow banaya hai. Uspar Click karke apne computer me Image ko select karke upload kare. ya fir aap Image ko Pakad kar bhi usme dal sakte hai. Jese hi aap Image ko upload karege Niche aapko Image Upload hoti Dikh jayegi. Bha aap dekh sakte hai Image ka Kya size tha, Kitna Kam huaa, Kitne size ki image ban gai, Kitne size kam huaa. or last me Download ki Button. Image ko Download karne ke liye, Download ki Button par Right Click kare fir Save link as par click kare. or computer me Save karle. Ek se jada Image ko ek sath compress karne ke liye aap ek sath jitni chahe image upload kare, or jab wo compress ho jaye to niche ek zip file ka option hai. uspar click karke sari image ek baar me download karle.

Off-Page SEO Optimization, SEO ka ek aesa tarika hai jisme ham apni site ko search me lane ke liye apni site ke aalawa dusri jagha kuch aesa karte hai jisse hamari site ki Search rank badti hai or hamari Post search me top par aati hai. Agar ham hamari post ko Search me upar lana chate hai to uske SEO ko hamne 2 main hisso me bata hai Kisi bhi Topic par jab Post likhte hai or usko search me lane ke liye jo sirubad hoti hai wo On-Page SEO se hoti hai. On-Page Optimize karke jab Publish kar dete hai to bari aati hai Off-Page SEO ki. Agar aapne On-Page SEO ki Post nahi padi hai to phele aapko wo bhi padni chaiye uske baad aap Off-Page SEO ke bare me padiye. aaj ke post me hum Off-Page Seo ke bare me puri details ke sath baat karege ki Off-Page Seo me aisi kon kon se techniqe hai jisko karne se aapke blog ko jyada benfit ho inhi sabhi baato par aaj hum Baat karege. bahut si aisi chiz hai jisko hum Off-Page Seo me karte hai jaise- Off-Page Seo me jo sabse jyada use kiya jata hai woh hai Social networking site. Social networking ka value Din wa din badhta hi jaa raha hai. Social networking hmesa se hi ek badiya method raha hai blog par traffic lane ka kyoki social networking se laakho log ek dusare se conect me hai. Isliye ye ek best tarika hai blog, busniness, advertisting, product ke promotion ka. agar aap apne blog ko aachi tarah se promote karna cahte hai to papular social networking site par apna acount banye. Agar aapke Account nahi hai to ye pade Social networking par acount banane ke baad daily waha active hokar apne blog ka promotion kare. Agar aap aisa karte hai to aap apne blog par bahut hi badiya traffic payege. Mai bus yahi kehan cahuga ki aap social networking site par apne blog ko promote karne ke liye ek plan banaye. Aisa Karne se aapko jyada benfit hoga. Ye bhi pade Facebook se apne Blog ki Traffic badaye search engine submission Off-page seo ka ek importent part hai. Aap apne blog ko papular search engine jaise- google, yahoo, bing, MSN etc me Submit kare. Site ko Popular Search engine me submit karne se hame ye faida milega ki hamari jitni bhi post hai wo unke data base me add ho jayegi or fir agar koi kuch search karega jo hamari site par hai to hamari site ko search me aane me faida milega. Sirf Submit karne se hi nahi aane lagte visitor, uske liye hame badiya Quality ki post bhi karna jaruri hai. Google Search Console me kaise account banaye or fir kaise unme SiteMap Submit kare uski jankari phele hi me site par share kar chuka hu. Bing Webmaster me site Submit karne ke liye yaha click kare. off-page seo me forum posting bhi ata hai. Internet par apne blog ke niche se related forum search kare aur uss par active hokar logo ke question ka answer achi tarike se de. forum ke dwara logo ki madad kare aur Iss prakar ke forum find kare jisme aapke blog ka link bhi add ho sake. aisa karne se aapke blog ko jyada se jyada se log janege aur aapke blog ka promotion ke sath sath ek strong network bhi banega. bahut se professional bloggers bolte hai ki Blog Directory Submission ab kaam nahi karta hai Magar mera mannan hai ki agar aap ek badiya tarike se Blog Directory Submission ko use karege to aaj bhi Uske acche result milege. Blog Directory Submission me aapko apne blog ko sabse badiya aur quality directory site jaise- DMOZ, Yahoo directory, zoominfo, one mission etc par submit kare. Bahut aise bhi Blog Directory Submission site hai jo aapke blog ko submit karne ke liye paise lete hai Aap aisa site se door rahe. Main Kuch top Blog Directory Submission sites ke bare me batata hu. Social Bookmarking Site ek bahut hi badiya madhyam hai apne blog ko internet par promote karne ke liye. Lekin bahut se new Indian bloggers isko use nahi karte hai kyoki woh iske bare me jante hi nahi hai. Search engine bookmarking site ko psand karta hai aur Uss par visit bhi karta hai. Kuch papular bookmarking site Digg, Stumbleupon, Delicious etc bahut hi carefull tarike se apna kaam kar rahe hai. Mai bhi bahut se social bookmarking site ko daily Use karta hu. Aur Ye mere liye aachi tarah se kaam kar raha hai. Mai aapko ye suggestion duga ki aap bhi papular social bookmarking site use kare. aap inke dwara apne network ko badh kar badiya traffic apne blog par laa sakte ho. IndiBlogger.in ek Indian BLogger ki Community hai jo aapko jarur join karni chaiye or aap muje Add bhi kar sakte hai indiblogger par. Meri indiBlogger Profile Off-page seo me ek bahut hi effective tarika hai Link Exchange Strategies ka. Isme karna ye hota hai ki aap apne blog nichetopic se related site se link exchange karte hai. Link Exchange karne se aapke blog ka badiya backlink banta hai aur google page rank bhi badiya hota hai. Link Exchange me simple karna ye hai ki aapko apne Blog se related Topic wale BLog hai unse contact kare or apna Link unke Blog me add karwaye or aap unke blog ka link add kare. Yaha ek baat ka jarur diyan rakhe ki ho blog hai uspar galat chije nahi hona chaiye nahi to uska asar aapke blog par bhi padega. High Quality Backlink kaise bana sakte hai uski information aapko yaha milegi. Photo Sharing Sites bhi ek aacha tarika hai off-page seo karne ka, maine dekha hai ki bahut se New aur Professional bloggers Photo Sharing tarike ko nahi Use karte hai. yadi aap ek bloggers hai to aap Photo Sharing sites se bahut hi smart tarike se traffic laa sakte hai. Yadi aap apne blog post me koi uniqe images use kar rahe hai to uss images ko top photo sharing site jaise- flicker, picase, photo bucket etc site par upload kar de. Jab aap apne photo ko top photo sharing site par upload karne jaye to uss photo me apne blog ka link bhi add kar de. Aisa karne par jab koi aapke photo ko dekhega to waha par aapke blog ka link bhi dikhai dega. Ye sab karne par aapke blog ka promotion bahut hi acchi tarah se hoga aur aapke blog par traffic bhi ayega. Free Photo Hosting Websites yaha aap apni images ko free me upload kar sakte hai. Video Promotion bhi ek bahut hi badiya off-page seo techniqe hai. Yadi aapke pass ek blog hai to aap video promotion ke dwara apne Blog ko badiya tarike se promotion karke traffic bhi laa sakte hai. Iske liye sabse pehle aapko apne blog ka ek badiya video banana hoga. Jo video aap bana Rahe hai uss video me aap apne blog ki quality ke bare me bhi share kare aur aapke blog se logo ko kya kya fhyada hoga ye bhi bataye. Jab video completely ban kar ready ho jaye to usko papular video site jaise- youtube, metacafe, daily motion etc par upload kar de. Aisa karne par aapke blog ka promotion bhi hoga aur aapke blog par traffic bhi ayega. Youtube se badiya paise bhi kamaye ja sakte hai, uski jankari mene di hui hai. jab aap apne blog par koi new post likhe to usko papular artical submission sites par publish karna naa bhule. kuch papular artical sites aapke post ka promotion free me karte hai yadi aap aisa karte hai to aapke blog post ka kuch deep link banega aur uss deep link ke dwara aapke blog ka promotion bhi hoga aur blog par traffic bhi ayega. Ye Jarur Pade Post Publish karne ke baad kaha-kaha Promote kare Classifieds Submission woh site hoti hai jaha aap apne blog ka advertise free me kar sakte hai. India me kuch mega classifieds site hai jaha se aap free me advertiser kar sakte hai jaise. Document sharing site bhi ek accha method hai blog par traffic pane ka. mai aapko kuch Document sharing sites ke bare me batata hu jaha par aap apne blog ka document PDF me convert karke Internet par share kar sakte hai. Aisa Karne par aapke blog par free me badiya traffic Ayega. Jo popular Sites or Blog hai, unka Review post kare apne blog me. Aap jis Fild me Blogging kar rahe hai usme jo success log hai unka interview share kare. Isse hoga ye ki jab aap Review ya interview post karege apne blog me to jo unke follower hai wo aapke blog par aayege. Iska ek faida or ye hai ki aap jiska interview karege wo bhi aapki post ko share karega. Ye jo tarika hai isme thoda paise lagte hai, Par agar aapka koi business Blog ya website hai to aap jitna invest karege apne blog ke advertise ke liye usse kai guna jada kama lege. Link baiting aesa tarika hai jisme website ke owner apni site ki link ek dusre ki site me add karte hai, jisse dono ko faida milta hai dono site ko Backlink mil jati hai. Isme diyan rakhne wali baat hai wo ye ki jis site se link exchange kare wo aapki site ki catogry ki hi ho or uspar koi galat chije share naa ho nahi to uska asar aapki site par bhi padega. Ye bhi ek badiya tarika hai apni site ko promote karne ka, Isse ham hamari site ka jo tipic hai usse sambandit sabal agar koi kisi forum me puchta hai to ham uske jabab ke sath apni post ki link bhi share kar sakte hai. Isse wo hamari site par bhi aayega or hame ek achi link bhi mil jati hai hamari site ke liye. Ye kuch Popular Guest Posting ke bare me to aap sayad jaante hoge, Kisi ke Blog ke liye Post likh kar uspar publish karna. Yaha par diyan rakhne wali baat ye hai ki jis site par guest post kare uski rank achi hona chaiye or uspar kuch bhi aesa nahi hona chaiye jo google ko pasand naa ho. Guest Posting ke Kitne Faide hai wo aap yaha read kar sakte hai. Sayad aapko pata hi hoga ki HMH par bhi Guest Post kar sakte hai, to agar aap chahe to yaha click karke Guest Post ki jankari le sakte hai. Muje Ummed hai ki ye post aapke liye usefull hoga! yadi iss post se related koi question hai to comment box me puch le. Ye bhi pade

Hello Friends Aaj ham is post me dekhege apne blog ki search ranking kaise badaye Google Search me. Ham badi mhanat karke apni Post ko likhte hai par wo Google ke search me nahi aati to hame bhut nirasa hoti hai q ki hame hamari mhanat ka koi inaam nahi milta visitor nahi aate. Jese ki aap jaante hi hoge Google duniya ka sanse bada search Engine hai or agar kisi ko koi jaankari search karna hota hai to wo Google me hi karte hai, To hamare liye ye bhut jaruri hai ki hamari Likhi hui Post bhi search me aaye. Uske liye hame Google Search Console me apna account banana padega or fir usme apne Blog or Website ko usme add karke verify karna padega. Google Search Console ko hi phele Google Webmaster Tool khate the abhi uska naam badla gaya hai. ye Google ki service hai webmasters ke liye jinki website hai. wo apni site ko isme add karke apni site ko google me submit kar sakte hai. or aapki site Google me kaise perform kar rahi hai wo aap detail me dekh sakte hai. agar aapki site me koi dikkat hai jisse wo search me nahi aa pa rahi hai ya aapki site hack hoti hai to uski jankari bhi aapko yaha mil jayegi. Yaha aapko apni site me agar koi error hai jo search engine ko aa rahi hai wo bhi dekh sakte hai. sitemap submit karke site ko jaldi index kara sakte hai, or kis country ko target kar rahe hai wo set kar sakte hai, iske sath sath ye bhi set kar sakte hai konse page ko search me dikhaya jaye or konse page ko nahi. Account banane me koi dikkat nahi hai Q ki ye bhi Google ki hi Service hai to jo hamari Gmail ki ID hai hame simple usse login karne hai. Agar aapka Email Account nahi hai to Gmail par account banaye phele Google Search Console me Account Banane ke liye sabse phele site par jaye www.google.comwebmasters Sign in to Search Console par click kare fir apne Gmail ID se login kare Ab aap Login to ho gaye hai. Blog ko Add karne ke liye apne Blog ya website jo bhi hai uska Address dale fir Add Property ki button par click kare Ab ek naya page khulega usme aapko apne blog ko verify karna hai. Aap koi bhi tarike se kar sakte ho. Apne Blogger me login karne ke baad Template ke section me jaa kar Template ko Edit kare. Ab Apne Template me head code ko search kare. Tip CtrlF daba kar kar sakte ho. head ke niche apne Google Search Console ke code ko dale fir Template ko save karde. uske baad Apne Code ko Verify kare Console me. Verify hone ke baad aesa message aayega Ab Search Console ke home page par jaye to aap dekhege ki aapka Blog add ho gaya hai. Agar aapke or bhi blog hai to aap unko bhi add kar sakte ho Add A Property ki button par click karke kar sakte hai. To ab aap ye jaan chuke ho kaise Google Search Console me apne Blog ko Add kiya jata hai. Inke aalawa bhi bhut faide hai, Simple saabdo me kahu to ye bhut jaruri hai hamare Blog SEO ke liye Google Search Console me Apne Blog ko Add karne ke baad apne Blog ka Site Map bhi jarur add kare. Sitemap kaise add kare Search console me uski jankari yaha di hui hai. Blogger ki or adhik jaankar ke liye yaha jaye. Hamesa ki trha agar aapko koi bhi dikkat aati hai ya fir koi sabaal hai to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. Agar aap Google use karte hai to aapko Google Useful URLs ke ware me bhi jarur pata hona chaiye.

YouTube kya hai or Youtube se paise kaise kamaye Video Upload karke, ya Youtube se online paise kamane ke liye kya karna padta hai, agar aese bhut se sabal aapke dimag me aa rahe hai to aap bilkul sahi jagha hai, me aapko bataoga kaise aap youtube se paise kama sakte hai. Online paisa kamana koi jada muskil kaam nahi hai or koi bhi online paise kama sakta hai chahe bo koi bacha ho, buda ho, collage student ho, house wife ho ya fir kahi par nokri karta ho. Aaj me aap ko batane ja raha hu ki aap sirf video banakar kaise paise kama sakte hai youtube se. Sirf aap ko karna ye hai ki video banaiye or youtube par upload kar dijiye. Youtube par aapko sabse phele to apne Google Account se login karna hai uske baad aap apne naam ki channel bana sakte hai ya fir dusre naam ki channel bhi bana sakte hai. Ek email se aap multipal channel bana sakte hai uski jankari mene di hui hai. Aapko Youtube pae sabse phele apni ek channel banana hai fir apne apne banaye hue video upload karna hai, yaha dhiyan rakhe aapko paise video upload karne par nahi milege. Aapko youtube se paise jab milege job log aapke video ko dekhege, jitni jada aapko video ko dekha jayega utni hi jada income hogi. Aap Video ko acha se acha banane ki kosis kare jisko log dekhna pasand kare. Youtube ek option deta hai apne video ko monetize karneka matlab video par ads dikhane ka jisse hamari income hoti hai. Monetize chalu kaise kare or kaise apne adsense account ko YouTube se jode uski puri jankari mene step by step di hai. Jab bhi koi viewers app ke video ko dekhega tab us par adsense ke ad show honge aur jab koi is ad ko open karega tab apki income hogi or is tarha app apne Video se paisa kama sakte ha. agar koi ads par click nahi karta hai tab bhi aap ki 1000 bar video dikne par kam se kam 1$ income hogi. Also Read 1000 Views par kitni Income hoti hai Youtube Video se Payment kab aur kaise mile ga ye question apke mind m foran hi a gaya hoga. Ap ko apke video ka paisa adsense ke account k through mile ga aur adsense k account m jab aap ki income 100$ Dollar tak ho jayegi tab adsense apko payment karega. Adsense payment ki process alag alag countries ke hisab se alag alag ha. India me EFT Electronic Fund Transfer k through payment karte hai. EFT se money direct ap k batye bank account me transfer ho jayegi. Link Building apne blog ko search engine me higher ranking par lane ke sabse prbhavi tarikon me se ek hai. Pehle jis site ke backlinks sankhya me jyada hote the veh site search results me top par hoti thi. lekin pichle kuch varshon me link building me bahut saare changes aaye hai aur link building ko sabse jyada effect kiya hai google ke algorithm Penguin ne, joki un sites ko target karta hai joki bad link building strategies ka pryog karti hai aur un sites ko penalize karke apne database se bahar kar deta hai. Jisse ye sites search results me nahi aati aur isse in sites ko bahut saare traffic ka loss hota hai. Google apne algorithms me lgaatar updates karta rehta hai, isliye hamen apni sites ko Google algorithms se penalize hone se bachane ke liye Bad link building strategies se dur rhana chaye. Aisi strategies Black Hat SEO ke antrgat aati hai joki aapke blog ke liye kaafi hanikark sabit hoti hai. Agar aapka blog ek baar google dwara penalize ho jata hai to use recover karna bahut mushkil hota hai. Isliye apni site ko penalty se bachane ke liye aapko nimnlikhit bad link building strategies ko Bilkul nahi apnana hai Aisi bahut saari sites internet par uplabdh hai jhaan par bahut kam daamon me aap apne blog ke liye hjaaron High Page Rank Backlinks kharid sakte hai, aur bahut saare Bloggers ye mankar inse backlinks kharid lete hai ki isse unka blog search engine me higher rank prapt karega aur iska kisi ko pta bhi nahi chalega ki unhone paid backlinks kharide hai, lekin Google bahut hi smart hai veh aisi sites ko turant identify kar leta hai aur unhen penalize kar deta hai. aap paid backlinks kharidne ki galti mat karna Agar aapko Blogging lambhe time tak karna hai to, nahi to aap blogging me issi ki baja se fail ho jayege. Link Spamming veh kehlati hai jab aap dusre blogs, forums aadi par jaakr kewal apne blog ke liye link prapt karne hetu koi content daalte hai. Google Web Spam ke head Matt Cutts btate hai ki agar aapke blog ke jyadatar backlinks comments se aate hai to google samajh jaata hai ki yeh aap link spamming kar rahe hai aur veh aapke blog ko penalize kar sakta hai. Isliye jab bhi kisi blog par commenting Karen to valuable comment add karne ki koshish Karen. Aur har ek blog par apne blog ka link add karne se bachen. Badiya Comment kaise karte hai, or comment karte time kya khayal rakhna chaiye uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. Internet par bahut badi sankhya me web directories uplabdh hai jhan par aap apna blog submit kar sakte hai. Lekin inmen se bahut jyada low quality directories hoti hai Jinmen agar blog ko submit karenge to aapke blog ko low quality backlinks prapt honge joki aapke blog ke liye nuksaandayak sabit hote hai. Isliye bahut soch samajhkar apne blog ke liye niche ke hisaab se high quality web directories me hi blog ko submit Karen. Bahut saare bloggers dusre bloggers ke sath apni site ke link exchange karte hai. Ye method kuch had tak to sahi hai lekin agar iska upyog jyada matra me kiya jaata hai to ye aapke blog ko nuksaan pahuncha sakta hai. Lekin agar aap apne niche ke quality blogs ke sath link exchanging karte hai isse aapko koi nuksaan nahi hoga. Jo Blog ache hai or jinki rank bhi achi hai un blog se to aapko faida hi hai par agar koi aesa blog hai jispar contant bhi acha nahi hai or rank bhi jada nahi hai. ya fir jis blog par hamare blog ki link hai uspar kuch gala chije hai to uska hamare blog par galat aasar pad sakta hai. Apne blog ki link ache blog par add karne ka sabse acha or secure tarika hai Guest Post karna. Agar aap HMH par Guest post karna chate hai to kar sakte hai. Ab aap ye soch rahe honge ki Do-follow backlinks to kisi bhi blog ke liye acche hote hai. Ha, main bhi manta hu ki do-follow backlinks kisi bhi blog ki search engine ranking improve karne me kaafi madad karte hai. Lekin agar aapke blog ke sabhi backlinks do-follow hai to phir thodi sambhalne ki jarurat hai kyonki agar aap apne blog ko search engine me safe rakhna chahte hai to aapke blog ke backlinks do follow ke sath no-follow bhi hone chahiye. High Quality do-follow backlink kaise banate hai uske kuch tips aapko yaha mil jayege. Agar aapne social sites par apne kaafi accounts bnaye hue hai aur ve sabhi accounts aapke ek hi blog par link kar rahe hai to ve links unnatural backlinks me aa jate hai. Google ne bhi declare kiya hai ki aise links kewal indexing ke liye use kiye jaate hai aur inka search engine ranking se jyada relation nahi hota hai. Social Sites jese Facebook, Twitter, Google, Pnterest jesi jitni bhi top sites hai unpar to apni site ki profile jarur banaye or link bhi kare. Youtube par apni channel bana kar usme apni link add kare. aesi jitni bhi site jinpar jo contant hai wo sahi nahi hai agar un sites par hamari site ki link add hai to un sites ka galat aasar hamari site par pad sakta hai or hamari site ki rank bhi kam ho sakti hai unki baja se. Wrong Sites se khane ka matlab hai aesi sites jinpar Hacking, Creaking ji jankari di jati ho ya fir Pron sites ho. istrha ki site hamare achi khasi sites ka acha khasa nuksan kar sakti hai. Ismen koi dorai nahi hai ki search engine me acchi rank prapt karne ke liye backlinks bhi kaafi jaruri hote hai, aur agar aap hamesha white hat seo ka use karke apne blog ke liye backlinks bnayenge to ye aapke blog ke liye kaafi beneficial rahega. Agar aap upar di gayi Bad link building strategies ko avoid karenge to aap Google penalty se hamesha safe rahenge. Jaise ki maine pehle bhi btaya ki google lgaatar apne algorithms me change karta rehta hai, isliye aapko ek successful bloggerinternet marketer banne ke liye in changes ke bare me jankaari rakhni chahiye. HindiMeHelp par hum SEO se related aisi mehtavpuran posts karte rahenge isliye hmari sabhi posts ki jaankari ke liye hmara email subscription jarur le. Is post ke bare me apni rai comments ke jariye jarur de.

Online paise kamane ke bhut tarike hai, or blogging unme se ek sabse popular tarika hai ye to aap jante hi hoge. Mene HMH par phele hi bataya hai ki kaise blog banaye or kaise ham blog par ads laga kar paise bhi kama sakte hai. Blog banao, uspar post karo or ads laga kar paise kamao ye jitna sunne me aasan lagta hai utna hai nahi. or bhut se blogger yahi galti kar bethte hai. wo blogging se paise kamana aasan samaj lete hai fir jab unki koi imcome nahi hoti to niras ho kar blogging choadd dete hai. bhut logo ka ye sabal hota hai or bhut logo ne mujse pucha tak hai ki me apne blog se paise q nahi kama pa raha hu ya me kya galti kar raha hu jo meri income nahi ho rahi ya bhut kam ho rahi hai. isse trha ke bhut se sabal New blogger ke dimag me aate hai, un sabhi sabalo ka jabab aapko is post me milega. Agar aap ek blogger hai to aapko ye pata hona cahiye ki aapke reader kon hai aur woh kaha se ate hai. Ye kyo important hai Iske Liye aap In Question Ka Answer khud se hi puche. Upar ke question se aapke pata chl gaya hoga ki in question ka answer aapke reader hi de sakte hai. Chuki Aapke blog ka income aapke blog traffic par depend karta hai. Yadi aapke blog ka traffic acha hoga to aap acha paisa kama sakege. Aap india ke top bloggers ko hi dekh le! woh successful isliye hai kyoki unko apne reader ke har ek task ke bare me pata hai. woh wese hi article likhte hai jaisa ki unke reader cahte hai. kyoki unko pata hota hai ki unke reader unse kya cahte hai. ek exp. ko hi hum le lete hai Yadi aap ek hindi jokes blog ke founder hai aur aap uss par daily new new jokes ko publish karte hai agar aap ek din apne uss hindi jokes wale blog par Seo se related article ko publish kar do to kya hoga Uss Seo wale article se aapko koi benfit nahi milega kyoki waha par aapke sare reader jokes se related hai. kehne ka mtlab ye hai ki yadi aap apne reader aur unke pasand ko nahi jaan payege to aap paise kamane me fail ho jayege. Jyadatar reader aapke article ko free time me padhna Psand Karte hai. Aapko uss free time ko pata karne ki kosish kare aur Ussi free time me hi apne article ko publish kare jisse aapko jyadad se jyada benfit milega. Aur aapke blog ka traffic bhi badiya hoga. Apne blog ke visitor ki puri detail ham google analytics me dekh sakte hai. Google analytics blog me kaise add kare uski jankari yaha hai. Agar aapko kisi bhi business me successful hona hai to aapko ek proper plan ki jarurat padhegi. Bahut se bloggers hai jo bina kisi plan ke blogging karna start kar dete hai aur kuch hin dino ke baad jab unko blogging se koi benfit nahi milta hai tab woh blogging ko Band kar dete hai. Mai un sabhi new bloggers se bass yahi kehna cahuga ki blogging Me bahut paisa hai buss aapko usko lena aana cahiye. Jab bhi aap blogging me ane ki kosish kare to aap ek badiya se paln le kar aye. Aur uss plan ko har ek angle se mentain rakhe. Agar aap ek plan bana kar blogging karege to aap bahut hi jaldi blogging se bahut hi badiya paise kamana suru kar denge. or jada jankari ke liye ye detail post jarur pade Perfect Planning Ke Sath Popular Blog Kaise Banaye uski Puri Jankari Aapko ye bhi pada hona chaiye Bahut se bloggers blogging se paisa kamane me fail isliye hote hai kyoki woh blogging Ko seriously nahi lete hai. Woh blogging ko ek fun ki tarah se sochte hai. Agar aap blogging ko ek fun ki tarah sochte hai to aap blogging se paisa kamane ke bare me bhul jaye. Pro bloggers blogging se jada paisa isliye Kamate hai kyoki woh apne blog ko ek busniess ki tarah dekhte hai. Aur woh apne blog me paisa aur time Dono invest karte hai. Yadi aap really apne blog se paisa kamana cahte hai to apne blog ko ek business ki tarah dekho. Aur apne blog ko seriously le. Apne blogging business ko top par lane ke liye Daily Hard work kare. Iske sath sath ye bhi kare jaise- Advertising, Promotion, Investment etc ye sab chize karne se aap apne blog se paisa kamane me Jaldi safal ho sakte hai. Woh ye sab isliye karte hai kyoki unko affiliate marketing ke bare me nahi pata hota hai. Yadi aap apne blog par kuch paise invest nahi karte hai to aapke fail hone ka Chance badh jata hai. 99 successful bloggers blogging me isliye successful hote hai kyoki woh apne blog ke bahut se jagah par paisa invest karte hai. Yadi aap apne blog ko business mante hai to mere ek simple se question ka answer de ki Aisa kon sa successful businessman hai jo apne business ko successful banane ke liye ek bhi paisa nahi invest kiya ho i think aisa koi nahi hoga. Isliye apne blog par kuch paisa invest kare. mai aapko batata hu jaha par aap apne blog par paisa invest kare- inke aalawa bhi aap jaha bhi lage inverst jarur kare apne blog me. jisse aapko kuch na kuch faida jarur miloega. Free word new bloggers ke liye bahut hi main word rahta hai. Yadi kisi new bloggers ko koi free tool offer kare to woh bina kuch soche usko turart collect kar lega. Bhut se aese tools hai jo free to nahi hai par jo hamare kaam ko bhut aasan kar dete hai free ke mukable. to agar aap unme bhi investment kar sakte hai to jarur kare. Jyada se jyada bloggers content marketing ke importent ko underestimates kar det hai Jo ki unke blogging me fail hona ka Main kaaran ban jata hai. Yadi aap kisi pro bloggers se content marketing ke bare me puchege to woh yahi bolega ki uska 75 time uske content ke marketing karne me lagata hai aur only 25 uska time content ko likhne me lagat hai. Yaha par mai aapko ek baat ko clear kar dena cahta hu ki content marketing ka mtlab article ko promotion karna hota hai. Yadi aap content marketing nahi karte hai to aap kabhi bhi blogging me success Nahi ho payege aur bina blogging me success hue aap paise bhi nahi kama payege. Isliye yadi aap apne blog se badiya paisa kamane cahte hai to aap content marketing apne har ek post ka jarur kare. Ye Jarur pade New Blog Post ko Promote karne ke 15 Tarike Maine un sabhi topic par cover karne ki kosish ki hai jinke wajah se new bloggers blogging me fail ho kar paisa Kamane me asafal hote hai. Yadi aapka koi old blog hai aur aap bhi abhi tak paisa kamane me fail hue hai to uper diye gaye kaaran aapke jarura kaam ayege. Un kaarano par work karke unko solved kare. Yadi aap in sabhi problem ko solved karne ke baad bhi paisa kamane me fail ho rare hai to humko bataye. Mai aapko uss kaarano ko batoga jiske karan aap paisa kamane me fail hue hai. Inke alwa yadi aapko koi suggestion ya sawal hai to hmse comment box me puche. Ye Bhi Pade Online Internet Par Aise Safe Reh Sakte hai Internet Safety

Online Shopping karna aaj ke Time me Aasan or phele ke mukable sasta hai, Par bhut war Online ham kuch kharidte hai to usme hamari Nasamji ya laparwahi ke karan jada paise lag jate hai. Agar aap Online Shopping karte hai, or aap chate hai ki aap kabhi bhi Online kuch kharide to sabse saste daam me or sabse achi chij kharide, to aap Iss post ko Pura Read kare. Me Iss Post me aapko ek Tool ke ware me batane wala hu, jiski madad se aap Online apne bhut se paise bacha sakte hai Shopping karte Time.

Hello friends,Mera name Shahid Afridee hai mai HelpGyan.com ka founder hu is website par mai computer, android or internet se related tips and tricks share karta hu. Ye meri pahli guest post hai HMH.pe, Aap muje ummid hai ki aapko meri ye post bahut pasand aayegi, jisme me ek computer se dusre computer ko remotly kaise operate kare wo batane wala hu. Ek Computer se Dusre Computer ko kaise connect karke chalate hai wo jaanne se phele ye jan lete hai ki ham iska kaha use kar sakte hai or kya fayda utha sdakte hai. Iske aalawa bhi aap inko apni jarurat ke hisab se use kar sakte hai. To chaliye dekh lete hai konsa software hai or usko kaise use karna hai. Aapko Remotely Dusre Conputer ko chalane ke liye Team Viewer Software ki jarurat padegi, jo aapke dono computer me install hona jaruri hai. Chaliye Step by step dekh lete hai kya karna hai or kaise iska use karna hai. Step 1 Sabse phele to aap Team Viewer ki site se isko software ko download kar lijiye. or download karne ke baad aapko dono computer me install karna hai. Team Viewer Aap site ko open karke apne windows ke liye software download kar lijiye. aap Mobile me bhi isko use kar sakte hai. Important Note 1 Team Viewer 2 Licence me aata hai. Commercial use or non-commercial use. aap jab usko install karke open kare to usme non-commercial hi select kare ye free hai. nahi to kuch time baad aapka trial khatam ho jayega fir aap use nahi kar payege. Note 2 Dono computer par same version team viewer download kare warna connecting me problem ho sakti hai aur dono computer me internet data or wifi on hona jaruri hai. Step 2 Team viewer ko install karne ke baad aap dono computer par is software ko open kare. Software open karne ke baad aapko isme 2 chije dikhegi. To ab maan lijiye aapko apne computer se samne wale ka computer chalana hai, To aap unse usme software me jo first section me ID or Password aa raha hai wo puch lijiye. Step 3 Ab aapko apne Team Viewer me apne partner ki ID dalna hai jo aapne abhi unse puchi hai. uske baad Connect to Partner ki button par click kare. Step 4 Ab ek popup open hoga, usme aapko partner ka Password bhi dalna hai. Yaha dhiyan rakhe, dono ke computer me internet on hona jaruri hai, Internet ke through hi connect hota hai. nahi to error aayegi or connect nahi hoga. Step 5 Connect hone ke baad aapke computer me aapke Partner ki screen aa jayegi, jisko aap apne Keyboard or Mouse ki madad se control kar payege. Connect karne ke baad aap samne wale computer ko pura control to kar hi sakte hai, sath sath jese agar kuch batana hai ya kuch baat karni hai to uska option bhi hame milta hai. Chat, Voice Call ya Video Call bhi kar sakte hai. Iss Software ka sabse acha use yahi hai, ki agar hame kisi dusre ke computer me kuch karna hai, kuch unko samaj nahi aa raha ya kuch karne me dikkat aa rahi, to ham iski madad se connect karke puri duniya me kahi se bhi kar sakte hai. Agar aapko Control nahi karna par koi Dile transfer karni hai to aap wo bhi kar sakte hai. connect karte time uska option bhi aata hai. yaha ek baat ka dhiyan rakhe iske jitni badi file hogi utna data dono ka lagega. Agar acha connection chaiye to dono computer me internet ki speed achi hona jaruri hai. To Dosto ummid hai aapko meri ye jankari pasand aai hogi, Thanks. Ye ek Guest Post hai, HMH.pe Guest Post karne ke liye yaha click kare Dusri Guest Post Read karne ke liye yaha jaye.

Agar aapke Mobile me koi Important Image thi jo aapne delete kardi or ab aap chate hai ki wo aapke mobile me wapas aa jaye, to wo aap aasani se recover kar sakte hai. Ye jo tarika me batane wala hu wo Android Phones ke liye hai or ye ek App hai jiski madad se aap Delete kiye hue Photo or Video ko recover kar sakte hai. Iss App ki sabse khas baat ye hai ki agar 1 saal phele delete kiya huaa photo bhi agar aapko recover karna hai to aap iski madad se kar sahte hai. Ye jo App hai Photo recover karne ka wo bina root ke bhi kaam karta hai, par isme wo puri files ko scan nahi par pata. fir bhi bhut si files aa jati hai. Par agar aapka Mobile rooted bhi hai to aap Image ke sath sath Video bhi recover kar sakte hai. Mobile Root kaise kare uski jankari ke liye yaha jaye Chaliye dekh lete hai aapko Kya karna hai or kaise deleted photo ko recover karna hai. Step 1 Sabse phele aapko apne mobile me DiskDigger Photo Recovery App install karna hai. DiskDigger Photo Recovery Step 2 Ab Simple App ko Open karege to aapko ek button dikhega Start Basic Photo Scan uspar click kare. Step 3 Ab aapke phone ki scaning start ho jayegi. isme thoda time lagega. aap wait kare or agar aap bich me bhi cancel karna chahe to kar sakte hai. Mene apne Mobile me scan kiya to usme 20 minutes lage, jisme mere mobile ki 43728 Images ko scan kiya, dekha jaye to ye bhut hi jada hai. Step 4 Ab aapke samne puri image aa chuki hai. Aap jinko bhi recover karna chate hai select karke recover ki button par click kare. Step 5 Ab Image ko save karne ke liye pucha jayega. Device ko select kare save karne ke liye. aap chahe to online bhi save kar sakte hai. Is trha aap apni delete ki hui image ko wapas la sakte hai. Agar aap Image or Video ke aalawa koi bhi dusri file ko recover karna chate hai jese Songs, documents to uske liye aap is App ka Pro version tri kar sakte hai. wese to ye app bhut badiya hai or aapke mobile me bhi jarur work karega par agar nahi karta hai to aap Dumpster Photo Video Restore ko tri kar sakte hai, ye bhi acha app hai Image or Video ko recover karne ke liye. Dumpster Photo Video Restore Ummid hai aapko ye App helpful rahega, agar aapka koi sabal hai isse related to aap comment karke jarur puche.

Internet Aaj hamari jisndi ka kitna aham hissa ban gaya hai, ye to sabko lagta hi hoga. Mere Mobile me ya Computer me to agar 10 Minute bhi Internet naa ho to aesa lagta hai, Pata nahi kis duniya me aa gaya hu. Matlab Puri Duniya se hi disconnect ho jata hu. Bhut Bar hota hai Hamare Mobile me ya fir kisi Friends ke Mobile me Net Chalana hai par ham Ya Fir Dosto ke Sath Lan Game Khalna ho to ham WiFi ki madad connect kar sakte hai. Uske liye bas hame apni Computer ko WiFi Hotspot me badalna hoga, jo bhut hi aasan hai. Also Read Connected WiFi ka Password kaise Dekhte hai Jo Trick hai Laptop me WiFi Hotspot banane ki usme kisi software ki jarurat nahi hai, Simple Notepad ki madad se 2 .bat file banani hai. Chaliye Dekhte hai kese kya karna hai. Step 1 Pehle step me apne laptop pe Notepad khole Press Win key R, aapke samne ek run dialog box khul jaega usmein Notepad type karein aur enter key press karein Step 2 Ab niche ke code ko copy karke notepad me paste kar dein yahan SSID wifi hotspot ka naam hai jise aap apne hisab se edit bhi kar sakte hain and key Wifi hotspot ka password hai, isse bhi aap apne hisab se edit kar sakte hain. Step 3 Is step me, apni is file ko startwifi.bat name se save kar dein.bat extension ka dhyan rakhein Step 4 Ab is step me ek new notepad file open karein aur niche ke code ko copy karke paste kar dein Step 5 Is file ko stopwifi.bat name se save kar dein. Aapne jo File Banai hai uske aesi jagha save kare jaha jaldi se phucha ja sake. Desktop par bhi save kar sakte hai. Ab WiFi Hotspot Chalu karne ke liye Startwifi file par double click kare to Wifi Hotspot shart ho jayega. Or fir kisi bhi Device me Wifi Connect kar sakege. WiFi Hopspot ko band karne ke liye Stopwifi ki file par double click kare. WiFi Hotspot Band ho jayega.

Friends Blog kaise banate hai hamne jana or ham kaise blog se paise kama sakte hai ye bhi hamne jana. Blog se agar ache paise kamana ho to, jis topic par aapne blog banaya hai usme aapka interest hona bhut jaruri hai, Agar aapka interest nahi hai to thode din baad Aap blogging karna band kar dege. Aesa aapke sath hi nahi hoga lagbhag 1000 logo me se koi 1 hi nikalta hai jo apni bloging lambe time jari rakhta hai. kuch main karan blogging ko lambe time tak na karne ke me aap se share karna chahuga. inke aalava bhi bhut karan ho sakte hai. Aapke blog ka Address Sahi hona bhi but jaruri hai. Blog Address aesa hona chaiye jo aapke blog ke topic se relate kare or yaad rakhne me bhi aassan ho. Me aapko bata du ki ham Blogger ke ek account me 100 blog hi bana sakte hai. To agar aapne faltu blog register kar rakhe hai to aap unko delete kar sakte ho. Aap chahe to jo blog aapne register kiya hai uski link badal kar dusri link bhi set kar sakte ho. Blog ka Address kaise change kare uski jankari yaha hai. Blogger ke Blog ko Delete karne keliye in Step ko follow karo. www.Blogger.com me Login karo Jo blog delete karna hai uski setting me jao Ab aapke saamne ek popup window khulegi Ab aapka Blog Delete ho chuka hai. Agar aap apne delete kiye huee blog ko wapas se restore karna chate ho to aapke pass 3 mahine tak ka time hai uske baad blog permanent delete ho jayega. Blog restore karne ke liye Blogger ke home page par jaye. baha aap dekhege ki ek Deleted Blogs ki link bhi aa rahi hai. Note Deleted Blogs me blog 3 mahine tak rhata hai uske baad permanent delete ho jata hai. Friends ab aap jaan chuke ho ki ham kaise blog ko delete or undelete kar sakte hai.

Internet Aaj ke Time me sabse jada jaruri hai, or agar aapka koi Business hai to usko badane ke liye Internet aapke liye bhut hi jada faydemand ho sakta hai. Agar aapko Sikhna hai Kaise Apne Business ko badaye Internet ki madad se to Aap Google Digital Marketing course ki madad se le sakte hai, jaha aapko iske ware me puri trha se sikhaya jayega, or jab aap ye sab sikh jayege to aapko Google ki taraf se ek Certificate bhi milega. Aapka koi Business hai, koi dukan hai jisko aap grow karna chate hai to uske liye aapko kya kya karna hai or kaise karna hai uski puri jankari aapko iss cource me milegi jisme SEO, Social Network, SEM ke aalawa or bhi bhut se topic ke ware me jankari di jayegi. Ye jo Google ka Course hai iska naam hai Digital Unlocked. Iss Course ko 23 topics me bata hai, or agar aap in topics ko learn kar lete hai to aapko Online apne business ko kaise badana hai uski puri jankari ho jayegi.

Aaj Kal Hackers Kafi Bad Gaye hai. Agar Aap Hackers se Bachna Chahte hai to aapko khas Bato ka Khayal Rakhna Hoga. Fake Website aur Smartphone Apps Aapko fasha Sakte hai. kai banko ki websites ki Hu-b-hu Nakal Tyaar kar Logo ko Bewkuf banaya Jata hai. Log isme Ulajh Jate hai aur Log in ID aur Password De baithte hai. Agar Aap Ye Jakari Waha De dete hai to Yah nakli Website banana wala Assani se Aapka Account Access kar leta hai. Aise Nakli Website ko Pahchane ka ka Sabse Assan trika hai hai Browser Address Bar Dekhne ka. Tay kare ki website ke Address se Pahle https laga ho. Apps ke Mamle me sabse Pahle Developer ka Name Check kare Aamtour per Apps Store me Yah App ke Niche likha Hota hai Aur Kisi bhi Banking Aap ki Install karne se Pahle Review Pade. Sirf official Aap Stores se hi Banking Apps Download karna Chahiye. Ye Bhi Pade Sabhi Internet user Email Istemal karte hai. Kisi se Sampark Sadhne aur Lubhane offer dene ke liye Yah Assan Trika hai. Sabse Jyada Froud Email Lottry Jitne ke Hote hai. Is Trah ke kisi email ko na khole. Email ke Attachment me Spyware ho Sakte hai. Agar Aap kisi Product ko Kam Kimmat me Bikte dekhe, to ho sakta hai ki yah Spam ho. Online Discount milte hai, per kisi chij ki kimmat retail price se 80 se 90 tak Kam Najar Aye to Sawdhan ho jaye. Keylonger Ek Computer Software hai jise Install karne se Aap Keyword per Dabaye Jane Wale Her Button ko record kar Sakte hai. Public Internet caf is Trah ke keylonger Install karne se liye Assan Target hai. Jaha Bhole-bhale User Fash Jate hai. Yah Janne ke Koi keylogger install to Nahi hai wo bada muskil padta hai or password se protected hota hai. to apni koi bhi jada personal information bha na dale. Banks Duwara Is Trah ki Dhokhadhadi se Bachne ke liye Kai Ads Nikale Jate hai. Aapke Bank se Kabhi bhi koi Aapko Phone kar Credit Card Details Nahi Puchega. Bank ke Name per Ane Wale Call jo Bank Details Mage. Khatre ki Ghanti Ho Sakti hai. Bank se ham jab bhi Transaction karte hai to hamare mobile par OTP aata hai jiske bare me bank kabhi nahi puchta. or wo hame batana bhi nahi chaiye kisi ko bhi. OTP kya hai or uska kya use hai achi se jaanne ke liye yaha click kare Digital World me Apni Niji Jaankariyo ko kisi ke sath Share nahi karna Chahiye. Niji Jaankariyo ki Madad se hackers Aapke Account tak Ja Sakte hai. Ye Guest Post Mukesh Yadav ne ki hai jo paisaclues.com ke Owner hai. Agar aapbhi HMH.pe par Guest Post karna chate hai to yaha click kare. HMH.pe par dusre Guest post padne ke liye yaha click kare.

Kuch dinon pahle maine ek client ke blog par work kiya tha. Jispar 150 se jyada post published he. Is hisab se us blog ki minimum traffic daily 4000-5000 page views honi chahiye. Lekin aap jankar surprised rah jayenge ki us blog ki traffic just 300-600 pvs daily hai. Jabki 90 posts me Yoast SEO Signal green tha. Fir Aisa Kyu Hua ? yani Post SEO Optimized Hone Ke Bad Bhi Traffic Kam Kyu Hoti Hai ? Iske piche kai reasons ho sakte hai, jise ham details me janege 1.No Keyword Research Jo keyword research nahi karte hai, vo blogging nahi, timpass karte hai. Bilkul sahi, bina keyword research kiye post likhana andhere me tir chalane jaisa hai. Because bina keyword research ke aap jane hi nahi payenge ki jis topic par post likh rahe hai, 1.Us topic par traffic hai ki nahi? 2.Us topic par traffic hai to competition kaisa hai? 3.Topic old hai ya popular ? Isliye keyword research karna chahiye. Isse traffic vale keyword ke bare me easily jana ja sakta hai. Traffic vale keyword ko banavat ke base par three type ke hote hai 1.Head Keyword Ise seed keyword bhi kaha hai. Jaise Blog Is keyword par traffic sabse jyada hote hai. Lekin competition high level hoti hai. jiske karan new blog is keyword par ranking easily nahi pa sakta. 2.Body Keyword Ye two phrase vale keyword hote hai. Jaise- Hindi Blog Inpar traffic aur competition seed keyword ke compare kam hoti hai. Jiske ke karan is tarah ke keyword par time ke sath ranking aur traffic payi ja sakti hai. 3.Tail Keyword Ye three-four phrases vale keywords hota hai matalab ye keyword ek line ke barabar hoti hai. Jaise Blog Kaise Banaye in Hindi Tail Keywords par traffic aur competition sabse kam hoti hai. Jisse is tarah ke keyword par ranking aur traffic sabse jaldi payi ja sakti hai. But jaruri nahi hai, sabhi head ya body keyword high competition vale ho, ye low competition vale bhi ho sakte hai. Jise aap Semrush se easily jan sakte hai. Isliye competition ke base par keyword ko tin parts me divide me kiya gaya hai 1.High competition Keyword In keyword par traffic sabse jyada hota hai, lekin competition utna hi jyada hota hai. Aise keyword seed aur body keyword ho sakte hai. 2.Midium Competition Keyword Ye keyword high competition keyword se kam competition vale hote hai aur inpar traffic bhi kam hoti hai. Isliye HCK ke compare ranking pana easy hota hai. Is tarah ke keyword seed aur body keyword ho sakte hai. 3.Low Competition Keyword Is tarah ke keyword par sabse kam traffic aur competition hoti hai. Isliye koi bhi new blogger is keyword ke use se ranking aur traffic easily pa sakta hai. Aapke liye khushi ki baat hai ki, ye low competition keyword me Seed Keyword, Body Keyword and Tail Keyword tino mil sakte hai. Jise aap Semrush se jan sakte hai. 2.No Promotion Post publish karane ke bad promotion na karana, fast traffic pane ki opportunity loose karane jaisa hai. Aap Facebook, Twitter jaise social sites par post ko share kar blog par good traffic driva kar sakte hai. Isse Google ko green signal milata hai. Jo Google ki important ranking factor hai. Behatar promotion ke liye 1. HD Image use kare. 2.Main word ke sath hash tag use kare. 3.Hot day and time me post publish kare 4.Jyada details ke liye ye post padhe- Effective Social Promotion Kaise Kare 3.Unnatural Backlink Kya aap teji se backlink bana rahe hai ? Kya aap daily 5-6 se jyada directories me blog submit kar rahe hai ? Kya aap daily 5-6 se jyada social bookmarks bana rahe hai ? Kya aap daily 5-6 se jyada commenting backlink bana rahe hai ? Kya aap different niche blog se backlink banate hai ? Stop these, ye sabhi un-natural act hai, jiske karan Google aapke new blog ko spam box me include kar sakta hai. Google every new blog ko first three month tak radar par rakhata hai aur is dauran un-natual backlink bananta hai to use spam box me include kar deta hai. Jise Googe Sandbox bhi kaha jata hai. Isliye natural ways se hi backlink banana chahiye 1.Old blog se backlink banaye. 2.edu or .gov se mila backlink gold hota hai. 3.High authority vale page se backlink banaye. 4.Competitors se backlink banaye. 5.Apne se kam DA vale blog se backlink na banaye. 6.Homepage se mila backlink bahut strong hota hai. 7.Sponsored Links ke liye nofollow tag use kare. 8.Post ke pahle paragraph me backlink banaye. 9.India based blog hai to .in TLD domain vale blog se backlink banaye. 10.Forum backlink na banaye. 11.Apne niche vale blog se backlink banaye. 4.Over Keyword Density Jarurat se jyada keyword post me include karana, keyword stuffing kahlata hai. Jise Google low quality content manta hai. 3 keywords per 500 words ko sabse ideal keyword density mana jata hai aur post ke beginning 100 words me 2 se jyada keywords include nahi karani chahiye. 5.Short Post Google achhi tarah se janata hai ki short post short information hi de sakta hai, full information nahi. Jo user experience ke liye bilkul bhi suitable nahi. Isliye Google is tarah ke post ko panelize karane ke liye June 2017 me fred update laya tha. Jisse kai blog posts ki ranking down ho gai thi. Isliye Long Post likhe 1.Long post se sabhi related sub topics ko clear kiya ja sakta hai. Jo trafficable ho sakta hai. 2.Reading time increase hogi aur automatically bounce decrease hogi. Jisse us post ki ranking increase hone ke great chances ban jayenge. 3.Short post ki tulana me long post ko natural backlink milane ke chances 200 jyada hoti hai, kyonki usmen har topic ki full details hoti hai. 4.Jab kisi topic ko details me likha jata hai to use kisi bhi readers dvara understand karana behad easy ho jata hai. Jiske karan readers long post ko love karte hai. 6.No Old Post Update Aap jante honge ki Google fresh content ko like karata hai aur ise old post ke ovar ranking deta hai. Jisse old post ki ranking time ke sath down ho jati hai. Isliye again ranking pane ke liye old post ko update karana jaruri hai. Ye tips follow kare 1.Post ke ek paragraph ko remove kare ya add kare. Jo sabse behatar hota hai. 2.Post ko new data par publish kare. 3.Image update kare. Jyada details ke liye ye padhe Old Post Se 200 Traffic Kaise Badhaye 7.No Outbound Link Much Outbound Links High authority website blog ke related post ko post se link karane se post natural aur genuine lagata hai. Jo Google ko green signal deta hai. But jyada outbound links create nahi karana chahiye, otherwise page value decrease ho jait hai . Jo SEO ke liye dangerous hai. 8.No Video Kya aapke blog ki bounce rate high hai ? To aapko post me video use karana chahiye. Isse aap apne blog ko jyada user friendly bana sakte hai. Jisse post ki engagement time increase hogi, bounce rate decrease hogi aur ranking me benefits milega. Example Post jisme koi video nahi hai. Uspar 10 visitors aate aur post ki reading time 2 minute hai. Total Engagement time 102 20 minute Kuch visitors ne full post read nahi kiya 20-2 Actual Engagement time 18 minute Ab us post me 2 minute video insert karte hai. Same visitors aate aur post ki length 2 minute hai. Total Engagement time for article 102 20-2 18 minute Total Engagement time for video 5mana 5 visitors ne hi video dekhax210 minute Total Engagement time 1810 28 minute. Yani video ko adhe visitors bhi dekhe to bhi post ki engagement time jabardast increase hoti hai. Jo aapko return ke rup me ranking aur traffic hi dega. Try karke dekhen. Tips Youtube Video embed karane ke liye Optimize Youtube Video Embed plugin use kare, jisse blog ki speed slow nahi hogi. 9.Slow Speed Blog jab new hoti hai, to speed fast hoti hai. Lekin jaise-jaise database ki size increase hoti hai aur ad units, facebook like box etc lagate hai yani blog me job hi kuch extra chije add karte hai, wo sidhe hi blog speed par bad impact dalata hai. Isliye blog ki speed ko proper optimize karte rahe, kyonki Google fast blog ko ranking deta hai. Best 16 Tariko Se Blog Ki Speed Badhaye 10.No Youtubue SEO Blog post ke liye Youtube video banana, ab Off page seo ka ek important part ban chukka hai. Jaise Google me tutorial ya trailer word search karke dekhe, SERP ke top place par Youtube Videos hi najar aate hai. Ye sab Google ke dvara 2015 me laye Youtube Update ke karana hua hai. Is update ke karan ab haal ye hai ki kai most important keyword search karane par SERP me Youtube video show ho hi jata hai. Matabal yadi aap bhi post ke liye Youtube video banaye to indirectly traffic blog par drive kar sakte hai. But better raking ke liye Youtube SEO karana jaruri hai, jo blogging SEO se easy hai.- 1.Video 5 minutes se jyada ke banaye 2.Video description 150-200 words ka write kare. 3.Traffic vale tag use kare, jise aap Tubebuddy Chrome Extension se dusre popular Youtbue video ke tags ko jan sakte hai. 4.Description me post link add kare. 11.Google Plus Followers Shayad aap Google Plus ka care nahi karte honge, But Google Google Plus ka care karta hai. Isliye Google vo sabkuch karta hai, jisse Google ka social site promote ho sake. Isliye Google SERP me Google Plus par shared post ko show karata hai. Aapne jis blog ko Google Plus par follow kiya hoga, usse related search karte hi Google plus par share us blog ka post bhi show hota hai. Google Plus Post Isi tarah aapke blog ke Google Plus followers ko SERP me aapka blog ka shared Google plus post show hoga. Jisse aapke regular visitor ki regularity bhi bani rahegi aur ranking ke liye Google par good impression bhi banegi. 12 Spam Comment Accepting No Comment Aksar beginner bloggers frustration me spam comment ko approve kar dete hai. Jo real human dvara nahi, bot se dvara kiye jate hai. Jo SEO ke liye bad hi hota hai. Vahi real comment post ki quality show karta hai, yadi post par comment na ho to post quality par suspense create karta hai. Isliye quality post create kare aur comment ke liye post ke ant me user se kuch question puche. Jisse aapko user comments mil sakte hai. 13.Simple Web Title SERP me show hone vale post title ko web title kaha jata hai. Yadi ye simple ho to kam hi visitor us par click karenge. Jisse achchi ranking ke bavjud good traffic nahi milega. Isliye aisa web title create kare, jo other blogs ke web title se different aur good ho. Behatar web title ke liye ye tips follow kar sakte hai 1.Web title me best, worst jaise powerful word add kare. 2.Number add kare. 3.Question word add kare. 4.Jyada details ke liye ye post padhe. Effective Web Title Kaise Likhe 14.Image SEO Yadi aap image ki proper SEO nahi karte hai to aap 2-3 lose kar rahe hai. Google post ke sath image ko bhi index karta hai. Jise vo Google image me show karta hai. Jahan se traffic milti hai. Isliye behatar image SEO kare aur apne image se traffic paye. Image seo ke liye ye post padhe Image Se Kaise Traffic Badhaye Best 11 Methods In Last Words Keval post likhane se hi blog per traffic nahi milati hai. Balki trafficable keywords search karne se lekar social promotion, web title creation, video inserting etc karane jaruri hai. Jisse Google par good impression banta hai aur ranking aur traffic milane ke chance create hote hai. Yadi aap is post ko like karte hai to jarur share and comment kare.

Facebook, jiske bare me mene phele bhut si jankari share kar chuka hu, Is Post me ham ek Facebook Trick ki baat karege jiski madad se ham Facebook Page ke likes or Facebook Group ke Member bada sakte hai. Ye jo Trick hai isse ham logo ko Impress karke Click karwa sakte hai or apne user bada sakte hai. Facebook ki is trick ko aapne Facebook ki kuch popular post ke comment me dekha hoga ya fir Post bhi dekhi hogi. Jo Post hoti hai usme ham koi badiya message type karte hai or usme continue reading or read more link add karke apne Page ko add kar dete hai. Jese aap ye Post dekhe Ek badiya Interesting message likha or usko adhura khatam karte huee continue reading ki link add kardi or usme apne Page ya Group ki ID add kardi. to jese hi uspar click karega koi pura padne ke liye wo hamare Group ya page par phuch jayega. isko or achi se samajne ke liye ye Post dekhe facebook par kaise link add ki hui hai Aslo Read Facebook ID Block hone se kaise Bachaye Is Simple par effective trick ko facebook par use karna bhut aasan hai, uske liye aapko kuch chijo ki jarurat padegi. Sabse Phele is Code ko kahi copy kare fir usko thoda edit karna hai PageGroup Id0 Message Yaha Type kare 0PageGroup Id1continue reading Jab aap pure code ko apne hisab se bana lete to wo kuch is prakar dikhega.
