Dosto aap log online earning ke bare me padhte honge or aap ek achi income online banana chahte honge. Ham sabhi ko pata hai ki online income kamane me sabse pehle blogging ata hai kyu ki blogging ek esa jariya hai jisse koi bhi badiya paise kama sakta hai. Lekin blogging se paise banane ke liye hame kuch achi- khasi mehnat karni padti hai apne blog ko badhiya banane ke liye taki use ham apne income ka source bana sake. Haam apne blog me nayi nayi or badiya artical or post uplode karte hai. Par ab apko har artical ke agar paise mile to kaisa hoga vo bhi dollors me. Ji haan ab aap online artical likh kar bejh sakte hai jiske liye apko paise milenge. Online vaise kai sites hai jo artical likhne ke liye paise deti hai par me apko do mashoor sites ke bare me batana chahunga Me apko iwriter recommend karunga or uske bare me apko kuch batana chahunga to chaliye artical se paise kamana sikhe. isse paise kaise kamaye usse phele jaan lete hai ye website hai kis kaam ki or ye work kese karti hai or kis trha ham isse paise kama sakte hai. ye ek website hai jinki madad se log apni jarurat ke hisab se article likha sakte hai or agar kisi ko paise kamana hai to wo jo article likhwana chata hai uske liye article likh kar paise kama sakte hai. khene ka matlab hai is site par ham article likh bhi sakte hai or agar hame kisi topic par article likhwana hai to ham paise de kar wo bhi karwa sakte hai. Iska Work karne ka bhut hi simple tarika hai. to is process me aapne dekha ki ek hai jisko article chaiye to wo paise de kar article likhwa raha hai or ek writer uska article likh raha hai. ye sara kaam iwriter ke jariye hota hai to hame direct contact karne ki koi jarurat nahi padti. To Aap jaan chuke hai ki iWriter par ham apna article likhwa sakte hai to chaliye ye bhi dekh lete hai ki paise kaise kama sakte hai. Step 1 Sabse phle apko www.iwriter.com par jaa kar register karna hoga. Register Here! Step 2 Register karne ke baad ab aap ek standard member ban jayenge. Me apko batana chahunga ki agar aap iwriter par badhiya badhiya artical likhte hai or clints ke ache response aten hai to aap dhere- dhere upgrade honge jaise- Standard member premium member lite member elite plus member. Upgrading ke sath sath aap ke har artical likne ki kimat bhi badhti jayegi jaise Standard member ko har artical ke 2.50$ milte hai or Lite memeber ko har artical ke 40-70$ milte hai. Step 3 ab register karne ke baad aap hire work option par jayen jahan apko kai artical milenge clints dwara jinko artical chahiye hota hai ve artical ka tital likh kar uska prise or kitne words me chachiye ye sab likh dete hai bas apko jo artical pasand aye use chunlen. Har artical ke side me ek sign bana hoga jispe click kar ke aap artical ko select kar sakte hai or google par jaa kar uske bare me kuch information ikhta kar le or us clint ko send kar de. Agar clint ko vo artical pasand agaya to vo apko artical ke paise de dega or jab apke iwriter account me 20$ ho gaye to aap paypal se nikal sakte hai. NOTE articals likne ke liye apko bas basic english ani chahiye. Agar apko artical ke bare me kuch samajh nahi araha hai to aap uski information google se nikal sakte hai. Pehli baar Artical likne se pehle apse asanse 15 english ke MCQ OPTION wale question puche jayenge ye question sirf ek baar hi puche jayenge phir aap aram se kai artical likh sakte hai. Artical likhne se pehle dekh le ki vo artical kon se member ke liye hai jaise standerd , premium ya lite. agar apko english nahi ati hai to aap hindi websites ke liye hindi guest posting kar sakten hai or paise kama sakte hai.

Internet kitni teji se bad raha hai ye to aap bhi maante hoge, Internet ki madad se hamare bhut se kaam bhut aasan or jaldi ho jate hai, Jese Ghar Bhate Shopping karna, Apne Mobile ko Internet se recharge karna. Internet ki dero subhida me se ek hai Internet ki madad se Taxi Book karna OLA Cabs se. OLA Cabs ek Taxi service hai India ki jo bhut teji se apna business bada rahi hai or ye India ki Top Taxi services me se ek hai. OlaCabs ko isrf OLA bhi kha te hai. OLA Cab 3 December 2010 ko siru ki gai thi or iske Founder ka naam Bhavish Aggarwal hai. Ola Cabs Mumbai me sabse phele siru ki gai or dhire dhire inka Business badi teji se badne laga, 2014 me Ola Cabs ne apne service ko 85 cities kar diya or unke pass ab 200,000 cars se bhi jada cars hai. Mera khud ka Experience hai, inki jo service hai wo bhut hi badiya hai, Me aapko Suggest karuga ki aap kam se kam ek baar jarur kahi jaye OLA Cabs se. Me aapko post ke akrhi me kuch offer bhi bataoga jisse aap pheli bar betne par 150 rupee ka free ghum sakte ho. OLA Cabs ko Book karne ke liye aapko Sabse Phele OLA ka App Download karna padega fir usme account bana kar Taxi book kar sakte ho. Chaliye Puri Process Dekhte hai kaise kya karna hai. OLA Cabs ka App download karne ke liye aapko apne mobile ke PlayStore me jana hoga. Aapke pass iPhone, Android, Windows koi bhi Phone ho App Download karne ke liye Download ki Button par click kare. Download OLA Cabs App Ya Fir Direct PlayStore me ja kar OLA Cabs search karke uska App Download karle. Ye bhi pade Google par apne Mobile ki Location dekhe Register karna bhi bhut aasan hai, Step 1 App ko install karke usko open kare. Step 2 Account banane ke liye Sign Up par click kare. Step 3 Ab jo Form aayega usko bhare. Note Ola Cabs Account banate samay Referral Code me YM67YW sahi se dale, isse aapko 50 rupee ka free Ride milegi. jisse aap free jaa sakte ho. Step 4 ab hame Mobile Number conform karna hai. Ab Hamara Account Ban chuka hai Ola Cabs me. Ye bhi pade Internet se Free Call kaise kare ye har city me alag alag hai, iske liye aap Ola Cabs ki site par dekh sakte hai, ya fir app me apni location select karke bhi uska charge dekh sakte hai. Kiraya pata karne ke liye jo car book karni hai, usko daba kar rakhe to uska kitna kiraya hai aa jayega. Agar aap pheli bar ride kar rahe hai to aap 50 rupee ka free ride bhi kar sakte hai agar aapne meri refer YM67YW code se account banaya hai, agar aap abhi tak Ola Cabs me nahi bhete hai to mera suggestion hai ki kam se kam ek bar jarur isme bhete. OLA Cabs ko book karna bhi bhut aasan hai, simple hame kaha par Taxi ko bulana hai bha par pin kar ride now ki button kar click karna hai. Agar ham jaha par hai bhi par Taxi ko bulana hai to apni location ko select karke ride now ki button par click kare. Chaliye Points se dekh lete hai kaise Book karna hai. Apni Taxi ko Conform kare Ab Ola Cab book ho chuki hai or jo time usme bata raha hai utne time me hamare pass aa jayegi. Ola Cab me Taxi kaise Book hoti hai App se aap jan chuke ho ham ola customer care Call karke bhi Taxi book kar sakte hai. unka Number niche diya hai mene Jab ham Taxi ko Book kar dete hai to hamare samne mobile me Taxi or uske Driver ki detal aa jati hai or ham taxi ko cancel bhi kar sakte hai agar hame nahi jana ho to. Ye bhi Pade Blogger par Free Site kaise Banate Ola Cab me payment ham online bhi kar sakte hai or apni ride khatam karke ham Taxi ke driver ko bhi de sakte hai jitna kiraya huaa.

Website or Blog me jo sabse jaruri or sabse main hota hai wo Domain, Agar Badiya Domain ho to Blog or Website ki Branding or SEO ka adha kaam to aese hi ho jata hai. Agar aap Blog banane ka soch rahe hai, ya aapka Blogpost par Blog hai jisme aapne abhi tak Domain add nahi kiya hai to ye sunhera moka hath se na jane de.

Indian government Government banks time par time India me easy business karane ke liye kai scheme launch karti rahti hai. SBI Saral bhi unhi me se ek hai, jise India ke Largest Bank SBI ne launch kiya tha. 10 50-60 , Iska main object hai, small and middle class ke businessman ke liye online transaction easy karana hai. Vakai me yah scheme kafi successful bhi hui hai, lac of customers is scheme ka benefit le rahe hai aur apne business ko grow kar rahe hai. SBI Mobile Banking Activate Kaise Kare Yadi aap bhi ek business hai to aapko is scheme ko join karna chahiye aur scheme ka benefit se apne business ko grow karne chahiye. To chaliye SBI Saral ke bare me in details jante hai- SBI Saral Kya Hai SBI saral ek single user transactional product hai, jise micro enterprises aur individual businessman ke liye banaya gaya hai. Jise use kar businessman easily online transaction kar sakta hai, jo business ke financial work ko easy bana deta hai. Yah scheme business man ko online fund third party ko transfer karne ka right deta hai, jab fully business purpose ke liye kiya gaya ho. YONO by SBI App Kya Hai Kaise Use Kare Yah transaction maximum Rs 5 lac per day kiya jaa sakta hai. Is scheme ke tahat SBI Saral name ek account open kiya jata hai. Jisse businessman SBI Saral ka benefits le sakta hai. SBI Saral Ke Benefit Jaise maine aapko pehle upar bataya tha ki SBI Saral scheme ko small and middle class business ke liye banaya gaya hai, isliye ye is tarah ke business ke liye behad hi beneficial hai. 1.No Need Lots of Cash Cash kisi bhi business ke liye blood ki tarah hoti hai. Primary need aur small expenses ke liye cash ki bahut jarurat padti hai, but aap SBI Saral se aap is tarah ki need ki online payment kar cashing problem short out kar sakte hai. 2.Easy to use Koi bhi individual SBI Saral account ko easily handle kar sakta hai. Vah SBI Saral account me balance dekh aur download kar sakte hai. 3.Bill Payment Aap Bank se registered suppliers ke sath private suppliers ko online bill payment kar sakte hai. SBI Balance Enquiry Kaise Kare 5 Tariko Se 4.Payment Schedule Aksar business me time ki kami hoti hai to SBI Saral ka yah feature aap ko kafi help kar sakta hai. Bas aapko party ke liye payment schedule karana hai, vo amount schedule time ko transfer ho jayega. 5.EPF Subscription and Salary Payment Cashless ke era me most of companies apne employees ke bank account me direct salary transfer karte hai. Jisse time saving ke sath hi cost saving aur no cash problem hoti hai. Isi tarah EPF payment bhi kiya ja sakta hai. 6.Tax Payment Yah part kisi bhi business ke liye important hota hai, jo time consuming bhi hota hai, but aap ise timelessly online done kar sakte hai, jise SBI Saral account ki help se kiya ja sakta hai. 7.Participation in e-Auction Business ki jaruri resource ko e-auction se bhi fulfill kiya ja sakta hai. Jisme participate karane ke liye online bank account ki jarurat padegi. Is purpose ke liye SBI Saral account ko use kiya ja sakta hai. Marksheet Loan Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare 8.Safe and Secured Transaction SBI Saral account me hone vale every transaction ki notification aapko SMS ke rup me aapke registered mobile number par milega. Jisse aap unauthorized transaction ko instant indentify kar report kar sakte hai. 9.Other Benefits Aap Rs 5 lac per day ki DD bana sakte hai. Iske alava beneficiary lever limit kar sakte hai, jo security ke liye jaruri hai. Dhani App Kya hai Kaise 3 Minute Me Loan Le Sakte Hai ? SBI Saral Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare SBI Saral account open karne ke liye aapke pas pehle se SBI me open account hona chahiye. Jyada details ke liye nearest SBI branch me contact kare. 1.Aap pehle SBI Saral ke home page par visit kare. 2.Right Side me Apply Now button par click kare. 3.Ab Aapko SBI Saral ke three type milega, jise aap apne anusar choose kare. 4. Click here to proceed par click kare. 5. New Registration Form aur Terms Conditions choose kar submit kare. 6. SBI Account no aur captcha enter kare. 7.Ab Form fill up kare aur nearest SBI Branch me contact kare. Demat Account Kya Hai ? Final Word Business me cashing problem bahut badi hoti hai, jo business ke sabhi work par impact dalti hai. Isliye Business ko constantly grow karana hai to cash flow bhi constant hona chahiye, jise aap SBI Saral scheme se shortout kar sakte hai. Isse app business row materials, resource aur taxation jaise need ko easily handle kar sakte hai. Yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai to Whatsapp, Twitter, Facebook aur Google Plus par share kare.

Hi Friends, aaj main pehli baar HindiMeHelp par koi motivational article share kar rha hoon, in articles ki mdd se aap logon ko kafi inspiration milegi joki aapki life me aapke liye kafi helpful sabit hogi. HindiMeHelp ka udeshay hi aap logon ki help karna hai. Isliye aaj main aap logon ke sath Jack Ma Founder of Alibaba.com ki story share kar rha hoon joki ek bahut hi inspirational Story hai. jo ek garib parivar se the, wo aaj china ke sabse amir aadmi hai. Jack Ma ki story un logon ke liye inspiration hai jo ki garib parivar se hai aur ye sochte hai ki garib hone ke karn ve kuch nahi kar sakte. Jack apne college entrance exams me do baar fail hua, use darjno baar naukari se reject kiya gya. Alibaba ki success se pehle unhone kai baar asafalta ka samana karna pada, lekin ve ruke nahi aur isi ki badaulat aaj ve china ke sabse amir aadmi hai. To fir aaiye jante hai Jack Ma ka janam 15 october 1964 ko Hangzhou namk sthan par hua tha joki china ke dakshini hisse me hai. Jack ka ek bda bhai aur ek choti behn thi. Jack ka privar garib tha. Jack bachpan me duble patle sharir ke the. 1972 me US ke president Richard Nixon ek baar hangzhou me aaye tab se Hangzhou ek tourist place ban gya, tab Jack ki umr 8-9 saal ke karib thi, Vah subah jaldi uthkar shahar ke main hotel me jata the aur english sikhne ke badle me tourists ko shehar me ghumata the. Unka Jack naam bhi ek tourist ne hi diya tha. Image Credit BuisenessInsider.com Unke paas paise nahi the isliye aage badhne ke liye unke pass kewal ek hi rasta tha vo tha padai ka. Apna High School pass karne ke baad usne usne college me apply kiya lekin vo do baar entrance exams me fail ho gya. Tisri baar ve exams me pass ho gye aur unhone Hangzhou Teacher s Institute ko join kiya, Unhone 1988 me vahi se apni graduation ki. Graduation karne ke baad unhone bahu saari jobs ke liye apply kiya. lekin unhen har baar asafalta ka samna karna pada. bahut baar naukri se rejected hone ke baad unhen aakhirkar ek English Teacher ki job mil gayi. Jack ko Computers aur Internet ka koi anubhav nahi tha, lekin ek baar jab ve 1995 me US ki trip par gaye to unhone pehli baar internet ka use kiya, fir ve internet se kafi akarshit hue. Jack ne internet par sabse pehle Beer ke baare me search kiya tha, tab unhe ye jankar kafi ascharya hua ki results me chinese beer ke baare me kuch tha hi nahi. Iske baad unhone China ki ek internet company start karne ki sochi. Uski pehli do koshishe fail ho gayi, iske 4 saal baad unhone apne 17 doston ko apne flat me ikkatha kiya aur unhen apne naye marketplace me invest karne ke liye mnaya jiska naam tha Alibaba. Is site par bade- bade niryatak apne saman ko list karte the aur Customers unhen yhan se directly kharid sakte the. Is Service ne jald hi duniya ke bahut saare niryatko ko akarshit kiya. Isse Alibaba ko kafi munafa hua. 2005 me yahoo ne Alibaba me $1 Billion invest kiye aur company ke 40 shares kharide. Ye alibaba ke liye kafi tha aur Alibaba ne China me Ebay ko piche chod diya. Isse Yahoo ko bhi kafi fayda hua. 2013 me Jack ne Alibaba ke CEO ke pad se istifa de diya lekin ve alibaba ke karykari adhyksh Executive Chairman bane rahe. Alibaba ne Jack ko $25 billion ka malik bna diya aur vah China ke sabse amir aadmi ban gaye. Jack aaj china me ek celebrity jaise hai jinhe sunne ke liye bahut badi bhid ikkathi ho jati hai. Alibaba Company har saal Talent Shows ko bhi host karti hai. Jack Ma china me ek pryavarn sanrakshk ke rup me bhi jane jate hai.

Friends, me aapko ek bhut hi interest website ke ware me aaj batane wala hu, or agar aapki koi WebsiteBlog hai to aapko ye jankari bhut pasand aane wali hai. Aap iss Website ki madad se ji aaapki website ke visitor hai, aap unki recording kar sakte hai or dekh sakte hai wo aapki site par kya karte hai, kitni der site ko use karte hai, or kaha kaha click karte hai. Chaliye website ke ware me jane or usko kaise use kare wo sab jaanne se phele thoda ye jaan lete hai, ki ham iss website ka kaise fayda utha sakte hai apni website ko or jada improve karne me. To mene aapko itne fayde bata diye hai ki aap usko ek ware try karke to jarur dekhege, or muje ummid hai aapko ye jankari pasand bhi aayegi, or isse aapko apni site ko improve karne me bhi help milegi. Agar aapki site achi se open nahi ho rahi aapke visitor ke device me to aapko apni site ki speed improve karne ki jarurat hai. Loading Speed kaise badaye site ki uski jankari mene share ki hai. Visitor aapki site par kya karte hai, uski video recording karne ke liye aapko sabse phele ek website par jana hoga, or fir usme account bana kar ek code hai jo aapko apni site me add karna hai. Step 1 Website par jaye fir apna account banaye. Smartlook Website Step 2 Ab jo Page aayega. usme apni Email ID or password daal kar account bana le, ya Direct facebook se bhi login kar sakte hai. Step 3 ab aapka account to ban chuka hai, par aapko ek code apni site me add karna hoga. Step 4 Ab aap thoda wait kare, aapki site par jab visitor aayege or aapki site ko use karege to unki recording hogi or wo aapke deshboard me aa jayegi. Aap Upar image me dekh sakte hai, jo bhi visitor ko track kiya jata hai uski kya kya detail hoti hai. Ye sab detail aap dekh sakte hai or agar aapko dekhna hai ki jo visitor hai wo site par kitni der ruka or usne site par kya kiya to aap Play ki button par click kare. Step 5 Ab aapke samne jo page open hoga, usme video hoga. jisko aap play karke dekh sakte hai ki jo visitor tha usne aapki site ko kaise use kiya or kya kya kiya. Isse aapki site me agar kahi koi kami hogi to aap uska aasani se pata laga kar tikh kar sakte hai. Iss Website ka ek or feature hai HeatMap, jisme ham jitne bhi visitor hai wo kaha click karte hai wo dekh sakte hai. uske liye aapko Heatmap me apni site ko add karna hoga. Add karne ke baad thoda wait kare, Q ki visitor aayege or aapki site par click karege usko track karne ke baad hi wo uski information teyar hoti hai. To Dosto, Specially Bloggers . muje ummid hai aapko ye jankari jarur pasand aai hogi or aapko isse help bhi milegi agar aap apni site ko apne kisi visitor ki najar se dekhna chate ho to. Agar aap Isko baad me use nahi bhi karna chaho to simple aapne jo code apni site me add kiya hai usko remove kar dijiye. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi comment karke batana naa bhule. or blogging se sambandit agar koi sabal hai to aap puch sakte hai.

Namaskar, aap sab ka HMH.pe par bahut-bahut swagat hai. Aaj is article me main aapke saath share karne jaa rha hun hindi bhasha me useful content provide karne wali kuch badhut hii badhiya websites List ko. Jaise-jaise Indian users ki counting online badhti jaa rhi hai, uske saath-saath hindi content wali websites kii counting bhi badhti jaa rhi hai. Ab aap log jante hii honge ki har ek website apne mayne me different hoti hai aur har ek site to quality content provide nahi karti hai, isliye hamne aapke liye ek research karke keval un websites ko list out kiya hai joki keval hindi bhasha me quality content provide karti hain. To bina kisi der ke, ye rahi list. Suvidha ke liye hamne websites ko alag-alag categories ke hissab se divide kiya hai. Is category me ve sabhi websites list ki gayin hain jisme aap badhiya knowledge wala content read kar sakte hain. Isme news websites aur entertainment websites bhi shamil kii gayin hain. Ye websites regulary inke authors ke dwara update kii jaati hai aur sucharu dhang se chal rahi hain. In websites par posts kii sankhya hazaron me hai. Is shreni me aisi websites hai jinme bhariyt sahity ke bare me bahut zyada knowledge provide kii gyi hai. Udhaaran ke liye jo pehli website hai Kavitakosh jisme ki 1,00,000 se bhi zyada pages hai. Yeh website basically hindi poems se bhri huyi hai. Aise hii is shreni kii any websites hain. Is category kii websites sabse premium websites hain. In websites ko padhkar aap bahut hii useful jaankari prapt kar sakte hain. Inme shamil hai aapko blogging sikhane wali websites jinse ki aap online paisa kmaana seekh sakte hain. Technology ke area wali sabhi badhiya hindi websites bhi isme hain. Motivational Category me ve sabhi websites ko list kiya gya hai jinme aisa content hai jaise ki motivational hindi poems, essays, stories ityadi. Inko padhkar koi bhi motivation prapt kar sakta hai. Jaisa ki is category ke naam se hii clear hota hai, isme ve website hai jinme cooking karna sikhaya jaata hai. Zaroor padhiye To ye thi hamari alag-alag categories me aane wali badhiya hindi websites kii list. Hame poori aasha hai ki aapko hamari ye useful hindi websites kii compilation bahut hii zyada acchi lgi hogi. Yadi aapka koi bhi question ho to aap hamare se comment me pooch sakte hain aur yadi aapko hamara ye article accha lga ho to aap ise social media par apne friends ke saath zaroor share kijiye. HindiMeHelp ko aisa hii bahut se useful articles padhte rehne ke liye Subscribe karna mat bhooliye! Guest Author Shallu Agrawal from Shout Me Hindi. Agar aapko bhi Guest Post karna hai to uski Jankari yaha hai.

Blogger ek aesa platform hai jo free to hai hi saath me bhut saral bhi hai. Ham bhut aasani se blog banakar usko chala sakte hai. Blog ko banane ke baad ham uspe apne article daalte hai, par ham jo article blog par daalte hai bo alag-alag category ke hote hai. Blog me bhut aasan hai har Article ko alag-alag karna uski catrgory ke mutabik, Is Post me ham bo hi sikhege. Blogger me ham apne Blog ke Post ko Label ke jariye arrange kar sakte hai. Chaliye jaante hai labels ke baare me bistaar se, or jaante hai kuch koman sabaalo ke jabab Labels ke jariye ham aasani se apni post ko category me daal sakte hai. Jese maan lijiye aapka jo blog hai aap usme Gaane, Poem, Jokes, SMS bagera daalte ho, To jab aap koi post likh rahe ho to usme kya hai uska label jodkar usko uski category me set kar sakte ho. Jesa ki mene bataya labels ki madad se ham post ko category me set kar sakte hai. Jab koi Visitor hamare blog par aata hai or agar bo sirf Jokes hi padna chata hai to bo Jokes ki label par click karega to us label me hamne jitni bhi post ko rakha hoga bo saari post aa jayegi jayegi.

Hello Dosto Mera Naam Ravi Sharma Hai Mai Indianol.org Ka Owner hu! Or Hindi Me Help Pe Ye Meri Pahli Guest Post Hai! Jisme Mai Apko Batauga Ki Blogging Aaj Ke Time Me Regular Jobs Se Better Kyu Hai! I Hope Apko Ye Post Jarur Pasand Aayegi Or Esse Apko Bahut Kuch Sikhne Ko Bhi Milega! Dosto Aaj Ke Time Me Logo Ke Liye Private Job krna Syad ek majboori ban gaya hai, Mane kaafi logo ko dekha hai jinke pass acchi qualification hoti hai but unko koi accha job nhi mil pata hai or mil bhi jati hai to unke upper bahut sara pressure, Work Load rehta hai or wo hamesha pareshan rahte hai! or wo apni Life sachi se injoy bhi nahi kar pate. Mai Yaha Par Private Job ko Bura Nhi Bata Raha hu But As A Blogger Mai Ye Advice Kruga Ki Aaj Ke Time Me Blogging Ek Regular Job Se 100 Guna jyada Behtar Hai! Jisme Aap Unlimited Paise Kama Sakte Wo bhi Bina Kisi Frustration Ke! Agar aap Blogging me Apna Carrer banane ka soch rahe hai to Blogging karne ke nuksan ke ware me bhi jarur jaan le. uske baad fesla kare ki aapke blogging sahi hai ya koi or kaam. Q ki agar aapka blogging me interest nahi hai to aap blogging nahi kar payege. Agar Ap Ek Blogger Hai Or Apka Blog Live Hai To Syad Aap Ek Secess ki Taraf Badh Rahe Hai! Kyoki Aane Wale Time Me Syad apko Kisi Job Ki Jarurat Naaa Pade! Iska Proof Mai Yaha Par Apko Niche Batauga!

Whatsapp kitni popular application hai wo to aap jante hi hoge, or iss app ka intna popular hona banta bhi hai q ki isme regular update bhi hote rhete hai or kuch aese feature bhi hai to logo ko bhut pasand bhi aate hai. WhatsApp ke New Feature jo abhi add huee hai ya ho hone wale hai uske ware me ham jaanne wale hai. Abhi kuch time phele hi Whatsapp ne security badane ke liye 2 step verification add kiya tha, iske sath sath aap Voice Call, Video Call, Live status ke ware me to aap jante hi hoge. Abhi Whatsapp me ek or bada update aane wala hai, jo logo ko bhut pasand aayega. Jo New update aane wala hai usme ham send kiye huee message ko cancel kar sakege ya edir bhi kar sakege. isse ye fayda hoga agar kisi ko galti se koi message send kar diya hai to ham usko delete kar sakege. Aapke sath bhi aesa jarur huaa hoga kabhi na kabhi, ki aap kisi or ko koi message send karna cha rahe ho or galti se kisi or ko chala gaya ho. aese me fir hamara kya hota hai uska andaja to jo galat message hamse send ho gaya hai usse hi lagaya ja sakta hai. Par ab aesa nahi hoda. Whatsapp ki jo new update hai, uska naam hai Revoke, jiski madad se ham send kiye huee message ko wapas bula sakte hai or fir chahe to usko edit karke double se send kare ya fir delete karde. Abhi ye jo update hai wo Beta version me hai iphone ke liye, par jald hi sabhi user ke liye aa jayegi or muje ummid hai iss new update ke baad jo whatsapp ki popularity hai wo or jada badd jayegi. Aap Screenshot ke dekhe kaise aayega option Revoke karke ka. To Firends aapko ye jo feature hai usse kitni help milegi ya aapko iski jarurat hai ke nahi wo aap comment karke bata sakte hai ki aapko kya lagta hai. ye acha hai ya nahi. Whatsapp ki or jada jankari ke liye hamari dusri post read kare

Internet ki duniya itni badi hai ki ham Onilne Internet ke baare me jitne Sikhe utna kam hai. Hamne pichle post me jana tha ki ham kaise Online Apne Mobile ko kahi se bhi Recharge kar sakte hai. Internet ne hamari jindgi kitni aasan kar di hai aap soch bhi nahi sakte, aaj internet ki madad se Exam ke result ham online dek sakte hai, Online Apne Dosto se jude rha sakte hai, Online Paise kama sakte hai or bhi bhut kuch . Abhi jo sabse jada Popular hai bo hai Online Shopping Sites. Q ki Shopping sites ki madad se ham ghar bhete kuch bhi kharid sakte hai or hamara kharida huaa samaan hamare diye huee Address par aa jata hai or hame kahi jaane ki jarurat bhi nahi padti. Agar aap Online kisi site se kuch samaan kharidna chate ho to ye kuch chije hai jo aapke pass honi chaiye. Agar aapko kuch lena hai to Aap kisi Dukaan par jaoge ya Online Bhi le sakte ho. Kya faida hai online shopping me ye aap in points ko pad kar samaj jaoge. Online Shoping ki bhut Sites hai par aaj me unme se ek jiska Naam sayad aapne suna hoga Flipkart. Me aapko bataoga ki aap kaise Online Shopping kar sakte hai Flipkart par. Online Shopping karne ke liye Aap meri steps ko follow karo. Step 1 Sabse phele aapko Shoping ki site par jana hoga. Aap direct niche diye search baar me search karo jo aapko lena hai. Agar aap direct is box me search karke samaan lete ho to aapko 20 ka discount bhi milega. Mobile ke liye Memory Card kharide 8GB sirf 200 Rs me to yaha Click kare.

Hello Friends hamne pichli post me jana kaise ham SEO Title likhe apni Post ke liye taki usko padkar jada se jada visitor hamare blog par aaye. Par yaha ek or bhut jaruri Chij hai jo Blog Title ke liye bhut jaruri hai Blog Title after Post Title for SEO. SEO ki najar se Post ka Title sabse pheli chij hai jo deside karta hai ki post me kya hai or ye kitni important hai. Blogger par agar aapka blog hai or agar aap blog ka Dafult template use karte hai to aapne dekha hoga ki jo aapka Blog ka TitleBlog ka Naam hai wo phele aata hai or Post ka Title baad me. Aesa har jagha hota hai Search me bhi Blog ka Title phele or Post ka title baad me aata hai or agar post ko share kiya jaye Social Network Sites par to bha bhi Blog ka Title phele or Post ka Title Baad me aata hai. Jo Title hai wo search result me, Browser ki heading me or Social Networking sites me dikhega to agar Blog ka Title phele aata hai to hamari post ka jo title hai wo cut ho jayega. Jisse hamare post par visitor me kami aa sakti hai q ki unko samaj hi nahi aayega ki post me hai kya. Jese search result me 66 sabd aate hai or agar Blog ka Title phele aata hai to utne sabd to aese hi kam ho gaye post title ke isse ho sakta hai post ka pura title naa aaye jo bilkul bhi acha nahi hai Post SEO ke liye. Post Title Phele or Blog ka Title baad me karne par kuch is trha dekhega. To Friends Sabse Phele apni Post ko Open karke dekhe agar aapke Blog ka Title phele dikh raha hai to usko abhi change karke Post Title ke baad me kare. SEO ke liye Ye Post Bhi Pade ye bhut hi simple hai, sirf hame ek code hai jisko badal kar uski jagha dusra code dalna hai, to chaliye dekhte hai kaise kya karna hai. Step 1 Blogger.com me login karke apne blog ke Deshboard me jaye. Step 2 Blogger ke Template me jaye fir uske Edit HTML par click kare. Step 3 Ab Template Editor me is Code ko search kare. ab jaha bhi ye Code hoga wo highlight ho jayega. Step 4 ab Code milne ke baad usko delete karde or uski jagha ye Code dale Step 5 Code ko replace karne ke baad Template Save karde.

Hello Friends, Aaj Date hai 27052018 yani ki mera B day. isliye ye din mere liye Special to hai ki, par jo log mujse chate hai , Muje pasand karte hai, jo muje support karte hai unki baja se ye din mere liye or bhi jada Special Ban gaya hai. Mere Bhut se Friends hai jo mere ware me jaanna chate hai or unke bhut se sabal bhi hai jinka jabab abhi tak kisi ko nahi pata hai, par aaj me mere wo sare raaj open karne wala hu. Kuch bate to aesi hai jo abhi tak mere aalawa kisi or ko nahi pata hai. Sabse Phele Baat karte hai me phele kis type ka banda tha, kya karta tha, kya soch thi meri or kya karna chata tha wo jaan lete hai uske baad jo Sabal hai unke jabab diye jayege. Me ek aese kism ka ladka tha, jo andar hi andar bhut kuch sochta tha, or andar kya chal raha hai wo kisi se share bhi nahi karta tha. q ki muje kahi na kahi aesa lagta tha ki me agar kisi se share karuga to wo samjega nahi or sayad mera majak bhi udaye. School Time me 8th class tak to kuch extra nahi kiya. Normal School se ghar, TV, Khana-Pina, Sona wass ye hi sab normal chalta raha. 8th Class me pheli war mene Computer ko use kiya School me, uss time to usko chalu kaise karna hai ya band kaise karna hai iss baat ne hi pasine chuda diye the. par dhire dhire thoda knowledge bada. Ab Internet bhi kuch chij hoti hai, jiska use karke ham kuch bhi dekh sakte hai, kuch bhi search kar sakte hai aesa pata chala. to wass ab isme thoda interest jag gaya. Ek war mere ek Friend ne online Map par uske ghar ka naksha dikhaya, par ye usne kaise kiya ye usne nahi bataya. Wass Fir kya tha Net Cafe ke chakkar lagna chalu huee, or Internet par pata nahi kya kya search karte, Game khelte. Fir aese hi dhire dhire bhut si chijo ke ware me pata chala. or WikiMapia ek site hai jispar ham apna Map set kar sakte hai ye bhi pata chala. Fir Kya tha Map set karke, mere uss friend ko bataya jo nahi bata raha tha ki usne kaise kiya. wass ye sab chal raha tha.

Hello, Welcome to Hindi Me Help Blog jaha par milti hai Internet ki puri jankari Hindi Me. Aaj batate hue badi hi khusi ho rahi hai ki 20 Feb 2018 ko HMH ko 3 saal pure ho chuke hai, or in 3 salo me bhut kuch dekhne or sikhne ko mila. or bhut se logo ki jo Help karne ki muhim thi usme bhi bhut hadd tak safal rahe. Hindi Me Help ki starting kaise hui or kya kya paresaniyo ka samna karna pada wo 1st Year HMH Success Story me share kiya hai. 2nd Year HMH ke liye phele saal ki trha nahi raha, Q ki uss time kuch personal Problems or Kuch dikkato ke karan thodi paresani hui. 2nd Year me Kya kya Utar Chadav aaye uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. 3rd Year Normal raha, Iss saal jesa flow chal raha tha wo same raha, or sirf ek badi problem aai thi jisme HMH Hack hui, uske aalawa to sab kuch badiya raha. Hack hone ke karan 4 din tak site down rahi thi. Hindi Me Help Hack hone ka Kya karan tha or meri usme kya galti thi wo mene share kiya hai. Abhi tak jesa bhi raha bhut badiya raha, Kuch problems bhi aai to unse bhi bhut kuch naya sikhne ko bhi mila, or HMH iss saal bhi apne maksad me kamyab rahi. Abhi tak to jesa chal raha tha tikh hai, par ab aage ke bhut bade plans hai HMH ke liye, jisse or jada se jada logo ko help ho sake jo Internet par kuch karna chate hai or uski jankari Hindi me chate hai. Mera aage ka Plan hai ki me iss saal badiya 10 logo ki Team banao, or fir wo milkar HMH.pe kaam kare, jisse abhi jaha HMH hai usse 10 guna uchai par ho, or jada se jada logo tak phuch sake. Abhi mene Office bhi Flat par hi bana rakha hai, par ab ek alag se Office bhi setup karna hai, yaha jo Team hogi wo sath me work kar paye. Iss Saal mera ek ye plan bhi hai, ki ek Workshop rakhi jaye, 3-4 din ki jisme Blog kya hai uski puri basic jankari di jaye, taki jo Blogging start karna chate hai wo badiya tarike se start karpaye. Jo Original Content Creator hai unko kisi trha support kara jaye or taki unki Help ho kaam me, aesa bhi kuch platform banane ka plan hai. taki log apna talent ka use karke or jada se jada logo ki help kare sirf dusre ke content ko apni language me naa likhe. Iss Saal Guest Post bhi karna hai, Community ko Grow karne ke liye. YoutubeBlog dono ko sath me karna hai, taki jo post hai unme video bhi ho or jo reader hai unko or aasani ho content ko samajne me. Daily apne kisi ek reader se contact karke feedback lena, or wo kya chate hai unko dhiyan me rakhte hue aage kaa kaam karna hai.

Hello Friends agar aapka blog Blogger par hai to ye post aapke liye hai. Is Post me ham baat karege Blogger ke ek future ki jo blog ke owner ke liye to bhut acha hai par blog ke visitor ke liye or SEO ke najariye se acha nahi hai. Ham Blog Banate hai usko acha Design karte hai taki wo acha dikhe. Par kya aapko pata hai Blogger ka ek future hai Quick edit jiski madad se ham direct hamare blog se hi apni post or widget ko edit kar sakte hai. Matlab hame agar koi post edit karni hai to deshboard me ja kar post search karke edit karne ki jarurat nahi padti. Hame simple jo hamare blog post ke niche Pencil ka icon dikhta hai uspar click karna hota hai or ham direct post editor me aa jate hai. Ussi prakar Widget ko edit karne ke liye bhi hame layout me jane ki jarurat nahi padti. ham direct jo Scrow Driver ka icon hota hai uspar click karke widget ko edit kar sakte hai. Ye Widget bhi Tri kare To jese ki aapne dekha inki madad se ham aasani se or jaldi post or widget ko edit kar sakte hai. matlab ye hamare liye to acha hai apne blogme. par agar koi visitor aata hai hamare blog par to usko inki koi jarurat nahi hoti. Q ki wo naa to hamari post or widget ko edit kar sakta hai. or isse hamare blog ka design bhi acha nahi lagta. SEO ke najariye se dekhe to Quick Edit icon ek image hai jiska koi meta data set nahi hai to wo search engine ko bhi samaj nahi aati. or isse hamare blog ka loding time bhi badta hai bhale thoda hi sahi par badta hai q ki browser ko har bar aesi image load karni padti hai jiski koi jarurat hi nahi hoti. To ab aap jaan chuke hai ki Quick Edit Pencil Icon or Screw Driver Icon ka kya istmal hai or uske kya faide or kya nuksan hai. To chaliye ab dekh lete hai inko kaise hataya jaye apne blog se. Quick Edit Pencil or ScrewDriver icon ko hatana bhut hi aasan hai. To chaliye dekh lete hai kaise hataye. Step 1 Blogger me login karke apne blog ke Deshboard me jaye fir Layout me jaye Step 2 Ab Post Widget ke edit icon par click kare Step 3 Ab Quick Edit ke tik ko hata de fir Save karde. Is Trha Quick edit pencil icon ko to hata sakte hai to chaliye ab dekh lete hai Quick Edit Screw Driver ko kaise Hataye isko hatane ke 2 tarike hai Chaliye dono tarike dekh lete hai Step 1 Sabse phele apne blog ke Deshboard me ja kar Template par jaye fir usko edit kare. Step 2 Ab ye jo Code hai usko Template me CtrlF daba kar search kare. Step 3 ab jitni bhi bar ye code hai usko delete karde template me se or last me template ko save karde. Ye tarika use karke aap usko hata sakte hai par agar aapko isme koi dikkat aa rahi ahi to aap ye dusra tarika bhi use kar sakte hai. Is Process me hame ek CSS Code hai jo Template me add karna hai. agar aapko nahi pata CSS Code kaise add karte hai Blogger me to uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. Step 1 Isme bhi hame Blogger ke Template ko edit karna hai. Step 2 Ab CtrlF Daba kar ye code search karna hai. bskin ya fir bskin or inke bich me CSS Code ko add karna hai. Step 3 ab jo code hamne search kiya hai uske bich me hame ye ek line ka code add karke template save karna hai. ab jo CSS Cade hai usko dalne ke baad template save karde. Or fir apne blog ko open karke dekhe. To dosto is trha ham Quick edit icon ko hamare blog se hata sakte hai or apne blog ko apne visitor ke liye or bhi khubsurat bana sakte hai. Agar aapko isme kahi koi dikkat aa rahi ho to aap comment karke puch sakte hi. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi wo comment karke jarur bataye. Ye Bhi Pade

Friends agar aapko kisi bhi image ki jarurat padti hai to aap Google me direct search kar lete hai, par kya aap jante hai kisi bhi image ko agar aap apne Blogwebsite ya apni kisi youtube video me use kar rahe hai to aap par copywright clam ho sakta hai. Ham Google se Filter karke free image bhi download kar sakte hai, par Google se Free Image kaise Download kare, usse phele thoda ye jaan lete hai akhir ye copyright hota kya hai. Copyright ek trha se hack hota hai jisne wo chij banai create ki hai. Jese wo koi Video, Music, Image, Article kuch bhi ho sakta hai. wo jisne banaya hai uspar uska adhikar hai. ab agar aese me usko koi dusra usko use karega to wo chori khelayegi. or jo uska owner hai wo clam karke usko delete bhi karwa sakta hai. To ab aapko thoda idea to ho hi gaya hoga, ki copyright kya hota hai. jisne jo chij banai hai uspar uska adhikar. To ab baat aati hai, to image kaha se download kare, jo copyright naa ho. Internet par sabhi chije paise me nahi milti ye to aap jante hoge, kuch chije hai jo free bhi mil jati hai. tikh ussi trha Free Image bhi mil jayegi jo Free to use hoti hai or uska licence Creative Commons hota hai, yani ham usko bina copy right ke use kar sakte hai. To ab aap ye bhi samaj gaye ki aapko jo image use karni hai wo creative commons wali image use karni hai jisko CC bhi bolte hai. Aap High Quality Free Image in website se bhi download kar sakte hai. Agar aap Google me search karte hai to aapko pata hoga, jitni bhi chije search me aati hai wo google ki nahi hoti, Q ki google sirf ek search engine hai or wo dusri site se hame content dikhata hai. image bhi. to aese me konsi image copyright hai or konsi free to use hai uska pata laga muskil hai. Par ham Google search ki setting me thoda change karke free image ka aasani se pata laga sakte hai or usko bina kisi tension ke use kar sakte hai. to chaliye dekh lete hai google se free image ko kaise search karke download kare. Sabse phele to aapko jis kisi ki bhi image search karni hai, aap Google Image me search kar lijiye. Ab aapke samne jo bhi aapne search kiya hai uski images aa jayegi. par yaha konsi copyright hai konsi free ya ham pata nahi kar sakte, or sabhi image search me aayegi. Jese aap niche Image me dekhe, mene tomato ki image search ki to mere samne bhut sari image aagai. Ab Free image ko filter karne ke liye aapko ye karna hai. Usage right me jo 4 option hai unka kya matlab hai wo bhi samaj lijiye To Friends, aap inme se apni jarurat ke hisab se select kar sakte hai, or agar aap Image ko Blog ya Youtube ya kisi bhi aese kaam ke liye use karna chate hai jisse aap paise kamane wale hai to aap starting ke 2 option me se koi ek select kare. Mujse bhut logo ne ye sabal pucha tha ki kya Google image ko ham youtube video me use kare to kya uspar bhi copyright ho sakta hai, to uska jabab hai Haa. Par agar aap Google se Free Image ko use karege fir chahe aap kahi bhi use kare koi problen nahi hogi, koi copyright nahi hoga. Hope aapko ye jankari pasand aai hogi, or ab aap bhi google se koi bhi image ko use karne se phele filter jarur karege taki aage aapko kisi problem ka samna nahi karna pade. Agar aapka koi bhi sabal ya sujab hai to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. Aapko Post bhi jarur pasand aayegi

Hallo Frinds Mera Name Sonu Rajput Hai Or Mai www.SonuRajput.com Ka Owner Hu, Mai Apni Web Site par Internet Technology GK se related Regularly New Post Karta Hu. OTP ek SMS service hai Jo apke online account ko safe rakhne ka kaam karti hai. OTP ka matlab One Time Password hota hai, jisko Ek he baar use kiya ja sacta hai. OTP ka SMS jab apke mobile par Aata hai to uski validity sirf 15 Minute ki Hoti hai uske baad uska koi use nahi hota. OTP service Aap ka koi bhi online account ho usko safe rakhti hai. jaise ki Aap net banking ke jariye kuch online product purchase karte hai to last mai apke registered mobile number par ek OTP aata hai SMS je jariye, or jab tak wo OTP net banking mai submit nahi karege tab take Aap wo online product ke liye payment nahi kar sakte. OTP apke Account ko safe rakhta hai. Ye service hame sabhi banko ki net banking mai jaruri milti hai kyuki banko ko secure hona bahut he jaruri hota hai. Agar kisi ko Apke net banking ka User Name Or Password Pata Bhi Chal Jata Lakin wo kisi bhi Parkar ki transition ya Len den ya Shopping nahi kar sacta kyuki last Mai OTP ki jarurat padti or wo OTP hamare Mobile number par Aata hai. or Aisa hone par apko Pata Bhi Chal jaye ga or Aap apna user name password ko change bhi kar sacte ho ya phir Aap apne bank mai jaker net banking block karwa sacte ho. Aaj kal to Google Bhi apne users ke Account ke Safety liye OTP service ka use karta hai Aap jitni baar Google ki website mai login karoge jab jab OTP ki jarurat padegi or OTP ke bina Aap Google mai login nahi kar sacte hai. usko activate karne ke liye yaha click kare. Or Aaj kal to E-Commerce Online Portal limited private Companies bhi Iska Use karne lagi hai Jaise ki paytm, free charge , mobikwik, oxigen wallet , Amazon, Flipkart,snapdeal , jaise company apne customers ki behtrin service or unke Account ko safe rakhne ke liye OTP ka use karti hai. ye jo Code aata hai jisko ham OTM khate hai. Is Code ko hame kabhi kisi ko nahi batana. Q ki aesa ho sakta hai koi hamara bank account hack karle fir hame call karke hamara OTP puch le kisi bhi bhane se. to yaad rakhiye Bank ya koi bhi service hamara OTP kabhi nahi puchti. To Friends aap jaan chuke ho OTP kya hai or iska Kya Istmal hai or iske jariye hamari security kaise badti hai. Ye ek Guest Post hai HMH.pe, Agar aap bhi apni Post Publish karna chate hai to yaha click kare. HMH par Dusri Guest Post padne ke liye yaha cliick kare.

Favicon Site ka Icon hota hai. Favicon sabd Favoriteicon se mil kar bana hai. Jo hamari site ki tab me, browser me bookmark karte hai bha, dikhta hai. Iska jo size hai bi 16 16 pixels hota hai. Is se hamari site ya blog me ek professional look aa jata hai. ye icon to chota sa hai par bhut kaam ka hai. Bhut si tab khuli ho browser me to isse pata chal jata hai konsi site kis tab me hai. Hamare Blog ka jo favicon hai bo orange color ka B hota hai. par ham usko apne pasand se badal sakte hai. Blogger me icon ko add karna bhut hi aasan hai aap simple Apne blogger ke deshboard me jao. Deshboard Layout Favicon ab Favicon ke widget ki Edit link par click kare.

Hello Friends Aaj thoda hatkat article hai jo abhi tak share nahi kiya gaya, Aaj ham baat karege USSD codes ki. USSD ka matlab hota hai Unstructured Supplementary Service Data. Duniya bhar me ham Mobile se jude rhate hai, SMS, Internet, call ke through. Har Company ka alag alag USSD Code hota hai Number ki detail nikalne ke liye, ki kitna Balance, SMS, GPRS bagera hamare number par hai. Me Aapko har Company ke USSD code batane wala hu jese Airtel, Aircel, BSNL, Idea, Reliance, Tata Docomo, Uninor, Vodafone, and Videocon. Insab ke Code sayad hi kidi ho yaad hoge to unki help ke liye. Ye Kuch or Jaruri Jankari Airtel me bhut se Code hai. Ye USSD Code ki List hai, in codes ki madad se aap Balance, Chalu or Band Services, SMS Plan, Offers, GPRS Offer, Recharge ki jankari pata kar sakte hai. Is Aircel ki USSD Code ki madad se aap apne Number ka Balance, Offer, GPRS Data, Free Minutes or SMS ki jankari le sakte ho. aircel sim ki jankari in Code se le In BSNL USSD Codes ki madad se aap aone Number ka Balance, Data Pan, Local SMS, National SMS, Calls bare pata kar sakte ho, bsnl offer check code dekhe. Idea USSD codes ki madad se aap apne Number ka Balance, Data, SMS, Calls, Gprs data bagera pata kar sakte ho. idea ka recharge karne ka number kya hai wo bhi aap dekh sakte hai. idea net balance check number bhi list me diya hai. idea no check code 09, idea balance check code. In Reliance USSD code ki madad se aap apna free Internet pata kar sakte ho, Caller tunes, Data pack, reliance number check, recharge ki jankari pa sakte ho. USSD Code se aap apna Number bhi pata kar sakte ho. Apne Number ki puri jaankari, konsi service chalu hai, kitna valance hai or kitni validity hai sab kuch. Uninor Codes ki madad se aap apne balance check kar sakte ho or apna SIM Card ka Number pata kar sakte ho. Vodafone user USSD Code ki madad se apna Number pata kar sakte hai. V2V night Minute, Free SMS, Calling Balance, Free Minutes, Chalu servies ki jankari, best Offer, bouns bagera pata kar sakte ho. Vedeocon me jada USSD Code nahi hai apne number ki jankari pane ke liye. Inka Sirf ek hi Code hai. Ye Lijiye Sari Company ke USSD Codes aap List me dekh sakte hai or apni kisi bhi company Airtel, Aircel, BSNL, Tata Docomo, Vodafone, Idea, Videocon, Uninor and Reliance ki jankari pa sakte hai. Agar aapke pass inke aalawa koi code hai to muje jarur bataye. Ye Bhi Padhe

Kya aap ek Popular hindi blog banane ke bare me soch rahe, Agar Haa to ye bahut Aasan baat nahi hai kyoki internet par phele se bahut se acche acche hindi blog bane huee hai to ab aapke man me ye sawal hoga ki akhir hum ek Popular hindi blog kaise banaye. Internet par koi bhi Naya blog ko bana kar Popular karna koi Aasan baat nahi hai iske liye aapko ek perfect plan banane ki jarurat hogi tabhi aapka blog Popular hoga. Jab aap ek perfect plan bana kar blogging start karege to aapke blog ke Popular hone ka chance badh jata hai. Iss article me mai aapko kuch plan aur tips ko bataoga jisse aap apne blog ko correct time par bana kar run kara sakte hai aur usko bahut Aage tak lekar jaa sakte hai. Dosto ek baat aap apne maan me bhaitha le ki. Agar aapko online kisi bhi chiz me success hona hai to aapko ek plan bana kar apne kaam ko karna padega bina kisi plan ke aapko online kisi bhi chiz me success hona bahut hi muskil hai. Isliye online internet par koi bhi kaam karne se pahle aapko uss kaam ki ek list bana kar pure plan ke sath start kare Thik ussi prakar aapko ek badiya hindi blog banane ke liye aapke pass ek badiya plan hona cahiya. Iss Post ke share karna ka maksad ye hai ki aap ek naya blog banane ke liye plan kaise kare. kewal blogger par jaakar naya blog bana dene ko plan nahi kahte hai. Agar aap ek blogger hai to aapko pata hoga ki blog banane ke liye blogger aur wordpress do bahut hi Popular platform hai jaha se aap apna blog bana sakte hai. Blogger ek free platform hai jaha par aapko kisi bhi parkar ka koi paisa nahi dena hota hai aur wahi wordpress par aapko blog banane ke liye aapko web hosting lene ki jarurat padhti hai aur har mahine aapko hosting ke liye $5-$10 tak kharch karna padhta hai. Agar aap blogging me naye hai tab aapko apne blogging ki suruwat blogger.com se karni cahiye aur jab aap blogging me puri tarah se expert ho jaye tab aap WordPress par apna blog sift kar lena cahiye. Blogger google ki ek free service hai Agar aapko blogger par ek badiya blog banana hai to aapko kewal domain name lene ki jaurat padegi aap gadaddy se domain le sakte hai. Yadi aap ek naya aur badiya blog suru karne jaa rahe hai to sabse pahla step aapka ye hoga ki hum apna blog kiss topic par banaye. Ek badiya Blog topic choose karne ke liye aapko apne ander jhaak kar dekhna cahiye ki humko kiss chiz me jayda interest hai aur aisa kon si chiz hai jisko mere se behtar koi aur nahi kar sakta hai. Apna Interest Kisme Hai kaise Pata Kare uski Tips aapko yaha mil jayegi, jiski madad se aap aasani se pata kar sakte hai ki, aapka kisme jada interest hai or konsa career aapke liye best rahega. Ek badiya blog topic choose karne se pahle aapko apne passion ko pata karna hoga aur aisa topic choose karna hoga jiske bare me aap regularly fresh aur new information likh sake. Aapko apna blog apne interest ke hisab se banana cahiye Ye jaruri nahi hai ki jiss topic par sabhi log blogging karte hai uss topic par aap bhi blog banaye. Jiss bhi chiz me aapko interest hai uss topic par aap apna blog banaye. Aise topic par aap apna blog kabhi naa bnaye jiske bare Me aapko naa hi jankari ho aur naa hi koi interest ho. Bhut se naye Blogger ye galtiya karte hai. wo dekhte hai ki yaar ye blog to itna popular hai to ham bhi aesa hi banate hai. par wo ye nahi jaante ki hamara isme interest kitna hai or kuch time baad sab khatam ho jata hai. to agar aap blogging me success hona chate hai to aesa to bilkul naa kare. Kisi or se apne aap ko compare naa kare or khud me kya talent hai unko jaan kar uspar apna blog banaye. Hindi blog banane se pahle ye bhi apne dimak me rakhe ki aap duasro ki help apne hindi blog se kaise kar sakte hai. Kyoki jab aapke blog se kisi ko koi fhyada hoga tabhi woh aapke blog par phir se visit karega Ye Internet Hai Mere Dost Yaha par Bina Kisi Mtlab ke Koi kisi Ko Poke Bhi Nahi karta Khane ka matlab hai aap jis bhi Topic par blog banaye par usme aap jo bhi daal rahe hai usko ye diyan me rakh kar dale ki isse kin logo ko faida hoga or kin logo ki isko jarurat hai. mera khane ka matlab aap samaj gaye hoge ki blog me bina matlab ki faltu post dalne se bhi koi matlab nahi hai. Aap kisi bhi chiz ke bare me dusare ko sikha sakte hai Mtlab Jiss chiz me aap expert hai usko apne blog ke dwara aap dusare ko bhi sikh sakte hai. jisse logo ko uss chiz se help milegi aur woh aapke regular reader ban jayege. Apne blog ke dwara latest news aur trends provide kar sakte hai Jaise ki Agar aapko technology me interest hai to aap apne blog ke dwara latest technolgy news share karke logo ko techlogy ki information de sakte hai. Jisse logo ko aapke blog se technolgy ki jarkari milegi. Yadi aapko logo ko hasane me maza ata hai tab aap apne blog ke dwara funny jokes aur kahinyo ke dwraa logo ko entertainmnet kar sakte hai. Yadi aapko success story padhne me interest hai to aap apne blog ke dwara success aur motivation story likh kar dusare ko bhi inspire kar sakte hai. successfull logo ke stryggle time ko bhi share karke aap apne hindi blog ko Popular bana sakte hai. Aagar aapko computer me interest hai tab aap computer ka tutorial banakar apne blog ke dwara dusare ko bhi computer ke bare me sikha sakte hai. Is Trha or bhi bhut si chije hai jinpar blog banaya ja sakta hai. or logo ki help ki ja sakti hai. Ek successfull blogggers apne competitor ki har ek chiz par najar rakhta hai. Agar aapko bhi apne Hindi blog ko high level par lekar jana hai to sabse pahle aapko apne competitor ko dhudhna hoga aur uske blog ko study karna hoga ki aakhir woh apne blog me kya kya karte hai. Apne competitor ko dhuh kar aap aisa kabhi naa kare ki jo jo blog post woh likha hai wahi wahi post mai bhi likhu. Aap apne blog me hemsa new aur fresh content likhne ki kosish kare. Apne Top competitor ki ek list banaye aur unpar hmesa najar rakhe ki woh apne hindi blog me kya kya kar rahe hai. Ye ek bahut jaruri baat hai kyoki aap ek Popular hindi blog banane ke bare me soch rahe hai aur aapke samne aapke hindi blog ke bahut se competitor milege. Apne Competitor se Sikho par kabhi usko Copy mat karo. Jaha aapne kisi ko copy kiya aapka khatam hona tay hai Yaha Competitor se ye matlab nahi hai ki aap jis topic par blog banaye us topic par phele se jitne blog hai wo aapke dusman ban jaye. nahi . Aapko unse mil kar chalna hai or agar koi jankari unke blog par hai to aap uski link apne post me de issi trha wo bhi aapke post ki link unki post me de sakte hai. jisse ek achi bonding bhi banegi or usse sabko faida bhi hoga. Agar aap ye soch rahe hai ki aap kisi blog ka contant ko copy karke apne blog par daal dege thoda bhut change karke. to aap likh kar rakh lijiye aap fail hi hoge. or aesa karne se phele aap ek war ye post jarur pade Dusare Website Se Copy karne ke Faide or Nuksan. Jab bhi aap apne blog ka domain name choose karne jaye to ye baat apne man me hmesa rakhna cahiye ki aapke blog domain name aapke blog ke main topic se milta ho. Aapko kuch badiya domain name ko ek paper par likh lena cahiye uske baad un domain name ke bare me apne friend aur family se puche ki kon se domain name aapke blog ke liye better hoga Uske baad hi domain name choose kare. Blog ka domain name aisa hona cahiye jo bolne aur dekhne me accha lage. Kabhi bhi blog ka domain name badaLong na rakhe jitna ho sake utna hi chota rakhe. Domain name aisa hona cahiye jo ek baar dekhne par yaad ho jaye. Ek High ranking Domain name choose karne ke liye sabse pahle aap google keyword planner me jaye aur waha par apne blog topic ke main keyword ka keyword research kare. Uske baad jo result ayega usme se jo keyword jyada search kiya jata ho aur low competitor ho usko select karke uss naam se hi apna domain name register kar le. Ek naya Popular Hindi blog banane ke liye aapko apne topic se related top low competitor keyword ko find karke collect karna hoga. Kisi bhi blog ko success karne me keyword ek bahut hi importent role play karta hai. Bina blog post me keyword ka used kiye hue aapke blog ka article google par rank nahi karege aur agar aisa hota hai tab aapko google ke dwara traffic bhi nahi milega isliye naya hindi blog start karne se pahle apne blog topic se related jyada search kiye jane wale keyword ko collect kar . Apne top 10 competitor ki list banaye aur unke url ko alexa me daal kar unke 5 main aur top searching keyword ko collect karle. Aisa karne se aapko 50 top high ranking keyword Turant Mil Jayege. Ek naya blog ko Popular karna Aasan kaam nahi hai lekin agar hu sahi planing karke Hindi blog banaye to hum jarur success ho sakte hai. Blogging me success hona koi ek din ya phir ek mahine ka kaam nahi hai balki isme safal hone ke liye aapko hard word aur sahi planing ki jarurat padti hai. Blogging ek tree ki tarah hai jisko aapko pahle dekh rekh karna padhta hai baad me bloggingtree aapko paisefruit jarur dega Mai aapse buss yahi kahna chahuga ki kabhi bhi apne aapko kisi se kamjor naa samjhe, buss jiss kaam me lag jaye usko karte rahe jab tak Ki woh kaam pura naa ho jaye. 1 Apne naye blog ke bare me apne friend ko bataye aur kuch acche hindi bloggers se contect karke unse apne blog ke bare me review le. Dusre Blog par comment bhi kare 2 Starting ke 10 article bahut hi high quality Content me likhe har ek article ko kam se kam 1200-1500 word me likhe. Sarting ke aapke 10 article ekdum dil ko chune wala ho mitlab jo bhi usko padhe woh aapnse impress ho jaye. Ache article kaise likhe uski jankari 3 Apne new blog ko kuch badiya social bookmarking site par submit kare jaise ki blogdadda, indiblogger. 4 Facebook, Twitter, aur Google plus par apne new blog ka promotion kare. 5 google, yahoo aur bing par apne blog ka sitemap submit kare. 6 Apne new blog ka ek uniqe aur simple logo banaye! aapka logo simple hona cahiye mtlab uske kuch bhi tadak bhadak naa ho. Online Free Logo kaise banaye uski jankari yaha hai 7 Apne templateTheme ko simple, uniqe aur fresh rakhe. 8 Apne Naye blog par 1month tak kewal apne kaam kar dhyaan de traffic ki chinta naa kare bus aap apna kaam sahi tarike se kare aur haa apne blog se paisa kamane ke bare me 3 month ke baad hi soche. Pahle apne blog ko improved kare uske baad paisa kamane ke bare me soche. 9 Apne blog niche se related Popular facebook group par apne blog ka welcome message share kare aur unko bataye ki aapne ke naya Hindi blog launched kiya hai Hey Everyone! Muje ye batate hue bahut khusi ho rahe hai ki aaj maine apna naya tech blog launched kiya hai! jaha par mai technolgy ki latest news share karuga aap sab se meri request hai ki aap logo mere new blog ko dekhe aur mere blog ke bare me apna review de. Regard Rohit Mewada Hindimehelp.com 10 Logo ke sath relationship banaye aur sabke sath friendly rahe apne blog par aye hue har commnet ko value de aur unka answer de. Apne aapko kabhi bhi over-smart naa Sabit kare aur un logo ko hmesa yaad kare jin logo ne aapki help ki hai. Ab aapne Blog ki planing to jaan li, par aapko Blogging me fail hone ke karan bhi pata hona chaiye taki wo galtiya aap naa kare Blogging me succes hona itna aasan to nahi hai par is duniya me naa mumkin bhi kuch nahi hai. Aapko Hindi Me Help ki success Story bhi padni chaiye Muje ummid hai aapko ye Article pasand aai hogi or aapko isme bhut si aesi jankari mili hogi jo or kahi nahi mil sakti thi. To Friends agar aap apne dusre blogger friends ki bhi help karna chate hai to unse is article ko jarur share kare. isse sabki help hogi or hamara acha ralation bhi banega. Comment karke jarur bataye ye post kesi lagi or isme aapko sabse achi baat kya lagi. or agar koi sabal hai to aap wo bhi puch sakte hai. Stay Happy and Share it.

Hey dosto mera naam Ankit Jha hai aur main HindiYaar.in ka owner hu ye ek guest post hai jo aapko jarur padhna chahiye. Aaj hum online shopping par baat karenge jo ki aajkal har koi karta toh hai lekin bina kisi savdhani, jinko jada jankari hi nahi hoti jiske wajah se bhut logo ko baad mein pachtana bhi padta hai. Aajkal har chij online hone lagi hai, jisme shopping ki baat kare toh sabse jyada magar aap sabhi ko pata nahi hoga ki online shopping karte time aapse fraud bhi kiya ja sakta hai isliye humesha kuch jaruri baaton ka dhyan rakhna chahiye jisse ki baad mein pachtana na pade. Main iss post mein aap sabhi ko bahut important baatein batane wala hu Online Shopping se judi hui so iss post ko please dhayan se padhe. Online shopping india mein sabse pehle Flipkart company ne start kiya tha lekin aajkal bahut se online shopping sites open ho chuke hai par sabhi site genuine nahi hote unme se kuch site fake bhi hote hai jo sirf logo ka nuksan karte hai. Aaj hum iss post mein kuch aesi tips janenge jisse hume online shopping karte time help milegi. Agar aap mere bataye huye tips ko follow karte ho toh aap online fraud se bach sakte ho. Dosto online aajkal sabkuch mil jata hai woh bhi bahut saste daamo mein lekin kuch sites aise bhi hote hai jo price ko badha chadhakar batate hai taki woh jyada se jyada paise kama sake. itna hi nahi kuch website aapke card ko hack bhi kar sakte hai, so aise sites se bachne ke liye aapko kya karna hai wo sab me batane wala hu, ummid hai aapko pasand aayega. Aap jis bhi product ko kharid rahe ho pehle toh uski puri information or detail ko achi se dekhe aur yeh dekho ki product ke jo features hai kya woh aapke liye sahi hai ya fir usme koi kami hai. Yeh baat main iss liye bata raha hu kyuki kai baar log bas product ke photos aur naam dekhkar hi uss product ko kharid lete hai magar jab wo product unke haath mein aata hai tab unko apni galti ka ahsas hota hai. By the way agar aapne koi product galti se kharid liya hai toh koi baat nahi aap usey replace bhi karwa sakte ho. Agar aapko nahi pata ki product replace kaise hota hai so don t worry iske steps aapko company ke official site par mil jayegi ya fir aap iss bare mein google par bhi search kar sakte ho Aajkal E-commerce sites bahut jyada hai lekin jaruri nahi hai ki sabke price same ho. Bahut baar aisa hota ki jo hum product kharid rahe hote hai uska price kisi site par jyada hota hai aur kisi or site par kam isliye agar aap chahte ho ki aapke paise bache toh price compression jarur kare. aap chahe toh kuch popular online compression sites jaise ki MySmartPrice, Junglee, PriceDekho etc. ki madad le sakte ho. Main bhi koi product kharidne se pehle uska price compare jarur karta hu, aur yakeen maniye price compare karne se aapke paise jarur bachenge. So price compare karna bhi bahut jaruri hai. Aapko pata hi hoga aajkal online fraud bahut hote hai isiliye jis bhi site se aap kuch kharid rahe ho uska url jarur verify kare kahi woh fraud toh nahi hai. Bahut baar aisa hota hai ki kuch fraud companies official website ke naam se hi dusri website bana lete hai jo ki dikhne mein bilkul same hota hai aur log dhokha kha jate hai. Ek baat ka humesha dhyan rakhe ki 1 domain name se 2 sites nahi banaya ja sakti, jaise ki koi amazon.com se hi dusri site nahi bana sakta kyuki yeh already ban chuki hai lekin koi amazon.com ki jagah amajon.com kare tab yeh site banana possible hai. lekin aap url par agar dhyan rakhe toh aise frauds se bach sakte ho. So kisi shopping site ke open hone ke baad aapko sabse pehle uss site ka url check karna hai. Aap jab kisi site par visit karte ho tab aapne url box mein http ya https jarur dekha hoga so iska kya matlab hota hai aur yeh humein online fraud se kaise bachata hai. Dosto https mostly online money transaction wale sites use karte hai aur https puri tarah secure hota hai isse hone wale transaction ki detail koi hacker aasani se nahi chura sakta lekin http use karne wale site secure connection nahi hote aur aapka data koi hacker aasani se chura sakta hai. HTTPS ka matlab secure Connection, or agar hamare computer or website ke bich me secure connection nahi hoga to koi bhi hacker bich me hi hamari detail chura sakta hai. to iss baat ka bhi dhiyan jarur rakhe. So friends mere kehne ka seedha matlab yeh hai ki jis site par aap shopping kar rahe ho woh https hona jaruri hai agar woh https nahi hai toh uss site par online payment naa kare to aapke liye accha hoga. Jitni bhi Online Shopping sites hai, ya koi bhi site jispar online payment hoti hai wo HTTPS to hoti hi hai, to online payment karne ke liye apni card ki detail dalne se phele Browser me HTTPS jarur check kare. Jab bhi hum koi product online buy karte hai tab humein sabse pehle shipping address fill karna hota hai uske baad billing details lekin kya aap sure hai ki koi aapke pc se yeh details nahi chura sakta ? Ji aisa possible hai koi chahe toh aapke browser se woh details aasani se chura sakta sakta hai isliye kabhi bhi apna card detail kisi browser mein save na kare aur jab aapki shopping complete ho jaye uske baad apna account log out jarur kare. Agar aapka Personal Computer hi hai or jisko aapke aalawa koi use nahi karta to alag baat hai. Main hai agar aap save karke rakhte hai to iss baat ka dhiyan rakhe ki koi or aapke browser ko use naa kare. Har koi chahta hai ki jab woh kuch kharide uske paise bache, lekin online shopping mein koi bargaining ka chakkar nahi hai isliye hum dusra tarika use karte hai, jise coupon kehte hai. Coupon aajkal har site apne coustmers ko deti hai aur uss coupon ki madad se aapko discount mil jata hai. Coupon mostly kisi festival par jyada launch kiya jata hai jaise ki diwali, holi, rakshabandhan etc. So coupon ka use karke aap online shopping karte time apne paise bacha sakte ho.

Agar aapka Blog hai, or aap chate hai ki wo 2g speed me bhi fast load ho to aap AMP ka use kare, wese mene phele bataya tha ki kaise Blog ki speed badaye, q ki blog ki speed SEO ke liye bhi bhut jaruri hai or aaj iss Post me aapko AMP ke ware me batane wala hu. or Free AMP Template bhi dekhege jo Blogpost ke liye best hai. AMP yani Accelerated Mobile Pages jo ki Google ka new project hai jo Mobile me sites or fast or aasan tarike se open karne ke liye hai. Agar site me AMP enable hai to Mobile me bhale slow internet chal raha ho, sites bhut fast load hoti hai. AMP me hota ye hai, jitne bhi extra code hote hai jo site ka load badate hai, or site ko load nahi hone dete. wo AMP version me load hi nahi hote. to aese me jo kaam ki chije hai Hamari Post or Ads sirf wo load hote hai. Sabse badiya baat ye hai AMP ki, jo site ka design hai wo bhi acha dikhta hai or fast bhi load hoti hai. isme hamare fayda to hai ki, q ki site puri load ho jati hai or jo user hamari site ko open kar raha hai uska bhi fayda hoga, q ki uska data kam lagta hai. Agar Aap AMP ke ware me or jada jankari chate hai to aap AMP Official site par dekh sakte hai. Abhi AMP Project new hai, par aane wale kuch time me muje lagta hai issi ka use hone wala hai, q ki har koi chata hai ki uski site fast load ho. Site ka Fast Load hona SEO ke liye bhi bhut jaruri hai. Ye dekhiye HindiMeHelp par bhi AMP use kar raha hu, to jo bhi mobile par Google me HMH ko search karte hai unke mobile me site AMP version me hi open hoti hai. search me AMP enable site kesi aati hai usko aap screenshot me dekh sakte hai.

Hello Bloggers, Agar aapka Blog Google ke free platform par hai to aapke liye ek khus khabri hai, Blogger.com ne abhi HTTPS ki setting di hai Blogspot blog ke liye jinki madad se ham apne blog ko secure kar sakte hai. Simple sabdo me kahu to isse site ki security me ek or layer ban jati hai or apni site or jada secure ho jati hai apne blog ke visitor ke liye. ye kuch faide hai HTTPS use karne ke

Ye Flikover every Indian bank se payement accept karta hai. Flikover Se Premium SEO Tools Buy Karne Ke Fayade 1.Flikover World ke lagbhag all Best SEO Tool jaise Semrush, Ahref etc offer karta hai , jise aage detaila me janenge. 2.Flikover standard price se kafi kam price me service offer karta hai. Jaise Semrush ki Pro Account ki Price $99.95 per month, but ise Flikover me $8 yani Rs 500month me buy kiya ja sakta hai. 3.Flikover Payumoney ke through payment accept karti hai, jo all Indian Bank Debit cards se payment accept karti hai. Flikover Kaun Kaun Si Premium SEO Tool Services Offer Karta Hai 1.A href Yadi aap backlink banana chahte hai to Ahref aapke liye best tool sabit ho sakta hai. Iske alava isse site audits, SERP checking, broken link checking, content explorer, rank tracking etc kiya ja sakta hai. Pricing Ahref Advanced Account $399 per month Flikover Price $10 Rs 600 per month 2.Semrush Semrush world ka number -1 SEO tool hai , jisse aap keyword research, domain analysis, competitor domain analysis, competitor keyword analysis etc kar sakte hai. Pricing KWFinder Premium Account $ 69 per month Flikover $7 Rs 400 per month 4.Majestic Majestic ahref ki sabse best option hai. Jab competitior aapko ahref par block kar deta hai. tab aap isse competitor ki backlink profile analysis kar skate hai. Pricing Majestic Pro Account $ 149 per month Flikover $7 Rs 300 per month 5.Canva Kya aap apne blog ke liye high quality meme, infographics, social graphic and posters create karana chahte hai, jo aapke blog aur social campaign ke liye jaruri hai? Aapko Canva use karana chahiye, jo Blogger ke liye best hai. Pricing Canva $12.95 per month Flikover $5 Rs150 per month 6.Grammarly I am sure, Grammarly ke bare me aap janate honge. Grammarly se effortlessly English language se related mistake ko correct kar sakte hai. Jo USA UK based English par work karta hai. Pricing Grammarly Premium Account $29.95 per month Flikover $5 Rs100 per month 7.Word AI Ham Indian English native nahi hai. Isliye English me mistakes hona lajami hai. But Google mistake like nahi karta hai, jo indirectly blog ki ranking par bad impact dalta hai. Lekin Word AI tool ki help se is tarah ke mistake ko remove kar post ko correctness improve kar sakte hai. Ye Grammarly se different hai. Grammarly words par focus karti hai, jabki Word AI post ke all content par. Ye mistakes remove kar post ke paragraph ko logically setup karta hai. Pricing Word AI Tutoring Account $49.95 per month Flikover $7 Rs400 per month 8.Keyword Tool Yadi aap Youtuber ya Affiliate Marketer hai to aapko Keyword Tool use karana chahiye. Is tool ki help aap separately Google, Youtube, Bing, Amazon , eBay aur App Store se related keyword jan sakte hai. Pricing Pro Plus Account $88 per month Flikover $7 Rs300 per month 9.ANIMOTO Ab ranking pana easy nahi hai, lekin yadi post me video insert kare to behatar user engagement se ranking increase ki ja sakti hai. But iske liye great video banana ki jarurat hoti hai. Jise Animoto se create kiya ja sakta hai. Animoto se social video, tutorial video aur slideshow videos banaya ja sakta hai. Pricing Animoto Pro Account $42 per month Flikover $5 Rs 200 per month 10.Lynda.com Kya aap online learning like karte Hai ? Lynda.com aapke liye best place ho sakta hai. Linkedin company Lynda.com bahut se online learning courses offer karti hai. 1.3D Animation 2.Bussiness 3.Web Development 4.App Deveopment 5.Gaming Development 6.Designing 7.Photography 8.Marketing 9.Video Shootin Pricing Lynda.com Premium Account $29.99month Flikover $5 Rs200month 11.Buzz Sumo Competitor blog ka most shared posts and social strategy janane ke liye Buzz Sumo best tool hai. Isse hame high traffic-able topic easily find kar sakte hai aur blog par viral traffic drive kar sakte hai. Pricing Buzz Sumo Pro Account $ 79 month Flikover $6 Rs 300 month 12.Spy Fu Google keyword Planner se aap competitor ke profitable keywords aur campaign ke bare me nahi jan sakte hai . But Spy Fu tool ki help ye sab jan sakte hai aur easily apne competitor ko overtake kar sakte hai. Pricing Spy Fu Basic Account $39 month Flikover $4 Rs 200 month 13.Alexa Alexa se aap apne blog ke sath competitor blog ki ranking, top keywords, audience overviews ko jan sakte hai. Jisse apne blog ke liye kis tarah ke post write karana chahiye, ise easily jana ja sakta hai. Pricing Alexa Advanced Account $149 month Flikover $4 Rs 200 month 14.Moz Yadi aap world SEO expert Rand Fishkin se SEO learn karana chahte hai to Moz SEO Tool buy kar sakte hai. Ve 14 hours ke 29 video offer karte hai. Sath hi Open Site Explorer, DA, PA Checker Tool, Moz Local available karte hai. Pricing Moz Pro Account $149 month Flikover $5 Rs250 month 15.Woorank Woorank website review karane ke liye best tool hai. Ye tool details me blog ki SEO related issues Site title, meta description, robots.txt, URL parameters, blocking factors, crawl errors etc. check kar review report show karta hai. Pricing Woorank Premium Account $149.99 month Flikover $4 Rs200 month 16.Netflix Netflix se aap world aur India ke popular TV shows, Movies, TV Serials dekh sakte hai. Pricing Netflix Premium Account $13.99 month Flikover Price $2 Rs 100 month Flikover Kaise Work Karta Hai Flikover ki service use karane ke liye do plugins Flikover1 and Flikover2 ko install karna jaruri hai, jo keval Google Chrome browser me hi work karta hai. Ab user jis SEO Tool ko buy kar chukka hai, uspar click kar turant access kar sakta hai. Flikover Support Flikover support team users ke problem shootout karne me bahut hi responsive hai. Problem hone par aap unhen contact us forum ya unke Facebook Support Page par contact kar sakte hai. Refund Policy Flikover ke pas refund policy bhi hai, jiske tahat yadi aap service like nahi karte hai to aapka money return ho sakte hai. Pro 1. Flikover se cheapest rate me World Best SEO Tool buy kar sakte hai. 2.Flikover all Indian Banks Debit Cards ko accept karta hai. 3.Flikover 95 access hone ki guarantee deta hai. 4. Flikover Plugin install karte hi instant SEO Tool ko access kar sakte hai. 5.Flikover ke pas refund policy hai. 6.Yadi aap kisi SEO Tool ko access nahi kar paa rahe to Flikover usi SEO Tool ka Backup Account bhi available karta hai. Cons 1.Flikover Chrome Browser par hi work karta hai. 2.Flikover Account ko ek hi IP Address se access kare. Kya aap cricket game ke fan hai ?. Tab aap cricket ke bare me achcha knowledge rakhte honge? To ab apne cricket knowledge se real cash win kar sakte hai. bas aapko fantasy cricket play karna hoga. Jise aap CricPlay par khel sakte hai, vo bhi bilkul free. Ye dream11 ke saman hai, but kuch difference hai, jise ham aage janenge. 10 50-60 , CricPlay Kya hai CricPlay Dream11 ke bad India ki second fantasy aur 100 free first fantasy cricket platform hai. Google play ke details according is free platform ko Times Internet Limited ne launch kiya tha. Abhi ye platform bilkul new hai, isliye isme bahut se changes ho sakte hai. Abhi jo hai, uske bare me baat karte hai Dream11 Kya Hai Kaise Play Win Kare Is platform me upcoming match ke liye dono teams ke players se ek team banana hota hai. Us team me every player ke performance base par points milata hai. Match finish hone ke bad sabhi team ki final ranking banai jati hai. Usi base par cash prize diya jata hai. Jise Paytm Wallet me transfer kar sakte hai. CricPlay par aap tin tarah ke contest play kar sakte hai 1.Play with the World Win Money aapko apni team banani hai aur uske performance ke base par real money win kar sakte hai. 2.Play with Friends Show them You are the best aap is platform par personal contest create kar sakte hai aur friends ko join karva kar unke sath competition kar sakte hai. 3.Daily Prediction Every day Cric Play upcoming match se related question ask karta hai, jise aapko predict karana hota hai. Yadi aap ka answer sahi hai to cash prize win kar sakte hai, jo weekly basis par milta hai. Dream11 Account Verify Kaise Kare CricPlay Par Account Kaise Banaye 1.Play store CricPlay app install kare. 2.App open kare aur Get Started par click kare. 3. Mobile number enter kare. 4.Ab aapke mobile par verification ke liye 6 digit pin aayega, use enter kar confirm kare. Ab aap ka account create ho chuka hai. CricPlay Kaise Play Kare 1.Sign up ke bad CricPlay app open kare. 2.Kisi Upcoming Match par tap kare. 3. Play cash contest par click kare. 4. Join Contest par click kare. 5.Ab aap ko dono teams ke players se apne ek team banani hai. Jiske kuch rules hai- -Aapko 1000 credit point se team banana hoga, ye point player pick karne time deduct ho jayegi. -Aapko dusri team se kam se kam 3 players pick karna hi hoga. -Aapke team ka structure kuch aisa hoga 3-5 Batsman 3-5 Bowlers 1 Wicket keeper 1-3 All rounder 6.Ab next kare aur Captain Vice Captain banaye. Dhyan rakhe Captain ko double aur vice captain ko 1.5x points milte hai , jo wining ke liye main factor hote hai. 7. Save Team kare, ab aapne successfully contest join kar liya hai. Note Is team ko match start hone se 1 hours pahle edit bhi kar sakte hai. aur aap Current match competition home ke Plus icon par click kar second team bana sakte hai. But aapko 12 coins ki jarurat padegi. Jiske ke liye CricPlay referral program se coin earn kar sakte hai. Ise start karan ke liye sabse upar coin wallet par click kare. Ab Get More CoinsShare Code par click kare. Ab apne code ya referral link every friends ke sath share karo. Dream11 Se Money Withdraw Kaise Kare Cric Play Contest Win Kaise Kare Cric play contest free hai, but real cash win karake liye real tips follow karna hoga 1.Right Player Chune Contest me right players hona aapko half winner bana jata hai. Isliye aap player ki last performance aur fitness ka jarur dhyan rakhe. 2.Captain Vice Captain Jis player ko captain aur vice captain banate hai use performance se consecutively 2.x aur 1.5 x point milte hai. Vahi bowler ek wicket leta hai to use batsman ke banaye 1 ran se bahut jyada points milata hai. Inhi baaton ka dhyan me rakh kar captain vice captain banaye. 3.Pich Report Pitch condition janana jaruri hai because pitch spin ke liye better hai to us match me spinner bowler aur jyada spin khelne vale batsman ko khilaya jayega. Final Touch Cric Play 100 free hai, jaha upar bataye gaye tips aur apne cricketing knowledge se real cash win kar sakte hai. Yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai to Facebook, Google Plus, Twitter aur Whatsapp par share kare.

Ye Post HMH.pe Blogger Series ki post hai. Blogger Blog me ham jab bhi koi post karte hai to hamari jo post hai bo Home page par puri dikhti hai or usse hamare jo blog ka look hai wo acha nahi dikhta, ussi ko sahi karne ke liye ham read more ki link add karege apne blog ki har post me. Ham apne blog ki har post ko alag alag bhi Read More option add kar sakte hai, apne blog ke editor me insert jump break ki madad se, utni hi post home page par dikhti hai. par isme hamara sirr-dard hai, har baar jump break add karo post me. to chaliye jaante hai kaise apne blog ke template me ek code add karke puri post me read more ka option lagaye. Defult template me home page par puri post dikhti hai, or jab ham read more ki script apne blog me add kar dete hai to Post to chota sa hissa dikhta hai or hamari post ki pheli image dikhti hai. jisse koi bhi dekh kar samaj sakta hai ki is post me kya hai. or agar usko wo post padni ho to uspar click karke usko pad sakta hai. Iska ek or faida hai hme, wo ye hai ki agar koi visitor hamari post ko padta hai to hamare blog ke page views bhi badte hai. Aap image ka size or kitne sabd dikhana hai usko bhi badal sakte ho, uske bare me mene niche bataya hai. Important Note Agar aap koi costume template use karte hai to aapko ye code add karne ki koi jarurat nahi hai apne template me q ki wo phele se add hota hai. Blogger ke liye aap badiya template yaha se download kar sakte hai Apne blogger ke deshboard me jao, fir Template ke section me jaa kar Edit HTML ki button par click kare. ????Template ko edit karne se phele template ka backup download kare Ab kahi bhi click kare Template code Editor me, Fir CtrlF dabaye. Ab ek secrch box aa jayega usme head likh kar Enter kare. Enter karte hi code ????search ho jayega template me. Ab aapko ye code ko copy karke head ke upar paste karna hai. Note Is Code ke suru me kuch number hai aap chahe to usko apne hisab se badal sakte ho. postsnothumbsum 490 Agar Image nahi hai post me to kitne sabd dikhana hai poststhumbsum 400 Image hai to kitne sand dikhana hai imgthumbheight 160 Thumbnail ki hight kya rakhni hai imgthumbwidth 180 Thumnail ki width kya rakhni hai Fir se CtrlF daba kar is code ko search kare. datapost.body Note ye code ho sakta hai 2 ya 3 baar aapke template me ho. aap Jitni bar Enter ki button dabayege aapko code ka pata chal jayega. last wale code ko hata kar ye code paste karna hai. ab Preview Template karke dekhe . Agar kaam nahi kar raha hai to aap ye jo code hai bo dusre code ki jagha badal kar dekhe. Last me Save Template par click kade. Ummid hai aapko ye post pasand aai hogi. Agar kahi koi dikkat aati hai Read More ke code ko add karne me to comment karke jarur bataye. ????Blogger ke upar or post padne ke liye yaha click kare. ????Kya aapko pata hai aap Youtube se bhi paise kama sakte ho
