Aap chahe kitane bhi post likh le, yadi aap apne blog ke liye traffic drive nahi kar pate hai to aapke dvara kiye sabhi hardwork waste hai. Maine personally hundreds hindi aur hinglish blogs ko analyzed kiya, jiske baad maine paya ki 97 bloggers traffic pane ke basic rules ko bhi follow nahi karte. Aise me ve low traffic aur post index naa hone ki regular complain karte hai. Isliye maine unki hi kamiyon ko dhyan men rakhakar yeh post ready kiya hai. Is post maine koi extraordinary tips nahi bataye, balki vahi normal se tips bataye hai, jo kisi bhi bloggers ko basically follow karane chahiye. Yadi aap bhi low traffic se suffered hai to is post ko carefully read kare- Blog Ki Traffic Kaise Badhaye 1 Post Title Post read karane se pahle hi, post title se hi reader jan jata hai ki post kya kahane vala hai. Isliye hamesha post title attractive aur message-full banane chahiye, jo direcatlly reader ke mind se request karta ho. Post title two types ke hote hai. Post Title Yeh title aapke blog me showup hota hai. Jise aap WordPress text editor me sabse pahle set karte hai. Ise visitors ko dhyan me rakhakar create karana chahiye. Web Title Ise Yoast jaise SEO plugin ki help se create kiya jata hai. Jise aap bhi WordPress Text Editor ke niche Yoast plugin ki help se set kar sakte hai. Yah Google SERPs me show up hota hai. Isliye web-title me trafficable keyword include karana jaruri hai. Ab ham posttitle ke structure par kuch baat kar lete hai, jismen pahle aata hai- i Long Tail Keyword Long Tail Keywords se matble hai, post se related words. Jinhen aap post ke web title me add karte hai to aapki traffic badhane ke 50 chances badh jate hai. Because long tail keywords ke karan aapka target ek se adhik trafficable words par ho jata hai. Post related long tail keywords ke bare me kaise jane- a Google Keyword Planner Google ka yeh tool bilkul free aur easy usable hai. Bas aapko Google Adword Account setup karna hoga. Jiske bad is tool ki help se post related important keywords ek stroke me find kar sakte hai. b LSI Yadi aap Google ke SERPs ko thode se seriously lete hai to aapne page ke ant me SERPs se related kai words denkhe honge, jise Latent Semantic Indexing kaha jata hai. In keywords ko jagah Google traffic ke base par deta hai. Matalab yadi LSI ko post title me add kare to post ki traffic badhai ja sakti hai. C Major Competitors Yeh bahut achcha hoga, yadi aap kam se kam weekly apne competitor blogs par visit karte hai. Isse aapko competitor ki ranniti ka pata chalta hai. Isi tarah related post ke web-title me use kiye gaye, keywords ko analyze karana chahiye aur important keywords ko apne post ke web-title me include karna chahiye. Per dhyan de apke post ki web-title aur aapke competitors ke web-title same nahi hone chahiye. Nahi to puri traffic aapke competitors hi le jayenge. ii Kaise word aur Number Word Use Kare Kya aap janate hai? Kissmetrics ke report ke anusar Kaise how to aur Number words title vale post sabse jyada share kiya jate hai. Kyonki ye keyword visitors ko attract karane ke mamle me powerful hote hai. Aur kaise word har Insaan ke kaise word se match hota aur numbers unhen post read karne ka properreason deta hai. 2 Proper Keyword Density Sambhavatah har hindi beginner bloggers ke man me question hota hai ki kaise keyword density pura kare , kyonki ve post ko puri tarah se hindi font me ready karte hai. To main bata dun ki focus keyword ko aap English me likhe aur per 500 words ke liye tin bar focus keywords ka use kare. Jisse aap proper keyword density pura kar sakenge. Yes! ek baat ka jarur khyal rakhe ki pahle 100 words me ya pahle paragraph me focus keyword use kiya gaya ho. Isse post ki subject fast clear hoti hai aur Google bot post ko jaldi index karta hai. 3 Readability Readability ka sidha sa meaning hai, post ko is tarah se taiyar karana ki reader easily aur smoothly read kar sake. Isliye aap chahe kitane hi quality post likhe le, lekin yadi readability ka dhyan nahi rakhate hai to sab waste hai. Jab maine is mamlen men hindi blogs ko analyze kiya to maine paya ki 90 blogs readability ka bilkul bhi dhyan nahi rakhate. Masalan ve apne post me computer ke enter key ka kanjusi se use karte hai. Jisse unke post lambe-lambe paragraphs se bhar-pade hai. Isi vajah destop par hi post ko read karane me badi mushkil feel hoti hai. Fir sochiye, smart phone ki choti screen par kaise use post ko read kiya ja sakega ? Is karana readers ko post read karne me hardness feel hoti hai. Ve dusre blog par move kar jate hai. Jisse us blog ki bounce rate increase, ranking aur traffic decrease ho jati hai, Isliye post ko aisa likhe, jise readers happy-happy read kar sake aur aapke blog ka regular visitor ban sake. Iske liye aap prayas kare ki do se tin lines ki paragraph banaye. Jisse desktop aur mobile par asani se read kiya ja sake. 4 Images Infographics Yadi aap image proper tarike se use karte hai to ye aapke thousand words ke barabar hai. Vaise bhi 2017 men images SEO ke liye bahut hi important factor hai, jo aapke liye backlink ke sath good traffic bhi driver kar sakta hai. Isliye Images ke liye 1.Pixabay jaise free stock vale websitese se high resolution vale images use kare, jinka impression bahut great hota hai. 2.Infograhic ka use kare, jo backlinks ke chances badhata hai. Image Se Kaise Traffic Badhaye 5 Theme Design PNG Logo Theme design thik vaise hi jaise aap aur aapke aspas ke poeple smart dikhane ke liye achche-achche clothe, oil, beauty creams use karte hai. Jab aap general life men itne sajate sanvarate hai to profession life ko kyon ugly rakha jaye? English me ek idiom hai, Well begin is half done. Ise main blogging ke sandarbh kahta hun First Good impression is half done Yani 1.Aapke theme ka design profession ho. 2.Ek PNG transparent logo ho. 3.Ek sidebar ho. 4.Important widget right place kiye gaye ho. 5.Feature Image ke liye High Resolution Images Use kiya gaya ho. Tabhi aap first impression ke conditions ko fulfill karte hai. Isliye free theme ki jagah premium theme use kare. Kyonki. 1.Unki coding clean hoti hai. Jisse blog ki speed fast ho jati hai. 2.Inmen pahle se Schema.org ki coding installed hoti hai. Jo aaj ke SEO ka main part hai. 3.Inki look profession hoti hai aur easily customization karke ise or bhi professional banaya ja sakta hai. Lekin mai samjh sakta hun kisi bhi beginner blogger ke liye premium theme buy karana out of budget ho sakta hai. 16 Tariko Se Blog Ki Speed Badhaye Isliye aap mujhse saste rate par premium theme buy kar sakte hai, Jo fast loadable and superb seo friendly theme hoga. Bilkul bloggingfirst.com ki tarah. Jiski profession design aap dekh sakte hai, jo first impression ke sabhi condition ko fulfill karta hai aur iski speed bhi check kar sakte hai, jo 1.5s hai. bloggingfirst speed report Theme ke alava logo aapke blog ka taaj hota hai. Taaj jitana sundar hota hai. Uksi chamk utni hi dur jaati hai. Isliye poster jaise dikhane vale logo naa lagaye, balki uske jagah high resolution vale PNG transparent logo lagaye. Yadi aap High Resolution PNG Transparent Logo create nahi kar sakte hai to aap mujhse behad hi kam kimaton par logo design karva sakte hai. Iske liye aap mujhe contanct kar sakte hai. 6 Email Marketing Most beginner blogger readers ke email collect karane par focus nahi karte. Jiske karan ve lagatar regular visitors pane ki jagah lose karane lagate hai. Aaj hi Getsitecontrol ya Hellobar jaise free email collector se visitors ke email collect karana start kare aur MailChimp se 2000 email-subscribers ko free mail send kar sakte hai. Email collect karane ke lihaj se sabse achcha popup email collector hota hai. Lekin ye visitors ko annoy karta hai. Butyadi popup email collector ki setting ek visitors ke liye ek din me ek baar hi open ho jaisi kar diya jaye. To ye kafi effective hogi. Ye puri setting aap Getsitecontrol dashboard me easily kar sakte hai. Aur iske alava yadi aap RSS Campaign run karana chahte hai to Google ka Feedburner Service hi best hai, jo puri tarah se free hai. Jiski puri setup read kar sakte hai- Par kuch baton ka dhyan rahe- FeedBurner Ko Blog Per Kaise Lagaye 1.Har blogging niche ka effective time hota hai, usi time me mail deliver karne ki koshish kare. 2.Google ke naye updates ke ansuar mobile phones me pop email-collector ko stop kar de. 3.Keval Google ke feedburner service par hi depend na rahe, Mailchimp se custom aur offer vale mail bhi send kare aur jisse aapki revenue bhi badh sake. 7 Social Marketing Aap Facebook par pakke taur par honge aur aap iske effectiveness se achchi tarah se introduce honge. But keval Facebook par hi promotion karne se kaam nahi chalega. because Google aapke blog ki social profiles ko dekhata hai aur ranking karta hai. Isliye Google Plus, Pinterest, Stubleupon, Reddit, Twitter, Instagram ko bhi join kare. Social Marketing par great promotion ke liye in tips ko follow karana hoga 1.High resolution vale images ya infographics jarur social post men include kare. Ise aap Canva se free me create kar sakte hai. 2.Email marketing ki tarah har social sites ka apana peak time and day hota hai. Jaise Facebook ka peak day Wednesday aur time 3-4 pm hai. Yani is time aur day me koi post karte hai to uske performance better hoga. Isi tarah others social sites ke peak time ko follow kare. 3.Twitter ke co-founder Evan Williams ka manana hai ki kisi bhi vykti ko social sites par 15 minutes se jayda time nahi spend karna chahiye. Vaise ek blogger ke liye social promotion work ke liye daily ideal time 30 minutes hai. Isliye aapko bhi Buffer jaies social marketing tool ka use karna chahiye, jiski help ek time me kai social sites par post kar, kafi time save kar sakate hai. Social Marketing Kya Hai ? Isse Kaise Traffic Paye Best 12 Methods 8 Commenting Commenting traffic pane ke lihaj se kitana important hai, iska proof main aapko is example dena chahunga- Xtremegaminerd.com ke founder Sarfraz Khan ne Feb 2015 me apne blog ko launch kiya. Aur pahle hi month se same niche ke blog aur website par regular comment karte rahe. Jisse unke blog ki traffic istarah se increase hui- June 2015 10-20 visits per day July 2015 20-30 visits per day Aug 2015 50 visits per day Sept 2015 100 visits per day Oct 2015 200 visits per day Nov 2015 200-300 visits per day Dec 2015 400-500 visits per day Jan 2016 600-700 visits per day Feb 2016 700-800 visits per day March 2016 800-100 visits per day. Aur regular commenting policy ka hi result raha hai ki ve ab 3000 visits per day paate hai. Aur Ek badi baat gajab rahi ki unhone do years me matr 45 post hi likhe hai. Lekin itne se traffic se monthly affiliated marketing se $4000 earn kar lete hai. Source SML Forum Isliye aap bhi same niche vale blog par comment kare. Isse aapke blog ki traffic bhi badhegi aur aapki ek online identity bhi banegi. Commenting ke samay kuch baton ka care kare- 1.Aapka comments one line ya two lines vala na ho. Aaap jitna long comment karenge. Aapka impression utna hi badhega. 2.Other blogs per kisi visitors ne question kiya ho to aapko uska reply karana chahiye, jo aapke knowledge ko show karega. 3.Comment me hamesha rich words ka hi use kare. 4.Non-essential commenting se bache, nahi to ye aapke Goodwill ke liye bad ho sakta hai. 5.Apne main email id ko gravator se connect kare aur smart look vala apni pic laga de. 6.Hamesha koshish kare same niche vale blog par hi comment kare, jisse aap maximum targeted traffic drive kar sakenge. 7.Comment ke liye real naam ka hi use kare, kyonki Google aapke har comment ko analyze karta hai. 9 Guest Posting Same niche ke high domain authorities vale blog per guest posting karna kisi beginner blogger ke liye quality backlink earn karne jaisa hai. Sathi blogging relation bhi banata hai, jo aapke blogging future ke liye jaruri hai. Iske alava aap kafi quality traffic apne blog ke liye drive kar sakte hai. 10 Long Post Kya aap long post likhate hai ? mera matlab 700 se 800 words vale post se. Yadi aap long post nahi likhate hai to iska matalab aap adh-pakka cooking kar rahe hai. Jise lena naa aap pasand karenge aur naa hi aapka visitor karega. Filahal Google ne Fred update laya hai, jiska impact un blogs par padega, jinke content short hai. Iskaran un blogs ki ranking decrease ho jayegi. Isliye is bare me jaldi decide kar len, nahi to kahin aapka blog na is update ke chapet naa aa jaye. Long Post likhane ke fayade- 1.Long post se sabhi related sub topics ko clear kiya ja sakta hai. Jo trafficable hoga. 2.Reading time increase hogi aur automatically bounce decrease hogi. Jisse us post ki ranking increase hone ke great chances ban jayenge. 3.Short post ki tulana me long post ko natural backlink milane ke chances 100 jyada hota hai, kyonki usmen har topic ki full details hoti hai. 4.Jab kisi topic ko details me likha jata hai to use kisi bhi readers dvara understand karana behad easy ho jata hai. Jiske karan readers long post ko love karte hai. 5.At last jab reader aapke post ko love karega to Google ko love karna hi padega. 11 Optimize Old Post Kya aap janate? Backlinko ke founder Brian Dean 5 years me only 34 post hi likhe hai, lekin ve daily lac views pate hai. Iske piche kya reason hai ? Ve new post likhane se jyada old post ko monthly optimized karne par focus karte hai. Old post me new trafficable keywords incluce karte hai aur new date par republish kar dete hai. Aur aap jante hai, Google hamesha fresh post ko high rankings deta hai. Jiske karan ve dubara apne old post high traffic pane lagate hai. Par jab hindi blogging community ki bat aati hai to main dekha, yaha daily post karane ki hod si machi hui to fir ve kaise old post ko optimize karenge ? Isliye main suggest karunga, thoda laptop ke keyboard ko rest de aur old post ko optimize kar new date par republish kare aur uske bad traffic dekhiye. Old Post Se 200 Traffic Kaise Badhaye 12 Blogging Directories Me Blog Submit Kare Indiblogger.in aur Blogarama.com jaise blogging directories par apna blog submit kare. Isse aap quality backlink aur traffic pa sakte hai. 13 Interview Always every beginner bloggers ko popular bloggers ke bare men read karana aur maximum janana achcha lagata hai. Aise me yadi aap popular blogger ke interviews lekar apne blog par publish kare to aapka blog ki ek alag identity ban sakti hai. Aur plus me popular bloggers se interact karne ka great opportunity bhi milega, jisse aapko bahut kuch learn karane ko milega. Last Words Aaj ke timeme traffic Designed Theme Logo Quality Content Marketing Strategy ke sanyog se hi better traffic pai ja sakti hai. Isliye pahle in charon par pahle focus kare aur jaldi se inhen fulfil kare and apne blog ke liye quality traffic paye, jo aapke revenue ko double kare. Iske alava aap traffic badhane ke konsa method apnate hai ? Hope, ye post aapke liye helpful hoga aur aapne ise pasand kiya ho. So Please share and comment.

Agar aap ek Blogger hai to Aap adsense jarur use karte hoge apne blog me, or agar abhi aapka adsense account approve nahi huaa hai to aapka ye sapna jarur hoga ki aapke blog me bhi adsense aap use kare. Aap Apne blog se paise kamane ke liye ads network ka use karte hai, par kabhi kabhi aapkobhi ye jarur lagta hoga yaar itne visitor aane par bhi earning itni kam hoti hai. abhi me aapko ussi ki tip dene wala hu, jiski madad se aap apni adsense ki earning jarur badha lage. Wese aapko pata hona chaiye Adsense 1000 views par kitne paise deta hai, ye fix to nahi hai. fir bhi ham andaja laga sakte hai. uski detail me jankari mene share ki hai aap usko bhi read kare. Agar aap Adsense use kar rahe hai to ye jankari aapke bhut kaam aane wali hai, aapko agar nahi pata ho to me aapko bata du, Adsense hame allow karta hai ki ham kisi bhi catogery ke ads ko block kar sakte hai, ya kisi bhi site ke ads ko block kar sakte hai, jo hame pasand naa ho ya unse hamari earning kam ho rahi ho To aese me hame iska fayda aise ho sakta hai ki hame jin keywords se kam CPC milta hai ham unko block karde to un ads ki jagha koi High CPC ka ads aayega or usse hamari earning bhi badegi. Me abhi aapko bataoga kaise aap Low CPC ads ko block kar sakte hai or ek list bhi duga Low CPC Advertiser ki, jisko mene internet par hi search kiya tha. or mene un sites ko adsense me block kiya to meri jo earning thi usme 30 increase huaa. Sabse phele to aapko apne adsense account me login karna hai. Account me login karne ke baad Allow block ads All my sites Advertiser URLs me jaye. Jo Box hai usme jo bhi Low CPC Advertiser URLs hai unko daal kar Block URLs ki buttom par click kare. Me aapko 500 Low CPC dene wale Advertiser URLs list de raha hu jisko mene block kiya hai, ho sakta hai aapki bhi earning badhe par iski koi guarantee nahi le sakta. aap in URLs ko block karke rakhe or ek mahine dekhe kya result milta hai. agar aapko lage nahi, in URLs ko block karne se koi fayda nahi huaa ya earning or kam ho gai to aap usko wapas allow kar dena. Note ye jo list hai wo mene internet par hi search karke use ki thi apne adsense me, or muje iska result acha mila hai to me aap logo se share kar raha hu, baki aapki earning kam hogi ya badegi wo Friends mene ye mega list share ki hai, jisme mene lagbhag sabhi words ka Full Form bataya hai jo Computer, Internet or Technology me use hone wale words ke or muje ummid hai aapko isme bhut se aese words ke full form bhi jaanne ko mila hoge jiske ware me aap phele nahi jante the.

Hello Friends, Aaj ham is post me sikhege kaise apne Facebook ID ya Page ka user-name ko set kar sakte hai or kaise badal sakte hai. Agar aapka Facebook Page nahi hai or aap banana chate ho to aap Phele ye pado FB par Fan s Page kaise banate hai. Username har ek Page or Profile ki ek alag ID hoti hai. Facebook Par jintne bhi Page ya Profile hai un sanki ek alag Id hai. Jab Ham Facebook par account banate hai ya fir Facebook Page banate hai to hamari ID ke Number me hoti hai. Ham hamare ID ko change kar sakte hai. Jisse bo yaad rakhne me bhi aasan ho. Facebook ID kuch is trha rhati hai www.facebook.com123456789 or ham usko aesi badal sakte hai www.facebook.comHindiMeHelp kholta. Sabse phele aap apne Facebook Account me Login kare. Login karne ke baad is Button par click kare Change Facebook User Name ab apna username daal kar save changes ki button par click kare. Dhiyan rakhe jo username phele se nahi hoga wo hi set kar sakte hai aap. Also Read Facebook Security Account Hack Hone Se Kaise Bachaye Facebook page ka username badalne ke liye aap apne page ko open kare jiske aap admin hai, uske baad About Us Tab me jaye. Is Page me aane ke baad aapko Username ka ek option dikhega, uske samne ko edit likha hai uspar click karke. jo username aap set karna chate hai apne Page ka wo dale or save karde. WhatsApp Messenger jo sabse popular Mobile Messaging Application hai jo lagbhag har Smart Phone me Install hai, Jisme Rojana caroro log message send or recive karte hai. Agar kisi ka Personal Data pata karna hai to WhatsApp bhi uska ek jaruya ho sakta hai q ki ham uspar bhut se aesi chije share karte hai jo kisi ko pata chal jaye to usse hamara nuksan ho sakta hai. Simple sabdo me kahe to agar hamara Whatsapp hack ho jaye to ham musibat me pad sakte hai. Aaj ham is post me dekhege ki kaise ham WhatsApp ko Hack kar sakte hai or kaise Dusro se apne WhatsApp ko hack hone se bacha sakte hai. Jo Hacker hai wo hamara koi Dost ya fir hamara Family member ho sakta hai. Ye bhi pade Jese ki aap jante ho hoge OTP ke conform kare ham WhatsApp use kar hi nahi sakte. jan ham Whatsapp install karke apna Mobile Number register karte hai to hamare mobile par ek SMS aata hai jisko hame whatsapp me dalna hota hai. Jab hamara whatsapp account chalu hota hai. To Agar koi aapka Whatsapp is trha hack karna chata hai to usko sirf us SMS ki jarurat hai jo aapke mobile par aaya hai conformation ke liye. jo upar wali trick hai agar wo kaam nahi karti to jo hamara whatsapp hack karna chat hai wo Call Verification ko select karke call se bhi hamare whatsapp account ko verify karke hack kar sakta hai. Ye karne ke liye usko sirf 15 second ke liye hamara Mobile chaiye, jo aasani se le sakta hai kuch bhi kha kar ki muje ek call karna hai. Ye Bhi Pade Internet se Free Call kaise kare kisi bhi Number par Internet par bhut se aese App or software uplabd hai jinki madad se hamare dost ya fir hamare family member aasani se install karke hamare Whatsapp ko kahi se bhi manage kar sakte hai. Is Tarike me hamare jo Whatsapp Message hai unko backup le kar kahi bhi send kar sakte hai. EMail, Google Drive bagera par. to agar aapka mobile kisi ke pass thodi der bhi chala gaya or usme whatsapp open hai to wo aapke whatsapp ke message ka backup apne email par send kar sakta hi. jo baad me wo aasani se pad sakta hai or hamari personal information ko aasani se hasil kar sakta hai. Ye Bhi Pade WhatsApp ke 5 new future jo abhi Playstore me nahi aaye Is Tarike me hamara jo phone hai uski screen ham dusri jagh abhi dekh sakta hai. Computer me bhi or ham apne mobile ko computer ki madad se bhi chala sakte hai. uske liye kuch App hai jo agar mobile me install ho to aasani se mobile ko computer se chala sakte hai or uski puri chijo ko dekh sakte hai. Teamviewer Quick Support and Airdroid do badiya App hai Mobile ko compouter se connenct karne ke liye. Ye Bhi Pade Whatsapp Web, whatsapp ka new future hai jiski madad se Computer me bhi ham whatsapp ko chala sakte hai. Computer me whatsapp chalane ke liye hame computer me web.whatsapp.com open karna padta hai. fir hamare mobile me whatsapp ke app se uske QR Code ko scan karna hota hai. uske baad hamare whatsapp ke message computer me bhi dikhne lagte hai. To agar kisi ke pass hamara mobile chala jaye to ho sakta hai wo uske computer me hamare whatsapp app se QR Code scan karde. uske baad wo hamare whatsapp ke sare Message send or recive kar sakta hai. Isse bachne ke liye hame apne WhatsApp Application me check karna hai ki kahi or login to nahi hai. or agar login hai to ham apne mobile se hi usko logout kar sakte hai. Bonus Tip Aapke Whatsapp ko koi dusre Mobile me install karke naa use kar paye, uske liye Whatsapp me 2 Step Verification Enable kare. Aapne ye to jaan liya kaise Whatsapp Hack se Bach sakte hai, ab ye bhi jaan lijiye Whatsapp ko Hack kaise kare.

Email Subscribe Kitne jaruri hai or usse hame kya faida hai. Kaise hamare BLog ki Traffic Email SUbscribe ki madad se bad sakti hai uske bare me phele hi bata chuka hu. Email Subscribe Badane ke liye sabse Phele hame FeedBurner me apne blog ki feed banani hai fir ek badiya Email Subscribe Widget jo Feed Burner ko support karta ho usko apne blog me add karna hai. Agar aap Phele hi FeedBurner me feed bana kar Email Subscribe widget add kiya hoga to aapne dekha hoga ki usme ek error aati hai. Error me Likha hota hai ki Publisher ne Email Subscription Chalu nahi kiya hai. Ham Is Post me Dekhege kaise Email Subscription Activate karte hai. Usse phele me maanta hu ki aapka Feed burner par aapki feed phele se hai. agar nahi to phele ye post pade. Email Subscription chalu karne ke liye meri simple steps ko follow kare. Step 1 Sabse phele Feed Burner ki site par ja kar Login kare apne account me. Step 2 Ab aapke samne aapki banai feeds ki list aa jayegi, jisme email subscription enable karna hai uspar click kare. Step 3 Ab aapke samne feed ka Dashboard aa jayega.

hello dosto me Jalaj Pandey jasknowledge.in ka founder hu. ye meri HMH.pe pahli guest post hai. Aaj me aapko bataunga ki kaise ham apne blog me Floating text add kar sakte hai. aapne bahut se blog me Floating text dekha hoga. Floating text ka matlb jo text left to right, right to left, up to down, down to up chalta rahta hai. bahut baar hame iski jarurat hoti hai. khastour pe jab koi news ya koi important message logon tak pahuchana hota hai to ham iska use karte hai. Aapne ye to mhesus kiya hi hoga agar koi hilti dulti chij hamari ankho ke samne aati hai to uspar hamara dhiyan jarur jata hai. to agar aapko bhi koi jaruri jankari apne visitor ko dena hai or unka dhiyan uske tarak khichna hai to aap Floating Text ka use karke kar sakte hai. Floating text 4 type ke hote hai dosto ab aap Floating text ko sanajh chuke honge to aab bari hai ise apne blog pe lagane ki to chaliye left to right Floating text lagane ke liye aapko ye code TYPE YOUR TEXT copy karna hai or TYPE YOUR TEXT ki jagah aap jo likhna chahte hai wo likhe or layout me jaha aap chahe waha HTMLjavascript me code ko save kar de. right to left text lagane ke liye aap is code copy kare or TYPE YOUR TEXT ki jagah aapna text likhe or layout me jaha aap chahe waha HTMLjavascript me code ko save kar de. up to down text lagane ke liye is code copy kare or TYPE YOUR TEXT ki jagah aap jo likhna chahte hai wo likhe or layout me jaha aap chahe waha HTMLjavascript me code ko save kar de. down to up text lagane ke liye is code ko copy kare or apna text likhe. to dosto aab aap jaan chuke hai ki kaise apne blog me Floating text add kar sakte hai or layout me jaha aap chahe waha HTMLjavascript me code ko save kar de. dosto ummed karta hu ye post aapko samajh aa gayi hogi agar aapko koi question hai to aap comment me hum se puch sakte hai. Ye ek Guest Post hai, Agar aap bhi HMH.pe Guest Post karna chate hai to uski jankari yaha hai. Dusri Guest Post Yaha Read kare. Ye bhi jarur read kare

Hello dosto. Mera naam Akshat Jain he Me TicTechBlog.blogspot.com ka Admin hu. Muze aaj HMH.pe par Gaust Post karte huye bhut khushi ho rhi hai kyuki me HMH se kai logo ki Help karpa raha hu. Dosto I am Sure aap sabhi Blogging ke baare me jante honge or agar nahi jaante to aap HMH.pe par iske bare me kai Post padh ke apna khud ka Free BlogWebsite bana sakte hai. Ham sabhi jante he ki Blogging Earning or Popularity ka ek bahut accha Source hai jisse ham ghar Bethe bethe lakho logo ki madad bhi kar sakte he or Bahut acche Paise bhi kama sakte hai. Lekin iske liye hame Blogging me Hard Work karna hota he or Blogging ko Seriously lena hota hai taki ham apne Blog ko bhi Top Blog me shaamil kar paye or Blogging me Success ho sake. Lekin agar hame Blogging me Success hona he or logo ki Help karni he to hame shuru se hi apne Blog ko Perfact or Best banane ki koshish karni hogi. aaj me apko bataunga ki hame BlogWebsite banane ke baad kya kya karna hota hai to chaliye Start krte he. Blog banane ke baad hamara sabse pahla kaam hota he Blog ko accche se design karna agar hamara Blog ka Design accha ho to jo Visitor hamare Blog par aate he vo Attract hote he or dobara visit karte hai. isliye me aapka bata deta hu ki Blog ko Design kaise karna chahiye Blog ko accha Design karne ke liye ek acche Template ya Theme ka hona bhi jaruri he agar apke paas Budget he to me aapko Advise dunga ki TemplateTheme Primium hi kharide or agar Budget nhi he to aap Free TemplateTheme Download bhi kar sakte ho. Aap iske liye HMH ki 250 Blogger Template ki list ki madad le sakte hai. Blogger ki Template Download karne ki 6 Badiya Website ki jankari yaha di hui hai. aap inko bhi dekh sakte hai. Agar aapne TemplateTheme Choose kar liya he to aap use Design kar sakte ho or agar aapke Paas PC nahi he to aap Mobile me EX File Explorer Download kar sakte hai. 10 Android Apps jo har Bloggers ke Mobile me Install Hona Chaiye to agar aapke mobile me nahi hai to abhi install kar lijiye. Vaise to me aapko apne Blog par kam Widget lagane ki Advise hi dunga taki Template Fast Loading ho lekin kuch Widget jo Useful hote he unko jarur Add jare jaise ki Social Media Icon jo ki ek jaruri Widget he isse Blog Readers hamse Connect rahenge. Agar aapko jaanna hai HTML Code ke Widget ko kaise add karte hai Blogger me to uski jankari yaha hai. Agar aap Blogging me Success chahte ho to Google se Traffic ana bahut hi jaruri hota he vaise to Google hamare Blog Post ko Keyword Milne par khud hi Add kar leta he lekin fir Bhi Google par Blog Submit karna bhut hi jaruri he taki Google ko apke Post ki janakari jald hi mil sake. Isliye me aapko Advise dunga ki aap Google Search Console par Blog jarur Submit kare. or uske baad Apne blog ka Sitemap bhi usme add kare. Abhi Recently Google ne apni search me kuch update kiya hai, jiski madad se aap google apni post ko or jaldi index kara kar search me la sakte hai. Direct Post ko Google me kaise submit kare uski jankari bhi jarur read kare. Agar aapko nahi pata ki SEO kya hota hai to me aapko bata deta hu SEO ka matlab hota he Search Engine Optimization yani Blog par aise Post likhna jo Google par jyada Search kiye jate ho or apne Post me Hot chal rhe Keywords bhi add kare. Ye kuch SEO Tip jo har blogger ko pata hona chaiye. Jab hamare Naya blog hota he to Google se jyada traffic nhi aata or ham Blog ko Promote karne ke tarike dhundte he or iske liye Facebook ek accha Source hai. me apko Advise dunga ki Aap apne Blog ka Facebook Page bana le or phir Uspe apne Freind ko invite kare baad me aap jo bhi Post karo usko apne Page par jarur Share karo. AGar aapne abhi tak Hindi Me Help ka Page like nahi kiya hai to abhi like kare or Hindi Me Help ke Facebook Group ko bhi jarur join kare. apne kai baar Bloggers ko kahte hue suna hoga ki hamara Newsletter jarur Join kare jab ham us Newsletter me apne Email daalte he to uske baad us Blog ke Post hamare Email me hi aa jate he aap bhi apne Blog me Feedburner ka Use karke Free Newsletter laga sakte ho or ye bahur jaruri hota he taki agar kisi Visitor ko apka Post pasand aaye to vo Newsletter Join karke Daily Reader ban jaaye. Email Subscribe Widget Blogger Me Add kare taki aapke visitor aasani se email par subscribe kar paye aapke blog feed ko.

Bahut se new bloggers hmse hmesa puchte hai ki aakhir regular blog ko update karne se humko kya kya fhyada milta hai aur isse hmare blog ka Seo kaise badiya hota hai. Mai un sabhi bloggers se kahna cahta hu ki regular blog ko update karne se aapko bahut se fhyade milte hai aur aapko jitna fhyada regular blog ko update karne se milta hai utna fhyada sayad hi kisi aur chiz ko karne me milta hoga. Aap apne blog ko kaise update karte hai Isse muje kuch nahi lena dena hai lekin agar aap ek naye bloggers hai aur aap apne blogging jurney ko abhi just start kiya hai aur aap blogging me apna career banana cahte hai to aapko blogging me safal hone ke liye daily apne blog ko update karna padega. Daily update karne ka mtlab aapko har ek din apne blog par ek artical publish karna padega. Agar aap aisa karte hai to aapke blogging me safal hone ka chance bahut jyada badh jayega. Iske sath sath agar aap daily apne blog ko update karte hai to iska fhyada aapko search engine ranking me bhi hoga aur aapki search engine ranking bhi bahut tezi se imporve hone hogi. Ye post unke liye hai jo blogging ko ek business ke taur par dekhte hai aur blogging ko hi apna full time career banana cahte hai. Iss post me mai aapko rgular blog ko update karne se hone wale fhyade ke bare me batoga Isliye dhyanpurwak iss post ko padhe. Daily blog ko update karne se search engine ranking badiya hoti hai. Jaha tak mera manana hai yah sabse badiya chiz hai. Google hmesa badiya content ko pasand karte hai lekin iske sath sath google daily update hone wale blogwebsite ko kuch jyada hi psand karta hai. Agar aap 1 weak me ya phir ek mahine me blog ko update karoge to google aapke uss post ko jyada value nahi dega jisse uski search engine me ranking badiya nahi hogi, lekin agar aap apne blog ko daily update karege to google aapke content ko kuch jyada hi value dega, jiski wajah se aapka content google me jaldi index hoga aur badiya ranking bhi payega. Also Read Regular update aur fresh content Google Ranking Factor ka ek importent point hai. Agar aap blog ko daily update karte rahe to google aapke blog ko notice kar lega aur regular basic par google aapke blog ke content ko read karte rahega. Jisse aapke blog ki ranking google me badiya hoti jayegi aur aapke blog ke jyada se jyada page index hote rahege. Ye Bhi Pade Jaha tak mera experience ka sawal hai to maine apne blogging Jurney me dekha hai ki regular update hone wale blog ka seo bahut badiya hota hai. aur unke har ek keyword ka rank google ke top 10 result me hota hai. Agar aap Fresh high quality content regular apne blog par publish karte rahe to mai yakin ke sath kah sakta hu ki aapke dwara target kiye gaye keyword ka rank google ke top 10 result me jarur ayega. Isliye yadi aap apne competitors ko piche chodna cahte hai to regular basic par fresh aur high qulity content apne blog par publish karte rahe. SEO ki or jankari ke liye ye post bhi pade Jiss prakar google Regular fresh aur high quality content psand karta hai thik ussi parkar aapke blog ko read karne wale aapke visitor bhi aapse Regular basic par fresh aur high quality content update karne ki ummed karte hai. yadi Aap aisa karte hai to aapke visitore aapke reader ban jayege aur woh aapke blog par daily visit karege jisse aapke blog ka traffic badiya hone ke sath sath unke sath ek solid relationship bhi banega. Mai aapko ek simple example ke dwara smjhata hu. Man lo aap movie dekhna bahut pasand hai. Aur aap market me ek shop par gaye movie ki DVD lene ke liye lekin uss shop par aapko koi bhi new movie ki DVD nahi mila kyoki uss shop ka malik sabhi purani movie ka hi DVD uss shop par rakhta hai aur kabhi bhi Naye movie ki DVD nahi lata hai?? Kya Aap uss shop par 1-2baar jane ke baad dubara jana pasand karege Mere Khyal se to Aap uss shop kabhi bhi jana nahi Pasand karege. Thik uss parkar aap ek aisa shop par gaye jaha par aapko new movie ki har ek DVD Daily basic par ati rahti hai aur aapko waha par har ek new movie ki DVD Turant mil jata hai to kya aap Uss shop par dubara nahi Jayege. Mere Khyaal se aap uss shop par daily jayege aur aap uss shop ke regular Customer ban jayege. Iss exmple se ek baat to saaf hai ki agar hum regular apne blog par fresh content update karte rahte hai to hmara relationship dusare ke sath badiya hota hai aur hmare blog ke visitor reader me convert ho jate hai. Regular blog update karne se blog post ki indexing rate badh jata hai. Maine dekha hai ki kuch bloggers ki hmesa yah problem rahta hai ki unka content jaldi google me index nahi hota hai. Iska main karan yah hai ki woh apne blog ko hmesa fresh content se update nahi karte hai. Jaha tak mere blog HindiMeHelp ka sawal hai to mere blog ka har ek post google me bahut hi jaldi index ho jata hai. Mere ek reader me mujhse pucha tha ki Rohit mere post 2-3din me google par index hota hai mai uss se kahna cahuga ki woh apne blog par daily fresh content update kare agar aisa aap karte hai to aapki blog ka crawlers badh jayega aur aapka page google me jaldi index hoga. Mai yaha par ek baat clear karna cahta hu ki daily blog ko update karne ka yah mtlab nhi ki aap kuch bhi aur kaisa bhi content daily update karte rahe. Daily upadet ka mtlab aapka content fresh hona cahiye aur aap jo content publish karne jaa rahe hai woh content internet par kahi par bhi naa ho aur aapka content kahi se bhi copy kiya hua nhi hona cahiye. Agar iss tarah ke content aap daily publish karte hai tabhi aapko iska fhyada milega. Yadi aap daily blog update karte hai to aapko search engine se bahut hi badiya traffic milga. Iske sath sath aapke reader yah sochege ki yah blog awesome hai aur iss blog ke content fresh aur uniqe bhi hai Isliye yah sab chize unko aapke blog ko suscribe karne ke liye majbur ho jayege aur woh aapke blog ke next post ko apne inbox me pane ke liye subcribe kar lege. Yaha par mai ek baat ke bare me aapko batana cahta hu khash karke hindi bloggers ko. Maine notice kiya hai ki hindi bloggers email Subscribers par kuch jyada dhyaan nahi dete hai Mai unse kahna cahta hu ki agar aapko badiya paise blogging se banana hai to jitna ho sake email Subscribers ko badhaye. jitna jyada aapke email Subscribers hoge utna hi badiya paise aapk blogging se banaoge Isliye isko ignor Kabhi bhi naa kare. Aaap kisi bhi bade bloggers ko dekh le uske safalta ka ek karan uske email Subscribers bhi hai isliye aap apne email Subscribers seriouse tarike se dekhe aur usko jyada se jyada Badhane ki kosish kare. Regular BLog ko update karne se ye faida bhi hai ki jo hamare visitor hai wo hamare blog ko regular open karke dekhte hai. Agar ham regular update naa kare or bhale kitna bhi ache article dale koi hamare blog ko daily open nahi karega jab tak ham daily new post naa dale. Daily Post dalne par jo visitor hai uske dimag ne bhi ye baat beth jati hai ki roj kuch na kuch naya dalte hai blog me to aaj bhi open karke dekha jaye blog par aaj kya naya hai.

Digital World me aaj har chij digital hoti ja rahi hai, aese me jo documents hai wo bhi ab digital documents me bhi rhete hai. aese me agar koi Important File ya Data galti se delete ho jaye to aap soch sakte ho kitna nuksan ho sakta hai. Agar aesa ho to kaam aate hai Data Recovery Software, jinki madad se data ko wapas liya ja sakta hai. mene ek post me bataya tha Mobile me restore kaise kare uske ware me, or ye raha best Software Data Recovery karne ke liye EaseUS. Ye ek software hai windows ke liye jiski madad se deleted files ko restore kiya ja sakta hai. Iss Software ka Free Version hai jo normal use ke liye kafi hai. par agar aesi condition aa jaye ki file wapas naa aa rahi ho to bhi iss software ke paid version se restore ki ja sakti hai. EaseUS Data Recovery Software ki or jankari ke liye aap yaha dekh sakte hai. Simple aapko sabse phele Software Download karke install karna hai. Download Recovery Software Install karne ke baad Software ko open kare, ab jis location se file delete hui hai wo select kare. Location select karne ke baad Scan kare Ab jitni bhi files aaye, unme se jo aap restore karna chate hai wo select karke recover kar lijiye. Iss Software ki madad se aap all formate ki file restore kar sakte hai, jo Computer, Memory Card, USB Drive, Cemera sabhi me kaam karta hai. Muje Ummid hai aapko ye Software jarur help karega apki delete hui file ko recover karne me, or agar aapka isse related koi sabal hai to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. Computer se related koi bhi sabal ho ya koi or jankari chaiye to wo bhi aap puch sakte hai.

Jin logo ka blog ya website hoti hai unke liye unke liye visitor kitne jaruri hai ye kisi ko batane ki jarurat nahi hai. Ham hamare blog ko top me lane ke liye kya kya nahi karte, Facebook Page bana kar uska widget apne blog par add karte hai, Twitter or Google par apni post ko share karte hai. Hamara maksad hota hai ji jada se jada logo tak apni post ki jaankari pohche. Blog ki Feed usme se ek sabse main hai. blog ki Feed ki madad se koi bhi hamare blog ko apne Email par Subscribe kar sakta hai or subscribe karne ke baad jab bhi ham pani new post publish karte hai uske pass email chala jata hai. Jo Hamare Blogger blog ka feed hota hai bo kuch is prakar hota hai. blogname.blogspot.comfeedspostsdefault hamare blog ko koi bhi subscribe to kar sakta hai par hame pata nahi chalta kitne logo ne subscribe kiya hai. To ye jaanne ke liye ki hamare blog ko kitne logo ne subscribe kiya hai ham apne blog ke feed ko Google feedburner se add karte hai. To chaliye Jaante hai kaise Blogger ki Feed ko Google Feedburner me banate hai or fir Apne Blogger ki Feed ko Kaise redirect karte hai. Step by Step Follow karo Step 1 Feedburner ki Site par jao fir apne Google Account se login karo. feedburner Step 2 Ab apni Blog ka URL dalo jiska aap Feed banana chate ho. Step 3 Ab jo naya page khulega usme Aapke Blog ke 3 feed URL aayege usme se aapko ek select karna hai. Step 4 Feedburner ka link kuch is parkar rhata hai httpfeeds.feedburner.comHindiMeHelp Step 5 Ab aapka Feed URL ban chuka hai aap uski link dekh sakte ho. Next ki button par click kare Step 6 Agar aap apne Feed par kitne click ho rahe hai usko track karna cahate ho to in option ko select karo. ya fir khali rhane do. Next ki button par click karo. Step 7 Ab kuch is Prakar Successfully ka message aayega. iska matlab hai aapka Feedburner par feed teyaar hai. Ek baar Feedburner par feed banne ke baad aapko karna ye hai ki apne blog ki feed ko redirect karna hai. uske liye in steps ko follow karo Step 1 Apne Blogger account me login karne ke baad apne blog ke deshbord me jao. Step 2 To Ab aap jaan chuke ho kaise FeedBurner par feed banate hai or usko kaise apne Blogger ke blog me add karte hai. To abhi ke liye bas itna hi, or dekhe kaise Subscriber Widget apne Blog me add kare or Email Subscription kaise enable kare Feedburner par. Agar Aapko Ispost ke samband me koi bhi paresaani ya fir koi sabaal ho to aap comment me post kare. or agar aapka koi or sabaal ho to aap Hamare HMH Forum me post kare. Blogger ki Puri Jankari yaha hai

Hello Friends, Agar Aap Jaanna chate hai Online Internet se Paise Kaise Kamaye to ye Jaankari sirf or sirf aapke liye hai, isme me aapko bataoga kaise aap paise kama sakte hai Online Internet ki madad se puri detail ke sath.

Bahut log sochte hai blogging ke baare me. Kuch log start krte hai fir thode dino me Bore or paresan hone ke baad blogging krna chhod dete hai. Lekin ek chiz hme yah dhyan rkhna hai ki agar hum apni lakshya ko paane ke liye aadhe raste se wapis laut jate hai aur jitna time hume adhe raste se lautne me lgta hai hum utni hi der me apni lakshya ko prapt kr skte the. Bas ek chiz ki jarurat hoti hai .wo chiz hai Patience Diraj . Jee haan agar hum thodi aur potential ke sath apne target ko achive krne ke liye apna priyas chalu rakhe toh humme success jarur milti hai. Toh chaliye mai aap logo ko inke baare me btata hun. Aap soch rhe honge khud ke boss mtlb. chaliye mai btata hu.khud ke boss matlab ki aap ke upar kisi aur ka pressure nahi rhega , sirf aap hi apne aap ko manage krenge. Apke upar koi pressure nahi rhega. Aapke blogging ka jo bhi topic rhega, aap uss field me aur bhi master hote jaoge, aap jisse bhi related post daloge. aapko uss post ya article ke baare me better knowledge ho jayegi. Aur thodi bahut technical knowledge bhi badh jayegi. Jaise aap html, css, aur dusre web developing technologies ke bare me bhi jaanne lagoge. Haan , aap jb seriously blogging karenge toh aap acche paise kamaoge aur apko kahi jane ki jarurat bhi nahi pdegi , iska matlb aapko office work se chhutkara mil jayega toh apke travelling ke expanses bach jayenge , isse aapki achhi khasi savings bhi ho jayegi. Janiye Blog start karne ke liye kya kya chaiye jab aap blogging me ghus jate hai toh aap time ko manage krna bhi sikh jate hai. Yaani ki aapko kb kon Sa post daalna hai. Aap raat ko bhi blogging kr skte ho. Iske liye Aapko specific time nikalne ki jarurat nahi pdti hai. Toh iss tarah se aap khali time ko bhi utilize kar skte hai. Aapko toh pata hi hoga jb aap koi post ya article apne blog pr post karte hai toh viewers aapke post par comment karte hai. Toh un comments ko aapko reply bhi karna pdta hai. Kuch negative comments bhi aate hai phir bhi aap apne emotions ko control krke uss comment ko ignore krte hai ya reply krte hai. Isse aapki communication skills bhi achhi ho jati hai. Aapko puri dunia se interact krne ka mauka milta hai. Read Online Internet se Paise Kamane ke 5 badiya Tarike Jo log blogging krte hai wo hmesha kuch na kuch sikhna chahte hai. Wo apne readers ke liye kuch na kuch nya dene ke liye lage rhte hai. Aise mein unki sikhne ki pravirti aur badh jati hai. Isse wo thoda attentive ho jate hain. Aur internet se hmesa kaam ki chize hi search krte hai. Mera Principle Har Roj kam se Kam ek New Chij sikho jo kal tak nahi aati thi. Jb aap khud ka kaam krte hai toh apke andar josh rhta hai. Aap apna kaam kisi bhi kimat me pura krna chahte hai. Issi tarah jb aap blogging krte hai toh apne blog ko popular krne ke liye aap apna saara energy blog ko popular krne me lga dete hai. Aur fir apne blog ko ek organisation ka roop dene ki koshish krte hai jisse aapke andar entrepreneur bnne ki quality aane lgti hai. Iss tarah se aap ek bahut hi bde entrepreneur ban skte hai. Iss post me bss itna hi. agar apko achha lga toh iss post ko adhik se adhik share kare, jisko beginner bloggers bhi padhe aur padhne ke baad blogging ko aur ache se kare or Apni Success ki sidi par chadne me madad mile. Ye Bhi Pade

Bahut se bloggers aise hote hai jo apne blogging safar ke pahle hi month me fail ho jate hai. Koi bhi Aadmi kisi bhi business me kyo success hota hai iska sidha sa answer hai ki uske pass kisi bhi business me success hone ke liye perfect plan and strategize hai. Jis parkar har ek business me badiya plan and strategize ki jarurat hoti hai thik usi parkar blogging me bhi aapke pass ek perfect plan and strategize hona bhut jaruri hai tabhi aap blogging me success honge. Jarur Pade Perfect Planning Ke Sath Popular Blog Kaise Banaye uski Puri Jankari Jab aap koi naya blog start karte hai to blogging ke pahle 30din hi Bata dete hai hai ki aap blogging me success honge ki nahi. Agar aap blogging me apna career banana cahate hai aur blogging ko ek business ke taur par dekhte hai to Aaj ka jo post hai woh aapke liye bahut hi madadgar sabit hoga kyoki iss post me mai aapko bahut hi importent-2 baato ke bare me bataoga jo aapko blogging ke pahle 30din me karna cahiye. Yadi aap in chizo Ko badiya tarike se kar lete hai to muje puri ummed hai ki aap blogging me apne career ko bahut hi Aage tak lekar jaa sakte hai. Iss post me mai aapko batoga ki blogging ke 1-30din tak step by step kya kya karna hai Roj. Isliye Iss post ko dhyanpurwak padhe aur smjhe kyoki iss post me aapko bahut se chizo ke bare me sikhne Aur Smjhne ko milega. Tip Post me jo Daily Tips di hai wo ek hi Din me karne ki kosis naa kare. Har Roj jesa Post me bataya hai wo kare or fir 30 Din baad hame apne blog me kya improvement huaa wo bataye. Aap is Page ko BookMark CtrlD karke rakhle 30 din ke liye taki Daily Tip padne me aapko koi dikkat naa ho. 1st Day me aapko apna domain name register karke usko apne self-hosted wordpress blog par setup karna cahiye. Uske baad aapko aapko ek badiya aur basic theme ko install karna cahiye. in chizo ko aapko pahle din me karna hai. Blog aap Chahe to Blogger par bhi bana sakte hai agar aap bilkul hi new hai to. Ya fir Aap WordPress par apna Self Hosted Blog Banaye. Badiya Domain bhut jaruri hai hamari website ko success dilane ke liye to aap domain register karne ke phele ye jarur pade Badiya Domain Name Kaise Select kare Apni Site ke Liye or uske baad Domain Kaise Register kare uski jankari yaha hai. WordPress Blog Kaise Banaye Step by Step jnakari yaha di hui hai. Ab aapka blog setup ho gaya hai, Ab time hai apne theme ko customize karne ka. Aap apne theme ko apne blog ke anusaar customize kare aur usko ek badiya look de aur jab theme badiya tarike se customize ho jaye to uske baad kuch usefull plugin ko install kare jaise- Yoast SEO, Google Sitemap Generator, Sassy Social etc. Badiya Widgets add kare. Ab aap apne blog ke design par focus kare jaise ki blog me ek badiya aur professional logo aur favicon set kare. blog ka logo bahut hi badiya aur simple rakhne ki jarurt hai usme jyada taam jham naa rakhe badiya background color aur text ke liye badiya font ka prayog kare. Blogging ka 4th day bahut hi importent day hota hai kyoki iss din aapko apne blog ke main nichetopic choose karna hoga. Mai aapko yahi suggest karuga ki aap apne interest ke hisab se topic ko choose kare jiss chiz me aapko intrest hoga wohi topic aap choose kare. Apni Site ka Topic select karne me jald waji naa kare or sabse main hai aap ko topic select kar rahe hai usme aapka interest ho, nahi to aap jada din apni site par kaam nahi kar payege. Aapne blog ka topic to choose kar liya hai ab baat ati hai aapke blog ke content ki ab aapko sochna cahiye ki apne blog topic ke anusaar kon se content ko hum apne blog par publish karna cahiye. Aapko apne time ke anusaar ek plan banana hoga ki aapko har weak me kitne content publish kar sakte hai. Bus aapko apne plan ke anusaar content ko publish karna cahiye. Ye Jarur Pade lagbhag aapke blogging safar ko 1 hafta khatam hone wale hai. Ab aapko apne blog par kaam suru karna cahiye lekin aapke pass content kaha hai. isliye blogging ke 6th day me aapko ek badiya fresh aur uniqe content apne blog topic ke Anusaar likh kar publish kare. Apne content ko publish karne ke baad usko friends, family, colleagues ke sath share kare aur unse apne content ke bare me review dene ke Liye bole. Also Read Blogging ke 7th Day me aap ek aisi social media sites ki list banaye jaha se aap apne blog ke liye audience paa sakte hai. Mai Facebook, Twitter, Google ko iske liye used karta hu. i think aapko bhi in sabhi social media par apni site ka new acount or Page banana cahiye. Account or Page Kaise Banaye wo jaanne ke liye Pade ab tak aapne blog bana liye, content bhi publish kar diya aur papular social media par acount bhi bana liya. ab time hai dusare bloggers ke sath ek relation banane ki. ab aapko kuch badiya bloggers ke sath relation banane ki jarurat hai aur unko aapne blog ke bare me bata kar usko support karwane ki jarurt hai. ye sb karne se aapki blogging network me badiya reputation banegi. Iske liye aap dusre blogs ko pade or unpar comments kare, Social Network sites par contact kare, agar koi Article acha lage kisi blog par to usko share kare. Join HMH FB Group Blogging ke 9th day me aapko apne blog ko Blog Directories site me submit karna cahiye Ye ek bahut hi important step hai. Internet par bahut se Free Blog Directories website hai aapko unme se kuch badiya aur papular Blog Directories par apne blog ko submit karna cahiye. Aisa karne se aapke blog par dheere-2 traffic ana start hoga. Blog Directory me Blog ko submit karna ye Off Page SEO me aata hai. Off Page SEO ki Puri jankari yaha hai Agar aapke blog par kuch commnet aye ho to unka answer bahut hi badiya tarike se de taki comment karne wale reader aapke blog par dubara aye. Kabhi bhi Comment ka galat tarike se reply naa kare or koi galat jankari dene ki kabhi kosis naa kare apne Blog par kaam karna suru kar diya hai. ab aapko ek email list banana ki jarurt hai taki aap apne post ko directly apne audience tak pahucha sake. aap email list banane ke liye Feedburner, Mailchimp aur Aweber jaise service ka upyog kar sakte hai. Mai aapko Feedburner used karne ki advice dunga kyoki ye ek free service hai. Blogging ke 12th day me aapko apne blog se paise kamane ke bare sochna cahiye aur ek chart banana cahiye ki aap apne blog se kon kon se method se paise bana sakte hai. Ek naye blog se paise banane ke liye google adsense sabse badiya option hota hai par wo itne new blog par approve nahi hota aasani se. Aap Starting me dusre Network bhi tri kar sakte hai. Yaha sabse main baat hai aapki earning naa ke wara bar hi hogi starting me q ki abhi aapke blog par traffic nahi hai. ab aapko dusare blog Par comment karna cahiye aur apne blog niche se related forums par bhi logo ke problem ko solved karna hai, aisa karne se aapke blog ka backlink banega aur Dusare Bloggers aapko notice bhi karege. ye ek bahut hi important point hai jisko aapko bahut hi badiya tarike se karna cahiye. Ab tak aapke blog ke kuch badiya reader ban gaye honge aapko unka sath connect ho kar blog design and layout inputs etc. chizo ke bare me unse puchna cahiye. aur agar kahi par kuch chije sahi naa dikhe to usko turant sahi kare. Yadi aapko organic traffic search engine se cahiye to apne blog ko search engine ke liye optimize karna hoga. aur uske liye aapko basic seo tips ko apne blog aur post me used karna hoga. Aisa karne se aap search engine se traffic milna start ho jayega. ab tak aapne 8-10 Post likh liya hoga. ab time hai aapko keyword research karne ki aap google keyword planner ki madad se aise keyword ko find kare jo monthly jyada search ki jati ho aur uske competition kam ho. Aise keyword ko find karke aap usko apne post me optimize kar de aisa karne se aapko search engine se real traffic milega. Ab tak aapne badiya tarike se content likh liya hai lekin ab time hai detailed blog post ki ab aap ek aisa topic choose kare jiske bare me aap detail me explain kar sakte hai. Aapka content kam se kam 2500-3000 sabd me ho Aisa karne se aapke reader ko bahut help milegi aur woh aapke blog par daily Ana psand karege. Jab aap apne detail post ko publish kar de phir uske baad ab time ati hai trust ki jisko aapko apne reader ke sath banani hai. aap apne reader ke sath personal judhe aur unke problem ko solved karne ki puri kosish kare. aap apne reader ko apne friend ki tarah dekhe jitna badiya aapke reader ko aap par trust hoga utna hi badiya tarike se aap blogging me paisa kama payege. aapko apne audience ke behavior ko analysing karna hai. uske liye blog me Google Analitics add kare fir ham hamare visitor kaha se aa rahe hai kya kar raha hai site par, kitni der ruk rahe hai jesi bhut si detail pata kar sakte hai. Ab aapko ye smjhne ki kosish karni cahiye ki aapke blog par aapke reader kya padhna jyada pasand kar rahe hai. aur ye bhi Analyze kare ki aapke blog ka jyada se jyada traffic kaha se aa raha hai. ye sabhi karne ke baad aapko ye smjhne me Aasni hogi ki aapko content delivery karne ke liye kin kin chiz par jyada focuse karne ji jarurat hai. Congratulations! ab Lagbhag 3 weeks ho gaya hai aapko blogging start kiye hue. lekin aaj ka din bahut hi important din hai. kyoki aaj aapko apne blog ko re-visit karke blog desgin aur theme par focus karna hoga. header aur sidebar me sab thik hai iss baat ko confirm kar le Ya phir apne experience ke anusaar aapko changing karne ki jarurat padhe to usko change kar de. Iss tarah pure blog ko badiya look dene ki liye re-desgin kare aur blog ko ek professional look de. ab time hai aapko apne traffic status dekhen ka ki aapko in 21din me kaha se aur kitna traffic mila hai. yadi aapka traffic aapki soch se kam hai to tension naa le aapka traffic dheere-2 badhega. traffic ke sath sath aapko bounce rate par bhi najar rakhni hogi. ab aap apne niche topic se related popular blog ko find kare aur uss blog par guest post kare. ye ek aisa time hai jaha par aap dusare blog ke reader ko apne blog par laa sakte hai. aisa karne se aapko traffic to milega hi iske sath sath aapka dusare bloggers ke sath ek accha relationship bhi banega or usse ek backlink bhi milega. ab aapko apne blog sidebar me apne dwara likhe hue top aur sabse badiya post ko displaying karne ki jarurat hai. aapko apne blog category se related top post ko professional look ke sath apne sidebaar me dikhane ki jarurat hai. Aisa karne se naye reader aapke top post ko padh kar impress honge. Blogging ke 25th day me aapko ek inspired post likhna cahiye aur uss post me aapko apne bare me apne visitor ko batana cahiye. aapke uss post me aapke blogging me aye hue strugle ko bhi likhe aur iske sath sath aapko blogging karne ka idea kisse mila ye bhi likhe. kul mila ek badiya inspired post likhe taki uss post ko padhne wale aapkse impress ho jaye aur aapke bare me aur janane ki kosish kare. Jarur Pade Hindi Me Help One Year Success Story 1st Anniversary Is din me aapko apne reader ke sath re-engage karne ka time hai. aapne pahle hi email list banana suru kar diya hai bhale hi aapka email list 10 ya 100 log ka ho. aapko apne email list par ek badiya msg send karna cahiye aur unse puchna cahiye ki muje apne blog ko improved karne ke liye apne blog me kya kya changing karna cahiye. i hope aisa karne se aapko kuch badiya idea milega apne blog me thoda changing karke usko aur improved karne ke liye. ab aapka 1month khatam hone wala hai isliye iss din aap kisi expert bloggers ko apne blog par interview dene ke liye invite kare. aur uss expert blogger ki experience ko apne reader ke sath share kare. Is din aapko kuch bahut hi badiya blog ki list banaye aur apne reader ko uss blog ki post ko padhen ke liye kahe. iske sath sath aap apne content ke bich bich dusare blog ki badiya content ka bhi link de jisse aapka dusre blog ke sath acha relation bannege, aapke visitor ko bhi uska fayda milega to wo or jada trust karege fir aap par. Blogging ke 29th day me aap badiya blog post likhne ke liye research kare. aur 10 badiya aur papular post ki ek list banaye. aur un post ko bahut hi detail me likh kar publish karne ki kosish kare. aapko uss list me se har ke din 1 post publish karne ki kosish kare. Aaj ka din aapke blogging career ka 30th din hai. aur aaj aapko kuch jyada karne ki jarurt nahi hai bus aapko apne 29th day ke sabhi chizo re-cap karne ki jarurt hai. aapne iss moth jo galtiya ki hui ho un galtiyo ki ek list banaye aur Agale month uss sabhi galtiyo ko sudhare ki kosish kare Blogging ke sirubadi din hi aese din hote hai jo aapko Aage ki Raste ko taye karta hai. Isliye yadi aapne starting me hi safalta paa li to aap Aage bhi success payege. Ek perfect plan and strategize apko har ke chiz me safalta dilata hai. Isliye jo bhi kare planing ke sath kare Aur Tab tak kare jab tak aapko saflta naa mil jaye. Blogging me starting ke 30din ke business plan ko padhne me aapko bhut kuch sikhne ko mila hoga. yadi ye blogging ka business plan aapko pasand aya ho to isko plzz social media par share kare. aur iss post ke bare me apna anmol vichar commnet box me jarur de. hum apke important comment ka wait karege. Keep Blogging Stay Smile

Hello Friends, 5-6 din ke gap ke baad aaj me aap se share karuga jo mujse bhut logo ne pucha ki ham kaise Facebook Page ke Message me automatic reply set kare. Facebook Page kaise Banate hai or ham usse kya kar sakte hai uski jankari me phele hi de chuka hu. Jo internet use karta hai us har saks ka Facebook par account to hota hi hai, to ye sabse badiya sadan hai hamari online promotion ke liye jo free bhi hai. Ham Facebook Page par post karke un logo tak hamari baat phucha sakte hai jinhone hamare page ko like kiya hai. Facebook Page or Group ke Like or Follower badane ki trick bhi pade, jiski madad se aap apne page ke likes bada sakte ho. Jesa ki mene kaha ki ham facebook Page ki madad se logo tak hamari baat phucha sakte hai, Or agar koi hamse Facebook Page par Message se sampark karna chahe to wo bhi kar sakta hai. Uske liye hamare Facebook Page me Messaging Enable hona chaiye. Facebook Account me login karke Facebook Page ko open kare. Fir setting me ja kar Messaging chalu kare. Image me dekhe kaise. Is setting ko Chalu karne ke baad koi bhi aapke page par aapko Message send kar sakta hai, is prakar aap unse ek direct sampark bana sakte ho or unki help kar sakte ho. Ab agar aapke Page par aapko koi message karta hai to aap uske message ka reply kar sakte ho, par aap hamesa to online rha nahi sakte. To uska Badiya Solution hai ki ham ek Automatic Reply set karde. usse hoga ye ki jab bhi koi hame facebook par message karega to uske pass hamara automatic message chala jayega. Agar Aapne Hindi Me Help ke Facebook Page par koi message kiya hoga to aapke pass ek automatic replay bhi aaya hoga wo example hai is Future ka. Ham reply ki madad se apne facebook fans se ek badiya relation bana sakte hai. To Chaliye dekhte hai kaise Automatic reply set kare facebook page me, Agar aapke Page par messages ka option chalu nahi hai to ye option aapke pass nahi aayega. Sabse Phele apne Facebook account me login karke Apne Facebook page par jaye. Page Open karne ke baad Page Settings par jaye Ab Messaging ke section me jaye. Messaging Chalu hogi jab hi aayega ye option. Ab hamare samne Instant Replies Automatic replay karne ka option aa jayega. Ab jab bhi aap offline hoge or agar koi aapke facebook page par message karega to usko aapka set kiya huaa message automatic send ho jayega. Facebook Ki or jankari ke liye yaha click kare , or Agar aapne abhi tak Hindi Me Help Facebook Group join nahi kiya hai to abhi kare. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi comment karke jarur bataye, or agar aapko kahi kuch problem aa rahi hai to aap wo bhi comment karke puch sakte hai. Aapko Ye bhi Pasand aayegi

Computer aaj ke time me logo ki kitni jarurt ho gayi hai ye to aap jante hi honge. computer ka jyada proyog young generation ke log karte hai. jaha tak mera anubhao hai ki computer ki har ke feature sayad hi kisi ko pata hoga. wese hi computer me bahut se shortcut key hota hai. Agar aapko computer ki shortcut key ke bare me pata hai to jab aap apna computer upyog karte honge to shortcut key ki jankari ki wajah se aapka bahut sara time Save hota hoga. Computer ke shortcut key ka upyog karke hum bahut se hard kaam ko simple tarike se kar sakte hai. Aaj ke iss post me hum computerLaptop ke important shortcut key ke bare me janege aur aap in shortcut key ki wajah se computer me bahut se kaam easy tarike se kar sakte hai. to chalo computerLaptop ki kuch important shortcut key ke bare me jaan kar apne computer ke kaam ko Eassy bante hai. Shortcut Key ko use karne ke sabse bada faida hai hamara bhut sara time bachta hai or aasani se ho jata hai. Mere Bhut se Dosto ne blog to banaya online paysa kamane ke liye par bo jada din blogging nahi kar paaye uska karan tha ki unke blog par visitor bhut kam aate the. Unke un karano ko samajne ke baad mene paya ki bo sirf paysa hi dekhte thee. Par or bhi bhut si baate hai jo hame diyaan me rakhni padti hai. Ye kuch Topics hai jinko diyaan me rakhna hai taki aapka online website success ki sidi chadta hi jaaye. aap ke blog ka title thoda lamba rakhe kunke google search engine me is tarha aap ka blog search me zyada aa sakt hai jabke agar aap short blog title rakhte hain to is bat ke imkan kam hain.
