Friends mene meri pichili post me aapko bataya tha ki kaise aap Blog ko Godaddy domain se add kar sakte ho. Ye jo post hai Website Kaise Banaye Serise ki post hai or is post me ham janege ki bina www lagaye apni website ko kaise khole. Aapne dekha hoga website ki link kuch is prakar hoti hai www.WEBSITE.com par agar hame website direct kholna ho to ham browser me daalte hai WEBSITE.com . jo www hai bo agar ham naa dale tab bhi boo hi website khulti hai. Hamne pichli post me sikha kaise blogger me domain add kare par agar hame bina www ke apni website kholni hai to hame kuch setting hai jo karni padti hai. Abhi ham ussi setting ko detail me samjege. agar aap bina setting ke apni site ko khologe to aapki site nahi khuegi or error aayegi Ab aap diyaan se meri har ek step ko sahi se follow karo Domain jis site se liya hai usme login karke apne domain par jao. Mera Domain Godaddy par hai. Agar aapne dusri site se Domain liya hi to ho sakta hai Page alag tarike se khule par setting same hi karni hai. Ab ek popup window khulegi Aapko ye char Google IP daalna hai ek baar me ek. pheli daalkar ADD ANOTHER ki button par click kare firse puri detail daalkar dusri IP dale. uski parkar charo daalna hai. 216.239.32.21 216.239.34.21 216.239.36.21 216.239.38.21 inko charo Google IP dalne ke baad FINISH ki button par click karde. Ab sabse phele Jo red color me Save Changes ki warning aa rahi hai us par click karde. Jo charo Google IP hai unko ek baar achi se dekh le A Host ke section me. Ab Blogger.com par apne account me login karke apne blog ki setting me jao Ab aapki sab setting ho gai hai. Agar abhi bhi error aa rahi hai to thoda intjaar kare 24 hours tak lagte hai DNS ko update hone me. agar usko 24 gante ke baad bhi error aaye to aapko puri process fir se check karne ki jarurat hai. To ab aapne apne blogger ka naked domain bina www ke set kar liya hai. Ye kuch or Post jo aapko padni chaiye Apne bichar or Sabaal Comment karna naa bhule. Happy Blogging!

Hello Friends hamne Blogger par blog to bana liya. Blog banane ke baad hamara kaam hota hai kuch chije blog se hatana jese Navbar or kuch chije apne blog me add karna jaise Facebook Like Box or Type in Over Language Widget. Blog banane ka sabse bada faida bhi yahi hai ki jisko coding bilkul bhi nahi aati bo bhi apni website bana sakta hai or usko design kar sakta hai. Jaise maan lo aapko apni site ke sidebar me kuch add karna hai or uska HTML code aapke pass hai. ya aapko ads ka code jodna ho. uske liye hame apne blogger me HTMLJavaScript widget ko add karna hoga. ye bhut hi aasan hai Ye ek blogger ka widget hai. Is ki madad se ham blog me HTML or Javascript ko add kar sakte hai. Is widget me hame khali box milta hai fir ham usme apne code ko daal kar save kar dete hai. Is ki madad se ham apne blog me kisi bhi code ko add kar sakte hai or usko blog me kahi bhi move kar sakte hai. Simple hai, agar aapko blog me koi widget jodna hai to aap uska code ko HTML me hi add kar sakte ho. Agar Aap koi ads lagate ho apne blog par to uska code bhi HTML me hota hai. Jaise maanlo aap BidVertiser ka ads lagate ho. Ye bhut logo ka sabaal hota hai ki hamne blog to bana leya par usko design kaise karre, or yehi khas baat hai blog ki, jisko bilkul bhi coding ki jaankari nahi hai bo bhi apne blog ko achi trha disign kar sakta hai. Jese mene meri kuch pichli post me bataya tha ki ham kaise apne blog ka Template Change kar sakte hai or usme Facebook Like Box or Type Over Language in Engilsh Keyword Widget bhi add kar sakte hai. Chaliye Jaante hai Step by step ki ham kaise Widget code ko apne blog me add kar sakte hai. Start karne se phele me maanta hu ki aapke pass Widget ka Code hai or aapne usko Copy kar rakha hai. uske baad Step 1 Blogger.com par jao for apne blog ke Deshboard me jao, Fir Blog ke layout me jao Layout me aane ke baad aap dekhege aapke blog ka pura layout aapke saamne hai. usme Add A Gadget ki link hogi. Aap jaha par HTML Code ko apne blog me jodna chate ho, bha ke Add a Gadget ki link par click kare. Step 2 Click karne ke baad ek new page khulega usme Blogger ke bhut se widget hai, unki list hogi. Hame hamare HTML Code ko jodna hai to ham page me niche jayege or HTMLJavaScript ke Widget ko select karege. Step 3 HTMLJavaScript Widget ko select karne ke baad ek naya page khulega To dosto aap ab ye jaan chuke ho ki blog me HTML code ko kaise jodte hai, par agar aapke dimag me fir bhi koi bhi sabaal aata hai to aap comment karke muje jarur bataye. Blogger ki Puri Jaakari yaha hai

Dosto aaj jo jankari me aap logo se share karne ja raha hu usse aap apne or apni family members ke mobile recharge me paise bacha sakte hai, me aapko jo trick batane wala hu uski madad se aap Free Offer pa sakte hai apne number par. Wese to bhi JIO ke karan lagbhag sabhi companyo ne apne plan saste kar diye hai par agar aap Free Offer chate hai to wo aap aasani se pa sakte hai. Me jo trick aapko batane wala hu wo mene idea or Airtel par test ki hai, par muje lagta hai ye har Mobile network par kaam karegi. Also Read to chaliye jaan lete hai kaise apne mobile Network par offer pa sakte hai. Aapko simple kuch steps ko follow karna hai. Step 1 sabse phele to aapko ek SMS send karna hai 1900 par, Message me type karna hai PORT 98xxxxxxx1 apna Nobile number.

Har Google Blogspot blogging platfrom user picasa ke bare me janta hi hoga, jaha online photo store hote hai aur Picasa name se ek computer software bhi hai jahar par photo edit hote hai. Blogspot platform ke post editor me jitne bhi photos upload karte hai wo sab Picasa main hi store hote hai, jise ham yaha click karke dekh sakte hai. Yah bat thi blogspot user ke liye, kai user picasa main apni private images, family photos and memories picasa web album me save rakhte hai, aur iske sath me Picasa ko mobile me use karke sab online photo ko gallery se bhi access kiya ja sakta hai, yaani Picasa me photo upload karke Google account ko sign in karke wo photos tablet, mobile, laptop or computer kis me bhi dekh sakte hai. Lekin Google picasa ab itna long time nahi chalne wala, Google na apne official blog par mention kiya hai ki ab Google Picasa ko chor kar Google Photos name ki service par dhyan de rahi hai. Yah bat Google ne saf words me kah di hai ki Google, Picasa ko retire kar raha hai. Ham yah jante hai ki Picasa me aap me se kai logo ke photos save hoge, lekin darne ki koi bat nahi hai, aap apne sare photos Google Photos me migrate kar sakte hai. Agar apke kai memorable pictures picasa main upload hai to unhe Google Photos me upload kar sakte hai. Chaliye dekhte hai kaise? Aaj ke har android phone me Google photos name ki apps install aati hai, jiska matlab hai aap apne photos ko mobile se bhi upload kar sakte hai ur pc me karne ke liye 2 tarike hai jinke bare me ham aage bat karte hai. Mobile me agar apke pahle se yah apps nai hai to ise Google play store se download kar sakte hai. Aur agar apka android version low hai to yah apps install nahi bhi ho sakti hai to uske liye computer se sidhe website par jakar bhi photos ko upload kiye ja sakte hai. Mobile se photos ko upload karne ka aasan tarika hota hai apko syncs option ko on karna jisko SettingBackup and Sync option par jakar kar sakte hai, jiske bad me yah upload hota rahega aur aap apne phone ko other task ke liye use me le sakte hai. Computer user ke liye Google ne ek website ko launch kiya hai photos.google.com name se. Jaha par apne Google account ko login karke apne photos ko upload kar sakte hai. Yah Google picasa se kai guna easy aur advance bhi hai. Aur iske sath me isme Album create karna aur photo ko manage karne ka kafi acha oprtion bhi hai. Computer user ke liye ek app bhi hai jiske through photo ko bina browser se bhi upload kar sakte hai, is apps ki help se photo ko online upload me rakh skte hai aur computerlaptop ko start rakhna hota hai baki yah background me running process me chalta rahta hai. App ko download karne ke liye yaha click kare. Is app ko install karke apni Google account ko login karna hai jaha par aap apne sare photo ko store karna chahte hai aur phir folder choose karlo jis folder ke saare photos apko upload karne hai and done. Phir yah background me chalta rahega. Photos upload karne ke darmiyan koi bhi photo ko upload hone me error ata hai to use 1 click m hi wapas retry kar sakte hai. Islye Apps ko use karna bahtarin rahega aur yah bilkul small size ki hi hoti hai. Apka sare photos store hoge apke Google account me, to yah bahut secure hoge. Aur jab aap photos ko upload karte hai to wo sab photos small size me compress hote jate hai wo bhi bina quality loss hue. Jiska matlab hai ki in future album ko small size me download karne me aasani hogi. Online photos ko edit karne ka bhi option kafi acha hai, aur koi bhi photos ko bahtarin tarike se search karke dhunda jaa sakta hai. To agar aap Google photos ko use karte hai to kafi time ko bacha sakte hai. Iske sath me yah service hamesha ke liye free hai, lekin isme 16GB-17GB limited hard disk apko milti hai jo photo ke liye bahut hai, kyon ki agar koi pic jayda high size ki hoti hai to use Google Photos auto compress kar deta hai to is tarah kam size me jyada photos ko bhi store kiya ja sakta hai. Lekin agar aap limited hard disk se jayda pana chahte hai to space kharida bhi jaa sakta hai. ye bhi pade

are-are aisa hum nahi kehte, aisa is film mein dikhaya gaya hai. Aur is film ki naayika arthaat heroine ne to hamare dil mein chhuriyan chala dee. Na chahte hue bhi hum poore cinema ghar mein akele-akele sitiyan maar rahe the. Kya sundarta hai nayika ke chehre mein, hum to ek dum mantra mugdh ho uthe the bhakton. Aur jab Ranbir beta apna sangeet utpaadak yantra arthaat apna guitar bajata tha to humara bhi man kar raha tha ki hum bhi ab kahin jaakar apna china wala guitar bajayein. Ranbir aur Nargis ne jis tarah ki prem leela ki hai use dekhkar to hame bhi apni pehli waali mehbooba ki yaad aa gayi. Hum bhi aise hi pahadon ki vaadiyon mein raas leela rachaya karte the. Hum bhi kahan apni jawani ke dino mein pahuch gaye.

Hello Blogger, Agar aapka blog hai or aap mhanat karke badiya post uspar dallte hai to aap ye bilkul nahi chahege ki koi aapki post ko copy karke apne blog par daal de. Me Phele hi bata chuka hu ki Dusre ki website se copy karne ke kya kya faiode hai or kya kya Nuksan, agar aapne wo post nahi padi hai to aapko padni chaiye. Jan ham koi Post likhte hai to uske liye phele ham uski puri jankari jutate hai sab jabha se or fir usko ache se acha karke apne visitor se share karte hai jisse unki help jo sake. Par Kuch New Blogger jinko uski jada jankari nahi hoti wo kya karte hai disre jo bhi blog hote hai unki post ko copy karke apne blog me dalte hai, or unko lagta hai ki jada post hogi to jada visitor aayege or usse jada income hogi. par aesa hota bilkul bhi nahi hai. To Aaj ham is post me janege ki ham kaise logo ko hamari post ko copy karne se rok sakte hai. Copy karne se rokne ke bhut se tarike hai. To dosto ab aap samaj hi gaye hoge ki agar aap mhanat karke apni post publish karte ho to usko kaise bacha sakte ho. To Chaliye Jaante hai kaise ham Apne blog me logo ko hamare ji post hai unke text ko select karne se rok sakte hai taki wo usko copy na kar sake. Ye karna bhut hi aasan hai, iske liye sirf hame ek CSS ka code hai jo hame hamare blog ke home page me add karna hai. to chaliye dekhte hai konsa code hai or kaha add karna hai. Agar aap chate hai ki aapke blog me ek sabd bhi copy naa ho to aap is code ko add kare ye jo Code hai isko site me add karne ke baad site par ek bhi sabd ko select nahi kar sakte. par agar aapki site par aap kuch aesa contant dalte hai jisko aap chate hai ki aapke visitor copy kar sake, jese Quotes bagera to uske liye aapko niche ka code add karna padega. ye jo dusra wala code hai, isko add karne ke baad ham jo bhi text blockquote me add karege usko select karke copy kiya ja sakega. Ab jo CSS ka code hai usko blog me add karna hai. Blogger me kaise CSS Code add karte hai uski jankari yaha hai. or WordPress me bhi Text widget add karke usme is code ko add kar saktge hai. To Dosto aap is trha aasani se apni post ke text ko select karne se rok sakte ho. jisse log aapki post copy na kare. par sabse jaruri to hai ki jo copy kar raha hai usko samaj me aaye ki copy karne se koi faida nahi hai. fir bhi ham jitna hamari taraf se kar sakte hai unta to hame karna hi chaiye. Ye post bhi pade

Hello Youtubers, Ye Post unke liye hai jo Youtube par kaam karte hai ya karna chate hai, q ki abhi recently youtube me bhut kuch ho raha hai jisse youtube creator par bhut bhari pada hai unke kaam or unki earning par. to ham is article me ussi ke ware me janege ki akhir kya karan hai jo youtube ki earning kam hui hai or youtube ne q apni policy me update kiya hai or janege kya update kiya. Youtube ek aesa platform hai jaha aap apne talent ko video ke jariye share karke naam kama sakte hai or sath sath badiya paise bhi earn kar sakte hai. HMH ki pichli post me bataya gaya tha youtube se kaise jada paise kamaye, agar aapne wo read nahi ki to aapko jarur read karni chaiye. Agar aap abhi youtube par work kar rahe hai to aapne jo me batane wala hu wo aapne jarur mhesus kiya hoga. abhi kuch mahino se youtube par jo video upload hone ki sankhiya hai wo bhut bad gai hai, har koi youtube par video bana bana kar upload kare ja raha hai. aese me ho ye raha hai ki ache video ke sath sath faltu ke video bhi bhut jada upload ho rahe hai. Agar aap youtube trending page dekhege to waha aapko 50 video me se adhe video to aese aapko dikh jayege jin video me kuch nahi hota, ek dam farji hote hai fir bhi trending me aa jate hai q ki wo unka title or thumbnail aesa dete hai ki log usko dekh kar uspar click kare. Agar aapko Youtube SEO ki jankari nahi hai to aapko uske ware me pata hona bhi bhut jaruri hai. Janiye Youtube SEO kaise kare Video par Jada Views lane ke liye. Par aese me ho ye raha hai, jo acha content hai wo top par aa hi nahi pa raha hai or bhut log aese farji video daal daal kar unka badiya tarike se SEO karke paise kamaye ja rahe hai, iske liye youtube ne apni policy me ek bada badlab kiya hai. Phele Youtube se paise kamane ke liye ye karna hota tha ki aap koi bhi apna banaya huaa ek video upload kare, or uske baad direct adsense ke liye apply kar sakte the. par aese me ho ye raha tha log kuch bhi farji video upload kar kar ke adsense account banaye ja rahe the. jisse jo video ache nahi hote unpar bhi ads aa rahe the. Janiye kaise Video youtube par upload nahi kar sakte, taki aap ye galti naa kare ki aapke video bhi farji video ki list me aa jaye. 1 adsense ke jariye agar youtube par paise kamana hai to aapke channel par 10,000 total views hona jaruri hai uske baad hi adsense ke liye apply kar sakte hai. or ab apply karne ke baad youtube ki team aapki youtube channel ko check karegi or dekhegi ki aap kis type ke video upload kar rahe hai uske baad hi aap adsense use kar payege. 2 Monetize enable jab hoga jab 1 saal ke andar 4000 Watch Time or 1000 Subscriber hoge, agar itne nahi hue to monetize disable bhi ho sakta hai. Youtube channel se Adsense kaise connect karte hai agar aapko nahi pata to uski jankari bhi site par di hui hai. Youtube par earning kam hone ke sidha sidha karan hai advertiser ka youtube se boycutt karna, jiski baja se youtube ke pass ads hi nahi hai video par dikhane ke liye or uss baja se earning kam hui hai. Jo Companya hai wo nahi chati ki unke ads aese video par dikhaye jaye jo farji video ho. q ki wo paise de rahe hai to chate hai ki unke ads sahi jagha hi dikhaya jaye. issi baja se abhi bhut si companyo ne youtube se boycutt kar liye hai. or uska sidha aasar jo youtube par kaam kar rahe hai unki earning par padha hai. Phele average ye tha 1000 views par 300-400 war ads aa jate the, par jabse badi badi companyo ne youtube par ads dena band kiye to youtube ke pass ab kam ads bache video par dikhane ke liye or ab bhut se youtubers ne bataya ki unko 1000 views par ab sirf 60-80 war hi ads aa rahe hai. matlab adhe se bhi kam ho gaye hai. Jo phele earning ho rahi thi, badi badi companyo ke jane ke baad adhi ho gai hai. issi liye youtube ne ye update bhi kiya hai taki thoda control kiya jaye jo galat video daal rahe hai unke upar. Jo Youtube par kaam kar rahe hai wo ab sirf ye ummid kar sakte hai ki jin companyo ne youtube ko boycutt kiya hai wo wapas aa jaye or firse apne ads youtube par dene lage. par un companyo ki ye sart hai ki unke ads farji video par naa dikhaya jaye. youtube uske liye work kar raha hai ab dekhte hai aage kya hota hai. Agar aap youtube par kaam karte hai or aap ke video quality video hai to aapko tension lene ki jarurat nahi hai, par agar aap un logo me se hai jo kuch bhi farji video daal kar youtube se paise kama rahe the to ab aap ye samaj lijiye aapka time ab khatam hone wala hai. ek website ke mutabik april month me youtube ko $1B ka nuksan huaa hai badi badi companyo ke boycutt karne par. to ab youtube itni dhil nahi dega ki koi bhi youtube ka farji tarike se paise kamane ke liye use kar paye. Hope ab aap samaj gaye hoge aapki youtube earning kam q hui hai or uska kya karan hai. or youtube ne jo update kiya hai wo q kiya hai or wo kitna jaruri tha youtube ke liye or ye update kitna jaruri tha un creator ke liye jo mhenat karke badiya video banate hai. Umid hai aapko ye jankari pasand aai hogi, agar aap youtube par kaam karte hai to aap apna experience comment karke jarur share kare or aapko kya lagta hai jo youtube ne apni policy me update kiya hai ki 10,000 views ke baad hi aap adsense se paise kama sakte hai wo sahi hai ya galat.

Hello Friends, Aaj ham baat karege Mobile se paise kamane ke. Jese aap ye to jante hi hoge Android Mobile aaj har dusre insan ke pass mil jata hai. Bhut log Android Mobile le to lete hai par Facebook, WhatsApp ke aalawa kuch use karte. Agar aap WhatsApp, Facebook, or Phone Call ke liye jo mahine me 1000 rupee ka balance dalbate ho wo free ho jaye to ye bhut badi baat hai. Aap Agar Smart Phone use karte hai to aapko ye pata hi hoga ki Phone me hame jo bhi chalana hai uska app hota hai wo hame Install karna padta hai. or agar App install karne par paise bhi mile to or badiya hai naa. Aesa hi ek App hai jisko sabse phele aap install kare. fir usme kuch app hai unko install karne par hame paise milte hai. Jo App hai jisse ham paise kama sakte hai uska naam hai mCent.

Jab aap ek naye post par work karte hai aur apna work uss post par completed karne ke baad aap usko publish karte hai. phir uske baad aapka new post internet par live ho jata hai. Post publish karne baad aapka kaam khtam nahi hota balki Asali kaam uske baad hi suru hota hai aur woh kaam hota hai new blog post ko promote karne ka. Apne new post ko promote karne ke liye aapko bahut se step ko follow karna padhta hai. Aapke uss blog post par jyada traffic tabhi Milega jab aap usko internet ke har ek place par promote karege. Jitne effective tarike se aap apne post ko promote karege utna hi badiya aapko uska benfit milega. Mai aapko kuch badiya step ko bataoga jisko aap apne post ko publish karne ke baad waha par promote kar sakte hai. kyoki kewal post ko publish karne se sab kuch nahi hota hai balki usko promote bhi karna padhta hai. Bina promotion kiye hue aapka post jyada logo tak nahi pahuchege. Mai un main point par focuse karuga jaha par aap apne new post ko promote kar sakte hai. Blog Post ke SEO par bhi jarur diyaan de Sayad hi koi aisa hoga jo facebook ka naam nahi suna hoga. Facebook ek bahut bada brand hai jaha par daily 200000k User ate hai. Internet par google aur youtube ke baad 3th sabse bada network Facebook hai. in numbers se aap ye soch sakte hai ki facebook kitna papular sites hai. Chuki Facebook par daily bahut hi jyada user ate hai isliye ye ek perfect place hai apne new content ko promote karne ke liye. Sabse pehale aap apne blog ke naam se ek facebook page banaye aur uske baad apne dhwara publish kiye gaye har ek new post ko waha par shere kare. Jab aap apne blog post ko facebook page par share karne jaye to apne post se related ek badiya sa long size ka image choose kare. Image choose karne ke baad aap uss image aur new content ka link dono sath me hi apne facebook page share kare. image ke sath link share karne par logo ko aapke post par jyada focuse padhega. Aur usse aapko badiya traffic milega. Ek aur baat facebook page par new blog post ke publish karne ka sabse badiya time 8pm-9pm hota hai kyoki iss time me facebook ke jyada se jyada user active rahte hai. Iss liye 8pm-9pm ke bich Me hi apne post ko facebook page par publish kare Read Facebook se Blog par Traffic lane ke badiya tarike Facebook page ke bare me to maine aapko bata diya. Thik ussi prakar facebok group Bhi ek bahut hi badiya palce hai apne new post ko promote karne ke liye. Yadi mai kahu ki agar aap badiya tarike se facebook group par apne post ko promote karte hai to ye facebook page se jyada traffic aur benfit aapko dega. Facebook par har ek topic par lakho group hai aapko apne blog ke nichetopic se related papular group ko join karna hoga. Papular group ka mtlb jiss group me jyada member ho. facebook par apne blog niche se related jyada se jyada group ko join kare aur ho sake to apne khud ka bhi fb group banaye. Phir jiss parakar ke content maine facebook page par share karne ke liye bataya hai thik ussi prakar ke content aur images un sabhi facebook group me bhi share kare. Aisa karne par apake blog par bahut hi badiya traffic ayega. Udharan Man lo ki aap ne apne niche se related 15 group ko join kiya hai aur har ek group me 10k 10 hajar member hai to jab aap in sabhi group par apne new post ko publish karege to aapke ye post 1510000 150000 logo tak jayega aur itne logo me se kam se kam 500-1000 logo to aapke blog post par click kar hi dege! Aapke ek new blog post par kewel facebook group se itna traffic aa raha hai mtlb facebook group ek bahut hi uniqe aur effective place hai new post ko promote karne ka aur aap isko miss na kare balki Use kare Note Post ko aese Group me share na kare jo Allow nahi karte jese Hindi Me Help ka FB Group. Facebook ki tarah twitter bhi ek bahut hi papular social networking site hai jiski Global ranking 09 hai. Worldwild 9 ranking ka mtlab iska bahut hi bada network hai aur isko use karne wale million me hai. Twitter ke 22.5 user USA ke hai jabki kewal 9.4 log twitter ko india me use karte hai. Maine dekha hai ki india ke bloggers twitter par apna jyada time nahi spent karte hai. lekin agar aap ek plan ki tarah twitter ko apne blog post ke promotion ke liye use karege to twitter bhi ek bahut hi badiya place hoga apne blog post ko promote karne ke liye. Twitter par koi bhi post share karna bahut hi easy hota hai. Agar aapke blog me social sharing wedget laga hoga to Uss wedget me facebook ke baad twitter Ka hi option ata hai. Jab aap apne New post ko ready karke publish kare to uske turant baad hi uss post ko twitter par bhi tweet kar de. Aap apne post ko bahut hi easy tarike se Twitter par tweet kar sakte hai aur Haa! apne tweet me hashtags lagana naa bhule kyoki hashtags lagane se aapke post ka fouse badh jata hai. Pinterest ka naam indian bloggers sunte hai lekin isko kaise use kiya jata hai ye unko nahi pata hota hai. Pinterest ko use karna bahut hi Aasaan hai. Jab aap new blog post ko publish kare to usme jo image hota hai usko Pin karna hota hai. Pinterest mainly Photo share karne ke liye Social networking site hai. Jab bhi new post publish kare to uske image ko pin karna naa bhule. Mai hmesa apne har ek post ko pin karta hu. Honestly mere hindimehelp par Pinterest ke dwara bahut hi badiya traffic ata hai. Pinterest ek huge social media site hai jo aapke har ek new post ko pin karke badiya tarike se promotion karta hai. Isliye aapne new post ko Pinterest par Pin karna naa bhule. Pinterest kya hai or kaise isko use kare uski jankari yaha par hindi me di hui hai. StumbleUpon ek bahut hi papular social bookmarking sites hai. Sabhi professinal bloggers apne har ek content ko StumbleUpon par share karte hai. Mai bhi apne har ek new post ko StumbleUpon par sahre karte hu! Post ko share karne ke kuch hi time baad StumbleUpon se mere blog par view ane lagte hai. Jab bhi aap koi naya blog post publish kare to uske link ko StumbleUpon par jarur share kare. Kyoki StumbleUpon apne aap me ek internet ka bada brand hai. Isliye apne har ek new post ko StumbleUpon par share karna naa bhule. Digg bhi same StumbleUpon hi ki tarah hai. Ye bhi ek badiya network hai apne new blog post ko free me promotion karne ka. Just digg ke website par jaye aur apna ek new acount banaye aur apne new blog post ke link ko waha par submit kar de. digg par apne new post ko submit karna bahut hi easy hai. Jaha tak mere manana hai ki jyada se jyada bloggers apne link ko digg par submit karte hai. Aap bhi digg ko miss naa kare balki apne har ek post ke link ko yaha par submit kare. aisa karne se aapke blog ka badiya tarike se promtion hoga aur aapke blog par accha traffic bhi ayega. Google ek top ki social media site hai. Aur blog post ko promote karne ke liye ek best place hai. Google, Google ka hi ek service hai jisko google ne banaya hai. Yadi aap ek plan ki tarah se google ko use karte hai to google ke dwara aap apne blog par bahut hi badiya traffic laa sakte hai. Yadi aapka blog blogger.com par hai to aap apne blog me automatic google par share karne ke feature ko enable karne par aapka har ek new post google par automatic share ho jayega. google par apne new post ko share karne se pehle aapko apne google ka profile attractive banaye aur uske baad apne har ek new post ko google plus par share kare. Aisa karne se aapko bahut se benfit milege. BlogWebsite ke liye Google par Page or Group bhi banaye slideshare ek bahut hi defferent document sharing sites hai. slideshare ki ranking google par bahut high hai. slideshare par apne new post ko share karne ke liye aapko apne post Ko powerpoint me convert karna padhega. Powerpoint me new post ko convert karne ke baad usko Slideshare par upload kar do. Agar aap aisa karte hai to bahut hi jada traffic aapke blog par ayega. Aur bahut hi acchi tarah se aapke new post ka peomotion hoga. Instagram ek naya aur huge network hai new post ko promote karne ka lekin aap Instagram par content nahi share kar sakte hai. Instagram par aap kewal image ko hi share kar sakte hai. Mai apne personal picture ke sath sath apne new post ke image ko bhi Instagram par share karta hu. Aisa karne se mere new post ka promotion acchi tarah se hota hai. Apne new post ke har ek image ko Instagram par share karna naa bhule. Sab kuch waha par ek case ki tarah share kare. Delicious ke bare me muje bhi jaldi hi pata chala hai. Aur mai abhi Iska new user hu. Jab maine Delicious par apna acount banaya to mai sochta tha ki ye bahut hi defult hoga lekin isko use karne ke baad muje pata chal ki ye to ekdum stumbleupon aur digg ke jaisa hi hai. Yaha par apne new post ko share karna bhi bahut Easy hai. I think Delicious ek bahut hi badha promoter place hai. Isliye apne content ko Delicious par promote karna naa bhule aur apne har ek new post ko yaha par share kare. Scoop.It ek free content promoter sites hai jaha par aap apne har ek new content ko free me promote kar sakte hai. Scoop.It par apne new post ko share karne ke liye sabse pahle aapko yaha par apna profile banana hoga. phir uski baad aap apne new blog content ko apne Scoop.It profile se share kare. Ye ek bahut hi easy aur very effective tarika hai apne new blog content ko promote karne ka. Scoop.It Par apne new blog content ko share karne se aapko accha benfit milega. Yadi aap ek acche bloggers hai to aapke pass apke readers ka email list jarur hoga. Yadi nahi hai to mai aapko high recomended karuga ki apne reader ka ek email list banaye aur apne new blog post ko publish karne ke baad uss post ko apne sabhi reader ke email par send kare. Apne email ko reader ke paass send karne ke liye aapko email marketing ke tool ki jarurat padegi Agar aap ek new blogger hai aur aapke pass itna paisa nahi hai ki aap paid email marketing tool le sake to aapko tension lene ki jarurat nahi hai kyoki internet par bahut se aise tool aur software mil jayege jiss se aap free me apne email ko apne reader ke pass send kar sakte hai. Free email marketing tool ke liye aap google par search kar sakte hai waha par aapko bahut se badiya option milege. Bus mai aapse yahi kahuga ki aap ek badiya email list banaye aur apne har ek new post ko publish karne ke baad uss email list par send kar de. ye ek bahut hi strong tarika hai new post ko promote karke traffic lane ke liye. Aap Feed-burner par apni feed bana kar Email Subscribe option enable karke bhi kar sakte hai. Email ka Subscribe Box add jarur kare site me Forum ek esay tarika hai backlink aur traffic pane ka. Sabse pehel aapko apne blog niche se related kuch papular forum ko join karna hoga. Phir uske baad apne new post se related question ko find kare aur unke question ka answer de question ke answer ke niche apne new post ka link bhi de. Issi tarah kam se kam 10-20 question par apna answer deke apne new post ko prmote kare. Forums ek accha tarika hai apne post ko promote karne ka. Aap bhi yahi kaam apne new post ke sath kare. Mai aapko 2 bahut hi papular forum ke bare me batata hu jaha par aap apne new content ko promote kar sakte hai- Apne new blog post ko top social bookmarking site par share kare. Top bookmarking site par apne new content ko share karne par aapka new blog post search engine par jaldi index ho jata hai aur isse aapko accha benfit milta hai. Mai aapko kuch top ki bookmarking site ke bare me batata hu. Apne new post se related ek badiya sa infographic banaye. Infographic banane ke liye aap piktochart.com aur canva.com ko use kar sakte hai. Uske baat uss Infographic ko top Infographic sites par submit kar de. Mai aapko kuch badiya Infographic sites ke bare me batata hu Jaha se aap apne blog post ka badiya link paa sakte hai. Video ek bahut hi papular tarika hai apne new post ko promote karne ka. Sabse pehle apne new post se related ek uniqe video banaye aur usko papular video sharing site jaise- Youtube aur Dailymotion par upload kar de. Jab aap apne new video ko upload karne jaye to video ke describtion me apne new post ka link bhi add kar de aisa karne se jo aapke video ko dekhege to usko post ka link bhi dikhai dega. Aur bahut se log uss par click bhi karege. Agar aap video banakar apne new post ko promote karege to Aapke blog par bahut hi badiya traffic ayega. Read Youtube SEO ki 6 Tips Views Badane ke liye Also Read Youtube ki puri jankari ke liye yaha click kare Aap social media ke koi bhi plateform use kare. jab bhi apne new content ko social media par promote karne ke liye jaye to HASHTAGS! lagana kabhi bhi naa bhule. Ye ek bahut hi importent factor hai aur aisa karne par jyada se jyada people aapke post ko dekhege. HASHTAGS! lagane se aapka post attratctive lagata hai aur log isko ignor nahi kar pate hai. HASHTAGS! me aap apne post se related keyword ko use kare. Aapne ye 15 tarike to jaan liye, par agar baat aaye blog ko promote karne ki to wo yahi khatam nahi hote. aap yaha dekh sakte hai 50 tarike Blog ko Popular karne ke. ha to friends muje puri ummid hai ki agar aap insab ko tri karege to aapke blog ki traffic me jarur improvement hoga. Agar aapke pass inke aalawa bhi koi tarika ya site hai jispar ham apni new post ko promote kar sake to comment karke bataye.

Hello Friends, Internet ek itna bada samundar hai jisme kabhi koi pura gota nahi laga sakta. Jitne ham isme andar jate hai ye utna hi ghara hota jata hai. Visit hindimehelp.comFBGroup Ye Bhi Jarur Padhe Mobile Se Free Calling Kaise Kare kisi bhi Number Par To chaliye jada baat naa karte huee apne topic par aate hai kaise Free call kare kisi bhi Mobile ya Landline par puri duniya me kahi bhi. Free Call karne ke liye sabse phele aapko in website par jana hoga ye dono website same work karti hai. Aap sabse phele in dono website me se kisi ko bhi open kare. website open hone ke baad aapko number dialer dikhega usme aapko bo number daalna hai jispar aap call karna chate ho. Hello Everyone! Main ShoutMeHindi se Harsh Agrawal hu, aur aaj aapke saath is article me share karme jaa rahan hu YouTube se paise kmaane ke liye kuch badhiya tareeke. Aap me se bahut se log ek YouTube channel bnake us par videos upload karke, paise kmaane kii iccha rakhte honge. Lekin aam dekha gya hai ki bahut se YouTubers kuch videos upload karne ke baad hii haar maan jaate hain aur keval 10 log aise hote hain joki YouTube se kuch na kuch paise kmaane me kaamyaab hote hain. Sabse pehle is article me main yh maan ke chlta hun ki aap ek serious YouTuber hain aur apne YouTube channel par regulary videos upload karte hain kyonki is article me main aapke saath jitne bhi ways share karne jaa rahan hun vh keval regular aur serious YouTubers ke liye hii work karenge. To bina vakt gavaye, ye rahe YouTube se paise kmaane ke teen sabse badhiya tareeke Google AdSense kisi bhi YouTube channel ko monetize karke usse paise kmaane ka the most easiest or simplest way hai. Iske liye aapko bs ek approved, AdSense account chahiye hoga aur uske saath hii us Google AdSense ke saath aapko apna YouTube channel link karna hoga. Yadi aap nahi jaante ki apne YouTube channel ko Google AdSense ke saath kaise connect karen, to hamara neeche diya giya video zaroor dekhiye jisme is saare process ko bahut hii badhiya tareeke se explain kiya gya hai. Ab iska matlab ye nahin hai ki aap yh process karke aasani se paise kmaane lg jayenge. Iske baad to asli kaam shuru hota hai. Aapko paise keval tabhi milenge jab aapke video ke viewers ads ko dekhenge aur unpar click karenge. Ab saari videos par to aapke ads display honge nahin aur saare viewers to aapki ads par click karenge bhi nahin. Iske ilava aur bahut saare factors hote hain jaise ki RPM, CPM vgera joki is mamle me matter karte hain. Aap apni traf se ek kaam kar sakte hain aur vo hai ki apni videos par jitne maximum views ho sake derive kijiye. Aur ant me aisa karne ke liye aapko apne videos ko bahut badhiya bnana hoga aur viewers ke liye useful bnana hoga. Also Read 1000 Views par kitni income hoti hai? Aapne pichle kuch salon me ek cheez notice kii hogi ki YouTube par bahut saari webseries banni shuru ho gyi hain. Udhaaran ke liye bahut saare Hindi Drama shows aajkal YouTube par videos aur web series ke roop me publish kiye jaate hain aur jinhe dekhne ke liye log hafton ka intzaar bhi karte hain. Lekin aapne ek aur cheez iske saath notice ki hogi ki jitna kharcha ve un series ko bnane me lgaaate hain vo keval Google AdSense aur YouTube se kii kmaayi se sambhav nahin ho sakta. To unke paas un series ko bnane ke liye itna paisa aata kahan se hain? Iska jwab hai, Sponsorship. Unhe apne videos ko banane ke liye bahut se log aur companies sponsor karti hain. Isi prakar yadi aap bhi chahte hain ki aap Sponsorship se paise kmaaye to aapko bhi ek aisa YouTube channel bnan hoga jiske hazaron lakhon subscribers hon aur jiska audience base bhi kaafi strong ho. Kyonki ye method Google AdSene wale method kii trah nahin hai jisme aap AdSense account ko link karke saath ke saath paise kmaana shuru kar sakte hain. Iske liye aapko apne Channel ko kuch aisa bnana hoga ki Sponsores khud aapke paas aayen. Sponsores aapko kisi bhi trah apni videos me unke promotion ke liye keh skte hain. Jaise ki video ke shuru hone se pehle Sponsores ka ad dena ya video ke beech unki taareef karna ityadi. Kayi sponsores to itne badhiya hote hain ki aapko bs unke logo me video me kuch chand seconds ke liye dikhana hota hai aur aapki video ke saare kharche ke ilava aapko poore mahine ka bhi profit mil jata hai. To jo last method, is post me main aapko btane jaa raha hun vo hai, Affiliate Marketing. Yadi aap affiliate marketing ke baare me nahin jaante, to main pehle aapko recommend karunga ki aap hamare neeche diye gaye posts ko padhiye aur Affiliate Marketing ke baare me vistaar se janiye aur is badhiya tareeke se samjhiye. Uske badd hii aap is tareeke se paise kmaane ke baare me soch skte hain. Hamari Affiliate Marketing kii eBook prapt kijiye. Ab aap YouTube par Affiliate Marketing kaise kar sakte hain. Aap maan lijiye kisi aisi cheez ke baare me apni YouTube video bna rahen hain jiska koi affiliate program ho. To aap uske affiliate program ko join karke description me ya fir video ke upar annotations ko use karke apne Affiliate links ko add kar sakte hain aur jab bhi aapka koi viewer un links par click karke kuch na kuch khareedga to aapko uska commission milega. Is tareeke se aap YouTube ko apni Affiliate marketing kii starategy ke liye use kar sakte hain. YouTube se paise kmaane ka sabse badhiya tareeka aur sabse zuyada profitable tareeka kaun sa hai? Ab aap sab ke man me question ye hoga ki inme se sabse badhiya tareek kaun sa hai. Yadi aapka ek YouTube channel hai aur usme videos par acche views ho rahen hain, to all time hit tareeka jisse aap paise kmaa sakte hain vo hai, Google AdSense. Lekin Google AdSense sabse profitable way to bilkul bhi nahin. Adhik profitable ways hai, Sponsorships aur affiliate marketing par ye all time ways nahin hain. Sponsorships aur affiliate marketing aapke liye tabhi kaam karengi jab aapke paas niche based videos tarffic hai ya fir aapki audience kaafi zyada hai. To ye tha mera aaj ka post jisme maine btaya ki aap YouTube se paise kaise kmaa sakte hain. Mujhe aasha hai ki aapko mera yh post bahut accha lga ho to yadi lga ho, hamare blog, ShoutMeHindi.com ko zaroor visit kijiye. Is post ke sambandhit aapke man me yadi koi bhi question hai to aap mere se comments ke zariye zaroor puchiye. Ye Ek Guest post hai HMH.pe, agar aap bhi Guest post karna chate hai to yaha click karke uski jankari pa sakte hai. Other Guest Post Read karne ke liye yaha click kare. Youtube ki or jankari ke liye aap ye post bhi jarur read kare
