India Me Adsense Account ko Approved karana bhut muskil padta hai jada farji karano ki baja se Adsense ke rule kuch jada hi kadak hai. Sare website ke owner or blogger chate hai ki unki jada income ho unke liye bo illegal kaam karte hai. Jada tar Adsense Disapproves hota hai q ki bo uski Niyan or sarte nahi maante. Me Is post me kosis karuga ki aapko Clear kar saku ki Adsense account par apna account banane ke liye kya kya jaruri hai or kya diyaan me rakhna padta hai. Agar aapka koi Blog hai or aap uspar Image hi daate ho to sorry aapke blog par adsense account approve nahi hoga. Bhut sari Image problem nahi hai, problem ye hai ki search engine ko Image me kya hai ye samaj nahi aata or adsense ko pata hai isliye adsense bhi approve nahi hota. Agar aapka Photography ka blog hai or aap uspar apni Images daalte ho. Jese ye ek blog hai Pic Jumbo. To aap in steps ko follow karo Image ko hamesa compress karke use kare, Image ko Compress karke size kam kaise kare uski jankari yaha hai. Simple Template use kare, jo dekhne me clean ho. Jo padne or Dekhneme bhi aasaan ho. Ye kuch baate jo aapke template mo honi chaiye Blogger me Template ko Upload kare or agar aapko koi badiya template chaiye to aap yaha dekh sakte hai Matlab bhut log adsense ko apply karte hai fir ulte kaam karte hai. jese apne dosto se khete hai ki ads par click kare, khud alag alag computer par apne ads par cick karte hai. aesa karne par ham unki sarto ka palan nahi karrahe hote or jese hi unke system ko iski jaankari milti hai hamara adsense account bhi disapproved ho jata hai. To aesa karne ka soche bhi nahi. Jo visitor apni marji se aate hai bo google ko bhi pasand hai or agar ham Apni site ke liye visitor ko badane ke liye kisi ko paise dete hai to jo visitor aate hai bo unki marji se nahi aate or fir bo kuch ulti sidi harkate karte hai. Jo Google ko bilkul pasand nahi hai. Mene bhut logo ko dekha hai ki Blog banke teyaar huaa nahi ki adsense ko apply karne lage. Adsense Disapprove to hona hi hai. or agar maan lo ki adsense approve ho bhi gaya to or blog par din me 100 visitor aate hai to income bhi naa ke barabar hogi. to phele traffic badane par diyaan do Paise to apne aap aayege. Mene bhut se logo ko dekha hai jinke 1 lakh se jada visitor aate hai unki site par per day fir bhi unhone adsense ke liye apply nahi kiya q ki uska main maksad traffic ko badana hota hai. or paise kamane ke dusre upai bhi hote hai. Bidvertiser ka use kar sakte ho, jab tak Adsense Approve naa ho India me or China or kuch country me Adsense ke account ke liye Site kam se kam 6 mahine purani hona chaiye. Ek tarike se dekha jaye to ye badiya hai q ki ham 6 mahine tak badiya post daalte hai to hamari traffic bhi bad jati hai. jisse ham jab 6 mahine baad hamari site ke liye adsense approve ho to hamari income bhi badiya ho sake. About Us, Contact Us, Terms ke page bhi apne site me add kare isse adsense ho apne bare me samaje me aasani hoti hai to hamare adsanse ka account approve hone ke bhi jata chances hote hai. About page me apne or apne blog ke bare me bataye. Contact Us me apna Email Id Dale or ek contact form bhi add kare taki uske istmaal arke koi bhi aap se contact kar sakte. Terms me bataye ki aapke site par jo visitor aata hai aap unki kya kya jaankari lete ho bagera bagera. Hamara adsense account jab bhi nahi banega jab ham apne blog par koi ayse bhasa use karege jo adsense support nahi karta. Ye jaanne ke liye ki konsi-konsi bhasa support karta hai yaha click kare. Khus khabri ki baat ye hai ki ab adsense Hindi bhi Support karta hai.

Har Rooj internet User bahut hi tezi se bad rahe hai. Internet par jyada se jyada log information collect karne ke liye Aate hai. Hum log hmesa dekhte hai ki jab internet par kisi User ko Koi information mil jata hai to woh Uss information ko apne notebook me note karta hai Ya phir uss pure web page ko save kar leta hai. Lekin mai aapko bta du agar aap usko note karege to aapka jyada time west hoga aur yadi aap uss webpage ko save karege tab bhi woh ek badiye quality ke file me nahi save hoga aur aapko baad me read karne me problem hogi. In sabhi chizo se Nijat pane ke liye aapko uss webpage to PDF file me convert kar dene cahiye. Agar aap kisi bhi webpage ko PDF file me covert kar dete hai tab aap uss file ko kabhi bhi kahi par open kar ke Asani se Read kar sakte hai. Yadi aap ek student hai aur aap daily internet apne padhai ke liye use karte hai tab aap aapne dwara collect kiye gaye information ko Pdf file me covert kar ke ek jagah par rakh sakte hai. Agar aap kisi bhi webpage ko PDF file me covert karke read karte hai to aapke file ki quality acchi hoti hai aur aap usko Asani se padh bhi sakte hai. Agar aap ek Blogger hai to aapke liye bhi ye ek badiya tarika ho sakta hai, apne blog ko offline promote karne ka, q ki agar koi aapki PDF download karege or usko read karege to aap usme dusri useful link bhi de sakte hai jisse wo user aapki site par double se aa sake. Wese to internet par kisi bhi webpage ko pdf file me covert karne ke bahut se tarike hai lekin mai ek Aasan tarike ke bare me bataoga jiska upyog karke apne kisi bhi webpage ko PDF file me Asani se covert kar sakte hai. Kisi bhi Post ko PDF me badalne ke liye hame simple ek Site ki jarurat padegi. TO Chaliy dekh lete hai kaise kya karna hai. Step 1 Sabse Phele aapko ey Website Open karni hai www.printfriendly.com Step 2 Ab Jis Post ko PDF me badalna hai uski Link Copy kare Step 3 Jo Box diya hai usme post ki link dale fir Print Privue par click kare. Step 4 Ab jo post hai wo PDF me kaisi dikhegi wo aa jayegi. aap chahe to usme kuch edit bhi kar sakte hai. Last me PDF ki button par click kare. Step 5 Ab ek Popup khulega. Ab File ko aap jaha bhi chahe save karle. Agar aapka Blog hai to aap Apni Post ko convert karke PDF me badle fir apni PDF File ko un sites par upload kare jinki rank achi hai. Discription me apni post ki link jarur de Q ki ussu se hame apni site ke liye backlink milegi. Ye Kuch Badiya Sites ki list in sites par apni PDF ko submit kare. To Friends aap ab jaan chuke hai ke kisi bhi post ko PDF me kaise badle or kya faide hai uske.

Privacy Policy me bataya jata hai site kya kya jankari leti hai visitor ki or kis ke ads dikhate hai apni site par. Konsi Detail Track karti hai or konsi Jankari Save karti hai. Privacy Policy Page isliye bhi jaruri hai q ki bhut se program hai wo check karte hai, jese Google Adsense. Hamare Privacy Policy Page ko Check karta hai uske baad hi Approve hota hai account. yaha dekhe Adsense Approve karane ke 11 tarike Adsense approve nahi hota to Bidvertiser ke ads lagaye Website ke liye Jaruri Page Privacy Policy ko Aap khud bhi bana sakte ho agar aapko uski jaankari hai to. Par agar nahi to koi baat nahi Online bhut si site hai jo Free me hamari site ke liye Privacy Policy Bana deti hai. To Chaliye Dekhte hai kaise banaye Privacy Policy apne blog ke liye Step 1 SerpRank Privacy Policy Generator par jaye. Step 2 Ab aapko Login karna hai, agar account nahi hai to Register kare. Step 3 Ab ek Form Aayega, Usko Bharna hai Step 4 Ab ek New Page Khulega usme hamare Blog ki Privacy Policy hogi. Usko Copy karle Ab hame apni Website me simple ek Page me isko Add karna hai. Ye bhi Pade Blog ki Traffic kaise badaye Blog me Add karne ke liye simple hame New Page Create karna hai or usme Hamari Privacy Policy ko dal kar Publish karna hai. Step 1 Blogger Dashboard Pages New Page par jaye Step 2 Ab Page Editor khul jayega. Ab Aapka Privacy Policy Page to Ban gaya hai, Is Page ko Menu me add jarur kare.

Yeh toh tay hai ki Pinterest ka naam aap ne Internet par lakho baar suna hoga kabhi kisi blog par, kabhi websites par aur kabhi YouTube channels par. Poore Internet par mano yeh chaa sa gaya hai par shayad hi aapko is site ki achi jankari ho aur aap iska use karte ho. Mere hisaab se yeh bahut hi interesting site hai aur yeh aapko bahut kuch naya sikha sakti hai saath hi agar aapka koi business hai toh aap Pinterest par use promote bhi kar sakte hai. Agar aap janna chahte hai ki kya hai ye Pinterest aur iska istemaal kaise kiya jaye toh humara yeh post zaroor padhe. Facebook aur twitter ki tarah Pinterest bhi ek famous social networking site hai, Yeh ek photos share karne ke lie saal 2010 mein launch ki gayi thi aur dekhte hi dekhte ye itni jyada popular ho gayi ki ab is par 100 million se bhi jyada logo ne register kar liya hai. Itni jyada lokpriyata ko dekhte huye isme kuch naye features bhi add karna zaroori samjha gaya jaise ki video aur messaging. Yeh website tezi se aage badh rahi hai, Pinterest aur baki sites jaise facebook, Twitter aur Google Plus se thoda alag hai isme khaas baat yeh hai ki is par 75 se bhi jyada users females hai. Pinterest par ek board hota hai jispar aap apne interest ke mutabik koi video ya fir image pin kar sakte hai. Ise virtual bookmark bhi kaha ja sakta hai. Account banane ke liye www.pinterest.com par jaye. or Account banane ke baad Hindi Me Help ko Follow karna naa bhule. Hum Internet ka istemaal har tarah ki information search karne ke liye karte hai, search to aasani se ho jata hai par jo bhi hum search karte hai woh organize nahi reh paata. Agar baat ki jaye Pinterest ki toh yaha ek board milta hai jaha par hum apne interest ki cheeze organized tarike se set kar sakte hai aur wo wahi par rahti bhi hai maine pehle bhi btaya hai ki yeh ek tarah ka bookmark hi hai. Ab agar baat aaye aapke career ya aapke business ki toh Pinterest aapki bahut help kar sakta hai. Aaj ke time par lakho log Pinterest par apna business start kar chuke hai ab aap soch rahe honge, Pinterest par apna business kaise kar sakte hai toh mai bata du ki ye bahut hi saral hai. agar aap koi fashion designer hai toh apne design kiye hue clothes ko Pinterest par show kar sakte hai isi taraf aap web designing, graphic designing ya fir kisi aur cheez ka bhi portfolio is par daal sakte hai log aapke product ko dekh sakenge. aur agar uhe kuch pasand aya toh woh product ke order ki bhi aapse request kar sakte hai. Agar aapka koi blog ya YouTube channel hai toh bhi aap Pinterest par use promote kar sakte hai.

Hindimehelp me ka sbse phla aur main aim yahi hai ki logo ki help krna. Aur sath sath unko internet se judi sabhi jankariyon se Update krte rhna. Aaj Hindimehelp website ke through bahut se logo ne Blog bnana sikh liya hai. Aur unme se bahut se log success bhi ho chuke aur kuch log success ki taraf badh rhe hain. Lekin mujhe ye btate huye bahut dukh ho rha hai ki abhi bahut se Hindi Bloggers badi badi galtiyan Kar rahe hain, Jiske wajah se unko success milne me deri ho rhi hai. Is article me kuch mistakes ko btaunga jisko dur karke ek Hindi Blogger bhi bahut hi kam samay me successful ho sakta hai. Hindi Me Help ki Success Story aap yaha pad sakte hai Ye Bhi Jarur Pade Dekhiye agar aapne Blogging sirf Paise ke liye start kiya hai toh Shayad Blogging aapke liye nahi hai. Aapne iss statement ko bahut se Blogs par padha hoga. Aur yah kafi had tk sahi bhi hai. Blogging ka matlab apne experience aur knowledge ko share krna hota hai na ki kisi dusre ke article ko apne blog par Copy krna. Aur kuch log isi wajah se Blogging ko aasan samaj lete hai. For example New Hindi Blogger Internet se English wale article ko Hindi me Translate karke apne Blog par publish kar rahe hain. Aur wo khud uss article ko practical tarike se karke try nahi krte hain. Unko sirf mtlb hota hai ki kisi bhi tarike se unke Blog par article ki quantity badh jaye. Abhi toh yah Translation sahi hain Lekin future me Google ka koi update aaya toh iss tarah ke Blog sbse phle Band ho jayenge. Aap log nirash mt hoiye. Iska sbse achha upay hai ki aap jo kuch bhi internet se ya offline sikhiye usko apne experience ke base par hi share kijiye. Direct translation Google ko bhi aata hai. Aur Google ko bewkoof koi nahi bna skta .

Hello Dosto, Agar aap Hindi Me HelpHMH ke reader hai to ye news aapke liye bhi khas hai Q ki HMH ne 2 year complete kar liye hai. Ye to aap jante hi hoge, Ham kuch bhi karte hai usme utar chadav to aate hi hai, aapne apni life me iss baat ko bhut war mhesus bhi kiya hoga, ki sab kuch acha ho jata hai fir koi new problem aa jati hai. wo tikh hoti hai fir dusri aa jati hai. or agar ham hamari life ko dekhe to jese books me chapter hote hai tikh aese hi hamari life me chapter badte jate hai. khene ka matlab ye hai ki kuch bhi karo, aasan kuch bhi nahi hai or impossible bhi kuch nahi hai. par aesa koi kaam nahi hai puri duniya me jisme paresani naa ho. agar aap koi aese kaam ke ware me search kar rahe hai jisme aapko kuch bhi paresani naa aaye or bina mhenat kare paise aate jaye. to aap search karna band kardo, q ki aesa koi kaam nahi hai. HMH ka Blogging or Youtube par main focus hai or Internet se related jankari share ki jati hai to ham ussi ke samband me baat karege. Aap Blogging karo ya Youtube par Kaam karo ya koi bhi kaam. agar aapko usme success hona hai or badiya paise kamana hai to aapko apne aapko improve karna hoga or new new chije add bhi karna hoga. or sabse main jo problems aayegi unse nipatna bhi hoga. Aapko ek baat achi se pata hona chaiye Jitna Chota kaam, Unti choti Problem. Jitna bada kaam, Utni badi Problem Matlab ye hai ki agar aap kuch bhi start kar rahe hai or aap chote lavel par hai to aapko choti choti problem aayegi. jese blogging me aap new hai to Blog kaise banaye, Template kaise upload kare, Domain kaise add kare. iss trha ki choti choti problems Jab aap apne aapko improve karte jate hai or jada sikhte jate hai or aapka jo lavel hai wo bhi badta jayega, or uske sath sath sab chije bhi badti jayegi. ab jo Problems hai wo bhi badi badi aayegi. jese Website ki Speed kaise badaye, Website Hack hone se kaise bachaye etc. Kuch Bhi Start karte hai to Starting me bhut jada mhenat karni padti hai, jese mene apni HMH.pe ki 1st Year Success Story me bataya muje kya kya karna pada or kaise me iss mukam par phucha. Ab Jab Site Next level par aa gai to uski jo problem hai wo bhi badd gai aesa nahi ki site popular ho gai to ab koi problem nahi aati. Ab badi badi problem aati hai jese jab Live 500 Visitor ek sath site par aate hai to site ka server down ho jata hai, or uske liye site ko VPS server par transfer karna pada. Aapne dekha hoga me kuch din se HMH.pe regular nahi hu, jabke mene bataya hai regular rhena kitna jaruri hai, q ki Problem sabki life me aati hai or life me utar chadav aate rhete hai. or abhi ka time mere liye acha nahi chal raha. par me haar maanne walo me se nahi hu or jald hi sab tikh karke kuch aesa jauur karuga jisse jo mera maksabd hai usme me ek kadam or aage bad saku. HMH ka maksad tha logo ko Internet ki jankari de kar unko Internet se jodna or agar wo Internet me Interest rakhte hai to unko Blogging or Youtube or Online Earning ki jankari de kar unko apne pero par khada karna. or muje lagta hai me bhut hadd tak isme success bhi huaa hu, or iss baat ki muje jo khusi hai usko me express nahi kar sakta. Jald me kuch naya lane wala hu, jisse jo Internet se jude hai or apna career banane ka soch rahe hai Blogging or Youtube me unko or help mil sakegi. English me to bhut hai or Hindi jaanne walo ke liye mere har steps hoge, taki jo ek boundary hai English ki wo hat sake or Internet par apna career bana sake. Yaha me ek baat jo hamesa se sabse bolta hu wo ek war fir bolna chahuga wo ye ki Aap Internet ka use jarur kare par uss topic par jisme aapka interest hai. aesa bilkul naa kare ki aapne blogging me blog banana sikha or khud hi blogging sikhane lage. Mera khene ka matlab aap jis fild me master hai uss fild ko select kare or khud se apna talent share kare. agar aap kisi bhi dusre ka talent ko share karege thoda bhut change karke bhi to bhi aap success nahi ho payege. Agar aapko Success hona hai to kuch naya or hatke karna hoga, jiski logo ko jarurat ho. To Friends abhi ke liye itna hi. jald hi milta hu. or regular hoke kuch naya or dhamakedar karege, sab milke.

Mai apne blog par hmesa hard work karne ki kosish karta hu. Aur main daily kuch na kuch nayi chiz Sikhne ki Bhi kosish karta hu Aur Daily kuch na kuch Sikhta hu. Kuch Dino pahle maine apna sabhi post ko phir se dekha Aur Unko Padha. Maine apne dwara likhe gaye sabhi posto ko aachi tarah se smjha aur uske baad maine ye post likhne ka socha. Maine Apne pichle kuch post me bahut hi prakar ke chiz share kiye. Aaj Main aapko kuch common chize Bataoga Jo aapke blog ko popular banane me bahut madad karega. Inme se kuch method ko Maine Apne blog par share bhi kiya hai. Agar aap in chizo ka dhyaan me rakh kar blogging karege to Muje ummed hai aapka blog bahut hi jaldi Improved hone ke sath sath popular bhi hoga. Apne Blog ko Famous karna har ke bloggers ka sapna hota hai. Lekin kuch hi logo ka ye sapna pura hota hai. Iska Karan ye hota hai ki hum sahi tarike se blogging nahi karte hai. Muje Pta hai yadi aap Blogging ke business me hai to apne blog ko popular karna Easy nahi hai. Lekin ye baat bhi Such hai ki Yadi aap ek Hard Worker hai aur hmesa kuch na kuch Naya Sikhne me Belive karte hai To guarantee ke sath kah sakta hu ki aap ek na ek din jarur success hone. Internet par bahut se aise tarike hai Jinke dwara aap apne blog ko next level par le kar jaa sakte hai Unme se kuch method ke liye paise bhi kharch karne padhte hai. Lekin ye jaruri nahi hai ki agar aap apne blog me paise investment karne ke baad bhi popular rahega. Agar aap ek hard worker hai to aap bina paise kharch kiye hue bhi apne blog ko popular bana sakte hai. Ek baat ka dhyaan rakhe jab bhi aap blogging me kuch karne jaye to aapko ye pata hona cahiye ki aap kya kar rahe hai. Bina aapka time west kiye hue kuch tarike ko batata jinko use kar ke aap apne blog ko Next Level tak le jaa sakte hai Aapko ye Sun kar thoda accha nahi lag raha hoga ki Akhir mai apne jyada se jyada post me blog design ke bare me kyo baat karta hu. Kyoki bina badiya blog Design ke aapka blog next level tak nhi Jaa payega. Apne blog ko Famous banane ke liye aapke blog ka design accha hona cahiye. Agar aapko design me thoda Gyan ho to aap apne blog ko khud design kar sakte hai. Blog design ko maine blog ko popular banane ke tarike Me Isliye Pahle number par rakha hai kyoki Blog ka design blogging me bahut impotent hota hai. Agar aap kuch bade blogger ke blog ko dekhe to unke blog ka ek unique design hota hai. Har ek visitor unique aur interesting chiz ko hmesa pasand karta hai. Jab koi aapke blog par visit karta hai to aapke blog ka design hi aapke visitor ko first impression deta hai. Ek visitor ke taur par Agar aapke blog ke design badiya nahi hai to mai bhi aapke blog par Dubara Jana nahi pasand karuga. Yadi aapke blog ka design clean aur accha hai to mai phir se aapke blog par jana Pasand karuga. Isliye agar aapko apne blog ko popular banana hai to apne blog design ko pahle popular banao. Apne blog ka aisa design karo jaisa kisi ke blog ka design naa ho. Apne blog ke header, layout, footer, sidebar, navigation etc ko hmesa unique aur clear rakhe. Apne blog par utne hi wedgetplugin ko use karo jitna ki aapko jarurat ho. Bina jarurat wale wedgetplugin ko remove kar do. I think Agar aap apne blog ka design better rakhoge to aapke blog ka first impression apke visitor par bahut badiya hoga. Blog Design me log kya mistake karte hai jo kabhi nahi karni chaiye uske ware me yaha detail me bataya hai aap iss article ko jarur read kare. Jab maine blogging start kiya tha tab bahut se Aise top bloggers the jinko mai follow karte tha. Maine sabhi top bloggers me ek common chiz dekh ki woh apne post me tutorial aur case study article ko hi share karte hai. Aur woh har ek ki madad ke liye Hmesa Ready Rahte the. In hi sabhi chizo ko Maine Bhi follow kya. Maine bahut se hindi bloggers ko kuch Aise article ko likhte hue dekha hai Jinka Upyog woh khud hi nahi kar pate hai. Muje thoda dukh hota hai jab naye hindi bloggers ye galti karte hai ki woh apne article ke liye sahi chiz ko nahi chun pate hai. Naye hindi bloggers kuch iss tarah se article likhte hai- Jo log iss tarah ke article likhte hai Maine dekha hai ki Unke Blog par nahi traffic ata hai aur naa hi woh koi paisa kamate hai phir bhi woh likhte hai. Mai un sabhi hindi bloggers se kahna cahta hu ki agar aapko blog traffic, page rank, online earning ke bare me pata hai to pahle aap usko apne blog par prayog kare yadi aap unko karne me safal ho jate hai tab uske bare me Apne blog par artcal likhe aur visitor ko uska proof bhi. Tab aapko uska benfit milega aur aapka blog popular hoga. kyoki internet Ka har ek visitor proof me jyada Belive karta hai. Agar aapko apne blog ko famous karn hai to aap un hi chizo ko apne blog par likhe jisko aap ne khud hi kiya ho aur jiska aapke pass proof ho ki maine ye kiye hai. Apne reader ko hmesa badiya se badiya tutorial dene ki kosish kare. Aur apne reader ke help ke liye hmesa tayaar rahe. Sirf kisi chij ko dekh kar kuch bhi share naa kare, phele usko achi se check kare or agar usme thodi bhi gadbad ho to usko share naa kare. Isse aapke visitor par aapka visbas bhi badewga. Aaj ke Date me sabhi blogger guest posting ko accept karte hai. Hindimehelp bhi guest post ko accept karte hai. Agar aap apne blog ko Next level tak le kar jana cahte hai to uske liye guest posting sabse badiya tarika hai. Sabse pahle aap apne blog topic se related popular blog ko find kare aur un par apne dwara likha hua badiya se badiya article publish kare. Agar aap regular basic par aisa karte hai to iska result aapko bahut hi jaldi miega. Aapke dwara kiya gaya Ek badiya Guest post aapke blog ke traffic ko bahut jyada improved kar sakta hai. Agar aap soch rahe hai ki 2-3 guest post kar dene se aapka blog popular ho jayega to aap galat soch rahe hai. Jiss tarah se aap apne blog post ka article publish karte hai Thik ussi prakar aapko regular basic par popular blog par guest posting bhi karte rahna cahiye. Guest post karne se Backlink or New Readger milne ke sath sath or bhi bhut faidae hai. Agar aap janna chate hai Guest post karne ke faide to yaha read kar sakte hai. Agar aap Hindi Me Help par ki hui Guest Post padna chate hai to yaha dekhe Internet par har koi free stuff ko bahut psand karta hai. Mai bhi free stuff ko bahut pasand karta hu. Yadi aap bhi apne blog par kuch badiya chiz free me apne reader ko de sakte hai to aapka apke reader ke sath bahut accha relationship banega. Yadi aapke pass Untne paise nahi hai ki aap koi premium chiz kisi ko Free Me de sakte to aap kisi ek topic par ek book likh sakte hai aur usko apne blog par free me uplabad kara sakte hai. Aap Book aisa likhe jisse usko dwonload karne wale ko help mil sake. Aap video tutorial bhi bana kar free me de sakte hai. Lekin ek baat ka dyaan de ki book aur video tutorial simple nahi hona cahiye usme kuch aisi chiz hona cahiye Jisse usko dekhne aur padhne wale ko bahut help mile. Agar aap kuch bhi badiya chiz apne blog par free me Upload kar denege to usko padhne aur dekhne wale aapke blog ko kabhi bhi nahi bhulege aur hmesa aapke blog ko yaad rakege aur uss par visit karega. Yadi woh free chiz acchi hogi to log usko apna dosto ke sath bhi share karege. jisse aapke blog ke bare me jyada se jyada logo ko pata calega. Yaha par ek baat ka diyaan rakhe ki koi aesi chij share naa kare jo paise me mil rahi ho or aap usko crack karke download karwa rahe ho. aese me software company aap par copywrite clam kar sakta hai or aap dikkat me fas sakte hai. to is baat ka jarur diyan rakhe. Har ek reader fresh aur new content ko Hmesa pasand karta hai. yadi aap hmesa fresh content ko publish karte hai to woh aapke blog ke success ka key banega. Maine dekha hai ki kuch logo ko jyada time nahi mil pata hai blogging ke liye. Agar aapko din me nahi time mil pata hai to aap raat me apna blogging ka kaam kar sakte hai. Blog reader ke sath sath search engine bhi fresh content ko pasand karta hai. Jab bhi aap koi new post likhne jaye to uss post ke bare me acchi tarah reserch kar le. aur usko apne tarike se ek dum details ke sath likhe. Search engine hmesa long post ko jyada value deta hai. Apne post ko publish karne ke baad kam se kam 1 din uss post ke promotion me lagana cahiye. Apne uss post ko har ek jagah par promote kare. Blog Post ko Promote karne ke 15 tarike yaha hai hum sab social media ke power ko jante hai. Social media aapke blog ke popular banane me bahut madad karta hai. Aap facebook aur twitter ko join kare. jab aap facebook par apne acount banaye to ye kosish kare ki aap jada se jada friend ko apne friend list me add kare aur un hi logo ko add kare jinko aapke blog topic ke bare me jaankari ho. Agar aap jaldi 5000 friends apne blog ke niche se related logo ko add kar lete hai to aap apne blog ko unke sath acchi tarah se promotion kar sakege. Agar aapka unke sath accha relationship ban gaya to to aapka blog 5000 logo me popular ho jayega aur unke dwara aur bhi bahut se logo ko aapke blog ke bare me pata calega Lekin utne logo me Apne blog ko popular karne ke liye aapko daily facebook par active hona padega aur unke sath Ghulna milna padhega. Facebook par kaise promote kar sakte hai blog ko uski jankari yaha hai Thik yahi chiz aapko twitter par bhi karna cahiye. Agar aapka blog social media par popular ho gaya to smjh lo ki aapne apna blog 50 popular kar liya. Ye woh 6 chize hai jisko acchi tarah se karne par aapke blog next level tak jaa sakta hai. Aapko apna blog ke har ek chiz ko soch smjh kar karna cahiye kewal jyada se jyada article likhne se aapka blog popular nahi hoga balki aapke dwara likha hua article unique aur fresh ho aur usse logo ko help mil sakte. kabhi bhi kisi dusare ke content ko copy naa kare hmesa apna khud ka content likhe. muje ummed hai ki ye article aapke liye helpfull hoga. Muje bahut khushi hogi yadi aap iss content ko apne dosto ke sath share karege. yadi aap sahi chizo ko follow karege to mai pure yakin se kha sakta hu ki aapka blog bahut Age tak jayega. Happy Blogging

Agar Aapki website hai to aap bhi chate hoge ki aapki website popular ho or jada se jada log aapki site par aaye. Par kya aapko pata hai ham kisi bhi website ke bare me kaise pata kar sakte hai ki wo site kitni popular hai . Agar nahi jante to ab jaan jayege. Website par kitne visitor aa rahe hai wo ham apni site ke liye to Google Analytics ki madad se pata kar sakte hai par agar hame kisi dusre ki site ke bare me ye jaanna ho to ham nahi jan sakte. Par Alexa Rank or uske data se ham andaja jarur laga sakte hai ki site par kitni traffic hogi or wo site kitni popular hai. Alexa ek website hai, jo Internet ki har website ko uski popularty ke hisab se rank deti hai. Hindi Me Help ki Alexa Rank dekhne ke liye yaha click kare Wese agar apni site ko alexa se verify nahi karte to bhi site ki rank do dikhata hai, par agar ham apni site ko verify kar dete hai to jo data hai wo thoda sahi aa jata hai alexa site par. jisse hamari site ki rank me bhi faida hota hai. Is Process me hame jo hamari site hai usme ek code add karna padega alexa ka. jisse ye verify ho jayega ki wo site hamari hai. Step 1 Sabse phele Clam karna hai apni website. Clam Website Now! Step 2 Ab jo Page khulega usme apni site ka url dale Step 3 Ab hame Alexa me Account open karna hai. Step 4 Ab Hame apni site me code add karke verify karna hai ki wo hamari site hai. Second option select kare. Step 5 Ab jese hi 2 par click karege ek code aa jayega. jisko hame apni site me add karna hai. Blogger me Code kaise add kare To Friends ab aap ne Alexa me apni site ko verify to kar liye. Aapne dekha hoga meri site ke bagal me Alexa Rank ka Widget add hai, jisme meri site ki kya rank hai wo aap dekh sakte ho. to agar aap bhi apni site me widget add karna chate hai to uske ye kuch code. Alexa Rank Widget add karne ke liye hame ek HTML ka code hai to add karna hai. To chaliye dekhte hai kaise add hoga. Sabse Phele to apne blogger ke deshboard me ja kar Layout secttion me jaye fir Widget select karke HTMLJavascript widget select kare or usme apne widget ke code ko daal kar save karde. AB apni pasand ka Widget code ko copy karke apni site me add kare. Type 1 Type 2 Type 3 Type 4 Type 5 Type 6 Jitne bhi Code hai usme apni site ka URL edit karna naa bhule. AGar usme dikkat aa rahi hai to aap ye Widget Generator ki adad se bhi Alexa Rank Widget bana sakte hai. Ye Bhi Pade

Agar aapne koi blog banaya hai to uske main do karan ho sakte hai, Aapne apne sock ke liye banaya hai ya fir Paise kamane ke liye banaya hai ya fir ho sakta hai dono karan ho. Me phele bata chuka hu kaise bidvertiser ke ads laga kar ham income kar sakte hai apne blog me. Blog me ham Infolinks se bhi paise kama sakte hai. Infolinks phela ad network hai jo text ads ke concapt par kaam karta hai. isme koi banner ads lagane ki jarurat nahi iske ads hamari post me jo sabd hai unhi ko link me badal deti hai. Isse Hamare Visitor ko bhi koi dikkat nahi hoti or hamari income bhi achi hoti hai agar koi link par click karta hai to. Infolink ke baare me aapko batane se phele mene isko tri kiya or muje inka concept badiya laga. button-green url httpswww.hindimehelp.cominfolinks target blank position center Create Infolinks Accountbutton-green Infolinks ek ad network hai jo 2007 me suru huaa tha. jo text adverting karte the par baad me inhone or bhi bhut si chije apne ads network me add ki jisse income ko or bhi badaya ja sake, jese intag, infold or inframe. Me aapko sabke baare me bataoga. Infolinks design aese kiya gaya tha ki site par koi extra jagha bhi naa use ho or visitor ko koi dikkat bhi naa ho site ko chalane me. To ab aapke Dimag me kyi sabal aa rahe hoge, Chaliye uske jabab ka pata karte hai. Infolinks jitna bhi text hota hai usme hi apne ads ki link ko daalti hai, Chalo dekhte hai kaise kaam karti hai Is Type ke Ads Apni Blog ki Post ke Text ko Ads link me Badal dete hai. Tik se samajne ke liye maan lijiye aap kisi Sports ki site par kuch pad rahe hai, to jitne bhi aese sabd hoge jinpar koi ads hai wo link me badal jayege, or jab aap un link par click karoge to ek chota Popup khulega us sabd se sambandit. jesa aapko image me dikh raha hoga. basketball ka ads aa raha hai. Ye jo ads hai wo hamari site ki faltu ka jo space hai bha aate hai, Site ke dono side. Is ads me bhi site se sambandit ads hi aate hai to click karne ke chance bad jate hai. Image me aap dekh sakte ho. is type ke ads me link me hi ads aate hai, isko chalu karne par link ke ads popup karke bhi khulte hai jisse click karne ke chance or jada bad jate hai intext ke mukable. To ab aap ye jaan chuke ko Infolinks kya hai or ye kaise kaam karta hai or kitne prakar ke ads hai isme. bese muje isko batane ki koi jarurat nahi hai par fir bhi me bata deta hu, taki aapko yakin ho jaye ki mene isko use kiya hai or isse meri income bhi hui hai. me janta hu, bhut log soch rahe hoge ye to bhut kam hai, iske karan hai mere blog par bhut kam traffic tha. Jese aap jante hoge agar kisi chij ka koi faida hota hai to nuksan bhi hota hai. jese ek sikke ke do phelu hote hai ussi prakar. to chaliye ye bhi jaan lete hai kya faide hai or kya nuksan Infolinks ke. Ab aap InfoLinks ke bare me sab kuch jaan chuke ho Agar ab aapne diside kar liya hai to aapko account banana hai Infolink par to Button par click karke account banaye. Create Infolinks Account Agar aapko Account banane me koi paserani ho rahi hai to thoda wait kare. Agli post me ham dekhege kaise Infolinks par acount banaye or usko kaise apne Blog me Add kare puri detail ke sath. Aapko ye Detail me jaankari kaise lagi Comment karke jarur bataye .

Blogger par Blog banana to bhut aasan hai bo hamne pichli post me dekha ki kaise ham apna Blog free me bana sakte hai kuch hi minto me. Ham blog banate hai or uspar mahanat kar ke badiya badiya article daalte hai, par agar bo logo tak nahi phuche to kya paida. Isme hamare blog ka template bhi bhut bada roll aada karta hai. Hamara Blog ka Template SEO friendly hona chaiye, taki koi agar Google me search kare to hamara blog search me aaye. Blogger ne phele se bhut se template de rakhe hai free me use karne ke liye par bo bhut purane hai or ham jaante hai ki Search Engines ke search karne ke tarike badalte hi jaa rahe hai. To hame jarurat hai ek naye SEO Friendly template ki. Template Mobile Friendly bhi hona chaiye matlab aapka blog mobile me bhi acha dikhe q ki ham ye to jaante hai ki jadatar lag ab mobile par hi Net chalate hai. Blogger ka Template ham agar Google me Search kare to lakho template aajaye ge unmese ham hamari jarurat ke hisab se chun kar usko apne blog par use kar sakte hai, hame bo upload karna padta hai. aaj ham ye hi jaanege ki Blogger par Template ko Upload kaise karte hai. Aap Badiya Blogger Template yaha se Download kar sakte hai Note Jo Template ki file hai bo Win.rar me hai, Is liye phele aapko WinRAR Software computer me Install karke fir Template ki file ko Bhar nikalna padega. Download WinRAR Apne blog ke liye Template ko Download karne ke baad aapko kya karna hai Blogger.com par jakar Login karo Apne Blog ke Dashboard me jao Ab ek popup window khulegi

Kisi bhi site ya blog ke bare me jaanne ke liye uska About us Page hota hai jisme uske bare me likha hota hai. Ye ek aesa Page hai jo bhut jaruri bhi hota hai site ke liye. Agar aap Adsense se paise kamana chate hai to Contact Us, Privacy Policy Page or About us Page hona bhut jaruri hota hai, Jab hi hamara Adsense account Approve hota hai. About Us Page Kaise Banaye or Usme Kya kya Likhna chaiye chaliye jaante hai. About Us ka Matlab hai Hamare Bare Me. Hame Is Page me Hamare bare me or site ke bare me likhna hai. Jisko koi bhi pad kar site kis bare me hai, Site ka Maksad kya hai, Kis chij ki site hai, Kisne site ko banaya hai, or bhi bhut kuch. Chaliye Point wise dekhete hai. Kya Kya Add karna hai About Us Page me. Inke aalawa bhi aap Likh sakte hai, Ab aap samaj gaye hoge ki About Us Page me Kya Likhna hai. To ek badiya About Us Page Banaye Apni site ke liye. Ek Baat ka or diyaan rakhe, likhna is prakar hai jese visitor aapke saamne betha hai or aap usse hi baat kar rahe hai. Acha Impression Jamega. Simple aapko Page Add karna hai, Chaliye dekhte hai kaise Blogger me Login kare, Fir Deshboard me jakar Page ke section me jaye. Ab Page Editor klhul jayega Is Page ko Menu me jarur add kare, jab hi koi isko dekh payega. Aap jitna ho sake badiya About Us Page Banane ki Kosis kare. Example ke liye hamara About Us Page Dekhe.

Agar aapka Blog WordPress par hai to aap Yoast Plugin to jarur use karte hoge, apne article ka SEO analyse karne ke liye, ki aapne sahi se SEO kiya hai ya nahi. or agar aap Yoast me sabhi signal Green karna chate hai to sahi post par hai. Yoast Plugin ke sbhi signal ko Green kaise kare wo janne se phele kuch bate hai jo aapko pata hona chaiye, agar aapko inke ware me sahi jankari nahi hai to please phele aap inko read karke samje Agar aapko upar diye Topic ke ware me jankari hai to aap teyar hai Yoast plugin ka sahi tarike se use karne ke liye. Yoast WordPress plugin hai, jisme SEO ki settings hoti hai. iski madad se post ka SEO analyse kiya ja sakta hai focus keyword set karke. Simple ham khe sakte hai Yoast plugin hame On Page SEO karne me help karti hai, or kahi kuch gadwad hoti hai to uske ware me batati hai. Note Agar aapka Blog Blogger par hai, fir bhi aap iss post ko pura read kare, Q ki bhale aap yoast plugin use naa kare par jo point hai wo pure karna jaruri hai SEO ke liye. WordPress me post likhte time niche ek box aata hai yoast plugin ka, jisme ham focus keyword daal kar post ka on page SEO check kar sakte hai, jisme hame pata chalta hai ki SEO me kaha kya kami hai. Jab Post likhte hai to Yoast ke kuch point to green aasni se ho jate hai , par kuch aese point bhi hote hai jo green nahi ho pate, to uska kya karana hai or kaise iski madad se SEO Friendly post likhe chailye dekhte hai. Sabhi point ko detail me batane se phele me aapko bata du, jo bhi point hai wo kisi trna program kiye gaye hai. to ho sakta hai aap sahi kare fir bhi kuch point green naa ho. to aapko uss baat ki jada tension lene ki jarurat nahi hai. wass sabse main hai ki aapko sabhi point ke ware me sahi jankari ho. Ye sabse main or sabse jada jaruri hai Focus keyword, q ki jo aapki post ko analyse kiya jayega wo issi ke hisab se kiya jayega. To jo bhi keyword dale ko puri research karke dale, yaha aapko wo keyword dalna hai jisko aap target kar rahe hai ki usko search kare to aapki ye post aaye. Keyword Kya hai uske ware me detail me mene bataya hai aap usko read karke keyword kya hai usko achi se samje. Jese hi focus keyword dalege, uske hisab se kaha kya kami hai wo batai jayegi, agar kahi kuch kami hogi to red signal aayega. Ye Point hai jo hame sahi se karna hai Ye jitne bhi point bataye, unko sahi se karne par post ka on Page SEO pura ho jayega. iske sath ek or option bhi hota hai Readability jiska matlab hai article read karne me kesa hai wo bataya jata hai, par agar aapka blog hindi ya Hinglish me hai jese Hindi Me Help hai to aap iss part par dhiyan naa de, wass uske jo point hai unko samje. ki read karne me aasan ho. At Last Hope ab aap samaj gaye hoge, jo point Yoast plugin me bataye jate hai wo kya hai or unko kaise green karna hai. Ek Tip hai aapke liye, ki jab bhi post likhe to in Point ko dekhe jarur, par post ko natural tarike se likhe taki jo aapke reader hai wo usko sahi samaj sake. aesa naa ho in point ko green karne ke chakkar me aap post ki quality gadwad kadre. Agar aapka koi bhi sabal hai to aap comment karke puch sakte hai, or aapko ye jankari kesi lagi wo bhi jarur batye.

Computer Glass un sabhi ke liye bhut jaruri hai, jo Computer ya Mobile par jada time vitate hai. Q ki Jitne bhi Digital Device hote hai, unse Blue rays nikalti hai jo hamari Ankho ke liye achi nahi hoti, agar jada uske contact me rahe to. or Computer Eye Glass ussi Light se hamari ankho ko bachate hai. Me aapko suggest karuga ki Computer or Mobile ka use karte time Specs Chasma ka jarur use kare jo Blue light se aapki ankho ko bachaye. Abhi me aapko bataoga ki Computer Glasses Kya hai, Inka Kya faida hai or kaha se aap apne Liye Computer Specs le sakte ho saste me. Suggestion Online Mobile Recharge Kaise Kare Full Info in Hindi Computer Glass jese naam se hi aapko pata chal raha hai ki computer ke liye hai. Ye specially banaye hi iss trha hai ki jitni bhi digitial screens hoti hai. unse jo blue light nikalti hai usko refelect karde or eyes tak naa aane de. wese sabhi type ke Specs ke liye jo Glass hote hai wo 3 type ke hote hai, same wahi Computer Glasses me bhi. 1 UnMagnified Iss type ke glass me naa Zoom hoga or naa Zoomout. matlab jese normal dikhta hai wesa hi dikhega. par isme jo computer ki harful blue rays hai wo cut ho jati hai. ye un logo ke liye best hai jinki ankho me koi problem nahi hai par wo computer par kaam karte hai. Iseo ZERO Number bhi khete hai. 2 Single Magnification Iss Glass me pure Glass me thoda Zoom hota hai, to agar aapko dur ka thoda clear nahi dikhta to aap ye le sakte hai. 3 Multi Focus Inn glass me niche ki or extra focus rheta hai, jo reading ke liye design hote hai, jisse words thode or clear dikhe. Jesa ki mene bataya jitne bhi digital device hai unse blue light nikalti hai, jo jada hamari ankho ke liye sahi nahi hai. agar aap inme se kisi bhi device par jada Time use karte hai to aapko Computer Glasses use karna hi chaiye To ab aap ye to samaj gaye hoge ki agar aapka koi bhi aesa kaam hai jisme aapko Digital Screen ke samne lambe time tak rhena padta hai to aap Specs Chasma phenna hi chaiye agar uske bure asar se bachna hai to. Jesa ki mene aapko Computer Eye Glasses ki puri jankari to dedi hai, to ab aap jaha se chahe le sakte hai. Mene Online Order kiye the, or agar aap chahe to aap bhi waha se kar sakte hai, abhi 30 Discount Offer chal raha hai. Aapko jada Problem naa ho uske liye Computer Glasses ki link me aapko niche de raha hu. Buy Computer Eye Glasses

404 error ya Not Found error blog website ki sabse common error hai, jo temporary ya permanent ho sakta hai. 10 50-60 , Isse user experience aur SEO optimization dono par bad impact padta hai. 404 Error Kya Hai Jab koi visitor kisi post ko access karane ki koshish karta hai aur vah server par available na ho to server 404 HTTP error code send karta hai. Jise Not Found kaha jata hai. 404 Error Se Kya Nuksan Ho Sakte Hai 1.High Bounce Rate Jab koi user post ko find nahi kar pata hai to blog ko turant leave kar deta hai. Jisse bouncer rate increase ho jati hai. 2.Bad SEO Impact Koi post not found ho to Google us post ko deindex kar deta hai. Jisse blog ki traffic down ho sakti hai. Not Found Error Kaise Jane 1.Google Search Consol GSC me login ho jaye fir left bar me Crawl Error par click kare aur 404 Response vale urls ki list bana le. 2.Broken Link Checker BLC plugin install kare aur easily not found links ko jan sakte hai. 3.Online Tool W3C Link Checker jaise tool se aap details me apne blog ki all link ko check kar skate hai. Not Found Error Hone Ke Reasons 1.MisspelledURL Typing Kisi user dvara url galat type karne se browser DNS lookup nahi kar pata hai, Jisse 404 error aata hai. 2.Changes and updates in Permalinks Post update ke time permalink me minor change karne se bhi 404 error ane lagta hai. 3.htaccess file Misconfiguration WordPress .htaccess file ko automatically configuration karti hai. but migration ya spam traffic block karne ke time is file ko touch karana padta hai. Jisse ek character bhi miss hone par bhi yah problem aa sakta hai. 4.Nginx.conf Misconfiguration Nginx server me htaccess file nahi hoti hai. Isliye permalink change karne ke bad Nginx.conf file ko manually configuration karna padta hai. Jise behad care ke sath naa kare to is tarah ki problem aa sakti hai. 5.Bad Hosting Plan Cheap hosting plan buy karane par blog ko essential hosting resource bandwidth, memory nahi mil pata hai to jisse post open nahi hota hai. 6.Limit permission Jab blog ki files ko FTP ya Filemanager dvara access karte hai to galti se kisi file ki permission limit me changes hone se post ya image public ke liye lock ho jati hai. Ek tarah ye not found error hai. 7.Migrate Blog From Blogger to WordPress Blog ko blogger platform se wordpress par shift karane par permalinks me changes aa jate hai. Jiske liye sahi configuration nahi kiya jaye to ye problem aa sakti hai. 8.Delete Post Kisi post ko delete karne se ye problem aa jati hai. 404 Error Ko Solve Karne Ke Tarike 1. GoogleRemoval Tool SERP me index not found url ko Google Removal Tool se remove kiya ja sakta hi. Isme thoda time lagta hai. 2.301 Redirect Not found URL ko 301 redirect plugin se htaccess file configuration se new url ya homepage par redirect kar skate hai. 3.DeleteUnimportant Outbound Not Found Link Comment box me user dvara submitted not found url ko delete karana hi behtar hai. Jise Broken Link Plugin se kar skate hai. 4.htaccess File Check Kare htaccess file ko edit karane se pahle backup lena sahi hai. Galati hone par FTP method ya Cpanel method se .htaccess file ko backup se update kar de. 5.Nginx.conf Yadi aapne WordPress Nginx server install kiya hai to default permalink ko postname change karne ke bad 404 error ane lagata hai. Jisse solve karane ke liye Nginx.conf file update karana hoga. Nginx.conf file ftp ya cpanel se configure kar sakte hai-

Hello Blogger, Agar aapka Blog Blogspot.com par hai to ye post aapke liye bhut jaruri hai, Q ki jitni bhi website hai unme SSL Certificate Install hona jaruri hai, HTTPS ek Ranking Signal hai jisse Google me site rank me faida hota hai, iske sath sath wo site jada secure hoti hai jo https ke sath open hoti ho. Sabse jaruri baat ye, ki Google Chrome ka jo New version aane wala hai, usme ye update aane wala hai, jisme agar ham kisi aesi website ko open karege jisme SSL nahi hai to visitor ke samne ek warning message aayega. To agar aapne abhi tak SSL Install nahi kiya hai to abhi kar lijiye, nahi to agar browser me aapke blog visitor ko warning milne lagi to fir koi aapke blog ko open nahi karege. July 2018 ke phele apni site me SSL jarur install kare. Read Blogger ki Puri Jankari in Hindi SSL Certificate kya hai or iske kya faide hai phele wo jaan lete hai, ki akhir hame faida hai hai SSL certificate use karne ka. SSL certificate ek certificate hai, jisme ho website ka connection hai wo secure hota hai. jisme User or Website ke bich me koi bhi data hack ya track nahi kar sakte. Jese agar aap kuch Form Fill kar rahe ho, ya Online Payment kar rahe ho. to maan lo connection secure nahi raha to koi Hacker aapki Information chura kar aapka nuksan kar sakta hai. Isliye SSL hona bhut jaruri hai. Wese ye jitni bhi eCommerce Website hai uske liye to jaruri hai hi, par ye Blogs ke liye bhi jaruri hai, taki jo hamare blog par user aaye unka data bhi secure kare. Jis site me SSL Certificate Install hota hai, unka URL Browser me https ke sath dikhta hai, jese httpswww.hindimehelp.com Image me aap dekh sakte hai, Hindi Me Help Secure Site hai, or URL ke aage Green Lock ke sath Secure bhi likha hua hai. Blogger Blog me SSL Install karna bhut hi aasan hai or sirf kuch Clicks ka kaam hai, jisse ham Free SSL Certificate apne Blog me Install kar sakte hai or apni site ko secure kar sakte hai. Sabse phele aap apne draft.blogger.com ke account me login karne ke baad Settings Basic me jaye me jaye Ab aapko HTTPS ka ek section dikhega, jisme aapko HTTPS on karne ke liye option hoga, jisme aapko Yes select karna hai. Note Agar aapne Custom Domain add nahi kiya hai apne BLog me to ye option aapke pass nahi aayega. Blogger me Domain kaise add karte hai uski jankari yaha hai. Isko On karne ke baad, jo aapki website hai wo https ke sath open hone lagegi. SSL Certificate ko install hone me thoda time lagta hai to aap thoda wait kare or Browser ka data clear karke dekhe. Jab SSL Install ho jaye Blog me uske baad jo niche ki setting hai, jisme http to https redirect karne ki setting hai usko bhi Yes karna hai. Isko karne se ye hoga, agar maan lo kisi ne aapki site ka URL http dala to wo automatic secure https par redirect ho jayega. jisse har war connection secure rahega. Agar aapne abhi Domain add nahi kiya hai to jo second wala option hai wo to jarur on kare, taki website https ke sath hi open ho. To Iss trha badi aasani se Blogger me Free SSL Certificate Install karke apni site connection secure kar sakte hai. Agar aap SSL Install kar rahe hai apne blog hai to aap ye naa samje ki aapka sirf itna kaam tha ki SSL yes kar diya or redirect kar diya to aapka kaam khatam. Kuch or Important Points hai jo aapko pata hona jaruri hai or kuch settings jo aapko change karni hai. Ye jo point bataye hai mene iss point ko achi se read kare. or agar aapne inko tikh se nahi kiya to aapki ranking par bhut pura asar pad sakta hai. SSL tikh trha se Install hua ke nahi wo aap iss website par check kar sakte hai. yaha aapko pata chal jayega ki aapki site full secure hai ke nahi. SSL Check At Last Agar aapne Apni blog me SSL sahi se Install kar diya hai to uske baad kya kya jaruri settings hai wo bhi aapne tikh se kardi hai.

Hello Blogger, agar aapka blog Blogger.com par hai to aapke liye ek khus khavri hai, Featured Post Gadget bhi add kar sakte hai ab blog me, jiski madad se aap apni pasand ki post home page par dikha sakte hai. Featured Post blogger ka ek gadget hai, iski madad se ham apne blog ki kidi bhi post ko sidebar me dikha sakte hai. Widget kuch is prakar ka hai or Blog me kuch is prakar ka dikhega ye to aap jante hi hopge ki regualr post karna kitna jaruri hai, har blog ke liye. Par bhut bar hota hai ham koi achi post publish karte hai, or uske baad kuch or post karte hai. to hota ye hai ki jo hamari achi post hai jisko hamare readers ko padna chaiye wo niche chali jati hai or wo usko pad nahi pade. Featured Post widget ki madad se ham hamari badiya post ko add karke side bar me dikha sakte hai, isse hamare visitor tak hamari important post phuch jati hai. Also Add Blogger Popular Post Widget Widget ko add karna bhut hi aasan hai, simple aap meri steps ko follow kare. Step 1 Sabse phele apne Blogger account me login kare fir apne blog ke deshboard me jaye. Step 2 Blog ke layout me jaye fir Add a Gadget par click kare. Step 3 Ab Gadget me se Featured Post select kare. Ste 4 Ab jo Page khulega usme hame Widget ki setting karni hai. Is trha aap aasani se Featured Post Widget ko apne blog me add kar sakte hai, or apni pasand ki post apne visitor ko dikha sakte hai. Ye Kuch or Widget jo aapke Blog me hona chaiye Agar aapki WebsiteBLog hai to aapko ye pata hona chaiye

Jo Android Phone use karte hai unhone kahi na kahi Android Phone Root sabd jarur suna hoga. Kuch Android App me root ki jarurat padti hai. Root kya hai or uske kya faide or nuksan hai ye me phele bata chuka hu. Mene apni pichli post me bataya ki PC se Andoid Mobile ko Root kaise karte hai, par bhut logo ke pass computerLaptop nahi hai, wo kaise root kare apne mobile ko. Aaj mai Android Phone ko root krne ka sbse aasan tarika btane ja rha hu. Jisme aap apne Android phone ko apne hi phone se Kuch hi steps me Successfully root kar skte hai. Root krne se phle aapko kuch baato ka dhiyan rkhna pdega. Isliye mai yah chahuga ki Aap rooting ke bare me pure detail se jaanne ke liye iss POST ko Pdhe. Android phone ko phone se hi root karna aasan hai, bas root karne ke liye hame ek application ki jarurat padegi. Chaliye dekhte hai step by step kaise kya karna hai Step 1 Sbse phle aap apne Android Device me King Root download kar lijiye. Aap iss download par click karkekar sakte hai. Download KingRoot Application Step 2 KingRoot download hone ke baad aap usko apne phone me Install kar lijiye. Note King Root Ko Install krne ke samay aapke screen pr Install Blocked likh ke aa rha ho toh aapko settings pr click karke Security me Unknown Resources ko enable kar dijiye . Fir aapka app install ho jayega. Step 3 King Root ko install karne ke baad open kijiye. Fir uspe Root ka option aayega aap uspe click kar dijiye. Step 4 Aur fir iss tarah se aapko Rooting ki process start ho jayegi . Jo ke roop me show karega. Iss tarah se aapki rooting ki process complete ho jaeygi aur wo bhi Without using PC Rooting ke time pe aapka phone reboot ho skta hai. or haa yah method bahut hi safe hai. Jo Mobile Data hai wo bhi safe rhata hai. Android Phone Root karna kitna aasan hai ab aap jaan chuke ho, par yaha me aapse ek baat khana chahuga ki root mobile karne par agar koi galat chije aapke mobile me aa gai to aapka mobile dead bhi ho sakta hai. is liye sabhal kar apne mobile ko use kare. Ye Bhi Pade

Ham starting me youtube par video upload karna shuru karte hai. Tab hamare khud ke banaye huye video bhi copyrighted ho jate hai. Isliye aapko videos upload karne se pahle ye jan lena jaruri hai ki ham kis tarah ke video youtube par upload kare. Toh dosto aaj ki post mai aapko yahi bataunga ki ham apne videos kaise banaye jo ki copyrighted na ho. Mai ummid karta hu ki ye post apke liye jarur helpful sabit hogi. Jab hamari self created video copyrighted ho jati hai. To hamare man me yahi sawal uthta hai ki ye video toh maine khud banai hai lekin fir bhi copyrighted ho gayi. Lekin isme galti hamari hi hoti hai ham youtube ki policy ko sahi tarike se follow nahi karte hai. Aur hamari video copyrighted ho jati hai. Aksar ye problem new youtuber ko hoti hai. Aapko is post ko padhne ke baad copyrighted ki problem dur ho jayegi. Video upload kaise kare ye to aapko pata hi hoga, agar nahi to pata to ye post bhi pade Youtube Me Kon Se Videos Copyrighted Ho Sakte Hai ? Agar aap youtube me video upload karke paisa kamana chahte hai. Toh iske liye aapko youtube ki policy ko acche se follow karna hoga. Youtube me daily na jane kitne log youtube channel banate hai. Lekin 10 log hi success hote hai. Toh aaj mai apko yahi batane ja raha hu ki ham kaun se video youtube par upload nahi kar skte hai. Agar aap is tarike ke video youtube par upload karoge toh apke videos copyrighted ho skte hai. Agar aap in points ko sahi se follow karoge toh apke video kabhi bhi copyrighted nahi hoge. Ek bat apko hamesha yad rakhni hai. Aap self created video hi youtube par upload kare, Kyoki dusro ki videos se ham kuch bhi nahi kama skte hai. Video Upload karne ke baad uski setting kaise kare ki wo aasani se search me aa sake uski jankari yaha hai. Youtube se sambandit sabhi post s ko padnbe ke liye yaha click kare Ye Bhi Pade

Jo Internet aap use karte hai wo aaj hamari life ka ek bada hissa hai, Aapko ye bhi pata hona jaruri hai ki hamari di hui jankari online share hoti hai, to aese me hamari jo privacy hai uspar aasar padta hai. Ham Jab Internet use karna start karte hai to hame pata nahi hota, kya privacy hai. kis site ko kaise use kare wagera wagera. to aese me ham bhut si aesi sites par bhi apna account bana lete hai jinki hame jarurat hi nahi hoti. to unpar dali hamari detail hamari privacy ko kam karti hai. Aapko ye bhi pata hona chaiye Google ham par kaise najar rakhta hai. Online kisi bhi site par account banana to bhut aasan hota hai, simple hame uske signup form ko bharke account banana hota hai. par agar hame kisi site ke account ki jarurat naa ho, ya hamne double account bana liye ho to kaise account ko delete karne me thodi dikkar aati hai. aaj me aapki ussi problem ko solve karne wala hu. Agar aapne kisi site par apna account bana liya hai or aapko wo delete karna hai, to aap thodi mehnat karke usko delete karne ka option search kar hi lege. par agar aapko kisi bhi site ke account ko one click me delete karna hai to aap kar sakte hai. Me aapko ek aesi site ke ware me hi batane wala hu, jiski madad se aap Internet ki lagbhag sabhi popular sites ke account ko delete kar sakte hai simple kuch clicks me. Me jis Website ki baat kar raha hu wo hai JustDelete.me Iss Website me Internet ki lagbhag sabhi popular site ke account ko delete karne ki jankari or Account delete karne ki direct link di hui hai. or kis website ka account delete karna aasan hai ya kitna muskil hai or delete hoga ke nahi wo bhi ham iss site par aasani se dekh sakte hai. Kisi bhi website ke account ko delete karna kitna aasan hai ya muskil usko yaha 4 category me bata gaya hai. Iss Website par hame site ke naam ke background me 4 colors show hote hai, unse pata chalta hai ki jo website hai uska account ko delete karna kitna aasan hai ya muskil. Easy Account ko delete karna bhut aasan hai. Medium Account ko delete karne ke liye thodi extra process hai. Hard Account ko puri trha se delete karne ke liye site ki customer services se contact karna padta hai. Impossible Account Delete nahi ho sakta. Aapko kisi bhi site ke account ko delete karna hai to aap sabse phele to aap is site par jaye JustDelete.me Ab aapko puri website ki link milegi. ab aap jis website ke account ko delete karna chate hai uspar click kare Aap scroll kar sakte hai ya fir search bhi site ko. Ab aapko karna ye hai. jis website ke account ko delete karna hai uspar click kare. jo bhi website hai aap uske naam ke niche aapko 2 chije or dikhegi. Account delete karne ke liye aap jo website ka name hai uspar click kare. to direct delete karne ka page open hoga uss website par. Note Aapko Link name par click karne ke baad website me login karna hoga account ko delete karne ke liye. Ye Jarur Read kare To Friends ummid karta hu aapko ye choti par helpful jankari pasand aai hogi, q ki bhut war hamare liye kisi site ke account ko delete karna bhut muskil pad jata hai. par ham iss site ki madad se badi hi aasani se kisi bhi site ke account ko delete kar sakte hai. Iss Site ka ek Chrome Extension bhi hai jiski madad se ham direct bhi kisi bhi account ko delete kar sakte hai. Aap JustDelete.me ka Chrome Extension Install kare Install Chrome Extension Agar aapko is website ko use karne me kahi problem aa rahi hai, ya aap jis website ka account delete karna chate hai uski link aapko is website par nahi milti hai to aap comment karke jarur bataye. ham aapko uss website ke account ko delete karne ki direct link provide karne ki puri kosis karege.

Hi mera name Vikash Kumar hai, Mai GyanBook.in ka founder hu. Mai apko android phone se related kuch batana chahta hu. Kya aap android phone ke default launcher ko use karke bore ho chuke hai. Playstore me android phones ke 1000 toh nahi lekin 100 launcher jarur apko mil jayenge. Unme se kuch Top launcher hai or baki ke launcher ko download or install karna dono time or Internet data waste karna hai. Aap sabhi launcher ko try karke decide nahi kar sakte konsa launcher apke android phone ke liye best hai. Islye mai apko 5 Top android launcher ke bare me bata raha hu. Ye launcher apke phone ke look ko badal dega or apke phone ke features ko bhi badha dega. Ye sabhi apps Google play store pe free me download kar sakte hai. Sabhi launcher ko try jarur kare. Also Read Mobile ko Hang hone se kaise bachaye Yahoo ne kuch din pahle apna android launcher banaya hai jiska name Aviate hai. Apne name ki tarah ye launcher cool hai or extraa ordaniry features deta hai. Aviate launcher Use karne me easy hai. Launcher me apko 4 sliding screen milenge- home screen, important apps, setting option, Sabhi apps alphabetical arrange. Jab aap headphone ko apne mobile me plug kaerenge toh apke phone ka music app automatically launch ho jayega. Is launcher me pahle se wallpaper gallery hai jisne muge bahut impress kiya. Ye ek smooth or light launcher hai. Read Net se free call kare kisi bhi Nuber par Ye launcher android phone ke liye best launcher hai. Buzz launcher ko use karke aap kabhi bhi bore nahi ho sakte. Launcher ki sabse bari khasiyat hai ki yaha 1000 types ke home scree hai jisko time to time change karke apne ko new look de sakte hai. Launcher me Internet se bahut se icon download karke ya galleey se pic select karke home scre pe laga sakte hai. Buzz launcher ek super customizable or smooth launcher hai. Google now, upar ke launcher ki tarah good looking toh nahi hai, lekin is launcher ko use karke apne phone ko voice power de sakte hai. Apko sirf Okay Google kahna hai or ye launcher James bond ki movie tarah apke voice pe work karega.Agar aap Call Puja kahenge toh ye launcher directly Apke phone me save kisi pooja ko call kardega. Yadi aap Take me to New delhi kahenge toh ye launcher apko android phone ke map ke through New delhi ka location dikahyega. Aise bahut sare commands hai jiska use karke aap apne voice se android phone ko use kar sakte hai. Themer bhi good looking launcher hai, waise toh ye launche buzz launcher se kuch milta julta hai. Lekin iske pas apna theme upload karne ka features hai. Aap yaha khud ka banaya hua bahut sara theme upload or use kar sakte hai. Iske kuch negative points bhi hai jaise ki ye launcher kabhi kabhi work nahi karta lekin mughe pata chala ki mere phone me aviate or buzz launcher pahle se installed hai jiski wajah se ye work nahi kar raha hai. Phir mene aviate or buzz launcher ko uninstall kar diya tab jake ye launcher ache kam kar raha hai. Read Youtube par Video Upload kare Mobile App se Ye sabse cute launcher hai, Smart launcher me bahut se app drawer hai jo isye smart launcher banata hai. App drawer me sabhi apps category ke hisab se set hai. Games ek jagah hai toh, Internet apps ek jagah, music, video apps sabhi alag alag category me hai.Ye launcher easy navigation ke liye best hai.Smart launcher me Google now ki tarah Ok google features available hai. Last Words Play-Store pe bahut se Launcher available hai lekin mene apko top 5 launcher ke bare batya hai. Apko jo launcher pasand aye usko choose karke install karle. Ye sabhi launcher apko playstore pe free me mil jayega. Ye ek Guest Post hai, agar aap bhi HMH.pe Guest Post karna chate hai to yaha click kare. Ye Bhi Pade Hindi Me Help ka Android App Install kare PlayStore se.

Agar aap apne Blog par Traffic lana chate hai to sirf web search nahi Image Search par bhi focus kare. Agar aap Image ka sahi SEO karege to blog par Image ke jariye bhi acha khasa traffic laya ja sakte hai. Image Blog post me bhut jaruri hoti hai, or Image SEO karna On Page SEO ka ek main point hai. jiski madad se post rank karti hai. Mere Hisab se Post me jaan jab hi dalti hai jab usme badiya image ho. mene kahi pada tha ki ek image 1000 sabd ke barabar hoti hai, or ye muje sahi bhi lagta hai. khene ka matlab hai kam se badiya image jarur add kare apni post me. jo baat ham 1000 sabd likh kar samja payege wo kaam ek image kardegi. Free Stock Image website ki list yaha share ki hai, jaha se free me image download kar sakte hai. or agar aap Google se Copyright Free Image Download karna chate hi to uska tarika bhi share kiya huaa hai. To Chaliye Dekhte hai Kya kya karna hai Blog me Post me use karne ke liye. SEO ka matlab hai search engine friendly. matlab jab koi search kare to hamari image bhi search Google Image Search me aaye. Google Khali Image se samaj nahi pata ki image me kya hai or ye kis bare me hai, isliye jab koi search karte hai to hamari image nahi aati, uske liye ye kuch Chije hai. jinka istmal karke ham apni SEO Friendly Image bana sakte hai. SEO Friendly Post likhne ke liye bhi Image SEO bhut jaruri hai. Sabse badi galti jo satarting me karte hai wo ye ki jo image hai usko remane nahi karte. jese kahi se koi photo khichi to uska naam kuch number me hota hai 232247248. isse dikkat ye hai ki Google ye nahi pata kar sakta ki image me kya hai, par agar uska naam hoga to uska pata chal jayega ki ye kiski image hai. Ye bhi Pade Kaise Badaye Apne Blog ki Traffic Jesa ki mene bataya Google Image ko achi se read nahi kar sakta ki ye image kis bare me hai. to jab ham post me upload karte hai to usme alt tag add karke ham batate hai ki is image me kya hai ya fir ye kis bare me hai. ALT Tag ek HTML Code hota hai. ALT Tag add karne ke liye steps follow kare Step 1 apni Image ko Blogger ke Post Editor me upload kare. Step 2 Image par click kare. uske baad kuch option aayege. Properties par click kare Step 3 ALT Tag me apni Image ke bare me likhe or ok ki button daba kar save karde. Title Text me bhi likhe apni image ka naam. isse agar koi image par mouse layega to uska naam popup hoga. Image me aap Caption bhi add kar sakte hai, iski madad se jo visitor aapke blog par aayega wo bh isko pad kar samaj sakta hai ki ye image kis bare me hai. Ye SEO ke liye jaruri nahi hai itna par agar kisi image ke bare me batana hai to Paragraph likhne se acha Caption me likhe. Post Description bhi jaruri hai Blogger SEO ke liye Image ka format hai usse direct to koi fark nahi padta image search me par ye bhi jaruri hai. Image ka size jitna kam ho sakte utna kam hona chaiye Q ki agar jada size ki image hogi to hamari site load hone me time legi. Loading ke karan hamari site ki rank par fark padta hai. Image ke jo mainly sabse jada use hone wale format hai Png, Jpg, Gip. Aap koi bhi use kare par dekhe sabse kam kis format ki memory rhati hai. Mere hisab se JPG. Image Size kaise kam kare uski jankari yaha hai, jisme aap site ki madad se free me image ko compress kar sakte hai bina uski quality kam kare. Agar aap Image ka format computer me change karna chate hai to aap Format Factory Software ka use kar sakte hai.

jo aapko us bewafa ke diye zakhmo ko bharne mein madad karenge. To bhakton aap inhe us bewafa ko bhejiye aur use uski galti ka ehsaas karaiye. Use dikhaiye ki usne aap jaise insaan ko khokar kitni badi bhool ki hai

Jab koi kisi website ka owner kisi wajah se apne domain ka renewal nhi kra pata to weh domain expire ho jata hai. Aur usko koi bhi kharid sakta hai. Dosto, sabse pehale mai aapko expire domain ke fayde ke bare me batata hu fir mai aapko bataunaga ki aap godaddy se expired domain kaise kharid sakte hai. agar aap kisi Purane expired domain ko apne blog me use karte hai to weh aapke blog ke liye SEO friendly hoga. jyadatar Expired domains ki pehale se kuchh backlinks aur page rank bhi hoti hai. Agar aap 10 12 saal purana domain ko apne blog ke liye use karte hai to isame koi doubt nhi weh domain aapke blog ke SEO liye bahut hi achha hoga. isame koi shak nhi koi domain jitna purana hoga weh utna hi jyada SEO friendly hoga. Bahut sare logo ko iss tarh ke domains ki talaas rehati hai. Aap expired domains ko kharid kar usko kai guna jyada kimat par bech sakte hai. Mera aapko salaah ki aap we expired domain ko kharide jo 10 saal ya usase jyada purana ho. Domain jitna jyada purana hoga weh utna hi achha hoga. Jyada profit paane ke liye aise domain name khojiye jo popular topic se related ho jaise health, finance, sport, blogging etc. Bahut sare log domain ko kharid aur usko fir bechkar lakho dollers kamate hai. Aapko ye Pata hona Chaiye Domain Kharidne ke phele ye Jane ki Badiya Domain Name kaise Select kare. Godaddy se Domain kaise Register kare Apni Website ke liye.

Hello Website Owner s Iss post me aapko bataoga ki ham apni website ka Short URL kaise bana sakte hai or kya uska faida hai. Agar aap Hindi Me Help ke Regular Reader hai to aapko pata hoga ki iska Short URL HMH.pe hai jisko agar aap browser me dalege to direct HindiMeHelp.com hi open hogi. Agar aap internet use karte hai or aapko websites ki jankari hai to aapko pata hoga. jitni bhi badi website hai wo apne user ko faida karane ke liye choti se choti chij ka dhiyan rakhti hai. Agar baat kare Facebook.com ki to sayad aapko pata hoga ham FB.com se bhi Facebook open kar sakte hai. Q ki facebook ne apna short FB banaya or wo ek badi site hai to unhone short URL ke liye FB.com domain ko $8.5 million me kharida. jiska faida ye ki unka koi bhi user agar facebook.com open karna chahe to wo sirf fb.com type karke open kar paye. Issi trha bhut si badi badi companies hai jinhone short URL ke liye bhut paise kharch kiye hai. To ab aap Short URL ka kya faida hai wo to samaj gaye hoge. HindiMeHelp.com ka short HMH hai or uske liye jo muje sabse best domain laga wo HMH.pe . jisme Simple khe sakte hai HindiMeHelp.com pe jane ke liye HMH.pe Type kare. yaha jo short Domain me .pe extension hai uska yearly charge 5k hai. matlab mene ye sirf isliye liya taki mere user ko pura HindiMeHelp type naa karna pade website pe aane ke liye. Simple wo HMH.pe type karke website par aa paye. Iske sath mere jitne bhi Important URL hai unko type karne me bhi aasani rheti hai, jese Example To last me aapko suggest karuga agar aap apni website ko ek brand ki trha dekhte hai or aapni ek alag phechan banana chate hai to aapko apne user ke liye wo sab karna hoga jisse unko thoda faida ho. Wese Badiya Domain kaise select kare uski detail post mene dali hai, aap ek war wo jarur read kare, jisse aapko Idea lag jayega ki Domain kesa hona chaiye or kin bato ka dhiyan rakhna chaiye domain select karte time. Short Domain Banana or usko add karna bhut aasan hai, Simple aapko sabse phele apne liye short domain dekhna hoga jo available ho, ye jaruri nahi .com ya .in ho. wass chota se chota ho. Jese example

Hello Friends Whatsapp kitna Popular hai wo to aap jante hai hai, har smartphone me whatsapp aapko milega hi milega. Bhut logo ka ye sabal huaa karta tha ki Whatsapp ko computer me kaise chalaya jaye. Abhi kuch hi Time phele WHatsapp ne apna ek Web Version laya tha. kiski madad se ham Apne Computer Browser me WHatsapp use kar sakte hai. or ab Users ki jarurat ke hisab se Whatsapp ne apna Software bhi released kiya hai jo Windows or Mac dono ke liye hai. Phele kya hota tha ki agar hame Whatsapp apne computer par chalana ho to hame apne Computer ke Browser me web.whatsapp.com open karke apne mobile se jo qr code hai usko scan karna padta tha or uske baad ham computer se apne whatsapp account ko chala sakte the. Abhi jo Software aaya hai usme or Web Browser me ham jo Whatsapp Chalate hai usme koi antar nahi hai. Bas yaha Software se ye faida hai ki hame bar bar apne browser ko open karne ki jarurat nahi hai. or New Message ke notification hame direct hamare computer par mil jate hai. abhi ka jo software aaya hai computer ke liye wo Windows 8 or Mac OS 10.9 se upar ke versions ke liye hai. Whatsapp Software ko Download karne ke liye Whatsapp ki official website par ja kar aap aasani se download kar sakte hai. Download Whatsapp Software Download ki button par click karne ke baad aapko thoda wait karna padega, Q ki jo software hai uska size 60mb ke lagbhag hai.

Hello friends. Mera naam Prabhjit Singh hai, Main myearningbrand.blogspot.com ka founder hu. Aaj main apko Jo batane ja raha hu jo bilkul latest trick hai. aap sab whatsapp, Facebook, twitter to jarur use karte hoge. Yeh 3 sabse popular sabse jade popular social media network hai. Aaj main apko yeh batane ja raha hu k 1 mobile pe kaise 2 Facebook, 2 WhatsApp , 2 twitter ke account use kar sakte hai. yeh aaj tak ka sabse simple tarika hai. Main Jada bate na karta hua batata hu k kaise 1 mobile kaise 2 whatsapp, Facebook aur twitter me account chala sakte hai. Friends ye phele ek problem thi par Android ka Lolipop 5.1 me ham do user add kar sakte hai or unki madad se bhi ek hi monile me 2 whatsapp or dusre app use kar sakte hai. Par aaj ham dekhege ki kaise ek app ki madad se ham ek hi mobile me 2 Whatsapp use kar sakte hai. Step 1 sabse pehle apko parallel space app download karni hogi Download Parallel Space App Step 2 download karne k baad ab is app install ho jayegi. Step 3 ab is app ko open kare aur isme se koi bhi app select kare jiske aap 1 mobile pe 2 account chalana chate hai. jese Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter. jitne bhi App aapke Mobile me install hai aap unko add karke dusre account ke liye use kar sakte hai. Step 4 App ko select karne ke baad usko open kare or apni New ID open karke usko use kare. Is trha aap kisi bhi app me double account use kar sakte hai. Agar aap Game ke sokin hai to aap Game bhi double install kar sakt ehai iski madad se. Note Agar aapke Mobile ki memory kam hai to ho sakta hai aapka Mobile Hang hone lage, isliye jada app bhi use naa kare. Ye ek Guest Post hai HMH.pe Agar aap Bhi Apni Guest Post karna Chate hai to yaha click kare. Ye Bhi Pade

Agar Aap Whatsapp use karte hai to ye jankari aapke liye bhut hi jada interesting hone wali hai, isme me aapko batane wala hu kaise aap Whatsapp use karne ka jo level hai usko bada sakte hai. Jesa ki sabko pata hai Whatsapp sabse popular mobile messaging application hai, or aaye din whatsapp me new features add hote bhi rhete hai, lekin uske baad bhi kuch aesi chij hai jo aap whatsapp app me nahi kar sakte. par aap third party app ko install karke apne whatsapp use karne ka experience ko bada sakte hai. Whatsapp par bhut se Funny Image wallpaer hamare pass aate hai, aese me bhut war aesa bhi hota hai ek hi Image war war ya bhut log send kar dete hai, usse hota to kuch nahi wass hamare Phone ki memory fokat me bhar jati hai. Iss Problem ko solve kar sakta hai Siftr Magic Cleaner, jiski madad se ham apne Phone ke duplicate Image ko search karke Delete kar sakte hai. Siftr Magic Cleaner Agar aapne Facebook Messanger use kiya hai to aapne dekha hoga Mobile me ek bubble aa jata hai message ka, jaha se ham message ko read or reply kar pate hai, Same wese hi Whatsapp me karne ke liye Notifly ka use kar sakte hai. Jab bhi koi Whatsapp me message aayega to uska ham bina whatsapp ko open kare direct reply bhi kar sakte hai. Notifly Disa ek bhut badiya Application hai sabhi platform ko ek jagha use karne ke liye. Jese agar aap ek hi person se Facebook, Whatsapp, SMS etc. par baat kar rahe hai to sabhi message aap ek jagha dekh sakte hai. Disa Agar aap Whatsapp use karte hai or aap chate hai koi aapke whatsapp ko open karke aapke message naa dekh paye to aap iss App ka use kar sakte hai, jiski madad se aap Whatsapp me Lock laga sakte hai. Whatsapp ke sath sath aap dusre App bhi lock kar sakte hai. Iss App ki ek khas baat or hai wo ye ki aap App ka Icon bhi change kar sakte hai, jisse kisi ko pata hi nahi chalega ki konsa app kaha hai. Lock For Whats Messenger Whatsapp me Emojis hai or agar aap whatsapp use karte hai to unka bhi jarur istmal karte hoge. par agar aap apne whatsapp ke experience ko or badiya emojis se badana chate hai to aap iss ap ka use kar sakte hai. Emojidom Whatsapp ka use aap karte hai to aapko ye bhi pata hoga ham whatsapp me jo DP Profile Picture hai wo sirf square image daal sakte hai, to aese me bhut war hota hai hamari koi achi picture jo square nahi hai usko ham achi se set nahi kar pate. aese Time par aap CropShop ka use kar sakte hai. CropShop ki madad se Kisi bhi image ko Crop kar sakte hai or usko badi aasani se sqare bana sakte hai. CropShop Agar aap kisi ko koi message kisi fix Time par send karna chate hai to SQEDit Scheduling App aapke kaam aa sakta hai. Iski madad se aap message ko Schedule kar sakte hai jese kisi ko B Day wish karna ho ya koi or message ho. Simple aapko Message set karke timer set karna hai. SQEDit Scheduling App Agar aap US ke number se whatsapp banana chate hai to Primo aapke kaam aa sakta hai, isme account banane ke baad hame ek US ka number milta hai jispar ham Call or SMS recive kar sakte hai. To aap uss Number se Whatsapp account bana kar use kar sakte hai. Agar aap kahi apna personal whatsapp number share nahi karna chate waha aapke liye ye trick bhut kaam aa sakti hai. Primo Bhut war aesa hota hai hame koi ek message send karna ho jo hamare phone me save nahi hai usko. to aese me message send karne ke liye phele uss number ko save karna padta hai. Par is Problem ka solution hai Click2Chat App jiski madad se bina number ke save kare ham whatsapp par message send kar sakte hai. Click2Chat WhatsApp Agar aap Whatsapp par chat kar rahe hai or kahi Group me ya kisi public place par hai to aesa bhut war hota hai jo hamare aas pass hote hai wo hamare mobile me dekh kar hamare message read karte hai, jo bhut si condition me ham nahi chate ki koi read kare. Aese me aap MaskChat App ka use kar sakte hai, iski madad se aap Screen ke upar parda laga sakte hai, jisse jo upar ke message hai wo hide ho jati hai. MaskChat Agar aap Whatsapp par chat kar rahe hai or agar aapko koi Audio message aaya to Publicly play karna thoda risky ho sakta hai, pata nahi usme kya ho. ab aese me aap apna Headphone use kar sakte hai par agar wo bhi nahi hai to aap Iss App ka use kar sakte hai. Stealth Audio Player ki madad se audio jo Main loud speaker me play hota hai uski jagha call wale speaker me play hota hai jisko kaam ke pass laga kar ham audio sunn sakte hai. Stealth Audio Player Agar aapke pass whatsapp use karne ka jada time nahi hai, ya aap kisi dusre kaam me busy hai to aese me agar koi aapko message kare to aap WhatReply App ki madad se automatic reply kar sakte hai. WhatReply me aap jo bhi message set karege wo automatic send ho jayega jo bhi aapko message send karege unko. Ye App use karne ke liye aapka Phone Rooted hona jaruri hai. WhatReply Agar aap Ek mobile me 2 whatsapp use karna chate hai to uske liye hai Parallel Space App. Iski madad se aap kisi bhi App ki copy bana kar double app use kar sakte hai. 2 Whatsapp kaise use kare uske ware me detail me phele hi bata chuka hu. Parallel Space Iss App ki madad se dusre Mobile ke Whatsapp message ko ham apne mobile me open kar sakte hai, iske sath sath message ko read or send bhi kar sakte hai. Iss App ka faida hone ke sath ye nuksan bhi hai agar ye galat hato me chala jaye to kisi ke whatsapp message ko read kar bhi kar sakte hai, jisko ham simple sabdo me Whatsapp Web Hack khete hai.
