Mobile Daily Life me kitna jaruri ho gaya hai wo to aap jante hi hoge, Agar kabhi hamara Mobile band ho jaye ya kisi ko Call karna ho or ham nahi kar paye to pata nahi kitna Kaam bigad jate hai. Agar aapke Pass Mobile hai to aapke sath bhi aesa jarur kabhi na kabhi huaa hoga ki aapke Mobile ka Balance khatam ho gaya ho or aapko kahi par jaruri call karna ho. Aesi Problem bhut war aa jati hai to ham iss Problem se bachne ke liye kya kar sakte hai chaliye jankate hai. Agar aapke Pass Android Mobile hai to aap App Install karke badiya Paise kama sakte hai, itne ki to me garentee le sakta hu ki aapko kabhi Paise de kar Mobile Recharge nahi karana padega. App se paise kaise kamaye uski jankari yaha hai. Aap ke Pass Paise hai ya aapne Mobile par paise kamaye hai to aap Balance daal sakte hai, par kabhi aesi condition bhi aa sakti hai ki aapke pass itna time bhi naa ho ki aap kisi Shop se Recharge kara sako or na Online Recharge kar sako. Aapko kahi urgent baat karni ho to aese me aap apne Friend ya apne Family member se Balance transfer karke le sakte hai ya kisi ko de sakte ho. Ye jo jankari me dene wala hu, wo aapko kaam to aane wali hai par yaha me aapko ek baat or bata du, Kuch log jo jaanna chate hai mobile balance chori karne ka tarika, to agar ye jankari unko mil gai to ho sakta hai wo aapke Mobile se Balance transfer kar le apna number par. Ye bhi Padhe Mobile ko hang hone se kaise bachaye jaanne ke liye click kare. To Chali ab Dekhte hai Kaise Mobile Balance ko Transfer kiya ja sakta hai, kisi dusre Mobile Number par. Balance Transfer Kaise Kare Idea me Balance Transfer karna bhut hi aasan hai simple aapko phone dailer me ek ussd Code dail karna hai or uski madad se aap badi aasani se balance transfer kar sakte hai. Kaise Kya karna hai Idea me Balance Transfer karne ke liye jaanne ke liye Steps ko follow kare. Step 1 Apna Phone Dialer open kare. Step 2 Dial kare 567jiske pass Paise send karna hai uska NumberKitne paise transfer karna hai Example 567987654321020 Note Ye bhi Padhe Whatsapp Se Paise Kaise Kamaye Uski Jankari in Hindi

Abhi ho sakta hai aapne kahi se sunaa ho ki koi SIM Mil rahi hai jisme Free 4G Internet, Free Call or Free SMS mil rahe hai or SIM Free me mil rahi hai, abhi me aapko ussi ke ware me batane wala hu. Jis SIM me sab chije unlimited mil rahi hai uska naam hai Jio SIM jo Reliance ki hai. Reliance Jio Puri trha se teyar hai Launch hone ke liye, or bhut jald launch bhi ho jayegi, Company ne Apne User badane ke liye ek offer diya hai jisme 4G LTE par free Internet Chala sakte hai pure 3 mahine tak or uske sath sath Free SMS or Call bhi 3 mahine tak bilkul free. Company se bhut acha tarika nikala hai apne girako ko badane ka isliye unhone free me ye service di hai taki log unki SIM ko kharide or use kare. Launching ke phele hi 7,00,000 users ban chuke hai. Ye bhi Aapko Jarur Tri kare Mobile Me App Install karke Paise Kaise Kamaye Top 6 App Abhi jo Offer hai Free 4G Internet, Free Call or Free SMS ka wo sabhi Mobile ke liye nahi hai. Company ne Samsung or iPone ke kuch Models par hi ye Offer diya hai. Agar aapke Pass in Mobile me se koi bhi Mobile hai to aap is offer ka faida utha sakte hai, Jio 4G SIM pane ke liye aapko karna ye hai ki aapko sabse phele My Jio App ko apne Mobile me install karna hai. My jio App Install karne ke baad aapko App ke andar 10 Apps or dikhege, aapko wo sab app install karna hai. Pure App Install karne ke baad MyJoi App ko open kare, fir aapko Get Jio SIM ka option milega, uspar click karke steps ko follow kare. fir last me aapko ek code milega. Aapko usko Save karke rakhle. ek Screen Shot bhi lele. Ab aapko karna ye hai jo bhi Aapke pass ki Jio Store hai, Apni ID Proof or Photo bhi jarur le jaye Jio Store SIM lene ke liyeor jo Code mila hai wo aapko baha batana hai fir aapko SIM mil jayegi. SIM ko activate karne ke liye 1977 par call kare. Jio 4G SIM ko lene ke liye jo Code hai wo upar diye Mobile me pa sakte hai, Par jo Jio SIM ham usko ham kisi bhi Company ke Mobile me chala sakte hai or 3 Mahine tak Free 4G Internet, Free Call or Free SMS ka luft utha sakte hai. Ye bhi Jarur Padhe High Speed Free Internet Wifi kaise Chalaye Railway Station Par Ye ek Trick hai jo TechPP ne share ki or wo work kar rahi hai lagbhag har 4G Mobile par, jese wo Supported Mobile par karti hai bilkul ussi trha. Un-Supported Mobile hai usme SIM lene ke liye jo Code generate karna hai uski trick jaanna hai to aap Steps ko Follow kare. Step 1 Sabse phele to agar aapne My Joi App Phele se apne Mobile me install kiya hai to usko uninstall kar dijiye. Step 2 Ab Apne Mobile me My Jio App Install kare Download My Jio in iPhone Download My Jio in Android Step 3 My Joi App install karne ke baad aapko usme 10 App Dikhege, un sab app ko Install kar lijiye. Step 4 Ab Mobile ka Data or Wi-Fi off kar dijiye. Step 5 Mobile Aapka 4G hona chaiye, Network Setting me ja kar Network ko Perfer LTE select kare. Step 6 Apne Mobile ko Restart kare. Step 7 Ab My Jio App open kare. Diyan rakhe Data or Wifi off hi rakhna hai. Step 8 Ab Aap My Jio App ko open karne ke baad aapko ek option dikhega Get Jio SIM uspar click kare. Step 9 Ab jo Page khulega usme error aayegi, Q ki Internet connect chalu nahi hai. Chita naa kare. Step 10 Ab Apne Mobile ka Data On kare.

column2: Hotstar India ka sabse popular Video Streaming Platform hai. Jispar millions Indian people Cricket Match, TV Show, Movies dekhte hai. Main khud hi ispar Live Cricket Matches dekhta hun. 10 50-60 , Ise Star India ne February 2015 me launch kiya tha . Yani World cup 2015 se thik pahle. Is dauran total 49 matches me 340 million viewership mile. Vahi usi saal IPL 8 season me 200 million views mile. Hotstar cricket, kabbadi, movies, show, serial ko Hindi, English, Kannada, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Marathi, Bengali language me available karta hai. Voot Se Video Kaise Download Kare Shuruat me Hotstar cricket match ko stream kiya karta tha. Par bad me Star India ke programs stream hone lage. Jiske karan ab is platform par 35,000 hours jitne content available hai. Jo kai categories me available hai. Jaise 1.TV Is section me aap Star Plus, Life OK, Star Jalsha, Star Vijay, Star Bharat, Asianet, Star Maa, Star World, HBO Originals, Showtime, ABC Studios, Star Pravah, Fox Life, National Geographic, Asianet Plus, Star Suvarna, Channel V, Star Sports First, Start Sports Second, Star Sports Tamil, Star Sport Hindi aur Star Sports First dekh sakte hai. Sony LIV Video Download Kaise Kare In channels ke ye programs mukhy tuar par stream kiye jate hai Ye hai mohabbatein ,Ye rishta kya kehlata hai, Saath nibhana saathiya, Siya ke ram, Tu Sooraj Man Saanjh Piya Ji, Suhani Si Ek Ladki, Big Boss Telugu, Ashta Chamma, Ishqbaaz, Devon Ke Dev, Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon, Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil, Dance Plus 3, Mappillai, Dil bole Oberoi, Nach Baliye 8, Koffee with Karana, Chandra Nandini, Naamkaran, Pagal Nilavu 2.Movies Is section me aap romantic, horror, comedy jaise movies dekh sakte hai. 3.Sport Yaha par live cricket, kabaddi, footboll badminton match dekh sakte hai. 4.News ABP, Asianet News, Republic jaise news channels ki news dekh sakte hai. 5.Premium Is section me premium content hote hai, jise dekhane ke liye aapko pocket light karana padega. I am sure aap hotstar par online content dekhane ke sath use download bhi karana chahate hai. Par ye sabhi video ko download karane ke liye allow nahi karta hai. Par aap is trick se kisi bhi video ko download kar sakte hai. Hotstar Se Tv Movies, Live Cricket, Kaise Download Kare Main aapko PC aur Smartphone se video download karane ke liye tarike batayunga. Download Hotstar Video to PC Is method ke liye aapko a batch CMD file download karana hoga, jo 1 MB se bhi kam hai. 1.Download Hotstar Downloader 2.Jab download ho jaye to is RAR file ko extract kare. Extract RAR File 3.Folder me hotstarlivesteamer ko open kare. 4. CMD window open ho jayega. Paste Link of Desired Video 5.Hotstar ki jis video ko download karana chahte hai, use link ko copy kar CMD Window ke upar vale ko select kar paste kare de. 6.Enter press kare. 7.Video ko download karane ke liye P type kare aur enter hit kare. Downloading start ho jayega. Jab aapka video download ho jayega, to aap use Hotstarlivestreamer ke video folder me find kar sakte hai. Download Hotstar videos on Smartphone Method 1 Kuch months pahle hi Hotstar ne video download karane ke liye Download Button add kiya tha. 1.Pahle Hotstar App install kar. 2.Video open kare. 3.Video ke niche aapko download button dikhega. Us par click kar download kar sakte hai. Download Hotstar Video in Smartphone Star Plus Serial aur Video Kaise Download Kare Best 3 Methods Method 2 Videoder App Se Video Download Kare 1.Smartphone me Videoder App download and install kare. 2.Videoder App ko open kare. 3. Hotstar Icon par click kare. 4.Ab Video browse kare aur manchahe video ko select kare, jise download karna chahte hai. 5.Screen par show ho rahe Download Button par click kare. 6.Ab Video Quality select kare aur Start Download par click kar download karna start kare. In Last Word Hotstar se video download karane ke kai methods available hai. Par ve work nahi karte hai. But ye dono methods 100 working hai. Aap easily manchaha video download kar sakte hai. Zee TV Serial Video Kaise Download Kare Yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai to doston ke sath share kare aur comment kare.

Hello Friends Aaj 20 Feb muje batate huee badi khusi ho rahi hai ki Aaj Hindi Me Help HMH.pe website pure Ek Saal ki ho gai hai or Jo HMH ka maksad tha aaj dekh kar lag raha hai ki wo pura ho raha hai or bilkul sahi Direction Disa me ja rahi hai. Hindi Me Help aaj kis mukan par hai wo alag se kisi ko batane ki to jarurat nahi hai q ki aese bhi sabko samaj me aa hi jata hai, par bhut si aesi bate hai jo aap logo ko pata hona chaiye jisse aap bhi HMH ka jo maksad hai uska hissa ban sake. Bhut Log Blogging Start karte hai to uska sabse main karan hota hai Paise Kamana or Naam kamana par HMH ka usse thoda alag hai sayad issi liye HMH or websites se thodi alag dekhi jati hai. Aaj me aapko Is Post me wo sare secret batane wala hu ki Kya Karan hai ki HMH aaj is mukam par hai or aap bhi is Mukam ya isse bhi ache mukam par kaise phuch sakte hai. Aapko site dekh kar pata to chal hi jata hoga ki site par kya jankari di jati hai or uska maksad bhi ye bhi hai. Internet Ki Jankari Hindi Me Dena or us Jankari ki madad se Hindi Jaanne walo ki Help karna. Jo HMH ka Maksabd hai wo uske Naam or uski Tag Line se bhi saaf samaj aa jata hai agar samajne ki kosis kare too. Ek Simple Banda Rohit Mewada jo Mechanical Engineering kar raha tha jo Padai me bhi average, jisne Apne Papa ji se jid karke ek Laptop liya Lekin usko baad me usse laga ki usko Laptop ki itni jarurat nahi thi jitni usne jid ki lene ke liye. Jada tar log jinke pass Laptop Computer hota hai to wo sirf kya karte hai Facebook, Youtube or Game iske aalawa uska koi use nahi hota unke pass. Par mere Pass Laptop aane ke baad mene usme or logo ki trha Facebook nahi chalai. Mene Google me search kiya How to Create a Website q ki muje laga sab Facebook Chalate hai to q na aesi koi website banai jaye, or Fir muje Blogger Platform ke bare me pata chala jo Google ki free service hai. Ab mene usme apna Blogspot Blog bana liya or muje usme interest tha to muje jab bhi time milta apne collage ke kaam se me blog me kuch naya sikhne ki kosis karta or fir usko apne blog par apply karta or jab wo sahi se ho jata to me apne blog ke apni language me likh kar post daal deta taki aage muje fir se us jankari ki jarurat pade to kahi jana naa pade. Jab mene Apna Blogger par Free Blog banaya tha us time muje bilkul bhi nahi pata tha ki iski madad se paise bhi kama sakte hai. Meri Engineering to chal hi rahi thi or sath sath me apni blogging ke interest ki baja se har roj kuch na kuch naya sikhta or usko apne blog me apply karke dekhne ke baad uski post bhi daal deta. 2 Saal me huii $5 Income

Nasmkar dosto mera name Rohtash Nimi hai or mai www.samajikjankari.com ka founder hu or agr apko kisi bhi tarah ki social information chahiye to aap hamre blog ko visit kar skte hai. HMH.pe meri ye phli guest post hai. Dosto bloging me fail hone ka ek sabse bda karn ye bhi hai ki hame bloging ke bare advance jankari na hona. Hamre blog me bhut se aaise error hote jo hame pta hi nhi chalta or jis vajah se hamare blog par traffic nhi bdhta. Agr hame blogging me kamyab hona hai to hame in error ke bare me pta hona jaruri hai. Blog par bhut se achi post hone ke babjud bhi hamare pas traffic nhi aata hai eska ek reason error 404 ho skta hai. Sabse pahle to hame ye pta hona chahiye ki not found, 404 errror kya hai or ye kab aata hai or ese thik karne ke liye kya kare ? Dosto blogging me jankari na hone ki bajh se ham kafi galti karte hai. Bhut bar ham apni post ki url ko badal kar bhut badi galti krte hai. Aaiye ese ek example ke jariye samjhte hai. Ham manke chalte hai hamne 2 june ko ek post bnayi Passport Kaise Banwaye ? Eska url bhi hamne yahi diya passport-kaise-banwaye or es url ko hamne google webmaster me submit kar diya 2 june ko hi. Agle din jab bhi koi google me search karega Passport kaise banwaye to hamari post search me aa jaygi or apni post es link pe clik karne se aasani se khul jayegi. After 1 mont hamne apni post Passport kaise banwaye se change kar ke passport kaise banwaye hindi me ya fir how to make a passport kar diya. Ab koi bhi visitor agr google me Passport kasie banwaye search karega to apni old post url passport-kaise-banwaye google me aa jayegi lekin jab vah us link par clik krega to usse Not found, error 404 dikhayi dega. Url change karne ke karn apki post pe kafi effect padta hai jaise auto share plugin se ke dawara hamari sabhi post facebook, google plus jaisi social site par gyi hui hoti hai lekin jab ham url change karte hai to unki url pahle wali hi rhti hai or jab bhi koi social site se hamare link par clik karta hai to usse Not found, error 404 milta hai. Esliye jha tak ho ske url change na kare to hi thik hai lekin fir bhi agr apne ye galti kar di hai to koi bat ni ham btayege apko Not found, error 404 kaise thik kare ? 1. Dosto eske liye apko add plugin me jakr Redirection ke naam se ek plugin hai usko install krna hoga. Install krne ke baad aap tool option par jakr Redirection par clik kare. 2. Redirection ke clik karne par apko ye screen dikhayi degi 3. Ab apko 404s pe clik krna hai or ab apko ye screen dikhayi degi 4. 404s pe clik krne par apko vo sbhi url dikhai de jaygi jinme not found, error 404 aa rha ho. Ab apko url ke samne di hui date pe clik Add redirect pe clik krna hai fir apko niche ye screen dikhayi degi. 5. Upar di hui screen me apko 2 option dikhayi denge Source Url jisme hame apni phle ki old url dikhayi degi or Target Url me hamko apni post ki new url dalni hogi. Es doran ye dhyan rhe ki only post ki url hi dale jaise how to find ncert solution free in hindi ye shi hai or hindimehelp.com how to find ncert solution free in hindi galt hai. 6. Apko 404s me jitne bhi url dikhayi de unko es tarah se thik kr le akpi old url me not fond, error 404 aana band ho jayga. Mai Ravi Kumar mai anytechinfo.com ka author hu, Ek bar aaplogo mere blog pe jarur visit kare, Internet Aaj hum Sabhi ke life ke ek important hissa ban chuka hai, Ghar ho ya office jagah Internet Maujaud hai, Iske hone se ham Apni bato ko ek jagah se dusre jagah aur ek sath kai vayktiyo tak pahucha sakte hai, Iske Liye hame email ki jarurat padti hai, Email Dawara Apni bato ko Dusre tak pahuchane ke liye Hame email Id banana hai, Lekin email sahi Vakyati Aur sahi jagah tarah se bheja jay tab hi iska fayada hai, To Hum Aaj Janenne Sahi email bhejne ka tarika, Email ka istemal Sabhi karte hai, Email personal bhi ho sakte hai Aur professional bhi , Personal email apne disto ya kisi any ko bhej sakte hai, jo ki kisi bhi chiz ke liye ho sakta hai, jubki professional email me kam se judi bate hoti hai, E-mail karne se pahle hum shayad hi 2 bar sochte honge, Lekin email karne ke bhi kuchh tarike hote hai, ek bhehtar email Ke liye aapko kuchh rules flow karne chahiye, Aaiye Jante hai, Also Read Temporary Email ID Kaise 10 Minute Mail Par Email me sabse important hota hai, introduction yani parichay , yadi aap kisi anjan Person Ko email likh rahe hai to, sabse pahele usse apna introduction de, Uske bad aap usse jis subject par aap bat karna chahte hai, iskke bare me usse kam sabdo me bistar se bataye, Achhe email ke liye ek sahi Subject line bahut jaruri hai, Apne email ko subject line se Highlight kiya ja sakta hai, Isse emai received karne aapka email ko behatar samajh aa sakta hai, wah aapke email ko value bhi dega, Apne email me ek uchit upsarg ka paryog kare, jaise Mr. Ms. Or Mrs iske alawa Professional Taur pe aap Sir ya Madam bhi likh sakte hai, Email me sahi bhasa ka paryog kare, SMS Bhasa ya tuti-futi English se mail ka bura effect pad sakta hai, Email me sidhe bat karna jayada achha hai, bat ko ghumane phirane se Jo point hai usse clear kare, Email likhte time aap capital aur bold font ka use na kare, Kyuki aisa font ko use karne se reciveder par aapka kharab impression pad sakta hai, isliye isi trah se text ke bich-bich me underline karna, fansi font ya multiple font ka paryog karna, Email se 08-10 bade attachment ek sath na bheje, habby aur bahut sari atechmment bhejne se reciveder ka inbox Abrudh ho sakta hai, Isliye bade attachment ko File hosting service se bheje , iske alawa badi file ko Zip file ya resize picture banake bhej sakte hai, Yadi koi vaykti jo pane mobile se email access kar raha ho hai, to usse jayada attachment ek sath na bheje, Email me Apna name likhna na bhule , yah bahut jaruri hai, Email chahe personal ho ya official , bhejne se pehle pure mail ki spelling jarur cheq kare, lhaskar jub aap mobile se email access kar rahe ho to, Kyuki touchscreen mobile hone ke karan kai bar galat type ho jata hai, Yadi aap bar-bar hone wali galat spelling se bachna chahte hai, to Auto correct option ka use kare, Email likhte time Abbreviation ka paryog kam kare,

Hello Friends Abhi ek Game jo bhut hi Popular hai or sab dur ussi ki charcha ho rahi hai lakho caroro log usko download kar chuke hai, Game ka Naam hai Pokemon Go jo ki bhut hi interesting Game hai. Chaliye Jante hai Pok mon Go ke ware me Bistar se ki akhir ye hai kya or isme hota kya hai or kaise is Game ko khela jaye or kaha se isko download kiya jaye. Pok mon Go ek free game hai jo hamari location ke adhar par khela jata hai, jisme hamara Mobile ka camera or GPS or internet connection ki jarurat padti hai. Pok mon Go banane wali comapny ka naam hai Niantic or is Game ko Publish kiya hai The Pok mon Company ne. Ye Game July me hi released huaa hai ISO or Android ke liye. Also read Apne Android Mobile ki location kaise pat kare Google par ye jo Game hai Real World ke Map par khela jata hai to usme Mobile ka Camera, Mobile ka GPS or Internet connection ki jarurat padti hai. Game me karna ye hota hai ki hame pokemon ko pakadna hota hai jo hame hamare Mobile ki screen par dikhai dete hai. Ham agar kahi jate hai to jo game me hamara avatar hai wo bhi chalta hai or jab koi Pokemon aata hai to mobile ka camera bhi chalu hota hai to aesa lagta hai wo Pokemon hamare samne hi hai. Pok mon Go Jab ham open karte hai to hame sabse phele Google account se sign up karke apna Avtar select karna hota hai, or uske color, dress, bagera select karni hoti hai. Ab ham Game chalu karke agar real me chalte hai to jo hamara avtar hai wo bhi game me chalta hai, or is trha hame jaha bhi Pokemon dikhge hame waha jana hai or unko pakadna hai. jese jese aap pokemon ko pakadte jayege aapki lavel badti jayegi or khatin Pokemon aate jayege jinko pakadna muskil hota jata hai. kul mila kar kha sakte hai ki jo log is game ko itna pasand kar rahe hai uska karan bhi hai q ki game khelte same hame lagat hai ki ham real world me wo game khel rahe hai. Game me hame Pok mon ko pakatna hai wo to aapko pata chal gaya par Game ko khelne ke liye hame or kin kin chijo ki jarurat padegi wo bhi jaan lete hai. Pok mon Go Game Real world map ko use karke hi khela jat ahai to isme jo hamari real location hoti hai ussi me hame Pokemon ko pakadna hota hai. to iske liye hame bhar jana padta hai. Is Game ko khelne ke liye hame Mobile me hi dekh kar chalna padtah hai q ki hame usme jaha bhi Pokemon dikhta hai hame waha ja kar usko pakadna padta hai. par agar ham is game ko road par khelne lage to ho sakta hai hamara dhiyan mobile ho or hamara takkar ho jaye kisi gadi se. Pok mon Go Game ko khelne ke liye Mall sabse achi jagha hai mere hisab se. Id Game me hame Internet ki achi speed ki jarurat padti hai, agar ham 2g se khele to Game bhut slow chalega. isliye agar kahi Wifi ha or jagha bhi achi hai to waha Pok mon Go ko khele. Data plan se khelne par bhut jada data kharch ho sakta hai. Also read High Speed Free Wifi Internet Chalaye Railway Station par Pok mon Go jab chalta hai to isme ek sath Mobile ka camera, GPS, Internet connection sab ek sath kaam karte hai to battery bhut jada use hoti hai. to agar aapko ye game khelna hai to aapko ek Powerbank bhi rakhni padegi apne pass. Pokemon Go ko chalne me kitni process chalti hai wo to me bata hi chuka hu, to agar itni sari chije ek sath chalti hai mobile me to Heating Problem bhi aane lagti hai Mobile me. Isliye ham is game ko jada der nahi khel sakte. Game 56 MB ka hai or game ko khelte same bhut sari process ek sath chalti hai to hame achi RAM or memory wale Mobile ki jarurat padegi, Agar kisi chote mobile me khelege to mobile bhut jada hang hoga. Yaha Padhe 10 Tarike Mobile Ko Hang Hone Se Rokene ke To Friends ye sab hai jo Pok mon Go khelne ke liye chaiye or honi chaiye. Aapko ye Game ek war jarur khelna chaiye or dekhiye ki akhir kya hai is game me aesa jo isne itne kam time me puri duniya me dhoom macha di jabki abhi to sab jagah launch bhi nahi huaa hai. Jo Game hai wo Launch to ho chuka hai or ham isko Playstore se download kar sakte hai, par abhi India me ye Playstore par avlable nahi hai to ham iska Direct apk download karke install kar sakte hai. Download Pok mon Go from itune Download Pok mon Go from PlayStore Pok mon Go Direct apk Download Friends Pokemon Go Game Download karke Kheliye or dekhiye abhi ke sapse popular game kesa hai. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi wo aap comment me bataye or apne dosto ko bhi is Popular Game ke ware me bataye. Ye Bhi Padhe

Hello, friend s main Mdbarkat Founder of JankariHindime.Com, aj main Apko Batane Wala Hun, Apne WiFi main Kitne Log Connected Hai jo Wifi Chala rahe hai aur Unko kaise Block kare. Main umeed karta Hun Apko ye Jankari jarur pasand Ayegi. Railway Station par Google High Speed Free WiFi kaise Chalaye uski jankari yaha hai WiFi jo agar kisi ko bhi free me mil jaye to usko kabhi naa chode aesa chij hai, or agar aese me Apke pass WiFi laga huaa hai or bhale aapne Password dal rakha ho par agar kahi se kisi ko password pata chal gaya to aapko pata bhi nahi chalega kitne log aapke WiFi ka Free me maja le rahe hoge. Jab jada log aapke WiFi se connect ho jayege to was aap aese andaja laga sakte ho ki aapki jo Internet Speed hai wo kam ho jayegi. Agar aapka WiFi Password logo ko pata chal gaya hai to aapke pass 2 raste hai, Kisi bhi achij ko Hack karna aasan nahi hota, Fir wo chahe Facebook Account ho, Whatsapp ho, Google Account ya Fir WiFi ho. Par ek baat aapko bata du Internet par koi bhi chij 100 secure nahi hai, Bank ki website tak hack ho jati hai. Hacking se bachne ke liye jitni bhi Possible tarike hai usko use karke security jarur badai ja sakti hai. Hacker se kaise Bache uski 10 Tips wo bhi aapko jarur padni chaiye To Ab aap samaj chuke hai ki WiFi ka Password Hack hona koi badi baat nahi hai, aapki choti si galti ki baja se aaram se Hack ho sakta hai. WiFi se kitne log connect hai or WiFi se Internet chala rahe hai aap agar uska pata laga le to aap unko WiFi me block kar sakte hai, fir bhale unko password pata chal bhi jaye fir bhi wo connect nahi kar payege WiFi se. To Chaliye dekh lete hai kaise pata kare kon kon Hamara WiFi Chori kar raha hai or kaise unko block kare. Step 1 Sabse Phele aapko Apne Android Phone me ek App Download karke Install karna hai jiska Naam hai Fing Network Tools Fing Network Tools Step 2 Install karne ke baad Open kare App ko, Fir Aap dekh sakege kon kon abhi WiFi se connect hai. Note Aap jis WiFi ka dekhna chate hai ki kon kon connect hai, us WiFi se aapka Mobile Connect hona chaiye. jitne Bhi Computer, Mobile connect hoge WiFi se unki list aa jayegi. Jo Device hai unka MAC Address bhi dikhega jo connect hai. Ab agar aapko kisi ko Block karna hai to aap uss MAC Address ki madad se kar sakte hai. Step 1 Jo aapka Device WiFi se connected hai usme apne Router ki IP address dale, Fir username or Password dal kar login kare. Step 2 Ab Click kare Mac Filtering main Security aur Click kare Add on Device. Step 3 Ab click kare Mac Address aur jisko Block Karna Chahte hai. block kar sakte Hai. Ap is process se Jisko Bhi block karenge aur phir Kabhi dubara Connect Nahi Hoga. To Dosto ab aap Jaan chuke hai kaise pata kare kon aapke WiFi ko use kar raha hai, or kaise usko Block kiya jaye taki koi aapke WiFi ka Free me aapne permission ke bina maja naa utha paye. Aapko ye Jankari kesi lagi aap comment karke bata sakte hai, muje ummid hai aapko isse jarur help milegi or aap apne WiFi ki security bada payege. Ye ek Guest Post hai HMH.pe, Agar aap bhi Guest Post karna chate hai to yaha click kare Dusri Guest Post padne ke liye yaha click kare

Hello Friends Aap logo ko ye to pata hi hoga www.HindiMeHelp.com ka Maksad hi hai Aap logo ki Hindi Me Help karna. Is website par me aapko Internet se related Jaankari deta hu or Internet se related Sabaalo ke jabaab deta hu. Agar aap ka koi bhi Sabaal ho Internet se related to aap Site ke Sabaal Jabaab section me post kar sakte ho. Ab aap WhatsApp se bhi mujse contact kar sakte ho. Aaj me WhatsApp ki Service bhi Start kar raha hu, ab Hindi Me Help ki Post ki Jaankari Aap direct apne Whatsapp Number par paa sakte ho. Aap Apne Sabaalo ke Jabaab hamare WhatsApp Group me paa sakte ho. Aap mujse WhatsApp par jude Uske Phele me aapko Kuch Rule s batana chahuga. Aap In Rules ko Diyaan se Pade. Hindi Me Help ki sari post ko WhatsApp par BroadCast kiya jayega. Matlab www.HindiMeHelp.com ki har post ki jaankari aapko apke whatsapp account par di jayegi. Hindi Me Help ke WhatsApp Par Group hai agar aap unme bhi judna chate ho to muje bataye. Par Groups ke Kuch Rule Hai aapko bo Saare rule Maannaqaqaa Padega nahito aapko Turant Group se Nikaal diya jayega. Note Abhi Group Nahi Hai Par Aapko Post ki Jaankari Jarur Milegi Que. Kya me Aapko Call Kar sakta hu? Ans. Nahi, Aap muje call nahi karege or agar aap call karte ho to aapke Rs10 per minute katege or mujse baat bhi nahi bogi Q ki mera WhatsApp Number US ka hai. Que. Kya Me Aapko SMS kar sakta hu? Ans. Haa, aap cahe to muje SMS kar sakte ho par diyaan rahe aapka Internation SMS Charge lagega. Que. Me aapko WhatsAap par Message kar sakta hu? Ans. Haa Aap kar sakte ho par ek baat ka diyaan rahe bar bar message naa kare q ki mere pass intna Time nahi hai ki me aapke saare Message ka reply kar saku. or Faaltu message to bilkul naa kare nahito me aapke Number ko Block kar duga. Que. Kya me Aapko Apne Group Me Add karu? Ans. Nahi, Aap muje apne Group me add naa kare or aesa karne par me Group Exit to houga, sath me aapka Number bhi Block karduga. Aap Mere Sari Rule ko maante ho to niche diye Button par click karke Group me add ho sakte hai. No Group Sorry Haa to Dosto aapko meri ye service kaise lagi ye muje comment ke jariye jarur batai. or aap mujse whatsapp ke through judna chate hai ki nahi ye bhi bataye. Agar aap Join Q karna chate ya Q join karna nahi chate ye jarur bataye. Agar aap Mere Rules me kuch change chate hai ya aapke paas kuch sujaab hai to Muje bo jarur bataye. Thanks

Hello Friends, Ye to aap jante hi hoge ki technology badh rahi hai har fild me or uske sath sath hamare liye sari chije aasan hoti ja rahi hai. Jese Internet ki madad se ham hamare lagbhag sare kaam Shopping, Mobile Recharge, ya koi bhi information nikalna hai. duniya me kahi se bhi kar sakte hai. Paise Transfer karne ke liye bhi jo Bank hai unme Net Banking, Mobile Banking jesi subhidaye to phele se thi. par abhi abhi ek or add ki gai hai jiska naam hai UPI. To chaliye Jante hai akhir ye UPI hai kya or iska Use kaise kare or iske kya faide or nuksan hai. UPI ka Fullform hai Unified Payments Interface. isme hota ye hai jo hamara Bank account hai usko ham apne Smartphone me use kar sakte hai UPI app ki madad se. hamare jitne bhi bank me account hai unme hamara mobile number to rigister hota hi hai. to ham hamare sare bank account jinme hamara number register hai unko ek hi app me use kar sakte hai or uski madad se hamare sabhi bank account ki detail dekh sakte hai or account me paise send ya recive bhi kar sakte hai badhi aasani se.

Agar aap ek Blogger hai to aap Successful to jarur hona chate hoge, or iss Guest Post me batane ja raha hun ki kisi bhi blog ko successful banana ke liye badiya First Impression bhut jaruri hai. Kya aap bata sakte hai visitor kisi blog ko open karta hai to sabse pahle kya dekhta hai ? Ek najar me popular blog aur new blog me difference kaise pata chalta hai ? Thoda apne najaron ko tej karen, aapko javab mil jayega. Chaliye main bata deta hun, theme look theme design hi vah pahli chij hoti hai, jispar kisi bhi visitor ki pahli najar jata hai. Because Sabse pahle theme design hi visitor par impression dalata hai. Theme design achchi hone par visitor aapke blog par long time tak rahega aur dubara bhi visit karega. Aisa isliye hota hai ki iske piche ek simple sa psychology method work karta hai, ham insane jab koi achchi beautiful chij dekh lete hai to usse jaldi attract ho jate hai Jise general language me first impression kahte hai. I am sure, aap school ke dino se apne friends par achcha impression dalane ke liye dress se lekar apni speaking skill me improvement karte honge. Aapka blog bhi bilkul aapke ki tarah hai, jisse bhi first impression ki jarurat padti hai, taki vo maximum visitors ko attract kar sake. Is first impression ke liye keval theme design se nahi, uske sath bhi kuch kuch hai jo acha hona chaiye. iske ware me jane usse phele pahle janate hai- Ek word me kahun to first impression kuch had tak love at first sight ki tarah hai. In details, first impression ek attractive ambiance create karta hai, jo keval visitors ke eyes ko achcha nahi lagta hai, balki ye man se lekar heart ko touch karta hai aur sath hi visitors ko acchi chijon ko yad rakhane ke liye positive request karta hai. First Impression se hone vale benefits se kisi bhi blog ko popular aur successful banaya jata hai. Jaisa ki maine pahle hi kah chukka hun ki sabse pahle Theme design hi visitor par first impression create karta hai. Isliye aap beautiful theme hi use kare. Iske alava ye tips follow kare- Google report ke anusar aapka blog maximum 3 second me open nahi hoti hai to aapka 60 visitors lose ho sakta hai. Sath hi page speed kisi bhi post ki ranking ke liye bahut important role play karta hai. Page speed increase karane ke liye ye tips follow kare- Blog ki speed badane ke Tips, jinki madad se aap site ka loading time or kam kar sakte hai. Yadi aap UC News par likhate hai to aap janate honge ki Badiya Post Title kitana important hai. Post title hi vah sabse pahli chij hoti hai, jise dekhkar visitor decide karta hai ki post padhe ya nahi. Isliye post title attractive aur short banaye, jo SEO Friendly ke sath User Friendly bhi ho. Behatar post title ke liye ye tips follow karen- Badiya Post Title kaise likhne ke 5 Tip, phele HMH.pe share kiye gaye the aap unko bhi jarur read kare. Kaha jata hai, ek image thousand words ke barabar hota hai. isliye yadi feature image high quality vala ho to aksar visitors post title ki bajay feature image se impress ho kar post padhane lagte hai. Aapko bhi high quality vale feature image create karana chahiye, jise aap Gravit.io se easily create kar sakte hai. High Quality Image aap Free wali hi use kare, jo aap Royalty Free Image website se Download kar sakte hai. or agar aap Google se Free Image Download karna chate hai to wo kaise kare uski jankari bhi aapko mil jayegi. Ab tak main jis impression ki baat kar raha tha, vo external impression tha. Jiske kai work aap ya kisi ke help se easily kar sakte hai. Lekin Internal expression bhi bahut jaruri hai, jiski sabse badi factor hai, Quality Post Yadi aap quality post nahi karte hai to external impression ke liye kiya gaya all work waste ho sakta hai. Isliye quality post likhane ke liye ye kare- Is section ka main work readers ko blog par banaye rakhana hota hai. Jisse blog ki bounce rate decrease hoti hai. Isliye Related Post Section me Related Post Title ke sath high quality image bhi show karana chahiye. Yadi aap kisi reader ke comment ko reply karte hai to reader aapse direct connect ho jata hai. Isse sabse jyada impression padta hai. Isliye sabhi comment ka reply kare, badiya comment kaise karte hai uske liye aap iss post ko read kare. Last Words Aapka blog kitana jaldi successful hoga, ye keval blog par posting karane par depend nahi karta hai. Balki ye quality post ke sath blog ke first impression par bhi depend karta hai. Isliye aaj se hi blog ko bhetar se bhetar banaye rakhne ke liye bhi kaam kare. Guest Author Bio Ye Post Ravi Kumar ji ke duara ki gai hai jo Bloggingfirst.com ke owner hai. Agar aapko bhi Guest Post karna hai to uski Jankari yaha hai.

Muje lagta hai aesa sabke sath hota hai, mere sath bhi aesa hota hai. Aap dekh sakte hai mene kaise apni site ko decorate kiya hai Udte huee Indian Airplone se or Indian Flag se. Mene mera Independence Day ka SMS, Ringtone Collection yaha share kiya hai To chaliye dekhte hai Aapko jada kuch nahi karna hai iske liye sirf ek code hai jisko apne blog me add karna hai. Sabse phele Apne Blogger account me login karke deshboard me jaye. Deshboard Layout Add a Gadget HTMLJavaSacript. Agar aapko Dikkat aa rahi hai kaise kaha jaye to ye post pade Kaise HTMLJavaScript ko add kare Blogger me. Ab aapko jo Curser apni Site me add karna hai us codeko add kare apni blog me. Aapko jo pasand ho aap usko apne Blog or Website me add kar sakte hai.

MP Board Sutdent search kar rahe hai ki MP Board ke Result kaise dekhe jinhone in bar 12th Board ke exam diye hai, to unko bata dete hai ki MPBSE 12th ka Result 12 May 2016 ko aa gaya hai. Result aa gaya hai MP Board 2016 ka or kaise Online MP Board ke Result ko dekhe uski jankari ham de rahe hai. Har Saal bhut se Student MP Board ke exam ko dete hai, or kosis karte hai ki ache Marks la sake taki acha collage le sake or aage ki apni padai achi se kar sake. MPBSE ko Board of Secondary Education, Madhya Pradesh bhi khate hai. Ye State Lavel ki Board Exam hai jo Madhya Pradesh Government ke under li jati hai. Agar aapke pass Android Phone hai to aap MP Board 12th ka Result Direct apne Mobile me bhi dekh sakte hai uske liye aapko ek App Install karna padega. Download App Here Mp Board ka Result dekhne ke liye Roll Number ki jarur padedi jo hame MP Board ke Exam ke liye mila hai. Facebook ek aesi site hai jispar abhi ke time me agar koi net use karta hai to uska facebook par 100 Account hoga. Kuch surveys ke hisab se average ek admi 23 minute Facebook chalata hai ek din me. Simple Sabdo me kahu to kuch logo ko Facebook ka kida rhata hai. Choti se choti chij ko facebook par share karte hai jese kab khana kaya, kab soye, kab ute, kaha gaye, kya piya, dinbhar me 20-30 post daalte hai. or like ke liye to kya batao kya pagal pan hai, Comment to bas ek aa jaye comment acha hai to usko like bhi kar sakte hai par nahi reply karege thx, taki or comment bade. kheer apne topic par aate hai, or jaan lete hai fb account delete permanently in hindi me. Ham Is Post me Dekhege kaise ham apne Facebook Account ko Deactivate kar akte hai or Janage hamesa ke liye Facebook Account Delete kaise kare. Agar aapke account ka koi galat use kar raha hai aap uss dar se apna account delete kar rahe hai to aapko account delete karne ki jarurat nahi hai, Facebook account ko hack hone se kaise bachaye uski tips mene share ki hai. FB account ko delete ya deactivate karne ke aapke bhut se karan ho sakte hai, to chaliye dekh lete hai kaise account ko delete karte hai. aap Agar Online Kisi bhi website ka account delete kaise karte hai uski jankari bhi mene share ki hai aap usko bhi jarur read kare. Sabse phele ye samaj lete hai FB id deactivate karne se hota kya hai Facebook Account ko jab koi deactivate karte hai to uska account koi search nahi kar pate or uske jitne bhi photo ya video jo usne upload kiye hai bo kisi ko nahi dikhte par agar wo kisi ka friend hai to uski friend list me uska naam dikhta hai.

Whatsapp DP in Hindi, Ya DP Full Form ye sabal aapke mann me jarur aaye hoge agar aapne kahi DP sabd kisi ko khete hue suna hoga ya kahi likhte hue dekha hoga. ki akhhir DP Meaning hota kya hai. Agar aap Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Instagram jesi koi bhi Social App ya sites use karte hai to aapke samne bhut se Short Words aaye hoge jese DP, LOL, GM, GN, ROLF or In Words ka kya Full Form hai or kya matlab hai wo me aapko abhi batane wala hu. DP Display Picture jisko Profile Picture bhi khete hai. Aapne dekha hoga jitne bhi Social account hote hai ham usme apna Photo set karke rakhte hai, FB, Whatsapp, Insta sabhi jagha. taki log usko dekh kar hame phechan sake. Uss Display Picture ko hi DP khete hai. DP Sabd Display Picture ka hi Short Form hai, jo ki logo ne hi apni sabuliyat ke liye banaya hai. Q ki jab bhi ham chat karte hai to agar kisi ko khena ho ki Aapki Display Picture Profile Picture achi hai . to itna lamba message Type karne se acha ham khe sakte hai aapki DP achi hai . Iss trha Short form ka use start hua taki kam sabd likh kar apni baat kahi ja sake. To ab aap sabaj gaye hoge ki DP ka Full Form or Iska matlab kya hai. Also Read Whatsapp Se Paise Kaise Kamaye Chaliye ab kuch or short Words or unke Ful Form bhi jaan lete hai jo Chat karte time use kiye jate hai, taki kam sabd me apni baat sajai ja sake or Time bachaya ja sake. Niche me pure Short Words ki list share kar raha hu, jo Chat karte time use hote hai. kis word ka kya matlab hai or kya uska Full Form hai wo aapko unke samne mil jayega. Ab aap jaan chuke hai Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram par use hone wale short words ke ware me. To der kis baat ki jaiye or kariye apne Friends or Family se chat in short form ke sath. or agar aap chate hai jinko aap ye short form likh kar send kare wo bhi sabhi sabd ka matlab tikh se samje uske liye aap ye post ka link unko send jarur kare. Hello Friends ham Jaante hai aaj ki tarikh me Mobile User kitni teji se bad rahe hai, Har ek vyakti ke pass Mobile Phone mil jayega. Internet ka use Computer se jada Mobile par karte hai log or Aaj Kal Ghar se lekar bhar tak sare kaam Mobile se hone jate hai. Or Kya aap Jaante hai Mobile se ham paise bhi kama sakte hai. Kya Aap Jaante hai Ham Mobile se itna paisa to aaram se kama sakte hai ki hamara Mobile ka jo kharcha hai wo ussi se nikal jaye. or agar ham usme thodi mhanat kar le to acha khasa paisa bhi kama sakte hai mobile se. Ye Bhi Pade Mobile se paise kamane ke phele ham kuch bate hai, phele wo jaan lete hai Mobile se jo paise kamane ka tarika hai jo me batane wala hu usme hame mobile me app install karna padta hai, App Install karne par hame uske paise milte hai. Hota ye hai jo Top App hote hai wo Download karne par paise dete hai. or ham jab unko install karte hai to wo paise hame mil jate hai. Jo App Download karne ke paise milte hai agar ham wo direct download karege to hame unke paise nahi milege. uske liye hame phele wo App install karna padega jinke jariye hame income karni hai. uski list me niche batane wala hu. Mobile se paise kamane ke liye hame jada kuch nahi sirf in chijo ki jarurat hai ye chije hame chaiye Mobile se paise kamane ke liye. Aap Mobile se ache paise bhi kama sakte hai. Par jada nahi to itna to jarur kama hi sakte hai ki aapko aage se kabhi Mobile ko recharge karwane ke liye paise apne jeb pocket se nahi dene padege. To chaliye jada time naa lete huee main Point par aate hai or dekhte hai kon kon se Android App hai jinse ham paise kama sakte hai. Me phele bhi kuch post me bataya tha ki ham kaise mobile par Paise kama sakte hai apps ki madad se. par un post me mene sirf ek app ke ware me bataya tha. aaj me aapko ussi trha ke badiya apps ki list dene wala hu jinse aap paise kama sakte hai. Important Note Niche jitne bhi App Diye hai unko Install karne ke baad unke andar ke kam se kam 2 Offer jarur complete kare. Mcent App mera sabse Favorite app hai, Isme ham App Install karke Paise kama sakte hai jisse ham apne number par recharge kar sakte hai.

Dosto aaj is post me Ham janege ki PhotoShop ko video tutorials ke sath kaise sikhe. Jiske liye is post me top 5 YouTube channel apko bataye jayenge taki un Channel se ap free me Photoshp ko sikh sake. Iska use sabse jyada business line me hota hai, jaise wedding pics designing, Graphic designing, Web designing, Infographic Designing etc. Kai log ise entertainment ke liye bhi use me lete hai. Well maine bhi starting me PhotoShop ka use entertainment me pic edit karne ke liye hi kiya tha. Lekin aaj me fotoshop ka use graphic designing ke liye use karta hu. halanki Photoshop ko sikhne ke liye kai book bhi hai aur kai website bhi hai jo text se sikhate hai lekin Photosop ko sikhne ka sabse bahtarin tarika hai ise video tutorials se sikhe. Aur isiliye maine is post me 5 ese YouTube channel bataye hai jo bahut hi achhe dhand se Hindi Video tutorials se free me Fotoshop sikhate hai wo bhi beginner Photoshop ke new user ke liye. to ye maine 5 YouTube ke channel bataye hai mujhe ummid hai in Channels se aap Photoshop ko achhe se sikh sakte hai, Lekin phir bhi iske alawa bhi kai chije ya topic Google par search karke bhi sikhi jaa sakti hai. Mera yah hamehsa manna hota hai ki koi bhi chij ko achhe dhand se sikhna hai to wo hai practise, yani practical karke sikhe na ki kewal theoretical knowledge me hi rahe. To uske liye agar aap in channels par koi bhi video dekh rhe hai tab Photoshop ko open hi rakhe aur sath me aap bhi dekhe ki yah kis tarah se hota hai. Is tarah se nahi kare ki ek bar puri video dekh li aur fir Photoshop open karke use karne ki kosis kar rhe hai. Kyonki is tarah se bhula ja sakta hai ki video me kya btaya tha aur apko kya karna hai. My Advice meri advice yahi hogi ki ek bar puri video ko dekh le, then Foto Shop ko open kare, fir se us video ko play kare aur is bar har thodi bar video ko pause kare Fotoshop par jakar us option ko, us tool ko, us tarike ko samjhe. Waise hamne yeah socha hai ki ab HindiMeHelp par Photoshop se related bhi post ki jaye apka kya khayal hai? Agar aap chahte hai ki HMH.pe ab PhotoShop ko bhi sikhaya jaye to abhi comments ke madhyam se bataye. Ye Post Bhi Pade

CCC Online Test in Hindi, Iss Test ko dene ke baad aapko pata chal jayega ki aapko Computer ka kitna gyan hai or kitni jankari aapko Computer ki hai. CCC Full Form hota hai Course on Computer Concepts, jo ki ek Computer Course hai jiski aaj kal har jagha jarurat padti hai agar computer se related koi kaam ho to. Q ki agar kisi ne iss test ko clear kiya hai matlab unko Computer ki achi jankari hai. Agar aapko NIELIT CCC Test Paper Admit Card Result Certificate Fees se related koi bhi jankari chiaye ho to aap isko Official Site se dekh sakte hai. nielit.gov.in Chaliye ab karte hai aapka Test or jante hai kitni jankari hai aapko Computer ki. Aap niche diye question ke sahi answer ko tick kare or sahi answer dene ke baad aap last me apna result dekh sakte hai. Computer Ke Shortcut Key konse konse hai or unka kya use hai uski puri jankari yaha hai.

Flipkart, India ki sabse badi E-commerce website hai jo din wa din badti hi ja rahi hai. Online site se ham koi bhi saman kharidte hai to uski kimat kisi dukan se kam hoti hai q ki usme bhut logo ka commission kat jata hai. Me phele hi Bata chuka hu kaise Online Shoping karte hai or kya faide hai uske. Flipkart me pichlw saal ek din ke liye offer diya the jinse bhut kam kimat me saman mil raha tha. Jo Offer tha uska Naam tha the big billion days, mene usme pichli bar ye saman kharide the Is bar fir se ye Offer hai 5 Din ke liye. To dosto me to full teyari me hu kam kimat me bhut sara saman kharidne ke liye. Kya aap Hai ? Chaliye Thoda Detail me Jaan lete hai Akhir ye chakar kya hai Flipkart jo ki shoping website hai, ye Bhut se saman hai jo bhut kam kimat me deti hai offer ke time me. Is bar 70 se jada category ke saman milege kam kimat me. Ye jo Offer hai wo sirf Mobile App ke liye hai. Flipkart ki site Mobile Browser me nahi khulti, sirf Mobile App me Khulti hai. Meri sabse pheli online earning this $5 or bo thi Adf.ly se. me ye kabhi nahi bhul sakta ki issi online income ki bjah se me motivate huaa or mene internet ko or achi se samja or uska result ye hai ki aaj me hjaaro $$$ online kama raha hu. Aaj me aap se meri suruaad ki khani share karne ja raha hu. Is post ko pura pade mera bada hai ki aap bhi mere trah online payse kamayege. Sabse phela question hamare dimaag me aata hai ki adfly hai kya? Chalo start karte hai adfly ke bare me. Adfly ek website hai jo website ki link ko chota karti hai or for link par click karne par hamari income hoti hai. jada confuse mat hona me pura bistaar se bataoga. Yaha par ek raaj hai ki jab bhi koi link par click karega to Google.com par jaane se phele 5 second ke liye ek ad aayega uske baad ek skip ki button aayegi uspaar click karne par aap google.com par jaayege. Ab aap ke dimaag me ye sabaal aa raha hoga ki adfly hame payse degi to ye keise kamayegi. Chaliye phele ye jaante hai ki adfly website ki income kese hoti hai or uske paas payse kaha se aate hai or bo hame kahase payse deti hai. Iska raaj hai Advertiser. Advertiser bo log hai jo apna wesite ko promate karne ke liye adfly ko payse deta hai. Chaliye dekhte hai kese kya hota hai. To ab ye to clear hai to payse kaha se aate hai or kaha jate hai, or kisko kitna kitna milta hai Adfly farji nahi hai. ye kuch proof Ab to aap ko yakin ho gaya hoga ki Adfly farji nahi hai. Sabse kam $5 nikaal sakte hai. matlab hame kam se kam $5 kamana padega account se nikaalne se phele. Adfly ke bhut sare tool hai jo hame madad karte hai jada payse kamane me Mass Shrinker Is tool ki madad se ham ek sath 20 link ho short kar sakte hai. Multiple Links Is tool ki madad se aap kisi page ki sari link ko adfly short link me badal sakte ho. Agar aap ki koi website hai to ye tool aap ke liye bhut useful hai. Easy Link Agar aap payse kamana to chate hai par link ko chota nahi karna chate to aap is tool kal istmaal kar sakte hai. ye bese hi work karega bas link chota nahi hoga. ye kuch is prakar ki link hogi httpadf.ly2469000httpwww.HindiMeHelp.com Isko aap jab bhi use kar sakte jo jab aap apna adfly account nahi khol pa rahe ho. Sirf aapko karna yaha haiki www.google.com ki jgha apni nai link daaldo. isme lekin ye option mil jata hai ki agar koi chahe to bo bina skip ads ke link khol sakta hai or ek yah ki isme pata chal jata hai ki ye link kis site ki hai. ek or code hota hai banner linkka is me payse kam milte hai or isme skip nahi karna hota. bas site open hoti hai to uske uper ek ad ka wanner aata hai. httpadf.ly2469000bannerhttpwww.HindiMeHelp.com Note ye jo code hai ye mera code hai agar aapko apna code chaiye to aap yaha signup kijiye. Sign Up Now! Bookmarklet ye ek beowser ka toolbar hai. is ki madad se aap kisi bhi site par jate ho or agar us site ki short link karna chate ho to toolbar ke Shorten with adfly! button par click kar ke short link kar sakte ho. API Documentation Is ki madad se aap apne adfly account ko kisi bhi application se join kar sakte ho. Web Analytics Is ki madad se aap apne adfly account ko Google ke analytics account se join kar sakte ho fir aap apne link par ho rahe click ko google analytics par dekh sakte ho bilkul live. Full Page Script Agar aap ka koi blog ya website hai to aap is script ki madad se puri wesite ki link ko adfly link me convert kar sakte ho. Website Entry Script Is Script ki madad se aap apni income ko bada sake ho. hoga ye ki jab bhi koi aap ki website par aayega to automatic page refracehogaor 5 second ke liyead aayega. Export Links and Stats Is tool ki madad se aap apni short ki gai links ko download kar sakte ho. Domains Is tool ki madad se aap apni website ka sab domain change kar sakte hai. jese maan lo aapki website ka naam hai httpswww.HindiMeHelp.com to is tool ko use karne ke baad aaoka naya link hoga go.HindiMeHelp.com Popup Ads Is tool ki madad se aap apni income popup ads ki madad se bada sakte hai. Is code ko apni website par wale to popup ads aayege jab koi visitor aapki site par aayege. Mass Delete Abhi Adfly ne ek or tool joda hai is ki madad se aap chate to bhut sari link ek sath delete kar sakte hai. Plugins Ye tool WordPress site ke liye hai. isko simple apni website se jodo or sari setting aapki site par hi aajayegi. Ek baat or adfly un logo ke liye nahi hai jo sofa par bat kar din-bhar TV dekhte rahe or $1000 per day income ka soche. Mene aese log bhi dekhe hai jo $50 ek din me kama rahe hai. Is ka raaj hai sannti or intjaar or lagatar priyaas. Ab lagbhag mene aapko adfly ki puri jaankari de di hai.Ab me aap se kahu Signup karo or kuch payse online kamao. Chalo ye bhi dekh lete hai ki account kese banaye. bahut aasan hai. Bhut hi saral steps hai account bnane me. to chalo start karte hai. Step 1. AdF.ly ki website par jaao Step 2. Click on Join Now Step 3 Anpa Email ID, User Name, Password, Links Shrinker or puri jaankari bhare fir Join ki button par click kare. Ab aapka account to ban gaya hai ab sirf aapko apna account verify karna hai. aapke email account par ek email aaya hoga usme ek link hoga uspar click kare. Email aane me lagbhag 2 minute lagte hai. Mubarak hoab aap online payse kamane ke liye teyaar hai. Sabse achi baat yaha hai adfly ke bare me ki jo bayakti kuch nahi jaanta computer, internet ke bare me bo bhi online payse kama sakta haionline iski madad se. Chaliye me kuch tarike batata hu isse payse kamane ke. bas ye hai ki aap ko thoda active hona padega or bas karna yah hai ki log aapki link par click kare. bhut sare foram hai jo bhar ki site ki link ko allow karte hai aap sirf apni link un forams me post kariye. bas in bato ka diyaan rahe ki aapki link unke topics se related ho or aap koi farji link share na kare nahi to hoga ye ki aap ko block kardiya jayega us forum se. ye bilkul forum par link share karne ke jesa hai bas isme aap ko jo post hai website ki usse related link post karni hai.

Google lagbhag every six month me koi na koi new algorithm implement karta hai, Jo ek new Google Ranking Factor ban jata hai. Aise me Google SERP me high ranking pane ke liye un factors ko follow karana jaruri hai. otherwise Google Penalization face karana pad sakta hai. Isliye maine khas hindi bloggers ke liye Google Ranking Factors laya hai, jise janana aapke liye behad jaruri hai- Google Ranking Factors Domain 1.Keyword in Domain Domain me keyword hona ranking me help karti hai. 2.Exact Matched Domain Exact match domain se kisi bhi keyword ke liye top ranking mil sakti hai. Par blog content top quality vala hona nahi chahiye. Otherwise Google penalize bhi kar sakta hai. 3.Country TLD Extension- Google always country TLD .in, .us, .jpn based blogwebsite ko .com .net .org TLD based blogwebsite ke compare related country me jyada ranking deta hai. 4.Domain Age Google engineer Matt Cutts ke anusar yadi aap quality content likhte hai to Domain Age se ranking par impact nahi padta hai. But one year domain low content hone se blog ko flag as spam kiya ja sakta hai. 5.Domain Authority High DA se high ranking milati hai. Ise quality backlink se badha sakte hai. Focus Keyword 6.Focus Keyword in Title- Title me focus keyword hona On Page SEO ka important part hai. Jo post ko search engine friendly aur user friendly banata hai. 7.Focus Keyword in Description Behatar SEO ke liye description me focus keyword hona chahiye. 8.Focus Keyword in URL Good SEO ke liye URL me focus keyword hona jaruri hai, lekin URL long na ho. 9.Focus Keyword in Subtitle Subtitle me focus keyword hone se post ki topic clear hoti hai. 10.Focus Keyword Density 500 words me 3-4 focus keywords hona chahiye. Jyada keywords avoid kare, isse over SEO ho jayega. 11.Focus Keyword in 100 words Google crawler pahle 100 words se hi post ka topic clear karta hai. Isliye post ke pahle 100 word me focus keyword include kare. But ek hi keyword include kare. 12.Focus Keyword Word Order Focus Keywords se exact match hone vale title post keyword se matched title post se pahle appear hota hai. Jaise Focus Keyword Blog Se Kaise Kamaye Post-1 Blog Se Kaise Kamaye 7 Best Tarike Post-2 Blog Se Paise Kaise Kamaye 7 Best Tarike Post 1 ko high rank milega. Content 13.Post Length Ek complete post large hota hai, Isliye large post ko google short post ke ovar ranking deta hai. Average Content Length For Ranking 14.Latent Semantic Indexing in Post LSI se blog ki traffic increase kar sakte hai. 15.LSI in Title LSI title me bhi include karana chahiye 16.LSI in Description LSI ko post aur title ki tarah description me include karana beneficial hai. 17.Duplicate Content Duplicate content ke karana Google Panda penalize kar sakta hai. 18.Copied Content Dusre blog se content copy karane se blog Google ke radar me aa jata hai. Yadi aap koi affiliate blog run karte hai aur product description ke liye merchandise website se us product ki description aur user reviews copy karte hai to penalty face karana pada sakta hai. 19. Speed Fast blog ko slow blog ke over high ranking milti hai. 20. Image optimization Image compressed ho aur uska alt tag, caption, description, title, post topic ke anusar ho. 21. Fresh Post Google hamesha old post ki bajay latest post ko high ranking deta hai. 22.Video Post me Video aur Audio include karane se post super quality vala mana jata hai. 23.Reading Level Yadi aapke post ko 8-10 th standard ke bachche samjh jate hai to aapko high ranking milegi. 24.Readability Chote-chote paragraph ko padhane me asani hoti hai. Isliye 2-3 lines ki hi paragraph banaye 25.Bullets and Number List Post me bullets aur number include karana post quality hone ki nishani mana jata hai. 26. Post age Post old hai aur use update kar diya jaye to easily high rank mil sakta hai. 27.Useful content Content ka useful hona jaruri hai, jo comment aur bounce rate se pata chalta hai. 28.Guest Posts High DA vale blog par guest post karane se aapki online identitiy majbut hoti hai aur quality backlink bhi milta hai. 29.Bounce Rate Blog Post ki bounce rate ideal hona chahiye, jo important ranking factor hai. 30.URL Length Post ka long url hone ke karan google url ko SERP me full show nahi kar sakta, jo Google URL Standard ke anusar sahi nahi hai. 31.URL Structure yourdomain.compostname ko sabse achcha URL Structure mana jata hai, Jo SEO friendly hone ke sath short bhi hai. Link 31.External link- Post me high quality external link add karane se post genuine lagata hai. 32.Number of External links Ye SEO ke liye behatar hai, Lekin jyada external link add karane se SEO par opposite impact pad sakta hai. Link aise blog se kare, jo hamare blog ko relink kare, jo SEO ke liye sabse behatar hota hai. 33.Internal Links Internal links se ek post ki PA se dusre post ki PA increase kar ranking badha sakte hai. 34.Broken Links 404, Sorry Not Found hone se Google post ko unindex kar sakta hai. 35. Affiliate Links Jis post me affiliate links add karana hai to content high quality ka bhi hona chahiye, otherwise Google penalize kar sakta hai. 36.Link from .edu or .gov or newspaper site .edu, .gov aur newpaper site sabse Highest DA vale hote hai. Inse mile Backlink se blog ki ranking increase ho sakti hai. 37.Links from Bad Neighborhoods Apne se kam DA vale blog se backlink lena SEO ke liye ghatak hai. 38.Backlink from Homepage High DA blog ke homepage se mile backlink se high juice pass hota hai. Jo blog ki DA jaldi increase karta hai. 39.Bundle of Link Ek hi blog se kai backlink banana ya kam time me adhik backlink banane se Google blog ko Sandbox me dal sakta hai. Jiske bad ranking down ho sakta hai. 40.Sponsored Links Paid Link, Sponsored Link, Powered By jaise anchor text vale backlink SEO ke liye bad hai. Yadi aap paid link chahte hai, to nofollow tag use kare. 41.Link From Post Post backlink pana natural aur reasonable lagta hai. 42.301 Redirect Blogspot se wordpress migrate karne bad 404 se bachane ke liye 301 link redirect karna padta hai. Par ye SEO ke liye good idea nahi hai. 43.Link Location in post Post ke shuruat me mila backlink sabse effective hota hai. 44.Backlink From Relevant Domain Relevant Domain se backlink pana SEO ke liye great hai. 45.Backlink From Relevant Post Relevant post se mila backlink sabse relevant mana jata hai. Jo ek natural backlink hai. 46.Forum Profile Links Forum se backlink pana sabse easy hai, par Forum se mila backlink SEO me koi help nahi karta hai, balki yadi jyada backlink mil jaye to SEO ko heart bhi kar sakta hai. Sitewide 47.W3C Validation Yadi blog me W3C error hai to ranking par bad impact pad sakta hai. jise aap yaha check kar skate hai. Validator W3C 48.Contact Us Page Blog me ek contact us page bhi hona chahiye, jisme Genuine address aur phone number hona chahiye. Jo aapki real identity ko show karta hai. 49.Visibility Blog loading hone par sabse pahle main content dikhana chahiye, otherwise bounce rate badhega aur ranking down ho jayega. 50.Privacy Policy Blog par Privacy Policy page hone se patta chalta hai ki aap Internet ke Global Standard ko follow karte hai. 51.Term Of Service- Term of service page na hone se Google ise users ke sath cheating karne jaisa samjhata hai. 52.About Us About us page ko google ignore nahi kar sakta hai. Isse blog owner ki real identity aur motive clear hoti hai. 53.Site Uptime Bar bar server down hone se user experience par bad impact padta hai. Isliye cheap hosting ki bajay achchi hosting buy karani chahiye. 54.Server Location Yadi hosting server India me hoto use blog ko India me ranking achchi milegi. 55. SSL Certificate Google pahle hi clear kar chukka hai SSL HTTPS vale blog ranking me benefits milega. 56.Breadcrumb Navigation Breadcrumb navigation se user ko patta chalta hai ki vah kis category ka post padh raha hai. Jisse user experience achchi ho sakti hai. Breadcrumb Navigation 57. Mobile Optimized January 2017 ke bad se hi Google ne mobile optimized blog ki ranking badha di hai. 58.Site Usability blog ka navigation bar, pagination, sidebar widget ko user easily use kar pa rahe ya nahi. Isse bhi ranking par impact padta hai. 59. Google Analytics Google Webmaster Tools Ye dono tool aapko behatar tarike blog se related data aur problem ke bare me batata hai, jise Google bhi use karta hai. 60.Youtube- Youtube Google ka hai, jise vo avoid nahi kar sakta hai. Isliye blog ka youtube channel hona fayademand ho sakta hai. 61.Social Share Number of Referring page high social share number vale social post se referral traffic milati hai, to blog ki seo ke beneficial hai. 62.Country TLD of Referring Domain Country TLD .in, .jpn vale website se bachlink milane par us country .in, .jpn me ranking milati hai. 63.Schema.org Markup schema.org markup ki help se search engine behatar tarike se blog ko read kar pati hai. Tabhi Google ranking deta hai. 64.DMCA Complaints DMCA complaints blog ki goodwill ko down kar deta hai. 65.Google News Box Google kisi topic se related news ko Google News Box me show karta hai, jo actual post ranking se upar hota hai. Is box me keval news site ke article hi show hote hai. Google News Box 66.Local Searches Yadi user restaurant near me motel near me search kare to uske location ke base Google SERP show karta hai. 67.Shopping Result Jab Google me product search karte hai to SERP me sabse pahle product picture show hota hai, jo sponsored aur eCommerce website se jude hote hai. Shopping Result 68.Spam IP Address Hosting plan buy karne ke bad Hosting Company Server IP provide karta hai. Yadi vo spam listed hai to Google aapke blog ko spam list me shamil kar sakta ahi. 69.Meta Title Spamming Title jarurat se jyada long rakhana ya title me kisi popular blog ka name dala spamming hai. 70.Meta Description Spamming Limit se jyada long description likhana, spamming hai. 71.Shared Hosting Beginner blogger ke liye sabse cheap hosting plan shared hosting hota hai. Jisme ek hi ip address ke server par kai blogs ko host kiya jata hai. Jismen yadi koi blog porn, adult content vala ho to uska bad impact dusre blogs par bhi padta hai. 72.WhoIs Privacy Protection WhoIs privacy protection se blog owner ki real identity chupi rahti hai, jo spam hone ka suchak hai. User Interaction 73.High CTR Keyword Web title me high CTR keyword include karane se ranking badhai ja sakti hai. 74.Direct Traffic Direct Traffic regular visitors se milati hai, jo blog ki trust value ko increase karti hai. 75.Regular Visitors Regular visitors blog ke real fans hote hai, jis blog ke jitne jyada hai. Use Google utna hi importance deta hai. 76.Chrome Bookmarks Google user ke Chrome ke sabhi data analyse karta hai. Jisme bookmarks bhi shamil hai. Is bookmarks me jin blog ki link hote hai. Use Google trust value deta hai. 77.Comments Comment users ke engagement ko show karta hai, jo blog ke content useful hone ka suchak hai. 78.User Engagement Time User blog ko kitna time spend karta hai, jo content value show karta hai. 79.Geo Targeting Google un blog ko high rank deta hai, jo kisi country, place se relate karte hai. Is tarah ke SERP us country aur place se related user ko dikhata hai. 80.Google Plus Circles Google SERP me us user ko us blog ka post jarur show karta hai, jo Google Plus par us blog se jude hote hai. 81.Popups or Distracting Ads 2012-2013 ke bich bloggers blog me itna ads add kar dete the, ki main content ka hi patta nahi chalta tha. Tab Google ne users ke complain par is tarah ke action ko penalize kar diya. Isi ab yadi content se jyada ad lagaye to Google penalize kar sakta hai. 82. On Page SEO Optimization On Page SEO optimization ka Google ka important ranking factor hai. 83. Off Page SEO Optimization Off Page SEO optimization bhi Google ka important ranking factor hai. 84.User Browsing History Google every user ke browser history ko read karta hai. Usi ko dhyan me rakh kar us user ke SERP show karta hai. Histroy.Google.com par aap apni history dekh sakte hai. Social 85.Number of Tweets Blog ke twitter account se huye adhik number me tweets Google ko green signal deta hai. 86.Authorized Twitter Users Account Authorized Twitter user account se referral traffic milana, kisi bhi blog ke liye golden moment jaisa hai. 87.Facebook Like Blog post par facebook likes Google ko good singal deta hai. 88.Facebook Share Facebook like se jyada facebook share importance rakhata hai, jo dhero referral traffic blog par deliver kar sakta hai. 89.Authority of Facebook User Accounts Authorized Facebook User Accounts se referral traffic SEO ke liye beneficial hai. 90.Pinterest Pins Twitter, Facebook ki tarah Pinterest Pins bhi ek google ka ek ranking factor hai. 91.Number of Google Plus Google Plus Google ka hai, Isliye kisi blog post par mile Google plus ko ignore nahi kar sakta hai. 92.Authority of Google Plus User Accounts Facebook aur Twitter ki tarah ye bhi Google ko green signal send karta hai. 93.Number of RSS Subscriber RSS Feedburner subscribers blog par trust karane vale visitor hote hai. Yadi ve adhik sankhya me ho to Google par good impact padta hai. Yadi aap is post ko pasand karte hai, to jarur share kare.

Material design aapne ye savd buhut baar kahi padha hoga adhiktar google ki post me ye ek graphics guidelines hai jo google ne pichhle saal apne IO event pe jaree ki thi , aur Google android ka lollipop OS bhi isi graphics ke userinterface par aadharit hai. Janiye WhatsApp ke 5 New Future ke bare me jo aap nahi jaante Isme poori design ko colours , animations aur parchhai me divide kiya jata hai jisse kaafi sundar aur aakarshak graphics milte hai. Material design nikalne ke baad google ne apne users ke liye ek buhut achchhi suvidha bhi nikali ki wo bina kisi application evam coding kare bager kisi bhi naam ko material design me likh kar use GIF me download kar sakte hai. Facebook , Twitter , Instagram kahi par bhi GIF file support ni karti sirf Google ko chhorkar atah Google ne ye service isi liye nikali ki Google user GIF creat karkar apna cover change kar sake . Agar aapka Google Par Account nahi hai to aapko aaj hi banana chaiye. Aapko Gif Banane ke liye ek website ka istmal karna hai, or simple usme apna Naam Type karke Download karke hai. Chaliye dekhete hai kaise. Step 1 Sabse Phele formtypemaker.appspot.com par jaye. Step 2 Ab jo Website Khulegi usme apna Naam type kare. Download button par click karne ke baad pehle GIF creat hogi uske baad automatically download ho jayegi, isme aadha ya ek minute lag sakta hai aur baki aapke internet speed par nirbhar karta hai. Ye ek Guest Post hai, Jo Akash Nema ne Share ki hai jo The Tech Minutes ke Owner hai. Agar aap bhi HMH.pe apni Post Share karna Chate hai to yaha Click kare. HMH par Dusri Guest Post Padne ke liye yaha click kare

Is Post me me aapko bataoga kaise Simple or Clean Social Following Icon ke Widget ko apne Blog me add karte hai. Is Widget me Facebook, Twitter, Google, RSS or Youtube ke logo hai. jinpar click karke koi bhi hamare Blog ko Follow kar sakta hai. Is Social Following Widget ki madad se hamare visitor hamare Facebook, Twitter, Google, RSS or youtube ko Subscribe, Follow or Like kar sakte hai. Jisse hame ye faida hai ki ham jab bhi New Post publish karege apne Blog par to ham usko apne sare social Network Page or Profile par share karege to jinhone hamare Page ko Like or Follow kiya hai unko pata chal jayega ki hamari site par new post aai hai.

Jese ki aap jaante hi ho Blogger ek sabse badiya platform hai website banane ke liye or mene blogger ke upar bhotse post bhi kiye hai. Ham kaise blogger ko website me badale ye mene meri pichli post me bataya tha. Ham jab blog banate hai blogger par to uska jo template rhata hai usme bhut si chije rhati hai jiski hame jarurat nahi hoti or unko hatake ham apne blog ko ham bilkul website ki trha bana sakte hai. jese Navbar jo blog me upar rhat hai uski hamare blog me koi jarurat nahi Ye jo likha hota hai hamare blog me niche Powered by Blogger is ka matlab hai, hamara jo blog hai bo hamne blogger.com par banaya hai. Isme agar aap chahe to apne blog ka naam aage daal sakte ho, jo aapke liye copyright ka kaam karega. Jese ki mene pichi post me bataya ki aap kaise apne dosto or ristedaro ko impress kar sakte ho website bana kar. Mene aapko Blogger par blog banane ke baad usko website me badalna sikhaya tha. Par agar aap website me badalne ke baad bhi agar apne kisi dost ko apni website bataoge to bo aapke blog me niche Powered by Blogger dekh kar samaj jayega ki ye to Blogger par hai or hamara impression nahi jam payega ???? Aap agar koi dusra template upload karte ho apne blog me to ye Attribute sahi nahi lagta. To chaliye jaante hai kaise hataye Powered by Blogger Attribution ko. Ab aap diyaan se meri steps ko follow karo or sikho kaise ham isko hata sakte hai. Iske do tarike hai hatane ke. Ham dono tariko se dekhege. Blogger.com me login karke apne blog ke deshboard me jao Layout me jao fir niche jo Attribution naam se widget hai uski edit button par click kare Ab ek popup window khulegi. Par yaha par ek dikkat hai aap dekhege jese dusre wigets me rhata hai besi koi Remove ki button nahi hai. Matlab ye widget locked hai. Widget ko unlock karne ke liye Template par jao fir Edit HTML ki button par click kare. ab aapke saamne aapke blog ka template editor me khul jayega. Jump to widget par click kare fir Attribution1 par click kare. Attribution1 par click karte se hi Attribution ka code aapke saamne aa jayega. Code aesa hoga jo mene highlight liya hai. usme aap dekhoge locked true hai uski jagha false likhde. False karne ke baad Save template ki button par click kare. Ab bapas Layout me jaa kar Attribution ke widget ki edit link par click kare Ab aapke saamne bapas se popup khulega usme aap dekhege ab Remove ki button aa chuki hai. Ab Remove ki button par click kare. Ye lijiye Powered by Blogger aapke blog se ab hat chuka hai. Blog se chupane ke liye aapko simple ek line ka CSS Code hai usko apne template me add karna hai. CSS Code ko kaise add kare ye jaanne ke liye muje step by step follow karo Read this Janiye CSS Code ko Blogger me add karne ke 3 tarike Blogger ke Deshbord me jaane ke baad Template ke section me jao Template par jane ke baad Customise ki button par click karo. ab Blogger Tempte Designer ka page khulega. Code apply karne ke baad aap dekhege ki Powred by blogger aapke blog se chup gaya hai.

Hello Friends Ham Facebook or Twitter ke bare me to phele hi jaan chuke hai or aaj Google ke bare me jaanege. Google ek Social Networking site hai jo Google ki hai, is site par ham apne dosto se jude rha sakte hai bilkul facebook ki trha, agar aap koi online work karte hai ya fir aapka koi business hai to aapka is par bhi account hona chaiye. Ab aapko meri Steps ko Follow karna hai Step 1 Google ki site par jaye, Fir Apne Gmail ki ID se login kare. Step 2 Ab aapke saamne jo page aayega usme kuch id aayegi jinko aap follow ya add kar sakte hai, aap jisko chahe add kare uske baad Continue ki button par click kare Step 3 Ab aapko apni Profile ki jaankari daalni hai Jese hi aap Finish ki button par click karege aapka account teyaar hai, ab aap Apne Google account ko use kar sakte hai. Muje Follow kare Google Par www.Google.comRohitMewada Hindi Me Help ke Page ko jarur Follow kariye New Post ki jaankari Page ke liye. To Friends Aasan tha naa, Wo isliye ki ye Google ki hi Service hai. Agar aapko or koi baat jaanni ho Internet se sambandit to aap bilkul puch sakte hai.
