Aapka Agar Blog hai ya Youtube Channel hai to aapne Adsense ka Naam to jarur suna hoga, or aapko uske ware me thoda bhut to pata bhi hoga ki ham usse paise kama sakte hai. Par aapke Dimag me kuch sabal hoge Adsense se Sambandit jiska jabab sayad aapko abhi tak nahi mila ho to yaha aapko wo sare sabalo ke jabab milne wale hai. Adsense se sambandit mene Sabal likhe hai jo log aksar pucha karte hai ya jaanna chate hai, to aap Har sabal ko Padhe or uska jabab bhi padhe. Me dabe se khe sakta hu aapko bhut kuch aesa jaanne or sikhne ko milega jo aapko abhi tak nahi pata tha. To Chaliye Start karte hai. Note Kuch Sabal or Jabab aese hai jo sirf aapko jab samaj aayege jab aap Adsense Phele se Use karte hai, unme confuse naa ho. Ans Adsense ke liye Agar aap apply karne wale hai to aapko Sabse pheli baat to jald waji bilkul bhi nahi karni hai or apni site ko puri trha se teyar karne ke baad hi Apply karna hai. Yaha Padhe Adsense Adsense Account Approved Karane ke 11 Tarike Hindi Mee Liye Apply karne se phele k Ans Hinglish se matlab hai jese HMH.pe par likha huaa hai. to agar aap bhi aese likhte hai apne blog par to aap Hindi select kar sakte hai. par ye jaruri bhi nahi hai kuch logo ne english select ki thi or unke bhi account approve hue hai. Ans Kitni Visitor ho ya kitni Post ho uski koi Value nahi hai. Par aapko apply karne se phele ye dhiyan jarur dena hai ki site sahi se design ho or kam se kam aap badiya 15 post publish kar chuke ho. Visitor kitne bhi ho usse site ke approve hone par koi aasar nahi padta. Ans Haa, Agar aap apne blog me adsense apply karne se phele Domain add kar lete hai to adsense ki team ko lagta hai ye thode series hai Blog ko le kar to thoda faida to milta hai approve hone me. Ans Jab kisi site ko adsense ke liye apply karte hai to site fully approve hone ke 2 steps hote hai. Phela Adsense ke liye apply kare fir jab approve ka email aa jata hai to hame ads code bana kar site me lagana hota hai. Fir Adsense ki team site ko visit karti hai or dekhti hai site sahi hai fir automatic ads dikhne lagte hai. Ads ko dikhne me 1 mahine tak sag sakta hai ya fir ho sakta hai 10 minute me dikhne lage. usme aap ya me kuch nahi kar sakte. aap ads code laga kar apni site par dhiyan de. Ans Aap Chahe to Ads ke Code ko kar Post ke Bich me add kar sakte hai par usme bhut matha pachi hai or time bhi lagta hai. Aap Template me ads ke code add karke aasani se use kar sakte hai Ads ko har post me laga sakte hai. Blogger Post ke Bich Mein Adsense Ads kaise Lagaye kahi bhi uski jankari. Ans Iss Sabal ka jabab me phele ek post ke madiyam se de chuka hu. aap usko padhe. 1000 Visitor Per Google Adsense Se Kitni Income Hoti Hai uski Puri jankari detail me. Ans Online earning karni hai to mere hisab se Google Adsense ka jabab nahi. par aesa nahi hai aap dusre ads network bhi use kar sakte hai or Google Adsense Sabse acha hai. Google Adsense Use Karne Ke Fayde in Hindi yaha diye hue hai. Ana Aap EK Page me 332 ads laga sakte hai. Matlab 3 Ad Units, 3 Link Ads or 2 Search Ads hai. Update Adsense ne Ads ki limit hatadi hai, aap kitne bhi bhi ads ek par par use kar sakte hai, par jada use karne se loding time badega isliye jada se jada 4 ads use kare. Ans Nahi, aap nahi laga sakte. ye Google Adsense ki policy ke khilaf hai. Agar aapne aesa kiya to aapka adsense account kuch hi ghanto me block ho jayega. To aesa karne ka Soche bhi nahi. Ans Dono Ads ke Type hai jo alag alag trha se load hote hai. Chaliye dono ko dekh lete hai kaise Load hote hai. Synchronous Jese agar Site par 3 ads lage hai or jab site load ho rahi hai to tino ads ek ke baad ek load hoge. Matlab phele ek load ho jayega uske baad dusra ads load hona start hoga fir tisra load hoga. Ad1 Ad2 - -Ad3 - Asynchronous Site par 3 Asynchronous ads lage hai to site load hone par tino ads ek sath load hone lagte hai. isme aesa nahi hota ki phele ek load hoga uske baad dusra. Ad1 Ad2 Ad3 Ans Asynchronous use kare, iska faida ye hai ki sare ads ek sath load hoge to ads load hone me kam time lagega jisse site ki loading speed badegi or jo server load hota hai wo kam hoga. Ye Bhi Padhe Blog ki Loading Speed Time Ko Kaise Kam Kare Puri Jankari Ans Haa, par bhut jada nahi. Jese aapko ye to pata hi hoga ki India me low CPC wale ads hi aate hai, to agar aap Low CPC wale ads block karke USA wale High CPC Ads India ke visitor ko dikhoge to koi faida nahi hoga. To khene ka matlab aap Ads ki jo category chahe block kar sakte hai par ye pakka nahi ki usse aapki income me badotri ho. Ans Aap jo Ads ke CPC hai uspar koi control nahi kar sakte or wo kam jada hota rheta hai, par aap CTR ko control kar sakte hai. CTR Badane ke liye Ads ko alag alag jaghao par lagaye or uska Type or design wagera change karte rahe. Alag alag jagha ads laga laga kar dekhe ho sakta hai aapki site ke hisab se konsi sahi jagha hai wo pata karne me aapko mahino lag jaye par practical karte rahe. Ans Ye aesa sabal hai jiska jabab sabke pass hai ya kisi ke pass nahi hai. Q ki uski koi limit nahi hai ki kitna kama sakte hai. Jitna kaam karege, jitne jada visitor aayege utni jada income hogi. Ye aapko Jarur Padhni Chaiye Online Blogging Me Kitne Paise Kama Sakte Hai Uski Limit Ans CTR to jitna jada hoga utni ho income hogi ye to aapko pata hoga. Par agar aesa hone lage ki jitne bhi visitor site par aaye wo sab ads par click kare to adsense ko to lagega naa ki isne inse bola hoga ya ads aesi jagha lagaye hoge ki jo visitor hai wo or kahi click kar rahe hoge par ads par click ho rahe hai. to aese me adsense acount khatre me aa sakta hai. Aap Ads Legal tarike se lagaye or usme koi chedkhani naa kare to 25 CTR bhi safe hai Adsense account ke liye. Par agar aap Adsense ki policy ke khilaf ja rahe hai jab itna CTR mil raha hai to account khatre me aa sakta hai. Ans Jab koi Site Block hoti hai to usko wapas unloack karna naa mumkin ke wara war hai, Fir bhi aap Appeal kar sakte hai. Appeal karne se phele aapki site q disable hui hai uska karan jaan kar usko jarur tikh kar le. Adsense ki Puri Polices ko follow kare phele. Ans Haa aap kar sakte hai. Agar aap ek website par ek se jada account use kar rahe hai to aapko use karne se phele ek war adsense ki Policy puri jarur pad leni chaiye, q ki agar aap war war site par adsense ke account badlege to ho sakta hai aapke account block ho jaye. Ans Haa, aap bilkul use kar sakte hai usme koi problem nahi hai. Yaha Padhe Infolinks Kya hai Uski Puri Jaankari Hindi Me Ans 100$ hona chaiye jab hi Payment milti hai. usse kam nahi. Ans Iska koi Time limit nahi hai, ho sakta hai 30 minute me account block ho jaye ya fir 1 hafta bhi lag sakta hai. To Adsense ki Policy ka palan jarur kare. Ans Haa Bilkul. EK adsense account ko aap kitni bhi website ya blog par use kar sakte hai uski koi limit nahi hai. Yaha dhiyan dene wali baat ye hai ki aap jitni bhi website ya Blog par adsense use kare unme se ek bhi aesi website nahi honi chaiye jo adsense ki policy ka palan naa karti ho, nahi to aapka adsense account block ho sakta hai. Ans Isme koi Trick nahi hai. Aap Ads alag alag tri kare, Alag alag ads unit tri kare, low CPC wale ads block karde. par aapke hath me aesa kuch nahi hai ki aap conform khe sake ki ab CPC bad jayega. Ans Adsense har mahine ki 21 tarikh ko Payment send karta hai, or uske 2-3 waorking day me wo paise hamari bank account me aa jate hai. kabhi kabhi aesa ho jata hai ki agar kisi adsense account me koi gadwad najar aati hai to payment ko hold par dal dete hai par account ko check karne ke waad payment send kar di jati hai. to koi bhi farji tarike se paise kamane ka soch rahe hai adsense se to sochna band karde. Agar Adsense se Payment sent ho chuki hai or abhi tak aapke account me nahi aai to aap apni bank se contact kare. Ans Adsense Account ko Verify karne ke liye hamare diye hue Address par ek PIN aata hai wo hame account me dalna hota hai. Jo PIN hai wo Adsense Account me $10 hone ke baad bheja jata hai. Yaha ek baat ka jarur dhiyan rakhe apna Address bilkul sahi dale. Ans Adsense Account ko Verify karne ke liye jo PIN bheji gai hai agar wo aapko 15 din tak nahi mile to aap Duwara PIN send kar sakte hai Adsense acount me se. 3 war PIN bheje jane ke baad bhi agar PIN hamare diye address par nahi aati to Document Upload karke bhi Address Verify kara ja sakte hai. Document se Verify karne ka option 3 war PIN bhene ke baad aata hai. Ans Agar aap Adsense use karte hai to aapne dekha hoga ki jo BlogWebsite ke Page VIews hote hai wo Adsense ke Views se alag hote hai uska karan hai ki aapne ads kaha lagaya hai or ad load hua ki nahi. Jese agar koi visitor aaya or aapne ads site me niche laga rakha hai or wo visitor niche gaya hi nahi to us ads ka view count nahi hoga. Ans Nahi, Bana sakta. Par haa Aap bana bhi sakte hai par wo ek hi persaon ke 2 account nahi rahege. aap aesa kar sakte hai ki ek apne naam se or ek apni family member ke naam se adsense account bana sakte hai. Ans Haa kar sakte hai, aap kisi bhi dusre ads ke sath adsense ads use kar sakte hai. Was aapko ye dhiyan rakhna hai ki jo ads aapne lagaye hai wo opoup ads naa ho or adsense ke ads se thodi dur ho. Ans Haa Bilkul, Blogger Google ka bhi hai or Adsense bhi. or aapne dekha hoga Blogger ke Deshboard me Adsense ka option aata hai. Aap Bina Domain add kiye bhi Blogger me Adsense use kar sakte hai. Ans Google ki jitni Service hai, jese Blogger, Youtube agar aap inse Adsense ke liye apply karte hai to jo account hoga wo Hosted account hoga. Matlab jo Ads aap use kar rahe hai wo unpar use kar rahe hai jo Google ke hi hai. Par agar aapki koi Site hai or aapko uspar ads use karna hai to aapko non-hosted account chaiye. Ans Ye Adsense ke Ads ka hi ek Type hai jo sirf Mobile par dikhte hai. Isme Website me Niche ek ads dikhta hai or kabhi kabhi agar website ki koi link open karte hai to bichme ek ads aata hai. Ans Estimated Earnings Ye wo earning hoti hai jo Daily, Din ki or 30 Din ki earning hoti hai. Ye jo earning hai usko ham fix nahi maan sakte hai kitne hi milege. Finalized Earnings Ye wo earning hai jo aapki hui hai, ye har mahine ke last me add hoti hai. Jo aapki estimated earning hai agar usme kuch earning aesi hui hai jo fake click ya aesa kuch bhi to wo hata di jati hai. jo Finalized Earning hoti hai wo hi milti hai. Ans Agar aap Youtube Adsense se Pause Kamate hai to aapne dekha hoga ki jo Youtube ki earning hai wo daily add nahi hoti. Wo har mahine ki 15 tarikh ko Adsense account me add hoti hai. Ans Nahi, Nahiiiii Agar aap Click karege ya kisi se khe kar bhi click karwayege to aap apne adsense account ko khatre me dal rahe hai. Ans Adsense Approve kaise kare, uski jankari aapko yaha milegi. jisme bataya hai aapko kya steps follow karni hai jo aapka adsense account jaldi approve ho jaye. Ans Adsense Term and Condition in hindi, aapko yaha milegi. Ans Google Ads Policy bhut hi Strick hai, jo aapko pata hona chaiye. Adsense Ads Policy in Hindi yaha hai. Ans Haa, aap Youtube Channel or Website ko ek hi adsense se connect kar sakte hai, or agar aap alag alag adsense account banayege to aapke account block bhi ho sakte hai, isliye ek hi adsense account banaye or jitni bhi youtube channel or website ho ek hi adsense account me connect kare. Ans Invalid Click ka matlab, farji ya galti se huee, or inse bachne ka tarika hai ads aesi jagha naa lagaye jaye jaha click kisi or par kar rahe ho or ads par click ho rahe ho or khud kabhi ads par click naa kare or naa kisi ko click karne ke liye kahe. Google usko track kar leta hai. Invalid Click ki Report kaise kare Google ko uski jankari yaha hai. Ans Yes, PTC yani Pay to Click. ye aesi website hoti hai jo middle men ka kaam karti hai. matlab user ko advertiser tak phuchane ka. par isme aesa kuch nahi hai ki Adsense use nahi kar sakte. wo bhi sath me dusre ads network ke use kar sakte hai. Ans Nahi, Lazy Load ka matlab hai jab uss content ki jarurat ho jab wo load ho. aese me agar ham Adsense ads lazy load use karte hai to jab bhi user scroll karke ads ki jagha par aayege ad load ho jayege. to isse earning par koi aasar nahi padta. website ki loading me jarur faida hota hai. Ans Google Adsnes eteam se contact karne ke 3 mail tarike hai Ans Agar aapne ya kisi or ne aapke account me kuch bhi aesa kiya jo Google allow nahi karta to aapka account hamesa ke liye delete bhi ho sakta hai. ab agar account delete ho chuka hai or aapne nahi kiya to kaise Google se Appeal kare uski jankari yaha hai. At Last Dosto ummid hai aapko bhut se sabalo ke jabab mil gaye hoge, Fir bhi agar aapka koi Sabal hai Adsense se Sambandit koi bhi to aap Comment me jarur puche. Aapke Sabal ka jabab jarur diya jayega or usko Post me List bhi kiya jayega taki or logo ki Help ho sake. Aapko Ye Jankari kesi lagi Comment me wo batana naa bhule. Agar aapko kisi sabal ka galat jabab lag raha ho to wo bhi jarur bataye. Page ko CtrlD dave kar Bookmark kar lijiye, Future me aapka koi bhi sabal hua to uska jabab yaha mil jayega Thanks

Hello Blogger jese ki aap jante hi hoge mene blogger ki bhut si jankari share ki hai HMH.pe jo aap www.HMH.peBlogger par dekh sakte ho. Blogger par blog banane ke baad ham uspe badiya post dalte hai or hamara maksad hot ahai ki jada se jada log hamare blog ko chalaye. Hamare blog ka Design bhut hi mhatpun Hissa hai kisi visitor ko apne blog par banaye rakhne me. BLog ka Design Responsive hona chaiye or usme jaru widget bhi add hona chaiye. Agar koi Visitor hamare blog par aaye or usko jo bhi post padna ho wopad sake uski pasand ki uske liye Labels use kare, Search Box use kare, Popupar, Recent Post widget bhi use kare. Ham Blog me bhale kitni hi badiya post likh kar dalde, par uska navigation aesa hona chaiye ki koi bhi usko aasani se chala sake or apne kaam ki post pad sake. PadeBadiya Post likhne ke 5 tarike jese ki aapko pata hi hoga post ki koi limit nahi hai ham kisi bhi post publish kar sakte hai, par agar kisi ko hamare blog ki koi purani post padni ho to usko usko piche ke page me jane ke liye ham Number Page Navogation add karke usko aasan kar sakte hai. Number Page Navigation ki madad se hamare blog ki post ke page ki list aajati hai, par agar ham isko use nahi karte to purani post ko padne ke liye ek-ek page piche jana hoga jo ek sahi upai nahi hai. TO Chaliye Dekhte hai kaise Number Page Navigation ko add kare apne blog me. alert-announceye jo Number Page Navigation Widget hai ye ho sakta hai aapke blog me add ho agar aapne koi Custom Template use kiya hai apne blog me. Agar aap blogger ke basic template use karte hai to aap isko add ka.alert-announce Is Widget ko apne blog me add karne ke liye hame 2 chije add karni hai Note Code ko apne Template me add karne ke phele apne template ka Backup jarur lele, agar kahi koi galti ho jati hai to aap pir se apna purana template use kar sakte hai. CSS Code kaise add karte hai blog me uske bare me phele hi bata chuka hu. jaanne ke liye pade 3 taike CSS Code blogger me add karne ke. abhi me short me bata deta hu Blogger Deshboard Template Edit Template ab CSS Code ko bskin ke upar dale. Aapko jis style me apne blog me Navigation widget add karna hai uska code copy kare. Is Script ko Template me hi add karna hai, to Template ko editor me kholne ke baad CtrlF daba kar body search kare template me. ab Code ke upar is code ko daal kar save kare bif cond datablog.pageType ! quotitemquot bif cond datablog.pageType ! quotstaticpagequot script type textjavascript !CDATA var perPage7 var numPages6 var firstText First var lastText Last var prevText Previous var nextText Next var urlactivepagelocation.href var homepage script script src httpshindimehelp.comtoolsWidgetCodespage-navigation.js bif bif Is Code ko template me dalne ke baad template save karde. Aap Chahe to is code ko edit karke apne hisab se set kar sakte hai. Jo Script ka code hai usme ye code bhi hai perPage 7, numPages 6, var firstText First var lastText Last var prevText Previous var nextText Next is trha aap is widget ko apne hisab se bhi set kar sakte hai, agar isme kahi koi dikkat aati hai to comment karke aap bata sakte hai. Ab hamare blog par agar koi aayega to wo number navigation ki madad se aasani se hamare blog ko use kar sakega. Ye Bhi Pade Blogspot ki Security badaye HTTPS se Agar koi labels par click karke hamare blog ki post dekh raha hai to ek page par 20 post dikhegi, usko set karne ke liye ye code add kare apne template me. Sabse Phele apne template me ye code search kare exprhref datalabel.url ab is code ki jagha niche ka code dale

Agar baat ki jaye Google plus ki toh beshak yeh ek behtareen platform hai apne websiteblog ko promote karne aur jyada se jyada traffic ko apne blogwebsite par lane ke liye kyuki Google Plus par ab Ek Arab se jyada log register kar chuke hai aur sath hi yaha par lagbhag 360 lakh se zyada users har samay active rehte hai. Ha ho sakta hai ki Google Plus aapko facebook aur twitter ke mukable utna na bhi pasand aye par sach maane toh Search Engine par achi ranking Google plus par hi nirbhar karti hai. Aap chahe toh thodi si mehnat kar ke kam samay me hi hazar se zyada relevant followers paa sakte hai aur iske liye zaroorat hai toh bas kuch steps follow karne ki. Aap mere instructions ko follow kare aur agle hi week se aapke 500 ya usse bhi jyada followers zaroor ho jayenge. Ji haan yeh bahut jaruri hai ki aapki profile look me behtareen aur interesting ho jise ki audience khud hi follow karna chahe. Agar aap apni hi picture profile aur cover par lagana chahte hai to woh photos bhi high resolution mein hi upload kare aur un pictures me brightness bhi achi honi chahiye. Saath hi aapko apni story aur ek tagline add karne ka option ayega toh isme bhi kuch interesting words ko add kar ke aap apni profile ko ek alag pehchaan de sakte hai. Agar aapko khud ko follow karwana hai toh aapko dusro ko bhi follow karna padega. Yeh jaanna behad zaroori hai ki kis tarah ka circle banaane se aapke blog ko profit hoga. Google Plus me ek option hai category ka. Sahi category select karne ke baad aapko usi se related sare people aur pages ka suggestion milega apne circle me add karne ka. Jaise ki agar ap Google Plus ke search box me Technology search karte hai toh technology par based pages aur people sabhi list wise show ho jayenge aur aap asani se unhe add kar sakte hai. Jab aap logo ko follow karte hai toh ek single person ke saamne aap ka introduction hota hai par jab aap kisi community me apna participation show karte hai toh aap hazaro lakho logo ke samne apna naam laate hai aur apna introduction karate hai. Kisi community ko join karte hi aap ek bade group ke part ban jate hai jaha par log kisi unique topic par apni alag alag thinking present karte hai ,toh mere hisaab se ye ek nayab tarika hoga apne followers ko increase karne ka. Jitna jyada aap apne profile par active rahenge utne jyada people aapko follow karenge. Aapko roz hi kuch na kuch interesting post karna hoga. Aap apne profile ko ek small blog ki tarah samjhe aur uspar regular post kare par ye dhyan me rakhe ki agar aapka post chota bhi ho phir bhi woh jaankaari se bhara hua ho aur padhne me bahut hi simple words me ho. Aap chahe toh post me text ke alawa videos, photos, infographics bhi apne audience ke saath share kar sakte hai. Ji haan aapne ekdum sahi suna, aap apne updates aur latest informations ko email ke jariye apne kareebi doston, family members tak pahucha sakte hai. Kabhi kabhi aisa hota hai ki google plus par aapka content show nahi hota toh aap is technique se bhi apna content ko popular kar sakte hai. Jaisa ki hum jante hai ki blog or website pure internet par faile hue hai aur hazaro log in par aate rahte hai toh agar aap Google Plus badge ko apne blog par share karenge toh aapke blog visitors bhi aapko follow zaroor karenge. Yeh Bahut hi basic baat hai jo ki maine bataya hai. Badges ek asaan tarika hai apne followers number ko aur jyada badhane ki. Jo log aapke post par comment kare unko reply de, influent logo ko apne post me jarur mention kare saath hi dusro ke post par bhi like, comment aur share zaroor kare. Apne readers ke saath ek acha relationship banana bahut important hai. Google Plus par success paana utna mushkil bhi nahi hai jitna ki yeh lagta hai aapke kuch weeks ki mehnat hi aapko ek acha connection provide karwa sakti hai, Toh bas shuru kar dijie mehnat aur haan maine apni taraf se saare important points include kar diye hai agar aapke paas bhi koi acha point ho toh use humare sath zaroor share kare. Ye Bhi Pade

Aaj ki date me har insan ke pass Mobile hai or 60 to aese hai jinke pass Double Mobile bhi hai. Technology jese jese badti ja rahi hai hamare kaam aasan to ho rahe hai par uske sath sath jo risk hai wo bhi bad raha hai, aesa hi ek risk hai aapka Mobile Number Hack hone ka. Security ko jitna update rakha jaye utna hi hamare liye acha rheta hai, or aap ye to jante hi hoge, Security ko double karne ke liye Banks, GMail, Facebook ya koi or service ho, OTP ka use karte hai. OTP ke jariye hamare Mobile Number par ek code aata hai, jisko dalne par hamara account verify hota hai, uske baad open hota hai. dekha jaye to, hamare Mobile par jo OTP aaya hai wo kisi ko naa mile to wo hamara account access nahi kar payege, bhale wo password gase kar bhi le. Par iska ulta, agar unko hamare Mobile number par aaye OTP mil jaye to wo hamare kisi bhi account ko Hack kar sakte hai badi aasani se. To ab aap ye to samaj gaye hoge, ki agar aapka Mobile Number Hack huaa. or kisi ko aapke Number par aaye OTP mil jaye to wo aapke kisi bhi account ko hack kar sakte hai. OTP Hack kaise ho sakta hai uske ware me bhi jaan lete hai. OTP Hack ka matlab jo Verification ke liye SMS me code aaye wo kisi ko pata chal jaye. iske hack hone ke tarike hai Aapka Mobile kisi ko mil jaye, or wo usko open karke aasani se SMS me code dekh sakte hai, isse bachne ke liye aapko apna mobile kisi ko nahi dena hai or Mobile me Password laga kar rakhe. Agar koi aapke Mobile me SPY App install karde, uske baad bhi wo aapke message dekh sakte hai, isse bachne ke liye kisi ko apna Phone naa de or hamesa Password laga kar rakhe. Agar aapne Mobile me Password laga rakha hai or aap apna Phone kisi ko dete bhi nahi hai. Fir bhi ho sakta hai kabhi aap kahi phone ko rakhe, ya aapka Phone Chori ho jaye. to wo aapke SIM ko dusre Mobile me laga kar OTP message dekh sakte hai. khene ka Matlab agar aapko apna OTP Hack hone se bachana hai to aapko Mobile ke sath sath SIM lock bhi karna hoga jo aap SIM PIN ki madad se kar sakte hai. SIM PIN Mobile SIM ki PIN hoti hai jo Mobile k pin se alag hoti hai, agar SIM ko kisi bhi mobile me lagaye ya same Phone ko restart kiya jaye to SIM ko unlock karne ke liye SIN PIN dalni padti hai. SIN PIN se hamare number ki security badh jati hai, q ki koi bhi fir bina SIM PIN ke hamara number use nahi kar sakte. SIM PIN set karne ki simple process hai, iske liye aapko apne Mobile ki setting me jakar Security and PIN setting me jana hoga. Aapka Mobile konsi company ka hai, uspar depend karta hai ye setting aapke mobile me kaha hogi. aap dekhe, nahi to direct apne mobile ke name se sath SIM PIN likh kar search kare to uski setting kaha hai aapko pata chal jayega. Ab aapko phele wali PIN Dalni hogi, agar aapne abhi tak koi PIN nahi dali hai to default PIN 0000 ya 1234 hoti hai wo dale. Aap apni Company ka SIM PIN dale, uske baad aapki SIM par Lock on ho jayega. SIM PIN enable karne ke baad aap unki PIN ko change kar sakte hai, uska option aapko SIN PIN enable karne ke niche hi milega, waha aapko apni Old PIN or 2 time New PIN dalni hai. Agar SIN PIN set hai, to jitni war bhi Mobile on hoga jis mobile me wo SIM lagi hai, 4 digit SIM PIN magi jayegi, uske baad hi Mobile on hoga or Mobile me network aayega. Important Note jo SIM PIN hai wo agar 3 war galat dali jaye to SIN Lock ho jati hai. Agar 3 war galat SIM PIN Dalne ke karan SIM Lock hogai hai to uske baad PUK Number maga jayega, to agar aapko apni SIN ka PUK Number janna hai to aap costumer care call kare dusre number se uske baad apni detail bata kar verify kare, fir aapko PUK number mil jayega SMS ke jariye. Agar PUK Number 10 war galat dala gaya to uske baad SIM permanently block ho jayegi, or fir agar aapko wahi number chaiye to aapko same document se ussi number ki SIM leni hogi. To ab aap jaan chuke hai kaise aap apni SIM ki Security bada sakte hai, Agar aapki SIM ki security aapne set nahi ki hai to aapke jitne bhi account hai wo hack ho sakte hai. Janiye kaise Whatsapp Hack hota hai, Facebook Hack hota hai, GMail Hack hack hota hai. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi ya isse sambandit koi sabal ho to aap comment me puch sakte hai.

Hello friends, in dino internet par Facebook ki service Free Basics ko lekar bahut charchaye ho rahi hai. Aap logon ko bhi facebook par is baare me notification mili hogi ki aap bhi Free Basics se judi apni rai TRAI Telecom Regulatory Authority of India ke pass bhejen. Jo log nahi jante ki Free Basics kya hai unhen main is post ke jariye puri jankari dene ki koshish karunga ki aakhir free basics hai kya, aapko ise support karna chahiye ya nahi, iske piche motive kya hai aadi sabhi chijon ke baare me main aapko btaane ki koshish karunga. To aaiye sabse pehle jante hai ki Free basics hai kya. Karib ek saal pehle Facebook ne Internet.org naam se ek service shuru ki thi jiske piche unka maksad ye tha ki internet ki pahunch duniya me har ek vyakti ke pass pahunchai jayen. Free Basics bhi Internet.org ke antergat hi ek programme hai joki india me shuru kiya gya hai. Facebook ne India me Free Basics india ki hi ek telecom company Reliance ke sath milkar shuru kiya hai. Free Basics ek App hai jiske dwara users internet ki kuch basic services jaise ki Wikipedia, Weather reports, News Updates aadi free me use kar sakta hai. Yahi nahi Free Basics ke dwara user Facebook ko bhi free me yani ki bina kisi data charge ke use kar sakta hai. Lekin ye abhi kewal Reliance ki SIM card par hi available hai. ab bahut saare log soch rahe honge ki Free Basics to un logo ke liye bahut hi labhdayak hai joki internet ka kharch nahi utha sakte aur unhen iske dwara free me internet uplabdh ho jayega. lekin main aapko bata dun ki Facebook ka ye programme Net Nutrility ke khilaaf hai. Net Nutrility ke khilaaf isliye kyonki Free basics ka use karke log kewal kuch hi websites ko free me use kar sakte hai jabki dusri sites ko open karne ke liye unhen bhugtaan karna padega joki sidha sidha net nutrility ke khilaaf hai. Net Nutility ke baare me aur adhik jankari ke liye ye post padhen. Ab aapke dimaag me ye bhi aaya hoga ki free internet dene se Facebook ko kya fayda hoga. to main aapko bta dun ki Facebook ko isse bahut hi bda profit hone wala hai. Darasal Facebook ka ye free basics sachmuch me free nahi hai. Aap niche diye gaye screenshot me saaf dekh sakte hai ki Facebook par photos v articles dekhne ke liye ve aapko reliance se data pack kharidne ke liye keh rahe hai. Ab aap hi btaiye ki kya ye sachmuch me free hai? Facebook, Reliance aur ve companies jo ki free basics me invest kar rahi hai un sabhi ko bahut bda profit hoga agar aap Free basics ko support karenge to. Sabse pehle dekhiye Free basics chalane ke liye aapko ek reliance ki sim ki jarurat padegi. Iske liye aap reliance ki SIM kharidenge to isse sidha sidha fayda kiska hoga? Of course reliance ka hoga. Aur fir jab aap Facebook jyada chalayenge to fayda kiska hoga? Facebook ka. jo aur sites free basics par free me chalengi unka bhi aise hi fayada hoga unki sites jyada chalengi to sidha sidha unka profit hai. Free Basics aur kuch nahi ye to ek tarika hai internet par kabja karne ka joki Facebook dwara chalaya jar ha hai. Jo users Free basics chalayenge unki saari private information Facebook ke hawale ho jayegi. Main Facebook Free Basics ke motive ko ek udahran ke dwara aapko samjhata hu. Maan lijiye koi aapko car chalane ke liye free me petrol deta hai lekin vah decide karta hai ki aap car kewal do hi directions me chla sakte hai. To ab aap hi btaiye agar aapko kisi aur direction me jana hai to aap kya karenge, aap apna hi petrol kharidenge. Hai na? Yahi khel Facebook khel rha hai. Veh free basics ke dwara kewal kuch hi services free me provide kar rha hai aur jab user kisi aur service ko bhi use karna chahte hai to iske liye use bhugtaan karna padega. To doston ab aap hi btaiye ismen free kya hua? Facebook free basics ke users ko vahi services dega joki veh chahta hai. Isse internet par lagbhag lagbhag Facebook ka hi adhikar ho jayega. Joki sarasar galat hai. Shayad ab to aap samajh hi gaye honge ki Free basics aapke liye faydemand hai ya nahi. Ye to free internet ka bas ek sapna bhar hai. Jo dikhne me to free lag rha hai lekin vastav me aisa hai nahi. Isliye main to aapko yahi kahunga ki aap free basics ko support n Karen. Free Basics ko support n karne ke liye kya Karen? Aapko facebook par kai baar notification bhi mila hoga ki aap bhi free basics se judi apni rai TRAI Telecom Regulatory Authority of India ke pass bheje. To sabse pehle main aapko bta du ki jab aap us par click karenge to Facebook TRAI ke pass automatic ek email bhej dega joki kuch is prkar hai To the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India, I support digital equality for India. Free Basics provides free access to essential internet services like communication, education, healthcare, employment, farming and more. It helps those who can t afford to pay for data, or who need a little help getting started online. And it s open to all people, developers and mobile operators. With one billion Indian people not yet connected, shutting down Free Basics would hurt our country s most vulnerable people. I support Free Basics and digital equality for India. Thank you. In hindi translation To the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India, main india me digital equality ko support karta hu. Free Basics jaruri internet services jaise communication, education, healthcare, employment, farming, aadi tak hare k vyakti ki free me pahunch bnata hai. Yeh un logo ki madad karta hai joki internet ke kharch ko afford nahi kar sakte aur jinhe internet chalana shuru karne ke liye thodi help ki jarurat hai. Aur yeh sabhi logo, developers, aur mobile operators ke liye khula hai. Free Basics ko band karna un ek billion logo ke liye bahut hi dukhad hoga joki abhi tak internet se nahi jude hai. Main free basics aur india me digital equality ko support karta hu. Thank you. To doston agar aap free basics ko support nahi karna chahte to please aisi kisi bhi notification par click n karen. Aapke ek button par click karte hi TRAI ke pass ek email send ho jata hai jismen btaya gya hota ki aap free basics ko support karte hai. Isliye aisi kisi bhi notification par click n Karen. SAVE THE INTERNET! AIB Video on save the internet Abhishek mishra s video on free basics Ab aapke kya bichar hai Free Basic par wo bataye, ho sakta ho aap free basic ko support kar rahe ho or aapke pass usko support karne ke koi acha karan ho. Is Jankari ko jada se jada logo ko share kare taki hamara aane wala Internet ka Future acha ho. Thanks. Ye Bhi Pade

Google Adsense, Matlab Internet se Paise kamane ka sanse aasan tarika. Q ki isse paise kamane ke liye wass hamare pass website ya Youtube channal honi chaiye jispar ham ads dikha kar paise kama sakte hai. Agar aap Adsense use karte hai to aap iss baat se jarur pareshan hoge ki Invalid Click farji click se kaise apne account ko bacha ya kya kare jisse hamara Google Adsense account suspended Disable hone se bacha sake. Google Adsense use karne ke faide janna chate hai to yaha read kar sakte hai. Iss Post me Inn Topics ke ware me bataya hai Invalid Click yani farji click jo adsense ke ads par ho wo hote hai. or Google kisi bhi Invalid click ko aasani se samaj jata hai. or agar limit se jada invalid click aaye to wo adsense account suspended ya hamesa ke liye Disable bhi ho sakta hai. Google ka simple sa formula hai, jitne bhi ads par click ho. agar wo koi aesa person karega jiska usme interest hoga to wo valid click mana jayega. par agar kisi ad par galti se click ho to koi bhi ad ko open karne ke baad usko turant close kar deta hai or wo invalid click mana jata hai. iske sath sath bhut sa data Google Track karta hai, sabhi user ka jisse or detail me unko pata chal jata hai ki konsa click valid hai or konsa nahi. Matlab sabse pheli baat, agar aapko Adsense use karna hai to aapko to galti se bhi click nahi karna hai or naa kisi visitor ya apne friends ko khe kar click karana hai. q ki agar koi aesa karege bhale wo ads ko thodi der open karke rakhe, fir bhi google samaj jayega ki iss person ka isme interest nahi tha fir bhi ye ads par q click kar raha hai. To agar aap kuch bhi aesa karte hai jisse ads par click ho bina user ke interest ke to abhi band karde, nahi to aapka adsense account risk me aa sakta hai. Ham Invalid Click ki baat kar rahe hai to ye sabal bhi aapke mind me jarur aayega ki kitne percent CTR safe hai ki wo Invalid click naa khelaye. To iska Me aapko phele hi bata du koi fix answer nahi hai, jo Google ne diya ho. Par agar sahi tarike se click aaye, or aapne ads ko sahi jagha sahi tarike se lagaye hai. or aapki targeted visitor hai to 10 CTR bhi normal hai, agar user unke interest se click kar rahe hai. mene apne kuch friends ko dekha unka 25 CTR tak bhi gaya, par unhone kuch bhi gadbad nahi ki thi to unka account utne CTR me bhi safe thaa. Matlab wass fake Click naa aaye, CTR kitne bhi ho usse koi dikkat nahi hai. Agar aapko Apne Google Adsense acount ko invalid click se bachana hai to uski jimmedari aapko hi leni padegi, Agar aap jaan bhuj kar kuch aesa nahi karte jisse invalid click aaye, fir bhi maan lo aapke account me kahi se invalid click aa jaye to unki jimmedari bhi aapki hogi. Google Apne Advertiser ka nuksan kabhi nahi hone deta, isliye agar aapko kabhi bhi aesa lage ki aapke account me invalid activity hui hai, or invalid clicks aaye hai to aap Turant Google ko iski information de, jisse phele ki wo aapke account ko ban kare. Agar aapka CTR jitna daily normal rheta hai, usse jada achanak bade, to aap dekhe ki traffic same hai par click bhut jada aa rahe hai to aap Turant Google Adsense Invalid Clicks Contact Form Fill kare. Me aapko suggest karuga, agar aap Adsense use karte hai to ek war Adsense Term and Conditions or Policy jarur read kare sahi se. Mene Hindi me Share ki hai aap yaha se bhi read kar sakte hai Agar aapko lagta hai ki aapke account me kahi se kuch fake traffic ya fake click aaye hai jo normal se jada hai to aap iss form ko fill kare. Step 1 Sabse phele Adsebse Invalid Clicks Contact Form ko open kare. Invalid Clicks Contact Form Step 2 Form ko Fill kare. Form Fill karne ke baad aap thodi chan ki saas le sakte hai, q ki agar kuch galat hua hai or aapne nahi kiya, to Google Adsense Team ab usko dekh legi. Yaha aap ek baad dhiyan rakhe, according to Adsense Team, form fill karne ke baad wo hamse sirf jab hi contact karti hai, jab hamne jo form fill kiya ho usse related koi update ho. agar aesa kuch nahi hai to hame koi mail nahi aayega adsense se. Lekin agar aap ye form fill karte hai, isse Adsense hamare account ko thoda seriously leti hai, ki inhone report bhi ki thi ki kuch gadwad hui hai uski. to wo hamare account ko suspend nahi karte. Agar hamare account par pheli war invalid Click Activity hoti hai to adsense account 30 din ke liye suspended hota hai, jisme ham naa to adsense ko use kar pate hai or naa usme earning hoti hai. or ye hamare liye first n Last warning hoti hai ki agar ab double se aesa hua to Adsense account ko hamesa ke liye Disabledelete kar diya jayega. Agar aapke Adsense Account par Invalid Click Activity ho chuki hai, or aapne der kardi Adsense team ko inform karne me, jiske karan aapka adsense account 30 din ke liye suspended nahi, hamesa ke liye disable ho chuka hai to aapko Invalid Activity Appeal form fill karna hoga. Agar account par invalid activity ke karan action liya ja chuka hai to aapko ye form fill karna hoga. Step 1 Invalid Activity Appeal form kar paye. Invalid Activity Appeal Step 2 ab aapke samen kuch option aayege, unse me aapko aapki kya condition hai wo select karna hai. Ye sab option select karne ke baad aapko niche ek Appeal Form ki link milegi, uspar click karna hai. Step 3 Ab aapko jo form samne aaya hai wo Fill karna hai. usko Fill karne se phele kuch bate hai jo aapko dhiyan rakhna hai. To agar aap upar ke points ko read kar chuke hai, or uske baad aapko lagta hai ki haa muej yahi form fill karna hai q ki aapka adsense account disable hai. to niche ke steps dekhe. Note Aapko ye Form English me Fill karna hai, agar aapko English nahi aati hai to aap kisi person se fill karaye jinko achi se english aati ho, nahi to agar aapne isme kuch galti ki to aapki application reject kardi jayegi. Ab aapke Mail par ek Mail bhi aa jayega ki aapne invalid activity appeal submit ki hai. iske baad aapka adsense account review kiya jayega. isme 48-72 ghante tak lag sakte hai ya isse jada bhi. or review ke baad agar aapne jo karan bataye uske baad laga ki account activate kiya jaye jab hi activate hoga. To ab aap samaj chuke hai, or jaan chuke hai ki kaise Google Adsense Account par Invalic activity hoti hai or kaise usse bacha jaye or agar account suspend ho ya dsable ho to kaha se appeal kare or kaise Form ko Fill karn hai. Agar aapko meri batai jankari me kahi bhi kuch doubt hai to aap comment karke jarur puche or jankari kesi lagi wo bhi jarur bataye. or apne Adsense Account ko Safe rakhe Bonus Tips

Internet ek bhut badiya jagha hai kuch bhi naya sikhne ke liye. Agar aapko koi bhi jaankari chaiye to aap internet par search karke uski puri jaankari paa sakte ho. India ki ek Company hai Idea Cellular jo India me Mobile service deti hai or ye Aditya Birla Group ki hai. Ye company logo ko Apne ek TV Ads ki madad se logo ko bata rahi hai ki bo kaise Internet kuchbhi sikh sakte hai or kuch bhi kar sakte. Bo IIN ke madiyam se logo ko bata rahe hai ki koi bhi IIN par kuch bhi sikh sakta hai. IIN Idea Internet Nework, idea ka banaya huaa ek concept hai. or ye December 2014 me launched kiya tha. Isme TV par ads ki madad se logo ko bataya jata hai ki bo kaise apni chuti padai, ya fir apne sapno ko kaise IIN se join karke pura kar sakte ho. IIN ka matlab sirf Internet hai. IIN ka pura matlab hai Idea Internet Network. Bo apni company ka advertisement TV par kar rahe hai isliye unhone apni compay ke naam internet ke sath jod kar IIN kar diya. ek ads me dikhay gaya ki ek ladke ka IIT me admission nahi huaa to bo IIN par sikh kar ek dron banata hai. IIN Idea Internet Network sirf ek natak hai jo Idea Cellular ne banaya hai apne business ke liye. jisme bo dikhate hai kaise log Hotel Management, Dance, Videsi bhasa, or apni chuti padai ko pura kar sakte hai. par iska simple matlab hai aap Internet se kuch bhi sikh sakte ho. Idea Cellular ke ye kuch ads jo TV par dikaye jate hai IIN ke upar In sabhi ads me dikhaya gaya hai ki log kaise IIN yani Intenet ki madad se apne sapno ko kaise pure kar sakte hai. Par ek baat me aapko bata du ye sirf ek concept hai. Bhut logo ka sabaal hota hai ki kya IIN se degree milti hai to us ka answer hai nahi. Aap internet se kuch bhi sikh sakte ho par uski aapko koi degree nahi milegi. IIN ka fullform hai Idea Internet Network matlab Idea apne inernet ka advertise kar rahi hai ki aap apne mobile par Idea ki SIM me net dalba kar kuch bhi sikh sakte ho. par ye jaruri nahi ki aapke pass Idea ki sim ho aap koi bhi sim par net chala sakte ho. Agar Aap Internet ke baare me Sikhna Chate ho to aap HMH.pe sikh sakte ho. HMH ka matlab hai Hindi Me Help, Aap HMH par Internet se related sari jaankari Hindi me pa sakte ho. HMH par aap sikh sakte ho

Hello dosto, Mera naam Govind Swami hai, me HinglishTech.In ka founder hun aur ye ek guest post hai. Kisi bhi baat ko apne social circle ke bich share karne ka sabse aasan jariya hai twitter. Read Twitter par account kaise banaye. Twitter ki sabse badi khubi yahi hai ki yah micro blog ki sheli me kaam karti hai, kahne ka matlab isme 140 character me hi apni baat likhni hoti hai. Kai baar aisa hota hai ki hum apni baat 140 character me poora nahi kar pate, aise me ya to hume apni baat bahut had tak choti likhni padti hai ya fir alag se tweet likhne ki jarurat padti hai. Kuch web tool aise bhi hai jinki madad se hum lambe tweet bhi kar sakte hai, me aapko ek aise hi tool ke baare me batane ja rha hun jiska naam hai TallTweets. Iske liye aap www.talltweets.com par jaiye, is site par jane par aapko twitter par sign in ke liye kaha jayega. Jaise hi aap sign in karne ke liye Sign in with Twitter ki button par click kare. Ab ek New Page Khulega, Jisme hame apna Twitter ka Username or password daal kar TallTweets ko allow karna padega. ab bapas Tall Tweets ki site par aa jayege. ab ham apni lambhi Tweet Type kar sakte hai. Is Trha aap 140 character se lambe tweet kar payenge. Actually yah web tool ek khas tarike se kaam karta hai, ye lambi tweets ko 140 character me vibhajit kar publish karta hai. ya fir uski Photo le kar usko publish karta hai. Reddit se Traffic kaise Badane or High Quality Backlink kaise banaye apne blog ke liye uske ware me ham iss article me janne wale hai, Ummid hai agar aapki website hai to isse aapko bhut help milegi. Is Article men Men Aap ko Batane Ja Raha hun ke Reddit Kya Hai aur Hum Apne Hindi Blog men Reddit se Traffic Kaise Le Sakte Hen. Dosto Reddit ek Social Media Site Hai Jahan Pe Log Youtube Videos, Images, Text Posts aur Web Posts Share Karte Hen Zyada Tar English Websites Apne Saare Posts Yahan pe Share Kar ke Buhat Zyada Traffic Receive Karti Hen. Reddit ko zyada tar English he Use Karte hen Lekin Kuch Waqt se Reddit Per Hindi Users ki tadad Increase Hone Lagi Hai aur Log Hindi SubReddits bhi Banane Lage hen jo Kaafi Popular Bhi Ho Rahe Hen. Dosto Reddit se Traffic Lene se Pehle Aap ko Reddit Per Apna Account Create Karna Parega. Account Create Karne Ke Liye Reddit.com Visit Karen aur Sign Up Kare. ap ki Gmail ID pe Confirmation Mail Ayega us Pe Click Kar ke Verify Kare, uske baad aap Reddit use karne ke liye teyar hai. Account Create Ho Jane Ke Bad sub se Pehle Aap ko Apne Blog ya Article se Related SubReddits Search Kar ke Join Karne Honge. SubReddit ko Aap ese Keh Sakte hen Jaise Facebook Groups Hote hen Isi Tarah Reddit men Subreddits Hote, jin Men Lakhon Nahi Balke Karoron Subscribers Hote Hai. Lekin Yad Rahe ke Aap ko Apne Topic ke Mutabik SubReddits Join Karne Honge aur Han Aap Ek Article 1 se Zyada SubReddits men Share Nahi Kar Sakte agar Aap ese Karte Hen to Aap ka Account Block Ho Sakta Hai. Aap ko Khud ho Ache aur SubReddits Dhondne Parenge jinmen Lakhon ki Tadad men Subscribers Hon. Us ke Ilawa Har SubReddit Men Apne Apne Rules Hote hen Jinko Follow Karna Lazmi Hota Hai Agar Aap Follow Nahi Karte to Aap ko us Group se Block Bhi Kiya Ja Sakta Hai. Tip Reddit Spamming naa ho uske liye bhut jada stricked hai, to aap aesa kuch bhi naa kare jisse lage ki aap sirf spamming kar rahe hai. aesa karne par aapka Account blog bhi ho sakta hai. Reddit ko use karne ka jo faida hai wo ye, ki aap waha se traffic la sakte hai to High Quality Backlinks bhi bana sakte hai. Aaj mujhe Rohit Mewada in HindimeHelp.com pe Guest post karne ka Mauqa diya hai jis pe men un ka Buht Shukr Guzar Hun. Agar aapko bhi HMH.pe Guest Post karna hai to uski Jankari yaha hai.

Youtube ek bhut hi Saral or free tarika hai online ache paise kamaneka ham ye to jaante hai. or hamne phele ye bhi jaan liya tha ki youtube se payse kis tarike se kamate hai. Bhut se mere dost youtube se paise to kamana chate hai par unko ye pata nahi hota ki youtube par apne video ko kaise upload karte hai, to Aaj ham jaanege, Video ko Youtube par kaise Upload karte hai. Muje step by step follow karo. kahi par kuch paresani aate hai to comment karo. Computer me Youtube Account me login karo. Mobile me upload karne ka alag tarika hai. agar aap bo janna chate hai to hame comment ke jariye bataye. Login karne ke baad Jo upar upload ki button hai us par click karo Upload par click karne ke baat ek naya page khulega. aapko yaha par apna video ko daalna hai. Aap video ko apne computer mouse se pakad kar Upload ki screen par laa kar chod de. Video upload hona start ho jayega. Jaese hi aapka video upload hona start hoga ek naya page khulega. diyaan rahe jab tak aapka video pura upload nahi ho jata aapko ye page band nahi karna hai. Aap Jo Video upload kar rahe hai uski sahi tarike se setting or detail dalne par hi wo search me aata hai kisi ke search karne par, to aapko uska bhi dhiyan rakhna hai. Youtube Video Setting kaise kare uski jankari yaha di hui hai. Dosto hamne ye to jaan liya ki video upload kaise karte hai. chaliye ab jaante hai ki video upload karne ke baad paise kamana start kaise karte hai youtube se. Youtube ki or bhi bhutsi jaankari ke liye hame follow jarur kare Facebook, Twitter , Google or Youtube par. Agar aapka koi sabaaldoubt ho to aap comment ke jariye puch sakte ho. Aapko ye jaankari kesi lagi ye jarur bataye.

Har blogger apne post ko Google ke 1st page pe rank karana chahta hai. Aur iske liye keyword research karta hai. Lekin kabhi kabhi usse keyword research mistake ho jati hai. Jiski wajah se post rank karne ke bajay niche rank par chali jati hai. Post ko rank karane me SEO ke liye keyword research hamara pehla kadam hota hai. Keyword research kafi challenging ho sakta hai. To chaliye jante hai wo kaun se keyword research mistake hai jisse apko bachna jaruri hai? Is post me main apko wo sabhi keyword research mistake bataunga jo log normally karte hain. Aap in galtiyon ko agar karne se khud ko bacha lenge aur in ko avoid kar lenge to ye fir apki keyword research strategy kle liye bahut acha sabit hoga. To chaliye jante hain ye kaun se keyword research mistake hain jisse bach kar aap apne post ko perfect optimization kar sakte hain. Jisse aapka post high rank kar sakta hai. Ye apke post ko first page par rank karane me madad karega. Successful keyword research strategy janne ke liye niche bataye sabhi point ko dhyan se padhe aur inhe follow kare. Doston hum aur aap me se bahut se aise log hai jo SEO ke bare me jankari rakhte hain. Bahut log SEO ko achhi tarah se samajh kar kaam karte hain. lekin wahi kuch aise bhi bloggers hote hain jinki jankari aadhi adhuri hoti hai. Aapne ye to jarur suna hoga ki . Aadhi knowledge Dangerous hoti hai. Ye yahan bhi apply hota hai. Mere kuch blogger bhai is baat ko aaj ache se samajh le ki SEO koi fix chiz nayi hai. Google har din kuch naye updates laata rehta hai. Aur uska bas ek hi aim hai ki wo apne visitors best aur accurate results show karna chahta hai. Iska matlab agar aap visitor ko dimag me rakh kar kaam karte hain to hi Google apko acha rank de sakta hai. Ab hum apne topic par aate hain. SEO karne me maine pehle hi bataya ki sabse pehla kadam hota hai Keyword Research Aur bahut sare bloggers yahi par jakar galti kar dete hain. To agar aap apne pehle hi step me galti kar denge, uske baad apka har step galat hota jayega. Chahe aap best on-page seo kare aur quality content likh le traffic nahi aayegi. Ye post aapke liye kafi important saabit ho sakta hai agar aap ki post rank nahi kar rahi hai. q ki ho sakta hai aap anjaneme wahi Keyword research ki galti kar rahe ho jo aapko nahi karni chaiye. Is baat ko hamesha dhyan rakhe ki unrealistic keyword ko bhulkar bhi target na kare. Kuch niche bahut competitive hote hain. Agar aapki niche website hai aur ye site bilkul nayi hai to isme rank karna bahut mushkil hota hai. Shuruat me kabhi bhi competitive keyword matlab Head Keywords ko target na kare. Balki agar aap long tail keyword ko target karenge to bahut fayda hoga. Isse aap rank bhi kar sakenge aur fir convert karne ke chances jyada hote hain. Chaliye ab ek example ke jariye ise samajhte hain ki aakhir long tail keyword or Head keyword ki tulna me kis tarah faydemand hai. Aur kis tarh ye ranking karne madad karta hai. Maan lijiye ki apki website ki niche hai clothes. Agar aap clothes par rank karna chahate hain to ye bahut hi tough kaam hai. Aur khaskar nayi website ke liye ek tarah se pasine chhudane wala kaam. Iski tulna me agar aap designer clother for women keyword par target karenge to result bahut acha milega. Also Read 4 Best Free Keyword Research Tool Agar aap ek bahut badhiya aur quality content likh rahe haion to isme sirf ek keyword ka istemal karna ek tarah se mitake hi hai, Kyu ki isse sirf apko ek hi keyword ke liye aane wali traffic milegi. Jahan tak ho sake ek se jyada keyword ko use kare isse apki traffic badhegi. Lekin ek baat ka dhyan rakhe ki ye naturally istemal kare. Successful keyword research strategy ke liye ye ek bahut hi important factor hai ki aap ek se jyda keyword ko apne post ke liye target kare. Proper keyword research bahut mushkil kaam hai. Sath hi isme kaafi waqt lag sakta hai. Isiliye ho sakta hai ki aapko lage ki itna time kyu waste kare. Jaldi se kuch keywords nikale aur use kar le. Yahin par aap galti kar dete hain. Aap soch lete hain ki aap jo keyword select kar rahe hain wahi apke visitors use karte hain search ke liye. Ye apki soch hoti hai lekin ye sahi nahi hai. Keyword research me agar aap enough time nahi dete to fir ho sakta hai apko wo keyword nahi mila hai jo apke liye post ko rank karane me jyaada faydemand ho sakta hai. Jaldbaji sahi nahi hai ye apko bhi malum hoga. Aap jis keyword ko rank karna chahte hain uske liye pura waqt de aur aise keyword ko select kare jo post ko jaldi rank karaye. Aap jo post likhna chahte hain uske liye keyword research ki ek list taiyar kare. Aur usko consistency ke sath update kare. Ho sakta hai kuch dino baad apke users ke search hone wale keyword badal gaye ho. Apne audience ko banaye regular banaye rakhna chahte hain to apne post ke keywords ko bhi update karte rehna chahiye. Keyword Research karne ka Free or sabse Best tarika kya hai uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. Aap waise keywords ko target kare jo apke users use karte hain. Users jin keywords ko search karte hain same hi hone chahiye. Apne audience ki bhasha ko samjhe aur usi ko istemal kare. Example ke liye aap Branded shoes ka business karte hain aur brand ke according shoes rakhte hain. Aise me jyada log Branded shoes names jyada search nahi kiya jata. Audience Nike shoes jyada search karenge. Agar aap irrelevant keyword Branded shoes names use karnge to apko jyada traffic nahi milegi. Jab aap kisi keyword ko select karte hain. To ye bhi ek important factor hai ki aap apne keyword ka form jarur dekh le. Yani ki aap is baat ka dhyan rakhe ki aapne jo keyword select kiya hai usme s or es add karne se jyada traffic hai ya fir bina s or es ke jyada traffic hai. Yahan hum ek keyword le lete hain aur use check karte hain to jo difference aayega usse apko ye samajhne me mushkil nahi hogi ki singular aur plural keyword research strategy ke liye kitna important hai. 1.8 million ka fark hai. Aap kisi bhi keyword ki traffic kisme jyada hai aur singular ya plural select karna hai iske liye ek tool ka istemal kar sakte hain. Google Trends iske bare me hume perfect jankari de deta hai. Bahut se users keyword ke singular form ka use kar ke information lena chahte hain aur kuch visitors plural ka istemal comparison ke liye bhi karte hain. Google apne visitors ko satik search result dene ke liye puri koshish karta hai. Users jo search kare usko satisfaction mile. Hum aur aap har din google me search karte hain. Aur apni jankari puri karne ke liye hum khud hi lambe lambe sentence likh ke search karte hain. taki hum jo dhundh rahe hain wo aasani se mil jaye. Isiliye ab har blogger long tail keyword hi istemal karne lage hain. Long tail keyword se rank karna bahut aasan hai. Aur wahi visitors apke site me aate hain jo bilkul usi term ko search karte hain. Long tail keyword use karna bahut faydemand to hai lekin sabse important baat ye hai ki usme traffic ka dhyan rakhna. Yahan jyadar blogger yahin par galti kar dete hain aur aise longtail keyword ko use karte hain jisme traffic zero hota hai. Ab aap hi batao aise keyword par rank karne se kya fayda jise koi search hi nahi karta. Agar aapne kisi keyword ko target kiya hai to ye janna bhi jaruri hai ki apko usme safalta mili ya nahi. Aap ko apne target keyword regularly check karna jaruri hai. Ye jarur dekhe ki log apke likhe article tak pahunch pa rahe hain ya nahi. Incognito window ko open kar ke usme apne used keyword ko search kar ke check kare ki apka post search result me kahan par hai. Isse apko pata chal jayega ki apko aur kitna improvement karne ki jarurat hai. To agar aap ye kaam karna bhul jate hain to fir iska matlab aap apne keyword ke liye serious nahi hai. Aur ye apki ek galti hai jisse aapki post rank nahi kar pati hai. Kis keyword par kaha rank kar rahi hai post wo aap Google Search Console me bhi dekh sakte hai. Doston ab aap samajh gaye hone ki aakhir most bloggers kaun si keyword research mistakes karte hain jiske wajah se search result me rank nahi kar pate. Mujhe ummid hai ki aapko ye post pasand aayi hogi. Aur aap bahut ache se samajh gaye honge ki aapki post rank kyu nahi kar pati. Successful keyword research strategy apke liye bahut fayda pahuncha sakta hai. Agar aap upar bataye gaye sare points ko ache tarike se follow karte hain to fir apke post ko rank karne se koi nahi rok sakta balki Google aapke post pasand karega aur SERP me achi ranking dega.

Aapne Apna Blog bana liya hai Blogger par or ab aap teyaar hai Apne Blog par pheli post likhne ke liye to chaliye dekhta hai kaise Post ko likh kar kaise publish karte hai. Ek baat ka diyaan rakhe jiski bhi aap post likhe uske bare me aapko achi jaankari hona chaiye agar nahi to phele apni jaankari badaye uske baad hi post ko likhe. Pade Paise Kamaye Bloggeer par Bidvertiser se dono ka ek hi kaam hai. Click karne ke baad aapke saamne post editor aayega. Jo Aap ki Post ka Title heading hai wo NewsPaper ki headline ki trha honi chaiye, Jisko padne ke baad samaj aa jaye ki is post me kya hai. Ab aap apni Post likhe uske liye kuch tips hai Friend ye to sirf basic idea hai kaise Post kare. iske bareme me aage detal me bataoga kis trha se post likhe ki Google usko pasand kare. Agar aapko Post Editor me kya kya option hai or unko kaise use karte hai wo nahi pata hai to aap yaha dekhe. Blogger post Editor ki puri jankar share ki hai. Search Description bhi add kare post me Yaha pade kaise Enable kare Search Description Post ke liye

Facebook ka Like Box jisko Fan Box bhi khate hai jo bhut hi jaruri hai har blog ke liye, Agar aap apne blog ko promote karna chate hai to aap facebook ki madad se kar sakte hai, Facebook Page ke jariye. Facebook ke like box se hota ye hai ki jab koi visitor aapke blog par aata hai or usko aapka blog pasand aata hai to bo direct aapke facebook ke page ko like karke aapka Fan ban jata hai, fir jab bhi aap koi nai post karte ho to usko facebook par pata chal jata hai. Agar aap nahi jaante ki Facebook Page kaise banate hai to yaha par click karo. Live Demo

Aaj ka jo time hai bo internet ka time hai. Aaj hamari jindgi me Internet bada mahatv rakhta hai, uski madad se ham puri duniya se connected rha sakte hai. jaise Online Shoping karna, Mobile ko net se recharge karna, ya fir kisi exam ka result dekhna aese bhut se kaam aasani se ho jate hai. Abhi ke time me jo sabse jada Popular hai to bo hai Social Networking Sites jese Facebook, Google, Twitter jinki madad se ham Apne Dosto or apne chahane walo se jude rha sakte hai. Aaj ham jaanege kaise Twitter par account banate hai. Ye ek online social networking site hai jisme ham 140 sabdo me message ko share kar sakte hai, usko tweets khate hai. Jiska ispar par account hai bo tweets kar bhi sakta hai or dusro ki tweets pad bhi sakta hai par jiska account nahi hai bo sirf dusro ki tweets pad sakta hai. In steps ko follow kare www.twitter.com par jaye fir sign up ki button par click kare, ya fir yaha click kare ab jo sign up form aa jayega uske bhare Username select karne ki tip Ab aapke mobile par ek sms aayega twitter se agar aapne mobile number dala hai to. usme ek verification code hoga. Code ko daalne ke baad Verify ki button par click kare. Ab aap ka Twitter account Ban gaya hai. ab agle page me aapse Email ID magega agar aapne Mobile se account ko register kiya hai. aap yaha par apni email is daal de. ya fir skip par click karke agli step par jaye. ham chahe to baad me bhi email is account me connect kar sakte hai. kuch bate Email address ko twitter account me jodte samay yaad rakhni hai Aap ka account to ban gaya hai ab aapke saamje kuch catory or famous logo ki ID aayegi. aap unko follow kar sakte hai. Ab aap account teyaar hai. Ab Search Box me search kare Hindi Me Help fir hamare account ko follow kare. jisse ham jab koi koi new post dale to aapko apne account par uski jaankari mil jaye. To Ab aap jaan chuke hai kaise account banate hai, Agar aapko koi dikkat aa rahi hai ya fir aapka koi sabal hai to aap Comment karke puch sakte hai. Twitter me photo Kaise Set karte hai or kaise Apni Information Update kare uski jaankari.

Hello Friends aaj ham online world ka sabse bade sabaal ke jabab ke baare me jaanege Website, ji hai website kaise banaye aaj ham ye jaanege. Agar aap apna online business karna chate ho ya apne kisi knowledge ko duniya se online share karna chate ho to aap ki website hona bhut jaruri hai, or aaj ham janege ki free website kaise banaye Google ki madad se. Start karne se Phele me kuch baate hai jo me aap ko batana chata hu ki, ham jo website bana rahe hai bo blogger.com par banegi. Blogger.com Google ki hi ek service hai or ye bilkul free hai, jisko ham Blog bhi bolte hai. Step by step follow karo- Step 1 www.Blogger.com par jao. Agar aap ke paas phele se Google account gmail account hai to aap us se login kare ya fir phele Gmail par ek account banaye. Step 2 Blog bnane ke liye New Blog ki button par click kare Step 3 ek naya page khulega Is page par aap ko apne blog ka tital, uska link url or uska template select karna hai. iske baad Create Blog ki button par click kare. ye lijiye aapki website bankar teyaar hai. Note ek baat dyaan rake ki aapke blog ki jo link rahegi usme blogspot bhi rahega. matlab maan lijiye aapne blog ke link liya ram to aapke blog ki link rahegi ram.blogspot.com. agar aapko ye blogspot hatana hai to uska bhi tarika hai jo me aapko aage bataoga. Blogger Ki Puri Jaankari Me jaanta hu aapke dimaag me bhut se sabaal hoge, or aap un sabaalo ke jabab bhi chate hoge. agar haa to niche comment jarur kare ya hamare Sabaal Jabaab Section me post kare. or aapko ye jaankari kesi lagi iske baare me comment karke jarur bataye. Hindi Me Help ka Facebook Group Join kare or apni or dusro ki help kare.

Apne blog ko banane ke baad sabse phela kaam hota hai usko sahi se design karna. Mene pichli post me bataya tha ki blogger par blog kaise banate hai or kya kya chaiye Blog banane ke liye. Hamara Blog banne ke baad ham uspar apni post to daalte hi hai par uske saath hame apne blog ko apne hisaab se design bhi karna hota hai, usko customize karna padta hai, taki bo dekhne me bilkul ek Website ki traha hi lage. Ye kuch chije hai jisko koi bhi dekh kar ye bata sakta hai ki ye ek blog hai or isko Blogger par banaya hai. Ham unko chupa kar ya fir apne blog se delete karke apne blog ko bilkul ek professional website ki traha bana sakte hai. Hamare Blog ko Promote karne ke liye Facebook Page bhi bhut jaruri hai. or Facebook Like Widget apne Blog se jode kar ham apne Facebook Page ke like bhi bada sakte hai. Is post he ham jaanege ki Nav-bar ko apne blog se kaise hatate hai. Ham jab Blog Banate hai Blogger.com par to hamare blog par upar ek Navigation bar Menu hota hai. Navbar sirf ek bloffer ke kaam ka hota hai bo uski madad se direct apne Bloggger ke deshboard me ja sakta hai. to ab aap samaj gaye hoge ki Navbar sirf hamare shortcut ke liye hai par hamare visitors ko iski koi jarurat nahi hai. Nav-bar hamare shortcut ke liye hota hai. Agar ham usko hatate hai to bas hamara ye nuksaan hoga ki hame blogger.com par jaakar hamare blog ka dashboard kholna padega. Faida ye hai ki aapka jo blog hai bo ek website ki trha dikhga. me aapko kahuga ki aap isko hata de. Ek baat or agar aap agar koi naya Template use karte hai to aapko Nav-bar hatana hi padega. Mene yaha par bataya hai Apna Template kaise Upload karte hai Blogger par. Isko hatane ke 3 tarike hai. ham sabse saral tarike ki baat karege jo phele nahi tha Blogger ne abhi joda hai, Navbar ko Off karna Navbar ko Off karne ke liye aapko Apne blog ke Layout me Jana joga. Usme aapko ek Navbar ke naam se ek widget dikega, uske edit link par click kare. Ispar click karne ke baad ek popup page khulega Off ko tik kare fir Save ka button dabaye. Ye lijiye ab Blog ka Navbar hat gaya, apne blog par jaa kar dekho. Dosto is post me aapne sikha Navbar ko hatana or ye bhi jana ki Q isko hataye. Agar aapka or koi bhi sabaal ho Navbar se related to aap comment kar sakte hai. Blogger se related koi bhi sabaal ho aap mujse puch sakte ho. Internet se related Sabaal Jabaab yaha kare. Aapko ye post bhi jarur padni chaiye ki ham apne Blog ka Tital, Discription or uska Address kaise change kar sakte hai ye SEO ke liye bhi bhut jaruri hai. Blogger ki Puri Jankari Yaha Hai

Mother Maa bhagwan ka sabse acha gift hai hamare liye jiski koi kimat nahi hai. Simple sabdo me kahe to Bhagwan ko possible nahi tha ki wo sabse sath rha sake to unhone sabke liye Maa banai. Maa jo apne sukh dukh ko choad kar apne bacho ki fikar karti hai, or wo kitna kaam karti hai wo to batane ki jarurat hai hi nahi. To Mother s Day ke is special Day par hamara itna to farj banta hai ki ham usko Wish kare or dikhaye ki hamari jindgi me unki kitni Importance hai or ham unse kitna pyar karte hai.

Aap Internet par money advertisement site par ads vigyapan dekh kar kamate hei. Jo bhi money aap kamate hei wo money dollar me hoti hei. Aap ye money seedhe bank accountkhate mei nahi daal sakte, pehle aap ye money Paypal accountkhate mei daalte hei uske baad paypal accountkhate se bank account mei. Paypal apne aap aapki money ko dollar sei rupee mei convert pariwartit kar deta hei. Email account banana bahut asan hei islye aapko ek site par jana hei aur signup button par click karna hei. site ka naam hei httpwww.gmail.com Agar aapke pass pehle sei hi email account hei to aapko naya email account banane ki koi jarurat nahi hei. Paypal ek bank hei .aap internet sei jo bi money kamati hei wo pehle paypal account mei bhejte hei uske baad aap money apne bank account me bhejte hei.Paypal ek tarah sei Internet ka bank hei.paypal account banana bahu asana hei iske liye aapko PAN card ki jarurat padti hei. Aap PAN card ke bina Paypal account nahi khol sakte hei. site ka naam hei www.paypal.com Agar aapke pass pehle sei hi Paypal account hei to aapko naya paypal account kholne ki jarurat nahi hei. Aap apne ghar ke aas pass ki kisi bi bank me jakar bank account khol sakte hei jaise ICICI bank,SBI bank,Axis bank,HDFC bank,PNB bank . Agar aapke pass pehle sei hi bank account hei to aapko naya bank account khone ki jarrat nahi hei. Internet par bahut saari aisi advertisement site hei jo aapko ads dekhne par rupee deti hei. par ye jaana bahut muskil hei ki kaun si site sach me imandar hei aur aapko paisa degi. Kyu ki bahut saari site aisi bi hei jo aapko ads dekhne ke baad aapka rupee aapko nahi deti aur dokha karti hei. Agar aapke paas ek Youtube Channel hai aur aap uspe videos regularly upload karte hai toh yah article aapke liye bahut hi helpful hai. Iss article me mai apko btaunga ki aap apne youtube videos ko aur bhatar kaise bana skte hai. Youtube ke kuch basic sabalo ke jabab yaha hai Quality Video Kyu Jaruri Hai? Mujhe nahi lgta ki apko yah btane ki jarurat hai ki YouTube Channel par quality video kyu jaruri hai. Aap bhi agar youtube par videos dekhte hai, agar video ki image quality achhi nahi hai ya uski audio quality bekar hai toh aap uss video ko dekhna turant band kar dete hai. Toh mera matlb yah ki agar aap bhi quality video bnayenge toh koi bhi banda agar aapke channel par aata hai toh video dekhne baad usko bhi achha lgega aur aapke channel ko subscribe krega. Aapke kaam ki taarif bhi krega. Agar Kaam Me Quality Ho, To Paise Apne-Aap Aane Lagte Hai. Bhut log kya karte hai ki Mobile se kahi ka bhi video banaya or Mobile se hi upload kar diya or monetize karke paise aane ka intjar karte hai, par aesa bilkul nahi hone wala ki aapke pass isti aasani se paise aa jaye. Jada tar log kya sochte hai ki bhut sare Video bana kar upload kardo to agar sabhi video thode thode bhi dekhe gaye to income hogi. par ye soch bhi galat hai, Quantity se jada Quality Jaruri hai. Ab aap Samaj hi gaye hoge ki Quality kitni jaruri hai, or agar Youtube se paise kamane ka soch rahe ho to aapko video ki Quality to achi rakhni hi padegi. To chaliye jante hai kya kya chaiye hame ek acha Video banane ke liye

Hello Friends, Me Phele bata chuka hu kaise Youtube se Paise Kamaye Jate hai Video Upload karke or Kaise Video Upload karte hai Youtube Par. Youtube Google ki hi Searvice hai or youtube par Google ke baad sabse jada search hoti hai duniya bhar me, matlab agar kuch share karna hai duniye se to ye ek badiya platform hai. Youtube Account Banane ke Baad Hamara sabse phela Kaam hota hai ki ham apni Youtube Channel ko sahi se set kare or jo uski settings hai unko sahi se apne hisab se set kare. Isme sabse phela jo kaam hai jiske bare me aaj ham is Post me dekhege, kaise Apni Youtube Channel ko Partner Verified kare or jaanege iske kya faide hai. Partner Verified Hamara account Youtube ka partner ban jata hai, matlab hamari koi brand hai or hamara Youtube ke sath partnership hai. Monetization Agar aapko Youtube se paise kamana hai to aapko apne video par ads lagana padega monetize karna padega. uske liye phele hamare account ko verify karna jaruri hai. Verify karne ke baad Apne Youtube Account ko Adsense account se connect karke monetization enable kar sakte hai. Longer videos Agar aapka Youtube Account verify nahi hai to aap 15 minute se jada ka video upload nahi kar sakte. Verify karne ke baad aap youtube par lambha video bhi upload kar sate ho. External annotations Ye Youtube ka ek future hai isme ham apne video ke upar link add kar akte hai. par agar aapko external link apne website ki link add karna hai to phele verify karna hoga. kaise Annotation ka istaal karte hai iske bare me me aaye bataoga. Paid content Paid Contant me aap jo video upload karege usko sirf wo dekh payege jo aapko paise dege. is future ke bare me bhi ham aage jaanege. Content ID appeals Aap jo Video Upload karege agar usko koi copy karta hai to aap youtube ko report karke video ko delete karba sakte hai. agar koi 3 video copy karke upload karta hai to uski youtube account bhi delete ho jati hai. is liye kabhi bhi aap kisi or ka video upload naa kare. Live streaming Aap Youtube par apna Live Show bhi set kar sakte hai Verify karne ke baad.

On-Page optimization ek SEO ka hi part hai, SEO ka Matlab hota hai Search Engine Optimization, yaani ki apni website ya blog ko better Search Engine Result Page ke liye Optimize karna. Yah optimization bhi 2 tariko se hota hai. Ek hota hai On-Page aur Dusra Off Page SEO. Is post me ham bat karege On-page ko kaise optimization karte hai. Jab bat aati hai On-Page SEO ki to apne abtak yahi padha hoga ki On-Page kya hai? Lekin is article me On-Page ko SEO ke liye perfect optimization kaise kare use practically janege. On-Page SEO Content ya Article banate time jo bhi ham apne content ya article me implement karte hai jaise Title, Heading, Permalink, Media, Design etc. ko sahi dhang se ompimize karna hi On-Page Search Engine Optimization kahlata hai. On-Page SEO kya hai? yah janne ke bad ata hai ki ise better SERP Search Engine Page Result ke liye kaise kare. On-Page SEO ko bina practically samjhe aap ise apne blog Content par laagu nahi kar sakte, aur agar ap apne post ka On-Page SEO achhe se nahi karte hai to apko better SERP nahi mil sakta. permalink ko hamesha chota aur keyword ko sath me lekar banaye. Bekar dikhne wale URL ko ignore kare jaise hindimehelp.comp123 Iske sath URL ko jayda bada bhi nahi rakhe jaise hindimehelp.comon-page-seo-apne-page-ko-seo-ke-liye-perfect-optimize-kare Lekin aisa kyon? Aisa isliye kyonki Google hamesah post ke permalink me se shuru ke 3-5 word ko jyada value deta hai. Jiska mtlb hai ki hame apne URL me targeted keyword ko place karna chahiye. Screen shot yah show karta hai ki kis tarah tarah se short URL Google Search Engine Result me attractive bante hai, aur sath me wo keyword hote hai to Google unhe Bold show karta hai, jo jyada eye caching hoti hai jisse hamari Blog par CTR bhi badhti hai. CTR Click Through Rate, Google ke fist page par 10 results show hote hai, suppose karo Google ke first page par 100 users search karne walo ko apki site show hoti hai to un me maanlo 20 users ne apki site ko hi open kiya baki ke 80 users ne baki ki bache 9 blog ya website ko open kiya, tab apki CTR 20 hogi. Aap jitna apne Permalink URL me kewal Main Keyword ko hi place karoge aur URL ko short rakhoge to yah alag aur chote me achha lagega. Defiantly aap apne post ke liye targeted keyword Jis keyword se apne post par ranking chahte hai ko title me place karte hai, aur yah achha bhi hai kyonki yah Google ka sabse important On-Page SEO factor hai. Lekin, iske sath me apko is bat par bhi dhyan dena chahiye ki Apne main Keyword ko title ke shuruaat me rakhe. Ho sakta hai aap kuch post ke title ko direct apne targeted keyword se shuru nahi kar paa rhe hai ya koi meaning hi nahi ban pa rhhi hai to bhi kosis kare ki ap apne targeted keyword ko title ke end me na rakhe. Kewal text se content banana hi kafi nahi hota hai, kosis honi chahiye ki us content me Videos aur Images bhi ho. Videos aur Images apke blog par aane wala user kuch wakt aur rukega. Jisse Bounce rate kam hogi aur time on page badhega. Bounce Rate Jab user blog par akar bina blog par second page par jae hi blog ko band kar deta hai. Time on Page Visitor apki site par kitna Time tak ruk raha hai. Sawal banta hai ki Mutlimedia SEO ke liye kese achha hai, Right? Aap apne content me attractive videos aur Images add karoge to isse apke blog ki Bounce Rate kam hogi yaani user apki site ko close kar de, iske chance kam ho jaege jo ki Google SEO ke liye achha hai aur sath me Time on Page badhega jisse user apki site par jyada time tak rahega to ye bhi Google SEO ke liye achha hai. Kul-mila kar Google user behaviour bhi dekhta hai ki user apki site par kitne time tak rukta hai aur kitne user apki site ko bina aage padhe close kar rhe hai. Agar koi visitor apke content par Google se search karke ata hai aur page loading hote hi apke us content se back aa jate hai then yah apke Search Engine ranking ke liye negative effect dalegi isliye hamari kosis honi chahiye ki us visitor ko apne site par roke rakhe. Apke article ya content me shuru ke 100-150 words me hi targeted keyword hona chahiye. Yani jo first paragraph hota hai apke content ka usi me apke keyword hona chahiye. Is screen shot me dekhiye, hamne SEO, Optization, On-Page, Search Engine ko target kiya hai jise content me shuru ke 100-150 words me hi use kiya hai. Keyword ko shuru ke 100 words me hi use karne se Google yah samajh jata hai ki apka page kis bare me hai. Google yah bhi record karta hai ki apki blog ke loading speed kitni hai. Yani apke blog ko khulne ki speed fast honi chahiye. Ise kam karne ke liye aap apne blog par high definition images ko compress kar sakte hai, aur agar apne blog ko self host par rakha hai to fast speed hosting hi le. Agar aap Google Blogger Blogspot use karte hai to apko hosting ki power ke bare me dekhne ki koi jarurat nahi hai kyonki Blogger platform me apki site Google ke server par host hoti hai. Apni kosis banaye rakhe ki apki site kam se kam 4 seconds me hi open ho jaye. Aur agar apke blog par users Indian aate hai tab apko apni site ki speed ko kam karna hi chahiye. Research se pata chala hai 75 users apki site ko dubara visit nahi karege agar apki site khulne me 4 seconds se bhi jyada time leti hai. GTMetrix.Com ka use karke apni site ki loading speed ko chek kar sakte hai. Website ki Loading speed kaise kam kare uski kuch important tips mene share ki hai, jo aapko apni site par jarur apply kare. Modifiers jaise Best , Top , Famous , Guide , Complete Guide , Review , Helpful etc. ko apne title me add karne se ise aur bhi attractive bana sakte hai. Jaise apko ek content likhna hai jiska theme hai WordPress Ke Tools to ise Title me is tarah se add kar sakte hai 1 Top 10 WordPress Tools Jo Apka Time Bachaege 2 10 Famous Tools jise Apko Bhi Use karna Chahiye 3 Best WordPress Tools ko Use karne Par Complete Guide Esa karne se agar aap Facebook, Google Plus par bhi apne content ka link share karte hai to waha se apko click milne ke change high hoge. Aur sath me Google par site show hone se high chance hoge ki users apke blog content ka title dekhe to pahle apke blog ke content ko pahle open kare. Agar aapko sikhna hai kaise ek badiya Title likh sakte hai jisse aapka SEO Improve ho to aap meri is post ko read kare jisme mene bataye hai Blog Post Title Likhne Ke 6 Badiya takike. Kya chance hote hai apke content ko padhne ke bad readers apke us content ko apni social profile par share kare? Chances are very high jab aap social share button ka user karte hai tab users apke content ko shares karege. Agar aap Social Share Button add nahi karte hai, tab apke blog ke ese readers kafi kam hoge jo Address Bar se URL copy karke apne social profile par paste karke share kare. Yani social share button ka use karna bahut jaruri hai agar ap apne content ko social site par viral karna chahte hai. Agar aap Google Blogger platfrom use karte hai to ho sakta hai apke Template me hi Social Share Button option ho, agar nahi hai ho to apko alag se social share button add kar sakte hai. aur WordPress users simply Digg Digg plugin install kar sakte hai. Research se pata chala hai, apke content me jitne length hoge chance high hoge apke Google first page par rank hone ke. Jis content ki high ranking chahte ho aur wo content ka topic bhi kafi high competition me hai tab apko kosis karni chahiye ki post kam se kam 2000 words me to likhi hi jae aur agar isse jyada words me likhte hai to wo aur bhi best hai. Aur rule bana dena chahiye ki har content ko at least 1000 words se jyada me likhe. Jitna Long content hoga usme utne hi jyada Long Tail Keyword ko use me le sakege. yaani utna hi achha hai SEO ke liye. Internal link ka matlab hai ki apne new content me purane published post ka link bhi add kare. Lekin us new content me usi content ka internal links add kare jo usse related hai. Agar iska achha sa example dekhna hai to wo hai Wikipedia, Wikipedia par average har post par 50 Internal Links apko mil jaege. Is bare me mera suggestion hoga ki new content par kam se kam 2-5 old content ko link kare. Jisse apki blog ki bounce rate bhi kam hogi kyonki aap user ko ek hi content nahi de rhe hai uske sath me aur bhi content aage kar rhe hai padhne ke liye to visitors apke blog par aur jayda time time tak rukege. Aap apne content me H2 and H3 ko subheading dene ke liye to use karte hi hoge? agar nahi to ise use me le kyonki first yah apke content ko more user friendly banati hai aur second usme keyword rakhne se yah On-page SEO optimization ko aur bhi strong karega. Jo aapka Keyword hai aapko uska ye dhiyan bhi rakhna hai wo ek limit se jada naa hi, nahi to wo bhi keyword staffing khelata hai. jo hamare liye acha nahi hai. Keywords ki kya limit honi chaiye uski jankari mene share ki hai wo aap read kar sakte hai. Apne content me jo Image add karte hai us image ka name bhi wahi de jo apka target keyword hai. for example on-page-SEO.jpg Is tarah ke image ke name nahi rakhe 12142015.jpg 1207pm.jpg Image Optimization ka second step ata hai ALT tag add kare. Agar aap Google Blogger platform user karte hai iske post editor me image me ALT Tag add karn ka option hai. ALT Tag me bhi apne target keyword ko hi place kare. For Example agar apke target keyword hai On-Page SEO Opmization , to ALT name add kare kuch is tarah add kare. Agar aap WordPress platform user karte hai iske post editor me bhi image me ALT Tag add karn ka option hai. Jiske liye kewal Image ke border par edit button par clik. For Example agar apke target keyword hai On-Page SEO Opmization , to ALT name add kare kuch is tarah add kare. Image optimization karne ka dusra reason yah hai ki Google ko yah pata chalne me aasani hoti hai ki apka content kis bare me hai. Jo apko search traffic aane me madad karega. For example apke content me 2 images hai jis par alt tag add kiya hai ek par online-make-money aur dusre par offline-make-money to Google samjhega ki apka content Make money topic par hai. Hamari jo Post joti hai wo search engine me ya fir Social Media me share karne par jo dikhta hai wo uska Title, Permalink or uska Description or Post ki Thumbnail. inhi ko dekh kar user unpar click karta hai. Blogger me Post Discription kaise add kare uski jankari yaha hai or agar aap wordpress use karte hai to SEO Yoast Plugin use kare. SEO Ki or jankari ke liye aap HMH.pe SEO Category ki post read kar sakte hai. Ummid hai yah content apko On-Page Optimization ko achhi tarah se samjhaya hai, comment karke apna feedback de ya aapka koi sabal hai to jarur kare.

Free Wifi ka password kaise pata kare ye Har uss Mobile user ka Sabal hota hai jo Free WiFi Use karna chata hai. Bhut logo ne mujse pucha hai wifi password kaise pata kare ya wifi ka password maloom karna software kaa naam batao. wifi ka password todna. Q ki sab ko Free ki chij use karna bhut Pasand hai. Aapne Jio SIM ke ware me to suna hi hoga, jisme 4G Internet or Free Call mil rahi hai, to log kese pagal huee jaa rahe hai uske liye. Jio Sim kaise le uski jankari yaha di hui hai. Agar Aap kahi bhar hai or aapke Mobile me Internet nahi hai or aap Internet chalana chate hai to sidhi si baat hai aap kahi Wi-Fi Hotspot search karege jo Free ho ya fir aapko uska password pata ho. Aaj kal Hotels, Dukhan, Cafe, Railway station, Bus Stops, Ghar har jagha Hotspots lage hote hai bas jarurat hai to unki location pata karne ki or Hotspot Search karna koi badi baat to nahi hai aap Apne Mobile ya Computer ka WiFi on karke kahi jayege or agar kisi hotspot ka Signal milege to aapklo pata chal jayega or aap usse connect kar sakte hai agar usme password nahi hai ya fir aapko uska password pata hai. Par iss process me bhut time lagega. Me aapko ek aese App ke ware me batane wala hu jisme Aap Map par dekh sakte hai kaha par wifi hai or agar WiFi me Password dala hai to uska Password kya hai. App ka Naam hai WiFi Map jisme Duniya bhar ke WiFi ki locations hai. Isme 30 Crore logo ne use kiya hai or bhut se WiFi ki detail isme mojud hai. WiFi Map App use karne se phele ye jaan lete hai akhir ye kaam kaise karta hai. WiFi Map App Android or iPhone users ke liye hai. Iss App ko Mobile me install karne ke baad jo user hai wo apna account usme bana sakta hai. Railway station par High Speed Internet Chalaye Free me uski information Fir hota hai ye jese aap kahi gaye kisi hotel me, ya kisi cafe me jaha aapko free WiFi mila ya fir aapko uska Password pata chala to aap usko WiFi Map App me save kar sakte hai. Isse hoga ye ki Map ye uss location par aapke duaara save kiya WiFi or uska Password Show hoga. Tikh issi trha Jitne bhi log Iss App ko use karte hai wo WiFi ki detail usme dalte rhete hai. WiFi Map App ki ek khaas baat ye hai ki isme aapki jo city hai aap wha ke jitne bhi WiFi hai usko offline bhi save karke rakh sakte hai, taki jab aapke Mobile me net khatam ho gaya ho jab bhi aap WiFi ki location dekh sake. WiFi Map me Mobile ki Location bhi Track hoti hai GPS ki madad se to ham aasani se Jaha Wifi mojud hai waha phuch sakte hai. Ye jo App hai wo Android or Iphone ke liye mojud hai to aap apne mobile me isko aasani se Playstore or itune se download kar sakte hai. WiFi Map Android WiFi Map itune Ummid hai aapko Ye Aap Pasand aayega or aap iski madad se Free WiFi ka maja utha payege. Agar aapka koi sabal ya sujab hai to comment jarur kare. Agar aapke Pass Wifi laga huaa hai to ho sakta hai dusre uska Free me maja le rahe ho to aap dekhe ki kitne log aapke Wifi ko chala rahe hai.
