Agar aapka koi business hai or agar aapke jo Clint ghirahk hai wo whatsapp use karte hai to Whatsapp ka New App Whatsapp Business App aapke bhut kaam aa sakta hai, aapke Business ko Promote karne ke. Phele hame whatsapp par apne business ko promote karne ke liye, ek phone me 2 whatsapp use karna padta tha. usse bhi kaam chal jata tha, par kuch aese tools jo usme nahi the wo hame Whatsapp business App me mil rahe hai. Agar aapko nahi pata Whatsapp se Paise kaise kamaye to uski jankari yaha hai, Simple aap apne Business ko promote karke bhi paise kama sakte hai. Agar aapka Business hai to simple si baat hai, uski kuch detail hogi jo aapko apne ghirakh ko batani ho, Jese uska Address, Opening-Closing time, Website, Contact Email etc. ye sab ham Whatsapp Business me daal sakte hai. Whatsapp Business ko use karne ke liye simple aapko usk App Download karna hai Playstore se. Whatsapp Business App Downalod Download karne ke baad jese Simple ham Whatsapp par account banate hai wese hi banana hai, yaha ek jo khas baat wo ye ki aap Landline number se bhi whatsapp account bana sakte hai, usko verify karne ke liye call verification ko select kare. jo Normal Whatsapp hai usme ham sir apna Naam or Tagline daal sakte hai par jo Whatsapp Business hai usme ham Apne Business ki sabhi Important information daal sakte hai. Jese ki aap upar Image me dekh sakte hai, ham isme kya kya dal sakte hai. jese ki aap dekh sakte hai, Business ki puri jankari to ham iss trha share kar sakte hai. par iske aalawa bhi kuch or option hai jo ek business ko manag karne me jaruri hai. Agar aapki Shop hai, or aap Whatsapp ki madad se apne order ko manage karna chate hai to Labels option ki madad se aap sabko manage kar sakte hai. Labels ke andar ham sabhi message ko category me rakh sakte hai, taki unko manage karne me aasani ho. Ye bhi ek badiya option hai, jisme aap apne sabhi message ko ek jagha dekh sakte hai, ki kitne message aapne send kiye, kitne phuche hai, kitne logo ne read kiye hai. iss trha aap apne pure Whatsapp business ke message ka data dekh sakte hai. Agar aap Offline hai or agar koi message kare to aap uske liye message set kar sakte hai, taki jo aapke costumer hai unko paresan naa hona pade. Aap uske jo message chahe set kar sakte hai, ki jab online aayege to aapko reply kiya jayega. Yaa aap itne Time contact kare. jesa kuch bhi. Ye bhi ek bhut badiya option hai, jisme aap welcome message set kar sakte hai, taki jab bhi koi new costumer aapko message kare to unko wo welcome message chala jaye. jisse jo ek relation hai Aapke Business or costumer me wo acha ban sake. Agar aap Whatsapp Business ke liye use kar rahe hai, to ye to pakka hai bhut se aese messgae bhi hoge jo sabko same hi send karna hai, to wo pura time karne ke jagha uska Quick Reply set kar sakte hai. Isme aap apne Log message ko ek short code ke sath set karke rakh sakte hai, taki jab wo long message send karna ho aap simple laga kar short code dale or wo long message aa jaye. At Last Whatsapp ka ye New App mere hisab se to bhut useful hai, or agar koi local business hai to uske liye to iska bhut badiya tarike se use kiya ja sakta hai. Whatsapp ke kuch aese feature bhi hai, jo abhi tak usme nahi hai, or agar aap Whatsapp bhut jada use karte hai to aap unko bhi jarur check kare, jisse jo aapka whatsapp use karne ka experience hai wo double ho jayega. Agar aapka Business hai to aapke liye ye App kitna Kaam aane wala hai ya aap iska use karege ya nahi or agar karege to kaise comment me share kare. jisse dusro ko bhi idea lag jaye ki iss trha se bhi iska use karke apne business ko promote kar sakte hai. Agar aapka koi sabal ho Whatsapp Business se sambandit to aap comment karke jarur puche.

Sitemap kya hai or Sitemap ki madad se post aasani se Google me index ho jati hai ye to aap jante hi hoge, to agar aapka blog Blogger par hai or aap Blogger sitemap search console me add karna chate hai to aap bilkul sahi post par hai. Agar Aapko Blogger ko puri jankari chaiye to yaha mil jayegi. Is Post me ham jaannege kaise apna blog ki Post ki jaankari Google tak phucha sakte hai. ye koi muskil kaam nahi hai simple aapko apne Blog ka sitemap Google Search Console me submit karna padega. Sabse phele aapko apna Blog Google Search Console me add karna hoga, agar nahi kiya to phele ye post pade. Google Search Console Important Setting bhi jarur kare, jisme se ek XML sitemap submit karna bhi hai jo ham abhi karne wale hai. SiteMap xml formate me search engine ke liye hota hai, jisme blog ki sabhi post ki detail hoti hai ki konsi post kab publish hui, jisse Search Engine jese Google ko aasani se pata chal jata hai ki blog par kitni post hai, to aasani se sabhi post index ho jati hai search me jiske baad wo search me dikhti hai. Blogger me default sitemap bana hota hai, par usko search console me add karna hamara kaam hai, Blogger SiteMap Search Console me kaise add karna hai wo aap niche di hui steps me dekh sakte hai. Step 1 Google Search Console me Sign kare Step 2 Ab Aap apne Blog ke Title ke upar click kare. Step 3 Sitemaps par click kare Step 4 Ab jo Page khulega usme AddTest Sitemap ki button par click kare. Step 5 AddTest Sitemap par click karne ke baad kuch option aayege. Jo aapke blog ka Link hoga uske aaye box me sitemap ki link add karni hai. atom.xml?redirectfalsestart-index1max-results500 fir Submit Sitemap ki button par click kare.

Post Title Ek riport ke anusar, yadi aap quality vala post nahi likhte hai, to reader only 8 second average time ke bad us post ko padhana stop kar dega. 10 50-60 , Ab sochiye, yadi aapne title attractive nahi banaya hai to readers ek hi najar me post ko padhane ka vichar hi chod dega aur aapka sara hard work dhara ke dhar rah jayega. Isliye aaj main aapke sath share kar raha hun, Best Post Title Kaise likhe jo SEO aur Readers ke liye 100 Work kare SEO Blog ? On Page SEO Kya Hai ? Perfect On Page SEO Ke Best 10 Tips 1.Search Engine Aur Readers Ke liye Alag-Alag Title Banaye Adhikatar beginner hindi bloggers post title aise likhte hai -Kuch Full English me likhte hai -Kuch English ke sath mix kar hindi me bhi likhte hai Kya ye SEO aur Better Reader Engagement ke liye effective hai ? Beginner bloggers isse bhi badi galati tab kar dete hai, jab Search Engine aur Readers ke liye same title create karte hai. Jisse traffic milegi ya na milegi, iski do condition create hoti hai Pahli Condition me search engine se traffic milati to kam hi regular readers us post ko padhate hai, because post title SEO ke hisab se thik hota hai, par regular visitor ko attract nahi kar pata hai. Example- Title For Search Engine Aamir Khan Biography in Hindi Good For SEO Post Title Aamir Khan Biography in Hindi Boring For Regular Readers Dusri condition me regular visitors se achche readership views milte hai to traffic nahi. Example- Title For Search Engine - Mr. Perfectionist ? Not good for SEO Post Title - Mr. Perfectionist ? Google For Readership Yani dono hi condition title aapke liye 100 work nahi karta hai. Blog Se Kaise Kamaye ? Best 7 Tarike Isliye search engine ke liye alag title create karana chahiye, jise web title ya meta title kaha jata hai.Ise aap Yoast plugin ki help se set kar sakte hai. Dhyan Rakhe- Hamesha Web Title English me banaye. Aur Blog par readers ke liye alag attractive title banana chahiye, jise dekhate hi readers ko post read karane ko man kar jaye. Dhyan Rahe Yadi aap hindi blogger hai to Hindi Title hi banaye Yadi aap hinglish blogger hai to Hindiglish Title banaye. Blog Design Kaise Kare 2.Focus Keyword I am sure, aap web title me focus keyword jarur include karte honge. Lekin focus keyword web title me sabse aage rakhe. Jisse ranking badhati hai aur traffic milane ke chances banate hai. 3.Long Tail Keywords Kya aap web title keval main keywords se hi create karte hai ? Example- Aamir Khan Biography in Hindi Ye keywords high competition vale ho sakate hai, kyonki sabhi bloggers web title me in keywords ko jarur include karte hai. Jisse naye blog ke liye traffic pana mushkil ho jata hai. Lekin in keywords se related kai keywords available hai. jinpar traffic bhi hai aur low competition vale hai. Example Aamir Khan Wife, Aamir Khan Children Aamir Khan Parents Inhe Long Tail Keyword kaha jata hai. Ise aap title me is tarah shamil kar sakte hai Aamir Khan Biography in Hindi Wife Children Parents Kaise Long Tail Keywords Find Kare 1.LSI Long tail keywords find karane ka sabse easy tarika hai. SERP ke end me jo related keywords show hota hai. Use Latent Semantic indexing kaha hai. Jise traffic ke base par show kiya jata hai. 2.Google Keyword Planner Google Adword par account create kare. ToolsKeyword Planner me jaye. Iske bad Search for new keywords using a phrase, website or category par click kare. Apna keyword dale aur dhero related keyword find kare. 4.Add Power Full Words Kabhi simple title banane par bhi ranking mil jati hai. But title par jitane click milane chahiye, utne milate nahi. Iska main reason hai, Title me power full word ka naa hona. Directaly powerful word SEO beneficial nahi hota hai, but indirectaly SEO beneficial hota hai. Vo aise Yadi apka post Google me fifth rank par hai aur upar ke ranked post me powerful word naa ho ya aapse kam powerful word ho to. Visitor 1-5 result dekhane ke bad aapke post par hi click karega. Jisse kuch dinon bad hi aapki ranking badh jayegi. Isliye aaj hi powerful word use kare. Ye powerful word hai Best, Worst, Reviews, Guide, Fast, 2017, Latest, Effective, 100 , Great, Free, etc. Example- SEO Optimized Post Title Kaise Likhe ? Janiye 6 Best Tips 5.Add Numbers Aap janate honge ki words ki tulana number jaldi samjh me aate hai, kyonki ye words ki tulana me clear hote hai. Is baat ko prove ko Kissmetric ke report ne sabit kiya ki numbers post padhane se pahle reader ke man me certainty la deta hai. Jiske karan reader interest ke sath post ko padhata hai. Is report se yah bhi sabit hua hai ki numbers vale post sabse jyada share kiye jate hai. Aap number ko is tarah se title me shamil kar sakte hai Example- 6.Start with Question Words Popular blog Quick sprout ke founder Neil Patel ne jab Google Webmaster me check kiya kis post par sabse jyada click mile hai. Ve janakar hairan rah gaye ki, in words se start hone vale post is sequence me popular rahe 1.How to 2.Numbers 3.Free 4.You 5.Tips 6.Blog Post 7.Why 8.Best 9.Tricks 10.Great Iska main reason hai question word sidhe visitor ke man me uth rahe question se connect ho jata hai. Jiske bad visitor us post par jarur click karta hai. Last Words Post title post ka sartaj hota hai, jise aap jitana sundar banayenge, people utne jaldi khiche chale ayenge aur janane ki koshish karenge. Isliye post title ke sath web title ko aisa banaye, jo ek hi najar me post ka subject clear kare aur reader ko post padhane ke liye lubhaye. Post padhane ke Thanks Is post ko helpful paate hai to jarur apne blogger friend ke liye jarur share kare.

BidVertiser A Division off Bpath,LTD ek bhut purani PPC pay par click ki site hai jo 2003 me start hui thi Adsense ke lagbhg sath me. Me is post me bilkul bistaar se bataoga ki BidVertiser kya hai or kaise kya hota hai. isse phele ki aap is website se jude ye baate jaanna jaruri hai aapke liye. Ham jaante hai ke Ads hamari websites or Blogs ke liye kitne jaruri hote hai paysa kamane ke liye. Me aapse khana chahuga ki is post ko padne se phele apne dimag ko thoda fresh kar le Q ki ye post thodi lambi hai. Me is post me puri kosis karuga ki aapke har sabaal ka jabaab aapko de saku is post ke end tak. Create BidVertiser Account BidVertiser alag PPC Pay Par Click network hai jo har bar visitor ke click karne par paysa deti hai jisse ham apni website ya blog par lagate hai. Visitor agar ads par click karta hai or fir jo agla page khulta hai agar bo us page me interest leta hai matlab jo agle page me khulta hai form ko fill karta hai, koi product leta hai to hamari commision hoti hai bo double ho jati hai. to hamesa chance hota hai double earning ka par bo visitor par nirbhar karti hai. Ye kuch tarike hai BidVertiser ke. jo usko sabse alag karte hai. Is par Publisher ke account ke liye ye hona jaruri hai, Sabse achi baat BidVertiser ki ye hai ki iski sabse kam payment le sakte hai to jo naya account banate hai agar unki income kam hoti hai jabbhi bo apne paysae le satka hai. Ye kuch tarike hai Payment lene ke ye company bhut dino se chal rahi hai or iske bhutse payment proof aap net par dekh sakte ho. ye raha mera payment proof alert-announceBidvertiser ab Free Hosted Site Supprt nahi karta, matlab agar aapko ads lagana hai to phele blog me domain add karna hogaalert-announce to aap teyaar hai apni site ya blog par ads dikha kar Paise kamane ke liye. Account banane ke liye ye steps follow kare. Create Account in BidVertiser Ab ab aapka account to ban chuka hai. apna account me login kijiye. login karne ke baad in steps to fillow karo. Is Image me jo number hai un ke bare me niche likhe hai Agle page par aap dekege ki aapki site list me aa jayegi hai. Ads ke Code ko Copy karne ke baad kaise apne blog par jodte hai ye jaanne ke liye yaha click kare.

Internet, jis par bhut se ideas hame lim jate hai, ya hame koi bhi jaankari chaiye to ham Internet par uske baare me jaan sakte hai. Internet logo ko free me apni jaankari dusre logo tak phuchane me madad karta hai. In sabke piche jo idea hai bo hai Net Neutrality. Agar aap abhi jesa Internet aap use karte hai, aage bhi aese hi karte rhna chate ho to Net Neutrality ke baare me pata hona chaiye. abhi abhut logo ko iske baare me nahi pata hai, par ab ye jaanna bhut jaruri hai. Agar nahi pata to koi dikkat nahi me aapko batata hu. Net Neutrality jisko network neutrality, Internet neutrality, or net equality bhi khete hai. ye ek rule hai jisme sari Internet company or Government Internet ki speedbara bar deti hai, Ham Internet par kuch bhi kare uske liye alag se koi charge nahi lagta or sabhi chijo ka barabar internet par use kar sakte hai jese Android Application, koi website, ya kuch bhi. iske baare me or detail me jaanne ke liye is site par jao netneutrality.in Agar Net Neutrality khatam hoti hai to jo Internet ki company telecom Company hai usko puri tharh se parmision mil jayegi ki bo kis site par kitna charge lagaye or kis ko kitni net ki speed de. Agar aapko alag alag website istmaal karni hai to aapko un sab sites ke liye alag se paisa dena padega. Aap jin sites ke liye plan loge agar unke liye achi speed chaiye to uske liye alag se charge dena padega. iske alawa jo telecom companya hai bo aapke net surfing par control bhi kar sakegi. Simple sabdo me kahu to agar Net neutrality agar khatan ho gai to Telecom Company ke muh rakchas ki trha khul jayege or ek Aam Insaan ke liye Net ko use karna bhut muskil ho jayega. Aap is Jaankari ko Facebook, Twitter, Google, Whatsaap Par apne saare dosto ko send kare or Net Neutrality ke baare me bataye. Jitna Jada ho sake utna kare . Thank You aapke support ke liye, Aapke kya vichaar hai Net Neutrality ke baare me comment karke muje bataye.

Hello Bloggers, Agar aap janna chate hai kitne Hindi Bloggers hai or unke konse blog hai to uski jankari aapko iss post me milne wali hai. Note Jitna bhi data hai wo sirf un logo ka hai, jinhone submit kiya hai, agar aap bhi ek blogger hai or aapka data isme nahi hai iska matlab aapne apni detail submit nahi ki. Agar Aapko apna Blog list me add karana hai to aap yaha submit kare Submit Blog Detail Form me jitni bhi detail mili hai, usko analyse karke jo data aaya hai wo yaha share kar rahe hai, ye Data Hindi Bloggers ka hai jo HMH FB Group me hai. Ye jo data ke pai chart hai, aap inme sabhi Blogger ka data dekh sakte hai, ki kitne Blog hai, kis topic par hai, earning karte hai ya nahi. Blogging ke aalawa or kya karte hai. 1 Kis Topic par kitne percent Blog hai wo aap iss chart me dekh sakte hai. or agar aapko ye janna hai kitne topics par blog bana sakte hai to uski list aapko yaha mil jayegi. 2 Kitne Blog percent kis language me hai wo aap iss chart me dekh sakte hai. manily ye chart Hindi Bloggers ka hai. Hindi Ya Hinglish, konsa jadha bhetar hai uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. 3 Kitne percent Blogger Full Time Blogging karte hai ya kitne Blogger aese hai jo apne dusre kaam se sath blogging karte hai uski jankari aapko iss chart me mil jayegi. 4 Jitne Bhi Blogger hai wo mainly kya karte hai, Study Job ya fir kuch or uski jankari aapko iss chart se mil jayegi. 5 Jitne bhi Blogger hai wo Blog ke liye konsa Platform use karte hai uska percent aapko iss chart me mil jayega. Agar aapko janna hai Blogger ya WordPress me konsa hai Best to uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. 6 Blogging se kitne blogger earning kar rahe hai or kitne nahi uski detail aapko iss chart me mil jayegi. List ko according to website age rakha gaya hai, to isse aapko andaja lag jayega konsi website kab start hui hai. Last Update 10052018 Ab aapko pata chal chuka hai, kitne Blogger hai or unke konse blog hai. Agar aap ek Blogger hai to aapko isse ye andaja to lag hi gaya hoga ki aap aakele nahi hai, aapke jese kitne Log hai.

Hello Friends Traffic kya hai or wo kya maine rakhti hai ek website ke liye ye usko batane ki jarurat nahi hai jiski websiteBlog hai. Agar Hamari website hai jo bhut achi hai par agar uspar visitor naa aaye to hamari site ki koi value nahi hai. Chaliye dekhte hai Infographic me ki ham Kaise apni site ki traffic bada sakte hai. Apne Blog par sabse main point hai Traffic badane ka wo hai Original or Quality contant. Hame aesi post dalna hai jo kahi se copy na ho or jiski quality bhi achi ho or jisse logo ki help ho sake. Copy q nahikarna chaiye wo batane ki jarurat to nahi hai, par aapko ek war ye jarur padna chaiye Dusre ki Website se Copy karne ke Faide or Nuksan Ye Bhi Pade Social Media kitni jaruri hai wo batane ki bhi jarurat nahi hai, Har ek inshan jo Internet use karta hai uska Social Media Sites par account jarur hoga. Facebook, Twitter, Google sabse Popular hai. To agar hame Logo ko hamari site ki jankari Social Media par deni hai to hame in sites par apne Site ka Page Jarur Banana hi padega. In Sites par apne account bana kar jab bhi koi new post kare to uski link share kare, isse hoga ye jitne bhi logo ne aapke page ko like or follow kiya hai unko site ki new post ki jankari mil jayegi. Guest Blogging bhi ek bhut acha tarika hai apne visitor badane ka. hame isme karna ye hai ki jo dusri site hai jo achi hai or jinpar badiya traffic aata hai or jinki rank bhi tikh hai unpar hame sabse best post karna hai. Guest Post ka Matlab ham kisi dusre ke blog par ek badiya post likh kar uspar publish kare, usme hoga ye ki hamara naam or hamari website ka naam usme diya jayega. to jitne bhi us site ki visitor hai jab wo us post ko padege to wo hamari site ke ware me me bhi jaan jayege. or iss trha hame us site se traffic bhi mil jayega or ek backlink bhi milegi jo SEO ke najar se bhut badiya hai. Guest Post Karne ke Faide kya kya hai wo aap yaha read kar sakte hai. Agar aap HMH par Guest Post karna chate hai to yaha click kare. HMH ki Guest Posts ko Padne ke liye yaha click kare Jab bhi aap kisi blog par post pade to last me aapko wo post kesi lagi wo comment karke jarur bataye. isse aapka ek relation banega us website ke owner se. or agar aap post achi se padege to aap apne vichar achi se bata payege. Ye Tarika bhi kaam aata hai, par yaha bhut log galti bhi karte hai. hame comment karna hai par ek acha comment. Jarur pade Badiya Comment karte Samay Rakhe in Baat ka Dhyan Comment Tips Aap apni site par post dalte hai wo to achi baat hai par aapko aapki site ke jo topic hai usse related forum me bhi account banana chaiye or unpar jo logo ke question hai unke jabab dena chaiye. or agar kisi ke sabal ka jabab aapki kisi post me hai to aap uska link bhi de sakte hai. Read Quora se Website ki Quality Traffic kaise Badhaye Infographic ko Agar aap apni site par add karke apne visitor ko dikhana chate hai to ye code apne post ke HTML me paste kare To Dosto aapko ye jankari or Infographic kesi lagi comment karke jarur bataye.

Jara apne aas-paas me dekhe, har school, college, hospital, Hotel, company, choti badi firms etc. sabhi hi ki website hoti hai. Internet ke is scope me har person kisi bhi firms ke bare me ghar bete hi Google me search karke jaan leta hai agar us particular firm ki website hai to. Web design ke is badhate scope se jahir hai web designer ki demand bhi jyada hai, aur aaj ke wakt me har web designer jo achhe se kam karta hai kaafi achhe se earn karta hai agar wo ek web designer hai to. To yah guide un logo ke liye hai jo apna career web designing me set karna chahte hai, no matter ki abhi aap kya kar rhe hai. Web designing ko part time me bhi handle kiya ja sakta hai. Internet par aaj ke time me bahut website hai jo web designing ko free aur paid dono me hi sikhati hai. Jise videos aur texts dono me hi sikh sakte hai. Agar aap English me weak hai to koi bat nahi, aaj ke wakt me har chij Hindi me milni bhi shuru ho gayi hai. Aur jyadatar site bhi hai jo Hindi me web designing ki book sale karte hai. Hamesha pahle sikhne me hi dhyan de badme earning honi hi hai. HTML ke bina koi bhi website nahi ban sakti hai, web designing me sabse pahle sikhne layak language HTML hi hai yahi se web designing ka course shuru hota hai. Waise to HTML ko web designing ka basic kahte hai lekin isme bhi aaj kai parts aa gaye hai, Jaise iska sabse advance part hai HTML5. HTML language kisi bhi website ka stucture design karta hai, yah pahle kisi bhi website ka dhanchamodel banata hai. Aur baki color wagera karne ka kaam baki languages ka hota hai. HTML ek language hai jisko window me pahle se aaye notepad me likha jata hai use codecoding kahte hai jise web page me save karke browser me dekhe jate hai. HTML ko sikhne ki sabse bahtarin website hai w3schools.com agar Hindi me sikhna chahte hai to Google me bhi search kare HTML in Hindi to apko kayi website mil jayegi. YouTube par HTML ki kai videos bhi hai, waha Hindi aur English dono me kai videos free course mil sakte hai. Jaise ki HTML kisi bhi website ka structure design karta hai usi tarah CSS phir color, size, padding, margin, style etc. karta hai. Example Agar HTML koi bh car ka model hai to us par color aur better look dene wali saari chije CSS hai, aur yah bhi notepad me hi likhi jaati hai. CSS ke liye bhi sabse best website w3schools hi hai. CSS ko sikhne ke liye bhi YouTube aur Google me search karke sikh sakte hai jo har language, videos and text me available hai. In dono ko dhyan se sikhe, kai bar in dono ki base par puri website design ho jati hai. Aur iske bad bhi ek chij ki jarurat hoti hai wo hai Animations. Photo sliding, Animation, Pop up and functions ke liye ek aur language hoti hai JavaScript. Lekin meri salah HTML ke bad me CSS sikhna nahi hogi, meri salah hogi HTMLCSS ke bad me Blogspot platform ko dhang se sikhe. Ab jab agar aap blogger hai to Blogpot platform ko achhi tarah se jante hoge, lekin HTMLCSS ko dhang se sikh lene bad me pahle puri koshish kare website ke template ko desing karna. Aur phir Blogspot ke template ko design karna. HTMLCSS dono ke base par jaise website ke template bante hai waise Blogspot me nahi bante hai. Blogspot ka template ka ek hi notepad file me likha jata hai balki website ke template me CSS aur HTML dono ki hi file alag-alag hoti hai. aur HTML ki har page ki file bhi alag hoti hai, lekin Blospot me esa nahi hai. Blogspot XML ke base par design hote hai. Jaahir si baat hai agar aap new hai to shuru me hi template design nai kar payege. Pahle bane hue tempalte ke code ko samjhoge aur un code me apni marji ke change kar-kar ke sikhoge. To chaliye abhi me apko batata hu ki kaise code ko change karke kisi bhi template ko modify karte hai. Note yah technique Blogspot aur Website dono ke template par follow hoti hai Sabse pahle apni websiteblog ko open kare jisme code me ko bhi changes karna ho. Phir jis bhi font, division, section etc. me changes karna hai par right click karke option khole, aur sabse niche wala option Inspect element ko choose kare. Yah har browser me ata hai. Phir apke Inspect element open hoga. Agar yah right side me open hua hai to ise footer me laye. Phir yah kuch is tarah se dikhega. Screen shot me dekh sakte hai, is inspect element me 2 sections hai, jimse left wala HTML ki coding hai aur right wala CSS. In me kisi bhi code ko yahi se edit kar sakte hai. Yah ek practical learning karne ke tarika hai, aap in me se kisi bhi code ko change karke use real file me apply kar sakte hai. Note Inspect me koi bhi changes real file me ya website me changes nahi hoga wo refresh hote hi remove ho jayga. Yaha se changes karke use dekhe ki kaisa look aata hai use blogspot ya website ke template me bhi changes kare. Aise karke aap kai practice kar sakte hai aur apki website ki designing skill bhi badhati jayegi. HTMLCSS ke base par website aur Blogspot ke template to design kiye jate hai lekin sath me responsive ka bhi dhyan rakhe. Iska mtlb hota hai ki apki website computerlaptop ke browser me to sahi open hoti hai lekin kya sath me mobile me bhi sahi open hoti hai? Agar ap kisi bhi websiteblog ka template PC aur Mobile dono me sahi open layak banate ho to yaani apko acha responsive ka knowledge hai. Iske liye sabse better hoga Bootstrap ko sikhna. Bootstrap time ko bachata hai, isme kam coding karni hoti hai aur bahut better website ko design kar sakte hai. Jyadatar log bootstrap ka use isliye karte hai kyonki isme responsive web page design hote hai. Yah koi software nahi hai, jisme code nahi likhne hote hai aur apne ap hi website generate ho jati hai. Yah ek technique hai jiska use karke website ko asan tarikse se bana sakte hai. Bootstrap ko bhi sabse achhe tarike se w3schools se sikh sakte hai. Phir dheere dheere Javascript aur PHP ko bhi sikhna shuru kare, ye dono hi script language hai. PHP se contact form, data detele create, managing, account, login, logout sab handle hota hai. For example agar kisi bhi website par ek form hai, wo form HTML se hi desing hota hai aur us form ka look CSS se design hota hai aur jab koi bhi user us form ko fill karke enter press karta hai wo data aap tak kaise pahuche ye PHP me hota hai. Ye bhi w3schools me sikh sakte hai. WordPress me sab language hoti hai. Jisme almost PHP ka use hota hai, agar aap Blogspot ke template ko achi tarah se design karna jante hai to WordPress ka template design karna apke liye aasaan hoga. Lekin WordPress SQL ke base par bhi chalta hai. SQL Structure quary language ek data ko analyse karne ki language hai, lekin ise sikhna itna important nahi jab tak aap kewal WordPress par theme designigng hi kar rhe ho. SQL advance level ke developing me sikhni hoti hai. To agar aap WordPress ko pura sikh le to uske bad me bhi kai chije hoti hai jasie Plugins desing karna. Theme design karna etc. Lekin WordPress me templatetheme blogspot ki tarah ek hi page par nahi hoti hai. Isme har option jaise Header, footer, sidebar, index etc. ke liye alag notepad file se alag page design karna hota hai. Iske bad bhi web designing and developing line ka end nahi hota hai, eCommerce, social site etc. ye bhi PHP, JS, HTMLCSS, SQL ke base par hi banti hai. Lekin in sab ke sath bhi aur bhi language hai jaise python, ASP etc. Iske sath me online application and software ke liye bhi programming language hoti hai jaise C, JAVA etc. aur in programming language ka editor bhi alag hota hai jaise HTML, CSS, JS, PHP etc. lanauge ka editor notepad hi hota hai. HTML, CSS, JS, PHP ka editor notepad hi hota hai jo pahle se window me hota hai, jo starts me search karne se mil jata hai. Lekin yah editor fully developed nahi hai. Isme kai problem ko face karna hota hai.

Hello Blogger, Kya aap jante hai har ek site ki ek alag robots.txt file hoti hai jo Search engines ko batati hai, kya search me bataye or kya naa bataye. Is Post me ham iske bare me janege, ye kya hai or uska kya kaam hai. Ye ek text file hi hoti hai jo har site me hoti hai, Blogger me automatic hi generate ho jati hai. Isse Search engine jese Google, Yahoo, Bing ko batate hai ki kya kya index kare or kya nahi kare. Jese maan lijiye aap ne koi Page banaya, koi Labels, ya fir koi Post jo aap nahi chate ki search me aaye to aap usko disallow kar sakte hai robots.txt ki madad se. Har site ki robots.txt file ki link aesi hoti hai www.website.comrobots.txt Jab bhi koi search engine ka bot hamari site par aata hai site ko search me index karne ke liye to sabse phele wo robots.txt ko hi dekhta hai usse usko pata chal jata hai kya index karke search me dikhana hai or kya nahi. Simple Sabdo me Ye ek Robot hota hai apni site ka jo Search Engine jab apni site par aata hai to unko batata hai kaha par permission hai aapko. Jese ki aap jabte hoge me Blogger.com ke bare me bata raha hu. to ye article sirf Blogger ke liye hai. Iske liye aap simple me jo site bata raha hu aap uspar jaye Robots.txt Generate kare! Ab jo site khulegi, usne apne blog ka pura address dale http ke sath jese httphindimehelp.blogspot.com Site Map kaise Add karte hai Google search Console me uske bare me mene yaha bataya hai, Jo site map ke bare me mene bha bataya hai, usme jo code ham use karte hai wo yaha bhi generate kar sakte hai. Ab ek Code Generate hoga, usko Copy karle To aapka Code to teyaa hai, Chaliye ab dekhte hai kaise or kaha isko blogger me add kare alert-noteYe Setting Agar aapne Galat kari to ho sakta hai aapki Site Search Engine Ignore karde or aapki site search me naa aaye. Diya se kare or agar samaj nahi aaye to isko naa kare.alert-note Sabse phele Blogger ke account me login kare Settings Search Preferences Custom robots.txt me jaye fir Edit par click kare. Ab Yes par tik karke apna Code daalde Box me. Save Changes par click kare. ab ye to huaa kaise banate hai or kaise add karte hai. Chaliye ab jaante hai agar hame koi Page, Post, Labels ko disallow karna ho search me to kaise kare. ye bhi Pade Blog ki Traffic badane ke tarike Important Note agar aapko achi se samaj aa raha ho jab hi kre nahi to kuch nahi kare. isse aapki site ke search par asar padega. Agar kisi Page ko Search me nahi Dikhana hai to aap usko Disallow ke sath likh sakte hai jese maal lijiye koi page hai jisko aap nahi chate ki index ho to disallow Disallow pabout-us.html agar koi labels hai to Disallow searchlabelyourlabel Post ko Disallow kare Disallow 201808my-blog-posts.html Issi trha agar maan lijiye aapko pure page ko disallow karna hai to Disallow p or agar kuch allow karna hai jese Allow pAbout-us.html Is trha aap apne hisab se set kar sakte hai kya index kare or kya naa kare search engines Important Note Me fir khana chahuga ki agar aapko, koi page nahi dikhana to hi Robots.txt ko edit kare nahi to is option ko enable nahi kare. Blogger apne aap badiya Robots.txt file bana deta hai search engine ke liye. Blogger ki Puri Jaankari yaha hai

kyonki aapke dvara ki gai On Page SEO par aapke blog ka future depend karta hai. Matlab yadi aapne sahi dhang se On Page SEO kiya hai to aapke blog ko Ranking aur Organic Traffic milegi. On Page SEO Kya Hai Post ko ready karate time Post Title, Permalink, Meta Description, Images, Focus Keyword etc ko search engines ke rules ke according set karana hi On Page SEO kehlata hai. On Page SEO post ke liye likhi gai pahle word se start hoti hai aur post ko publish karane ke sath complete hoti hai. Ab janate hai- On Page SEO Best Tips 1.Web Title Hamen Post Title nahi, web title SEO optimized karane ki jarurat hoti hai. Nahi samjhe ? Web Title Actually search engines men hamare post ka jo title show hota hai, use web title kaha jata hai. Jise aap Yoast Plugin ke dvara set kar sakte hai. Post Title Jo title ham readers ko dhyan me rakhkar ready karte hai, use Post Title kahate hai. Post Title I am sure, abtak apne popular hinglish blogs par post title ke optimization ke bare me hi padha hoga. Par main aapko bata dun, post title ka on page seo me koi yogadan nahi hota. Ise keval readers ko post read karane ke liye ready karana chahiye, jo keval blog par hi show hota hai. Is bare me maine popular website bhaskar.com se jana. Jahan website par post ki title to hindi men hoti hai, par unka webtitle pure English men hota hai. Isi par Shoutmeloud.com ke founder Harsh Agrawal kahate hai, Post Title hamen blog par active visitor ko attract karne ke liye set karana chahiye, jabki Web Title aisa set karana chahiye ki, search engines men jyada se jyada click paa sake. Isliye ye janana jaruri hai ki SEO Optimized Web Title Kaise Set Kare ? Iske liye in baton ko follow karen 1.Include Focus Keyword Post ke web title men focus keyword ko use karen. Yah SEO ka sabse important aur basic tip hai. Aur koshish karen Focus keyword title ke shuruat me ho to post ranking me bahut help milati hai. 2.Use Hot Words Best, Worst, Useful, Great jaise hot word hamesha har kisi ko attract karta hai. Isliye yadi inhen web-title men add kiya jaye to click rate increase ho sakti hai. 3.Use LSI aapne jab bhi Google me search kiya hoga to aapne page ke ant me related words ki kuch line dekhe honge, jise Latent Semantic Indexing kaha jata hai. Google in keyword ko jagah traffic ke base par deta hai. Yadi aap ise title me add karen to aapke blog ki traffic increase ho sakti hai. 4.Use Number and Question Word Kissmetrics ki report me prove hua hai ki Numbers aur Question Words vale titled post sabse jyada share kiye jate hai. Matlab jyada social traffic pane ke chances banate hai. Because numbers aur question words vale titled post people ke problem aur interest se direct connect ho jate hai. Jaise 1.Motapa kam karne ke 6 idea 2.Motapa kaise kam karen 2.Permalinks Amuman maine dekha hai, hindi bloggers permalinks ko title ki tarah long set karte hai. Jo ki SEO benefit pahuchane ki jagah spammy lagate hai. Isliye permalinks short hi banaye- 1.jise yad rakhane men readers ko asani ho 2.short permalink vale post ko social site par share karane ke bad traffic jyada milate hai, kyonki short url clean and genuine lagta hai. 3.Google permalink ke shuru 2-3 words ko hi importance deta hai. Ex-Bloggingfirst.comon-page-seo Mere kahane ka matlab hai, reader jitani se aasani se aapke blog se related chijo ko yaad karenge, utni jaldi hi aapke blog ki branding hogi. Iske alava Google short permalink ke liye hi recommend karta hai. Isliye kuch baton ka dhyan rakhe 1.3-5 words ka hi permalink set kare. 2.WPPermalinksPost Name hi choose karen. Aisa isliye Google hamesha new post ko old post ke compare high ranking deta hai. Ek samay baad aapka bhi post old ho jayega aur fir se ranking pane ke liye us post ko update karana hoga. Yadi aapne permalinks option men day and name ya month and name select kiya hai to post update karane se URL change ho jayega. Jisse ranking grow hone ki jagah down ho jayegi. Isliye post name hi chune, jo short and stable hota hai. 3.Meta Description Simply hame meta description me focus keyword include karte hue post ki aisi short preview summary likhna hota hai ki SERP search engine result page par us post ko read karane ke liye readers ko attract kare. Adhikatar beginner blogger meta description me post ki begging lines ko copy kar paste kar dete hai. Ye SEO ke liye work karta hai, basharte meta description me focus keyword include kiya gaya ho. Lekin practically ye bilkul bhi thik nahi. Jaise maan lo aapne is tarah ke practice se aapka post search engine ke first page par aa jaye . Lekin effective meta description naa hone ke karan post link web title par jyada click nahi paa sakenge. Jisse bad men aap ranking bhi lost kar sakte hai. Isliye meta description custom likhe, jo attractive ho. 4. Post Quality and Length 300 words me likha gaya post, kuch time ke liye aapke blog ke liye traffic laa sakta hai. Lekin ye stability nahi laa sakta. Buzzsumo aur Moz ne milkar 10 lakh article ko analyze kiya. Jismen paya ki 85 article 1000 words se kam vale hai. Aur jab posts ki social sharing number aur backlink check kiya gaya to unhone paya ki jaise jaise post ki length increase hoti gai vaise-vaise social share number aur backlink badhate gaye. Sharing Number And Backlink For Long Post, Image Neilpatel.com Isliye yadi aap long post likhate hai to 1.Low content vale post ko piche kar apni post ki ranking badha sakte hai. 2.Aapke readers aapko us topic ki expert manegi, jo trust ko increase karega. 3.Adhik se adhik social sharing numbers milenge, jo aapke blog ki traffic increase karega. 4.Natural backlink milate hai, because jab aapka content full finished up hoga to people khushi-khushi aapko post ko apne post me link karenge. 5.Keval ek focus keyword ke liye target naa karke, kai keywords ke liye easily target kar sakte hai. Jo short post ke mukable 2-3 guna jyada traffic drive kar sakta hai. 5.Use Proper H Tag H tag matalab H1Heading 1, H2 Heading H2, H3, H4 se hai. Usually H tag words ki importance show karta hai, jo search engines aur reader dono ke liye work karata hai. Vaise wordpress theme post title ko H1 tag ke sath show karata hai. Isliye ise Post me dubara use na karen. Iske alava H tags ko is sequence me use karen H2Post Subheading.H2 Paragraph. H3Topic TitleH3 .H4Topic SubTitle.H4 Paragraph. .H4Topic SubTitle.H4 Paragraph. H3Topic TitleH3 .H4Topic SubTitle.H4 Paragraph. .H4Topic SubTitle.H4 Paragraph. H2 tags ke bich focus keyword jarur include karen. 6.Readability Keval quality vala post hi write karana jaruri nahi, balki post ko reader ke liye kaise show karana hai. Ye bhi janana jaruri hai. Simple words men Readability ki meaning Read karane ki capacity se hai. Isliye post ko aise write karana chahiye ki reader achchi readership capacity se easily post ko read kar sake. Forbes ko diye Interview me Backlinko.com ke Founder Brian Dean ne kaha main New York times ke website se readability sikha, Maine dekha, New York times ke post ki paragraph two lines ki hai. Jise read karane easiness feel hua Thik aise hi behtar readability ke liye two lines ki paragraph banaye. Isse aapko ye benefits honge 1.Bounce rate kam hoga. 2.Reading time increase hone se post ki ranking badhegi. 7.Keyword Density Post men include kiye gaye focus keyword ke percentage number ko keyword density kahate hai. Kisi bhi post ke liye ideal keyword density 1-2.5 hoti hai. Mukhytaur par keyword density ka use Search Engines ke liye post ki topic clear karane ke liye hota hai. Jise aap in jagaho par focus keyword place kar better Keyword Density kar sakte hai 1.Web Title 2.Permalink 3.Meta Description 4.Pahle 100 words ya First paragraph 5.H2 Tag Subheading 6.Last Paragraph 8.Interlinking Out linking Interlinking Post men blog ki related post ki link insert karana, interlinking kehlata hai. Interlinking karane se blog ki bounce rate kam hota hai, jo indirectly post ki ranking ke liye important role play karta hai. Out linking Post men dusre blogwebsite ki related post link add karana, out linking kehlata hai. Yadi aap post men high domain authority vale blog ya website ki related post link insert karate hai. Iska positive impact search engines par padta hai. Matlab high authority out link ke karan search engine aapke post ko genuine aur quality vala samjhata hai. 9.Image Ek Image 1000 words ke compare better work karta hai. Kisi bhi post me images insert karane se ye benefit hote hai 1.Better User Experience 2.Fast Post Topic Clear hota hai 3.Bounce rate decrease hota hai 4.Ranking improve hoti hai 5.Organic traffic increase hota hai 6.First Impression Great hota hai, jo directly frequent visitor ko regular visitor banata hai Isliye post me related images include kare. Lekin yadi aapka blog shared hosting par hai to kam se kam images post me use kare aur unhen jarur optimize karen. jisse server par extra load na pade. Is karan aapka server response time good rahegi. Better SEO ke liye Post me images ko kaise lagaye , ye janane ke liye ye post padhe. 10.Post Speed Ant me jab aap post publish kar de to Gtmetrix par post speed check karana bhule. Hamesha dhyan rakhe, Google ne kaha hai, jo blog under 3 second men open nahi to hai. Vo blog 40 traffic lose kar deta hai Isliye better speed ke liye in tips ko follow karen- 1.Image ko online aur offline optimize karen. 2.Premium theme use karen 3.Minimum plugins use karen 4.Cloudflare use karen Better Blog speed ke liye ye post read kare 16 Tariko Se Blog Ki Speed Badhaye In Last Words Jis tarah English ya hindi me error free letter, essay, application etc write karane ke liye Grammar ki jarurat hoti hai. Usi tarah SEO optimized post likhane ke liye On Page SEO janna jaruri hai. Grammer ke compare On Page SEO easy hai. Bas aapko focus keyword title, permalink, meta description, content me include karte hue long post likhane ki jarurat hoti hai. Jismen related interlinking aur out linking bhi karana hota hai. Yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai, to Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus Whatsapp par jarur share karen. Share with your world!! WhatsApp Facebook Twitter Google pinterest LinkedIn Buffer

UC News Chines Giant Alibaba Group ki UC Web Company ki Trending News Collecting Platform hai. Jise kuch sal pahle hi China men launch kiya gaya tha. Jahan UC News ko mili success ko dekhate hue 6 June 2016 ko India men App version aur UC browser men inbuilt feature ke rup men launch kar diya gaya. 10 50-60 , Internet Se Paise Kamane Ke 10 Best Ways 400 million users ke sath UC browser duniyan ka dusra sabse popular browser hai. Jisse world men iski market share 19.75 ki ho gai aur India men 100 million users ke sath yah ratio pura 50 hai. Jisko lekar UC Web puri tarah se gambhir hai. Isliye UC News ne monetization ke bajay content ki quality par focus kiya. UC NEWS Kya Hai ? Basically UC News Cricket, Politics, Money, Business, Interesting News, Science Technology jaise 20 se adhik categories se related News registered publishers Media group, blogger, journalist etc se collect karti hai aur approval process ke baad smartphone users ke recommendations ke anusar serve karti hai. Filhal UC News keval Hindi or English content ko hi accept kar rahi hai, par future men Indian regional language vale content ko bhi support karenga. UC Browser ki Indian smartphone users tak achchi pahunch hone ke karan yeh business 6 mahinon men hi hit ho gai. Jiske result men 2016 ke last months se UC News ne contents ko Google Adsense se monetize karne laga. Jiska kuch hissa registered publishers ke sath bhi share karta hai. Best 4 Free Bitcoin Earning Android Apps UC News Publisher Account Ke liye Requirements Yani yadi aap bhi blogger hai to apne content par UC News se money earning kar sakte hai . Par iske kuch requirements hai, jise pahle aapko pura karane honge- Hindi ya English language men blog ho. Content Original aur quality wala ho. Post me use ki gai image copyright ke rule ko violet naa karta ho. Pan card Bank Account iski jarurat payment lene ke time padegi, filhal optional hai Kaise Banaye UC News Publisher Account Yadi aap above points ko pura karate hai to following step men janiye kaise create kare UC NEWS Publisher Account Step 1 UC Web par visit karen Sign up par click karen. Step 2 Email Inbox men verification mail ayega, verification link par click karen. Step 3 Type of Account chune, yadi aap blogger hai to Personal chune aur yadi Organization hai to Organization chune. Step 4 Account Information men Account name, apne logo upload kare, blog ka name, category, about your blog, operator name, mobile number, pan number enter karen. Aur ab Accept Term Conditions par tick karen aur continue button par click kar Sign up process ko pura karen. Ab kuch dinon men UC News Account moderator aapke application ko check karenga. Jab aapka account approve ho jayega, tab aapko approval mail bheja jayega. Blog Se Kaise Kamaye ? Best 7 Tarike UC News Par Post Kaise Publish Karen ? Approval milane ke baad pahla post publish kar sakte hai, par directally aapka post publish nahi honga, moderation process se gujarane ke baad hi aapke post ko publish ya suspended kar diya jayega. Isliye be careful, post ki approval pane ke liye kuch rules follow karme honge 1.Post men kisi bhi tarah ki link allowed nahi hai. 2.Post men yadi aap kisi website se image uthakar lagate hai, caption men pura credit de, par link ki tarah nahi. 3.Post ki length kam se 150 words ka rakhen. Vaise in rule ko follow kar easily apne post publish kar sakte hai. Page Views Kaise Badhaye ? UC News par post par mile views ke adhar par earning hoti hai. Yani aapka pura focus post views badhane par hona chahiye, taaki income badh sake. Iske liye main aapko kuch tips bata raha hun- Post Trend aur Most Popular Topic par ho. Post ki title men OMG !! Shocking !! jaise surprised words ka use karen. Post men high resolution image ka jarur use karen. Possible ho to Youtube video bhi post men dale. Post jyada naa long likhe naa hi jyada short likhe aur baton ko summarize karen. UC News Se Monetization Kaise Karen aur Payment Kaise Transfer karen ? UC News par apne post ko monetization enable karen ke liye 1.aapka account kam se kam 7 din old ho 2.aap koi post par 2000 views pa chukka ho. 3.Minimum 5 Post likh chuke ho. 4.20 Index Points earn kar chuke ho. UC News publisher ke income ko weekly basis par every Wednesday ko update karta hai. Jab aapka income $50 ho jayega. Tab aap bank account info update kar mahine ke 6 se 10 vee date ke bich apni earning transfer karvane ke liye apply kar sakte hai aur earning 3-4 dinon me bank me transfer ho jayega. Hike Messenger Kya Hai Isse Kaise Kamaye Is post ko jarur apne blogging friend ke sath share kare aur khud ka income ke sath friend ka bhi income badhaye. Is post related koi question ho to jarur comment box men puchhe.

Hello Dosto, Aaj ham baat karege ek aese widget ki jo hamare blog ke liye bhut jaruri hai, bo hai Email Subscribe Box. Is Widget ki madad se hamare blog ke visitor Email par sabscribe kar sakte hai, fir ham jab bhi koi new post daalte hai hamare blog par to unko email ke jariye pata chal jata hai ki hamne koi new post dali hai. Aapko Email Subscribe Widget ko use karne ke liye phele aapko apne Blog ki feed ko burn karna padega Google Feedburner par, janiye kaise. Ye jo widget hai isme Ham hamare Feed burner ki feed ko use karege. Jisse koi bhi agar subscribe kare to ham usko feedburner ke account me dekh sake Step 1. Apne Blogger ke Deshboard me ja kar layout me jaye fir Add Widget par click kare. Step 2. HTMLJavaScript widget select karke Is code ko usme dale. Code ko Widget me Copy Paste karne ke baad aapko Feedburner ka username hata kar aapko apna daalna hai. Step 3. Aap username ko badalne ke liye CtrlF type kare fir HindiMeHelp Search kare or fir uski jagha apna username daalde. 2 jagha change karna hai. Note Email Subscribe Widget jab kaam karega jab aapke Feedburner par Email Subscription Enable hoga. Step 4. Code me apna feedburner daalne ke baad Widget ko Save karde. To friends ab aap is widget ki madad se apne visitor ko kha sakte ho ki wo apne email par new post ki jaankari pane ke liye subscribe kare. Blogger se related or post padne ke liye yaha click kare. Important Blogger Widgets

Hello friends jaisa ki hum sabhi jante hai google me hamari post kaa search me aana kitna jaruri hai, or Google Posts jaldi index nahi karta yeh lagbhag 2-3 days le leta hai, par agar ham koi aesi post dal rahe hai jisko jaldi search me lana ho. To uska bhi tarika hai. Google me Post Index lene me lagbhag 2-3 din lagte hai, par agar ham khud apni post ki link ko Google me Submit kare to Post search me Turant aane lagti hai. To agar aap bhi apne Blog ki Post ko Secendo me lana chate hai to ye jankari aapke liye hai. Google me Post ko Submit karna koi jada muskil nahi hai, uske liye hamari site Google Search Console me add honi chaiye or Hamari site ka Site Map Google Search Console me submit hona chaiye. Agar aapne Phele se ye kar rakha hai to ab aapko bas Link Submit karni hai. Step 1 Sabse Phele Google Search Console me Login kare. Step 2 Apni Website par jaye. Step 3 Search Console ke Dashboard me ja kar. Crawl Fatch as Google par jaye. Step 4 Ab jo page khulega uske Post ka URL Submit karna hai. Aapki Post ka URL kuch is trha hoga httpshindimehelp.comhtml-sitemap-page-blogger-wordpress-ke-liye or agar Blogger par Blog hai to kuch is trha httpshindimehelp.com122015html-sitemap-page-blogger-wordpress-ke-liye Jesa bhi ho aapko apni website ka Naam hata kar baki ka URL dalna hai Q ki website ka naam phele se add hoga. Image me dekh sakte hai. Step 5 Ab Post ka URL list me add ho jayega. Step 6 ab ek Popup aayega. Step 7 Boom !! Apka post index ho chuka hai google pe post search karke check karlo Important Note Aap 1 month mein sirf 500 posts index kr sakte ho iss method se aur mere hisaab se yeh thik value hai post index karne ke liye. New Update Google me URLs Direct Search Result Page se submit kar sakte hai, janiye kaise. Ye Bhi Pade Ye Guest Post hai jo Ankit Jha ne send ki hai jo talktimetricks.net ke Owner hai. Agar aapbhi HMH.pe Guest post karna chate hai to yaha click kare.

Is post me ap log Free SEO Extensions ke bare me janenge jinhe ap apne chrome browser me install kar sakte hai, Blog ke liye SEO me ye extension aapki bhut help kar sakte hai. Post start karne se pehle me apko bata du ye ik guest post hai HMH.pe . me asha karta hu apko meri ye post apko pasand aayegi or is post me apko kuch naya sikhne ke liye milega. Meri post ka title hai seo extensions chrome browser ke liye yani aise extension jo ik blogger ke liye bahut jaruri hote hai seo ke jankari ke liye or jinka use karke wo dusre blogger ke site ke seo position, backlinks, domain authority, page rank etc ke bare me asani se jankari prapt kar sakte hai. Agar ap ik new blogger hai or apke blog ka seo accha nahi hai to ap in extension ko apne chrome browser me install karke seo ke jankari prapt kar sakte hai or apne blog ke bhi seo position check kar sakte hai es post me mai apko aise he kuch seo extensions ke bare me bataunga jo apke liye fhayademand hai phele hum jante hai chrome extensions hote kya hai. Chrome extension software ke tarahe he hote hai jaise hum computer me kisi new task ke liye software install karte hai same use tarhe hum browser me online work karne ke liye extension install karte hai yani software or extension me fark sirf itna hai ke software computer me install kiye jante hai or extension browser me. Simple sabdo me kahe to. Extension se Browser ko ham or jada useful feature add kar sakte hai. Agar aap nahi jante Google Chrome Extensions Kaise Intall kare to uski jankari aapko yaha milegi, jisme 5 important Extension ke ware me bhi bataya hai. Ye extension ik blogger ke liye bahut he jaruri extension hai agar ap ik blogger hai to apko seo ke bhi jankari hogi is extension ko ap apne chrome browser me install karke kisi bhi site ko open karke uske page authority, domain authority, link profile, keyword highlights etc ke bare me jan sakte hai. iske alawa agar ap iska paid version use karte hai to apko or bhi bahut sare features milte hai jo ek blogger ke liye jaruri hote hai. MozBar Seo quake ik bahut he badiya extension hai bloggers ke liye seo quake ke apni website bhi hai jiska link hai www.seoquake.com ap is site par bhi iske tools ka use kar sakte hai. seo quake ke site par apko bahut se free tools milenge, seo quake extension bhi seoquake.com ne he develop kiya hai, ap is extension ke dwara kisi bhi site ka no follow links, page source, semrush rank, google page rank, google index, yahoo links, bing index, web archive page, alexa rank etc ko dekh sakte hai iske alawa or bhi feature hai is seo extension me. SEO quake Buzzsumo extension bhi ek bahut he badiya extension hai kyoki es extension ka use karke aap kisi bhi site ke social media popularity ke bare me jan sakte hai. Buzzsumo extension bilkul free hai, is extension ka use karke ap kisi bhi web page ke bare me jan sakte ho ki use facebook, twitter, linkedin, pinterest, google, par kitna share kiya gaya hai facebook par kitne likes, comments, mile hai iske alawa ap is extension me backlinks bhi check kar sakte hai. Buzzsumo Ahref ek bahut he badiya extension hai or ese ahrefs.com site ne develop kiya hai or ye extension bilkul free hai ahrefs.com ek bahut he popular seo programming site hai or eski site par apko bahut se seo tools milenge. ap ahref extension me bhi kisi bhi site ke ahref rank, social signal for google, facebook, twitter, number of backlinks, domain rank etc ke sahi jankari check kar sakte hai. Ahref Majestic backlink analyzer extension ka use karke ap kisi bhi site ki backlinks ki puri jankari prapt kar sakte hai. iss extension ka use karke ap backlinks ko summery me jan sakte ho. Mojestic backlink analyzer Ye extension bhi ik bahut hi badiya chrome extension hai ek extension ko install karke jab aap kisi bhi site ko visit karenge to apko us site ke puri traffic data ke jankari, site ke pageview, visitors etc ke jankari mil jayegi jo ik blogger ke liye kaafi fhayademand hoti hai. Page analytics by google Ye extension bhi ek blogger ke liye kaafi badiya hai kyoki es extension ka use karke ap kisi bhi site ke broken link ka pata laga sakte hai. Linkminer Seo website analysis extension ko woorank.com website ne develop kiya hai woorank ik online tool website hai jaha par ap kisi bhi website ke seo position, backlinks, traffic, technical seo errors check kar sakte ho or seo website analysis extension me bhi ap kisi bhi site ka seo score check kar sakte ho. Seo website analysis Ye Sabse Best or Free extension hai Keyword research ke liye, ki iski madad se direct search page par hi dekh sakte hai ki wo keyword itni war search kiya jata hai, kitna uska CPC hai or kitna uska competition hai. Keyword Everywhere Broken Link 404 link hona aam baat hai, ki hamne koi link add ki or baad me wo page remove ho jaye to 404 error aati hai, jo ki hamari ya kisi bhi website ke liye sahi nahi hai. to aap iss Check My Links Chrome Extension ki madad se aasani se pata kar sakte hai ki koi link broken to nahi hai, taki usko tikh kar sake. Check My Links I hope aap logo ko ye post pasand ayi hogi, or aapko in extension se SEO me bhut faida milega, agar koi or Extension jo list me rhe gaya jo to aap comment karke jarur bataye.

Hello Dosto Mera Name Vivek Raj Gyanwebpoint.com Meri Website hai. Mai Aapne Website Par Internet, Blogging, Android, Computer Etc Se releted Information Share Karta Hu, HMH.pe Aaj Mujhe Guest Post Karne Ka Mauka Mila Jiske Liye me Rohit ji Ko Thanks Bolna Chahta Hu. Aaj Mai Aapko Batane Wala Hu Youtube Ke Liye Intro Video kaise Banate Hai. Intro Video Ka Matlv Hota Hai Introduction Video Jisme Aap Apni Channel Ka Introduction dete hai. Agar Aapke pass Youtube Channel Hai, or Aap Youtube Se Earning Karna Chate Hai, youtube par succes hona chate hai to aapko Apne YouTube Channel Ke Video Ko Professinal Look dena Hoga. Video Ko Professinal Look Dene Ke Liye Aapko Apne Video Ke Start Me Intro Video Ko Add Karna Hoga, Bina Intro Video Ke Aapne Channel Ki Video Ko Koi Pahchan Nhi Ho Pati Hai. Agar aap Ek Badiya High Quality Video kaise banaye uske ware me or jada jaanna chate hai to aap hamari is post ko read karke jaan sakte hai. Intro Video Ko YouTube Video Me Add Karne Se Aapki Video Dekhne Me Kafi Acchi Lagegi, Or Viewer Aapki Video Ko Dekhte He Samjh Jayege Ki Video Kis Channel Ke through Upload kiya gya Hai. Intro Video Me Aap Apni Channel Ke Bare Me Bata Sakte Hai, ya Normal Animated Logo laga sakte hai. Intro Video Banane Ke Liye Bhut Sare Software Aate Hai, Our Bhut Sare Online Website hai jaha aap Intro Video Ko Bana Sakte Hai. Mai Aapko Sabse Easy Website Ke Bare Me Batane Wala Hu Jaha Aap badi aasani se apne YouTube Channel Ke Liye Intro Video Bana Sakte Hai. To Chaliye Dekhte Hai YouTube Ke Liye Intro Video Kaise Banaya Jata Hai. Step 1 Sabse Pahle Aap panzoid.com Ki Website Par Jaye, Or Waha Apna Intro Video Select Kare. aapko jo design formate pasand aaye aap wo select kar sakte hai. Step 2 Ab Next Window Open Hoga. Yaha Open In Clipmaker Par Click Kare. Step 3 Ab Fir Aapke Samne Ek Next Window Open Hogi. Step 3 Ab Aapke Samne Text Editor Open Hoga. To Is tarah Aap Intro Video Ko create kar sakte hai. I Hope Aapko meri post jarur pasand aayi hogi. Agar aapko meri post acchi lagi to plese Ise Share Kare. Youtube se sambandit agar aapka koi bhi sabal hai to aap wo bhi comment karke puch sakte hai. Ye ek Guest Post hai HMH.pe , Agar aap bhi Guest Post karna chate hai to yaha click kare or dusri Guest Post Read karne ke liye yaha click kare.

Hello Friends, Agar aapki koi website hai to aapne Google search console me apni usko add karke apni site ka .xml site map jarur add kiya hoga, agar nahi kiya to abhi kare ye bhut jaruri hai hamari site ko search me achi se index karne ke liye. Ussi trha HTML SiteMap bhi hota hai jiske bare me ham aaj baat karege. Start karne se phele aap ek bar mera HTML Site Map dekh lijiye aapko sab samaj aa jayega ki ye kya hai or iska kya use hai. HMH HTML SiteMap Site Map simple hamari puri Post ki list hoti hai, jiski madad se Search Engine ko hamari site ko jaldi se index karke post ko search me dikhne me madad milti hai. Site Map ham 2 trha ke bana sakte hai .XML Site Map kaise Google me Submit kare uski jankari yaha hai Jada na khichte huee simple me aapko batata hu kya karna hai, HTML SiteMap banane ke liye Blogger me. Step 1 Apne Blogger ke Dashboard me ja kar New Page Create kare. Step 2 Ab jo Page Editor me Title me jo aap chahe Daal sakte hai. All Post, SiteMap, Puri Post, Page ki Body me ye Code dalna hai, HTML section me. Credit Code Sorce Step 3 jo Code hai usme ek code ki line hai blogUrl httpswww.hindimehelp.com , Enter your blog URL usme Hindimehelp.com ki jagha apni Blog ki link dale. Step 4 Agar Aap Chate hai ki aapke visitor is page par comment naa kare to aap comment disable bhi kar sakte hai. Step 5 Ab Page ko Publish karde. Isme Add karna bhi aasan hai, par iske liye hosted wordpress blog hi hona chaiye, agar Free blog hai to aap usme add nahi kar sakte. Simple aapko isme ek Plugin hai jo add karni hai, Plugin ka naam hai Hierarchical HTML Sitemap Tip Agar aap HTML SiteMap ko Apne Visitor ko bhi dikhana chate hai taki wo aapki post ko aasani se pata kar sake to aap HTML Site Map Page ki Link apne Blog ki Menu me Add kare. Blogger ki Puri Jankari yaha hai.
tum bhi uspar pyaar nyochavar karo. Jaise hi tumhara mitra koi galti kar baithe aur chappal khaye, tum jaakar us ladki ka dil behla do. Yaari dosti apni jagah, aur pyaar mohabbat apni jagah.

kaafi yogya kanyaayen dikhengi. Dhang se baat karke dosti kar lo. Baat ban jaaye to humein dhanyavaad kar dena. Aisi vaisi baatein ki to hamare shraap se bach nahi paoge. Kaafi jan hamare shraap ka asar dekh chuke hain.
jaakar uski saheliyon ki khoob tareef karo. Wo sochegi ki unmein aisi kya baat hai jo usmein nahi. Aur khud hi tumhari taraf khinchi chali aayegi.
aankhon mein aankhen daalkar hi baat kiya karo. Pet mein titliyan ud rahi ho fir bhi ekdum vishwaas se khade rehna.
shakkar lene ke bahane uske ghar ke chakkar kaatna koi buri baat nahi. Fir ek din use chai peene apne ghar bulake apna dil ka haal bayaan kar do.
kahan kahan jaati hai. Uske baad kam se kam 21 dino tak uske saamne mat aana. Wo khud bechain hokar tumse baat karne ke liye bekaraar ho jaayegi. Dhyan rahe is tarike mein pitaai ka khatra hai.
hamesha uski saheliyon ki tareef karo. Uski tareef mat karna jise tum pasand karte ho. Uske man mein jalan paida karo. Isse wo tumhari taraf aakarshit hogi.
saath mein ghar parivaar ki bhi 2-4 baaten kiya karo. Jitna jyada apnapan dikhaoge utne hi fatafat wo tumhari apni ban jayegi.

Blog ki loading speed fast hona bhi ek Google ranking factor hai, agar apko apne blog ko better On-Page optimize karna hai to page loading speed ko bhi dhyan me rakhna hoga. Waise yah question comments se bhi pucha gaya hai, aur yah kaafi blogger ki problem hoti hai. Website or Blog ki Loading Speed ki jo Problem hai chaiye dekhte hai kaise usse nipta jaye or kya kya kar sakte hai apne blog ki speed badane ke liye Agar ek eCommerce site per day $100,000 earn karti hai, tab is site ki loading speed 1 second kam hone se year ka $2.5 million loss hota hai. Research se yah bhi pata chala hai hai ki 47 readers yah ummid rakhte hai ki website 2 seconds me hi open honi chahiye aur agar 3 seconds se jyada bhi ho jaye to 40 readers site ko chor dete hai. Or India me to 2g Net Chalane wali bhi bhut hai to unke pass bhi site jaldi khule uske liye hame apni site ki speed badana to bhut jaruri ho jata hai. To yah janne ke bad me aap bhi chahege ki apki siteblog ki speed tezz ho? jarur chahege kyonki yah apke blog ka Google ranking to badhata hi hai aur sath me daily traffic ki chances ko bhi badhata hai. Internet par waise to kai softwarestoolsapplications hai jisse image ki size ko kamreduce kiya ja sakta hai lekin jab kaam bina koi download kiye ho jaye to wo aur achha hai. Kisi bhi Image ki size ko reduce karne ke liye apne computerlaptop me Starts me jakar Paint open kare. Aur phir paint me us image ko open kare jiski size ko reduce karna hai, phir CtrlW press kare. To apke samne kuch is tarah se ek box open hoga. Jisme 2 tarike se image ki size ko kam kar sakte hai 1. Percentage se aur 2. Pixels se. Jisme better hoga pixels wala option choose karke apni pixels ko kam kare aur phir use save karde. Aap file ki size kitni hai wo pahle Paint tool ke niche dekh sakte hai. Aur jab badme file ko save karte hai to save hone bad me size dekh kar andaja laga sakte hai ki kitni kam karni hai. Ye Bhi Pade Home page par jyada post show karne se home page load hota jata hai, jime user pareshan hokar apke blog ko chor bhi sakta hai. Blospot aur WordPress dono hi platform ke setting me aasan option hai apne home page post show karni ki sankhyaquantity tay karne ka. Home Page par kitni Post dikhana hai Blogger blog me wo kaise set kare uski jankari Image me di hai. WordPress Blog me Home Page par Post set karne ke liye Image me dekhe. Also Read How to Speed Up WordPress Blog in Hindi Waise to internet par kai aisi service hai jo free pop up provide karti hai, lekin un me se kai to bahut hard load hone wale hai. Hamesha koi bhi pop up use karne se pahle uski speed ko bhi note kare. Agar apko professional pop up use karna hi hai to uske liye Hellobar.com use kare. Jo free bhi hai aur paid bhi, yah pop up ka tool bahut hi bahtarin hai aur looking me professional bhi hai. Aur iske sath me ek yah bhi dhyan rakhe ki kya apka blog ka pop up apne mobile version me sahi open hota hai? Waise to almost top blogger Mobile par pop up ko off hi rakhte hai, kyonki mobile user ke liye yah pareshani ho sakti hai, jaise kai pop up mobile me puri screen rok leta hai aur close option dikhta hi hai aise me user site ko hi close karega.

Hello Blogger, Ye post specilly un blogger ke liye hai, jo apna blogging ka time sahi manage nahi kar pa rahe hai. Iss post me mene kuch simple Tips share ki hai Blogger ka Sedule kesa hona chaiye uske upar. Time jo sabhi ke pass 24 hours hi hota hai, ham usko to nahi bada sakte. par agar ham uska sahi se use kare to utne hi time me or logo se jada or acha kaam kar sakte hai. Chaliye dekhte hai Kesa Sedule hona chaiye Blogger ka. Note Ye me apne hisab se bataya hai. par jaruri nahi aap bhi aese hi kaam kare, Q ki ho sakta hai aap kuch or bhi kaam karte ho, ya study karte ho. Par aapko post se Idea to mil hi jayega ki kaise Blogging karna hai. Agar aapko blogging karni hai, or sahi se karni hai. to sabse important hai ki aapke kaam ka fix time ho or aap wo kaam ussi fix time me kare. Isse hoga ye, jis time jo bhi kaam karege uske aap apna 100 de payege, or agar kahi bhi success hona hai to ye bhut jaruri hai. Aap Niche di Infographic me dekhe, kis trha ek blogger apna Sedula bana sakta hai. Agar aap sabhi kaam sedule se karege to aap Daily ek post bhi kar payege or kaam karne me bhi maja aayega. Iss Infographic me jo hai, wo ek Full Time Blogger ke liye hai, par agar aap kuch or bhi kaam karte hai to uske hisab se aap apna sedule bana sakte hai. Sedule banane me jo sabse main baat hai wass aapko unka dhiyan rakhna hai Inn sabhi points ko dhiyan me rakhte huee, aap apna Time Table banaye, jisko aap follow kar sake. Q ki mera manna hai. agar hamara time table nahi hota to jo kaam ham sirf 1 ghante me kar sakte hai. wo 4 ghanto me hota hai. At Last ab aap muje comment karke bataye, ki aapka koi time table hai ke nahi blogging ka. or agar hai to aap kaise kya karte ho wo bhi bataye. taki muje or dusre Blogger ko bhi kuch sikhne ko mile. Happy Blogging.! Agar aap Iss Infographic ko apne Blog me share karna chaite hai to aap niche diye code ko post ke HTML me paste karke kar sakte hai.

Kya aapne kbhi socha hai ki kisi game ko mobile me khelne se aap lakho kma sakte hai nhi na but ye sach hai ek game hai jo aajkal bhut chal rha hai sab uske diwane hai jiska name Dream11 hai. aap me se kai log es name ko pehle bhi sun chuke honge kyouki ye game 2012 se hi chal rha hai Mujhe bhi abhi kuch din pehle hi eske bare me pta chala. asi baat nhi hai ki pta nhi tha pta tha but m eske bare m yhi sochta tha ki Dream11 cricket game hai bas game hai esse earning ? Kuch idea nhi tha but abhi kuch din pehle jab mere ak friend ne eske bare me btaya to mujhe ye kaafi achha lga or maine ese usi din join kar liya Aapke mn me esko leke bhut se swal aa rhe honge ki dream11 kya hai ? Ese use kaise kare, withdrawal kaise kare. aaj me aapko eski puri information dunga jisse aap dream11 ke bare me achhe se jaan payege. Dream11 ak website hai or eska Android app bhi hai jisko 2012 me Harsh Jain and Bhavit Sheth ne bnaya tha. eska head office maharastra mumbai me hai ager aapko sports ki achhi knowledge hai to aap es websiteapp ke jariye apni knowledge ko paiso me convert kar sakte ho. Dream11 ak online game hai jisme aapko cricket football kabadi mil jayega esme aapko players ko chose karke ak virtual kalpnik team create karni hoti hai jo aapne virtual team create ki hai wo players real life match me kaisa performance karte hai ager achha performance karte hai to kuch points aapko diye jaate hai. ager match ke end last me aapko achhe points mile or aapki ranking achhi aai to aap dream11 se ak achhi khasi rkam jeet sakte hai. ye app apko playstore par nhi milega, download karne ke liye aap button par click kare. agar aap Mobile use kar rahe hai abhi to direct download ho jayega. Download Dream11 App Download Dream11 App from Official Site Download Dream11 App Agar aap computer use kar rahe hai to aapke pass 2 option aayege download karne ke. ek to aap yha apna mobile number daal kar get app link par click kar de, dusra aap 1800-3000-9976 es number par miss call bhi kar sakte hai. dono hi process me aapke mobile number par ek link aayegi aap us link par click karke directly dream11 download kar sakte hai. dhayan rhe ye app playstore par available nhi hai be carefull.

Agar aap Search Engine Optimization achi se karke apni site ko search me lane ki puri kosis karte hai taki aapki site Google me Top par aa sake, to aapko SEO Mistakes ke ware me bhi pata hona chaiye jo aapko kabhi nahi karni hai. SEO bhut aasan hai or isko sahi tarike se karne par hamari site aasani se search me aa jati hai, par jo New hai unke liye ye bhut badi problem hai or sahi jankari na hone ke karan wo SEO me galti bhi kar dete hai, abhi ham unhi mistakes ke ware me janege or dekhege kaise unse bacha jaye. Agar aapko SEO ki jankari nahi hai to aap yaha read kar sakt hai SEO ki Puri Jankari in Hindi Sabse pheli or important hai Title Tags jinko bhut log neglate kar dete hai jo Search Engine Optimization ke liye bhut hi jaruri hota hai. Title tags ki madad se search engine or readers ko article ko samajne me aasani hoti hai. Aapka jo main Keyword hai wo aap Title me add karna naa bhule or uske sath ye bhi dhiyan rakhe ki wo readable ho Padne me aasan or samne aane layak. Jab ham koi bhi post likh rahe hai to jin keyword ko ham target kar rahe hai search me lane ke liye usko add karna bhut jaruri hai, par agar aap jabarjusti jaha uska use nahi hai waha bhi usko war war add karege to naa wo padne me sahi lagega or naa search engine ko wo pasand aata hai, isko keyword stuffing khete hai. Keyword kya hai or uska kya use hai or kitni keyword Density rakhe uske ware me mene bataya hai agar aapko nahi pata to aap unko jarur read kare. Agar aap koi article likh rahe hai or usse related koi jankari kisi dusri site par hai jo aapke readers ko fayda phucha sakti hai to usse readers ko to fayda hai hi, sath sath google bhi iss ko pasand karta hai. To aapne agar kisi dusri site ki ya apni hi site ki koi link add ki jo ab nahi hai to us link par click karne par 404 error aati hai, aesa hone par naa Google us chij ko pasand karta hai or naa wo hamare readers ke liye acha hai. Isse bachne ke liye aap apni site ko regular check karte rahe kahi koi 404 error to nahi aa rahi. Ye to aap jante hi hoge, agar aap blogging kar rahe hai to ki backlink kya hai or ye kitni jaruri hai hamari site ke liye. Backlink banana koi badi baat nahi hai aap thode time me bhut si backlink bana sakte hai par yaha backlink ye se jada uski quality depend karti hai. 20 low quality Backlink se jada 1 High Quality Backlink ki value hoti hai jo kisi authority site se mile. or agar low quality backlinks jada ho to hamari site search engine ki najar me spaming me aa jati hai. to aapko iss baat ka dhiyan rakhna hai quantity se jada quality par focus karna hai. Must Read High Quality Backlink Banane ki 6 Jaruri Points Anchor text bhi bhut important hai bhale wo internet link ho ya external link. bhut se newbies ye galti karte hai wo kisi link ko add karne ke liye uske anchor text ki jagha Click Here jese words use karte hai jo SEO ki najar se acha nahi hai. To ummid hai agar aap ye SEO Mistakes kar rahe the to ab nahi karege or apni site ko or jada SEO Friendly banayege.

Ab aapko Apne us Gmail account me login karna hai jo aapne mobile me dala hai. 3. Jese hi Aap Sign in karoge Google aapke mobile ko search karne lageha 4. Jese hi aapke Mobile ki location Google ko pata chalegi aapko Google Map par dikhne lagegi. Mobile ki jo location hogi uska ek area hoga 24 meter ka. 5. Gmail Google se related products ko access karne ki key hai. Yadi ye aapke pas nahi hai to Google ke product jaise Online Word, Excel, Drive, Google Plus, Youtube ko use nahi kar sakte. 10 50-60 , Gmail Kya Hai? Basically Gmail Account ek e-mailing service hai, jiski help se kisi bhi vande ko e-mail ke rup men apna message send kar sakte hai aur dusre vykti se receive kar sakte hai. Bas iske liye hame virtual unique address banana hota hai, jise Email Address Email ID kaha jata hai. Aur Gmail se related address ko Gmail Address Gmail ID kaha jata hai. Gmail ko Google ne 1 april 2004 ko launch kiya tha, jab ye 1 GB data storage ki free facility deta tha, jise ab badhakar 15GB kar diya gaya hai Aur Gmail ki help se 50MB ke data receive aur 25MB tak ke data ko send kar sakte hai. Ab janate hai- Gmail Account Kaise banaye aap video bhi dekh sakte hai Step 1 1. G mail.com par jaye 2.Create An Account par click kare. Create An Gmail Account Step 2 Ab ek form open hoga. Is tarah ki- Fill The Gmail Form Is form ko is tarah fill up karna hai- 1.Name Name ke first section me apna first name likhe aur last section me apna surname likhe. Yadi aapka middle name bhi hai to first name ke sath likh de. Is tarah RajKumarFirst Name SharmaLast Name 2.Choose your username Username real me aapka email address hai. Isme jaise rajkumar dale, yadi not available bata raha hai to apne pasandid number apne naam ke last me jod de. rajkumar123 3.Create a password yahan apne pasand se kuch bhi dale, par dhyan rahe- -date of birth, date of anniversary naa dale -kisi friend ya relatives ka naam na dale Aisa me isliye kah raha hun, koi bhi aapko password ko aasani se guess kar sakta hai. Isliye hamen passward me special character $! jarur dalana chahiye. 4.Confirm your passward apne jo pahle password set kiya, vahin enter kar de. 5.Birthday Is section apna actual date of birth dale. Sahi hi dale varna bad me problem ho sakti hai. 6.Gender Apna gender select kare. 7.Mobile Phone Mobile no- dale, jispar account banana chahte hai. 8.Your Current Email Address Yadi aapka koi purana email address hai to enter kare, nahi hai to empty rahane de. 9.Location County me India select kare. 10. Ab next step par click karen. Iske bad Privacy and Term ka Window open hoga. Use dhyan se read kare aur I AGREE par click kare. Step3 Ab aapko apna account verify karana hai. Verify Your Gmail Account 1.Phone number me apna number dale 2.Text Message SMS ya Voice Call Select kare. Suvidha ke anusar SMS vala option select kare aur continue kare. Step4 Kuch seconds ke bad aapke number par Google ek verification code send karega. Yadi aap nahi paa rahe hai, to atleast 15 minute tak wait kare aur dubara try kare. Yadi fir bhi nahi ho raha hai to dusre mobile number se try kare. Step5 Ab is window me verification code enter kare aur continue kare. Enter Verification Code Congrats !! ab aapka gmail account ban chukka hai. Keval continue gmail par click kare aur gmail account me jaye. E-mail Kaise Send Kare- Gmail se mail send karane ke liye ye steps follow kare 1.Left Side me Compose par click kare Compose A Mail 2.Ab ek box open hoga, ismen Message Body -To ke samane jise mail send karana chahte hai, uski e-mail id likhe. -Subject me subject likhe -Message Body me main message likhe. -Photo ya koi file send karana hai to use attach kare. -Last men Send button par click kare. Pro-Tips 1.Starred Section me Starred kiye mail milega. 2.Sent Mail Section me sent mail ke details milega. 3.Drafts Section me aapko saved mail milenga. 4.Spam Section me aap spam mail milega. 5.Trash Section me delete kiye gaye mail milega. Last jab aapka all work pura ho jaye to sign out hona naa bhule. Sign Out Iske liye top right corner me apne name ke pahle character par click kare aur sign out ho jaye. Internet Se Paise Kamane Ke 10 Best Tarike Google Ke 10 Best Interesting Secrets Hope, aapne successfully apna Gmail Account create kar liya hoga, yadi aap koi problem face karte hai, mujhe comment ke rup me puche. Aur yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai to apne friends jarur share kare.

Hello dosto mera nam hai Raj Chauhan aur meri bhi isi tarah ka ek Hindi blog hai jiska nam hai HINDI TECH WORLD aap is par visit kar ke mere posts ko padh sakte hain. Aaj ki is post me main aap ko Google ka ek popular feature I m Feeling Lucky button ke bare me batane ja raha hun aur sath aapko iska use karna bhi bataunga. Is button ko aap ne Google ke homepage pe jarur dekha hoga lekin kya aap iske bare me jante hain? Agar nahi to chaliye jante hai iske bare men. Google ke home page par do buttons hote hain pahla hota hai Google Search ka jo search results ki list ko aap ke samne rakhta hai aur I m Feeling Lucky button us search results ki list me se sabse pahle link par aap ko sedhe redirect karta hai ya pahunchata hai. Ye button aap ke liye tab faidemand hai jab aap ko vishwash ho ki Google par aane wala pahla search result aap ko usi page par le jayega jahan par aap jana chahte hain. Is tarah ye aap ke time ko bachata hai. Aur agar aap ko iske pahle search par wishwash nhi hai to iska use mat kijiye kyoki isse aap ka time waste ho sakta hain. Ye Bhi Pade Aaj kal iska istemal karna thoda muskhil ho gaya hai kyoki ab aap apne Google search box me kuch bhi type karte ho to ye fataphat results dikhane lagta hai aur phir ye button aap ke samne nhi aap pata. Aur is feature ko Instant Search Kahte hain. To aap koi se use karne ke liye Instant Search feature ko off karna hoga. Ise off karne ke liye pahle Google ke homepage par jayen phir Settings par click kar ke Search settings par click Karen. Uske bad ek page open hoga usme Never show Instant results par check Karen phir Save par click kar ke Instant results ko off kar den. Phir kya ab Google par ja kar apni manchahi site ka nam type Karen jese Hindi Me Help, FB, Youtube aur I m Feeling Lucky button par click Karen. Uske bad aap sidhe uspar redirect ho jayenge. Dosto mujhe ummid hai aap sabhi ko meri ye post pasand aai hogi. Agar pasand aai hai to ise apne friends aur relative ke facebook, twitter aur G par jarur share Karen. Ye ek Guest Post hai HMH.pe agar aap bhi Guest post karna chate hai to yaha click kare. Dusri Guest Post ko padne ke liye yaha click kare Ye Bhi Pade

Abhi ke time me aesa domain select karna jo search me aasani se aaye ye sabse pheli step hoti hai apne blog ko success ki taraf lejane ki, jiski madad se hamare blog ko search me badiya ranking milti hai. High Quality ka Domain bhut aasani se Google me rank karta hai or search me first par aasani se aa jata hai. Blog ko search me lane ke liye aapko SEO ki Puri Jankari hona bhi jaruri hai jo mene share ki hai, aap unko jarur read kare. sath sath or bhi bhut si bate hai jo hame dhiyan rakhni padti hai Starting me New Blogger jo jada tar ye galti karte hai, ki badiya domain name nahi lete or fir unko bhut paresani hoti hai google me apne blog ko rank karne me, or fir Blogging me Fail hokar Blog band kar dete hai. Jo sabse phela step hota hai Blogging me apna career banane ka, ek aesa domain register kiya jaye jo hame aasani se rank dilaye or sabse hatkar bhi ho. To Chaliye Dekhte hai kaise ham apne liye ek High Quality Badiya Domain select kar sakte hai. Domain name agar chota hota hai to acha rhata hai, logo ko aasani se yaad ho jata hai or usko wo direct bhi type karke hamari site ko khol sakte hai. Mera Suggestion hai 13 sabd se jada use naa kare domain me. Jese aapko pata hi hoga meri site ka Domain Name www.HindiMeHelp.com hai, jo 11 sabd ka Domain hai, to mene apni site ke liye HMH.pe Domain register bhi kiya or unko apni main site par redirect kardiya. jisse ab koi bhi HMH.pe type karke bhi Hindi Me Help par aa sakta hai. Domain Name aesa hona chaiye jo yaad rakhne me aasan ho, jisko koi bhi aasani se yaad rakh sake. Domain me aese hi sabd use kare jo aapki site se sambandit ho. Iska ye faida hai ki agar koi aapki site par aayega to wo double se bhi aa sakta hai q ki usko uska naam yaad hoga. or wo kisi ko direct bhi bata sakta hai ki ye koi site hai.
