Hello Friends, Ye Post Facebook ke New FB Users ke liye hai jinhone Facebook abhi abhi use karna start kiya hai ya facebook ki jada jankari nahi hai, to aapko jada tension lene ki jarurat nahi hai. Me Phele bhi kuch post share kar chuka hu facebook ke upar jese Fb ID block q hoti hai or kaise bachaye, FB Account Hack kaise hota hai blog hone se Mere Pass bhut logo ke message, Comment ke jariye ye sabal aaya hai hamne apne Mobile Number se apni facebook ID banai, fir ussi number se dusri facebook ID banali. par ab ham jab ID or Password dalte hai to New ID open hoti hai par Purani ID kaise open kare. Is Problem ka Solution jane uske phele ham jan lete hai facebook account banta kaise hai, or hamari kis galti ki baja se ye dikkat aati hai. Facebook account kaise banaye uski jankari yaha hai, jisme aapko ek EMail ID Chaiye ya fir Mobile Number. Ab bhut log Mobile number se apna account bana lete hai facebook par. to ab jab bhi unko account open karna hai to wo apna mobile number or password daal kar apni FB ID open kar lete hai. Ab Problem ye ho jati hai ki ussi mobile number se ek dusri ID banane par jo purani ID me number add hota hai wo automatic remove ho jata hai, q ki ek hi number 2 id me add nahi kar sakte. fir ham jab apna mobile number dalte hai or password dalte hai to purani ID nahi khulti q ki usme se wo number remove ho chuka hai or new banai gai ID hi open hoti hai. mujse mere bhut se dosto ko ye problem hui or sabhi mujse puchte hai or janna chate hai To muje pata chala ye ek bhut badi problem hai, jo bhut logo ko hoti hai, isliye mene is Problem se nipatne ke 2 tarike pata kare Agar aapne ek Mobile number se koi Facebook ID banai or galti se ussi number se dusri ID banadi hai to jo phele fb ID hai usme se aapka number remove ho gaya hoga. Ab agar aap apna Mobile number or password dalege account ko open karne ke liye to aapka jo new facebook account hai sirf wo open hoga to ab purane account ko kaise open kare. chaliye uski process jaan lete hai. Step 1 Sabse phele aap apni purani Account ki Profile ko kisi bhi Browser me open kare Login ki jarurat nahi hai. Step 2 Ab Browser ka jo address bar hai usme aapki profile ki link hogi. kuch is Prakar jo aapki profile ki link hai wo 2 trha ki ho sakti hai jo ye example profile link hai isme jo username hai wo 100001348796048 or R.N.Mewada hai, aap inko copy karle. Step 3 ab karna ye hai, Jab login karte hai to EMailMobile Number ki jagha aapko username dalna hai us id ka password dalna hai, ID ko open karne ke liye. fir ID open ho jayegi. Account open hone ke baad sabse phele Apna EMail Address ya apna koi dusra Mobile Number add jarur karle. Step 1 Apne Facebook me login karke setting General Email par jaye. Image me dekhe kaha kaise jana hai ya fir yaha click karke direct bhi ja sakte hai. Step 2 ab Add another email address or mobile ki link par click kare jo popup khulega usme apna email ID dale fir Add ki button par click kare. Step 3 ab Aapke Email Account par ek mail aayega facebook se. usme jo link hai uspar click karke conform jarur karna hai. Is trah Email ID add kar sakte hai Facebook account me. ab agar aap number remove bhi kar dete hai fir bhi aap login kar sakte hai apne facebook account me apni email id or password ki madad se.
Directory submission se easily backlink banaya ja sakta hai. Isse jaldi hi blog ranking me improvement ke sath organic traffic ko badhaya ja sakta hai. Yah Off Page SEO ka important part bhi hai.

India me cricket ke itne diwane hai ki yadi inki alag community bana di jaye to Cricket name ka new religion ban jayega. 10 50-60 , I am sure aap bhi cricket ke fan hai, tabhi to aap is article ko read kar rahe hai. To aapko yah jankar behad khushi hogi ki aap cricket se money bhi earn kar sakte hai. CricPlay Kya Hai, Kaise Play Win Kare Bas aapko karana hoga, apne cricket skill aur knowledge ka use. Fantasy Cricket Platform Dream11 par . Kaise karenge ye sab chaliye jante hai details me- Dream11 Kya Hai ? Dream11 India ki first most trusted fantasy sport platform hai. Jis par Cricket aur Football se related betting hoti hai. jo legal hai. Ispar users apni skill aur knowledge se money bet par lagate hai aur win karte hai. Dusri language me kahen to upcoming cricket match ke liye apna team banana hota hai. Ab aapki chune team ke players real game me achcha performance karte hai to aapko good points milega aur ranking high hogi. Jisse aap prize money earn kar sakte ai. Ye sab karane ke liye sabse pahle entry fees lagti hai, jo real me betting amount hoti hai. Is platform ko do young avid sports fans Harsh Jain aur Bhavit Sheth ne 2012 me start kiya tha. Us year dream11 ke jyada user base nahi the, lekin jaise-jaise awareness badhi to user base bhi badhane lage, 2014 me 10 lakh, 2016 me 50 lakh aur 2018 me 2 crore users ho chuke hai. Dream11 Account Kaise Banaye Paye Free Rs 100 1.Sabse pahle Dream11 App install kare. yah app Google Play Store par available nahi hai. But ye Dream11 directly install nahi hoga, kuch error aa sakta hai. Isliye smartphone ke SettingSecurityUnknown Sources allow installation of apps from unknown sources ko on kare. 2.App open kare. 3. Enter Code par tap kare. 4.Ab is form me ye details fill up kare -Enter Invite Code HINDI217OP P se pahle O hai, zero nahi code jarur enter karega, tabhi Free Rs 100 bonus milega. -Mobile No Account verification ke liye mobile number jaruri hai. -Email Id Dream11 apke mail par current game aur prize money se related info mail par send karega. -Password Minimum 8 character ka password banaye, jismen 1 number aur 1 symbol jarur include kare. Register par click kare. 5.OTP aayega, jo automatically fill up ho jayega. Ab account verify hote hi confirm ho jayega aur aapke account me Rs100 credit ho jayega. Jio Cricket Play Along Game Kya Hai Kaise Play Kare Dream11 Kaise Play Kare Aap Dream11 tab hi khel sakte hai, jab cricket world me koi series ya league ho run kar raha ho. Abhi India me IPL khela ja raha hai to aap IPL team banakar play kar sakte hai. 1.Sabse pahle koi Upcoming Match pick up kare. 2.Ab aapko ek aisi team banana hai, jiske players achche form me ho aur every players ka us match me khelne ki puri possibility ho. Aap dono teams ke best players se apni P11 bana sakte hai, but aap ek team se keval 7 players hi pick kar sakte hai. Team me aapko is type ke player select karane honge. Jiske liye aapke milate hai 100 credit points, jisse aapko 11 players buy karna hoga. 1 WK Wicket-Keeper 3-5 BAT Batsman -1-3 AR All Rounder -3-5 BOWL Bowlers 3.Ab aap jis player ko apne team me pick karan chahte hai to uske green plus button par tap kare. 4.Dono teams se mix team banana ke bad Next kare. 5.Ab selected players me kisi ko captain aur vice captain banaye. Dhyan rakhe Captain ko uske performance ka 2x points aur Vice Captain ko 1.5x points milta hai. Isliye soch samajh kar kisi bhi players ko captain aur vice captain banaye. Ye game changer sabit ho sakte hai 6. Save Team kare. 7.Aapka team kuch is tarah show hoga. 8.Ab Join Contests par click kare. 9.Aapke samne contests list open ho jayega. Jise aap Prize Money aur Entry Fees ke base par join kar sakte hai. Yah aapko user level ke base par kai type ke contests mil jayega -Mega Contest -Only for Beginners -Hot Contest -Popular Contests -Contest for Champions -Head to Head -Winner Takes All -Practice Contests Yadi aap shuruaat me experience lena chahte hai to Practice contests join kare, jo bilkul free hai. nahi to Only for Beginners contest join kare. Every contest ke sath ye details show hota hai- Total Winnings Amount Yah amount winners ko distribute kiya jata hai. Winners winner numbers Entry Fee contest me participate karane ke liye required amount XX Team Maximum team participate kar sakti hai. 10.Ab kisi contest par join kare. 11. Date of birth, State fill up kare aur Go ahead par click kare. 12. Join Contest ko confirm kare. Ab aap chahe to My Team par click kar maximum 6 team bankar contest me participate kar sakte hai. Note- Deadline ke bad aap apne team ko edit nahi kar sakte. IPL Video Download Kaise Kare Dream11 Se Points Kaise Milate Hai Dream11 jin rules se point provide karta hai. use Fantasy Point System kaha jata hai. Jo T20, ODI, Test Match, Batsman, Bowler, All Rounder, Fielder, Wicketkeeper ke liye different hota hai. T20 Cricket Form Batting Run 0.5 Bounder Bonus 0.5 Six Bonus 1 Half Century Bonus 4 Century Bonus 8 Dismissal for a duck -2 Bowling Wicket excluding run out 10 4 wicket haul Bonus 4 5 wicket haul Bonus 8 Maiden over 4 Fielding Catch 4 StumpingRun out 6 Run out 4Thrower 2catcher Other Captain 2x Vice Captain 1.5x In Starting 11 2 Economy Rate Below 4 runs per over 3 Between 4-4.99 runs per over 2 Between 5-6 runs per over -1 Between 9-10 runs per over- -1 Between 10.1-11 runs per over- -2 Above 11 runs per over -3 ODI aur Test ke liye Dream11 App me Fantasy Point System dekhen. Dream11 Contest Kaise Win Kare Dream11 me keval team bana lene se contest win nahi kar sakte hai. Ek contest win karane ke liye bahut se factors par work karna padta hai 1.Right Player Select Behatar performance vale player hi select kare, jo pichle kuch match me achche runs banaye ho aur uske present match me khelne ki puri possibility ho. All rounder players select karna sabse behtar ho sakta hai, because ye batting, fielding aur bowling me achche points de sakta hai. 2.Batsman vs Bowler Team me sabse jyada batsman select kare ya bowlers. Use aap upar Fantasy Point System se jan gaye honge. Ek batsman 1 run banata hai to use keval 0.5 point milata hai, jabki bolar ko 1 wicket lene par 10 points. 3.Weather Pitch Jahan match hone vala hai, vaha ka condition aur pitch report jarur jane. Uske according hi player select kare. 4.Small Contest Joint Kare Big contest me big competition hoga to winning chances bahut kam hoga. Isliye small contest join kare, jisse aapka winning chances jyada rahega. Pro Tip Aap deadline time se kuch minute pahle every contest ko dekhen, jisme maximum teams aur joined teams ke number me difference sabse jyada ho, use hi join kare. 5.Captain Voice Captain Ye dono role game changer hote hai. isliye jyada soch vichar kar ke hi captain ya voice captain banaye. Pro Tip Pitch batting friendly ho to opener ko caption banana achcha rahege, yadi pitch iske ulat ho to bowler ko captain bana sahi rahega. Vahi dusri taraf voice captain kisi all rounder ko banana sabse best rahega. Javani to machis ki jalati tilli ki tarah bit jati hai , lekin budhapa old age tham sa jata hai , because

isliye life partne r ki jarurat sabse jyada padti hai. 2.Kahi job nahi kar sakte, isliye paise ki jarurat sabse jyada padata hai. Kya apane apne old age ke liye taiyari kar li hai? Ham first need ki baat nahi kar rahe, balki second need ki baat kar rahe hai. Yadi aapne abhi tak kuch nahi kiye hai aur aapki age 40 years se kam hai to aap NPS aur APY se apne future ko secure kar sakte hai. India me old age ko financial strong banana ke liye NPS National Pension System aur APY Atal Pension Yojana sabse popular scheme hai, jisse aap old age ke din maje se gujar sakte hai. NPS Kya Hai Kaise NPS Account Open Kare Hamne isse pahle post me NPS ke bare bataye the, isliye is post me APY ke bare me janenge. APY Atal Pension Yojana Ke liye Apply Kaise Kare APY Jandhan Scheme ke bad Indian Government ki second largest scheme hai. Jise 9 May 2015 ko launch kiya gaya tha. Is scheme ka main object hai, unorganized sector ke employees ka future secure karana . Jiske liye pension diya jata hai. Yah pension beneficiary ko 60 year age hone ke bad investment ke base par per month Rs 1000, ya Rs 2000 ya Rs 3000 ya Rs 4000 ya Rs 5000 milata hai. Filhal Government pension ke amount ko Rs 10,000 karane par vichar kar rahi hai. Marksheet Loan Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare APY Ke Benefits APY se kai fayade hai, jo priceless hai. 1. Old age secure hoti hai. 2. Invested amount tax free hota hai. 3. Regular saving karane ki habit banata hai, jo other saving ke liye encourage karti hai. 4. Financial status strong hota hai. 5. Old age me jyada respect milata hai, kyonki paisa jo hota hai. APY Ko Kaun Join Kar Sakta Hai APY ko bhi join karane ke liye simple qualification set kiye gaye hai, jise points me jante hai. 1. India ka resident ho. 2. Age 18-40 year ho. 3. Tax Payer na ho. 4.Kisi other Social Welfare Scheme EPF ka benefit na leta ho. Atal Pension Yojana APY Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare APY ke liye apply karane ka process behad hi simple hai. 1. Application Forum download kare. 2. Forum fill up kare. 3.Bank me jama kar de. Jiske bad APY ke liye aapke bank account se premium amount automatically cut ho jayega. Jiska benefit 60 year age ke bad milega. APY Ke Plans APY ke under 60 year age ke bad Rs 1000, ya Rs 2000, ya Rs 3000, ya Rs 4000, ya Rs 5000 per month pension dene ke liye applicant ke age ke according kai plans bana rakhe hai. Ise APY Calculator bhi kaha jata hai, jiske according investment hone ke bad 60 year ke bad investor ko definitive pension amount per month milega. PM Mudra Scheme Ke Tahat Loan Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare APY Me Invest Kaise Kare APY invest karane ke liye monthly, quarterly, half yearly fix installment pay karna hota hai, jo is scheme entry karane vale candidate ki age ke according different hoti hai. Aap APY Calculator dekh sakte hai. Example- kisi person ki age 30 year hai aur vo APY scheme se 60 year ke bad per month Rs 1000 pension lena chahate hai to use per month 116 rupees ya 346 rupees quarterly ya 685 rupees half yearly pay karana hoga. Yani 1000 rupees per month pension chahane vale ko 60 ki age tak 1.7 lakh invest karana hoga. Isi tarah Rs 2000 per month pension ke liye Rs 3.4 lakh, Rs 3000 per month pension ke liye Rs 5.1 lakh, Rs 4000 per month pension ke liye 6.8 lakh aur Rs 5000 per month pension ke liye 8.5 lakh invest karna hoga. APY Card PRAN Card Kaise Download Kare Ya APY Balance Kaise Dekhe Yadi aapne abhi tak PRAN Card nahi banaya hai ya lost ho gaye hai to aap easily online PRAN Card ko bana sakate hai. Iske liye following steps follow kare, isse aap APY balance bhi jan sakte hai. 1.Is link par visit kare. 2. PRAN number janate hai to PRAN Number enter kare ya Subscriber Name, Bank Ac Number, Date of Birth, Views for Subscriber select kare. 3.Submit kare. 4.Ab aap APY Balance ko dekh sakte hai aur PRAN Card ko download kar sakte hai. FAQ Important Question Kya Government Se Bhi Contribution Milegi? Ha, Government is scheme me annual contribution ka 50 contribute karti hai, but Government per year maximum Rs 1000 ka contribution kar sakti hai. Yah contribution Govt 2016 se 2020 tak karegi. But yah benefit lene ke liye kai condition hai. 1. Is scheme ko 31 March, 2016 se pahle join hona chahiye. 2. APY ke alawa other Social Security Schemes, jaise EPF, SPF etc ka benefit naa lete ho. 3. Investor tax payer naa ho. Kya APY Ke Pension Amount Ko Increase Ya Decrease Kiya Ja Sakta Hai? Pension Amount ko keval 60 year age se pahle hi increase ya decrease kiya ja sakta hai . Jise plan upgrade ya degrade bhi kah sakte hai. Yadi pension amount increase karana chahte hai to increase hue installment ko pay karana hoga aur baki dono plans ke contribution ke different amount due amount ko 8 ki monthly compounding interest ke sath pay karana hoga. Vahi, plan degrade karna chahenge to dono plan ke contribution ka different amount excess amount ko return kar diya jayega. Yadi APY Investor Ki Death 60 years Age Se Pahle Ho Jati Hai To? Yadi 60 years se pahle hi APY Investor ki death ho jati hai to remain years investor ki age 60 year tak hone tak uske husband ya wife ko installmentpay karana hoga, yadi vo APY plan ko jari rakhana chahte hai to. Jisse death investor ki 60 years age ke bad uski wife ya husband ko lifetime pension milega aur unki death hone par nominee person ko remain invested amount return kar diya jayega. Vahi agar investor unmarried ya uska husband wife alive nahi hai to nominee ko total invested amount return kar diya jayega. Vahi agar investor ka wife husband alive hai aur is plan ko continue nahi rakhana chahte hai , to is case me bhi total invested amount return kar diya jayega. LIC Se Online Loan Kaise Le Payment Kare? Yadi APY Investor Ki Death 60 Year Age Ke Bad Hoti Hai? Is case me investor ki wifehusband ko lifetime pension milati rahegi. Par agar investor ki wifehusband alive nahi hai to nominee ko invested amount return kar diya jayega. Kya 60 Year Age Se Pahle APY Scheme Ko Close Kar Sakte Hai? Bilkul, aap in condition me close kar sakte hai. 1.Following fatal disease hone par cancer, kidney failure end state renal failure, primary pulmonary arterial hypertension, multiple sclerosis, major organ transplant, coronary artery bypass graft, aorta graft surgery, heart valve surgery, stroke, myocardial infarction, coma, total blindness and paralysis 2.APY scheme me investment karne me financially disable hone jane par. Iske bad invested amount return kar diya jayege. Note- agar aapne 31 march 2016 se pahle APY me invest kiye hai to Government contribution cut kar remain invested amount return kar diya jayega. Kya Ek Person NPS aur APY Account Open Kar Sakte Hai? Nahi, ek person ya to NPS ka ya APY scheme ka benefit le sakta hai. APY Ko Join Karne Par Kya Tax Benefit Milega? Is scheme me invested amount par 80 CCD 1 aur 80 CCD 1B act ke according tax benefit milega. Act 80 CCD 1 ke according, APY me invest ke liye Annual income ke 20 tax free hoga. Yah maximum 1.5 lakh per year ho sakta hai. Vahi 80 CCD 1B ki according, APY me invest ke liye 50,000 rupees tax free hoga. APY Pension Par Tax Dena Hoga? Ha, yadi 60 year ke bad aapka annual income taxable hai to tax dena hoga. Home Loan Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare In Last Word Life ke liye money fuel ki tarah hai, jiski sabse Jyada jarurat old age me padati hai, because us age me income resource nahi hote hai, aise me APY ki pension aapke life ko fuel up kar sakta hai. Isliye aapko jarur iska benefit lena chahiye. Yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai to Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus aur Whatsapp par share kare.

Indian Premium League IPL sabse popular twenty20 cricket leagues hai world me, jo 2008 se start hui thi. IPL ko lakho log pasand karte hai or ho sakta hai unme se ek aap jo, jinko IPL Live Match Score dekhna pasand hai. Agar aapko Live IPL Match dekhna hai to uske kuch sites or App ke ware me abhi me bata raha hu, jinse aap TV, Mobile, Laptop me badi aasani se Live t20 IPL Cricket Match Free me dekh sakte hai. IPL 2018 season 7 April se 27 May, 2018 tak chalege, jisme 8 team ek dusre se bhidegi jitne ke liye, In romanchij 20-20 Cricket match ko Live dekhne ke ye rahe kuch Best tarike. Start Sports Official Channel hai jaha IPL live match dikha sakte hai. Agar aap TV par Live Match dekhna chate hai to Aap Star Sports TV channel par dekh sakte hai. Start Sports ka Androd App bhi hai agar aap Mobile par dekhna chahe to usko install kar sakte hai. Hotstar ek bhut badi streaming service hai. Ispar IPL dekhne ke liye alag hi section diya hai App or Website par. Hotstar ek paid service hai par aap inpar one month ke liye free trial me match dekh sakte hai. Ye ek popular cricket related website hai, jiske ware me sabhi cricket lover s ko pata hi hoga. Iss site par ham Live Cricket Match dekh sakte hai, sirf IPL match nahi, baki bhi jitne cricket tournaments and leagues hote hai wo bhi HD format me. Agar aap www.us.ipl.indiatimes.com par jate hai, to aap IPL Match ko live dekh sakte hai. Ye website manily un logo ke liye hai jo IPL ke sokin hai par India ke bahar hai to wo isski madad se High Quality me Live Match dekh sakte hai. Agar aapko India me iss site par Live IPL Match dekhna hai to aapko VPN ka use karna padega. cricket.about.com par badi aasani se Live Free IPL Match dekh sakte hai, jiske liye simpel site open karna hai. Yaha Live IPl match ke aalawa bhi baki ki jankari mil jati hai Match se related, jese post-match events, scorecards, performance reviews, player information etc. TVmazza par bhut si movie or TV show free me dekh sakte hai. Ye Website jo India me nahi hai unke liye sahi hai. or agar aapko India me ipl live streaming dekhna hai to aapko VPN ka use karna padega. ipl live streaming cricket 365 tv par dekhna bada hi aasan hai. Yaha aap last year ke IPL Match bhi dekh sakte hai. Match ke aalawa aap iss website par Players ka Interview bhi read kar sakte hai. iplt20.com sabse sahi website hai IPL Match ke liye, jaha IPL Match ki puri jankari mil jati hai. ipl t20 live score, Konsi team ki kya rank hai, kab konsa match hai ya kis player ki konsi rank hai. ye Mobile or computer dono me badiya se chalti hai. ye website manily Live Cricket Match ke liye hi hai jada ham IPL matches live dekh sakte hai. iske aalawa yaha dusre tournaments or leagues ke Live match bhi dekh sakte hai. Agar Internet connection slow hai uske baad bhi iss site par achi se chalte hai live match. Crictime ki 2 website hai www.crictime.cc or www.crictime.to jinpar aap Live IPL dekh sakte hai. Agar aapko t20 Live dekhna hai to aap in sites ka bhi use kar sakte hai. agar aapka Internet connection acha hai to aap aasani se bina rukabat ke IPL dekh payege. Ab aap Jaan chuke hai, Live IPL Match kaise dekhe or kaha dekhe. Wese IPL ka Live dikhane ka licance Startsports or Hotstar ke pass hai ke pass hai par agar aapko Free me dekhna hai to aap dusre tariko ka use kar sakte hai. Comment me bataye kya aapko IPL pasand hai or aap kis team ko support karte hai.

Online paisa kamana har bloggers ki top choice hoti hai. Lekin jyadatar bloggers isme fail ho jate hai. Yadi aap paisa kamane ke bare me soch rahe hai to sabse pehle aap apna time aur diyan waha sahi jagha lagaye. Har ek bloggers Ke liye adsense ko approved karana ek tarah se sapna hota hai. Aur jab unka adsense ka account approved ho jata hai aur jab adsense ka ads apne blog me laga dete hai to wah moment unke life ka ek happiness moment hota hai. Lekin uss happiness ka end tab hota hai jab kuch din ke baad bloggers apne adsense ki earning ke dashbord ko dekhte hai, kyoki unki adsense ke earning bahut hi kam hoti hai. Also Read Adsense Approve hone ke phele kya kya hona chaiye Adsense se online paisa kamana dusri monetization company se hard hota hai. Jab bloggers ke adsense ki earning bahut hi kam yaa naa ke barabar hoti hai to sabhi ke man me yahi question ata hai ki aakhir hm adsense se paisa kamane me fail kyo hote hai. Aaj ke post me hum issi baat par cover karege ki new bloggers adsense se online paisa kamane me kyo fail ho jate hai. Mai aapko un point ko batata hu jiske karan log adsense se paisa kamane me fail ho jate hai. Jab kisi new bloggers ka google adsense ka acount approved ho jata hai to woh turant Ussi hi din se hajaro dollar $$$$ kamane ke bare me sochne lagta hai. Jo har ek bloggers ki sabse badi mistak hai. Adsense ke Jaldi Paisa nahi hota hai. Google adsense se paisa kamana itna asan bhi nahi hai. Maine aapko pahle hi bola hai ki Other monetization methods ke bajaye adsense se paisa kamana bahut hi hard hai Q ki inki Term Conditions bhi bhut strick hai. Aise bahut se log hai jinke blog ka traffic bahut high hai phir bhi woh mahine me $100 se jyada nahi kama pate hai. Mai bus yahi kehna cahuga ki adsense se badiya paisa kamane ke liye sabse pehel aapko uske har ek method ko smjhna hoga. kabhi bhi jaldi paisa kamane ke chakkar me naa padhe. Aap Internet ya kahi bhi phele din se Paise nahi kama sakte. adsense se online paisa kamane me fail hone ka dusara karan ads placement hai, Agar aap proper ads placement nahi karege to aapko earning bhut kam hogi. Jab bhi adsense ads lagaye jaye to convenient fill karke ads naa palce kare. Google supports page par Ja kar Ads Placement ke bare me lern kare aur ye bhi learn kare ki kaha kaha ads ko place kar ke CTRclick-through rates ko increase kar sakte hai. Papular forum par bhi jaa kar Ads Placement ke bare me jankari le. Adsense ke ads ko put karne ke ek sabse badiya aur working place hai header. Jab aap header par apne adsense ke ads ko place kare to waha par aap 72890 ka bannar ads hi put kare. Ye baat bhi dhyaan me rakhe ki ek webpage par 3 ads se jyada ads naa palce kare kyoki aisa karne par aap google ke dawra banned ho sakte hai. Adsense hame 3 Banner ads or 3 Link ads allow karta hai ek page par. Mere Adsense account me ek message aaya tha usme muje 300 250 ki jagha 336 280 ads size use karne ko kaha gaya. jab muje ads ke size ka sahi matlab samaj aaya. Ads agar ham bade lagayege to jo sabse jada pay karne wala ads hoga wo display hoga. agar chote size ka ads jada pay kar raha hoga to wo. par agar ham chota ads size use karte hai to sirf chota hi ads dikh sakte hai. Adsense ki Ads Placement Policy Hindi me aap yaha read kar sakte hai. bina Seo ke naa aap blogging me success ho sakte hai aur naa hi adsense ki earning ko incrase kar sakte hai. Seo ek bahut hi important part hai internet marketing me. Sabse pehle aap kuch forum aur Seo ki top website par jaye aur waha par seo ki kcuh basic technique ke bare me learn kare. Seo ke madhyam se apne blog ki quality aur ranking ko improved karne ki kosish kare kyoki blog ranking improved karne par aapke adsense ki income bhi improved hogi. Apne post me kuch hardcore SEO karne ki kosish kare. Only link-building karne se aapko help nahi milega. Basic seo aapke ranking ko impproved karne ke liye sufficient hai. Iske sath sath apne outbound links aur refferal link ko low quality site se control kare. Aapke adsense ki income number of click par depends hai. Yadi aapka blog visitors ko nahi attracting kar payega to aap apne blog par click kaise payege. Apne blog par quality content ko publish or share kare se aapke reader aapki or post to padna chahege par aapki post ka time fix naa hone ke karan unko dikkat aayegi. Apne content ko posting karne ke liye ek schedule banye jaise- once a day, once in two days, once in a week, aur isko apne reader ke liye fix kar de. Aisa karne se aapke reader ko pata hoga ki aap apne artical ko kab publish karege. daily posting karna importent nahi hai balki regularly posting karna importent hai. Bhut-War kuch log apne low Adsense income ko dekh kar paresan ho jate hai. Aur Isi karan wah apne account me kuch extra karne ke chakkar me galti kar dete hai jiski wajah se unka adsense ka acount banned ho jata hai. yadi aap apne adsense se income generate karne me fail hote hai to aap khud apne ads par click karna naa start kare aur naa hi dusare ko click karne ke liye bole. google aapse jyada smart hai aur woh aapke fraud activities ko turant catch kar lega. Agar aisa hua to aap apna adsense ka acount kho dege. Isliye google Adsense ke term aur condition ke hisab se hi chale. Agar Adsense Account par Invalid Activity ho to uski report Adsense Team ko kaise de yski jankari yaha hai. At last To ab aap Jan Chuke hai ki Adsense account me Income karne me log q fail hote hai. Chaliye ek bar fir se revision kar lete hai kya karan hai adsense se income naa hone ke ye bate diyan me rakhege to aap bhi adsense se achi income kar sakte hai. Meri adsense se starting me bhut kam income thi, par jese jese hamara account purana hota jada hai, or hamari site ke visitor badte jate hai aese hi jo CPC hai ads ka wo bhi badta jata hai. Agar aapke dimag me or koi aesa karan hai jiski baja se log Adsense Se Paisa kamane ke Fail hote hai to comment karke bataye. Adsense ke Sabhi Sabalo ke Jabab To aab aap bataye, aapko kya lagta hai. Q log adsense se paise nahi kama pate, or jo point post me bataye hai unme kitni sachai hai.

Online Free Survey karke Google Rewards Earn kare. Janiye kya hai Google Opinion Rewards or kaise kaam karta hai. Iss Article me ham janege Google Opinion Rewards ek survey App hai jisme mobile App or services ka survey liya jata hai. Iss App ko Google ne Developed kiya hai jiska maksad hai servey ke jariye logo ka kis chij me kesa interest hai pata lagaya ja sake. Jab bhi koi Servey karte hai App me, to uska rewards ke rup me kuch paise milte hai jo kahi bhi use kar sakte hai. Google Play Store Se Google Opinion Rewards App Install Kare. Install Hone Ke Baad Open Kare. Open karne Ke Baad Aapse Kuch Personal Details Mangega. Us Hisab Se Aapko Survey dene ke liye aayege. Aap apni detail submit kar dege. uske baad agar aapke liye koi servey hoga to aap Answer Survey par click karke wo servey de sakte hai. Ab Hamein Kuch Disclaimer Dikhayega Jisme Survey Ki Thodi Jankari Hogi Use Yes Kare. Isake Baad Aasan Sa Survey aa jayega, usko Aap Fill Karte Jaye. Tips Jyada Play Credits Paane Ke Liye Hamesha Positive Answer Hi Select Kare Jisse Google Aapko Achhe Credits De Ab Aapka Survey Complete Hone Ke Baad Aapke Play Credits Aapko De Diya Jayega Yaad Rakhe Jo Play Credits Aapko Diye Jayenge Wo Is Din Se 1 Year Ki Validity Hoti Hai. Isliye Expire Hone Se Pahle Hi Spend Kar De. Google Play Credits Ko Hum Google Ke Products Mein Spend Kar Sakte Hai. Agar Aap Jyada Travel Ya Kahin Jate Hai To Google Aapse Har Jagah Visit Karne Par Wahan Se Related Survey Send Karega Jisse Jyada Credits Earn Kar Sake Iske Liye Hamein Kuch Settings Karni Padegi. Jisse Google Ko Pata Chale Ki Aapne Kahan Kahan Visit Kiya Jisse Aapko Survey Send Ho. Step 2 Ab Niche Dikhaye Gaye SS Ki Tarah Dono Settings Ko On Kar Dijiye. Whatsapp Group banana jitna aasan hai, utna hi muskil hai group ko active banaye rakhna. Agar aapka Whatsapp Group hai or aap chate hai ki aapka Group active bana rahe hai or sabhi member usme active rahe hai to aap iss post ko pura jarur read kare. Abhi me aapko Kuch Tips or Tricks share karuga, jinki madad se aap apne Whatsapp Group ko ek Successful Whatsapp Group bana sakte hai. Whatsapp Mobile me use hone wala sabse popular messenger app hai ye to aap jante hi hoge, jo lagbhag har smartphone me install hota hi hai. Aapko ye bhi pata hona chaiye ki ham Whatsapp se Paise bhi kama sakte hai. or WhatsApp Business App se bhi apne Business ko bada sakte hai. Ek Successful Whatsapp Group banane se phele apko, Group ka Niche Topic sochna hogga. jiss ka related aap us Group mein Post karega. Ab ek Niche kuch bhi ho skta hai. Jaise ke mobile review, motor bikes etc. But, mai recommend kroga k aap apna niche apne Interest ke according hona Zarori hai. Abb apne ek whatsapp group bna liya hai. Pr kamm yhi pr khatam nhi hota hai. Kyuki abhi apko Group ke niche mai interested Member s ko Find krna hai. Fir unhe apne Group mai Invite bhi krna hai. aap apni Niche ke Related Whatsapp Groups ko join kare. aur un Group ke active member s ko apne group ke barra mai bataye. Unko bhi apna Group mein Join karne ki Request kare. Aap Kisi bhi Topic ke Whatsapp Group ki list direct Google par search karke find kar sakte hai. EK baat ka dhiyan rakhe, Group me jitne bhi member ho, jab tak wo active naa ho unki koi value nahi hai. to kosis kare sirf unhi ko add kare jo Group me ad hona chate hai. Group me jab bhi koi New member add ho to unko welcome kare or uske ware me Group me dusre member ko bataye. Welcome karne se jo new member hai wo bhi thoda special mehsus karege or group me interest dikhayege. Welcome karne ke sath sath aapko new member ko Groups ke rules bhi batana hai taki wo usko khusi khusi follow kare. Effect is tarike se sabhi New Joined Member apne aap ko special Mann ne lagega. Aur vo sabhi members aap ke saath kuch engage Ho Jayenge. Aap ko Apne WhatsApp group mein add daily content post karna hai. aap ko Aisa high quality content post karna hai, jisse Sabhi Group Members Roz aapke group ko open Kar ke apke latest Posts check kare. Effect Es tarika se group members ki activeness increase ho Jayegi. Jaisa k Hum Sab Jante Hain ke Koi Bhi Person ko text padna Se Jyada mza video or audio sunne me ataa hai. Toh aap apne WhatsApp group mein videos and audios share karna Shuru kar dijiye jisse aapka engagement Aur Bhi Jyada strong ho jayega. Whatsapp Group Members ko hamesha as a Family Treat kare. Unki Har Ki Problem ko Solve kare. Apko Apne Group ko Problem Solving Product banana hai, na k ek Profit making Product. Agr apne apne Group ko PSP Problem Solving Product bna diya tu paisa apne aap apne shru ho jaiga. Apko Apne Whatsapp Group mai Month mai 1 bar ek survey conduct krna chahiya. Essa apko unka Interest janne mai help milegi. Aap unka Interest ka according hi group mai post kare. At Last To Dosto upar bataye Tips or Tariko ka use karke aap ek active or badiya Whatsapp Group bana sakte hai. ummid hai isse aapko Whatsapp marketing me jarur bhut help milegi. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi comment karke jarur bataye, or agar aapka Whatsapp Group Engagement se related koi question ho to aap wo bhi jarur puche. Ye ek Guest post hai HMH.pe , Agar aap Bhi Guest Post karna chate hai to yaha Submit kare.

Google ek Search Engine hai or abhi wo Hindi par bhi focus kar rahe hai ki jo Hindi Content creator hai, unki wo help kare taki jin user ko Hindi me content chaiye untak google badiya content phucha sake. Google Webmaster ke English me bhut si guides Internet par hai, par Hindi me nahi hai. to Google Team ki hi taraf se ek Yotube series start ki hai, jisme wo Google SEO, Website se related sabalo ke jabab Hindi me dete hai. Iss series ko jo host kar rahe hai unka naam Abhas Tripathi hai, jo Google Webmaster Specialist hai, jo Specially Hindi Webmaster ki Help karne ke liye hai. Abhi me aapse wo sabhi Video share karuga, jisme users ne Question Puche or Google Team ki taraf se uska kya jabab mila, ummid hai isse aapko bhi bhut kuch sikhne ko milega, or agar aapka koi doubt hoga to wo clear ho jayega. Que Kya Backlink banane ke liye paise or time karch karna chaiye or kya Backlinks Website ke liye jaruri hai? Also Read Que Ek Page par kitne Link hona chaiye, or kya bhut jada Link se kuch galat prabhav bhi site par padh sakte hai? Que Website me kis bhasa me likhna jada sahi hai hindi ya Hinglish, or agar Hinglish me likhte hai to kya usme ghabrane ki jaruri hai? Kuch logo ko lagta hai Hinglish me likhne se paresani me pad sakte hai.

Koi bhi kaam ho, agar unpar bina research kare, kaam kare to usme success ke chance bhut kam ho jate hai. To agar kuch bhi start karna hai to sabse phele uspar research kare, usko analyse kare ki aapke liye kya sahi rahega. Agar aap Blog Banane ka soch rahe hai, to ye nahi kisi bhi dusre ka blog dekha or khud ka blog start kar diya, uske liye phele aapko dekhna padega, ki aapke liye kya sabse best rahega jisme aap success ho pao or acha result mile. Blog Aap kisi bhi topic par bana bana sakte hai, mene 100 Blog Topics share kiye hai aap wo list bhi jarur check kare, to aapko idea ho jayega kitne topic par blog bana sakte hai. Agar aap Blog bana rahe hai to aapko ye pata hona bhi bhut jaruri hai, ki aapka Interest kis chij me hai. Apna Interest pata karne ki Technic mene yaha share ki hai. Abhi me aapko ek World ki ek sabse best Technic ke ware me batane wala hu, jiska use badi badi companies, or jo successful log hai wo karte hai. uss Technic ka naam hai SWOT Analysis. SWOT ka matlab hai Strengths Khubi, Weaknesses Kamjori, Opportunities Avsar and Threats dikkate Sabse phele aapko apni jo Strength hai wo phechanni hogi, jisme aap achi ho, uske baad aapko apni Weaknesses dekhni hai. ki aapne kya kamiya hai. Ab aapko apne Strength or Weaknesses ke base par dekhna hoga ki aap aesa kya hai jo abhi tak kisi ne nahi kiya jo aap kar sakte ho, jiske karan aap success ho sako, or last me aapko apni success ke bich me kya kya paresani aayegi usko analyse kare. Chaliye dekhte hai iss Technic ka use kaise kare Blogging me, or ek badiya topic select kare jisme sabse jada faida ho.

SBI India ki sabse badi Government Bank hai, Jiske crores customer hai, jinme ek aap hai aur aap apne account ka balance janana chahte hai. 10 50-60 , To main aapko bata dun aap kuch simple tarike se ghar baithe apne mobile aur pc se balance check kar sakte hai. jise ham aage jante hai SBI Mobile Banking Activate Kaise Kare SBI Balance Enquiry Kaise Kare Ham aapko balance enquiry ke liye four tarike bata rahe hai, jo behad hi simple aur effective hai. 1.Missed Call Method Yah method sabse easy hai, jisse aap quickly apne SBI account ka balance jan sakte hai. bas aap following steps follow kare 1.Sabse pahle aapko is service ke liye bank account se linked mobile number ko register karna hoga. Aap apne account linked mobile number se ye SMS send kare REG spaceAccount Number , ab ise 09223488888 par send kar den. Kuch minute bad service activation ki confirmation message aa jayega. Jiske bad ye service use kar sakenge. 2.Ab balance janane ke liye registered number se 09223766666 par missed call kare. Ab aapke mobile par Account Balance ka SMS aa jayega. Is tarah yadi aap account ka mini statement janana chahte hai to 09223866666 par missed call kare. YONO by SBI App Kya Hai Kaise Use Kare 2.SMS Method Pahle vale method ki tarah yah bhi easy method hai but thoda-sa time consuming vala hai. 1.Is service start karane ke liye aapko bank account se linked mobile number se following message send karna hoga. REGspaceAccount Number , ab ise 09223488888 par send kar den. Service activation hone ke bad confirmation message aayega. 2.Ab aap SMS se balance enquiry kar sakte hai, bas aap is SMS ko registered mobile number se send kare. BAL , ise 09223766666 par send kar den. Isi tarah mini statement janane ke liye MSTMT type kar 09223866666 par send kar den. Yadi aap last 6 months ka transaction janana chahte hai to ye try kare 1.Aapke bank account se aapka email id link hona chahiye, usi par bank last 6 month transaction ki pdf file send karega. 2.Ab type kare, ESTMT space Account Number space code . Code four character password hoga, jise aapne type karana hai aur PDF file open karte vakt iski jarurat padegi. Jio Payments Bank Kya Hai Kaise Saving Account Open Kare 3.ATM Card Method Aap nearest ATM Center visit kare aur ye steps se follow kare 1.ATM machine me ATM Card swipe kare. 2.Screen par show ho rahe options me Balance INQ par click kare. 3.Ab PIN enter kare. 4. Current or saving me se apna account type select kare. Generally sabka saving account hota hai. 5.ab aapko kuch amount show hoga, vahi aapka Bank Balance hai. Airtel Payment Bank Me Saving Account Kaise Open Kare 4.Online Method Is method ke liye aapke account par Internet Banking Service enable hona chahiye. Tabhi balance enquiry kar sakenge. 1.SBI ki Personal Login page par jaye. 2. Username aur password enter kar login ho jaye. 3.Homepage par Transaction Accounts show hoga, jisme aap Click here for balance par click kar balance ja sakte hai. Marksheet Loan Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare 5. App Method Yadi aap app ke divane aur technology ko lekar crazy hai to ye tarika aapke liye hai. 1. Simply SBI Quick app install kare. 2.App open kar aur Account Service me jaye aur Registration kar le. Simply aapke mobile se SBI ko registration ke SMS jayega, isliye Bank se link SIM ko slot no 1 me lagaye. Registration hone ke bad aap following chizo ki enquiry kar sakte hai -Balance Enquiry -Mini Statement -Cheque Book Request -6 Month e-statement Is service ko de register bhi kar sakte hai, bas Deregister option use kare. Iske alava aap is app se ye kar sakte hai -ATM Card Blocking -ATM card Switch onoff -Generate Green PIN LIC Se Online Loan Kaise Le Payment Kare? In Last Word Maine aapko ghat baithe aur bank jaye bina kaise SBI bank account balance jante hai to uske 5 effective and quickest method bataya hai, jise aap apne work ko easily done kar sakte hai. Yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai to Facebook, Whatsapp, Twitter aur Google Plus par share kare.

Kya Aap Aircel User Hai to jitana jaldi ho sake, aap apne Aircel Number ko kisi dusre network me port kara le, because bankruptcy ke karan Aircel company shut down ho sakti hai. 10 50-60 , Isliye aap jitna jaldi ho sake apne Aircel Number ko MNP kara len. MNP Mobile Number Portability ke liye UPC code ki jarurat hoti hai. Jio SIM Par Free Callertune Kaise Activate Kare 2 Best Method Jise aap kaise pa sakte aur kaise Aircel Number port kar sakte hai, uske liye ham combined tin tarike bata rahe hai. Aircel Number ko Dusre Network Me Port Kaise Kare 1.By SMS Yah method simple hai, lekin iske liye Aircel SIM ki jarurat padegi. Ab in simple steps ko follow kare- 1.Jaisa ki janate hai MNP karane ke liye UPC ki jarurat padti hai, uske liye Message Box me likhe. PORTspace10 digit Aircel Number Ab ise Aircel SIM se 1900 par send kar de. 2.Return me Aircel se SMS aayega, jismen Port ke liye confirmation manga jayega. Aap use confirm kar de. 3.Confirm hone ke kuch hours ke bad aapke number UPC Unique Port Code aa jayega. 4.Ab nearest SIM retailer ke pas UPC aur Aadhar Card ke sath jaye aur New SIM le le. Jio Phone Me Whatsapp Kaise Chalaye 2.By Call Is tarike ke liye aapko Aircel SIM use karne ki jarurat nahi padegi. Aap dusre network ke number se bhi UPC pa sakte hai. Bas keval apko Aircel SIM ka 20 Digit ID Number pata hona chahiye. Yadi aapko apne Aircel SIM ka 20 digit number nahi pata hai to SIM Card Info App install kare. Par Aircel SIM mobile me laga hona chahiye. Aap 1 minute me 20 digit SIM ID number jan jayenge. Ab aapne 20 Digit SIM ID number jan liya hai to ab janate hai kaise UPC code generate kar sakte hai. 1.Other Company ke SIM se 9782012345 For Rajasthan Circle par call lagaye. 2.Language select kare. 3.Aircel Consumer select kare 4.10 digit Aircel number enter kare. 5.Aapne Aircel SIM ID Number ke last 5 digits enter kare. 6.Ab UPC ka SMS mil jayega. Jiske sath adhar card ko le jaye aur SIM retailer se dusri SIM le len. PUK Code Kaise Paye All Networks Ke Liye FAQ Kya Aircel Company Shutdown hone ja rahi hai? Bankruptcy aur High Competition ke karan Aircel par 1500 Cr rupees ka loan hai aur company last 9 months se loss me hai. Hum jante hai google serch engine me speed up wordpress website blog ke related bhot search hote hai. Sab log janna chahte hai ki unki website ki speed kaise badha ske. Aap ye bhi jante honge ki online plugins and tools se bhi aware honge. But aaj ke es topic me hum .htaccess file se apni website ko kaise speed up kar skte hai. Uski puri jankari dunga. Sab ke dimag me ek hi baat hongi ki .htaccess file kaise kam karti hongi? Aur ye file ka name bhi bhot se logo ke liye to strange hoga. Aap ko janna jaruri hai ki ye wordpress htaccess file web server se connected rehti hai jo wordpress website speed up me major role play karti hai. Also Read Blog ki Loading Speed Time Ko Kaise Kam Kare Puri Jankari .htaccess ka short form Hypertext Access hai. Ye file specifically server ke configuration ko create karne ke liye hai. Ye jankari bhi bhot aavshyak hai ki ye protection bhi provide karta hai admin area ko. safeguarding, other sensitive directories , redirecting users , preventing spammers, speed up your wordpress website and so on. Itni sari facility ye ek single file ki help se hoti hai. Aapko .htaccess ke aage lage Dot. ke bare me janna bhi jaruri hai. Basically ye Dot Htaccess file ko hidden file banata hai. Jiske karan aap file ko file manager me bhi nhi dekh pate ho. Htacces file dusri file se kuch hatke hai. Ye apne aap bhi create ni hoti. Create karne ke liye go to Settings gt Permalinks, and click the Save Changes button. .htaccess file web server ke root me se create hogi. Aap badme file manager or FTP client se file ko find kar skte ho. Ek bar .htaccess file create ho jaye badme editing karke speed up karna bhot hi easy rehta hai. Uske liye aap file manager or FTP client ki help le skte ho. Agar aap File manager use kar rhe ho to code insert karne ke liye aap built in code editor ka bhi use kar skte ho. Aur appke computer se bhi file ko download kar skte ho. Bas aapko niche diye gaye changes proper way se karne honge and badme web server ki root directory me proper trike se upload karna rhega. Upar thi file manger se kaise htaccess me work kare. Ab yha me aapko FTP client se kaise work kare. Agar aap FTP client use kar rhe ho to aap manually download, edit and upload sab kar skte ho. But ek chij janna bhot hi jaruri hai ki .htaccess file me editing very careful way se hona chahiye. Koi chhoti se chhoti mistake bhi website me takniki problem la skti hai. To uske liye bhi ek achha sujav hai aap .htaccess file ko edit or change karo usse phle .htaccess file ka complete backup lelo. Bhot sari method hai .htaccess file to speed up wordpress website. Yha par hum kuch important method ke bare me janenge. Aap .htaccess file ka use file ki size compress karne ke liye bhi kar skte ho. Jaise ki html, css, javascript, XML file etc. Aap en sabhi document ki size Compress karke results ko fast load karva skte ho. Compression in Apache Servers. Google ne ek special module developed create kiya hai jiska name modpagespeed . Ye module Apache Servers me File ko compress karne ke liye use hota hai. But ye chij janna jruri hai ki modpagespeed aapke hosting provider ko support karta hai ki nhi? Godaddy and siteground module ke sab plans ko allow karta hai. Jyare hostgator , inmotion hosting and A2 hosting support VPS and Dedicated hosting packages. Ek bar jake dekhna jruri hai ki modpagespeed installed kiya gya hai ke nhi? Niche diya gya code .htaccess file me add karo aur enable the module- In case agar aapka hosting support nhi kar rha hai to aap ek dusra module hai jiska name moddeflate module use use kar skte hai. Uske andar aap niche diye gye code ko use kariye. Nginx Servers se Compression karo. Agar aapki website Nginx server pe hosted hai to niche diya gya code add kariye. Ye Cashing proven method hai website ki speed ko increase karne me. Google Page Speed Analysis and Various page Loading speed measurement tools bhi recommend karte hai. Browser cache se page speed ko enhance kare. Jab visitor aapki website par first time aata hai tab vo visitor ka browser automatically download all image,script and css file jisse aapki website properly display ho ske. Fir jab same visitor aapki website par aata hai tab browser automatically load kar deta hai sab files ko. Aur necessary files ko uske cache me store karta hai. Jisse vo apni speed ko normal se jyada payega. Uske liye aapko niche diye gaye code ko follow karna rhega. Uske liye setting expire date karni rhegi. Jo kuch bhi rhega vo website par depends karega. Image hotlinking ye ek serious issue hai aapki website ke performance ke liye. Jab dusre log aapki website ki images ko hotlinks karte hai uska meaning ke vo aapki website ki images ko directly access kar rhe hai resource link ki help se. .htaccess file aapko hotlinking ko rokne me bhi help karega. Uske liye bhi niche diya gya code ka proper use kariye. Fir koi person aapki weebsite se aapki images ko direct use ni kar skega.

Life me ek apna home banana hona har kisi ka dream hota hai, Par aaj ke time me badhate prices ke bich saving money se manchaha home buy kar pana behad mushkil hai. 10 50-60 , Marksheet Loan Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare But aap Home Loan se is dream ko fulfil kar sakte hai , vo bhi badhate prices se apne aap ko bachakar , yadi aap thodi si samjhadari dikhate hai to. Ye behad hi simple hai. jise aage jante hai Home Loan Ke Apply Kaise Kare Simply home loan ke aise person apply karte hai to jinhe new home flat buy banana hota hai ya old home ko repair karane ki jarurat hoti hai. Aise jaruratamand persons ke liye banks or financial institutions kuch interest rate par loan provide karti hai. Dhani App Kya hai Kaise 3 Minute Me Loan Le Sakte Hai ? Type of Home Loan Basically Home loan ke two type hote hai 1.New Home Flat buy karane liye loan lena, isme new home ka nirman bhi included hai. 2.Old Home ko repair karane ke liye loan lena. Home Loan Interest Interest ke base par Home loan two type ke hote hai 1.Fixed Interest Wala Loan Is tarah ke loan ke interest rate loan expiry tak same rahta hai. Is loan se sabse bada benefit hai ki aap present badhati mahangai se bach sakte hai. 2.Floated Interest Wala Loan Is tarah ke loan ki interest rate every quarter me RBI dvara jari instruction ke according set hoti hai yani changes hoti rahti hai. Is tarah ke loan se aap kuch money save kar sakte hai, but vahi interest rate increase hone par jyada EMI bhi pay karana pad sakta hai. PM Mudra Scheme Ke Tahat Loan Ke Liye Apply Kaise Kare Home Loan Eligibility Every Bank or Financial institution kisi bhi person ko loan dene se pahle achchi tarah se enquiry karti hai ki loan lene vala person loan pay karane ki capacity rakhta hai ki nahi. Jiske liye in chizon ki enquiry karti hai Financial Status Bank or Financial Institution Income and property ke base par loan provide karti hai, isliye vo salary slip and bank statement check kar sakti hai. Job Status Yadi aap salaried person hai to bank aapke two year ka record check karega, but yadi aap self employed hai to 5 years ka records check kar sakta hai. Credit History Loan dene se pahle bank loan applicant ka credit history jarur check karta hai, kuch kami pane par loan dene se mana bhi kar sakti hai. Age Loan ke liye minimum eligible age 18 and maximum eligible age 60 years hai. Money View App Se Loan Kaise Le ? In Two Hours Self Assessment Kitne Loan Le Sakte Hai Aap kitna loan le sakte hai ya kitna mil sakta hai. Ye kai factor par depend karta hai. 1.Cost of Home Bank Financial Institution always home cost ka 70-80 amount tak hi loan deta hai, baki aapko payment karana hoga. 2.Size of EMI Aap per month kitna EMI pay kar sakte hai, uspar loan ki amount depend karta hai, but dhyan rakhe EMI salary se 40-45 se jyada nahi hona chahiye. 3.Loan Period Yah baat achche se jan le loan long time ka hoga to short term loan ke compare jyada interest pay karana hoga. Document Requirement 1.Identity Proof 2.Address Proof 3.Age Proof 4.Educational Certificates 5.Income Proof 6.Employment Details 7.Property Details 8.Bank Statement LIC Se Online Loan Kaise Le Payment Kare? Home Loan Process 1.Aapko jis bank se loan lena hai, us bank ke executive se bat kare. 2.Loan ke liye Forum fill up kare. 3.Forum submit karte time processing fees pay kare, jo 0.25 se 1 ho sakti hai. 4. Bank officer aapke dwara submitted document ke base par aapki property or other details ki physical verify karega. 5.Fir Bank aapke income bank statement ki calculation karega, uske 30 ko bank saving manata hai, uske based par loan provide karega. 6.Sabkuch sahi hone par Bank Lawyer dwara aapke property ki legal verification karega. Jise lawyer ek report ke rup me bank ko hand over karega 7.Ab Bank aapke Property ki marketing value calculate karega. Uske marketing price ka 70-80 ke equal loan amount provide karega. jiske liye bank Loan Acceptance Letter issue karega. Jispar sign hote hi terms ke according loan amount dwara provide kiya jayega. Paytm Se LIC Premium Ka Payment Kaise Kare FAQ 1.Kya Loan lene ke liye fees pay karana hota hai? Yes, bank se loan lene ke liye fees pay karana hota hai, jise processing fees kahte hai. Yah 0.25-1 ho sakti hai. 2.Kya Loan amount ek sath pa sakte hai? Ha, but aap chahe to home making stage ke base par bhi loan le sakte hai. 3.Kya loan ko dusre bankfinancial institution me transfer kar sakte hai? Yes, but certain formalities fulfil karana hoga. 4.Home loan se kya benefit hai? Home loan se current mahangai, income tax aur increased interest rate se bach sakte hai. 5.Home Loan se kya loss hai? Yadi aapne floating interest rate vala loan le liye hai to interest rate badhane par aapko jyada EMI pay karana hoga. And agar aap regular 3 month tak loan ki ek bhi EMI pay nahi kar paate hai to Bank aapko defaulter declare kar sakta hai aur aapke property ko sell kar sakti hai.

Hello Friends, aaj ka Topic thoda interesting hai. q ki aaj ham Blogging or hamari Life ko connect karege, or janege ki kya faide hai ek blogger se shaadi karne par. SEO yahi Search Engine Optimization, jo har uss website ke liye jaruri hai jo search result me top par aana chati hai. SEO Kya hai or usme kya hota hai uski jankari HMH.pe phele hi detail me share kiya ja chuka hai, agar aapko SEO ki jankari nahi hai to aap waha se read karke sikh sakte hai. Abhi ham baat karege, Top Best SEO Tips ke ware me, jo ek popular SEO expert ne apne Youtube channel par share ki, jo sach me bhut jada Important hai. Ye jo SEO Tips hai wo evergreen hai, matlab aesa nahi hai ki wo sirf aaj kaam karegi or kuch time baad kaam naa kare. Q ki jitni bhi tips hai usme sabse main to yahi hai ki jo Google chata hai ham wahi karne wale hai. agar aap lamba URL use karte hai to wo search page par pura nahi dikhta, q ki waha kuch limit hoti hai. Agar Short URL use kare, to bhut jada chance rhete hai ki usse samja ja sake ki page me kya hai. Research ke according jada se jada 3 words use karna chaiye. Sayad aapne ye pheli war suna ho, ki aap Amazon par bhi Post ke idea search kar sakte ho. Par ye bhut hi badiya tarika hai, jisme aap apne blog par sabse hatke or badiya content share kar sakte hai. Amazon par Idea search karne ke liye, sabse phele jis bhi topic par aapka Blog hai, uski Book search kare, jo bhi popular book search me aaye. Ab Book ka Table of Content dekhe, waha aapko apne catogery ke sabhi topic ki list mil jayegi. Waha se Topic milne ke baad aap, unko Google Keyword Planner par search karke bhi dekh sakte hai ki wo kitna search hota hai, taki aapko andaja lag jaye ki isse kitna traffic mil sakta hai. Yaha ye batane ki to jarurat nahi hai, ki Title me target Keyword ka use kare. wo aap On Page SEO Guide me jaan chuke hoge. Par Aapko High CTR Click Through Rate badane ke liye bhi Title ko optimize karna hoga. Agar CTR jada hoga to uske 2 faide hai Google ka ya kisi bhi search Engine ne Officially nahi kaha ki lambi post hogi to usko higher rank milegi. par Research ke mutabik average 1890 Words wali post Top par thi. Labai kitni bhi ho usse fark nahi padta, par Google ka main target hota hai ki jo user search kar raha hai, wo unko pura ek hi jagha mile. to agar koi Detail me badiya post hai to sidhi si baat hai uspar sab kuch hoga. Isse Keywords Density bhi sahi rheti hai or LSI Keywords bhi aasani se add kar sakte hai. Modifier ka matlab hai aese sabd jisse log usme jada Interest dikhaye. jese Matlab aapko Title aesa likhna hai ki usme main keywords ke sath aese words aaye, jinko read karke uspar user click kare. Example ke liye aap issi post ka Title dekh sakte hai. First Tip me aapne jana ki URL Short takhna hai, or usme aapko apna main Target Keyword hi use karna hai. Jisse User or Search Engine aasani se samaj sake ki Page me kya hai. 3rd Tip me bataya tha, ki CTR badana hai, or CTR badane ke liye Title me Number ka use kare.

Hindi Type karna English Type karne ke mukable thoda muskil padta hai computer me, or Agar tikh se Hindi Typing naa aati ho to badi muskil ho jati hai. Par me aapko ek tarika bata raha hu, jiski madad se aap badi aasani se Bolkar Hindi Typing kar sakte hai speed ke sath. Aapne Mobile me to dekha hoga Voice Typing ka option rheta hai, par computer me aesa nahi rheta, or agar computer me bol kar type karna ho to uske liye sabse best tarika hai Google Docs. Computer me hindi bol kar type karne ke liye aapko simple Google Docs ko open karna hoga, jaha Voice Typing ka option hame milega. Step 1 Sabse Phele Google Drive par jaye, uske baad New Google Docs par click kare Step 2 Ab Google Docs open ho jayega, usme Tools par click karke Voice Typing par click karna hai. isko aap CtrlShiftS se bhi open kar sakte hai. Step 3 Voice Typing par click karne ke baad screen par ek Mic ka icon aa jayega, jispar click karke typing start kar sakte hai. Agar Hindi Me Type karna hai to mic ke upar jo English US hai usko Hindi select karna hoga phele. Note Voice Typing karne ke liye aapke aaspas ka mahol sant hona chaiye, or badiya voice ke liye ek Mic use kare taki aajab tikh se samaj aaye, or sahi typing ho. Niche aap Image de dekh sakte hai, kis trha se type hota hai. Voice se Hindi me Type kaise kare, usko or achi se samajne ke liye niche diya huaa video jarur dekhe. At Last Ummid karta hu aapko ye jankari pasand aai hogi, or ab aasani se computer per Bol se Hindi Likh payege. Agar aapka koi sabal ho isse sambandit to aap comment karke puch sakte hai.

How To Hack WhatsApp Account in Hindi ye har ek Whatsapp user ka sabal hota hai, or wo jaanna chate hai Kya koi WhatsApp Hacking App ya koi Whatsapp Hack Tool hai. Agar aap bhi Jaanna chate hai Whatsapp Hack kaise kare to aap Bilkul sahi jagha hai. WhatsApp Hack Kaise hota hai, wo batane se phele me aapko bata du ye jankari sirf knowledge purpose ke liye hai, or agar aap iska kahi galat use karte hai to uske jimmedar aap khud hoge. or sabse main baat agar koi iss tarike se kisi ka Whatsapp account hack karta hai to Police badi aasani se unka pata laga sakti hai, to kuch bhi galat kadam uthane se phele jarur soche. Sabse phele to ek baat jo me sabse phele clear kardu, kisi bhi account ko hack karna aasan nahi hota, par ye baat bhi sach hai Internet par aesa kuch nahi hai jo hack naa ho sake. Hacking se Bachne ke liye jitni sabdani ham rakhe utna hi hamare liye badiya rheta hai, iske ware me mene bataya hai Kaise Apne aapko Hacking se bachaye, aap iss article ko jarur read kare taki koi aapko hack naa kar sake. whatsapp hack kaise kare in hindi uski steps batane se phele me aapko bata du jo tarika me bata raha hu wo koi Hacking nahi hai, Whatsapp ka feature hai jiski madad se ham apne Whatsapp ko ek sath jada jagha use kar sakte hai Par agar uski jankari naa ho to koi bhi uska galat use kar sakta hai or Kisi dusre ke Whatsapp Message padh sakta hai. Me jo tarika batane wala hu, wo Whatsapp Web hai, jisme ham apne whatsapp account ko Browser me login karke apne Message send or receive kar sakte hai. Agar aap whatsapp web se login kar rahe hai to uske liye kuch chije hai jo jaruri hai Kisi bhi whatsapp ko hack karne ke liye, ya kahu Browser me login karne ke liye aapko uss Mobile ki jarurat padegi 2 second ke liye. Simple aapko Whatsapp Web ka QR Code scan karna hai or aapka kaam ho gaya. Step 1 Whatsapp Web ke liye aapko sabse phele Apne Chrome Browser me iska URL open karna hoga. web.whatsapp.com Note Agar aap apne Mobile me web.whatsapp.com ko open kar rahe hai to Desktop Version me open kare. Step 2 Ab aapke samne ek QR Code aayega, wo aapko uss Whatsapp Account se scan karna hai jisko aap Hack karna chate hai. Jiska Whatsapp Hack karna hai uske Mobile me Whatsapp Open karne ke baad, aap Jab setting me jayege to waha aapko ek option milega Whatsapp Web usko open kare, to camera chalu ho jayega, uske baad aap usse QR Code ko scan kare. Step 3 Jese hi Aap QR Code Scan karege, uske baad turant aap dekhege jo Mobile me whatsapp account hai wo aapke Browser me open ho jayega, or sabhi message aa jayege. Iss trha Whatsapp ko whatsapp Web ki madad se hack kar sakte hai. Agar aap Mobile se Whatsapp ko Hack karna hai to aap iske liye kuch App hai unka bhi use kar sakte hai. Chaliye unke ware me bhi jaan lete hai. jis app ki jarurat padegi Mobile me whatsapp hack karne ke liye wo simple browser hi hai, jisme web.browser.com open hoti hai Desktop version me. Step 1 aap kisi bhi Whatsapp Web App ka use kar sakte hai, ek app ki link me aapko de raha hu. Tablet for Whatsapp Step 2 App Download karne ke baad open kare, to aapke samne whatsapp ka QR Code aayega. Step 3 Ab Jis Mobile ka Whatsapp Hack karna hai uski setting me ja kar, Whatsapp Web open kare. Step 4 Aapke Mobile me jo Web App ke andar Whatsapp QR Code dikh raha hai usko scan kare dusre mobile se whatsapp me. Jese hi scan hoga, Uss Mobile ka Whatsapp aapke mobile me open ho jayega, uske baad aap message send, receive, View kuch bhi kar sakte hai. Whatsapp Web me login karne ke baad isko Logout kaise kare wo bhi jaanna jaruri hai. Logout karne ke dono mobile me option hai. 1 Jis Mobile ka Whatsapp hai usko logout karne ke liye Whatsapp Web me jaye, fir dekhe whatsapp web me login hoga to logout karne ka option aayega, uspar click karke logout kar sakte hai or iss trha Whatsapp Web Hack ko khatam kar sakte hai. 2 Whatsapp Web me 3 dots par click karne par waha bhi logout karne ka option aata hai. Iss Trha aap Kisi bhi Whatsapp account ko ek se jada jagha use kar sakte hai, Hope aapko meri di hui jankari pasand aai hogi. or sabse main agar aap iska galat use karne ka soch rahe hai to dhiyan rakhe agar aapne kuch bhi galat use kiya to Police aasani se aapki puri detail nikal sakti hai. Bhut Logo ka Hota hai wo apne Girl Friend ka Whatsapp Hack karna chate hai, Ya BoyFriend ka Whatsapp Hack karna hai to me aapse ek baat khena chahuga. kisi ki Privacy se khilwad karne ka kisi ko huck nahi hai. WhatsApp Hack se Sambandit Kuch Sabal, jo muje lagta hai bhut logo ke hoge to uska jabab bhi dedeta hu, inke aalawa bhi agar koi sabal ho to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. Agar aapko kisi whatsapp account ko hack karna hai, matlab ek se jada jagha open karna hai to uske liye aapko uss mobile ki jarurat padegi Whatsapp Web Code ko scan karne ke liye. Bina mobile ke aap whatsapp hack nahi kar sakte. Agar aapko check karna hai aapka whatsapp Hack hai ya nahi, uske liye simple aap whatsapp web me jakar, dekhe agar kahi login ho to logout kar dijiye. Agar Mobile me Whatsapp Web me login hai to wo kaha par login hai uski detail bhi batata hai, isse pata kar sakte hai kisne or kab hack kiya hai. Nahi, agar aapne logout kar diya to jab tak double se whatsapp web ke QR Code scan nahi karege double se hack nahi hoga. Kitni bhi jagha Whatsapp Web ko use kar sakte hai, agar kahi login hai to whatsapp web me par click karke dusra QR Code scan karke login kar sakte hai. Ye jo tarika mene bataya hai, ye whatsapp ka feature hai jiski madad se ham ek hi whatsapp account ko ek se jada jagha use kar sakte hai. par agar kisi ko iski jankari naa ho to koi iss trha se hack kar sakte hai. Whatsapp jo web se use karte hai wo asliyat me koi hacking nahi hai, par uski bhut logo ko jankari naa hone ke karan koi bina hanare bataye whatsapp ko dusri jagha open kar sakte hai. par uske liye QR code scan karna padta hai. to agar baat kare bina QR Code ke whatsapp hack karne ki to iske aalawa koi tarika nahi hai. Agar kisi ka whatsapp hack karna hai to uska QR Code scan karna hoga. or wo bina mobile ko open kare QR Code scan nahi kiya ja sakta. matlab mobile ki jarurat to padegi hi. Agar aapko kisi or ka Whatsapp apne mobole me open karna hai to aapko simple QR Code se kar sakte hai, jisme same message aapke mobile me copy ho jayege, or Verification code ki bhi jarurat nahi padegi. Iske aalawa koi or tarika nahi hai whatsapp ko Hack karne ke liye, kuch tarike hai par unse bhi hack karna bhut jada muskil hai. Whatsapp Hack Se Kaise Bache uski jankari me phele hi share kar chuka hu, agar aapne wo read nahi ki to usko jarur read kare. Q ki agar aapko how to hack whatsapp account in hindi pata hai to kaise bachna hai, Whatsapp Hack se wo bhi aapko pata hona chaiye. Agar aapka koi bhi sabal ya sujab hai to comment karke jarur bataye.

Facebook sirf Naam hi kafi hai. Aesa sayad hi koi hoga jo Internet use karta hai or uski Facebook par ID nahi hai. Facebook Par ID mainly in karano ke liye banai jati hai, Ham Facebook Par Group bhi bana sakte hai, jisme Group ke member post kar sakte hai. Chaliye ab topic par aate hai, Jese ki aapne dekha hoga ya suna hoga ya fir aapke sath bhi aesa huaa hoga ki aapki ID block ho gai ho, or ID ko kholne ke liye facebook friends ke kuch photo aate hai unko phechan kar hame batana hota hai. jab hi wo ID khulti hai. Kabhi kabhi aesa hota hai, ham jis naam se ID banate hai, uska ID proof maga jata hai. IDD proof me Hamara Naam, Date of Birth honi chaiye. Also Read Facebook Account Hack Hone se kaise Bachaye Facebook ID Block hone ke bhut karan hai, par ham simple sabdo me samje to agar ham koi bhi aesa kaam karege jo dusro ke liye sahi nahi hai to hamari ID block ho sakti hai. ye kuch Points Ye kuch Points, inko pad kar aap lagbhag samaj gaye hoge Facebook ID Block hone ke kya kya karan ho sakte hai. Facebook Par agar hamari Personal ID block hoti hai to kitna dukh hota hai, ye unse acha koi nahi jaan sakta jinki ID Block ho chuki hai. Kuch logo ke sath aesa bar bar hota hai or unko uska karan samaj nahi aata aesa mere sath q ho raha hai or usse kaise bacha jaye. TO chaliye jaante hai kuch tips, jinki madad se ham apni ID ko Block hone se bacha sakte hai. Agar aapki koi Face ID hai to me aapko Suggest karuga ki aap usko delete karde, Fake ID ka matlab hai aap logo ko dhoka de rahe hai. To Friends ab aapki Bari, Aap apne experience comment karke share kare, kya aapki ID kabhi Block huii hai, or aapne uske baad kya kiya. Jo Points mene bataye hai unke aalawa bhi aapko algta hai ki ye koi or karan bhi hai ID block hone ke to wo bhi jarur bataye. Taki me Post me unko add kar saku.
