Web Push Notification Kya hai or iska kya use hai, agar aap janna chate hai to iss post ko pura read kare. mera dawa hai agar aapka blogwebsite hai to iske faide janne ke baad aap apne aapko rok nahi payege Push Notification ko apne blog me add karne se. Agar aap Smartphone use karte hai, to aapke phone me notification to aapne dekhe hi hoge, jo Apps se aate hai. tikh ussi trha jo Notification kisi website se Browser par aate hai usko Web Push Notification khete hai. Abhi ke jo Modern Web Browser hai, jese Chrome, Firefox, Safari ye sab Push notification support karte hai. Matlab agar kisi website ka notification on kiya to jab bhi wo website kuch notification send karegi to uska notification logo ke browser me aayega. Ye Computer or Mobile dono me work karta hai. Ho sakta hai aapne kuch site par Push Notification ke liye popup bhi dekhe ho. or agar nahi dekhe to aap Hindi Me Help par hi dekh sakte hai.

Hello Friends aap ye to jaante hi hoge ki Internet ne aaj hamari jindigi kaha se kaha pahuchadi hai, ab hame kahi jane ki jarurat nahi ham apne ghar se hi puri duniya se jude rha sakte hai or apne saare kaam Internet ki madad se kar sakte hai. ham ek ussi kaam ki baat kar rahe hai jo internet ne hamare liye bhut aasan kar diya hai or hame kahi jaane ki bhi jarurat nahi padti. Online Internet se Mobile Recharge karna. Mobile Recharge karne ke liye bhut si sites aapko mil jayegi, jinki madad se aap ghar bhete ya apne mobile ki madad se kahi bhi apna mobile ya kisi or ke mobile recharge kar sakte hai. Muje jo sites pasand hai bo hai FreeCharge or PayTM Hame online mobile recharge karne ke liye in chijo ki jarurat padti hai Email ID, Bank Account ATM or Mobile Number. Also Read jese ki mene bataya bhut si site hai online mobile recharge karne ke liye unme se ek FreeCharge. Me aapko bataoga ki Freecharge Website se kaise mobile recharge kare. Jannne ke liye Meri Steps ko follo karo. Recharge karne ke liye aap inki website ka use kar sakte hai ya free inka jo App hai uski madad se bhi recharge kar sakte hai. dono ki process bilkul same hai. Paytm se Recharge Kaise Kare agar aapka ye sabal to me aapko bata du, aap online Mobile recharge kisi bhi website se kare same hi process rahega, was design or interface change hoga. Step 1 www.FreeCharge.in par jao, ya fir aap Mobile me Paytm App Download karke usse bhi aasani se kar sakte hai. SIGN IN par click karo Step 2 ab agla page khulega usme agar aapka account phele se hai to aap login kar lijiye ya fir phele apna account bana lijiye. Me aapko Suggest karuga ki aap Facebook se Sign in kare ye Jaldi bhi ho jayega or asaan bhi hai. Step 3 Apne FreeCharge ke account me login karne ke baad aapke saamne ek form hoga mobile resharge karne ke liye usme detail bharde Step 4 Ab ek naya page khulega uspar aap dekhege ki kuch coupan giye huaa hai aap chahe to unko select kare ya fir PROCEED ki button par click kare Step 5 Ab jo naya page khulega uspar aapko payment karni hai. yaha par payment ke bhut option diya hai. ham Debit Card ko select karte hai. ATM Card piche se Step 6 Make Payment ki button par click karne par ek naya page khulega. ye me apne PNB ke ATM card se kar raha hu isliye aesa aa raha hai ho sakta hai aap ka dusra ATM ho to alag tarike se aaye. ek baat or aapke Bank account me aapka mobile number jarur juda hona chaiye q ki jab ham payment karte hai to ek OTP aata hai hamare paas hame bo daalna padta hai jab payment hoti hai. OTP Kya hai or iska Kya use hai uski jankari yaha aapko mil jayegi. Ek baat ka jarur diyaan rakhe kabhi bhi aap online payment kare to phele site ko dekhle or apne card ki detail kisiko nahi bataye nahi to wo aapke account ka koi galat istmaal kar sakta hai. Kabhi bhi Apna ATM pin kisi ko na bataye. bank account se mobile recharge ke liye utne paise cut ho jayege ot aapke mobile me balance aa jayega.

Hello Friends, Welcome to HMH. Agar aap Internet se Paise kamate hai ya kamana chate hai to aapko Internet par bhut se tarike mil jayege. or Agar aapka Blog hai to aapko adsense ke ware me to pata hi hoga. Adsense ki Polices kitni strick hai wo to aapko pata hi hoga, ab aese me aap kabhi nahi chahege ki aapki choti si galti ki baja se aapka Adsense account Block ho jaye. to chaliye dekh lete hai Google Adsense ki Ad Placement Policies hindi me. Google se Sare Sabalo ke Jabab aapko Yaha Milege Hindi me, or unke aala bhi agar aapka koi sabal ho to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. Original Source Ad placement policies in English Tip jis point ko read karna hai link par click karke wha ja sakte hai. Avoiding accidental clicks Ensuring proper ad placement Aap Apni site ke Visitor ko kisi bhi trha se uksa nahi sakte Ads par click karne ke liye. Aap Ads ko aesa jagha nahi laga sakte jaha galti se site ke kisi contant par click karne ho or ads par click ho jaye, jese Menu, Navigation or Download link ke pass. Ads lagane se phele dekh le ki aapki ad kisi bhi Play Button, Download Button, Navigation button Previous or Next , Game window, Video Players, Drop-down menu ke pass nahi hona chaiye q ki yaha galti se click ho sakta hai ads par. Agar aapka Design aesa hai jisme war war galti se ads par click ho rahe hai to aapko warning ka notification aa sakta hai. Achi se samajne ke liye Image me Dekhe kaha ads nahi lagana hai Aap isliye liye bilkul allow nahi hai ki ads par focus dilaye. Image me dekhe example Site par Ads lage hone ke baad hi jo aapki site par visitor aaye usko ads ki baja se koi dikkat nahi honi chaiye. Matlab aap Sticky ya Floating ads nahi laga sakte site me jo site me scroll karne par bhi screen par hi dikhe. Ye bhut jaruri hai ki aap apni site par jo visitor aa rahe hai unko confuse gumrha naa kare ulti sidhi heading de kar. Agar aap aesa karte hai to aap adsense ki policy ke khilaf ja rahe hai. Aap ads ke sath sirf 2 chij likh sakte hai agar aap chahe to Advertisements or Sponsored Links inke aalawa agar aapne kuch bhi likha jese resources or helpful links ya kuch bhi to aapka account khatre me aa sakta hai. Aap apni site ko ads lagane ke baad check kar le kahi galti se bhi to aesi kisi heading ke niche ads nahi aa raha, warna ye galto aapko bhari pad sakti hai. Aap bilkul allow nahi hai is trha ki kisi bhi heading de kar visitor ko ads par click karke ke liye uksane ke liye, jese Aap bilkul bhi aesa nahi kar sakte ki bhut image ho or unke niche aap ads laga de jo dekhne me aese lage ki unke ware me hi kuch likha hai. Image me dekhe Aapko site ka aesa layout bilkul nahi rakhna hai jisme site ke upar ke hisse me sirf ads dikhe or contant niche ho. isse jo user hai usko samajne me dikkat aati hai. Image me dekhe Mobile implementation Agar aap Ads ko upar lagaye or koi visitor aapki site par aayega to usko puri screen par sirf ads dikhega, jo aapke visitor ke liye bilkul acha nahi hai or aap aesa karne ke liye allow bhi nahi kiye jate. Image me dekhe Aap ads ko aese bilkul nahi laga sakte jisme contant or ads ko samajne me dikkat aaye. Matlaab aapka jo contant hai aap ussi formate me ads nahi laga sakte. Example me dekhe jo contant hai or ads hai wo bilkul same dikh rahe hai, ye allow nahi kiya jata Note Google Adsense in-Feed Ads use kar sakte hai, usme aapko koi problem nahi hogi. kisi bhi trha ka muhabra ya sayri nahi likhe ads ke pass jo ads par click karne ke liye prerna deti ho. Agar aapki game ki site hai ya koi bhi aesa flash contant aapne apni site me add kiya hai to usme or ads me kam se kam 150px ki duri hona hi chaiye taki galti se ads par click naa ho. Aap abhi ek Page par itne ads laga sakte hai New Update Adsense ne jo Number of ads ki limit thi wo ab hata di hai, aap kitne bhi ads ek page par use kar sakte hai, par mera suggestion hai 3-4 ads se jada use naa kare nahi to aapki site ka load time bhi badega. or user ko bhi aapki site chalane me dikkat aayegi. Aap ek ads se jada bade ads nahi use kar sakte ek page par, Large Ads se matlab hai 300 1050 and 970 250 formats. aap koi bhi site use kar sakte hai par was ye dhiyan rakhna hai ki sare ads bade size ke naa use kare. Hamesa dimag me rakhe ki jo ads hai uska size or format badiya ho or apni site ke hisab se unko change bhi karte rahe. Mobile Implementations Ads ki limit to wo hi hai mobile ke liye bhi par yaha kuch or chij bhi hai. jese ek time par 2 ya usse jada ads nahi dikhne chaiye screen par. Automatic refresh Page bilkul bhi allow nahi kiya jayega, jab visitor khus fresh kare sirf jab. jis page par ads hai wo page automatic kisi dusre page par bhi redirect nahi hona chaiye. Aap ads ko aese bhi add nahi kar sakte jese koi Video, game ya koi download ki link hai uske phele ads dikhe. Aap ads ko in pages par nahi laga sakte jispar aapka koi contant nahi hai. jese login page, Error Page, Thank you Page or 404 Page. Agar aap aese page par ads lagate hai jispar koi contant nahi hai to jo visitor hai usko aesa lagta hai ads hi contant hai jo bilkul bhi allow nahi kiya jayega. Aap ads ko aese page par add nahi kar sakte jisme live chat, auto refreshing comment ko, ya messaging karne ka option ho. Email me Adsense ke ads nahi laga sakte ye bhi bilkul bhi allow nahi kiya jayega. Adsense ke ads kisi bhi software ya application me bilkul allow nahi hai jese toolbars, Browser extension, desktop application software. Adsense ke ads sirf website par hi allow kiye jate hai jisme contant ho. Aap Google Ads ko kisi bhi new window open hoti ho usme add nahi kar sakte. jese kabhi kabhi koi information ke liye dusri window open ho usme aap ads nahi laga sakte. Aap aese kisi bhi popup window me ads nahi laga sakte jo visitor ke click karne par open hoti ho or jisme browser ke pure option naa ho jese back button, edit url wagera. Matlab aapko ads unhi page par use karna hai jinme pura navigation ho. Agar aapki site par kisi chij ke popups aate hai or wo 3 popups se jada hai to aap us site par adsense ke ads nahi use kar sakte. Agar koi Password procated page hai to aap usme adsense ke ads nahi laga sakte. Aap ads sirf unpar laga sakte hai jispar google crawler aaram se access kar sake. Agar aap apne adsense account se kisi dusre ki site par ads lagana chate hai to aap laga sakte hai par yaha aapko ye baat diyan me rakhni hai ki jo ads ki quantity hai wo jada nahi honi chaiye jitne ek page par allow hai usse. aap kisi bhi web page par adsense ke ads laga sakte hai jo Adsense ki policies kapalan karte ho. Adsense use karne ke liye aapko HTML source code ki jarurat padti hai to aap kisi bhi host par use kare to diyan rakhe kisi policy ka ulaghan naa ho. Agar aap kisi dusri site ko frame ya window me apni site par dikhate hai or ads lagate hai to wapka account block ho sakta hai. Friends ummid hai ab aap jaan chukle hai Adsense ke Ads kaha or kaise lagana hai or kin kin baat ka diyan rakhna hai taki aapka adsense account kabhi block naa ho ya uspar koi warning naa aaye.

Friends, Agar aap Hindi Blogger hai aapne iss topic par jarur socha hoga, ki yaar kis language me post karu, konsi language mere liye best rahegi, kis language me jada traffic aayegi, Reader konsi language me read karna pasand karege, jada paise kisme kama paoga, Google kisko jada support karega. Iss trha ke pata nahi kitne sabal aapke dimag me aaye hoge. or aap kahi naa kahi thode confuse bhi hoge ki yaar konsa Best rahega Hindi ya Hinglish ? Hindi Ya Hinglish ispar bhut se blogger ne phele hi post share ki hai, jisme unhe kya lagta hai, wo unke expriance ke hisab se unhone bataya. Kisi Blogger ne Hindi ko Support kiya, to Kisi ne Hinglish ko. Koi Blogger Hinglish se Hindi me chale gaye to koi Hindi se Hinglish me aa gaye. aese me sabke dimag me ek doubt to ban hi gaya ki yaar, mere liye kya best rahega. Me aapko mera kya najariya hai wo bataoga. me kisi ek languange ko support nahi karuga, or naa aapko kahuga ki aap iss language me blogging karo. wass me apne tarike se jitne bhi point hai unko clear karne ki kosis karuga, taki aapka jo confusion hai wo dur hojaye. Me aapne Kuch sabal puchuga, Jiska jabab aap khud ko dena. or unhi sabalo ka mera kya jabab hai wo me aapko is Post me hi bataoga. par ho sakta hai aapke kuch jabab mere jababo se alag ho. par aapko usse ye to clear ho hi jayega ki aapke liye konsi language Best rahegi. To chaliye start karte hai, aap apne jabab ko agar kahi likhege to or jada sahi rahega aapke liye, taki last me jab aap apne pure jabab dekhe to aapko aapka answer mil jaye ki aapke liye konsi language best hai. Ye sabal aap apne aap se puche or jo bhi jabab aapke mind me sabse phele aaye samaj jao aap ussi ke liye blogging kar rahe hai. Mera Jabab Me Blogging isliye kar raha hu q ki ye mera pession hai, mera sok hai, or mera jo passion hai me usme logo ki help kar pa raha hu, ye baat mere liye sabse badkar hai jo muje blogging me continue karne par majbur karti hai. Aap Q blogging kar rahe hai wo aap ache se jante hoge, jo bhi hai wo aap likh le. Mera Jabab Me Blogging isliye kar raha hu, taki jo mere jese log hai unki me help kar saku. or jo problem muje aai uska solution me logo ko de saku. Aap blogging kar rahe hai to jo aapka blog topic hai wo bhi bhut mayne rakhta hai, q ki usme aapka interest hona bhut jaruri hai. jo bhi aapka topic hai wo aap likh lijiye. Ab jese agar maan lo aapka topic hai Motivation to mere hisab se Hindi me likhna jada sahi rhega, q ki agar koi motivation article muje nahi lagta Hinglish me read karna pasand karega. Ye sirf mera point of view hai. ho sakta hai aapko Motivation article bhi Hinglish me read karna pasand ho. Mera Jabab Internet n technology hai mera topic, jisme se Youtube, Blogging, or Internet Main Topic hai. Agar aapko clear nahi hai ki aapka sabse jada interest kisme hai to aap hamara ye article jarur read kare Apna Interest kisme sabse jada hai pata karne ka tarika or aap SWOT se bhi pata kar sakte hai. Aap Blogging q kar rahe wo bhi aap jante hoge, ho sakta hai Paise kamane ke liye, Naam kamane ke liye, ya dono ho sakta hai. ya fir ho sakta hai inse hatke bhi kuch ho. jis baja se aap blogging kar rahe hai. Mera Jabab Me Blogging kar raha hu, sirf isliye ki koi ek din mujse aa kar kahe, Rohit Bhai aapki baja se meri life ban gai. or ye jo koi bhi mujse kahe wo aese hi nahi. uske dil se nikle ye mere liye. sirf isliye me blogging kar raha hu. or rahi baat Name fame, ya paise ki to agar ham acha kaam karte hai to ye to apne aap hi aa jate hai. Agar aapka blog to hai par aap usse paise nahi kama pa rahe to aapke liye bhi ek Post hai jo aapko read jarur karni chaioye New Blogger Blog Se Paise Kamane Me Kyo Fail Hota Hai Blogging kar rahe hai to type to karna hi padega, ab aap ye bhi dekh le aapko kisme type karna aasan lagta hai. Wese agar aapko Hindi Type karna nahi bhi aata to bhi koi tension wali baat nahi hai, aap Google Input tool ka use karke badi aasani se hindi type kar sakte hai. Mera Jabab Wese mera iss sabal ka jabab to aapko phele se pata hoga, ki muje Hinglish me type karna hi jada best lagta hai. Aap kisme read karna pasand karte hai, ho sakt hai aapko English me pasand ho, Hindi ya fir hinglish. Mera Jabab Aapko sayad pata hoga HMH sabse phela blog hai jispar Hinglish me post dali gai. q ki HMH ke phele koi blog nahi tha jo hinglish me blogging kar raha ho. Jab mene blogging me series hoke kuch karne ka socha uss type muje ye bhi nahi pata tha ki me agar Hinglish me type karuga to muje ads approve hoge ke bhi nahi blog me. q ki ye me bhi janta tha ki ye koi language nahi hai. par mene yaha paise naa dekhte huee sirf apne talent ko share karna sahi samja. Aapko pata hai me Hinglish me Post q likhta hu, Q ki muje starting me muje Jab kuch nahi pata tha to muje iss type ka hi content chaiye tha jisme Hinglish me blogging ke ware me likha ho. or HMH banane ka mera maksad hi ye tha ki jo muje problem aai uska sloution me mere jese logo ko du. taki jin problem ka samna muje karna pada or kisi wo uska samna naa karna pade. Aapka jo blog hai, wo kis type ki information share karta hai, or kon aapke reader hai or wo kis trha se read karna jada pasand karte hai. ye bhi aapke liye important hai. par isme usse jada main hai aap bhi usme comfortable ho. Mera Jabab Muje to Hinglish hi pasand hai, or me blogging mere jese logo ke liye kar raha hu, matlab mere readers ko bhi hinglish hi pasand hai. Iss sabal ka jabab aap thoda soch kar de, q ki aap jo bhi dalte hai apne blog par wo aap kaha se late hai, uske liye kya karte hai, or jo aap dalte hai usse kisko fayda hota hai ye sab bhut important hai. Mera Jabab Me Blogging karke mera jo bhi experience hai ussi ko share karne ki kosis karta hu. or sabse main baat agar muje blogging sirf paise ke liye karni hoti to me Hindi me Blogging kabhi nahi karta. par muje paise nahi chaiye the, or muje pata hai ham jitne paise ke layak hai utne paise apne aap hamare tak khiche chale aate hai. Aap Hindi ya Hinglish me jada kisko pasand karte hai, iss sabal me overall chije aa jati hai, jese read karna, likhna, share karna, dekhna, type karna. har point ko dekhne ke baad aap kisko jada pasand karte hai.
Ab blogging keval passion hi nahi raha gaya hai, balki ye online career banane ka great opportunity ban chuka hai.

taki apni field me pahchan bana sake. Anyway 90 bloggers ka blogging karane ka final target money earn karana hota hai, jo unhen ek complete professional bloggers banata hai. Isliye aaj main aise tarike batayunga, jisse aap apne blog se money earn kar sakte hai. Blog Se Kaise Kamaye 1.Display Ad Network Display Advertisement Network Yeh Blog monetization karane ka sabse popular tarika hai. Bas aapko minimum 500 visitors per day ki jarurat hoti hai, aap is tarah ke Ad network ko join kar apni earning start kar sakte hai. How it works Ad Networks third parties advertisers ke Ad ko partner publisher ke website blog par show karte hai. Month ke ant me earning ka kuch parts apne pas rakhkar, publisher ko pay kar deti hai. Ad Model Yah ad network popular three ad model ke base par work karta hai. 1.CPC Is tarah ke model ko follow karane vali ad networks publisher ko ad click ke base par money pay karti hai. Isliye is model ko cost per click kaha jata hai. Ye cost per click rate Marketing Inflation, Traffic , Money Exchange Rate ke base par har pal change hoti rahti hai. Kuch ad network fix cpc bhi follow karte hai. Is Ad Model ki popular ad network hai 1.Google Adsense 2.Adnow Ise adsense ke sath use kiya ja sakte hai 3.Desipearl Ise adsense ke sath use kiya ja sakte hai 4.Chitika 2.CPM CPM Calculation Formula Is model ki Ad network, is formula ke adhar par publisher ko pay karti hai. Yahan impression reader ke view hai. Is model ki sabse achchi baat hai ki yadi ad par click na bhi mile, tab bhi earning continue rahti hai. Yeh model high traffic blogs ya website ke liye suitable hai. Is Ad Model Ki PopularAd Network 1.Adsoptimal 2.Propeller Ads 3.Conversant Media 3.CPA Yeh Ad model affiliated marketing jaisi hai. Affiliated Marketing me products sell karana hota hai to is CPA model me reader ko kuch task jaise Sign up, Email Subscribing ke liye push karana padta hai. Jaise hi koi readers Advertising website se sign up ya email subscribing karta hai, usse earning ho jati hai. Jise Cost per acquisition ya cost par action kaha jata hai. Is model ki ad network publisher ko high pay karti hai. Is Ad Model Ki Popular Ad Network 1.Cuelink 2.Vcommission Payment Mode Jo Ad Network India based hai, ve payment bank account me send karti hai, aur other ad networks paypal account me. Yeh payment nishchit date ko ek amount ki limit Threshold pura hone par pay karti hai. Pros 1.Instant Payment 2.Fast Income Increment Cons 1.Slow blog speed 2.High Bounce Rate 3.Low User Engagement Time 4.Account ban ko khatra jyada. 2.Affiliated Marketing Yah blog se kamai karane ka sabse best method hai, jo blogging career ki future secure karta hai. Jab kisi merchandise website ki product ko apne blog par promot karte hai aur koi visitor blog par us product ko buy karane ki ichcha se product link par click kar merchandise website par us product ko kharid leta hai, tab hame uske badale kuch commission milata hai. Is pure process ko Affiliated Marketing kaha jata hai. Other earning method ki tulana me Affiliated Marketing ek slow method hai. Jo puri tarah blog par ane vale traffic aur quality post par depend karta hai. Affiliated Marketing Karane Ke Liye Jaruri Chije 1.Quality Traffic , Post me aise keyword use karana chahiye ki affiliated post par product buy karane ki chah rakhane vale visitors hi aaye. Naa ki keval janakari lene vale visitors. 2.Quality Post, jo true information dekar Product ko buy karane ke liye visitors ko convenience kare . 3.Professional Blog Look, blog open hote hi half work to blog ka professional look hi kar deta hai, jisse most of visitors ko product ko buy karane ke liye convenience karana easy ho jata hai. Kisi Bhi Blog Ye Chije Professional Banati Hai- -Premium Theme -HD Logo -Impressive About Me Page Author Profiles with Picture -Fast Blog Speed 4.Experience, Kisi product ke bare me likhane se pahle experience hona jaruri hai, tabhi product ki every choti se choti details ke bare me bata sakenge. Tabhi complete and quality post likha ja sakte hai. How it works Affiliated marketing start karane ke liye kisi merchandise website ki affiliated program ko join karana hota hai. Jab ham us website ki kisi product ko apne blog par promote karana chahte hai. Tab hame ek special link milata hai, jismen us product ki aur hamari id code hoti hai, jise affiliated link kaha jata hai. Jab koi visitor us link par click karta hai aur merchandise website par us product ka page open hota hai. Jab visitor use product buy kar leta hai. Tab ID code ke dvara hamare sale ko track kar liya jata hai aur commission ko hamare Affiliated Account me credit kar diya jata hai. Best Affiliated Marketing Program 1.Amazon Affiliated Marketing Program 2.Flipkart Affiliated Marketing Program 3.Cuelink 4.Bluehost India 5.Hostgator India Pros 1.Lifetime Stable Income Source 2.No bad impact on Visitors and Blog 3.Big Income 4.Fast Growth Cons 1.Kuch new companies fraud bhi karti hai, isliye achchi tarah se check kar join kare. 2.Kabhi kabhi tracking problem bhi ho jati hai, jisse aapke dvara sale product ki commission nahi milata hai. But ye problem naa ke brabar hoti hai. 3.Paid Post Jab kisi brand ya product ke bare me post likhane se paise mile, use paid postpaid review kaha jata hai. Paid post ki opportunity keval popular blogs ko hi milata hai. because brand company kam time me jyada se jyada popularity chahte hai. Ek paid post ke liye popular blogs Rs5000 se Rs 6000 charge kar sakte hai. How it Works Market me aayi new company brand ko apni business establish karane ke liye exposing ki jarurat padti hai. Jise ve related popular blogs se puri kar sakte hai. Isliye ve popular bloggers se apni brand product ke upar post likhane ko kahte hai aur uske badale pay karte hai. Kaise Paid Post Ya Paid Review Ki Opportunity Paye Iska ek hi jabav hai, apne blog ko complete professional and popular banaye. Isse pahle aap affiliated brand products par review par likh sakte hai. Jisse aapka review knowledge aur skill me improvement hogi. Jo brand company ko lubha sakti hai. Iske bad koi bhi brand company aapke blog ko beneficial pate hai to ve khud aapse contact karenge. Pros 1.Instant Payment 2.Big Money 3.Brands se related Traffic increase hoti hai, 4.New Identity in Marketing Cons Paid post karane par paxpat ki najaron se dekha jata hai. Aksar kai youtubers aur bloggers par injam lag chukka hai, ve paise ke chalte product ke bare me galat information deta hai. Isliye paid post karane se pahle product ko khud use karana chahiye aur correctfull info hi dena chahiye. 4.Direct Ad Jab aapka blog popular ho jaye, tab aap apne blog par advertisement start sakte hai, jise Direct Ad kaha jata hai. Direct Ad ke tin format hote hai 1.Text Link Ad 2.Banner Ad 3.Text Link Ad in Post. Aap format ke adhar par monthly payment le sakte hai. Pros 1.Nischit Instant Income Cons Similar Field ke Blog ka Ad show karane se aapke visitors kam ho sakte hai. 5.Service India me vaise hi SEO and Designing expert ki kami hai, jo hai ve bahut fees lete hai. Aise me Yadi aap blog setup, SEO optimization, Speed Optimization aur blog customization me interest rakhte hai to cheap rate par is tarah ke service start kar sakte hai. Kaise Kare Service Offer 1.New page new subdomain par service offer kare. Dhyan rakhe, aapka blog aur service ka nature ek hi ho. 2.Offer page par service le chuke clients ke website aur review show kare. 3.Kisi bhi client ko service dene se pahle unhe apne pure term conditions bataye. 4.Payment aap service se pahle ya bad me bhi le sakte hai. Ye aap par depend karta hai. Jise aap Instamojo ki help se collect kar sakte hai. 5.Apne Service ka Banner post aur sidebar me lagaye aur email-subscribers push message subscriber ko is bare me mail send kare. 6.Apni service se related guest post popular blogs par kare, Dhyan rakhe, guest post me kabhi apni service ke baare na bataye, otherwise guest post approve nahi hoga. 7.Apni service promote karne ke liye popular blogs par ad de sakte hai. Pros 1.Fastest Income 2.Fast Popularity and Fans 3.Secure Future 6.Sell Ebook Yadi aap kisi khas field jaise motivation, blogging me achcha knowledge rakhte hai to use aap ebook ka rup dekar visitors ko sell kar sakte hai. Jisse aap achchi kamai kar sakte hai. sathi aapko popularity bhi milega. How it Works 1.Apne knowledge ko ebook ka rup de. 2.Fir use Amazon ya apne blog par hi promote kare. 3.Blog par promot karte hai to Instamojo jaise payment collector company ki help payment collect kar sakte hai. Pros 1.Great Income 2.Big Popularity 7.Review Post Review post me basically future customer ko batana padta hai ki kyon is product ko kharidana chahiye. Jise ke liye aapko genuine opinion dena chahiye. Review post kuch had tak paid post ke saman hai aur affiliated marketing ka part hai. Isliye ise kaise kare, uske liye Affiliated Marketing Method dekhe. In Last Word Blogging start hoti hai passion se, lekin ise continue rakhane ke liye money earn karana jaruri hai. Aaj aap upar ke methods try kar sakte hai. Ismen Kuch aise bhi method hai, jo blogging ke shuru din se hi start kar sakte hai. Jaise Affiliated Marketing and Service. Iske alava kisi aur method se blogging income karte hai, to jarur share kare. Aapko ye post pasand aayi ho to jarur share kare. Share with your world!! Agar Aap Youtuber hai to aapka hamesa ye rheta hoga ki aap ek acha Video banaye jo dekhne me accractive lage. Ek ache video ke liye sirf acha cemera hi jaruri nahi, Video ke liye ek badiya Video editing software bhi jaruri hai jiski madad se ek acha video bana sake. Paid Software to bhut mil jayege jinme ham aasani se video ko badiya tarike se edit kar sakte hai, par agar aap new hai or aapke pass abhi itne paise nahi hai ki aap software kharid sake to tension lene ki koi baat nahi hai, me aapko is article me Best Free Video Editing software ke ware me batane wala hu jinki madad se aap ek acha video bana sakte hai. Also Read Android Mobile me Video edit karke ke Best App 1. LightWorks Ye ek powerful video editing tool hai, jisme ek badiya movie bana sakte hai. Aapko jaan kar herani hogi par is software par Batman or Mission Impossible jesi badi movie bhi bani hai. LightWorks Is Software me aapko ye future milege timeline, multiscreen, effect add kar sakte hai or video ko cut bhi kar sakte hai jo bhut aasan hai isme karna. Ye Best Free Video editing software hai, or aap jese jese isko use karege aapko or jada achi se use karna aata jayega. 2. Windows Movie Maker Ye Windows me phele se aata hai jo use karne me bhut aasan or simple hai. Is Video editior me jada option to nahi hai par agar aapko simple ek video banana hai to aap isme bana sakte hai. Windows Movie Maker 3. VirtualDub VirtualDub ek video recoder or editor hai jo 32 bit or 63 bit dono me work karta hai. Iska GNU license hai to koi bhi isko use kar sakta hai Free me. Is Software me badi file ko bhi jaldi edit kiya ja sakta hai. AVI or MPEG-1 formate me video bante hai is editor me. VirtualDub 4. Tb ZS4 Video Editor ZS4 Video Editor ek free tool hai isko aasani se download karke use kiya ja sakta hai. Is Software ko mainly files ko add karke video banane ke liye use kiya jata hai. jese Image, Sound, video ko add karke ek video bana sakte hai iss software me. ZS4 Video Editor 5. WAX Wax is Professional Video editor hai jisme special effect add kiye ja sakte hai video. Wax me 2d 3d effect badi aasani se add kiye ja sakte hai or sabse main baat ye bhi free hai. Wax 6. Cinefx Jashaka Cinefx ek offline playback, editing, encoding, animation or visual effects tool hai jisme special effect add kiye ja sakte hai bhilkul ek professional editor ki trha. Hollywood me special effect ke liye bhi is tool ka use kiya jata hai. Cinefx Jashaka 7. Blender Blender ek Free open source 3D Video editor hai, jisko koi bhi publicy use kar sakta hai. Is Tool me Edit kar sakte hai, 3D Graphics add kar sakte hai, special effect add kar sakte hai or bhi iske aalawa bhut kuch hai. Blender 8. Avidemux Avidemux ek free Video Editor hai Simple Cutting, filtering karne ke liye. Isme bhut se video formate suppport karte hai jese AVI, DVD compatible MPEG files, MP4 or ASF. Agar aapki koi Website hai, ya aapki koi SEO Companies hai hai to aapko Google Algorithm kaise kaam karte hai wo pata hona chaiye, taki aap unko follow karke sahi trha se apni site ko Google search me rank kara pao. Google me aaye din kuch na kuch update to aata hi rheta hai, usme se 7 Big Google Algorithm Updates ke ware me janege iss post me, jo aapko janna bhut jaruri hai. Iss Update ne bhut si top rank site ko effect kiya tha, q ki jitni bhi aesi website thi jinki quality achi nahi thi unki rank down kardi gai thi. Jo High Quality content tha, unki rank high ho gai thi iss update ke aane ke baad. Thin Content jitne bhi page jisme jo content tha usse user ko koi value nahi milti, un sab ko down kar diya tha. Jese agar user ne koi question search kiya hai to uska sahi tarike se jis page par answer hoga, wo page top par dikhaya jata hai. Low Quality Content Jo content hai agar uski quality achi nahi hai, jese sahi format naa hona, Spilling Mistakes hona, page ki navigation sahi naa hoga, fokat ki image honaa. jesi kuch bhi jisse user ko paresani ho. Unhelpful content aesa kuch bhi content jo user ke bilkul kaam ka nahi, usko google allow nahi karta search me. Duplicate Text Agar ek se jada page same hi text ke hai to google unko duplicate content samajta hai, or aese me agar sabhi page same hai to panda Update ka site par action liya jata hai. Article Spinning Duplicate content ko bachne ke chakkar me, article ko thoda bhut her-fer karke double se share karne ki kosis ki, Google Panda update me inpar bhi action liya jata hai. Agar aapko lagta hai, aapki site par upar diye points me se kuch hai, jiske karan Google Panda ka action aapki site par liya gaya hai, to ab . aapko apni site ka jitna bhi aesa content hai jo sahi nahi hai usko delete karna padega. or agar kuch content aesa hai jiski quality low hai to unko edit karke sahi karna padega. Ye Google ka 2nd bada algorithm update hai, jo lagbhag Panda Update ki trha hi hai. Par isme site ki link Profiles bhi dekhi gai. iss type Backlinks ka bada faida hua tha iske aalawa jitne bhi aese link jo achi site se nahi the, ja aesi site se aa rahe the jiska content site se match nahi karta to uska negative asar pada tha sites par. Agar aapko Penguin se bachna hai to aapko High Quality Backlinks hi banaye. High Quality Backlink kaise banate hai uski jankari yaha hai. Buying Links Agar links kahi se kharidte hai to ye Google webmaster guidelines ka ulangan karta hai, kahi se bhi paise de kar link nahi le sakte. Alag Alag Anchor Text ki kami text me jo link add karte hai, usko anchor text khete hai, to agar jitni bhi link aa rahi hai agar wo same anchor text se aa rahi hai to usse rank par aasar padta hai. Low Quality links Agar kahi se link aa raha hai, par uska content quality low hai to iska bhi negative asar site par padta hai. Keyword Stuffing Jis Keyword ko target karke content likha ja raha hai, agar wo war war use kiya jaye, jiska kuch matlab naa ho to wo keyword stuffing khelata hai. Phele ye bhut chalta tha, ki kisi keyword par rank karana hai to wahi keyword war war likh do, par iss update me unko panalize kar diya gaya. Keyword kya hai or kitni Keyword density honi chaiye uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. Isme jitna bhi bad effect hai uska karan hai bad Backlinks, to agar isko tikh karna hai to jitne bhi low quality links hai unko remove karna hoga. Low Quality Backlinks kya hai uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi, jinko aap pata karke Google Search Console me Disavow kar sakte hai. Iss Update me sabse jada Effect kiya Local Business site ko, Q ki agar koi kuch search kar raha hai to uski location ke hisab se usko result show hota hai. Matlab, agar aapko aapki website kisi specific location par rank karani hai to aapki website me uss trha ka content hona chaiye jisse google ko samaj aa sake ki ye iss jagha se relate karti hai. Iss update ka main maksad hai ki user ko aesi information di jaye jo unke jada kaam ki ho. Jese agar koi Movie ticket search kar raha hai to unko unki location ke hisab se uss city me jo movie lagi hai unko wo result dikhai jaye. Agar aapko apni website ko local area me rank karni hai to aapko in bato ka dhiyan rakhna padega Hummingbird se to jese ek naya dor hi aa gaya ho, isme search ko improve karne par focus kara gaya hai. user kya search kar raha hai or wo kis trha ka answer chata hai usko samajne ke baad usko result dikhaya jata hai. Matlab agar maan lo 2 alag alag insan hai or bilkul same word search kar rahe hai fir bhi ho sakta hai unko alag alag result dikhaye, unke interest ke hisab se. Agar aap koi content likh rahe hai to iss baat ko achi se research kare, ki aap jo content likh rahe ho unko kon read karege or wo kis trha se read karna pasand karege. q ki agar user aapke content ko pasand nahi karege to aapki site ko rank me bhi problem hogi. Isle liya aap Google par hi search karke pata kar sakte hai ki log kis type se search karte hai or kya janna chate hai. Google me type karne par automatic aage ke sabd aa jate hai usse aap pata kar sakte hai ki log kis type se search karte hai. or jo search page me niche related search aati hai unse bhi idea le sakte hai. Payday Loan me kuch chije common hai Google Panda or Google Penguin se, par isne confuse naa ho. ye ek alag update hai. jo 2013 me aaya tha. jiska main maksad tha aesi sites ko penalize karna jo Pron, casino ya fir virus wali ho. Iss update me agar kisi aesi site se links aa rahi hai jo sahi nahi hai to unn site par bhi bad effect padha tha. wese iss update me kya huaa tha agar aapko wo samaj aa gaya to wo kaise tikh hoga wo bhi aap samaj gaye hoge. simple aapko apne user ko value deni hogi or agar kuch Black hat SEO kar rahe hai jese spam links to unko clear karna hoga. ye to aapko name se hi samaj aa gaya hoga, iss update me google ne un site ki rank down kardi thi jo mobile me achi se open nahi hoti. Abhi ke time me 80 log mobile se hi internet par search karte hai, to unki shubhida ke liye google ne un site ko top rank di jo mobile friendly thi. taki user ko chalane me aasani ho. Responsive design website ka design aesa hona chaiye jo kisi bhi device me website ko open kare, wo usme fir ho jaye or use karne me aasan ho. Aap Kuch Mobile Friendly Template yaha se Download kar sakte hai. Large Font website ka font bhi thoda bada ho taki user ko read karne me paresani naa ho mobile screen par. Unsupported Content website me kuch bhi aesa content naa ho jo mobile me support naa karta ho. jese Flash file mobile me open nahi hoti to aesi site ki rank down ho jati hai. No separate website Wese abhi ke time me to koi use nahi karte, par phele mobile me tikh se open ho uske liye alag se sub domain me site banate the. jese www.hindimehelp.com computer me open hoti hai or agar mobile me open kare to m.hindimehelp.com par isse bhi rank me effect padta hai. Website Speed Website ki speed ek bhut important factor hai, Google ne ek servey kiya tha usme pata chala ki agar koi website 3 second se jada me load hoti hai to unki traffic 50 kam ho jati hai. Blog ki loading speed kaise badaye uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. Optimize Image Website me Image use karna to jaruri hai, par agar unko sahi size or compress nahi kiya to isse site par bhut si problem hoti hai. jese loading time badna, ya image ka sahi se open naa hona. isliye image ko hamesa optimize karke hi use kare. Image ko Optimize kaise kare or SEO Friendly banaye uski jankari yaha hai. website elements ke bich me gap website me jitna bhi content hai, ya kis area me kya hai wo clear hona chaiye. agar samaj nahi aa raha ki kaha kya hai or website ko access karne me dikkat hoti hai to un site ko penalize kiya jata hai. Fred dusre update ki trha nahi hai, Google me roj ke chote mote update hote hai un sab ko mila kar isko ye naam diya gaya. Iss update se lagbhag sabhi website effect hue the jo March 2017 me aaya tha. agar aapki website isse purani hai to aapne bhi dekha hoga ki achanak website ka traffic kam ho gaya. Isme fix to pata nahi chala ki kisko target karke ye update kiya, par bhut se webmaster ne website ko analyse kiya to kuch data samne aaya ki in website ko target kiya gaya Fred Update me. Advertisement jin site par bhut jada ads the, ya aese ad the jo user ke liye sahi naa ho un website ko iss update se effect hua tha. Thin, Low-value content jitni bhi site thi, jinpar jo content hai wo low quality ya useful nahi hai unki rank down kardigai. Kharab User Experience jis website ko use karne me paresani hoti hai unko iss update me bhut asar padha tha traffic me. user ko paresani naa ho, uske liye design ki in galtiyo ko naa kare. At Last Hope Agar aapne iss post ko pura read kiya hoga to aapko sab kuch clear ho gaya hoga ki Google Algorithm me kya kya bade updates aaye hai or unse sites par kesa aasar pada hai. or agar koi site penalize hui hai to wo kaise tikh kar sakte hai. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi comment me jarur bataye, or koi sabal ho to wo bhi puch sakte hai.

Aaj technology bahut tezzi se badh rahi hai ye to apne suna hi hoga, iske sath me har din koi na koi tool, application, software aur extension etc. ban rahe hai jo hamarea time save karta hai. Yah bhi application ki tarah hi hai, jaise aap normally apne computer par koi application install karte hai waise hi jab ham wo application install karte hai jo Google chrome ke sath me attach hoti hai unhe extension khate hai. Kisi bhi extension ko install Google ke extension store se hi kiya jata hai, Google ke extensions store me jane ke liye yaha click kare. Aur fir extension par tick mark kare fir jo extension chahiye wo search kare, jaise example ke liye mene Google transalate search kiya. Apne jo bhi search kiya hai usse realted bahut saari extensions ayegi jisme se apko jo bhi chahiye us par click kare. Apko jo bhi extension chahiye us par click karne ke bad ek popup box open hoga.

Pichle post me maine Affiliate Marketing ke bare me bataya tha. Usi series ke under aaj main world ke sabse bade affiliate program ka bare me batane jar aha hun, jo Amazon Affiliate Program hai. 10 50-60 , Yadi aap New hai to jarur padhe Affiliate Marketing Kya Hai aur Isse Kaise Kamaye Amazon Affiliate Program Se Paise Kaise Kamaye About Amazon Affiliate Program Amazon ko Jeff Bezos ne July 5, 1994 me lauch kiya tha aur aaj world ki sabse badi e commerce company hai. Iske piche Amazon ki affiliate program ka sabse bada contribution hai, Jiske liye Amazon every month lakho dollars amazon associates ko pay karti hai. World ke developed countries me bahut sal pahle hi amazon affiliate program launch ho gaya tha. But India is affiliate program ko june 2013 me launch kiya gaya. Tab se abtak lakhon Indian is program se jud chuke hai aur monthly lakho ki kamai karte hai. Amazon Affiliate Program Join Karane Ke Liye Requirement 1.Blog Amazon ke product ko solid tarike se promote karane ke liye blog hona jaruri hai. Aap wordpress blog bana sakte hai, jo Speed and SEO ke mamle me kisi aur CMSblogger, joomla par banaye gaye blog se achchi hoti hai. Ek Professional WordPress Blog Banane Ke Liye Ye Chije Jaruri Hai- 1.Right Domain 2.Good Hosting Plan Jise aap Bluehost se buy kar sakte hai 3.SEO Optimized Fast Premium Theme 4.Jarui Plugins, jaise Yoast SEO, W3Total Cache, Akismet, Autoptimize etc. 2.Quality Post Affiliate Marketing me success pane ke liye quality post ek key ki tarah work karta hai. Isliye kisi product par likhane se pahle achhe research kare aur long post likhe. 3.Experience and Interest Aap interest aur experience se hi readers ko product buy karane ke liye impress kar sakte hai because interest aur experience se product ki har choti se choti details ke bare me bata sakte hai. Jisse readers jarur impress hota hai. 4.Bank Account And Pan Card Amazon se earning receive karane ke liye bank account aur pan card hona jaruri hai. Is tarah ke formality ko bad me bhi complete kiya ja sakta hai. Amazon Affiliate Program Account Kaise Create Kare 1.Sabse pahle Amazon Affiliate Program website par visit kare aur Join Now For Free par click kare. Create Amazon Affiliate ProgramAccount 2.Account Create Kare. 3.Ab Login ho jaye. 4.Apne bare me details fill up kare aur next kare. 5.Website add kare aur next kare. 6.Website se related information fill kare aur finish par click kare. Congrats! apka amazon affiliate program account ready hai. Ab aapko aap jis product ko apne blog par promote karana chahte hai, Amazon se use product ka affiliate link create karana hoga. Amazon Affiliate Link Kaise Create Kare Amazon affiliate link do tarike se create kiya ja sakta hai. 1.Amazon Associates Site Stripes Jab aap Amazon affiliate account sign in hokar amazon.in visit karte hai to aap amazon website ki top me ek bar dekhate honge, jise Amazon Associate Site Strips kahte hai. Amazon Associates Site Stripe Isse kisi bhi product affiliate text link, affiliate image link aur affiliate textimage link create kar sakte hai. Bas aapko search bare me manchaha product search karana hoga aur Site Stripe ke Text par click kare. Affiliate link create ho jayega. 2.Amazon Associates Account me Product linking option se affiliate link create kar sakte hai. Amazon Product Linking Amazon Affiliate Commission Rata in India Amazon every product ke liye different commission pay karta hai. Jise Amazon Fixed Advertising Fees kahta hai. aapko kisi bhi product ko promote karane se pahle commission rate jarur janana chahiye. Amazon Affiliate Commission Rates Amazon Kaise Payment Karta hai 1.Amazon se payment receive karane ke liye minimum earning balance Rs 2500 hona chahiye. 2.Payment aap Cheques ya NEFT se receive kar sakte hai. 3.Payment mahine ke ant se 60 days ke bad hoti hai. Amazon Affiliate Program se related koi question hai to jarur puche aur is post ko apne friends ke sath jarur share kare.

Kisi bhi wordpress blog ke liye hosting thik vaisi hai, jaise seed ko ankurit hone ke liye water ki jarurat hoti hai. 10 50-60 , Aise me yadi seed ko jaruat se kam water de diya jaye to kya hoga ? yahi haal hota hai, hamare blog ka. Jab bad hosting company chun lete hai. Aksar aisi galatiyan tab hoti hai, jab hame cheap hosting ki jarurat hoti hai. Lagbhag 7-8 months pahle, mujhe apne other project ke liye cheap hosting ki jarurat thi. Tab maine Cheap hosting company in india ko google kiya. Uske bad SERP ke first page par aaye every hosting company website aur unki website ko check kiya. After result, maine jo best cheap hosting company paya vo Globehost hai. Jab maine ise open kiya to plan prices dekhakar amazed rah gaya. Globehost ki hosting plan ki prices only Rs 249 year se start hoti hai. Maine Linux Shared Hosting ka Standard Plan buy kiya, jiski price only Rs 599year hai. Ab maine blog setup kiya aur speed check kiya. Main jo paya, vo big hosting company ko takkar dene jaisa tha. Blog ki Fully Load only 1.0 Second My Blog Fully Loaded Speed Test Hosted on Globehost Blog ki Onload Speed 393 ms My Blog s On load Speed Server Response Time 151 ms OMG !! ye to Google ke Recommend Server Response Time se bhi Fast hai. My Blogs Server Response Time Jabki gaur karane vali baat hai ki maine us blog par Jetpack plugin install bhi nahi kiya tha, jo images ko speed up karta hai. Uske bad bhi ye superfast speed hai, vakai me ye India ke top hosting companies ko kaddi takkar de raha hai. GlobeHost Review Globehost ko 2014 me found kiya gaya tha. Tab se cheap rate par better service provide kar rahi hai. Jiske karan aaj iske pas thousands satisfied client hai. Pahle Globehost Linux hosting plan, window hosting plan aur SSL certificate offer karti thi. Par ab Globehost kafi grow kar chuki hai aur dher sare service offer karti hai. Jismen me pramukh hai- 1.Cloud Hosting 2.Reseller Hosting 3.Virtual Servers VPS 4.Dedicated Server 5.Domain Reseller 6.Androip App Developing 7.Website Design Ab Globehost ke hosting plans ko janate hai, jo fastest speed ke sath cheapest price vale hai GlobeHost Hosting Plans Linux Shared Hosting Plan Linux Shared Hosting Plans Linux shared hosting plan ki price Rs 249yr se start hoti hai aur best shared hosting plan ki price Rs 1999yr hai, jisme free domain bhi milta hai aur sathi hi kai domain ko host kiya ja sakta hai. Window Shared Hosting Plan Window Shared Hosting Plans Window shared hosting plan ki price Rs 600yr se start hai aur maximum price 3600yr hai. Jisme unlimited websites host kiya ja sakta hai. Hello, Friends jada tar me aap logo ko batata hu kaise account banate hai, Par aaj me uska ulta batane ja raha hu. Mene apni ek post me bataya hai kaise ham Apna Google Gmail Account kaise bana sakte hai, or aaj ham baat karege kaise apne Google account Gmail ko delete kaise kare. Aapke Google account Gmail account ko delete karne ke aapke pass kai karan ho sakte hai jese aapne apna naya gmail account banaya hai or aap purane wale ko use nahi karna chate. Iska ek or karan ho sakta hai ki aap chate ho ki us email id se jitne bhi account banaye hai bo sab bhi band ho jaye. jese Youtube, Blogger, Gmail, Playstore, Google Drive or sare Google ki services jin par aapne account banaye hai. Account ko Delete karne ke liye aapko Apne Google Account ki setting me jana hoga. Aap Simple is Button par click kare Delete Google Account Ab aapko apne Gmail ID ko daalkar Login karna hai jisko aap delete karna chate ho. Agar aap phele se login hai to aapko fir se password dalna padega. Login karne ke baad jo page khulega usme aapke Google par jinte bhi account hai is ID par bo aa jayege. Page ke last me 2 tic karke Delete Account ki Button par click kare Delete ki Button par Click Karte hi Aapka Google Account Permanently Delete ho Jayega. Aap Jese hi Delete Account ki button par click karoge ek naya page khulega. To ye lijiye aapka account ab delete ho chuka hai, or usse jinte bhi account banaye the aapne bo sab bhi. Agar aapka or koi bhi sabaal hai to aap comment karke or HMH Forum me puch sakte ho.

Agar aap ye post read kar rahe hai, iska matlab aapka blog hai ya aap Blog banane ka soch rahe hai ya fir aap Blog ke ware me jante to jarur hoge. Iss post me ham baat karege kaise Blog par daily post kiya jaye, wese aap agar new hai to aapko ye read karke thoda ajib bhi lag sakta hai, ki isme kya hai daily post karna hai. simple daily likh kar post publish hi to karna hai. to me aapko batadu, jitni aasan chije dikhti hai utni hoti nahi hai, tikh ussi trha khena aasan hai par daily ek post likh kar publish karna bhut muskil. Par agar aap apne Blog ko leke series hai or aap chate hai ki aapka Blog ka Traffic bade or Search Engine me badiya rank par aaye to regular update karna bhut jaruri hai. Regular Blog Update karne ke kya kya faide hai wo aap yaha read kar sakte hai. Agar aapne abhi abhi Blog start kiya hai to ho sakta hai aapke pass post ke liye bhut se ideas ho, or aap regular post kar bhi rahe ho jos jos me. par ek time aesa aata hai, jab samaj me nahi aata ki kya post likhe, or kaise sab kuch manage kare. Me apne experience se kuch tips aapse share kar raha hu, jisse aapko regular post karne me bhut help milegi. Agar aap New hai to sabhi points ko dhiyan se read kare, or agar aapko blogging karte hue time ho gaya hai to kuch post aapke itne kaam ke nahi hoge. par ham step by step badege taki sab kuch systematic samaj me aaye. Regular post karne me jo sabse badi problem aati hai wo hai Post Idea or Time ki, jiske karan regular post nahi kar pate, or agar ye problem solve ho jaye to fir regular post ham aasani se kar sakte hai. Regular Post karni hai to rakhe in bato ka dhiyan Agar Regular post karna hai apne blog par to sabse jada jo important hai wo ye ki sahi topic par blog. aesa Topic jisme aapka Interest ho, Q ki agar aapka Interest hi nahi rahega to aap bored ho jayege, fir post karna to possible hi nahi. Sabse phele jane ki aapka Interest kis topic me hai, apne Interest ka pata kaise lagaye uski tips aapko yaha mil jayegi. Agar aapko samaj nahi aa raha kis topic par Blog banaye to aap ye list check kare, isme mene 100 Blog Topic share kiye hai. Agar aapka Blog hai to ye bhut jaruri hai, ki aapka Blog jis topic par hai usme kya chal raha hai. or aesa to bilkul nahi hai ki aapko 100 jankari aapko ho uss topic par. to aapko regular read karne hoge uss filed ke Blogs ko. Agar aap Regular Blog ko read karege to kya trend chal raha hai uski jankari bhi aapko rahegi, or post ko read karne me hi aapko new new post ideas bhi aa jayege, jispar aap post likh sakte hai. Muje jis topic me interest hai, mene un sabhi Blog ko subscribe kar rakha hai, taki jab bhi wo koi post publish kare to uska notification muje mile. jisse me apne aapko update rakh saku.

Youtube par Account kaise banaye or kis trha usse psise kama sakte hai inke bare me phele hi jaan chuka hai. Aap agar youtube chalate hai to aapne notice kiya hoga ki kuch youtube channel ka jo URL aesa hota hai jo yaad rakhne me aasan or channel ke naam se milta judta rhata hai. jese youtube.comHindiMeHelp. Chaliye Youtube Custom Channel URL ke bare me thoda detail me jaan lete hai Youtube par jitni bhi channel hoti hai un sabka ek URL hota hai, jisko browser me dalne par wo channel khul jati hai. Ham jab Youtube Channel banate hai to uska ek URL hota hai par wo bhut bada hota hai jo yaad rakhna bhut muskil hota hai. Ham Apne Channel ke URL ko badal kar jo URL banate hai usko Custom URL khate hai. Defult www.youtube.comchannelUCDYgnFXsPlQWxgRgtkwoR7A Custom URL www.youtube.comHindiMeHelp Phele direct hi iska option aa jata tha, par ab ye kuch bate hai jo puri hone par hi ham Custom URL set kar sakte hai. Jab ye sari points pure hoge to aap channel ka Custom URL set kar sakte ho. Aap apne Website ko Google Page Par Verify karke bhi Custom URL Set kar sakte ho. Jab Aap Qualify ho jayege to Custom URL set karne ka option aa jayega. Jab aap custom URL ke liye Qualify ho jaoge, To aap Apni Account ki Advanced setting me jaye. Aap jab Qualify ho jaoge to aapko Email bhi aayega or aapke Creator Studio Dashboard me bhi Notification aa jayega. EK baat ka Diyan rakhe, Custom URL ek baar set karne ke baad usko badla nahi ja sakta. TO set karne se phele achi se check karle. Step 1 Youtube Account me Login karne ke baad Advanced Account Setting me jaye Step 2 AB Channel Setting me aapko ek option dikhega, Claim your custom URL. us par click kare. Step 3 ab aap Custom URL set karne ke page par phuch jayege Step 4 Ab aap Apni Channel ka Custom URL Dekhege jiske liye aapki channel approve hui hai. Aap usko badal nahi sakte. Bas aap itna kar sakte ho ki usme kuch Sabd or number add kar sakte ho agar aap chaho to. Ye jo Custom URL Channel ke liye Approve hota hai wo Channel Name, Website Name, Display Name me se koi ho sakta hai.

Traffic pane ke liye koi bhi beginner blogger social media ko best friend bana sakta hai. Iska reason aapko Social Media Stats mil sakta hai. Facebook ko 19,50,00,000, Twitter ko 2,32,00,000 , LinkedIn ko 3,00,00,000, Youtube ko 6,00,00,000 aur Instagram ko 1,60,00,000 Indians use kar rahe hai. Stats se clear hai ki Indian Population ka ek big part social media par active hai, jismen youth sabse aage hai. Yadi achche se social marketing ki jaye to apne blog par achcha social traffic drive kiya ja sakte hai. Yaha aap samjh le ki keval post sharing karana hi social marketing nahi hai. Ismen bahut kuch hai, jise aage janege. Isse pahle jante hai Social Marketing Kya Hai Social Marketing offline marketing ki tarah hai. Iske dvara target visitors ko find kiya jata hai. Tab unhen impressive tarike se blog website par visit karne ke liye invite kiya jata hai. Taki ve blog post ko read kar sake ya koi product buy kar sake. Social Media Se Traffic Pane Ke Tips Social Marketing Kaise Kare 1.Image Aksar kaha jata hai ki ek image 1000 words ke barabar hote hai . Jiska impact social media me bhi dekhane ko milta hai. Jise aap khud bhi feel karte honge. Isliye social post me kam se kam ek image jarur include karma chahiye. Iske alava ye tips follow Karen- 1.High Resolution Image use kare, jise Gravit.io se create kar sakte hai ya Pixabay se download kar sakte hai. 2.Image ki size big rakhe, jo sabhi social media ke post me fit ho jaye. 3.Kabhi kabhi infographic bhi share kare, usse jyada user attract hote hai. Image Se Kaise Traffic Badhaye Best 11 Methods 2.Post Title Social media par image ke bad post title hi users ko attract karta hai. Isliye title seo friendly hone ke sath attractive bhi hona chahiye. Jise read kar user impress ho sake hai. Jaise, Aamir Khan Wiki, Biography in Hindi, Birth Data, Wife, Son, Daughter Ye title seo ke lihaj se achcha hai par ye social media ke liye nahi. Is title ko is tarah banaya ja sakta hai Aamir Khan Ki Biography in Hindi, Jise Aap Nahi Jante Aamir Khan Ki Biography in Hindi, Jise Aapko Janana Chahiye Jyada jankari ke liye ye post padhe Best Post Title Kaise Likhe Best 6 Tips 3.Social Site Par Post Publish Karane Ki Best Time Every social media ka hot time day hota hai, jab platform par sabse jyada users active hote hai. Is vakt social sites par post publish karne se sabse jyada traffic pane ke chances badh jate hai. Best Time To Publish Post on Social Sites 4.Blog Speed Social Stats ke anusar 1.Facebook par monthly 155 million active Indian users hai, jismen 94.83 users mobile phone se facebook access karte hai. 2.Twitter ki 80 tweets mobile device se hoti hai. 3.Pinterest ko 80 user mobile phone me open karte hai. 4.Instagram ko use karan ke liye 92 user mobile phone ko prefer karte hai. Yani ham kah sakte hai 80-90 social site users Smartphone me social sites open karte hai. Ab is traffic ko apne blog par drive karane ke liye jaruri hai ki aapka blog fast aur responsive ho. Google ke anusar desktop ke liye blog ki ideal loading time 3 second aur mobile phone ke liye 5-6 second hai. Kya aapka blog mobile phone me fast open hoti hai ? Best 16 Tarike Se Blog Ki Speed Badhaye 5.Gender of Social Site 21th century me gender ki baat karana achcha nahi lagata. Par social site ki gender fact batana behad jaruri hai, jo aapko surprised kar sakti hai. Social Media Users Gender Info Aap behtar results ke liye gender ko dhyan me rakh sakte hai. 6.Quality Post So sonar ki Ek lohar ki Aap bhi bilkul aisa kar sakte hai, yadi aap quality post likhte hai to. Quality post use kaha jata hai jo SEO Friendly, Social Friendly aur User Friendly ho. Vaise bhi quality post ke dvara hi social users ko regular visitors banaya ja saktahai aur reader se post sharing ke liye impress kar sakte hai otherwise social site user ek bar visit karne ke bad dusri bar blog par visit nahi karega aur na hi post share karega. Isliye post- 1.Post kam se kam 800 words ka likhe, jo complete ho. 2.Fresh post likhe. 3.Post Social friendly likhe, Jise aap Google Analytics Social Warfare Plugin se jan sakte hai ki kis post par sabse jyada social traffic mila hai aur share kiya gaya hai. 4.Post daily nahi, quality post kare. Vo sabse effective hota hai. 7.Sharing Plugin Yadi readers ke liye post sharing button touch karana hard hai to ve post share nahi karenge. Isliye- 1.Mobile aur Desktop me Floating social sharing button use kare, jo mobile ke bottom me aur desktop ke bottom ya sidebar me float kare. 2.Mobile me social sharing button responsive ho. 3.Light speed vale social sharing button hi use kare. 4.Post ke ant me readers se post share karne ke liye kahe. 8.Social Follow Button Post ke ant me social link ya social button show karane se follower ki number quickly increase ho sakti hai. Jise media websites achchi se tarah se use karte hai. 9.Response on Social Sites Aksar followers social media par question puchate hai uska reply in time karana chahiye. Isse aap fans par great impact dal sakte hai. 10.Make Facebook Group Facebook Group banaye aur blog par us group ka link add kare. Facebook page fans se group join karne ke liye kahe aur unhen apne friends ko bhi add karne ke liye kahe. 11.Share Old Post Yadi aapka blog evergreen niche jaise WordPress, Health, Love Relation ka ho to old post ko share kar social traffic drive kar sakte hai. Iske liye Revive Old Post Plugin ka use kare sakte hai. Note- ye method keval evergreen niche ke sath hi effective hai. 12.Use Social Post Sharing Tool Buffer jaise social post sharing tool se ek sath kai social sites par post publish kar sakte hai. Isse aapka kafi valuable time bach jayega. Iske alava aap social sites se traffic pane ke liye kaunsa tarika follow karte hai ? Yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai to jarur share kare.
