Flipkart india ki ek leading E-Commerce company hai jispar ham online kuch bhi kharid sakte hai ghar bhethe aur aaj ki date me ye india ki top successful companies me se ek hai. Aaj is post me main aapke sath Flipkart ki hi success story share karne ja rha hoon jise padhkar aap kafi inspire honge. Flipkart kitni Success hai uska andaja ham in bato se hi laga sakte hai ki Flipkart site ki Alexa Rank 7 hai India me, 15000 log kaam karte hai flipkart me, or 1$ billon kimat hai flipkart ki jo din wa din or badti ja rahi hai. To fir aaiye jante hai Flipkart ke ware me. Also Read Flipkart ki shuruaat 2007 me ki gayi thi jab India me e-commerce industry apne pair jamana shuru kar rahi thi. Flipkart Company Singapore me registered hai, lekin iska headquarters Banglore, India me hai. Flipkart Online Services Pvt. Ltd ke naam se register hai company. Flipkart ke founder Sachin Bansal aur Binni Bansal hai joki pehle Amazon.com ke liye kaam karte the, usi dauran unke dimaag me india me ek e-commerce company start karne ka idea aaya. Sachin bansal aur Binni Bansal dono hi IIT Delhi ke student rahe hai aur dono hi Chandigarh se belong karte hai. Unhone apni khud ki company start karne ke liye amazon company choad di. Shuruaat me Flipkart par kewal books hi bechi jaati thi lekin dhire dhire iska vistaar hua aur jald hi is par wide varities ki chijen bechi jaane lagi. Flipkart Indian e-commerce industry me ek aakarshak tarike se ubhri. Jaise jaise flipkart growth karti gayi vaise vaise iske liye bahut saare investors badhne lage. Flipkart ne investors ke vishwas ko kayam rakhte hue kmaal ka pardarshan kiya. 2008-09 me karib 40 million rupees ki total sale ki. Aur agle hi saal yeh badhkar 200 million rupees ho gayi. Jis dauran Flipkart ki shuruaat hui thi us time par kisi bhi e-commerce company ko do badi dikkaton ka saamna karna padta tha. Pehli difficulty thi online payment ki, bahut saare log online payment nahi karna chahte the, aur online payment gateways setup karne me dikaat aa rahi thi. Isliye flipkart ne cash on delievery option introduce kiya. Flipkart pehli aisi company thi jisne payment ke liye cash on delivery option launch kiya tha. Aur aaj ki date me sabhi indian e-commerce companies is payment option ka istemaal karti hai. Dusri problem sabhi chijon ko time par deliver karne ki thi. Saaman ko time par deliver karna bhi ek aisa factor hai joki ek e-commerce company ki success ko nischit karta hai. Flipkart ne is samasya ka smadhaan kiya apna khud ka supply chain management system launch karke, jisse products ko time par deliver karne me aasani ho gayi. Flipkart ne market me apni mojudgi ko aur behtar karne ke liye other companies ko bhi acquire kiya jaise myntra.com aur letsBuy.com, Chakpak.com etc. Amazon company ki bharat me entry hone ke baad in dono companies me market me apni value badhane ke liye kada competition hai. Flipkart ki Chote se book s e-retailer se lekar india ki largest e-commerce platform banne ki journey bahut saare startups ko inspire karti hai. Aaj ki date me Flipkart ki fresh capital 1 billion dollar hai aur ismen 14000 se jyada employees kaam karte hai. Flipkart ke co-founder Sachin bansal apne ek interview me btate hai ki jab flipkart ki shuraat hui thi tab ve banglore ki roads par jaakar books ke small distributors se orders lete the. Apni marketing strategies ko yaad karte hue ve btate hai ki- hum church street me gangram books store ke baahar khade rehte the aur us store se baahar nikalne vale logo ko flipkart ka bookmark dete the. Apni targeting ko dhyaan me rakhte hue hum kewal unhin logo ko bookmarks thamate the joki store se books purchase karke nikalte the. Recently Flipkart ko Walmart ne kharida hai, 1lakh Crore Rupee me. jisse aap andaja laga sakte hai, 2 lakh se start hua ek business kaha se kaha phuch sakta hai. To doston aapko flipkart ki success story kaisi lagi? Hame comment ke jariye jarur btaye aur agar aapko ye post pasand aayi ho to ise apne friends ke sath social media par bhi share Karen. Ye Bhi Pade

Airtel Call details Airtel Call History janane ke kai reasons ho sakte hai, yadi SIM aapka ho to jarur call history jane, kahi aapke SIM ka misuse to nahi kiya gaya 10 50-60 , Aise me aap jis mobile me us sim ko use kiye hai, uske call history se jan sakte hai, lekin yadi user smart hai to vah call details delete kar sakta hai . Is tarah call details janane me badi problem ho sakti hai. But dont worry . Aap ek nahi balki do tarike se Airtel sim ki call details nikal sakte hai. Simply In reason ki vajah se Airtel Call Details ki jaruat padti hai 1.Love Affairs Love affairs aaj ke time me call details nikalane ka sabse bada reason hai. because aaj love affairs bahut fashion me hai. Jisko lekar koi khulasha karata hai to koi nahi karta hai. Tab call details janane ki jarurat padti hai. 2.Get Back Lost Phone Yadi apak phone missing ho jaye aur bad me mil jaye to uska call details janana sabse jaruri hota hai, nahi to apake liye koi illegal problem create kar sakta hai. Aise me aap call details ko jankar samay rahate hue problem resolve kar sakte hai. 3.Call Bill Yadi aapka connection postpaid hai to month ke end me clear hisab-kitab karane ke liye call details ki jarurat padati hai. 4.Other Kabhi aisa bhi situation aata hai, jab hame kisi strange ko call karane ke liye apna phone dena pad jata hai. Is situation me bhi kabhi kabhi call details janane ki jarurat pad jati hai. 5.Police case Koi bhi issue ko lekar police case ho jaye to call details check karana must hai. Ab aaiye janate hai Airtel Call Details Kaise Nikale Airtel se call details nikalane ke liye do method fashionable hai, jisme ek paid aur dusra free hai. Ham aapko yahan dono tarike batane vale hai. Method 1 SMS Dwara Call Details Kaise Nikale Yah tarika apake liye easy aur quick ho sakta hai. But aapko kuch baton ka dhyan rakhna hoga 1.Is method dvara call details pane ke liye SIM me Rs 50 ka balance hona chahiye, jise Airtel call details provide karne ke liye charge karti hai. 2.Is method se aap keval outgoing calls ke bare me hi information le sakte hai, incoming calls ki nahi, vaise most of case me hame outgoing call details ki jarurat padti hai. Is method se call details janane ke liye ye steps follow kare 1.Mobile phone ke message box me jaye. 2. Following SMS format me message likhe EPREBILLspaceMonth NamespaceEmail ID 3.Ise 121 number par send kar de. 4.SMS send hote hi Rs 50 cut ho jayega. 5.Kuch minutes bad SMS aayega, jisme password hoga. 6.Itne time me hi apke email id par call details ki PDFfile receive hogi. 7. Email id open kare aur PDF file download kare. 8.Ab us file ko open kar aur password enter kare. In last ab aapke samane requested month ki all outgoing calls ki details hogi. Method-2 Airtel Official Website Se Call Details Kaise Nikale Yadi aap upar ke method me kamayaba nahi hote hai ya aap apna balance nahi katavana chahate hai to yah tarika ajama sakte hai. Bas iske liye aapko in chijon ki jarurat padegi. 1.Laptop 2.Internet connection. Ab is tarike se call details janane ke liye in steps ko follow kare. 1. Airtel ki official website par visit kare. 2.Website ke top right me Boy icon par click kare. 3.Yadi existing account hai to login ho jaye, nahi to Account create kare. 4.Ab registered number par OTP received hoga, jise enter kar submit kare. 5.Is new page me Get Started link par click kare. 6.Ab email address enter kar continue kare. 7.Ab Registered Airtel SIM se related data SIM owner name etc enter kare. 8. Go to Dashboard link par click kare. 9.Ab Get itemised bill par click kare, month select kare aur email address enter kare, jispar call details pana chahate hai. 10. Tems and conditions ko check kar submit kare. Ab apake mail par kuch minute me call details ki PDF file aayegi, jise download kar len. Hope aapne successfully Airtel Call Details pa liye honge. Yadi aap is post ko helpful pate hai to Facebook, Whatsapp, Twitter aur Google Plus par share kare.

Aajka ka zamana Internet ka hai or iski jarurat bahut badi hai. Kyunki internet par har kaam kiya jasakta hai isme se ek kaam hai internet se paise kamana jo jayda tar logo ko pata nhi hota hai. Aap ye post padhe rahe hai iska matalab aapko bhi ye janna hai internet se paise kaise kamate hai. To aap sahi jagha par hai kyunki aaj ke post me aap iske bare me details me janege. Sabse phele to aapko kuch baaton ko dhiyan me rakhna hoga. Kyun ki aap internet se paisa kamana chate hai to aap me Hardwork, Sabar or humesha naya sikhne ki bhukh hona jaruri hai. Ager aapme inme se koi bhi chize ki kami hai to aap internet se paise kama nhi sakte. Ager aapme ye teeno goon hai to aapko internet se paise kamane me koi rokh nhi sakta. Ab baat karte hai internet par kaam kya kare. Ye bhi bahut hi aasan hai bas aapko Computer ka basic knowledge hona cahiye mera kahene ka matalab aapko computer use karna aana cahiye. Ab aap ye post padhe rahe hai to aapko computer or internet ka knowledge ache hoga hi. to chalo jante hai Internet se paise kaise kamate hai. Internet par paise kamane ke liye aapke pass sabse phele ek Email ID hona jaruri hai. Fir chahe wo Gmail, Orkut, Yahoo par bani ho ya kisi or par bani ho. Email ID kr bager aap Internet par koi bhi kaam nhi kar sakte. Email id kitni important hai ye aapko ache se samjh me aagaya hoga. Ager aapke pass Email ID nhi hai to aap wo banale. Ab aapko ek Blog banani hai. Iske liye aap www.blogger.com par jaye or apne Gmail account se Singin kare. Iske baad aapko Blog Create karna hai jo free me hota hai. Blog create karne se phele aapko kuch baate yaad rakhni hai. Jaise ki aapko ek acha sa naam rakhna hai apne blog ka jo jayda bada bhi nhi hona cahiye or sath hi yaad rakhne me aasan hona cahiye. Dusri baat aapko phele ye deside kar lena chahiye ki aap kis topic yani subject par blog create kar rahe ho kyunki aapko use subject par humesh kuch new likhte rahena hoga or us subject par likhte samay aapko bore bhi nhi hona cahiye. Ye tabhi ho sakta hai jab aapka choice kiya hua subject me aapko interest ho. Fir bhi mai aapko kuch subject ki list bata deta hu jis par aapko blog create karna chahiye. Blog Create karne ke baad aapko apne blog ke setting ko ache se setup karna hai. Iske baad aapko apne blog ko Website me convert karna hai. Jo bahut hi jaruri hai internet se paise kamane ke liye. Blog ko Website me convert karne ke liye aapko ek Domain Buy karna hoga. Iske liye aap Godaddy se Domain buy kar sakte hai jo bahut hi kam price me domain deti hai. Jo first time Godaddy se domain buy kar hai usko 99 rupaye me Domain milta hai. Domain ko buy karke apne blog par setup karne ke baad aapka blog website me convert ho jayega ab aapka blog ek professional website ki tarha dikhai dega. Ab aap internet se paise kamane ke liye puri tarha tayar hai. Apne blog ko or professional banane ke liye aap Mobile Friendly Blogger Template upload kare. Ye template bahut hi ache hote hai or free bhi hote hai ager aap paise kharcha karna chate hai to aap paide Template buy kar sakte hai jo sabse better hote hai. Internet se paise kamane ke liye abtak humne 2 step complete kardiye hai. Ek hai blog create karna or dusri step hai blog ko domain lagake professional website me convert karna. Ab aap 3rd step karne wale hai jo most important hai internet se paise kamane ke liye wo hai unique quality content post jo SEO ko follow karke likhe ho. Mera kahene ka matalab hai ki aapko roze ek Post likh ke publish karni hai. Jo kahi se Copy kiye hui nhi honi cahiye. Matalab aapko jo post likhni hai wo apne jubani likhni hai. Post me kam se kam 300 word ka use karna hai sath hi kam se kam ek image ka use karke post likhni hai. Or ek most important baat post ko meaning full likhne ke sath hi spelling sahi likhna. Aisa aapko roz karna hai yani aapko roze ek post publish karna hai. Post publish karne se aap internet se paise kamana start nhi kar sakte internet se paise kamane ke liye aapke website par traffic aana bahut jaruri hai. Yani visitors aana jaruri hai. Iske liye aapko apne blog ko Google, Bing or yandex webmaster tools me submit karna hoga jiske baad aapki site Search Engine me Show hone lagegi. Iske alawa aapko Social Site par apne blog ka roz pramotion karna hoga. Roz post publish karke us post ko promote karne se aapke blog par ek manth me achi traffic aane lagegi yani visitors aane lagege. Iska matalab ab aap internet se paise kamane ke final step par hai. Final step me aapko Adsense account create karke usme apne blog ko submit karna hai. Jaise hi AdSense aapke blog ko Approval deta hai aapko Adsense ke ads apne blog par lagane hai. Adsense ads apne blog par lagate hi aapka paise kamana start ho jayega. Jab bhi koi visitors aapke blog par lage ads par click karega aapko us click ke AdSense paise dega. To Dosto ab aap jaan chuke hai ki internet se paise kaise kamate hai. Mai apni next guest post me aapko ek or tarika bataunga jo internet se paise kamane ka best tarika hai. Ye ek guest post hai mera naam Shaikh Muneer mai IndiHow.com ka author hu jaha par aapko internet, blog tutorial, make money se related jankari hindi me milegi. Aapko ye jankari kaisi lagi ? Koi sawal ya sujhav ho to aap hume comment karke puch sakte hai. Ye ek Guest Post hai HMH.pe or agar aap bhi apni Guest Post karna chate hai to yaha click kare. Dusri Guest Post padne ke liye yaha click kare Ye Bhi Pade

Kisi bhi website or Page ko Search Engines me rank karne ke liye jaruri hai sahi SEO, or jese jese Technology badh rahi hai, search Engines bhi bhut smart hote ja rahe hai. to aese me agar aapko apni website ko rank karna hai to abhi ke latest SEO trend ko follow karna padega. Top 10 Google Ranking factor 2017 ke ware me mene pichle saal bataya tha, uske baad bhi bhut se bade update google ranking factor me hue hai, jiske karan bhut ki traffic achanak kam hui hai to kuch logo ki badi hai. SEO Kya hai or kaise kaise karte hai. On-Page SEO Off-Page SEO jesi bhut si detail post phele hi HMH.pe share ki hui hai, agar aapko SEO ki jankari nahi hai to inko jarur read kare. jesa ki me phele bhi bata chuka hu, kisi bhi post ko rank karne ke liye 200 factor chijo ko dekha jata hai, par unme se jo sabse jada important abhi ke time me hai, unke ware me ham baat karege. kisi bhi site ko google me rank karne ke liye usko dekha jata hai ki wo secure hai ke nahi, or agar wo secure nahi hai to automatic uski rank down kardi jati hai. Secure site me matlab hai, site me SSL certificate install hona, jisko aap browser me dekh sakte hai. Agar site me SSL certificate install hai to address war me site URL ke aage https dikhai dega, or agar nahi hai to sirf http dikhta hai. Google ne abhi kuch time phele Blogger.com me bhi https enable karne ka option add kiya hai to agar aapne abhi tak nahi kiya hai to jaldi kar lijiye. Agar aap SEO ke ware me jante hai to aapko pata hi hoga, ye ranking factor bhut jaruri hai agar site ko mobile par bhi rank karna hai to. q ki agar koi user Mobile se kuch search kar raha hai to unko phele wahi site dikhai jayegi jo mobile me achi se open ho. Iske liye aap koi bhi Template apne site me use kare, usse phele check karle achi se ki wo Mobile friendly ho. Blog Design Mistakes ke ware me bhi read kare, jo jada tar log karte hai. ye ek bhut hi Important ranking factor hai, jisme site ki loading speed fast hona bhut jaruri hai. agar site ki loading speed slow hai to automatic uski rank down kardi jati hai. Google ka sabse phela maksad hota hai ki wo user ko acha expriance de, or uske liye wo de dekhte hai ki konsi site fast hai fir wahi site upar dikhai jati hai. WordPress site ki loading speed kaise badaye uske kuch tips yaha share kiye hai. iske sath aap ye bhi read kare, q badh jati hai Blog ka loading time or kaise usko tikh kare. Kisi bhi page ko rank karne ke liye us page ki quality bhi check ki jati hai, isko simple me samje to jo search kiya ja raha hai wo kis page par sabse achi trha se hai wo dekha jata hai. konsa Page acha hai ya kis website par wo hai jo user search kar raha hai, iska pata Google apne Rank Brain technology se lagati hai, jisme wo user kisi bhi site par jakar kya kar raha hai uske bhewar ko dekh kar samaj jata hai ki kis sitepage par kesa content hai. Jese agar koi user kisi site par gaya or turant usko band karne open karne ke baad, to google aasani se samaj jata hai ki jo iss user ko chaiye tha wo iss website par nahi hai. or aese me google uss page ki rank down kar deta hai. To iska sidha sa solution hai, content me sab kuch or badiya tarike se share kare, taki koi bhi user agar ek war aaye to wapas naa jaye. koi bhi content agar detail me hoga, matlab long hoga to sidhi si baat hai usme jada detail me wo jankari hogi. to in bato ka khayal rakhe kisi bhi content ko publish karne se phele. Google or Visitor ke hisab se content kaise likhe uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. Ye sabse purana or sabse important ranking signal hai aaj bhi, jisme agar kisi site ko high quality backlinks mil rahe hai to usko hamesa jada value di jati hai search engine me. Backlink kya hai uske ware me mene bataya hai, aap agar nahi jante to waha read karke samaj sakte hai. Backlink jaruri to hai, par agar wo Bad Backlinks hai to unse ulta nuksan hota hai, isliye Quality Backlink hona bhut jaruri hai. Quality Backlinks kaise banate hai uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. Image jo ki kisi bhi article ki jaan hoti hai, jada nahi to kam se kam ek image to add karni ho padti hai taki post ko search kare to wo thumbnail me dekhe. Ek Image 1000 sabd ke warawar hoti hai, to agar kisi ko kuch samjana hai to wo image se aani se samja sakte hai. Par agar aap Image ko bina optimize ke use kar rahe hai to aap bhut badi galti kar rahe hai. q ki aese me search ening usko tikh se nahi samaj payega ki wo image kis ware me hai. Image ko Optimize karne ke liye sabse phele usko sahi dimension me resize kare, usko baad uski memory kam karne ke liye image ko compress kare. or upload karne se phele image ko rename jarur kare. Image ka SEO kaise karte hai uske ware me yaha detail me bata hai, aap wo jarur read kare. Social Signal se matlab hai social site par kitni war share kiya gaya. Google iss chij ko bhi dekhta hai or usse bhi andaja lag jata hai ki konsi post hai jo log jada pasand kar rahe hai. Hamesa apni post ko social site par share kare, or site me social share ki button bhi add kare taki aapke reader ko agar koi jankari pasand aaye to wo usko aasani se share kar sake. Social site se traffic kaise badaye uske ware me bhi read kare, taki aap sahi tarike se apni traffic bhi badha paye. At Last Abhi jitne bhi SEO Ranking factor mene bataye hai iss post me, sirf itne nahi hai, par ye sabse jada important hai or agar aap apni site ko rank karna chate hai to aapko inka dhiyan to rakhna hi padega. mene jitne ranking factor ke ware me abhi bataya hai, or online hi research karke pata kiya hai, par Aapko agar lagta hai in ranking factor ke aalawa bhi kuch hai jo jaruri hai to unke ware me comment me jarur bataye. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi wo batana bhi naa bhule. Happy Blogging !

Agar aap Internet use karte hai to aapko ye pata hi hoga, jo bhi ham Internet par karte hai usko pura track kiya jata hai, bhut si aesi jankari bhi online chali jati hai jo sayad aap naa chahe ki kisi ko pata chale. Mene apni ek post me bataya tha, Google kaise hampar najar rakhta hai, aap usko bhi jarur read kare. tikh ussi trha Facebook ho ya koi or dusri Site ya App, wo apne user ka data track karti hai, taki uss data ka use karke wo apne aapko uss trha se improve kar sake or user ko uske hisab se subhida de paye. Agar aapka Facebook par Account hai to aapne abhi ye jarur suna hoga, ki facebook ka data chori ho gaya. or kuch log bol rahe hai ki facebook account ko delete karde. to ye sab bhi kya majra hai uske ware me bhi janege. Chaliye phele dekh lete hai Facebook kaise or kya kya data track karke usko backup apne pass rakhta hai. Agar aap apna Facebook Id chala rahe hai to uspar aap jo bhi kar rahe hai, jese konsi post like, comment, share, ya konse page like kare, konse group me aap add ho. ye sab to track hota hi hai. Iske sath aapne apni profile me apni jitni bhi detail dali hai wo sab data bhi unke pass backup rheta hai. par baat yahi khatam nahi hoti, agar aap Facebook App use karte hai or Facebook Messenger aapke phone me install hai to aapka bhut kuch track kiya jata hai, jisko pata karke badi aasani se koi bhi jaan sakta hai ki aap kaise insan ho, kesa aapka nature hai ya kya aapko pasand hai or kya nahi. To ab aap ye to samaj gaye ki agar aap fb use karte hai to kitna kuch aapki jankari fb ke pass hai, jiske jariye wo aapko aapse jada achi se samaj sakti hai ki aap kaise insan hai. Facebook ye sab data isliye use karta hai, taki wo in sabse hame samaj kar, hame jada kya pasand hai wahi chije jada hame dikhaye. Par agar ye data kisi ke hath lag jaye, to aap khud socho, jisko aapke ware me sab kuch pata ho, wo aapka badi aasani se apne faide ke liye use kar sakta hai. q ki aapko kya pasand hai kya nahi wo sab jankari unke pass hogi. aesa hi kuch hua tha kuch time phele Facebook par, jisme lagbhag 5crore account ka data leak ho gaya tha ek App ke karan, or iska matlab hai koi bhi kuch bhi galat istmal kar sakta hai uss data ka. Ab baat aati hai, facebook ham use karte hai to facebook to chalo track kar raha hai data, par facebook se bahar kaise ja sakta hai, to uska tarika hai Facebook App permission. Mene apni ek Post me phele bataya tha, kaise Facebook Fake App ki madad se kisi bhi account ko hack kar sakte hai, unka data chura sakte hai. isme hota ye hai koi App jisme login with facebook ka option hota hai, to ham direct facebook se usko jaruri data dekar login kar lete hai. par kuch app jarurat se data data le lete hai, jiska wo galat istmal kar sakte hai. To ab isse bachne ka tarika ye hai, kisi bhi aese app ya website me facebook se allow naa kare, jo trusted naa ho ya limit se jada permission le raha ho. Permission kya kya le raha hai wo jab allow karte hai uss time aata hai, to usko check karke hi allow kare. To agar aapko apni privacy bachani hai to aapko in sab bato ka dhiyan rakhna padega, or ye bhi ki aapka Facebook account secure ho, nahi to koi bhi aapka data chura sakta hai. Facebook secure kaise kare, taki koi hack nahi kar sake uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. aapne ye to jan liya facebook kaise aap par najar rakhta hai or kya kya data wo track karta hai. Facebook ke pass aapka kya kya data hai agar aapko wo dekhna hai to aap download karke dekh sakte hai. Facebook Data Download karne ke liye aapko Facebook account ki setting me jana hoga, waha aapko Download a copy of your Facebook data ka option milega. Download a copy par click karne ke baad ek button aayega, Start My Archive uspar click karke start kare. fir aapke email par ek mail aayega facebook se jisme bataya jayega ki aapka backup ki request acpect ho gai hai. Kuch time baad facebook se ek or email aayega, jisme aapka facebook data download karne ki link hogi, uspar click karke aap apna data download kar sakte hai. Jo data file hai wo aap Browser me open karke apna data dekh sakte hai, kya kya data fb ke pass hai. or achi se samajne ke liye aap ye video bhi dekh sakte hai. At Last Ab aap jaan chuke hai Facebook aapke ware me kitna kuch janta hai. kher agar aapka data facebook me hi rahe fir to jada ghavrane ki baat nahi, q ki wo aapko aapke pasand ki chije dikhayegi uski madad se. par aap khud socho aapka ye data kisi aese hath me chala jaye jo aapka use karna chahe to kitni aasani se wo aapka use kar sakta hai. To agar aap nahi chate ki aapki itni sab data kisi ke pass jaye to aap apna Facebook account delete kar sakte hai. par agar aap ye sochte ho ki meri ye sab information kisi ko pata chal bhi jaye to wo kya kar sakta hai to me aapko bata du, aapki ye information kisi ko pata chal jaye to aap unke hatho ki katputli ban sakte ho, fir jo wo chahe wo aap karoge kher ye itna aasan nahi hai par ye possible hai. To me wass itna hi khena chahuga, Internet use karna band to nahi kar sakte, par Internet par secure kaise raha jaye uska jaruri aapko honi chaiye. Aapko ye jankari kesi lagi wo comment karke jarur bataye, ya aapko kya lagta hai aapka data kitna important hai.

Improving writing ability in exam 1. fast and legible handwriting is essential for examination you need not worry about beauty of your writing at this stage but it must be legible enough for the examiners to read and understand what you write this can be mastered only when practiced throughout the year. 2. practice at home school should match the real event which is test exam at school board level. 3. write as many dummy test exams as possible at home a part from the ones administered in the school. 4. till the syllabus is completed, you can write and practice chapter wise test with the schedule of one subject in a day. 5. when the syllabus is completed, you can divide it into 2 or 3 equal parts in such a way that are few easy and a few tough chapters are combined and you can write 3 hour exam in that selected portion. 6. sample question papers which are available from various sources along with study material provided in the school will be of great help for self administered test exam. 7. you can practice 3 hour exam by randomly selecting previous years question paper from CBSE. 8. the more you are exposed to question asked in previous previous exam papers you are more likely to encounter in real exam you will, therefore, gain more confidence in the exam hall. 9. always try to stick to time schedule of test exam. 10. you should know and restrict to word limit of VSA S A LA type questions otherwise you may tend to write too much for VSA and very little for LAtype question. 11. Draw diagram neatly with pencil wherever necessary and label them properly do not draw the diagram in ink at all the labels symbols used in describing should match with those used in diagrams. Blogging start karne par sabse phela sabal har ek blogger ka ye hota hai total kharcha kitna aata hai ek WebsiteBlog banane me or Kya kya chaiye ek badiya website banane ke liye, to agar aapka bhi ye sabal hai or aap bhi ek badiya site banana chate hai, to iss article me aapke sabhi sabalo ka jabab milne wala hai. BlogWebsite banane ke liye bhut se platform hai jinme se Blogger.com or WordPress sabse jada Popular hai, Blogger ya WordPress kon hai best wo achi se janne ke liye aap yaha read kar sakte hai.

Hello Friend, Youtube ko ki ek Video Shearing Site hai jo February 14, 2005 ko launch hui thi, jisko baad me Google se connect karliya. is Post me ham ussi ki kuch options ki baat karege. agar aap Youtube use karte hai ya karne ki soch rahe hai ya fir aap youtube paise kamane ke liye use karte hai to ye jaankari aapke liye jaruri bhi hai. To Chaliye jaante hai Youtube Me use hone wale Sabdo ke bare me or kya matlab hai unka, kya istmal hai unka Youtube par jo hamara acount hota hai, jisme ham video upload karte hai usko Channel bhi khate hai. Jese Hindi Me Help ki ye Channel Hai Ham youtube par kisi channel par new video ki jaankari ke liye subscribe karte hai. Subscribe karne ke baad hamare youtube ke account ke subscriptions me new video aa jate hai jinko hamne subscribe kiya hai or Hamare email par bhi pata chal jada hai. Job koi kisi channel ko Subscribe karta hai to wo subscriber khalata hai. Agar Subscribe karne ke sath sath Bell Icon par bhi click kare to uska Notification bhi aata hai mobile App par. Ye hamari Channel ka hi ek video rhata hai jisko ham apne channel ke home page me set karte hai. jab koi hamari channel ko kholta hai jisne subscribe nahi kiya hai to wo video apne aap play hone lagta hai. ham is video me apne channel ke bare me batate hai taki wo subscribe karle. Youtube par jo video upload kiye jata hai to uske jariye paies kamane ke liye uspar ads dikhana padta hai, usko monetize khate hai, or is process ko monetization khate hai. Youtube monetize on kaise kare uski jankari yaha hai. jo video rhata hai, usko play karne ke phele jo image hame dikhti hai wo Thumbnail hoti hai. youtube par ek se jada video ek group me rhate hai usko playlist khate hai. Playlist me ek video khatam hone ke baad dusra video apne aap start ho jata hai. Youtube par video kaise upload karte hai Computer se Ye Youtube ka ek future hai isme ham video ke upar link add kar sakte hai. Fir jab koi hamare video ko dekhta hai to us button par click karke bo us link par ja sakta hai. Ham Subscribe button bhi add kar sakte hai Annotation se madad se. Youtube Video Card ki madad se Video, Subscribe link, poll ya apni website ki link de sakte hai. jo Video ke upar hi i button me dikhti hai. or jo time hamne select kiya hai uss time popup bhi hoti hai. Video ke andar agar koi bol raha hai to uska likha huaa bhi aata hai video me usko khate hai subtitles ya CC. Ye sabse jada jab kaam aata hai, jese koi video kisi dusri bhasa me ho or aapko wo nahi aati to aap CC ki madad se jaan sakte ho ki wo kya bol raha hai, CC ko translate bhi kar sakte hai. At Last Friends ye kuch Common chij hai jo youtube par istmal me aati hai, inke aalawa bhi bhut si chije hai, jinke bare me me aaye bataoga. agar aap kisi or chij ke bare me jaanna chata hai youtube me to Comment kare. me usko post me bhi add karuga.

Email ID Kya hai or iska kya use hai wo aap jante hi hoge, or nahi jante to iske ware me suna jarur hoga. Aaj Online har kaam me Email ID ki jarurat padti hai, Fir Chahe Facebook Account ho ya Online Shopping karni ho, har Kaam me Email Address ki jarurat padti hai. To agar Aap janna chate hai kaise New Email id Banana Hai to is Post ko pura read kare. Email ID apki ek vertual ID hoti hai jiski madad se aap kisi dusre ki Email ID par message send kar sakte ho Internet ke madiyam se. Jo Email ID hoti hai usme hamara username hota hai or akhri me jis site par hamne Email ka account banaya hai uski link hoti hai or dono ke bich me at the rate ka sign hota hai. Jese Meri Email ID hai AdminRohitMewada.com. Isme mera username Admin hai or mene ye apni personal website RohitMewada.com par banai hai. Email ID aap kisi bhi site par bana sakte ho Yahoo, Microsoft ya GMail jo ke bilkul free hai. Par me aapko Gmail Par ID banakar dikhaoga Q ki ye Google ki Service hai to iske or bhi faide hai. Gmail Google ki hi service hai isliye Gmail Account ko Google Account bhi khate hai. Gmail Par account banana koi jada muskil nahi hai. Matlab Google Account banayege to hamara Gmail account bhi ban jayega os usse hame Mail ID bhi mil jayega. Simple aap meri steps ko follow karna or agar kahi par aapko dikkat aati hai to muje comment karke batana me aapki puri trha se help karne ki kosis karuga. To chaliye suru karte hai or sikhte hai Kaise Email id Banana Hai. Sabse phele www.Gmail.com ki site par jaiye. Create account par click kare new account banane ke liye Ab aapke saamne ek Form khulega, usme aapko apni puri detail bharke submit karni hai Apna Mobile Number verify karna hai. apna number check karke verify ka terika chune. SMS se code aayega ya fir aapko ek call aayega usme code ko batayege. ek option select karne ke baad Continue ki button par click kare. Ab aapke pass chune huee tarike se ek code aayega aapke mobile par, usko yaha daalna hai Ab aapke saamne Google Par Profile banane ke liye option aayega. Aap chahe to bana sakte ho par ham baad me banayege, abhi No Thanks ki button par click kardo Ab aapka account ban gaya hai. or Pheli baar aapka account Open huaa hai isliya aapko welcome kar rahe hai. Get Sterted ki button par click kare. ye lijiye aapka email account teyaar hai. aap isme dekhege Gmail Team se aap ko 3 mail aaye hai. Ab aap jan chuke hai email id kaise banaye or Email khul kar aapke saamne hai. Ab account jab bhi aap open karna chahe to Apna Email ID or uska password daalkar Sign kar sakte ho. Sing In karne ke liye www.Gmail.com site par jao or apna email or password daalkar sign in kar sakte ho. fir aapka account khul jayega. ab aapka gamil account open ho jayega. Jaruri jab aapka account ka kaam ho jaye to account ke aese hii naa kate, apne account ko sign out kare. taki koi aapkee account ka galat istmaal na kar sake. Upar corner me arrow par click karke Sign out ki button par click kare. Jo hamari Gmail ki id hai ye Google ki jitni bhi service hai un sab par login karne me use hogi. Ye khuch Service jin par ham apni email is or password se login kae sakte hai or bhi jitni hai jo Google se connected hai. ab aap jaan chuke hai Kaise Email id Banana Hai or kya uska use hai, uske baad bhi agar aapka koi sabal hai to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. Aapne Google par apni GMail ID to bana li par aapko ye bhi pata hona chaioye ki aapke account ko koi hack karke uska galat istmal bhi kar sakta hai. Aap ye jarur padhe ki ham kaise apni GMail ID ko Hack hone se bacha sakte hai. Kya aapko pata hai ham Gmail ki id ki madad se Free me apni website bana sakte hai, bina kisi coding ke. Hamne hamara online blog to Shuru kardiya tha ye jaankar ki Blog kaise banate hai or Blog shuru karne ke liye hame kya kya chaiye. Ham jab blog banate hai to Banate samay ham uska Tital dete hai uska link dete hai par kuch samay baad hame lagta hai ki hamare blog ka naam ya tital ye hona chaiye tha or ham usko change karna chata hai.

Facebook, jispar har ek us bande ka account hai jo internet ke bare me thoda bhi janta hai. FB par jadatar 2 karano ke liye account banate hai Hamari jo Personal Profile hoti hai usme bhut si aesi chij hai jo ham public se share nahi kar sakte, Jese Apne Firends list, Agar ham chahe ki hame koi aesa banda friend request send na kare jisko ham nahi jante to ham wo bhi kar sakte hai. Jese ek sikke ke 2 phelu hote hai ussi trha kar ek chij me kuch achaiya hoti hai to kuch buraiya bhi hoti hai. Jese hamare facebook account ko koi hack kar sakta hai, par mene iske bareme phele hi bataya hai kaise fb account ko hack hone se bachaye. Bhut bar aesa hota hai koi hame facebook par paseran karte hai, bar bar tag, comment karke ya fir hame bar bar kisi chij ke liye invite karta hai, ya faltu ke message send karta hai. to ham unko Block kar sakte hai facebook par, or jab chahe unblock bhi kar sakte hai. Jis ID ko ham Block karte hai us ID se hamari ID khulti hi nahi hai. uske liye hamari ID hoti hi nahi hai. Simple kisi ko Block karna hai to uske bhut se tarike hai. Step 1 Sabse Phele Apne Facebook Account me Login kare, Step 2 jisko Block karna hai Facebook par uski ID open kare. Step 3 3 dots hai uspar click kare fir block karde. Image me dekhe kaise. Step 1 Sabse phele Apne facebook account me login karna hai. Step 2 ab Account ki setting me jana hai. Step 3 Ab Blocking ke section me ja kar account Block kar sakte hai. Ye Process bhi Simple hai, Same Jagha jana hai jaha Block karne ke liye gaye the. Down arrow Settings Blocking Ab jisko unblock karna hai, uske naam ke aage Unblock ki link par click kare.

Doston ajkal ke bhag daod bhari jindagi men har insaan ka ana jana ek jagah se dusri jagah laga rahta hai. Aise men ek aam insaan train se lamba safar karna pasand karta hai. Magar ajkal train ticket ke liye ham tras jate hai chahe tatkal ticket ho ya 4 mahine pahle ka booking ho, kabhi koi seat khali nhi rahti. Inke peeche ek bada raaz hai aj main usi ke bare men baat karne jar aha hun. Apko andaja bhi nahi hoga ki kaise yeh hacker 45 second men sari ticket book krlete hain. Ek aam insaan jabtak id ko login karta hai aor yatra ki details bhrke ticket search karta hai tab tak sari seat gayab ho jati hain. Doston yeh apke liye bahut kaam ki baat ho sakti hai. Aise software ko puri tarah se gair kanuni mana gya hai or na hi iska koi licence hai. Yeh sab software men apka bank details or private details bhari jati hai or na hi inko koi garanti hai ki yeh puri tarah se safe hai. Doston ap hi soncho jo apne desh se bagawat kar sakta hai who apka private data kisi ko sell bhi kar sakta hai ya uska galat use kar sakta hai. Aise mamle bahut samne aye hain jismen kisi ke bank se ticket book ho jana yak hai or site pe online kuch purchase ho jana. Aor aisi online bahut site hain jahan par user ka private data sell kiya jata hai. Ap is software se bachke raho. Aor aise gair kanoni tatkal software ko sell karne wali kuch site bhi hai. Jinka list neeche main de raha hun. httpswww.tatkalsoft.info httpswww.tatkalsoftservice.com httpswww.taktalsoftware.com Doston apne shi suna tatkal software ke liye lag alag name se hacking tools ate hain. Jinmen ek agent customer se liya hua ticket ka passenger details ko pahle se hin in software men feed kar deta hai. In software ke andar who sara details bhara jata hai jo ki tatkal ticket ya opening tatkal book karte time hamen apne hanthon se type karna padta. Aur jab tatkal ticket booking ka time hota hai to yeh agent log software ko open karke booking time se 3 minutes pahle login kar lete hain. Uske baad software apna kaam start kar deta hai. Agent ko sirf dekhte rahna hota hai. Software irctc login capcha ko apne ap fill karke submit karta hai aor id login karta hai uske baad jurny details fill karke yeh software train search karta hai or us train ka seat availability chek karta hai. or jaise hi tatkal ticket open hota hai yeh software automatically booking process age badhata hai. Passenger page pe jake passenger ka sara details bharta hai, passenger page ka capcha bhi fill karke automatically submit karke payment process karta hai hai. Aor maje ki baat yeh hai ki payment karte time tatkal software bank se na koi otp ata hai aor na hi koi capcha ata hai sab bypass ho jata hai aor last men tatkal ticket book ho jati hai. Dosto yeh sab pora process men software ko sirf 40 second lagta hai aor 40 second me irctc ki ticket book ho jati hai. In tatkal software ke name kuch is tarah hain redmircy tatkal software, abs tatkal software, mac Tatkal software, orang tatkal software, etc. Doston tatkal booking software men pair kholne ka option hota hai. Pair ka matlab ap jo ticket book karne ja rahe hai uske liye ap kai window khol sakte hai banega kisi ek hi window men. or ek normal insaan browser se ticket book karega aor who ek browser men ek tab se jyada nahi khol sakta, but in software men ap 1 ticket ke liye jitna bhi pair kholna chahe khol sakte hai bas apke pas irctc ki id honi chahiye 1 id se 1 pair login hoga. Pair kitna bhi khole jismen payment pahle process hoga wahi book hoga baki sab pair ruk jate hain. Doston soncho in software men kitna advance trick hai aor yahi wajah hai ki ham ticket ke liye taras jate hai aor time pe ticket nhi milta. Doston in software men ip lagane ka system hota hai 1 ip pe sirf 2 ticket book kar sakte hain. In software men unlimited ip lagaya ja sakta hai. Aor unlimited ticket book kiya ja sakta hai aor who bhi ek saath. 1 ip men 2 slot hota hai, 1 ip pe sirf ek dinmen 2 hi pnr banaya ja sakta hai aor har ticket alag name se alag alag slot men save kiye jate hain. Aor sare ticket ko ek sath open bhi kiya ja sakta hai apke laptop men jitna screen hai ap utna pair open kar sakte ho. Doston software men premium tatkal ka fire limit dalne ki suvidha hoti hai. Jisse agent apne anusar ka limit daal sakta hai agar use jyada fire aya to software booking stop kardega fir agent jab tak manually click nhi karega tab tak payment nhi hoga jaise hi agent pay karta hai ticket book ho jayega.
jinke kamron mein film abhinetriyon ke posters hain. Hata do inko. Aadhe se zyaada garmi aise hi kam ho jayegi.

Stock Photography aesi chij hai jo sab logo ko pasand aati hai. Ye or Images ki trha Image hoti hai par isme kuch Special hota hai. Jisko ham Apne Blog, Presentation ya fir kisi project me use karte hai. Stock Image hamari Akho ko attract karti hai. Wikipidea ke mutabik, Stock Photography ek aesi photography hai jisme jo Photographer rhate hai, Wo alag alag location se photo ko kichta hai. Ye jo Photo hote hai bo hamari jarurat ke hisab se bilkul sahi rhate hai. Ham in Photo ko bhut kam kimat me kharid sakte hai. Aap Simple kharid sakte ho Stock Image websites se apni jarurat ke hisab se bhut kam kimat me. Ye kuch Badiya Wesite Stock Image ke liye. Ye jo Websites hai inpar aapko High Quality me badiya Image mil jayegi bhut kam kimat me. Par bhut log hai jo Image ke liye kharcha nahi kar sakte, Unko Free Stock Image Chaiye jisko wo kahi par bhi use kare or unpar koi copyright Clam naa ho. Agar Aapka Blog hai to aap uspar copy image dalege to aapka Adsense Approve hone me bhi dikkat aayegi. Mere Pass Bhut se sabaal aaye Stock Image ke liye, Specially jo Blogger hai Is trha ke or bhi Sabal hai. Is liye aap me aapse Free Stock Image ki 11 Websites Share kar raha hu. usse phele jaanle Kuch logo ke dimag me ye sabal bhi aa sakta hai ki itni matha pachi arne ki kya jarurat hai, sidhe google me search karlo or image download karlo, unko me simple khana chahuga ki aap bilkul aesa kar sakte ho or aapko image mil bhi jayegi. Par Image jo hoti hai unme se jada tar copywirte hoti hai matlab ham agar unko use karte hai to ham par case ho sakte hai. Mera khane ka simple ye matlab hai agar aapka blog hai or aap usse adsense ke jariye paise kamana chate hai to copyright material naa dale apni site par to hi acha hai. Pade 11 tarike Adsense Account ko Approved karane ke pixabay Pixabay bilkul shutterstock ki trha hai. Bas itna firrent hai ki ispar HD image free me mil jati hai, jisko ham kahi bhi use kar sakte hai. Abhi is site par lagbhag 400,000 imges hai or sabhi free hai. Free me image ek bada problem hai, bhut log kya galti karte hai ki Google image me image ko search karke use kar lete hai par copyright hone ki baja se baad me dikkat aati hai. Is problem ko solution hai Picabay. Is site par ham free me image ko use kar sakte hai or koi link attribute kese ki bhi koi jarurat nahi. yaha par kuch badiya mage pixabay par PIXABAY Editor s Choice Section Stocksnap.io Is site par wo roj HD image add karte hai. Is site par bhi jo Image hai wo Creative Commons hai matlab ham inko bhi free me use kar sakt hai or koi attrubute dene ki bhi jarurat nahi. Is sie ki sabse baiya baat ye hai ki ispar sirf HD image hi uoload karte hai jo durse logo se ispar submit ki hai. Pic Jumbo Ye bhi bilkul free stock photo dalt hai apni site par personal or kisi bhi project k eliye. Pic Jumbo par ultra HD image bhi hai par uske liye hame paie dena padta hai, jo sirf 6$month hai. or is hisab se hame bhut badiya image mil jati hai. Unsplash Unsplash HQ Stock photo dalte hai. Is site par jada tar nature ke photo dale jate hai. Unsplash ke license ke hisab se aap unki photo ko copy, Edit ya khud baat sakte ho bilkul free. Agar aap unke email se subscribe karte ho to aapko daily 10 new photo bhi aapko send karege email par. Designers Pics Designers Pics Jessu John, India se banai hai. Sari Photo inhi ne khichi hai or ham inko free me use kar sakte hai. IM Free Agar aapko bhut Photos ki jarurat padti hai to IM free bhi aapke kaam ki site hai. Is site se bhi aap free me image ko download karke kahi bhi use kar sakte ho. Sare photo bhut badiya hote hai is site par HD me. Flickr CC Bhut logo ko ye pata hi nahi hai ki Flickr bhi ek badiya site hai stock image ke liye. Simple aapko ispar jo bhi free image search karna hai usko search kare fir only Creative Commons par click kare, jo ki free image oti hai. SplitShire SpliteShire ek or badiya site hai jispar high quality ki image mil jati hai. Ye Image bhut hi usefull hai Designers, Developers or bloggers ke liye. Jinko aap free me use kar sakte ho. Stokpic Is site par HD images hai jinko aap print kar sakte ho, Advertising me use kar sakte ho, Blog, Business or newspaper me bhi use kar sakte hai. Is site par bhi free images hai par kuch paise me bhi hai. Gratisography Jitni bhi pictures Gratisography par add ki jati hai wo sahi e bhut badiya hoti hai, Is site par wo jitni bhi image dalte hai categories wise. ham ispar aasani se image ko search karke kahi bhi free me use kar sakte hai. Startup Stock Photos Is site ke to naam se hi samj aa gaya hoga. Jab ham koi kaam start karte hai to usme use kar sate hai in images ko free me. Ye image smaill business or startups ke liye bhut badiya hai. At Last To free images ki website ki list to aapne dekhli. or muje lagta hai in sites mese aapko apne kaam ki image jarur mil jayegi. Par use karne ke phele me aapko suggest karuga ki aap image ko ek baar check karle ki ye image or kaha use ki gai hai or kahi copyright to nahi hai. Uske liye aapko Simple jo image hai usko TinEye par upload karna hai ya fir image ka url bhi daal sakte hai. uske baad jese hi search karege jinti bhi jagha ye image hogi aa jayegi. Isse ham kisi bhi image ka source pata kar sakte hai. Akhri me aapse ye hi khana chahuga ki aapka jo bhi topic ho usse related stock image hi use kare. Image use karne se hamari Post me jaan dal jati hai or agar ek badiya image ho to kya baat. Aapke kya bichaar hai or koi suggestion hai to comment me jarur bataye.

Youtube jo ki ek aesa platform hai yaha koi bhi apne Video upload karke duniya se share kar sakta hai, or Video ko monetize karke usse paise bhi kama sakta hai. Youtube se Paise kaise kamaye or kaise Channel ko monetize kare uske ware me phele hi bata chuka hu, agar aap new hai to aap yaha dekh sakte hai. Youtube se apni Youtube Partner Program YPP me ek bada update kiya hai jisse jo chote channel hai wo ab paise nahi kama payege, abhi me ussi update ke ware me batane wala hu. ki wo kya hai or uski kya limits hai. Youtube ne kuch time phele ek update kiya tha, jisme channel ke total views 10,000 hoge, uske baad hi monetize enable hoga. lekin ab thoda usse bhi muskil hone wala hai. Youtube Channel ko monetize chalu karne ke liye Channel ke pichle 12 mahino me 4,000 hours watch time hona jaruri hai or uske sath 1,000 subscriber bhi. Ye aap Youtube Official Blog par bhi read kar sakte hai. Starting me monetize enable karne ke liye total 10,000 views to chaiye hi, par uske sath sath ab 4000 Hours1000 subscriber bhi hona jaruri hai pichle 12 mahino me. Ye jo Update hai wo 20 February 2018 se apply ho jayega. Agar aapki channel new hai, ya aap New Channel banane ka soch rahe hai jispar monetize enable nahi hai to aapko ye limit puri karni hogi, uske baad hi monetize on hoga. Agar aapki channel par monetize on hai, par aapki channel par jada views nahi aate, or aapki channel par pichle ek saal me 4000 hours watch time se kam hai or 1000 subscriber se kam bade hai to aapka monetize bhi disable ho jayega. Jese hi jo limit hai wo puri hoti hai, monetize ke liye apply kar sakte hai. Agar aapka phele monetize on tha, par new limit ke karan disable hua hai to aap badiya video dale or jese hi aapki limit puri ho. aap suspend hone ke ek mahine baad double se apply kar sakte hai. Youtube ka khena hai, ye update unhone youtube creators ke liye hi kiya hai, taki jo galat kaam karte hai wo dur rahe. Youtube par 90 aesi channels hai jinki one year ki earning 100$ se kam hai ya ek mahine me 2$ hoti hai, aesi channel ab monetize nahi hopayegi. At Last Mere hisab se to ye update bhut badiya hai, q ki agar aese channel hai jo 100$ se kam kamate the ek saal me. to agar kisi ki aesi channel hai to wo ab earning ko naa dekhte huee badiya video dalege, or fir jada views aayege to earning bhi jada hogi. Aapko Kya lagta hai Youtube Partner Program ka ye update acha hai ya bura, or isse aapke youtube channel par kya aasar padha wo bhi share kare. or agar isse sambandit koi sabal ho to aap wo bhi jarur puche.

Dosto mene phele aapko bataya tha ki ham kaise apna free blog bana sakte hai. Par agar aapko apne blog ko website me convert karna hai to aapko sabse phele ek acha sa domain register karna padta hai. Domain Name Register karne ke liye hame kisi domain selling website se domain ko lena padega. Online aapko Bhut se domain selling website mil jayegi. unme se ek jiska naam sayad aapne suna hoga GoDaddy. me aapko bataoga kaise ham godaddy se domain ko kharid sakte hai. Aap kisi bhi site se domain register karo lagbhag same hi process rahegi. aap yaha Top 5 Domain Register site dekh sakte hai. Domain Kharidne ke phele ye jarur pade, Kaise Badiya Domain Name select kare apni site ke liye. jo aasani se search me aaye, or har trha se badiya bhi ho. Domains ko kharidne ke liye aap meri Steps ko follow karo GoDaddy ki Site par jao. Godaddy Domain Offer GoDaddy par account banane ke liye is form ko bharo. Agar phele se account hai to is step ko rhene do. In sabhi details ko yaad rakhna hai ya fir kahi par likh kar rakh lo. Ab aapka GoDaddy par account to ban chuka hai. Ab GoDaddy me Login hone ke baad aapko website ke liye naam search karna hai. uske liye aapko godaddy ki site par aasani se search box dikh jayega. Aapko jo Naam register karna ho usko search karo. Agar kisi ne phele se domain ko kharid rakha hai to aap usko nahi kharid sakte. Domain ki jo kimat hai bo alag alag ho sakti hai. Abhi ek offer chal raha hai isliye 99 rs me ek saal ke liye mil raha hai. nahi to iski kimat lagbhag 600rs hoti hai.

Mai Post Start Karne Se Pehle Apna thoda Introduction de du! Mera Naam Saddam Husen hai Aur Mai allblogtips.in Ka Founder Hu. Aur Mai HindimeHelp Ka Regular Guest Blogger Hu. Mai Ummed Karta Hu. Ki Mere Sabhi Post Ke Tarah Iss post Ko Bhi Aap Log Pasand Karege! Agar Aapko Blogging Ke Bare Me Aur Sikhna Hai To Aap Mere Blog Par Visit Kar Sakte Hai. ab Mai article Par Ata Hu? Maximum blog ke founder ko ye nahi pata hota hai ki ek awesome blog title ko kaise likhte hai. kya aapne kabhi apne Aap se ye sawal pucha hai! koi kyo mere post par koi click nahi karta hai aur mujhe kyo google se target traffic nahi milta hai. jab ki aap sabkuch sahi sahi tarike se karte hai! agar aapke sath aisa hota hai to iska karan aapke blog post ka title ho sakta hai. ji haa aap ekdum sahi soch rahe hai aapka content good hai lekin aapke content ka title good nahi hai. jiss wajah se log aapke content par click karne me interested nahi hote hai. muje pta hai ki aap successful hone ke liye hmesa awesome content likhne ki kosish karte hai. regularly awesome content likhne ke baad bhi aapko badiya result nahi milta hai. to iska karan blog ka title hai. yadi aap apne blog title ko attractive nahi likhege to aap apne reader ko acchi tarah se impress nahi kar paa rahe hai, aur google se aapka blog traffic bhi kam hoga! aaj ke article mai aapko excellent blog title ko likhne ke 6 tips bataoga. jinko follow karke aap apne article ke title ko apne reader ke aakho me attract kara sakte hai! badiya post title likhne ka ek bahut hi badiya aur common tarika hai ki aap blog post ke title me number ka prayog kare! aap apne post ke condition ke hisab se number ka upyog kare. blog post ke title me number ko use karne ka koi rules aur regulation nahi hai! jaisa ki aap dekh rahe hai ki iss article me mai numbers 6 ka upyog kiya hua hu! isliye aap koi bhi number apne article me use kar sakte hai. Example Title Post aap Interesting sabd ka use apne post title me karke apne reader ko easy attention de sakte hai. log hmesa attractive chizo ko jyada pasand karte hai. is liye aap kuch fabulous word ka use karke apne title ko delicious banaye. kabhi bhi title me koi boring word na Use kare. hmesa excellent word hi use kare jaise- Fantastic, Unlimited, Excellent, Secret, Brilliant, Awesome, interesting, outstanding, solid, etc Example Post Title hmesa ye kosish kare ki blog post ke title me whykyo, whenkab aur HowKaise ka use kare. hmesa Reader kuch na kuch janane ki koshish karte hai jaise- why something is impotent, why something is needed, thik ussi prakar when doing the task, aur how to do anything. example se aap to smjh hi gaye hoge ki whykyo, whenkab aur HowKaise ka Use blog post title me karna kitna impotent hai. yadi app iss tarh ke word ko title me use karege to aapke readers ke pass ek direct messege jayega aur woh aapke article ko padhne me intrest dikhega Example Post title yadi aapka blog post title bahut bada hai to aap kabhi bhi uss se traffic ka expect na kare kyoki reader kabhi bhi traditional long aur boring title ko padhne me apna time nahi west karte hai. isliye hmesa title ko chota rakhne ki kosish kare. title chota hone ke sath sath sweet bhi ho. agar hum title ke length ke baat kare to 30-70 letters ke title seo friendly hoti hai. aur aap bhi apna title 30-70 letters ke ander hi rakhe. isse jada sand ka titel google me bhi pura nahi dikhta. Example Post title blog post ka title clear hone ke sath sath asani se smjh me ana cahiye. yadi aap fancy aur complex title rakhte hai to ye logo ko smjhne me bahut hi paresani hoga. fancy aur complex title rakhne par aap apne blog ke traffic ko miss kar dege. isliye jab bhi blog post ka title likhe to clear likhe. jab bhi koi post ke title ko dekhte to unko fatak se samaj aana chaiye ki post me kya hai or unko kya milne wala hai. Example Post title aap ye koish kare ki aapke reader ke problem aapne post ke madhyam se solved karte rahe. isliye aapka blog post ke title ke keyword ko problem solver hona cahiye. aap iss tarah ke keyword ka use kare jo clear idea se particular problem ko solve karte ho. Example Post title

Yadi aap Whatsapp user hai to ab aapko online money sending aur receiving ke liye Google Tez, Paytm ya Bhim App use karane ki jarurat nahi. Ab aap Whatsapp se hi apne friend ya relatives ko money send ya receive kar sakte hai. 10 50-60 , Haal hi me Whatsapp ne Online Payment Enabled Whatsapp ka beta version launch kiya hai, jo filhal sabhi ke liye available nahi hai. Iska stable version aane me kuch time lag sakta hai, chaliye ab jante hai- Whatsapp Business App Kya Hai ? Whatsapp UPI Payment Feature Kya Hai ? Whatsapp ne online payment feature ke liye planning 1 April 2017 se hi shuru kar diya tha. Ab kuch time bad sabhi Android aur iOS users ke liye available hoga. Whatsapp Payment feature ke liye Paytm aur Bhim app ki tarah NPCI ke payment system UPI Unified Payments Interface ko use karata hai. Yani aap ko Whatsapp se payment transaction ke liye bank details nahi, UPI address ki jarurat hogi. Jise aap easily create kar sakte hai. Whatsapp Ko PCLaptop Me Kaise Chalaye Whatsapp Payment Feature, Paytm aur Google Tez Se Kaise Difference Hai ? 1.Whatsapp -Whatsapp ke globally 1.2 billion users hai. Jab Whatsapp globally payment feature ko enable kar dega, tab yah duniya ka sabse bada Payment enabled app ban jayega. Vahi India me iske 25 karor users hai, jo other app users se kahi jyada hai. Yani Indian me bhi Whatsapp sabse bada payment enabled app ban sakta hai. Payment feature enable karane ke bavjud whatsapp messaging app ke rup me hi jana jayega aur Whatsapp payment option chat ke dauran available karta hai. But Paytm ki tarah Amazon, Flipkart jaise ecommerce websites aur retailer shopkeeper ko payment karane ke liye ise use nahi kar sakte. 2. Paytm India me Paytm ke 18 karore user hai. Paytm ne haal me hi UPI ko App me add kiya tha. Vaise Paytm ek e-wallet hai. jo homepage aur inbox me payment feature available karta hai. 3.Google Tez Google Tez ne India me ab tak 12 karore use jod chukka hai. Yah homepage par payment feature available karta hai. Sath hi messaging ke liye bhi jana jata hai. WhatsApp Plus Kya Hai ? Ise Kaise Install Karte Hai? Whatsapp me Whatsapp UPI Payment Feature Kaise Add Kare Simply aapko Whatsapp me Whatsapp UPI Payment Feature enable karne ke liye update karna hoga. Yadi aap is tarike se chat box me payment feature nahi dekh paa rahe to aap aise friend se contact kare, jiska Whatsapp UPI Payment Feature Enabled ho. Yadi vo aapko whatsapp se money send karane ki koshish karega to Whatsapp UPI Payment Feature Setup karane ka notification milega. Ab OK press karte hi aapke Whatsapp me Payment Feature add ho jayega. Ab transaction karane ke liye Whatsapp UPI payment feature setup karna hoga. jise aage jante hai. GBWhatsApp Kya Hai Ise Kaise Install Kare Whatsapp UPI Payment Feature Kaise Setup Kare Whatsapp me UPI Payments Feature setup karana Bhim app ke saman hai. 1.Whatsapp setting me jaye aur Payments option par click kare. 2.Ab Verify Via SMS par click kare. Hello friends , aaj kal computers ka use har jagah ho rha hai-chahe ghar per,office mein,or school mein, har jagah. Hamari day-to-day life ke kai tasks or activities ab computers per depend ho gye hain. Inme se jo main activities shaamil hain- jaise online study krna,job search krna,kisi bhi product se related information search karna,shopping karna,trip ki planning karna, in sab activities ko karne ke liye ham computers ka use kr skte hain. To is tarah aap dekh sakte hain ki computer kis tarah se hamari life ko easy bana rha hai. Home Computer ya PCPersonal Computer ke saath ham or bhi tasks kar sakte hain jaise aap ghar baithe apna bank balance dekh sakte hain,bill pay kar sakte hain, aap apni personal income or kharchonexpenses per bhi najartrack rkh sakte hain, funds transfer, buy or sell stocks or apne financial plans ko evaluate kar sakte hain. Computer ka use ab har jagah hota hai jaise ki aapne dekha hoga ki log rupay ka transaction ATMAutomated teller machine se karte hain. Or grocery store mein bhi computer ka istemaal hota hai jiski help se money ki calculation or jitne items purchase kiye gye hain unka calculation easy ho jata hai. Kai log Computers ko as a source of communication use krte hain yaani ab communication karne ke liye text per hi limited nhi rehna padega. Ab aap voice calling,sound recording send kr skte hain,videos share kr skte hain and graphics ki technology ki help se aap computer per other persons se face to face communicate ker sakte hain. Aap videos send kar sakte hain or apni family,friends or relatives ke saath photographs send and share kar sakte hain. Technology day-to-day advance hoti jaa rhi hai or computers ab hamari life ke integral parts ban chuke hain. To agar aapko is digital world mein success hona hai to yeh bahut jaroori hai ki aap Computer Literate ho. Computer Literate hone se matlb hai ki aapke pass computer or uske uses ki knowledge or achi samajunderstanding ho. us insaan mein inmein se koi bhi baat fit baithti hai to sachet ho jaaiye, jeevan mein mushkilein badh sakti hain
kyunki insaan pyaar karta hai taaki wo ek khushhal zindagi jee sake, par yadi koi aap par baat baat par shak kare to kya aap uske saath khush reh sakoge? Kabhi nahi bachha!
sabhyata hi insaan ki pehchan hoti hai bhakton, Insaan ki pehchan uske kapdon se nah uski baateon se hoti hai.
kabhi bhi unke saath prem sambandh nahi banane chahiye, kyunki jo kisi ki izzat nahi karta wo aapki bhi izzat kabhi nahi karega, ye ek param satya hai bhakton.
chhote se chhote faisle mein bhi jise hamesha doosaron ka muh dekhna achha lagta ho, aise insaan ke saath aap kabhi bhi khush nahi reh sakte bachha.
kintu use aap par yakeen hi nahi hai to bhakton kabhi bhi aap us insaan ke saath khus nahi reh sakoge, kyunki jahan yakeen hi na ho wo rishta kabhi safal nahi ho sakta.
kintu apna matlab nikal jaate hi badal jaata hai, aise insaan se jitna door rho utna hi behtar hai bhakton.

Hello friends agar aap OLX,Quickr ya inki jaisi other classified sites ko use karte hain to apke man mein kai baar yeh sawaal ata hoga ki aakhir yeh websites rupay kaise kamati hain? Agar ham OLX ki baat kare to isme koi shak nhi hai ki OLX hamare country ki most popular ecommerce site hai or successfully business kr rhi hai. Others countries mein to yeh successful hai hi saath hi saath india mein yeh most successful ecommerce site hai. Sabse aascharya ki baat yeh hai ki OLX ki popularity badne ke karan Google ko apni ek classified website jo ki Google trader ke name se jaani jaati thi usko band karna pada. OLX Website ke baare mein OLX website ek ecommerce classified website hai jisper ham online kuch bechne ke liye ads de sakte hain jisse ham apna old samaan bech sakte hain. Or ham kuch bhi yahan se second hand kharid sakte hai jo or logon ne bechi hai. Is website ke kuch domains hain jaise olx.com,olx.co.ke, olx.in jo ki alag-alag countries mein unke domain ke hisaab se open hoti hai or work krti hai. Yeh lagbhag 40 countries mein work karti hai. Is site ko february 2006 se 8 years ho gye hain. Iske founders Alec Oxenford or Fabrice Grinda hai. Yeh ek shoppingclassified website hai. Olx kaise rupay kamati hai Ab ham aapko batate hai ki classified website kaise earning karti hai 1. Google Adsense OLX google adsense ko use krta hai. Google adsense ek ad network hai jo website per apne ads deta hai or agar un ads per click hota hai to usse site owner ki or google ki earning hoti hai means jis advertiser ne ad diya hai uskk google ko pay karna hota hai then google site owner ko un ads per click hone ke rupay deti hai yeh PPCpay per click based network hai. Olx two google ad unit use krta hai jise ham banner ads keh sakte hain. Jo ki size mein bahut bade hote hain jisse un ads per click hone ke chances bad jaate hai. Or kyunki google CPMCost per thousand impression ads deti hai yaani ki 1000 impression per 1 dollar ke lagbhag deti hai. To OLX per agar 2014 ke august tk ki traffic dekhi jaate to 2.4 million hoti hai to isse aap andaja laga sakte hain ki kewal users ke visit hone per hi kitni kamayi hoti hogi or jab ads per clicks aayege to sayad uska double bhi ho sakti hai. 2. Sponsored Listing jaisa ki aapne dekha hoga ki jab bhi aap google per kuch search karte hain to search result mein google kuch ads deta hai jisper click hone pr google advertiser se rupay leti jiska ads usne lagaya. Thik usi tarah olx bhi apni listing mein sponsored links lagati hai means jab koi person koi product search karta hai uske baad jo search result ki listing aati hai to usse pehle kuch sponsored links aate hai jinper click hone se olx advertiser se rupay leti hai. 3. Feature listing ads Feature ad wo ad hai jo OLX users ke search terms ke anushaar deta hai. Yeh ads un sabhi advertisements ke niche show hote jo same category ke hote hain. Inke charge kuch is prakar hai- Home page per feature ads ke liye yeh 9.99$ per week charge leta hai. Or agar aap chahte hain ki aapka ad search result mein top listing mein aaye to uske liye yeh 2.99$ per week charge leta hai. Ad placement website ki algorithmcoding per depend hai isliye yeh pata laga pana muskil hota hai ki ek time mein kitne features ads aa sakte hain. Agar Aapka Facebook par account hai to aap apne dosto se to jude rhe hi sakte hai, jese ki ham dekhte hi hai abhi ke time me social networking site ke aesa free tarika hai jiski madad se koi bhi uski jaankari duniya se share kar sakta hai. Facebook par ham Apne Friends or Family se jude rha sakte hai, or agar koi business karte hai ya fir koi celebrity hai to Facebook Page ya fir Facebook Group ki madad se logo se jud sakte hai. Facebook par crore users roj facebook use karte hai, Me aapko bata du- Facebook par har roj 6 lakh war galat password daalkar account ko hack karne ki kosis ki jati hai. Kuch log hack kar bhi lete hai. to aaj ham issi topic ke bare me baat karege or apne account ko kaise hack hone se bachaye ye janege. Fb account hack hone ka sabse bada karan hai Facebook Account hack kaise hota hai uski jaankari naa hona, to ham har tarike ke bare me baat karege jisse hamara facebook account hack ho sakta hai. Ek baat ka diyaan rakhe me aapke account ki security kaise badaye usme madad karuga, koi mujse ye ummid naa kare ki me kisi ka account hack karu ya aapko hacking sikaho. Jab bhi Fb par login karte hai to ID or Password dal kar login karna padta hai. Aapne dekha hoga Keep me logged in ka option bhi rhata hai. uspar click karne ka matlab hai jab jak aap Logout nahi karege aap login hi rahege. Is option ka sirf apne computer me use kare jisse aapko bar bar password dal kar login nahi karna pade. Par agar aap Apne kisi Friends ke computer me ya fir kisi Net Cafe me facebook chalaye to ispar kabhi click nahi kare. Facebook ka password majbut rakhe, jisko koi aasani se pata na kar sakte aapka password. Bhut log kya glti karte hai jo unka mobile number rhata hai usko hi facebook password set kar dete hai. Password aesa hona chaiye jisko aap aasani se yaad rakh sako or koi uska andaja bhi naa laga sake. In sabko ek sath karke kuch is trha ka password banega Cric6756 Aap mene bataya is trha se apna majbut password bana sakte hai. ab aapka password kitna majbut huaa usko aap Password Meter ek website hai uspar check kar sakte ho. Apne Account ki Setting Security me jaye or login Alerts enable kare. jisse aapka account me jab bhi login ho aapko notification aa jayega. Facebook Login Alert Alerts chalu karne ke baad aesa notification aata hai agar or kahi bhi koi login karta hai. Email Bhi aata hai or SMS bhi aata hai. Is Option ko enable karne ke baad jab bhi aapko facebook code ki jarurat padegi to aap Apne Mobile me Facebook App ki setting me ja kar dekh sakte ho. Security me apne 5 Fb Friends ko add kare, jinpar aapko bharosa ho. Agar kabhi aapke account me login karne me koi dikkat aati hai to facebook ek ye option bhi deti hai ki aap apne trusted friends ke pass phone laga kar apna code le. jo aapke ye friends hai ise sabse pass alag alag code jayega. usko eksath dalne par account khul jata hai. isliye jo bharose ke ho unh ko add kare. Facebook Trusted Friends Is option me Ham jab Login karte hai to Facebook hamse puchta hai ki kya ye trusted Device hai. Agar ham usko Yes kar dete hai to wo yaha Save ho jata hai. Fir ham jab bhi isme Login karege to hamare pass koi Notification nahi aayega. Yaha Check kare agar koi aesa Computer Save ho jo aapka naa ho to usko remove karde. FB Login Device Account ki setting me ja kar current session me jaye, bha aap dekh sakte hai abhi aap apne account me kaha par login hai, Jese agar aap apne Mobile me or Computer me Login hai to wo aap isme dekh sakte hai. Agar aap kisi or ke computer me Facebook chala rahe the or aap logout karna bhul gaye to aap yaha par ja kar End Activity par click karke kahi se bhi logout kar sakte hai. Facebook Remote Logout Facebook par bhut log fack account bana lete hai, Total Facebook Account me se 8 fack account hi hai facebook par. To agar aapko koi paresan karta hai ya aap nahi chate ki wo aapke account ko khole to aap usko block kar sakte hai. Facebook Account Block Mobile Number bhi jarur add karke rakhe, isse aapko kabhi password bhul gaye to forgot karne me bhi aasani hogi. aap facebook ke sms mobile par bhi aayege. Facebook Mobile Number Jo Aapke phecha ke ho unhi ko facebook par friend banaye, Agar koi aapko friend request bheje to uski ID phele check kare kahi fack to nahi. me apni agli post me bataoga kaise check kare Fack Id hai ki nahi. Facebook Friend Requests Agar aapne bhut logo ko firend request send ki hai or unhone abhi tak accpect nahi ki wo dekhna hai to uska bhi tarika hai, jisme mene bataya hai Facebook send request kaise dekhe. Kya Aapko Pata hai Facebook par 5000 se jada friends nahi bana sakte, Agar aap ke isse jada chane wale hai to aap Apna Facebook Page banaye Facebook par apps ka option bhi hai, jinki madad se ham kisi bhi game, sites se facebook account ko connect kar sakte hai. par iski madad se koi hamare account hack bhi kar sat hai, isliye jab koi koi app install karre ye jarur dekhe ki ye kya kya permission le raha hai. or jo kaam ke nahi hai unko Remove karde apne account se. Facebook Apps Facebook App se Account kaise Hack hota hai uski jankari yaha hai, agar aapko janna hai kaise aap kisi app ko permision de kar apna account hack kara sakte hai to iss post ko read kar sakte hai. Aap apne account pe kya share karte ho, kon kon usko dekhe, kon aapko tag kar sakte is trha ki puri setting aap apni Account Privacy me kar sakte ho. Isse agar aap chate hai ki koi meri ye jaankari naa dekh paye wo aap kar sakte ho. Facebook Privacy Setting Privacy setting account ki security ke liye bhut jaruri hai, aap Fb me apne Friends ko Hide karke rakhe, or anjan insan aapko friend request send naa kar paye uski liye facebook friend request block karke rakhe. Aapka jo Computer hai Usme AntiVirus jarur rakhe, Q ki kuch aese virus bhi hai jo agar hamare computer me aa jaye to hamare computer me ham kya karte hai uski puri jaankari Net par chali jati hai or jisne us virus ko banaya hai wo puri detail dekh sakta hai. Agar aapke Computer me Antivirus nahi hai to aap Avast Free Anti Virus yaha se Download kare. Kuch Log Facebook par kisi ki ID Hack kare ke liye bilkul Facebook ki site jesa login Page banate hai or uski Link send kardete hai jiski ID hack karna hai uske pass. Fir jab wo usme Apni Facebook ki ID or Password dalkar Login karna chata hai to Login me Error aati hai or uska ID or Password Hacker ke pass Chala jata hai. Isko Check karne ke liye ki ye fack login Page to nahi hai apne browser me check kare ki jo site ki link hai wo httpswww.Facebook.com hi ho. Hackers kya karte hai ki ek aesi se website banate hai jo facebook ke url ki trha lage jese Facedook.com or uski link send kar dete hai jiki ID hack karna hoti hai. to uske ID or Password unke pass aa jate hai. Agar aapko lagta hai kahi aapne apna ID or Password Fack Login Page par to nahi daal diya to jada naa soche or apna Facebook Password Change karde turant. Computer ka ek Software hota hai, jisko Key-logger khate hai. Is software ko computer me install karne ke baad jitni bhi button dabai jati hai computer me wo sab save ho jati hai. To agar aap Kisi dusre ke computer me login kare usse phele ye jarur diyan rakhe ki wo bharose ka admi ho. khane ka matlab hai ki aesa naa ho usne apne computer me keylogger install karke rakha ho or aapka password usme save ho jaye. Net Cafe par jarur sabdhar rahe. Isse aapke Bank account hack ho sakta hai, isliye iska khayal rakhe. Ye jo tarika hai isse aapke account ki Security nahi badti par agar aapko agar lagta hai to koi bar bar mere account ko hack karne ki kosis kar raha hai to aap apne account ko deactivate kar sakte hai, jisse koi aapki Id ko khol kar koi jaankari nahi dekh payega. Facebook Account ko Deactivate Kaise kare ya hamesa ke liye delete kaise kare uski jankari mene dio hui hai. Jis Email ko aapne Facebook me use kiya hai usko bhi secure rakhe or uska Password bhi majbut rakhe. Or apne Email ko Facebook Par share naa kare or usko only me kare. Isse aapke account me ek or layer aa jayegi security ki. Email Account ko secure kaise kare, uske liye yaha mene tips share ki hai Hack hone se bachane ke ke liye. Ye sabse Advance tarika hai, jiski madad se aapapne fb account ko hack hone se bacha sakte hai. agar aapne FB me 2 step verification on kar rakha hai to uske baad agar kisi ko aapka password pata chal bhi jaye to bhi wo aapka account open nahi kar payege jab tak unke pass wo code naa ho jo aapke mobile par OTP ke rup me aayega. Facebook 2 Step Verification At Last Agar aap itni Bato ka diyaan rakhege to Aapka Account Hack hona bhut muskil hai.

Time-time par ki gai money saving hamesha kaam aata hai, usi tarah future save karana hai to money saving ki serious planning karani hogi, tabhi old age ke time ko sukun bhara bana sakenge. 10 50-60 , Iske liye Government ne NPS National Pension System run kar rakha hai, jiska fayada uthakar har koi apne old age future secure kar sakta hai. To aaiye janate hai- NPS Kya Hai Kaise NPS Account Open Kare Indian Government Government employees ki defined pension se padane vale financial burden ko khatm karne ke liye aur Pension plan se related freedom dene ke liye 1 January 2004 ko NPS ko launch kiya tha. I s plan ka main object tha, desh par padane vale financial burden ko khatm kar government employees ko future secure karane ke liye investment habit banana, taki employees ke paise ko desh ki growth me use kiya jaye. Bad me jab unhen jarurat pade to interest sahit apna investment amount withdraw kar sake. Yah scheme America ki 401k plan se match karta hai. 22 December 2003 ko jab Indian Government ne is scheme ko introduce kiya tha, tab ise Contributory Pension System kaha gaya, jise launching ke time ise National Pension System name diya gaya. Shuruat me yeh plan Government Employees except of Indian Army ke liye compulsory tha , but 1 May 2009 ko private sector aur Farmers ke liye is scheme ko open kar diya gaya. NPS Se Kya Benefit Hai NPS MGNREGA ke bad Indian Government ki sabse badi scheme hai, isliye ye plan country ke bade hissa ko prabhavit karti hai aur iska benefit bhi bada hai. 1.Tax Saving Income Tax Act 80CCC and 80CCD ke under NPS me 40 maturity amount tax free hota hai aur 60 amount taxable hota hai. 2.Secure Future NPS ka main object hai financially future secure karana hai, vakai me ye old age ka roof ki tarah hai, jo financial strong banata hai. 3.County Growth Pension ke rup me mile paise ko country, Industries, Infrastructure etc ke growth me lagaya jata hai, jo pensioner aur every countryman ke liye beneficial hai. NPS Account Ka Type NPS account two type ke hote hai, jise koi bhi apni jarurat ke anusar open kar sakta hai. Tier-1 Is type ke account se amount maturity period yani 65 year ke bad hi withdraw kar sakte hai. Isliye ise Non-Withdrawal Saving Account kaha jata hai. Isme aapko minimum 500 rupees monthly aur 6000 rupees annually deposit karana hoga v Income Tax Act 80 C ke according concession bhi milega. Is account ko open karte time minimum 500 rupees ki jarurat padti hai. Tier-2 Yah account normal saving account ki tarah hai, jisse aap kabhi money withdraw kar sakte hai. Is tarah ke account ko open karte time minimum Rs 1000 ki jarurat padegi. Isme monthly minimum Rs 250 aur annually Rs 2000 deposit karana hota hai. But isme apko kisi bhi tarah ki tax par concession nahi milega. NPS Account Ko Kaun Open Karava Sakta Hai -Resident ya non resident Indian citizen ho -Uski age 18-60 year ke bich ho. -Mentally balanced ho. NPS Account Open Karane Ke Liye Required Document Aadhar Card Pan Card NPS Account Kaise Open Kare Indian Government ne most of bank aur financial institution ko POP Point of Presence bana rakha hai, jise PFM Pension Fund Manager bhi kaha jata hai. Yaha jankar aap NPS account open kar sakte hai. NPS ke total 8 PFM hai- SBI Pension Funds LIC Pension Fund UTI Retirement Solutions HDFC Pension Fund ICICI Prudential Pension Fund Kotak Pension Fund Reliance Capital Pension Fund Inme sabse Jyada SBI Pension Funds popular hai, jiska pension fund Rs 61,000 crore ho chuka hai. All Indian Central Government Employees LIC Pension Fund, SBI Pension Fund aur UTI Retirement Solutions me invest karte hai. Ye PFM four type ki schemes available karate hai, jiski alag-alag condition hoti hai Scheme E Ise equity scheme bhi kaha jata hai, isme 75 equity share me invest kar sakte hai. Scheme C Is scheme me high quality corporate bonds me invest kiya jata hai, isliye ise Corporate Debt Scheme kaha jata hai. Scheme G Is scheme me aap Government Bonds me invest kar sakte hai. Scheme A Yah scheme private sector valon ke liye hai. Note- aap offline ke saath online bhi NPS account open kar sakte hai. Iske Aadhar Card mobile number se registered hona chahiye, taki account registration ke liye OTP pa sake. In Last word Apna old age secure karna hai to abhi se money saving karana hoga, tabhi aap old age me life ko really enjoy kar sakenge. Jiske ke liye NPS better option hai. Aaj hi ise join kare. NPS se related question ho to comment jarur kare.

Yeh tyohaaron ka mousam Indian Consumers per bahut hi meharbaan hai. aaj ki is post mein ham aapko batayenge ki kaise aap maatra 1700 rs mein iphone 7 le sakte hain. Apple Iphone hamesha se hi smartphones users ke liye craze bana hua hai. per iske atyadhik daamexpensive price ke karan wo log jo Iphone ka use karna chahte hain wo apni ashaaon ko man mein hi daba lete hain. Media ki report ke anusaar Aap Apple ka latest Iphone 7 sirf 1700 rs mein kharid sakte hain. Report mein bataya gya hai ki agar aapke pass Adhaar card hai to aap 1700 rs ki down payment karke Iphone kharid skte hain or baaki ka bacha hua rupay aap installments mein pay kar sakte hain. Apple company ne Iphone ki chah rkhne walo ke liye bahut hi acchi scheme nikaali hai iske liye company indian banks se anubandh karne ki tyaari kar rahi hai agar yeh anubandh successfully approved ho jaata hai to aam grahakonconsumers ko maatra 1700 rs ki aasaan kistoninstallments mein Iphone hansil karne ka laabh mil sakta hai. NOTE Per yeh Scheme aap tabhi le paayenge jab aapke pass Adhaar card hoga. Apko bata den ki Apple company ne apne 2 smartphones 1Iphone 7 or 2 Iphone 7 plus ko 13 september 2016 ko launch kiye hain.Yeh event San Francisco mein hua tha. Iphone 7 or Iphone 7 plus aapko 32 GB,128 GB or 256 GB ki alag-alag storage capacity ke saath uplabdh honge. Yeh phones aapko alag-alag colours mein bhi available hain jaise Silver,gold or rose gold colours mein. Ek new variant jo ki Black colour mein hai wo kewal 128 GB or 256 GB ke variants mein aayega. Jabki 32 GB wale model ki kimat market mein 60000 rs batayi jaa rhi hai,or anya models ki price abhi disclosebatayi nhi ki gyi hai. Iphone 7 ke best features Iphone 7 ki display 4.7 inch hai jisme 3D touch diya gya hai jabki Iphone 7 plus mein 5.5 inch ki Retina display ke saath 3D touch diya hai. Dono hi smartphones mein New quad-core Apple A10 Fusion processor hai jo ki apni peechliprevious generations se 40 faster kaam karta hai. Dono hi smartphones iOS 10 per work karte hain. Iphone 7 mein aapko 12 MP ka iSight Camera milta hai or 4k video recording ki suvidha milti hai. Iphone 7 plus mein aapko dual 12 MP rear cameras milte hai 1Wide angle. 2Telephoto lens. Dono iPhones mein ek hi tarah ka 7 MP Facetime camera hai jo ki iPhone 6S ke 5 MP camera se nikalkar aaya hai. Yeh Iphones water or dust resistant hain. In models mein ek new home button hai jo ab touch sensitive hai or yeh taptic engine use karta hai jiska bahut hi achaa response hai. Hello friends, bahut dino baad aaj aap sabhi ke liye motivation ke upar ek blog post leker aaya hun is post mein total 17 motivational quotes hain jo main umeed karta hun ki aapki life ko change karne mein help kar sakte hain. To start karte hain. 1. Main har baar sochta hun ki yeh birds ek hi jagah par kyun baithe rehte hain jabki yeh duniya mein kahin bhi udd sakte hain. Fir yhi sawaal main khud se poochta hun. -Harun Yahya 2. Kuch aisa likhen jo padne layak ho or kuch aisa karen jo likhne layak ho. -Benjamin Franklin 3. Rukawaten to jinda insaan ke saamne hi aati hain murdon ke liye to sab rasta chod dete hain. 4. Insaan man se viklanghandicapped hota hai shareerbody se nhi. 5. Problem ko problem samajna hi sabse badi problem hai. 6. Kuch log karke dikhate hai. Kuch log hote hue dekhte hain. Kuch log hairaan ho jaate hain ki ho kya rha hai.Aap in mein se kon ho 7. Important yeh nhi ki aapne kitna kiya , Important yeh hai ki aap kitna kar sakte the. 8. Aap apni soch badlo fir aap har cheej ko badalne mein kamyaab ho jaoge. 9. Is duniya mein koi bhi aisa nhi hai jo aapko rokne ki himmat rakhta ho bas kewal ek insaan ke alawa jo aap khud ho, aap limitless ho. 10. Sab problems ki wajah Mind or Matter hai If you dont Mind, It doesnt Matter. 11. Ek aisa Motivational Quote jo aapki har pareshani ko hal kar sakta hai yeh ek aisa chota sa quote hai jo aapko kathin samay mein accha feel kara sakta hai or acche samay mein aapko thoda sa bura bhi feel kara sakta hai This too shall pass Yeh bhi gujar jaayega. 12. Agar aap Plan banane mein fail ho gye, to aap fail hone ka plan kar rhe hain. 13. Har ek din wo cheej karo jo aapko daraati hai. 14. Murkh dusron per hanste hain or buddhimaan khud per. 15. Logon ke baare mein mat soche agar yeh kaam bhi aap hi karenge to wo kya karenge. kabhi mat socho ki log kya kahenge yeh socho ki kya main inko sochne per majboor kar sakta hun then aap successful ho jaaoge. 16. Koi bhi kaam hai usko karo ya mat karo. Try jaisi koi cheej is duniya mein nhi hoti. 17. Hamko hamesha har wo cheej impossible hi lagti hai jab tk wo ho naa chuki ho.
