samaj aur parivesh se prapt manas sanvedanon ke sandeshon se jin anubhootiyon kee upalabdhi hoti hai, unake hi vimarsh se naee-naee vyakhyaon ko aadhar milata hai. yuva chintak evan lekhak tatha bharatiy dak seva ke adhikari krishn kumar yadav ka nagarik uttar pradesh, lakhanaoo se prakashit dvitiy nibandh sangrah anubhootiyan aur vimarsh isi chintan, manan aur vivechan ko aadhar deti manasi vritti ka parinam hai, jisamen lekhak ne sahity aur sahityakar, vyakti aur samaj, vigyan aur praudyogikee, vaishvik chetana tatha sanskritik adhyayan ke anek aadhunik aur uttar aadhunik tathyon ko vyakhyayit karane ka prayas kiya hai. lekhak ka isase poorv abhivyaktiyon ke bahane namak nibandh sangrah prakashit ho chuka hai. prashasanik seva men rahakar bhi chintan manan karana evan sahityik lekhan karana apane aap men ek vishisht upalabdhi hai. rajakeey seva ke dayitvon ka nirvahan aur shreshth kritiyon kee sarjana ka yah mani-kanchan yog viral hai. krishn kumar yadav ke nibandhon men unaka bahuaayami chintan mukhar huaa hai.

sanskritik pratimanon par aadharit nibandh evan samasamayik v jvalant muddon par aadharit nibandh. vyaktitv v krititv aadharit lekhon men desh ke moordhany sahityakaron v manishiyon - munshi premachand, rahul sankrityayan, manohar shyam joshi, amrita pritam v da0 ambedakar ke janm se mahaprayan tak ke safar ko kramashah lipibaddh kar bikhare manakon ko ekatr kar mala ke roop men taiyar kar unake jivan-sangharsh v bharatiy samaj men yogadan ko rekhankit karane ka sarthak prayas kiya gaya hai. aaj jab har lekhak pustak ke madhyam se sirf apane bare men batana chahata hai, aise men anubhootiyan aur vimarsh men tamam sahityakaron v manishiyon ke bare men padhakar sukoon milata hai aur is prakar yuva pidhi ko bhi inase jodane ka prayas kiya gaya hai. lekhak kee shreshth-jivan moolyon ke prati prakhand aastha, bharatiy sanskriti ke prati agadh anurag tatha samagrata bharatiyata ke prati ekanishtha kee sprihaniy chetana se prannavan ye nibandh hindi jagat kee sthayi nidhi hain. inamen lekhak ka svadhyay tatha abhivyakti kee nishchhalata apane poorn vaibhav ke sath vidyaman hai. vaigyanik vishleshan kee dakshata lekhak men hai, isalie usaka kathy pratyek pathak ka kathy ban gaya hai.

tab is lekhak kee kahaniyon men vyapt pragatishil vicharon aur janajagriti ke sandeshon se sahity lokahit ke sanvardhan ka ek naya aandolan bana tha. rashtraprem, stree vimarsh, jatipratha, ashiksha, nirdhanata, sadhanahinata, kisan, majadoor,sarakari tantr aadi ke tatkalin svaroop aur unake parinam aur dushparinam premachand ke sahity men kis prakar rache base hain, krishn kumar yadav kee is pustak men gambhir adhyayan ka vishay banakar ubhare hain. premachand ke oopar aaj jis tarah ke aakshep kiye ja rahe hain, unakee rachanayen jalayi ja rahi hain, unakee prasangikata par saval khade kiye ja rahe hain, aise men yah lekh aur bhi mahatvapoorn ho jata hai.

dharm, darshan aur adhyatm ke talasparshi vidvan, yayavar, mahamanav rahul sankrityayan ka sampoorn jivan prayogik gyan ke karmashil chetan ka vikasasaman svaroop tha. unhonne kisi ek dal ke daladal ko kabhi nahin svikara tha. vah vidrohi aatma ke jyortimay pragya puroosh the. vivechana ke kram men shree yadav ne apane kathanon ko rahul ji ke jivan darshan se, unake lekhan se tatha unakee rajanaitik aur pragatishil avadharanaon ke sandarbhon se bahuvidh sanvar kar jis jatil bauddhikata se mukt kiya hai, vah pathak ke man ko samaj, sabhyata, sanskriti, itihas, vigyan ityadi se anupranit manishi ke sanyas se samyavad tak le jakar us bhavabhoomi par pratishthit karane ka prayas hai, jahan lekhak kahata hai- bhago nahin duniya badalo.

unaka aam aadami ke lie lekhan, patrakarita ke uchch aadarsh, hamalog, buniyad, jaise dharavahikon ke sarjak tatha kyap jaise sahityik srijan ke lie akadami puraskar prapt karana sahity ke itihas kee abhootapoorv upalabdhi hain . kho gaya kissagoee shirshak se is pustak ke lekhak ne paramparaon, roochiyon aur vimarshon ke jivant uddharan uddhrit kiye hain, jo joshi ji ke prati shraddhanjali hai. amrita pritam ke yogadan par hindi jagat men sashakt roop men adhik nahin likha gaya hai, aise men amrita pritam ko, jitane najadik se shree yadav ne dekhane ka prayatn gum ho gaya rasidi tikat namak lekh men kiya hai svayan men ek jigyasapoorn satat utsukata ka nirvah karati kahani ka kathanak hi lagata hai.

unase vichalit n hote hue kis prakar shikshavid rajanitigya, arthashastree, vidhivetta aur sanvidhan nirmatree parishad ke mahatvapoorn pad tak pahunchakar ek sarvamany neta banane men safalata paee thi, usaka vivaran bhi anubhootiyan aur vimarsh ke prishthon par ankit hai. do0 ambedakar ke antarvirodhon par charcha ke sath-sath vartaman rajanaitik-samajik parivesh men jis prakar unhen bhunaya ja raha hai, us par bhi charcha karake is lekh ko aur bhi aayam diye ja sakate the.

chahe vah panchayati raj dvara ho ya ghareloo mahila hinsa adhiniyam dvara ho ya roodhivadi varjanaon ke todane dvara ho. deh vimarsh ke daur men yah lekh apani prasangikata sthapit karata hai. itihas ke aayam men lekhak ne aitihasik dharoharon ke mahatv ko paribhashit karate hue, hal ke dinon men itihas purnalekhan ko lekar uthate savalon ke bich itihas kee vibhinn dharaon ko rekhankit kiya hai. bharatiy pariprekshy men dharmanirapekshata lekh men pashchaty v bharatiy sandarbhon men dharm kee tulanatmak mahatta ko rekhankit karate hue bharatiy samaj men dharm ke avadanon v vibhinn samayon men dharmik ekata ko darshate hue antatah sanvaidhanik upabandhon ke madhyam se vartaman samaj men dharm ka vishleshanatmak vivechan kiya gaya hai. lekhak ka kathan bada satik hai ki- tushtikaran kee nitiyon ke bich hamane ek dharmanirapeksh rajy ko to apana liya hai par dharmanirapekshata abhi tak hamare samajik jivan ka ang nahi ban payi hai. bharatiy sanskriti aur tyauharon ke rang is sangrah ka sabase lamba lekh hai. isamen lekhak ne desh ke kone-kone men manaye jane vale mahatvapoorn tyauharon, inake pichhe chhipi manyataon, riti-rivajon aur aitihasik ghatanaon, unako manane ke dhangon men vividhata aur unakee prasangikata par rochak dhang se prakash dala hai. lekhak ne is lekh ke madhyam se antatah samajik samarasata, rashtriy ekata v akhandata evan tyauharon- parvon ko manane kee mool manaviy bhavanaon ko sanjone kee koshish kee hai. yadyapi is lekh men bharatiy tyauharon par vistrit janakari hai lekin pongal aadi dakshinanchal aur uttaranchal ke tyauharon ko jodakar ise aur bhi rochak banaya ja sakata tha. aadhunikata aur uttar aadhunikata ke drutagami vikas ke badhate charan jis prakar nit naye gyan aur vigyan ke aalokamayi jharokhe kholate ja rahe hain, unase hi yuvaman chakachaundh ke bhoolabhulaiya poorn jivan men digabhramit ho raha hai. filmi duniya, usamen vyapt jivan moolyon ko tilanjali deti naee pidhi aur us adhogaman kee or utsukata bhari nigahon men vastavik jindagi se door ke sapane to chinta ka vishay hain hi, vidyarthiyon ka rajanitigyon dvara shoshann, shiksha ka gunatmak avamoolyan, netritv kee akshamata, sahity, kala, sanskriti aur gyan kee avahelana se upaji nakaratmak soch, yuva bhatakav kee sthiti kyon shirshak lekh men bahut satik dhang se ukeri gaee hai. in sabhi lekhon men lekhak kee tathyatmak drishti bina kisi bhavukata ke, bina kisi atyukti ke bharatiy sanskriti kee sachchi nishtha se parichalit hai. poorvagrahon se mukt krishn kumar yadav kee lekhani prachinata evan aadhunikata ka samanvay prakat karate huye ek vimarsh khada karane men safal rahi hai.

fir bhasha aur sahity aprabhavit kaise rah sakate hain? hindi bhasha par isaka kya prabhav huaa hai aur kya hoga, is tathy ko vartaman men dekhate hue atit ke lekhan aur patrakarita ke itihas tak pahunchata lekhak bhoomandalikaran ke daur men hindi dvara anek sarthak prashn karata v unaka uttar dhoondhata pratit hota hai. bhoomandalikaran ke daur men teji se badhate bharatiy kadam men lekhak ne 1990 ke bad arthavyavastha men teji se aaye uchhal ko rekhankit kiya hai aur udghoshana kee hai ki - bharat ko ek bar fir se jagadguru kee bhoomika nibhane ke lie taiyar ho jana chahie. bajarikarann, drishy aur shravy midiya, bahurashtriy kampaniyan, upabhoktavad aadi ka brand imej kee mahatta shirshak lekh men tatha intaranet ka badhata prabhav men vishv-gram kee najadikiyon se bhasha, sanskriti, vyapar, vyavasay, shiksha aur jivan ke sabhi kshetron kee soochanaon ke upalabdh hone ke sadhan roop men bhi is pustak men charcha ka vishay bana hai. koching sansthaon ka failata mayajal bhi lekhak ke drishtipatal se gujara hai aur usane koching sansthanon dvara apanayi jane vali takanikon evan unake mayajal men fansate samany vidyarthiyon kee durdasha par bebakee se prakash dalate hue koching vyavastha ke chalate vidyalayon men adhyapan ke girate star par bhi chinta vyakt kee gayi hai.

drishtant ityadi gady jaisi niras vidha men rochakata ka samavesh karate hain aur lekhan ko tarkapoornn-tathyapoornn-praman sammat banate hain. krishn kumar yadav ne is pustak men sahity aur sahityakar, vyakti aur samaj, vigyan aur praudyogikee, vaishvik chetana tatha sanskritik adhyayan ke anek aadhunik aur uttar aadhunik tatvon ko vyakhyayit karane ka prayas kiya hai. lekhan kala men prabandh ya nibandh ka sahity men mahatvapoorn sthan hota hai. is pustak ke lekhak ne us apeksha kee poorti ka prayatn kiya hai. nibandh ke svaroop vivechan men hi nahin balki unake sampadan men bhi lekhak ne apani shodhaparak drishti dvara vishay-vastu ko aitihasik taratamy kee chasani ke sath paros kar apani lekhani ke kaushal ka parichay diya hai, jo nishchay hi pathakon ke lie upayogi ban pada hai.

vivek aur visheshata ke sath sadhy huyi hai. ek prashasak hone ke sath-sath manaviy sanvedanaon se gahare roop men jude hue krishn kumar yadav ka yah sankalan vaishvik jivan drishti, aadhunikata bodh tatha samajik sandarbhon ko vividhata ke anek staron par samete hindi nibandh ke jis poore paridrishy ka ehasas karata hai vah nibandh kala ke bhavi vikas ka soochak hai. lekhak ne parampara se hatakar ek naye marg ka anusaran karake nibandh vidha ko ek naya aayam dene ka prayas kiya hai. sarvatha naee shabd yojana, naee prasangikata, naee anubhootiyan aur naee vimarsh shaili ke sath yah ek dastaveji nibandh sangrah hai, jo vicharon kee dharohar hone ke karan sangrahaniy bhi hai. kul milakar pratipady, bhasha, shaili-tinon hi drishtiyon se ye nibandh prashansaniy hain. inakee prastuti sarvatha svagat yogy hai.

apane hi man ke rahasy khola karata hai. isi aalochana ko, is rahasyoddhatan ko aur manushy ne jagat men jo kuchh saty aur sundar paya hai aur pa raha hai usi ko sahity kahate hain. aur kahani ya aakhyayika sahity ka ek pradhan ang hai. aaj se nahin, aadi kal se hi. han, aajakal kee aakhyayika men samay kee gati aur roochi se bahut kuchh antar ho gaya hai. prachin aakhyayika kutoohal pradhan hoti thi, ya adhyatmavishayak. vartaman aakhyayika sahity ke doosare angon kee bhanti manovaigyanik vishleshan aur manorahasy ke udghatan ko apana dhyey samajhati hai. yah svikar kar lene men hamen sankoch n hona chahie ki upanyason hi kee tarah aakhyayika kee kala bhi hamane pashchim se li hai. magar panch sau varsh pahale yoorop bhi is kala se anabhigy tha. bade-bade uchchakoti ke darshanik tatha aitihasik upanyas likhe jate the. lekin chhoti-chhoti kahaniyon kee or kisi ka dhyan n jata tha. han, kuchh pariyon aur bhooton kee kahaniyan alabatta prachalit thin. kintu isi ek shatabdi ke andar ya usase bhi kam men samajhie, chhoti kahaniyon ne sahity ke aur sabhi angon par vijay prapt kar li hai. koee patrika aisi nahin jisamen kahaniyon kee pradhanata n ho. yahan tak ki kaee patrikaon men keval kahaniyan hi di jati hain.

aur ham vikshipt hue bina nity atharah ghante kam kar sakate to shayad ham manoranjan ka nam bhi n lete. lekin prakriti ne hamen vivash kar diya hai. ham chahate hain ki thode se thode samay men adhik se adhik manoranjan ho jae. isilie sinema grihon kee sankhya din b din badhati jati hai. jis upanyas ko padhane men mahinon lagate usaka aanand ham do ghanton men utha lete hain. kahani ke lie pandrah-bis minat hi kafi hain. ataev ham kahani aisi chahate hain ki vah thode se thode shabdon men kahi jae, usamen ek vaky, ek shabd bhi anavashyak n aane pae, usaka pahala hi vaky man ko aakarshit kar le, aur ant tak hamen mugdh kie rahe, aur isake sath hi kuchh tatv bhi hon. tatvahin kahani se chahe manoranjan bhale ho jae, manasik tripti nahin hoti. yah sach hai ki ham kahaniyon men upadesh nahin chahate, lekin vicharon ko uttejit karane ke lie, man ke sundar bhavon ko jagrit karane ke lie kuchh n kuchh avashy chahate hain. vahi kahani safal hoti hai, jisamen in donon men se ek avashy upalabdh ho.

usamen kahin n kahin devata avashy chhipa hota hai, yah manovaigyanik saty hai. us devata ko khol kar dikha dena safal aakhyayika lekhak ka kam hai. vipatti par vipatti padane se manushy kitana diler ho jata hai. yahan tak ki vah bade bade sankaton ka samana karane ke lie tal thonk kar taiyar ho jata hai. usakee durvasana bhag jati hai, usake hriday ke kisi gupt sthan men chhipe hue jauhar nikal aate hain aur hamen chakit kar dete hain. yah ek mano vaigyanik saty hai. ek hi ghatana ya durghatana bhinn-bhinn prakriti ke manushy ko bhinn-bhinn roop se prabhavit karati hai. ham kahani men isakee safalata ke sath dikha saken to kahani avashy aakarshak hogi. kisi samasya ka samavesh kahani ko aakarshak banane ka sabase uttam sadhan hai. jivan men aisi samasyaen nity hi upasthit hoti rahati hain, aur unase paida hone vala dvandv aakhyayika se chamaka deta hai. satyavadi pita ko maloom hota hai ki usake putr ne hatya kee hai. vah use nyay kee vedi par balidan kar de ya apane jivan siddhanton kee hatya kar dale? kitana bhishan dvandv hai. pashchatap aise dvandvon ka akhand srot hai. ek bhaee ne apane doosare bhaee kee sampatti chhal kapat se apaharan kar li hai. use bhiksha mangate dekh kar kya chhali ko jara bhi pashchatap n hoga? agar aisa n ho to vah manushy nahin hai.

magar kahani men bahut vistrit vishleshan kee gunjaish nahin hoti. yahan hamara uddeshy sanpoorn manushy ko chitrit karana nahin, varan usake charitr ka ek ang dikhana hai. yah paramavashyak hai ki hamari kahani se jo parinam ya tatv nikale vah sarvamany ho, aur usamen kuchh barikee ho. yah ek sadharan niyam hai ki hamen usi bat men aanand aata hai jisase hamara kuchh sambandh ho. juaa khelane valon ko jo unmad aur ullas hota hai, vah darshak ka kadapi nahin ho sakata. jab hamare charitr itane sajiv aur aakarshak hote hain ki pathak apane ko unake sthan par samajh leta hai tabhi use kahani men aanand prapt hota hai. agar lekhak ne apane patron ke prati pathak men yah sahanubhooti nahin utpann kar di to vah apane uddeshy men asafal hai.

yatharth nahin ho sakati. jivan men bahudha hamara ant us samay ho jata hai, jab vah vanchhaniy nahin hota. lekin katha sahity manushy ka racha huaa jagat hai aur parimit hone ke karan sampoornnatah hamare samane aa jata hai aur jahan vah hamari nyay-buddhi ya anubhooti ka atikraman karata huaa paya jata hai, ham use dand dene ke lie taiyar ho jate hain. katha men agar kisi ko sukh prapt hota hai to isaka karan batana hoga. duhkh bhi milata hai to isaka karan batana hoga. yahan koee charitr mar nahin sakata jab tak ki manav buddhi usakee maut n mange. srashta ko janata kee adalat men apani har ek kriti ke lie javab dena padega. kal ka rahasy bhranti hai, par vah bhranti jis par yatharth ka aavaran pada ho.

Hello friends aaj ke is post mein ham kali linux ko android phone mein android ko bina root kiye kaise install kare iske baare mein janenge. Kali linux kya hai? Kali linux ek aisa operating system hai jo penetration testing ke kaam aata hai jisper ham kai tarah ke hacking ke expertiments kar skte hain. Jisme aap kai tarah ki cheeje use kar skte hain example ke liye jaise password cracker,wifi hacking,ethical hacking,web security exploitation, or bhi bahut kuch. Jo ethical hacking ke baare mein jaante hain wo kali linux kaise bhul skte hain. Per general knowledge ke liye yeh bhi jaanana jaroori hai ki isko develop kisne kiya ? To kya ap janana chahoge ki kali linux ke developer kon the? Ans Kali linux ke developer Mati Aharoni or Devon Kearns the. Ab ham batate hain aapko ki aap apne android phone mein kali linux ko kaise install kare bina root kiye. Kali linux ko kaise install kare android phone ko bina root kiye? Is method mein aap wo saari files jo linux per hoti hain unko download kar android mein usko use kar payenge fir aap bhi apne penetrating test kar skte hain khaskar wo log jo ethical hacking mein interested hain. Isko apne android phone per install karne ke liye ek App jiska name GNURoot hai uski jaroorat padegi. Yeh bhi pade 1. Blogging me bright career kaise banaye with success tips 2. HD movies kaise download karen?? Ab main aapko android phone mein linux install karne ke steps batane jaa rha hun inko follow kare 1. Sabse pehle aap GNURoot ko apne android phone mein download kare or install kare. Hello friends aaj is post me main apko batauga ki kaise apne desktop ki screen ko shoot karte hai, agar aap koi bhi window use karte ho. Agar aap ek blogger hai to apko yah article jarur padhna chahiye, kyonki isme ek shortcut technique batai hai jo apka time save karega. lekin yah bahut lamba process hai, jisme paint open karna then save karna etc hai. Lekin ab wo time gaya. Abhi main apko ek software ka name batane jaa rha hu jise aap free me download karke use me le sakte hai lekin usse pahle ham us software ke bare me janege. Yes, us software ka name hai LightShot, jo ekdam free hai. Jise yaha click karke download kar sakte hai. Is software ko download karke install hi karna hota hai isme koi setting nahi karni hoti. Jaisa ki screen shot me dekh sakte hai, jab aap PrtSc key ko press karte hai to arrow ke just niche Select area likha hota hai jiska matlab hai ab apko screen ke area ko select karna hi jitna apko screen shot karna hai. Jab aap screen ko selecet karte hai to kuch is tarah se screen show hoti hai. Ab jab screen ko select kar dete hai ki kitni screen ko screen shot karna hai to ab ata hai ki us image me kya edition karna hai jaise arrow ka sign dena, mark karna, text likhna etc. Edition karne ne liye option kuch is tarah hai. Jisse kuch is tarah edit kar sakte hai Edit karne ke bad jab photo ko save karna hota hai tab ise kai tariko se kar sakte hai. Pahla tarika to yah hai ki CtrlS press kare, to wo direct hi apke laptopcomputer me document me Lightshot name ka folder ban jaega usme save ho jaega. Dusra tarika hai, CtrlC press kare fir wo picture apke clipboard me copy ho gaya hai, fir use Paint, Photoshop etc. me CtrlV press karke paste karoge to waha wo copied pic present ho jaegi. Agar Facebook par chatting box me CtrlV press karoge to direct wo pic apne friend ko send ho jaegi. Tisra tarika hai yah hai ki aap us pic ko online kai upload kar sakte hai, upload karte hi fir apko ek link milega jis par wo pic persent hogi, is tarah apne friend ko kewal link send karoge to wo us link ko open karke picture ko dekh sakte hai. Online upload karne ke liye screen shot me dikhaae hue option par click kare. Is par click karne ke bad ek box aega jaha se link ko copy kar sakte hai, us link me apki screen shot hogi. Iske sath hi direct social par share kar sakte hai aur print kar sakte hai etc. Isko short and sweet me samjhe to yah hai ki sabse pahle yaha click karke lightshto ko download karke istall kare, aur fir screen shot karne ke liye PrtSc key ko press kare jo Delete key ke paas hi hai, fir jo bhi edit karne hai wo right option se edit kar sakte hai aur fir CtrlS press karke save kare. Jo apke Document ke ke andar ek lightshot name ka folder ban jaega jisme wo screen shot save ho jaega. Isme apko paint bhi open nahi karna hoga, aur save karne ke liye bar bar us file ko kahan rakhna aur kya name rakhna yah bhi decide nahi karn hoga. Kyonki Lightshot me apne aap har file ka name decide ho jata hai. To aap kab Lightshot ka use karna start kar rahe hai? Ye Post bhi aapko padni Chaiye

Search Engine Optimization SEO bhut hi jaruri hai website par jada user ko lane ke liye search engines se. Bhut log website start karte hai or SEO seikhna start karne hai, par unko samaj nahi aata start kaha se kare, thoda kam expriance hone ke karan. SEO me bhut si chije hai jo sabko pata hona chaiye or bhut si aesi chije bhi hai jinki ab jarurat nahi padti SEO me. to aaj ham is post me janege SEO ke kuch sabalo ke jabab jo har blogger ko pata hona chaiye. A SEO Search Engine Optimization, Simple sabdo me kahe to SEO wo hai jiski madad se ham apni site ko search le late hai or Organic Results se achi traffic pa sakte hai apni website par. Sahi SEO ki madad se site ko search me top par laya ja sakta hai. A Dusra Sabal ye ho sakta hai ki Q kare SEO. Agar aapki website hai to aap bilkul chahege ki jo aapne apni site me dala hai wo search result me aaye. SEO karke ham jo Search Engines hai unko help karte hai hamari site ko samajne me ki hamari site me kya hai, jab hi wo hamari site ko search me achi se dikha sakte hai. A Iska jabab simple hai, aap ye to jaante hi hoge ki agar ham kuch search karte hai to hajaro, lakho result aa jate hai par starting ke page par sirf 10 result aate hai. Jab bhi koi kuch search karta hai to search engine uske hisab se sab website ko check karta hai, or agar site me SEO acha kiya hai to Search Engines ko samajne me aasani hoti hai ki us page me kya hai or wo SERP serch Engine Result Page me dikhata hai. SERP par aane ke liye ye Post Jarur padhe A Jese sikke ke 2 phelu hote hai, wese hi SEO ke Faide ke sath kuch nuksan bhi hai. Bhut log kya karte hai SEO ka acha knowlage hone ke karan apne kisi bhi article ko search me rank dila dete hai, par wo user ke hisab se galat hai or isko Blank Hate SEO khete hai. Search Engines aesi chijo se bachne ke liye apne Algorithm me update karte rhete hai jese Hummingbird and Penguins jisme jo bhi aese blank hat Technics use karte hai unki site search engine spam me dal deta hai. Google ke 7 Bade Algorithm Updates jiske ware me har ek website owner ko pata hona chaiye. A SEO ko mainly 2 hisso me bata gaya hai, On-Page SEO or Off-Page SEO. A SEO ki 2 Techniques hoti hai White Hat SEO or Blank Hat SEO. A Back link wo hoti hai jab kisi dusri website par hamari website ki link add ho. Backlink bhi 2 trha ki hoti hai Do-Follow or No-Follow. A Ye bhi Backlink hi hoti hai. Matlab hamari site ki link kisi dusri site par. par ye jolink hoti hai wo hamari site ke liye achi nahi buri hoti hai. Bad Backlink ke ware me pura jaanne ke lie yaha click kare A Out Bound Link wo link jo ham apni site par add karte hai par wo kisi dusri site ki hoti hai. Matlab kisi dusri website par chale jate hai uspar click karke. A Keyword wo sabd hota hai jiske liye ham apni website ko search me lana chate hai. Jab koi uss sabd ko search karege google me to hamari site SERP par aa jayegi. A agar ham koi Article link rahe hai kisi keyword par to wo keyword kitne percent aana chaiye wo hoti hai keyword density. Keyword 2-3 hi hona chaiye usse jada aane par problem ho sakti hai. A Meta Tag HTML ka code hota hai jo sirf search engine ke liye hota hai, Ham Meta Tag ki madad se Search Engine ko batate hai ki website kis ware me hai. Meta Tag me ham Meta Title, Meta Keywords, Meta Description or Robot tags dalte hai. A Jab koi visitor kisi site ko open karta hai or fir wo kitne der war uss site se jata hai usko khete hai bounce rate. Agar koi site par aa raha hai or bhut der site par ruk raha hai to bounce rate kamm hoga. isse search engine me rank badne me madad milti hai. A Web Directory wo website hoti hai jaha par bhut sari website ki link hoti hai category wise. A ye ek text file hi hoti hai jo Search engine crawlers hote hai unko batati hai ki site ke konse page ko index karna hai or konse page ko index nahi karna hai. A website par jitne bhi Page or Post hoti hai unki list hoti hai usko khete hai site map. Site Map 2 trah ke hote hai .HTML Site Map or .XML site Map or jankari ke liye ye padhe A Title jo hai wo 50-68 sabdo ka hona chaiye or Post Discription 140-150 sabd ka hona chaiye, agar isse jada bada use karege to wo SERP me pura nahi dikhega. Ye bhi Jarur Padhe A Search engine image ko read nahi kar sakte to hame search engine ko batane ke liye ki jo image hai wo kis chij ki hai hame uska SEO karna padta hai. Image ka SEO Detail me jaane ke liye ki kaise Image ko SEO Friendly banaye taki wo aaram se search me aa sake, ye post read kare. A koi bhi Post ko search me jab aati hai jab wo index ho jaye, uske liye hame hamari site ka site map sublit karna hota hai. Agar ham regular Post kare to dhire dhire hamari post jaldi index hone lagti hai q ki jo crawlers hote hai wo hamari site par jaldi jaldi aane lagte hai. Aapko Apne blog or website ko Google Search Console me add karke apna Site Map jarur submit karna hai. Ham Khud se bhi index kara sakte hai hamari Post ko, kaise karte hai uski jankari yaha hai. Google ne New Update kiya hai, jisme ham direct Search Page se bhi Apni Post ke URL ko submit kar sakte hai . Direct Search Engine se kaise Submit kare uski jankari yaha di hui hai. Dosto ummid hai aapko ye SEO ki jankari achi lagi hogi or bhut se aapke sabalo ke jabab aapko isme mile hoge. Agar aapka SEO se sambandit koi bhi sabal hai to aap comment me jarur puche. Ye Kuch or Post jo aapko Jarur padna Chaiye

samaj ka darpan. gyan rashi ka sanchit kosh yadi manav kalyannakari nahin hai to use men sahity kaise kahoon meri samajh se bahar hai. jivan ke sookshm aur yatharth chintan samajik charitr ka pratipadan karati rachanaon par pratikool ya ashlil tippaniyan kahan tak svagat yogy hai meri samajh se bahar hain .

vah logon kee aatma ko tript kar raha hai aur rachanakar bhram men hai kee keertimanon kee lambi shrankhala men usane ek kadi aur jod di. ashlil tukabandi foohad hasy netaon ko galiyan parosakar kavi samajhata hai kee usane bada tir mar liya. vani aur svatantrata ka duroopayog nahin hona chahie. ijahare khyal bura nahin hota. usakee abhivyakti ailaniyan aur khullam khulla kee ja sakati hai basharte kee khyal garimamay ho bhasha susanskrit aur parimarjit ho bat dushale men lapet kar bhi kahi ja sakati hai

tabhi yah samanjasy sajivata ke sath samakalin srijan ka sakshee ban pata hai. yuva kavi evan bharatiy dak seva ke adhikari krishn kumar yadav ne apane pratham kavy sangrah abhilasha men apane bahuroopatmak srijan men prakriti ke apar kshetron men vistarit aalanbanon ko vishayavastu ke roop men prapt karake hnaday aur mastishk kee rasatmakata se kavita ke anek roop bimbon men sanjone ka prayatn kiya hai. abhilasha ka sangyak sankalan sanskaravan kavi ka inhin visheshataon se yukt kavi karm hai, jisamen vyaktigat sambandhon, samajik, rajanaitik, aarthik samasyaon aur vishamataon tatha jivan moolyon ke sath ho rahe pidhiyon ke atit aur vartaman ke takaravon aur prakriti ke sath paryavaraniy vikshobhon ka khulakar bhavatmak arth shabdon men anugunjit huaa hai. para aur apara jivan darshan, vishv bodh tatha vidvan bodh se upaji anubhootiyon ne bhi kavi ko anek roopon men udvelit kiya hai. in udvelanon men jivan saundary ke sarthak aur sajiv chitr shabdon men arth pa sake hain.

pyar aur dular ke vividh roopon men kathan kee marmasparshi bhangima ke sath kathy ko sidhe-sidhe pathak tak sanpreshit karane ka prayatn banaya hai. shabd jo abhidhatmak shaili men kuchh kah rahe hain vah bahut spasht arthanviti ke parichayak hain, parantu bhavatmakata ka kendr bindu vyanjana kee antashchetana sanbhoot v aatmiyata ka manavi manovigyan banakar ubhara hai. god men bachche ko lekar shubh kee aakankshee man buri najar se bachane ke liye kajal ka tika lagati hai, banh men tabij bandhati hai, skool ja rahe bachche kee bhookh-pyas svayan men anubhav karati hai, padosi bachchon se ladakar aaye bachche ko aanchal men chhipati hai, doolha bane bachche ko bhav men dekhati hai, kalpana ke sansar men shahanaeeyon kee goonj sunati hai, bahoo ko saunpati huee man bhavuk ho uthati hai. najon se pale apane ladale ko jivan dhan saunpati huee man ke ashru, karoona vigalit sneh aur anurag ke moti banakar ludhak padate hain. kavi ka man ke prati bhav abhyarthana aur abhyarchana banakar kavita ka shashvat shabd saundary ban jata hai.

jahan man anek roopon men prakat hoti hai. kabhi patr men utkeern hokar, to kabhi yadon ke jharokhon se jhankati huee bachapan se aaj tak kee upalabdhiyon ke bich ek safal putr ko aashirvad deti huee. kisi nirashrita, abhav grast, kshudhit man aur santati kee kaya ko bhi kavi kee lekhani ka sparsh mila hai, jahan majaboori men chhipi nirihata ko bhookhi kamuk nigahon ke svarthi sansar ke bich ardhaanavrit aanchal se doodh pilati manavi ko amanaviy najaron ka samana karana pad raha hai. man ke vividh roopon ko bhavon ke anek staron par ankit hote dekhana aur kavita ko shabd dena aadarsh aur yatharth kee anubhootiyon ka dil men utarane vala shabd bodh hai.

jyotsana snan prem kee suvistarit rati-rajani ke aagosh men baithe khamosh anrtamilan ke kshanon ko in panktiyon men dekhen-rat ka paharajab main jheel kinare baitha hota hoonchand jheel men utar karanaha raha hota haikuchh der badachand ke sathaek aur cheharamil jata haivah shayad tumhara haipata nahin kyon bar-bar hota hai aisamain nahin samajh patasamane tum naha rahi ho ya chandaaakhirakar jheel menek kankad fenkakarakhamoshi se main vahan se chala aata hoon.

tumhen jita hoon, tumhari khamoshi, bevafa, preyasi, titaliyan, prem, kunvari kiranen, shirshak kavitayen jin vaiyaktik bhavanaon kee mansal abhivyaktiyon ko angadaiyon men umang se bharakar dil ke jharokhon se jhankati sanyog aur viyog kee rasatmakata ka ijahar karati hain, vah gahari sanson ke bich uthati girati janm-janm se pyasi priti payasvini ke tat par baithe yugal kee hnadayaspandon men suni jane vali sharir kee khushaboo aur chhuan ka smriti-sfit sansar hai. inamen aangik cheshtaon aur aindrik aasvadanon kee saundaryamayi kalpana ka kalatmak prannayan hnadayavan rasagyon ke liye rasayan ban sakata hai.

vayaskata, praudhata aur vardhaky kee avasthaon ko langhati kavita kee gambhir dhvani madakata ke unmad ko jivan saty ka darshan karane men saksham bhi ho jati hai. nari ke streetv ko matritv aur preyasi roopon se aage badhata huaa kavi, shoshann, utpidan, anachar, anyay ke paryay ban chuke sandesh se dalit v abala jivan se bhi sakshatkar karata hai, jahan mahiyasi kee mahima, khand-khand ho rahi bhogya banakar deh ban jati hai. stree vimarsh kee in kavitaon men samajik aur vaiyaktik vicharana kee anek sanbhavanaon se sakshatkar karata kavi bhav aur vichar men poojya par ho rahe anant atyacharon ka pardafash karata hai. bahoo ko jalana, havas ka shikar hona tatha vo ban kar sadak ke kinare adhanangi, pagal aur bechari bani becharagi kya kuchh nahin kah jati, jo in kavitaon men beti aur bahoo ke roop men kartavyon kee gathari lade jivan kee dagar par arthahin kadamon se jine ko vivash ho jati hai. stree vimarsh ka yatharth, dalit chetana kee soch in kavitaon men vartaman ka saty ban kar ubhari hain.

balashoshan aur bal manovigyan ko abhilasha kee kavitaon men jin shirshakon men abhivyakt kiya gaya hai, unamen pramukh hain-akhabar kee kataranen, jamun ka ped, bachche kee nigah, vo apane, aatma, bachcha aur manushy tatha bachapan. in rachanaon men bal man kee jigyasa, aakrosh, aatank, masoomiyat, prakriti, paryavaran aadi ka manushy ke sath, ped-paudhon ke sath v jiv-jantuon ke sath nikat sambandh aatmiyata kee kalpana ko sakar karate hue, atit aur vartaman kee sthitiyon se tulana karate hue, aage aane vale kal kee tasvir ke sath vyakt kiya gaya hai. bahudha jivan aur kartavy bodh se anupranit is khand kee kavitaon men kavi ne bachche kee nigah men boodhe chacha ko bhikh ka katora lie hue bhi dikhaya hai aur hudadang machate jamun ke ped tatha mitti kee sodhi gandh men mauj-masti karate bhi smriti ke kotaron men chhipi atit kee tasvir se nikalakar prastut karate paya hai. bachchon ke nishchhal man par chhal kee chhaya ka svarthi prapanch kis prakar havi hota hai aur jhoothe pralobhan v ahankar ke vashibhoot hue log unhen bhay ka bhoot dikhate hain aur jivan bhar ke liye kuritiyon ka gulam bana dete hain, yah bhi in kavitaon men drishtavy huaa hai.

tab sansar ke halachal bhare mahaul se alag, use makhamali ghas aur pedon ke harit sansar men rachi-basi alaukik sundarata ka darshan hota hai aur chidiyon kee chahachahahat sunaee deti hai. vah man kee khidakee khol kar dekhata hai tabhi use apane astitv ke darshan hote hain. akelepan ka ahasas karati niravata, manav jivan kee hakeekat, bachapan se javani aur budhape tak ka safar anek aashaon aur nirashaon ka andhera aur ujala najar aane lagata hai akelepan men. is prakar kee kavitaen bhi is sankalan kee visheshata hain.

adhikari aur karmachari kee jivan dashayen, failen, suvidha shulk tatha farj adayagi shirshakon men niji anubhav aur dainik kriyakalapon ka svanubhoot prastut kiya gaya hai. prakriti ke sath bhi kavi ka sakshatkar huaa hai-pachamadhi, badal, naya jivan tatha prakriti ke niyam shirshakon men. inamen manushy ke bhav lok ko aanubhootik uddipan pradan karati prakriti aur paryavaran kee sukhad smritiyon ko prakritasth hokar jivan ke sath-sath jiya gaya hai.

daya, sahanubhooti ka manav dharm ko anupranit karata charitrik aadarsh bhi nahin bhoolata. vartaman samay men manushy kee sadvrittiyon ko chhal, danbh, dvesh, pakhand aur jhooth ne kitana dhak liya hai, yah kisi se chhipa nahin hai. in manav moolyon ke avamoolyan ko kavi ne shabdon men kavita ka roop diya hai.

jo pragatishilata chetana kee aadhunikata bodh se yukt chittavritti ka pratibimb hai. isamen kavi man bhi hai or jan man bhi. manushy is sansar men samajikata kee simaon men akela nahin rahata. usake sath samaj rahata hai, atah apane samparkon se mili anubhooti ka aabhyantarikaran karate hue kavi ne apani bhavana kee sanvedanatmakata ko vivekajany pahachan bhi pradan kee hai. roodhi aur maulikata ke prashnon se oopar uthakar jab ham in kavitaon ko dekhate hain to lagata hai ki sahaj man kee sahaj anubhootiyon ko kavi ne sahaj roop se samayik-sahityik sandarbhon se yug-bodh bhi pradan karane ka prayas kiya hai. dayitv-bodh aur kavi karm men pandity pradarshan ka koee bhav nahin hai, fir bhi yah to kaha hi ja sakata hai ki vichar ko bhav ke oopar vijay mili hai. kavita samakalin lekhan aur srijan ke samasamayik bodh kee parinnati hai so abhilasha kee rachanaen bhi is tathy se achhooti nahin hain.
ve aur un ka sthan bhi tadbhav roopon ne le liya hai. shree yadav ne bhi anek shabdon ke vyakaraniy roopon ka aadhunikeekaran kiya hai.

aadhunikata bodh tatha samajik sandarbhon ko vividhata ke anek staron par samete prastut sankalan ke adhyayan se aabhasit hota hai ki shree krishn kumar yadav ko vipul sahityik oorja sampann kavi hraday prapt hai, jisase vah hindi bhasha ke vangamay ko smriti pradan karenge.

6 Habits of Highly Successful People in Hindi Hello Friends, Aaj Kl har koi successful banna chahta hai per ban nhi pata kya aap jante hain kyun ? Ek insaan ko mahan ya yeh keh lo successful kon bana skta hai sidhi si baat hai wo khud per wo khud kaise bnta hai ye depend karti hain uski aadatonHabits per. Aaj hm aapko 23 habits batane wale hain jo aapko aapki life mein success ki taraf badhane mein kaam aayegi or aap mano ya naa mano abhi bhi jo aap ho gaur karke dekho aap abhi jo ho wo apni habits ki wajah se ho. To agar aap khud ko change karna chahte hain to in habits ko jald se jald follow karna start kare. 23 Habits of Highly Successful People 1. Apni Life ki Responsibility Khud Lo Agar aapka koi dream h ya aap aap apni dream life jeena chahte hain , aapke saath wo sb ho jo aap chahte hain to aap apni life ki full responsibility khud lo agar aap dusron ke decisions pe work karte hain or jo wo kehte hain wo sahi mante ho to aap unke hissab se jee rhe ho aapka khud ka koi motive ya dream ni hai . Agar hai to aaj se khud ke dam pe decisions lena start karo or fir aapko khud ni pta chalega ki jo aap chahte the wo kitni jaldi mil gya . 2. Important Task pehle kare Time management ka pehla rule yhi hai ki aap apne important task ko pehle complete karen. yeh highly successful people ki sbse khaas aadat mein se ek hai wo apna important task jo unke goals ko achieve karne mein help karti hai usko pehle complete karte hain others tasks ko baad mein. 3. Apna Morning Routine Khud Bnao Kai logon ko is baat ka pata hi nhi hota ki unko subah se leker shaam tk kya karna chahiye jisse ki unke goals jaldi achieve ho to aapko apna khud ka morning routine bnana chahiye jisme pure din mein aapko kya kya karna h uske baare mein likha ho isse aapka din waste hone se bach jayega kyunki TIME IS PRECIOUS ! Jo aapne bita diya wo wapas ni aayega pr aage ka bhi aise hi na bita do isliye morning routine jaroor banao . 4. Ready to Learn Apka Mind theek waise hi kaam karta hai jaisi cheejen aap sikhte ho observe karte ho or result bhi fir utna hi milta hai to agar aap apne mind ko knowledgeful things se update rkhoge or wo cheeje sikhoge jisse aapko lagta hai aap successful ban skte ho to bina soche usko sikhna chahiye or hamesha nayi cheejo ko sikhne ke liye tyaar rehna chahiye kyunki Knowledge hi aapki position batayegi ki aap kya ho ! 5. Fail Hone ka Dar na hona Kai baar logo ke paas unke ideas hote hain per wo is dar ki wajah se action nhi lete ki kahin fail naa ho jaayen wo har kaam ko perfect karne ki sochte hain jabki yeh bilkul galat hai Simple si baat h ki Mind Jyadatar Negative sochta hai per result to tb dikhta hai jb action ho yaani fail pass ka pata to tb hi chalega jab wo kaam hoga jab kaam hi nhi start hua to already fail ho or ek thought kaha hi hai Jaisa aap sochte ho waisa aap bnte ho To aap to pehle se hi soch ke rkhe ho ki fail ho jayege TO fir kyun nhi hoga jabki aapko believe karna chahiye ki aap successful bnoge or action lo . 6. Result pe Focus nhi Goal pe Focus Jyadatar logo ko kisi kaam se niklne wale result pe focus hota hai wo sochte hain ki wo successful tbhi honge agar unka result positive aaya jbki kai baar aisa ni hota or wo dukhi ho jaate hain jabki unhe goal pe focus karna chahiye usko paane mein lagne wale efforts or journey pe focus karna chahiye usme fun dhoondhna chahiye naye naye ideas lagane chahiye. Yhi wajah hoti ki log chah kar bhi wo nhi kar paate jo wo chahte hain agar aap result pe focus karte hain to aap limited ho jaate hain because aapke mind mein ideas hi nhi aayega or failure ka dar badhne lagega jbki goal pe focus karne se aap unlimited ho jaate ho aapka mind us goal ko achieve karne ke kai ideas deta hain bs un ideas ko check kare work kare to theek nhi to dusra idea or aisa karte karte jaldi aapko wo idea milega jo aapki life change kar dega. Agar Aap abhi tk yeh post pad rhe hain to aap samaj gye honge or aapne soch bhi liya hoga ki ab aapko kya karna hai. Is post ko share jaroor kare un logo ke saath jo apni life mein bada change chahte hain per confusion mein hain. Because aadat ni badli naa ! samay ke sapeksh aur jivan-gatikee ke rachanatmak kriyashilanon se bhasaman rahi hai jahan ekangi, adhoore, nishkarshamoolak, khandit aur vakr vicharon ko kabhi spesa nahin mili. unakee aalochana men vishay-vastu aur vichar sahajata kintu samagrata se pravesh pate hain aur ek udar vikasit jivan ke paksh men badi dridhata aur nishpakshata se apani bat pathakon ke samaksh rakhate hain. yah unakee aalochana-vidha ka ek vishesh gun samajha jana chahie jo pathakon ko path ke daramyan us vitrishna aur oob se ubarata hai jo prayah kisi ganbhir lekh ke shastreeyata aur vichar-vithiyon ke adhyayan-kram men anubhavaniy hoti hai aur, pathak lekh ke ant tak aalochy vishay-ras ke aasvadan men apane ko bandhe pate hain. kahana n hoga ki shree sinh aalochy-vastu ke bhitar bade nisprih bhav se apani paith banate hain, usako gunate aur taral banate hain, fir apane manasapatr par sokhakar hamare samay, lok aur sanskriti ke nikash par use dhar dete hain aur jab vah unakee apani vastu ban jati hai to badi sahajata se kagaj par rakh dete hain, jo adhyetaon ko sahaj svikaraniy hoti hai. parantu aisa karate hue unamen apani vidvata ka leshamatr bhi ahamany bhav nahin jhalakata. isi karan da sinh kee kritiyan matr aalochana n hokar, ek rachana ka bhi aabhas de jati hai jisamen kavita kee-si sarasata aur bodhagamyata bhi hoti hai. sanpreshaniyata ke is gun ke karan pathak ke man men unake aalochy-vastu ka vichar gahare utarata hai aur aatmasat ho jata hai. yahi vajah hai ki inakee kavyalochana aur vaicharikee, donon pathakon-kaviyon ko n sirf gahari samajh pradan karate hain, apitu klasikee aur shaili-shilp ke star par bhi usakee samajh ko parimarjit kar use samriddh banate hain. nishchay hi, yah unake satat aalochanabhyas, ganbhir adhyayanashilata aur apratim hunar ka parinam hai jo unake shramafal ke roop men unakee kritiyon men udbhasit hota hai.

jab sanprati rachi ja rahi aadhi-adhoori aur khandit aalochana se sahity ka bhala nahin ho raha, balki apooraniy kshati ho rahi hai, vichar-bodh kee sakaratmak aalochana paranpara, jisamen janapadiy sanskar aur lokajivan ke prati atoot aastha ho, kee mahati aavashyakata mahasoos kee ja rahi hai kyonki dekhane vali bat yah hai ki hindi aalochana ka rachana-sanbandh jyadatar aaj vyakti-sanbandh men badal chuka hai jise aalochana kee girohabandi bhi kahana atyukti n hoga! pahale aalochana vyakti-aachchhann n hokar rachana ke gunn-doshon par kendrit hoti thi. par aaj adhikatar yah prayojit hoti hai jisake pichhe ya to bajar aur poonji ka ganit kam karata hai ya fir sabake apane-apane poorvagrah, aatmamoh aur apane krititv ke prati sammohan hote hain. isaliye door-daraj ke ilakon men, janapadon men jo lekhak-kavi yadi mahatvapoorn bhi siraj rahe hain to unakee rachanaon kee kadr nahin. ve upekshaon kee tokari men pade rahate hain. falatah chije shinakht ke abhav men dhire-dhire apani pahachan kho deti hain aur rachanakar bhi nirash aur shithil ho baithane lagate hain, usakee rachanashilata bhi kramashahkharab hoti chali jati hai. aisa isaliye hota hai kyonki suvidhaon kee trishna bade lekhakon -aalochakon ko nagaron-mahanagaron men khinch lati hai jahan ve janapadiy chetana aur spandan se door rahate hain, ataev janapadon men rache ja rahe mahatvapoorn sahity ke prati anyamanask hote hain. isaliye da. jivan sinh ke shabdakarm kee upadeyata svayansiddh hai, karan ki ve pradhanatah janapad ke hi aalochana paranpara se sarokar rakhate hain aur usi ko apani aalochana ka aadhar banate hain. sath hi un vicharadharaon ka tarkasangat prativad bhi karate hain jinase jivan aur lok ka ahit ho raha ho. shram ke bhavalok kee pratishtha aur poonji ke prabhav se falit roopavad aur nira kalavad ko jivan ka pratipaksh manate hue usaka virodh in prativadon men aasani se lakshit kiya ja sakata hai.

jo vibhinn avasaron par unake dvara diye gaye sahityik-vaicharik vyakhyan hain, jise yahan ek mala ke roop men silasilevar gunthakar prastut kiya gaya hai. samay aur sanskriti ko parat-dar-parat kholate hue, bharatiyata se jude anek mahatvapoorn savalon aur usakee asmita kee gaharaee se padtal karate hue, manavapaksheey saty kee nirantar tatol jari rakhate hue, shram kee bhavabhoomi par janagan ke jivan-sangharsh kee katha ka marm batalate hue, vaishvikaran ke sarvagrasi vichar se hajaron salon kee chintanaparampara se nihsrit apani sanskriti ke vinasht ho jane ke aasann sankaton se savadhan karate hue aur manushyata kee sanskriti ka sabal paksh udghatit karate hue da. sinh ne jin moolyon kee sthapana is aalochy-pustak men kee hai, unakee ninv par hi ab tak kee manav sabhyataen nafasat se tikee huee hai aur usaka astitv har samay vajood men hona jivan ke liye anivary hai jisase jude savalon ka sookshmata se avagahan karane kee jarurat hai kyonki ab ham ek gulami se nikalakar doosari gulami kee or chal rahe hain. yah paratantrata itani prachchhann aur apani bhasha men kahen to kapatapoorn indrajal kee maya hai ki hamen ahasas to hota hai ki is daur men ham sabase jyada unmukt ho gaye hain, par kam karane kee jagah se lekar bistar aur atyant niji antarangata kee jagah tak bhi vah hamen apane lapete men le chukee hai. vaishvikaran kee kokh se udbhoot udarikaran ke nam par sare sansar men failaya gaya bhramapoorn vicharajal hi vastutah vah uttar-aadhunikata hai jisane manav jivan ke chandrama ko rahu kee tarah aaj gras liya hai. isaliye da. sinh ne pustak ke aamukh men hi kaha hai ki - poonji ka paksh itana nirankush hokar hamari chhati par baith chuka hai ki kavita, sanskriti aur svabhashayen jindagi ke sarokaron se lagabhag bahar hote ja rahe hain. ham uttar-aadhunik samay ke ek aise chakravyooh men ghir gaye hain ki isase mukti ke upay dhoondh pana kathin ho raha hai. sare vaikalpik jabab vastusthiti kee aalochana se aage nahin badh pa rahe hain. jo bhi uttar nikalakar aate hain, unamen aagat se jyada vigat kee gandh hoti hai. yadi vikalp kee soch ko koee tek milati hai to le-dekar marks aur gandhi kee vichar paranparaon men. kuchh log donon ko milak bhi sochate hain. fir bhi manushyata ke liye bhavishy ka koee spasht uttar nahin ban pa raha hai. n deshi, n videshi. ek sanbhram jaisi sthiti hai.

soor, tulasi, bihari aur subhadra kumari chauhan ke oopar likhe vichar ka uddeshy svayamev ujagar ho jata hai jisakee charcha main ant men karana chahoonga jisase bat ko rakhane men suvidha hogi.

sankat aur usake satitv ke raksharth un kriyashilanon ko samajhane kee antaradrishti deta hai jisake mool men lok kee ve paranparaen aur jivanonnmukh gatividhiyan hain jo manushy kee aantarik unnati ke dvar kholati hai aur manavata kee sanskriti rachane men sahayy aur agragami hoti hai. is khand ka pahala adhyay prakriti, darshan aur sanskriti hai. yahan sanskriti kee rachana -prakriya ko samajhate hue jivan ji ne prakriti, dharm, paranparaen aur vikas se usake antarsanbandhon aur dvandvon ko itani barikee aur saghanata se chitrit kiya hai ki poora aalekh hi ek shodh-aalekh sa lagata hai. ek udaharan dekhie sanskriti aur paranpara ke antarsanbandhon par -

jo us bandariya men bhi dikhaee deta hai, jo agyanatavash apane mritashishu ke thathari ko apane vakshasthal se chipakaye ghoomati hai. kahane ka matalab yah hai ki ham sanskriti ke karmakand se bachakar hi usake jivit aur svasth paksh ka vikas kar sakate hain. karmakand aur anushthan, sanskriti ke bahari paridhan hote hain usakee aatma nahin. manushy ko sadaiv aatmik vikas kee jarurat hoti hai, n ki bahari vaichitry kee.

vastu aur usake upabhog par kendrit ho gaya hai. poonji ka mahatv har samay raha hai lekin vah pahale kabhi manushy kee sthanapann nahin ban payi thi, jabaki ab vah usaka sthan leti dikhaee de rahi hai, yah sanskriti-premiyon ke liye sabase badi chinta kee bat honi chahie. bhavishy ka sangharsh poonji aur sanskriti ka hi sangharsh hoga. dekha jay ki is sangharsh men manushy kitana vijit aur kitana parajit hota hai!

sanskritik itihas ka vivaranatmak adhyayan bhi karana pada tha. parantu mujhe itihas-vettaon kee moti-moti kitabon se us samay utana labh nahin huaa jitana ki filavakt is chhoti si pustak ke sanskriti khand ke aalekhon se, par afasos ki us vakt tak yah pustak prakash men nahin aayi thi. in aalekhon ke padhane ke uparant agar koee bharat ke sanskritik itihas ka adhyayan kare to mere vichar se vah isake udbhav aur vikas kee jatil-sanshlishth prakriya ko adhik gaharaee se samajh payega kyonki in aalekhon men nihit vichar, sanskriti ke aadhunik bhavabodh ko chetana ke star par jagrat kar hamen us satyanveshan kee or modate hain jahan, vivad kee paridhi se alag, itihas apane mool roop men ghatit huaa hai. isaliye pustak ka yah khand matr sahity-sachetaon ke liye hi nahin, sanskriti aur itihas ke shodharth - vidyarthi ke liye ek mahatvapoorn pustak a manual to understand the cultural heritage in India sabit hogi.

bharatiyata ke jvalant aur behad vivadit, ulajhe hue mudde par bharatiyata ka savala shirshak se likha gaya ek matr itana gahan-ganbhir, bahuprastariy multi layered aur bahuaayami multi dimensional vicharalekh bhi hai ki ise is pustak ka menifesto bhi kaha ja sakata hai jo pustak ko sarvajan hitaya aur keemati banate hain kyonki bakaul samalochak yah ek aisa saval hai jo aasani se pichha nahin chhodta. hajaron salon kee paramparaon ka bal hamare pichhe jo hai. kaisi vidambana hai ki aaj kee bharatiyata men ram kee us sanskriti ko ulata ja raha hai, jisamen kursi lene ke bajay kursi chhod dene kee hod rahi hai.

svavalanban aur aatmanirbharata jaise vichar pichhadepan ke dyottak ho gaye hain jisamen gandhi kee mool avadharana ke ant kar dene ka bhi bigul foonk diya gaya hai kyonki da. sinh ke anusar arthavyavastha men ab sab kuchh itana gadd-madd hai ki deshi-videshi, rashtriy aur antarashtriy, jatiy aur vijatiy shaklon kee pahachan kee sookshm rekhaen tak mitane ko hain. . isase kisi samaj, desh aur rashthr kee bhavasatta kee koee ikahari aur ekarekhiy pahachan nahin hoti. isaliye is kshetr men jo keval bharatiy manisha ne racha hai vah usaka apana hai. vahi hamari bharatiyata hai. vastav men is shodhalekh ke madhyam se bharatiyata kee jo khojabin kee gayi hai, usamen yahan ke darshan, rishi-chintan parampara, sanskriti kee samarasata ka aatmasati charitrik paksha, manav-vyavahar aur sanbandh-bhavana ko bakhoobi samane rakha gaya hai. isake sufal ke roop men bharatiyata ka jo pratiman yahan prastut hai, vah is arth men anyatam hai ki vah hi kal ke pravah men tik saka to tik payega, bakee sab aisa pratit hota hai, tathakathit uttaradhunikata ke prabal veg men bah jayenge, itihas jisaka sadiyon se sakshee raha hai.

udaravad kee aad men shoshan aur kroorata ka ganda khel chand bahurashtriy kanpaniyon ke dvara khela ja raha hai. sath hi yahan, is bahari bayar men bharatiyata kee karunadhara ke ksheen ho jane ke sankat par gahari chinta vyakt kee gayi hai.

isake bad ke aalekh dharm aur sanskriti men dharm ke prati marksavadi drishtikon men sanprati falit ho rahe vivekahin, bhramak vicharon ko aade hathon lete hue jivan ji ne dharm ke mool aur sattatmak, donon pakshon ka vishleshan kiya hai kyonki dharm ke mool men manaviy karuna, sachaee, nishchhalata, sanvedanashilata, aasha jaise hriday ke aatmik bhav hain par jab koee bhi dharm, da. sinh ke anusar sattatmak sthiti men tabdil ho jata hai to apani us manaviy pahunch se door hone lagata hai, jo manav jati ke ek samooh ke liye ek samay shanti ka sandesh lekar aayi thi. tab rah jati hai usakee aanushthanikata, usaka karmakand, usaka sharir. dhire-dhire usakee aatma nasht jati hai aur vah ek dhancha matr banakar rah jata hai. is rahasy ko koee jivan sinh sarikhe samalochak kee kushagrabuddhi hi jan sakati hai ki marks ne dharm kee isi ulti prakriti ko janata ke liye afim bataya tha jo dharm kee manaviy bhoomika ke viparit hai, n ki us dharm ko jo kshudratam prani ke liye bhi karuna aur shil ka vyavahar lekar sansar ke kalyanarth avatarit hota hai. yahan dharm ke sanskritik paksh ke ud ghatan men samalochak kee medha atulaniy pratit hoti hai jo aadami ke vishvas ko dharm se digane se bachati bhi hai.

jaisa ki shirshak se spasht bhi hai, vaishvikaran se sanskriti par aasann khataron kee bahukoniy padatal kee gayi hai. yahan lekhak ne yah sandhan aur sanket karane kee koshish kee hai ki yadi bajar, takanik ityadi aadhunik shodhon ka upayog manaviy gunnavatta ke liye kiye jayen to sthiti badal sakati hai jo ki ek vicharaniy sthapana hai.

vah gahan manaviy prakriya ke marg se hokar jata hai. kis tarah jata hai, yah sudhi pathak aalochana padh kar aasani se samajh sakate hain. is path se gujar kar aise kalavad aur roopavad se mohabhang bhi hota hai jo jivan kee prakriya se bahar hai.

bhasha par is pustak par sat aalekh hai. ye aalekh vishvavidyalayi chhatron aur pratiyogi parikshaon men apane vaikalpik vishay hindi sahity chunane valon ko visheshopayogi pathaniy samagri upalabdh karata hai jo unake bhasha sanbandhi silebas par gahari pakad banane ke kam aa sakata hai. sath hi yahan hindi jati kee sankalpana ko vrihattar, udaravadi pariprekshy men vivechit kiya gaya hai jo hindi kshetr ke alava ahindi kshetron men hindi ke vikas aur prasar kee naee sanbhavanaen aur dishaen kholati hain. sath hi sabhi jatiy bhashaon ke unnayan aur aatm-gaurav ka marg prashast karati hai, hinglisha ke prabhav men din-din nishpran ho rahi janabhasha hindi ko akshunn rakhane ke nihitarth bharatiy aatmabal ko sahi disha aur soch pradan karati hai.

kavita khand ke aalekhon ka bhi abhipret hai. ataev ab main pahala khand, jo kavita vishayak pathon par aadhrit hai par aata hoon. is khand men aath vichar hain, jinamen panch madhyakalin sant -kaviyon ke krititv par, ek riti-kavi bihari, ek svatantrata ke gayak stree-kavi subhadra kumari chauhan aur ek kavita ke gady-roop par hai.

soor, tulasi aur mira ko lok jivan ke atyant pratibhavan kavi ke roop men dekhate hain. yahan lok aur bhakti prithak-prithak nahin hai. in sant-kaviyon ka sabase vilakshan gun yah hai ki ye bhakti men yog-sadhana ke paksh ko jivan aur lok kee gaharaee men utar kar pratipadit karate hain, n ki usakee avahelana kar. aur ek premamay, bhavapoorn sansar kee rachana karate hain. aadikal kee kaviyon kee tarah inamen bhakti ka paksh jivan aur lok se kata huaa nahin hai. samalochana men is vichar ko pratishtha mili hai ki aaj ke kaviyon kee rachanadharmita bhale hi un sant-kaviyon kee rachanadharmita se aage kee ho, par unake srijan ke gahan manaviy arthon ko abhi samagr roop se samajhana bakee hai kyonki unakee kavitaon ka lok-samay ab ke kaviyon se kahin adhik samriddh hai. in lekhon ka sabase mahin aur saghan pahaloo hai unamen vyaiktik bhinnata individual difference, jo bahut rochak bhi hai. jivan ji kee sthapana hai ki kabir sanskriti kee buniyad par khade hain jabaki tulasi usake kangooron par.daraasal, kabir hamare aadhunik bhavabodh ke bahut najadik hain, is mamale men tulasi unase pichhe hain. isaliye tulasi samanjasy aur samanvayavad ke poshak hain. ve toote-foote ko jodane ka kam jyada karate hain.kabir samanvayavad ke poshak nahin hain. ve sanskriti ko antarvastu men badalate hain aur pahale se chali aati huee khand-sanskriti men upekshit ko shamil karate hain. kintu jab sanskriti ke star par stree ka mamala aata hai to kabir bhi pichhad jate hain. kabir ke vyapak jivananubhavon men stree kee pida nahin sama pati. is morche ko sanbhalati hain miran. soor par likhe gaye aalekh ye braj ke loga men ve sabase mahatvapoorn bat kahate hain ki soor ne nagar sabhyata ke oopar gramy sabhyata ko pratishthit kiya hai jinamen prem aur jivan ke rag hain. par kaise? yah sab janane ke liye sinh ji ke priy pathakon ko poore aalekh se gujarana hoga, sab uddharan yahan dena samichin nahin kyonki yah to pustak-charcha hai jisamen mainne matr apani pathakeey samajh hi abhivyakt kee hai.

ek bat aur bhaktikalin kaviyon par, vah yah ki prem-ras ke atyant mahatvapoorn kavi malik mo. jayasi kee kami is khand men khalati hai, jo madhyakalin sant-kaviyon kee ladi ko poori hone se rokati hain. parantu pustak ke aamukh men da. sinh kee svikarokti hai ki jayasi par koee mauka nahin mil paya to ve chahate hue bhi chhoot gaye. par unase aasha kee jani chahie ki is pustak ke aagami sanskaran men is kami ko door kar liya jayega.

to ve sahajata se muskurakar tal gaye. laga ki svamukh prashansa se bachana chahate the. par unako sangopang padhakar svayan yah anubhav kiya ja sakata hai ki unakee soch men pragadh parthivata vidyaman hai jo unakee aalochana ko shreshth aur arthavan banati hai. thik hi kaha hai kisi ne ki shauk-e-didara gar hai to nazar paida kar. unamen yah nazar arthat aalochana -drishti isi parthivata se utpann hoti hai.

sahity ke gady aur pady, donon pathakon ke liye apane lok, vartaman aur bharatiy sanskriti ke samajh ko vikasit karane kee ek anoothi aur anivary pustak sabit hogi- shabd aur sanskriti jo unake sandarbh-granth ke roop men sahayak ho sakati hai.
balki sahity-parisar men apana panv pasarane lagi hai jo sahityalochana ke svasth parampara ke vikas ke ujjval bhavishy kee aashvasti deti hai.

Instagram Influencer kaise Bane or Kaise Instagram se Paise kama sakte hai agar aap janna chate hai to aap bilkul sahi post par aaye hai. Abhi me aapko Instagram se Paise kamane ke tarike share karne wala hu, jinki madad se aap achi khasi earning kar sakte hai. Me apni Pichli post me share kar chuka hu Whatsapp se Paise kaise kamaye, Facebook se paise kaise kamane ya Youtube or Blogging se paise kaise kamaye. or aaj ke topic me ham abhi ke sabse Hot Topic Instagram ki baat karne wale hai. Instagram se Paise kamane ke liye sabse phele jaruri hai ek Instagram Account or usme bhut sare active Follower, to agar aapke pass ye hai to aap Insta se Paise kamane ke liye teyar hai. par agar nahi hai to bhi tension lene ki jarurat nahi hai. Phele Instagram par Apni ek brand banaye or Follower badaye, uske baad paise kamaye. Instagram hame Direct koi paise nahi deta hai, par agar ham Apni Brand waha banaye jisme bhutse log hame follow kare to ham bhut tariko se paise kama sakte hai. Instagram se paise kamane ke liye sabse phele jaruri hai, Instagram Influencer banna Instagram Influencers ka matlab aesa person jiske bhut sare Follower ho or jo usko Follow karte ho. uski Post ko Like comment karte ho. Agar Instagram par Follower badana hai or ek Influencer banna hai to inn bato ka dhiyan rakhe Select Topic Instagram par agar success hona hai to sabse phela or sabse jaruri kaam hai, jis topic par brand banani hai wo select kare, or sirf uspar focus karke post kare. Yaha aap self Brand bhi bana sakte hai, ya aapki koi company ya service hai to uska account bhi bana sakte hai. Account Bio Instagram par Account banane ke baad Account ki Bio or baki detail or fill kare, or sahi tarike se Fill kare. jisse jo bhi usko dekhe wo samaj sake account kis ware me hai. Take Good Photo Instagram ek Photo or Video share Social Network hai, to logo ko attract karne ke liye jaruri hai High Quality Photo or Video share kiye jaye. jisse log unko pasand kare or hame Follow kare. Regular Post Agar Instagram par Follower badana hai or ek Instagram Influencer banna hai to Badiya post Regular karna bhut jaruri hai, taki logo ke samne hamari post aati rahe. or jada se jada logo tak post phuch sake. Use Hashtag Instagram par Simple post naa kare, jo bhi Topic hai or jo post hai usse related jo bhi Popular Hastags hai wo post me jarur use kare. jisse jo Post hai wo jada se jada logo tak phuch sake jo usme interest rakhte hai. Engage with Follower Agar Instagram Influencer banna hai to uske liye jaruri hai, bhut sare log post ko Like or Comment kare. to iske liye jaruri hai jitne bhi log comment ya post ko like kare unko reply karke ek connection banaye. taki wo aage bhi connect rahe. Iss trha aap inn bato ka dhiyan rakh kar Instagram Follower bada sakte hai or ek Instagram Influencer ban sakte hai. Agar aapka Instagram account nahi hai, or agar aap aaj hi start kare to regular work karke max 2 mahino me aap ache khase follower bada sakte hai. Instagram se bhut log lakho me paise kama rahe hai, jisme agar me aapko ek example du too. Aapne Priya Prakash ka naam to suna hoga, jo matra ek akh maarke popular hogai thi. aapko jaan kar herani hogi, usne ek sponsor post karne ke 8 lakh rupee liye the. Instagram Influencers ke liye jo sabse Popular or sabse aasan tarika hai paise kamane ka Sponsor Post, jisme Paise lekar sirf Instagram par post karna hota hai. Agar aapke bhut se Active follower hai, fir to automatic bhut se Brand aapse contact karege, or kahege ki aap uske ware me post kare jiske badle wo aapko paise dege. Par agar aap abhi New hai or aapke jada Follower nahi hai, to aap khud se bhi Brands se contact karke Sponsor Post kar sakte hai. Instagram Influencers ke liye Ye website, jaha se Sponsor Post li ja sakt hai. Instagram par Ache se ache photo Click karke share karne se usko jada log pasand karte hai ye to aap jante hai, to aese me agar aapke Click kiye kuch bhut badiya photo hai jinki agar kisi Brand ko jarurat hai to wo aapse kharid bhi sakte hai. Jesa ki aap jante hoge, jitni bhi Brand hoti hai wo apne Product ya Services ke liye badiya Photo ki talas me rheti hai, to aese me aap unko apne Photo Sell karke bhi ache khase paise kama sakte hai. Photo Sell karne ki ye kuch badiya website Agar aap ek badiya Instagram Influencers or Brand apne faide ke liye aapko paise dekar apna Promotion karati hai, to aap khud socho. aap apne khud ke bhi kuch Product ko Direct sell karke acha khasa paisa kama sakte hai. Agar Instagram par bhut sare Follower hai to uski madad se aap apne dusre Platform ko bhi promote kar sakte hai. Jese agar aapka Youtube Channel hai ya Website hai to aap Instagram par unko free me promote kar sakte hai. Instagram me jo Story wala option hai wo bhi bhut effective hai apna promotion karne ke liye. Jis trha Sponsor post hoti hai, jisme log hamare khene par product ko kharidte hai. same wahi Affiliate Marketing me bhi kar sakte hai. Affiliate Marketing me jo bhi badiya Product ho jo hamari audience ke liye sahi ho uska Affiliate Link share kar sakte hai. usse hoga ye, jitne bhi log wo product ko kharidege uska commission hame milega. Affiliate Marketing Kya Hai or kaise usse paise kama sakte hai uski jada jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. At Last To iss trha Aap Instagram se Paise kama sakte hai or ek badiya Instagram Influencers ban sakte hai.

Hello, friends aapka hamare Hinglish me Blog mein fir se swagat hai aaj ki post Productivity ke upar hai. Aaj ham janenge ki Productivity kya hai ? or isko increase karne ke wo konse Best 15 Productivity Tips hain jisse aap kam time mein jyada production kar sakte hain. 7 What is Productivity? Productivity ko saral shabdon mein kaha jaaye to kisi bhi insaan,machine ki koi bhi work karni ki capacity ko kehte hain. Top 15 Tips to Increase Productivity in Hindi 1. Turn Off Notifications Jaisa ki aap jante hi aaj ke youth ke pass all time saath rehne wali ek cheej smartphone hai or aaj kal ka youth jyadatar apna time social media per bita deta hai usper aane wale notifications usko tab jyada distract karte hai jab koi important kaam chal rha ho to agar aap bhi apni productivity ko badhana chahte hai to yeh bahut important hai ki aapka keemti time in faltu ki notifications ke aane ki wajah se barbaad na ho to focus kare ki aap jab bhi kaam kar rhe ho at least us waqt Notifications ko turn off kar den jisse wo aapko disturb naa kar sake warna fir aap social media kholker baith jayenge or aadha ghanta se 1 ghanta kab beet jayega aapko pata bhi nhi chalega. 2. Read More Aap Daily books padne ki adat banaiye yeh kaam mobile per chipke rehne se kaafi accha hai books padne ke bahut fayde hain jaise agar aap Motivational Books padte hain to aap mein positivity or confidence aata hai or agar aap business related books padte hai to definitely aapki productivity badhne ke aapko ideas mil sakte hain jisko aap apne work field or business mein lagaker usko grow kar sakte hain. 3. Respect your Time Aisa to aapne kai baar hi suna hoga ki ek baar time nikal jaata hai fir wo wapas nhi aata or yeh baat 100 sach hai isliye aap is keemti time ko kisi aise kaam mein lagaye jo jaroori ho or agar aap mein kaam ko taalne ki adat hai to usko band kare, koshish nhi bilkul band karen! 4. Productivity tools ka use kare Ab to technology bahut hi advance ho gyi hai ab aap ek ungli per pura world dekh sakte hai to fir aap technology ka use apni productivity ko badhane mein kyun nhi karte? Internet per kayi aisi websites or playstore per kayi aise Apps hai jo aapke time ko manage karte hai or aapki Productivity badhane mein madad karte hai to aaj hi un apps or tools ko find kare or use karna chalu kare. 5. New Habit daale Jaisa ki Abdul Kalam ji ne kaha tha ki Aap apna future nhi badal sakte per apni aadatenHabits to badal sakte hain or aapki habits jaroor aapka future badal dengi to doston is baat ko apne mind mein store karke rakh len or new habit bana len kyunki aapki abhi jo life chal rhi hai wo aapki habits ki wajah se hai agar aap apni life mein thoda change lana chahte ho to habit change kar do ya habit nhi change kar sakte to koi new habit bana lo. 6. Majedaar Goals Set karo Normally log yaa to bahut chote goals set karte hai ya bahut bade ki unko apne aap per hi confidence nhi hota ki wo usko pura kar bhi payenge ya nhi per koi bhi exciting goals set nhi karta. Agar ham aisa goal set kare jisko pura karne ke baad ya usko pura hone tak ki journey mein hi maja aa jaaye, to fir kitna maja aayega aap hi batayiye? 7. Imagine Your Success Socho aap jindagi mein jo banana chahte hain wo ban gye to kya hoga? Us feeling ko mehsoos kijiye yaani apni Success ko Imagine kijiye isse hoga yeh ki aap andar se motivated ho jaaoge or aapki aapke field mein Productivity bhi badh jaayegi. 8. Wake Up Early Agar aap chahte hain ki aap jaldi Successful ban jaaye to aapko jaldi jaagna hoga. Jaldi jaagne bahut fayde hai. Agar aap jaldi nhi jaagte hain to aap apna bahut time waste kar rhe. Main un Successful people ki baat nhi karunga jo jaldi jaagte hain jiski wajah se wo apna valuable time apne work mein laga paaye or successful hue main aapki baat kar rha hun ki kya aap apna maximum time apne goals, dreams mein de rhe hain ya sokar kewal dreams hi dekh rhe hain. 9. Avoid Meetings yahan per aapko office ki meeting ko avoid ke liye nhi kaha jaa rha hai. Yahan baat ho rhi hai un meetings ki jo aapka time ko waste karne ke alawa kuch nhi karti na koi value de rhi na kuch waha se produce ho rha hai For ex Doston ke saath gapsap karna. Aisa bhi nhi hai ki aap isko bilkul hi band kar den per isko limited rakhe or analyse kare ki aap isme jyada time to nhi de rhe jo waste ho rha hai. 10. Morning Alarm mat band kare Kayi logon ki adat hoti hai ki wo morning alarm ko snooze kar dete hai or fir se So jaate hain jiska result yeh hota hai ki wo late ho jaate hai or fir unhe baad mein sharmindagi ka saamna karna padta hai to yeh naa ho iske liye aap ya to alarm ko apne se itna door rakhe jahan per usko band karne ke liye aapko uthna hi pade ek baar aap uth gye to less chances hai aapko dubara sone ke liye bed per bhi jana pade. 11. Multi-tasking band kare Kabhi bhi Multi-tasking na kare yeh aapki mind ki efficiency ko kam karta hai or aap kisi ek kaam per focused nhi reh paate ho jiska result yeh rehta ki naa kaam hota na koi output milta or last mein frustration ki wajah se tension,depression jaisi faltu ki cheeje hone lagti hain. Ek time per ek hi kaam kare kyunki aap robot nhi hain! 12. Find Passion Har insaan mein koi naa koi aisa talent hota hai aisa koi kaam jaroor hota hai jo usse behtar or koi nhi kar sakta hai. us talent ko find kare apne passion ko find kare or usper work karna start kar den apne passion ko follow karne se aapko satisfaction milega jo life mein bahut jaroori hai. kayi log aisi job mein fase pade hai jisse unko satisfaction nhi mil rha kis wajah se kyunki unhone apne unique talent ko naa find kiya na kabhi usper work kiya to aap aisi galti naa kare!! 13. Tasks ko break kare aap apne bade-bade tasks ko break kar den fir har ek tasks ko fatafat complete kare isse aapka motivation level bhi badega jaise-jaise aap ek-ek task complete karte jaayenge. 14. Unnecessary tasks eliminate kare Aap analyse kare ki wo aise konse kaam hai jo aapka time jyada consume kar rhe hai or output mein kuch nhi de rhe yaani unnecessary hai wo tasks unko karna band kare. 15. Just Do it Agar aapke mind mein kisi kaam ke baare mein thought aata hai to usko fatafat karna start kar do jab tak kahin aapka mind usko karne se mana naa kar de kyunki hamare mind mein 70 negative thoughts aate hain jo aapko kisi bhi kaam ke negative dikha denge. For ex Negative People. To aaj se koi bhi kaam ho Just do it kyunki agar us kaam ko sochoge to kabhi nhi hoga kyunki jyadatar to negative thoughts hi aane wale hain Or last mein Negative people ka saath chod den bhale hi wo aapka dost kyun naa ho yaa fir agar aapko aapka friend bahut pyara hai to fir aap usko change kar de warna cheeje same rehegi jaisi hai. To friends in tips ko follow karke dekhe or hame comment mein bataye ki aapko yeh tips kaisi lagi or aapke pass koi article ho jo logo ko motivate karne mein help kar sakta hai to jaroor share kare tab tak ke liye is article ko un logo tak share kare jisko iski bahut jaroorat hai. chhattisagadh ke dhamatari men tahasiladar hokar aaye. do varsh ve yahan rahe aur sthanantarit hokar shivarinarayan aa gaye. yahan ke nadi-nale aur pahadi ka prakritik saundary unhen bahut bhaya aur yahan rahate hue unhonne kaee granthon kee rachana kar dali. shivarinarayan ko unakee karyasthali kaha jaye to atishyokti nahin hogi. yahan unhonne kashi ke bharatendu mandala kee tarj men jagamohan mandala banakar chhattisagadh ke bikhare sahityakaron ko sametane ka sadprayas kiya jisamen ve safal bhi hue. kadachit yahi karan hai ki shivarinarayan ek sahityik tirtha ke roop men bhi prasiddhi pa saka. pandit hiraram tripathi jagamohan mandal ke ek jagamagate nakshatr the.

nibandh, upanyas aur samalochana ka pravah isi kal men dikhaee deta hai. bharatendu yang ka mahatvapoorn aur ullekhaniy tathy hai- hindi kavita ka kendr sankraman. is yug men hindi kavita vyaktigat aur darabari roochiyon se hatakar nagar roochiyon men sankramit hoti hai. inase kavy sanchetana ke samoohik vikas ke naye kendron ko janm diya. kashi aisa hi ek pramukh kendr tha aur is kendr ke nyookliyas the- baboo bharatendu harishchandr. aalochakon aur itihasakaron ne badi shiddat ke bad is tathy ko svikar kiya hai ki us samay kee sahityik gatividhiyan bharatendu harishchandr kee parishkrit sahityik suroochi evan jagarookata ke falasvaroop kendrit hokar naye vatavaran niyojit karane men pratifalit huee thi. us yug kee sahityik gatividhiyon kee ek jhalak hamen chhattisagadh men bhi dekhane ko milati hai. in sahityik gatividhiyon ka kendr mahanadi ka tatavarti gram shivarinarayan tha aur thakur jagamohanasinh usake nabhikendr the. unhonne yahan ke aath sajjan vyaktiyon ka parichay apani kriti sajjanashtaka men diya hai jinamen pandit yadunath bhogaha, mahant arjunadas, mahant gautamadas, makhan sav, pandit hiraram tripathi, mohan pujari, rishiram aur ramanath pramukh hain. sajjanashtak ke bare men ve likhate hain.
jise vishv ka prachinatam gurookul vishv vidyalay mana jata hai. shabari yahan kee paricharika thi jisake joothe ber khane shreeram aur lakshman yahan aaye the. balmikee ramayan men bhi ullekhit hai-

dvitiy nam ramapur, tritiy nam baikunthapur aur chaturth nam narayannapur yuganukram se janiye. vahan chitrotpala-ganga ke tat par punyaroopi kanan mandit sindooragiri parvat ke nikat sakshat avinashi shree narayan virajaman hain. unakee charan ko sparsh karati huee pavitr rohini kunda sthit hai. suprasiddh sahityakar shree batusinh chaihan ne rahini kund ko ek dham bataya hai- rohini kund ek dham hai, hai amrit ka nira jabaki pandit malikaram bhogaha ne use mokshadayi bataya hai.

usaka svaroop vyapak aandolan ya samajik vyapti men n hokar simit tatha sankeern vyaktigat nishtha par hai. tripathi ji kee bhakti bhavana men aastha ka sanpradayik roop nahin hai. unakee bhakti bhavana men sagun nirgun sabhi ekakar hai. unake jivan kee ramamay jhankee prastut hai.
vishesh hai hamare desh men skil ka itana patan. doosara patr bhi fed aof se sin men in ho raha hai.

hamare is mahan desh men sadiyon se len-den kee kala nirantar pratishtha ko prapt hoti rahi ho. vahan, aise nasamajh, lete hi pakad lie jane vale dusht, patak, nark ke bhagi nahin to aur kya hain. patr kutilata se sin men sthapit hone ka prayatn kar raha hai.

shiksha kee kami ke karan se chhoti-chhoti nasamajhiyan kar jate hain. donon patr ab shila par virajaman hain. ikaththe hokar desh men rishvat lene men pakade jane arthat kala men adyohpatan par bhanyakar roop se chintatur dikhaee de rahe hain.
najar ka fer. ab gun grahakata to rahi nahin, samajh hi nahin pate hain dene vale ke mansoobe idhar li nahin, udhar tapp se dhar lie gae.

fir dhire se baig ke andar sarakate the aur baig chaparasi ke hathon men pakadate the. yani range hathon ka koee chakkar hi nahin. aur ab dekho rakam sidhe hathon men lete hain, taki range hathon pakade jane ka sapana poora kar saken.

unhin varmaji ko, rishvat lene valon ke pitamah ko. aaj subah se hi ve ikadam udas hain. jab se akhabar men khabar padhi hai, mishraji ke rishvat lete hue range hathon pakade jane kee, ve udas hain. chay ke sath tin kee jagah dedh hi biskut khae hain. akhabar ko pare rakhakar udas najaron se ghar ke bilaute ko niharane men lage hue h. bilauta bhi unake bache hue biskuton par danv lagane ka paintara dhoondh raha hai. unakee aankhen rishvat lene kee kala ke is bhanyakar patan par sikudi-sikudi si ja rahi thin. mainne dekha ve ganbhir mudra men chhat ko niharane men lage the. rashtriy taur par chintit hone kee paranparik poorn uchchata ko prapt karana chahate the.
gajab to ab suno-ek bar to unhonne rishvat lene vale paise anathalay men dan karavakar usakee rasid mangava li thi.

taki karmiyon ko vidhivat roop se is vishay men daksh kiya ja sake. balki ve karmachariyon ko seva poorv prashikshan men hi is vishay ko rakhavane ke himayati hain. prativedan bhi taiyar kar liya tha.

Google AMP kya hai or Blog me AMP kaise Apply kare agar aap ye janna chate hai to aap bilkul sahi post par aaye hai. Google AMP jisme AMP ka Matlab hai Accelerated Mobile Pages jisme jo Page hai wo bhut fast load hota hai mobile me. Is samay 70 se adhik log internet ka use mobile device me karte hai. Isliye google ne amp project launch kiya taki mobile me website jyda speed me open ho. Jisse user ka interest badhe aur online content ko bad hawa mile. Website Speed Google Ranking Factor hai ye to aap jante hi hoge. ki jo fast load hoti hai wo upar aati hai search me. Google AMP ek standard project hai jise google and twitter ne milkar launch kiya hai. Yeh project html and css par work karta hai. Yeh JavaScript code ko compress krke html me modify kar deta hai jisse page fast load hone lagta hai. In sort khe to google amp ek aisa page hai jo page se extra content and widget ko remove karta hai. Dome ke liye aap Hindi Me Help AMP version dekh sakte hai. Yeh AMP Project feb 2016 me aaya tha. Aaj ke samay me kafi ye popular bhi hai. Worpress ke liye bhut se WordPress AMP Plugin uplabd hai , jinki madad se WordPress blog ko AMP enable kar sakte hai. But Blogger or Blogspot website me aisa kuchh nhi hai. To agar aapko Blogger me AMP Apply karna hai to pura kaam khud se manuly karna hoga. Blogger me AMP Apply karna wese jada muskil kaam bhi nahi hai, agar aapko Coding ki thodi basic knowlage bhi hai to aap aasani se AMP Apply kar lege. Kaise Apply karna hai Google AMP Blogger par uske liye Steps ko follow kare. Sabse pahle apko Google AMP Blogger Template download karna padega. Kai website free google amp theme deti hai aur aap paid theme bhi le sakte hai. Use download kre aur apne blog me Template upload kar de, Theme upload karne se pahle uska backup lena naa bule purani theme ka taki koi badwad naa ho. Ab apka blog google amp ho jayega. Ab aapko amp tag hi use karna padega jaise AMP Image, AMP Adsense Ads, amp style AMP Video etc. Jab bhi ab aap post karenge to compose ki jagah html option ka use karenge. Iske liye sabse pahle us page me uplabdh sabhi html tag remove karna hai. Kyoki isme div tag pahle se maujud hote hai jise amp page error manta hai. Ydi aap ise remove nhi karenge to div tag se realated error aane lagegi jisse amp me apka page google me index nhi hoga. Iske bad apko post me image aur ad bhi amp me insert karni hai. Ye tag bhi hum batayenge ki kaise amp image insert kiya ja sakta hai. Ydi apke blog me pahle se post hai aur unme image ya tag non amp hai to search console me errors so hoga. Aur use google amp me index nhi karega balki wo non amp page ke jaise show hoga. So ydi apna blog bina page error ke sath show karna chahte hai or website ke sabhi page amp me show karna chahte hai to old post ko modify or html me edit kre. Jaise ki amp image lagaye, div tag and style remove kar de. Amp ad ka use kre. Ydi fir bhi koi errors aati to comment kre. Google amp image banane ke liye amp-img tag ka use karna hai. Jab hum image insert karte hai to wo non amp hoti hai aur uska html code img src . img hota jisme jha par bhi img bus likha hai uski jagah amp-img likhana hai. Or neeche diye gaye image tag ka use kre. Is code me apko src ke aage jo invited comma me jo hindimehelp.jpg likha hai uski jagah apni image ka link dalna hai jise aap amp image me insert karna chahte hai. Aur is prakar aap amp image post me insert kar sakte hai. Adsense amp responsive ad post me lagane ke liye sabse pahle neeche diye gye code ko copy kre. Ab is code me jo ca-pub-13563278374853 likha hai uski jagah apko apni adsense id dalna hai jo ki adsense har publisher ko deta hai. ise publisher id kahte hai. Aur ad slot ke aage jo invited comma ke under number hai usko apne ad slote code se remove karna hai. Jab aap ad crate karte hai ya ad copy krte hai to usme yeh code hota hai. Yeh apki ad unit id hoti hai. Video Embed karne ke liye sabse pahle neeche diye gye code ko copy kre Ab src me diye gye code ko apni video ke url se replace kar de. Isi tarah aap you tube ke video bhi amp me use kar sakte hai. Iska code ye hai. Ab is code me video id me you tube video ki id se replace karni hai. Ab apka you tube amp me ho gya hai. Dosto ummid hai apko ye post jarur pasand aayi hogi. Ydi apko isme koi doubt hai to comment me sawal puchh sakte hai. Agar aapko bhi HMH.pe Guest Post karna hai to uski Jankari yaha hai.

. bachche se lekar boodhe tak kee yahi koshish hoti hai. han buddhi ka star alag alag hone se har manav ka aanand prapt karane ka dhang alag alag hota hai. koee galat tarike se pata hai to koee sahi tarike se. koee kam pata hai to koee adhik pata hai. lekin har prani ka uddeshy ek hi hota hai. chahe vah kisi bhi desh ya dharm ka ho. chahe vah kisi bhi jati ka ho. chahe vah koee bhi bhasha bolane vala ho. vah aananda aanand aur sirf aanand hi chahata hai.

rath-eendhan ityadi vastuon kee dhvani karnnapatal kee or chalayaman hai. atah aisa pratit hota hai ki yah manushyamatr ka chintaka, usakee aavashyakataon ka sachetaka, dhara par manav kalyan ko samarpit manishi dikh padata hai.

bap. mithya naeen mattha to tera firaila hai. too kahin khanon men rahata hai kya? samajha, fainens bhaee to moonisapilti taip kam karata hai. achchha-achchha deta hai, to fauran hi taiks kee tangadi mar deta hai. ye munbaee kee barish nahin bidoo ki jab chahe naha liya, ye to sarakari nal hai idar pani le, udar jeb dhili kar. abi samajha ki naeen ki tere kan ke niche bajakar teri aatma ka daravaja bhadabhada doon.
