Hello doston aaj ham aapke saamne ek motivational story lekar aaye hain yeh story khaas taur se un logon ke liye hai jo middle class parivar se hai to chaliye story ko enjoy karte hain. Ek baar ki baat hai ek Darshnik apne shisya ke saath kahin jaa rhe the. Chalte-Chalte dono log ek khet ke paas pahunche. Dono logon ko bahut jor ki pyaas lagi hui thi to dono log khet ke beechon-beech bane ek tute-foote ghar ke saamne pahunche or darwaje par dastak di. Khet kaafi achaa or upjaaufertile tha. Lekin uski halat bahut badtar thi uski halat dekhkar lagta tha ki uska maalik us per jara sa bhi dhyan nhi deta hoga. Andar se ek aadmi nikla, uske saath uski patni or 3 bacche bhi the. Sabhi Fate-Purane kapde pehne hue the. Darshnik bola Kya hame paani mil sakta hai? badi pyaas lagi hai! Admi ne paani diya fir darshnik bole Main dekh rha hun ki aapka khet itna bada hai per isme koi fasal nhi boi gyi hai. Aakhir aap logon ka gujara kaise chalta hai? Admi bola Hamare paas ek bhains hai vo kaafi doodh deti hai,Doodh bechkar kuch paise mil jaate hai or bache hue doodh ka sevan karke hamara gujara ho jaata hai. Shaam kaafi ho gyi thi to dono log wahi ruk gye. Aadhi raat ko darshnik ne shisya ko uthaya or kaha, Chalo hame abhi yahan se chalna hai, or chalne se pehle ham us aadmi ki bhains ko chattan se girakar maar daalenge. Shisya ko apne guru ki baat per yakin nhi ho rha tha per vo unki baat bhi taal nhi sakta tha. Isliye dono bhains ko marker raaton-raat gayab ho gye! Yeh ghatna shisya ke man mein baith gyi or kareeb 10 saal baad jab wo ek safal aadmi ban gya to usne socha kyun naa apni galti sudharne ke liye us aadmi se mila jaaye or uski aarthik madad ki jaye. Apni car se wo us khet ke saamne pahuncha. Shisya ne dekha ki wo ujda khet ab falon ke bagiche mein badal chuka tha. Shisya ne socha ki sayad bhains ke marne ke baad vo pariwaar sab kuch bech kar chala gya hoga. Isliye vo wapas lotne laga tbhi usne us aadmi ko dekha. Shisya bola Sayad aap mujhe pehchan nhi paaye, Saalon pehle main aapse mila tha. Aadmi bola Han Han! kaise bhool sakta hun us din ko, aap log to bina bataye chale gye per usi din naa jaane kaise hamari bhains bhi chattan se girkar mar gyi. Kuch din to samaj hi nhi aaya ki kya kare, per jeene ke liye kuch to karna tha, To lakdiya kaat kar bechne lage, usse kuch paise hue to khet mein buwayi kar di. Fasal acchi nikal gyi, bechne per jo paise mile usse falon ke bagiche lagwa diye. Yeh kaam achaa chal pada or is samay main aas-paas ke 1000 gaaon mein sabse bada fal vyapari hun. sachmuch yeh sab kuch naa hota agar us bhains ki maut naa hui hoti.! Shisya bola Lekin yeh kaam to aap pehle bhi kar sakte the. fir Admi ne kaha Kar to sakta tha! lekin tb jindagi bina utni mehnat se chal rhi thi, Kabhi laga hi nhi ki mere andar itna kuch karne ki chamta hai to koshish hi nhi ki lekin jab bhains mar gyi tab haanth-pair marne pade or is mukaam tak pahunch paya. To doston sochiye, kahin aapki jindagi mein bhi to koi aisi bhains nhi jo aapko ek behtar jindagi jeene se rok rhi hai. Kahin us bhains ne aapko bhandh kar to nhi rkha hai! Agar aapko lage ki aisa hai, to aage badiye. himmat kariye, apni rassi katiye or ajaad ho jayiye. aapke paas khone ke liye bahut thoda hai per paane ke liye poora jahan hai! jaayiye use pakar dikhayiye!! Computer ho ya pyaar. Kam se kam 2-4 logon se pyaar karna aajkal ka rivaaj ban gaya hai. Kyunki agar ek ne dhoka diya to doosara koi to hona chahiye na. Par kuch bhakt 2-4 logon se ek hi samay mein ishq ladate samay pakde jaate hain, aur joote chappal khaakar waapas aate hain, apne bhakton ki isi samasya ko door karne ke liye aaj hum aapko denge kuch aise anmol tareeke jinko amal mein laane ke baad aap 2-4 kya, balki 15-20 logon se ek hi samay mein ishq lada sakte ho, aur pakde bhi nahi jaaoge.

aur na mein tera check karunga. To kehne ka arth hai bhakton ki jab bhi unse milne jaao to bhoolkar bhi apna Chalit Doorbhas yantra arthaat mobile phone na le jaayein. Ye samaj lo ki tumhara sabse bada shatru hai ye.

kahin aisa na ho ki tum kisi ko patane mein laakhon paapad belo aur tumhara mitra use lekar udan chhu hole. Mitrata apni jagah aur prem apni jagah. Zyaada jaankaari ke liye angrakchhak artaat Bodyguard dekh lo bachha, samajh aa jaayega ki aajkal ke mitra kis mitti ke bane hain.

WordPress par Blog kaise banate hai wo to aapne jaan liya, par ab aapke dimag me ye khayal aa raha hoga ki ab WordPress par blog banane ke baad kya kare, kya kya settings kare or kaise apne wordpress blog ko puri trha setup kare. Aapne ek New Website banai ho direct wordpress par ya fir Phele Blogger par aapka blog tha jisko WordPress par sift kiya. Aapko WordPress ki kuch basic settings hai jo karna hi padega apni wordpress blog ko starting karne se phele. Agar aapka Blog Blogspot par hai or aap usko WordPress par sift karna chate hai to mene uski jankari bhi di hui hai. Aaj mai iss post me aapko un wordpress setting ke bare me bataoga, jisko WordPress par Blog banane ke baad karna hota hai. Yadi aap in sabhi setting ko sahi tarah se set kar lete hai to aapka wordpress blog ekdum ready ho jayega aur aap apne blogging ko wordpress par karna start kar Denge. To chalo dosto dekhte hai wordpress par blog banane ke baad kon kon si setting ko setup hota hai. Muje puri ummid hai Aapko isme bhut kuch naya sikhne ko milega. Ye ek bahut hi jaruri step hai jisko jyadatar blogger ignore kar dete hai. WordPress ko apne web hosting me install karne ke baad sabse pahle aapko isi kaam ko karna cahiye. Default admin Login Ko Delete Karke New Admin Login Create kare. WordPress ki Security ki najar se ye bhut jaruri hai, nahi to wordpress site ko hack karna thoda aasan ho jata hai. Chaliye dekhte hai kaise New User bana kar Admin user ko remove karte hai. Step 1 sabse pahle aapko apne wordpress me login karna hoga. WordPress ke Dashboard me jaakar Users par click kar uske baad Add New par click kare. Step 2 Add New par click karne ke baad ek form open hoga. Aap uss form ko sahi sahi fill kar de. Uss form ke dwara aap apna Admin account create kar sakte hai. jiske dwara aap login karke apna kaam start kar sakte hai. Ab aapka New User Add ho chuka hai. Step 3 An jo new user add kiya hai uska username or password se login kare wordpress me. Fir User ke section me jaye or jo Admin user hai usko delete karde. Ab ek conformation message aayega, Conform Deletion par click kare. Iss trha Defult Admin user ko delete karke new user bana sakte hai WordPress me. Ab aap koi bhi new post ko publish karege woh aapke new acount name ke ander publish hoga. Ye bhi ek bahut basic setting hai jisko bahut se bloggers set karna bhul jate hai. Iss setting ko set karne ke baad aapka websiteblog professional jaisa lagne lagega. Title, aur Tagline ki setting aapke website ke seo ko bhi majbut karta hai. Iss setting ko set karne ke liye aap sabse pahle Settings General par click kare. uske baad kuch option aayege. top two fields me aapko Apne website ka title and tagline likh de. Aapko niche ek time zone ka bhi setting dikhai dega jaha par jaa kar aap time zone select karna hai. Aap agar india se hai to kolkata select kare. or fir setting ko save karde. jab hum apna new blog wordpress par create karte hai to uske baad wordpess sample ke liye kuch default content ko hmare blog me add kar deta hai. Aapko un sabhi default content ko removedelete karna hai. Default content ko removedelete karne ke liye aapko. WordPress ke Dashboard me jaakar Posts All posts par click kare. Uske baad waha par jitne bhi sample post dikhai de un sabhi ko removedelete kar de, jo Sample Comment hoga wo bhi delete ho jayega us post ka. Thik Isi Prakar Pages All pages par click kare aur waha par bhi jitne sample page ho un sabhi ko Delete kar de. bahut se bloggers iss step ko nahi karte hai. lekin agar aapko apna websiteblog ko badiya aur professional banana hai to aapko sabhi sample post aur pages ko delete kar dena cahiye. Sample post aur pages aapke websiteblog ko badiya look nahi dete hai. WordPress Permalink ko set karna bhi bahut jaruri step hai. Agar aap apne WordPress Permalink ko change nahi karte hai to ye aapke blogwebsite ke SEO par ek bura prabhao Dal sakta hai. Sabhi professional Bloggers ka manana hai ki WordPress ka default Permalink seo friendly nahi hota hai. Isliye ye bahut jaruri hai ki hum ek SEO friendly WordPress Permalink choose kare. Ek Seo friendly Permalink kuch isi tarah se hota hai, jisme website ke address ke baad post ke keyword hote hai. jo padne me yaad rakhne me or SEO ki najar se bhi bhut acha hai. httpwww.yourwebsite.comsample-post Aap WordPress Ke Dashboard Me Jaakar Isko Set Kar Sakte Hai, Image me jo bataya hai usko select karke save karde. Ek Caching Plugin Aapke wordpress blog ko fast loading banata hai. WordPress blog ki fast loading speed ek bahut hi impotent factor hai badiya search engine ranking Pane Ke Liye or apne visitor ko acha expriance dene ke liye. Caching plugin aapke website ke bekar chizo ko cach karke aapke website ki performance ko badiya banta hai. WordPress par bahut se aise Caching Plugin hai jiska upyog aap apne blogwebsite me kar sakte hai. May aapko 2 bahut hi papular Caching Plugin ko batata hu jiska upyog sabhi professional blogger karte hai. Aap in dono me se kisi bhi Caching Plugin ko insall karke apne websiteblog ki perfoemence aur laoding speed imporved kar sakte hai. W3 Total Cache WP Super Cache Jaisa ki niche ke screenshot me dikhai de raha hai ki aap wordpress ke dashboard ko open karke uske baad Setting Reading par click karke Reading Settings Ko Configure kar sakte hai. In setting se jo aapke visitor hoge unke liye hai. jese agar aap chate hai ki agar koi email se subscribe kare to uske email par post ki jankari jaye to wo puri jaye ya thoda sa hissa jaye, taki wo blog par aa kar post ko read kare. Yadi aap ek bloggers hai to aap kabhi bhi SEO ko ignore nahi kar sakte hai. SEO ke bina aapko search engine me ranking nahi milegi. Search engine me ranking pane ke liye aapko SEO plugin ki jarurt padegi. SEO by Yoast Ek bahut hi powerful Seo plugin hai. SEO by Yoast aapke websiteblog ke sabhi basic aur advance SEO setting ko set karne me Madad karta hai. SEO by Yoast me bahut hi awesome features hai. Isliye apne new wordpress blogwebsite me aapko SEO by Yoast ko insall karna bahut jaruri hai. SEO by Yoast ko Insall karke uski sabhi SEO setting kaise karte hai iske bare me mai Aane wale time me puri Details ke sath Post share karuga. Also Read SEO ki Puri Jankari SEO Full Guide in Hindi or dusri SEO ki Post Padhe Aapka wordpress blogwebsite professional tabhi lagega jab usme koi top quality ka theme upload hoga. WordPress blog ke liye internet par bahut se free aur paid theme uplabdha hai. Yadi aapke pass paid theme ke liye paise hai to aap koi professional free theme choose karke usko apne blog me upload kar sakte hai. Yadi aapke pass utne paise nahi ki aap koi paid theme buy kar sake to apko tension lene ki jarurt nahi kyoki wordpress ke theme dashboard me aapko bahut se prakar ke free theme miljayege jo aapke website ke liye perfect honge. Aap wordpress ke theme dashboard me se apne websiteblog ke anusaar free theme choose kar sakte hai. Aapke dwara choose kiye gaye theme ko wordpress blog me upload karne ke liye aapko. Go to Appearance Themes par click karke Add New par click karke apne wordpress theme ko bahut hi Easy tarike se apne wordpress blog me upload kar sakte hai. Aap apne free theme ko apne anusaar customize bhi kar sakte hai. Note Kabhi Bhi Koi Nulled Cracked theme ka upyog naa kare Agar aap aisa karte hai to ye aapke pure menhat par pani pher sakta hai or aapki site hack ho sakti hai ya uskoi koi galat use ho sakta hai. Isliye Nulled theme upyog karne se accha koi badiya free theme ki upyog kare. Ek naya wordpress blog banane ke baad aapko kuch Importent Plugin hai jinKo Install karna bahut jaruri hota hai. yaha par mai aapko kuch aise Essential plugin ko share karta hu jo har ek wordpress bloggers ke blog me hona cahiye. Also Read 10 WordPress Plugin jo Blog Me Install Honi Chaiye Apne website ka daily backup lena bahut hi jaruri Hota hai. Isliye apne new wordpress blog me Backup Plugin Install karna ek bahut hi jaruri kaam hota hai. Yaha par mai aapko kuch badiya Backup Plugin ko share kar raha hu aap un sabhi Backup Plugin me se kisi ek plugin ko apne wordpress blog ki daily backup lene ke liye install kar sakte hai. BackUpWordPress BackWPup free WordPress backup to Dropbox Akeeba backup Ye bhi ek bahut jaruri chiz hai jisko aapko karna cahiye. Yadi aapke wordpress ka dashboard bahut se Unused Themes Aur plugins se full hai to aapko un sabhi Themes Aur plugins me se Unused WordPress Themes Aur plugins Ko Delete kar dena cahiye jisse faltu ka load nahi padta server par. Unused WordPress Themes ko delete karke ke liye aap Appearance Themes par jaaye aur waha par jitne bhi theme aise ho jinka koi upyog naa hota ho un sabhi ko delete kar de. Jin theme ko Delete karna hai uspar click kare fir aapko kone me delete ka option dikhega uspar click karke delete kar sakte hai. Unused WordPress plugins ko delete karke ke liye Plugins Installed Plugins par jaaye aur waha par jitne bhi Unused WordPress plugins ko delete kar de. Aapko unhi sabhi plugin ko rakhe jo aapke liye upyogi ho baki sabhi ko delete kar de. Yadi aap apne wordpress blog ki sabhi Unused WordPress Themes Aur plugins Ko Delete Kar dete hai to isse aapke wordpress blog ki performance pahle se accha hoga Aur Loading speed bhi jyada hoga. Also Read Blog ki Loading Speed Time Ko Kaise Kam Kare Puri Jankari User Profile Apke website ka ek various places hai jisko aapko set karna hoga. Apne User Profile ko setup karne se aapke blog reader ko ye mouka milega ki woh aapke bare me aur jaan sake. User Profile set karke liye aap sabse pahle. Go to Users Your Profile click kare. Your Profile par click karke ke baad apke samne ek form open ho jayega. Uss form me aapke information ke bare me puchega aapko un sabhi chizo ko sahi sahi bhar kar save karna hoga. First Name, Last Name, Email, Website URL aur bio chize waha par likh kar aapko save karna hoga. Ye ek bahut hi simple step hai aur har koi bloggers isko bahu hi Easy tarike se likh kar apne User Profile Ko Complete kar sakta hai. Ab aapko apne wordpress blog me Google Analytics Aur Google Search Console Ko Install karna hoga. Google Analytics ki madad se aap apne websiteblog ki traffic ko track kar sakte hai. Google Analytics ki madad se aap ye bhi jaan sakte hai ki aapko kiss country se jyada traffic aa raha hai. Aur bhi bahut si aisi chize hai jisko aap Google Analytics ki madad se jaa sakte hai. Google Search Console ki madad se aap search status, crawl status jaisi aur bhi bahut si chizo ko jaan sakte hai. ye google ka ek bahut badiya service hai. Google Search Console hmare blogging me bahut help karta hai, uski important setting karna naa bhule. Also Read About Us Aur Contact Us Pages aapke new website ke liye bahut jaruri hai. In dono pages ki wajah se aap apne reader se connect ho sakte hai. About Us page me aap apne reader ko apne bare me batate hai. Jitna badiya tarike se aap About Us ko likhenge utna hi badiya aapko uska fayda bhi milega. ye aapke creativity par depend karta hai ki aap apna About Us page kaise likhte hai. About Us page likhte time me aapko iss baat ka dhyaan dena hoga ki About Us aap apne reader ke liye likh rahe hai aur aapko isme sirf aur sirf apne bare me likhna hota hai. Contact Us Page ek aisa page hota jiske dwara aapke visitor aapse Contact karte hai. Ye aapke upar depand karta hai ki aap apne visitor ke sath Kaise contact karna cahte hai. ABout Us aur Contact Us Page ko creat karke ke liye apne wordpress ke dashboard me jaa kar Pages New Pages par click karke waha par apna About Us Aur Contact Us Page ko creat kar sakte hai. Contact Us Page KO create karke ke liye aap Contact Form 7 plugin ka upyog kar sakte hai. WordPress ek bahut hi papular blogging platform hai, ispar internet ki 20 bani hui hai. lekin bahut se bloggers ke man me ek tarah ka ye dar rahta hai ki wordpress ek bahut hi hard platform hai aur unke anusaar wordpress blog ki setting ko setup karna bhi bahut hard hota hai. Mai un sabhi bloggers se ye kahna cahata hu jo wordpress ko ek hard blogging platform samjhte hai real me wordpress ek bahut hi Easy blogging platform har aur har koi wordpress par apna blog bana kar usko bahut hi simple tarike se run kara sakta hai. Yadi apka wordpress blog abhi new hai to mere dwara bataye gaye sabhi wordpress ki setting ko aapko set karna cahiye. In sabhi wordpress ki basic setting ko set karke aap bhi apni blogging ko wordprerss par start kar sakte hai. Mai ummed karta hu ki aapne iss wordpress post ko enjoy kiya hoga. patana men sanvad prakashan, munbai se prakashit yogendr krishna ke kavy-sankalan bit chuke shahar men ka lokarpan charchit varishth kavi arun kamal ke dvara kiya gaya. samaroh ki adhyakshata samakalin janamat ke pradhan sanpadak ramaji ray ne ki. unaki pratinidhi kavitaon par samalochanatmak tippani karate hue arun kamal ne apane vaktavy men kaha ki yogendr krishna ki kavitaen sanpoorn hindi kavy-paranpara men ek naya adhyay jodati hain. unhonne kaha ki bit chuke shahar men ki kavitaon men aaj ka hinsak hota samajik paridrishy ek nae muhavare men ujagar huaa hai.

hatyare jab buddhijivi hote hain, hatyare jab masiha hote hain, bit chuke apane shahar men, poorvajon ke garbh men thahara samay, kam pad rahin barooden tatha dilli men pahali bar jaisi kavitaon ki vishesh charcha karate hue kaha ki in kavitaon ke madhyam se kavi apane samay ke bade prashnon se muthabhed karata dikhata hai. unhonne kaha ki apani kavitaon men yogendr bilakul hi nae evan maulik muhavare ke sath prastut hue hain. ye kavitaen inhen agrim pankti ke samakalin kaviyon ke bich khada karati hain.

kumar mukul, vinay kumar, sanjay kumar kundan, bhagavati prasad dvivedi, sudhir suman, javed hasan, em ke madhu, musafir baitha, arun narayan samet shahar ke anek sudhi pathak, sahityakar evan buddhijivi upasthit the.

jo brahmaputr men milati thi. sabako tairate hue dekh bhoopen ka ji chahata ki vah bhi tairen, magar tairana nahin aata tha. ek din bhoopen ne dekha ki ek chhoti ladaki nadi men naha rahi hai. kinare par khade kisi aadami ne kaha ki vah doob jaegi. bhoopen fauran nadi men kood gaye. bachchi ne unhen jakad liya. donon doobane lage. tabhi ek bihari pulisavale ne unhen pani se bahar nikala. bahar nikalane ke bad pulis vale ne bhoopen ko dhamakaya ki aainda is tarah ki harakat nahin kare. usaki dant sunane ke bad balak bhoopen ne tay kar liya ki vah tairana avashy sikhega. agale din vah ek bans ki sahayata se tairana sikhane laga. ek ghante tak koshish karane ke bad vah tairana sikh gaya. jab tairana aa gaya to bhoopen ne tay kiya ki relave ke pul par us samay khada hokar pani men chhalang lagane men bada maja aaega, jab relagadi aa rahi hogi. usane vaisa hi kiya. kamakhya steshan se relagadi guvahati ki taraf aa rahi thi. tabhi bhoopen pani men kood gaya. tairate hue kinare ke ek ped ke pas pahuncha. relagadi aage jakar ruk gayi. gard ne utar kar fatakara, marana chahata hai kya ? bhoopen bhagata huaa nani ke pas pahunch gaya aur sara hal kah sunaya.

usase balak bhoopen naraj ho gaya tha. usane tay kiya ki relagadi ko patari se girana hoga, tab us gard ko saja mil jaegi. agale din bhoopen ne rel ki patari par pattharon ko dher ke roop men rakh diya. isake bad ghar men aakar khat ke niche chhip gaya aur besabri ke sath relagadi ki pratiksha karane laga. relagadi ki aavaj sunai padi. bhoopen ke dil ki dhadakan tej ho gayi. relagadi teji se gujar gayi. patari se relagadi utari nahin. balak bhoopen ne dubara vaisi koshish nahin ki.

parvati prasad baruva jaise gitakar-sangitakar the. in sabake sampark men aane ke sath hi bhoopen ke bhitar ka kalakar pallavit-pushpit hone laga. bangali manch par ravindr sangit pratiyogita hui. tab bhoopen ko keval ek ravindr git gana aata tha, jise gakar bhoopen ne pratham puraskar prapt kiya. puraskar ke roop men sone ka padak mila. panch varsh ki umr se bhoopen haramoniyam bajana sikhane laga tha. tejapur men vishnurabha ne shastreey sangit ki buniyadi baten sikhai.

poovar duvar bheli aahe tai kiran dhali, hiya je mor chamake . bhole din men bijali ki tarah van marati hai, poorab ka daravaja kholakar vah kiranen failati hai, mere dil men roshani fail jati hai. bhoopen chhota tha aur aise giton ka bhavarth samajh pane men asamarth tha. isake bavajood manch par vah gane laga tha. bhavishy ke kalakar ko khad-pani milane laga tha. bhoopen bachapan men hi sochane laga tha ki kya git se samaj ka kuchh upakar kiya ja sakata hai ? skool men chhathi kaksha men padhate hue usane pahala git likha - kusumbar putr shreeshankar guru. 1939 men ek aur git likha - mai agnikumar firingita. fir likha - kanpi uthe kiy tajamahala.

halanki tab tak film pradarshit nahin ho payi thi. jyotiprasad ne van rangamanch ko jivant roop pradan kiya tha. adhikatar log keval unaki ek jhalak dekhane ke lie aate the. jab tak jyotiprasad se parichay nahin huaa tha tab tak bhoopen ke man men badi ichchha thi ki kisi tarah jyotiprasad ke karib pahunch jae.
jab unaka parichay guvahati se aaye kamalanarayan chaudhari se huaa. kamal bahut achchhe gayak the. unhonne bhoopen ko ek gajal gana sikha diya.

jab ek din jyotiprasad agraval, vishnu rabha aur fani sharma bhoopen ke pita se milane aaye. ye tinon vyakti tejapur ke sanskritik aakash ke jhilamilane vale sitare the. unhonne bataya ki bhoopen ko kalakatta le jana chahate hain aur usaki aavaj men rikard taiyar karana chahate hain.

isalie do lakadi ke bakse jodakar bhoopen ko us par khada kar diya gaya tha. jayamati aur shonit kunvari film ke lie nayika ki aavaj men bhoopen ne git rikard karavae. bhoopen ko yangest aartist aof hij mastars vyois aof indiya rikard sangita ka samman mila. gale men sone ka medal pahanakar bhoopen ne jo tasvir khinchavai use bangal ki rikard sangita patrika ne aavaran par prakashit kiya. isase pahale mastar madan ne kam umr men gane ka kirtiman sthapit.

sinema aadi men vyapak roochi rahi hai shayad isi ke parinam svaroop dinakar ji ke sahayog se kalej men apavada namak ek prishthiy patrika ka padarpan huaa. bhavishy men is aasha ke sath ki apavad ek apavad nahin rahega, hamane sahity ke safar men ek angreji patrika kranis intaraneshanala ko bhi prakashit kiya. yadyapi sahity ki is anokhi aur dil lubhane vale anubhav ne is kshetr men aage badhane ke lie prerit kiya kintu parivarik jimmedariyon men ulajhakar isamen ek viram chihn lag gaya.

gayan v git rachana, vah bhi itani smaraniy, sanvedanashil v karnnapriy yah bhoopenada ka apana anokha andaj hain. logon ke dil men bhoopenada ka git dil hum hum kare bas gaya. parantu main to usi din unaka bhakt ho gaya jab inaka sangitabadgh kiya huaa git aarop film men nayanon men darapan hai, darapan men koi suna. sach men bhoopenada asam ke gaurav hain, inake vyaktitv ke kuchh anachhue pahaluon ke bare men is pustak ko prakashit karate hue main gauravanvit mahasoos kar raha hoon. bhagavan unhen svasth rakhe aur ve apani dhunon se hamen sada rijhae rakhen, isi aasha ke sath.aasha hai yah aapako pasand aaegi, kripaya apane sujhavon se hamen avagat karaen. ataH is mahan hasti bhoopenada ko mera ek bar fir salama.
aaf aashirvad, prerana, sahabhagita ki apeksha karegi taki bhavishy men bhi any sahity ke nagine aaf samaksh prastut kar saken.

sangitakar, gayak, sahityakar, patrakar, film nirdeshak, patakatha lekhak, chitrakar - aur har roop advitiy hai, anootha hai. asam ki mati ki sondhi mahak ko suron men rupantarit kar unhonne desh-videsh men asam ke sangit ko pracharit kiya hai. ve asam ki janata ki char pidhiyon ke sabase chahete gayak hain. bihoo samarohon men varsha men bhingate hue rat-rat bhar log unako gate hue dekhate-sunate hain. asam ki sanskriti, brahmaputr nadi, lok parampara, samasamayik samasya - jivan ke harek pahaloo ko unhonne giton men roopantarit kiya hai.
mujhe khushi hai ki main apane mohalle ke bihoo utsav men gane ke lie aaya hoon. choonki chandamari ilake men hi unhonne sangharshapoorn jivan ke kai sal gujare hain.
vahi khanak, vahi dil ko chhoo lene vali mithas hai, keval umr ka prabhav najar aane laga hai. pahale ve bihoo utsavon men rat-rat bhar gate rah jate the, parantu ab svasthy thik nahin rahata.

yadiu akano ne bhave . isi git ko ve bangla men bhi gate hain, asamiya men bhi gate hain, hindi men bhi gate hain. fir ve kahate hain, main ek premagit sunana chahata hoon. ve gane lagate hain - shaishavate dhemalite . git ka bhav hai - bachapan men ham sath-sath khelate the. vaishakh men brahmaputr men tairate the. tumane mujhase vada kiya tha ki sath-sath jienge. tumane kaha tha ki tumhare bina ji nahin sakoongi, jan de doongi. magar mere pas dhan nahin tha. tum apana vada bhool gayi aur ek dhanavan ke sath byah kar chali gayin. ek din mainne tumhen mahangi poshakon men dekha. kya tum soch rahi thi ki tumhare bina main apani jan de doonga ? main jan nahin doonga, balki jita rahoonga, taki ek naye samaj ka nirman kar sakoon. yuvavastha men unhonne yah git likha tha, jo aaj bhi sunane valon ke hriday ko sparsh karata hai.

ghar ki ladaki hai. do gane sunaegi. fir main gaunga. damana film ka ek gana bhi sunaegi. damana men bhoopen hajarika ne apane purane lokapriy giton ko naye andaj men pesh kiya hai. gayika ne gana shuri kiya bijulir pohar mot nai, fir gaya - o ram-ram aalata lagaungi . bhoopen hajarika ne tali bajakar gayika ki prashansa ki. ab unhonne fir gana shuroo kiya - sagar sang mat katana satoorilo, tathapito huaa nai klant . yah git unhen bahut pasand hai. is git men unaka jivan darshan chhipa huaa hai - sagar sangam men kitana taira main, fir bhi main thaka nahin. nirantar joojhate rahane ka jivan darshan.

ghan gham-gham kare o aai . gulajar ne film roodali ke lie isaka anuvad kiya hai. hindi men bhi unhonne gaya - dil hoom-hoom kare .. yah git jab khatm huaa to unhonne kaha - ebsatrekt pentings ho sakati hai, ebsatrekt film ho sakati hai to ebsatrekt git kyon nahin ho sakata .. isake sath hi apana mashahoor git gane lage - vimoort mor nishati jen maunatar sootare bovapa ekhani nila chadar . meri vimoort rat mano maun ke dhage se buni hui ek nili chadar hai .

bharatavasiyon ke lie, vishvavasiyon ke lie gana chahata hoon - ve gane lage - vi aar in d sem bot bradar, vi aar in d sem bot bradar . fir isi git ko asamiya men aur bangla men bhi gakar sunaya - aami ekhanare navare yatree, aami yatree ekhanare navare ..

vaise hi jaise ki isaka git-sangitamay hona isakee anokhi khausoosiyat ke roop men sthapit ho chuka hai. aur itani sari filmon ke itane sare giton ke aadhar par ek samajik safar ka khaaaqa pesh karane kee himakat karana - itane chhote-se aalekh men - vaisa hi hai jaisa sanskrit kee vah kahavat ki aap dustar samandar men tairane to nikale hain par bataur sazosaman aapake pas bas ek adad dongi hai! lihaza main apana kam thoda aasan yah kahate hue kie leta hoon ki main sirf ishqiya ganon ke kuchh pahaluon par kuchh sthool baten hi kah paoonga. ab prem giton kee tadad bhi koee kam to nahin hai - kyonki vidhaen hamare yahan aksar nattham-guttha paee jati hain aur har qism kee film men ek prem-kahani, chahe up-plot ke roop men hi sahi, amooman hoti hi hai. nayak-nayika prem se pahale, prem ke dauran, virah kee avastha men tatha shadi v suhagarat aadi ke mauqe par bhi lazimi taur par gate-gunagunate pae jate hain. halanki hamare yahan sanvad ya dayalog bhi khaaase kavyatmak v natakeey hote rahe hain, par jaisa ki prasoon joshi ne hal hi men faramaya, kaee sthitiyon ko bayan karane ke lie gane aam taur par zayada karagar auzar hote hain.

aaj bhi badastoor qaayam hai, aur rahenge, bhale hi dilli ke chand sine-darshak ganon ke dauran hi uthakar farig hona apane vaqt ka behatar istemal samajha karen. aam log yah bhi kahate pae jate hain ki sine-sangit men vah bat nahin rah gaee hai jo pahale huaa karati thi. aaj rimiks ke chalan ke sthapit ho chukane ke bad shastreey mizaj ke rasikon ko ek aur taiyarashuda bahana mil gaya hai adhunatan ko kosane ka ki hay, dekhie kaise ye nae zamane ke nasamajh itani achchhi-achchhi dhunon ko, itane achchhe-achchhe giton ko bhrasht kie de rahe hain, jaise nae ganon ka naganapan kafi nahin tha ki puranon ko bhi buri tarah tod-marod rahe hain. paranpara kee thati bazar ke luteron ke hathon sareaam lut rahi hai aur ham mookadarshak bane hai, afasos hamen ye din bhi dekhana tha!

kinchit nirapeksh bhav se shayad soch sakate hain ki paranpara ko lekar is tarah kee mat-bhinnata utani hi shashvat hai, jitane paranpara ko nae sire se sirajakar samriddh karane men usase hue prasthan. ham sab apane zamane kee chizon se sahaj moh men jite hain, aur nae ko shak kee nigah se dekhate hain. yah sab vaisa hi hai jaisa ki apane skool-kolej ke dinon ya javani ke dinon ko yad karate hue yah kahana ki ab kolej men vah bat nahin rah gaee hai, hamare zamane men yah hota tha, vah hota tha! ajib bat nahin hai, par pareshani tab shuroo hoti hai jab yadon kee rahaguzar se chuninda, behatarin qisse uthate hue vartaman tak aate-aate ham chahe-anachahe patan ka ek afasana, ek achchha-khaaasa vrittant gadh lete hain ki hamare daur ke bad to jo bhi guzara, gaya-guzara hi thahara! ham rachanatmak dharatal par musalasal chhijate hi gae hain. yah pariprekshy filmi itihas-lekhan par, chahe vah patrakari ho ya sanjida, khaaas taur par hal tak havi raha hai. misal ke taur par main filmi duniya ke patrakar-sansmarannakar ramakrishn kee ati-pathaniy kitab se vah ansh uthana chahoonga jab ve sahir ludhiyanavi se ek lanbi-si batachit kar rahe hote hain. gaaur se dekhen to yah muthabhed film kee riyazat karane vale aur film par nuqtachini karane, use puraskrit ya nindit karanevale do alag drishtikonon ke bich kee hai. ramakrishn bar-bar star sistam, vigyapan, blaik mani, asahityik, ashastreey antarvastu aadi kee bat karate hue ghuma-firakar patanonmukh filmi rachanatmata kee bat sahir se manavana chahate hain, lekin sahir hain ki ade hue hain, aur ve hindi filmon ko n duniya kee kisi aur bhasha kee filmon se kamatar manane ko taiyar hain, n hi ve ise ashlil ya foohad manate hain. vaise hamare maujooda muqaam se palatakar dekha jae to ye saval bhi kitane satat aur shashvat rahe hain sochakar hairat hoti hai. lagabhag yahi saval aaj bhi hindi ka koee bhi patrakar filmakaron se karata nazar aata hai, giravat aur milavat kee yahi bhasha koee bhi tippanikar chalate-firate sinema par jad deta hai. dohare maze kee bat yah hai ki ye prashn sinema ke svarnnakal men, use svarnnakalik banane vale se hi kie ja rahe the. chalo suhana bharam to toota ki itihas ke baqisvarnnakalon kee tarah yah suvarnnamay daur bhi thik vaisa hi nahin tha jaisa ki manane ka aam taur par mithakeey rivaj raha hai!

unake sangit se katakar dekhana akshamy hai, par is lekh men main ek aise path kee jurrat karana chahata hoon, jahan shabd hi aham hain, shesh chize gaun. to meri shanka ka pahala karan ye hai ki mujhe us daur ke gane, khaaas taur par prem-git nihayat rondoo jan padte hain. sharad datt ne sahagal kee jivani likhate hue yah dalil di hai ki behatarin git aam taur par karun hue hai. ve viyogi hoga pahala kavi taip ke shlok bhi uddhrit karate hain is siddhant ke samarthan men. khaud is daur ka ek gana to isaka ghoshanapatr jaisa hai hi
tadpati, virahakul ya virahatur kahana mushkil hai par is lanbi vyatha ka ton kundanalal sahagal-shmashad begam-noorajahan ke yug men hi tay ho gaya tha.

vaise talat mahamood aur rafi bhi us yug kee dardili dhara se achhoote nahin rah sakate the. aaie kuchh chuninda hit ganon kee ek pared dekhen, unaka hit hona isalie manikhaez hai ki n sirf in giton ke rachayita balki unake darshak-shrota bhi is samoohik marsiyakhavani men shamil hain.

tanhaiyon ka atoot silasila hai, aansuon ka sailab hai, duniya choonki zalim hai dard samajhana to door ghayal man ka makhaaul udane men zayada dilachaspi leti hai, lihaza bar-bar marane-mitane, duniya chhod jane kee khavahish dikhati hai. ek amar deth-vish! shayad bemani nahin hoga yah kahana ki aazadivibhajan ke bad ka ek-dedh dashak apane ishqiya lahaze men sahity ke mahadevi yug-jaisa tha. ye bhi spasht hai ki roomaniyat ka yah soofi-bhakti tevar zamane kee zayadatiyon kee aalochana gam kee siyahi men doob kar karata hai. samajik vishamataon ke khailaf khule vidroh ke kaee misalen hain par usakee roomani tarjumani men aatmavishvas ka abhav hai. tadabir se taqdir badalane ka, danv lagane ka zikr bhi aata hai, par aavahan ke roop men hi. kuchh apavad hain, par unhen apavad hi mana jana chahie, jaise ki shailendr ka likha aaha ka yah git jisamen virah-vyatha aatmahanta disha men n jakar badi nazuk kavyatmak sthitiyan aur binb rachati hai.

amooman usi anupat men jisamen vah prashansa kee pushp-vrishti kiya karata tha. kahane kee zaroorat nahin ki virah aur vifal pyar ke git abhi-bhi hain par unakee sankhya kafi kam ho gaee hai. sattar ke dashak men jahan mumataz jaisi nayikaen bhi bhang khakar ya bina khae bold ho rahi hainjay-jay shiv shankar, kanta lage n kankararotibindiya chamakegi, choodi khanakegido raste aur khalanayika helen logon ke man men apane mohak ke nrity ke bal par - aaj jise aaitam nanbar kahate hain - piya too ab to aaja, shola sa man dahake aake bujha ja ka mukt nimantran deti hain, to manoj kumar poorab aur pashchim ke sabhyata-vimarsh ke yuddh men shuddh-shashvat bharatiy aadhyatmik prem ke nae manadand rachate hain chal sannyasi mandir men ka javab pap hai tere andar men hi hona tha. dev aanand bhi hippi uchchhrinkhalata ko apane naitik vimarsh se dapatate hain. par jooli, bobi namni aavara isaee ladkiyan hindoo nayakon ka shilabhang karati hi rahin. bich-bich men hira-ranjha, laila-majanoon logon ko purani shaili ke shahidana pyar vale nostailjiya ka sukhad ahasas karane ke sath-sath darate bhi hain. labboluvab yah ki log lav-storiyan banate rahe, sabhyata se bhagakar grihasthiyan basate rahe.

aur unake bich ek saf shram-vibhajan bhi hai, bazar kaun jaega, rasoee kise dikhati hai, aur kaun shaharati hai, jo us biyaban men pani aur bijali khoj rahi hai, aap vakyon ka ling-nirnnay karake samajh gae honge.

khaaamoshi1969 ke lie. par hal ke dinon men aksa ke git bhi unhonne hi likhe, aur banti aur babali tatha satya ke bhi - jinamen kiradaron ke mutabiq sadk-chhap kavita ko bade saliqe se ek vyangyatmak doori banate hue chipakaya gaya hai. par onkara men to khaaas taur ve aise git sirajate hain jo bipasha basu ke kiradar ke sath nyay karate, aayatam hote hue bhi, ishq ke abhinav mizaj kee paribhashaen gadhate hain. namak ishq da aur bidi jalaile donon hi ek sath kinchit karun aur daihik hain. ek mujara karanevali ka bindas vivek abhivyakti pata hai trasad trikon ke bhram ko hava dete padosiyon ke lihaf, unake choolhe se udhar li gaee aag ke binb men.

vah ab 17 aur 21 chunbanon kee aandhi ban gaee hai. kabhi kisi achchhe se lekh men krishn kumar ne kisi filmi gane men nayika dupatte ke udne men stree-mukti ka aagaaaz dekha tha. kabhi aaradhana men bhi kishor kumar ne rajesh khanna ke lie gaya tha.

apani jinsi abhivyakti ko lekar bebak. par ehatiyatan nashe kee sanskritik ot bhi le li gaee hai, zamana to jaise manahi ke andaz men dastak deta hi khada hai, aur jo huaa chahata hai nayak-nayika ke bich, vah to bhool hai hi! ab zara yah ailan sunie.

Hello Friends, Kaise hain aap sab? ummid hai acche hi honge. Jaisa ki aap sab ko pata hi hai ki aaj kal har chiz, internet par mil jati hai. Aap jo kuch chahein internet se sikh sakte hain. Kuch bhi janna ho google par search kariye aur dhero websites ke link khul kar aa jate hain, jahan se aap, apni Sabalo ke Jabab pa sakte hain. abhi jese jese Internet ka istmal badte ja raha hai Web design or Developer ki jarurat bhi badti ja rahi hai. Agar hamara Khud ka Blog ya Website hai to hame Web Design bana to jaruri ho jata hai. Aap Web design sikhne ke liye kisi institute me admision le sakte hai par agar aap khud se sikhna chate hai to aap badi aasani se jab marji chahe sikh sakte Free me youtube par video dekh dekhe kar. Youtube par Ham Free me sikh sakte hai jiska hame ek rupaa nahi dena, Jo Video banate hai sikhane ke liye unki income video par ads aane se hoti hai to hame hame kuch dene ki jarurat nahi padti. Agar aapke pass koi Talent ya Knowlage hai to aap bhi usko sikha kar paise kama sakte hai Youtube par agar aap kuch search karege to aapko hazaro Video mil jayegi jinko dekh kar aap kuch bhi sikh sakte hai. bhut sare Web Designing ke Tutorial Videos and Channels mil jayenge. Yaha me aapko Kuch Top or Best Youtube Channel ke ware me batane wala hu jinki videos ko aap dekh kar Web Designing Developing sikh sakte hai. Jarur Jarur Padhe Web Designing Developing me Career Kaise Banaye Puri Jankari 1st web designer channel youtube pe 2008 me launch hua tha, aur ab iske 2 million se bhi jyada Subscribers hain. Is channel par har week ek naya Video post hota hai, jismein Web Designing ki creative cheezein samjhayi jati hain. Is channel par regular question and answer sessions bhi hote hain, jismein viewers apne sawal puch sakte hain. Niche diye gaye link se aap is channel ke videos ko dekh sakte hain. 1st Web Designer Ye Bhi Padhe Iss channel ke owner Adam, Web Designing ke practical aspects pe jyada focus karte hain, iss channel ko vo akele operate karte hain, lekin unke sare videos clear, informative, samjhne me asaan hote hain. Adam ke paas HTML, SQL, PHP, CSS aur Javascript ki bhut acchi knowledge hai jise vo apne videos me bhi share karte hain. Iss channel me playlist skills ke hisab se organized hain. Adam Khoury Also Read Jaisa ki is channel ke naam se hi pata chalta hai ki yahan Web Design ki Tutorials ki bharmaar hai. Yahan par aapko Web Designing ke har Topic ke videos easily mil jayenge. Agar aapko Web Designing shuruat se sikhni hai to, iss channel ki Web Development Tutorials for Beginners naam ki playlist se aap start kar sakte hain. Iss channel me aapko Web Hosting aur Uploading files to webhost ke bhi tutorials bhi mil jayenge. LearnCode.Academy Also Read this Iss channel par aapko Responsive Websites Designs, and WordPress themes se related videos mil jayenge. Videos simple and easy to understand hai. Agar aapne Basic Web Designing sikh li hai aur aap aur jyada Web Designing ko samjhna chahte hain to ye channel aapke ke liye bilkul perfeect hai. yaha se aap kuch abstract topics ke bare me sikh sakte hain. LearnWebCode Ye Bhi Padh Ye channel thoda unique hai kyuki yahan pe viewers ki request par, videos upload kiye jate hain. Iska matlab ye hai ki agar aapko Web Designing ke kisi topic pe bhut jyada problem ho rahi hai, to aap Derek ko contact karke unse help karne ke liye keh sakte hain. Iss channel pe Web Designing ke bhut sare topics ke videos aapko mil jayenge, jinhe aap dekh kar asaani se web designing sikh sakte hain. Is channel par aap Android Applications ko develop karna bhi sakte hain. Agar aapko Web Designing bhut pasand hai to, ye channel aapke ke liye bhut faidemand ho sakta hai. Derek Banas Ye Bhi Padhe Maine aapko youtube ke kuch best channels ke bare me upar bataya hai, agar aapke paas bhi koi acche youtube channels ki information hai to niche comment karein. Aur aapko yah post kaise laga jarur bataye.

Hello, Blogger Agar aapne Blogger par blog banaya hai to aapko pata hona chaiye blogger post editor me kya kya option hai or kaise Blogger Post Editor ko use karte hai. taki uska use karke achi se post blog par dal paye. Video Dekhne ke liye click kare 1 Post Title Isme ham jo Post likhte hai, uska Title daalna hai. Udharan ke liye aap News Paper ko le sakte hai uski ek heading hoti hai or fis uske bare me likha hota hai. ham Heading pad kar samaj jate hai ki post me kya hai. ussi trha hame apni post ki heading deni hai Post Title me. 160 sabd se jada nahi hona chaiye. 2 Post Body Isme hamari jo bhi post hai usko daalna hai, sahi thara se. jisse logo ko padge me aasani ho. 3 ComposeHTML Ham jo Post likhte hai wo Compose view mw likhte hai, HTML par click kare par Jo HTML code hai wo dikhta hai. agar aap koi HTML code ho add karna chate hai to HTML me ja kar add kar sakte hai. 4 UndoRedo In Button ki madad se ham Post editor mo jo bhi laste me kiye usko ek step piche or ek step aage ja sakte hai. Undo ke liye ShortCut CtrlZ 5 Font Is Option me hame kuch or Fonts ke option diye hai, jinki madad se ham chahe to hamari post ke font badal sakte hai. 6 Font Size Isme ham apne font ka Size bada ya chota kar sakte hai. 7 Format Is option ki madad se ham Apne Post ko sahi trha se fomate me likh sakte hai, Heading, Subheading se kar. jisse logo ko padne me bhi aasani ho or Google me bhi hame faida milta hai inko sahi se set karne me. 8 Blod B Is B ki madad se ham sabd ko bold mota kar sakte hai. Example ke liye jese Hindi Me Help. Iska Shortcut bhi hai CtrlB 9 Italic I Is option ki madad se ham sabdo ko teda kar sakte hai. jese ye Hindi Me Help. Iska ShortCut hai CtrlI 10 Underline U Is ki madad se ham sabd ke niche line khich sakte hai. Jese ye Hindi Me Help. Shortcut hai CtrlU 11 Strikethrough ABC Agar aap sabdo ko katna chate hai, bich me line khich kar to iski madad se kar sakte hai. 12 Text Color Is option ki madad se ham sabdo ka color badal sakte hai. 13 Text Background Colour Isme ham sabdo ke piche ka background color badal sakte hai. 14 Add or Remove Link ham jo bhi link add karna chahe post me iski madad se kar sakte hai. 15 Insert Image Hame jo bhi Image ko add karna ho apni post me isi madad se kar sakte hai. Image ko computer se upload bhi kar sakte hai or Online image link se bhi add kar sakte hai. Sai tarike se Image kaise Upload kare Blogger me SEO ke sath uski jankari yaha jarur read kare. 16 Insert a Video Video ko add karne ke liye ya option hai. ispar click karke Video upload bhi kar sakte hai. Par me aapko Suggest karuga ki aap Youtube par apna video upload kare or fir usko add kare. 17 Insert Jump Break Iska use hamari post ko do hisso me batne ke liye hota hai. Fir agar maan lo kisi ne hamare blog ko subscribe kiya to uske pass hamari adhi post jayegi, jaha par hamne Jump Break kiya hai. Agar Simple template use karte hai to aapne dekha hoga puri Post home page par dikhti hai. Isko select karne ke baad nahi dikhti. Par Iska or acha option me phele hi share kar chuka hu jisme hame bar bar add karne ki jarurat nahi padegi. 18 Alignment Is option ki madad se ham jo text hai hamari post ka usko ham arrange kar sakte hai. 19 Numbered List Agar aapko koi list add karni hai to aap iski madad se numbering kar sakte hai. 20 Bullet List ye option bhi Numbered list ki trha hai, isme Dots aate hai number ki jagha. 21 Quote Iski madad se aap kuch special hai usko dikha sakte hai. Example I am not a HANDSOME guy. But I can give my HAND to SOME one who needs me. Beauty is in HEART, Not in FACE. Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam 22 Remove Formatting Is Option ki madad se aap apni post ke text ke sare format remove kar sakte hai. Jese aapne agar koi bhi formatting ho Blod, Itelic, underline, Kuch bhi. jiska Remove karna ho, us text ko select kare fir button par click kare. 23 Check Spelling Is option ki madad se Post me jo spelling galat hai wo highlight ho jate hai.

vahi krish n chandar jinakee ek gadhe kee aatmakatha gadhe kee vapasi ek gadha nefa men jaisi rachanaen hain . pahachan gae aap, shukr hai, main to dar hi gaya tha ki bat aage kaise badhegi . janab, bat aisi hai ki aage jo kissa hai usaka nayak to vahi purana jana pahachana gadha hai . aap kahenge isamen nae aur purane kee bat kahan se aa gaee . ab gadhe to gadhe hi hote hain, yahi unakee vishisht pahachan hai . yahi to, yahan bat hai aur gahari bat hai. purana aur vahi gadha isalie ki isamen kishnachandaranuma farmoole ke antargat kuchh vishisht kism kee budghimatta dali gaee thi anyatha gadhe to sadiyon se ek hi daee se nirmit kie ja rahe hain, nirih kism ke, gadhepan kee chamak lie, kharanuma budghimatta se otaprot . halanki ye bat alag hai ki gadhon ko yah galatafahami hai ki ve imoshanal fool hain - dhobi ke pyar men, ghas ke ikarar men, bojha dhone ke intajar men . aap kahenge ye kis taip ka imoshan hai, ab hai to hai, isalie to ye . ab rahane bhi dijie bar-bar kyon ek hi bat doharaee jae . so, apane nayak ke vyaktitv ka jyada bakhan n karate hue bat ka sira fir se pakada jae .

pyar ya desh ko lekar vichalit nahin hai, balki ve kuchh naya soch rahe hain . badalate vakt ke sath ve bhi kafi fyoochar planing men vishvas rakhane lage hain . unaka vichar hai ki ve apani aane vali santatiyon ke lie aakhir virasat men kya chhodakar ja rahe hain ? us par unakee poori jati kee nigahen jaroor hi tikee hogi . halanki unake pas kafi kuchh hai fir bhi ve nem-fem-gen kee kuchh ekstra vyavastha baithana chahate hain . apani pidhiyon ke lie bhari-kuchh chhodakar jana chahate hain . kya ?.sheyar, nahin janab ye insananuma baten gadhon kee khopadi men nahin samati hain . nivesh-gyan durbhagy se unake pichhale poore anubhav men aasapas se thikathak tarike se bhi nahin gujara hai, anyatha ve ekadh traee to jaroor hi mar lete . khair, arthajagat to is krity men hissa na lie jane par sadiyon tak unaka ahasan utar hi nahin paega. bhari vichar manthan ke uparant ek din unake unnat lalat aur virat khopade men kriket men kairiyar banane ka aaidiya aa gaya . tatkshan unhen apane charon or gardabh jati, apani santati, jayakar kee dhvaniyan sunaee dene lag .

fir khud bhavishy ke rol modal ke roop men apani sthiti ka chintan kar sanyamit mudra dharan kar li. ab ve un upadanon par vichar karane lage jo bhavishy men ek kriketar ke roop men unamen hona chahie the. apani hrisht-pusht kad-kathi par nigah dalate hi unhen is bat ka to poorn santosh ho gaya ki bakiyon kee tulana men filahal sharirik majabooti men to ve uchchastar ko prapt hain . shoroomon ke pas se gujarate samay aksar ve kamentri men manasik majabootinuma baten apane karnnapatal par risiv karate rahe hain . so, ve svatah muskurae fir pichhali panktiyon vali rol modal kee bat yad aate hi danton par oshth ke parde fit karate hue aage vali dulatti se khopade ko thokakar dekha . tann se manasik majabooti ka eekoaane par unhonne is babat bhi itminan ho gaya.

najar dalo. e najaravalo. pratibha ke bajar men taiyar mal pada hai, utha lo. bhijava do kisi bhi desh ke toor par. ve fir apani hi soch par kunthit hue, unhen kaun-kaise utha sakata hai. chintit bhi hue ki vijeta trafi lane par unhen kandhe par kaise uthaya jaega. fir yad aaya ki janata apane kandhon par to un jaise kaee ko barason se . so, ve bhi utha hi lie jaenge. ab ve ruk nahin pa rahe the. sidhe bord ke daftar kee or nikal pade. sochate bhi ja rahe the ki kuchh paise hi rakh liye hote to aoto hi kar leta khair, mahan khiladi-vinamr bhav. paidal hi daftar tak ja pahunche. vahan dekha bhari bhid-bhad sitaron-staron ka joradar jamavada. pichhale anubhav ke aadhar par kaee ko to ve tatkal hi pahachan gae. aavaj dene ko hi the ki yad aaya ki abhi ve sitare nahin hue hain, rukana hi uchit hai.
ummid ka aansoo gira. gardabharaj apani sari masoom beeeman pratibha ke sath vapas mud gae. budghimani kee aisi oonchaee dekhakar unhen apani vyaktipradatt chetana par rulaee aane lagi.

to kya aap prasann nahee honge ? avashy honge aur kyo nahee honge? aakhir, satta-shakti ka svaad jo chakhane ko milega, parantu jara Thaharie, thoDee gambheerata se vichaar keejie. ho sakata hai maamala pooree tarah se prasannata ka na ho. aie jara gambheerata se gaur faramae.

parantu mantree pad aapako aise hee nahee milane vaala. isake lie aapako chunaav laDana hoga. ab agar aapaka bhaagy vaastav me prabal hoga, to aap eemaanadaaree se chunaav jeet sakate hai. varana aaj ke maahaul me to jab tak aap beeemaanee se jaati-dharm ke gaNit nahee lagaenge, chunaav kisee soorat jeet nahee sakate. maan leejie, yah bhee ho gaya. parantu khaalee chunaav jeetane se bhee kuchh haasil nahee hone vaala. aap bane rahenge do Take ke emele aur emapee. asalee, raubadaar mantree pad paane ke lie aapako tamaam joDatoD karana hogee. goTiyaa biThaana hongee. raajayog ka yahaa kya kaam? chalie, maan leejie ki yahaa bhee bhaagy ne saath de diya, magar fir aisa ho sakata hai ki aap mahatvaheen ya bina vibhaag ke hee mantree ban jae aur log-baag aapaka majaak uDaane lage. jaahir hai, mahatvapoorN aur bhaaree bharakam bajaT vaale malaeedaar vibhaag ko paane ke lie aapako kheenchaataanee karanee hogee, laabing karanee hogee, preshar TaikTiks apanaanee hogee. muft me kuchh bhee haasil hone vaala nahee hai. isake lie alag se mehanat mashakkat karanee hogee. alag se, naayaab, kelakuleTeD paanse chalane honge.

maan liya ki aap mantree ban hee ge. dhanyavaad raajayog. parantu aapakee aage kee raah bhee koee aasaan nahee hogee. ho sakata hai ki aapaka ya apake sambandhiyo ka ateet ranga-puta ho. tab aapake virodhee ya bahut sambhav hai aapake neta-sangee-saathee jo mantree pad se maharoom hai khod-khod kar aapake ateet ko ughaaDenge aur is tarah aapake mantree pad par hamesha talavaar laTakatee rahegee. ab yah maan le ki kaanch kee tarah aapaka ateet svachchh hai aur vartamaan paaradarshee hai jo ki bhaarateey raajaneeti me - soory ke ulaTee disha me ugane ke samaan hee saty hai, to bhee bhavishy ke baare me kya kaha ja sakata hai. aapake virodhee jo maatr aapake satta me aane kee vajah se paida hue honge ya doosare satta kaamee aapako yoo hee chain se nahee rahane denge. ve aapakee har baat ko, har kaary ko desh aur janata ke viruddh batala kar aapake viruddh zooThe kaanD-kisse frem karenge aur usame aapako Taangane kee harachand koshish karenge. yah bhee ho sakata hai ki aap apane virodhiyo ko samaapt karane kee aisee hee kisee koshish me khud hee fans jae.

satta milate hee aapakee parsanal laif ka beDa gark ho jaega. aap chaaTukaaro se ghir jaenge. aapake chaaro aur suraksha ka arthaheen ghera khaDa kar diya jaega aur aapako aapake parichito se bhee milane nahee diya jaega.

yah bhee shaasvat saty hai ki jisane bhee satta ka svaad chakha, chaahe vah bhagavaan hee kyo na ho, sarvada sukhee kabhee nahee raha. vah bhee satta praapti ke lie ya satta shakti ke kaaraN ya satta par aasann khataro ke kaaraN dukho se ghira raha.

satta shakti kee yaade aapako jeene nahee dengee aur aapake virodhee aapako fir kabhee na uThane laayak banaane me aapaka pulinda baandhane me kuchh bhee kasar nahee rakhenge. tab, yah sab aur bhee asahaneey ho jaega.
jyeshTh ke maheene me, jab rohiNee nakshatr me soory apanee pooree tapan vaataavaraN me preshit kar raha tha, ek yaachak nange paanv dvaar-dvaar jaakar bhiksha maang raha tha.

karshakaay kaaya asar kar gee aur use kuchh-kuchh kahee se mil bhee gaya. ek ko usaka dopahar kee tapatee dhoop me nange paanv yaachanaarat rahana jara jyaada hee dravit kar gaya aur usane apana faTa puraana joota jo kachare ke Dabbe me Daalane ke lie alag rakh diya tha, nikaala aur yaachak ko de diya, taaki usake paanv ko tapatee dharatee se thoDee raahat to mile.
parantu do dvaaro ke aage jaane ke uparaant usane un jooto ko apane pair se utaara aur apane thaile me rakh liya.

apane satkarm se gadagad us yaachak ko thoDa sa aage jaakar bhee dekh raha tha ki usaka puraana joota bhee kis prakaar ek achchhe prayojan ke lie kaam aa raha hai. parantu jab usane yaachak ko joota utaar kar apane thaile me rakhate dekha to vah pashchaataap se budabudaaya saala ab use kabaaDee me jaakar bech dega.
aur soch raha tha ki agar vah joote pahan kar yaachana karega to fir logo ke man me daya aur karooNa kaise upajegee?

jo likh raha hoon vah kyon likh raha hoon ? kisake lie likh raha hoon ? yah bhi, ki kya likh raha hoon. mere mitr meri is man sthiti par darshanik mudra men muskate hain, fir yakayak ganbhir ho jate hain, aur samajhate hain bachcha ye to buniyadi saval hain, in savalon par to log bahut bahasen kar chuke hain. tumhen apana darshanik star thoda badhana chahie. masalan aajakal uttar aadhunikata par jo bahas ho rahi hai, usamen tumhara kya rol ho, abhi tak tumane uttar aadhunikata par kya likha hai, kuchh nahin n daraasal tum samay se kafi pichhe chal rahe ho. main hin bhavana lie vapas lautata hoon. mera isilie lekhakon kee biradari men koee sammanajanak sthan nahin ban paya hai. koee bhi lekhak mujhe jhidak sakata hai - aakhir mainne likha kya hai ? n to usamen bhasha ke sath khelane ka kaushal hai, n usamen chamatkrit karati sthitiyan hi hain, n patanonmukhi pashchimi lekhakon kee rachanaon ke parishkrit ansh hi usamen hain, n abhadrata, ashlilata aur nagnata usamen hai tab kya hai mere lekhan men ? ab bhaiya ye kyon nahin samajhate ki aadarshavadi aur yatharthavadi lekhan ka bhi ant ho chuka hai. ab jaduee yatharth ka yug hai marks aur lenin aprasangik ho gae hain. ab to ginsabarg kee bat karo, jok derida kee bat karo, striyon kee saundary pratiyogita kee bat karo, amerika ke nachaniya maikel jeksan kee bat karo, bil gets kee bat karo, yani jo bhi aadami ko jins aur aakankshaon ko havas bana sake, us vastu kee bat karo, yahi uttar aadhunikata hai.

bole haikort men pablik intarest litigeshan ke pachas hajar rupaye lagenge. aajakal in netaon ne to desh ko barabad kar rakha hai, sab bhrasht hain bhrashtachar ke khilaf to bas jyoodisiyari hi ekamatr sahara hai. aap pachas hajar rupaye mere asistaint ke pas jama kara dijie aur use poora kes vistar se samajha dijie nishchit hi yah kes ham hi jitenge. aajakal jyoodisiyari janata ke fevar men disijan de rahi hai .

yani uttar aadhunikata ka matalab jyoodisiyari hi samajhaegi. khair mujhe is bade vakeel par n krodh aaya, n daya hi aaee ab mainne socha chalo kisi daktar ya injiniyar se poochhate hain ki uttar aadhunikata kya hai. ek nami daktar ke yahan bhid lagi huee thi at mainne marijon ka samay nasht karana uchit nahin samajha aur klinik se bahar nikal kar sidhe sinchaee vibhag ke adhishasi abhiyanta ke daftar men ghus gaya. pata chala sahab daure par hain, es di o bhi sath gae hain , koee injiniyar hai ? mainne janana chaha tabhi ek lamba sa naujavan mere pas aakar thahara aur poochha kya kam hai ? mainne kaha ek janakari prapt karani hai. vah bola -bataie yah sunishchit ho jane par ki vah injiniyar hai, mainne kaha - main uttar aadhunikata ke bare men aapake vichar janana chahata hoon. vah thoda achakachaya, bola aap kya janana chahate hain. main nahin samajh paya aap kaun hain aur kahan se aae hain ? mainne kaha -ji main ek lekhak hoon aur isi shahar men rahata hoon. aajakal uttar aadhunikata kee badi charcha hai buddhijiviyon ke bich men aur injiniyar intailijainsiya men aate hain at aapake vichar janana chahata tha. vah thoda chakit huaa bola - yoon to main kam se ja raha tha par aapaka kes intaresting hai, aaie baithate hain. usane ghanti bajaee, chaparasi se pani aur fir chay lane ko kaha aur ulte usane mujhase janana chaha ki ye fenomina uttar aadhunikata aakhir kya hai ? mainne kaha - jaise modarnijm matalab aadhunikata purane roodhivadi mahaul men ek khulapan aur sampannata, adhik suvidhaen laya vaise hi ab post modarnijm aa gaya hai, matalab khulepan kee intiha, sampannata kee intiha, aur suvidhaon kee intiha ho gaee hai. aadhunikata ke bad ab uttar aadhunikata ka jamana hai. aap bataen is bare men aap kya sochate hain. vah fir bola its veri intaresting, mainne to is bare men kabhi socha hi nahin aur sahi mayane men to maine kabhi modarnijm ke bare men bhi nahin socha. han kabhi lagata tha ki log padh likh kar modarn ho gae hain. par dekhie hamare desh kee halat to bahut kharab hai. ganvon men to logon ko pine ko saf pani tak nahin hai, sadaken nahin hain, sinchaee kee suvidhaen nahin hain, achchhe skool nahin hain, aspatal nahin hain. sach to ye hai ki in chijon kee kisi ko paravah bhi nahin hai, n sarakar ko, n prashasan ko aur aapake ye buddhijivi, ye lekhak bas baten karate hain, han kuchh achchhi baten bhi karate hain par usase kya hoga ? main to taims aof indiya padhata hoon, usamen kuchh aartikal achchhe aate hain. aapase milakar bahut achchha laga main kisi lekhak se pahali bar mila hoon kabhi fir aaie, kahakar vah uth khada huaa, main bhi uthakar bahar aa gaya.

vyagr tha ki itane men meri najar mere padosi arthashastr ke profesar rasabihari varma par padi. mainne unhen namaskar kiya aur unake sammukh apani jigyasa rakhi. ve thode achakachae par fir sambhalate hue unhonne kaha -dekhie aaj ikonami kee halat kya hai ? hamen gro karane ke lie kepital chahie taki indastriyal devhalapament ho sake sari yojanaen kepital intensiv yojanaen hain, investament karana padega, par paisa nahin hai. ab globalaijeshan se maltineshanalhamare yahan aakrisht hue hain, hamari polisij libaral huee hain isase fark padana chahie tha, par nahin pada sach poochhie to hamari sabase badi kamajori hai ki sab bhrasht hain, beeeman hain. ab dekhie desh men paisa aata hai, neta kamishan kha jate hain, bade-bade afasar lakhon rupaye dakar jate hain to ikonami stebal kaise ho ? blek aur vhait men, blek ka reshyo badh gaya hai amir jyada amir aur garib jyada garib ho gaya hai. lekin fir bhi tarakkee to huee hi hai vaise agar hamare charitr men thodi si eemanadari aa jae to bat hi kuchh or ho han, vo kya kaha hai aapane uttar aadhunikata, han to yahi hai bas, yahi hai madarnijm, postamadarnijm jo kuchh hai.

uttar aadhunikata kya hai ? bas lekhak hi is atyadhunik gyan ke gyata hain at ab kisi lekhak se hi is vishay par bat karani chahie. mainne riksha pakada aur ek kasbaee lekhak mitr ke ghar kee or chal diya. man nahin mana aur mainne rikshevale se bhi poochh hi liya ki bhaee uttar aadhunikata ke bare men janate ho ?
log pahale paidal chalate the fir ghodagadi, bailagadi, riksha aur fir motaragadi aa gaee, to ye huee aadhunikata isake bad kya hoga ?
kisi din bis kisi din chalis, pachas tak mil jate hain. itane men lekhak mitr ka ghar aa gaya, maine riksha rokakar paise die.
babooji aapane bataya nahin havaee jahaj ke bad kya aaega ? mere mool prashn ko yad karate hue budabudaya uttarichchha.

uttaraichchha yani jahan chaho ichchha se udakar chale jao, jahan chaho utar jao koee ghoda nahin, koee gadi nahin, jahaj bhi nahin rikshe vala muskaraya aur rikshe ka haindal pakadakar aage badh liya.

badi bat thi, varana aise avasar birale hi hote the jab ve ghar par milate hon. unhonne bahut garmajoshi aur apanepan se svagat kiya, aakhir kasbaee the ji bhar ke baten karane ke lie arddhapadmasan kee mudra men ek chh inch oonche takht par virajaman ho gae mainne unhen apani pareshani bataee, ve bahut vinamr hokar bole, bandhu aap hi adhik samajhadar hain, main to kasbe se aaya hoon, vahan to aadhunikata hi badi gajab dhane vali huee jise dekho vahi chakkoo, chhuri, tamancha latakae ghoome hai. ek or rajaniti ke akhade hain to doosari or sharirik shakti ke bade shaharon aur ti vi kee chamak-damak se prabhavit naee pidhi. sab kuchh alp samay men pa lene ko aatur thahari dharm-karm ka jvar aata jata rahata hai. kuchh log apani asahayata aur suvidhahinata par dravit hote rahate hain. seth sahookar thasak se rahate hain naukaripesha badhate bhrashtachar aur makkari se sadaiv trast rahate hain. majadoor varg badhati mahangaee se majadoori kee tulana karata rahata hai. is sabake bavajood apanapan hai vahan, par aage badhane ka koee skop nahin hai, isalie log bade shaharon kee or bhagate rahate hain. vahan to aadhunikata hi lanpatapan kee shreni kee aaee hai, ab uttar aadhunikata kya hogi ? badi daravani tasvir banati hai jehan men mujhe laga yahan bat nahin banegi, aage badhana chahie so mainne aagya chahi .
abhi aae, abhi chal die, yahi to shahar valon ka gun hai thik se baithe bhi nahin, sahity aur duniya jahan kee charcha bhi nahin huee, itani jaldi kya hai bandhu ?
fir baithenge, daraasal aaj mujhe uttar aadhunikata par ek raitaap dena hai main chala aaya, ve avak dekhate rahe.

gahe bagahe charcha bhi karate hain, inhin men se kisi ko pakadana chahie mainne ek midiya eksapart se bhent kee. ye bhootapoorv sahityakar aur abhootapoorv marksavadi huaa karate the. unhonne mujhe bataya, aadhunikata ke kansept men yatharthavad urf marksavad ka bahut bada yogadan tha. ab soviyat roos aur madhy yorop men marksavad ke asafal rahane se jaroorat mahasoos hooee ki isake bad kya vicharadhara samichin hai. ab ek atyadhunik aur aashcharyajanak roop se sahi arthon men uttar aadhunik vichar kee jaroorat hai jo uttar marksiy vicharon ko rekhankit kar sake. aaj ka yatharth koee sapat yatharth nahin, jaduee yatharth hai. kahin koee chij yatharth hai. kahin koee aur chij. ab duniya simat gaee hai. hamen kshetreey soch se aage badhakar bhoomandaliy soch kee aavashyakata hai. vicharon kee duniya men naee kranti kee jaroorat hai. naee se naee chij, naya se naya utpadan, naya se naya manushy aur naya se naya vichar aur vyavahar, yahi uttar aadhunikata hai. nishchit hi ab mere gyan chakshu khul gae the.

fir thathakar hanse, pun ganbhir mudra banakar unhonne kahana shuroo kiya, daraasal itana saral nahin hai is vishay ko samajhana. hamen itihas, vartaman aur bhavishy, trikal ka dhyan rakhana hoga. atit men pauranik sandarbhon men dekhen to bramha, vishnu, mahesh ka jo charitr roopak hai usamen vishnu parampara se bandhe dikhaee dete hain, bramha sarjak hain, parampara todate hain yadakada at aadhunik mane ja sakate hain. shiv hamesha parampara aur yug donon se aage chalate hain isalie uttar aadhunik mane ja sakate hain. vartaman men ham dekhate hain ki vishv vikasashil, vikasit aur avikasit tin shreniyon men vibhajit hai. avikasit log atitajivi hote hain vikasashil aadhunik poorn vikasit tatha vikas ko poornnat atikramit karane vale, donon uttar aadhunik hain. ab ham bhavishy kee bat karen, bhavishy men ham kahan honge aur kahan hona chahenge ? ham agar nirantar yatharth kee bat karate rahenge aur aage nahin badhenge, to kuchh bhi hasil nahin kar payenge sach yah hai ki hamare desh kee sath pratishat janata jahil hai, ya kah lijie ashikshit hai, garib bhi ho sakati hai, to inake bharose ham kahan jaenge ? samriddh aur sukhi bhavishy ke lie hamen inakee bat karani chhodani hogi. hamen vishv arthavyavastha ke sandarbh men khud ko dekhana hoga. vikasit deshon ko samajhana hoga. vikas ke aage kee sthitiyon ko samajhana hoga. ham bahut kuchh amerika se sikh sakate hain, kaise vishv ke sabhi deshon par apana samarik, manovaigyanik dabav banaya jaye. bahurashtriy kanpaniyon se sikh sakate hain, kaise duniyabhar men apani aarthik unnati ka netavark sthapit kiya jae ? ham pashchim kee jivanashaili se sikh sakate hain ki kaise sukhi samriddh aur aanandadayi jivan jiya ja sakata hai.

samaj aur rashtr kee simaon se oopar hai, shreshth hai, use apani shreshthata sthapit karani chahie, kisi bhi keemat par sahity men uttar aadhunikata ko lekar badi bhramak sthiti bani hai. sare tutapunjiya lekhak uttar aadhunikata kee baten karane lage hain. ve kuchh janate- samajhte to hain nahin, bas talab ke mendhakon kee tarah tarr-tarr lagae hue hain. lautate samay unhonne mujhe ek aavashyak hidayat di ki aap jo bhi likhen, mere nam ke ullekh ke bina hi likhen kyonki aapake pas tep vagairah nahin hai at aap nishchit hi bat banakar likh denge aur fir mujhe kahi huee baton ko dis-on karana padega.

kah pana mushkil tha ve ek hi samay men dakshin aur vam donon the, balki kaha jae to ek ajib sa ghalamel the. badi ajib bat thi ki ve apane ko dakshin se shuroo manate the par n to ved, puran aur upanishad unhonne padhe the n bharatiy parampara ke vishesh gyata the aur ab ve choonki apane ko vam ke karib pate the lekin marks, engals aur lenin ko padhane kee bhi unhonne koee jahamat nahin uthaee thi. dvandatmak bhautikavad aur aitihasik bhautikavad unhen ubaoo vishay najar aate the. aur n hi vam rajaniti unhen bahut prabhavit karati thi. is sabake bavajood ve khanti uttar aadhunikata virodhi lekhak the. uttar aadhunikata ke virodh men unake tark khase vajanadar aur vamamargi the. mainne jab unhen bataya ki main kaee buddhijiviyon aur a-buddhijiviyon se mil chuka hoon lekin abhi tak nahin samajh paya ki samasamayik sandarbhon men hamare desh men is fenomina kee kya upayogita hai ?

samrajyavad ka virodh hai, maltineshanals ka virodh hai, globalaijeshan ka virodh hai, libarelaijeshan ka virodh hai, apasanskriti ka virodh hai, patanashil moolyon ka virodh hai, aakhir kitane log hain jo ye virodh kar rahe hain ? kitane log is ladaee men shamil hain?

jisakee charcha n hona svabhavik tha mainne naukari se bina batae chhutti kar li thi, kal mujhe isake lie dant sunani hogi. ghar par rashan khatm ho gaya tha, khana banane ke lie bajar se patni do kilo aata aur aadha kilo chaval laee hogi. padosi ke bachche ka eksident ho gaya tha, mujhe aspatal jana tha, nahin pahunch saka yooniyan ke dimand chart banane men mujhe apani ray rakhani thi, vah bhi nahin rakh paya. desh ke maujooda halat par mujhe taras khana tha, vah bhi nahin kha saka. akhabaron men chhapi hatya, balatkar, dakaiti, firauti, pulis julm, netaon kee besharmi aur prashasan kee janavirodhi harakaton par bladapreshar badhana tha, vah bhi nahin badha paya. sampadakon kee foohadata par unhen dantana tha vah bhi nahi dant paya. ek chhoti si sahaj kavita likhani thi, nahin likh paya.

door kee baat hai. parantu jab suna ki miyaa musharraf krikeT dekhane bhaarat aa rahe hai to laga ki krikeT me kuchh to hoga ki log deevaane bane firate hai. to is baar dekha. suna tha ki krikeT ij e fanee gem. yep, iT ij, jenTalamen. sachamuch doosare kisee bhee khel me maje ka ansh utana nahee rahata jitana krikeT me hota hai. hokee, fuTabaal se lekar jimnaasTik, ethaleTiks kisee bhee khel ko leejie, usame khel ka maja hota hai. parantu krikeT me to maja hee maja hota hai. maje ka khel hota hai.

kaafee kuchh dekha, suna aur bahase kee. raashTreey, antarraashTreey, sthaaneey krikeT patr-patrikao tatha krikeT visheshaanko ka adhyayan kiya, inTaraneT kee krikeT se sambandhit tamaam saiTo kee khaak chhaan Daalee, Teevee par laiv maiches dekhe, aur saath hee saath reDiyo par aankho dekha haal bhee suna. yahee nahee, mainne apane muhalle me galee krikeT bhee khelee. pratyek maich ke praarambh hone se pahale, maich ke dauraan aur maich ke baad maich ke baare me visheshajnyo dvaara kie ge vishleshaNo ka gahan chintan-manan aur vishleshaN kiya. krikeT maich kee tarah ye bhee khaase majedaar rahe. is prakaar mere paas krikeT ke baare me Dher saaree, achchhee khaasee jaanakaaree ekatr ho gee jiname mere apane krikeT ke anubhav bhee shaamil hai.

jo kisee jamaane me bahut pahale sirf maidaano me khela jaata tha. ab galee mohallo bheeD bharee saDako se lekar reDiyo, Teevee-prasaaraNo, patr-patrikao ke stambho-visheshaanko, raajaneeti aur saTTe yaanee yatr-tatr-sarvatr khela jaane laga hai. ab to krikeT - khel se bhee aage jaakar krikeT Diplomesee tak pahunch gaya hai, jahaa ek desh ke sambandh krikeT ke kaaraN ek doosare se banate bigaDate rahate hai. parantu krikeT ko lekar ye baate vishv ke kuchh darjan-bhar raashTro me hee laagoo hai, jiname bhaarat-paakistaan pramukh hai.

khel nahee. agar kisee desh kee Teem haar jaatee hai to us Teem ke virooddh unake desh me dharana pradarshan to hote hee hai, gaahe bagaahe dhokhebaajee, bhrashTaachaar aur maich fiksing ke aarop bhee lagae jaate hai. jaanch kee maang kee jaatee hai. Teem ka jo sadasy haar ka jimmedaar maana jaata hai, usaka ghar se nikalana doobhar ho jaata hai, log usake ghar me pattharo kee bauchhaare tak karane lagate hai. maidaano me to pattharabaajee aam baat hai hee. agar Teem jeet jaatee hai to use inaamo se laad diya jaata hai, prashansa ke pul baandh die jaate hai. parantu har doosare maich me haar-jeet kee yah sthiti Togal hotee rahatee hai. yah ekamaatr aisa khel hai, jisake khelane vaalo kee sankhya saikaDo me hai, laakho ise dekhate hai aur isake visheshajny karoDo me yaanee, lagabhag har koee hai. koee bhee apanee visheshajnyta poorN raay de sakata hai ki Tos ka faisala ya pahale khelane ka faisala kuchh doosara liya gaya hota to maich ka pariNaam kuchh doosara hota. yaanee khilaaDee kee kaipebiliTee, Teem kee kaipebiliTee jyaada maayane nahee rakhatee. krikeT me maayane rakhata hai Tos, ampaayar, vikeT, mausam aur saTTa.

tab bhee kayaas lagae jaate hai, poorvaanumaan lagae jaate hai aur vishleshaN kiya jaata hai ki agar paanee gir gaya ya andhera ho gaya to maich rook jaega aur yah Teem ran ausat ke aadhaar par jeet sakatee hai. yoo Teem me pratyek paksh me gyaarah khilaaDee hote hai, parantu kabhee kabhee ampaayar aur refaree bhee kisee Teem kee taraf se khelane lag ge prateet hote hai. krikeT me kaha jaata hai ki jis Teem ne Tos jeet liya, samazo aadha maich jeet liya. par amoonan vah baakee ka aadha maich haar hee jaata hai.
us par vichaar, usake vishleshaNo aur aankaDo par anavarat bahaso me aata hai ki kaun see Teem kaisa khelee, kis khilaaDee ne kitane-kaise chavve maare, kisane kitane kaich Tapakae ityaadi ityaadi.
ye tha mera samathing. aapake paas bhee to krikeT kee jamaapoonjee hogee is baare me. to fir sheeghr bataie taaki unhe bhee evareething ofishiyal abauT krikeT me shaamil kiya ja sake.

Namaskar, Main hun Harsh Agrawal, ShoutMeHindi se aur aapka HindiMeHelp par bahut-bahut swagat hai. Is article me main aapko bataunga ki aap apni website ya blog ko social media par kaise promote kar sakte hain. Vaise to aap sab logon ko pta ki hoga ki aap alag-alag sources se apni website par traffic ko prapt kar sakte hain. In tareekon me se do sabse badhiya tarreke search engine se organic traffic aur social media se social traffic prapt karna hai. Aaj ham social media par apni website ko promote karke social traffic ko gain karne ke baare me janenge. Jab hum social media ki baat karte hain to hamare maan me sabse pehle Facebook ka hii vichar aata hai. Lekin main aapko bta deta hun ki social media par apni website ya blog ko promote karna keval use Facebook par promote karne ke ilawa bhi any sbhi social media sites jaise ki Twitter, Google, Instagram, ityadi par promote karna bhi hai. Chahe koi bhi social media website ho, aapko neeche diye gaye points ko follow karna hoga aur aap apni website ko kafi badhiya tarreke se promote karne me saksham honge. Ye sabse pehla step hota hai joki kisi bhi social media marketer ko apne maan me rakhna hota hai. Aapko sabse pehle us social media website ke baare me badhiya knowledge honi chahiye jispar ki aap apna content promote karne jaa rhen hain. Ab kaisa kyon? Iske kayi kaaran hain. Har ek social networking website ka apna alg structure hota hai. Udaharan ke liye Facebook ka apna ek hissab hai. Isme aap apni website ka page bhi bna sakte hain, jispar aap apni website ke articles ko post karke, social media sharing ke dwara promote kar sakte hain. Iske ilawa aapko Facebook posts par zyada shares ya likes prapt karne ke liye Boost Advertisement ka option bhi deta hai. Isi prakar twitter ka apna alg structure aur style hai. Isme aap hashtags ka use karke apni reach ko badha sakte hain. Isi prakar, Google me GIF images se content ko promote kiya jaa sakta hai. In sabhi cheezon ko apne man me rakhte huye, aap sabse pehle jis bhi social media networking site par apne content ko promote karna chahte hain, usko acchi trah se samjhiye. Chahe aap social media par apni website par zyada traffic prapt karne ke liye promote kar rhen hai ya fir chahe aap apne brand ko simply popular karne ke liye aisa kar rhen hain, aapko ye bhi janna hoga ki aap kis trah kii promotion chahte hain. Promotions do trah ki hoti hai. Manual aur second hoti hai, Advertisement promotion. Ab manual bhi do trah ki hoti hai. Self manual aur manually paid. Self manual promotion me aap svayam apni saari website ki overall promotion ke liye responsible hote hain. Lekin isme aap kisi bhi cheez par paise kharch nahi karte. Isme shamil hai, apni website ke articles ko manually social media par share karna aur articles promote karke, zyada views, likes ityadi prapt karna. Manual paid promotion me aap kisi social media marketer ko hire karte hain, use pay karte hain aur veh aapke liye social media promotion ka saara kam karta hai. Jo promotion ka sabse badhiya aur kargar tareeka hai, vo hai Advertisemental way. Aap apni website ko ya uske content ko alg-alg tareke se social media sites ko pay karke Advertisemens ke zariye promote kat sakte hain. Sabhi social media websites par apni website ko promote karne ke liye aapki website ko bhi technically kuch requirements ko poora karna hota hai. Jaise ki yadi Facebook par aap apne articles ko promote karna chahte hain to ek badhiya tareeka hai apni website ke pages ko Facebook AMP friendly pages bnaye. Aise me aap zyada se zyada content ko promote karne me saksham honge. Aise hii alag-alag social media platforms par alag-alag technical Requirements ho sakti hain joki aapko poori karni chahiyen. In requirements me social media ke liye images, audio-video content aadi create karna bhi shamil hai. Isi prakar aapko apni website par bhi social media par sharing or Follow Widget Add karna chaiye Yadi aap upar diye gaye in major points ko follow karte hain to aap kafi accha social media promotion karne me successful ho sakte hain. Ab kuch aur mahtav purn points bhi hai joki aapki madad kar skate hain, ye points neeche likhen hain Zaroor padhiye, any useful related articles Mujhe aasha hai ki aapko mere btaye gaye sabhi points social media par apni website ko promote karne me madad karenge. Yadi aapka is sambandh me koi bhi question ho to aap hamare se comments me zaroor poochiye. Aise hii bahut se any useful articles ke liye aap, ShoutMeHindi ko subscribe kar sakte hain. Yeh article humare guest blogger Harsh Agrawal ne likha hain jo ki India ke top most bloggers me se ek hain. Inke kuch prashid bloga hain ShoutMeLoud, ShoutMeHindi, Coinsutra.

jo kharidana chahata tha, magar vah dubara nahin aaya. bhoopen ne unase apani yojana ke bare men bataya. mahadevi ne unako apani kahani ka adhikar de diya. us samay desh men hindi- chini bhai-bhai ka mahaul tha. chin ke kaunsalar ko bulakar bhoopen ne muhurt karavaya tha. lata mangeshakar ko klaipistik dene ke lie aamantrit kiya tha. lata ne majak men kaha tha - bhoopen da, main jis film ke lie klaipistik deti hoon, vah film banati nahin hai. lata ka majak sach sabit huaa. ratonrat bhoopen-hemant prodakshan ki jagah hemant-bela prodakshan ban gaya aur mrinal sen film ke nirdeshak ban gaye. ek tarah se langadi mari gayi thi aur film ke projekt se bhoopen ko bahar kar diya gaya. mrinal sen ne film banayi. jis din film kalakatta men rilij hui, usi din chin ne bharat par aakraman kar diya aur film buri tarah pit gayi.

us ilake men mastana taip ladakon ne unase kaha - ham aapaka bal bhi banka hone nahin denge. hamari lash par chadhakar hi koi aap tak pahunch sakata hai. asam se bhage bangali siyaladah pahunch chuke hain. aapako asali khatara unalogon se hi hai.

main jara bahar se aa rahi hoon. bhoopen ko aashanka hui ki kahin gundon ko bulane ke lie to nahin ja rahi hai ! kuchh der bad vah dher sare rikard lekar lauti. rikard pleyar par vah rikard bajane lagi. pahala gana tha bhoopen ka sagar sangamata, doosara gana tha bhoopen ka, tisara aur chautha gana bhi bhoopen ka hi tha. veshya ne kaha - suna hai asamiya-bangali ke bich kuchh huaa hai ? aisi halat men aapalog yahan kyon aaye hain ? main yah dhandha jaroor karati hoon par aapako door se dekhane ke lie mahajati sadan men jati hoon. aaf gane mujhe bahut achchhe lagate hain. main asam ja chuki hoon. ek chay bagan ke malik ke sath. nam nahin bataungi. asam itana pyara hai. yah sab kya ho raha hai.

usaka gahara prabhav bhoopen par pada. unako film ka kam milana band ho gaya. priyam badauda men thi. bhoopen aur naukar ko gujare ke lie har mahine panch sau rupaye ki jaroorat hoti thi. panch sau rupaye ka jugad kar pana kathin ho jata tha. kafi karj ho gaya tha. guvahati men bhi parivar ko kafi dikkaton ka samana karana pad raha tha.

jisaki shooting unhonne terah dinon men poori ki. bhoopen ko prag jane ka nimantran mila. prag se lautane ke bad bhoopen asam gaye aur hemang vishvas ke sath sanskritik toli banakar jagah-jagah ghoomate hue asamiya-bangali sadbhav ka sandesh dene lage. tatkalin mukhyamantree vimala prasad chaliha ne lagabhag rote hue bhoopen se kaha tha ki ve sthiti ko niyantrit nahin kar pa rahe hain aur unake jaise kalakar hi kuchh kar sakate hain. bhoopen ko kai tarah ki dhamakiyon ka bhi samana karana pada, parantu dhairy khoe bina unhonne apana sanskritik abhiyan jari rakha. utpal datt ne nyoo eja men likha - bhoopen hajarika ki tarah kaun kalakar alpasankhyakon ki suraksha ke lie sadak par utarata hai ? kya ham utarate hain ? kya hamane kalakatta men aisa koi prayas kiya.

aksharam dvara hindi bhavan dilli men aayojit, granth akadami dvara sadyaH prakashit vyangy sankalan kaun kutil khal kami ka lokarpan karate hue vyakt kie . unhonne sabase pahale lekhak ko badhai di ki vah rachana ke akal se bahar nikal aaya hai . unhonne lekhak ki is bat ki bhi prashansa ki ki usamen imanadari jinda hai aur isi imanadari ke tahat usane bhoomika men apane rachana-akal se sangharsh karane men ravindr kaliya aur gyan chaturvedi ke sahayog ko rekhankit kiya hai . prem janamejay ke vyangy apane prahar men nishthur hain par unamen manaviyata nirantar bani hui hai . nirmala jen ne prem janamejay ke lekhakiy fakkadpan ki prashansa bhi ki .

bahut sare kam chhodkar, ek hi siting men padh gaya, yah kitab ki takat ko batata hai . prem janamejay ne is kitab ke dvara nai jamin todi hai aur sahi jagah todi hai . prem ne ret men bij dalane ka kam kiya hai . unhonne apani soch ko todkar bahar aane ka prayas kiya hai . pradip pant ne prem janamejay ki muhavaredar bhasha aur vishay vaividhy ki prashansa ki . unhonne kaha ki prem janamejay un gine chune vyangy lekhakon men hain jo tatkalik ghatanaon par matr vyangyatmak tippaniyan nahin karate hain apitu door tak mar karane vali rachana ka srijan karate hain . aur yahi karan hai unaki rachanaon men netaon par vyangy kam hain . harish naval ne kaha ki prem ka vyangy prayojaniy vyangy hai . prem ne bhoomika men apane jis akal ki charcha ki hai, vo akal nahin hai bahut dinon se jis jamin par koi fasal nahin us jamin ke adhik urvar hone ki prakriya hai . ye parati ke bad ki parati-katha hai . prem janamejay jaisa bhashik prayog hamare samay ke vyangyakaron men bahut kam hai . divik ramesh ne kaha ki prem janamejay un gine chune vyangyakaron men se hain jinhonne vyangy ko foohad hone se bachaya hai . bhasha par inaki pakad bahut gahari hai . prem janamejay ki rachanaon men ek tarah ki mahakavyatmakata hai . ye khatara mol lete hue vyangy karate hain aur svayan ko bhi kataghare men rakhate hain . prem ki rachanaon men hasy ki kami hai aur ye vyangy ke sath hasy ka ghalamel kam hi pasand karate hain aur yahi karan hai inaka hasy bhi chutila hota hai .

kyonki main kuchh dinon ke lie asam se bahar jaunga. jo asuvidha ho rahi thi, vah dikha diya gaya tha. jane ke raste men kuchh badhaen thin, unhen hatakar vah kshitij ki or chala gaya. vaisa roothakar mainne likha tha. asam ki mitti ne mujhe kabhi galat nahin samajha. asam ki mitti ne javab diya hai, karodon logon ne javab diya hai, svikar kiya hai, sneh diya hai. vaisa mainne yoon hi kaha tha. jis tarah man se roothakar kaha jata hai. vaisa kahane men koi ghrina ka bhav nahin tha.

shonit kunvari ke gane gavae, indr malati film men mujhe apana git vishv vijayi n jabana gavaya. mujh par prabhav pada ki apani mitti ki gandh se pyar karana chahie. jyotiprasad aagaravala evan vishnuprasad rabha ne bachapan men mujhe yah prerana di. jab main videsh gaya to vahan bhi dekha, pol rabasan jaise kalakar naye-naye prayog kar rahe hain. vahan se lautakar dola he dola aur sagar sangamata jaise giton ki mainne rachana ki. main khud hi git likhata hoon, khud hi dhun taiyar karata hoon, khud hi gata hoon, isilie apane git ki shaili ke bare men khud hi koi ray nahin de sakata. agar meri rachana men kisi ko vishesh shaili najar aati hai to shayad vishayavastu ke karan najar aati hai.

kah nahin sakata. meri aavaj janmajat den hai. sangit sikhe bina main bachapan men gane laga tha - tota ki tarah. panch sal ki umr se hi log mere git ki sarahana karate rahe hain. jab main yuvavastha men pahuncha, tab mainne mahasoos kiya ki mujhe bahut kuchh sikhana hai. aur mainne lagatar sikhane ka prayas kiya hai.

bhavuk ho jata hoon, aise logon ka kahana hai. tab main apane-aap ko bhool jata hoon. gate samay main is kadar ram jata hoon ki sab kuchh bhool jata hoon. git ke ek-ek shabd ko main anubhav karata hoon. mujhe aisa lagata hai ki agar main un shabdon ko mahasoos kar paunga to shrota bhi unako achchhi tarah mahasoos kar paenge.
