yahan kyon nahin gaya ? pol rabasan ne kaha tha - git mere lie hathiyar hai. jahan jis hathiyar ki jaroorat hoti hai, usi ka istemal karata hoon.

jisamen mitti ki gandh aur aam aadami ke dil ki bat shamil ho. jin dharmik giton men bhagavan krishn ham jaise manushy ban gaye hain, vaise git mujhe pasand hain. film ke sangitakar ke roop men mera manana hai ki sangit ke jarie mujhe film ko niyantrit nahin karana hai. film ki gati ko aage badhane ke lie main sangit ka istemal karata hoon.

kafi manasik parishram karana padata hai. pratyek git ka aadi, madhy aur ant hota hai. moti ki tarah kisi git ko chamakane ke lie sochane ka vakt chahie. har tarah ka srijan prasav vedana ke saman hota hai.

bhoopen hajarika ke khilaf bhi asam ke akhabaron men kafi kuchh likha jata raha hai. kalpana lajami ke sath unake sambandh ko lekar in akhabaron ne hamesha aakramak tevar apanaya hai. san 1971 men bhoopen aatmaram ki film aaropa men sangit dene ke lie mumbai gaye the. kalpana lajami gita datt ki bahan ki beti hai. tabhi usase unaka parichay huaa tha. pahale shyam benegal ki sahayak thi. bad men bhoopen hajarika ki sthayi sachiva ban gayi. ek pala, roodali, damana jaisi filmon ka nirdeshan karane vali kalpana lajami ne sananda ko diye ek sakshatkar men kabool kiya tha ki vah bhoopen hajarika ke sath liv toogedara ke sidghant ke tahat jivan yapan kar rahi hai. asam ke kala samikshak manate hain ki kalpana lajami ne bhoopen hajarika ko asam se door karane ka prayas kiya hai aur bhoopen hajarika ka adhikadhik vyavasayik upayoga vah karati rahi hai. guvahati men ek sanvadadata sammelan men kalpana aur patrakaron ke bich jhadap bhi ho chuki hai. kalpana apane sakshatkar men kah chuki hai ki vah bhoopen hajarika ki sehat ko dhyan men rakhate hue kuchh bandishen lagati rahi hai, jise lekar asam ke log bura manate rahe hain.

ve git desh-videsh men kafi lokapriy hue hain. bhoopen ne apane purane giton ke dhunon ko kalpana ki filmon men istemal kiya hai. samikshak manate hain ki damana aur bad ke myoojik elabamon men anuvad ka star sahi nahin hai, kyonki stariy gitakaron ne unaka anuvad nahin kiya hai.
yah bat main aaj mahasoos kar raha hoon. ab sochata hoon, mere jaise vyakti ke lie sevanivritt hona jaroori nahin hai.

usake parivesh , desh , kal ,paristhiti ke anuroop hota hai ! subhadra kumari chauhan ek sath hi pragatishil nari , grihini , man , kavi , lekhika , svatantrata sangram senani , jananetree v rajaneta thin ! ve jamin se judi huee thin , atah unake anubhavon ka sansar ati vishal tha ! yahi karan hai ki unake sahity men kahin bhi natakeeyata v banavatipan nahin hai varan vah hriday sparshi abhivyakti ban pada hai ! unaka janm 1904 men ilahabad ke nikat nihalapur namak ganv men ramanathasinh ke jamindar parivar men huaa tha ! itihas vid janate hain ki bisavin sadi ke praranbh men bharatiy samaj men jatigat , vargagat , dharmagat , lingagat roodhiyan apane charam par thin ! bal vivah kee parampara thi ! in kuritiyon ke viruddh hi subhadra kumari chauhan kee katha drishti bhi kendrit thi ! bahumukhi vyaktitv ke chalate v durbhagyavash asamay mrityu ke karan unhonne bahut adhik nahin likha hai , par jo kuchh bhi likha hai vah sab ka sab marmasparshi , uddeshyapoorn v shashvat ban kar hindi sahity kee dharohar ke roop men supratishthit hai!

hindi ke sarvadhik padhe v gaye gaye giton men se ek hai ! yah git svayan men git se adhik vir gatha kee ek sachchi kahani hi hai ! jisamen kavayitree ne rani lakshmibaee ke jivan ke sare ghatana kram ko ek padyatmak kahani ke roop men is sajivata se prastut kiya hai ki pathak ya shrota vir ras se bhav vibhor ho uthata hai ! yah rachana unakee pahachan ban gaee hai !

isamen bhagnavashesh, holi , papipet , manjhalirani , parivartan , drishtikon , kadam ke fool , kismat , machhuye kee beti , ekadashi , aahuti , thati , amaraee , anurodh , v gramina kul 15 ek doosare se badhakar kahaniyan hain ! in kahaniyon kee bhasha saral bolachal kee bhasha hai ! adhikansh kahaniyan nari vimarsh par kendrit hain!

vah mere pas upalabdh bikhare moti kahani sangrah kee prati par ek mitr ke dvara doosare ko pustak bhent karate huye kee gaee tippani hai! jo in kahaniyon kee lokapriyata , upayogita v aam pathak ka sahity anurag pradarshit karati hai ! aaj kitane pathak svayan pustaken kharid kar padhate hain ? bhent karana to bad kee bat hai ! aesi ruchikar hriday sparshi kitani kahaniyan likhi ja rahin hai ki ve pathakon ke bich charcha ka vishay ban javen ?unakee kahaniyan kritrim , saprayas likhi nahin lagati ! ve to aasapas se hi uthaee gaee vishay vastu kee taratib se prastuti hi hain !

asamanjas , abhiyukt , sone kee kanthi , nari hriday , pavitr eershya , angoothi kee khoj , chadha dimag , v veshya kee ladakee kul 9 kahaniyan hain ! in sab kahaniyo ka mukhy svar parivarik samajik paridrishy hi hai!

kailashi nani , biaalha , kalyani , do sathi , profesar mitra , durachari v mangala 8 kahaniyon kee kathavastu nari pradhan parivarik samajik samasyayen hain ! hingavala , rahi , tange vala , evan gulabasinh kahaniyan rashtriy vishayon par aadharit hain
aur apani vyapak katha drishti se ve ek ati lokapriy kathakar ke roop men hindi sahity jagat men supratishthit hain !

vatavaran , bhoogol , sabhyata , sanskriti , parivesh , rahan sahan , samaj vigyan ke adhyayan anveshan men yatraon ka mahatv nirvivad hai . sabhyataon ke aadan pradan , jenetik roop se brids ke sammilan men bhi yatraon ka yog raha hai . itihas men jhanken to bhagavan shree ram kee manav danav sanskritiyon ko milane vali uttar dakshin ko jodne vali yatra ko shanti yatra kaha ja sakata hai .desh bhar men pandavon kee yatraon ke smarak milate hain . samooche bharat ko tirth yatra ke ek sootr men pirone hetu poorab pashchim uttar dakshin men dharm pithon kee sthapana ka abhinav kary vishv itihas ke sanbhavatah sabase kam umr ke yatree , aadi shankarachary ji ne kar dikhaya hai .haj yatra kis musalaman kee hasarat nahin hoti ? sare vishv men bharatiy sanskriti ka paracham laharane ka shrey vivekanand ji kee shikago yatra ko hi jata hai jisane unhen sadhoo se svami ke roop men pratishthit kiya . bairistar gandhi ko rel ke tisare klas ke dabbe men kiye gaye deshatan ne hi mahatma gandhi bana diya . achanak paristhitiyonvash payalat se pradhanamantree bane rajiv gandhi ne rashtravyapi yatraon se hi lokapriyata ka sachcha janadhar paya .

jisane sarvapratham pashchimi sabhyata ko poorvi desho se parichit karavaya. kolambas ne yatra se hi amerika aur vest indij dhoodh nikale . purtagali yatree vaskodigama ne kep aaf gud hop ka naya samudri marg khoja .
en ivaning in peris , lav in tokiyo , bambe too bainkak , etti dej eraund di varld , aadi anek yatra kendrit filmen banaee hain .

relve rijarveshan , polis thana , baink , jalapraday sansthan , aasapas ke udyog , aadi ka bhraman karavane se ve in sansthanon se prayogik roop se parichit ho pate hain . yah parichay unhen inake jivan men ati upayogi hota hai . vigyan ke vartaman yug men jab ham ghar baithe hi ti vi par duniya bhar kee khabaren dekh sakate hain ,tab bhi us varchual varld kee apeksha vastavik paryatan prasangik bana huaa hai . toorijm , chahe vah sportas ko lekar ho , karnivals par kendrit ho ,buk feyar , emyoojament park , neshanal farest par aadharit ho ya any vibhinn karanon se ho badhata hi ja raha hai .

silikan vaili aaf indiya kahe jane vale shahar bangalor v tin sagaron kee milan sthali kanya kumari kee vigyan kendrit shaikshanik yatra karavaee gaee . is navachar kee vyapak prashansa ho rahi hai . pradesh ke skoolon men kaksha 8, 9, v 11 men adhyayanarat pratibhavan chhatron men se svatantr vigyapan ke dvara aavedan aamantrit kiye gaye . pichhali klas ke praptankon v any mapadandon ke aadhar par visheshagyon ne 1000 bachchon ka chayan kiya . inamen lagabhag 40 pratishat ladkiyan shamil thin . makhanalal patrakarita vishvavidyalay bhopal ke vidyarthi bhi is shaikshanik bhraman men shamil kiye gaye . pratyek 10 bachchon par ek abhivavak shikshak banaya gaya . rajy vigyan shiksha sansthan jabalapur ko naracharing ka kary saunpa gaya . yatra ke dauran bachchon ko vaigyanikon se milavaya gaya , bachchon kee jigyasaon ka samadhan kiya gaya . yatra ke in 10 dinon men rel ka dibba hi chhatron ka ghar tha. kvij ke aayojan huye . yojana hai ki inhin bachchon men se aprail mah men ek pariksha lekar 100 bachchon ka chayan kiya javega , jinhen uchch shiksha hetu chhatravritti di javegi . samagr roop se m.pr. sarakar ka yah aayojan adbhut v prashansaniy raha . jisaka vistar apekshit hai .

jahan par panlimar sains par vishv stariy anusandhan ho rahe hain ka bhraman karavaya gaya . intar yunivarsiti sentar far estronanmi end estrofijiks pune , sentar far develapament aaf edavans kampyooting pune bharatiy egro indastrij faundeshan pune evan E T H risarch leboretari pune bhi bachchon ne vahan jakar dekhe .

indiyan spes risarch aarganaijeshan , vishvaishvaraiya indastriyal end teknalajikal myoojiyam jaise sansthanon ka avismaraniy bhraman aayojit kiya gaya . kanya kumari men bachchon ko desh kee asmita ke pratik svami vivekanand se parichit karavane vishisht kary kiya gaya . itani badi sankhya men bachchon ko suniyojit dhang se samay sima men yatra karavana ek bada chailenj tha , jisakee vyavastha ke liye pratyek sthan par ek edavans tim bheji gaee thi . chhoti moti asuvidhaon ke alava sari yatra nirvighn sanpann huee . yah aayojakon kee ek bahut prashansaniy upalabdhi hai .

mujhe dekho karib aakar ke falasafe par aayojit yah vigyan manthan yatra ne sare pratibhagiyon ko amrit ras pan karavaya hai ,jisaka unake vyaktitv par dirgh kalin sakaratmak prabhav padega aisi aasha hai .

kisee tarah kee koee kasam aapane na kha rakhee ho aur aapake chikitsak ne alag se aapako mana nahee kiya ho to koee agar aapase yah poochhe ki chaay chalegee? to bhale hee aapaka javaab na me ho, us vakt aapake chehare kee chamak se saamane vaale ko yah andaaja ho hee jaata hai ki chaay kee jaroorat aapako kitanee hai. chaay to chaay hai. agar aap daaroo-shaaroo nahee peete hai aur chalo saath me chaay bhee nahee peete hai, tab bhee aap kahalaate hai- Tee-ToTalar. yaanee chaay aapake saath hai, bhale hee aap chaay ke saath nahee hai.

fir akhabaar ke aa jaane ke baad khabaro ke saath chaay, fir subah ke naashte ke saath chaay, fir daftar ya dukaan pahunchane par kaam kee shurooaat ke lie chaay, dopahar kee atiaavashyak chaay, dopahar ke bhojan ke baad jarooree chaay, shaam kee chaay aur is beech Tapak paDe mehamaano ke svaagat satkaar ke lie chaay. yaanee apane jeevan ke ek baDe hisse kee ek baDee jaroorat hai chaay aur sirf chaay.

nirjeev, praaNaheen aur boriyat se paripoorN najar aaya tha, vahee daftar ke paas vaalee chaay kee dukaan jeevanee shakti se paripoorN, sajeev, praaNavaan, oorjaavaan aur rangeeniyat se bharee najar aee thee. aakhir kyo? sirf isalie ki chaay me vah taakat hai jo praaNaheen cheejo me bhee praaN vaayu ka sanchaar kar de. yahee kaaraN hai ki daftaro me failo ke boz se martapraay baabuo ka man chaay kee dukaan par aakar harshollaas se jeevit ho uThata hai. jara yah bhee yaad keejie ki kisee daftar ke kisee baaboo kee ubaasiyaa kaise chhoomantar ho gee thee jab aapane use chaay ke lie aamantrit kiya tha.

to ghoos roopee sirf ek kap chaay se aap apana koee baDa kaam bhee karava sakate hai. namak ka karj ada karane kee baat puraanee ho chukee hai. ab to chaay ka karj chaDhata aur utarata hai. aapase kee dafa logo ne apanee sevao ke badale chaay-paanee ka kharcha chaaha hoga. kabhee aapaka aatmeey aapako chaay ke lie poochhana bhool gaya hoga to bhale hee aap chaay nahee peete ho, aapaka chaay peene ka mooD us vakt bilakul na raha ho, fir bhee aap kahenge saale ne chaay ke lie bhee nahee poochha.

ateev, aseem aanand avarNaneey aur akalpaneey to hai hee, kisee khomache vaale kee chaay ka fursat me baiTh kar peene ka apana aanand hai. chauk par saDak par khaDe rah kar faalatoo kee charcha me chaay paan ka alag aanand hai. akhabaaro me sir ghusaakar suDakee gee chaay ka alag aanand hai, to beevee aur Teevee ke saath Tee ke aanand kee baat hee kya hai. chaay chaahe meeThee ho ya kaDavee, kaalee ho ya khaalis doodh kee, apane hisaab se sabako achchhee lagatee hai, khaasakar tab jab isakee talab tej lagatee hai. iseelie to Treno me bikane vaalee safeda kee chaay bhee bhaee log usame maja DhoonDhakar pee hee lete hai. darasal chaay to hamesha achchhee hee hotee hai, bas kabhee vah thoDee achchhee, jyaada achchhee ya kabhee sabase achchhee ho jaatee hai.

to koee usakee khushaboo meelo door se soongh kar khincha chala aata hai. ho sakata hai chaay ke aapake anubhav bhee aise hee romaanchakaaree ho. mera apana anubhav hai ki subah ka preshar chaay ke bagair banata hee nahee. akasar log subah uThane ke lie chaay peete hai par kee aise bhee hai jo chaay ka ek pyaala halak me utaar kar sone jaate hai.

jo shilang men rahati thi. amerika men bhi bhoopen ko us ladaki ki yad aati thi. apane sath bhoopen usake khat lekar gaye the. bich-bich men khat kholakar padhate the. dil men tis hoti thi. mata-pita ki bhi yad aati thi.

jarmani, aastriya aadi deshon ke vidyarthi shamil hue the, usamen bhoopen kis tarah pratham aa gaye the. padhai karate hue bhoopen ko intaraneshanal haus men ek ghanta lift chalane ka kam mil gaya, jisake badale unhen char dolar milate the. isake sath hi bhoopen sviming pul ke bahar kapadon ki paharedari ka bhi kam karate the. garmi ki chhuttiyon men holivud jakar part taim naukari karate the.

jo kamyunist tha. tab bharat men telangana krishi vidroh chal raha tha. rav vidyarthiyon se chanda lekar telangana bhejata tha. bhoopen git gakar paise jutane lage aur rav ke uddeshy ki sahayata karane lage.

ravindr sangit aadi ki taiyari ki gayi thi. bhoopen ne ek asamiya parivar se mekhala-chadar ka jugad kiya taki karyakram ke din priyanvada mekhala-chadar pahanakar nrity pesh kar sake. dhoop-agarabatti jalakar bhoopen ne baragit ka gayan shuroo kiya aur priyanvada nachane lagi. donon pratham sthan par rahe. donon ke nam ki dhoom mach gayi. bharat men ilastreted vikali ne sachitr samachar prakashit kiya.

mere bhavishy ka koi thikana nahin hai. tum chali jaogi. mujhe tin sal aur padhana hoga. isake alava bhoopen ne priyam ko apane khastahal parivar ke bare men bataya. tis rupaye ke kiraye ke ghar men das bhai-bahanon ka parivar gujara karata hai. pitaji ko 145 rupaye penshan ke roop men milate hain.
tum agar aaj bhi us ladaki ko nahin bhool paye ho, vah tumhen milane vali bhi nahin hai. main kisi aur se shadi nahin karoongi.
jisane ek amir ladake se vivah kar liya tha aur havada men rah rahi thi. apane dil ke dard ko bhoopen ne shaishavate dhemalite . git rachakar vyakt kiya tha.

n hi aarthik suraksha de paenge. priyam ko koi etaraj nahin tha. is tarah donon vivah karane ke lie tatpar hue. bharatiy vidyarthiyon ne teparikardar par bismilla khan ki shahanai bajai, bangali ladakiyon ne alpana ankit ki, gujarati ladakiyon ne garaba nrity pesh kiya. ek brahman bangali adhyapak ne mantrochcharan kiya. fir siti kort men jakar donon ne kanooni roop se ek-doosare ko pati-patni man liya. is vivah ke lie n to bhoopen ke mata-pita taiyar the n hi priyam ke mata-pita.

Agar aap Blogging me naye hai or abhi aapne new website ya blog banaya hai to aapne ye sabd to jarur suna hoga SEO . to ho sakta hai aapke mind me ye sabal ho ki ye SEO kya hota hai or SEO Kaise karte hai website ko search me lane ke liye. To aap bilkul sahi post par aaye hai, isme me aapko batane wala hu, SEO kya hai, kaise SEO karte hai or kitne type ke SEO hote hai jo hamari site ko search engine google me lane me madad karte hai. Agar aapne abhi abhi blogging start ki hai or aap iss baat se paresan hai ki aapki site search karne par top par q nahi aati, to iska sidha sa matlab hai aapko SEO kya hai or wo kitna jaruri hai ye aapko pata nahi hai. Iss Post me ham bilkul basic se start karege, taki jo abhi bilkul new hai wo bhi samaj sake, or SEO ke jitne bhi Topic hai unke ware me HMH.pe phele hi share kar chuke hai unki link bhi aapko post me mil jayegi. Seo Kya hai SEO ka meaning Hota hai Search Engine Optimize. Simple sabdo me kahe to, Search Engine Optimize ka matlab hai hamari site ko iss trha se teyar karna ki usme kya hai wo search engine Google, Yahoo, Bing achi se samaj sake or search me dikhaye. Ye to aap jante hi hoge ki ham kuch bhi google me search karte hai to google hame kisi site ki link de deta hai, SEO me ham Google ko hi batate hai ki hamari site me ye hai. tkai jab koi search kare to google hamari site ko search result me dikhaye. SEO ka matlab to aap samaj gaye, ki site ko search engine achi se samaj sake uss trha se teyar karna. par isme bhi bhut si chije aati hai. par agar ham isko main 2 part me dekhte hai On Page SEO kya hai, wo aapko thoda to uske naam se hi samaj aa gaya hoga. On Page SEO ka matlab hai wo SEO jo hame hamari site ke page par hi karna hai jisse search engine usko samaj sake ki uske kya hai or usko search me dikhaye. On Page SEO kaise karte hai uske ware me detail me har ek point ko bataya huaa hai, aap usko jarur read kare. q ki agar aapko ON Page SEO kya hai samaj aa gaya or usko kaise karte hai to aapka 60 kaam to bina mhenat ke ho jayega. On Page SEO me kya hota hai Ye sab On Page SEO me aate hai, inka kya matlab hai or kaise inka use hai wo sab aapko SEO Page SEO ki post me mil jayega. Off Page SEO kya hai wo bhi aap naam se samaj gaye goge, matlab wo SEO jo Page se hatkar karna hai. Matlab site par jo bhi dalna tha, jo bhi setting karni thi wo sab ON Page SEO me kardi. khene ka matlab wo sab kuch jisse site search me me aaye or jo site se bhar ho wo Off Page SEO hota hai. Off Page SEO kya hai or wo kaise karte hai uski detail Post bhi aapko HMH.pe mil jayegi, aap On Page SEO ko sikhne ke baad Off Page SEO ko bhi achi se samje. Off Page SEO me kya kya hota hai Ye sab Off Page SEO me aate hai, or inke aalawa bhi jo page se hatke karte hai site ko search me lane ke liye wo sab bhi Off Page SEO me aata hai. At Last Agar aap abhi New hai or aapko SEO ki jada jankari nahi hai, to aap iss post ko read karke itna to samaj gaye hoge, SEO ka matlab hota hai Search Engine Optimization, jisme ham wo sab kuch karte hai jisse search engine hamari site ko achi se samaj sake or search me dikhaye. Upar Post me mene bhut se useful article ki link add ki hai, aap un sabhi ko read kare, to aapko SEO ki achi jankari ho jayegi. kaha se start karna hai wo thoda or me aapko bata deta hu. Sabse phele On Page SEO kya hai or On Page SEO kaise karte hai usko achi se samje or apne BlogWebsite me uss chij ko apply kare. On Page SEO ki har ek point ko achi se samajne ki kosis kare. Agar aapko On Page SEO samaj aa gaya to aapko adhe se jada kaam to bina kare hi ho jayega, agar isme kahi koi sabal ho to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. Jab On Page SEO ko achi se samaj le, or uske har ek point ko apni site me implement karna sikh le, uske baad Off Page SEO kya hai wo sikhe. Off Page SEO me bhut si chije aati hai, par usme sabse main Backlink ko mana jata hai.
dana, fal chunane befikr hokar jangal ka bhraman karake sham ko lautate the. fir rat ko chain ki nind bhi sote the.

pyas aur thakavat ke mare ve nirjiv se ho gaye the. sabhi pakshiyon ne milakar unhen dana-pani khilaya aur thodi der bad unaki moorchha khatm hui. sab yah janane ke lie hairan the ki ye pakshiyan kahan se aai hain?
audyogikaran, praudyogikaran ke karan poora vishv bigad raha hai. prakriti ki sundarata men bhi grahan lag raha hai.

samaj ke aise chir-parichit jiv hain, jinase sabhi parichit hain. ye neta, abhineta, gunde, badamashon kee tarah samaj ke anivary tatv hain. inake bina samaj ka poorn nirman nahin ho pata hai, kyonki inake karan hi nari jati se judi dahej kee tarah kee samasya , chhedachhad ka astitv, samaj men maujood rahata hai jo kisi bujurg ke aashirvad kee tarah din doona rat chauguni dar se mahangaee kee tarah badhati chali ja rahi hai. isase ghar kee grihani ho , skool-kalej jati chhatra ho, daftaron men kam karati praudha ho, koee bhi nahin bacha hai. sabhi ko ghar se bahar nikalate hi rod inspektar kee chhedachhad ka shikar hona padata hai.

us din ye upavas dharan kar lete hain, kyonki bina chhedachhad ke inhen khana nahin pachata hai. samaj men inhen talashane ke lie koee vishesh chashma lagane kee jaroorat nahin hai. ye pop star maikal jaikshan kee tarah bal badhaye, apane sharir kee chaudaee ke barabar baigi pent kam paijama pahane govinda chal, amirakhan muskan ke sath alag se sadak par ghoomate najar aa jate hain ye apani upasthiti ka ehasas hamen svayan karate hain jab bhi kisi kanya ko dekhate hai. to apane arddhanarishvar balon ke pichhe hath ferakar apana rod inspektar hone ka parichay dena yah pratham farj samajhate hai.

jitana ki netaon ke pahanane ke lie khadi ke kurtte ke paijama ka, chara surkhiyon men rahane ke lie ghotale ka hai. inakee sari javani pan ke thele par sadak takate hue kat jati hai. ye subah sat baje se rat das baje tak ek aadarsh sipahi kee tarah pan ke thele par dyooti dete hai. jis tarah yatayat sipahi kee najar se koee trak bachakar nikal nahin pata , usi tarah inakee giddh nigahon se koee ladakee bachakar nahin ja sakati hain jo bhi ladakee inhen bhanti hai usake pichhe ye shahad kee makkhi kee tarah lag jate hain aur ek aadarsh parivarik sadasy kee tarah use roj ghar se kalej v kalej se ghar chhodakar aate hai. is bich men jitana bhi samay inhen raste men aasapas kee motar karon, trakon, taimpon se bachane ke bad milata hai, utana samay ye prem ijahar chhedachhad karane men lagate hai. aisa din men ye char -panch ladakiyon ke sath avashy karate hai.

mini skart chhata li oonchi edi vali ladakee ko maharani viktoriya , ghas n dalane vali , patthar ka javab eent se dene vali ladakee ko maharani lakshmibaee, saindil marane vali ko maharani durgavati , jaise aitihasik patron se pukarate hain, inamen kam padhe-likhe aavara navayuvak hi nahin, em.e.bi.e, pi.ech.di. dharak padhe-likhe samajhadar log bhi shamil rahate hain. jo aksar chhedachhad men dushyant kee shakuntala, tulasi kee ratnavali, mahabharat kee panchali , vridavanalal varma kee mriganayani jaise sahityak patron ka istemal karate hain. ye log ladakiyon ke sanbandh men ke.ji.be.ke jasooson kee tarah ghar valon se jyada janakari rakhate hain.

samaj men badanami hona, sar ke balon ka chauraha banavana, ladakiyon dvara ek se ek shabdon -bandar , gadha, khajoor, tingoo, kaddoo jaise shabdon se sanbodhit hona , mar kha jana, aadi ka in par koee asar nahin padata hai.

prasiddh, nijee aspataal me apanee seva dena chaaha. pahale hee din usakee raatrikaaleen DyooTee ke dauraan nagar ke ek pratishThit, sampann parivaar ke mukhiya ko aakasmikata me aspataal laaya gaya. mareej ko dil ka bhayankar daura paDa tha aur mareej ke aspataal pahunchane se pahale hee yamadoot apana kaam kar ge the. usane mareej kee nabj dekhee jo mahasoos nahee huee, dil kee dhaDakane sunee jo gaayab thee aur ghoshit kar diya ki mareej ko aspataal me mart avastha me laaya gaya. mareej ke sampann parivaar jano ko yah khaasa naagavaar gujara aur unhonne halla machaaya ki mareej ka ilaaj uchit prakaar nahee hua aur ek prashikshu ke haatho galat ilaaj se mareej ko bachaaya nahee ja saka.

prasiddh, nijee aspataal me apanee seva dena chaaha. pahale hee din usakee raatrikaaleen DyooTee ke dauraan nagar ke ek pratishThit, sampann parivaar ke mukhiya ko aspataal laaya gaya. mareej ko dil ka bhayankar daura paDa tha aur mareej ke aspataal pahunchane se pahale hee yamadoot apana kaam kar ge the. usane mareej kee nabj dekhee jo mahasoos nahee huee, dil kee dhaDakane sunee jo nahee thee. usaka dimaag tejee se dauDa. mareej ka parivaar shahar ka sampannatam parivaaro me se tha. usane turant imarjensee ghoshit kee, mareej ke munh me okseejan mosk lagaaya, do-chaar eksaparTs ko jagaakar bulaaya, manhage se manhage injekshan Thonke, eeseejee, eeeejee, skain karavaaya, ilekTrik shok dilavaaya aur antat baarah ghanTo ke athak parishram ke pashchaat ghoshit kar diya ki bhagavaan kee yahee marjee thee.
amareeka se aayaatit 75 hajaar rupe ka jeevan-daayinee injekshan bhee lagaaya, par kya kare bhagavaan kee yahee marjee thee.

ek praudh mahila ho chuki thi. par jise ham ladaki ke rup men dekh chuke hote hain vah ta-umr ladaki hi najar aati hai. chahe usaki shashthapoorti kyon n ho jae. apani hamaumr striyon se milane par ham pate hain unaki bhav bhangimaen sada vaisi hi lagati hain kisi ladaki ki tarah.

kad, bhare jism v chehare, uthi hui nak aur joode men vah koriyan nasl ki kisi stree ki tarah lagi thi. us par usake hath ki chhatari ne usake vyaktitv men char chand laga die the. yah bat use shayad maloom thi isalie chhaya mil jane ke bad bhi usane chhatari band nahin ki thi. un striyon ki tarah jo haradam apane hath men kuchh n kuchh rakhe rahana chahati hain - chahe pars ya baig, hath ki ungali men koi bachcha ya fir chhatari.
aur paDhane me maja aaya. usane aage yah bhee kaha ki mai bhee soch raha hoo ki tumhaare batae raaste ka koee sankalp loo taaki use nibhaane me aasaanee to rahe hee, maja bhee ae.

bina kisee sampaadakeey kainchee ke bhay se aur bina kisee bhay ke ki yah kahee prakaashit ho paega bhee ya nahee. aapakee rachana prakaashit rahegee aane vaalee peeDhiyo ke upayog ke lie anant kaal tak, jab tak inTaraneT ka vajood rahega.
parantu is blog ke paaThako kee raay jyaada mahatvapoorN hai. kya ve ise nity zel paenge? apanee raay TippaNiyo ke maadhyam se muz tak pahunchae.
us tadittarangiy gatimayata men prarambh ho jae aalap, jo dhire-dhire badhata jae, jhala kee nakshatra-mala tak. taramandal khil uthen aur fail jae ujala, guru sharan rani ke nam ka.

1929 ko dilli ke ek jane mane kayasth mathur parivar men huaa. us kayasth parivar men sahity, sangit, kalaon ke prati prem bhav to tha lekin ladakiyan usamen aage badh-chadhakar hissa len isakee manahi thi. dhun kee dhani sharan ji ne pratikool vatavaran ko bachapan se hi anukool bana liya, aur aage bhi sangharsh karati rahin.

par nanhin sharan rani ne dekha ki bhabhi to khan-pan, ghar-parivar aur grihasthi men doobi huee hain, kahan sikhengi. liya ek sikka, chhed die svar, aanand aaya, saragam nikali. sa-re-g-m nikal aae to fir kya tha, vah vady inaka ho gaya aur ye us vady kee ho gaeen.

videsh gaeen. ve pratham mahila thin jinhen sarod ke karan vibhinn prakar ke samman mile. ve pratham mahila thin jinhen sarod par doktaret kee upadhiyon se navaza gaya. ve pratham mahila thin jinhonne pandrahavin shatabdi ke bad bane hue vady yantron ko n keval sangrahit kiya balki rashtriy sangrahalay ko dan men de diya. ve prathamon men pratham thin.
chilam bharani padti thi. rasoee men samay dena hota tha. aur das-das ghante ke riyaz kee pabandi. sanbhrant-raees parivar kee sharan rani ne aughad baba kee sari bat manin.

kya hota hai paranpara pradan karane kee prakriya ka silasila, to baba aur sharan rani ji ke aapasi rishton ko badi gaharaee se samajhana hoga. guru aise hi vidya nahin deta, jab tak ki shishy men poori lagan n ho, nishtha n ho. us nishtha kee pratimoorti banakar sharan rani bar-bar maihar jati rahin. sangit sikhana hai to gurubhakti nishtha se karani hogi. unhonne than liya ki sikhakar hi manengi. gagan ko gunja dengi sarod ke suron se.
agar jivan-sathi sahara n de. pati bhi sarod jaisa hi mila. surila sultan sinh bakalival. unhonne sharan ji ko sada utsahit kiya aur aage lane ke lie pichhe-pichhe rahe.

kahan sitar, kahan bansuri, kahan sarod! ve vilakshan svar-samrat the aur sare vady-yantron se pyar karate the. vadyon ke prati yah prem, paranpara ke roop men sharan rani ji ke pas aaya. ve bhi vadyon se pyar karane lagin. pati sultan sinh bakalival ke sahayog se vady-yantron ka ek vishal bhandar unake pas ikattha ho gaya. kahin vo aadivasi kshetron se anoothe prachin vady lekar aaeen, kahin unako gramin lok vady mile. tarah-tarah ke tantree-vady aur tal vady. ve sab ke sab unhonne bharat sarakar ke adhin rashtriy sangrahalay ko dan men de die. sharan rani bakalival gailari bani, jisaka udghatan kiya tha shreemati indira gandhi ne. is sangrahalay ko sharan ji nirantar sanpann karati rahin. unake vadyon par dak tikat jari hue. sarod par bhi, bansuri par bhi aur mridang par bhi.

tadap thi, ek aakarshan tha, ek chunbak thi jisake pichhe sharan divani si rahati thin. kya chahie kalakar ko? yash. han, yash chahie. kisi ke pichhe daudi nahin sharan ji. do. zakir husain dvara sammanit kiya gaya. aar. ke. narayan dvara unhen padmabhooshan se sammanit kiya gaya. n jane kitane manchon par, n jane kitani bar unhen sammanit kiya gaya. samman sharan ji ke pichhe-pichhe dauda, sammanon ke pichhe sharan ji kabhi nahin daudin.

vahin usake shastreey paksh ko bhi anadekha nahin rakha. unhonne sarod ko lekar kafi shodh-kary kiya. kalidas ke meghadoota se yah sootr nikala ki meghon ne apana rasta badal liya tha choonki unake adhik niche aane par alakapuri men rahane vale sangitakaron ke sazon ke sur utar jate the. yah bat tay hai ki unhin sazon ke sur utarate hain jo chamade se bane hue hote hain. sarod ek aisa hi vady hai jis par chamada laga rahata hai. yani sarod ek prachin bharatiy vady hai. ve kahati thin ki sarod nam ke mool men svarodaya raha hai. sangit ke kuchh vidvan manate hain ki sarod vady madhy eshiya se aaya. ve matabhed rakh sakate hain. shodh aur bhi honi chahie. vaise shodh ho bhi jae to labh kya? ek samachar chainal men sharan ji ke dehavasan kee khabar dete samay unhen sitar-vadika bataya ja raha tha. sarod aur sitar men unake lie koee fark hi nahin hai. kya kahen unako, yad kar liya yahi kya kam hai.

lekin svaron ke bich se shrutiyon kee sahi ladi pakad men nahin aa rahi thi. baba ne apane hukke men gahara kash mara aur chilam se nikali ek laharati huee si chingari. baba ne kaha aise, aise, han aise nikalo. sarod ka tar ungali ke dabav ke sath parade par chingari kee tarah laharaya aur vah nad adhikatam surila hokar nikal aaya.
lekin paranparavadiyon ne mana kar diya. allah ka bheja huaa koee ek maulavi tha jisane kaha ki mitti kee pahali mutthi sharan rani kee hogi.
unase kitane logon ne shrutiyon aur mindon ko pakada hoga. log aankh mind kar aansoo paunchh lenge par vaisi mind kaun nikalega?
aravind rahi,mariyam gazala, ma.na. narahari, shree aar. pi. sharma, ahamad vasi,ram govind, maya govind, rajam ji, niralaprasad ji

2008 ko varishth gazalakar v rachanakar shree khanna muzaffarapuri ke nivas sthan par sanpann huee. varishth gazalakar shree aar. pi. sharma maharsh kee adhyakshata tatha anant shreemali ke sanchalan men aayijit is goshti men padhare anek shair v rachanakar, mukhy mahaman maya govind, ram govind, ke sath sath ma.na. narahari, janab ahamad vasi, gitakar shailendr ji, niralaprasad ji v unake suputra, madhuji, mariyam gazala, ratna jha, raghuvanshi ji, devamani pandey, shabanam kapoor, rajiv sarasvat, aravind rahi, vijay, main- devi nagarani, rajam ji aur svayan khanna sahab. sabhi ne uttam rachanaon ka path kiya.
gitakar shailendr ji,shree aar. pi. sharma maharsh , shree khanna muzaffarapuri, anant shreemali aur devi nagarani,

maya govind aur devi nagarani ji ka fool v shal ke sath sanman kiya. maharsh ji ne adhyaksheey sanbodhan men kavi gan kee rachanaon kee pathaniyata ko saraha aur apani kuchh gazal sunakar sabhi ko aannad vibhor kar diya. ant men khanna ji ne sabhi atithi gan ka sanman sahit aabhar prakat kiya.
kh ke prati aakarshit hai, aur aap ga ke prati aakarshit hai, to ka ke paas kh ke lie behatar sambhaavanae hai jaisee ki aapakee ga ke lie honee chaahie aur akasar kh aur ga ek hee vyakti hota hai.
praaya isake ulaT bhee sahee hota hai yaanee sansaar ka sabase aakarshak purush sansaar kee sabase badasoorat stree se shaadee karata hai.

aur yadi vah saada bhojan karata hai to usaka jeevan bhee saada, svachchh hoga. ab ye alag baat hai ki saada-bhojan-uchch-vichaar me saade aur taamasee bhojan me kis hisaab se kaisee bhinnata maane - agar menaka gaandhee kee maane to duniya me doodh se baDa maansaahaaree bhojan aur koee hai hee nahee!
samaanata bhale hee na ho, kuchh adhyayano se yah nishkarsh nikaala gaya hai ki aapake mobail fon se aapake vyaktitv ka pata lagaaya ja sakata hai.

seeDee ke dhandhe ka mobail fono se kya sambandh? vah bola - are saahab aap baDe bhole ho. aapako pata nahee hai. hamaara dhandha jo haree-neelee seeDee se chakaachak chalata tha ab vah malTeemeeDiya yukt mobail fono ke kaaraN manda ho gaya hai. log ab seeDee nahee khareedate, balki mobail kee dukaano me jaakar seedhe hee ye filme DaunaloD karava lete hai aur usame hee ye filme dekhate hai. pahale log gem kee seeDee le jaate the vo ab mobailo me gem khelane me vyast rahate hai. usake munh se nikalate bolo kee kaDavaahaT muz tak pahunch rahee thee. muze laga ki yadi usaka bas chalata to vah sampoorN sansaar ke mobail fono par pratibandh laga deta.

Theek hai, chaaro or pragati ho rahee hai. tum bhee takanolaajee ke saath chalate kyo nahee? achaanak vah prasann ho gaya. usane bataaya ki usane bhee ek dukaan dekh liya hai aur aavashyak saamaano ka aarDar de diya hai - usakee bhee mobail DaunaloD shop agale hafte khulane hee vaalee hai. fir usane muzase usee prasannata se kaha - saab, apanee dukaan par aate rahana. aapako baDhiya mobail dilavaenge aur shuroo me maheene bhar ka analimiTeD DaunaloD bilakul muft!

ab vaapas aate hai - aapake mobail fono par - jo aapaka vyaktitv darshaate hai. yadi aapake paas koee smaarT fon hai to bhale hee aapako usaka poora fankshan pata na ho, aap un fankshano ka upayog na kar pae ya aapake lie ve anaavashyak ho, aap us smaarT fon ko haath me lekar apane aap ko achchha khaasa smaarT mahasoos karenge. aur yadi yah kaala bukhaara motee jaisa kuchh ho to kya kahane! ye to sautano ka kaam bhee bakhoobee karane lag gee hai! yadi aapake paas O2 ais jaisa mobail fon haath me nahee hai to aapako sabake saamane apane mobail ko apanee jeb ya pars se baahar nikaal kar baat karane me bhee sharm aatee hai. mobailo ko bhee ab Dres sens aur faishan sTeTamenT me shaamil maan liya gaya hai.

ve abhiyaan jaroor safal ho jaate hai. baat bilakul saaf hai kaary ho ya na ho - abhiyaan ke roop me hone vaalee gatividhiyaa jyaada, pooree tarah safal hotee hai. kya aapako nahee lagata ki safaee abhiyaan se lekar satta praapti ke abhiyaan tak me is abhiyaan shabd ke mahatv ko ab kisee soorat nakaara nahee ja sakata.

vidyut maNDal, doorabhaash jaise vibhaago me saal me ek baar graahak seva saptaah ka abhiyaan chalata hai. yaanee saal me sirf ek baar, saptaah bhar abhiyaan ke tahat ve graahako kee seva karate hai. baakee samay kaun graahak aur kaisee seva? sarakaaree upakram hai, kaam karo na karo apanee naukaree pakkee, maheene ke aakheer me apana vetan pakka. usee tarah rel, nagar nigam ityaadi me saal me ek baar, ek saptaah ke lie svachchhata abhiyaan chalaaya jaata hai. baakee samay saDate raho gandagee-badaboo me.

posTaro eva bainaro ke dvaara bataaya jaata hai ki saDak par surakshit chalana chaahie, niyamo ka paalan karana chaahie. keval saptaah bhar yah abhiyaan chalata hai. fir baat vahee kee vahee. saDako me gaDDho kee tarah. abhiyaan khatm to baat khatm. goya saal me bas ek saptaah hee suraksha se, niyamo ka paalan karate chalo, baakee saal bhar aany-baany, asurakshit chalane kee chhooT sabako hai.

vikaraal svaroop me to aa hee jaate hai, ne atikramaN bhee roop le lete hai. isase logo ko atikramaN ke baare me adhik jaanakaaree to ho hee jaatee hai, agale atikramaN virodhee abhiyaan kee pukhta neenv paD jaatee hai.

khaDe-khaDe ya kabhee relo kee chhato par ghanaghor asurakshit hote hue bhee apanee jarooree yaatra pooree kar leta hai. kyonki bheetar jagah nahee aur doosara koee vikalp bhee nahee. vah baink, vidyut vibhaag me apane kaam ke khaatir ghanTo lain me lagakar is aasha me prasann hota hai ki ab usaka kaam ho jaega. fir abhiyaan kee jaroorat hee kya?

is desh ke netao-afasaro ko hai. in abhiyaano ke bagair unakee prasiddhi ka graaf jo oopar nahee chaDhata. ye log abhiyaan chalaane kee nee nee yojanae banaane me lage rahate hai. kahee rN baanTane ka to kahee rN mukti ka. kahee pahale se hee kangaal ho chukee sarakaaree vidyut kampanee ke upabhoktao ke bilo kee maafee ka abhiyaan. jis desh ke bahusankhy aadamee kee pahachaan langoT hai, use kampyooTar janit pahachaan patr pradaan karane ka abhiyaan chalaaya jaata hai. vah us parichay patr ko apanee langoT me baandh kar rakhega, aur koee sarakaaree afasar poochhega abe apanee pahachaan bata to vah zaT apanee langoT me se pahachaan patr nikaal kar bata dega, nahee to use bhee jel kee hava khaanee paDegee.

uchch pado ke lie aparihaary aur anivaary hotee ja rahee hai, doosaree taraf hindee bachao tamil bachao ka abhiyaan badastoor jaaree hai. jahaa desh ke honahaar, bhavishy nirmaata bachcho ke lie buniyaadee shiksha ka Dhaanchaagat akaal hai, vahee baDo-booDho ke lie saaksharata aur uttar saaksharata abhiyaan chalaaya ja raha hai. udaaharaN kam nahee hai. jahaa dekho, vahaa abhiyaan aur abhiyaan abhiyaan hee abhiyaan.
doosare, bhale vichaar me, in abhiyaano me gati laane ke lie bhee koee abhiyaan chalaaya jaana chaahie. kya khayaal hai aapaka. apan bhee shuroo kare koee abhiyaan ?

Tum kya aasha karte ho ki humare umar mein pata hota? Agara mujhe us swaal ka abhi jawaab dena hota, main yah khata main aasha karta hoon ki jab main tumhare umar ka tha main prabhubhoj ker mahatav ko aur zyaada samjhta. Main asha karta hoon ki maine Elder Jeffrey R. Holland ko prabhubhoj par batlaaye hue ko zyaada samjhta. Usne kahata tha, Prabhubhoj siddhaant mein ek sahaj tarke se prapt kiya hua nimataran hai ki yah ek sachcha dhaarmik anubhao, ek pavitra mel, aatma ke liye ka nawikaran hai. 1

Hume Ishu Maseeh ke naam ko apne ikcha se lena chahiye.2 Is vaada ke saath, Pradhaan Henry B. Eyring ne sikhlaya ki Uske zarooraton ko apni tarah jaano. Hum Usko apne jiwan ki sabse zaroori bhaag janege. Hum wah karege jo Wah chahata hai naaki jo hum chahatein ya jo dunuya humein karne ko sikhlati hai. 3

hum yah bhi vaada kartein hain ki humesha 4 Ishu Maseeh ko yaad karenge. Usko suli par chadhaane se pehle ki raat ko, Maseeh ne apne chelon ko Apne ird-grid ikatha kiya aur prabhubhoj ko sthaapit kiya. Usne roti ko thoda, ashirwaad diya, aur kaha, Lo, khaao Yah meri deh hai. 5 Phir Usne katora lekar dhanyewaad diya, aur Apne Devduton ko pine ko diya, aur kaha, Yah vacha ka mera wah laho hai , jo bahuton ke liye paapion ki chama ke nimit bahaya jata hai. 6

hum Parmeshwar ko gahwhi detein hain ki hum Uske Putra ko humseha yaad karenge, naaki sirf parbhubhoj ke hi samay. Is ka matlab hai ki hum humesha Uddhaarkarta ke uddhaaran aur sikhshanon ko apne ichchaaon, apne chunaao, aur apne karye ko maargdarshan dene ke liye dekhenge.8

Agar tum mujh se prem kartey ho, mere aagyaaoun ka paalan karo. 10 Prabhubhoj hume antardiristi ka ek aosar deta hai aur Parmeshwar ki oar humare hriday aur kaarye ko mudhne ka aosar deta hai. Aagayaoun ka paalan karne se humare jiwan mein susamachaar ki shakti, mahaan shaanti aur dhaarmikta prapt hoti hai.

usne prabhubhoj ke dauraan apneaap ka antardrishti se sanchaalan kiya. Usne apne kiye hue galtiyon ko yaad kiya, aur vaada kiya kiya agle safta wah nahi dohra jayega. Wah cheezon ko sahi tarah se kar ke aur paap se mukt hokar khush thi. Anubhao ko yaad karke, usne kaha, main Praeshchit ke ke paschaataap ke bhaag mein kaarye ko kar rahi thi.

wah dukhi aur niraashawaadi mehsoos kar rahi thi. Wah dekh sakti thi ki waha wahi galti ko baar baar kar rahi thi, har safta. Parantu phir usne vyaktigat yogna banaya ki wah Praeshchit ke mahaan bhaag ko andekha kar rahi thi Maseeh ki na khatam hone waale shakti. Wah bhool rahi thi ki sabhi samay par Uddhaarkarta ne use madad kiya tha wah banne mein jo use banna zaroori tha aur apne khud ke chamta se zyaada sewa ko karne mein.

usne pehle haftey ke vishye par dobara socha. Usne kaha Main apne khushi ke ahesaas ko udaasi mein badalte hue dekh rahi hoon jabki Use mujhe kai aosarein aur chamtaaein ko diya hai. Mujhe apni chamta pata thi anpe bachche ki zarooraton ko jaane ke liye jab wah sapasht nahi tha. Maine yah us din jaana jab maine mehsoos kiya ki main aur zyaada kuch bhi nahi kar sakti thi, main apne dost ko kewal shakti bhare shabdon ko de sakti thi. Maine us aosar par vineet hokar dikhlaya jab mujhe uske vrodh mein karna tha.
maine apne kiye hue paschaataap ke kaarye mein aur zyaada asha mehsoos kiya tha aur maine anewaale safta ke liye dobara asha ki umeed kiya tha.

soch, ya karm ke saath, Sabbath se lekar Sabbath tak? Humun cheezon ke liye maafi chahtein hai aur aasha kartein hain ki chama prapt hogi. Chama prapt karne ka tarika hai apne paapion ka paschaataap, unke liye hoga jinke khilaaf humne paap ya apraadh kiya hoga aur unse chama manga hoga aur phir prabhubhoj ke mez par dobara jaane ke liye taeyaar jaha, agar humne sahi paschaataap ko kiya hoga aur apneaap ko sahi tarike se rahka hoga, hume chama prapt hoga, aur dhaarmik changaai humare aatma ko prapt hoga.

Main ek gawaah hoon ki waha par prabhubhoj ke dauraan aatma maujood rehta hai jisse tan-man mein sukh cha jaata hai tum aatma ke ghaao ko changaai prapt kartey mehsoos karoge, aur bhoj ko kam hotey hue. Sukh aur khushiyon un aatmaon ko prapt hota hai jo dhaarmik bhojan ke laayak aur sachchai se lene ki aasha kartein hain. 11
Maseeh hume sikhlaatein hain ki hamari aatma ko Aatma ko swast aur nawikaran karta hai. Prabhubhoj ka vaadha hai ki humare saath humesha uska Aatma rahega. 15

main us chitra ke bare mein sochti hoon jaha punaharjiwit Uddhaarkarta Apne haathon ko faelaye hue hain, jayese ki Wah hume prem se gale lagaane ke liye khade hain. Main is chitra ko pasand karti hoon. Jab main is mauke ke bare mein prabhubhoj ke dauraan sochti hoon, mera aatma bhar jata hai jayese ki main Uddhaarkarta ke sahbon ko sunn rahi hoon Sunno, mera daya ka haath tumhari oar faela hua hai aur jo mere paas aayega, use main swikaar karunga aur dhanye hai jo log mere paas aatein hain. 16

ashirwaad, aur prabhubhoj ko baatey hain. Jab purohiti rakhne waale apne haathon se hume pavitra lakchan se deta hai, ayesa hai jayse Uddhaarkarta Khudh hi Apne daya ke haathon ko badha raha hai, hum sab ko amantrith karta hai anmol prem ke uphaaar ko lene ke liye Uske bachaane waale balidaan paschaataap, chama, daya, aur aasha ke dwara.17

utna hi pavitra aur mahatav bhara humare liye hota hai. Yah hai jo 96-saal-umar ka pita ne jo batlaya tha jab uske putra ne pucha tha, Pitaji, tum girjaghar kyo jaate ho? Tum dekh nahi saktey, tum sunn nahi saktey, tumhare liye chalna kitna mushkil hai. Tum girjaghar kyo jaatey ho? Pita ne jawaab diya, Yah prabhubhoj hai. Main prabhubhoj lene jaata hoon.
Hello Blogger, Ye Post un Bloggers ke liye hai jinka phele se blog hai or agar aap unme se hai jo blog banane ka soch rahe hai to bhi ye post aapko jarur puri read karna chaiye.
jab koee sofTaveyar pradarshit kiya jaata hai to usake kraish hone kee sambhaavana oDiyans kee sankhya ke seedhe anupaat me hotee hai.

Beginner blogger kisi kacchi mitti ke ghade ke saman hote hai. Unpar jaisa impact padta hai, ve vaisa hi ban jate hai. 10 50-60 , Is bich ve jaan bhi nahi pate hai ki ve kya sahi kar rahe hai aur kya galat. Yahi main reason hota hai ki bahut se beginner bloggers jis popular blog se inspire hote hai, ve vaisa hi copied blog bana lete hai. Kya isse blog successful ho jayega ? Bilkul nahi, balki ek common internet user bhi easily jan jayega ki vah beginner blog us popular blog ka copy hai. Jisse vo post ko read kiye bina blog ko left kar sakta hai. Jisse bounce rate bhi increase ho jayega aur returning visitors bhi decrease ho jayega. Ye to thi ek badi galti, par beginner blogger aur bhi galatiyan karte hai, jise aage jante hai Beginner Bloggers Ki Top 12 Mistakes 1.Same Domain Domain vah pahli cheezhoti hai, jisse online identity banane ki shuruaat hoti hai. Par bahut se beginner bloggers popular blogs se milate julte domain buy kar lete hai. Jisse copied identity ban jati hai. Isliye unique domain buy kare. Iske ye tips follow kare 1.Domain Short aur memorable ho 2.Domain me niche keywords ho 3.Double character aur hyphen use na kare. 4.Puri details ke liye ye post padhe Best 6 Tariko Se Right Doamin Select Kare 2.Cheap Hosting Company Shuruat me sabhi beginner blogger chahte hai, maximum low expenses me blog setup kar le. Isliye ve cheap hosting company se plan buy kar lete hai. Lekin isse un security aur low performance jaise problems ko face karana pad sakta hai. Haal hi me mere ek client ne ek cheap hosting company se hosting plan buy kiya. Main jab jab client ke blog par Jetpack Configuration karta, tab tab blog down ho jata tha. Ant me Jetpack ko uninstall karana pada. Isse us blog ki image speed up nahi ho saki. Cheap hosting company ki main problem hoti hai ki unke system aur software up to date nahi hote hai. Jiske karan kai problems aate hai, jaise- 1.Bahut se down times 2.Slow server response time 3.Imporant Plugins ko support na karana. 4.Weak security system 5.Unwanted blog data deletion In sab ki vajah se aapke blog ka future unsecure ho jata hai. Isliye aap Bluehost , Hostgator ya Godaddy se hi hosting plan buy kare. 3.FreeCrackedNull Theme India me free chij use karana fashion sa hai. Isme beginner blogger bhi piche nahi hai. Ve eye close kar free theme use karte hai. Lekin ve nahi jante ki koi bhi theme developer free theme keval promotion ya data stealing ke liye banate hai. Isliye free theme- 1.SEO Friendly nahi hoti hai, jisse google se jyada traffic nahi milti. 2.Theme me clean coding na hone ki vajah se theme fast nahi hoti, Jisse blog slow open hota hai. 3.Slow speed ki vajah se bounce rate badh jata hai. Jisse blog ki ranking down ho jata hai. Best 16 Tariko Se Blog Ki Speed Badhaye Yadi aapne kahin se Popular Premium Theme ko free me download kiya hai to vo cracked nulled theme hai. Jiske original version me hacker spamming code hide tarike se implement kar free me offer karte hai. Jab koi blogger is tarah ke theme ko apne blog par install kar leta hai. Tab vo blog ke sabhi data jaise Username, Password etc ko chura lete hai. Jab blog popular ho jata hai. Tab us blog ko hack kar leta hai. Sath hi is dauran vo apke subscriber ke email id ko sell karke money earn kar rahe hote hai. Is baare me details me janane ke liye SMI par kiya gaya mera guest post padhe- Free Theme Kyu Nahi Use Kare Isliye yadi aap apne blog ke liye seriously traffic aur security chahte hai to premium theme hi use kare. 4.Short Post Yadi aapko koi adhpakka food de de to kya aap kha lenge?. Nahi na. Yahi haal hota hai visitors ka, jab kisi beginner blog par uncompleted post pata hai. Visitor turant us blog ko left kar deta hai aur ek seconds ke kam time me us blog ko bhul bhi jata hai. Aakhir aisa post hi kyu likhe, jise visitor ek second tak yaad tak nahi rakhte ? Isliye long, complete and quality post likhna chahiye, isse ye fayade hote hai 1.Readers happy hote hai, jisse post ko adhik share kiye jate hai aur isse maximum social media se traffic milta hai. 2.Bounce decrease hota hai. Jisse Post ki ranking badh jati hai. 3.Quality post hone ki vajah se koi blogger apne related post ko us post se link kar sakta hai. Jisse us post ko ek natural backlink mil jata hai. 4.Post long hone ki vajah se apne se related sabhi search words ko target karta hai. Jisse organic traffic increase ho jati hai. 5.Short Post Title Aksar story, shayari likhane vale beginner blogger post title keval two ya three word vale banate hai. Jiske karan ve related words ko target nahi kar pate hai. jiske karan blog ki traffic nahi badhati. Isliye Post Title me related words add kar long kare. Iske alava ye tips follow kare- 1.Post title me powerful word add kare. 2.Search Engine aur Blog Post ke different title banaye. 3.Add numbers 4.Read All tips in details SEO Optimized Post Title Kaise Likhe 6.Low Quality Image Most of beginner blogger is bat se darte hai ki yadi unhone high quality image laga diye to blog ki speed slow ho jayegi. Isliye majburan low quality images use karte hai. Jisse blog ka impression hi khatm ho jata hai. Par aap chahe to high quality image use kar sakte hai, par use Adobe Photoshop aur WP Smush Plugin se optimize kare. Image ko speedup karane ke liye Jetpack Plugin install kare aur Speed up Media Feature on kar de. Aur dhyan rakhe, jitni size ki image post me lagana hai, utni hi size ki image ko upload kare. Vaise aap HD Feature Image Gravit.io se create kar sakte hai, jo high quality hone ke sath low weight ke hote hai. 7.Image without Related Post Section Related post section me image ke sath posts show karana chahiye, jisse user engagement badh jati hai. But kuch beginner blogger related post section me post title hi show karte hai. Jab Ki unhen image ke sath post show karana chahiye, jo bounce rate decrease karta hai. 8.Spam Comment Comment na keval blogger me confidence badhata hai, balki ye blog ki SEO me bhi help karta hai because comments me kai aise words hote hai, jo post me nahi hote. Jisse search engines me un keywords ko target kar traffic ko badhaya ja sakta hai. Par aksar beginner blogs par comments behad kam hi aate hai, jisse frustrated hokar beginner blogger spam comment ko bhi approve kar dete hai. Jo SEO ke liye negative value add karta hai. Isliye spam comment ko sidhe delete kar de. Iske alava every comment ka reply kare, isse first impression create hota hai. Dusri galati Aksar beginner blogger dusre blog par apne original name se comment nahi karte hai. Jisse unka behad kam hi comment approve hota hai aur unki real online identity bhi nahi banati hai. 9.Inappropriate Widgets Blog ko professional look dene ke liye sidebar ki bhi professional look hona jaruri hai. Isliye sidebar me minimum widget sahi kram me lagaye. Iske liye aap popular blogs ko dekh sakte hai. 10.Jaldi Adsense Account Apply 80-90 beginner blogger pahle din se paise kamane ki chahat rakhte hai. Isliye ve jaldi hi adsense account ke liye apply kar dete hai. Par blog low traffic aur low content hone ke karan jaldi approval bhi nahi hota hai. Jab approvalmilta hai to low traffic hone ke karan per day $1 tak ki income bhi nahi hoti hai. Jabki iske ult- 1.Beginner blogger ki greedy rup ko show karta hai. Jisse visitors par negative impact padta hai. 2.Adsense approval ki khushi me most of beginner blogger jaldi jaldi post karane lagte hai. Isse post ki quantity to badh jati, par quality down ho jata hai. Jisse blog ki regular readers ghatane lagate hai. 3.Yeh bilkul sach hai ki Adsense blog ki speed ko 2-3 second tak down kar deta hai. Isse direct user experience aur post ranking par bad impact padta hai. Jabki beginner blogs ki traffic behad kam hote hai, jo adsense ke karan aur bhi kam ho jata hai. 4.Low traffic hone se Adsense Account close hone ka sabse jyada risk hota hai. because Adsense hamesha beginner blogger ke adsense account ko radar par rakhta hai. Jaise hi koi invalid action hota hai, ve account ko ban kar deta hai. Main suggest karunga ki pahle 6 month tak blog par regular posting aur traffic badhaye. Jab aapki traffic minimum 500 per day ho jaye to tab adsense account ke liye apply kare. Vaise yadi pahle din se income karana chahte hai to Affiliate Marketing, Newsdog ya UC News try kare. 11.Pop Up Box Google December 2016 ko declare kar diya tha jo mobile user experience ka khyal nahi rakhega, uske blog ki ranking down kar diya jayega. Maine dekha abhi bhi kai beginner blogger ispar dhyan nahi dete hai. 1.Isliye mobile me pop up box ko 5 second ke liye delay kar de ya close kar de aur keval jaruri floating social sharing button lagaye. 2.Post ko chote-chote paragraph me likhnachahiye, jisse mobile user easily read kar sake. 12.Visitors ko Subscribers Me Convert Na Karana Blog ki regular visitors ki numbers badhane ke liye behad jaruri hai ki blog ke visitors ko subscriber me convert me kare. Iske liye blog ko Feedburner se connect kare ya Getsitecontrol ya Hellobar jaise email collector service use kare. In Last Word Blog ko successful banana ke liye jaruri hai ki ham vo sabhi chije kare, jo user aur SEO ke liye best ho. Yahi success mantra hai. Yadi aap iske alava beginner blogger ki galatiyan pate hai, to hamare sath share kare. Post like karte hai to jarur share.

Bahut se aise student hai jo online job internet par search karte rahte hai. Woh padai ke sath sath part time job bhi Karna cahte hai. online job student ke future study me kaam aata hai. Bahut se aise bhi log hai jinko ye yakin hi nahi hota hai ki online job karke bhi paisa kamaya jaa sakta hai. Jab maine bhi pehli baar online job ke bare me suna tha tab muje bhi yakin nahi hua tha. meri pheli earning $5 thi. Yadi aap ek College student hai aur aapke pass full time job karne ke liye time nahi hai to aap internet par hi ghar bhaithe online job karke badiya paise kama sakte hai. Iss artical ke likhne ka main reason yahi hai college student ko ye information dijaye ki woh kaise aur kaha online job karke paisa kama sake. Internet ek bahut hi badiya madhyam hai information lene ke sath sath paisa kamane ka. Internet par aise bahut se tarike hai jaha se aap part time me kaam karke paise kama sakte. Internet par online kaam job karne ke liye aapko kisi skill ke bare bus jaankari honi cahiye. Jitna badiya apke skill ki jankari hogi utna hi badiya tarike se aap online paise kama payege. Maine ye notice kiya hai ki internet ke jyada se jyada online job without investment ka hota hai mtlb aapko kisi bhi prakar ki koi paisa kahi par bhi invest nahi karna hota hai lekin kuch aise bhi place hai jaha par aapko paise kamane ke liye kuch paiae invest karna padhta hai. internet ke jyada se jyada online job me skill aur jaankari ki jarurat hoti hai. lekin ek baar jab aap job start kar lenge tab aapko usme jankari hoti jayegi ki aap uss kaam se badiya paise kamane lagege. Ek student ke taur par aapka jarur life ke liye koi aim hoga. aur aap apne aap ko hmesa motivate karte hone ki muje yaah tak Kaise pahuchna hai. Hindi Me Help blog ke start karne bahut se reason hai aur unme se ek reason ye bhi hai ki logo ko internet ke bare me jaagru karna aur Iske sath sath logo ko usefull information dekar online sabki help karna. Agar aapki Padai Puri ho chuki hai or aap nokri karna chate hai to aapko Nokri ki jankari yaha milegi. Jab aapka kisi compnay me job lagta hai to aapko daily morning me uthkar office ke liye jana hota hai aur kabhi kabhi late hone par aapko daat bhi padhti hai. Lekin online job me aisa kuch nahi hai yaha par job ka Koi fix time nahi hota hai. aap apne time ke khud boss hote hai jab aapka man kare tab kaam kare nahi to band karke rakh de. aapke job ke bare me bolne wala koi nahi hota hai. yadi aapko din me time nahi milta hai to aap online job ko raat me bhi kar sakte hai. Agar aap online job karte hai to ye aapke padai me koi Baadha nahi dalta. Aap din me apni padia aur dusare kaam kare aur yadi aapko night me time mile to aap apna online job raat me kare. online job ka ye ek bahut hi badiya fhyada hai ki aapke job ka koi fix time nahi hota hai. Online job ka dusara fhyada ye hai ki yaha par aapko kisi bhi prakar ka koi Pressure nahi hota hai. Aamtaur par dekha gaya hai ki bahut se log apne kaam ke Pressure me apna job chod dete hai. kyoki unki ye sikayat hoti hai ki unko bahut jyada kaam diya jata hai jinki woh apne time me nahi pura kar pate hai. lekin online job me aisi koi baat nahi hai, yaha par aapko aapke kaam ka koi Pressure nahi hota hai. Yaha par aap apne hisab se kaam choose karte hai mtlab jitna aap kaam karege utna hi aapko paise milege. mtlb yadi aapko kisi bhi din koi kaam karne ka man nahi kar rah hai to aapke uss din kaam naa karke kie wajah se aapko koi nuksan nahi hoga. Aur Next din aapko extra kaam bhi nahi karna hoga. mtlb sabhi chizo ko mila kar aapko online job me kisi bhi prakar ka koi Pressure nahi hota hai. online job ka sabse badiya aur effective fhyaad ye hai ki aapko kaam karne ke liye office me nahi jana padhta hai. kyoki sabhi online job ghar par bhaith kar hi kiye jate hai. agar aap kisi compnay me offline job karte hai to aapko daily travell karke office ke liye jana hota hai. lekin online job me aisa nahi hai yaha par aap apna pura work ghar par rah kar karte hai. ye online job ke kuch fhyade hai jinko maine aapko bataya inke alawa bhi aur se bahut se fhyade hai online job ka. agar aap online job karte hai to yaha par aapki income fix nahi hoti hai daliy change hoti rahti hai. lekin ek baat to pakka hai yadi aap aache se online job karte hai to aapki income aapke ummed se jyada hi hoga. muje ummed hai ki online job ke in fhayde se aap jarur online job karne ke liye intrested hoge. mai bahut se aise real story ko janta hu jo apna career online job me bana liya hai aur woh isko full time me karke har mahine lakho rupaye ghar par bhaith kar kama rahe hai. aur woh ab ek successful entrepreneur ban gaye hai. online job karne se aapke travelling ke paise bhi bachte hai. yadi aap ek college student hai to aapko apne padai aur pocket money ke liye online job jarur karna cahiye. yadi aap online job karne me intrested hai tab aage ke artical ko padhe nahi to aap artical ko padhna band kar sakte hai. Online internet job me sabse asan job Freelance Writing ka job hai. isme aapko kisi dusare ke liye artical likhna hota hai badle me woh aapke artical ke quality ke hisab se aapko payment deta hai. college student ke liye Freelance Writing ka job ek better job hai part time me paisa kamane ke liye. bus isme aapko acchi tarah se likhna ana cahiye aur aapka Grammar aur english accha hona cahiye. bahut se aise college ke student hai jo regularly Freelance Writing ka job karke paise kamate hai. Freelance Writing ka job aapko direct clients ke liye karna hota hai. bahut se aise platform hai jaha se aap online Freelance Writing ka job find kar sakte hai hai. internet par aise bahut se bloggers hai jo Freelance Writing ka job karke har mahine laakho rupay kamate hai. In hi sabhi reason ki wajah se mai aapko recommend karuga ki aap bhi Freelance Writing ka job kare. mai aapko kuch badiya aur trusted plaform batata hu. jaha se aap Freelance Writing ka job kar sakte hai Iske ware me or jada detail me jaanne ke liye padhe Online Article likh kar paise kaise kamaye Also Read 4 Tips Productive Professional Writers ke liye Yadi aapke pass Freelance Writing ke job ke liye time nahi hai to aap Micro-job aur Online website servey job ke dwara paise kama sakte hai. Iss type ka job bahut hi easy hota hai aur isme time bhi Kam lagta hai. isme karna kya hota hai ki bahut sari aisi company hai jo apne sevice ka review internet user se lena chahti hai kyoki internt user technical roop se bahut experince hote hai. service ke review ke badle me woh aapko paise dete hai. kuch aise bhi micro-job website hai jo kisi bhi type ka task aapko deti hai jaise-writing review, commneting etc aur aapse servey ke dwara quaestion puchte hai aapko un question ka jabab sahi tarike se dena hota hai. aur iske badle me woh aapko har ek task ke paise deti hai. Micro-job aur Online website servey job aap unhi website se kare jo website papular ho kyoki internet par bahut se aise scamfarji website bhi hai jo aapse apna kaam to niklwa lete hai lekin paise dene ke time me paise nahi dete hai. aesi website se door rahe aur jo website papular naa ho usko ignor kar de. mai aapko kuch trusted website ke bare me batata hu jaha se aap micro-job aur online servey karke paise kama sakte hai. Fiverr Gig Se Jada Earning Kaise Kare, uski jankari yaha hai. Micro Job ki or jankari ke liye padhe Micro Job Website Se Online Paisa Kaise Kamaye Logo Designing ka job college student ko bahut pasand ata hai. yadi aap designing karne me intested hai to aap apne intrest ke hisab se paise bhi kama sakte hai. Logo Designing ka job karne ke liye aapko acchi tarah se PhotoShop, Illustrator ete ani cahiye. yadi aapko ye sab nahi ata hai to aap apne local store se designing ka book le kar ye sabhi chize learn kar sakte hai. Aap Yaha Sikh sakte hai aur yadi aap badiya tarike se ye sabhi chize sikhna hai to aap graphic designing ka course karke Logo Designing me expert ban sakte hai. jab aapko badiya tarike se Logo Designing karna aa jaye tab aap apne khud ka logo bana kar online sell kar sakte hai. fiverr ek aisa place hai jaha par bahut si aisi company, bloggers, webmaster hai jinko apne busniess ke liye logo ki jarurat padhti hai aap apna banaya hua logo fiverr kar sell karke bahut hi badiya paise kama sakte hai. fiverr ek bahut hi papular website hai jaha par logo ki selling aur buying hoti hai. logo desgning ke alawa fiverr par aur bhi kai tarah ke desgin bhi hai jinko karke aap badiya paise kaam sakte hai. blogging ek aisa madhyam hai jaha se aap apna career full time aur part time dono tarah se bana sakte hai. india me bahut se aise bloggers hai jo apna job chod kar full time me blogging karte hai. aur har mahine laakho rupay kama rahe hai. yadi aap ek acche content writer hai aur aapke pass kuch seo aur social media marketing ka knowledge hai to aap part time me blogging karke acche paise bana sakte hai. yadi aap ek college ke student hai to aapko blogging full time nahi karni cahiye balki part time me karni cahiye. jab aapko part time blogging karte hue badiya experience ho jaye tab aap apne part time blogging ko full time blogging bana skte hai. mai ek full time blogger hu aur mai apne har mahine me itna paisa kama lete hu jitna mai ek job karke nahi kama pata. blogging ek learning journey hai aap jtna yaha learn karege utna hi jyada Earn karege yadi aap blogging karke ek part time blogger banana cahte hai to aap HMH ki Blogger, WordPress or Blogging category ki sabhi post padhe aapko bhut kuch sikhne ko milega. Muje Ummed hai ki mere dwara diye gaye iss information se aapko help milegi. internet se paise kamana bahut hard kaam nahi bahi bas aapko ek plan bana kar sab kuch legal tarike se suru karna hoga. ye post khask kar ke college student ke liye publish kiya gaya hai. yadi aapko iss post se related koi sawal ho to comment box me puch le aur ye information aapke liye helpful hai to isko apne dosto ke sath bhi share kare taki unko bhi online job ke bare me information mil sake Ye Bhi Padhe
aur desh kee adhisankhy aabaadee mobail hone me juT gee prateet hone lagee to muze bhee antata sharm see aane lagee aur mainne socha ki chalo apan bhee mobail ho hee jae

mainne mobail fono kee ek baDee-see dukaan me kadam rakha. selsamen ne prashn vaachak darshTi se muze dekhate hue meree or musakaraahaT fenkee haa sar, apane puraane mobail ko ne, taaja-tareen behatareen takanolaajee yukt byooTee pees se badalane ka sahee vakt aa gaya hai. aaj hee ek naya moDal aaya hai. vah aapako isee dukaan par milega anyatr aapako kahee nahee milega.
to aap ek atirikt mobail apane ghar ya daftar ke lie lena chaahate hai bahut achchhe. ab to yah nihaayat hee jarooree ho gaya hai- ek atirikt parsanal mobail fon vyaktigat jaroorato ke lie.
to aap mobail kisalie lena chaahate hai? selsamen ne tanik aprasannata se poochha. use laga ki mai shaayad usaka Taim kharaab karane vaala hoo.

Bahan Packer aur main Oxford University gaye the. Hum apne saathwe par-aaja ke suchi ko dhoondh rahe the. Oxford ke Christ ke Kolej ka neta, Dr. Poppelwell, ne dayaluta dikhlaya kolej ke archivist ko suchi lane diya. Waha saal 1853 mein humne apne purwajon ke naam, John Packer ko paya.

maine Topical Guide ko khola aur use ek paat dikhlaya 18 panon ka, bahut hi chote se likha hua, single-spaced, Ishu Maseeh oar likha gaya. Yah Uddhaarkarta par pure dharmshaastra ko saath mein ikatha kiya gaya hua suchi hai jo duniya ke itihaas mein likha gaya hai-Purane aur Naye Niyam, Mormon ki Dharamshaastra, Doctrine aur Covenants, aur the Pearl of Great Price ki gawahi hai.

maine use batlaya, bagal-bagal mein, upar aur niche, kitaab se kitaab, mahatav ke baad mahatav-tum jaanoge ki wah humesha hai, Prabhu Ishu Maseeh ke kaarye mein diviye sundar gawahi ke saath- Uska paydaish, Uska jiwan, Uska shikshan, Uska Suli par chadhna, Uska Pumaharjiwit hona, aur Uska Preashchit karna.
vaatawaran badal gaya, aur usne hume imaarat ko saer karaya, jiske saath Romans ke zamaane ko batlaane waali cheezein.

hum Maseeh mein anandith hotein hain, hum logon ko Maseeh ke vishye mein updesh detein hain, hum Maseeh ke vishye mein bhavishyevaani kartein hain aur hum apni bhavishyevaani ke anusaar likhtein hain ki humari santaan yah jaan sakey ki weh apne paapion ki chama ke liye kaha dekhein 2 Nephi 2526.
Uddhaarkarta ne batlaya, Maarg aur sathye, aur jiwan main hi hoon bina mere dwara koi Pita ke paas nahi pahunch sakta John 146.

Usne batlaya hai Sunno, main wahi hoon, jo ki apne logon ko mukt karne ke liye shirishti ki neev ke samay se karne ko taeyaar tha. Sunno, main Ishu Maseeh hoon . Mujhi se sara mahushye samaajh jo mere naam par vishwaas karenge, weh anant ke liye prakaash paayenge aur weh mere putra aur putriyon ban jaenge Ether 314.

jo Adam aur Eve ko Eden ka Bagiche mein mana kiya hua fal khaane ke baad hua tha, jaese 1 Corinthians mein batlaya gaya hai Aur jaese Adam mein sab martein hain, waise hi Maseeh mein sab jilaaye jayenge1 Corinthians 1522.

Praeshchit karna hi chahiye , nahi to maanao samaajh ko nasht hone se bachaya hi nahi ja sakta hai, ha, sabhi katohar hai, sabhi ptith aur bhatke hue hain aur nasht honge kewal praeshchit jo ki hitkaari hai usi ke dwara bach sakenge Alma 349 10.

aur humare galtiyon ke liye yahakaarye hai karne ko, parantu hume dharti par aane se pehle, humne Uske niyam ka paalan karne ko kaha tha aur uske niyam ko todhne se saza ko pura karne ko swikaar kiya tha.

jis tarike se hum saaf ho sakey. Ishu Maseeh punaharjiwit Maseeh hai. Hum Uska bhakti kartein aur Uske jaantein hain wah peeda jo usne hum sab ke liye aur wah peeda jo Usne hum mein se har ek ke liye jhela tha ko, dono Gethsemane ke Bagiche aur kruss par chadhane ke samay ko. Usne yah mahaan vinamrata ke saath kiya tha aur Uske diviye anant samjh ke rishtey aur kaarye mein.
yaha koi mukti nahi hoti. Yah jeene ke liye mushkil se bhare duniya hota agar hume apni galtiyon ke liye chama nahi mila hota, agar hum apne aap ko kabi saaf nahi kare hotey aur aage badhe hotey.

parantu weh anant tak ki shasanti ka vaada un sabhi ke liye hai jo Use swikaar karenge aur piche chalenge aur Uske shikshanon ko maanege. Uska daya se mahaan dukh bharta hai, dusron ke paap ko jhelne waala bhi.

jo wah nahi jaanti thi parantu batlaya gaya, ki uske khilaaf hua tha. Usne batlaya ki usne mahaan kadwaahat ko jhela tha. Apne gusse mein, wah dimaagi taur se rone lagi, Kisi ko is mahaan galti ke liye bharna padega. Is khaas dukh aur swaalon ke samay par, usne likha ki uske hriday mein turant hi jawaab aaya Kisi ne ise pehle hi bhar diya hai.

hum jiwan bhar pastaawa mein rah saktein hain ki humne kuch galta kiya hai ya kisi ke saath bura kiya hai. Wah galti jo galti se hui ho ko saaf kiya ja skta hai. Agar hum Uske Praeshchit ko samjhenge, hum Prabhu Ishu Maseeh se mahaan shaanti kop rapt karenge, Uske dharti par dekh rekh ke samay, aur Uske diviye mission humare Uddhaarkarta ki tarah.

000 se zyaada stakes hai. Humare paas 80,000 pure-samay ke prachaarakhein sewa mein hai, aur Girjaghar mein 15 milion se zyaada sadesye hai, Yeh nambar yah dikhlarein hai ki jo pattar pahaad se bina haathon se kata gaya ho aage badhata rehta hai aura nth mein pure duniya mein fael jayega DC 652.

chahe kitne bhi bhaagon aur deshon mein humare prachaarakhon pahunch jaye yab chahe hum kitne bhi bhaashoun mein baatein karein, Ishu Maseeh ke susamachaar ki sachchie safalta veyaktigat sadasyon ke dhaarmik shakti dwara hi napa ja sakta hai. Hume vishwaas ki shakti chahiye jo Maseeh ke sabhi vishwaasi chelon ke hriday mein paya jata hai.

shaadi shuda aur avivahit ke gawahiyon ko mazboot karne ko dhoondhtein hain. Hume Ishu Maseeh ke susamachaar ko aadmi, mahila, aur bachchon, sabhi jaatiyon aur deshon, dhani aur gareeb ko sikhlans zaroori hai. Hume abhi jald parwartith aur jo humaare beech mein kai girjaghar ko shuruwaat karne waalon ke bachchein ho. Hume unko dhoondhna hai jo kho gaye hai aur unhein madad se waapis yaha lana hai. Hum sabhi ke gyaan aur drishye aur dhaarmik shakti ki zaroorat hai. Is Girjaghar ka har ek sadasye vyaktigat taur se Girjaghar ka ek mahaan bhaag hai.
aur hume har ek ki zaroorat hai agar hum Uddhaarkarta ke diye hue kaarye mein safal hona chahatein hain.

parantu14-saal- ke umar ka ladka hone se hi usne shuruwaat kiya tha is sawaal se Sabhi Girjaghar mein se mujhe kis mein shaamil hona hai? dekhiye Joseph Smith History 110. Joseph ki Uddhaarkarta mein vishwaas aur gawahi badhati rahi jayesa humara hona chahiye, Aagya par aagya, thoda yaha, thoda waha dunga 2 Nephi 2830 DC 12821bhi dekhiye. Joseph prarthna karne kiye ghutne par hua, aur kitna mahaan kaarye hua prarthna aur Pehle Pratikaran ke uske parinaam mein.

main Prabhu Ishu Maseeh ki gawahi ko bayaan karta hoon. Wah jiwit hai. Wah humare Muktidata aur Uddhaarkarta hai. Maseeh ke Praeshchit ke karan, sare manushye bach sakte hain Articles of Faith 13. Wah is Girjaghar ka sanchaalan karta hai. Wah Apne sewakoun ke liye ajnabi nahi hai. Jabki hum anewaale jiwan ki oar atama vishwaas ke saath badh rahe hai, Uska Aatma humare saath hoga. Yaha Uske shakti ka koi anth nahi hai unke jiwan mein ashirwaad aur maarg dene ke liye jo sahi aur sachchaai ko dhoondh rahein hain. Main Uski gawahi Ishu Maseeh ke naam se deta hoon, amen.

AMP Install Kya aap janate hai, world ke 90 website ki design desktop version ko dhyan men rakhkar kiya jata hai , jo ki USA, Canada jaise deshon ke liye suitable hai. Because vahan Internet Surfer website surf karane ke liye jyada se jyada desktop or laptop use karte hai. 10 50-60 , Par India me, ye picture puri tarah se ulti hai. Yahan population se do guna jyada mobile phones people ke hathon men. But yahan bhi or deshon ki tarah websiteblog ki design Mobile Version ke bajay Desktop Versionko dhyan men rakhkar kiya jata hai. Jisse us blog ya website ki performance computer or laptop par achhi hoti hai. But Mobile phones par fisaddi prove hoti hai. Kya aap janate hai yadi aapki site 3 second ke andar nahi open nahi hoti hai, to aap 60 traffic lost kar dete hai aur yeh jaruri nahi ki yadi apka blog laptop men 3 second men open hota ho to mobile phone par bhi 3 second open ho. Isi problem par Google ne World ki leading companies ke sath milkar solution nikalane ki koshish ki aur result men AMP Project nikla. AMP Project Kya Hai? AMP Project ka full name Accelerate Mobile Pages Project hai aur yeh ek open source project hai. Is project se jo koi bhi blog ya website judta hai, uski simple html or limited javascript version ready kiya jata hai aur blog ki every url ko amp suffix ke sath index kar liya jata hai. Jise aap Google Cache bhi kah sakte hai. Aur sath hi Images ko lazy load kiya jata hai. Original URL yourdomain.com AMP URL yourdomain.comamp AMP Blog Ki SEO Kaise karen ? AMP Install Karne Ke Kya Kya Fayde Hai ? 1.Google Report ke anusar, site ki speed mobile phones par pahle ke mukable tin guna fast ho jati hai. 2.Aapke server par load kam padta hai, kyonki Google AMP pages ko khud host karta hai aur AMP Project free CDN bhi available karta hai. 3.Fast Speed ke karan site ki bounce rate dramatically ghategi aur traffic bhi badhegi. 4.Visitors badhane ke sath aapke Revenue bhi badh sakta hai. AMP Se Nuksaan Kya Kya Hai ? 1.Shuruati daur men blogger ko Google Ads lagane men dikkaton ka samana karana pada, kyonki jo Google Adsense ad code provide karta hai, use AMP Project support nahi karta hai. Lekin ab AMP for WP Plugin ki madad Adsense Ad lagaya ja sakta hai. 2.AMP keval Google Adsense ko hi support karta hai, jisse aap or kisi display ad network se mobile phones par apne blog ko monetize nahi kar sakenge. lekin affiliated marketing par koi farak nahi padega. 3.Aap Analytics ke rup men keval Google Analytics hi use kar sakte hai, WP Stats nahi. AMP Ko Lekar Faili Rumors 1.Initially, kuch blogger ne complain kiya ki blog ki mobile traffic ko track nahi kar pa rahe hai. Par ab Plugin aa chukka hai, jiski madad se GA Code implement kar aap aasani se track kar payenge. 2.Share button nahi laga sakte, ab ye problem bhi solved ho chukka hai. Bas aapko ek plugin install karana hoga. 3.Related Post Widget nahi laga sakte, ab aap plugin install karke is widget ko laga sakte hai. 4.Google Adsense Ad show nahi raha hai. AMP for WP Plugin ki help se Adsense Ad show kiya ja sakta hai. 5.Comment Section show nahi ho raha, ab plugin ki help se aap comment section enable kar sakte hai. Main AMP Install Nahi Karana Chahta Hun, Isse Website Ko Kuch Nuksan To Nahi Hoga? Google kahata hai, yadi aapka site responsive hai aur mobile phones par under 3 seconds men open hoti hai to aapko AMP install karne ki koi jarurat nahi. Isliye maine bhi apne Entertainment blog par AMP install nahi kiya, kyunki Google ke instruct ko puri se fulfill karta hai. But problem tab aane lagi jab blog ki traffic drop hone lagi . Aur jab traffic average level se down ho gai to maine blog ko technically aur seo point of view se check kiya. Par mujhe koi bhi problem nahi mila. Iske alava maine dekha kai SEO forms men bloggers traffic lost hone ki baate kar rahe hai . Tab mujhe feel hua. Yeh problem sabki hai. Aur vahi kai bloggers claim kar rahe hai ki AMP installkarne ke bad unke blog ki mobile traffic increase hui aur bounce rate decrease hui. Isliye mere pas AMP install karne ek alava koi option nahi tha, isliye maine AMP install kiya. AMP Install Kaise Kare? AMP install karane ke liye aapko following plugin install karane honge- AMP Official AMP Plugin Ise install karane ke bad yeh blog ya website ki AMP HTML version create karta hai aur Google ke AMP project se connect karta hai. Iski help se basic design bhi kiya ja sakta hai. Glue for Yoast SEO AMP Yoast Addon SEO Plugin Yah Yoast Plugin ka extension matr hai. Iski help se AMP site ki SEO kar sakte hai. AMP for WP Accelerated Mobile Pages for WordPress Design, Share Button Adsense Ad Plugin AMP plugin keval blog ki basic version hi ready karta hai. Lekin usmen related post, Adsense ads, social share button, logo aur menu bar lagan ke liye is plugin ko install karana hoga. Ant men is link ki madad se check karen, AMP sahi implement hua ya nahi. validator.ampproject.org Hope is post se AMP se related questions ke solution mil gaya hoga. Yadi aapke pas koi question ho to jarur comment box men share kare aur post ko social sites par bhi share kare. Thanks to read the post. Next post men janenge, AMP Blog Website par Better Tarike se Google Ads Kaise Lagaye ?
