agar aap kisee achchhe khaase laabh ke pad par hai. aapake vishay me aisa kaun kah sakata hai ki aap laabh ke pad par hai? jaahir hai, ye to aapake dhur virodhee chilla chilla kar kahate honge ki aap laabh ke pad par hai. agar aap laabh ke pad par hai, aur kaanoon bhee aisa maanata hai, to bhee koee baat nahee. aise kaanoono kee aisee-taisee aap svaya saksham hai apane lie naya kaanoon banaane-banavaane ke lie, jo puraanee tithi se prabhaavashaalee maana jaega aur jo yah sunishchit karega ki aap koee bhee, kisee bhee laabh ke pad par nahee hai bhale hee us pad par aapako achchha khaasa maanadey, ghar-ofis-kaar-fon, vyaktigat sevako-sachivo kee suvidhae haasil hotee ho.

apane yahaa laabh ke pad par to chaparaasee hota hai. vo subah se lekar shaam tak kaam karata hai subah saahab ke ghar jaakar vahaa ka kaam karata hai din me ofis ka taamazaam dekhata hai baaboo kee faile sarakaata hai aagantuko ko chaay pilaata hai saahab kee ghanTee sunata hai - shaam ko fir apane afasar ke ghar khidamat karata hai, aur ant me thakahaar kar raat ko nau das baje ghar pahunchata hai. badale me use maah ke ant me tanakhvaah milatee hai. sarakaaree Definishan ke hisaab se yah use laabh milata hai. aur is tarah se vah laabh ke pad par hota hai.

kisee sarakaaree sangaThan ya kisee sarakaaree upakram ka adhyaksh kisee laabh ke pad par nahee hota. vah to seva ke lie hota hai. desh kee seva, janata kee seva ke lie hota hai. yoo to use kuchh maanadey milata hai, kaanoonan, parantu yah bhee koee laabh hota hai bhala? use yah maanadey na bhee mile to bhee vah apanee us kursee se baDa prem rakhega aur vahaa baiThe rahane ke tamaam jaddojahad karata firega. maanadey ke rup me milane vaale pratimaah maatr kuchh hajaar rupe bhee bhala laabh kahalaata hai? agar yah laakho karoDo rupayo me hota tab maanate ki laabh ka pad hai!

aur, baDe saahab se milane-milaane ke bataur bakhsheesh ke rup me use nity kuchh rupe laabh ke bataur mil jaate hai. baDa laabh ka pad to un afasaro ka hota hai jin par ve apanee nigaah lagaakar posTing karaate hai hajaaro-laakho rupe kee, aur kuchh maamalo me karoDo rupayo kee saugaate dekar. jaise ki kisee khaas porT par eksaij inspekTar kee posT ya kisee Daansabaar kshetr me pulis inspekTar kee posT ya kisee audyogik ilaake me lebar insapekTar kee posT ya. are! in udaaharaNo se to yah vyangy kolam hee poora bhar jaega aur aise udaaharaN kya aapako nahee pata?.

jara aap dekhie ki aapaka pad bhee laabh ka hai ya nahee. agar aapaka pad laabh ka hai tab to aap is dharatee ke sabase nikarshT kism ke praaNee hai. aapako laabh ke pad par rahane me sharm aanee chaahie. ya to aap apana laabh ka pad chhoD de ya use laabh ke pad ke sarakaaree Definishan se alag haTaane kee koee jugat lagae. ya fir tatkaal kisee baDe laabh ke baDe pad par jaane kee jugat lagae. arth yahee ki ya to aap laabh ke pad par na rahe, aur rahana hee chaahate hai to baDe laabh ke pad par rahe sirf laabh ke pad par nahee! aapaka pad laabh ka na rahe, yahee meree shubhakaamanae.

to kya aap prasann nahee honge ? avashy honge aur kyo nahee honge? aakhir, satta-shakti ka svaad jo chakhane ko milega, parantu jara Thaharie, thoDee gambheerata se vichaar keejie. ho sakata hai maamala pooree tarah se prasannata ka na ho. aie jara gambheerata se gaur faramae.

parantu mantree pad aapako aise hee nahee milane vaala. isake lie aapako chunaav laDana hoga. ab agar aapaka bhaagy vaastav me prabal hoga, to aap eemaanadaaree se chunaav jeet sakate hai. varana aaj ke maahaul me to jab tak aap beeemaanee se jaati-dharm ke gaNit nahee lagaenge, chunaav kisee soorat jeet nahee sakate. maan leejie, yah bhee ho gaya. parantu khaalee chunaav jeetane se bhee kuchh haasil nahee hone vaala. aap bane rahenge do Take ke emele aur emapee. asalee, raubadaar mantree pad paane ke lie aapako tamaam joDatoD karana hogee. goTiyaa biThaana hongee. raajayog ka yahaa kya kaam? chalie, maan leejie ki yahaa bhee bhaagy ne saath de diya, magar fir aisa ho sakata hai ki aap mahatvaheen ya bina vibhaag ke hee mantree ban jae aur log-baag aapaka majaak uDaane lage. jaahir hai, mahatvapoorN aur bhaaree bharakam bajaT vaale malaeedaar vibhaag ko paane ke lie aapako kheenchaataanee karanee hogee, laabing karanee hogee, preshar TaikTiks apanaanee hogee. muft me kuchh bhee haasil hone vaala nahee hai. isake lie alag se mehanat mashakkat karanee hogee. alag se, naayaab, kelakuleTeD paanse chalane honge.

maan liya ki aap mantree ban hee ge. dhanyavaad raajayog. parantu aapakee aage kee raah bhee koee aasaan nahee hogee. ho sakata hai ki aapaka ya apake sambandhiyo ka ateet ranga-puta ho. tab aapake virodhee ya bahut sambhav hai aapake neta-sangee-saathee jo mantree pad se maharoom hai khod-khod kar aapake ateet ko ughaaDenge aur is tarah aapake mantree pad par hamesha talavaar laTakatee rahegee. ab yah maan le ki kaanch kee tarah aapaka ateet svachchh hai aur vartamaan paaradarshee hai jo ki bhaarateey raajaneeti me - soory ke ulaTee disha me ugane ke samaan hee saty hai, to bhee bhavishy ke baare me kya kaha ja sakata hai. aapake virodhee jo maatr aapake satta me aane kee vajah se paida hue honge ya doosare satta kaamee aapako yoo hee chain se nahee rahane denge. ve aapakee har baat ko, har kaary ko desh aur janata ke viruddh batala kar aapake viruddh zooThe kaanD-kisse frem karenge aur usame aapako Taangane kee harachand koshish karenge. yah bhee ho sakata hai ki aap apane virodhiyo ko samaapt karane kee aisee hee kisee koshish me khud hee fans jae.

satta milate hee aapakee parsanal laif ka beDa gark ho jaega. aap chaaTukaaro se ghir jaenge. aapake chaaro aur suraksha ka arthaheen ghera khaDa kar diya jaega aur aapako aapake parichito se bhee milane nahee diya jaega.

yah bhee shaasvat saty hai ki jisane bhee satta ka svaad chakha, chaahe vah bhagavaan hee kyo na ho, sarvada sukhee kabhee nahee raha. vah bhee satta praapti ke lie ya satta shakti ke kaaraN ya satta par aasann khataro ke kaaraN dukho se ghira raha.

satta shakti kee yaade aapako jeene nahee dengee aur aapake virodhee aapako fir kabhee na uThane laayak banaane me aapaka pulinda baandhane me kuchh bhee kasar nahee rakhenge. tab, yah sab aur bhee asahaneey ho jaega.

aur isee vajah se isase muze lagaav sa ho gaya tha. ise chhoDane ke khayaal se hee muze katee achchha nahee lagata tha isee kaaraN mai ise saalo-saal chalaata raha tha sudharava-sudharava kar. ek din jab mekenik ne apane aujaar neeche dhar die to muze majabooree me nee gaaDee khareedane jaana hee paDa.

aur doosaree or bahut se puraane aur sekaNDs kee gaaDiyaa rakhee thee. mainne nee chamachamaatee gaaDiyo me se ek pasand kee. gajab ka moDal tha aur kam eenghan me jyaada mailej aur jyaada povar deta tha.

achchhe, povaraful moDalo kee gaaDiyaa aarakshit hai aur aarakshit jaatiyo ko hee saplaee kee jaengee. sarakaar ne aadesh to kab se nikaal rakha hai. darasal, nijee kshetr me aarakshaN ke kaaraN jo sekaND greD ke maal ban rahe the unaka levaal koee nahee tha to sarakaar ne unhe anaarakshito me becha jaana anivaary kar diya gaya tha.

sekeNDs kee gaaDiyo ke Dher kee or ishaara kiya usame se chhaanT le, kyonki saaree nee povaraful gaaDiyaa to aarakshito ke lie aarakshit hai. aur jo aarakshit nahee hai, ve janaral klaas hai unhe to sekaNDs me se hee chhaanTana hoga. kaanoon jo ban gaya hai. bechane vaale bech nahee sakate, khareedane vaale khareed nahee sakate.

aur use lekar apane ghar kee or lauT chala. yah gaaDee to meree maujooda gaaDee se bhee khaTaara thee. par, shukr hai, chal to rahee thee. patnee ne aadesh farama rakha tha lauTate me sabjee lete aana. raaste me sabjee baajaar me ruka. vahaa ek insapekTar khaDa tha. usane muzase meree jaati poochhee. mainne kaha bhaee, mai sabjee lene aaya hoo. kisee jaati sammelan me nahee.

nahee to nikal le. mainne use bhee vahee javaab diya- meree jaati maanav jaati hai. vah thoDa bhramit hua. fir kuchh samazata-nahee-samazata hua fir gurraaya abe ye bata rijarv klaas hai ya janaral? mainne use fir samazaana chaaha ki mai maanav hoo aur rijarv ya janaral me koee bhinnata nahee samazata. insapekTar ne apana zanDa ThakaThakaaya aur bola saale janaral! bhaashaN pelata hai. udhar ja vahaa se le. usane ek kone kee or ishaara kiya jahaa baasee, saDatee-galatee sabjiyaa janaral klaas ke lie bik rahee thee. taajee sabjiyaa aarakshit logo ke lie aarakshit thee. jo aarakshit sabjiyaa aarakshito me bik nahee paatee thee, saDane-galane lag jaatee thee, baasee paD jaatee thee to janaral klaas me bikane Daal dee jaatee thee. sarakaaree aadeshaanusaar.

khaee ja sakane vaalee kuchh sabjiyaa chhaanTee, aur ghar kee or chala. chauraahe se ghar kee or Tarn kiya to Traifik pulis ne baDee lambee seeTee bajaee aur haath dekar roka. poochha kaun jaat ba? mainne usase kaha ki meree shaadee ho chukee hai aur mere ghar me koee shaadee yogy var nahee hai jo mai jaat bataoo. jaati-paati to shaadee byaah ke samay hee log baag dekha karate the ab tak. Traifik vaala sajjan purush lag raha tha. vah hansa, bola vo baat nahee ba. baat ee hai ki ee raasta tanik rijarbe hai na. rijarb jaat ke ho to kaunau baat nee. jai sakat hau. par rijarb jaat nee hau to ee raasta me nee ja sakat. kauno cheking me dhara jaoo tau jel ke chakkee peesal paDab.

baDhiya, siks-for len saDake rijarvo ke lie rijarv hai. janaral klaas ko TooTee fooTee galiyo se santosh karana paDega. usane muze ek patalee, gaDDhedaar galee kee or ishaara kiya udhare se jao baaba.

jisakee muze aashanka pahale se hee ho rahee thee. mai apane bahate khoon se Dara hua tha lihaaja sarakaaree kaanoon ke bhay se zooTh bol gaya aarakshite hoo baaba. parantu itane me lain me kisee ne muze pahachaan liya aur chillaaya ee to janaral hai. ee galat hai. isako ihaa se bhagao. jaahir hai, vah naamee, anaarakshit jaati ka eksaparT DokTar aarakshito ke lie aarakshit tha.

duniyaadaaree se, sardee-garmee se bhee koee matalab nahee tha. usane masheenee andaaj me mere ghaav par maraham paTTee kar dee. muze mahasoos hua ki kaash! pooree duniya aisa ho jae to kitana achchha ho.
is baat ko maanegee use hee voT denge. usakee har baat par joro se, poore josho kharosh se taaliyaa baj rahee thee.

aur use saantvana dene kee asafal koshish kar rahe the. mainne jijnyaasa vash logo se poochha ki vah kisalie ro raha hai. logo ne bataaya is aarakshit jaati ke bujurg ne apanee biTiya ke lie ek achchha var talaasha tha. shaadee pakkee kar dee thee. parantu sarakaaree kaanoon ke tahat ise apanee biTiya ko kisee any aarakshit ke saath shaadee karavaana thee, jo is bujurg aur isakee biTiya ke hisaab se usake yogy nahee the. isakee biTiya ne is vajah se khudakushee kar lee. mai bhee jaar jaar rone lag gaya. muze meree beTee yaad aa gee. usake gam me shareek hota hua mai aage baDh gaya. mai kya kar sakata tha? mai kuchh nahee kar sakata tha. pata nahee sarakaar ko kya ho gaya hai. vah aage kya karegee pata nahee.

der se ghar aane me use bhee hamesha lagata rahata tha ki mai apane dosto ke saath kahee baiTh kar jaam uDaata hooonga. par fir meree baanh par paTTee bandhee dekhee to usaka gussa hava ho gaya. haay raam! ye kya ho gaya usake munh se besaakhta nikala. mai past ho chuka tha, aur kuchh bolane bataane ke mooD me nahee tha. bas itana hee kaha kuchh nahee, gaaDee ke ek purje se choT lag gee thee.
jab aap saarvajanik vaahan se jaate hai to kaar paarking khaalee rahata hai parantu jab aap kaar lekar jaate hai to paarking me jagah nahee rahatee.

ghanaghor baarish rukane ka naam hee nahee letee. jaise hee aap kaar ke bheetar jaise taise tarabatar ghusate hai, baadal chhanT jaate hai, chiDiya chahachahaane lagatee hai, aur aasamaan me indradhanush nikal aata hai.
aashcharyajanak aur naamaaloom tareeke se daag-dhabbe aur DenT to lag hee jaate hai - aur ye aapake kaar kee keemat ke varg ke seedhe anupaat me hote hai.
ujjaval, chamakeelee sarjana jo usakee kaalpanikata kee aseemitata ko bakhoobee darshaatee hai - bas kee samay saariNee hai.

Main achambe mein padh gaya. Ek Sattar, wah aage bola, bhavishyevakta se baatein kar raha tha sabhi sadasyon ki oar se parantu wah bhavishyevaktaon ke shabdon ko sadasyon ko batla rahe the. Kabhi na bhulo tum kis tarah ho! Yah ek shaktibhara shikshan hai.

hum sab ne wah galti ko kiya hai kyunki insaan se darten hain. Isaiah mein Prabhu ne hume chetaaoni diya hai, Tum na to manushye ke tiraskaar se aur na hi unke apshabdon se daro Isaiah 517 2 Nephi 87bhi dekhiye. Lehi ke sapne mein, yah dar dusre logon ko mahaan aur khule imaarat se ungali ko utane se shuruwaat kiya gaya tha, kai ko bhulate hue ki weh kis tarah the aur ped ko chod diya lajjit hokar dekhiye 1 Nephi 825 28.

agar chaalchalan nahi, ek ko nikar karne ke zimmedar bana kar. Hum jo ungali utatein hain ke liye izzat bhare sah-hastitav ko dhoondhtein hain, magar jab insaani dar hume paap se chama karta hai, yah ek fanda ban jaata hai Proverbs ki kitaab mein likhe ki tarah dekhiye Proverbs 2925. Yah fanda chalaaki se humare dayaluta ki oar badhta hai, taaki Parmeshwar jo pasand nahi karta ya chahat usi kaarye ko karein. Kamzor vishwaasi ke liye, yah ek mahaan rukaawat ki tarah hai. Uddhaaran mein, kuch praarchaarakhen is insaani dar ko apne saath mission ke sewa mein le jatein hain aur apne saathi ke galat harkaton ko apne mission pradhaan se nahi batlatin hain kyunki weh apne saathiyon ke saath dhoka nahi karna chahate. Chaalchan ka parinaam sahi dhang se pehle aur dusre aagyaon yaad karne se hota hai dekhiye Matthew 2237 39. Jab yeh achambe mein pade prachaarakhen Parmeshwar ke khilaaf hone ko jaante hain aur apne saathi ko nahi, unhein himmat se apne dhyaan ko badalna chahiye.

jab Joseph Smith bhool gaya tha ki kis tarah kare tab usne Prabhu manaya tha Martin Harris ko 116 dharamshaastra ke panon ko udhaar dene ke liye. Shaayad Joseph Martin Harris ko uski madad ka abhari hona dikhlana chahata tha. Hum jaantein hain ki Joseph bahut hi utsukh tha dusre gawahi kartaon ko uske khilaaf jhute mute baaaton ko faelne se bachaane ki madad ke liye.

ya kitne bhi kaaran ho, Prabhu ne unhein maaf nahi kiya aur us par rokh laga diya Kitni baar tumne galti kiya hai aur apne aap ko insaan ke mat kiya hai, Isliye, dekho, tumhe Pareshwar se zyaada insaan se darna nahi chahiye DC 36 7 zor diya gaya. Is dukhit anubhao ne Joseph ko yah yaad rakhne mein madad kiya tha, humesha ke liye, kis tarah wah tha.

weh Parmeshwar se vishwaas ko kho saktein hai. Yah sochte hue ki ek insaan Parmeshwar ko khush kar sakta hai aur usi samay isaan ki aagyakaari na hone par bhi unke taraf ho sakta hai parantu chal ya sachcha insaan nahi ya do swamiyon ka ek saath sewa karna chahata hai Matthew 624 3 Nephi 1324.

sachcha himmat ka chinn insaani dar par jeet raha hai. Uddhaaran mein Daniel ki prarthna ne use sher se jhelne ki madad kiya tha, parantu use Raja Darius ko lalkaarne mein himmat kis ne diya tha dekhiye Daniel 6. Us tarah ki himmat Aatma ka uphaar hai jo Parmeshwar se dartein hain jisne apne prarthnaon ko kiya hai. Rani Esther ke prarthna ne use wahi himmat diya tha uske pati se saamna karne mein, Raja Ahasuerus, jaanta tha ki yah karne se uske apni jiwan mein khatra hoga dekhiye Esther 48 16.

parantu jayesa C. S. Lewis ne dekha tha Himmat hai sabhi gun ka parikchan ke samay. Pilate daya se bhara hua tha jabtak ki daya karne se khatre mein nahi pada. 1 Raja Herod dukh mein tha John jo Baptisma dene waala tha ko nikaalne ke aagre par parantu pasand karna chahata tha baitne waalon ke sang Matthew 149. Raja Noah Abinadi ko azaad karne ke liye taeyaar tha jabtak ki uske dusht paadiriyon ne us par duwidha ke dabaao ko dala tha dekhiye Mosiah 1711 12. Raja Saul ne Prabhu ke baaton ko nahi sunna tha ladaaiyon ko karwaya tha kyunki wah logon bhaye mana, aur unki baaton ko sunna 1 Samuel 1524. Mount Sinai ke niche vidhrodi Israel ko shaant karne ke liye, Aaron ne sone ke gaaye ko banaya, bhooolte hue ki use kis tarah karna tha dekhiye Exodus 32. Kai Naye Niyan ke mukhye netaaein vishwaas kiya Prabhu par Parnatu Phariseeyon ke kaaran prakat mein nahi maante the kahi ayesa na ho ki weh araadhnalaye mein nikaale jaaye Kyunki manushyon ki oar se prasansha unko Parmeshwar ki oar se prasansha ki apeksha adhik priye lagti thi John 1242 43. Dharamshaastra mein is tarah ke uddhaaran bhare hue hain.
Mormon Sunno, Main nidarta se kehta hoon, Parmeshwar se aagya lene se aur main darta nahi ki insaan kya kar sakte hai sachcha prem har dar ko bhaga deta hai Moroni 816 zor diya gaya.
sansaar ko pasand karne waali baaton ko main nahi likhta, lekin jo baatein sansaarik nahi hai, aur jo Parmeshwar ko pasand karne waali baatein hain, unko main likh raha hoon 1 Nephi 65.

main tumhara pradhaan senapati Moroni hoon. Main shakti ko nahi khojta usedhona chahata hoon. Main sansaarik izzat nahi dhoondhata parantu main apni Parmeshwar ka izzat, apne desh ki swatantrata aur bhalaai chahata hoon Alma 6036.

ki usne yah kaha, Agar ateeth aur vartamaan mein sabhi log Moroni jaese hote aur bhavishye mein usi ki tarah loh hote, tab sunno, adholog ki shakti hi sadeo ke liye nasht ho jaati aur maanao vash ke hridayon par shaitaan ka kabhi bhi koi adhikaar nahi ho pata Alma 4817.

yah hai kyunki apradhi sachchaai ko katorta maante hai, do tukdon mein karne jesa aadhaat pahunchaati hai 1 Nephi 162, jaise Pradhaan Harold B. Lee ne dekha, Logon ko sachchaai bura lagta hai! 2 Unke ninda bhare kaarye hai, sahi mein, galti jo khudh ko sahi lage, Korihor ki tarah jisne ant mein maan gaya, Main jaanta tha ki ek Parmeshwar hai Alma 3052. Korihor jhut bolne mein itna mahir tha ki usne apne khudh hi ke jhut ko vishwash kiya dekhiye Alma 3053.

jo Elder Neal A. Maxwell ke shabdon mein, khud ko satusht karega, aatam-sudhaar dhoondhane ke bawajood 3 aur paschaataap nahi. Prabhu ke star ko sanstha ke chaalchan tak karna sidhaant chodhna hai. Nephites ke beech kai girjagharein, Uddhaarkarta ko unko bhent ke do sadiyon ke baad, siddhaant ko saral karna shuruwaat kiya, Elder Holland ke kahawat ko udhaar maange kar.4

humare dinon ke tulna ko dekho Aur ayesa hua ki do sao daswa warsh smaapt hote-hote desh mein kai girje ho gaye ha, bahout se girje Maseeh ko jaanne ka dhong kartey hue uske injil ke adhikaash bhaag ko is kaaran karne lage, yaha tak ki unmein har prakaar ki buraaiyon ah gayi aur ayesi kariyaon karne lage jo ki unke liye anuchit hone ke karan wachit thi parantu un logon ke liye pavitra ho gayi 4 Nephi 127.

khud-jhut bolte hain aur khud ko nikaar detein hain, bishop se guzaarish ya chahatein hain ki mandir ke sifaarish ke star ko kam karein, skool pushti, ya praarchaarak ke arzi mein. Is tarah ke dabaao mein bishop hina asaan nahi hai. Phirbhi, Uddhaarkarta ki tarah jisne mandir jo saaf kiya tha uske pavitrata ke liye dekhiye John 215 16, aaj ke bishop ko mandir ke star ko puri tarah se bachaane ko batllaya gaya hai. Wah Udddhaarkarta tha jisne kaha, Main apne aap ko apne logon ke liye daya agar mere log mere vaade ko pura karenge, aur is pavitra ghar ko maela nahi karenge DC 1107 8.

humare mahaan Uddhaaran, humesha Apne Pita par dhyaan diya. Usne Apne logon se prem aur sewa kiya parantu kaha, Maine logon se izzat nahi paya John 541. Jinhein Wah sikhlata tha Wah chahata tha ki Uske piche chalein, parantu Usne unke hit mein nahi dhoondha. Jab dayaluta ke kaarye ko karta tha, jaese bimaaro ko dheek karna, uphaar humesha aadar se aaya ki kisi insaan ko nahi batlaao Matthew 84 Mark 736 Luke 514 856. Bhaag mein, yah sahi ko chupaane ka tha jo Uske piche aaya tha Uske bal ko rokhne ke bawaajood dekhiye Matthew 424. Usne Pharisees ko accha kaarye karne ke liye ko bura bhala kaha taaki sirf insaan use jaane dekhiye Matthew 65.

sirf ek hi sachcha insaan jo jiya tha, sab se nidar tha. Uske jiwan mein, Us par kai ilzaam lagaye gaye parantu unke ungali utaane par kabhi faeda nahi utaya. Wah hi sirf woh insaan hai jo kabhi nahi bula tha kis tarah karna hai Main humesha wah karta hoon jo Pita ko pasand hai John 829 zor diya gaya, aur Main apneaap se kuch nahi kar sakta, parantu apne bhejne waale ki ichcha chahata hoon John 530.

Uddhaarkarta ne shirshak Pita ko lagbhag 163 samay par istamaal kiya hoga, Nephites ko saaf taur se batlatey hue ki Wah waha par Apne Pita ko prastuth karne ke liye tha. Aur John 14 adhyaye se 17 tak, Uddhaarkarta ne lagbhag 50 samay par Pita ke baare mein batlaya hoga. Sabhi stithiyon mein, Wah Apne Pita ka sachcha chela tha. Wah Apne Pita ko prastuth karne mein bilkul sachcha tha, ki Uddhaarkarta ko jaanna Pita ko bhi jaane jaesa hai. Putra ko dekhna Pita ko dekhne jaesa hai dekhiye John 149. Putra ko sunna Pita ko sunne jayesa hai dekhiye John 536. Woh Apne Pita ke jaesa ban gaya tha. Pita Us mein hai aur Woh Pita mein ek hai dekhiye John 1721 22. Wah sahi tarah se jaanta tha Use kis tarah karan tha.

aur insaan se izzat nahi chahenge DC 12135. Aur main asha karta hoon ki Uska anokha uddhaaran hume humesha madad kare yaad rakhne mein jo pehla aur mahaan aagya hai ko Matthew 2238.Jab dusre Parmeshwar ke aagyaon ka anaadar karne ke liye ijaazat ko chahatein hain, main asha karta hoon ki hum humesha yaaad karein ki kis ke chelein hum hain, aur kis taraf hum kartein hain, mera prarthna hai Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.

skool se aane ke baad maiths kee aur der raat ko kaimisTree kee. is beech shaam ke samay maidaan me krikeT kee bhee koching lena paDatee hai kya pata kis din bhaarateey kshetreey krikeT Teem ke chayanakartao kee najar us par paD jae aur krikeT Teem me shaamil kar liya jae? parantu rukie, abhee haal kee ghaTanao se to lagata hai ki bhaarat ke adhisankhy honahaar krikeT ko apana kairiyar banaane se Darenge kya pata kisee ek din kee asafalata se krikeT premee unake putale foonkane lage aur unake gharo me patthar baajee karane lage. jinhe apane gharo me pattharabaajee karavaanee ho, apane putale funkavaane ho vahee ab krikeT ko kairiyar banae. oopar se beeseeseeaee ne vijnyaapano ke anubandh par taala to Daal hee diya hai, mehanataana bhee khaasa kam kar diya hai. krikeT se achchha to lagata hai aaj koee bhee doosara profeshan ho gaya hai jee, haa koee bhee doosara profeshan. har koee krikeTaro ke oopar thook jo raha hai! aur, yahee baat sachin bhee cheekh-chilla kar kah rahe hai.

magar shaayad naam bhar ko. ve krikeT ke alaava baakee saare atirikt, malTeepal Taask kar rahe the. ve vijnyaapan kar rahe the, akhabaaro me lekh likh rahe the, kampaniyo ke braanD embeseDar bane ghoom rahe the. beeseeseeaee ne unake par katar diye. yah to beeseeseeaee kee kroorata hai. aaj ke malTeepal Tosking ke jamaane me jahaa har vyakti ekaadhik kaam karata hai jaise ki subah kee chaay peete hue akhabaar bhee baanchata hai aur Teevee bhee dekhata hai, ya ki kaam par jaate hue fanse jaam me apane lepaTop par apane ofis ke kaam yaanee kee blog likhana aur paDhana aur Tipiyaana ityaadi nipaTaata hai to is kism kee bandish sire se hee galat hai. beeseeseeaee do-munhee baate kah rahee hai. krikeTaro kee malTeeTaasking nahee chalegee, parantu unako malTeekoching dee jaegee. ab bechaara krikeTar sune to kisakee sune. koee koch bolega maidaan me tum aise khaDe rahana. doosara bolega nahee aise. ho sakata hai bhavishy me bhaarateey kocho ke beech kee aapas kee krikeTaee dekhane ko mil jae.

mai bahut prasann hoon aapko is mahaan sammelan mein swaagat karne ke liye. Hum duniya bhar mein kayi sthaanon mein ikattha hue hai un bhaaiyon aur bahanon ko sunne aur unse seekhne ke liye jinhe humne Maha Adhyakshtaaon aur Girjaghar ke maha afsaron ki tarah swikaar kiya hai. Unhonne swarg se sahayta li hai apne sandeshon ko pesh karein, aur unhonne prerna mehsoos ki hai ki unhein kya kehna hai.

sabhaaen pehli baar redio dwar prastut hui thi Girjaghar ke apne KSL naamak station dwara. Yeh sammelan tv prasaaranon ka bhi 65-saalon ka varsh ghaat manata hai. 1949 October mein hue maha sammelan par, sabhaaen pehli baar pure Salt Lake chetra mein KSL television dwara prasaarit hua tha.

ek naya mandir ka samarpan hua hai aur ek ka dobara-samarpan hua hai. May mein Pradhaan Dieter Uchtdorf ne Fort Lauderdale Florida Mandir ka samarpan kiya. Ek badhiya yuvaaon ka sanskritik samaroh pesh kiya gya samarpan se ek din pehle. Agle din mein, Raviwaar, May 4, ko mandir ko teen sabhaaon mein samarpan kiya gaya.

jo pehli baar 1972 mein Pradhaan Joseph Fielding Smith dwara samarpan kiya gaya tha. Ek vishaal sanskritik samaroh hua tha dobara samarpan se ek din pehle, itne saare yuva us mein bhaag le rahe the ki do alag alag pradarshan hue the, jiske kalakaar bilkul alag the. Sab milakar, 16,000 yuvaon ne bhaag liya tha. Dobara samarpan ke samaroh agle din sampann hue the, jismein kayi Bhaaiyon ne saath diya, jismein saath the adhyakshta ke netaaen aur mandir pradhaan, unke salaahkaarein, aur unke patniyaan.
aur agle saal, 2015 mein, hum aasha karte hai paanch anye mandiron ka samarpan ya dobara samarpan hoga, anye mandirein bhi mumkin hai, agar samay par samaapt ho jaaye.

jab pehle ke tay kiye gaye mandiron ka nirmaan aur samarpan samaapt ho jaaega, hamare paas duniya bhar mein 170 chaalu mandirein hongi.Kyunki hum apne koshishein pehle goshna kiye mandiron ka nirmaan samaapt karne mein lagae hai, hum is samay koi bhi naye mandir ka ghoshna nahin karenge. Haalaanki, bhavishye mein, jab zaroorat dikhega aur hum sthaanein niyukt kar denge, tab anye mandiron ke ghoshna hum karenge.

000 prachaarakein hai jo sewa kar rahe hai, duniya bhar mein susamachaar ke sandesh ko le jaa rahe hai. Hum yeh dobara pushti karte hai ki prachaar kaarye ek purohiti zimmedaari hai, hum sabhi yogye aur nipunn jawaan purshon ko sewa karne ke liye protsaahit karte hai. Hum abhaari hai un jawaan mahilaaon ke liye jo sewa kar rahi hai. Woh bhi bada yogdaan deti hai, bhale hi unhe koi avashyakta nahin hai sewa karne ki jaise jawaan purshon ke liye yeh aagya hai.
hamare hridayon ko chuh lein aur hamara vishwaas badhe, mai vinamrata se prarthna karta hoon Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.
jab koee sofTaveyar pradarshit kiya jaata hai to usake kraish hone kee sambhaavana oDiyans kee sankhya ke seedhe anupaat me hotee hai.

buDha ge ang masalan harday aur haath paanv is tareeke se svachaalit ripeyar hokar ne banane lage, to yakeen maanie, yah to lagabhag aisa hee hai, jaise aadamee ne amaratv ko praapt kar liya. aur, ab to sachamuch lagata hai ki vah apane sampoorN amaratv se sirf, aur sirf ek kadam peechhe hai. kalpana kare ki aadamee ko amaratv praapt ho jae, to aisee sthiti me hoga kya?

to do-teen sau saal jeene ke baad vah jeevan se bhayankar roop se bor ho jaega, pooree tarah se oob jaega. fir vah marane ke taur tareeke eejaad karega. marane ke ek se ek behatareen tareeke. ek se ek naayaab tareeke. fir vah saharsh ghoshaNa karega ki amuk din, amuk samay, amuk-amuk naayaab, kharcheele tareeke se marane ja raha hai. usake marane ke din samaaroh honge, naach gaana hoga aur saara kaaryakram bhavyata se sampann hoga. jo aadamee jitana jyaada sampann hoga, vah utana hee shaanadaar tareeke se marega.

amar aadamee ke ang svachaalit tareeke se ripeyar ho jaaya karenge aur ne ug aaya karenge to fir use kis baat ka Dar hoga? vah har kisee se panga leta firega aur baat-baat me har kisee ka haath paanv kaaT Daalega. saDako par har koee, betarateeb, ek doosare ko kuchalata kaaTata chalega. aur, agar kisee ko apana koee ang pasand na aega ho to vah use kaaT Daalega taaki kuchh naya-sa, achchha ang ug ae.

aur log-baag soch-samazakar hee mara karenge, ata parthvee par jagah kee kamee ho jaegee. lihaaja, kaanoon ban jaega ki kisee faimilee me koee bachcha tab tak paida nahee hoga jab tak ki us faimilee ka koee sadasy svechchha se mar nahee jaata. parthvee par ek marega, sthaan khaalee karega tabhee us sthaan par doosara aa paega. jo is kaam ke lie marega, usaka naam shaheedo me likha jaega aur usake lie smaarak banae jaenge. evaj me jo bachcha paida hoga, vah sabakee aankho ka taara to hoga hee, log use apane paas rakhane ke lie, use dekhane ke lie, use pyaar karane ke lie, use paalane ke lie ek din, ek ghanTe, ya das minaT ke lie kirae par jisakee jaisee hastee ho, liya karenge. koee marega to, ya kisee ke yahaa bachcha hoga to ye khabare antarraashTreey star kee khabare hua karengee. sthaaneey star par to samaaroh ke lie avakaash bhee hua karega. aur kaun jaane, ye samaaroh raashTreey aur antarraashTreey star par bhee hone lage.

har roj jiega, pooree tarah jiega. saal-dar-saal, saikaDo saal. koee paanch sau saal kee umr ka aadamee sau saala umr ke vyakti se bahas me kaha karega jyaada bakabak mat kar, teree jitanee umar hai, usase paanch guna mera anubhav hai. bahut raddee sthiti aa jaane par hoga yah ki koee sarakaar ya koee desh ka samraaT yah niyam bana dega ki koee bhee aadamee saat sau saal se jyaada nahee jee sakega. kabhee koee, apekshaakart javaano kee sarakaar, adhyaadesh hee nikaal degee ki amuk din se paanch sau saal se jyaada umr ke tamaam manushyo ko jinda rahane par paabandee lagaee jaatee hai, lihaaja ve apane-apane hisaab se marane ka kaaryakram tay kar le, anyatha us din ke baad unhe kahee se bhee DhoonDh kar tatkaal maar diya jaega.

bhaee jee ko emaTeevee-faishan Teevee dekhana hota hai to bahan jee saanta baarabara - kyonki saas bhee jaise kaaryakramo kee deevaanee hotee hai. bachche kebeesee-2, antaaksharee aur Daans-Daans kee koee kaDee chhoDana nahee chaahate. aapako har aadhe ghanTe par samaachaar apaDeTs dekhana atyant jarooree lagata hai. oopar se krikeT ka miyaadee bukhaar to rahata hee hai.

dekhane vaale kee. har ek kee apanee pasand. ek hee samay me kee-kee chainalo me aane vaale kee-kee pasandeeda kaaryakram. sambhav hai ki praaya kisee ek samay ek chainal par antaaksharee ka fainal raunD chal raha ho aur doosare par emaTeevee ka fainal kaunT Daun. kisee aur chainal par krikeT ka fainal maich dikhaaya ja raha ho, to kisee any chainal par vaarshik vyanjan pratiyogita ka pariNaam dikhaaya ja raha ho. fir ghar me har ek ko doosare ka pasandeeda kaaryakram nihaayat hee ghaTiya, ubaoo, nirarthak aur isee prakaar na jaane kya kya lagata hai. lihaaja ve apane pasandeeda kaaryakram ko hee dekhane aur doosaro ko dikhaane kee jugaaD me lage hue rahate hai. jaahir hai, aisee paristhitiyo me aapake gharo me yada kada mahaasamar bhee to hota hee hoga.

jinhe Teevee ke har kaaryakram me aanand aata hai. antaaksharee bhee achchhee lagatee hai aur rasoee sho bhee. filmee kvij me bhee maja aata hai aur DaakyoomenTree me bhee. Delee seeriyal me to dainik akhabaar kee tarah ka eDikshan hai. film besD kaaryakram aur filmo kee to baat hee kya hai! krikeT, kaar resing, boksing ke thril ka maja Teevee ke alaava kahee nahee hai. ab aisee sthiti me dimaag ke bheetar mahaasamar hota rahata hai ki kaun-sa prograam dekhe aur kaun sa chhoDe kyonki sabhee saale praim Taim me hee, pata nahee kyo dikhaate hai.

usee samay, formoola van kaar resing ka fainal raunD kisee doosare chainal par dikhaaya ja raha hota hai. dono hee kaaryakram apane ko bahut pasand hai. par dono kaaryakramo ko ek saath to nahee dekh sakate. bahut hua to nee takaneek vaalee pip pikchar in pikchar Teevee ya Dabal vijan Teevee laee ja sakatee hai, parantu aavaaj to kisee ek chainal kee hee sunanee paDegee. fir yah bhee to hota hai ki kisee teesare-chauthe chainal par kisee soorat na chhoDane laayak pasandeeda kaaryakram chal raha ho.

kisee bhee chainal ka praim Taim ka koee bhee kaaryakram kisee ke lie bhee chhoDa jaane laayak nahee rahata. sabhee kaaryakramo ko dekhana Teevee chainalo-proDyoosaro ke lie to jarooree hai hee darshako ke lie bhee aavashyak hai. par ek saath itane saare achchhe kaaryakramo ko koee kaise dekh sakata hai. isaka koee hal tatkaal nikaala jaana chaahie.

furasat me dekho. isase aapaka pasandeeda koee prograam chhooTega nahee. par, tab bhaee, aakhir din me chaubees hee to ghanTe hote hai na! mere jaise sabhee chainalo ke sabhee kaaryakramo ke deevaano ke lie to yah aiDiya bhee fel hai! oopar se, har maheene-do-maheene me ek naya chainal aur chala aata hai Dher saare ne, majedaar kaaryakramo ko lekar.

Hi friends, Is post me main aapko backlinks kya hai or kaise kaam karte hai uske bare me puri jankaari dene ki koshish karunga. Aap SEO se to vaqif honge hi, agar aap apne blog ko search results me first page par lana chahte hai to aapko apne blog ka SEO karna bahut hi jaruri hai. SEO mukhyt do prkar se kiya jata hai On page SEO me ve sabhi chijen aati hai joki aap apni blog post likhte vaqt apply karte hai, On page SEO acchi prkar se karne ke liye aapko ek SEO optimized articlepost likhni hoti hai. Read Post ka Title SEO Friendly Likhne tarike Read Post SEO Friendly Likhne ke 5 tips Off page SEO me ve sabhi chijen aati hai joki aap apne blog ke bahr apply karte hai. Inmen sabse important hote hai- Link Building aur Social Media presence. Social Media presence me aapko apne blog ko social media par promote karna hota hai aur Link Building me aapko apne blog ke liye Backlinks bnane hote hai. Jitne jyada aapki siteblog ke backlinks honge aapki site search results me utni hi higher rank prapt karti hai. Read Facebook se apne Blog par traffic badaye Ab jyada der n karte hue main aapko backlinks ke bare me btata hoon. To fir aaiye jante hai ki backlinks kya hote hai aur ye aapke blogWebsite ke liye kyon important hai Backlink kya hai wo simple sabdo me samje to, Backlinks wo link hote hai jo ek website se kisi dusri website par jate hai. Jaise ki maan lete hai agar main aapki site ka link apni kisi post ya apne blog par add karta hoon to isse aapki site ko ek backlink prapt hota hai. Backlinks aapke blog ke liye bahut jyada faydemand hote hai. Aapki site ke jitne jyada backlinks hote hai Google aapki site ko search results me utni hi jyada value deta hai. Lekin Google aapke blog ko value tabhi deta hai jab aapke blog ke backlinks quality achhi sites se honge. Backlinks ke aur bhi bahut saare fayde hote hai jaise ki Search Engine aapki site ko jaldi index karne lagta hai, aapki site ko referral traffic milta hai, aapki site ki authority increase hoti hai. Quality Backlinks ve hote hai jo aapko quality sites se prapt hote hai. Jaise ki HindimeHelp ek quality site hai aur agar aapko Hindimehelp se backlink prapt hota hai to Google aapki site ko jyada value deta hai aur aapke blog ko search results me higher ranking prdan karta hai. Quality backlinks bnane ke liye aapko relevancy ka bhi bahut dhyan rakhna padta hai mtlab ki agar aapka blog technology se related hai to aapko other technology related blogs se hi backlinks prapt karne honge, iske bjaye agar aap kisi food blog se backlinks prapt karte hai to Google aise backlinks ko jyada value nahi deta. Quality Backlink Kaise Banaye uski Jankari yaha di hui hai, High Quality jitni achi hai site ke liye utni hi buri Bad Backlink hoti hai, or Bad Backlink kya hoti hai unki jankari yaha hai. Backlinks do prkar ke hote hai- Do-Follow backlinks link juice pass karne me madad karte hai, yani ki aise links aapke blog ki ranking ko bdhane me kafi madadgaar hote hai. Dofollow links ka example a href httpwww.google.com Googlea ya fir a href httpwww.google.com rel do-follow Googlea By default sabhi links Do-Follow hote hai, lekin agar aap chahte hai ki aap jo link dusri sites ko de rahe hai usse link juice pass n ho to aap link me No-Follow attribute add kar sakte hai. Ye ve backlinks hote hai joki link pass karne ko allow nahi karte, inki search engine me value do-follow links ke mukable kam hoti hai. Search Engine Ranking me No-Follow Links ka role nahi hota hai. No-Follow backlink ka example a href httpwww.google.com rel no-follow Googlea To agar kabhi aapki site par aesi site ki link add karne ka moka pade jispar kuch galat chij hai to aap usko No-Follow kar sakte hai. Ab aap backlinks ki importance ko samajh gaye honge, isliye ab aapke man me ye question jarur aaya hoga ki backlinks bnane ki shuruaat kaise karen. apni site ke backlinks bnane ke liye aap in simple tarikon ka pryog kar sakte hai agar aap apne blog ke liye jyada se jyada backlinks bnana chahte hai to iske liye aapko apne blog par quality content likhna hoga. Post bilkul simple bhasha me, to the point aur vistaar se honi chahiye. yani ki aapko aise articles likhne honge jise aapke readers asaani se samajh saken aur vah article unki mdd kar sake. High quality content likhne se other bloggers aapke article ke link ko apne readers ki help karne ke liye post me add kar sakte hai. Jese ye ek badiya article hai. Backlinks bnane ka ye free aur easiest method hai, aapko bas ye karna hai ki apne niche ke other blogs par regularly commenting shuru karen. Jin blogs par commentluv enabled hota hai un par commenting karne se aapke blog ko do-follow backlink prapt hota hai joki aapke blog ke liye bahut jyada faydemand hota hai. Lekin jin blogs par commenting karne se aapko No-follow backlink prapt hota hai ve bhi aapke blog ke liye helpful hote hai. Halanki No-follow search results me jyada matter nahi karte lekin na hone se kuch hona bhi sahi hota hai. Commenting karte vaqt ye dhyan rakhen ki aap spam comments n add karen isse aapka comment approve nahi hoga hamesha comments me value add karne ki koshish karen. yani ki aise comments ko avoid karen- Great post! Awesome post! keep it up aadi. aise comments spam comments hote hai, inhen avoid karen. Post ko pade fir uspar apni rai de. aese comment ache hote hai or usse aapko bhi kuch na kuch naya sikhne ko milega. Badiya comment kaise kare uski jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. wo sab dhiyan rakhe comment karte time. Quality Backlinks bdhane me Guest Blogging bahut jyada prbhavi hoti hai. ismen aapko apne nichetopic ke kuch popular blogs par apni guest post submit karni hai aur sath hi apne blog ka ek link add karna hai. lekin yaad rakhen ki Guest Blogging ke liye apne niche ke popular blogs ko hi chune aur ek badhiya high quality content vaali guest post likhkar submit karen. Agar aapka Blog Internet se Related Topic par hai to Aap HMH.pe bhi Guest Post kar sakte hai. Or jankari ke liye yaha click kare. apne blog ko web directories me submit karna backlinks bnane ka ek badhiya method hai, iske liye apne blog ko vibhinn web directories me submit karen, lekin yaad rahe ki aap apne blog ko quality web directories me hi submit karen. Backlinks aapki site ke liye kafi helpful ho sakte hai lekin agar aap galat tarikon ka pryog karke backlinks bnayenge to ye aapki site ke liye bahut jyada nuksaandayak ho sakte hai. Isliye apni site ke liye backlinks bante samay nimnlikhit baaton ka dhyan avshy rakhen Mere hisaab se ab aap backlinks ke baare me acchi trah se jaan gaye honge, ki Backlink Kya hai or Kaise Backlink bante hai or kya faide hai Backlink ke. fir bhi agar aapka Backlinks se sambandhit koi bhi question hai to aap comment ke dwara puch sakte hai. aisi hi aur bhi nayi posts ke updates paane ke liye hmara free email subscription len aur Facebook, Twitter, Google par hamen follow karen.

fir keTareena aur ab elma ne to amareekee kshetro me taanDav-sa macha diya hai. ek toofaan se nipaTe nahee ki doosara haajir. vah to ganeemat hai ki aadamajaat ne supar kampyooTar naamak aujaar eejaad kar liya hai jisakee vajah se toofaan kab, kahaa se paida hoga, kahaa-kahaa se gujarega aur kahaa jaakar khatm hoga isaka pata vo pahale se laga leta hai aur apane ko tabaahiyo se bachaane kee naakaam koshishe karata hai. toofaan paida hone ke kaaraNo par lagaam lagaane, usake paida hone se rokane ke upaay bhee lagata hai aadamee aaj nahee to kal DhoonDh hee lega.

aajakal ke netao ke to ye haal hai ki na to koee ponga panDit aur na hee koee poliTikal eksaparT aaj kal ke maahaul me yah bata sakane kee koovat rakhata hai ki kis neta ka mijaaj kis din kaisa rahega. baat sirf itanee hee nahee hai, ab to yah ummeed bhee jaahir nahee kee ja sakatee ki kis din kis neta ka kaisa mijaaj ho sakata hai. aur to aur, jo tota-chhaap panDit chauraaho baajaaro me tote se kaarD nikaal kar aapakee saTeek bhavishyavaaNee ka daava karate hai bhale hee ve khud saDako chauraaho me baiThane ko abhishapt ho ve bhee netao ke baare me koee bhavishyavaaNee karate nahee deekhate.

tamaam tarah kee gaNanao ke uparaant bhee aap kisee sthaan vishesh ke mausam ke baare me kuchh nahee kah sakate. kisee din alasubah chaTakhatee huee dhoop khilatee hai to yah aabhaas hota hai ki aaj mausam khula rahega. parantu dopahar aate-aate ya akasar shaam Dhalate-Dhalate ho yah jaata hai ki ya to bhaaree bharakam barasaat ho jaatee hai ya fir kabhee ole bhee paD jaate hai. isake Theek vipareet agar aasamaan me ghanaghor ghaTae ghumaDatee dikhaee detee hai to fir yahee ho jaata hai ki samast poorvaanumaano kee hava nikaalatee huee pooravee havae pashchim kee or hava ho jaatee hai. yahee kaaraN hai ki kisee barasaat me mumbee me jal plavan ho jaata hai jahaa log saDako par hee chaubees-aDataalees ghanTo tak fans jaate hai to kahee maalava me sookha paD jaata hai. baadal vahee hai, maanasoon bhee vahee hai, parantu mumbee aur baDauda me to bhaaree baarish laata hai jaavara aur ujjain me sookha. maanasoon jab aktoobar me bhaarat se pooree tarah vida le chuka hota hai to poorvottar bhaarat aur chennee me baadal faTane lagate hai

doosare din subah uThane par mausam ke badale hue mijaaj kee tarah badalee huee hotee hai, aur nateejatan, kisee any ke prati nishThaavaan hokar vah subah kee angaDaee leta hai. jab tak dopahar kee garamee ka paravaan chaDhata hai, usakee nishTha kisee doosare kee taraf bahane lagatee hai to shaam hote-hote nishTha kee yah bahaar ya to ulaTee lauT paDatee hai ya fir kisee aur poTenshiyal disha kee or bahane lag jaatee hai. subah usake mukhaaravind se jo pravachan nikale hote hai, use shaam ko ya to vah gaTak leta hai ya fir auT of konTeksT kee sanjnya dekar usase peechha chhuDaane kee bharasak koshish karata hai.

pahaaDo me sookha paDane laga tha. satta aur dhan ke prabhaav ke kaaraN apane idhar netao ke saath bhee yahee sthiti hai. koee bhee chhuTabhaiya neta ab paarTee pramukh ko khuleaam Teevee kaimaro ke saamane aankhe tarer deta hai. doosare din paarTee se baahar ho jaata hai. teesare din fir andar ho jaata hai. nahee to apanee nee paarTee khaDee kar ya doosaree paarTee me shaamil ho satta me shaamil ho jaata hai. vahaa se use apanee puraanee paarTee ke pramukh ke kaale dhandhe aur kaala paisa saaf dikhaee dete hai, jo vah jab paarTee ke andar tha, kabhee dikha nahee tha. jo jindagee bhar doosare ko chillaaya aur gariyaaya, ab usakee prashansa ke pul baandh raha hai, use sar aankho par biTha raha hai aur jisake saath usane ab tak ka raajaneetik jeevan jiya, usakee chhatr chhaaya me usane apana yah raajaneetik kad praapt kiya, use vah ek zaTake me chhoD de raha hai. ab yah baat juda hai ki yahee, isee tarah kee baat usake lie doosare log kahate firate hai. par, poliTiks me to bhee, sab chalata hai.

isase pahale ki is lekh ka mijaaj itana badal jae ki aap in vaakyo ko paDhate bor ho jae aur apane baal nochane lage, maamala yahee khatm karate hai aur chaahe jaisa mausam ho, usake maje lete hai netao ke bayaano ka bhee aur mausamee bayaaro ka bhee.

Hello Dosto, Aap ye to jante hi hoge. Internet ka use kitna badta ja raha hai or har jagha aaj kal Internet ka istmal hota hai or jaha abhi nahi ho raha waha bhi kuch time me hone lagega. Agar Aap Blogging me apna Career banane ka soch rahe hai to aap bilkul bana sakte hai or isme aage bhut scoop bhi hai. Blogging hi nahi aap Internet se related agar aap koi bhi field me career banana chate hai to aap bilkul bana sakte hai. Jese Youtube bhi abhi ek acha option hai Online career banane ke liye, Aap Youtube par Video upload karke kaise kama sakte hai. Aapne dekha hi hoga, Internet user kitni teji se bad rahe hai to aese me agar aap blog banate hai to blog ke liye visitor to badna aam baat hai. Par Blogging me Career banane se phele kuch bate hai jo aap jo jaan leni chaiye q ki har kaam ke faide ke sath sath nuksan bhi hote hai, to agar aapko wo dono pata ho ki isme kya faide hai or kya nuksan hai to fir aap aasani se deside kar sakte hai ki aapko kya karna hai. Aapko ye bhi sochna padega ki agar aap blogging me apna career banane me agar fail ho gaye to fir aapke hath me kya rahega or aapke ek fesle se aapki puri life kesi jayegi wo depend karti hai to aap ye fesla aap aasani se naa le or iske liye achi se soche. me abhi kuch bate batane wala hu unke ware me jarur soche. Agar aap Blogging karte hai ya koi bhi aesa kaam karte hai jisme aapka koi bose nahi rahega to aapko faida ye hai ki aap jab chahe kaam kar sakte hai or aapko kisi se dab kar rhene ki bhi jarurat nahi hogi, par iske sath ek nuksan bhi hai agar aap blogging karte hai to wo ye ki aapko kisi ka dar nahi rhega ki agar mera ye kaam nahi huaa to koi muje datega isse hoga ye. ho sakta hai aap aapna kaam time par naa kare jisse aapko blogging me bada nuksan ho sakta hai or blogging me fail hone ka karan bhi ye ban sakta hai. To agar aap blogging me apna career banana chate hai top sabse important hai ki aapka pane upar itna control ho ki aap apna kaam time par sahi tarike se kar sake bina kisi ke dabab ke bina. Blogging karne ka ek faida ye hai ki aapko time ki koi boundary nahi rahegi jese job me rheti hai ki aapko itni baja se itni baje tak kaam karna hai, aap jab chahe jab aapna blogging ka kaam kar sakte hai par yaha bhi ek nuksan hai wo ye ki job me fix time hota hai ki itne time kaam karna hai par blogging me aapko extra time bhi dena hoga. khene ka matlab hai agar aap job karte hai to aapko 8 ghante kaam karna hai par agar aap blogging karte hai ya koi bhi Business karte hai to aapko 24 ghante apna dimag apne kaam ko dena hoga, haa aap apne dusre kamo ke liye bhi usme se time nikal sakte hai par aap yaha ye nahi soch sakte ki aap free ho or aapke pass ab bhut jada time hai. Agar aap kahi job karte hai to aapko office jana padta hai par agar aap blogging karte hai to aap kahi se bhi apna blogging kaa kaam kar sakte hai. Job me ye bhi ho sakta hai aapko apni family se dur kisi dusri city me rhena pade, par blogging karne ke liye aapko kahi dur jane ki jarurat nahi. yaha bhi ek baat jo dhiyan dene wali hai wo ye ki aap apna kaam kahi se bhi kar sakte hai par aapko apna ek alag office setup karna hi padega warna aap sahi se apna blogging ka kaam nahi kar payege. Aap ek Office setup kare, or apna fix time rakhe ki muje itne time blogging ka kaam karna hai iske aalawa kuch nahi karna to jada acha rahega. Me sirf blogging karta hu, fir bhi me apni family se dur rheta hu, isliye nahi ki muje dur rhena pasand hai, walki is liye q ki agar me ghar rahuga to blogging par tikh se dhiyan nahi de paoga. to agar aapko bhi aesa lagta hai to aap apne ghar se thoda dur apna offic setup kare. nahi to hoga ye ki aapki family ko lagega ki aap job to karte nahi to kuch bhi kaam hoga to aapko hi karne ke liye bolege. isliye aap fix time rakhe or ye samje ki ye aapko job hi hai. Jese agar aapme koi talent hai ya kuch bhi aapme special hai jo aap logo ko bata sakte hai ho, sikha sakte ho, help kar sakte ho to blogging uske liye best hai. Aap blog bana kar puri duniya se apna talent share kar sakte hai. Agar aap job karte hai to aapko wo hi kaam karna padega jo company aapko karne ko kahegi, to aese me bhut kam chances hai ki aapko jo pasand hai aapko ussi me koi kaam mile. Agar aapko Amir banna hai to aap job karke nahi ban sakte, uske liye aapko khud ka kuch kaam karna padega. Job karne me ham jo kaam karte hai uski mhenat ka fal company ko milta hai par agar ham khud ka busniess karte hai to hamare jitni mhenat hogi uska pura fal hame hi milega. Par agar aap jada mhenat nahi kar sakte to aapke liye job hi sahi hai. Ye aadat hona bhi bhut jaruri hai new-new chijo ko sikhne ki cha, or kuch new karne ka junun. sath sath aapko dhirya or sant bhewar ka hona bhi blogging me lambe time tak bane rhene ke liye.
