hum purohiti ki mahaan sharir ki tarah ikatta hue hain, dono yaha Sammelan Kendra aur duniya bhar ke sthaanon par. Main abhaari hoon apne zimmedari ke liye vinamar hokar tumhe kuch baaton ko batlaane mein. Main prarthna karta hoon ki Prabhu ki Aatma mere saath ho jab ki main ayesa karun.

1939, February 14 ko, Germany, Hamburg mein, ek sarwajanik aokaash mana rahe the.Daya bhare bhaashanon ke dauraan, utsahik bheed, deshbhakt gaana ga rahe the, naya jangi jahaaz Bismarck ko Nadi Elbe mein pahali baar utarah gaya tha. Yah,sab se shaktishaaly jahaaz paani par, ek asaadhaaran kawaj aur mashinari ka parchaai tha. Nirmaan ke liye 380-milimitar tak 57,000 blueprints, raedar-simit, dohari-bandukh kalash ki zaroorat tha. Jahaaz mein 28,000 miles 45,000 km ke bijali sarcut the. Yah 35,000 tan se ziyada aur ke kawaj-palate ne mahaan surakhcha pradaan kiya tha. Dikhne mein alishaan, akaar mein vishaal, golabari mein bhayankar, nadubne waala mahaan jahaaz batlaya gaya tha.

jab 24 May, 1941 mein, British Navy ke do shaktishaaly ladaai ke jahaaz, the Prince of Wales aur the Hood, ke ladaai mein Bismarck aur German cruiser Prinz Eugen shamil the. Paanch hi mimton mein Bismarck ne Hood ko Atlantic mein dubo diya aur sabhi parantu 1,400 mein se teen yaatri. Dusre British ladaai waale jahaaz, the Prince of Wales, ko bahot nuksaan hua tha aur waapis chala gaya.

Bismarck dobara phir ladaai par nikla, is baar British ke chaar ladaai waale jahaz se aur hawaaijahaz se. Kul milaakar, British ne paanch ladaai waale jahaaz, do planen, 11chote, aur 21 tezi se ladne waale jahaazon ka istamaal kiya tagatwar Bismarck ko dhoondne aur dubone ke prayaas mein.

kai missiles ko Bismarck par chode kewal kuch hi bahari nusaan pahucha tha use. Wah duba nahi? Phir tarpedo ne ek safal gola mara, jisneBismarck ke rudder ko bandh kar diya. Use banana namumkin tha. Bandukein chalne ko taeyaar thi aur chalane waale taeyaar, Bismarck sirf dhire gol mein chal sakta tha. Kuch hi duri par shaktishaaly German hawaai jahaaz tha. Bismarck desh ka fatak tak nahi pahuch paya.Weh surakhcha ka sthaan nahi pradaan kar paye, kyuki Bismarck ne yojna bhare chalne ka chamta kho diya tha. Rudder nahi the, madad nahi mila, faatak tak nahi pahuch paya tha. Uska ant nazdeek tha. British bandukhuon ne prajwalit kiya jabki German dal ne bardaad kar diya aur ek mazboot jahaaz ko dubo diya. Atlantic ke bhukhe laharon ne pahale diwaaron ko toda aur phir German saenik ke ghamand ko todh diya. Bismarck ab nahi tha.1

hum sab bhi inginary ke chamatkaar hain. Humari rachna, phirbhi, insaan ke chamta mein nahi tha. Insaan bahot hi mushkil ke mashin ko bana sakta hai parantu usmein jaan nahi daal sakta ya usmein kaaran aur parinaam ke shakti nahi de sakta. Yeh diviye uphaar hain, sirf Parmeshwar dwara banaya gaya hua.

bhaaiyon, hume raasta diya gaya hai jis par hume chalna hai. Prabhu ki roshnighar sanket kar raha hai hum sab ko jabki hum jiwan ke samundra mein taer rahein hain. Humara kaarye hai ki hum sidhe apni manzil ki oar badhein-Parmeshwar ki celestial raajye ki oar. Ek insaan usi tarah nahi jaese bina rudder ka jahaaz, kabhi ghar ke faatak tak nahi pahuchega. Hume chin milta hai ki maarg banao kis oar jana hai, apne manzil tak ke liye taeyaari karo, apne paiye ko usi oar ghumao, aur aage badho.

yah insaan ke saath bhi hai. Engin aur paiyon ki shakti bekaar hai bina maargdarshan ke, us shakti ki istamaal, maargdarshan par chalne ki shakti ka disha, dikhlaai nahi dena, chote akaar mein parantu bahot hi kaam ka hai.

chaand, aur taaron ko banaya hai-swarg ke galax ies ko machuon ko maarg dikhlane ke liye jo samundar mein taertein hain. Humare liye, jab hum jiwan ke maarg par chalenge, Wah saaf taur se maarg dikhlata hai aur usi oar ishara karta hai jaha hume jana hai. Wah satarkh karta hai chakkar, khatron, chal se bacho. Hum apne aap ko unse dhoka nahi dekhne denge jo hume gumrah kartein hain, weh chatur paap ke lubhaane waale rang-birangi cheezon se bacho. Balki, hume prarthna karna chahiye hume chote saral awaaz ko sunna chahiye jo humare aatma ke ant tak batlata hai Swaami ke dayabhare nimantaran ko, Aao, mere piche ho lo. 2
jo aagya ka paalan nahi karenge, jo khudh ke banaye hue maarg par chalenge. Unhein bahot ziyada bahekawe se guzarna padhata hai jo hum sab ke ird-gird hai aur jo bahot khatarnaak ho sakta hai.

hume duniya mein mushkilon ke samay rakha gaya hai. Hum is musibaton bhare duniya mein jaha sabhi oar jhagdon ki baochaar hai mein rahatein hain. Raajniti ka khel desh ko barbaad kar raha hai, nirdehi shakti ko pakad rahe hai, aur sangaton ke khand tut rahe hain, aosar se maharum aur asafalta ke ahessas se chale jaatein hain. Insaan ke sujhaao humare kaanon mein bajh rahein hain, aur humare ird-gird paap hotin hain.

humara purohiti humare saath hota hai. Kya hum pavitra sthaanon par rahatein hain? Kripa, jab tum khud ko aur apne purohiti ko khatre ke sthaan mein rakhtein ho ya un gatividhiyon mein bhaag lene se jo tumhare laayak nahi hai ya us tarah ka purohiti, jismein musibaton ko utana pade.

hum dosron ke liye sabhi uddhaaran hotein hai karne ke liye. Devdut Paul ne batlaya, Par vachan, aur chaal-chalan, aur prem, aur vishwaas, aur pavitrata mein vishwaasiyon ke liye adesh ban ja. 3 Usne yah bhi likha ki Maseeh ke piche chalne waalon ko duniya ki roshni ki tarah banna chahiye 4 Sachchai ke uddhaaran ko dene se buraai se bhare duniya mein sachchai prapt ho sakta hai.

jisne chaar Girjaghar ke Adhyakshtaoun ke salaahakaar ki tarah sewa kiya hai. Usne sachchaai ke uddhaaran ko sidha uske kaam ke vehapaar bhar mein, Canada ke sarkaar ki sewa ke dauraan, aur Ishu Maseeh ke Devdut ki tarah . Usne hume yah prerit bhare salaah ko diya Susamachaar ke shikshan ko jine se ziyada khushi aur safalta kuch bhi nahi dega. Ek uddhaaran banno achchaai ke liye prabhaao dalo.
hume Anant Naaowik ki maargdarshan ki zaroorat hai-mahaan Jehovah ki bhi. Hum madad ke liye pukaartein hain, hum swarg se pukaartey hain swarg ki madad ke liye.

Adam aur Eve ka putra tha. Shakti mein balwaan parantu kaarye mein kamzoor, Cain bhukha, jarantua, aagya na maanne waale ko aagya dene waala ban gaya tha, aur katal karne se us veyaktigat chakar ko todh diya tha jo use surakhcha aur mukti deta. Cain ne swarg ke cheezon se ziyada duniya dari ke cheezon se prem kiya Cain kathor ho gaya tha aur paap ki oar chal pada tha.

Parmeshwar ke ek sewak ko nirakhchin kiya gaya.Swarg se prerna ko prapt karke, Daniel, ne raja ke liye diwaar par likhe hue ko samjhaya. Inaam jo use prapt hua tha ko dekhkar-ek raaj wansh ka robe, ek sone ka chen, aur raajniti ki shakti-Daniel ne kaha, Apne dhan apne hi paas rakh aur jo badalna tu dena chahata hai, wah dusre ko de. 6 Bahot payese aur shakti Daniel ko deni chahi thi, duniya dari ki cheezon ko aur Parmeshwar ka nahi. Daniel ne nikaar kar diya aur vishwaasi bana raha.

Daniel ne Parmeshwar ki bhakti ki bhale hi yah tae hua tha ki ayesa nahi kiya ja sakta, use gaddhe mein shero ke saath fenk diya gaya tha. Bible mein likhi hui katha hume batlati hai ki dusre subeh, Daniel ko gaddhe mein se nikaala gaya, aur us par haani ka koi chin nahi paya gaya, kyuki wah apne Parmeshwar par vishwaas . 7 Khatre ke zaroorat ke samay mein, Daniel ka vishwaasi rahane ka kaarye ne diviye bachaao kiya aur surakhcha ka sharan sthaan pradaan kiya. Is tarah ka bachaao aur surakhcha humara ho sakta hai jab hum apne jiwan ki gaadi ko anant ghar ki oar le jaayenge .

balu ghadi ki ret ki tarah, samay ke raastey par chalo. Naye dal ke khiladiyon ne jiwan ke samay ko bhar diya hai. Humare din ke musibatein hume daratein hain. Duniya bhar ke itihaas mein, Shaitaan ne Parmeshwar ke chelon ko musibat dene ke liye humesha karye kiya. Agar hum uske bahekawe mein padh jaatein hain, hume- taagatwarBismarck ki tarah-us rudder ko kho dega jo hume maargdarshan dega surakhchit sthaan tak pahunchne mein. Balki, bhale hi humare paas insaani nipunta ka banawat ho, hum swarg se annat maargdarshan ko chahatein hain, taaki hum dekhein aur ek sache aur sahi kaarye ko karein. Humare Swarg ke Pita humare sachche aagya ko kabhi jawaab diye bagair nahi raheinge. Jab hum swarg se madad chahatein hain, humara rudder, Bismarck ki tarah nahi hoga, kabhi tutega nahi.

hum jiwan ke samundar mein surakhchit rahein. Humare paas Daniel jaysi shakti ho, taaki paap ke aur humare ird-gird ke bahakawe ke bawajood hum sachche aur vishwaasi rahein. Humari gawahi Jacob ki tarah shaktishaaly aur mazboot rahe, Nephi ke bhaai, jo, jab us aadmi jo uske saamne sabhi tarikoun ko aazmaaya tha uske vishwaas ko todne ke liye, ne batlaya, Wah apne vishwaas se digh nahi sakta tha.

Prabhu sabhi deshon ko, apne raashtra aur bhaasha mein, apni vaani ki shiksha logon ko deta hai. 1 Aaj yeh dharamshaastra ki purti ek baar phir hui hai jab mujhe apne ehsaas batlaane ka maoka mila hai apne maatra bhaasha mein.

jab mai Uruguay-Paraguay Mission mein ek jawaan prachaarak tha. Mission par mere pehle mahine mein, zone ke netaaon ne ek gatividhi rakhi ek susamachaar ke siddhaant ko dikhlaane ke liye. Zone ka har prachaarak ke aankh par patti baandhi gayi, aur hamein batlaya gaya ki hamein ek patle maarg par chalke ek bade kamre tak jaana tha. Hamein ek hi neta ki aawaaz ko sunkar, jo pehle se batlaya gaya hai, uske paas pahunchna hai. Haalaanki, hamein chetaoni di gayi thi ki safar ke daoraan, hamein kayi aawaazein sunaai dengi jo hamein uljhaega aur gumraah karna chahenga hamare maarg se.

baate karne ke baad, aur iske daoraan ek awaaz jisne kaha, Mere piche ho lo, mai nidar tha ki mai sahi aawaaz ka picha kar raha hoon. Jab hum bade kamre tak pahunche, hamein apne aankh ki patti ko kholne ko kaha gaya. Jab maine aysa kiya, maine jaana ki wahan do dal the aur mai us dal mein tha jisne galat aawaaz ka picha kiya tha. Mainne apneaap se kaha, Yeh aawaaz to bilkul sahi aawaaz ki tarah sunaai de raha tha.
Kabhi bhi, galat aawaaz ko nahin sunna. Phir maine khud se kaha, Haan, Prabhu, Main Aapke Piche Ho Lunga.
sidha, aur shaktishaali nimantran hai jo hum paate hai. Woh ek saaf aawaaz se aata hai jisse hum uljhenge nahin.

Mere piche ho le, Mere saath chalo. Har ek baar yeh kuch kar dikhane ka nimantran tha. Yeh sabhi manushye jaati ke liye hai uske dwara jo bhavishyevaktaaon ya Bhavishyevakta hai, shikshakon ka Shikshak, Parmeshwar ka Putra, Maseeha hai.

Kya tum Mormon Dharamshaastra padhoge? Kya tum prarthna karoge? Kya tum girjaghar jaaoge? Kya tum Ishu Maseeh ka uddhaaran par chaloge aur adhikaar rakhe hue se baptisma loge? 4 Aaj tum is nimantran ka kaisa jawaab doge?5

Minas, Uruguay ka, prachaarakon ke saath bhent kar rahe the. Kyunki elders paath ke daoraan kayi sawaal puchte the, unhonne tay kiya ki woh ek gaersadasye padosi ek sundar 14-varsh ki Norma namak ladki ko bulaenge jawaab dene mein madad karne ke liye. Norma bahut hi utsuk haae skool vidhyaarthi thi jo is varsh skool mein Bible dharamshaastra adhyan kar rahi thi, isliye jab prachaarakon ne usse ek sawaal pucha, Norma turant jawaab de deti. Woh ek mahatvapurn jaanjhkarta thi. Us din a paath Gyaan ke Shabd Word of Wisdom par tha.

Norma jaan gayi thi ki use kya karna hai. Usne apni maa se kaha, Maa, ab mujhe dudh ke saath coffee milakar mat dena. Sirf dudh dena. Uske us nirnay se uska ichcha dikh raha tha ki woh Maseeh ka nimantran swikaar karna chahati thi, jo prachaarakon ne usse pucha tha.

Norma ke uddharan ko dekh kar, uske maata, pita, aur bhaai bahan ne bhi baptisma liya. Norma aur mai ek saath bade hue us chote magar shaktishaali shaakha mein. Baad mein, jab mai prachaar sewa se waapas laota, hum ne shaadi kar li. Mujhe hamesha pata tha ki use apne saath rakhkar Uddhaarkarta ke piche ho lena aasaan ho jaaega.
use ek saaf nimantran ke saath jawaab mila Aao, mere paas. 8 Haalaanki, bhale hi nimantran saral tha, woh bina balidaan ka nahin tha. Uske liye mehnat chahiye tha nirnay aur kriya ke saath.
mere priye bhaaiyon, bina Pita ki aagyaaon ka paalan kiye hum kya Maseeh ka anukaran kar sakte hai? 9
Unki aawaaz ko sunne, aur uspar amal karne ka nimantran shuruaat se prachaarakon ka sandesh raha hai, kayion ko madad kiya hai achchaai ke liye apne aap ko badalne mein.

unhonne is maoke ka faaeda uthaaya aur mere pita aur maata se susamachaar ke baare mein baat ki. Mere pita ne prachaarakon ko swikaar kiya, aur meri maata ne Maseeh ke sandesh aur nimantran ko apnaaya. Us din se aaj tak, woh Girjaghar mein sakriye rahi hai. Usne kaha, Haan, Prabhu, mai Aapke piche ho lungi!
tumhe shakti milegi jiwan ke bojhon ko sehne ka, chaahe shaaririk ya aatmik, aur andar se achcha badlaao anubhav karoge jo tumhe khush rehne mein madad karega.

kathor-hriday waale logon ke paas susamachaar prachaar karne ke liye bheja gaya tha. Woh uske yogye nahin mehsoos kar raha tha. Use sandeh hua ki kya woh aysa kar paaega. Prabhu ne uske mann ko shaant kiya aur uske vishwaas ko mazboot kiya Mere saath chalo nimantran ke zariye ek nimantran jo, ek andhe ki laathi ya ek dost ke haath ke jaisa hota, kisi ke hum safar ban sakta hai jo nishchayi nahin hai. Uddhaarkarta ka haath lekar aur Unke saath chalne se, Enoch ne paaya ki woh saahasi ho gaya aur ek achcha prachaarak aur ek bhavishyevakta ban gaya.10
aur tab hum Uske saath chal sakte hai. Is darje par hum Uddhaarkarta ke saath nazdeeki rishta bana sakte hai pehla nimantran swikaarne ka hamara fal.

bahut mehnat se, Uddhaarkarta ka kapda chuh paayi thi11 aur phir ya Bartimaeus jo andha tha ki tarah jiska ichcha zaroori tha uske jiwan mein ghate chamatkaar mein.12 Donon kisson mein shareer aur aatma ki changaai hui thi.
Unka kapda chu lo, Unka nimantran swikaar karo, aur kaho, Haan, Prabhu, mai Aapke piche ho lunga! aur Unke piche chalo.

Mere piche ho lo, aur Mere saath chalo nimantranon ke shakti adhik hai aap logon ke liye jo use swikaar karte hai taaki tum apne aap ko badlo aurandar ek badlaao laao jo tumse kehlaaega, Mai shaetaan ke kaaryon ko nahin karunga, par sadeo achche karam hi karunga. 13
tumhe kamzor ki madad karne ka, latke hue haathon ko uthaane ka, aur kamzor ghutnon ko mazboot karna ka ichcha jaagega. 14
Haan, Prabhu, mai Aapke piche ho lunga! Sirf sachchaai jaanne se tumhari duniya nahin badal jaaegi jabtak tum gyaan ko karm mein na badloge.18

Pradhaan Thomas S. Monson, ke shabd hamein Uddhaarkarta ke nimantran ko swikaarne aur karne mein uksaate hai. Pradhaan Monson ne kaha Woh mahima ka Raaja kaun hai, yeh praaniyon ka Prabhu? Woh hamare Swami hai. Woh hamare Uddhaarkarta hai. Woh Parmeshwar ka Putra hai. Woh hamein Mukti Dilaane Waala hai. Woh kehta hai, Mere piche ho le. Woh sikhlaata hai, Jaao, aur waisa hi kar. Woh niwedan karta hai, Mere aagyaaon ka paalan karna. 20
aur tab shaayad Unke nimantran ka hamara jawaab zor aur saaf se sunaai dega Haan, Prabhu, mai Aapke piche ho lunga! 21 Prabhu Ishu Maseeh ke pavitra naam se, amen.
tum ek baar phir apne dhaarmik saahas ko aaj bada sakte ho agar tum sunne aur amal mein laane ki ichcha rakhte ho.

aap Parmeshwar ke saamne apne dhaarmik saahas ki tulna kaise karoge? Kya aapke paas ek niji gawahi hai ki aapka vartamaan ka bhent ek Antim-din Sant ke mein paryaapt hai anant jiwan paane ke liye? Kya aap maante hai ki Swarg ke Pita aapse prasann hai? Kya baate mann mein aaenge agar abhi se ek minat mein Uddhaarkarta ke saath aapka niji vaartalaabh ho jaaye? Kya paap, niraashaaen, aur galtiyaan tumhare apne aap ki drishti mein hai, ya phir aap khushi se intazaar karenge? Kya aap Unke aankhon mein dekhoge ya Unse nazre churaaoge? Kya aap darwaaze par khade rahoge ya Unki or badoge?

tab woh ek dusht chaal chalta hai taaki tumhare aur Parmeshwar ke beech dooriya paeda ho jaaye. Shatru jaanta hai ki Maseeh mein vishwaas woh vishwaas jo lagataar komal daya aur prabhaoshaali chamatkaar utpann karta rehta hai ek niji saahas ki tarah hai ki tum sahi chunne ki koshish kar rahe ho. Is kaaran woh tumhare mein tumhe jhut batlaaega woh jhut jisse Swarg ke Pita tumse niraash ho jaaye, ki tum Praeshchit ke ashirvaadon ke laayak nahin ho, ki koshish karne mein koi faaeda nahin, ki sabhi log tumse behtar hai, ki tum ayogye ho, aur ek hazaar usi tarah ke baatein.

tum sachchi saahas se Parmeshwar ke singhaasan ki or nahin badoge. Tum jo bhi karoge, jis kisi bhi cheez ke liye prarthna karoge, jo bhi chamatkaar ki aashaaen hongi, wahan hamesha paryaapt aatma-shanka hoga tumhare vishwaas ko kam karne ke liye Parmeshwar mein tumhare vishwaas ko hi nahin, parantu tumhare saahas khud mein bhi ho. Susamachaar ko is tarah se jine mein koi maza nahin hai, aur na to yeh bahut swasthpurn hai. Sabse zaroori, yeh to ekdam anavashyak hai! Badalne ka nirnay tumhara hai aur sirf tumhara hai.

agar paalan kiya jaaye, to saare bure aawaaz gum ho jaaenge aur tumhe phirse woh shantipurn ashwaasan aur dhaarmik saahas milega jo agar tum chaaho to paa sakte ho. Ek 1 se-le- kar- das 10 ke beech ki jo bhi tulna tum ne apne liye ki thi, ab Ishu Maseeh ke Praeshchit ko apnaane se, tum ek baar phir apne dhaarmik saahas ko aaj bada sakte ho agar tum sunne aur amal mein laane ki ichcha rakhte ho. Mai nidarta purwak bolunga, is aasha ke saath ki sudhaar aa sake na ki bura lage.

safaai dena band kijiye, aur vajah nikaalna ki aap kyun aagyaakaari nahin ban paa rahein hai band kijiye. Maano ki tum shareer se swatantra ho aur swatantra ho swatantrata aur anant jiwan chunne ke liye 2 Nephi 227. Prabhu tumhare paristhitiyon ko bhali bhati jaanta hai, magar Woh yeh bhi jaanta hai ki chunn lete ho ki susuamachaar ko purn rup se na jiya jaae. Agar yeh baat hai, to utna imaandaar raho ki tum woh keh sako, aur apne hi paristhitiyon ke andar tum nipunn hone ki koshish karo. Dhaarmik saahas badta hai jab tum apne dhaarmik sukh zimmedaari lete ho Ishu Maseeh ka Praeshchit har din apnaane se.

jo ki ek mandir hai, aksar aatmik takraao aur aatma sammaan ko utpann karega. Agar tum mote ya patle ho, agar tum apne shareer se na khush ho aur uske baare mein kuch kar sakte ho, to kijiye! Elder Russell M. Nelson ne sikhlaya ki hamein apne shareer ko ek mandir ke tarah sawaarna chahiye aur hamein apne khaane peene par dhyaan dena aur paryaapt kasrat karna chahiye We Are Children of God, Ensign, Nov. 1998, 87 Liahona, Jan. 1999, 103.

Feb. 2, 2003, 2 speeches.byu.edu. Isliye, samajhdaari barte aap apne khaane par aur khaaskar apne khaane ki maatra par aur yeh jaane ki apka shareer kitna kasrat seh sakta hai. Agar aap shaaririk rup se tandurust hai, aaj nirnay kijiye ki aap apne shareer ko sambhaalenge aur ek sahi, lambe-samay ka kasrat yojna banaye aur ek swasth bhojan yojna bhi banaye, apni chamtaaon ko dhyaan mein rakh kar. Dhaarmik saahas badh jaata hai jab tumhara aatma, Uddhaarkarta ke madad se, puri tarah se zimmedaar ho jaata hai tumhare swabhaawik prakriti ke purush ya mahila ke.

to meri aagyaaon ko maanoge John 1415. Thoda aagyaakarita thode hi ashirvaad laata hai, aur kuch bura chunna bajae kuch bahut bura ke phir bhi galat chunaao kaha jaata hai. Tum ek buri film nahi dekhkar shudh nahin mehsoos kar sakoge kyunki tumne ek bahut buri film nahin dekhi. Kuch aagyaaon ko achchi tarah nibhaane se anye aagyaaon ka thukraana maaf nahin kiya jaata. Abraham Lincoln ne sahi kaha Jab mai achcha karta hoon mai achcha mehsoos karta hoon, jab mai bura karta hoon mai bura mehsoos karta hoon in William H. Herndon and Jesse William Weik, Herndon s Lincoln The True Story of a Great Life, 3 vols. 1889, 3439.

sahi cheezein karein sahi vajahon ke liye. Prabhu, jo jo ek hriday aur ek ichchapurn mann chahata hai DC 6434 aur jo dil ke baaton ko jaanta aur samajhta hai DC 331, jaanta hai kyun tum girjaghar jaate ho kya tum sirf wahan shareer mein hote ho ya sach much araadhna kar rahe ho. Tum Raviwaar ko O Babylon, O Babylon, I bid thee farewell gaaoge aur phir kuch chanon baad uska anand le sakoge Ye Elders of Israel, Hymns, no. 319. Yaad rakho ki dhaarmik cheezon ko halke se lene se khushi nahin praapt hoti hai. Girjaghar aur punahsthaapit susamachaar ko apna pura jiwan banaao, na sirf apne baahari ya dikhaawe ka jiwan. Aaj chunna ki tum kiski sewa karoge sirf kehne ki baat hai jabtak tum usi tarah se jeene na lago dekhiye Joshua 2415. Dhaarmik saahas badta hai jab tum sach mein koshish karoge, sahi vajah ke liye, ek samarpit jiwan jeene ke liye tumhare sabhi kamzoriyon ko lekar!

tumhe chaubiso ghante use karte rehna hai, kyunki uske ashirvaad kabhi khatm nahin hote. Ishu Maseeh ke Praeshchit aur pashchataap ko ayse apnaao jaise Mahaan DaactarIshu Maseeh ke aadesh par har din tum dawaaiya lete ho. Aadat daal lo lagataar, khushi se, anand ke saath pashchataap karne ka taaki yeh tumhare jiwan guzaarne ka chunaao ban jaaye. Aysa karne mein, dhyaan dein ki tum samay na barbaad karo, aur auron ka intazaar na karo tumhe aashwaasan dene ke liye. Apna dhyaan Uddhaarkarta par tikaa kar, yeh parwaah karein ki Woh tumhare baare mein kya sochta hai, aur parinaam aane do.Dhaarmik saahas badhti hai jab tum swanye ichcha aur anandit hokar apne chote aur bade, paapon ka pashchataap karte hai, jis samay woh hota hai Ishu Maseeh ke Praeshchit ko apnaane se.

Prabhu, unhein maaf karunga jise mai chaahun, magar tumhare liye zaroori hai sabhi manushye ko maaf karna DC 6410. Har ek insaan, har cheez ko, har samay, maaf karna ya koshish karna, taaki tumhare jiwan mein maafi aaye. Dushmani na rakhe, aasaani se bura na maan lein, jald se maaf karein aur bhul jaayein, aur kabhi nahin sochein ki tumhe yeh aagya nahin maanna hai. Dhaarmik saahas badta hai jab tum jaante ho ki Prabhu jaanta hai ki tumhe kisi aur insaan se dushmani nahin hai.

rukaawaton, aur achambhon ko apne maransheel anubhav ka ek bhaag samjhein. Yaad rakhiye ki tum yahan sahi aur nipunn tay hone ke liye aaye ho, yeh dekhne ke liye ki tum woh sab karoge jo Prabhu tumhare Parmeshwar tumhe batlaayega Abraham 325 aur mai yeh bhi kahun, chaahe jo bhi paristhiti ho. Tumhare kayi milyan bhaai aur bahanein pariksha le chuke hai ya usse guzar rahe hai, to tumhe kyun baksha jaaega? Kuch musibatein tumhare apne unaagyaakaarita ya laaparwaahi ka natija hote hai. Anye musibatein aati hai kyunki koi aur laaparwaah reh chuka hai ya is kaaran kyunki yeh duniya pehle se hi buri hai. Jab yeh musibatein aati hai, shatru ke chelein yeh batlaane lagte hai ki tumne kuch galat kiya hai, ki yeh ek saza hai, ek chinnh ki Swarg ke Pita tumse prem nahin karte. Ise nazarandaaz kar dein! Balki, ek muskaan laaye, swarg ki or dekhein, aur kahe, Prabhu, mai samajhta hoon. Mai jaanta hoon yeh kya hai. Woh samay jab mai khud ko tumhare laayak banaau, hai na? Phir Unke saath milkar ant tak jhelein. Dhaarmik saahas badta hai jab tum yeh maan lo ki aksar musibaton aur kashton ko tumhare jiwan mein aane diya jaata hai kyunki tum kuch sahi kar rahe ho Glenn L. Pace, Crying with the Saints Brigham Young University devotional, Dec. 13, 1987, 2 speeches.byu.edu.

maine apne ek sabse vishwaasi bahanon se pucha ki kyun woh khud ke liye itni sakht rehti hai, kyun woh khud ko chote chote galtiyon par sudhaarti thi. Uska jawaab ek ayse vyakti ki tarah tha jo hamesha galat aawaaz ko sunta hai, usne kaha, Isliye koi mere jaisa nahin hai.

mera jo salaah tha is bahan prachaarak ke liye wahi tumhare liye bhi hai apne kamzoriyon ko swikaar karo, par unke kaaran koshish karna mat chodo, un mein se kuch tumhare saathi bane rahenge jab tak tum yeh jiwan na chod do. Chaahe jo bhi tumhare abhi ka stithi ho, jab bhi tum imaandaar, khushaal, daenik pashchataap ko apnaaoge sabse behtar bankar, Uddhaarkarta ka Praeshchit tumpar samet lega aur tumhare saath chalega, khud hi, jaha kahi bhi tum jaaoge. Is tarah se jeene se, tum sach mein sadeo apne paapo ki chama praapt karoge Mosiah 412 har din ke har ghante, har minat ke har ek chan, aur is tarah puri tarah saaf aur Parmeshwar ke saamne laayak hamesha rahoge.

agar tum chaaho, ki khud ke liye jaano, aaj ya jald hi, ki tum apne kamzoriyon ke sahit Parmeshwar ko khush rakh paa rahe ho. Mai ek premi Uddhaarkarta ki gawahi deta hoon jo chahata hai ki hum aagyaakari ho. Mai ek premi Uddhaarkarta ki gawahi deta hoon jo utsuk hai Apne anugrah aur daya ko humpar undelne ke liye. Mai ek premi Uddhaarkarta ki gawahi deta hoon jo anand manata hai jab hum Unke Praeshchit ko har din shaant aur khush aashwaasan ke saath istemaal karte hai aur hum sahi disha mein jaa rahe hai. Mai ek premi Uddhaarkarta ki gawahi deta hoon jo utsuk hai ki tumhara saahas Parmeshwar ki upasthiti mein mazboot ho jaaye DC 12145.Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.

us shaam se pehle jab Woh Khudko sabhi maanav jaata ko chudaane ke daan mein de diya. Jab Usne Apne chelon ke saath roti ko toda, Usne kuch kaha jisse unke hriday mein achambha aaya hoga aur gehri udaasi bhi. Usne kaha, Tum mein se ek mujhe pakadwaaega.

Shaayad yeh Bhaai Rama ke baare mein keh raha hai. Maine hamesha uspar shak kiya hai, ya achcha hua ki Bhaai Rama yaha hai. Use yeh sandesh sunne ki zaroorat thi ? Ya kya hum, us samay ke chelon ki tarah, khud ki sochte aur yeh mahatvapurn sawaal apne baare mein puchte Kya woh mai hoon?
phool hamesha khilte the, ped swath aur chaao dene waala. Aisa dikhta tha ki padsi bharpur koshish karta tha ki uska aangan sundar ho.

aur woh kuch karna chahata tha is ke baare mein. Kya woh use sirf ukhaad kar phenk sakta tha? Ya use ped maarne waale dawaai se maar sakta tha? Shaayad agar woh raat ke samay jaaye tab, woh use chupke ukhaad sakta tha.

tab woh kemron ke liye gaayab ho sakta hai. Isliye usne apne pure chehre par neebu ka ras laga liya, baahar gaya, aur do benkon mein daaka daala. Bahut der nahin hui ki use pakad liya gaya jab usi sham ki TV ke samachaar mein uska tasveer aaya. Jab pulis waalo ne aadmi ko Cameron se li gayi vidio dekhaaye, use khud par vishwaas nahin hua. Magar mere chehre par to neebu ka ras tha! usne kaha.3

use dilchaspi hui ki ek aadmi apne hi asamartha ko hi nahin pehchaan paaya. Yeh jaanne ke liye ki kya yeh ek aam samasya hai, do anusandhaankartaaon ne kolaj ke vidhyaarthiyon ko jiwan ke kuch yogyataaon se jude kuch parikshanon mein bhaag lene ke liye amantrit kiya aur phir unse pucha ki woh parinaam ke baare mein kya sochte hai. Jo vidhyaarthi ke jawaab kamzor dikhe unke kaam karne ke dhang ke milaan mein woh apna kaam ka andaaz lagane mein sabse piche the un mein se kuch ke parinaam jitna woh soch rahe the usse paanch guna zyaada tha.4

har baar yahi parinaam par aata hai hum mein se kayi log kathinaai ka saamna karte hai apne aap ko sahi maaine mein dekhne mein, aur kaamyaab log bhi apne khud ke yogdaan ko badha kar batlaate hai aur auron ke yogdaan ko ghata kar batlaate hai.5

kaam, aur girjaghar ke hamare yogdaan jitna hum karte hai se bada hai, tab hum apne aap ko andha kar dete hai ashirvaadon aur mauko ko dekhne se jiske zariye hum khud ko badhiya tarikon se pragati dila sakte the.

ek ward mein rehta tha jiska darja Girjaghar mein uncha tha sabhaaon mein lagbhag sabhi log aate the, gharelu shikshan ke pratishat zyaada the, Praathmik ke bachche hamesha achche kaede ke rehte the, ward mein bhojan ke samay badhiya bhojan aata tha jo ki sabhaghar ke farsh par bahut kam girta tha, aur mujhe lagta hai kabhi Girjaghar ke naachon mein kabhi ladaai nahin hoti thi.
yeh dampati achambhe mein the ki jab woh baahar sewa pradaan kar rahe the, us ward mein 11 dampatiyon ka talaakh ho chuka tha.

unke dilon aur sadasyon ke jiwanon mein kuch ashubh ho raha tha. Aur takleef ki baat yeh hai ki yeh stithi naya nahin hai. Ayse bure aur aksar bekaar ke cheez hote hai jab Girjaghar ke sadasye susamachaar ke siddhaanton se dur ho jaate hai. Baahar se woh Ishu Maseeh ke chelein lagenge, magar unke dilon ke andar unhonne Uddhaarkarta aur Unke shikshan ko alag kar diya hai. Woh dhire dhire dhaarmik cheezon se dur ho gaye hai aur duniya ke cheezon ke kareeb ho gaye hai.

aasaan ho jaata hai bahane banana ki kyun Parmeshwar se prarthna nahin karein, dharamshaastra adhyan baad mein kyun karein, Girjaghar sabhaaon aur gharelu shaam sabhaaon se dur rahe, ya imaandaari se daswa hissa aur bhenton ko na bhare.
jo tumhare bharose mein saopa gaya tha ?6 Kya tumne is sansaar ke parmeshwar ko mauka diya ki tumhare budhi ko andhi kar dein taaki Maseeh ke vishaal susamachaar ka prakaash tum par na chamke ?7
ya woh parishrami Ishu Maseeh ke shikshan par kendrit hai? Kyunki jahan tumhara dhan hoga, wahan tumhara dil bhi hoga. 8

agar yeh tumhari ichcha hai ki apneaap mein Maseeh jaise gunon ko laao jaise ki vishwaas, sadgun, gyaan, santulan, shaanti, bhaai se dayaluta, ishwartav, dayaluta, vinamrata, aur sewa, 10 Swarg ke Pita tumhe Apne haathon ke aozaar banaenge kayi logon ko uddhaar dilaane ke liye.11

hum mein se koi nahin batlaana chahata ki hum sachche raah se bhatak rahe hai. Aksar hum apne andar nahin dekhna chahate aur apne kamzoriyon, paabandhiyaan, aur dar ka saamna nahin karna chahate. Isi kaaran, jab bhi hum apne jiwanon ka nirikshan karte hai, hum aysa ek filtar ke madad se karte hai jahan tarafdaari, bahano, aur kahaniyon se hum khud ko batlaate hai ki hamare soch aur karam ayogye nahin the.

tab Uddhaarkarta ka mukti dene waalu shakti unhein change nahin karegi aur mazboot nahin banaegi.12 Pratikul tarike se, hamara andhera hamare maanav kamzoriyon ke prati bhi hamein divye saobhaagye ke prati hamein andha karta hai jo ki hamare Pita chahate ki hamare andar rahe.
yeh mat soche ki kaise yeh shabd kisi aur par laagu hote hai par yeh saral sawaal puchiye Prabhu, kya woh mai hoon?

jo Uddhaarkarta se seekhna aur Unke jaisa banna chahate hai, jo khud ko chote bachche ki tarah vinamra kar lete hai aur hamare Swarg ke Pita se apne soch aur karmon ko milaana chahate hai woh Uddhaarkarta ke Praeshchit ke chamatkaar ko anubhav karenge. Woh zaroor Parmeshwar ke badhiya Aatma ko mehsoos karenge. Unhe ek vineet aur ahankaar rahit hriday ka parinaam anubhav hoga. Unhe Ishu Maseeh ke sachche chelein banne ki ichcha aur kaeda se ashish milega.

mujhe mauka mila hai is duniya ke kuch sabse mehnati aur budhimaan purush aur mahilaaon ko jaanne ka. Jab mai chota tha, mujhe prasannta milti thi unhein dekh jo padhe likhe, sampan, safal, aur jinhe duniya dwara prashansa milta tha. Magar in varshon mein, mainne yeh jaana hai ki mujhe zyaada khushi milti hai ashcharyejanak aur ashishbhare logon ko dekh jo sach mein achche aur bina chal ke hote hai.
aur kya yahi susamachaar hamein deta hai? Yaho to achchi khabar hai, aur yeh hamein madad karta hai achcha banne mein.
hamein apne ghamand ko bagal karna hai, apne dikhaawe ko nazarandaaz kar dena hai, aur vinamrata se puchna hai, Prabhu, kya woh mai hoon?

mere putra, kuch cheezon mein sudhaar laani hai, woh cheezein jismein Mai tumhare madad kar sakta hoon, mai prarthna karta hoon ki hum is jawaab, vinamrata purwak apne paapon aur khaamiyon ko swikaar karenge, aur phir apne rawaiya ko badlenge achche patiyon, achche pitaoun,achche putron ki tarah ban kar. Hum is samay se aage puri koshish karein Uddhaarkarta ke ashish bhare raaste par sthirta se chalne ke liye kyunki khud ko spashtta se dekhna gyaan ka shuruaat hai.
hamara uddaartapurwak Parmeshwar hamare haath pakde hamein le jaaega Prabhu hamein balwaan banaega, aur Parmeshwar dwara hamein ashirvaad milega. 14
ek pehla kadam is vishaal aur sampurn chelapan ke maarg par chalne ka shuruaat hota hai woh saral sawaal puchne se

Google ko 4 September 1998 ko Larry Page aur Sergey Brin ne found kiya tha. Dono hi us waqt Stanford University ke Ph.D. students the. 10 50-60 , Us waqt koi nahi janta tha, jisko ek Research project ke tahat banaya gaya, vo ek din people ke life ka hissa ban jayega. Aaj kuch bhi janan ho to people turant suggestion de dete hai, Google karke dekh lo. Aur aaj every blogger ki first choice hoti hai, uska blog jaldi se jaldi google par aa jaye. Iske main reason hai, Google ne aur Search engines ke compare apne system ko sabse jaldi user friendly banaya aur kai product jaise Gmail, Youtube etc laya. Jisse people ki online life easy ho gai. Is growth ki raftar me Google ne kai amazing secrets aur tricks develop kiye, jise behad kam people hi janate hai. Aaiye janate hai- Google Ke Secrets Tricks 1.Search Askew Askew ka hindi meaning tircha, tedha hota hai. Jise aap Google me search karenge to SERP bhi tircha ho jayega. Kuch is tarah- 2.Search Do a barrel roll Google ke SERP ko 360 degree me ghumaya ja sakte hai. Bas Google search bar me Do a barrel roll likhe aur screen ko dekhiye. SERP ko z or r twice word se bhi 360 degree me spin kar sakte hai. 3.Search Super Mario Bros I am sure aap is game ke jante honge. Yah Game mere childhood ka favorite game tha. Ye game us vakt ka sabse popular game tha. Jiske karan Google ne us vakt ke bachcho lubhane ke liye is game se related ek function ko apne search engine me add kiya tha. Jise janane ke liye Super Mario Bros search kare. Ab SERP ke right side me is game ke bare me description box dikhega, jismen question mark vala red blink karta hua ek box bhi dikhega. Bas aap uspar click kare aur kamal dekhiye. Yadi aapne childhood me ye game khele honge, to aapki childhood ki yaden taji ho gai hogi . Ab aap ji bhar ke coins le sakte hai. 4.Search Zerg rush Ise search karte hi red aur yellow color ke bahut se o aa jate hai, jo search results ko eat kar jate hai. Inhen aap kill bhi kar sakte hai. Bas is par click karte rahe. Par ant me aap apne search results ko nahi bach sakenge. Because ye charo se attack karte hai. Ant me page par Double G ban jata hai. Is dauran aapne jitney o ko mare hai, uska score bhi milata hai. jise aap apne friends ke sath share kar sakte hai. 5.Seach Pac-Man Game Yah Japanese arcade game hai, jise 1980 me banaya gaya tha aur kafi popular raha. Jiskaran yah game kai feature phones me najar aata hai. Aap yadi ise khelana chahte to bas search kare Pac-Man Game aur SERP par khele. 6.Search conways game of life Yah search karte hi SERP par ke dono side se kuch arkriti ubharati hui najar aayegi. Kuch is tarah Ise control box se aap full screen, stop aur resume bhi kar sakte hai. Google ne yah England ke mathematician John Horton ki yad me banaya tha. 7.Love Heart Love ki language Google bhi janta hai, par Google par love heart lana chahte hai to aap search bar me sqrtcosxcos300xsqrtabsx-0.74-xx0.01, sqrt6-x2, -sqrt6-x2 from -4.5 to 4.5 search kare aur result dekhe. 8.Calculator Apko jaldi sa koi mathematical problem solve karana hai to bas Google me calculator search kare. Aapko samane digital calculator open ho jayeg. 9.Definition Kisi word ka definition janane ke liye DefinitionYour Word google search kare. 10.Flight Status Check Google ki help kisi bhi flight ki arrival time aur date jan sakte hai. Bas Google Airline Name aur uske Flight Number enter kare. Kuch is tarah Airline Name 123456 11.Search Specific Filetype Google par kisi tarah ki specific files ko easily search kiya ja sakt hai. Keval is format ko follow kare Filetype File Name PDF file search karne ke liye aap likh sakte hai PDFSEO 12.Kisi bhi City Ka Weather Jane Google me kisi bhi shehar ke name ke aage weather likhe aur result aapke saamne hoga. 13.Allintitle Yadi kisi specific words se related posts hi search karana chahte hai allintitle your word karke seach kare. Your word jin post title me hoga. Google use hi show karega. Isse aap SEO competition bhi check kar sakte hai Search Results ke number dekhe aur is list ko dekhkar determine kare ki aapke word ka SEO competition kitna hai. Under 1,000 Non-competitive 1,000 4,000 Mildly competitive 4,000 6,000 Competitive 6,000 Highly Competitive 14.I am Feeling Lucky Button Is button ko kam hi people use karte hai, lekin jitne bhi use karta hai. Usse Google ko per year $1,00,00,000 ka loss ho jata hai. Because ye I m Feeling Lucky button use karane vale user Google Ad se intract hue bina destination website par chale jate hai. Jisse earning ki bajay Google ko service of cost bharana pad jata hai. 15.BackRub Larry Page aur Sergey Brin ne pahle Google ko backlink checker system ke rup me develop kiya tha. Jiska name BackRub rakha gaya tha. Par bad me iske system ko search engine ke rup develop kiya gaya. Jiska naam Googol rakha. Par company register karte waqt ye domain available nahi tha. Isliye Googol ko Google karna pada. Hope, ye post aapko pasand aaya hoga. Ise jarur share kare.

MAHSOOS KIYA HOGA KE GHAR KA MAHAUL ACHCHA HOTE HUE BHI ACHANAK KUCH AISI PARISTHITIYAAN BAN JAATI HAIN,KE GHAR MEIN AAPAS MEIN MEMBERS KE BEECH VIVAAD ,KALAH UTPANN HO JATA HAI,LEKIN HAMEIN USKA KOI SOLID REASON SAMAJH MEIN NAHIN AATA.KABHI -KABHI YE CHOTE-CHOTE VIVAAD ITNA UGRA ROOP LE LETE HAIN KE POORE PARIWAAR KI SAMPOORNA SHANTI BHANG HO JAATI HAI.HUM SOCHTE RAH JAATE HAIN,LEKIN KARAN HAMAARE SAMAJH MEIN NAHIN AATE.ISKA MAIN REASON GHAR MEIN NEGATIVE ENERGY KA HONA HI HAI, AB SAWAL YEH UTHTA HAI YE NEGATIVE ENERGY KAB AUR KAHAN SE ISS GHJAR MEIN AAYEE?

RISHWATKHORI,BHRASHT TAREEKE SE KAMAAI KARNE SE BACHNE KI SADAA KOSHISH KAREIN,KYONKE ISS TARAH SE KAMAAI GAYEE SAMPATTIDHAN KA UPYOG THEEK TARAH SE LOG NAHIN KAR PAATE HAIN ,UNKI SANTAAN PATHBHRASHT HO JAATI HAIN.
BAHINO,PATNI AUR BETI KA SADAA SAMMAAN KAREIN.ISS SE CHANDRA,BUDH AUR SHUKRA GRAH AAPKE ANUKOOL HO JAATE HAIN.
BAHINBETIBUA ADI KA APMAAN KARNE SEBUDH GRAH AUR PATNI KA APMAAN KARNE SE SHUKRA GRAH OPPOSITEPRATIKOOL HO JAATE HAIN.
GURU AUR ANYA BUJURGON KA SAMMAAN KARNE SE SOORYASUN PLANET AUR GURUBRAHASPATI PLANETGRAH ANUKOOL HO JAATE HAIN.

DESI KAPOOR KA POOJA MEIN PRAYOG KIYA JAATA HAI,DEVI POOJA MEIN KHASKAR PRAYOG KIYA JATA HAI,KYONKE ISMEIN NEGATIVE ENERGY KO EXPEL KARNE KI POWER HAI.ISLIYE LAGBHAG HAR POOJA MEIN DESI KAPOOR KA PRAYOG KIYA JAATA HAI.
KE YE JAHAN BHI HOTA HAI,WAHAN SE VIPATTIYAAN DOOR RAHTI HAIN.TULSI KE PAUDHE KO GHAR KE ISHAAN KON MEINNORTH-EAST LAGAANA CHAAHIYE,YA PHIR MAIN GATE KE PAAS.
YA MAIN GATE KE PAAS LAGAANE SE ENVIRONMENT KE BACTERIA NASHT HO JAATE HAIN,GATE KE PAAS HONE SE NEGATIVE ENERGY KA PRAVESH GHAR MEIN NAHIN HO PAATA HAI.
USMEINPAANI MEIN MUTTHI BHAR NAMAK DAAL KAR HI LAGWAAYEN.ISS SE BHI GHAR KI NEGATIVE ENERGY DOOR HOTI HAI.
US PAANI SE POORE GHAR MEIN FARSH PAR PONCHA LAGWAAYEN,TO GHAR KI NEGATIVE ENERGY DOOR HO JAATI HAI.

YEH NEGATIVE ENERGY DOOR KARNE KA SABSE SARAL AUR SASHAKT SAADHAN HAI.HINDU GRANTHON MEINISKI BAHUT IMPORTANCE BATAAI GAYEE HAI.PRACHEEN KAAL MEIN HAMAARE RISHI-MUNI KOI BHI ANUSHTHAN KARTE THEI,TO PAHLE US JAGAH KO PALE GOBAR SE LEEP KAR US JAGAH KO PANCHGAVYAGOBAR,COW URINE,SHUDDH GAAY KA GHEE, DOODH,DAHI SE PAVITRA KARTE THEI,JIS SE WAHAN KI SAARI NEGATIVE ENERGY DOOR HO JAAYE.

PHIR KISI PHOOL SE YA AAM KE PATTON SE US JAL KO POORE GHAR MEIN CHHIRAK DEIN,TO DHEERE DHEERE POORE GHAR KI NEGATIVE ENERGY TO SAMAPT TO HOTI HI HAI,POORE GHAR KE VAASTU DOSH BHI SAMAPT HO JAATE HAIN.

ISS KI DHOONI DEVI DEVTAAON KE YANTRON AADI KO LAGAANE SE WOH SHUDDH HO JAATE HAIN,POOJA STHAL PAR LOBAAN YA GOOGUL KI DHOONI LAGATAAR JALTE RAHNE SE WAHAN KI SAARI NEGATIVE ENERGY GAYAB HO JAATI HAI.AGAR POORE GHAR MEIN ISKI DHOONI ROZ YA WEEKLY KAM SE KAM DO BAAR LAGAAI JAAYE TO GHAR NEGATIVE ENERGY SE SURAKSHIT RAHTA HAI.

AGAR NIYAM SE ROZ YA WEEKLY KAM SE KAM 3 DIN ISKI DHOONI GHAR MEIN LAGAI JAAYE TO GHAR NEGATIVE ENERGIES KE EFFECT SE BACHA RAHTA HAI.NAVRATRI MEIN ISILIYE LOG GHAR MEIN DAILY KAM SE KAM 9 DIN TAK TO GOOUL KI DHOONI JALATE HAIN JIS SE SAARE GHAR KI NEGATIVE ENERGY GHAR SE BAHAR HO JAAYE.

JO HAMNE AAP LOGON KO DEE HAI,PASAND AAYEE HONGI,AGAR KUCHH SUJHAV DENA CHAHEIN YA KISI PARTICULAR CHEEZ KE BAARE MEIN JAANKAARI CHAHTE HON TO LIKHEIN,HUM KOSHIS KARENGE KE WOH JAANKAARI AAP LOGON KO UPLABDH KARWA SAKEIN.
AGAR CHAHEIN TO HUMSE CONSULT KAR SAKTE HAIN ,SAMADHAAN VEDIC VAASTU SE KIYA JAAYEGA.FROPPER FRIENDS KE LIYE YEH SEWA NISHULK UPLABDH HAI.

hume Pradhaan Thomas S. Monson ke vyaktigat uddhaaran aur purohiti ki sewa se humesha prerna prapt hota hai. Abhi jald, kai deacons se pucha gaya, Pradhaan Monson mein tumhe sab se achcha kya lagta hai? Ek deacon ne batlaya ki kis tarah Pradhaan Monson, jab wah bachcha tha, ne apne khilaunon ko zarooratmand doston ko diya tha. Dusre ne kaha ki kis tarah Pradhaan Monson apne ward ke kai vidwaoun ka dhyaan rakha. Teesre ne batlaya ki wah bahut hi kam umar mein ek Devdut ban gaya tha aur duniya bhar ke logon ko ashirwaad diya hai. Phir ek jawaan purush ne kaha, Wah cheez jo mujhe Pradhaan Monson ke bare mein sabse achcha lagta hai Unki gawahi.

hum sab ne apne bhavishyevakta ke khaas gawahi Uddhaarkarta Ishu Maseeh ka aur usko Aatma ke prerna par humesha chalne ko mehsoos kiya hai. Har ek uddhaaran jo wah bataata hai, Pradhaan Monson chahtein hai ki hum susamachaar mein aur zyaada jiwan bitaaein aur humare vyaktigat gawahi ke liye dhoondhein aur shaktishaali banaye. Yaad karo kuch pahale sammelan mein usne isi manch par yah kaha tha Hume shaktishaali rahane ke liye aur bure disha mein jaane se bachne ki koshish karo , hume khud ki gawahi hona chahiye. Chahe tum 12 ya 112 ke ho-yah beech ke bhi-tum khud hi jaan saktey ho ki Ishu Maseeh ka susamachaar sahi hai. 1

siddhaantein sabhi par laagu hota hai. Pradhaan Monson ke kahe hue par, main puchta hoon Kya hum sab apne liye jaantein hain ki susamachaar sachcha hai? Kya hum atma-nirbharta se kaha saktein hain ki humare gawahi sach mein khud ka hai? Pradhaan Monson ne dobara batlaya tha Main batlata hoon ki Uddhaarakarta aur Uske susamachaar ki gawahi ko jo shakti tumhe tumhare ird-gird ke paap aur buraai se bachayega. Agar tumahre paas abhi yah gawahi nahi hai, jo kuch bhi ho yah gawahi ke parapt karne ke liye karo. Tumhara khud ki gawahi hona zaroori hai, kyunki dusron ki gawahiyan kuch der hi saath dega. 2

jaese kishor yodha ne kiya tha, Hum is mein sandeh nahi kartey ki humari maataaein bhi yeh baatein jaanti thi. 3 Yah achcha tarika hai humare gawahi ka shuruwaat karne ka, parantu hume zaroori hai ki hum madad karein use aage badhane mein. Susamachaar mein humesha jine ke liye, yaha apne khud ke gawahi ko prapt karne aur mazboot karne se zyadaa zaroori kuch bhi nahi hai. Hume bhi, Alma ki tarah batlana chahiye, In baaton ko main swaye hi jaanta hoon. 4

main tumse kahta hoon ki Parmeshwar ki Pavitra Aatma ne un baaton ki jaankaari mujhe karaaai hai, in baaton ko swaye jaanne ke liye maine kai dinon tak upwaas aur prarthna ki hai. Aur main jaanta hoon ki weh sab sathye hai. 5

Nephi ne bhi khud ke liye sachchaai ko jaana. Apne pita ko khud ke kai aatmik anubhaaoun ko batlatey sun kar, Nephi wah jaanna chahata tha jo uske pita ko pata tha. Yah jaanne ke liye bahut hi utsuk tha- yah wah tha jis ki use bahut ikcha thi. Bhale hi wah bahut hi kam aayu ka tha, usko Parmeshwar ke bhedon ko jaane ke liye badi abhilaasha thi. 6 Aur maine Prabhu ko pukara aur sunno, aur mainn jaanta hoon, Pavitra Aatma ki shakti dwara. 7

wah Aatma mein leen ho gaya tha bahut unche parwat ko dekha, jaha usse pucha gaya, Tum kya chahatey ho? uska jawaab saral tha Main un baaton ko dekhna chahata hoon jinhein mere pita ne dekha tha. 8 Kyunki usko bahut vishwaas tha aur uska saaodhni se kaarye ke bal tha, Nephi ko mahaan anubhaoun ke saath ashirwaad diya gaya. Usne Uddhaarkarta Ishu Maseeh ke payedaish, jiwan, aur Krus par chadhane ki gawahi ko prapt kiya tha usne Mormon ki Dharamshaastra aur antim dinon mein susamachaar ki Punaharsthaapna ko pahale hi dekha tha-khud se pura jaane ki sachchi ikcha ke parinaam mein.9

Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith bhi bahut kam aayu ka tha jab uska man mein ghabeer parchaai dikhaai diya dhaarmik sachchaai par. Joseph ke liye, wah samay mahaan kathinaaiyon ka tha, jaati ke sandesyon ko lekar jhagde aur galat faramiyon se gira hua. Wah jaanna chahata tha ki kaun sa Girjaghar sachcha tha.10 Bible ke in shabdon se prerit hua Par yadi tum mein se kisi ko bhuddhi ki ghati ho to Parmeshwar se maango, 11 usne apne jawaab ko dhoondhne ke liye kaarye ko kiya. 1820 ke garmi mein ek sundar subeh ko, usne jangal mein jakar padon ke beech ghotne par hokar prarthna kiya. Kyunki usko vishwaas aur kyunki Parmeshwar ke paas uske liye khaas kaam tha karne ko, Joseph ko Parmeshwar jo Pita hai aur Uske Putra, Ishu Maseeh ki mahaan drishti prapt hui aur khud ke liye sikh ki use kya karna chahiye.

hai jo hum sthir rahane se humesha prapt kartein hain jab hum susamachaar ko sikhtein, prarthna kartein, aur susamachaar mein jeetein hain.Yah Pavitra Aatma ki ka ahesaas hai jo humare aatmaoun ko gawahi deta hai ki hum jo sikh rahein aur kar rahein hai waha sahi hai.

ek gawahi ped ki tarah hai jo fule aur falne ke liye kai awastha se guzarta hai. Kuch sab se bade ped pakchim United States ke Redwood National Park mein paya jata hai. Jab tum is bade ped ke niche khade hoge, yah aschriye hoga yah dekhna ki har ek chote se beejh se hua hai. Yah humare gawahi ke saath bhi hai. Bhale hi hum ne ek hi dhaarmik anubhao se shuruwaat kiya ho, weh samay ke saath fultey aur faltey hain humesha ke poshan aur humesha dhaarmik anubhao ke dwara.

phir, jab bhavishyevakta Alma ne gawahi ko badhaane par samjhaya tha, usne beejh ko ped banne par batlaya tha. Agar tum sthaan doge, usne kaha, ek beejh tumhare hriday mein boya jayega, sunno, agar wah sachcha ya achcha beejh hai aur tumne apne aswaashan ke karan use fekh nahi diya, jisse ki tum prabhu ki aatma ka virodh karo, tab wah tumhari chaati ke andar vikaash karega aur jab tumhe is vikaash ka anubhao hoga tab tum apne maanas mein kahoge yah beejh ek uttam beejh hai arthat yah achchie vaani hai kyuki yah meri aatma ka vikaash karti hai ha, usne mere vivek ko badhaana arambh kiya aur is ka swaad mujhe achcha lag raha hai. 12

roshni, wah ahesaas ke saath jo batlata hai ki Parmeshwar ki vaani sachchie hai. Phirbhi, is ka ahesaas aschariye hai, yyah sirf shuruwaat hai. Tumahre gawahi ko badhane ki kaarye bhi katam nahi hua hai redwood ped ko bone ke kaam jayse hota hai jab dharti mein se pahala patta nikalta hai. Agar hum haal ke dhaarmik prerna ko andekha aur nikaar kartein hain, agar hum uski paalan poshan humesha dharamshaastra ko sikhne aur prarthna aur Aatma ke aur zyaada anubho ko dhoondhtein nahi hain, humare ahesaas mar jayega aur humare gawahi kam ho jayega.
tab dekho, usmein jad na hoti aur jab surye ka dhup use jhulsayega tabjad na hone se wah sukh jayega, aur tum use ukhaad kar fenk doge. 13

humare gawahi ped ki tarah hi badhenge humesha, us tarah se ki vishwaas nahi kiya ja sakta hai, humare humesha ke dekhbhaal aur pariksham ke kaarye ki parinaam mein. Agar tumne vaani ka paalan poshan kiya, Alma ne vaada kiya, ha, agar viraksh jab badhana aarambh karta hai tabhi tumne uska paalan poshan agar pariksham dwara vishwaas ke saath dhayerpurwak fal ko prapt karne ki asha se kiya tab us mein jadh padegi aur dekho, wah badh kar viriksh hoga aur anant jiwan prapt karega. 14

Pavitra Aatma ne mere aatma ko gawahi diya tha ki jo main padh raha tha wah sachcha hai. Yah haal ki gawahi ne mujhe apne kai dusre susamachaar sachchaaiyon mein se ek gawahi tak pahuchaya tha, kyunki, jaesa Pradhaan Monson ne sikhlaya tha Jab hum jaantein hai ki Mormon ki Dharamshaastra sachcha hai, tab phir jaantein hai ki Joseph Smith sahi mein ek bhavishyevata hai aur usne Parmeshwar jo Anant Pita hai aur Uske Putra, Ishu Maseeh ko dekha tha. Yah bhi jaantein hai ki antim-din mein Joeph Smith ke dwara susamachaar punaharsthapit hua tha saath mein Aaronic aur Melchizedek Purohitiyan bhi punaharsthapit hua tha. 15 Us din se, mujhe Pavitra Aatma ke dwara kai pavitra anubhaoun ko prapt hua hai jisne mujhe aswaasan diya hai ki Ishu Maseeh duniya ka Uddhaarkarta hai aur Uska punaharsthapit susamachaar sachcha hai. Alma ke saath, main yah kahe sakta hoon ki main jaanta hoon ki yah sab sachcha hai.

abhi aur aaj samay hai hume sikhne ya jaane ka ki susamachaar sachcha hai. Har ek ke paas zaroori kaarye hai karne ko.Yah kaarye karne ke liye, aur duniya ke us prabhaao se bachne ke liye jo humesha musibat mein daalta hai, humare paas Alma , Nephi, aur jawaan Joseph Smith ke jaesa vishwaas hona chahiye humare khud ke gawahi ko paane aur badhaane ke liye.

main Pradhaan Monson ke gawahi ko pasand karta hoon. Yah redwood ped ki tarah shaktishaaly bada ped hai, Pradhaan Monson ki gawahi bhi samay ke saath fale aur bade. Hume khud hi jaan saktein hain, jaesa Pradhaan Monson ne jaana tha, ki Ishu Maseeh humare duniya ke Uddhaarkarta aur Muktidata hai, ki Joseph Smith Punaharsthapna ka bhavishyevakta hai, saath mein Parmeshwar ki purohiti ko bhi punaharsthapit kiya hai. Hum us purohiti ko rakhtein hain. Main vineet se prarthna karta hoon ki hum in cheezon ko khud hi sikhein aur jaane Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.

daravaje par bhid k yon ikattha kar rakhi hai. marijon ko dekhate hue do. prashant ne apane kam paundar se kaha. usane do. ka ishara pate hi marijon ko sarakari dis pensari ke daravaje se bahar dhakel diya. unamen se ek marij ko do. prashant ke pas late hue vah bola, sar, isaka ilaj tat kal karana padega. yah bahut hi siriyas hai. yadi kahin yah ilaj ke bina mar gaya to ganv kee rajaniti ko ek naya mud da mil jayega sath hi aapakee badi fajihat hogi. atah ise jaroor dekh len.
bahut garib aadami hoon. jab se fasal kataee ke lie mashinen aaee hain, bhookhe marane kee naubat aa gaee hai.
chalak aur tikadami kauye ne bal poorvak use dara dhamaka kar bartan ko apane kab je men le liya. usaka poora jal pikar apani p yas bujhaee.

kaee milon ke malik, karakhane chal rahe hain, aadhat hai. unaka nagar men rootaba hai. s thaniy sans thaon, pulis tatha prashasan men tooti bolati hai. kisi kee bhi k ya majal ki choon chapad kar sake.

ha, wah mritio jiske vishye mein Amulek ne kaha tha, jo ki shaaririk mritio hai phirbhi manushyon ko samay diya gaya tha jismein wah paschtaap kar sakta tha isliye wah jiwan pariksha kaal ki stithi mein hota hai aur yah samay Parmeshwar se milne aur taeyaari karne ke liye hota hai us anant stithi ki taeyaari ka samay hota hai jiske vishye mein hum logon ne kaha haiaur jo ki mere huon ke punaharjiwit hone ke paschaat aata hai. 3

Aaronic Purohiti mein hume jo samay sewa karne ke liye pradaan kiya gaya hai wah aosar hai humare liye dusron ko zaroor madad karne ko sikhne ke liye. Ussi tarah jayse Prabhu madad dete hai hume zaroori hai ki maranshil jiwan ke parikshan mein hum safal ho jayein, Wah hume humare purohiti ke taeyari mein madad karta hai.

uske saath, ek niyukti Aaronic Purohiti ko dekhbhaal karne ke liye. Mujhe abhi bhi yaad hai jaese ki kal hi hua tha. Mujhe sundar girtey hue patiyon ki tarah yaad hai ki naye parwartith ne mere bhaai aur mere saath ek vidwa ke liye kuch kaarye kiya tha. Mujhe kaarye yaad nahi hai, parantu mujhe wah ahesaas yaad hai ki purohiti shakti ne humein madad kiya tha karne ko jo maine baad mein Prabhu ke kahe ko sikha tha ki hume wah sab karna hai humare paapon se chama ke liye aur isliye Usko milne ki taeyaari karo.

main us shaakha pradhaan ke liye abhaar mehsoos karta hoon jisne naye parwartith ko madad kiya tha Prabhu ke dono bachchon ko taeyaar karne ke liye jo kisi din bishops ban saktein hain, gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal ko karne ke liye aur purohiti ki taeyaari karne waalon ko sanchaalan ke liye bhi.
wah pahali baar tha jab maine ek dekha tha. Aur baad mein maine pahali baar priests parishad ke sanchaalan bishop ke shakti aur ashirwaad ko mehsoos kiya tha.
dusre gunwaan aadmi ke saath jinhein wah hume sikhlane ke liye niyukt kar sakta tha. Wah kaksha mein kursiyon ko gol mein rakhta tha. Wah mujhe apne kursi ke bagal mein, dahene oar bithlaya.

aur kai kaaranon se main samajh nahi pata phir, ek baar se zyaada usne mere ghar par fone kiya aur kaha, Hal, main chahata hoon ki tum mere saath mere saathi ki tarah kuch bhent ke liye chalo. Ek baar, wah mujhe apne saath ek vidwa ke ghar le jana chahta tha jo akeli rahati thi aur ghar mein bina bhojan ke. Jab hum ghar ja rahe the usne kaar ko rokh diya, apne dharamshaastra ko khola, aur mujhe batlaya ki usne kyo us vidwa ko is tarah sammaan diya tha ki wah sirf apne aap ki dekh bhaal ke liye shakti ko nahi rakhti parantu, aage aanewaale jiwan ke samay mein, dusron ki madad bhi kar sakti hai.

muskuraatey aur unke achchaaiyon aur unke himmat ke gungaan kartey hue, jo mujhe 10 minton se zyaada laga. Jab hum us ghar se ja rahe the, usne dhire se kaha, Yah ek achcha bhent tha. Weh choti ladkiyon humare bhent ko kabhi nahi bhoolengi.

us anubhawik purohiti neta ne pahale hi humare ghar par mere putra ko bhent karne ko kaha tha. Unhone mujhe sunne ki ijazat diya tha. Buzurg saathi ne prarthna se shuruaat kiya, madad maangtey hue. Phir usne mere putra se kuch ayesa kaha Mujhe lagta hai ki hume wah shikshan lena chahiye jo is parivaar ko unhein paschaataap ki pukaar ki tarah sunaai de. Mujhe lagta hai ki weh mujh se bahot achchie tarah se nahi lenge. Mujhe lagta hai ki weh sandesh ko tumse zyaada achchie tarah se sunnege. Is liye tum kya sochtey ho?
ek anaadi yuva mein Parmeshwar ke bade bachchon ko paschaataap aur surakhchaa ki niyukti ko karne ke liye.
parantu mujhe pata hai ki ek bishop, ek Melchizedek Purohiti rakhne waala, aur Prabhu, ek purush ko purohiti ke liye taeyaar kar rahein the aur kisi din bishop ki tarah.

purohiti taeyaari ke is tarah ke safalta ko tum jaamtey ho jo tumne apne khudh ke jiwan mein dekha aur anubhao kiya hai. Tum ayese bishops, saathiyon, aur maata-pitaoun ko jaantey ho aur khudh bhi ho. Tumne apne purohiti ke kaarye ke taeyaari mein Prabhu ke ashirwaad ko dekha hai jo wah jaanta hai ki tumhe pahale hi prapt hai.

paschaataap, baptisma, aur Pavitra Aatma ko prapt karke. Pradhaan Thomas S. Monson, ne isliye, un sabhi dharamsiddhaanton par prerit bhare bhashanon ko diya hai. Parantu mujhe pata hai usne jo Girjaghar ke logon aur prachaarakhoun aur doston ke saath kiya tha jab Toronto ke mission mein salchaalan kar raha tha ne mujhe kaarye ke liye prerna diya tha.
Ya, mujhe Barah ko dene se pahale, main chahata hoon ki tum padho. Tum jaanoge ki kya yah sahi hai. Wah mujh se 32 saal bada tha aur bahot zyaada budhimaan aur hoshiyaar.

shayad prabhubhoj ke mez par, ek dharamsiddhant ko karne mein galti ko karta hai. Yah ek ghambheer samasya hai. Kabhikabhi galti ki saza jaanta dwara zaroor hona chahiye nakhushi, apmaan ke ahesaas ke saath ya kharajh karne se.
jab Pavitra Aatma dwara prerna mile aur phir baad mein use zyaada prem karo jiska tumne ninda kiya hai, taaki wah virodhi ki tarah na dikhe. 6
unhein tumhare prem ko jald aur turant hi ahesaas kiya hoga. Unhein tumhare sudhaar ko karne se pahale tumhare sahi gungaan ko mehsoos kiya hoga.

John jo baptisma dene waala tha se jab Aaronic Purohiti ko punaharsthapit kja raha tha Mere priye saathiyon tumhare upar, Maseeh ke naam se main Aaron ki Purohiti ko deta hoon, jo devduton ki dekhbhaal karne ki chaabie rakhtein hain, aur paschaataap ke susamachaar ko, aur paapon se mukti ke baad baptisma ke liye aur yah dobara kabhi dharti se waapis nahi liya jayega, jabtak ki Levi ke putra dobara Prabhu ko sachchaai ke bhent nahi detein. 7

Girjaghar ke Pradhaan taeyaari karne waale purohiti ka bhi salchaalan kartein hain. Saalon se Uska sandesh hai ki doosron ke jiwan mein paschaataap ke susamachaar aur baptisma ko lane se sahi bachaao ho sakta hai.

shikshakein, aur paadri humesha salaaha kartein hain sabhi parishad ke sadasyon ko Prabhu tak pahunchaane ke liye. Adhyakshtaaein sadesyon ko vishwaas aur prem ke saath aage badhane ko batlatein hain. Deacons prabhubhoj ko shaant aur vishwaas ke saath detein hain taaki sadasye Praeshchit ke ahesaas ko mehsoos karein aur vaadon ko nibhaaye jab weh us pavitra rup mein prapt kartein hain.

ke ek vyakti ke baad ek ka puri tarah se dekhbhaal karoge.Aur weh saathiyon saath mein prarthna kartein hain parivaaron ke mukhyon ke zarooraton aur aashaon ko seekhne ke baad. Ayesa karne se, woh mahaan din ke liye taeyaar rahatein hain jab weh apne khudh ke parivaar mein pita ki tarah, vishwaas se sanchaalan kartein hain.
main purohiti ko pasand karta hoon, aur main tumhare saath hone mein khush hoon. Main bahut abhari hoon ki hum is mahaan kaarye mein saath kaam kar saktein hain.

vigyaan, aur tekonolgy ki unnati ne kai logon ke jiwan mein sudhaar laya hai.Phirbhi yaha par bahut insaan ko jhelne aur kasht uthane ki bhi gawah hai. Yudh aur yudh ke afwaaon ke saath saath, prakritik apattiyon mein badhanti baadh, aag, bhookam, aur bimaariyon ke saath duniyabhar ke miliyaon ke jiwan mein prabhaao daal raha hai.
Girjaghar aapat saadhanon ko jinhe zaroorat hai unhe diya jata hai. Uddhaaran mein, pichle November, Philippines ke duwip desh mein Typhoon Haiyan ne pahaar kiya tha.

Haiyan ne bahut chati aur peeda pahuchaya tha.Pure shaheren nasht ho gaye the kai mar chuke the milinoon se ghar barbaad ya nasht ho gaye the aur mukyr sewaein jayse paani, naale, aur bijali bandh ho chuka tha.
paani, kapde, aur swaasthiye vigyaan cheezon ko girjaghar ke sadasyon aur gaer-sadasyon ko pradaan kiya tha.

kai jinhone sab kuch jo unke paas tha ko ho diya tha, raaye liya gaya ki sabhi sadasyon ke stithi aur surakhcha ke liye. Prerit yogna banaye gaye aur daesyon ko jine ke stithiyon aur aatam-nibharta ko swikaar karne ke liye dobara shuruwaat kiya gaya.
palambar, aur dusre ghar banane waale kaaryon ko sikha tha, weh achche kaam ke aosaron ko dhoondh paye the jab nazdeek ke shaharon aur sangatonon mein ghar banana dobara shuru hua tha.

Jehovah ne apne bhavishyevakta dwara batlaya Tere desh mein daridar to sada paaye jaenge isliye main tujhe yah aagya deta hoon, ki to apne desh mein apne deen daridar bhaaiyon ko apna haath dhila karke awashye daan dena. 1
gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal karna Girjaghar zimmedaariyon mein chaar mein se ek diviye niyukti mein se hai jo vyaktigat aur parivaaron ko mukti ke liye laayak rehne mein madad karta hai.2

hume bhi vyaktigat zimmedari di gayi hai gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki sewa karne ka. Girjaghar ke vishwaasi sadasye sabhi sthaan par har mahine upwaas kartein hain 24 ghanton tak bhojan aur paani nahi khana ya pina aur phir Girjaghar ko wah upwaas ke samay bhojan ko karne waale keemat ke barabar upwaas bhent ko dena.
wah yah kya nahi hai? ki annaye se banaye huedason, andhera sahanewaalon ka jua todkar unko chuda lena, aur sab juaon ko tukade-tukade kar dena?
anaath aur maare-maare firtey huon ko apne ghar le aana? kisi ko nanga dekh kar, wastar pahanana aur apne jaatibhaaiyon se apne ko na chipana? 4
aur tu shidh changa ho jayega tera dharam tere aage age chalega Prabhu ka tej tere piche raksha karte chalega.
aur deen dhukhiyon ko santusht kare tab andhiyare mein tera prakaash chamkega, aur tera ghor andhikaar dopahar ka sa ungiyala ho jayega

Pradhaan Harold B. Lee ne yah kaha Mahaan ashirwaad jo upwaas rakhne se prapt hota hai sabhi sadi mein saaf taur se batlaya gaya hain, aur yahan Prabhu apne mahaan bhavisyevakta dwara batlatein hain kyo yaha upwaas hai, aur wah ashirwaad jo upwaas ko rakhne se prapt hota hai. Agar tum Isaiah ke kitaab ki 58th adhyaye ko vishleshan karte ho tum waja jaanoge ki kyo Prabhu chahatein hain ki hum upwaas bhent ko bhare, kyo Wah chahata hai ki hum upwaas karein. Kyunki hume yaha karne se hum pukaarenge aur Prabhu jawaab dega. Hum prarthna karenge aur Prabhu kahega, Yaha main hoon.
jab hume aur zyaada Prabhu ki ashirwaad ki zaroorat hogi, jab dharti par vichaar ka sahi ko padega. 6

Pradhaan Thomas S. Monson, ne in siddhaanton par apni gawahi ko diya hai ek vyaktigat rup se anubhao kiya gaya hua gawahi. Usne kaha Girjaghar ke sabhi sadasye jinhone un zarooratmandon ki madad kiya hai anubhao ko kabhi nahi bhoolenge ya pastawa hoga. Mehanat, saaodhaani, aatam-nibharta, aur dusron ke saath baatna humare liye koi naya baat nahi hai. 7

Ishu Maseeh ka Girjaghar Antim-din Santon ka ke sadasyon vaadon ko banane waale aur aagyaon ka paalan karne waale log hain. Main kisi bhi niyam, kisi aagya ko nahi jaanta, jo, agar sahi dhang se kiya gaya, saral hai karna aur jo upwaas ke niyam se zyaada ashirwaad ko deta hai. Jab hum upwaas rakhtein hain aur sachche upwaas bhent ko bhartein hain, hum Prabhu ke bhandaar mein us samay ke bhojan ke keemat ko detein hain. Yah zaroori nahi hai ki payese ka balidaan us samay ke kharch se zyaada ka ho. Usi samay, hume aur zyaada ashirwaad milne ko vaada kiya gaya hai jyesa pahale batlaya gaya tha.

ek samay ka bhojan aur phir baad mein do se shuruwaat kiya ja sakta hai, jab ki weh upwaas ke niyam ko samajhte aur sharirik rup se kar saktein hain. Patiyon aur patniyon, yuva, aur bachchon ko prarthna ke saath shuruwaat karna chahiye, apne jiwan mein ashirwaad ko prapt karne ke liye dena chahiye jab ki Prabhu ke ashirwaad aur upwaas ke samay shakti ko dhoondhte ho. Upwaas ka niyam us samay pura hota hai jab upwaas bhent ko Prabhu ke abhikarta, bishop ko bhara jata hai.

tum ward mein kalyaan maarg diklate ho. Tumeh gareeb ke liye diviye dhoondhane ko aur dekhbhaal karne ka. Sahayak Sanstha pradhaan aur Melchizedek Purohiti parishad netaon ki madad se, tumhara kaarye hai ki sadasyon ko madad karo unko madad mile aur aatam-nibhar banne. Tumhe sadasyon ka sharirk aur dhaarmik zarooraton ka dekhbhaal karna hai upwaas bhent ko saaodhaani se istamaal karke sharirik madad ki tarah aur prashaarit parivaaron aur sangaton saadhanon ko pradaan karne.Jab tum purohitit ke chaabiyon ko prarthnashilta se karoge, aur gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki madad vivek tarah se karoge, tum yah jaanoge ki upwaas bhent ka sahi istamaal jiwan mein madad karne ke liye hai, naaki jiwan shaali ke.

tumhare paas chaabiyan hai aur bahari siddhaanton ko dekhrekh karne ki shakti hai. Tum bishop aur parishad sadasyon ko unke purohiti ke kaarye ke liye aagya dete ho aur phir Girjaghr ke sadasyon ko dhoondhatey ho upwaas ka aosar mein shaamil hone ke liye. Jab ki tum Aaronic Purohiti ko rakhne waale apne purohiti zimmedariyon ko badhatein hai aur sabhi Girjaghar ke sadasyon ko yah aosar pradaan kartein hain, tum turant hi upwaas ke vaada bhare ashirwaadon ko unko batlaao jinhein sab se zyaada zaroorat hai. Tum yah gawahi doge ki greeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal karne ki aatma ke paas kathor hriday ko komal banane ki shakti hai aur un logon ki madad karne ke jo humesha Girjaghar aatein hain.
Jo bishop apne Aaronic Purohiti parishad ko upwaas bhent ko batorne mein shaamil hone ke liye sangatith kartein hain is pavitra zimmedari mein bahut safalta prapt karenge. 8

yaad rakho ki yah stithi alag ho sakta hai ek sthaan se dusre aur ek desh se dusre mein. Darwaze par ja kar Aaronic Purohiti parishad sadasyon ko payese batorne ka kaam shaayad waha nahi hota ho jaha tum rehte hoge. Phirbhi, hum tumhe prarthnashilta se bhavishyevakta ki salaah ko karne ko amantirith kartein hain aur un prerit bhare kaaryon ko dhoondho jaha tumhare ward ke Aaronic Purohiti rakhne waale apne purohiti ko badha saktein hain upwaas bhent ko batorne ke kaam mein shaamil hokar.

phir prakat hue Prabhu ne pucha, Isliye tumhe kis tarah ka vyakti hona chahiye? Usne jawaab diya, Meri tarah. 9 Jab hum apne upar Maseeh ke naam ko letein hain aur Uske piche chale ki koshish kartein hain, hum Uske parchaai ko dekhenge aur Ussi ki tarah bannege. Uddhaarta ke dekhbhaal ke samay se gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal hota chala aaya hai. Yah sabhi kuch mein hai jo Wah karta hai. Wah hum sab ke paas aata aur humein madad karta hai. Uska kaarye asaan hai, aur Uska bhoj halka. Main tum sab ko Uddhaarkarta ki tarah banne ko batlata hoon gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal karke, upwaas ke niyam ko puri tarah se nabha kar, aur puri upwaas bhent ko bhar kar. Main yah vimanrata se gawahi deta hoon ki gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal ko achchie tarah se karne se dhaarmik awadhi ki parchaai dikhta hai aur dono dene waale aur prapt karne waale ko ashirwaad prapt hoga.

Hello Friends agar aap mere regular visitor hai to aap jante hi hoge ki mene blogger par kitni post dali hai jo aap www.HMH.peBlogger par dekh sakte hai. Blogger jo Google ki service hai to aese hi hamara Blog ki Security to jada hogi hi, Q ki Google ne saaf kha rakha hai ki agar koi bhi khami nikalta hai Google ke kisi Product me to usko $100 se $20,000 ka iman diye jayege. Matlab ham ye kha sakte hai ki hamara blog aasani se hack nahi ho sakta. Par Ham is baat ko bhi inkar nahi kar sakte ki Internet par kuch bhi secure nahi hai, yaha tak ki Bank ki sites bhi. Har roj 1000ro sites hack hoti hai. to hame bhi jitni ho sake sabdani rakhni chaiye. Hacker se Kaise Bache uski 10 Tips yaha hai, wo bhi jjarur read kare. Blogger Blog ne abhi ek Future add kiya hai jisme ham apne blog ko HTTPS enable kar sakte hai. Isse koi bhi hamare blog ka data change nahi kar sakta or jo hamne share kiya hai wo hi hamare visitor ko dikhega. Agar aap Blogspot extension use karte hai or aapne abhi tak HTTPS ko enable nahi kiya to aapko abhi karna chaiye. Kaise kare HTTPS ko Enable ye janne ke liye yaha click kare. Blogger Blog me SSL Install kaise kare uski Jankari yaha hai jesa ki me phele hi kha chuka hi ki Blogger ho hack karna bhut muskil hai, par kuch tips me aapko duga jisse aap apne blog ki security or jada bada sakte ho. Agar kisi ka blog hack hota hai to wo unki galti se hi hota hai. Aapka jo Google Gmail Ki ID hai jisse aapne apna blog banaya hai wo aap kisi ko na bataye or apni email ID ko Blog ke naam se alag rakhe. Bhut se log ye galiti karte hai ki wo jis email ID se Blog banate hai us ID ko wo sabko bata dete hai to isse hota ye hai ki agar kisi ne aapki GMail ID Hack karli to wo aapke blog ka Malik ban jayega. Matlab aapka Blog bhi hack. Email ID ka address Blog ke naam se alag rakhe nahi to naa batane ka koi matlab hi nahi banta. Apne Visitor se Contact karne ke liye ek alag Email ID banaye or usko Blog me use na kare. apne Visitor ko ek email id de aapse sampark karne ke liye. Issi Emal ID ko Contact Us page me dale. Read Google Plus Page Kaise Banaye apne Blog ke liye Google ke account me ham 2 step verification chalu kar sakte hai isme hame password dalne ke baad hamare mobile par OTP bhi dalna padta hai, jisse hamare account ki security double ho jati hai. Agar kisi ko hamari Email ID or Password pata chal bhi jaye to bhi wo account open nahi kar sakte q ki unko code bhi chaiye jo hamare mobile par aata hai. 2 Step Vitrification chalu karne ke liye yaha jaye. Google ki site par jaye. Ham apne Blogger Blog me ek se jada logo ko add kar sakte hai jo hamare blog ko manage kar sakte hai, Post kar sakte hai or bhi bhut kuch. To agar aapko kisi ko sirf Post ke liye add karna hai to jo sirf post kare to usko sirf Author add kare. Admin sirf jab banaye jab aapko uspar pura bharosa ho q ki Admin ka matlam malik. Password kisi ko na bataye Is Point me aap soch sakte ho ki ye kya tip hai, ham apna password q kisi ko batayege. par fir bhi me kha du agar aap kisi phecha ke dost ko bhi bataye to uske baad password change jarur karle. GMail ka Password Change karke ke liye yaha click kare Jane Secure Password kesa banaye Ye Galti lagbhag sabhi New Blogger karte hai, mene bhi ki thi. Koi Template jo Paise me Mil raha ho kisi site par wo hi template koi dusri site wala usko crack karke download karba raha hai. or ham wo cracked template apne blog me add karke bade khus hote hai ki dekho mene itne paise ka free me le liya par asliyat alag hoti hai. aap ye socho ki jo chij paise me mil rahi hai wo hi chij koi free me dega to usko kya milega. usko bhi koi faida hoga jab hi to wo aesa karega. or crack template me wo kuch virus ki file bhi add kar dete hai jisse hota ye hai ki jo bhi hamare blog par aata hai uske browser me automatic virus download ho jata hai or uska paisa free template dene wale ke pass jata hai.

kiye kaamon, aur unki kahi khamoshi dwara bhi. Hum use us prabhaao se jaante hai jo usne sabse pehle apne doston aur dusra apne dushmanon par daala tha se, aur teesra un logon par jo us samay jiwit the.

par woh nahin jaante woh kya hai. Paesa aa gaya hai, aur duniya mein manushye ke gun aur gyaan se bane avishkaarein bahut hai, par humabhi bhi bechaaen, asantusht aur ghabraaya hue hai. Agar hum Naya Niyam kholenge hamein yeh shabd sabse pehle milenge, Mere paas aao aur mai tumhe vishraam dunga, jiwan ki roti Mai hoon, jagat ki Jyoti Mai hoon, Yadi koi pyasa ho to mere paas aaye aur piye, Mai tumhe shaanti diye jaata hoon, Tum saamarthya paaoge, Tumhara mann anandit hoga The Character of Jesus 1908, 7, 11, 15 16.

unke kapde ya un gharon ke jahan woh rehta tha ki parwaah nahin kiye the. Woh ek charni mein paeda hua, ek kapentar ke dukaan mein kaam kiya, teen saalon tak padhaaya, aur phir krus par mar gaya. Naya Niyam ayse logon dwara likha gaya tha jo chahate the ki hum apna dhyaan Unpar dhare Ishu ke yogta , 21 22 ek ashwaasan ke saath ki Woh sach mein Parmeshwar ka Putra tha aur hai, duniya ka Uddhaarkarta aur Muktidaata.
he Swami, kya tune apne khet mein achcha beej na boya tha? phir jangli daane ke paodhe usmein kaha se aaye?
Yah kisi shatru ka kaam hai. Daaso ne usse kaha, Kya teri ichcha hai, ki hum jaakar unko bator lein?

uske ya uski puri shakti se, woh jo achcha hai ka poshan karna chahiye aur use itna mazboot aur sundar karna chahiye ki jangli daane use nahin akarshak lagenge. Hum Prabhu ke Girjaghar ke sadasye kitne dhanye hai hamare Prabhu aur Uddhaarkarta ke anmol susamachaar ko apne buniyaad ki tarah rehne ke liye jispar hum apna jiwan banate hai.
mai tumse phir kehta hoon ki agar tum sahi raaste se andar prawesh karoge, aur Pavitra Aatma graham karoge, tab woh tumhe bataega ki tumhe kya karna chahiye 2 Nephi 325.

hamari zimmedaari hai parivaar ko sambhaalna aur surakshit rakhna samaaj aur anantta ka mul ang banakar. Bhavishyevaktaaon ne baar baar chetaaoni di hai parivaar ke aniwaariye aur haanikaarak parinaamon ke baare mein jab parivaar ke mulye kam ho jaaenge.

aur hamein yeh dekhna hai ki hamara uddharan Prabhu ke rache yojna ko banaye rakhna aur sahara dena hai is maranshilta ke Unke bachchon ke liye. Sabse badhiya shiksha sachche uddharan se diya jaata hai. Hamare ghar pavitra sthaan hone chahiye duniya ke prabhaawon ko jhelne ke liye. Yaad rakhiye ki Prabhu ke badhiya ashirvaad sachche parivaaron ke dwara milte aur diye jaate hai.

jo ki apne hi tarikon se, sthir paarivaarik jiwan banati hai aur bhavishye ki peedhi ko anant achchaai ke liye poshan karti hai. Jo nirnay is peedhi ki mahilaaen banati hai woh anantta tak prabhaawit karenge. Mai sujhaao dena chahata hoon ki aaj ki maataaon ko mauka aur chunaoti mila hai woh sab karne ka jisse wohghar ko mazboot kar sakein Standing for Something 10 Neglected Virtues That Will Heal Our Hearts and Homes 2000, 152.
bhaaiyon, tumhara Israel mein pita hone ka pavitra niyukti tumhara maranshilta aur anantta ka sabse zaroori niyukti ek aysa niyukti hai jisse tum kabhi mukt nahin hoge.

hum ek film dikhaaya karte the taaki hamara mukhye sandesh aasaani se samjha jaa sakein. Ek saal mein, Girjaghar ke stake sammelan daoro mein yaatra karte karte, hum us film mein kya hai ko achchi tarah jaan jaate the. Hum ise asaani se dohara saktein hain. Woh sandesh in kayi saalon mein ab bhi mere mann mein hai. Film mein aawaaz Pradhaan Harold B. Lee ka tha aur usmein usne apne beti ke ghar mein hue ghatna ko batlaaya tha. Woh aysa kuch tha
maata ne beton se jaldi se kaha, Kyun nahin tum aaj raat ka prarthna khud keh lo aur Maa fal ka kaam karti rahegi?
Kya zyaada zaroori hai, prarthnaaen ya fal? Dekhiye Teachings of Presidents of the Church Harold B. Lee 2000, 143 44.
prarthnaaen fal se zyaada zaroori hai. Ek safal pita ya maata ko kabhi utna vyast nahin hona chahiye ki woh apne bachche ke saath ka yeh sikhlaane ka pal nahin bita paaye.

sewanisht maargdarshaate haath ka zaroorat tha. Hamare maata-pita ek mahaan aur prabhaaoshaali viraasat hai jahan woh sab kuch daao par lagate hai taaki woh apne parivaaron ko vishwaas aur saahas ke saath paal sakein taaki agla peedhi ke paas unse bhi zyaada mauke ho. Hamein apne hi andar us tarah ke lagan ki aatma ko paana hai aur sab chunaotiyon ka saamna karna hai balidaan ke usi aatma ke saath. Hamein bhavishye ke peedhiyon mein hamare Prabhu aur Uddhaarkarta ke sikhshanon par zyaada nirbhar hona sikhlaana hai.

mere beton, yaad rakho, yaad rakho ki tumhe apne Muktidaata, jo ki Parmeshwar ka Putra, Maseeh hai, uski chattaan par apni neev ko banana hai jisse ki jab shaetaan apni prabal hawa ke jhakoro ko, haan bawandal ke dhure ko, apne sabhi olon aur bhishn aandhiyonke thapedon ko tumhare upar bheje, tab uske paas, woh shakti na hogi jo tumhe, khinch kar santaapo aur anant dukho ki khaai mein phenk sake kyunki jis chattaan par tumne apni neev daali thi woh nissandeh aysi neev hai jis par agar logon ne apne makaan banaye tab woh kadapi gir nahin sakte Helaman 512.

s kootar evan karon kee maram mat, dhabon, bhavan nirmann, kuligiri, kalin udyog, jari kee kadhaee, diyasalaee, aatishabaji, bidi tatha pital udyogon, choodi nirman jaise jokhimapoorn udyogon men lage hue hain. do tihaee se j yada shramajivi bach che gam bhir choton ka samana jalana, t vacha kee bimari, aankh kee roshani evan sans kee bimari sahate hue asahay sa jivan jikar kal kavalit ho jate hain - yah s thiti bharat men hi nahin varan vish v ke sabh y evan vikasit deshon men kisi bhi paimane par kam nahin dekhi ja rahi hai. arthat vish v ke rash tr bach chon ke dvara nirdharit adhikaron ke prati sachet nahin jan padate.

duroopayog aur ghrina se muk ti dilana tha. isaka vis trit vivaran san 1990 men aayojit vish v bal sam melan men kiya gaya jisake dvara prat yek bach che ko samajik, aarthik, rajanitik tatha sans kritik adhikar pradan karane par vishesh bal diya gaya. bach chon kee an y gam bhir samas yaen jinamen bal shram mukh y hai ke lie 27-30 ak toobar 1997 men narve kee rajadhani os lo men sanyuk t rash tr sangh dvara ek bal shram par an tarrash triy sam melan ka aayojan vish v ke logon ka dh yan bach chon ke adhikar evan samas yaon kee or aakarshit karane ka vishesh prayas kiya gaya. sanyuk t rash tr kee vishesh mahasabha men 08.10.2002 ke dvara bach chon ke vikas, kal yan evan suraksha hetu vishesh rannaniti banaee. is rannaniti men bach chon ke 54 moolabhoot adhikaron ko parit kiya gaya. jinamen se pramukh roop se anu. 1 ke tahat bach che kee paribhasha di gaee hai. isake anusar 18 varsh se kam aayu ke bach che is shreni men rakhe gaye hain. anu. 2 vibhedahinata, anu. 3 men bach che kee anukool abhiroochiyan, anu. 4 men unake adhikaron ka karyan vayan kaise ho diya gaya hai. anu. 5 men mata pita ka margadarshan tatha bach chon kee kshamataen, jivit rahane ka jan majat adhikar anu. 6 men diya gaya hai. vahin anu. 7-8 men bach che ka nam rash triy tatha pahachan evan sanrakshan ke bare men bataya gaya hai. anu. 9-10 men mata-pita se prithakata tatha parivarik punah ekeekaran ka adhikar bataya gaya hai. anu. 11 men avaidh s thanan taran evan gair vapasi ke bare men bataya gaya hai. anu. 12 men bach che kee ray anu. 14-14 men abhiv yak ti kee s vatantrata evan vichar, aat ma kee aavaj evan dharmadarshan kee s vatantrata prat yek bach che ko pradat t kee gaee hai. anuch chhed 15-16 men sangathit hone kee s vatantrata evan gopaniyata ke sanrakshan kee bat kahi gayi hai. vahin anu. 17-18 men soochana ko pahunchane tatha mata-pita ke ut taradayit v ka varnnan milata hai. anu. 19-20-21 men duroopayog evan upeksha se sanrakshann, parivar, vidvan bach chon ka sanrakshan evan god lie jane ka pravadhan kiya gaya hai. anu. 22, 23, 24 sharanarthi bach che, badhit bach che evan s vas th y sevaon ke bare men vishesh bal diya gaya hai. anu. 25 dekhabhal evan sans tha men rakhane ka punaravalokan tatha anu. 26-27 s vabhavik suraksha, jivan s tar men sudhar kee poorti ka varnnan kiya gaya hai. anu. 28-29 men shiksha evan shiksha ke uddeshy ke bare men nirdeshit kiya gaya hai. anu. 30 al pasankh yak samudayondeshi mool ke bach chon ke bare men bataya gaya hai. anu. 31 men rik t samay men manoranjan evan sans kritik gatividhiyon ke bare men nirdeshit kiya gaya hai. anu. 32 men bal shram tatha anu. 33, 34, 35, 36, 37 men kramashah madak drav yon ka duroopayog, laingik shoshann, vikray, v yapar, apaharan v shoshan se sanrakshan tatha ut pidan evan s vadhinata se vanchit hone ko nishiddh kiya gaya hai. anu. 38, 39, 40, 41 men sain y sangharsh, punarvas sam ban dhi dekhabhal, bal n yay ka prashasan tatha vartaman manadan don ke prati sam man ko rekhankit kiya gaya hai. anu. 40-45 men bach chon ke pradat t adhikar ko prabhavapoorn karyan vayan, poshan evan an tarrash triy sahayog hetu sanyuk t rash tr ke vibhin n abhikaranon yatha-an tarrash triy shram sangathan, vish v s vas th y sangathan, yoones ko aur yoonisef samiti kee baithakon men upas thit ho sakenge. anu. 46 se 54 ke vishish t bin duon men has takshar anu. samarthan, pravesh, lagoo hone vale sanshodhan, shankaen, prakh yapan tatha pramanik abhilekhon ke bare men vivaran diya gaya hai. sanyuk t rash tr samajhaute ke anusar in adhikaron ke tahat bach chon ke sarvangin vikas ke lie n yoonatam jivan s tar sunish chit karana tatha prathamik shiksha kee samuchit v yavas tha karana sabase mahat vapoorn mana gaya hai.

raj yon kee mahilaon aur bach chon kee suraksha ke lie vishish t pravadhan karane kee shak ti deta hai. anu. 24 men 14 varsh se kam aayu ke bach chon ko karakhanon evan an y jokhim poorn kary men niyojan ka pratirodh kiya gaya hai. vahin aarthik aavash yakataon kee vajah se kisi v yak ti se usakee kshamataon se pare kam karavane ka anu. 39 ee.-ef pratirodh karata hai. anu. 45 ke dvara balakon ke lie nihshul k evan anivary shiksha ka pravadhan upalab dh karane ka raj y ko nirdesh diya gaya hai. bharatiy sansad ke dvara in sanvaidhanik v yavas thaon ke tahat 1974 men ek rash triy niti s vikar kee gaee jisane ghoshit kiya ki bach chon kee upeksha, kroorata aur shoshan se raksha kee jayegi aur 14 varsh se kam ka koee bhi bach cha anish chitata vale v yavasay ya bhari kary men nahin lagaya jayega. bharat men un sanvaidhanik pravadhanon ke atirik t anek aise mahat vapoorn vidhan diye gaye hain jo bach chon ko vibhin n v yavasayon ke tahat kanooni suraksha pradan karate hain. 14 varsh kee kam umr ka v yak ti faik tri ek t 1948 ke tahat rojagar nahin kar sakata hai. bagan ek t 1951 tatha khan ek t 1952 ke tahat 15 varsh kee umr men karyon par pratiban dh lagaya gaya hai. kuchh pramukh adhiniyam anubandhit shramik adhiniyam 1975, bal shramik nivaran aur niyamitikarann 1986 tatha 1987 kee rash triy bal shram niti ke an targat bal shramikon ko shoshan se bachane aur unakee shiksha, chikit sa, manoranjan tatha saman y vikas par jor dene kee v yavas tha kee gayi hai. isake sath hi bharat sarakar apani vibhin n panchavarshiy yojanaon men balakon ke adhikar evan bal shramikon ke ut than ke lie kaee karyakram shurooaat kie hue hai. sarakar ke alava kaee gair sarakari s vaich chhik sangathan bhi is disha men gam bhirata se prayasarat hain.

aatankavad, bhikh mangavana, dhanadhyon ke manoranjan ke lie un hen videsh bhijavana, tas kari jaise kary karavana, balashram, bal v yapar, kuposhann, ashiksha, bal aparadh, bal sainik, vis thapan, balika bhroon hat ya, vigyapanon ke prayog men balakon ka manasik evan sharirik shoshann, bal yaun durachar aur yuddh jaise kaee karanon se palayan karane vale parivaron ke sath sima par sainikon kee kamavasana ka shikar hone ke alava un hen vibhin n tarikon se sharirik manasik aur sanvegat mak roop se pratadit karane, unake daihik aur aarthik shoshan karane evan moolabhoot suvidhaon se vanchit karane ke lie aisi takanikon aur pravidhiyon ka prayog kiya ja raha hai, jo manavata ke nam par kalank hai. nish karsh roop men yah kaha ja sakata hai ki vikaral hoti bal adhikaron kee samas ya ko aaj kanooni aur manavadhikar kee drish ti se dekhane ke sath-sath usake manaviy, samajik tatha v yavaharik pahaloo se bhi dekhe jane kee aaj shiddat ke sath aavash yakata hai tabhi ham in jamin ke nan hen-mun nen sitaron ko sharirik roop se s vas th, manasik roop se sajag tatha naitik roop se aadarsh nagarik bana sakate hain.

Ishu ne Apne Chelon ko wah diye jise Wah ek naya aagya batlaya John 1334. Teen baar doharaya, wah aagya saral tha parantu mushkil Jaesa maine tumse prem rakha, waisa hi tum bhi ek dusre se prem rakho John 1512 verse 17. bhi . Ek dusre se prem karne ka shikshan Uddhaarkarata ke dekhrekh ka mukhye shikshan hai. Dusra mahaan aagya tha tu apne padosi se apne samaan prem rakh Matthew 2239. Ishu ne yah bhi sikhlaya, Apne virodhiyon se prem rakh Matthew 544.
