Parantu dusron se prem ko rakh jaesa Usne apne bhedh ke saath rakha tha ka aagya Uske chelon ko tha- aur humare liye- ek chunaoti ko mahaan tha. Sahi mein, Pradhaan Thomas S. Monson ne hume pichle April mein sikhlaya tha, vaastav mein, prem susamachaar ka mulvastu hai, aur Ishu Maseeh hamare Uddhaaran hai. Unka jiwan prem ka viraasat tha. 1

Uska suli chadhane se pehle, Ishu ne apne chelon ke liye prarthna kiya Mine tera vachan unhein pahucha diya hai aur sansaar ne unse bayer kiya , kyunki jaesa main sansaar ka nahi, waise weh bhi sansaar ke nahi John 1714. Phir, Pita se Usne guzaarish kiya, Main yah vinti nahi karta ki tu unhein jagat se utah le parantu yah ki tu unhein sab dusht se bachaaye verse 15.

jayesa Ishu ne ek kahani mein batlaya hai, Uska raagye khameer ki tarah hai, jo is ka kaarye hai ki duniya ko apne prabhaao se aage badhaaye dekhiye Luke 1321 Matthew 1333 1 Corinthians 56 8 bhi dekhiye. Uske chelen wah nahi kar saktein agar weh sirf unke saath rahenge jo unke vishwaasi aur karye ko kartein hain. Yadi tum mujhse prem rakhtey ho, tu meri aagyaoun ko maanoge dekhiye John 1415.
Usne saaf taur se batlaya ki kis tarah se yah dharamvidhi hoga. Phir Usne apne mahaan siddhaanton ko sikhlaya
jo koi waadviwaad ka bhaaona rakhta hai wah mera nahi, parantu us shaitaan ka hai jo ki kalah ka janamdata hai aur wah logon ke hridyon ko ek dusre se ladne ke liye bhadkaata hai.

Bible sihklata hai ki bhudhimaan log krodh ko dhandh kartein hain Proverbs 298. Pehle ke Devduton ne sikhlaya tha ki un cheezon ke piche chalo jo shaanti deta hai Romans 1419 aur prem se sachchaai batlaao Ephesians 415, kyunki mahushye ka krdh Parmeshwar ki dharam ka nirwaah nahi kar sakta James 120. Naye revelation mein Prabhu ne aagya diya ki punaharsthpit susamachaar ke khushi ke vaani ko batlana chahiye sabhi aadmi ko anpe padosi ke sang, daya aur vinamarta ke saath DC 3841, namrata ke saath, virodhi ke saath jhagda nahi karke DC 1930.

hume humare sachchaai jo hum jaantein hain ko bhulana ya kam nahi karna chahiye. Hume apne sthaan ya humare mulye ko nahi bhoolna chahiye. Ishu Maseeh ke susamachaar aur vaadein jo humne banaye hain humein anant ke sachchaai aur jhut ke beech ke chunaotiyon ke kaarye ko jaane mein madad karta hai. Us chunaoti mein koi na aacha na bura nahi hota.

weh dosh lagane waale chale gaye aur Ishu ko us mahila ke saath akela chodh diya. Usne uske saath daya dikhlaya naaki us samay use kuch kaha. Parantu Usne usko aur phir paap na kar John 811. Dayaluta se prem ki zaroorat hai, parantu Maseeh ke piche chalne waala-Swami ki tarah- humesha sachchaai mein rahega.

Uske chelein paap ke vyeohaar se kabhi kabhi samna karega, aur aaj ga jab weh sahi aur galat ka bachaao karenge jaesa weh jaantein hain unhein kabhikabhi paspaati ya kattar bhi kaha jata hai. Kai duniya bhar ke mulye aur karye mein Antim-din Santon ko ayese chunatiyon ko jhelene padenge. In mein aaj bahut zyaada muhye hai ek-hi-ling ka shaadi ko karna United States ke kai states aur jilaaoun mein aur Canada aur kai duniya ke dusre deshon mein bhi. Hum mein kuch hain jo shaadi mein vishwaas hi nahi kartey. Kuch bachchon ko nahi payeda karna chahatey. Kuch ashleel chitra ya khatarnaak nashile pardaath par pabandhi nahi chahatey. Dusra uddhaaran hai- kai vishwaasiyon ko pata hai-ki vishwaas na karne waale pati ya parivaar ke sadasye ya vishwaas na karne waale karam chaariyon ke saath jine ka chunaoti.

jaese mandiron, bhakti karne waale gharon, aur humare gharon mein, humein sachchaai aur aagyaoun ko saaf aur sahi tarike se batlana chahiye jaesa hum punaharsthapit susamachar mein paaye hue mukti ki yogna mein sikhtein hain. Hume wah karna chunaao mein boli mein aur jaati mein kaahooni taur se sahi hai, aur un deshon mein bhi jaha niji taur se izzat kiya jaata hai kaanooni dhang se.

jo jaati ke log kahate aur kartey hai mein dusri mahatav rahata hai. Jaati ke muft ka istmaal kai janta ke kaaryon mein hota hai, parantu wah un zaroori cheezon par laago hota hai dusron ko vishwaas aur karyon ko karne mein. Kanoon chaalchalan par pabandhi laga sakta hai jo galat ya achcha na ho, jaese yaon upyug, maar-dhaar, ya aatangwaadi chaalchalan ke, chahe jaati ke naam par ugrahwaadi dwara ho. Kam khatre ki chaalchalan, chahe kuch vishwaasiyon pasand na kare, saralta se ant tak khatam hona chahiye agar Mormon ki Dharamshaastra ke bhavishyevakta dwara kanooni kiya gaya ho kahate hue janta ki awaaz Mosiah 2926.

hum sab ko susamachaar ke shikshanon par chalna dena chahiye apne padosi se prem karo aur bhedbhaao se bachne par. Maseeh ke chelein namarata ke uddhaaran rahate hain. Hume sabhi logon ko prem karna, achcha sunne wala hona, aur unke sachche vishwaas par chinta karne waala hona chahiye. Bhale hi hum sahemat na ho, hume jhagdaalo nai hona chahiye. Humare khatrili shirshak mein humare padavi aur vaartalaabh mein bhedbhaao nahi karna chahiye.Hume humare padviyon ko samjhaane aur khojne mein aur dusron par bhrabhaao dene ke liye imaandaar rehna chahiye.Yah karne se, hum chahtein hain ki dusre humare jaati ke sachche vishwaas aur humare jaati ke muft ke kaarye se apasand na ho jaye. Hum chahata hoon ki hum sabhi Uddhaarkarta ke zaroori Niyam par chalein Is kaaran jo kuch tum chahate ho ki manushye tumhare saath karein, tum bhi unke saath ayesa hi karo Matthew 712.

hume bure parinaamon ko izzat se swikaar karna chahiye aur humare virodhiyon ke saath izzat se pesh aana chahiye. Bhale hi kuch ho, hume sabhi ke sang achcha vyawaahaar karna chahiye, kisi bhi tarah ke bhedbhaao ko chod kar, jaati ke bhedbhaao, paramparaon, jaati ke vishwaas ya avishwaasiyon, aur dusre yaon anustithi mein.

LDS yuva bhi, ke ek dusre ke sang ke vyahaar ko dekh kar dukhi hotein hain.Ek dusre se prem karne ka aagya mein dusre jaatiyon ke beech prem aur izzat shaamil hai aur dusre jaatiyon, paraampara, aur laabhdaayak pad bhi hai. Hum sabhi yuva ko chunaoti dartein hai ki badmaashi, anaadar, ya bhaasha aur kaaryon mat karo taaki jo dusron ko dukh detein hain. Yah sabhi Uddhaarkarta ke aagya ek dusre se prem karne ko rukhtein hain.

parantu dusre nitiyon ke karan vyaktigat jhagde shaamil nahi hona chahiye jo sarkaar ke khilaaf ho aur hissedaar ko saja nahi de. Hum sab ko nafrat bhare vaartalaabh ko chod dena chahiye aur dusron ke sujhaao ko izzat se maanee.

samjho ki parivaar ka ek sadasye dusre ke sath bina shaadi ke yaon sambandh rakh raha hai. Wah do zaroori mulye ko ladaai mein daalta hai-humara prem parivaar ke sadasye ke liye aur hume aagya ko nabhaane ke liye. Uddhaarkarta ke uddhaaran se, hum prem se dayaluta ko dikhla saktein hain aur sachchaai mein sthir raha saktein hain wah karne se jo hum dekhtey aur jaantey hai ki galat hai

main ek bahan se mila jisne mujhe apne gaer sadasye pati ko uske saath 12 saalon se girjaghar aatey hue ke bare mein batlaya magar Girjaghar ke sadasye nahi bana tha. Main kya kar sakti hoon? usne pucha. Maine use salaaha diya ki sabhi achchie cheezon ko kaartey raho aur apne pati ke saath shaanti aur dayaluta se raho.

main sochti hoon ki 12 saalon tak pata chala ki main kitni shaant thi, parantu mujhe nahi pata hai ki kya main usko lekar bahut shaant thi. To, maine ek mahine se zyaada bahut hi katin tarike ko kiya, aur unhone baptisma liya.
khaaskar parivaar ko banana mein. Uske patra mein aage, main ab zyaada dayalupan ko karne ki koshish kar rahi hoon kyunki hum is saal mandir mein badhna chahatein hain!

hume zaroori hai ki hum bedbhaao ke logon ke saath rahe. Jaha mukhye hai, in ke humari oar se bhedbhaao nahi hona chahiye ya bhol jana chahiye, parantu Maseeh ke chelon ki tarah humein dusron ke saath shaanti se jiwan ko bitana chahiye jo humare mulye ko nahi baatein ya un shikshanon ko nahi swikaartein jis par wah hai. Pita Pita ka mukti ki yogna, jo hum bhavishyevata ke praktikaran dwara jaantein hain, ne hume maranshil awastha mein rakhta hai jaha hume Uske aagyaoun ka paalan karna hai. Jismein shaamil hai humare bedbhaao waale padosiyon ke parampara aur vishwaas ko prem karna jaese Usne hume prem kiya hai. Jis tarah Mormon ke bhavishyevakta ne sikhlaya hai, hume zaroor aage badhana chahiye, Parmeshwar aur sabhi manushyon mein prem rakhtey hue 2 Nephi 3120.

humare Uddhaarkarta ki aagya ek dusre se prem karne ka jaese Usne hum se kiya hai sabse badi chunaoti hai. Main prarthna karta hoon ki hum ise samjhein aur apne sabhi rishtedaari aur gatividhiyon mein dhoondh kar jiwan bitaen, Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.

Main apne 5th kaksha ka sab se bekaar chatra tha. Ek din Ben ne 30 swaalon ka ek math pariksha ko kiya. Uske piche ke chaatra ne use sudhaara aur waapis de diya. Shikshak, Mrs. Williamson, ne har bachche ke naam ke saath mark ko batlana shuru kiya. Ant mein, wah Ben tak pahunchi. Sharminda ke saath, usne jawaab ko dhire se diya. Mrs. Williamson, shochte hue ki usne 9 kaha tha jawaab diya ki Ben ko 30 mein se 9 ko haasil karna aschariye ka sudhaar tha. Phir Ben ke piche ka chatra ne chilaya, Nao nahi! Uska kuch bhi sahi nahi tha. Ben ne kaha ki wah waha se gaayab ho jana chahata tha.

Ben ki maa, Sonya, apne khud ke musibaton se guzar rahi thi. Wah 24 bachchon mein se ek thi, jiske paas teesra greid ka shikshan tha, aur padh nahi sakti thi. Uski shaadi 13 saal mein kar di gayi thi, talaakh shuda thi, do putron ke saath, aur unko Detroit basti mein paal rahi thi. Kisi bhi tarah se, wah aatam-nirbhar thi aur vishwaas karti thi ki Parmeshwar use aur uske putron ki madad karega agar weh apna kaarye karein.

unhone roya, baadviwaad kiya, parantu weh safal na hue. Phir Ben ne socha, Usne niyam bana diya tha. Main us aagya ko pasand nahi karta tha, parantu usko hume humare jiwan mein safal dekhne ki ichcha ne hume badal diya.

phir Johns Hopkins medical school ko, 33 ki umar mein wah chief ki pediatric neurosurgery ban gaya tha aur duniya bhar mein jaana-maana sarjan tha. Yah kaise mumkin tha? Kkaaskar ek maa ke kaaran jisne apne jiwan mein bina hi koi saobhaagye ke apne maa hone ke niyukti ko pura kiya tha.1
Parmeshwar jo jiwit hai ke Putra Ishu Maseeh mein vishwaas, aur baptisma aur Pavitra Aatma ke uphaar ko sikhlaye DC 6825.

ke rup mein hume apne bachchon ke mukhye susamachaar shikshak aur uddhaaranon ko banna chahiye- bishop, Raviwaar Skool, Jawaan Mahilaien ya Jawaan Purush, nahi parantu maata-pita. Unke muhkye susamachaar adhyaapak ki rup mein, hum unhein Praeshchit ke shakti aur sachchaai ko sikhla saktein hain- unke pehchaan aur diviye bhaagye- yah karte hue unhein sachcha neev pradaan karo jis par weh bana sakein.Jab sab bol diya gaaye aur sampann hai, ghar hi Ishu Maseeh ke susamachaar ko sikhlane ka mukhye sthaan hoga.

Beirut jaane ka kaarye prapt hua tha. Jab waha tha, maine ek 12-saal ki umar ki ladki, Sarah ke bare mein sunna. Uske maata-pita aur do bade sahadaaron Romania Girjaghar mein parwartith hue the parantu phir unhein apne ghar ko waapis jana zaroori tha jab Sarah sirf saath saal ki umar ki thi. Unke janambhumi mein koi Girjaghar nahi tha, koi bhi sangatith units, Raviwaar Skool ya Jawaan Mahilaaen kariculam nahi. Paanch saal baad uske parivaar ne Beirut ke ek shaakha ko jaana aur mere aane se pehle apne 12 saal -umar badi putri, Sarah, ko bhej diya bade sahadaaron ke saath, baptisma ke liye. Jaha maine mukti ki yojna par bakti ka sandesh diya. Sarah kai baar apne haath ko utaya aur swaalon ke jawaab diya.

aur usko bahut kam Girjaghar ke jaankaari ke saath, mai uske paas gaya aur pucha, Sarah, tumhe kis tarah un sawaalon ke jawaab pata hai? Wah turant boli, Meri maa ne mujhe sikhlaya hai. Unke sangaton mein koi Girjaghar nahi tha, parantu unke ghar mein sisamachaar tha. Uski maa uske liye mukhye susamachaar shikshak thi.

Jo baatein main apne pita se anant jiwan aur santon ke vishye mein sunna karta tha wah mere hriday mein achchie tarah pravesh kar chuki hai Enos 13. Yaha koi sandeh nahi tha ki kaun Enos ka muhye susamachaar shikshak tha.

dharamshaastra aur dusre achche kitaabon ko padhtey hue, aur main uske bagal mein rahati. Mujhe yaad hai uske jeb mein rahe hue cards ko jismein dharamshaastra aur Shakespeare ko doharaya tha aur wah naye sabd jo wah jaana aur sikhna chahata tha. Mujhe shaam ke bhojan ke mez par susamachaar ke swaal aur jawaab bhi yaad hai. Mujhe yaad hai ki mere pita mujhe kai baar buzurg ko bhent karne le jaatey the- kis tarah hum rukhtey the kisi ke liye ice-cream ya dusre ke shaam ki bhojan ke liye murgi ya usko ant mein payese dene ke liye haath ko milana. Mujhe yaad hai wah aschcha ahesaas aur uski tarah rehne ki ichcha.

lagbhag 90 saal ki, apne ghar ke sahadikar kichin mein bhojan pakate hue aur khaane se bhare trey ko lekar khush hotey hue. Maine use pucha wah kaha ja rahi thi. Usne jawaab diya, Are, main kuch bhojan buzurg ke liye le ja rahi hoon. Maine khud socha, Maa, ki tum bhi buzurg ho. Main apne maata-pita jo mere mukhye susamachaar shikshak hai ka kitna abhari hoon yah batla nahi sakta.

naaki sirf humesha prarthna karna. Jab main 17 saal ka tha, main apne khaat ke paas ghutne par hota, aur shaam ka parthna karta. Mujhe pata nahi tha, ki meri maa darwaaze par khadi thi. Jab maine khatam kiya, usne kaha, Tad, kya tum Prabhu se madad chahatey ho ki tume achchie pati dhoondh de?

maine jawaab diya, Nahi, jiska usne jawaab diya, Achcha, tumhe chahiye, putra yah tumhare jiwan ka sab se zaroori kaarye hoga. Jin shabdon ne mere hriday mein ghar kar liya tha, aur phir che saal tak, maine Parmeshwar se prarthna kiya ki mujhe achchie patni ko dhoondhne mein madad kare. Aur, ayse, is tarah usne prarthna ka jawaab diya.

hum apne bachchon ko anant cheezon ke parinaam ke liye humare bachchon ko prarthna karna sikhlana chahiye- prarthna karna chahiye ki is chunaoti bhari duniya mein sudhta se rahane ke liye shakti mile, aagyakaari rahein, aur sachchaaie se khade rehne ke liye himmat rahe.

parantu unmein se kai koshish karte hai subeh prarthana ko karne mein .Maata-pitaon ki rup mein, unke mukhye susamachaar shikshak ki tarah, hum yah sahi kar saktein hain. Mormon Dharamshaastra ke kaun se maata-pita ne virodhi ke baochaar se bachne ke liye apne bachchon ko bina kawaj aur shild aur talwaar ke ladaai mein jaane diya tha? Magar hum mein se kaun apne bachchon ko har subeh ghar se jaane se pehle khatre se bhare duniya mein, Shaaitaan ko jhelne ke liye aur uske kai bahekaawe mein ane ke liye, un ke dhaarmik kawaj aur shild aur talwaar ki bina bejenge jo bachaane waale shakti prarthna se prapt hota hai? Prabhu ne kaha, Humesha prarthna karo, ki tum Shaaitaan par viyay prapt kar sako DC 105. Maata-pitaaon ki tarah hum apne bhachon ko humesha subeh ki prarthna ko karne ki aadad ko banane mein madad kar saktein hain.

Sonya Carson ki tarah, hume zaroori hai ki hum apne bhachchon ko prem se magar dhire se unko tv aur dusre electronic shaadhonon par pabandhi lagaye, joki kai stithiyon mein unke jiwan ke bahut se samay ko barbaad kar rahe hain. Balki hume unke samay ko ziyada laabhdaayak susamachaar gatividhiyon mein lagane chahiye. Yaha par shuruwaat mein kuch pabandhi bhi hona chahiye, kuch shikaayatein kartein hai, parantu Sonya Carson ki tarah, hume samajhna chahiye ki yah aane waale jiwan mein kis tarah ka prabhaao dalega aur uske saath chalne ko. Ek din humare bachchein samjhenge aur jaanege ki jo humne kiya wah achcha tha. Agar hum yah nahi karenge, to kaun karega?

dimaagi, aur rachaatmak shaktioyn ko prapt kartein hain, ya woh humare bach kuche samay aur gunon ko prapt kartein hain, humare Girjaghar ya bahari ke kaamon mein sabhi samay ko dene ke baad jo bachta hai? Anewaale jiwan mein, mujhe pata nahi hai ki kya bishop ya Sahayak Sanstha pradaan ke shirshak rahenge ya nahi, parantu mujhe pata hai ki pati aur patni, pita aur maata, ke shirshak rahenge aur duniya ke ant tak izzat milega. Yah hi wah ek mahaan zimmedaari hai jo hume maata-pitaon ko yaha is dharti par zaroor karna chahiye taaki hum apne jiwan ke un mahaan, parantu usi tarah ke , zimmedaariyon ko nibha sakein.

hume aashwaasan mila hai ki Parmeshwar hume kabhi akele nahi chodenge. Parmeshwar hume woh zimmedaari nahi deta jo humare shakti se bahar ho- mai uska gawahi de sakta hoon. Hum maata-pitaaon ki tarah humare diviye kaarye mein, aur Parmeshwar ke saath hissedaari mein, humare bachchon ke susamachaar aur uddhaaran ke muhkye shikshakein ban saktein hain, main yah Ishu Maseeh ke naam se prarthna karta hoon, amen.

balki vah abhi nabalig tha. dasavin tak yahin daur chala. padhaee men bhi kuchh khas n tha. avval aata parantu pichhe kee talika se. gharavale bhi kafi pareshan rahate. khel khelana bhi pasand nahin karata. agar man men kabhi khel bhavana hichakole bhi marati to gharavale tana dete. har vakt khel, isalie to padhaee men avval aate ho vah bhi pichhe kee disha se. tumhara to ab bhagavan hi malik hai. tane sunata raha tulana auron se hoti rahi. dekho us samir ko farst laya hai apane bap ka nam raushan kiya hai. dard asahaniy hota gaya. man men kshobh janm lene lage. bechara tha. pappoo hi raha. dasavin ke parinam ne ek bar fir se nirasha ke andhere men dhakel diya. lekin ghar men ek man thi jisane har vakt puchakara, galatiyon par parda dalati rahi. janati thi, vah bhi usakee kokh se janma usake kaleje ka tukada raha. us bechare kee tarafadari men kabhi-kabhar aakshep ke dansh ko bhi hansakar sahan karane se n katarati. man jo thahari, vishal hriday hona to lajami hi tha. bap kee tarah patthar dil kee sanskriti hamare bharatiy sabhyata men nahin dekhi gaee hai. aur apani hi chhavi ko dhoomil hota dekh kaha chup rah pati.

bodh hone laga. ek ladkee se man hi man pyar karane laga. bechara sharmila jo thahara. kahane kee himmat kaha thi. lekin ek bat to usamen thi ki vah apane sabhi baton ko bedhadk doston ko kah deta. use shahar kee hava bhi nahin lag paee thi. kyonki jahan vah rahata tha use ganv kaha jata. ganv kee sanskriti men pala-badha jahan har padosi men rishte-nate talash leta. kisi ko chacha-chachi, mama-mami, didi-bhaiya aur bahan bana leta. aur ek bar jo man men bitha leta, door-door tak us par kudrishti nahin dalata. lekin jahan vo padhane ke lie modarn skool jata tha. aas-pas ka vatavaran shahar ke mahaul men poori tarah dhal chuka tha. samane khulane vale daravajon ke bich rishte to door kee bat, ek-doosare ko janate tak nahin. anajane musafir ko ghar talashane men bhi kafi mashakkat karani padti thi.
jo aaj ke mahanagaron ke bachche kaksha satavin se hi jan chuke hote hai. n to ladkiyan rijhane ke taur-tarike se hi vakif tha, usake bad kee parikalpana kee to bat hi chhod den.

barahavin ka parinam samane. parivar valon ka shor kanon men laudaspikar kee tarah ek bar fir bajane laga. isaka kadapi tatpary nahin ki vah fel ho gaya tha. balki pratham se do ank pichhe rahakar dvitiy shreni ka khitab to avashy hi pa liya tha. sab ne kahan ab kya karoge? usane kahan taiyari medikal kee karoonga, shayad daktar ban jaoon. konafidens looj jo thahara. medikal kee taiyari ke lie koching men dakhila liya par usakee ajibo-garib si padhaee ne use aur asamanjas men dal diya. yah bhi ek sal yoo hi jata raha. ek bat avashy rahi is bar use prem ka moh man men nahin panap paya.

vo alag. padhaee se mano ab man hi uchat gaya tha. bijanas men jane ka man bana liya. ghar valon ne bhi protsahan dene ke bajay ek bar fir se padhaee kee dal-dal men jhok diya. kahan abhi padho bijanas karane kee umr abhi bahut bachi hai. pas ke kalej men dakhila liya taki snatak kee khanapoorti ho sake. isi bich bechare ko dilli ghoomane ka mauka mila. vahan kee daudti bhagati jindagi se kafi prabhavit huaa. roj nae-nae husn ke darshan aur usase panapate aakarshan ne dilli men rahane kee lalak jaga di. dilli men rahana koee aasan nahin tha. mahanga shahar tha. vo dakshata bhi nahin thi jisase kee vah khushahal jindagi apani bana sake. lekin achanak usake jehan men kaee sare rangin sapanon ne jagah banana shuroo kar diya. man se ek aagaj uthane laga, kahane lagah-

use har keemat par pana hai. aise men rojagar parak kors ke vichar manthan chalane laga. sath hi man kee aavaj ko bhi poora karana tha. patrakarita ek matr rasta dikha jisake madhyam se in tamam raston se gujara ja sakata hai. lekin kuchh kamiyan usamen jisase is raste par aana aasan nahin dikh raha tha. lekin kahate hai n jo kismat men likha hai vahin hota hai. achanak usake hathon men likhane kee kshamata jagrit hone lagi. shuruaat bechare ne kavitaon se kee. isi bich ek ladkee ke pulakit chehare ne usakee aakhon men dastak di. fir kya tha prerana ubal marane laga. kalam kee, dhar dharadar hoti chali gaee. raftar bhi tej hoti gaee likhane kee. shabdon aur vakyon se khelane kee kala men bhi nikhar aane laga. han ek kami thi usamen sahityik shabdon ka istemal nahin kar pata. vajah ek matr thi, vo ganv, jahan hindi bhi shuddh nahin boli jati thi. kyonki pradeshik bhasha ka bol-bala tha.

agar tune bevafaee kee to aatmahatya kar loonga. vo bechara soch men pad gaya. kisi kee jan se jyada usaka pyar keemati nahin ho sakata. usane fauran use dil se nikal diya. dosti rakhi par vo ehasas khatm kar diye, jisane usake dil ko vichalit kar rakha tha. fir kya tha dil khali kahan rahata hai vah bhi umr ke aise padav men. talash to sabako rahati hai apane lie ek sathi kee.

kshetravad, bhaee-bhatijavad aur bajaravad ke badhate chalan ne kafi nirasha pahuncha hai. vah samajh chuka hai ki patrakarita apani purani dhara kho chukee hai. jisake ufan matr se hi bade se bade chattan dhool men parinnat ho jate the. balki vaishvikaran ke is yug men yah bhi ek khoobasoorat rangin lifafe kee tarah dikhata hai. samay ke takaje ko bhanpate hue ab usane bhi khud ko badalane ka faisala kar liya hai kyonki akela chana bhad nahin fod sakata. is badali huee paristhiti men naee soch ke sath khud ke lie mukammal sthan pane ka prayas usaka jari hai. dekhana hoga aane vale dinon men vah kitana safal ho pata hai.

jise kisi ke aatmahatya kee dhamakee ne usake ehasas tak mitane ke lie vivash kar diya tha. usakee mang ab sajane vali hai. hathon men menhadi rachane ja rahi hai par vah bhi kisi aur se. lekin ek badi aashchary karane vali bat samane aaee ki vah us pappoo se pyar karati thi, lekin use kabhi kahane kee himmat nahin huee thi. aise men ek bat avashy samane aati hai ki bechare ladke ko pappoo kee sangya di jati hai. lekin un ladkiyon ka kya nam diya jae jo pappoo vali harakaten karati rahati hai. vichar kare!

humare kampani ne Charlie Brown holiday TV specials banane waale kampani mein niyam ki kuch sarkaari kaam kiya tha.1 Main Charles Schulz aur uske banane waale ka dost ban gaya-Peanuts, Charlie Brown, Lucy, Snoopy, aur dusre aschariye kalakaaron ke saath.

Charlie Brown ki basebol ko khelne waale ek zaroori khel rahe the- Lucy daeye feild mein khel rahi thi, aur uske oar ek uchi bol maari gayi. Virothi khilaadi apni sthaan par the, aur yah khel ka aakhri daur tha. Agar Lucy bol ko pakad leti hai, to weh khel jeet jaatey. Agar Lucy bol ko pakad nahi paati, to dusre khilaadi jeet jaatey.
pure khilaadiyon ne Lucy ko gher liya tha jab bol niche ah raha tha. Lucy soch rahi thi ki, Agar maine bol ko pakad liya, mera naam hoga, agar nahi, to badnaami.

aur jabki uske saathi aschariye se dekh rahe the, Lucy ne bol gira diya. Charlie Brown ne apne glove ko dharti par dhul par beeg diya. Lucy ne phir apne saathiyon ki oar dekha, apne haathon ko apne kamar par rakha, aur kaha, Kis tarah tum aasha kartey ho ki main bol ko padak lunga jabki main dusre deshon ke saath apne desh ke anokhe niyam par chintith hoon?
aur uske paas har samay ek bahaana tha.2 Bhale hi humesha mazaakiya, Lucy ke paas bahaane hotey batlaane ke liye weh uske bol na pakadne ke jhootey bahaane hotey.

usne humesha sikhlaya hai ki faeslon par anewaali jiwan nirbhar hota hai.3 Ussi mul ke adhaar aaj raat mera salaaha hai ki bahaane banane chod do jo hume sache faeslon ko banane se rokhtey hain, khaaskar Ishu Maseeh ki sewa karne ki izzat ke saath. Isaiah mein hume sikhlaya gaya hai, hume bure ko tayaagna, aur bhale ko grahan karo. 4

jab Shaitaan ka prabhaao insaan ke hriday mein kai naye aur chaturaai ke tarikon se bhar rahi hai, ki humare chunaao aur faeslein saodhaani se karne chahiye, humesha faeslon aur cheezon ko lekar jis ke dwara hum jeetein hain. Hum aagyaoun ko puri tarah se maanna chahiye aur pavitra vaadon ko nibhaana chahiye. Jab hum bahaane ko bana kar mandir ke endowments nahi pratigya karte, mission par laayak nahi rahatey, aur mandir mein shaadi nahi kartey, weh haanikaarak hain. Yah bahut dukh detein hain jab in faeslon mein vishwaas kartein hain, aur us tarike se nahi rahatey jo zaroori hai in faeslon ko karne ke liye.5

kuch log gativdhiyon mein nahi jaatey! Tum avivaahit purush, jitna der mein tum vivah karoge sahi umar aur bade hone ke baad, tum utna hi avivaahit khush rahoge. Parantu tum aur zyaada peede ko mehsoos karoge! Kripa dhaarmik aur sammilit gatividhiyon mein zaroor shaamil ho 6 apne mandir mein shaadi ke faesle ke saath.
yah faesle mein vishwaas nahi dikhta hai, naye bhavishyevaktaoun ke salaaha ke saath nahi hota, aur yah siddhaanton ke saath laayak nahi hai.

padhaai kare, mandir mein shaadi kare, aur ek vishwaasi khushi se bhara parivaar ho. Main uske faesle se bahut khush tha. Parantu aage vaartalaabh mein, pata chala ki uske faeslon ke anusaar uska sanchaalan aur wah banaaye hue chunaao humesha sahi nahi the. Maine mehsoos kiya ki wah mission par zaroor jana chahata tha aur gambheer bahakaawe se bach raha tha jo mission ki sewa par jaane se rokh sakta hai, parantu uske har din ke kaarye uski madad nahi kar rahe the use use jheltey hue shaaririk, ahessas, janta, dimaagi, aur dhaarmik chunaotiyon mein.7 Usne kaarye ko achchie tarah karna nahi sikha tha. Wah skool ya seminary ke padhaai ko lekar gambheer nahi tha. Wah girjaghar jaata, parantu usne Mormon ki Dharamshaastra nahi padha tha. Wah apna zyaada samay video ke khel mein aur janta ke media ke istamaal mein lagata. Wah sochta tha ki mission par jaana kaafi tha. Jawaan purush, kripa karke humare Prabhu aur Uddhaarkarta , Ishu Maseeh ke laayak sanchaalan karta aur ghambheerta se taeyaar hokar pratinidhitav karein.
hume zaroori hai ki badlaao, baraabri, aur khaas gyaan par zor dein. Yah zaroori hai ki bahaane banana bandh karein aur sahi chunaao ko karein.

baraabri, aur gyaan ka hai Internet ke istamaal ka. Is ke istamaal se prachaar kaarye ho sakta hai, purohiti ke zimmedaariyon mein madad mil sakta hai, mahaan purwajon ko pavitra mandir ke dharam vidhi ke liye dhoondhna, aur bhi zyaada. Achchaai ki chamta mahaan hai. Hum yah bhi jaantein hai ki wah buraai ko faela skati hai, jismein ashlilchitra, electronic vaartalaabh,8 aur chupaap barbarana shaamil hai. Yah paagalpan ke sujhaao aur tarikon mein bhi fasa sakti hai. Jaesa Bhaai Randall L. Ridd ne pichle maha sammelan mein shaktishaali se sikhlaya tha, Internet par baatein kartey hue, Tum bekaar ke cheezon mein fas saktey ho jo tumhare samay ko barbaad karega aur tumhare achche karne ki chamta ko kam karega. 9

Arthur C. Brooks, ne is sthar par zor diya hai. Usne samuhik madhayam ke istamaal par tippani diya hai, hum apne jiwan ke khushi ke pal ko prasaarith kartein hain parantu skool ya kaam ke mushkil samay ka nahi. Hum aadhe jiwan ko dikhlaatein hain- kabhi kabhi jhuti aur jo hum nahi hai. Hum is jiwan ko dikhlaatein hai, aur phir humare samuhik madhyam ke doston ke jhute jiwan ko puri tarah se apnaatein hain. Brook batlaata hai, Zaroor wah tumhe bura mehsoos karega apne samay ke kuch bhaag ko khushi mein mehsoos karne ki jaesa nahi hai, aur tumhare samay ke kuch bhaag yah dikhlaatey hue ki dusre tum se zyaada khush hai? 12

anchaahi musibatein, aur humesha ke jhadon mein fas chuke hain. Jab hum paagalpan se bahar nikaltey aur saaodhaani se apne ird-gird ke sachchaai ko dekhtein hain, yaha bahut kuch nahi hota hai jo hume humare anant tak ke sachche neev ki oar madad kare. Main janta hoon ek pita ko jo unke kai musibaton ke bawajood bhi apne bachchon ke farmaish ko pura karta hai.Wah unse saralta se puchta hai, Kya yah tumhe aur bhi achcha insaan banayega?
bade ya chote, jo punaharsthapit susamachaar ke saath nahi chalta, hum zaroori ashirwaadon aur surakhchaoun ko gawa detein hain aur humesha paap ya apne maargdarshan ko kho detein hain.

gyaan, aur samuhik tarikein Parmeshwar ke khushiyon ke yogna se aur Ishu Maseeh ke khaas kaarye se alag ho jaatein hain, yaha par sangaton mein humesha viyojan ho jata hai.14 Humare dinon mein, kai sthaanon par anmol badhanti ke bawajood, khaaskar vigyan aur vaartalaabh mein, kai khaas mul kamzor pad gaye hain aur khushyaali aur sukh kam ho gaya hai.

usne kuch dimaagi chal aur aaj ke sachche gyaan ki kami ko dekha.15 Acts mein hum padhtey hain Sabhi Athenians aur musaafiron ke liye jo waha the apne samay ko kisi aur cheez mein nahi lagaye, parantu chahe batlaye, ya kuch naye cheez sunne. 16 Paul ka zor tha Ishu Maseeh ke Punaharjiwan par. Jab bheed ne jaati ke is poshan ke uske sadesh ko jana, kuch ne use mara dusron ne use andekha kiya, kahatey hue, Hum is Swami ke vishye mein baad mein sunnege. 17 Paul ne Athens kobina koi safalta ke chod diya. Dean Frederic Farrar ne uske bhent par likha Usne Athens mein girjaghar nahi banaya, aur Athnes ke bagal se guzarne ke baad bhi , wah waha kabhi nahi gaya. 18

behatar, sab se achcha ke matlab se chunaao aur zimmedaariyon ke tarikon ko dekhta hoon. .19 Kai chunaao bure nahi hai, parantu agar weh humara pure samay lele aur sahi chunaao nahi karne de, phir weh khatarnaak ho jaatein hain.

basketbol, basebol, aur daudne waale khel mein bhaag lene ke samay ko lekar na khush tha. Wah un khilaadiyon ko jaanta tha jo shakti, ant tak khel, aur dal ko badhaatey the parantu batlaya ki ek khel par shaayad kuch hi samay tak dhyaan dena achcha hai. Uske nazariye mein khel- kud achcha tha parantu mere liye achcha nahi tha. Uske anusaar kuch khel mein sirf deshi log ya naamchin lambe-samay ke zyaada zaroori kharche ko kartey the.

main ek cheez Lucy ke basebol ke khel mein pasand karta hoon ki, mere pita chahtey the ki, main videshi nitti ko sikhun aur chinta nahi tha ki wah bol pakdun ya nahi. Main yah batlaata hoon ki meri maa ko khel-kud pasand tha. Wah sirf us samay mere khel ko nahi aati agar wah aspataal mein hoti.

Logan Bluebird resturant mein tha. Haath milaane ke baad, usne dobara mujhe se ankh nahi milaya. Usne sidhe Merlin se baatein kiya aur mujhe andekha kar diya. Bhojan ke baad, pehli baar, mere oar muda, parantu wah mera naam bhool gaya tha. Usne phir Merlin ko batlaya, Agar tum Stanford skool ko chuntey ho aur apne mitra ko apne saath lana chahtey ho, uska mark achcha tha aur wah ho sakta hai. Yah anubhao mere liye pakka ho chuka tha ki main apne pita ke achche salaaha par chalun.
barabri, aur gyaan zaroori hai. Jab achchie tarah se istamaal kiya jata hai, weh humare jiwan ko sudhaar deta hai.

main sabhi ko lakhsh aur himmat deta hoon, jawaan aur buzurg, lakhsh aur uddesh aur zyaada achche sudhaar ko nirakhshan karne ke liye.Humare roz ka sanchaalan aur chunnao humare lakhsh ke saath samaan rahana chahiye. Hume zaroori hai ki kamiyon aur manbahalaao se bahar nikalein. Yah zaroori hai ki humesha chunnao ko humare vaadon ke saath sachchaai se Ishu Maseeh ki sewa karein.21 Hume us lakhsh se kisi bhi tarah se bahekna nahi chahiye.

hasmukh log hain. Hum achche mijaaz ke indriyon ke abhaari hain aur doston aur parivaar ke saath bina samay ke mulye ke liye. Parantu hume yahan vichaar par ghambheerta zaroor dena hai jo humare jiwan ko jeene ka neev ho aur humare sabhi chunnao ke. Manbahalaao aur kamiyon jo bahant ko rokhtein hain khatarnaak hotein hain, parantu jab Ishu Maseeh aur Uske Girjaghar ke vishwaas ko kam kartein hain, wah khatarnaak hai.

hum wah kaam ko karenge jo Swami ke sewa karne waalon ke mahaan kaarye mein zaroori hai. Sabhi cheezon mein hume yaad rakhna hai ki Ishu ke gawahi mein himmat rakhne se logon ko celestial aur terrestrial raagye ke mul parinaam mein se alag kiya ja sakta hai.23 Hum chahatein hain ki hum celestial ki oar alag paaye jaaen. Uske ek Devdut ki tarah, Praeshchit aur Ishu Maseeh, humare Uddhaarkarta ke pavitrata ki sachchaai ki zaroor gawahi deta hoon.
ek dhaarmik purush ko chuna, jo Unke susamachaar ke purnata ki Punahsthaapna kar sakta tha. Usne Joseph Smith ko chuna.

ek devdut ne Joseph se pehla bhent kiya use naam se pukaara aur usse kaha ki woh, Moroni, ek shubhchintak hai jo Parmeshwar ki upasthiti se aaya hai aur kaha ki Parmeshwar ne uske liye kuch kaam diya hai. Kalpana kijiye Joseph ne kya socha hoga jab us devdut ne use batlaya ki sansaar ke har ek desh, jaati aur bhaasha ke log use bhala bura kahenge. 1 Shaayad Joseph ke aankhon ka achambha dekh Moroni ne dohraya, ki sansaar ke sabhi log use bhala bura kahenge.2
Kitna niraala hai ki ek gumnaam ladke ko laayak samjha gaya aur yogye mein mahimaa moh lena . ki woh sabse kadwa atyachaar hai. 3

anye log unke virodh bante gaye. 38 varsh ke umar mein, 150 aadmiyon ke giroh, jinke chehre pe kaala rang tha, dwara uski hatya ho gayi thi.4 Jabki Bhavishyevakta ka jiwan achaanak khatam ho gaya, Joseph ke khilaaf bhala aur bura baat abhi shuru hi ho raha tha.

jiske baad kayi anye swarg ke dut unse mile. Woh Parmeshwar ke haathon mein saadhan bana pavitra dharamshaastra, nazarandaaz kiye aur khoya hua dharamsiddhaant, aur purohiti ko saamne laane ke liye. Budhimaani se zyaada kuch hona chahiye yeh janne ke liye ki Joseph ka kaam kyun avashyak tha iske liye hamein Joseph ki tarah, Parmeshwar se maangna chahiye. 9 Aatmik sawaalon ke aatmik jawaab hotein hai Parmeshwar ke dwara.

ki sone ke patte ek devdut dwara pahunchaae gaye the aur Parmeshwar ke shakti dwara anuwaad kiya gaya tha. Use vishwaas na karne se, woh jald Joseph ke gawahi ko thukraate hai, aur durbhaagye se kuch log Bhavishyevakta ke jiwan ko badnaam karne ka paap karte hai aur unke charitra ke baare mein jhoot bolte hai.

Girjaghar ke baare mein un logon se seekhna jo Girjaghar se nikal gaye hai, us tarah hoga jaise Ishu ke baare mein Judas se salaah lena. Jo ab girjaghar nahin aate hamein apne baare mein zyaada batlaate hai aur jisse woh nikle haigirjaghar uske baare mein kam batlaate hai. 11

Apne baeriyon se prem rakho, aur apne satanewaalo ke liye prarthna karo. 12 Chalo hum unpar daya karein jo Joseph Smith ki aalochna karte hai, hum apne hriday mein jaante hai ki Joseph Parmeshwar ka bhavishyevakta tha aur hum samajhte hai ki yeh sab Moroni ne pehle batlaya tha.

hum un hazaron logon ke shabdon ko kahe jinhonne unhein niji rup se jaana tha aur jinhonne apna jaan diya taaki unke dwara sthaapit hue kaam ko pura kar sakein. John Taylor, jise chaar baar goli maari gayi thi us giroh ke dwara jisne Joseph ko maara tha, wohi baad mein ghoshna karega Mai gawahi deta hoon Parmeshwar, devduton, aur manushyon ke samaksh, ki Joseph ek achche, aadarniye, aur dharmaatma vyakti the aur ki uska niji aur saarvajanik charitra doshrahit tha aur ki woh Parmeshwar ke bhakt ke tarah jeeta aur marta tha. 13
shaayad Martin Harris dwara likha hua, jismein Joseph Smith ne jaise kaha use Mormon Dharamshaastra mila tha uske khilaaf tha.14

woh bahut jald chale gaye. Mahinon baad visheshagyon ne paaya aur jaalsaaj ne batlaya ki woh patra ek dhoka tha.16 Tum jo khabron mein sunte ho uspar sawaal kar sakte ho, par kabhi bhi Parmeshwar ke bhavishyevaktaaon ke gawahi par sandeh mat karna.
jabki sach ho, shaayad kisi alag tarah se pesh ho jo uske dinon aur haalaathon ko dekh kar nahin batlaaya jaata hai.

Georgia ke National Center for Disease Control mein. Ek baar jab mai taxi ka intazaar kar raha tha ek bhentvarta ke baad taaki woh mujhe hawai-adda le jaa sake, mai zameen par let gaya kuch dhup lene ke liye waapas Utah ke thandi mausam mein jaane se pehle. Baad mein mujhe daak dwara ek tasveer mila mera jab mai leta tha jo koi chitrakaar ne dur se khincha tha ek khaas telephoto lens waale camera se. Uske niche tha ek likhawat, National Center ka Sarkaari Chikitsak. Tasveer to sach tha, likhawat bhi sach tha, par sachchaai ka istemaal kiya gaya galat nazariya pesh karne ke liye. 17 Jo hum jaante hai ki sach hai use hum nahin phenk dete kyunki kuch baaton ko hum abhi samajhte hi nahin.

Hum gambheerta ke saath yeh bhi suchit karte hai ki Parmeshwar ka ek dut swarg se niche aaya aur humne un swarn pushto tatha unmein khodi hui lipi ko apni aankhon se dekha hai. 18 Hum kayi anye gawahiyon ko bhi dohraa sakte hai.19

000 bhaktgan ke dalein hai aur 88,000 prachaarakein hai duniya bhar mein susamachaar sikhlaate hue. Laakhon Antim-din Sant ab Ishu Maseeh ke uddharan anusaar jeena chahate hai, sammaanit jiwan, gareebon ki dekhbhaal, aur dusron ki sewa karne ke liye apna samay aur gunon ka istemaal karna.
par jaanch karne waale ko sirf unhi par bharosa karke apne sachchaai ke khoj ko ant nahin karna hai.

ek mission samaapt kiye prachaarak ne mujhse ek dost ke baare mein kaha jo Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ke baare mein jaankaari paakar niraash ho gaya tha. Woh kayi baar baat kar chuke the, aur us prachaarak ke bhi mann mein sandeh paeda hone laga tha in baatcheeton ke kaaran.

mujhe uske apne gawaahi ki chinta ho rahi thi. Bhaaiyon aur bahanon, mai tumhe saodhaan karna chahata hoon tum auron ki madad nahin kar sakoge agar tumhara apna vishwaas surakshit nahin hai apni jagah par.

Aysa hoga to nahin, par agar jahaaj ka pressure badle, tumhare seat ke upar ka bhaag khulega, aur oxygen mask dikhenge. Agar aysa hua, aage badhiye aur ek mask ko apni or khinchiye. Mask ko apne naak aur muh ke upar rakhiye. Elastic rassi ko apne sir ke upar pehne aur mask ko theek karkepehne. Uske baad yeh chetaoni Dyaan rakhiye ki aap apne mask pahen liya hai kisi aur ko madad karne se pehle.

Parmeshwar se puchte samay ki woh ek sachcha bhavishyevakta tha. Woh shaayad Bhavishyevakta ke Pehle Drishti ka varnan karte samay aayega. Baar baar Mormon Dharamshaastra padhne se tumhare hirday mein ek gawahi sama sakti hai. Woh tab aayega jab tum Bhavishyevakta ke baare mein apna gawahi de rahe ho ya jab tum mandir mein khade ho aur yeh samjhoge ki Joseph Smith ke zariye pavitrata badhaane ki shakti dharti par waapas aayi thi.22 Vishwaas aur achchi abhilaasha se, Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ki tumhari gawahi mazboot ho jaaegi. Maedaan ke baahar se paani se humesha gubbaaro ke khel tumhe bigho sakte the, par woh kabhi bhi tumhari vishwaas ki jalti jwala ko bujha nahin sakti thi.

ko main ek khaas chunaoti deta hai Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ki gawahi khud haasil karo. Apne aawaaz ko, Moroni ke bhavishvaani anusaar, Bhavishyevakta ke baare mein achcha kehne ke liye istemaal karo. Yeh hai do sujhaao Pehle, Mormon Dharamshaastra mein woh shaastra dhoondhiye jo tum mehsoos karte aur jaante ho ki ekdam sach hai. Tab use parivaar aur doston ke saath gharelu shaam sabha, seminary, aur apne Jawaan Purush aur Jawaan Mahilaaon ki kakshaaon mein batlaao, yeh kehte hue ki Joseph Parmeshwar ke haath ka saadhan tha. Iske baad, Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ki gawahi padhiye Pearl of Great Price ya is patrika mein, jo ab 158 bhaashaaon mein uplabdh hai. Tum ise online paa sakte ho LDS.org par ya prachaarakon ke paas. Yeh Joseph ki apni gawahi hai jismein har waardaat likha hai. Aksar ise padhe. Joseph Smith ke gawahi ko apne aawaaz mein record kijiye, use lagataar suniye, aur doston ko sunaae. Bhavishyevakta ke gawahi ko apne hi aawaaz mein sunne se tumhe sahayta milega gawahi ko badhaane mein.
jiwanon ko badalta aur ashirvaad deta hua. Duniya ki koi bhi shakti Parmeshwar ke kaarye ko nahin rok sakta hai. Chaahe jo bhi ho, yeh mahaan kaarye aage badhta rahega. 23
hamare Uddhaarkarta aur Muktidaata. Usne ek pavitra manushye, ek dhaarmik purush ko chuna, jo Unke susamachaar ke purnata ki Punahsthaapna kar sakta tha. Usne Joseph Smith ko chuna.
Prabhu Ishu Maseeh ka chela. Pita Parmeshwar aur Unke Putra, Ishu Maseeh, unko dikhe the. Usne Mormon Dharamshaastra ko Parmeshwar se di gayi uphaar aur shakti ke dwara anuwaad kiya.

hum achchi tarah samajh jaaenge Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ke pavitra niyukti aur divye mission ke baare mein. Us din, jo ab-door-nahin hai, tum aur mai aur kayilaakhon anye log Bhaai Joseph ko dobara jaanenge. 24 Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.

paegambar, aur praktikarta aur Pradhaan ke rup mein samarthan karein Henry Bennion Eyring ko Pratham Adhyakshta ke Pratham Salaahkaar aur Dieter Friedrich Uchtdorf ko Pratham Adhyakshta ke Dusre Salaahkaar ke rup mein.

aur inhein parishad ke sadasyon ke rup mein Boyd K. Packer, L. Tom Perry, Russell M. Nelson, Dallin H. Oaks, M. Russell Ballard, Richard G. Scott, Robert D. Hales, Jeffrey R. Holland, David A. Bednar, Quentin L. Cook, D. Todd Christofferson, aur Neil L. Andersen.
Chetriye Sattaron, aur maha sahayak adhyakshataon ka samarthan karen jaise vartamaan samay woh niyukt hai.

nishchy hi isaka pramukh shrey svargiy dushyant kumar ko jata hai. halanki dushyant kumar ke pahale, hindi men gazal rachana ka shubharanbh ho chuka tha. keval aadhunik yug kee hi bat karen to bharatendu, badrinarayan chaudhari, pratap narayan mishra,nathoo ram sharma shankara, jay shankar prasada nirala, da. shamasher bahadur sinh,trilochan,janakee vallabh shastree,balabir sinh ranga aadi ne hindi gazal ke prati apani ruchi aur rachana ka parichay diya tha . lekin, ukt kaviyon kee gazalen jan-manas men aate men namak kee tarah ka hi prabhav utpann kar sakeen. hindi gazal ko ek yugantarakari kavy vidha ke roop men pratishthit karane ka shrey dushyant kumar ko hi jata hai. lekin 1975 men dushyant ke anayas dehavasan ke das varsh bad tak bhi kuchh log kahate rahe ki hindi gazal dushyant-kal men hi qdamatal kar rahi hai.aise kathan nishchit hi aagrah se yukt evan atishyoktipoorn the. dushyant kumar ke dehavasan-kal se ab tak duniya bhi aage badhi hai aur hindi gazal bhi . jivan, samaj, sanskriti,aur yatharth ke anek paripekshyon ka udghatan huaa hai. chetana ke naye staron kee nirmiti huee hai. kala-sahity ke kshetr men abhivyakti kee naee chunautiyan ubhari hain. yatharth pahale se adhik saghan evan sanshlisht huaa hai.

manch yani bazar ka hissa n banate hue, anushasan,ekagrata aur aatyantikata ke sath desh ke bhinn-bhinn hisson men baithakar achchhi gazalen kahi hain- us feharist men gazalakar dvijendr dvija ka nam sasamman shamil kiya ja sakata hai.kyonki ve vigat teis varshon se maranda palamapur ,rohadoo, hamirapur, kangada aur dharmashala jaise parvatiy kshetron men nivas karate hue achchhi gazalen kah rahe hain- jahan vastut gazalagoee ka koee utsah-vardhak mahaul nahin. nissandeh,

keets, shaili se le kar aadhunik aangl-sahity ke adhyeta. gazal keval unakee vaicharik- bhavabhoomi kee hi abhivyakti nahin, use kalatmak-star par bhi unhonne aatmasat kiya hai. dvijendr kee gazalon men ek vishesh qism kee aantarikata, samajh, salahiyat, sookshmata aur saghanata ko mahasoos kiya ja sakata hai.ye bat sach hai ki dvijendr dvija gazal ke mamale men kisi ustada ke fer men nahin pade.fir bhi, gazal ko le kar unakee jigyasaen, unake anveshann, unake prayogon ko, ve desh ke guni gazalakaron se mil- bantakar,samajhate-boojhate spasht karate rahe hain. isake kahane ke kshetr men apane-aapako talib-e-ilma vidyarthi samajhate rahane kee sahajata unake rachanakar -qd ko badhati hi hai.

rajanitik,sanskritik evan aarthik morchon par tamam bechain saval uthati hueen. aisa nahin hai ki pahadon men rahakar dvijendr pahadon kee bat nahin karate. lekin unaka pahad himachal tak simit nahin. jati, mazahab,rang,naslon aue firaqaaparasti kee siyasat ke khailaf bhi unaka gazalakar tan kar khada hai. pahad kee kathin zindagi men khaoonpasine se sinche gae kheton kee upaj ka bantavara thik-thik hone kee chetavani bhi unake sheron men hai. kul mila kar, unakee gazalen pragatishil aur janavadi chetana se lais jagarook gazalen hain .jo konpalon kee shaili men pallavit hoti hain. unake andar gazal kee kavyatmakata kee hifazat karane kee avishrant chinta bhi dikhaee deti hai-jo nissandeh svagat-yogy hai.

Internet Aaj Hamari Jindgi me kitne maine rakhta hai ye to sab samajte hi hai. Aaj hame kahi jane ki jarurat nahi padti ham ghar bhate hi Shoping kar sakte hai, Mobile Recharge kar sakte hai. Par kya aapko pata hai Is tej raftar online jindgi me hamari jo bhi gati bidhiya hota hai wo track hoti hai. Friends jab apko ye pata chalega ki dunia ka no.1 Search Engine hum par har samay, hamare har ek action ko track kar rha hai. To apko kafi herani hogi lekin ye sach hai ki Google hum pe har samay humare har gatividhiyo, Pasand na Pasand aur Contact par kadi nigrani rakhta hai. Also Read Google ke Most Important URLs jo aapko pata hona chaiye Google ki bhut si servires hai hai jo kahi na kahi hamari jindgi se judi hui hai jese Gmail, Google, Youtube, Google Map Par Google hame achi service dene ke liye hamari puri gati bidiyo par Najar rakhata hai. To chaliye sabse pahle hum ye janate hai ki google ye sab karta kaise hai. Google Search Engine ek aisa search Engine hai jis sayad hi koi use na karta ho. Aur ye baat bhi sach hai ki sayad hi koi iski najaro se bach paya hai. Kyonki Internet pe khulne wale jyatar Website Google se Search kr ke kholi jati hai. Ye apke dwara search kiye gaye Keywords aur click ki gai site ke sambhit jankari store karte rhta hai taki ye apke ruchiyo aur pasand na pasand ko samajh sake. Iska Faida ye hai ki fir aage agar ham koi chij search karte hai to hamare interest ke hisab se hi search reslut aayege. Jese Maanlo agar me Apple Mobile use karta hu or uske bare me kuch na kuch search karta rhata hu. or agar me sirf Apple search karu to mere search result me Apple Mobile Company aayegi. par agar koi jo fal-fruit ke bare me search karta rhata hai to uske result me Apple saf aayege. Dunia me sabse jyada Videos search kar ke dekhe jana wala Youtube Google ka hi ek Service hai. Aur ye bhi apke Ruchiyo, Pasand na Pasand ki jakari Google ko bhejta rahta hai. Youtube ki or jankari ke liye yaha click kare Mujhe jayada samjhane ki jarurat nahi hai ki Chrome bhi Google ki hi hai. And ye apke dawra khoji ja rhi har chijo se sambhit jankari Google ko bhejta rhta hai. Safari, Firefox bhi track karte hai gati bidiyo ko. Also Read Aaj kal Smart Phones me sabse jyda use hone wala OS Android hai. Aur ye humare phone me huve har gatividhiyon ki jankari Google tak pahunchata rhta hai. Android Smart Phone hamesha hamare sath hota hai isliye Google hum pe iski madat se har samay nigrani rakhta hai. Aapko ye bhi pasand aayege google Analytics ke dwara aap apne website ke visitors ki sankhya aur unke pasand na pasand ko jan sakte hai. Ye blog visitors ki puri jankari hume deta hai. Lekin ye baat bhi utni hi sach hai ki jitni jankari ye hume nahi deta balki usse jyada humari jankari Google ko bhej deta hai. Google Adsense ke bare me batane ki jarurat nahi hai fir bhi bata deta hu ki ye Google ki Ads Network hai jo aam tor pe har Website pe laga hota hai. Jahir si bat hai ki iske Ads code jahan jahan lage honge vahan vahan apki upastithi darj ki jayegi. Aur iski suchna Google ko bheji jayegi. ye bhi pade Aapke dwara Send aur Receive ki gai Emails ko Google pahle check karti hai. Fir jakar apko mail milta hai. Ye google ki social networking site hai aur jahir si baat hai ki ise use karne wale har bande ki jankari Google ke pass hoti hai. To Friends dekha apne ki Google hum pe anytime kis prakar se nigrani rakhta hai. Also Read Google Map jis par ham kisi bhi jagha ka naksa dekh sakte hai. par ham jab bhi isme koi location search karte hai ya navigation chalu karte hai to Google ke pass hamari Physical location bhi chali jati hai. Ab apke man me sawal ye uth rha hoga ki Google humare data ko store kar ke karta kya hai, Hai na! To main apko bata du ki Google humare Ruchiyo aur Pasand na Pasand ko jan kar usi hisab se Advertise display karvata hai aur paise kamata hai. Ya ek prakar se kahe to ye ek tarika hai Google ke paise kamane ka. I hope friends apko meri ye jakari achhi lagi hogi aur aap is Post ko Share jarur karenge Thank You! Guest Post Vinay Singh ne ki hai jo gyaniblog.com ke owner hai. Agar aap bhi HMH.pe Apni Guest Post karna Chate hai to yaha click kare.

Aapka Interest kisme hai or kis chij me apna career banaye jo aap usme success bhi ho sake or apni success ko injoy bhi kar sake. Aapko sahi khusi jab hogi jab aap wo kare jisko karne me aapko maja aata hai or aap usme success ho jaye. Apna Career kisme banaye, kya kare achi jindgi jine ke liye jisme sab kuch ho jo aap chate hai ye jaanna to sab chate hoge, or ye mod har ek ki life me ek war aata hai jab unko ye fesla lena padta hai ki ab aage unko kya karna hai or kaise apni life ko jina hai. Me Aapko is article me ye hi batane wala hu ki aap kaise apne Interest, Passion or Talent ko phechane or usme aapko career banana hai ya nahi ye kaise decide kare. uski kuch tips duga. jiske baad aap apni life ko kese jina hai thoda or achi se samaj paoge. Jab muje mera passion jaanna tha to mene apne aap se kuch sabal puche the or jab muje unka jabab mile to me samaj gaya muje apni life me kya karna hai. Aapka apna passion kis chij me hai ye jaanne ke liye aapko bhi wo sabal apne aap se puchna hoge, jo mene apne aap se puche the. Agar aapne abhi tak Meri Success Story nahi padhi to aapko jarur padhna chaiye. Aapko bhut kuch naya sikhne ko jarur milega. Aapka Passion kis chij me hai wo jaanne ke liye aap sabse phele to Copy or Pen uthaye or usme ek list banaye jo bhi aapko pasand hai ya jo aap karna chate hai ya banna chate hai. jo jo bhi karna aapko pasand hai wo sab likhe. har ek chij ko likhe jo aapko pasand hai. kam se kam 20 topic likhe. jo bhi aapke mind me aaye likhte jaye. Aap jab sab topic ko likh lege or fir unko dekhege to aapko samaj aa jayega ki aapko kya hai jo sabse jada pasand hai ya aap kya banna chate hai or kya karna chate hai, or kya kar sakte hai. Jab aapko ye pata chal jaye ki aapka Passion kya hai to uske baad apne aap se ye kuch sabal puche, jisse aapko clear ho jayega ki haa ye hi aapka passion hai. Inn Sabalo se aapko or clear ho jayega ki aapka jo passion hai ya sirf kisi ko dekh kar lagab ho gaya hai. Khene ka matlab jese maan lijiye aap agar Online Blogging karna chate hai to aap Q karna chate ye sabal apne aap se puche. Yaha sabse main hai agar aapko iss sabal ke jabab me ye mile ki wo itne kama raha hai, wo itna success hai me bhi ho jaoga to aap galat track par hai. Blogging me Success aap sirf jab ho sakte hai, jab aapko khud ko usme maja aata ho. naa ki dusre ko dekh kar aap karte ho. Aap kisi or se inspire ho sakte hai par kisi or ko follow naa kare, kuch bhi karne se phele apna Talent phechane jisse aap apna feature acha kar sake or jisme aapko jo chaiye wo mile or aap khus rahe. Jese maan lo agar aap kisi ke blog se copy karte ho bhale post ke idea hi churate ho. jara socho agar samne wale ne blogging band kardi to aapka kya hoga. aapko kisi or par depend nahi hona hai. Blogging Start karne se phele kuch bate hai jo aapko pata hona chaiye, agar aap blogging me career banane ka soch rahe hai. Apne aapko kisi or se compare naa kare, or jo aapka talent hai aap usko phechane jab hi aap success ho payege. Iss Trha aap apna Passion or Talent ko phechan sakte hai, ab baat aati hai ki agar aapka jo talent or Passion hai wo agar aesa hai jiske liye aapko ek risk lena pade, or jisko karne se log aapko rok bhi rahe hai to aap kya kare.

jaise kisi shilpakar kee tarashi huee ek sajiv aatma jo tan ko odhakar is sansar kee sair ko nikali ho. jis rah se vo gujarati, gujarane vale tham jate the, jaise jam se jate the. unakee aankhe patthara jati, jaise kisi noor ko samane paya ho. han vahi hoor shila meri priy saheli aaj mere samane se gujar rahi hai, khud se hokar bekhabar.

jahan insan is kadar badal jaye, n fakat rang roop men, par jisake poore astitv kee kaya palat ho jae. vo kalej ke jamane bhi khoob huaa karate the, jab main aur shila sath sath raha karate the, ek kamare men, ek hi klas men aur lagabhag poora vakt sath khana, sath padhana, sath samay bitana. kya odhana, kya bichhana aisi har soch se pare, aajad panchhiyon kee tarah chahakate hue, har pal ka lutf lete hue, har sal kalej men tap karate hue ab ham donon fainal sal men pahunchin. char sal ka arasa koee kam to nahin hota, kisi ko janane ke liye, pahachanane ke liye.
main tumhari saheli savi, kaisi ho? jaise suna hi n ho, ya chahakar bhi sunana n chahati ho, kuchh aisa ahasas man men utha. aisa kya ho sakata hai jo is badalav ka karan bane?

balakhati, har kadam par thirakati huee shila, jaise kisi shilpakar kee tarashi koee chhavi, din bhar gunagunati apane aas pas ek khushaboo failati, aaj itani berang, rookhi bina ahasas kyon? meri utsukata badhi, mainne aage badhakar usake sath kadam milakar chalate hue dhire se fir usaka hath tham liya.
main to vahi savi, savita hoon, par tum shila hokar bhi shila nahin ho, yah main nahin manati. kaisa hai samir?

aankhon men udasi ke sae jyada ghane aur tan simatakar chhuee muee sa, jaise vah simat kar apana astitv chhupa lena chahati ho. mainne usakee kalaee pakad li. jab usane chhudane kee koshish kee to jyada pukhtagi se pakadi, aur han usane bhi fir chhudane kee koshish nahin kee. shayad apanepan kee garmi se patthar pighalane laga tha. usi pyar kee aanch men pighalakar hi to vah samir ke sath chali gaee, door bahut door kisi aur duniyan men. pichhe chhod gaee apani pyari saheli savita ko, apane antim varsh kee padhaee ko, apane aane vale ujjal bhavishy ko. shayad us pyar kee panah ne usase vah raushani chhin li thi, jis karan use sirf samir, usakee chitrakari, aur toolika par nikhare rang aas pas dikhaee pad rahe the. jane kya tha vah, kaise khumar tha, pyar ka junoon hi raha hoga, jo usane apana bhavishy samir ke nam likh diya. aur ek din achanak vah usake sath shadi achanak mere samane aa khadi huee.
kal samir vapas ja raha hai apane ghar shimala, aur men bhi usake sath ja rahi hoon. kahate hue shila mere gale lag gaee.

ya vah ab kisi prakar kee dakhal andaji nahi chahati thi, isiliye to shadi ka mahatv poorn faisala akele hi le liya, kisi kee jaroor hi use mahasoos nahin huee. han ek bat saf thi, usake oopar us pyar ka, samir kee kala ka jo indradhanushi khumar tha, us bahav men vo bahe ja rahi thi. koee bandh vahan bandhana bekar tha, yahi soch kar main bhi apani poori soch ke sath adhoore shabdon ka sahara lene lagi.

tum jyada mat socho, mainne soch samajh kar yah faisala liya hai kyonki main samir ke siva nahin rah sakati aur n vo mere siva. ab main jivan ke rangon ko odhana chahati hoon, unamen apani aashaon ko rangana chahati hoon, isase jyada kuchh nahin.han chalo sath men baithakar aakhiri bar khana khaen, kal vaise bhi subah kee gadi pakadani hai, aao chalen. kahate hue usane meri kalaee thik usi tarah pakadi thi, jaise aaj mainne usakee pakadi hai.

baton ke dauran main samir kee or dekhati rahi chori chhupe, jaise use janane kee, pahachanane kee koshish karati rahi. aisa kya tha usamen jo meri priy saheli kee jindagi men toofan banakar aaya aur bavandar kee tarah baha kar le ja raha hai. do mahine ke liye jo aart ka projekt use saunpa gaya tha, usake poora hone ke pahale hi usane shila kee jindagi par apana rang chadha diya aur ab sath le ja raha tha meri jan se pyari saheli ko, jaise jabaradasti koee mere tan se rooh ko juda kar raha tha. sochon ke daire se khud ko bahar nikalate hue mainne samir kee or rukh kiya.

par ek bat to batao, kya do mahine shila kee khatir aur nahin ruk sakate taki shila bhi apani padhaee kee javabadari poori kar le. jivan bhar sath nibhane ke liye jaroori nahin hai ki ham vakt ke sath khilavad karen. padhaee to raushani ka ek ang hai, use is tarah adhoora.
aur us faisale se main jyada khush to nahin, par naraz bhi nahin. meri prerana mera mit banakar mere sath saye kee tarah rahe, yah meri khushakismati hai.

apani sunahari duniya men sundar sapanon ko lekar aur fir sab dhundhala dhundhala sa ho gaya. din bite, mahine bite, aur sal bhi bitate chale gaye.ek nahin, do nahin, poore barah baras. sochon ka silasila sath tha, pakad men usakee kalaee aur hamakadam hamari chal. aakhir ek ped ke niche khinchakar mainne use bithaya aur fir main bhi baith gaee usake pas satak kar jaisa ham aksar baitha karate the.
too yahan is shahar men shimala se itani door? aur samir kahan hai, sath men kyon nahin aaya? mainne anajane men kaee saval ek sath poochh liye aur usaka munh takane lagi javab ke intajar men !

jinhen chahakar bhi main apane aanchal men samet n paee, na hi shila ne jatan kiya us fisalati huee dhara ko rokane ka. bas kuchh kah n paee aur uthate hue apanepan se kaha chalo kahin baithakar chay pite hai savi.

anabujhee kisi pyas ka hona jahir tha, par us pyas ka rukh ek naya mod le raha tha. shila kee jubani usakee aansuon kee tarah bikhari huee kahani ko sametate hue shila ne kaha savi main usake liye bas toolika par bikhare hue rangon ka ek bindu thi.

sach mano savi jis tarah usane toolika par rang bikherakar meri tasviron ko sajaya, unhen sajiv bana diya apane hunar kee barikiyon se, kaee kharidar un par fida hokar kharidane lage. daulat ka nasha din se jyada samir kee raten rangin karane laga. din ko main kisi patthar kee moorti kee tarah usakee prerana banakar ghanton baithi rahati aur vah nape tule dhang se mere har kon men rang bharata raha, bechata raha aur khanakhanahat men khota gaya, aur fir bahav itana tez aaya us badh men, jo vah mujhe bhi baha le gaya usakee svarth kee vedi ke us par jahan main tumhari vah saheli to nahin rahi jo har pal ko tum se bant leti thi, par han banti si, bikhari bikhari si us shila ka zarra zarra bikharata gaya. han vah shila jo apani aan ban ke sath jiya karati thi.vah. aur shila foot footakar rone lagi.

aansuon kee juban sab kah gaee. mujhe yoon lagane laga ki shila bikhar kar toot chukee hai aur jahan tak meri soch pahunch sakati thi, aisa aabhas huaa jaise shila mujhase vahi purana aashray mang rahi thi, usi aanchal kee narmi dhoondh rahi thi, vah nisvarth sparsh mang rahi thi.

bikharav ka ant ho gaya, sabhi bikhare rang fir se simat kar us berang shila roopi bindu men samate chale gae, boond sagar men sama gaee. aakash ke badal chhant gae, viratata najar men bhar gaee sitaron bhara aasaman saf dikhaee de raha tha.

Ishu Nazareth Apne ghar ke prachaar sthaan mein khade huwe aur yeh shabd jo Isaiah ne bhavishyevaani ki thi ko padha aur Luke ke Gospel mein likha Prabhu ka Aatma mujh par hai, isliye ki usne kangaalo ko susamachaar sunaane ke liye mera abhishek kiya hai, aur mujhe isliye bheja hai ki tutedilon ko changa karun, bandiyon ko chutkaare dilaaun, susamachaar prachaar karun aur kuchle huwon ko chudaaun. 1
Ishu ka pehla aur zaroori maseehi zimmedaari kiya gaya tha ki usne gareeb ko ashirvaad diya, use bhi jo mann ke deen the.

Ishu gareeb aur masoom se ek alag dhang se prem karte the. Woh usi tarah ke do logon ke ghar mein janma tha aur waisa kayi logon ke beech bada hua tha. Hum Unki jiwan ke sabhi saansaarik tatva ko nahin jaante, magar Usne ek baar kaha tha, Lomdiyon ke ghaddem aur panchiyon ke basere hote hai parantu manushye ke Putra ke liye sir dharne ki bhi jagah nahin hai. 2Hum jaante hai ki swarg aur jagat ko aur usmein ki saari vastuwon ki 3 Rachnewaala, Apne buzurg awastha mein, bina ghar ke tha.

gareebi maanav jaati ki sabse badi aur faeli hui kathinaaiya rahi hai.Gareebi ke parinaam aksar shareerik hote hai, magar jo aatmik aur bhaotik nuksaan usse pahunchta hai bahut hi haanikaarak ho sakta hai. Kisi bhi kahani mein, us mahaan Muktidaata ne lagataar hamein pukaara hai Unke saath is bhaari bojh ko logon par se hataane ke liye. Jehovah ki bhumika mein, Usne kaha Woh Israel ke gharane ka kadaai se jaanch karega kyunki zarooratmandon ka dhan tumne lutkar apne gharon mein rakha hai.

Ishu Maseeh ka punahsthaapit Girjaghar ek saal ke liye bhi abhi punahsthaapit nahin hua tha jab Prabhu ne apne sadasyon se kaha ki woh gareeb aur zarooratmand ki parwaah karein, aur unhein sahayta dein taaki unhein takleef na ho. 6 Us waakye mein aap aagya ki aawaaz ko pehchaane unhein takleef na ho. Yeh bhaasha Parmeshwar istemaal karta hai jab woh kisi baat par zor dena chahata hai.

ek purush ya mahila kya kar sakta hai? ShikshakIshu Maseeh ne khud ek jawaab diya hai. Jab, Uske vishwaasghaat aur Krus Par Chadhaane se pehle, Mary ne Ishu ke sir par keemti sangemarmar ka tel daala, Judas Iscariot ne is ka virodh kiya aur uske virodh kuch kaha. 7

usne kuch bhi to nahin haasil kiya hai. Is choti si mahila ne turant jawaab diya ki uska kaam pyaar ke baare mein tha, sankhya ke baare mein nahin. Bhale hi woh kayi anye logon ki madad nahin kar saki, usne kaha ki usne ek aagya ka paalan kiya Parmeshwar aur apne padosi se prem karo, un logon ko bachaane se jin tak woh pahunch saki apne saadhanon ke saath. Humse jo bhi ho paata hai shaayad saagar mein sirf ek bund sa dikhe, usne kabhi kaha tha. Par agar hum woh na kare, tab saagar mein ek bund kam hoga jitna abhi hai usse. 9 Gambheerta se ripotar ne samjha ki Isaai dharam sankhya se taalluk nahin rakhta. Usne tay kiya ki agar swarg mein zyaada khushi hoti hai ek paapi ko lekar jo pashchataap karta hai un ninaanbe99 ke milaan mein jinhe pashchataap ki zaroorat nahin hai, tab toh Parmeshwar pratishaton ki parwaah nahin karta.10

jaise Raaja Benjamin ne sikhlaaya tha, hum is kaaran se apne saadhanon ko daba kar na rakhein kyunki hum sochte hai ki gareebon se apna dukh khud apne upar laaya hai. Shaayad kuch logon ke kathinaaiyaan unhi ke kaaran aayi hai, par kya baaki log wahi nahin karte? Kya yahin woh vajah nahin ki yeh dayalu raaja puchta hai, Kya Hum Sab Bhikhaari Nahin Hai? 11 Kya hum sab madad aur aasha aur prarthnaaon ke jawaab ke liye nahin pukaarte? Kya hum sab apne galtiyon aur hamare zariye utpann hue musibaton ke liye maafi ki bheek nahin maangte? Kya hum kripa ki bheek ki alochna nahin karte apne kamzoriyon ko chupane ke liye, ki daya nyaye ke upar vijayi hoga hamare stithi ko lekar? Yeh ashcharyejanak nahin, hai ki, Raaja Benjamin kehta hai hum paapon se chama paate hai Parmeshwar se vinti karne ke baad, jo daya se uttar deta hai, magar hum apne paapon ke chama hone ko rok dete hai jab hum gareebon ki vinti nahin sunte.12

hamein un zarooratmandon ke liye bhi prarthna karna chahiye. Zoramitiyon ka ek dal, jinhe unke dharam ke log gande aur bekaar yeh dhaarmik shabdein hain samajhte the, ko unke prarthna gharon se baahar bheja gaya kyunki unka pehnaawa ghatiya tha. Mormon kehta hai, woh sansaarik sampati mein unke paas bahut hi kam vastuwein thi aur hriday se bhi deen the 13 do stithiyaan jo lagbhag hamesha saath aati hai. Alma aur Amulek jo ek saath prachaar karte the ne un ghatiya poshak ke logon ke hit mein baate ki unhein batlaa kar ki bhale unhein log sabhi suvidhaaen nahin dete hai, woh hamesha apne kheton aur apne gharon, apne parivaaron aur apne hridayon mein prarthna kar sakte hai.14

isi dal se, jinhe khud thukraaya gaya tha, se Amulek kehta hai, Aapke prarthna karne ke baad, agar tumne kisi deen, aur nange ko thukraaya, aur beemaar aur dukhi ko na bhent kiya, aur apne sampati mein se, agar tumhare paas woh hote hue, zarooratmand ko na diya mai tumsekehta hoon, tumhara prarthna vyarth ho jaaega, aur tumhare liye koi laabh nahin hoga, aur tum usi prakaar dhoni hoge jaise ki avishwaasi hote hai. 15 Yeh hamein shaktishaali dhang se yaad dilaata hai ki, chaahe hum dhanwaan ho ya gareeb, hamein jo bhi hum kar sakein karna hai jab anye log ki zarooratein hoti hai.

mujhe doshi na tehraaya jaae ki mainne raaste par bheek maangna ko uchit kaarye kaha hai, isliye mai aapko aashwaasan deta hoon mai bhi anye logon ki tarah mehnat, kamkharchi, atma-nirbharta, aur abhilaasha ke siddhaanton ka mazbooti se saath deta hoon jaise koi aur jiwit vyakti deta hai. Humse aasha ki jaati hai ki hum kisi se madad maangne se pehle khud apna madad karein. Iske alaawa, mai nahin jaanta ki kaise aapko apni zimmedaari puri karni hai un logon ko lekar jo kabhi bhi khud ki madad nahin karte ya nahin kar sakte. Magar mai jaanta hoon ki Parmeshwar jaanta hai, aur Woh tumhe madad karega aur chelapan ke dayalu kriyaon mein maargdarshan dega agar tum lagataar chahate aur vinti karte ki Uske diye kisi niyam ko pura karne ke tarike dhoondhte ho jo Unhonne hamein diya hai.
aur anaath aur maare maare firte huwon ko apne ghar le aana? kisi ko nanga dekhkar, vastra pahenana ? ki tum bojh ko todkar, aur dukhi logon ko chuda lena ? 16

donon dhaarmik aur saansaarik, jo unhein milta hai jo upwaas ke niyam ko jeete hai. Mai un chamatkaaron ki gawahi deta hoon jo mere saath ghate hai. Sach mein, jaise Isaiah ne likha tha, maine apne upwaas mein ek baar se zyaada pukaara, aur sach mein Parmeshwar ne jawaab diya, Mai yahan hoon. 17 Is pavitra saobhaagye ko kam se kam har mahine to aazmaao, aur apne upwaas bhent mein jitna ho sake utna daansheel raho aur anye hiumeniterian, shiksha sambandhi, aur prachaarak daano mein. Mai vaada karta hoon ki Parmeshwar tumhare saath daansheel rahega, aur jo log tumhare haathon se sahayta praapt karenge tumhare naam ko sada dhanye kahenge. Girjaghar ke teen chautayi se zyaada sadasyon ko pichle saal upwaas bhenton se sahayta mili hai jo sewanisht bishop aur Sahayak Sanstha pradhaan ke dwara diye gaye the. Isse to kitne saare abhaari Antim-din Sant huwe.

is tarah ke bhaashan mein apne jiwan mein na kamae hue ko khule taur se, ayogye, na khatam hone waale ashirvaadon ko yaad karna chahiye, donon saansaarik aur dhaarmikta se. Tumhari tarah, mujhe paeso ki chinta hoti thi samay samay par, magar mai kabhi gareeb nahin tha, na to mai jaanta hoon ki gareeb kaisa mehsoos karte hai. Iske alaawa, mai sabhi kaaran nahin jaanta ki kyun janam, swaasth, padhaai, aur aarthik maoke maranshilta mein itne alag hai, magar jab mai saekdo logon ki maango ko dekhta hoon, mai yeh nahin jaanta ki agar Parmeshwar ka kripa nahin hota, mujhe kya kuch jhelna padta. 18 Mai yeh bhi jaanta hoon ki mai apne bhaai ka rakhwaala nahin, mai apne bhaai ka bhaai hoon, aur kyunki mujhe bahut kuch diya gaya hai, mujhe bhi dena chahiye. 19

mai Pradhaan Thomas Spencer Monson ko khud samaanit karta hoon. Mujhe is manushye ko 47 varshon se jaanne ka ashirvaad mila hai, aur marte dam tak mai uska ek rup hamesha yaad rakhunga jab woh aarthik rup se ujda hua Purab Germany se laota tha ghar mein pahenne waale jute pahen kar kyunki usne sirf apna dusra suit aur uske anye shirt hi nahin par paer ke jute bhi daan kar diye the. Kitne sundar hai pahaadon par aur hawaiadde se guzarne waale unke paer jo achche samachaar aur shaanti laata hai. 20 Kisi bhi insaan se zyadad mujhe pata hai ki, Pradhaan Monson ne wohi kiya jo woh kar saka, vidhwaaon aur bina-pita ke bachchon ke liye aur usne to ab tak bahut kuch kar diya hai.

ki gareeb ek din Parmeshwar ka raajye ko unke paas aata dekhenge shakti aur mahaan mahima ke saath. 21Mai aasha karta hoon ki hum is bhavishyevaani ko pura karne mein madad karenge apne sachche Ishu Maseeh ke Girjaghar ke sadasyata ke shakti aur mahima mein woh kare jo ho humse gareebi ke bandiyon ko chutkaara dilane aur unke sapnon ko nasht hone se bachaane ke liye, mai vinti karta hoon Ishu Maseeh ke kripalu naam se, amen.

ke lie aarakshan kee vyavastha kee taki ve padh likh kar v naukari pakar samanata par aa sake tatha apane parivesh ko bhi aage badhane men madad kar saken. par is adhikar ko hamane jis beman se diya hai usaka parinam hai ki hamane ise keval vot ka maghyam bana kar chhod diya hai aur kabhi bhi is bat ka moolyankan karane ka prayas nahin kiya ki jati vihin samaj kee sthapana kee or hamare kadam kyon nahin badh rahe hain. poonjivad aur fir usake bad anek deshon men aayi samajavadi kranti ne duniya ko yah sandesh to de hi diya hai ki unakee rdudasha ke pichhe koee daiviy kop nahin hai apitu ye manaviy shadayantr bhar hai. yadi in shadayantrakariyon se takarane kee ichchha aur hausala ho to apani sthitiyon ko badala ja sakata hai. aarakshan shiksha aur anek tarah kee sashaktikaran yojanaon ke dvara kuchh matra men aisi ichchhaen paida bhi huyi hain. aavashyakata in ichchhaon ke ek jagah par ekatrit hokar sangharsh ke bal dene kee hai. aarakshan ka paksh aur vipaksh aaj desh kee bahut badi samasya ban kar ubhare hain jinake aadhar par aaj desh ke anek rajanitik dal vot batorane ka kam kar rahe hain. jaise jaise ham jativihin vivah kee or badhenge vaise vaise jatiyon kee sankeern simaen bhi tootengin jisase aarakshan kee aavashyakata aur usake duroopayog se mukti milegi. kalpana keejiye ki desh men ek jati vihin samaj sthapit ho gaya to bahujan samaj parti, aar je di, samajavadi parti savarn samaj parti samet saikadon partiyon ka astitv hi samapt ho jayega tatha isake bad jo dal bachenge ve janata kee janavadi mangon ke aadhar par kam karane vale sachamuch ke rajanitik dal hi hongen. is vaishvikaran ke yug men ek or to hamare yuva poori duniya par chha jane kee soch rahe hain aur kahan sankeernnatam jati aur upajati men vivah tak simit rah kar apana aur desh tatha samaj ka kachoomar nikal rahe hain.
mamooli-si prem kahani hai. ho sakata hai aapako yah prem kahani to kya, kahani hi n lage aur aap kahen ki yah sab kya bakavas hai?

isamen kahani jaisa to kuchh bhi nahin. ham yahi sab kuchh to roj dekhate-sunate rahate hain. fir bhi yah kahani kahani hi hai. jivan ya kahani jo kuchh bhi hai, yahi hai. bakee faisala aapaka. khair.

pichhale kaee barason kee kaee-kaee shamon kee tarah, aaj kee sham bhi hamara kathanayak munbaee mahanagar, jise desh kee aarthik rajadhani bhi kaha jata hai, ke mairin draiv kee munder par pichhale aadhe ghante se kathanayika ke intazar men baitha huaa arab mahasagar kee uthati girati laharen dekh raha hai. soory abhi-abhi dooba hai aur jate-jate jaise apane pichhe rangon kee balti ko thokar mar gaya hai. sare rang gadd madd hokar kshitij men bikhar gaye hain.

kuchh bhi ho sakati hai. vah kisi bhi vishay ka grejuet ya post grejuet ho sakata hai. vah kisi baink men klark ya kisi praivet farm men jooniyar asistent ya kisi faiktari men storakeepar bhi ho sakata hai. aise pachason dhandhe hain is mahanagar men jo kathanayak ya kathanayak jaise doosare naujavan karate milenge. vaise bhi is kahani men bat se koee fark nahin padata ki vah is vakt thik-thik kaun-sa kam kar raha hai.

vah munbaee mahanagar ke door ya pas ke kisi upanagar men steshan se kafi door kisi jhopadapatti men rah sakata hai aur entap hil, bandra sarakari vasahat, sahar pi end ti kaloni men klas for kvartars men se kisi flait men sab-laiting karake ek kamara bhi lekar rah sakata hai aur yah bhi ho sakata hai ki kahin khane kee suvidha ke sath peing gest ban kar rah raha ho. yah bhi ho sakata hai ki vah kisi hed klark numa apane kisi bos ke dedh kamare ke makan men rat ko bistar bichhane bhar kee jagah men rah raha ho. hone ko to yah bhi ho sakata hai ki vah kisi laj men chhah ya aath bistaron vale ek bade se kamare men rah raha ho jahan rahane ke sath-sath khane kee bhi suvidha ho. beshak vahan ka khana itana ghatiya ho ki aaye din usaka pet kharab ho jata ho, lekin fir bhi vahin jama huaa ho aur chah kar bhi use chhodane kee himmat n juta pata ho. itana tay hai ki vah kahin bhi rah raha ho, kiraye ka kamara le kar rahane kee usakee haisiyat nahin hai. hoti to kathanayika se kab kee usakee shadi ho chukee hoti aur vah is samay yahan baitha usaka intazar n kar raha hota.
usane socha aur rah chalate ek aadami kee ghadi par nigah dali. use yahan baithe hue paintalis minat hone ko aaye the.

isi jagah par huee thi. lagabhag dhaee sal pahale. katha nayika kee zindagi bhi kamobesh kathanayak jaisi hi hai. usaka bhi koee bhi nam, naukari, digri, jati, dharm ho sakata hai. alabatta vah rahati apane ghar men hai aur is tarah se kuchh mayanon men kathanayak se behatar sthiti men hai. bakee baten kathanayak se milati julati hain. shayad isi vazah se donon ke bich batachit shuroo huee hogi. donon men do-ek fark aur hain. kathanayak is shahar men paradesi hai. yahan usaka koee nahin hai. kathanayika sthaniy hai. usaka apana ghar bar hai. bakee sare dukh ek jaise. sanjhe aur lagabhag barabar bhi. kathanayika sadharan kathi kee, ausat-si dikhane vali ladakee hai. beshak usakee aankhen khoob gahari aur khas tarah kee chamak liye hue hain, usaka bakee chehara-mohara sadharan hai. rang bhi thoda daba huaa hai jisakee vajah vah kaee bar hinata bhi mahasoos karati hai.

beshak mamooli hi ho, apani khud ka zindagi hai, aur unakee bhi ek pahachan hai. choonki yahan kahi ja rahi kahani bharat desh, usakee aazadi kee pachasavin varshaganth aur us dauran kee, katha nayak tatha katha nayika ke prem kee kahani hai, at in donon ke nam bharat aur bharati rakh diye jayen to aap shayad etaraz n karen. sanyog se katha nayika bharati upanam se kavitaen bhi likhati hai.

jinhen ham aage poori kahani men bharat aur bharati ke nam se janenge, halat ke mare do adane se insan hain. behad sharif aur zamane bhar ke satae hue. unakee poori zindagi ko sirf tin lafajon men bayan kiya ja sakata hai - sangharsh, sangharsh aur sangharsh. safalata ek bhi nahin. vaise mauka milata to ve bhi zindagi kee sari sidhiyan aapako ek sath chadh kar dikha dete. bas, unhen apani zindagi sanvarane ke mauke hi nahin mile. har tarah se yogy hone ke bavazood. apani taraf se har sanbhav koshish kar lene ke bavazood. vaise unakee is halat ke lie unhen to kattaee doshi nahin thaharaya ja sakata. yah bat bhi hai ki ve halat ka shikar hone vale akele, pahale ya aakhiri bhi nahin hain. daraasal isake pichhe ek lambi kahani hai aur use bayan karane ke lie hamen apani is prem kahani ko thodi der ke lie yahin rok kar halat kee us kahani kee tah men jana hoga. han, itana zaroor hai ki jab ham katha nayak aur katha nayika ke bahane un sari sthitiyon kee padatal kar rahe honge, to ve donon bhi lagatar is kahani men hamare aas pas bane rahenge balki jahan bhi mauka mila, hamen aage kee apani kahani khud hi sunayenge.

desh kee aazadi kee yah pachasavin varshaganth thi. vaise to katha nayak aur katha nayika ke lie aazadi ke is sal aur pichhale unachas salon men koee antar nahin tha. yah sal bhi pichhale sare salon kee tarah vaise hi shuroo ho kar yoon hi guzar jane vala tha, fir bhi, yah sal pichhale salon se is roop men alag tha ki sarakari taur par aur sarakari kharche par poore desh men sal bhar tak utsav ka mahaul rahane vala tha. is mad ke lie sarakar ne karodon rupaye pahale hi ek taraf rakh diye the jinhen sal bhar chalane vale sarakari samarohon, utsavon, natakon aur nautankiyon men khule hathon kharch kiya jana tha. in aayojanon ke lie bahut oonche daraje kee bisiyon samitiyan bana di gayi thin aur unake salah mashavire se ye sare bhavy aayojan kiye jane the. jahan tak katha nayak aur nayika ka in sab aayojanon se judane ka saval tha, ve in sari chizon ke prati poori tarah udasin the. vaise bhi sarakar ne unhen in sabamen shamil hone ke lie nahin kaha tha. kahata bhi kaun? kisi ne n to unhen in sabake lie aamantrit kiya tha aur n hi kisi bhi stej par un hen vishvas men hi liya gaya tha. ve chah kar bhi in sabamen shamil nahin ho sakate the.

vah is samay door kisi ganv men ya chhote shahar men apani bimar man, ritayard bap, berozagar chhote bhaee, shadi ke intazar men baithi bahan ke bare men soch raha ho aur is mahine bhi unhen ab tak mani aardar n bhej pane ke bare men pareshan ho raha ho ya use aaj apani is naukari se bhi javab mil gaya ho aur vah ek bar fir berozagar hone ja raha ho. ho sakata hai kal usakee premika ka janmadin ho aur vah usake lie koee chhota-mota tohafa lene ke bare men soch raha ho. is bat kee bhi sambhavana hai ki aaj shanivar ho aur usakee jeb men ek bhi paisa n ho, use har halat men aaj apane thiye ka kiraya chukana ho, nahin to . . ya usane nayika ko aaj badhiya khana khilane ka vada kar rakha ho ya usakee naukari men koee lafada ya rahane kee jagah ya. ya. ya. .

jivan ke, usake sangharshon ke bare men bahut sare aise pahaloo ho sakate hain jinake bare men ham kuchh bhi to nahin janate. ho sakata hai ki abhi tak hamane jo bhi anuman lagaye hain, ve sare hi galat hon. ham usake bare men jo kuchh soch rahe hain, aisa kuchh ho hi nahin. vah us kism ka aadami ho n ho. vah to bas, yoon hi yahan mausam aur sham kee ranginiyan dekhakar kuchh vakt bitane kee niyat se mairin draiv kee munder par aa kar baith gaya ho.

ham galat nahin hain. katha nayak ko le kar hamane jitani bhi baten sochi hain, ve sari kee sari sahi hain. kuchh baten agar aaj sahi hain to kuchh sachchaiyan aane vale ya bite hue kal kee bhi ho sakati hain.

jaisaki mainne bataya, desh kee aazadi ka yah pachasavan sal pichhale unachas salon se koee khas fark nahin rakhata tha. sab kuchh vaisa hi tha. balki kaee mayanon men badatar bhi. agar is bich janasankhya badhi thi to berozagari usake anupat men kaee guna badhi thi. halanki aazadi ke is pachasaven baras men bhi pichhale baras aur usase bhi pichhale kaee barason kee tarah desh ke sabhi vishvavidyalayon, mahavidyalayon, takanikee aur prabandh sansthanon ne lakhon kee sankhya men har tarah se yogy aur kuchh kar guzarane ke utsah se labarez post grejuets aur grejuets taiyar karake sadaken par utar diye the. unakee jagah turant hi, aur unase adhik hi tadad men, naye log unakee jagah lene ke lie in sansthanon aadi men pahunch gaye the. bhitar sabake samane layak jagah nahin thi, fir bhi log the ki kisi bhi tarah ek bar dakhila pa lene ke lie aakul-vyakul the. kaee log to isake lie apani haisiyat se kaee guna jyada paise kharch karake bhi bhitar jagah pane ke lie hod - si laga rahe the. isase koee fark nahin padata tha ki unakee ruchi kis vishay men thi aur pravesh kis vishay men mil raha tha. unhen to bas, ek adad digri se matalab tha. kaise bhi, kisi bhi vishay kee mile. ve janate the ki unhen jo naukari, agar kabhi mili to, sirf digri ke aadhar par milegi. usamen darj vishay ke aadhar par nahin. unakee visheshagyata ke aadhar par to kattaee nahin.

sadakon par abhi bhi pichhale kaee barason ke bakaya post grejuets aur grejuets har tarah se yogy, zarooratamand aur ichchhuk hone ke bavajood apane layak koee kam nahin talash paye the aur har vakt apane hath men maili pad chukee digriyon, aavedan patron kee kopiyon aur akhabaron kee kataranon kar bandal uthaye daftaron, faiktariyon, sevayojan karyalayon ke get ke aasapas aur chaurahon, nukkadon par dekhe ja sakate the. ve har kahin maujood the. ve sab jagahon par arase se the.

sir futtauval, aur isi tarah kee doosari arajak sthitiyon kee shurooaat ho jani chahiye thi, fir bhi n jane kyon aam taur par yah sthiti nahin aa payi thi. ye log behad aasthavan the. pratiksha aur aashvasanon ke sahare yahan tak kee kathin aur asambhav yatra poori karake aa pahunche the. unhen abhi bhi ummid thi ki koee jaduee chirag unakee zindagi ka andhera door karane ke lie, bas aata hi hoga. unhen is tarah apane layak kam kee talash karate hue ab tak to sadiyan bitane ko aayin thin, balki pichhali pidhi men se bhi adhikatar log bina koee dhang ka kam paye apani zindagi kee aadhi sadi poori kar chuke the. n to unaka intazar khatm huaa tha aur n hi koee jaduee chirag hi unakee andheri zindagi men raushani ka ekadh katara hi la paya tha. ye sare ke sare log, jo berozagar the, aur kam karana chahate the, arase se khali pet aur lagabhag sunn dimag liye ab tak past hone ko aaye the, lekin jaisa ki mainne bataya, unakee aankhon men chamak abhi bhi bakee thi aur ve sab ekatak, sadaq ke us muhane kee taraf dekh rahe the, jahan se kabhi-kabhi rozagar ke kuchhek mauke muhaiya karane valon ke aane kee barik-si ummid rahati thi. amooman ve log kabhi is taraf aate dekhe to nahin gaye the, sirf sune gaye the aur agar kabhi ve aaye bhi the to aage aage khade do-char logon ko apane pichhe aane ka ishara karake bahut teji se laut gaye the. unake aane aur laut jane ke bich ka antaral itana kam hota tha ki pichhe khade logon ko hava bhi nahin lag pati thi aur ve laut chuke hote the.
hamesha chhala gaya tha. usake hisse men kabhi bhi koee bhi dhang kee naukari nahin aayi thi. har bar usi kee bari aane par sab kuchh khatm ho jata tha.

unase mili thi saikil use. ek aur bachche ko muft padhane kee shart par. lekin yah naukari sirf tin din chal payi thi. vaise chalane vale isase badatar naukariyan bhi chala hi rahe the, balki katha nayak ne bhi aage-pichhe kaee vahiyat naukariyan kee hi thin, lekin machchhar marane vali us naukari se vah ek pal ke lie bhi khud ko jod nahin paya tha. bahut beman se do-dhaee din kat kar usase alag ho gaya tha.
