ya ghar valon ke sath samoohik roop se zahar kha lete the, lekin ab tak koee aisi varadat sunane men nahin aayi thi ki naukari mangane valon ne koee bhi kam n milane par mil malikon, bainkon ya sarakari daftaron vagairah ka gherav kiya ho, hinsa ka rasta apanaya ho ya kahin oonchi aavaj men bat hi kee ho. aisi ek bhi ghatana sunane men nahin aayi thi. shayad berozagaron kee hi jamat aisi thi jo ki sangathit nahin thi. unaka koee gut nahin tha aur unaka koee rahanuma bhi nahin tha. han, kabhi-kabhar kuchh svarthi tatv zaroor in logon ko apane matalab ke lie apane pichhe aane vali bhid men shamil kar lete the aur apana kam sadhate hi inhen vapis sadakon par thel dete the.

berozagari aur had daraje kee udasinata se kabhi bhi nahin lad payega. koee bhi nahin lad sakata tha. yahan kisi ko bhi to kisi kee paravah nahin thi. kahin koee sunavaee nahin thi. halat itani kharab thi ki rozagar daftaron ke rajistaron men aur nam likhane kee jagah hi nahin bachi thi. fir bhi har berozagar naukari kee halakee-si ummid men rozagar daftaron ke aage lagi kataron men din bhar khada rahata. fir bhi ghanton ek pair par bhookhe pyase khade rahane ke bad bhi nam likhavane ke lie usaka nambar nahin aa pata tha. deri kee shikayat karane par yahi bataya jata ki staf kee kami hai, der to lagegi hi.

usakee khud kee barason kee mehanat, poonji, lagan aur eemanadar koshish bhi bekar chali jati thi. kahin - kahi to ek-ek kam se tin-tin aadami chipake hue the. rozagar ho n ho, pet sabake pas lagabhag ek jaisa hi tha jo aadha-adhoora hi sahi, anaj mangata tha. isi khali pet ko kisi bhi halat men bharane kee mazaboori kaee logon ko aaparadhik jagat kee taraf mod deti thi, jahan jane ke to kaee aasan raste the, lekin vapasi ka koee bhi rasta nahin hota tha.

kuchh de-dila kar ya oonchi sifarish vagairah lagava kar in thodi-si naukariyon se chipak bhi gaye the, ve bhi itane virodhabhas kee zindagi ji rahe the ki aashchary hota tha ki ab tak ye log pagal kyon nahin ho gaye. batani ka gold maidalist baink ke kauntar par baitha din bhar not ginata tha aur fijiks ka farst klas farst kahin sade hue sarakari daftar men ghun lagi kursi par baitha aalatoo-falatoo kee chitthiyon ko darj kar raha tha. angreji sahity ke emae pas yuvak hotal men grahakon ke dinar ke aardar lete milate aur hindi ka piech di kisi door-daraj kee chungi par baitha jahil trak draivaron se matha-pachchi kar raha hota. bayo kaimisti kee pratham shreni kee emaesasi pas ladakee telifon aoparetar kee tuchchi si naukari karane par mazaboor thi aur paliestar taiknalaji men piech di yuvak kisi chay kampani men marketing mainejar hota. kahin kahin aisa bhi hota ki ghoda daktari kee digri le lene ke bad bhi jab kisi yuvak ko door pas kahin bhi chhoti-si naukari nahin milati thi to vah motar parts kee ya kitabon kee selsamaini vali ghumantoo naukari sirf is lie svikar kar leta tha ki berozagar rahane se to achchha hai, kuchh bech hi lo. ghar valon ke samane har samay thobada latakaye rahane se to yahi behatar tha. usane khud bhi to grejuet hone ke bad aise aise kam kiye the jinhen koee aathavin pas bhi aaram se kar sakata tha balki kar bhi raha tha.

anutpadak aur apane star se kam ke kam karane pade the. ab tak kee pachchis tis naukariyon men se ek bhi to usake layak nahin thi. katha nayak hamesha yahi soch kar apane ko tasalli de leta ki vah akela nahin hai. usake sath ke lakhon kee tadad men berojagar log ek sath kaee sazishon ke shikar hain. sarakar kee chinta to itani bhar thi ki usake aankadon men kisi tarah yah darj ho jaye ki desh kee adhikatar aabadi unake prayason kee vazah se aaj sakshar hai, shikshit, prashikshit hai aur har tarah se yogy hai. vah akshar banch sakati hai. sabako naukari dene kee n to usakee naitik jimmevari hai, n usakee aukat hi hai, aur n hi usane kabhi aisa vayada hi kiya tha. agar kahin kamon kee gunjaish thi bhi, to sarakar kee oonchi, gaddedar kursiyon par baithe logon ke pas itani dooradarshita hi nahin thi ki tay kar sakate, kis kam ke lie kaun-sa aadami thik rahega. sabase badi vidambana to yahi thi ki tay karane kee takat rakhane vale kaee afasar aur lidar khud hi galat jagahon aur galat kursiyon par galat tarike se baithe hue the. unase kisi bhi tarah kee koee bhi ummid karana unake sath j yadati hi hoti. sabase adhik takalif kee bat to yahi thi ki jin logon ke bharose yah desh chal raha tha, ve hi log pichhale barason men sabase jyada nakara, bhrasht, laparavah aur avasaravadi sidv hue the.
balki kisi bhi kshetr men is tarah ka ek bhi vyakti nahin tha. ye desh baunon ka desh ban chuka tha.

unamen aadhe se jyada luchche, aavara, katil, hatyare, shatir aparadhi, bis bis hatyaon ke sidv doshi dakait aur girahakat bhare pade the. rajaniti ke kshetr men kul mila kar yah aalam tha ki aap ek neta aur hatyare men fark nahin dikha sakate the. fark tha bhi nahin. donon ek hi kam kar rahe the aur kamobesh donon ka tarika bhi ek hi tha. aaye din akhabar netaon dvara karodon rupaye kee rishvat lene, hatyaen, balatkar karane aur doosare itar aparadhon men lipt paye jane kee khabaron se bhare rahate the. aksar pata chalata ki falan neta ya mukhy mantree ke ghar se karodon rupaye kee nakadi payi gayi hai ya falan pradhan mantree par karodon rupaye sootakes men aparadhiyon se lene ke aarop lagaye gaye hain. aksar pradhan mantree par doosare deshon ke hathiyar bechane vale karobariyon se rishvat lene ke aarop lagate rahate aur ve in aaropon se n vichalit hote aur n hi inaka khandan hi karate. ve poori besharami se adalaton se agrim jamanat bhi le aate the. besharami ka yah aalam hota tha ki ve dobara chunav ladane ke lie ek bar fir janata ke pratinidhi ban kar hath jode vot mangane ke lie chal padate the. un par aaparadhik mukadame chalate rahate, ve jel bhi ho aate aur is bich satta apane parivar valon ko saunp jate, mano satta n ho, lala kee dukan ho ki koee bhi sauda suluf bech lega.
satta sukh tha aur asim suvidhaen thin. yah isi desh men ho raha tha ki desh kee behatarin suraksha mashinari aparadh kee duniya se rajaniti men aaye logon aur unake kunabon kee hajari baja rahi thi.

koee lakshy nahin tha, jisake pas koee jimmevari bhi nahin thi aur samajik bodh to door door tak nahin tha. fast laif ka himayati yah yuva varg jis raftar se badi badi gadiyan chalata tha, usi raftar se apane sare kam poore hote dekhana chahata tha. yah yuva varg behad jaldi men tha aur use zara sa bhi intazar karana gavara nahin tha. vah apane pas aadhunik aagney hathiyar pain ya laitar kee tarah rakhata tha aur unaka istemal bhi vaisa hi karata tha. vah aadhi rat ko klab men sharab parosane men ek pal kee bhi der hone par ya bar bala dvara paig ke sath chunban dene se inakar karane par usakee kanapati par goli mar kar do sau aadamiyon kee maujoodagi men sareaam usakee hatya kar sakata tha, apani manapasand aaisakrim n milane par vetar kee hatya kar sakata tha, sharab ka nasha badhane ke lie apani hi premika ko mar kar use makkhan ke sath tandoor men bhoon sakata tha aur saiks sanbandhi apani vikritiyon ko poora karane ke lie bhari tikat kharid kar purushon ka nanga nach bhi dekhane ja sakata tha. use kisi ka, kisi ka bhi dar nahin tha, kyonki use pata tha ki is desh ka kanoon usakee mutthi men hai aur koee usaka bal bhi banka nahin kar sakata. usakee uchchhrinkhalata ka yah aalam tha ki vah kahana n manane vali kisi chhatra ka usake hostal men ja kar samoohik roop se balatkar kar sakata tha aur shikayat kee dhamakee diye jane par use sabak sikhane ke lie dobara use sadak se uthava kar usake sath fir se usake sath samoohik balatkar kar sakata tha.

aiyyashi ke nit naye charagah talashata, bhaunde roop men saiks ka pradarshan karata, karata aur nashe men dhut ho kar ghar lautate samay kisi ko bhi apani gadi ke niche kuchal sakata tha. use is hadase par koee afasos n hota. use pata tha ki jab gavahiyan di jayengi to vahan usakee biemadi gadi ka nahin, kisi anadi sharabi dvara chalaye ja rahe trak ka jikr hoga.

haisiyat aur zindagi men kuchh kar guzarane kee tamanna rakhane vale tamam injiniyar, doktar aur doosare kshetron ke profeshanalon kee tarah kisi bhi keemat par, bahar ke mulkon kee taraf nikal jata. beshak vahan doyam daraje ke jivan tha, fir bhi kam se kam itana to mil jata ki vah khud ka aur apane pichhe parivar ka khyal to rakh pata. vah kitane hi aise logon ko janata tha jo yahan se badi badi digriyan le kar gaye the aur bahar ke mulakon men bairagiri kar rahe the. ve kinhin sharton par bhi vahan jana chahate.
rozagar aur paisa to tha. har sal bahar jane vale dimagon kee sankhya badhati jati. unhen rokane ke lie n to koee niyam the aur n hi koee pralobhan hi.

bade-bade audyogik gharanon aur vishalakay deshi videshi udyamon men naukariyon ka saval tha, to vahan ke layak padhaee to katha nayak ke pas thi lekin kismat nahin thi. use koee mamooli naukari dene ko taiyar nahin tha, itani aala naukari kaun deta. vah dekhata tha ki vahan hamesha kuchhek aala daraje kee naukariyan huaa karati thin aur aksar layak aadamiyon ko mil bhi jati thin, lekin aam taur par in udyog valon kee nigah takanikee aur prabandh sansthanon men har sal taiyar hone vali behatarin krim par hi rahati thi. in sansthanon men fainal varsh ke shuroo hote hi audyogik samoohon ke pratinidhi vahan chakkar katana shuroo kar dete aur vahan taiyar ho rahe behatarin dimagon ko bahut oonchi, ummid se kahin adhik aur yogyata ke anupat men do - tin guna oonchi boliyan laga kar ek tarah se kharid lete the aur apane yahan kee top mashinari men fit kar dete the. ek bar in yuva, oorjavan aur shatir dimagon ko kharid lene ke bad ye udyog dhandhe vale inase barah pandrah ghante kas kar kam lete aur un par kharch kee jane vali ek-ek paee vasool kar lete. yah bat digar hoti ki is tarah se kainpas selekshan se laye gaye ye shatir dimag kisi ek jagah sal chh mahine tikana bhi apani tauhin samajhate aur apani chhati par apane bazar bhav ka billa lagaye ek aur oonchi chhalang lagane ke lie doosari kanpaniyon se bhav taul karane lagate. halat yah ho jati ki ek kanpani men pachas hajar rupaye masik, kar, bangala, klab maimbaraship jaisi suvidhaon ko bhogane vala teees varsh ka sayana dimag pachapan hazar vali kanpani men jane kee firak men rahata aur pachapan vala kisi sath hazar vali kanpani men sauda pata raha hota. oopar ke star par yah aavagaman itana tej, aakasmik aur anivary-sa lagane lagata ki pata hi nahin chalata tha ki kal tak jo aadami kisi kold drink kanpani men siniyar marketing mainejar ke roop men naya prodakt lanch karane ke lie apani tim se aur adhik dedikeshan, samarpan aur daishing eproch kee mang kar raha tha, achanak agali subah kisi joota kanpani men kaise ja pahuncha.

kala kee, aur samaj shas treey vishayon kee. kaee bar vigyan kee vishisht shakhaon kee bhi. ye digriyan unhen kisi bhi vishisht, takanikee, prabandh ya eksakyootiv ya kaee bar sadharan daraje ke padon tak bhi nahin pahunchatin thin. unake lie to sirf ausat naukariyan ya fir adhyapan hi bachata tha. vah bhi simit sankhya men. pahale aaiees men in digridhariyon ka nambar lag jaya karata tha, lekin kuchh arase se is lain men bhi profeshanal logon ne dhava bolana shuroo kar diya tha.

speshalaijeshan kee thi chahe vah kisi bhi kshetr men ho. in kshetron men thoda kam ank vale aadami ko bhi kisi n kisi naukari kee ummid rahati hi thi, lekin samany vishay ke piech di bhi bazar men koee khas keemat nahin rakhate the. aisi digriyon vale log bhi samany aur kam padhe likhe tatha berozagaron vali bhid ka hi hissa ban kar rah jate the. unhen bhi klarkee se lekar aaiees tak ke lie lagatar aavedan karate rahana padata tha, balki kam padhe-likhe berozagaron ke sath ek suvidha rahati thi ki ve zaroorat padane par khud ko kisi bhi chhote mote kam men bhi fit kar lete the. ye kam padhe-likhe log vakt zaroorat bazar men kele, seb aur pyaj bhi bech sakate the, riksha chala sakate the balki chala bhi rahe hi the. ve koee bhi chhota-mota kam kar lete the. kuchh bhi nahin hota tha to apana sab kuchh bech-bach kar midil eest kee taraf mazadoori karane hi nikal jate the. lekin ab to halat yah ho gayi thi ki kisi bhi chhote se chhote kam par kisi varg vishesh ka ekadhikar nahin raha tha. oonchi oonchi digri vale bhi chaparasi, bas kandaktar aur hamalagiri kee tuchchi naukari ke lie apani asali digriyon ko chhupa kar samane aane lage the. kaha ja sakata tha ki desh ne padhaee ke mamale men ab itani tarakkee kar li thi ki ab yahan rikshe vale, khomachevale, pan bidi vale aur yahan tak ki bindi-surkhi bechane vale bhi emae, bie pas hone lage the. ve bhi aakhir kahan tak bhookhe rahate. berozagari to unhen ek kap chay aur eplaee karane ke lie dak kharch tak ke lie rula dalati thi. bhookhe rah kar ghutate rahane se to yahi behatar tha ki jo bhi, jaise bhi mil raha hai, le lo. ise chhoden to hathiyane ke lie das log lain men khade milenge. zinda rahane ke lie koee bhi shart badi nahin thi.

paise bhi thik the aur vakeel sahab ka vyavahar bhi achchha tha. lekin jo takalif thi, usase kisi bhi tarah se par nahin paya ja sakata tha. usake kalej ka samay, tyooshan ka samay aur vakeel sahab ke yahan hajari bajane ka samay ek hi the. vakeel sahab poora din mangate to kolej kee padhaee aur aane-jane ke lie bhi use utane hi samay kee zaroorat hoti. use har halat men rozana do chizen chhodani hi padatin. tyooshan ka samay to fir bhi badala ja sakata tha lekin bakee donon samay usake bas men nahin the. yahan bhi naukari hi chhooti thi. vakeel ne bhi yahi salah di thi ki pahale padhaee poori kar lo, tabhi koee dhang kee naukari talasho. mere yahan kam karate rahane se agar tumhari padhaee ka harza hota hai to main yah dosh apane sir nahin lena chahoonga. vaise kabhi bhi fis vagairah ke lie rupaye paise kee zaroorat ho to . . .

praivet naukariyon aur berozagari ke dauron ka raha tha. kabhi naukari ke lie padhaee to kabhi padhaee ke lie naukari. kabhi donon ek sath to kabhi donon hi nahin. tarah tarah kee dukanon men selsamain ship kee. lotari ke tikat tak beche. sadakon par khade ho kar brejari se le kar bal pain tak beche. sirf is ummid se har tarah ke kam men khud ko khapaye rakha ki achchhe din bas aate hi honge. usane kisi bhi kam ko chhota nahin samajha tha. halanki is vazah se use kaee bar bahut sharmindagi bhi uthani padati.

usane us din alag-alag saiz kee brezari ke kaee dibbe pakada diye aur aankh marate hue bola, le ja beta, maze kar. ek se ek badhiya grahak ko yah nayab tohafa saste damon par bech. nayan sukh vahan se lena aur dabal kamishan main doonga. usane lakh kaha tha, vah yah aaitam is tarah sare-aam aavazen laga kar nahin bech sakata lekin dukanadar ne ek nahin suni thi aur usane us din pahali aur aakhiri bar sadak par khade ho kar yah aaitam bechi thi aur usi din yah gadabad ho gayi thi.

aur khas taur par usase vah kaee din tak aankhen nahin mila paya tha. apane aap par gussa bhi aaya tha ki sali yah bhi koee zindagi hai. har vakt koee n koee ladaee ladate hi raho. is tuchchi zindagi se to behatar tha, anapadh hi hote. kam se kam is tarah se apane parayon ke samane nazaren to n jhukani padatin. halanki kaee din bad jab unamen samany roop se batachit shuroo huee thi to un donon ne hi itana khyal zaroor rakha tha ki is bat ka bilkul bhi zikr nahin kiya tha lekin vah soch sakata tha ki use aur usakee saheliyon ko kitana kharab laga hoga, ki unaka klas failo, dost jo padhaee men kam se kam unase to achchha hi tha aur ve aksar usase nots vagairah manga karati thin, sadak par is tarah se . . .

bahut bad men usase kaha bhi tha ki us din vah ghar ja kar bahut der tak roti rahi thi. isalie nahin ki ve achanak usake samane us vakt pad gayi thin jab vah futapath par is tarah kee koee chiz bech raha tha. usase pahale bhi vah use kuchh n kuchh bechate hue dekh hi chukee thi aur is bat ke lie usakee tarif hi karati thi ki vah kisi bhi kam ko chhota nahin samajhata tha aur sab kam karane ke bavazood apani padhaee ke prati bhi utana hi siriyas tha. use rona to is bat par aaya tha ki use padhaee poori karane ke lie kaise kaise din dekhane pad rahe the.

varana to vah ek sal barahavin men fel ho jane ke bad padhaee ko poori tarah se alavida kah chuka tha. sunita usase ek sal jooniyar thi aur usake fel ho jane se donon barahavin men aa gaye the. us sal bhi vah lagatar sunita ke konchane, samajhane aur har tarah se usaka manobal banaye rakhane ke karan hi achchhe nambaron se pas ho paya tha. bie ke lie bhi usake lie farm sunita hi layi thi aur apani poori anichchha ke bavajood sirf sunita ka man rakhane ke lie bie kar raha tha. beshak bie karane ke chakkar men usaka aarthik graf bigad gaya tha aur usake hath se ek dhang kee naukari bhi jati rahi thi. vah yah bhi janata tha ki vah bie to kya emae bhi kar le, dhang kee naukari usase sau tarah ke papad bilavayegi. lekin isake bavajood vah sunita ka kaha nahin tal paya tha. vah usake lie itana kuchh karati thi. usakee sari takalifon ko vah beshak kam n kar sake, vah itana to karati hi thi ki jaise bhi ho, vah usaka manobal banaye rakhati thi. padhaee ke lie bhi aur behatar zindagi ke khvab ko lagatar nigah men rakhane ke lie bhi.

jahan bhi koee dhandha kar raha hota tha ya jis sadak par vah saman bech raha hota ya jis dukan par vah koee tuchchi selsameni kar raha hota to vah us sadak se bhi guzarana talati thi taki use yani katha nayak bharat ko bevazah usakee nazaron ke samane chhota n hona pade. yah bat vah samajhata tha aur ve donon kabhi bhi is bat ko apane aapasi sanbandhon ke bich men nahin late the. khasakar, mojon vale kisse ke bad se to sunita usakee khuddari ka poora samman karati thi. vah us ghatana ke bad se is bat ka poora khyal rakhati thi ki usakee kisi bhi bat se, vyavahar se katha nayak ko takalif n pahunche.

kisi ko bhi hava tak n lage ki vah kitane kathin daur se guzar raha hai. kaee zaroori chizen tal rahi thin. vah chah kar bhi apane lie dhang ke rumal aur moje nahin kharid pa raha tha. jo do ek jode the usake pas ya to unaka ilastik dhila ho gaya tha ya ve panjon kee taraf bilakul fat gaye the. sunita se yahin ek bevakoofi ho gayi thi. halanki usakee khud kee apani koee kamaee nahin thi, fir bhi vah apani taraf se usake lie do jodi moje aur rumal le aayi thi. vaise to isamen aisa kuchh bhi nahin tha ki bat ka batangad banata. ve donon pahale bhi ek doosare ko chhoti moti chizen dete hi rahe the. lekin in chijon ko dekhakar vah buri tarah hart ho gaya tha. ekadam chup ho gaya tha. is ghatana ke bad se usane kaee din tak sunita se bat nahin kee thi. usake hisab se yah usake aham par chot thi. use becharagi kee had tak sharminda karane vali bat. shayad yah usi ghatana ka prabhav raha ho ki usane us din ke bad se aaj tak mojon vale joote hi nahin pahane hain. vah ya to saindil pahanata hai ya fir bina tasmen vale joote, jinamen mojon kee zaroorat hi nahin rahati.

usakee bahan ne apane kisi rishtedar se tay kar di thi. ladaka doktar tha. sadak ke kinare feri laga kar saman bech kar padhaee karane vala katha nayak nishchit roop se us doktar ka vikalp nahin ho sakata tha. filmin kisson men yah bat chal jati thi, lekin zindagi kee sachchaee donon hi janate the. ab emae pas sunita ke sapane ek bie pas aur do sal se lagabhag berojagar katha nayak kaise bhi to poore nahin kar sakata tha. ek aadh sapana bhi nahin. yahan bhi usane ise apani ek bahut badi har man liya tha. vah ladata bhi to kisase aur kis aadhar par. ladane layak aatmavishvas berozagaron ke hisse men nahin aata, yah bat vah janata tha. usane sunita kee shadi ke bare men ek lafj tak nahin kaha tha. ek bar fir chuppi ke gahare koone men utar gaya tha.
gumanam si zindagi guzarane lagate the. thik katha nayak kee tarah. vah bhi khali hath yahan chala aaya tha. shayad yahin kismat kuchh palata khaye.

ve jab sthanantarit ho kar banbaee aaye to unhin ne koncha tha, chale aao yahan. yahan koee bhookha nahin marata. ek bar kismat aajamane men koee harj nahin. main apane aofis men hi tumhare lie koee badhiya job dekhoonga. tab tak tum hamare sath hi rahana.

n bhookhe rahana pada tha aur n hi khana khane ke evaj men hotalon men bairagiri karani padi thi. kar leta to behatar tha. bhasin sahab ne use chhat aur roti zaroor di thi, lekin usakee haisiyat tyootar se girate girate ghareloo naukar aur bebi sitar kee ho gayi thi. aisi zindagi se to behatar tha, futapath par hi so leta. vah soya bhi lekin bad men. jahan tak naukari ka saval tha to mistar bhasin kabhi bhi nahin chahate the ki use naukari mile. ve to yahi soch kar use laye the ki vah roti aur chhat ke evaj men unake bachchon ko padhata bhi rahega ve donon jab naukari karane jayenge to din bhar muft men bachchon ka khyal bhi rakhega.

jitane sangharsh kiye hain, un par chahe to ek poori kitab likh sakata hai, chahe to bina ruke ghanton bat kar sakata hai. lekin takalif yahi hai ki yah sona itana tap chuka hai, isane itani garami, tap aur mar jheli hain ki ab vah bat hi nahin karata. ab ekadam chup hi rahata hai. vah kaee kaee din tak ek shabd bole bina bhi rah sakata hai. kaee bar to poora poora din yahan tak ki shanivar kee sham se lekar somavar aofis pahunchane tak ek shabd bole bagair sara vakt kat deta hai. kahe bhi to kya. kahe bhi to kisase. hamare kitane bachche hain yah batate samay ham garbhapaton kee sankhya nahin ginate. yahan to katha nayak ke pas safalataon ke nam par misakairij aur aborshan vale mamale hi hain. safalata ek bhi nahin. han, is shahar men bhi usakee ek premika hai. yahi ikalauta prem hai jo pichhale dhaee tin sal se kisi tarah ghisat raha hai. dost ek bhi nahin.

chal, daftar ke chaparasi kee bolkani, bistar bhar jagah ke lie kabhi vasaee to kabhi chemboor, kabhi bhayakhala to kabhi ulhasanagar. banbaee ka koee bhi upanagar nahin bacha hoga. kabhi bilakul sadak par aa jane kee halat. ekadh rat park men bhi. naukariyan bhi isi tarah badalin. begari kee mar bhi khayi aur paise bhi ganvaye. kaee bar poori pagar hi jebakataron ka nishana ban gayi. kitani hi raten usane dal ubal kar bred ke sath khayi hai, dal ka pani pi kar raten guzari hain. pav aur garam mithe pani ka kambineshan banaya hai. bhala aise dinon kee bhi ginati rakhi ja sakati hai kya. bas, har bar pagar ka sabase bada hissa use kamare ke lie rakhana padata hai. bhookhe pet hi sahi, sone ke lie to jagah chahiye hi.

vahan use rahane khane ke hi pandrah sau rupaye dene padate hain. bakee panch sau rupaye usakee zindagi kee bakee sari zarooraton ke lie hain. inamen kabhi-kabhar ghar bheja ja sakane vala maniaardar bhi shamil hota hai. usakee sari khushiyan, takalifen, bimari, kapada latta, tren ka sizan tikat, chay, toothapest, brash, kanghee, tel, kitab, pain, tauliya, akhabar, joota, moja vah pahanata nahin, rumal, pres, sabun, sigaret, pan, jo vah eford hi nahin kar sakata, dadhi, heyar kating, sinema, manoranjan, upahar, ghar jane aane ke lie kiraya jo vah panch sal men sirf ek bar hi juta paya hai, aur vah sab kuchh jo ek shahari aadami ko subah uthane se le kar rat ko sone tak jutana hota hai, use in panch sau men hi jutane hote hain. ye panch sau rupaye usake vartaman ke lie hain, usake bhavishy ke lie hain, jisamen sirf salana tarakkee pachas rupaye hoti hai. aur yahi masik rashi usake bhavishy ke lie hai. isi men usakee bhavi grihasthi, makan, parivar, bal bachche unaka bhavishy aur usake khud ke sare sapane isi rashi ke sahare poore kiye jayenge. kabhi-kabhar bimari kee vazah se usakee pagar se koee katauti hoti hai ya ovar taim kee vajah se ya bonas kee vazah se koee atirikt rashi milati hai to vah samajh hi nahin pata, isaka kya kare aur kaise kare.

lekin ab sab kuchh chhod chhad diya hai. vahan bhi vahi khichakhich. falan din nahin aaye the, falan din aaye the lekin bachche kee tabiyat thik nahin thi so padhaya nahin tha, falan din.falan din. ab vah kuchh bhi nahin karata, chhutti hote hi yahin aa baithata hai aur tabhi jata hai jab khana khane aur sone ka vakt ho jata hai. vah ab har taraf se laparavah ho gaya hai. n kuchh sochata hai, n sochana chahata hi hai. pichhale do tin salon se usakee sari shamen aam taur par yahin gujari hongi. chupachap akele, door kshitij men jahajon ko, niche laharon ko ya fir sadak par chal rahe logon ko chupachap dekhate hue. sirf shanivar ko hi vah kuchhek vaky bolata hai jab katha nayika aati hai. us ek ghante men vah katha nayika se jitane shabd bolata hai, utane vah poore hafte men bhi nahin bolata.

jaisa ki mainne bataya hindi men emae hai aur kavitaen likhati hai. usakee ab tak kee poori zindagi lagabhag usi tarah kee rahi hai jaisi zindagi katha nayak ne guzari hai. kadam kadam par sangharsh. kabhi padhaee ke lie, kabhi chhat ke lie to kabhi do vakt kee roti ke lie hi. vah bhi agar ginane baithe ki kul mila kar use kitani bar apani padhaee sthagit karani padi hai to usakee koee ginati nahin hai. naukariyon kee ginati bhi vah ab tak bhool chukee hai. lekin ek bat usake sath hamesha rahi. ek ek kadam aage badhati badhati vah yahan tak aa pahunchi hai. vaise usake samane bhi kaee bar zindagi ke shart kat aaye the. vah chahati to unaka fayada utha kar kahan se kahan pahunch sakati thi, lekin dikkat yahi thi ki ye sare shartakat usakee deh se ho kar guzarate the.

doosari taraf anapadh, ghareloo ya naukaripesha, kunvari ya shadishuda kisi bhi tarah kee ladakiyon kee samajik aur aarthik halat kabhi bhi achchhi, sammanajanak aur sukoonabhari nahin rahi thi, lekin har vakt paison kee tangi, rozana kee zarooraton ke aur sath hi un zarooraton ko poori karane vali chizon ke dam betahasha badh jane ke aur kisi bhi tarah se unhen poora n kar pane kee kachot ne idhar unake jivan ko aur bhi doobhar aur takalifadeh bana diya tha. padhi likhi lekin mazaboori se ya svechchha se ghar ke bhitar baithi aurat ko to ghar kee chaharadivari ke bhitar hi shoshit karane vale kaee hath the lekin jo aurat mazaboori ke chalate do char atirikt paise kamane kee niyat se ghar se bahar nikalati thi, usaka gala tipane ke lie charon taraf kaee jodi hath ug aate the. emae, emaesasi aur bied ya emaed vagairah kar lene ke bad bhi usake nasib men gali mauhallon men har chauthe ghar men khule pablik skoolon men panch-sat sau rupalli kee naukari hi bachati thi, jahan use sau-sau bachchon kee klas ke sat aath piriyad rozana lene hote. ye panch sat sau bhi use apani taraf se kuchh dhila kiye bagair nahin milate the. is aarthik aur manasik shoshan ke alava naukari kee anishchitata evan daihik shoshan kee aashanka kee addashy talavar har samay unake sir par latakati rahati. kisi bhi any behatar vikalp ke abhav men vah vahin aur yoon hi khatati rahati thi. apani zindagi ka behatarin vakt yoon hi barabad ho jane deti thi. khushi, kuntha, sapane sab apani jagah hote the aur yah chhoti si naukari apani jagah hoti thi, jo beshak ek dhang kee sadi bhi nahin dila sakati thi, fir bhi kuchh to deti hi thi. kaee jagah to halat itani kharab thi ki kuchh javan auraten sirf isalie do char sau rupaye kee naukari karane ke lie din bhar ke lie ghar se bahar rahati thin taki akele ghar par baithe boodhe sasur ya jeth ya javan devaron kee muft kee khitamadagari n karani pade aur unakee ijzat bhi bachi rah sake.

steshan par hamali karane vale ke lie bhi fi fera das bis rupaye ka intazam tha, lekin ek em e aur emaesasi pas kisi maidam shyama ke lie ya din bhar kisi praivet aafis men khatane vali konvent se padh kar aayi mis mairi ke lie sarakar ne kisi nyoonatam vetan kee bhi zaroorat nahin samajhee thi. jo bhi chahe unaka shoshan kar sakata tha. log dhadalle se kar hi rahe the. poore desh ka yahi aalam tha.

fir bhi donon men ek fark to tha. ve yahin kee, isi mitti kee bani huee thin. yahin kee paidaish. ve choonki kahin bahar se nahin aayi thin, atah is shahar ke mijaz ko achchhi tarah se janati thin. sangharsh choonki is shahar men rahane kee pahali aur aakhiri shart thi, isalie vah is yahan kee zamin ko, isakedh tapaman ko, yahan ke yatharth ko, zindagi ke sabhi rangon, roopon aur jayakon ko khoob pahachanati thi. vah bilakul pados men basi filmi duniya kee chakachaundh ko, aisho aaram ko, vahan kee beshumar daulat kee asaliyat se vakif to thi, in sari chizon ke lie use svabhavik roop se sapane bhi aate the, lekin in asambhav se lagane vale sapanon ko poora karane ke lie ve aam taur par koee badi bevakoofi nahin karati thin. bambaee kee ladakiyon kee zindagi kee bahut kadavi sachchaee thi ki vah apani haisiyat ke anusar hi aise sapane dekhati thin jinhen vah thode bahut sangharshan ke sath, kuchh intajar ke sath kisi bhi bade samajhaute ke bina poore kar sakati thin.

ek thik thak sa, naukarishuda pati, aur khud ka, beshak chhota sa hi sahi, ek adad alag ghar huaa karata tha. jo sachamuch achchhi kismat vali hoti thin, ve tinon sapane n sahi, inamen se do ek to aage pichhe poore kar hi leti thin. inakee zindagi ka matalab chhoti-chhoti khushiyan, sangharsh, kabhi n khatm hone vali takalifon ka antahin silasila hota tha, jinake sath madhyavarg kee sabhi ladakiyon ko aage pichhe, kam jyada, joojhana hi hota tha. lekin ek bat hamesha unake paksh men raha karati thi ki ve kabhi himmat nahin harati thin. hamesha lagi hi rahatin. behatar, thoda aur behatar kee chah unhen kabhi thakati hi nahin thi. ek-ek tinaka chun-chun kar ghonsala sajane jaisa sangharsh. ek sapane ke poore hote hi doosara sapana poora karane ke lie ya us sapane se thoda oopar ke star ka sapana dekhane ka silasila shuroo ho jata. is tarah se apane sansar ko aur behatar banane ka silasila chalata hi rahata tha. isi vajah se kaee bar sapane tootane ya poore n ho pane par bhi unaka mohabhang nahin hota tha, aur n hi ve kabhi nirash hi hoti thin. ve zindagi ke sath sath in sab baton kee aadi ho jati thin.

kabhi bhi, bahut oonche star ke sapane dekhana shuroo kar deti thin. sapane dekhana aur unake poora n hone par nirash hona koee galat bat nahin thi, balki sapane n dekhana hi asvabhavik mana jata. pareshani kee bat to yah thi ki unake apane chhote bade shaharon ya kasbon men jab unake ye sapane poore nahin ho sakate the aur ve bina soche samajhe munbaee mahanagar kee taraf chal padati thin ya kaee bar fusala kar le aayi jati thin, jahan unake vichar se raton - rat n keval sare hasin sapane poore kiye ja sakate the balki duniya bhar kee shano-shaukat bhi jutaee ja sakati thi. ve sapane men dekhi gayi ek anajani duniya kee talash men munbaee aa to jati thin, lekin aate hi rah bhatak jati thin. takalif yah bhi thi ki desh ke har bade chhote shahar men aise sapane dekhane vali kamazor, bhavuk, aur kaee bar bevakoof ladakiyon kee tadad hamesha badhati hi rahati. kabhi kabhar alag alag chhote bade shaharon se bhag kar ya bhaga kar layi gayi kuchhek ladakiyon ko bahut sangharsh karane ke bad filmon men ekstra ka ekadh rol mil jaya karata tha. bakee ninanave fisadi ladakiyan hamesha ke lie gumanami ke andheron men kho jati thin. raste bhatakate bhatakate ve alag alag raston se bazar men bikane ke lie pahunch jati thin. vahan sirf chhat, roti aur hamesha ke lie gumanam, badanam zindagi hoti thi. aur kuchh bhi nahin. kuchh bhi to nahin.

jadon se kate, bilakul anajan deshon se aaye apasanskriti ke giddhon ke lie khol diya tha, aur ye badi-badi aankhon vale daravane giddh amooman har ghar kee chhat par lage entina ke zariye har ghar ke draing room men pahunch gaye the, tab se alag alag shaharon se balivud khinche chale aane vale ladake ladakiyon ko rozana pachason kee tadad men banane vale tivi siriyalon men chhote mote kam milane lage the. isake bavazood rozana jitane log yahan rol pane kee talash men pahunchate the, unake do fisadi ko bhi kaimare ke aage ya pichhe kam nahin mil pata tha. natiza yahi hota tha ki itane sare log jab arasa bit jane par bhi apani kismat kee potali ko khulata bhi nahin dekh pate the to apane aap ko kisi bhi aise kam men jhonk dete the jisamen beshak gumanami ho, lekin thik thak paise milate rahen. ladakiyon ke mamale men yah bat jyada lagoo hoti thi.
nach sakati thin aur agar inamen se unhen kuchh bhi nahin aata tha to grahakon ko apani muskan ke sath biyar to pila hi sakati thin.

saiks ko le kar manasik vikritiyon ko bhunane ke naye thikane the. aazad hindustan men yah pahali bar dekha suna ja raha tha ki is tarah se saiks sanbandhi kunthaon ko n keval sarvajanik taur par samajik manyata dilayi ja rahi thi, balki use is tarah galiyon, chaurahon par sare-aam bhunaya ja raha tha. bloo filmon ko chhup chhupa kar dekhane-dikhane ka zamana ja chuka tha. ab to pratyaksh pradarshan ka zamana tha. in tathakathit tan-man kee thakan utarane, tanav dhila karane ke navin addon - ledij biyar baron men sare sham gatividhiyan shuroo ho jatin. kaee jagahon par to subah gyarah bajate hi bhari riyayat ka lalach de kar grahakon ko patane ka silasila shuroo ho jata.

aankhon men chubhati raushaniyan, tej stiriyofonik sangit, dhunaa, shor sharaba, aisi jagahon ko ek alag hi rang dete the. in tang, majhaule aakar ke biyar baron ke mukhy hal ke bichon bich kanch ke farsh ka ek ubhara huaa ek tapoo bana diya jata tha, jisake niche rangin battiyan jalati bujhati rahati thin. inhin tapuon par, inake ird-gird rat bhar khul la khel muradabadi chalata rahata.

hotal kee bikri badhavao aur is tarah jitani jyada ho sake, apane lie tip kamao. isaka natija yah hota aapakee mej par sarv karane vali ladakee lagatar aapake sir par khadi rahati, vahin mandarati rahati. aapane apane gilas men se ghoont bhara bhi nahin hota ki vah aati, botal men se aur biyar udel jati. usakee har sanbhav ichchha aur koshish rahati aur vah bar-bar isharon se, hav-bhav se, aur shabdon se bhi jatalati ki use aapake akelepan se hamadardi hai, vah aapako kanpani dena chahati hai. aap use bas, ishara bhar kar den. vah aapakee mej par aa baithegi. baten karegi. piyegi, pilayegi, aapako sath degi. aap usaka hath thamenge to vah bhi aapaka hath daba kar aapake prati apani bhavanaen darshayegi. aap aagrah karenge to aapako. . aap kahenge to aapake sath khana bhi khayegi. is tarah vah aapaka mood aur aapakee jeb halakee karegi. jo kuchh usane aapako diya, sabakee keemat tagadi tip ke roop men vasool karegi. seth kee jo bikri usane badhayi hai, usakee kamishan use seth se alag se milegi. in biyar baron men amooman sari chijon ke dam do-tin guna vasool kiye jate.
apani sudhabudh kho kar piyen, pilayen aur noton kee itani barish kar den ki hotal ka seth, nachane vali, gane vali, sarv karane vali aur daroo banane vali kanpani, sab ke sab bhitar tak bhig jayen.

lekin jab sthaniy ladakiyon ne dekha ki yahan to turant kamaee, khoob khana pina aur gahe bagahe mauj maja bhi hai to jhopadapattiyon men rahane vali garib, mazaboor aur thodi tez ladakiyan bhi yahan aane lagi thin. gahara mekaap, shokh adayen, odhi huee muskurahat aur in sabake oopar jalati bujhati battiyon vala mahaul bakee sari kamiyan poori kar deta tha.

ghareloo auraton aur kamakaji mahilaon ka janaboojh kar zikr nahin kiya ja raha jo svechchha se, mazaboori men, kisi aarthik, sharirik athava parivarik dabav ke chalate duniya ke sabase purane gyat dhandhe men lipt thin. unakee zindagi ke bare men log pahale se hi jaroorat se jyada janate hain. isaka karan saf hai. paramparagat veshyavritti ab gaye jamane kee bat ho chukee thi. beshak abhi bhi aapako rah chalate ya us tarah ke bazaron men grahakon kee talash men khadi saji dhaji aisi paturiyon ke darshan ho sakate the jo is chahe anachahe is dhandhe men dhakel di gayi thin aur vahan se nikalane ka ab unake pas koee rasta nahin bacha tha. lekin desh kee aazadi ka pachasavan varsh aate aate duniya ke sabase purane dhandhe ke samikaran badal chuke the. ab is dhandhe ko bhi samajik manyata de di gayi thi aur ise vyavasayik jagat ka ek anivary ghatak man liya gaya tha. ab is dhandhe ko safedaposhi ka jama pahana kar naye taur tarikon ke sath sar anjam diya jane laga tha. mal vahi tha aur roop badal diya gaya tha usaka. ab vah sosaiti garl, parsanal sekretari aur parsanal eksakyootiv ke roop men karporet jagat kee shobha badha rahi thi.

soshal gaidaring s ke nam par, telifon ke zariye, fraindaship sarkal kee partiyon ke jariye kiya ja raha tha aur kisi ko kanon kan khabar nahin hoti thi. bas, har jagah manamani fis ada karane kee zaroorat thi.
aam taur par ladake chahe, ve jyada padhe-likhen hon ya guzare layak, sab ke sab ek hi nav par savar the. sabakee gardan berojagari kee dudhari talavar ke niche thi.

karakhanon men utpadan kam ho raha tha, is karan se vahan kam log bharati kiye ja rahe the. yah bhi nahin kaha ja sakata tha ki desh men kampyootar kranti aa jane se kam karane layak hathon kee zaroorat hi nahin rahi thi.

galat prathamikataon aur in galat prathamikataon ke galat natijon ka shikar ho kar rah gaya tha. kamon kee bharapoor gunjaish thi aur unhen salike se karane se kar sakane ke lie har nazariye se yogy aur behatarin log har jagah upalabdh the. sirf mauka diye jane kee bat thi, jisaka sanyog hi nahin banane diya jata tha. charon taraf avyavastha ka ekachhatr raj tha. is desh ke karnnadharon ne kabhi apani kursi, dal aur parivar se bahar nahin dekha tha, n jana tha. aaj tak is bat kee taraf dhyan dene kee zaroorat hi nahin samajhee gayi thi ki aakhir ham har sal lakhon kee sankhya men shanadar berozagaron kee fauj kisalie taiyar kar rahe hain. aakhir ek poori pidhi bina kam dhandhe ke kis tarah sahaj, sammanajanak aur samajopayogi jivan ji hi kaise sakati hai? sankat to yahi tha ki yah sab barason se chala aa raha tha aur isi tarah hi chalate rahane vala tha.

lekin hamare pas pine ka pani nahin tha. hamare pas atyadhunik taiknalaji thi, lekin hamen yah samajh men nahin aata tha ki koode-kachare ka kya karen ya hamare desh ke karodon log subah-savere nivritt hone kahan jayen? hamare pas aadhunik astr shastr the lekin saf pani, hava aur nyoonatam guzare layak do vakt kee roti hamare desh ke karodon logon ke lie abhi bhi sapana the. ham karen niryat kar rahe the, lekin staiplar pin aur kampyootar flopi ka aayat kar rahe the. hamare pas radar banane kee suvidhaen thin lekin achchhe toothabrash ham abhi bhi bahar ke mulkon se hi mangate the. hamare lakhon injiniyar, vaigyanik aur prabandh visheshagy bekar baithe the lekin hamari sarakar rozana ek kee dar se videshi takanikon ka aayat karane ke lie doyam daraje kee videshi farmon se sanyukt udyam lagane ke lie karar kar rahi thi. aaye din hamare audyogik gharane chaddhi, aaloo ke chips aur do kaudi ke bled banane ke lie kisi n kisi mulk se takanikee gyan pane ke lie gidagidate dekhe ja sakate the. ham nahin janate the ki apane desh ke karodon bhookhe bachchon ke lie roti kahan par ugayen, ya apani zamin ka istemal kaise karen lekin apani hi zamin ka koee aur behatar istemal kar sakane ke abhav men hamane ise, apane desh kee dharati ko pepsi aur kola kola kee ladaee ke lie tuchchi sharton par rehan rakh diya tha.

vigyapan baji ke ab tak sabhi gyat aur agyat samikaran badal chuke the. in donon kampaniyon ek doosare ko nicha dikhane aur sare desh ke sanbhavit aur asanbhav grahakon ko apani taraf khinchane ke lie jo hathakande apanaye the, ve buri tarah distarb karane vale the. unake hording shmashan ghat men the aur astabal men bhi. aspatal men bhi aur girajaghar men bhi. ab to ye halat ho gayi thi ki ve kisi shav yatra ko bhi spansar kar dete, shart, bas, ek hi hoti, shav ke sath chal rahe sabhi log unake logo kee ti shart pahan kar chalen aur murde ko bhi unhin ke kold drink ke logo vala kafan pahanaya jaye.

shatir bijines manided logon kee ban aayi thi. jo jitana bada dhoort, usakee dukanadari utani hi achchhi chal nikali thi. in logon ne desh ke berozagaron kee lambi chaudi fauj ka aune paune dam dekar shoshan karana shuroo kar diya tha. in tathakathit dukanadaron ne har chhote bade shahar men tarah tarah kee sels ejensiyan, sarvis ejensiyan aur das tarah ke doosare non prodyoosing dhandhe khol liye the. ye log kuchh paida nahin karate the, fir bhi poore upabhokta bazar ko inhonne apani giraft men le liya tha. inaka jal poore desh men faila huaa tha. kaee bar ye log kisi maltineshanal, jvaint venchar ya antararashtriy kism ke kisi makkadajal ke bharatiy pratinidhi ka choga pahan kar har tarah aayatit taiknalaji, konsaipt, prokdat ya sarvis ko ghar-ghar pahunchane kee thekedari karate the. inake kam ka tarika bahut hi sidha aur paradarshi lagata tha, lekin asal men ye ek bahut hi ghatak kism kee apasanskriti ke vahak the, jo sirf apana aur apana hi ghar bharana janate the.

balki ve kahin se bhi, kisi bhi godam vagairah se aoparet kar sakate the. ve aksar subah aur dopahar ke akhabaron men vok in intaravyoo ke lie lubhavane vigyapan dete. kaee bar to subah ke akhabar men din men gyarah baje kisi tarankit hotal men sakshatkar men pahunchane ka nimantran hota to kaee bar dopahar ke akhabar men sham panch baje ve naukari ke ichchhuk smart, fraish grejuets, dhadalle se angrezi bol sakane vale kismat ke sataye ladake-ladakiyon ke lie palak panvade bichhaye milate the. ye log aakarshak vetan aur lubhavane kamishan ka chara dal kar logon ka bulate. jitane bhi berozagar rozana alag alag hotalon men alag alag kampaniyon ke lie hone vale in vok-in intaravyoo ke lie pahunchate, amooman hathon-hath rakh liye jate. fir bhi smart aur fraish logon kee zaroorat bani hi rahati. daraasal, in sab berojagaron ko bazar men har tabake, umr, aur aay varg ke upabhokta taiyar karane kee muhim par lagaya jata aur fir unhen apane mohak shabdajal men fansa kar unake zariye apani kampani dvara pracharit deshi videshi utpadon kee mang paida karani hoti thi.
jinakee use zaroorat hi nahin hoti thi aur jinhen kharid kar vah sirf unhin logon par raub jama sakata tha,jinhen vah vyaktigat taur par pasand nahin karata tha.

dalal, utpadak aur importar khelate rahate the. sabaka makasad ek hi rahata - jaise bhi ho upabhokta kee jeb se paise nikalo. usakee jeb men nahin hain to use apani sharton par udhar do. usake man men in aalatoo falatoo chijon ke lie lalak paida karake apane utpad ke lie mang paida karo. fir manamani keemat par usakee saplaee karo. yahi bazar ka moolamantr tha jo in kampaniyon ke taja bharati sels eksakyootivs ke kan men utar diya jata tha.

patane, aur fansa kar lane kee vidhivat trening di jati thi. fir unhen ek achchhi si kadaqadar kamiz aur rangin taee pahana kar aur ek bade se baig men duniya bhar kee falatoo chizen bhar kar bajar men utar diya jata tha - jao, sham tak poore baig ko khali kar lao. jitana mal bechoge, utani hi kamishan paoge. rozana baig khali kar ke laoge to tarakkee paoge.

daftaron, bazaron aur koloniyon men kisi bhi vakt bhatakate hue dekhe ja sakate the. inake baig men sheving krim, kichan ka aadhunik saman, juraben, chakoo sait, laitar, fraing pain, tarch kuchh bhi ho sakata tha. ve aapako folding chhata pasand n aane par mini miksar ke lie fansa sakate sakate the aur usake lie bhi n fansane par apane baig se bachchon ke lie koee imported khilauna nikal kar gher sakate the. ye chijen ve aapako chhapi huee keemat se aadhi keemat par dene ke lie ek tarah se gidagidate dekhe ja sakate the. yah bat alag hoti ki chhapi huee keemat se aadhi keemat par bhi vah chiz mahangi lagati.
ghatiya, nakali ya difaiktiv nikal aane par vapis kar sakane kee koee sahooliyat hi. ye to aaj yahan, kal vahan vale jiv the .

marketing dairaiktar ya mainejamaint treni jaise bhari bharakam padanam vale ye ghumantoo selsamain daraasal bahut nirih se lagate the. inhen din bhar bolane, dar dar bhatakane, dher sara saman dhone aur ek ek grahak ko apane shabdajal men fansane kee hi kamishan milati thi. isake lie unhen din bhar jis tarah aur jitani bar gidagidana padata tha, unhen taras ke layak hi banata tha. ek bat aur bhi thi. in logon ko dekhakar bachapan men dekhe feri valon kee bhi yad aati thi, jo bandhe bandhaye gali mauhallon men barahon mahine ek hi tarah kee chizen bechane ke lie lagabhag usi vakt ke aasapas aaya karate the aur lambi si pyari si tan laga kar poore mauhalle ko apane aane kee khabar diya karate the. ve feri vale sabhi mauhallon men bahanape ka sa rishta jodate hue saman becha karate the. ek tarah se ve gali mauhallon kee dinacharya ka ek hissa ban jaya karate the. ve kaee bar kisi kee mang par khas aaitam dhoondh kar bhi la diya karate the. isake alava ve bahanon, bhabhiyon aur nanadon ke kaee mamalon men razadar bhi huaa karate the.

lekin in aadhunik feri valon ko dekhate hi khijh paida hoti thi. ek to ye log bak bak bahut karate the, daravaja khulate hi sighe bhitar ghus jate the aur doosare apani chizen jabaradasti thopana chahate. halanki un par khijate samay ham achchhi tarah janate hote the ki ye to sirf bhade ke sipahi hain jinake zariye ye ladaee aur koee lad raha hai lekin ladaee ke niyam to yahi sikhate hain ki dushman ko maro, nahin to vah aapako mar dalega. isi vazah se ye selsamain har jagah dutkare bhi jate the.

lekin konsaipt aur sarvis saiktar ka pratinidhitv karati thi. ye log grahak ko patane kee har chand koshish karate, apani sarvis ke lakhon fayade ginate the. jaise ve aapako fansane ke lie ghar se hi kasam kha kar nikalate the. yahi unaka pesha tha. videshi bainkon ke kredit kard, kisi klab ya holide risort kee mahangi aur aajivan sadasyata, kisi shoping klab kee sadasyata ya isi tarah kee kisi bhavy eenami yojana vagairah ke lie rozana saikadon kee sankhya men ye marketing eksakyootiv grahakon kee talash men idhar udhar daftaron, dukanon, koloniyon men chakkar lagate dekhe ja sakate the. inhen naukari par rakhane vali kampani inake lie jo bijines target tay kar deti, ve dekhane-sunane men bahut aakarshak lagate, lekin hasil karane bahut mushkil hote the. ye kampaniyan grahak patane ke lie har tarah ke naitik-anaitik hathakande apanatin. kahin se bhi grahakon ke pate, fon nambar hasil kar letin aur fir unhen fon karake batatin ki aapako hamane samman, eenam ke lie chuna hai. logon ko eenam lene ke lie kisi achchhe hotal men bulavaya jata, mej buk karavayi jati. vahin ja kar pata chalata ki ve akele nahin hain jinhen is tarah bulavaya gaya hai. kaee aur bhi hain jinhen is tarah gher kar laya gaya hai. vahin yah rahasy bhi khulata ki yah sara natak unhen kisi mahangi, falatoo aur bakavas skeem kee sadasyata ke lie gherane ke lie kiya ja raha hai. turant sadasyata lene par bhari chhoot ka chugga dala jata. ek poora dal hota jo har tarike se aap par itana dabav dalata ki aap mazaboor ho kar han kar baithen. videshi bainkon ke kredit kard ke karobar se jude log bhi yahi hathakande apanate. kisi bhi aire gaire se farm bharava lete, jo baink dvara rijaikt ho jata. sirf farm bharavane ke evaj men bichauli kampani apana kamishan khara kar leti. agar kisi galat ya haisiyat n rakhane vale aadami ko kredit kard mil bhi jata aur vah kharidari karane ke bad vakt par bhugatan n kar pata to usake ghar gunde bhijava kar jan se marane kee dhamakiyan di jatin.

unake pas vijiting kard hai, bhari bharakam padanam hai, lekin asaliyat ve hi janate the ki unhen kitane mushkil lakshy de diye jate the. poora n kar pane kee halat men turant bahar ka rasta dikha diya jata. din bhar ediyan ragadane ke evaj men unhen pachas sath rupaye bhi mushkil se milate jabaki din bhar men ve kampani ko hajaron rupaye kama kar de chuke hote the. isake alava ye kampaniyan udhar mal la kar nakad bechatin, sirf inhin ghumantoo logon kee hi naukari ya pagar ka thikana nahin hota tha. isake alava, in kampaniyen ka koee bharosa bhi nahin hota tha ki kab band ho jayen ya dhandha hi badal len.

amooman rasoee kee ya aalatoo falatoo chijen hotin jo ghareloo ya kamakaji auraton kee zindagi aaramadayak banane ke bade bade dave karatin. yah bat alag hoti ki aap khud bajar se ye chizen thok baja kar aadhi keemat par la sakate the.

bas, aapaka paisa thode hi arase men duguna ya tiguna karane ka lalach deti thi aur jab bhole, bevakoof aur padhe likhe anapadh log apana sarvasv unhen saunp dete to ye log raton rat sare paise le kar champat ho jate. ye log janate the ki logon kee yadadasht bahut kamazor huaa karati hai aur aksar log ye bat aasani se bhool jate hain ki abhi kuchh hi din pahale unaka padosi apane lakhon rupaye kisi aise hi fandebaj ke chakkar men ganva chuka hai isake bavajood ve naye sire se khud bevakoof banane ke lie taiyar ho jate aur apana sab kuchh in vhait kolar safedaposh dakaiton ko saunp dete. poore desh men in dakaiton ka jal bichha huaa tha aur log the ki inhen apana sab kuchh saunp rahe the.

lekin yahan bhi rojagar pane valon ka aur sarvis pane valon ka bharapoor shoshan ho raha tha. dekhate hi dekhate desh ke har gali mauhalle men sthaniy, deshi aur videshi, antarrashtriy kooriyar sevaon ka jal sa bichh gaya tha. inamen sthaniy log bhi the aur maltineshanal kampaniyan bhi thin jo ek chhote se kavar ko ek shahar se doosare shahar men chaubis ghante men pahunchane ka dava karake sau rupaye tak jhatak leti thin. jitana bada lifafa, utani hi jyada fis. in ejensiyon men bhi vok in intaravyoo ke zariye fresh grejuets bharti kiye jate aur unhen achchhi yoonifarm pahana kar aur gale men pejar lataka kar bajar men dakiyagiri ke lie utar diya jata. ye bechare taee dhari yuva log din bhar ek bade se plastik baig men dher sari chittiyan lie ek imarat se doosari imarat men dakiyagiri karate dekhe ja sakate the. inhonne ek kam poora kiya nahin hota tha ki pejar par doosara sandesh aa tapakata ki aate hue falan kampani se bhi dak bhi lete aao. inamen se jo marketing said men hote, ve bhi bechare din bhi apane asambhav aur mushkil tagret poore karane ke chakkar men mare mare firate.

har kshetr men bazar ka jyada se jyada hissa hathiyane ke lie gala kat pratiyogita tha ek doosare ke grahak fodane ke lie ochhi harakaten thin aur anaitik tikadamen thin. makasad sirf ek hi tha - jyada se jyada kamaee. usake liye ve kisi bhi star tak niche utar sakate the. utar chuke the.

ya kisi drishyaman athava adrishy-si kisi chiz kee dalali kar raha hota. raton-rat aam aadami kee zindagi par upabhoktavad ne hamala kar diya tha. sare rishte nate, zarooraten, bhavanaen, komalataen aur kalpanaen, kuchh bhi isake bhishan hamale se bach nahin paye the.

ek bazar ka nam ho gaya tha, jis par, jisake lie aur jisake zariye kuchh bhi kharida becha ja raha tha. rah chalate, ghar par dubake baithe ya bed room men chhipe hue bhi use lagata rahata ki har vakt maltineshanalon kee ek tej dhar chhuri usakee gardan har vakt ret rahi hai. n sirf chhuri, balki in vishalakay danavon kee bhari bharakam lat usakee pith par aur donon hath usakee jeb men hain. upabhokta ko yah bhi lagata rahata ki ek aur adrishy hath hai unaka, jisane usaka tentuaa daba rakha hai ki main dekhata hoon - too kaise nahin kharidata hamari banayi chizen aur deta hamare tay kiye hue dam.

jo use laisens par chidiya bithane se milati thi. aam aadami par in maltineshanalon ka itana adhik dabav tha ki usakee sans sans inakee maujoodagi ke karan bojhil thi. jaise har vakt in maltineshanalon kee klas si chalati rahati ki yah khao, yah pio, yah kamiz pahano, kamiz ke niche baniyan falan kampani kee ho aur paint us kampani kee to usake niche chaddhi falan desh kee, falan kampani kee thik rahegi. ye kampaniyan din men das bar yad dilatin ki is videshi chaddhi men ilastik falan kampani ka thik rahega. yah bhi yad dilaya jata tha ki hamari chaddhi dhone ke lie kis kampani ka sabun uttam rahega. subah uthate hi kis kampani ke brash par kis doosari kampani ka toothapest lagana behatar rahega aur kulla kis kampani ke mauthavash se kiya jaye, yah salah di jati. in sabake margadarshan ke lie dasiyon kampaniyan subah subah hazari bajatin. isake bad hamari hazamat moondhane ke lie sat aur kampaniyan katar bandhe nazar aatin. kisi ke hath men videshi ustara hota to kisi ke hath men brash ya krim. koee koee to hamare chehare par kisi bhi keemat par apana aaftar shev loshan hi ragadane ke lie chhatapatata nazar aata.

polish ho, ghadi ho, pain ho, nelakatar ho, gadi ho, brifakes ho ya usamen rakhe steplar hon, steplar kee pin ho, kutarane ke lie chips hon, ya chubhalane ke lie mint kee goli ho - har jagah yahi bade bade sir vale maltineshanal hamen ghere khade milate. unake pas hamen bimar karane ke lie jank food the, bimari se bachane ke lie lie mahangi davayen thin aur un davaon kee keemat vasool karane ke lie mazaboot hath the. chhuri har hal men aam aadami kee gardan par thi. aavaz uthane kee to gunjaish hi nahin thi. virodh karane ka matalab pragati ka virodhi kahalavana tha.

khushaboo aur jayake duniya bhar men pasand kiye ja rahe the aur hamen videshi jank food bargar, pitsa aur dibbaband chikan khane par mazaboor kiya ja raha tha. hamare char rupaye kilo ke aaloo kharid kar ve usake chips bana kar hamin ko panch sau rupaye kilo ke hisab se khila rahe the aur ham kha rahe the. sab kuchh isi tarah chal raha tha aur ham bakare kee tarah sir par latakati talavar kee dhar lagatar pas aati mahasoos kar rahe the. jeb men rupaya aata hi nahin tha aur jab aata tha to ve log yah pahale hi tay kar chuke hote ki ise kaun kis kis anupat men hathiyayega?

vahan ek ajib sa mahaul tari tha. ek taraf samaj ka ek bahut bada varg aisa tha jo poori eemanadari, koshishon aur mehanat ke bavazood do vakt roti nahin juta pa raha tha. use apani chhoti se chhoti zaroorat, khushi ya ichchha ke lie lambe samay tak intazar karana padata tha aur kuchh bhi hasil kar pane ke lie har bar naye sire se sangharsh kee shurooaat karani padati thi.

shaharon aur kaee bar kasbon ke bazar bhi har vakt grahakon kee bhid se pate rahate. kisi bhi samay bazar se guzarate vakt bhid kee vazah se kandhe chhilate. dukanadaron ke pas sabhi grahakon ke layak saman to hota, lekin dikhane, bechane kee hi fursat nahin hoti thi. jitani badi aur mahangi dukan hoti, vahan utani hi jyada bhid hoti. log the ki chizon par toote padate. halanki kuchh arasa pahale tak itani mahangaee kee kalpana bhi nahin kee ja sakati thi. chizen mahangi thin aur khoob mahangi thin. lekin yah dekh kar bhi hairani hoti thi ki in damon par bhi un chizon ko kharidane vale apani bari ka intazar karane ke lie lambi lainon men lage rahate. pata nahin logon ke pas itana paisa kahan se aa jata tha ki din bhar shaping karane ke bad bhi khatam nahin hota tha.

kapade dhone, roti belane kee mashinen to ab bite vakt kee baten thin. yah yug to apane sath har asanbhav kam ke lie aadhunik upakaran le kar aaya tha. ab aap kahin bhi aadami ko ek sath hagate aur mobail fon par baten karate ya fon par baten karate aur hagate dekh sakate the. selular fon ya pejar ab chalate firate aadami ke pas pain ya laitar kee tarah aam ho chale the.

shanadar aur aon d top aof d varld jaisa mahasoos karane jaisa tha, lekin aam aadami ke lie yah abhi bhi bahut mushkil taim tha. bahut hi mushkil vakt. usane isase pahale ek sath itani mushkilen kabhi bhi nahin dekhin thi.

chokalet khate hue bachche, maigi noodals aur bargar khate hue bachche, saf suthare, kisi khas kampani ke mahange sabun se nahate saf gadabade bachche. ye sare bachche upabhok ta sanskriti ke naye vahak the jo badi badi kampaniyon ke utpadan bechane kee muhim par lagaye gaye the. ve naye yug ke bikri pratinidhi the. ve svabhavik bachanap jite, galabahiyan dale bhari basta uthaye skool jate bachche nahin the, in bachchon men shararaten nahin thin. inake bachapan men kahin bhi mitti nahin thi kyonki inake kapadon men jara si mitti lagate hi inakee modal mataen inhen kisi kampani ke sabun se dho dalati thin aur ye fir se pahale kee tarah ujale aur saf suthare ho jate the.
dhabon hotalon men, sadakon, chaurahon par, bhattiyon ke pas aur skoolon ke bahar. bas ve inhin kee nigah men nahin the.

ek sath guzarane ka aham faisala liya gaya. halanki ek-doosare ka sath unhen kisi tarah aage badhate rahane ka bahut bada sahara deta tha aur katha nayak ko apani zindagi arthapoorn lagane lagi thi, fir bhi vah aksar bechain ho uthata. katha nayika ko lekar vah jitane bhi sapane bunata, sabamen usakee ek hi chinta hoti ki aakhir vah usase shadi kare to kaise aur use le jaye kahan?

aur chhoti bahan dasavin kee chhatra hone ke bavajood pados ke ghar men ek chhote bachche ke lie bebi siting karati thi aur evaj men tin sau rupaye pati thi. ghar ka kharch katha nayika ke vetan se hi chalata tha. kisi tarah gadi khinchi ja rahi thi.

lekin ye sab bhi oont men munh men jire kee tarah lagata. pahali doosari ke bachchon ko sirf isalie fel kar dena ki ve jabaradasti aapase tyooshan padhen, bachche ke janm din par sirf tafi dekh kar nak bhaun sikodana aur jatalana ki hamen aur bachchon kee tarah sirf tafi par n bahala kar kuchh gift bhi lao, khud ke janmadin par kaksha ke sare bachchon ko khali lifafe pakada dena ki is men apane man-bap se das bis rupaye rakhava lao, ye sare hathakande katha nayika ko bahut ochhe lagate. aakhir vah kavitaen likhati thi aur kuchh to sochati samajhati hi thi. halanki is sab ke lie use kuchh bhi n karana padata aur sari chizen apane aap hoti jatin, fir bhi usaka man n manata.

satrah hazar rupaye kee dres ya pandrah hazar ka rangin dhoop ka chashma mahanga nahin lagata tha. is kathin vakt men bhi log barah pandrah sau rupaye ka khana kha hi rahe the, auraten pandrah sau rupaye kee brejari pahan hi rahi thin aur log bachchon ko hazaron rupaye ke khilaune dilava hi rahe the.

takalifon aur mazabooriyon ke chalate katha nayak aur katha nayika pichhale do dhaee baras se ek doosare ko chahane ke bavazood shadi ke lie tay nahin kar pa rahe hain. katha nayak ke pas jagah hi nahin hai. use hansi aati hai - usake pas nayika ko choomane, gale lagane ya mutthi bhar pyar karane ke lie bhi jagah nahin hai. sab kuchh sarvajanik jagahon par. sabake samane.

ek khas bat karani hai use. nayika ko tabhi usane sattar kee raftar se chal rahi lagabhag khali lokal men sham ke sadhe aath baje pahali bar chooma tha. nayika behad romanchit ho gayi thi. vah kalpana bhi nahin kar sakati thi ki yah ghunna sa, chuppa sa aadami itani mardanagi ka kam bhi kar sakata hai. isase pahale ki nayak use dobara choom pata, vasaee steshan aa gaya tha aur vah tezi se utar gayi thi. gadi chalane tak khidakee kee salakhen pakad kar khadi rahi thi aur jate jate use - buddhoo kahin ke kee shanadar digri de gayi thi.

lekin vah nahin janata tha ki is ekant kee use itani badi keemat chukani padegi. use aofis ke hi kisi sathi ne bataya tha ki ek sindhi mahila peing gest rakhati hai. rahane aur ghar ke khane kee bahut kam damon par bahut achchhi vyavastha. vah vahan turant pata karane gaya tha. sachamuch achchha ghar bar tha. karib saintis baras kee mahila thi vah. bahut hi milanasar lagi thi vah mahila use. pahali hi mulakat men man moh lene vali. usakee ek hi ladakee thi - chaudah-pandrah baras kee. pati aksar bahar toor par rahata tha. ghar par koee mard rahe. . .yahi soch kar vah peing gest rakhati thi.

jahan vah kabhi kabhar katha nayika ko lane kee soch sakata tha. agar sab kuchh thik thak chalata to vah vahin rahate hue shadi karane kee bhi soch sakata tha. lekin yah sara sochana sirf sochana hi rah gaya tha.

lekin in sapanon men dastak kisi aur ne di thi. pahale to vah samajh hi nahin paya tha ki yah daravaja khatakhatane kee halakee si aavaz kahan se aa rahi hai. kafi der bad hi vah samajh paya tha ki usi ka band daravaja khatakhataya ja raha tha. usane uth kar jab daravaja khola tha to samane makan malakin khadi thi. lagabhag paradarshi gaun men. usane ekadam bhitar aa kar daravaja band kar diya tha.

socha. . , are tum khade kyon ho, aao baitho na, aur usane katha nayak ko khinch kar apane pas bitha liya tha. katha nayak ko kato to khoon nahin. vah yah kya dekh raha tha. yaun ka itana khula aamantrann? achanak usake samane sab kuchh saf ho gaya tha. yah itane kam damon men sari suvidhaen, itana achchha vyavahar aur itana badhiya bhojan. badale men yah sab kuchh. chhi. .

yahan tak ki vah usake samane poori tarah nangi ho gayi thi, lekin jab katha nayak kisi bhi tarah is roop men apane jivan men saiks kee shurooaat ke lie razi nahin huaa tha to usane use dher sare paison ka bhi lalach diya tha - tum jo chaho le lo bas meri yah ichchha poori kar diya karo. roz nahin to hafte men do-ek bar sahi. vah fir bhi nahin mana tha to usane aakhiri danv chala tha - vah man jaye varana vah us par apani ladakee ko chhedane kar ilzam lagayegi aur isi vakt khade khade daravaje se bahar nikalava degi. ek bar usane socha bhi ki kya harz hai, jab sab kuchh usake samane itane shanadar dhang se parosa ja raha hai to vah bhi kyon n aanand le, lekin vah aisi nimfomainik auraton ke bare men janata tha. ek bar silasila shuroo ho jane par isaka kahin ant nahin hota. apani saiks poorti ke samane ve n din dekhati hain n rat. yahi soch soch kar vah use apane se pare thelata raha. yahi kahata raha, aaj vah bahut thaka huaa hai. kal vah zaroor usakee ichchha poori karega. lekin vah bilkul bhi nahin mani thi. vah bar bar use apane oopar gira rahi thi. usane jabaradasti katha nayak ke kapade utar diye the. vah tab bhi nahin mana to usane katha nayak ko gali di thi - namard kahin ka, mainne to socha tha dekhane men achchhe khase ho. . .

tab tak intazar karane ke alava koee upay nahin. panch sal ya aur jyada? tab vah tis kee hogi aur katha nayak taintis ka. donon jab bhi milate hain, har bar sir jod kar baithate hain aur bisiyon bar guna bhag karate hain.

in do pyar karane valon ka bhi zindagi kee chhoti chhoti khushiyon par hak banata hai. unhen bhi apane chhote chhote sapanon ko poora karane kee chah ho sakati hai. vaise bhi ve eyyashi vali, khoobasoorat aur aisho aaram kee zindagi ke khvab kahan dekh rahe hain. ek chhota sa ghar hi to chahate hain jahan unakee apani khud kee duniya ho aur .

behatar naukari ke aur behatar zindagi ke sapane ko poora karane men unakee madad kar sakate hain. aapakee nazar men in donon men se kisi ke bhi layak koee behatar naukari ho ya kahin bina dipojit ka kam kiraye vala koee ghar ho to unhen zaroor batayen. ve door pas kahin bhi jane ke lie taiyar hain. in donon ka bayodata aapake pas hai hi sahi.

sabhyata ke aarambh se hi dharm evan darshan ke kendr- bindu bane huye hain. ramayan men bhagavan ram kee ravan par vijay ko asaty par saty kee vijay bataya gaya aur pratik svaroop ham aaj bhi ise dashahara parv ke roop men manate hain tatha ravan ka putala jalakar saty kee vijay ka shankhanad karate hain. mahabharat men bhi ek krishn ke netritv aur panch pandavon kee sau kauravon aur attharah akshauhini sena par vijay ko saty kee asaty par vijay bataya gaya. kalantar men ved aur puran ke virodhi buddh v jain ne bhi saty ko panchashil v panchamahavrat ka pramukh ang mana.

par is marg par chalana utana hi kathin hai jitana ki sachche pyar ke marg par chalana. rashtrapita mahatma gandhi, jinhen saty ka sabase bada vyavaharavadi upasak mana jata hai ne saty ko eeshvar ka paryayavachi kaha. unake shabdon men- saty hi eeshvar hai evan eeshvar hi saty hai. yah vaky gyan, karm evan bhakti yog kee triveni hai. saty kee anubhooti agar gyan yog hai to ise vastavik jivan men utarana karmayog evan antatah saty roopi sagar men doobakar isaka rasasvadan lena hi bhakti yog hai. shayad yahi karan hai ki lagabhag sabhi dharm saty ko kendr bindu banakar hi apane naitik aur samajik niyamon ko pesh karate hain.

usi prakar sarakari karmachari hetu rajakosh ke ek ansh ka bhakshan n karana asambhav hai. bhrashtachar ek aisa vish bel hai jo samaj men nity fail raha hai. ise khatm karane hetu kade se kade dand apanaye gaye, par isaka vish aur bhi gahara hota gaya. yahi karan hai ki ek daur men bhrashtachar ko vishvavyapi samasya kahakar isaka samanyikaran karane kee koshish kee gayi to dekhate hi dekhate bhrashtachar ko shishtachar ka paryay mana jane laga. nishchitatah jab aap kisi vyakti se kam nikalavane hetu use rishvat n dekar usake janm din par ek mahanga aur khoobasoorat upahar pradan karate hain to aap apani buri niyat ko chhupane ka ek shisht tarika apana rahe hote hain.

nyay men deri, jagarookata ka abhav, shartakat tarikon se lakshy pane kee hod aur manav ka svarthi svabhav hi isaka mool karan hai. in sabase nipatane hetu svatantr nyayapalika, svatantr peras, lokayukt v lokapal sanstha, satarkata aayog, bhrashtachar nirodhak byooro jaisi sansthayen gathit kee gayi . vartaman men udarikaran vyavastha ke dvara laisens- paramit raj kee samapti, soochana-takanik ke badhate dayare ke sath har kisi par midiya kee najar , sitijan-chartar ke madhyam se vibhinn vibhagon dvara nagarikon ko jagarook banana, ee-garvanens ke dvara prashasan men kagaji bojh kam karake kampyootaraijeshan dvara paradarshita lana v tatkal seva muhaiya karana, sivil sosayati dvara apane adhikaron ke prati jagarook hona, soochana ka adhikar lagoo karane v sting aapareshan jaise tatvon ke dvara bhi bhrashtachar par kaboo karane ke prayas kiye gaye hain.

jahan se bhrashtachar roopi gend uchhalati hai, n ki us jagah jahan par vah girati hai. bhrashtachar par anekon seminar huye, bade-bade panne ise khatm karane ke dave se range gaye aur tamam jabani jama kharch huyi par ham is tathy kee avahelana kar rahe hain ki bhrashtachar antatah ek naitik evan vaiyaktik samasya hai. jab tak har vyakti svayan ko is dosh se mukti dilane ka prayas nahin karata tab tak bhrashtachar unmoolan ek nara matr hi rahega. bhagavan ram ant tak ravan ke das siron ko tiron se bindhate rahe par us par koee fark nahin pada, antatah vibhishan ke ishare par unhonne ravan kee nabhi par tir chalaya aur use dharashayi karane men safal rahe. aisa hi bhrashtachar ke sath bhi hai.
jisako apanane ke pashchat vyakti moksh kee avastha ko prapt karata hai. moksh prapti ke pashchat vyakti is sansar ke punarjanm chakr se mukt ho jata hai.

par itani bhi gahari nahin ki koee chahakar bhi unhen nahin hila sake. yahi karan hai ki bhrashtachar par padi har chot use jhakajhor kar rakh deti hai. saty bhale hi kam chot karata hai, par jab karata hai to vah behad tikshn hoti hai. jaroorat bhrashtachar ko ek lailaj rog manakar shant baithane kee nahin, varan ise samapt karane hetu prayas karane kee hai.

usake prati n to rashtr ka netritv, n sahityakar, n midiya aur n hi buddhijivi sanvedanashil hai. lagata hai sabhi sanvedanahin ho chuke hain, shoony ho chuke hain. desh men bada se bada hadasa ho jata hai, kshan bhar ke liye rediyo v ti0 vi0 apani jani-pahachani aavaj men use khabaron ka roop de dete hain, akhabar vale apane panne rang dete hain, fir aaya-gaya ho jata hai. logabag bhool jate hain, karan ki is desh kee janata ka bhulakkadapan purana hai. yadyapi ki isamen janata ka dosh nahin, balki dosh to rashtriy karnnadharon ka hai, jinhonne samaj ka mahaul aur sanskar hi aisa nirmit kar diya hai ki isake siva kuchh nahin ho sakata.

unase saksham netritv kee aasha karana hi vyarth hai. desh par sabase lambe samay tak shasan karane vali kangres parti ka hal dekhen to svayan mahatma gandhi ne aajadi pchat kangres ko bhang karane kee bat kahi thi kyonki unhen aajadi ke bad kee bharat kee tasvir dikhane lagi thi. yah anayas hi nahin hai ki kangres matr ek parivar vishesh ke vyaktiyon ke bharose rah gaee hai aur apani sthaee niyati manakar unase hi kisi karime kee aasha karati hai. kabhi svatantrata aandolan ka paryay rahe kangres kee yah manodasha svayan men bahut kuchh spasht kar deti hai. uttar pradesh jaise sashakt rajy men apani jamin khisakane ke bad jis prakar kangres chhatapata rahi hai, use samajha ja sakata hai. yuvaraj ke roop men pracharit kiye ja rahe rahul gandhi bundelakhand ke ek dalit parivar men rat gujar kar is bat kee aasani se ghoshana karate hain ki oopar se chale ek roopaye men se matr panch paisa hi in ilakon men pahunchata hai, par isake lie jimmedar kaun hai batana bhool jate hain. isi prakar bharatiy janata parti to sadaiv mukhauton kee rajaniti se hi grast dikhati hai. kabhi ayodhya to kabhi gujarat ko hindutv kee prayogashala banane vali bhajapa ke karnnadhar satta men aate hi gathabandhan kee aad men apane mool muddon ko darakinar kar dete hain. aise hi tamam any rajanaitik dal kshetravad, jativad, sampradayavad jaisi bhavanaon ke sahare yen-ken-prakaren satta hasil karate hain aur vikas kee baton ko pichhe chhod dete hain. nishchitatah ise uchit nahin thaharaya ja sakata aur isi ka natija hai ki aaj arajakata, aatankavad, anushasanahinata, bhrashtachar, samajik asuraksha ka dooshit mahaul poore rashtr men vyapt hai.

dharmachary v midiya bhi apani jimmedari se aankh nahin chura sakate. ye aaye din desh kee janata ko rashtriyata, eemanadari, mitavyayita, anushasan v karmathata ka path padhate hain par kabhi apane gireban men jhankane kee koshish nahin karate. lokatantr ka chaturth stambh kaha jane vala midiya in kathit karnnadharon dvara kahi gaee ek-ek bat ko breking nyooj banakar desh kee janata ko ubata rahata hai. janata kee aavaj uthane kee bajay midiya kee prathamikata sarakari vibhagon aur karaporet jagat se prapt vigyapan hain, jin par unakee roji-roti tikee huee hai. roj pravachan dene vale dharmachary janata ko dharm kee chashani khila rahe hain aur karmavad kee bajay logon ko karmakand kee taraf prerit karake apana ulloo sidha kar rahe hain. aisa pratit hota hai ki ya to yah varg yah samajhakar pravachan jhadata hai ki is desh kee janata anapadh aur nasamajh hai athava ve is sootr par kam kar rahe hain ki kisi bhi jhooth ko bar-bar doharane se sach man liya jaega. vastutah rajanaitik dal, poonjipati ya dharmachary in sabaka nihit svarth ek hai aur duniya kee sari sukh-suvidhaon se paripoorn is varg ke pas abhav namak chij fatak bhi nahin sakati. yahi karan hai ki yah varg yathasthitivad ka purajor pakshadhar hai. inhen kisi bhi prakar ka parivartan pasand nahin - bhale hi aam janata akal, bhukhamari, mahamari se trast ho, desh ka shikshit yuva varg roji-roti kee talash men budhape ko pahunch jaye, desh kee aadhi se adhik janata garibi rekha ke niche jivan-yapan karati rahe, bhola-bhala dehati naukarashahi ke jal men pisata rahe, kintu is desh ke netaon, poonjipatiyon v dharmacharyon par isaka koee asar nahin padata. inaka sab kuchh to sinhasan, gaddi v aasan tak simit hai. yahi unaka rashtr hai, yahi unakee deshabhakti hai, bakee chijon ke prati yah varg apani sanvedanashilata kho baitha hai.

rajanaitik ichchhashakti ke abhav men is rog ka upachar nahin bata sake. mahatma gandhi ka nam lekar rajaniti karane vale unakee ichchhanusar samaj ke antim vyakti ke aansoo nahin ponchh sake aur antatah sari chot antim vyakti ke hi hisse men aayi. lubhavane naron ke sath any rajanaitik dal jab satta men aaye to bhi sthiti jas kee tas rahi. garib tabakon hetu roj naee yojanaen lagoo kee jati hain, par unamen se adhikatar kagajon men hi apana lakshy poora karati hain. yahi karan hai ki bhrashtachar ko shishtachara banane men deri nahin lagi. aankade gavah hain ki desh ke 62 pratishat logon ko rishvat dekar kam karavane ka pratyaksh anubhav hai aur aam nagarik prativarsh karib 21,068 karod roopaye rishvat deta hai. vastutah bhrashtachar vyaktigat aacharan se ab sansthagat roop le chuka hai. yah aam janata ka durbhagy hi kaha jayega ki jab aise masalon par bahut shor-sharaba hota hai to mamale ko aayog kee chaharadivari ya nyayik janch prakriya kee janjir se bandh diya jata hai aur fir to bhoolana hi bhoolana hai, karan ki mamala adalati janch prakriya se gujar raha hai ataev is par kisi prakar kee tika-tippani karana nyayalay kee avamanana paridhi ke antargat aata hai. isi prakar badh, sookha, akal ya any aapadaon ke samay mantreegan v adhikari viman, helikaptar aur karon ke kafile ka prayog karate hain, natijan jitani rahat pidit-janon ko nahin mil pati hai usase kahin jyada mantree v adhikariyon par kharch pad jata hai. vastutah bhrashtachar ke khilaf kadam uthane kee jimmedari jin logon aur sansthaon par hai, khud ve bhrashtachar men buri tarah ulajhe hue hain. pahale ke rajaneta bhrashtachar men apana nam aane par sharamate the, aaj ve poori takat se apane bhrasht aacharan ka bachav karate hain. hal hi men chara ghotale mamale kee sunavaee ke dauran sarvochch nyayalay ko bhi tippani karani padi ki bhrashtachariyon ko laimpapost se latakakar fansi de deni chahie, to usakee vedana aur aakrosh ko samajha ja sakata hai.

sahaj hi anuman lagaya ja sakata hai. hamare adhikatar jan-pratinidhi apani aaparadhik prishthabhoomi ke chalate vaise bhi sadaiv charcha ka vishay bane rahate hain. aparadhiyon ka rajanitikaran ho raha hai ya rajaniti ka aparadhikaran ho raha hai, kuchh bhi kahana bada kathin hai. abhineta-abhinetriyon ke mandir aur unakee pooja ab purani bat ho gaee hai, bharatiy rajaniti men bhi isake udaharan khulakar samane aane lage hain. yahan vyakti pooja muhavara nahin balki yatharth ban gaya hai. dharmanirapekshata ko sanvidhan ka moolabhoot tatv mana gaya hai par tamam rajaneta dharm evan devi-devataon kee sharan lete rahate hain. ise unaka vyaktigat aagrah samajhakar darakinar bhi kar diya jay to yahan devi-devataon v pauranik charitron se tulana hi nahin balki janapratinidhiyon ko svayan devi-devata bana diya gaya. kabhi dharm ke nam par vot mangana, kabhi chatukarita kee had tak jakar ek hi vyakti ka nam japana, to kabhi netaon ko eevar bana dena- isase bada majak lokatantr men aur nahin ho sakata. aapatakal ke daur men tatkalin kangres adhyaksh devakant barooaa ne kaha tha- indira ij indiya end indiya ij indira. mano yahan lokatantr nahin samantavad ya rajatantr ka saya ho. tamilanadu men ema0ji0 ramachandran kee mrityu pashchat chennaee men unaka mandir banavaya gaya, jisamen unhen devata ke roop men dikhaya gaya. jayalalita ko postaron men kali man ke roop men dikhaya gaya to mayavati ne kaha ki main hi maya lakshmi hoon. rajasthan men vasundhara sarakar ke tin sal poore hone ke upalakshy men jari kailendar men unhen annapoorna devi evan bhajapa ke shirsh netaon atal bihari vajapeee, lalakrishn aadavani v rajanath sinh ko kramashah brahma, vishnu v mahesh ke roop men darshaya gaya. muradabad men soniya gandhi ko durga man kee veshabhoosha men bhrashtachar aur aatankavad ka sanhar karate hue dikhaya gaya to jabalapur men ek poorv vidhayak ne soniya gandhi ko rani lakshmibaee ke roop men postar men dikhaya. maharashtr men vilasarav deshamukh ko govardhan uthate shreekrishn ke roop men dikhaya gaya. aise n jane kitane udaharan hai jo rajatantr v samanti samaj kee yad dilate hain. janata ke bich jakar unake dukh-dard ko sunane aur unaka upachar karane kee bajay rajanaitik dalon ke shirsh netaon kee vandana, rajaniti men pardapan karane v kursi pane ka shartakat tarika ban gaya hai. chalisa rajaniti isi kee den hai.

patra-patrikaon, ti0vi0 aur manchon par desh ka yuvavarg, kisan, majadoor, karigar in baton ko sunakar ya padhakar gunega to usake manas-patal par kya prabhav ankit hoga? apane in rashtriy karnnadharon kee karagujariyon v fir lambe-lambe pravachanon se usakee kya dharana banegi? jab desh ka uchchapadasth varg hi bhrashtachar ke aaropon ke sanshay men kaid ho, usaka aacharan logon kee nigah men saf-suthara n ho to fir us desh ka bhavishy kya hoga? isi karan daae0 ram manohar lohiya ne kaha tha ki yadi bhrashtachar ko khatm karana hai to isakee shurooaat uchchapadasth logon se honi chahiye. par durbhagyavash aaj is desh ka netritvavarg apane svarth men andha ho apane pad ka sara fayada apanon ke liye bator raha hai. vah chahe jati ke roop men ho, bhaee-bhatijavad ke roop men ho, kshetravad ke sandarbh men ho- kintu dayara sankeernnata v svarth ka hai. aaj choonki sare log isi sankeernnatavadi najariye men kaid hain so hamam men sab nange hain kee tarj par ek doosare kee kamajoriyon aur buraeeyon ko anadekha kar rahe hain. nishchitatah aaj svasth evan samagr netritv ka sankat desh par mandara raha hai aur jab tak svasth netritv nahin paida hoga, bharat kee dharati par se jativad, sampradayavad, kshetravad, bhrashtachar, arajakata, aatankavad ka khatma namumakin hai. yah manthan ka vishay hai ki hamare sath hi aajadi paye tamam rashtr vikas ke kaee payadan chadh gaye, par bharat men apekshit pragati nahin huee. vartaman ke tathakathit karnnadharon kee aavaj men dam nahin hai kyonki aavaj men dam, sanskar, vichar aur charitr se aata hai par ye karnnadhar andar se khokhale hain. ise rashtr kee badakismati hi kaha jayega ki in netaon kee koee niti nahin hai, naitikata nahin hai, charitr kee pavitrata nahin hai, samagrata nahin hai, samadarshita nahin hai. ye rajaniti ko siddhant ke tahat nahin, balki kutil niti ke tahat chala rahe hain, kyonki ye avasaravadi hain. har netritv apane sinhasan ko bachaye rakhane ke liye rashtriyata, akhandata, ekata, dharmanirapekshata, bandhutv, samata ka nara lagata hai kintu sabakee manasikata ek jaisi hai. aaj sabhi rajanaitik dalon evan netaon ka ekamatr lakshy satta hai aur satta kee is kursi tak pahunchane ke liye kabhi ye rashtriyata, akhandata, ekata, dharmanirapekshata, bandhutv, samata v samajavad kee sidhi laga lete hain to kuchh ko ramanam kee sidhi lagane men bhi parahej nahin.

santusht varg evan doosara, asantusht varg. santusht varg choonki rajanaitik, samajik, aarthik, prashasanik, sanskritik aur dharmik har kshetr men apana varchasv bana chuka hai atah vah yathasthitivad ko banaye rakhane ke liye katibaddh hai, chahe isake liye kitane bhi jhooth ka sahara lena pade. rashtrahit men jaroori hai ki yah varg logon ko upadesh dene kee bajay apani kathani-karani ka antar svayan mitakar eemanadari, charitra, karmathata, anushasan ko apane aacharan men utare. jis din yah suvidhabhogi varg sankalpabaddh hokar tyag ka aadarsh upasthit kar dega, desh-samaj kee dasha sudharane men vakt nahin lagega. doosari taraf asantusht varg ka netritv satta kee kursi ke liye logon kee bhavanaon ka shoshan v dohan kar raha hai. abhi tak vah samaj ko navin vichar nahin de paya aur jab tak vichar nahin paida honge, tab tak samaj men n to badalav aayega aur n hi kranti.

Vaise main UC News par sabse jyada articles Sport category par likhata hun. Lekin pichale hafte maine dusre category par kai articles likhe. Jisse achche views bhi mile aur earning bhi hui. Ab aap soch rahe honge ki maine achcha kiya. Lekin mujhe isse 10 index points ka loss ho gaya. Isse pahle mere 78 index points the, bas 2 index point earn karne ke sath main Diamond Blogger ban jata. Aisa hi kuch aapke sath na ho jaye, Isliye jane Index Point Kya Hai ? Aap UC News par kitane professional rup se regular original article likhate hai, jispar achche view milte hai. Use UC News points ke base par calculate karta hai. Jise Index Point kaha jata hai. Simple word me kahe to UC News aapke quality work ko award ke rup me Index Point deta hai. Is system ko UC News ne August 2017 ko implement kiya tha. UC News Par Views Kaise Badhaye Index Point Kaise Work Karta Hai ? UC News Index Point ke dvara apne platform ki content quality me improvement karana chahta hai. Isliye isne Index Point jaise system ko laya hai. Jise Grade System kaha jata hai. UC News se judane vale every blogger ko index point in factors ke base par milta hai 1.Professionalism 2.Influence 3.Activeness 4.Originality Inhe mai aage details me batayunga. UC News is system ke base par bloggers ko four parts me divide karta hai- 1.Bronze Blogger- Ye aise bloggers hote hai, jinke index points 0-49.9 hote hai. Isme Basic partner bhi hote hai, jinke 0-19 index points hote hai. 2.Silver Blogger Jin blogger ke index points 50-64.9 hote hai, vo is category me aate hai. Is category ke bloggers ko award ke rup me Additional View milate hai. 3.Gold Blogger Is category vale bloggers ki index points 65-79.9 hote hai. Is tarah ke bloggers ko UC News award ke rup me kai Additional View aur Extra Revenue Share deta hai. 4.Diamond Blogger 80-100 index points vale blogger Diamond blogger kahe jata hai. Gold blogger ki tarah inhe bhi UC New Extra View aur Extra Revenue Share deta hai. Kaise Maine UC News Par Ek Din Me 4,57,565 Views Paye Index Point Ya Grade System Se Kya Kya Fayde Hai 1.Yadi aap UC News par new blogger hai to jab aapke Index Point 20 ho jayega, tab aap Monetization enable kar earning start kar sakte hai. Isse aap Basic Partner se Advanced Partner ban jayenge. 2.Yadi aap UC News par old blogger hai to aapko Gold Blogger banane ki koshish karani chahiye. Isse aapko 1.Extra Views Additional Recommendations milenge, yani Gold blogger banate hi aapke post ko UC New apne Homepage par jyada se jyada dikhayega, jisse achche view mil sakte hai. 2.Extra Earning Additional Interests hogi, yani Gold blogger banate hi UC News aapke liye earning sharing percentage badha deta hai. Ek anuman ke anusar UC News GoldDiamond blogger ke article se ki gai earning ka 60 deta hai, jabki Bronze ya Silver blogger ko 40-50 deta hai. UC News Se Kaise Maine $470 Kamaye Vaise Silver Blogger banane par aapke post ko Additional Recommendations milega. Index Point Kaise Badhaye Main pahle hi bata chuka hun Index point ko Influence, Professionalism, Activeness, Originality ke adhar par calculate kiya jata hai.
