isamen ek nayi zindagi aur achchha mahaul bhi tha. kaisal ka kahana tha ki karar ke anusar mujhe prati saptah tin filmon men kam karana hoga aur vetan hoga dedh sau dalar. karno kee kanpani se jitana milata tha, usase yah duguna tha. fir bhi mainne na nukur karate hue kaha ki prati saptah do sau dolar se kam nahin loonga. kaisal sahab ne kaha ab ye senet sahab par hai vo unhen keliforniya men bata denge. fir mujhe soochana mil jaegi.

bhari anakarshak munh, aur majaboot jabade vale ek bhari-bharakam insan se pada tha aur is chehare mohare se main prabhavit huaa. par main is udhedabun men tha ki apane bhavishy ke rishte men vah kitani sahridayata se pesh aaenge. us sakshatkar men lagatar main behad narvas tha aur samajh nahin pa raha tha ki banda mujhase khush hai ya nahin.

unhonne chalataoo dhang se poochha. maine bataya sitanbar ke pahale hafte men shuroo karoonga, jab karno kanpani se mera karar khatm ho raha hai. kansas siti chhodane ko lekar mere man men kuchh khataka tha. kanpani vapas inglaind ja rahi thi aur main los enjels, jahan main akela hooonga aur bat kuchh jam nahin rahi thi. antim karyakram ke pahale mainne sabake lie drink mangaya aur sabase vida lene ke vichar se main kuchh gamagin ho gaya.

jisakee mujhase kisi karan vash patati nahin thi, ko mazak soojha aur mujhe kuchh upahasatmak dhang se kasamasa kar bataya ki kanpani kee or mujhe tohafa milega. ye kabool karata hoon ki ye bat mere dil ko chhoo gayi thi. alabatta, kuchh huaa nahin. dresing room se jab sab ja chuke the, fred karno jooniyar ne svikar kiya ki daindo ne vastav men ek vidaee bhashan taiyar kiya tha aur mujhe ek bhent dene kee vyavastha kee thi, lekin ye dekhakar ki mainne sabake lie pine ka intajam kiya hai, usakee vo sab karane kee himmat nahin huee aur vah tathakathit upahara dresing tebal ke aaine ke pichhe chhod gaya tha. tin kee panni men lipati huee tanbakoo kee khali dibiya thi jisamen chikanaee vale rogan kee purani khurachan rakhi huee thi.

gae honge. aisa hai ki main to pahali hi bar gaya tha, isalie to jyada hi utsahit hoon. isalie poochh dala. khair, aap bhi isi tarah se utsahit honge, jab pahali bar vahan se laute honge. stabdhanuma khumari ka to aisa hai ki vahan ka displin, jajbat, deshabhakt aadi-aadi dekhakar mere pet men marod uthane lage, aankhen tak bhar-bhar aaeen. kasam se kya gajab kee deshabhakt hote hain. aap ne dekhe to honge hi vahan, sachchi bolio gae the ki nahin? vo kya hai ki ham bhi aam deshavasiyon taip kisi ke abrad aadi jane kee bat par aasani se kam hi yakeen karate hain. nahin aap bol rahe ho to gae to hoge hi. yar kya sadaken hain. kya bildingen hain. kitani pyari-pyari karen hain. kitane sundar-sundar to log hain.gandagi ka kahin namonishan nahin. sadakon par kachara kahin milata tak nahin. desh ko saf suthara rakhane ke prati kitane kanshas rahate hain videshi soch-soch ke hi mujhe to chakkar aane lagate hain.

aaega bhi kaise kabhi gae ho. man liya gae hoge. ek bar mainne ek angrej ko dastabin ke pas khade dekha, kafi der tak jab vo vahan se nahin hila to mainne poochha ki bhaee sahab kya bat hai. usane jo kaha use sunakar apana desh hota to koee use dastabin men hi dalakar kerosin chhidak deta. kah raha tha ki usaka dost abhi kuchh kele lekar aane vala hai isi karan vah yahan khada hai taki khakar chhilake dastabin men fenk sake. kyon? taki sadak par kahin gandagi n rahe. furasatiya kahin ka. aap karenge aisa? kya kaha-han karenge. aapakee itani majal. apane desh ko lajaoge kya? . aap kam se kam bharatavasi to nahin ho sakate. main man hi nahin sakata. kya koee apane deshavasi bhaee ko aisa ganda javab deta hai bhala?

mainne tatkal soch liya tha ki yahan apane dost ke ghar rahana hi nahin hai. aisi falatoo kee chijen dekh-dekhakar aadaten kharab hone ka dar tha bhaee. isalie main vahan se khisak liya tha. are, hamari vo bajabajati naliyon kee bat hi kuchh aur hai, videshiyon ne dekhi hi nahin hain ve shanadar nale-naliyan. kya to gandagi- rashtriy ekata ke jivant smarak hain jivant smarak. sauhard se sarabor. samarasata se otaprot. vishal khuli banhen jo chahe aasara le le. kya to janavar, kya to sharabi,kya to sanyasi. sab ka saman bhav se svagat. aisa utsah. itani uddat bhavana. theth ganv se dhur shaharon tak. mahak ka aalam ye ki 50-50 kos tak khyati kee laharen pahunche. nak par chahe kitana bhi roomal laga lo sab beasar. khule aam subah kee kuchh murgenuma baithakar kee jane vali kriyaon ke lie bhi sarvatha anukool. kahin hoti hai itani sasti bhor sangoshthi, badi-badi samasyaon ka hal isi sangoshthi se nikala hai. halanki ye bat itihas men kahin darj nahin hai lekin aam aadami se poochhakar dekh lo, bata dega.

kritaghn kahin ke. inake yahan hoti nahin hain ye chijen to hamare yahan ki aisi chijon ko lekar nak-bh sikodate firate hain. desh ganda hai. hai to hai, tum kar lo. bas doosare deshon kee gandagi men hi dilachaspi, vahan ka kooda hi dikhata hai inhen, garde par hi najar rahati hai. mujhe nahin jamate bhaiya aise log. tabhi to nali ko saf karate dekhakar mera to khoon khaul gaya. bas chalata to salon ko vahin nali men hi dhakel deta. videsh ka mamala tha apan ne bhi socha dost kisi lafade men pad jaega. nahin to sachchi men dhakel hi deta fir koee kuchh bhi kar leta, nautankee apan ko bardasht hi nahin. lekin ek bat to hai kam eemanadari se karate hain patthe, sale sare ke sare jut jate hain. jyada n-nukar nahin karate. hamare yahan to aise kamon ke lie ek ko khojane jao to sara din manate raho fir ikatthe bhi hon to aapas men hi itani kich-kich ki isase to achchha sali nali hi gandi padi rahe. so padi hi rahati hai. halanki isake pichhe hamara svabhavik dharoharon ko sanjone ka prem hai, aur nahin to kya? tabhi to hamane varshon kee mehanat se in nale-naliyon men itihas-puratatv kee kaee leyar jama kar li hain.

main bat kar raha tha ki videsh men aisa nahin hota. ek bar kuchh log dikhe ek jagah moorti bane khade the, tas se mas nahin ho rahe the. pas gaya to pata chala rashtragan baj raha tha. sab vahin par jame hue the sina tane-sir oopar uthae. ab lo batao kaise log hain sans to le lo bhaiya kahin shahid hi na ho jao. aise dikhave ke chakkar men. hamen dekho aise chakkaron men bilakul nahin padate. rashtragit baje ya gan pade hain to pade hain. kahai ka dikhava dil men hai to deshabhakt ka sailab. jab kahoge redimed nikal kar dikha denge. kya khade hone bhar se sabit ho jaegi deshabhakt. in videshiyon ke tarike inhin mamalon men to khisakele hain, sara jor dikhave men dil se kuchh nahin, bhavanaen bhad men jaen, dikhava hona chahie. karate raho dikhava. main to salon ko bas ke aage dhakel deta. kafi log the to isalie to bas rahane hi diya.

mejabani ko aadar dete hain, samane valon ko pareshani n ho, isalie danadan angreji men bolate hain. is mamale itane anuragi jiv hain ki jis desh men jaen, vahan kee bhasha men bolane ko taiyar hain, vo to vahan kee bhasha n sikh pane kee majaboori hai. anyatha to kisi gair deshavasi ke kasht se ham tatkal hi dravit ho jate hain. ek ye hain videsh men aakar bhi matribhasha men bhashan bhanj rahe hain. dekhate nahin logon ko kitani pareshani ho rahi hogi. hoe to hoe inhen kya? ye to apana matribhasha prem hi dikhate rahenge. dikhavati kahin ke. ek bar ek strit par ja raha tha. dekha ek bhikharinuma aadami sadak par hait rakhakar vayalin par anguliyan ghasite hi ja raha hai, log usake hait men not dal rahe hain. dekhate hi apane ne bhanp liya bachchoo logon ko blaik mel karake paise ainth raha hain ki dalo hait men not nahin to aise hi bhayanak vayalin baja-baja ke kan fod daloonga. ek hamare yahan ke hain, shalin nafasat bhare andaj vale, bhikharipan kee thasak lie. kahai ka gana-bajana. bhikhari hain to kam kis bat ka aur darana hi hoga to vayalin ya sangit se daraenge kya?, vaisaee n chhin lenge not?

sochate hi nahin kamane khane ka jajba rakhate to bhikhari banate kya? nakali nahin lagate ye log aapako, dekho mana mat kario nahin to fir manoonga hi nahin ki kabhi videsh gae the. han, kya kaha- lagate hain. guru, paintare badaloo, pakke deshavasi hi ho. achchha ek to itana to ye baikagraund men nakalipan bhare hain oopar se baten suno patthon kee nakali-nakali si. yoo no maee kantri. maee neshan.taip kee. abe, hamara bhi kantri, hamara bhi neshan hai. ham kabhi gate dikhate hain kya? ye kya ki bat-bat par praud karane lago. praudi log apane ko pasand hi nahin isalie apane desh kee garv se baten karate hi nahin hain ki pata nahin bhaiya samane vala desh ke bare men kya sochane lagen. isalie to desh ke bare men sari achchhi-achchhi baton ko kitabon men hi rakhate hain. bolate hai kya? jyada janana hai to kitabon men padh lo. logon se poochhoge to bechare sidhe sahaj log, ghamand ka namonishan nahin. sankoch ke mare kya achchha bata paenge desh ke bare men, jyada jor doge to aapaka samman rakhane ke lie yahan ki buraee aur shuroo kar denge. itani sadagi kahin milati hai bhala. sidhe-sade, bhole-bhale, ghamand rahit logon ka desh hai.

desh tak. yoon hi nahin dugurnon se mukti paee jati hai. achchhi-achchhi chijon kee kurbani deni padati hai. bhari prayas karana hota hai. kya tarif karoon apane deshavasiyon kee. yahan to desh ke lie samman kee bhavana tak nahin hai. ye kya ki desh ka jhanda tak lapete fir rahe hain. kyon bhaee? aisa kya samman ki jhanda tak pahan liya oopar se andar tak. hamen dekho jhanda chhoone dete hain kisi ko, sasamman chadhaya-utara fir lapet kar rakh diya. varshon tak to ham use gopaniy vastu kee tarah sarakari taur par sahejakar rakhe rahe. ab jakar kuchh faharane-vaharane kee chhoot di hai. to bhi das niyam pandrah kayade sath men bata die hain. vo to ham jara niyam-kayadon ka lihaj kar jate hain anyatha to hamara rashtraprem itana utkrisht koti ka hai ki ek bar jhanda faharaen to varshon tak yoon hi laharane den.

amerika ke bare men poochh lo tapp se bata denge. itani informeshan rakhate hain jaise hayar sekandari vahin se kiya ho. mehanati hai hamari yuva pidhi . vija jaisi kanpaliketed chij ke bare men poochh lo-ech-1,pi-1 koee sa bhi van-t-thri ho sabhi kee mukammal maloomat. poora telend amerika ko vikasit karane men laga denge. yoo no vahi vasudhaiv kutunbakam kee bhavana. fir desh ka bhi dhyan rakhate hain. videsh sanbhalenge ham aur desh ko ganjale,sanjale manjhale bhaiiya, itane sare to hain koee bhi sanbhal lega hi. videsh jakar bhi itani chinta hai desh kee , kahin dekhe hain aise log. aise hi nahin soochana aur takanik men vishv men bharatiy chhae hue hain. itani teji se tarakkee kar rahe hain bhaiiya ki mujhe to dar lagata hai ki aane vale samay men kahin naee jenareshan ko deshabhakti ke mayane bhi deshabhakti dot kom men hi nahin samajhana pade. aaj hi sanbhaliyo bhiya.

aur sudoor chin ke pradhan mantree chaoo en lai bhi is bat ke lie vivash hue ki vishv shanti ke, jivan maran ke prashn par masale par ho rahi vishv netaon kee baithak se pahale se ve khas taur par mangava kar charli chaiplin kee film dekhen aur charli ke intazar men apane ghar kee sidhiyon par khade rahen.

lekin is traimp ne apani mook vani se duniya bhar ke karodon logon se barason baras sanvad banaye rakha aur n keval apane man kee bat un tak pahunchayi, balki logon kee jivan shaili bhi badali. charli ne blaik end vhait filmen banayin lekin unhonne sabakee zindagi men itane rang bhare ki yakeen nahin hota ki ek akela vyakti aise kar sakata hai. lekin charli ne ye kam kiya aur bakhoobi kiya.

n neta, n raja, n pir, n fakeer, jo lakhon ghayalon ke jakhmon par maraham lagata ya, jinake bete behatar jivan ke nam par, insaniyat ke nam par yuddh kee aag men jhonk diye gaye the, unake parivaron ko dilasa de pata, aise vakt men hamare samane ek chhote se kad ka aadami aata hai, jisake chehare par gazab kee masoomiyat hai, aankhon men hairani hai, jisake apane sine men jalan aur aankhon men toofan hai, aur vah sabake honthon par muskan lane ka kam karata hai. is aadami ke vyaktitv ke kaee pahalu hain. vah ghumakkad, mast maula hai, bhala aadami hai, kavi hai, svapnajivi hai, akela jiv hai, hamesha romans aur romanch kee ummiden lagaye rahata hai. vah tumhen is bat kee yakeen dila dega ki vah vaigyanik hai, sangitagy hai, dyook hai, polo khiladi hai, alabatta, vah sadak par se sigareten utha kar pine vale aur kisi bachche se usakee tofi chhin lene vale se jyada kuchh nahin. aur han, yadi mauka aaye to vah kisi bhali aurat ko usake pichhavade lat bhi jama sakata hai, lekin beintaha gusse men hi. vah yah kam apane akele ke balaboote par karata hai. vah sabako hansata hai aur rulata bhi hai. ham hanse, kaee bar dil khol kar aur ham roye, asali aansuon ke sath - aapake aansuon ke sath, kyonki aap hi ne hamen aansuon ka keemati upahar diya hai.

sahi mayane men jiniyas. jiniyas shabd ko tabhi usaka sahi arth milata hai jab ise kisi aise vyakti ke sath joda jata hai jo n keval utkrisht komediyan hai balki ek lekhak, sangitakar, nirmata hai aur sabase badi bat, us vyakti men oosh ma, udarata aur mahanata hai. aap men ye sare gun vas karate hain aur isase badi bat, ki aap men vah sadagi hai jisase aapaka kad aur ooncha hota hai aur ek garamahat bhari sahaj apil ke darshan hote hain jisamen n to koee hisabi gannana hoti hai aur n hi koee prayas hi aap isake lie karate hain aur inase aap sidhe insan ke dil men pravesh karate hain. insan, jo aap hi kee tarah musibaton ka mara hai.

karodon logon ke chehare par hansi lane ke lie bahut papad belane pade. bhayankar hatashaon ke, akelepan ke daur unake jivan men aaye, parivarik aur rajanaitik morchon par ek ke bad ek musibat unake samane aayin lekin charli kabhi dige nahin. unhen apane aap par vishvas tha, apani kala kee eemanadari, apani abhivyakti kee sachchaee par vishvas tha aur sabase badi bat unakee niyat saf thi aur ve apane aap par bharosa karate the.

donon hi manch ke kalakar the lekin ye usakee man kee aavaj ke kharab hote chale jane ke karan hi tha ki mujhe panch baras kee umr men pahali bar stej par utarana pada. us rat main apani zindagi men pahali bar stej par utara tha aur man aakhiri bar. ve apani pahali manch prastuti se hi sabake chahete ban gaye aur fir unhonne pichhe mud kar nahin dekha. abhi mainne aadha hi git gaya tha ki stej par sikkon kee barasat hone lagi. mainne tatkal ghoshana kar di ki main pahale paise batoroonga aur usake bad hi gana gaoonga. is bat par aur adhik thahake lage. stej mainejar ek rumal le kar stej par aaya aur sikke batorane men meri madad karane laga. mujhe laga ki vo sikke apane pas rakhana chahata hai. mainne ye bat darshakon tak pahuncha di to thahakon ka jo daura pada vo thamane ka nam hi n le. khas taur par tab jab vah rumal liye-liye vings men jane laga aur main chintatur usake pichhe-pichhe lapaka. jab tak usane sikkon kee vo potali meri man ko nahin thama di, main stej par vapis gane ke lie nahin aaya. ab main bilkul sahaj tha. main darshakon se baten karata raha, main nacha aur mainne tarah-tarah kee nakal karake dikhayi. mainne man ke aayarish march thim kee bhi nakal karake batayi.

jo ravivar kee sham ghar par dinar ke lie nahin baith pate the, unhen bhikhamange varg ka mana jata tha aur ham usi varg men aate the. pita ke marane aur man ke pagal ho jane aur koee sthayi aadhar n hone ke karan charli ko poora bachapan abhavon men guzarana pada aur yatim khanon men rahana pada. hamara vakt kharab chal raha tha aur ham giraja gharon kee khairat par pal rahe the. man pagal khane men aur bhaee sidani apani naukari par jahaj men, charli ko dar rahata ki kahin use fir se yatim khane n bhej diya jaye, vah sara sara din makan malakin kee nigahon se bachane ke lie sadakon par mare mare firate, main laimbeth vok par aur doosari sadakon par bhookha-pyasa kek kee dukanon kee khidakiyan men jhankata chalata raha aur gay aur sooar ke mans ke garama-garam svadisht lajij pakavanon ko aur shorabe men doobe gulabi lal aaluon ko dekh-dekh kar mere munh men pani aata raha.
uchcharan par dhyan deti rahati, hamara vyakaran sudharati rahati aur hamen yah mahasoos karati rahati ki ham khas hain.

fir bhi skooli padhaee ne unhen jo kuchh sikhaya, usake bare men ve likhate hain kash, kisi ne karobari dimag istemal kiya hota, pratyek adhyayan kee uttejanapoorn prastavana padhi hoti jisane mera dimag jhakajhora hota, tathyon ke bajaye mujh men ruchi paida kee hoti, ankon kee kalabaji se mujhe aanandit kiya hota, nakshon ke prati romanch paida kiya hota, itihas ke bare men meri drishtikon vikasit kiya hota, mujhe kavita kee lay aur dhun ko bhitar utarane ke mauke diye hote to main bhi aaj vidvan ban sakata tha.

usase koee bhi doosara bachcha bilkul toot hi jata. charli kam dhandhe kee talash men galiyon men mare mare firate us vakt main aath baras ka bhi nahin huaa tha lekin ve din meri zindagi ke sabase lambe aur udasi bhare din the.

thiyetar men hi karana hai. unhonne bisiyon dhandhe kiye mujhamen dhandha karane kee jabaradast samajh thi. main hamesha karobar karane kee nayi-nayi yojanaen banane men ulajha rahata. main khali dukanon kee taraf dekhata, sochata, inamen paisa pitane ka kaun sa dhandha kiya ja sakata hai. ye sochana machhali bechane, chips bechane se le kar pansari kee dukan kholane tak hota. hamesha jo bhi yojana banati, usame khana zaroor hota. mujhe bas poonji kee hi zaroorat hoti lekin poonji hi kee samasya thi ki kahan se aaye. aakhir mainne man se kaha ki vah mera skool chhudava de aur kam talashane de.

printar ka kam kiya, khilaune banae, glas bloar ka kam kiya, doktar ke yahan kam kiya lekin in tarah-tarah ke dhandhon ko karate hue mainne sidani kee tarah is lakshy se kabhi bhi nigah nahin hatayi ki mujhe antat abhineta banana hai, isalie alag-alag kamon ke bich apane joote chamakata, apane kapadon par brash ferata, saf kolar lagata aur straind ke pas bed ford strit men blaik mor thietar ejensi men bich-bich men chakkar katata. main tab tak vahan chakkar lagata raha jab tak mere kapadon kee halat ne mujhe vahan aur jane se bilakul hi rok nahin diya.

main khushi ke mare pagal hota huaa bas men ghar pahuncha aur dil kee gaharaiyon se yah mahasoos karane laga ki mere sath kya ho gaya hai. mainne achanak hi garibi kee apani zindagi pichhe chhod di thi aur apana bahut purana sapana poora karane ja raha tha. ye sapana jisake bare men aksar man ne baten kee thin aur use main poora karane ja raha tha. ab main abhineta hone ja raha tha. main apani bhoomika ke pannon ko sahalata raha. is par naya khakee lifafa tha. yah meri ab tak kee zindagi ka sabase mahattvapoorn dastavej tha. bas kee yatra ke dauran mainne mahasoos kiya ki mainne ek bahut bada kila fatah kar liya hai. ab main jhopad patti men rahane vala namaloom sa chhokara nahin tha. ab main thietar ka ek khas aadami hone ja raha tha. mera man kiya ki main ro padoon.

ve usase jyada ke hakadar hain aur vahan ve apani vyavasayik baniya buddhi ka ek namoona dikha hi aaye the, halanki yah rashi mere lie chhappar fad lotari khulane jaisi thi fir bhi mainne yah bat apane chehare par nahin jhalakane di. mainne nimrata se kaha, sharton ke bare men main apane bhaee se salah lena chahoonga.

shuruaat men kuchh shabdon ka aadan pradan aam taur par gadahapachisi ke shabd, kuchh hi minaton ke bhitar poori jindagi ka nazariya hi badal jata hai. poori kayanat hamare sath sahanubhooti men khadi ho jati hai aur achanak hamare samane chhupi huee khushiyon ka khazana khol deti hai.

vahan sirf anamanapan, sab kuchh udasinata liye hue aur charon taraf aadami hi aadami. sirf pet bharane kee khatir kam dhandhe se jude rahana hi kafi nahin lag raha tha. zindagi naukar sarikhi ho rahi thi aur usamen kisi kism kee bandh lene vali bat nahin thi.

svapnajivi bhi aur udas bhi. main zindagi se khafa bhi rahata tha aur use pyar bhi karata tha. kala shabd kabhi bhi mere bheje men ya meri shabd sampada men nahin ghusa. thiyetar mere lie rozi-roti ka sadhan tha, isase jyada kuchh nahin.

apane aap se asantusht? main ravivaron ko akela bhatakata ghoomata rahata, parkon men baj rahe baindon ko sun ka dil bahalata. n to main apani khud kee kampani jhel pata tha aur n hi kisi aur kee hi. aur tabhi ek khas bat ho gayi - mujhe p yar ho gaya. mujhe achanak do badi-badi bhoori shararat se chamakati aankhon ne jaise bandh liya. ye aankhen ek dubale hirani jaise, sanche men dhale chehare par tangi huee thin aur bandh lene vala usaka bhara poora chehara, khoobasoorat dant, ye sab dekhane ka asar bijali jaisa tha. lekin haitti ko ji jan se chahane ke bavajood unhonne apani chauthi mulakat men hi usake kharab mood ko dekh kar faisala kar liya ki vah unase pyar nahin karati. aur sanbandh tod baithe. mera khyal yahi hai ki ham vida ho jayen aur fir kabhi dobara ek dooje se n milen. mainne kaha aur sochata raha ki usakee pratikriya kya hogi.

vahan par mere avasar ab bandhe bandhaye rah gaye the. aadhi-adhoori padhaee ke chalate agar main myoojik hol ke kamediyan ke roop men fel ho jata to mere pas majadoori ke kam karane ke bhi bahut hi simit aasar hote.

filmon aur manoranjan ke sarvadhik safal vyaktitv ke roop men poori duniya ke logon ke dil par raj karana tha to vahan se jana bhi unake lie sabase dukhad ghatana ban kar aayi. ve khuli anant aakash kee khuli hava kee talash men amerika gaye the aur aakhir khuli hava kee talash men mazaboor ho kar vahan se kooch karana pada aur umr ke chhathe dashak men svitazaralaind ko apana ghar banana pada.

har fild men aur har umr ke the. ve amooman har desh ke rajyadhyaksha, rashtrapati, pradhan mantree se mitrata ke star par milate the. ve unakee filmen dikhaye jane ka aagrah karate, unhen rajakeey samman dete. unake ghar par aate aur unake sath khana khate. ve gandhi ji se bhi mile the aur neharoo ji se bhi. gandhi ji se ve bahut prabhavit hue the. unhonne barnard sho ke ghar par kaee bar khana khaya tha aur aainstin kaee bar charli ke ghar aa chuke the. jivan ke har kshetr ke log unake mitr the main doston ko vaise hi pasand karata hoon jaise sangit ko pasand karata hoon. shayad mujhe kabhi bhi bahut jyada doston kee zaroorat nahin rahi - aadami jab kisi oonchi jagah par pahunch jata hai to dost chunane men koee vivek kam nahin karata. alabatta ve manate the ki zaroorat ke vakt kisi dost kee madad karana aasan hota hai lekin aap hamesha itane khushanasib nahin hote ki use apana samay de payen.
amir tha aur badi hasti tha. isake bavazood main nyoo yark men akela aur pareshan hal ghoom raha tha.

oona o nil se unakee chauthi shadi sarvadhik safal rahi. halanki donon kee umr men 36 baras ka fark tha aur oona unakee chhattis baras tak, yani aajivan unakee patni rahin. ve apane jivan ke antim 36 baras usi kee vajah se achchhi tarah se guzar sake. pichhale bis baras se main janata hoon ki khushi kya hoti hai. main kismat ka dhani raha ki mujhe itani shanadar bivi mili. kash, main is bare men aur jyada likh pata lekin isase pyar juda huaa hai aur parafaikt pyar sari kunthaon se jyada sundar hota hai kyonki ise jitana jyada abhivyakt kiya jaye, usase adhik hi hota hai. main oona ke sath rahata hoon aur usake charitr kee gaharaee aur saundary mere samane hamesha naye naye roopon men aate rahate hain.

tathy batate hain ki negari se unakee pandrah din ke bhitar hi do bar sagaee huee thi aur tooti thi. charli ne apani aatm katha men apani sabhi santanon ka bhi ullekh nahin kiya hai. isakee vajah ye bhi ho sakati hai ki ye aatm katha 1960 men likhi gayi thi jab ve 71 baras ke the aur oona ne kul mila kar unhen aath santanon ka upahar diya tha aur unakee aathavin santan tab huee thi jab charli 73 baras ke the aur oona 37 baras kee.

apani aatm katha men charli ne apane saiks sanbandhon ke bare men kafi khul kar charcha kee hai har doosare vyakti kee tarah mere jivan men bhi saiks ke daur aate-jate rahe. lekin unaka manana hai mere khyal se to saiks se charitr ko samajhane men ya use samane lane men shayad hi koee madad milati ho. aur ki thand, bhookh aur garibi kee sharm se vyakti ke manovigyan par kahin adhik asar pad sakata hai. jo paristhitiyan aapako saiks kee taraf le jati hain, ve mujhe jyada romanchak lagati hain.

ek jivit vyakti hoon. daraasal, jab main ve kapade pahan leta aur traimp ka bana dharan kar leta to mujhe tarah tarah ke mazakiya khyal aane lagate jinake bare men main kabhi soch bhi nahin sakata tha. choonki mere kapade mere charitr se mel kha rahe the, mainne tabhi aur usi vakt hi tay kar liya ki bhale hi kuchh bhi ho jaye, main apane isi dhab ko banaye rakhoonga.

sangitakar, abhineta, nirdeshak, sanpadak, nirmata aur bad men to vitarak bhi. jald hi unakee tooti bolane lagi. lekin ek mazedar bat thi unake vyaktitv men. kisi bhi film ke pradarshan se pahale ve behad narvas ho jate. unakee raton kee nind ud jati. pahale sho men ve thiyetar ke andar bahar hote rahate, lekin aashchary kee bat, ki sab kuchh thik ho jata aur har film pahale kee filmon kee tulana men aur safal hoti.
kailektar ke khilaune aur moortiyan sabhi dipartament storon aur dragastoron men bik rahe the. jigafeld ladakiyan charli chaiplin git ga rahi thin.
aur thi mere samane ek dostani duniya. thode se hi arase men main karodapati ho jaoonga. main kabhi is sab kee kalpana bhi nahin kar sakata tha.

kala, sanvad adayagi, kaimara engal, nirdeshan, thiyetar, vigyan, paramanu bam, manav manovigyan, machhali marana, samyavad, samajavad, poonjivad, yuddh, amiri, garibi, rajaniti, sahity, sangit, kala, dharm, dosti, bhoot pret kuchh bhi to aisa nahin bacha hai jis par unhonne apani visheshagy vali ray n jahir kee ho. komedi kee paribhasha dete hue ve kahate hain, kisi bhi komedi men sabase mahattvapoorn hota hai nazariya. lekin har bar nazariya dhoondhana aasan bhi nahin hota. kisi komedi ko sochane aur use nirdeshit karane se jyada dimag kee satarkata kisi aur kam men zaroori nahin hoti. abhinay ke bare men ve kahate hain mainne kabhi bhi abhinay ka adhyayan nahin kiya hai lekin ladakapan men ye mera saubhagy raha ki mujhe mahan abhinetaon ke yug men rahane ka mauka mila aur mainne unake gyan aur anubhav ke vistar ko hasil kiya.

unakee abhinay kala par, unakee filmon par, unakee shaili par aur unake traimp par duniya bhar kee bhashaon men shayad ek hazar se bhi jyada kitaben likhi gayi hain. jo bhi unake jivan men aaya, ya nahin bhi aaya, usane charli par likha.

vishv vikhyat vaigyanik, lekhak aur rajanayik unase milane ke lie samay mangate hon aur usake aas pas vilasita kee aisi duniya ho jisakee ham aur aap kalpana bhi n kar sakate hon. jivan ke ye donon paksh charli spensar chaiplin ne dekhe aur bharapoor dekhe.
amerika dvara un par ye shak kiya jana ki ve khud kamyoonist hain aur agar nahin bhi hain to kam se kam unase sahanubhooti to rakhate hi hain aur unakee parti lain par chalate hain.

us desh ke lie itana kuchh karane ke bad jab unhen beaabaroo ho kar apana jama jamaya sansar chhod kar ek naye ghar kar talash men svitzaralaind jana pada to ve behad vyathit the. un par ye aarop bhi lagaya gaya ki ve amerikee nagarik kyon nahin bane. aapravas vibhag ke adhikariyon ke savalon ko javab dete hue ve kahate hain, kya aap janate hain ki main is sari musibat men kaise fansa? aapakee sarakar par ahasan karake! roos men aapake rajadoot mistar josef devis ko roosi yuddh rahat kee or se sain fransisko men bhashan dena tha, lekin ain mauke par unaka gala kharab ho gaya aur aapakee sarakar ke ek uchch adhikari ne mujhase poochha ki kya main unake sthan par bolane kee meharabani karoonga aur tab se main isamen apani gardan fansaye baitha hoon.

jisane diya hi diya hai aur badale men sirf vahi manga jo usaka hak tha. usane hansi banti aur badale men pyar bhi paya aur aansoo bhi paye. usane kabhi bhi naraz ho kar ye nahin kaha ki aap galat hain. use apane aap par, apane faisalon par, apani kala par aur apani abhivyakti shaili par vishvas tha aur us vishvas ke prati sachchi pratibaddhata bhi thi. vah apane paksh men kisi se bhi ladane bhidane kee himmat rakhata tha kyonki vah janata tha ki sach usake sath hai. usamen parafaikshan ke lie itani zid thi ki sitilaits ke 70 sekend ke ek drishy ke lie panch din tak ritek leta raha. apane kam ke prati usamen itani nishtha thi ki mook filmon ka yug bit jane ke 4 baras bad bhi vah lakhon dolar laga kar mook film banata hai kyonki usaka manana hai ki har tarah ke manoranjan kee zaroorat hoti hai. vah sach che arthon men jiniyas tha aur ye bat aaj bhi is tathy se siddh ho jati hai ki filmon ke itane adhik parivartanon se guzar kar yahan tak aa pahunchane ke bad bhi sattar assi baras pahale bani usakee filmen hamen aaj bhi gudagudati hai. us vyakti ke pas mas apil ka jaduee chirag tha.
n padha, n likha, bas charli baba ke sanidhy men baitha ye kam karata raha. unhen apane bhitar utarata raha.

aavashyak laga, apani taraf se futanot diye hain. ek bat aur ki beshak charli ne vidhivat skooli shiksha nahin payi thi, lekin unaka bhasha gyan adbhut hai. unhonne n keval angrezi ke, balki french, italvi, grik aur jarman sandarbh bhi khoob diye hain. bhasha unakee shanadar angrezi kee misal hai.

lekin mitron kee shubhakamanaon ke sath main ise poora kar paya, mujhe isaka santosh hai. isake kuchh ansh shree nikhare ne taip kiye hain, kuchh pannon kee dikteshan mere chhote bete abhigyan ne li hai, hart kren kee kavita ka saras anuvad meri telifon mitr dipti ne kiya hai. in sabaka aabhar.

pul se shuroo karate hue ek nayi sadak banayi gayi thi jisase braitan tak ka sidha rasta khul gaya tha. isaka natija yah huaa ki keningatan rod par, jahan mainne apane bachapan ka adhikansh vakt guzara hai, kuchh bahut hi shanadar ghar dekhe ja sakate the. ye ghar vastukala ke utkrisht namoone the. inake samane kee taraf lohe kee gril vali balkani hoti thi. ho sakata hai ki un gharon men rahane valon ne kabhi apani koch men baith kar braitan jate hue jorj IV ko dekha hoga.

kuchh ghar aise bhi bache rahe jin par vakt kee mar nahin padi aur unamen doktar, vakeel, safal vyapari aur natakon vagairah men kam karane vale kalakar rahate aaye. ravivar ke din, subah ke vakt keningatan rod ke donon taraf ke kisi n kisi ghar ke bahar aap kasi huee ghodi aur gadi dekh sakate the jo vahan rahane vale natak kalakar ko nauravud ya meratan jaisi dasiyon mil door kee jagah par le jane ke lie taiyar khadi ho. vapasi men ye keningatan rod par alag-alag tarah ke sharab gharon vhait haus, da harns, aur da tainkard par rukate hue aate the.

aksar tainkard ke bahar khada behatarin poshaken pahane in rangile chamakeele mahanubhavon ko utarate aur bhitar launj bar men jate dekha karata tha. vahan natakon ke kalakar aapas men milate-julate the. ravivar ke dinon ka unaka yahi shagal huaa karata tha. dopahar ke bhojan ke lie ghar jane se pahale ve apana ek aakhiri paig yahan liya karate the. ve kitane bhavy lagate the. charakhane ke soot pahane aur bhoore felt hait date, apani hire kee angoothiyon aur taipinon ke lashakare marate. ravivar ko dopahar do baje pab band ho jata tha aur vahan maujood sab log bahar jhund bana kar khade ho jate aur ek-doosare ko vida dene se pahale man bahalav men vakt zaya karate. main un sabako hasarat bhari nigahon se dekha karata aur khush hota kyonki unamen se kuchhek bevakoofi bhari akad ke sath dingen hankate.

us din man khidakee par baithi ekatak bahar dekh rahi thi. vah meri taraf mudi aur kamazori se muskurayi. kamare kee hava damaghontoo thi aur kamara barah varg fut se thoda-sa hi bada raha hoga. ye aur bhi chhota lagata tha aur usakee dhaluaan chhat kafi nichi pratit hoti thi. divar ke sath sata kar rakhi gayi mez par joothi pleton aur chay ke pyalon ka ambar laga huaa tha. nichali divar se sata ek lohe ka palang tha jis par man ne safed rang pota huaa tha. palang aur khidakee ke bich kee jagah par ek chhoti si aag jhanjhari thi. palang ke ek sire par ek purani-si aaram kursi thi jise khol dene par charapaee ka kam liya ja sakata tha. is par mera bhaee sidani sota tha lekin filahal vah samudr par gaya huaa tha.

hamesha khush rahane vali aur yuva mahila thi. vah abhi saintis kee bhi nahin huee thi. vah is vahiyat duchhatti ko bhi chamaka kar suvidhapoorn bana sakati thi. khasakar sardiyon kee subah ke vakt jab vah mujhe mera nashta bistar men hi de deti aur jab main so kar uthata to vah chhota-sa kamara safaee se damak raha hota. thodi-si aag jal rahi hoti aur khoonti par garama-garam ketali rakhi hoti aur jangale ke pas haiddar ya blotar machhali garam ho rahi hoti aur vah mere lie tost bana rahi hoti. man kee ullasit kar dene vali mauzoodagi, kamare ka sukhad mahaul, chini mitti kee ketali men dale jate ubalate pani kee chhal-chhal karati aavaz, aur main aise vakt apana saptahik komik padh raha hota. shant ravivar kee subah ke ye durlabh aanandadayak pal hote.

kiston kee adayagi samay par n kiye jane ke karan le jayi ja chukee thi ye koee nayi bat nahin thi aur main dans ke path padha kar panch shinling hafte ka jo yogadan diya karata tha, vah bhi achanak khatm ho gaye the.

aise bhi din hote jab main ghar par hi rahata aur man mere lie chay banati, sooar kee charbi men mere lie bred tal deti. mujhe ye bred bahut achchhi lagati. fir vah mujhe ek ghante tak kuchh n kuchh padh kar sunati. vah bahut hi behatarin path karati thi. aur tab main man ke is sang-sath ke sukh ke rahasy ka parichay pata aur tab mujhe pata chalata ki main maikkarthi parivar ke sath jitana sukh pata, usase jyada mainne man ke sath rah kar pa liya hai.

vah mudi aur ulahane bhari nigah se meri taraf dekhane lagi. use is halat men dekh kar mera kaleja munh ko aa gaya. vah bahut kamazor tatha mariyal-si ho gayi thi tatha usakee aankhon men gahari pida nazar aa rahi thi. main akathaniy dukh se bhar utha. main tay nahin kar pa raha tha ki ghar par rah kar usake aasapas hi bana rahoon ya fir is sab se door chala jaoon. usane meri taraf taras khati nigah se dekha,tum lapak kar maikkarthi parivar ke yahan chale kyon nahin jate, usane kaha tha.
tum bhag kar maikkarthi ke yahan hi jao aur rat ka khana bhi vahin khana. aaj ghar men khane ko kuchh bhi nahin hai.

han.han tum daud jao. halanki main usake aage gidagidata raha ki vah mujhe ghar par hi apane pas rahane de lekin vah mere jane par hi adi rahi. is tarah se main aparadh bodh kee bhavana liye chala gaya. vah usi manahoos duchhatti kee khidakee par baithi rahi. use is bat ka zara sa bhi guman nahin tha ki aane vale dinon men durbhagy kee kaun-si potali usake lie khulane vali hai.

velavarth men 16 aprail 1889 ko rat aath baje huaa tha. isake turant bad, ham, sent skvayar, sent jorj rod, laimbeth men rahane chale gaye the. meri man ka kahana hai ki meri duniya khushiyon se bhari huee thi. hamari paristhitiyan kamobesh thik-thak thin. ham tin kamaron ke ghar men rahate the jo suruchipoorn tarike se saje hue the. meri shuruaati smritiyon men se ek to ye hai ki man roz rat ko thiyetar jaya karati thi aur mujhe aur sidani ko bahut hi pyar se aaramadayak bistar men sahej kar lita jati thi aur hamen naukarani kee dekh-rekh men chhod jati thi. sadhe tin baras kee meri duniya men sab kuchh sanbhav tha agar sidani, jo mujhase char baras bada tha, hath kee safaee ke karatab dikha sakata tha aur sikka nigal kar apane sir ke pichhe se nikal kar dikha sakata tha to main bhi thik aise hi kar ke dikha sakata tha. isalie main adh peni ka ek sikka nigal gaya aur mazabooran man ko doktar bulavana pada.

aankhen bainjani nili aur lambe, halke bhoore bal. bal itane lambe ki vah aasani se un par baith sakati thi. sidani aur main apani man ko bahut chahate the. halanki vah asadharan khoobasoorat nahin thi fir bhi vah hamen svarg kee kisi apsara se kam nahin lagati thi. jo log use janate the unhonne mujhe bad men bataya tha ki vah sundar aur aakarshak thi aur usamen samane vale ko bandh lene vale saundary ka jadoo tha. ravivar ke sair-sapate ke lie hamen achchhe kapade pahanana use bahut achchha lagata tha. vah sidani ko lambi pataloon ke sath chaude kalar vala soot pahanati, aur mujhe nili makhamali pataloon aur usase mel khate nile dastane. is tarah ke mauke aatmatushti ke utsav hote jab ham keningatan rod par itarate firate.

rivalving tebal par ghoom jatin. jab man ke khate-pite din the to ham bhi vestaminstar rod par raha karate the. vahan ka mahaul dil khush karane vala aur dostana hota. vahan shanadar dukanen, restaran aur sangit sadan the. pul ke thik samane kone par falon kee dukan ranginiyon se bhari hoti. bahar kee taraf taratib se rakhe gaye santaron, sebon, nashapati aur kelon ke piramid saje hote. isake thik viparit, samane kee taraf nadi ke us par sansad kee shant dhoosar imaraten nazar aatin.

meri mansthitiyon ka aur mere jagaran ka landan tha. vasant men laimbeth kee smritiyan - chhoti moti ghatanaen aur chizen. man ke sath ghoda bas men oopar ja kar baithana aur pas se guzarate lilak ke darakhton ko chhoone kee koshish karana. tarah-tarah ke rangon kee bas tikaten, santare ke rang kee, hari, nili, gulabi aur doosare rangon kee. jahan basen aur tramen rukati thin, vahan futapath par un tikaton ka bikhara hona. mujhe vestaminstar pul ke kone par fool bechane vali gulabi chehare vali ladakiyan yad aati hain jo kot ke batan men lagane vale fool banaya karati thin. unakee daksh ungaliyan teji se gote aur kinari ke farn banati chalatin. taze pani chhidake gulabon kee bhigi-bhigi khushaboo, jo mujhe betarah udas kar jati thi. aur vo udas kar dene vale ravivar aur pile chehare vale mata-pita aur unake bachche jo vestaminstar pul par pavan chakkee ke khilaune tatha rangin gubbare liye ghisatate chalate. aur fir paini stimar jo haule se pul ke niche se jate samay apane fanel niche kar lete the. mujhe lagata hai is tarah kee chhoti-chhoti ghatanaon se meri aatma ka janm huaa tha.

man ke sath vahan ke slaid sho dekhana, lapaton men muskurati aurat ka jivit sir dekhana, shi dekhana, chh peni kee bhagyashali lotari, sarapraiz paiket uthane ke lie man ka mujhe ek bahut bade burade ke dram tak oopar karana aur us paiket men se ek kaindi ka nikalana jo bajati nahin thi aur ek khilaune vale brooch ka nikalana. aur fir kaintarabari myoojik hol men ek bar jana jahan lal aaramadayak sit par panv pasar kar baithana aur pita ko abhinay karate hue dekhana.

man aur usake thiyetar ke aur sathiyon ke sath chala ja raha hoon. unakee chal men rama tatha hansi-khushi men khush. hamara bigul bajane vala apani shekhi men hamen keningatan rod se ghode kee saj-sajja kee sumadhur run jhun aur ghodon kee tapon kee sangitamay aavaz ke sath liye ja raha tha.

roye ja rahi thi aur bar-bar aarmas trang ka nam le rahi thi - aarmastrang ne ye kaha aur aarmastrang ne vo kaha. aarmastrang jangali hai. man kee is tarah kee uttejana hamane pahale nahin dekhi thi aur yah itani tej thi ki mainne rona shuroo kar diya. main itana roya ki mazabooran man ko mujhe god men uthana pada aur dilasa deni padi. kuchh baras bad hi mujhe us dopahari ke mahattv ka pata chal paya tha. man adalat se lauti thi. vahan usane mere pita par bachchon ke bharan poshan ka kharcha-pani n dene kee vajah se mukadama thok rakha tha aur badakismati se mamala usake paksh men nahin ja raha tha. aarmastrang mere pita ka vakeel tha.
dikkat sirf ek hi thi ki ve pite bahut the. man ke anusar yahi un donon ke bich jhagade kee jad thi.
tumhara irada kya hai aur turant javab do? to man ne vapasi tar bheja tha,nach, gana, partiyan aur mauj-maza, darling!

jo ek aairish mochi the, kaunti kork, aayaralaind se aaye the. unake gal surkh sebon kee tarah lal the. unake sir par balon ke safed guchchhe the. unakee vaisi safed dadhi thi jaisi vhislar ke potret men karlail kee thi. ve kaha karate the ki rashtriy aandolan ke dinon men pulis se chhipane-chhipane ke chakkar men ve gile nam kheton men sote rahe. is karan se unake ghutanon men hamesha ke lie dard baith gaya aur is karan ve dohare ho kar chalate the. ve aakhir landan men aa kar bas gaye the aur apane lie eest len velavarth men jooton kee marammat ka kam-dhandha talash liya tha.

man kee chhoti bahan, bhi stej kee adakara thi. lekin ham usake bare men bahut hi kam janate the. isaka karan yah tha ki vah aksar hamari zindagi men se aati-jati rahati thi. vah dekhane men bahut aakarshak thi aur gussail svabhav kee thi isalie man se usakee kam hi patati thi. usaka kabhi-kabhar aana achanak chhote-mote tante men hi khatm hota tha ki man ne kuchh n kuchh ulata sidha kah diya hota tha ya kar diya hota tha.

lekin bhayankar garibi ke dinon men main use is bat ke lie kosa karata tha ki vah itani shanadar zindagi kahe ko chhod aayi thi. vah hans deti aur kaha karati ki main in chizon ko samajhane kee umr se bahut kam hoon aur mujhe is bare men itana nahin sochana chahiye.

usamen koee kaduvahat nahin hoti thi. isase mujhe shak hone lagata tha ki vah khud bhi unake pyar men gahare-gahare doobi huee thi. kabhi to vah unake bare men bahut sahanubhooti ke sath bat karati to kabhi unakee sharabakhori kee lat aur hinsak pravritti ke bare men bataya karati thi. bad ke barason men jab bhi vah mujhase khafa hoti, vah hikarat se kahati,too bhi apane bap kee hi tarah kisi din apane aapako gatar men khatm kar dalega.

chalataoo-sa thiyetar tha jo jyadatar faujiyon ke lie khel dikhata tha. ve log ujadd kism ke log hote the aur unhen bhadakane ya ochhi harakaton par utar aane ke lie mamooli-sa karan hi kafi hota tha. eldarashot men natakon men kam karane valon ke lie vahan ek hafta bhi guzarana bhayankar tanav se guzarana hota tha.

main us vakt vings men khada huaa tha jab pahale to man kee aavaz fati aur fir fusafusahat men badal gayi. shrotaon ne thahake lagana shuroo kar diye aur anap-shanap gane lage aur kutte billiyon kee aavajen nikalana shuroo kar diya. sab kuchh aspasht-sa tha aur main thik se samajh nahin pa raha tha ki ye sab kya chal raha hai. lekin shor-sharaba badhata hi chala gaya aur mazabooran man ko stej chhod kar aana pada. jab vah vings men aayi to buri tarah se vyathit thi aur stej mainejar se bahas kar rahi thi. stej mainejar ne mujhe man kee sakhiyon ke aage abhinay karate dekha tha. vah man se shayad yah kah raha tha ki usake sthan par mujhe stej par bhej de.

vah thiyetar kee apani sakhiyon se kabhi-kabhar hi mil pati. usakee vah duniya ab chhoo mantar ho chukee thi aur usakee ab yaden hi bachi thin. aisa lagata tha mano ham hamesha se hi is tarah ke dayaniy halat men rahate aaye the. bich ka ek baras to takalifon ke poore jivan kal kee tarah laga tha. ham ab beraunak dhundhalake kamare men rahate the. kam-dham talashana bahut hi doobhar tha aur man ko stej ke alava kuchh aata-jata nahin tha, isase usake hath aur bandh jate the. vah chhote kad kee, lality liye bhavuk mahila thi. vah viktoriyan yug kee aisi bhayankar vikat paristhitiyon se joojh rahi thi jahan amiri aur garibi ke bich bahut badi khaee thi. garib-guraba auraton ke pas hath ka kam karane, mehanat majoori karane ke alava aur koee chara nahin tha ya fir thi dukanon vagairah men had-tod gulami. kabhi-kabhar use narsing ka kam mil jata tha lekin is tarah ke kam bhi bahut durlabh hote aur ye bhi bahut hi kam arase ke lie hote. isake bavajood vah kuchh n kuchh jugad kar hi leti. vah thiyetar ke lie apani poshaken khud siya karati thi isalie sine-pirone ke kam men usaka hath bahut achchha tha. is tarah se vah charch ke logon kee kuchh poshaken si kar kuchhek shiling kama hi leti thi. lekin ye kuchh shiling ham tinon ke guzare ke lie nakafi hote. pita ji kee darookhori ke karan unhen thiyetar men kam milana aniyamit hota chala gaya aur is tarah har hafte milane vala unaka das shiling ka bhugatan bhi aniyamit hi rahata.
doosari abhinetriyon kee bhi nakal dikhati jinhen usane tathakathit vaidh thiyetaron men kam karate dekha tha.

sheron ko khana khilane ke lie mand vale pinjare men jati hai. vah hamen vilsan bairat kee oonchi pop jaisi aavaj men nakal karake dikhati. vah chhote kad ka aadami tha isalie panch inch oonchi hil vale joote pahan kar ghoshana karatayah eesaiyat kya hai, main nahin janata lekin main itana zaroor janata hoon ki.ki yadi eesaiyat ne marsiya jaisi auraten banayi hain to rom, nahin, jagat hi isake lie pavitratam hoga. is ansh ko hasy kee jhalak ke sath karake dikhati lekin usamen bairet kee pratibha ke prati sarahana bhav jaroor hota.

unhen pahachanane, man dene men usaka koee sani nahin tha. chahe fir vah nayika ailen teri ho, ya myoojik hol kee jo elvin, vah unakee kala kee vyakhya karati. vah takanik kee barik janakari rakhati thi aur thiyetar ke bare men aise vyakti kee tarah bat karati thi jo thiyetar ko pyar karane vale hi kar sakate hain.

vah yad karati samrat nepoliyan ke jivan ka koee prasang dabe panv apane pustakalay men kisi kitab kee talash men jana aur marshal ney dvara raste men gher liya jana. man ye donon hi bhoomikaen ada karati lekin hamesha hasy ka put le kar, mahashay, mujhe ijazat dijiye ki main aapake liye ye kitab la doon. mera kad ooncha hai. aur nepoliyan yah kahate hue khafa hote hue gurraya ooncha ya lamba?
is bachchi ko koee nam do varana main ise zamin par patak doongi. aur samrat charls hadabadi men sahamat ho jate hain, thik hai, thik hai, da da k aof albans.

abhinay kar rahi thi, aur apane atulaniy tarike se usakee vyakhya kar rahi thi. vah garibon aur masoom bachchon ke prati yishoo masih ke prem aur daya ke bare men bata rahi thi. shayad usakee sanvedanaen mere bukhar ke karan thin, lekin usane jis shanadar aur man ko chhoo lene vale dhang se yishoo ke naye arth samajhaye vaise mainne n to aaj tak sune aur n hi dekhe hi hain. man unakee sahishnuta aur samajh ke bare men bata rahi thi usane us mahila ke bare men bataya jisase pap ho gaya tha aur use bhid dvara patthar mar kar saza di jani thi, aur unake prati yishoo ke shabd aap men se jisane kabhi pap n kiya ho vahi aage aa kar sabase pahala patthar mare.

mujhe is aadami men koee kharabi hi nazar nahin aati. tab man ne bataya ki kis tarah se un logon ne yishoo ko nirvastr kar dala tha aur use zalil kiya tha aur usake sir par kanton ka taj pahana diya tha, usaka mazak udaya tha aur usake munh par ye kahate hue thooka tha, o yahoodiyon ke raja .

aaj tum mere sath svarg men hovoge, aur kros se apani man kee or dekhate hue yishoo ne kaha tha, man, apane bete ko dekho. aur unake antim, marate vakt kee pida bhari karah, mere param pita, aapane mujhe kshama kyon nahin kiya?
man kah rahi thi, ve manavata se kitane bhare hue the. ham sab kee tarah unhen bhi sandeh jhelana pada.

yishoo chahate hain ki pahale tum jio aur apane bhagy ko yahin poora karo. usane kaha tha. okle strit ke us tahakhane ke us andhere kamare men man ne mujhe us jyoti se bhar diya tha jise vishv ne aaj tak jana hai aur jisane poori duniya ko ek se badh kar ek katha tatv vale sahity aur natak diye hain pyar, daya aur manavata.
uchcharan par dhyan deti rahati, hamara vyakaran sudharati rahati aur hamen yah mahasoos karati rahati ki ham khas hain.

main apani agyanata ke chalate aur bachapane men man se kahata ki vah fir se stej par jana shuroo kyon nahin kar deti. man muskurati aur kahati ki vahan ka jivan nakali aur jhootha hai aur ki is tarah ke jivan men rahane se ham jaldi hi eeshvar ko bhool jate hain. isake bavazood vah jab bhi thiyetar kee bat karati to vah apane aapako bhool jati aur utsah se bhar uthati. yadon kee galiyon men utarane ke bad vah fir se maun ke gahare koone men utar jati aur apane suee dhage ke kam men apane aapako bhula deti. main bhavuk ho jata kyonki main janata tha ki ham ab us shano-shaukat vali zindagi ka hissa nahin rahe the. tab man meri taraf dekhati aur mujhe akela pa kar mera hausala badhati.

isake alava, ye kitana khas kism ka lag raha hai. man ka samajhane-bujhane ka tarika itana shanadar tha ki sidani aaj din tak nahin samajh paya hai ki vah man ke fusalane par vah kot pahanane ko aakhir taiyar hi kaise ho gaya tha. lekin usane kot pahana tha. us kot kee vajah se aur man ke oonchi hil ke saindilon ko kat-chhant kar banaye gaye jooton se sidani ke skool men kaee jhagade hue. use sab ladake chhedate,josef aur usaka rang biranga kot? aur main, man kee purani lal lambi jurabon men se kat-koot kar banayi gayi juraben lagata jaise unamen pliten dali gayi hain. pahan kar jata to bachche chhedate,aa gaye sar fransis drek.

soop kee tikaton ke sahare din kat rahe the aur madad ke lie aaye parsalon ke sahare ji rahe the. isake bavajood, sidani skool ke ghanton ke bich akhabar bechata, aur beshak usaka yogadan oont ke munh men jira hi hota, ye us khairat ke saman men kuchh to jodata hi tha. lekin har sankat men hamesha koee n koee klaimeks bhi chhupa hota hai. is mamale men ye klaimeks bahut sukhad tha.

chay kee patti kee patti abhi bhi usake sir par bandhi thi, sidani us andhiyare kamare men hanfata huaa aaya aur akhabar bistar par fenkata huaa chillaya,mujhe ek batuaa mila hai. usane batuaa man ko de diya. jab man ne batuaa khola to usane dekha, usamen chandi aur sone ke sikke bhare hue the. man ne turant use band kar diya aur uttejana se vapis apane bistar par dhah gayi.

ek khali jagah par usane batuaa khol kar dekha aur usamen chandi aur tanbe ke sikkon ka dher paya. usane bataya ki usaka dil balliyon uchhal raha tha aur vah bina paise gine hi ghar kee taraf bhagata chala aaya.
alabatta, man ke vishvas ne turant hi ise hava de di ki eeshvar ne ise hamare lie ek varadan ke roop men oopar se bheja hai.

main nahin janata. lekin vah ek hafte ke bhitar hi thik ho gayi. jaise hi vah thik huee, ham chhutti manane ke lie samudr ke dakshin tat par chale gaye. man ne hamen oopar se niche tak naye kapade pahanaye.

usakee gulabi aur nili dolachiyan aur us par lakadi ke belache. usake satarangi tanboo aur chhatariyan, laharon par itarati kashtiyan, aur oopar tat par ek tarah karavat le kar aaram faramati kashtiyan jinamen samudri sevar kee gandh rachi-basi thi aur ve tat? in sabakee yaden abhi bhi mere man men charam uttejana se bhari huee lagati hain.

purane machhuaaron ke ganv ke avashesh hi dikh rahe the jisamen purane dhab kee dukanen najar aa rahi thin. isamen atit kee dhundhali si sarasarahat chhupi huee thi. shayad yah samudri sevar kee aur tar kee mahak thi.
to usane man ko salah di ki use laimbeth ke daftar ke pradhikariyon kee madad leni chahiye taki apane aur apane bachchon ke palan-poshan ke lie pita par madad ke lie dabav dala ja sake.

panjab, rajasthan aur gujarat men manaya jata hai. is parv par vivahit auraten apane pati kee lambi umr ke liye poore din ka vrat rakhati hain aur sham ko chand dekhakar pati ke hath se jal pikar vrat samapt karati hain. is din bhagavan shiv, parvati ji, ganesh ji, rkatikey ji aur chand kee pooja karati hain.

chahe vo pati ya sasural valon kee taraf se ho, ye donon auraten aapas men bat kar sakati hain ya ek doosare kee madad kar sakati hain. ek dulhan aur usakee dharm-sakhi dharm-bahan ke bich is mitrata sambandh ko ek parv ke roop men manaya jane laga.

moolatah karava chauth is dharm-sakhi dharm-bahan ke rishte ko fir se navin roop dene aur manane ka salana parv hai. ye us samay kee ek sarvashreshth samajik aur sanskritik mahanata thi jab duniya men batachit ke tarikon kee kami thi aur aana-jana itana aasan nahin tha.

tumhara pati fir se jinda ho jayega lekin isake liye tumhen karava chauth ka vrat kathorata se sanpann karana hoga. tabhi tumhara pati fir se jivit hoga. usake bad rani viravati ne karava chauth ka vrat poori vidhi se sanpann kiya aur apane pati ko dubara prapt kiya.

mahanatam safalata kaise paen taip kee kitabon kee badh aaee huee hai. aisi hi ek kitab mere hath lag gaee hai. usake lekhak aur usane sade siddhanton ko mainne padha, manavata ke itihas men yada-kada hi itana mahan kam itani saral bhash men huaa hoga, aisa mera manana hai. halanki jab aap khud padh lenge to man lenge ki main kitana sahi kah raha hoon. mahatvakankshiyon ke hitarth alankar rahit yah kitab itani saral aur lokal bhash men likhi gaee hai ki aapako lagega ki jaise aap apane aasapas ke hi kisi vyakti ka sansmaran sun rahe hon. yahi is kitab ke lekhak aur usake siddhant kee khasiyat hai. khair, main yon poori kahani suna doon aap hi padh len, lekhak ka preranadayi jivan aur unaka kalajayi siddhant kee dastan.

lekin sara kolej unhen pro. tiem sahab ke nam se janata hai, thik usi tarah jis tarah ajit ko sara shahar layan ke nam se janata tha. tejaram moti prakash morale nahin balki tangadimara morale urf pro. tiem sahab. unake mainejament kaushal ke kayal, medha se aatankit poore kolej ke log, unakee karagujariyon ke jivant kaisit, batan dabaya kisse shuroo, kisse bhi kya akhand kisse, ek kisse men hi tin sahayak kisse nikal aaen. anant kathaen ek pro. tiem. yoon to unhonne apana kaeriyar chaparasinuma kisi chij se shuroo kiya tha. halanki ve tab bhi ise shikshan sahayak hi kahate the. shikshan sahayak ke roop men unake dayitvon ke antargat ve batate the. ji han, yahan sab kuchh ve hi batate the yonki unake samay ke bakee sab varishtha to unakee karagujariyan se asamay hi mritapray ho gae. is karan ye dayitv unhen hi nibhana padta hai. to ve jab shikshan sahayak the to varishth pradhyapakon, adhyapakon ko chak, dastar, pani, sutaee ka rool, bhavishy ke drishtigat kuchh profesaron ke ghar kee rashan-pani aadi lakar dete the. isake alava sammanit karyon ke antargat ve batate the ki laibreri se kitaben lana bhi unhin ke dayitv huaa karate the.

jahan unhen apani medha ke bare men gyana huaa, aur ve kafi padh likhakar is jagah tak pahunche. isi sandarbh men ek maukhik kinvadanti yah kahati hai ki unhen pradhyapakon dvara di gaee list kee kitabon ko dhoondhane ke dauran kuchh purani piechadi dhool khati mil gaee thi, jinhen unhonne hastagat karake ghar pahunch liya tha. tatpashchat kolej ke trasti mahoday ke yahan di gaee apani nisvartha sevaon ke pratifal ke roop men unhen isi kolej men adhyapakee prapt ho gaee thi. ek any yahan bhi maukhik kinvadanti ka vivaran kuchh doosari taraf ka hai, jisake antargat bataya jata hai ki trasti mahoday ke boodhe bap jo ritayar profesar the, ki tiem sahab ne itani seva kee thi ki marate samay ve apani piechadi unhen saunp gae the jise tiem sahab jild kholakar dobara peshakar piechadi prapt kar li thi, jis vishayak unaka kathan tha ki unhonne guruprasad amar kar diya hai vo guru ke khase bhakt the aur jab tab las men batate rahate the ki kaise unake guru ne keval unakee lagan aur jigyasa dekhakar khansate-khansate hi unhen prabandhana kee shiksha di thi. halanki yah bat alag hai ki is dauran girane vale thook ka ve prabandhan uchit dhang se nahin kar pae the, jis sanbandh men bhi unakee amar sooti thi ki guru ka thook bhi shishy ke lie moti ban jata hai. arthat ve shikshan par isi thokotsarjit paddhati ke antargat shikshit-dikshit hue the, jis karan thookakar chatane, doosaron ke charitr par thookane aadi-aadi karyon ko atyant hi nishnat evan samarpit bhav se karate the.

aap bhi isase prerana le saken, isalie is siddhant ka laiv demo diya ja raha hai, taki aap ise sikhen, gunen aur pad-haisiyat aur antatah jivan behatara bana saken.notah yah bhi us kitab men hi bataya gaya hai.

sanstha, vastuon ka uchit niyojan hi prabandhan hai. lekin jab aap ise vyapaka najarie se dekhate hai to prabandhan hai vyakti, sanstha, vastuon kee apane anukool kar, thik dhang se apani vyavastha baitha lena, arthat vinamrata se tangadi marate hue kam se kam samay men adhikatam doori prapt kar lena. shram-buddhi-kaushal ke vanchhit ghalamel se, tikshnnata se chijen mainej karate hue mainejar ho jana. ye vyavaharik prabandhan hai. aage unhonne joda aadhunik kal men se hi tangadimar mainejamenta kahate hain. yah prabandhan ka ekadam naya aur spesilaijd eriya hai. spesilaijd isalie hai ki koee aam chhatr ise kar hi nahin sakata. isake lie to kaiyanpanti kee dhoortata men page hue khas baikagraund kee aavashyakata padti hai, yoon hi nahin har koee ise prapt kar sakata hai. isamen sabase khas bat hai uchit taiming kee yani yogy avasar par tatkshan hi kalakari dikha di jae, anyatha to loojarsa kaitegiri men gine jane ke lie taiyar rahana padta hai. tiem sahab apani bat kah bhi nahin pae the ki poorv men hi ek chhatr bol pada. sar jara taiming kee bat ditel men samajhaie na.

jigyasayut aavaj baid taiming ka klasikal udaharan hai. bagule kee tarah ghat lagakar sadhi jati hai taiming jara sa chooke aur poori mehanat ka safaya jaise kisi aofis men pramoshan ek ka hona ho aur tin davedar ho to yahan taiming ka kya mahatv hai, ek udaharan ke madhyam se samajho-a ne isake lie salabhar dikhae apane kam karmathata ko hi paryapt aadhar manate hue. aadhar par khud ko pramoshan ka sabase bada davedar mana liya. vahin ba ne kam aur karmathata ke sath-sath bos ko samane apani nirantar hajiri ko pramoshan ka aadhar pana. vahin isi dauran sa ne kam-karmathata-kartavy ke sthan par bos ke prati kartavy ko prathamikata dete hue jeschar-poshchar men bhi vinamrata kee atirikt doja milana shuroo kar di. aofis aur bangale par dyooti kee pankchualati badha di, yani fal pakane ka mausam aane par har tarah kee nishkriyata ko tyag kar prabandhana men jut gaya. han to bachcho batao fir kise mila hoga promoshana tiem sahab ne kaha. sa ko hi mila hoga, sar. kaee aavajen ek sath aaee. vairi gud ab samajh rahe ho tangadimar prabandhana jahan a aur ba kartavy aur mehanat men kam nahin the lekin jab atirikt mehanat kee jaroorat thi to ve chook gae, vahin sa ne is atirikt mehanat arthat fal pakane ke mausam men mali ke saman najaren rakhin, ped ke aasapas fal ke chanhuor jholi failakar usake girane par lapakane ke lie taiyar ho gaya. tab kahi jakar hath aata hai fal. ye kya ki bij to dal die aur nishchintata men baith gae, konpale bhi nahin nikalane paengi ki dhor-dangar khel kar denge. machan bandhana padta hai, fasal kee raksha karani padti hai niraee-gudhaee bhi samay-samay par kee jati hai, tab pramoshan kee fasal pak kar khalihan men aati hai. jaisi sa ke khalihan men aaee.

shiksha hi nahin ye kahani to apane aap men poori pasabuka hi hai, jo kahati hai uchit samay kiya gaya koee bhi atirikt prayas fal kee prapti karavata hai. mainejament kee bhasha men sahi taiming men sahi eta jabaki tangadimar mainejamenta men ise kahate hai karagujari vid taiminga kyonki agar aaj tumhare pas yah kala nahin hai to aage badhane ke avasar bhi nahin h,ai karan ye hai ki aaj to isafarish tak yogy logon kee lagaee jati hai, ayogy kee to koee sifarish tak nahin lagana to aise paridrishy men tangadi marate hue hi aage badhana padta hai.

bhid lagana padti hai, bhid jaisa munh banana padta hai, kaee bar to sari vyavastha jeb se hi karana padti hai, fir saikadon karyakarta hote hain neta ke chahunor khade hone ko. karagujari kee kala nahin aati ho to do-tin pidhiyon tak bhid hi bane rahana padta hai. neta ke daravaje par hi mandarate rahana padta hai, panvon men pade rahana padta hai, joote-moje tak ban jana padta hai, tikat kee mashakat karani padti hai. aise n jane kitane padta hai karane padte hai tab kahi jakar ekadh ichchha poori ho pati hai. ab tumhin batao hain na sau mushkilen, isalie mainejar bano vats , mainejar, ejiyootiv bane rahane men karyakartapane ka dam chahie, isalie karagujari dikhani hi padti hai fir mere alava poore desh men tumhen itana uchchastariy prabandhan modal koee nahin padha paega, samajha paega. isalie mere in sikhon ko aaj hi ganth bandh lo anyatha fir tapate hi rah jaoge. tiem sahab prabandhan men gahan darshan mis karake roj hi isi tarah ka athah gyan chhatron ko pradan karate hi rahate hain.

stoodenton se politis karake apana hit sadhata rahata hai. kal hi chhatron ko baragala raha tha ki agar koee profesar padhae nahin to use shikayat kee jae, batao to ab stoodent bataenge ham ya-kaise padha rahe hain, 25 sal se to padha rahe hain aaj tak samajhe kya jo ab bataenge, vaise samajh jate to hama n ho jate, tharakee dikhata hai prinsipal kya kahate ho, teka marate hue bakiyon se hami bharavaenge fir stafaroom se nikalakar prinsipal ke kamare men bhi pahunchenge taki vahan bhi. vahan prinsipal ko bataenge ki in boodhe-khoonsat profesaron ke pas koee kam to hota nahin hai, dinabhar baithakar kolej kee buraee karate rahenge, fir aisa nahin ho raha, vaisa nahin ho raha ki tan chhede rahenge,sar jara tait to karo inako. itane prabandhana se nivrit hokar ve ek chakar stoodent lidaron ke pas lagaenge jinhen ve bataenge ki rajaniti kaise chalaen, kaun se profesar chhatron ke virodhi hai, fand kitana hai aadi-aadi. itana karane ke bad ve motarasaikil lekar pahunchenge pres, jahan sab editaron ke pas baithakar unhen bataenge ki bhaee kolej men kya ghapale-ghotale chal rahe hain, nam mat dena lekin dekh lo kaisa durdasha kar di kolej kee, shiksha kee dukanen bana ke chhod diya hai. tum hi kuchh karo nahin to sab rasatal men jaega. mera nam nahin chhapana aadi do-tin bar doharakar ve apani praivet koching men pahunchenge taki men bahari chhatron ko bhi vyavaharik prabandhan men dikshit kiya ja sake.

kyonki pashchim pranbadh kee kitabon men vyavaharik prabandhana vahin ke najarie se likha gaya hai, jise sthaniy jaruraton ke hisab se parivardhit-parimarjit karane ka prayas aaj tak kisi ne kiya hi nahin, choonki is prabandhan ko unhonne poorvaroopen praitikal taur par aajamakar bhi dekha hai, pritesting ke anukool parinam prapt hone par hi bahusankhyak chhatr varg ke vyapak hiton ko drishtigat rakhate hue ve ise ek siddhant ke roop men vikasit kar usake dooragami shikshann-prashikshan men lage hain. unaka to manana yahan tak hai ki kisi bhi safalata ko aap jan nahin pa rahe ho to unake maulik siddhanton kee roshani men is siddhant ka vishleshn kar len, kahin n kahin usake jivan men inaka anushilan mil hi jaega. pratidin lagabhag ye bat kisi n kisi las batate hi hain fir chhatr kalyan ke mahan siddhant ke janmadata ke taur par usakee khumari men hi ghar kee or lautate hain. yahi santushti hi unake jivan kee kamaee hai, thati hai. ve prasann hain, jivan kee utkrishtata isi prasannata men chhupi hai. khushi kisi bhi raste se jivan men aani chahie.mahan sadhy kee rah men tuchchh sadhanon kee or nahin dekha jana chahie. unake siddhanton ke anushilan se sarvatr khushi faile isi kamana ke sath.
yah janane kee ghor jigyasa men mainne isake aage kee kahani kee bhayankaratam risarch kee to jo pata chala vo apane munh se aapako bata nahin paoonga. aage khud hi padh len.

ghareloo siddhant ke aage ho jata hai fel. jahan vo mahan profesar ban jata hai sirf moti. thoda bahut sammanit huaa to unakee patni moti prakash bol dengi. aaj tak ve yahan apana vyapak prabandhan nahin chala pae hain, poori duniya ko tangadimar prabandhan kee kala men nishnat kar rahe hain, yahan ek tang par khade haus prabandhan men karyakartapane kee bhoomika nibha rahe hain, barason se. aage bhi koee rah nahin. mainejar nahin ban pa rahe hain. tangadimar prabandhan ka koee modal shreematiji par nahin chala pa rahe hain.ghar kee khidkee se ve har aanejane vale ko aashabhari nigahon se dekhate hain, kuchh aap hi bata dijie.ji han unaka aashay aap se hi hai. kuchh vyavaharik gyan dijie na plij, koee ghareloo- siddhant koee modal.ho sake to bataie.bhaee sab. o bhaee sab.
ab aap mahan siddhanton ko dene valon ke baikagraund kee khoj men n jut jana. yad rakhie, darunn-vivashata.

jara dard kuredo, devadasamukhi stail men shuroo ho jaenge. shuroo bhi kya honge, karmafala, vidhi ka vidhana, prarabdha aadi-aadi ko bich men lakar aise-aise talle denge ki aapako lagega ki aadami to jabardast kailibar ka hai, bas jara uparokt chijon ke chalate pratibha nahin dikha pa raha hai. hamari khasiyat hi ye hai ki dard-dukh-gam-asafalata aadi ke adhikansh karanon ko duniyobar vyavasthaon ke havale karate jaenge. halanki log bhi kya karen sadiyon se pidhi-dar-pidhi yah vichar virasat kee tarah saunpa ja raha hai. halanki koee safalata mili nahin ki ekadam se aantarik gun dikhaee dene lagenge, namratapoorvak badappan sahit usaka kredit lene lagenge. khaira, filahal to ham bat kar rahe hain kailibar n dikha pane ke karanon kee.

kahe ka bhar halka karega, khud hi bojh hai, eeshvar n jane kin janmon ke papon kee saja de raha hai, fir dukh men atirikt saund traik bhi milaenge. he! eeshvara simpaithi apane atirikt kisi ke paksh men gavara hi nahin karate aise prani.
itani nanhin si to bitiya hai, jo bhi dekhane aata hai, dahej ke lie munh fad deta hai, samajh nahin aata. kahan se, kaise vyavastha karoon. vidhata bhi n jane kya-kya din dikha raha hai.
bakee beimanon ko dekho kitana aage badh gae, eemanadari se naukari kee hai, ijjat kamaee hai, vahin pade hain. jane kya hoga.b

doosaron ka bhala karate-karate kabil ban gae. too to eemanadari gale men latakakar aofis men ghusa, dar ke mare sit par baith gaya, n kisi kam men himmat dikhaee, n aage badhakar koee kam kiya, n sahab ko dabangata se koee chij samajhaee. samane valon ne aisa kuchh kiya to tatkal unhen beeeman ghoshit kara, eemanadari ke khol men ghus kar dukhiya ghonghe bane pade rahe. fir samane vale ne koee safalata paee nahin ki duniyobar vyavastha ko bich men lakar kosane kee mahafil jama li. koee aaya nahin, shrota dikha nahin ki bat ghuma-ghuma kar baten apane dard-dukh-jakhmon kee taraf laenge, taki priy trek par vahi dard bhari shahanaee vadan suna saken. har chij men oopar vale ka kasoor dhoondhenge. abhyas bhi itana tagada kar lenge patthe ki aisa jatalaenge jaise eeshvar har dukh ko asafalata ke pichhe karm-prarabdhy-vidhan aadi ko yathasthan fit karane men karate hain. usakee har safalata ke pichhe tikadam hai, sabit kar hi denge. apani har asafalata ke pichhe pichhale janm ke karm, eemanadari, achchhaee aadi poorvajanmiy vyavasthaon- sadgunon ka hath bataenge. khud bhale hi salon tak ek hi jagah par atake rahen, samane vale ke har pramoshan men, oopar uthate jane men usake gire hue tarikon ka rajafash karane men hi apana kartavy nirvahan manenge.

jise gahe-bagahe har sthiti men fit karane ke lie mamooli se raddo-badal kee hi jaroorat padati hai. fir lagatar is modal kee sanshodhit-parivartit janakari de-dekar ek vishleshak ke roop men prakhar-medha ke dhani jaisa tanboo bhi tan lenge, taki navoditon ko isake tale laya ja sake. in sab mamalon men to mehanat men koee kami hi nahin chhodate patthe. jara bhi sahan nahin ki poori srishti kee vyavastha bhedabhav rahit santulit hai. man ke hi chalate hain kaliyug hai, kauvvon ko khir pina hi hai, hans to sale ghoore se hi khane ka jugad karate firenge. jahan rahenge, vahan ke vatavaran men adrishy prabhav chhodakar hi rahenge. sankhyabal men bhale hi kam ho, lekin atishighr apane jaison kee poori shrrinkhala ka vaicharik utpadan kar dete hain. ye utpadan bhi chain riekshan kee prakriya apana dvigunit-trigun badhata hi chala jata hai. becharagi ka bahumat badhata hai, to har doosara-tisara chehara sataya huaa sa, har panchavin-aathavin shakl dukhiyari dikhane lagati hai. isi prakriya ka hi to pratifal hai ki duniya dukh kee khan. re manava duniya dukh kee khan. jaisi baten sansar men aakar mahaul kaipchar karane lagati hain, dukhiyaron ka ek market nirmit hone lagata hai. fir ye log nirantar apane svantah dukhay par chintan-manan-sanbhashan aadi dete-dete ek din duniyabhar ko inhin se mukt dilane ke bijanes men sanlagn ho jate hain. aoftar-aol yoo no its a lang eksapiriyans aof dekha-samajha-bhoga-yatharth vich kanvart in e mishan for pis for main kaind. isalie bhavishy men yad rakhen, modarn ej men dukh-dard-prarabdh men bhi etasetra. etasetra.eksatra kee bharapoor gunjaish hai.

ek rupaya de do baboo ji kahate hue ek bhikharin ek aadami ke samane gidagidane lagi. us aadami ne use das ka not de diya. sath men baithe usake dost ne kaha yar vah bhikharin tujhase ek rupaya mang rahi thi aur toone use das rupaye de die. toone aisa kyon kiya ? yah log bahut jhoothe aur makkar hote hain. nahin aisa nahin hai usane kaha aur shoony men dekhane laga-

aankhon men gaddhe, bal safed mere pas aakar baith gaee. usane mujhase yoon hi baten karana shuru kar din aur kaee tarah ke saval bhi poochhe jaise main kahan rahata hoon ? yahan kyon aaya hoon ? aur use jab yah maloom huaa ki mainne is bar haeeskool ke imtihan die hain to vah mujhe achchhe nambaron se pas hone kee duaaen dene lagi. fir usane mujhase das rupaye mange. usane kaha tha ki vah bhookhi hai. hoon jhoothi makkar lalachi mujhe bevakoof bana rahi hai. mainne dil hi dil men aisa socha aur usase kaha ki mere pas das rupaye nahin hain. fir vah mujhase bina kuchh kahe uthakar chali gaee. pepar khatm hone tak mere jahan men yah bat kaee bar aaee ki log panch das rupaye ke lie kaise kaise jhooth bolate hain. pepar khatm hote hi main bahan ko lekar ghar aa gaya aur kuchh din bad yah bat bilkul bhool gaya.

sirf soorat hi yad rah gaee thi. jab maine usake bare men pata kiya to maloom huaa ki usakee maut hue do mahine ho chuke hai. mujhe n jane kyon aisa laga ki jaise usakee maut ka jimmedar main hi hoon. anayas hi yah lafj mere jahan men goonjane lage kash mainne use das rupaye de die hote. usakee maut ka jimmedar main khud ko manane laga aur yah bat mere dil men ek tis banakar rah gaee.

Facebook Par aapka Account hoga, aapke uspar bhut se friends bhi hoge. Jada tar hota ye hai jinhe ham nahi jaante wo bhi hame friend Request send kar dete hai. ab jinko nahi jaante unki friends request kuch log to accepct kar lete hai apne friend list badane ke liye par kuch log nahi chate ki jinko wo nahi jaante wo unko friend banaye. Facebook Security se dekhe to hame anjan logo ki friend facebook par friend nahi banana chaiye, Agar aap apni personal bate share nahi karna chate ye bhi ek karan ho sakta hai anjan logo ko friend naa banana. Aap Apni Friend list ko bhi chupa sakte ho. Kuch log jada Popular ho jate hai to unke pass bhut si friend request aati hai, par ham facebook par 5000 se jada friend nahi bana sakte. Par agar aap chate hai ki aap logo se jude rahe to uska ek acha upai hai Facebook Page banaye ya fir Kisi Topic par Facebook Group bhi bana sakte hai. To Chaliye Dekhte hai kaise ham anjan logo ki Friend Request se chutkara pa sakte hai. Aapko ancahe friends request se chutkara pane ke liye sabse phele apne Facebook Account me login karna hoga. Ab Aap facebook Account me login ho chuke hai. ab aapko upar Navbar me Lock ka icon dikhega. Is trha aap apne Facebook account ki setting kar sakte ho, ki kon aapko friend request send kar sake. Agar aap jaanna chate ho kaise Facebook Account ko deactivate ya delete kare hamesa ke liye to ye post pade. Facebook ki adhik jaankari ke liye yaha click kare, or agar aapka koi sabal hai to comment karke jarur bataye. facebook par friend request kaise bheje wo to aapko pata hi hoga, simple profile ko open karke send friend request button par click karke request send kar sakte hai. par agar aapne disable kar diya hai to jo bhi aapki profile ko open karege unko friend request send karne ki button hi nahi dikhegi. To ab aap jaan chuke hai facebook par friend request kaise band kare or uske kya faide or nuksan hai, fir bhi agar aapka koi sabal ho to aap comment karke puch sakte hai. hamne kis kisko facebook firend request send ki hai, jinhone abhi tak accept nahi ki wo kaise pata kare uski jankari mene yaha share ki hai, or agar aap apne Friends ko hide karna chate hai FB Profile par to uski jankari yaha hai. or agar Mujse Friendship karna chate hai to hamara HMH Facebook Group Join kare.

kuchh khas nahin badala hai pichhale bis varshon men hamari tahasil ke ikalaute sarakari kolej men, vahi bilding hai, vahi kakshaen hain, han apani klas kee khidakee se lage hue bagiche ke kinare-kinare pankti se lage ashok ke ped ab kafi bade ho gae hain . jahan pahale tar kee fensing huaa karati thi ab pakkee baundri ban gaee hai . kitana sukhad hota hai jis kolej men shiksha grahan kee usi men adhyapan ka avasar mil jana . kolej prangan men kadam padate hi atit jaise fir jivant hokar vartaman ke dharatal par daudane lagata hai . mujhe yad hai, kolej men tumhara naya-naya edamishan huaa tha . us din fis jama karane kee antim tithi thi . ek hi kaish kauntar hone ke karan kauntar par atyadhik bhid thi chhatra-chhatrayen yadyapi alag alag lainon men lage hue the, kintu dhakkamukkee itani adhik thi ki samajh nahin aa raha tha ki chhatra-chhatraon kee laeenen alag-alag kaisi bani hai, har koee jitani jaldi ho sake fis jama kar, bhid aur dhakkamukkee se mukt hona chah raha tha . tum bhi usi bhid men fis jama karane ke prayas men lagi huee thi ki achanak tum jor-jor se chillane lagi badtamij ! teri himmat kaise huee mere dupatte ko hath lagane kee ! main abhi shikayat karati hoon prinsipal se . . . teri man-bahan nahin hai kya ? . ganvar . . besharam . . nalayak aur n jane kya - kya . tum mujhe lagatar dante ja rahi thi . mujhe turant to kuchh samajh hi nahin aaya ki tum mujhe kyon dant rahi ho, kintu bad men pata chala ki laeen men dhakkamukkee ke karan kisi ladakee kee heyarapin men fansakar tumhara dupatta khinch gaya tha aur ittefak se tumhare bilkul bajoo se main khada tha bas, aur tumhen laga jaise mainne hi janaboojhakar tumhara dupatta khincha ho . bas, tumane bina kuchh soche samajhe mujh par galiyon kee bauchhar kar di . yadyapi bad men tumane hriday se mujhase mafi mangi thi . aise huaa tha hamara pahala parichay .

isaliye nahin ki main tumhen pasand nahin karata tha balki sach bat to yah thi ki main tumhen usi din se chahane laga tha jis din tumane raudr roop dharan karate hue mujhe dant lagaee thi aur sachchaee ka pata chalane par utani hi vinamrata se mujhase bar-bar sori plij, sori plij kaha tha . tumhare lie kolej padhana, suyogy var kee talash poori hone tak matr samay vyatit karana tha . tumhara uddey bas itana hi tha ki tumhare nam ke sath em.e. kee digri jud jae . poore kolej samay men tumhara dhyan padhaee kee taraf kam aur shararaten karane men jyada laga rahata tha . kolej kee sanskritik gatividhiyan, pikanik, en.es.es. ke kaimp, tum kolej jivan ke har pal ko bharapoor ji lena chahati thi . kolej ka arth tumhare lie sirf mauj tha, kintu mere lie kolej padhane ka matalab tha apane mata-pita kee aashaon ko poora karana, unake sapanon ko poora karana . . . aur yahi vajah thi kee tumako chahate hue bhi main shuroo-shuroo men tumase doori banaye rakhata tha, kintu ko prem to prem hota hai vah to bas ho jata hai . tumhen kadachit yakeen n ho par tumhara likha das pej ka pahala patr aaj bhi mere pas surakshit rakha hai . em.e.hote hi hamara milana julana lagabhag band hi ho gaya tha, kyonki kolej men hi ham mil sakate the . isi bich tumhare pita ka sthanantar kisi doorasth jile men ho gaya aur fir tum jo gaee to kabhi vapas nahin laut sakee . sirf tumhare vivah kee khabar hi mili thi .

main tumhen dosh nahin de raha hoon ki tumane meri pratiksha kyon nahin kee, yatharth prem men isakee koee jagah nahi hai . ham svajatiy the hamari shadi men koee rookavat nahin aani chahie thi, kintu svajatiy matr hona hi prem ke parinnay bandhan men parivartit hone ka koee thos aadhar nahin hai, kyonki mujhe lagata hai berojagari aur prem ka prayah samanjasy nahin hota hai, apane prem ko pane ke lie rojagar ek anivary tatv hai . aur mere pas tha hi kya ? bi.e.em.e. kee pratham shreni kee digriyan, vishvavidyalay ke gold medal, aur prishthabhoomi men ek doorasth ganv ke garib kisan mata-pita kee anaginat aashayen aur ummiden . . . . vidyarthi jivan men hamara pahala uddey apane lakshy kee prapti hona chahie n ki prem ke divasvapn, kyonki jivan ka yah amooly samay ek bar hamare hath se nikal jane ke bad n to hamen prem hi mil pata hai aur n hi apana lakshy . shesh bachata hai sirf pashchatap .

hamamen samanatayen to bahut thin, ham ek hi kolej men padhate the, ek hi klas men padhate the, hamaumr the aur ek doosare ke gunon, avagunon ko janate samajhate hue ek doosare ko pasand karate the, kintu ye samanatayen ek beti ke pita ke lie bilkul paryapt nahin thin main kahan ganv ka rahanevala kisan ka beta aur tum shahar men pali badhi tahasiladar sahab kee ikalauti, sundar sushil beti . mera tumhara kaise mel ho pata kyonki lila, har insan sukh suvidha chahata hai, tum, tumhare mata pita aur, aur . .shayad prem bhi . hindi sahity se em.e. ke bad mainne shighr hi piechadi. ke lie panjiyan kara liya tha aur sath hi naukari ke lie bhi harasanbhav prayas karata raha, kintu jahan charon taraf angreji ka bolabala ho, pashchimi sanskriti kee aandhi chal rahi ho vahan nirala, pant kee kavitaon aur premachand ke upanyason kee bhoomi se roti upajana aasan nahin tha . han isake lie kahin urvar bhoomi mili bhi to bhrashtachar ke keetanuon ne usake ankuran par viram laga diya . tum sach kahati thi prem hriday kee atal gaharaiyon men aavirbhit hota hai, kintu usake jivit rahane ke liye do vakt kee roti aur sir par chhat hona nitant aavyak hai . anurag tum jaldi karo yadi tumhen jaldi hi naukari nahin mili to main fir tumhen kabhi nahin mil paungi . han, tumane ek rasta aur sujhaya tha ki samajik maryadaon ko todakar ham ghar se bhagakar mandir men shadi kar lete hain kintu bahut soch vichar karane ke bad mera man aise raste par chalane par sahamat nahin huaa tha, jo hamare mata-pita kee pratishtha aur unake man samman par kalikh laga deta aur prem to gauravanvit karata hai apamanit nahin . main naukari kee nirantar talash karata raha aur udhar tum mujhase dhire-dhire door hoti gaee aur apani beti ke lie dipti kalektar jaisa damad mil raha ho to kaun pita nahin chahega ki usakee beti ka vivah jaldi n ho . dukh aur sukh ne aage-pichhe hi mere daravaje par dastak die the, jis varsh tumhari shadi huee usake ek varsh bad hi mujhe piechadi avard huaa tha . aur naukari ke raste bhi khul gaye the, par tab tak to bahut der ho chukee thi, tum kisi aur kee duniya men sada ke lie chali gaee thi. tab mujhe bahut dukh huaa tha . kintu main kuchh kar nahin paya, kyonki tum vaivahik jivan kee aisi simaon men bandh gaee thi, jisamen poorv prem ka pravesh dampaty jivan kee khushiyon ko khatm kar vinash aur barbadi ko janm deta hai aur mainne yah kabhi bhi nahin chaha ki main ya mera prem tumhare sukhi vaivahik jivan men darar padane ka karan bane . mainne to eeshvar se sadaiv yahi prarthana kee ki tum jahan bhi raho sada svasth v prasann raho . parantu kahate hain n dharati gol hai kahin se bhi chalana praranbh karo ghoom firakar ham vahin aa jate hain, jahan se chalana shuroo kiya tha . 20 sal bad main aaj vahin laut aaya hoon hamare usi kolej men jahan hamare madhy premabij ka ankuran huaa tha . vahin tumhari smritiyon ke bich jahan se mera man kabhi bahar nahin nikal saka .

pichhale bis salon men tumane mujhe kabhi yad kiya ho ya n kiya ho kintu main tumhen kabhi bhula nahin paya . prem kee dhara par upaje tumhari smritiyon ke fool abhi murajhaye nahin hai pratham prannay kee khushaboo liye ve ab bhi surabhit karate hain, mujhe, mere man ko, meri aatma ko, aise, jaise abhi khile hon .

aar.di.ek s ,eke. 47 rayafal ka mukabala nahin kiya ja sakata . to ham galat hain . poore desh kee sadakon par har mool, vansh ,varnn,varg ,majahab , tabake ke lakhon logon ne momabat ti kee chhoti si lau jalakar ekata kee aisi misail jalaee hai jisake samane paramanu bam kee chamak-dhamak, damak bhi fikee pad gaee hai .

soochana, nak she, janakari, upalab dh karaee . us dharati ko nash t karake virodh hona chahie tha . jahan rahakar un honne aatankavad kee shiksha, diksha, prashikshan prap t kiya tha . un aakaon kee mrit yu se virodh hona chahie tha jinake ishare par un honne kam kiya .

sima par kadi chaukasi rakhen, aapas men jati, dharm, majahab, ke nam par bam kee tarah n fate . jis tarah desh kee janata ne sadak par aam aur khas ka bhed bhav n rakhate hue virodh v yak t kiya hai . vah desh chalane valon ke lie ek sikh hai ki vah sab karen, lekin desh kee ekata, akhandata , akshunnnata ke sath khilavad n karen . yadi samay rahate un hen samajh nahin aati hai to un hen rajamahalon se sadak par aane men j yada samay nahin lagega .

kar, chungi, rajas v, lagan, fis ada karati hai jisake pichhe s vatantrata se jina, unake pran evan deh kee raksha karana ,v yapar, v yavasay, aavagaman kee s vatantrata hona ,bolane aur likhane kee chhoot hona ,aadi maulik baten shamil hai . yadi hamen sanvidhan men pradat t pran aur daihik s vatantrata ka mool adhikar prap t nahin hota hai to yah hamari nitiyon kee kami hai jise ham aatankavad ka nam dekar nahin chhupa sakate hain .
majahab kee divaron ko todakar ek sath rahe ,jo dharm ke nam par mandir mas jid kee aad lekar ladavana chahate hain . un logon ko ham badhava dete hain . apane jahan men un hen panah dete hain .

logon ko aapas men ladavane ke sivay an y koee tarika najar nahin aata hai . yahi karan hai ki aaj bharat dharm, bhasha, jati ke nam par kaee tukadon men bant chuka hai . desh ke andar usake kaee bhag ho gaye hain . aajadi ka tiranga laharane ke lie hamen jang kee tarah desh ke andar taiyar karani padati hai . kuchh jagah to aajad tiranga lahar bhi nahin pata hai .
