nirih asahay janata kee bali chadhi hai . aatankavad ke nam pad desh ke nami neta, adhikari, suraksha sainik bhi shahid huye hai lekin usake bad bhi dono s tar par janata or prashasan ke s tar par aatankavad rokane kee thos rannaniti ham aaj tak nahi bana paye hai k yonki ham itana sab kuchh bhogane ke bad bhi dharm rajaniti majahab mas jid giraja setu ke nam par ladane date hue hai .
fata pahan lenge ,futapath par so jayenge lekin aantak ke nam par nahin bikenge ,nahin batenge ,nahin katenge nahin ladenge ,nahin jhagadenge .

usaka bam dharm nahin janata, usaka hen d grened jati nahin poochhata, e ke 47 amir garib ,hin doo mus lim nahin pahachanati, aara0 di0 ek sa0 paudar neta ,janata men fark nahin pahachanate, fir k yon n ham sab aapas men milakar isaka samana karen aur aatankavad ka safaya karen .

bekari, bhukhamari ke nam par bantane kee koshish karen ham nahin batenge khud mehanat karake garibi door karenge, shiksha prap t karake rojagar prap t karenge, ach chhe vatavaran ka nirman karake s vas th y jivan jiyenge aur aatankavad ke nam par kisi lakhanavi, haidarabadi, in dauri, gujarati, kash miri, ke bayan par nahin bhadakenge, nahin bikharenge, nahin bifarenge, nahin ladege, nahin tootenge, nahin bikenge, nahi bhadakenge, nahi jhagadengen .

mujhe nahin maloom, lekin mujhe aisa lagata hai ki us vakt main nishanebaji ke chakkar men vivekashoony ho gaya tha. tabhi to main yah sochane laga tha ki achchhi nishanebaji bhi buddhimani kee nishani hai, kyonki yah janana bhi ek kala hai ki achchhe shikar kahan milenge aur unaka shikar kaise kiya jae.

to vahan par sar je mekinatosh se bhent huee. mujhe jitane bhi vakta mile unamen ve sarvottam the. bad men pith pichhe meri tarif karate hue unhonne garv se kaha tha, is yuvak men kuchh hai jo mujhe ruchikar laga. shayad unhonne bhi dekh liya tha ki unakee batayi har bat ko main kitane dhyan se sun raha tha, aur main to itihas, rajaniti aur naitik darshanashastr ke bare men nira buddhoo tha. kisi prasiddh vyakti se apani prashansa sunana kisi bhi yuvak ko achchha lagata hai, kyonki yah use sahi raste par lagae rakhata hai, halanki is prakar kee tarif se kushagrata badhati hai lekin kaee bar mithya ahan bhi badh sakata hai.

fir bhi samay shanadar guzara. vahan ka jivan ekadam tanav rahit tha. paidal ghoomane ya ghudasavari karane ke lie door-daraj ke ilake bade hi dilakash the, aur sham ko sab baithakar sangit aur gappabaji ka aanand lete the. hamari gappen bahut vyaktigat nahin hoti thin, jaisa ki bade parivaron men aksar hoti hain. garmiyon men poora parivar aksar purane portiko kee sidhiyon men baith jata tha. samane hi fulavari thi aur makan ke thik samane faila huaa dhalavan jangal nadi men chamakata rahata tha. nadi men machhaliyon kee chhalang ya jal pakshiyon ka tairana bada hi manamohak tha. mere dilo dimag par mayer kee un shamon kee yad aaj bhi taza hai. main ankal jos ka bahut aadar karata tha aur mujhe unase lagav bhi bahut tha. ve bahut hi maun prakriti ke aur ekantapriy vyakti the, lekin mujhase kaee bar khulakar baten karate the. ve atyant saral aur spasht vivek ke svami the. mujhe nahin lagata ki sansar men aisi koee bhi shakti hogi jo unhen us marg se vichalit kar sake, jo marg unakee samajh men sahi ho. unake bare men main hores ke kavy kee kuchh panktiyan kahata tha.

1828-1831 edinabarga men do satra guzarane ke bada, pata nahin mere pita ko malooma ho gaya, ya meri bahanon ne bata diya ki main fijishiyana banane ka vichara pasanda nahin karata. unhonne mujhase kaha ki main padari bana jaoon to behatara hoga. kyonki main eka nithalla shikari banoon, isa bata ke ve prakhara virodhi the. usa samaya to yahi sambhavana jyada thi ki main shikari banane kee ora kadama badha raha tha. mainne sochane ke lie kuchha mohalata mangi, taki charcha aofa inglainda ke sabhi dharmasootron ke prati apane mana men vishvasa paida kara sakoon, kyonki suni sunaee baton ke karanna men mana men bahuta-si aashankaen ghara kara chukee thin. isake alava main padari banane ke vichara ko pasanda karata tha. isi krama men mainne eesaee siddhanton para piyarasana ke lekha aura anya dharmagrantha bahuta hi savadhani se padhe. usa samaya to baibala ke pratyeka shabda men varnita satya ka kade aura aksharashah palana karane men mujhe sandeha nahin raha gaya. jalda hi main isa bata ka murida ho gaya ki eesaee mata ke siddhanton ka sampoornna roopa se palana hona chahie.

to yah bada hi asangat lagata hai ki kabhi main padari banana chahata tha. vaise mera to abhipray nahin tha aur mainne pitaji kee ichchha ko chhoda bhi nahin tha, lekin padari banane ka yah vichar bhi us samay svabhavik roop se dam tod gaya, jab mainne prakritivadi ke roop men bigala men kam shuroo kiya. yadi manas vigyaniyon ka bharosa kiya jae to main padari banane ke lie kaee mayanon men ekadam sahi tha. kuchh varsh pahale jarman manas vigyani sosayati ke karyalay se mujhe ek patr mila tha, jisamen unhonne kafi shiddat ke sath mera foto manga tha. kuchh samay bad mujhe unakee baithakon ka vrittant prapt huaa, usamen yah ullekh tha ki mere lalat ka aakar prakar vahan charcha ka vishay raha, aur vahan maujood ek vakta ne to yahan tak kaha ki mere jaisa unnat lalat to das padariyon ko milakar bhi nahin hoga.

to yah bhi zaroori ho gaya ki is disha men taiyari karane ke lie main kisi inglish yoonivarsiti men padhane jaoon aur upadhi hasil karoon. mere sath sankat yah tha ki skool chhodane ke bad mainne koee shastreey granth nahin padha tha. mujhe yah jan kar bada hi kshobh huaa ki in do baras ke dauran skool men padha huaa sab kuchh bhool gaya tha. sab kuchh. yahan tak ki grik varnnamala ke kuchh akshar bhi. isalie main aktoobar men thik samay par kaimbrij nahin ja saka, balki shroojaberi men hi praivet tyootar se padha aur fir krisamas kee chhuttiyon ke dauran 1828 kee shuruaat men hi kaimbrij ja paya. mainne jald hi skool kee sari padhaee ko yad kar liya, aur homara tatha grika testamenta jaisi aasan grik pustakon ka suvidhanusar anuvad bhi kar lene laga tha.

aur 1828 kee garmiyon men baramauth men praivet tyootar bhi rakha, lekin meri padhaee bahut dhimi chal rahi thi. mujhe bijaganit ke shuruaati sootr to bematalab hi lag rahe the. padhaee men is tarah kee adhirata dikhana ek tarah se bevakoofi thi, kyonki bad ke samay men main khud ko hi kosata tha ki mainne mehanat kyon nahin kee aur ganit ke kuchh vikhyat sootron ko kyon nahin samajha. mujhe lagane laga tha ki ganit kee janakari rakhane vale prabal medha ke svami hote hain. lekin sath hi mujhe yah bhi mahasoos huaa ki ganit kee padhaee men main khas kuchh kar bhi n pata. shastreey gyan ke bare men mainne kolej ke anivary laikcharon ke alava kuchh khas nahin kiya, aur inamen bhi main mamooli taur par hi jata tha.

apana shastreey gyan, bijaganit aur yooklid doharaya. yooklid men mujhe vaisa hi aanand aaya jaisa ki skooli dinon men aata tha. bie kee pariksha pas karane ke lie mujhe pale dvara likhita evidensa aofa filosfi padhana bhi zaroori tha. yah kam mainne man lagakar kiya aur mujhe yah to bharosa ho hi gaya tha ki main sampoorn evidensa ko poori shuddhata ke sath likh sakata tha. han, itana zaroor hai ki pale jaisi spasht bhasha nahin likh pata. is kitab ke vibhinn prakar ke tarkon ne, aur main yah bhi kahoonga ki unakee prakritik aadhyatm vidya ne mujhe yooklid jaisa hi aanand pradan kiya. in rachanaon ka savadhanipoorvak adhyayan hamare shaikshanik pathyakram ka vah bhag tha jo mere dimagi vikas ke lie shikshan men zara-sa bhi kam ka nahin tha. mainne in rachanaon kee tota ratant ka prayas nahin kiya. ise main tab bhi bekar manata tha aur aaj bhi manata hoon. mainne us samay pale kee bhoomika ke bare men svayan ko jyada pareshan nahin kiya isi vishvas ke boote main tark vitark kee parampara se khush aur santusht bhi raha. pale ke sabhi prashnon ka thik uttar dene, yooklid men behatar taiyari aur shastron kee padhaee men bhi dayaniy roop se asafal n hone ke karan mujhe aanars n karane vali polloee ya logon kee bhid men achchha sthan aur digri bhi mil gayi. mujhe thik tarah se to nahin maloom ki mera raink kitana oopar tha, lekin mujhe thoda bahut yad hai ki soochi men panchaven, dasaven ya shayad barahaven sthan par tha.

aur inamen haaajir hona apani marji ke mutabik tha, lekin edinabarg men laikchar sun sunakar main itana oob gaya tha ki main sedavika ke prabhavashali aur rochak vyakhyanon men bhi nahin gaya. yadi main un vyakhyanon men gaya hota to bahut pahale hi bhoovigyani ban jata. halanki mainne vanaspatishastr men hensalo ke vyakhyan sune aur unakee spashtata ko tatha atyadhik prabhavashali uddharanon ko mainne bahut pasand kiya lekin main vanaspatishastr padhata nahin tha. hensalo apane shishyon aur yoonivarsiti ke kuchh purane sadasyon ko lekar door daraj ke ilakon tak paidal ya ghodagadi men ya fir nadi ke bahav ke sath sath bajare men baithakar adhyayan yatraon par jate the. is dauran pae jane vale durlabh paudhon aur pashuon par ve vyakhyan dete. ye adhyayan yatraen badi manoranjak hoti thin.

to bhi main yahi kahoonga ki vahan mera samay buri tarah se barabad ho raha tha. bhayankar barabadi. nishanebaji kee aur shikar karane kee meri bhavana mar chukee thi, aur ab mujhe desh ke door door ke hisson kee sair karane men maza aane laga tha. main door door tak ghudasavari karata. yahan main ek naee hi chandal chaukadi men fans gaya tha. hamari is mandali men kuchh lafange aur nich pravritti ke yuvak bhi the. ham aksar sham ko ek sath bhojan karate, halanki inamen hamare sath aksar koee n koee garimamay vyakti bhi rahata tha, aur kaee bar ham jyada pi lete the, aur bad men gate rahate ya tash khelate. is tarah se jitani shamen mainne guzarin, mujhe aaj bhi usake lie sharam mahasoos hoti hai. halanki mere kuchh mitr bahut hi khushamijaz the aur ham sabhi ke dimag sataven aasaman par the, lekin kul milakar mujhe un dinon kee yad bahut sukhadayak nahin hai.

aur lagata hai meri ruchi bhi kafi achchhi thi, kyonki mainne hamesha achchhe chitron kee prashansa kee thi, aur unake bare men bujurg kyooretar se charcha bhi karata tha. mainne sar joshuaa renald kee kitab kafi ruchi ke sath padhi. halanki yah ruchi mere prakritik rujhan men nahin thi, to bhi kuchh baras tak mainne isamen kafi ruchi li, aur landan sthit neshanal gailari ke kaee sare chitr mujhe bahut aanandit karate the, aur sebestiyana dela piyembo ke chitr to jaise mujhe divyalok men le jate the.

kyonki main kaee bar khud hi kings kalej chala jata tha, aur kaee bar to giraje kee gayan mandali ke bachchon ko paise dekar apane kamare men unaka gayan sunata tha. yah bat doosari hai ki mere kan sangit ko samajhane ke mamale men din hin the. main ek bhi dhun samajh nahin pata tha, aur n hi koee dhun baja pata tha. sahi tarike se gunagunana to mere lie kathin tha, fir bhi yah rahasy hi hai ki main sangit ka aanand kyonkar le pata tha.

aur jitana aanand mujhe is kam men milata tha, utana kisi any kam men nahin aata tha. yah kam keval sangrah ka junoon tha, kyonki main in keeton kee chir fad nahin karata tha. han, itana zaroor hai ki prakashit vivaranon ke sath in keeton ke bahari lakshan yada-kada mila leta tha, lekin main unake nam zaroor rakh leta tha. keet sangrah ke bare men main apane utsah ke pramannasvaroop ek ghatana batata hoon.

tabhi mujhe tisara bhring bhi dikhaee diya. main use bhi chhodana nahin chahata tha, isalie mainne hath men pakade hue ek bhring ko munh men rakh liya. durbhagyavash us keet men se koee tikha taral padarth nikala jisase meri jibh jal gayi aur main thoo thoo kar utha. bhring munh se bahar gira aur sath hi tisara bhring bhi hath n aaya.
aur isi tarah daladali ilakon se sarakande lane vale bajaron kee tali men se kooda kachara bator lata tha. is tarah se mujhe kuchh durlabh prajati ke bhring bhi mile.

jitani mujhe us samay huee, jab mainne stifana kee ilastreshansa aofa britisha insektsa, men yah jaduee shabd dekhe - sar, si darvin dvara sangrihita. mere door ke rishte ke chachere bhaee dablayoo darvina foksa ek chatur aur bahut hi khushamijaj vyakti the, us samay kraist kalej men padhate the. main inake sath kafi hil mil gaya tha aur inhonne hi mujhe keet vigyan se parichit karaya. isake bad main triniti kalej ke elbarta ve se bhi parichit huaa aur unake sath bhi keet sangrah ke lie jane laga. aage chalakar yahi sajjan suvikhyat puratattvavetta bane. sath men usi kalej ke ech thampasana bhi hote the. bad men yah prasiddh krishivigyani, gret relave ke cheyaramain aur sansad sadasy bhi bane. lagata hai ki bhringi keeton ke sangrah kee meri ruchi men hi bhavishy men mere jivan kee safalata kee sootr chhipa huaa tha.

unamen se kaee ne mere dimag par amit chhap chhod di thi. jahan jahan mujhe achchha sangrah karane ka mauka laga un sabhi khambhon, purane vrikshon aur nadi ke kinaron ko main aaj bhi yad kar sakata hoon. un dinon penagiyasa kruksa mejara namak pyara bhringi keet ek khajane kee tarah se tha, aur don men ghoomate hue mainne ek bhringi keet dekha jo ki sadak par daudata huaa ja raha tha. mainne bhag kar use pakada, aur turant hi mainne andaza laga liya ki yah penagiyasa kruksa mejara se thoda alag hai. bad men pata chala ki vah pi kvadripanktetasa tha, jo ki isakee ek kism ya isi kee nikat sambandhi prajati hai, lekin isakee banavat men thoda antar hai. mainne un dinon lisinas ko kabhi jinda nahin dekha tha, yah keet bhi anajan vyakti ke lie kale kairabaiduasa bhring se shayad hi alag lage, lekin mere beton ne yahan ek aisa hi keet pakada aur main turant jan gaya ki yah mere lie naya hai. to bhi pichhale bis sal se mainne british bhringi keet nahin dekha hai.

profesar hensalo ke sath meri dosti. kaimbrij aane se pahale mainne apane bhaee se unake bare men suna tha. profesar hensalo vigyan kee har shakha ke bare men janate the, aur main unake prati natamastak tha. saptah men ek bar ve opan haus rakhate the. us din yoonivarsiti men vigyan vishay padhane vale sabhi andar grejuet aur purane sadasy ekatr hote the. foks ke madhyam se jald hi mujhe bhi sabha men shamil hone ka nimantran mila aur usake bad main niyamit roop se vahan jane laga. hensalo ke sath ghulane milane men mujhe adhik samay nahin laga. kaimbrij men bad ke dinon men main jyadatar unhin ke sath sair karane jata tha. kuchh gurujan to mujhe yah bhi kahane lage the, hensalo ke sath ghoomane vala vyakti aur aksar sham ko ve mujhe apane parivar ke sath bhojan par bula lete the. vanaspati shastra, keet vigyan, rasayan, khanij vigyan aur bhoovigyan men unhen vyapak gyan tha. lambe samay tak nirantar chalane vale sookshm avalokan se nishkarsh nikalane kee unakee ruchi bahut gahari thi. unakee nirnnay shakti advitiy aur unaka dimag santulit tha, lekin mujhe koee bhi to aisa nahin dikhaee deta tha jo yah kahe ki profesar hensalo men aatm pragya nahin thi.
ve sushil the aur doosare ke dil ko jit lete the, lekin ve kisi bhi galat kam ke khilaf bahut hi jaldi aakrosh se bhar jate the, aur fauran hi use rokane ka prayas bhi karate the.

aur jel le jate samay ugr bhid ne unhen havaladar ke hathon se jhapat liya, aur usi dhoolabhari tatha patharili sadak par donon uthaeegiron kee tangen pakadakar ghasitane lage. ve donon hi sir se pair tak dhool se sane hue the. lat ghoonson aur pattharon kee mar se unake chehare lahooluhan the. donon hi adhamare hue ja rahe the. bhid itani jyada thi ki un donon aafat ke mare uthaeegiron kee ek jhalak bhar dekh pae the ham donon. us bhayankar drishy ko dekhakar hensalon ke chehare par jo pida mainne dekhi vaisi mainne apane jivan men kabhi nahin dekhi. unhonne bar bar bhid ko chirakar rasta banane kee koshish kee lekin vah to asambhav tha. ve turant meyar ke pas bhage aur mujhase kaha ki unake pichhe aane ke bajaye main kuchh aur pulisavalon ko bula laoon. bakee to yad nahin, han itana zaroor huaa ki pulis donon uthaeegiron ko jinda hi jel pahunchane men safal rahi.

unase isake pakke praman milate hain. hichem men rahane ke dauran to unhonne bahuton ka bhala kiya. aise insan ke sath to meri ghanishthata honi hi thi, aur mere khyal se yah mere lie apar labhadayak bhi raha.

balki sarvavidit hai. is ghatana se ve to bahut kam prabhavit hue lekin mujhe unhonne yahi ehasas karaya ki mainne svayan hi bahut ullekhaniy tathy ko bhali prakar samajh liya hai. sath hi main isake lie bhi kritasankalp ho utha ki ab apani khoj ko lekar itani jaldabaji nahin karoonga.

lekin mainne unake vyakhyan kabhi nahin sune. hensalo aur liyonard jenyans men jija sale ka rishta tha. liyonard bhi kabhi kabhar hensalo ke yahan rukate the. inhonne aage chalakar prakritik itihas men bahut se utkrisht nibandh prakashit karae. liyonard jab fains svathama bulabek kee sima par rah rahe the, to main khas mehaman ke taur par unake pas gaya tha. unake sath bhi prakrit itihas par mainne khoob baten keen. ham milakar sair ko gae. main apane se umr men bade kaee logon se parichit huaa jo vigyan ke bare men adhik chinta nahin karate the, lekin ve sab hensalo ke dost the. inamen ek skotamain bhi the jo sar alekjendar raimase ke bhaee the, aur jisas kalej men shikshak the. bahut kam umr men hi inaka dehant ho gaya tha. ek mistar daves bhi the jo bad men haraforda ke din bane. garibon ke lie shiksha vyavastha taiyar karane men inhonne bahut nam kamaya. in logon aur aise hi gyanavan log tatha hensalo sab milakar gramin ilakon men door door tak adhyayan yatraon par jate the. inamen mujhe bhi bulaya jata tha aur sabhi mujhe tahe dil se sath rakhate the.
jisane mujhe gubarailon ka sangrah karate dekhakar kaha tha ki tum ek din royala sosayati ke failo banoge. usakee aatma kee yah aavaz mujhe us samay nirarthak lagi thi.

remase aur deves ke samane isaka vachan kiya, kyonki pahale kisi mauke par mainne tenarifel kee shobha ka jikr kiya tha, aur hamari mandali ke kuchh logon ne yah bhi kaha tha ki ve vahan jane ka prayas karenge, lekin mera vichar hai ki ve sab adhoore man se kah rahe the. lekin main to bhitar se taiyar tha aur landan ke ek marchent se milakar jalayan ke bare men poochhatachh bhi kar chuka tha, lekin meri yah yojana bigen par samudri yatra ke aage dhari rah gayi.

kuchh padhaee karane aur chhoti moti yatraon men nikal jata tha. patajhad ke dauran mera sara samay nishanebaji men jata tha. main isamen se jyadatar samay vudahaus aur mayer men guzarata tha. kaee bar main aayatan ke raees ke sath bhi rahata tha. kul milakar kaimbrij men bitae gae tinon baras mere jivan ke sarvadhik khushi bhare rahe. meri sehat bahut badhiya rahi aur kul milakar main kabhi dukhi nahin raha.

isalie antim pariksha uttirn karane ke bad bhi mujhe do satron tak roka gaya tab hensalo ne hi mujhe samajha-bujha kar bhoovigyan ka adhyayan shuroo karane ke lie kaha. isalie shrapashayar lautane ke bad main bhookhandon kee vyavastha ka adhyayan karane laga aur shroojaberi ke aasapas ke ilakon ke rangadar nakshe bhi taiyar kie. prachin chattanon ka bhoovaigyanik anveshan karane ke lie agast kee shuruaat men profesar sedavik narthavels kee yatra shuroo karane vale the hensalo ne unase kaha ki ve mujhe bhi sath chalane kee ijazat den. sab taiyari karake ve mere pita ke ghar aakar ruke.

lekin us majadoor ne shankh bechane se mana kar diya. main is bat se poori tarah sahamat tha ki use yah shankh vastav men gaddhe men se hi mila tha. mainne sedavik ko yah bat bataee to sandeh nahin sach men ve ekadam bole ki kisi ne ise gaddhe men fenk diya hoga lekin ve yah bhi bole ki yadi yah vahin pada rahata to bhoovigyan ke lie durbhagy kee bat hoti, kyonki yah hamen midalaind kauntij men dharataliy mitti ke jamav ke bare men kafi baton kee janakari dega. daladal kee ye paraten vastut himanadiy yug se sambandhit hain, aur bad ke varshon men ye mujhe aarkatik ke toote hue shankhon men bhi mile. lekin us samay main ekadam hairan rah gaya ki sedavik is adbhut tathy par khush kyon nahin hue ki ushnnakatibandhiy ilake ka shankh yahan inglaind ke bichon bich ilake men zamin ke bhitar kahan se aaya hoga. yadyapi mainne bahut-si vaigyanik pustakon ka adhyayan kiya tha, lekin isase pahale mujhe itani gaharaee se yah ahasas nahin huaa tha ki tathyon ka samoohikaran karane men hi vaigyanikata hai, kyonki isake bad hi koee samany niyam ya nishkarsh nikala ja sakata hai.

konave, bengor aur kaipal koorig ke lie nikal pade. is yatra ka ek labh to mujhe yah mil hi gaya ki kisi desh ke bhoovigyan ka adhyayan kis prakar kiya jae. sedavik mujhe kaee bar apane hi samanantar chalane ko kahate aur kahate ki chattanon ke namoone lete chalo tatha nakshe par unaka star vinyas bhi chihnit karo. mujhe thoda-sa sandeh hai ki unhonne yah meri bhalaee ke lie kiya tha, kyonki main unakee sahayata karane men bahut hi udasin rahata tha. is yatra ke dauran ek vishesh anubhav bhi huaa ki jab tak dhyan dekar n dekha jae to utkrishtatam lakshan ko bhi nazar-andaz kar dena kitana aasan hota hai. kvem idval men ham donon ne kaee kaee ghante lagakar sabhi chattanon ko bade hi dhyan se dekha, kyonki sedavik unamen jivashm fosil talash rahe the, lekin ham donon hi ne apane charon or bikhare pade himanadiy lakshanon par zara bhi dhyan nahin diya hamane samatal tarashi chattanon, idhar udhar pade shilakhandon, aavasanik aur parshviy himodhon par nazar hi nahin dali. halanki ye lakshan itane suspasht hain ki isake kaee varsh bad filasfikala maigajin men prakashit ek lekh men mainne yah zikr kiya ki vah ghati apani kahani thik usi tarah se kah rahi thi jis tarah se jalakar khak huaa koee makan kahata hai. yadi yah ghati abhi bhi himanad ke pani se bhari hoti to ye sabhi lakshan itane mukhar n hote jitane is samay hain.

aur is tarah kee yatra ka mainne khoob aanand uthaya. main baramauth men padh rahe kaimbrij ke purane sathiyon se mila aur vahan se shroojaberi lauta aur nishanebaji ke lie mayer chala gaya. us samay mujh par bhoovigyan ya kisi any vigyan kee banisbat chakor ke shikar ka bhoot savar tha.

jo unake sath bina kuchh bhi vetan lie bigal kee samudr yatra par chal sake. use prakritivadi ke roop men kam karana hoga aur badale men use kaiptan ray apane kebin kee sabhi kalakritiyan denge. jahan tak mera vishvas hai mainne apane yatra sansmaran rojanamache men un sabhi ghatanaon ka jikr kiya hai jo us dauran ghatit hueen. yahan main keval itana hi bataoonga ki main bhi is prastav ko manane ke lie poori tarah se ichchhuk tha. lekin mere pita ne isaka purazor virodh kiya, aur meri bhalaee ke lie yah bhi kaha,yadi tum samany buddhi ka aisa koee vyakti bata sako jo tumhen vahan jane kee salah de, to main bhi sahamati de doonga. isalie mainne usi sham inkar karate hue javab likh diya. agali subah main pahali sitambar kee taiyari karane ke lie mayer chala gaya. main nishanebaji kar raha tha ki mujhe ankal ne bulavaya. unhonne mujhase shroojaberi chalane ke lie kaha aur bole ki ve mere pita se chalakar bat karenge ki us prastav ko manana buddhimani ka kam hoga. mere pita hamesha yah manate the ki mere ankal vishv ke sarvadhik samajhadar vyakti hain. unakee bat sunate hi pitaji ne fauran sahamati de di. main kaimbrij men bahut fijoolakharchi karata tha, isake lie mainne pitaji ko bharosa dilaya ki bigel yatra ke dauran main apane bhatte se jyada kharch nahin karoonga. pitaji ne muskarate hue kaha, lekin unhonne mujhe bataya hai ki tum bahut buddhiman ho.

aur is bat ko pakka manate the ki ve kisi bhi insan ke chehare se usaka charitr jan sakate the. unhen sandeh tha ki mere jaisi nak vale insan men is samudr yatra ke lie paryapt takat aur ichchhashakti bhi hogi. lekin main samajhata hoon ki bad men unhen yah to santosh ho gaya hoga ki meri nak ne galat aabhas diya tha.

kisi bhi kami ke prati udar, bahadur, dridh pratigy aur gazab ke oorjavan to the hi, apane sabhi matahaton ke lie joshile dost bhi the. ve jise sahayata pane layak samajhate the, us vyakti ke lie kuchh bhi kar guzarate the. ve ek sajile, sudarshan vyakti the. unaka vyavahar bahut adhik shishtata liye hue tha. unakee sabhi aadaten unake mama prasiddh lard kesalarig se milati thin, jaisa ki riyo ke ministar ne bataya tha. beshak unaka chehara charls dvitiy se milata-julata tha. isi silasile men doktar vilish ne apana ek elabam diya tha. unhin chitron men se ek chitr fitj ray se bahut milata julata tha. bad men chitr ke niche likha nam mainne padha doktar ee sobeskee stuaart, kaunt daalbain jo ki usi samrat ke vanshajon men se the.

aur fir ilzam lagane men ve kisi ko bhi bakhshate nahin the. ve mere prati kafi dayalu the, lekin unake sath ghanishtata kar pana tedhi khir tha. lekin ek hi kebin men rahane ke karan ham donon kee aadaton men kuchh ghal-mel to ho hi gaya. ham kaee bar ek doosare se ulajh bhi jate. aise hi yatra kee shuruaat men brajil ke bahiya namak sthan par unhonne gulami pratha ka paksh liya aur isakee badi tarif kee, jabaki mujhe gulami pratha se nafarat thi. unhonne mujhe bataya ki ve ek aise vyakti se mil chuke hain jisake pas kaee gulam hain. unhonne svayan hi anek gulamon ko poochha tha ki kya ve khush hain, aur kya ve aazad hona chahate hain. is prashn par sabhi ka javab tha - nahin. mainne us samay upahas ke lahaze men kaha tha ki malik ke samane usake gulamon ka vah javab koee mayane nahin rakhata. isase ve bahut nakhush ho gae aur bole ki isaka matalab yah bhi ho sakata hai, ki main unake sath rahana nahin chahata. mainne socha ki ab jahaj to chhodana padega, lekin jaise hi doosare logon ko is jhagade kee bhanak lagi, to jahaj ke kaiptan ne fauran hi apane laiftinent ko bheja ki jao aur ray ke gusse ko shant karane ke lie darvin ko khari-khoti sunao.

aur isi ne mere poore kairiyar ka khaka taiyar kiya. lekin ye sab kuchh ek chhoti-si ghatana par aadharit tha. ghatana kuchh yoon thi ki jis din mere ankal tis mil savari chalakar mujhe shroojaberi lae the, sansar men bahut kam natedaron ne aisa kiya hoga, aur to aur meri nak bhi isamen aade aa rahi thi. main hamesha yah mahasoos karata hoon ki mere dimag ke lie is yatra ne vastavik prashikshan ya talim di thi. isase mujhe prakritik itihas kee kaee paraton kee janakari mili aur chizon ko samajhane kee meri takat men badhotari huee, halanki ye sari yogyataen mujhamen pahale se maujood thin.

lekin bahut sthanon par chattanon aur jivashmon ke sanstaron aur prakriti kee janch karane ke sath sath yadi man men yah prashn aur aasha bhi rakhi jae ki isake alava aur kya mil sakata hai, to us bhoo-bhag ke bare men kuchh tathy ujagar hone shuroo ho jate hain. is prakar sari sanrachana hi kamo-besh subodh banane lagati hai. main apane sath leyel likhit prinsipalsa aofa jyoloji ka pahala khand bhi laya tha, jise main savadhanipoorvak padhata raha. yah pustak kaee mayanon men mere lie bahut fayademand rahi. varde antarip namak dvip sent jego vah pahali jagah thi, jisaka mainne nirikshan kiya, aur vahin mujhe pata chal gaya ki bhoovigyan kee janakari par jitane lekhakon kee rachanaon ko main padh chuka tha ya bad men padha, unamen sabase nayab tarika leyel ka tha.

sabhi prakar ke jivon ka sangrah. main inaka sankshipt byaura likhata aur kuchhek samudri jivon kee chhoti moti chirafad bhi karata tha. par ek kami rahi ki draing men hath tang hone aur sharir rachana kee zaroorat bhar janakari n hone ke karan is yatra ke dauran mainne jo sansmaran likhe, ve sab bekar ho gae. is tarah se mainne kafi samay barabad kiya. han, itana zaroor raha ki krasteshiyans kee kuchh janakari hasil huee jisakee madad se main bad men siripediya par apana prabandh granth likh saka.

yadi unakee tulana beintaha mehanat aur dhyan lagakar kam karane se kee jae to ve isakee tulana men kuchh bhi nahin the. us samay to main mehanat aur dilo-jan se kam karane ka path padh raha tha. us samay main jo kuchh padhata ya sochata tha usaka sidha talluk us chiz se rahata tha jo main dekh chuka tha ya dekhane kee sambhavana thi. meri yahi aadat is yatra ke agale panch baras tak barakarar rahi. main pakke taur par kah sakata hoon ki isi prashikshan kee badaulat main vigyan men kuchh hath panv mar paya.

aur ant men yah kam mere naukar ne sanbhal liya, kyonki ab yah nishanebaji mere kam ke aade aane lagi thi, khasakar kisi ilake kee bhoovaigyanik sanrachana taiyar karate samay. halanki man ke kisi kone men main yah bhi mahasoos kar raha tha ki kisi chiz ko dekhane aur saty kee kasauti par kasane kee takat shikari ke kam se jyada hai. is yatra ke dauran kiye gaye kamon se mere dimag ka kitana vikas huaa tha yah isase spasht ho jaega ki mere pitaji kabhi sandeh men koee kam nahin nipatate the aur lalat shastr men unhen koee ruchi nahin thi, lekin ve badi paini nazar rakhate the, tabhi to samudr yatra se lautane ke bad mujhe dekhate hi, meri bahanon ko bula kar bole, kyon ji! isake sir ka to huliya hi badal gaya hai.

ko main plemauth men bigal par fitj ray se milane gaya. vahan se shroojaberi gaya. apane pita aur bahanon se lambi judaee ke lie vidaee li aur chal diya ek aur safar ke lie. main 24 aktoobar ko plemauth pahunchakar vahin rahane laga aur 27 disambar ko duniya ka chakkar lagane ke lie yatra shuroo karane tak vahin raha, kyonki bhari andhadon ke karan hamare jahaj bigal ke do prayas vifal ho chuke the, aur hamara jahaj vahin inglaind ke samudr tat par langar dale khada raha. plemauth men ye do mahine behad mushkil bhare guzare. halanki main kisi n kisi kam dhandhe men laga hi rahata tha. apane parivar aur mitron se lambi judaee kee yad hi mujhe hatash kar deti thi. aur mausam bhi apane rang dikha hi raha tha.

to usake aadhar par mainne yah bhi man liya ki mujhe dil kee bimari hai. mainne kisi daktar se salah bhi nahin li kyenki main poori tarah se man chuka tha ki vah kya faisala sunane vala hai, yahi ki main samudri yatra ke kabil nahin hoon, aur yahan main har khatara uthane ko kamar kase baitha tha.

aur ye chhitaput ghatanaen bad men yad bhi nahin rahin. mainne apane kuchh vaigyanik lekhon main bhi inaka kafi upayog kiya. misal ke taur par, sent helena jaise kuchh dvipon kee bhoovaigyanik sanrachana ko spasht karate hue moonga dvipon ke nirman aadi ka samadhan kiya. yahi nahin, gailapegos dvip samooh ke bahut se tapuon par pae jane vale pashuon aur paudhon ke ekal sambandhon ko bhi dhyan men rakha aur dakshini amarika men pae jane vale jivon aur paudhon par bhi lekh likhe.

kyonki mujhe khoj bin men aanand aata tha aur prakritik vigyan se jude tathyon ke vishal punj men kuchh aur tathy bhi jodane kee meri balavati ichchha thi. itana hi nahin, vaigyanikon ke bich apane lie thik-thak jagah bana pana bhi meri abhilasha thi, yah main nahin kah sakata ki meri abhilasha mere sahakarmiyon se adhik thi ya kam.

vahan ke bhoovigyan par ek kitab likhoon. is vichar ne mujhe romanch se bhar diya. yah mere lie avismaraniy kshan the. mere man par aaj bhi vah chhavi jas kee tas ankit hai ki lave se bani khadi chattan ke niche main khada tha, oopar sooraj chamak raha tha, aas pas registani ilakon men pae jane vale kuchh paudhe sir uthae khade the aur mere pairon ke pas samudri jal men jivit moonge apani chhata bikher rahe the. yatra ke hi dauran fitj ray ne mujhase kaha ki main apane kuchh rojanamache padhakar unhen sunaoon. sunate hi ve bole ki ye to bhaee, chhapane chahiye, aur is tarah se doosari pustak ka aagaj ho gaya.

jisamen meri bahanon ne likha tha ki sedavik ghar aakar pitaji se mile the aur unase kaha tha ki ab mujhe vaigyanikon ke bich jagah milana tay hi hai. us samay main yah nahin jan paya tha ki unhen meri gatividhiyon kee janakari kaise mili hogi. bad men mainne suna aur mujhe bharosa bhi huaa ki mainne kuchh khat hensalo ko bhi likhe the. un khaton ko unhonne kaimbrij kee filasfikal sosayati ke samaksh padha, aur unhen vahan vitaran ke lie chhapavaya bhi tha. mainne jitane jivashmon ka sangrah kiya tha, vah bhi hensalo ko bhijava diya tha. is sangrah ne bhi jivashm vaigyanikon ko kafi aakarshit kiya tha.
lekin yah khushi kshan bhangur hoti thi. par itana to tha hi ki prasiddhi pane ke lie main apane raste se jara-sa bhi diga nahin.

mayer, kaimbrij aur landan ke bich khoob daud bhag karane ke bad main 13 disambar ko kaimbrij men ghar lekar rahane laga. is samay tak mera sara sangrah hensalon ke pas raha. mainne vahan par tin mahine bitae aur profesar milar kee sahayata se khanijon aur chattanon par parikshanon men juta raha.

jiolojikal sosayati men kaee lekhon ka path kiya aur jiolojikala aabjarveshansa patrika ke lie vrittant taiyar karana shuroo kar diya. isake alava, jooloji aofa di vayaja aofa di bigala ke prakashan kee taiyari men jut gaya. julaee men mainne da aorijina aofa spisheza ke lie tathyon ke sangrah ke lie not buk likhani shuroo kar di. isaka ullekh mainne kafi pahale shuroo kar diya tha. isake bad agale bis varsh tak mainne apana kam rukane nahin diya.

lekin mujhe yah vichar tyagana pada kyonki egasij ne gleshiyar jheel siddhant ka pratipadan kiya tha, aur us samay janakari kee sthiti ke tahat koee aur varnnan sambhav bhi nahin tha. mainne samudr kee sankriya ke paksh men tark diya, halanki meri yah bhool mere lie ek sabak bhi thi ki kuchh chizon ke bare men vigyan par bharosa chhodana padata hai.
aur bigal se samudr yatra karate samay jab ham bich bich men adhyayan yatraon par jate the, aur koee ek hi kitab leni hoti thi to miltan meri pahali pasand hote the.
janavari 29, 1839, aura apara govara strita men rahane se lekara 14 sitambara 1842 ko landana chhodakara douna men basane taka

halanki jitani mehanat mainne is dauran kee thi vah apane jivan men itani hi samayavadhi men fir kabhi nahin kee. isaka karan bar bar kee bimari aur lambi tatha gambhir bimari ka ek jhataka lagana raha. jab main thoda khali hota tha to jyadatar samay korala rifsa par lagata tha. isaka lekhan mainne apani shadi se pahale shuroo kiya tha aur isaka aakhiri proof mainne 6 maee 1842 ko padha. vaise to yah pustak chhoti-si thi, lekin isamen meri bis mah kee mehanat lagi, kyonki mujhe prashant mahasagar ke dvipon par sabhi lekh padhane aur kaee chart dekhane pade. is pustak ko kaee vaigyanikon ne uchch stariy bataya aur main samajhata hoon ki isamen die gae siddhant ab apani jagah bana chuke hain.

Hello, Abhi ek trha ki Wish Website Script with Name jo bhut jada trend me chal rahi hai, Whatsapp par. jisme hame whatsapp par ek message aata hai or usme ek link hoti hai. jispar click karne ke baad hamare naam ke sath animation me ek wish hoti hai. Agar aap Whatsapp use karte hai to iss trha ka message bhi aapke pass jarur kabhi na kabhi aaya hoga. or agar aap aesi website banana chate hai to iss post ko pura read kare. jisme me aapko Blogspot Blog ki madad se iss website ko banane ki steps batane wala hu. Demo 15 August Whish Site Ye jo Script hai wo Indian Independence Day yahi 15 August ke upar hai par aap usko edit karke kisi bhi event ke liye bana sakte hai. wo sab steps aapko issi post me mil jayegi. Independence Day Wish site ka Demo to aapne dekh hi liya hoga, agar same wesi hi website aapko banani hai to aap in steps ko Follow kare. Step 1 Sabse phele Blogger.com par jaye. or fir Gmail ID se login kare. Step 2 Ab aapko New Blog create karna hai, Blog create karna bhut hi aasan hai. Blogger par Blog kaise banaye uski jankari yaha step by step di hui hai. Aapko jis bhi naam se Blog banana ho aap bana sakte hai, par thoda dhiyan rakhe jis event ke liye aap bana rahe hai usse milta julta naam ho. Step 3 Blog ke dashboard me aane ke baad, Theme par jaye. uske baad Contempo me 2nd Template ko select kare. Step 4 Ab Template ko Apply karene ke liye Apply to Blog ki button par click kare. Step 5 Ab Page me sabse niche jaye, uske baad Revert to Classic themes par click kare. Step 6 Ab Template ke phele ke code ko delete karke jo niche Script Code diya hai wo dale. Ab aap Blog ko oepn karke dekhe, Boom aapka Blog teyar hai. Wish Script website kaise banani hai uski puri process to aap upar dekh chuke hai. chaliye ab jaan lete hai Script Code jo hame website me dalna hai wo kaise dalna hai or kaise usko edit karna hai. Agar aap Iss Script ko kisi or festival ke liye use karna chate hai to wo bhi kar sakte hai, simple aapko iske code change karne hoge jo bhut hi aasan hai. Ye jo Code hai wo aapko Blogger theme me dalna hai. Website URL Code me 2 jagha Website URL likha hua hai, uski jagha aapne jo blog banaya hai uska URL copy karke dale. ! Ad Code Enter Here Code me 2 jagha hai ! Ad Code 2 Enter Here hai, uske niche aap apna Ad Code laga sakte hai. ye dono ad upar or niche dikhege. ! Background MP3 sound iske niche MP3 ka code aap usko change kar sakte hai dusre song ke sath. ya fir remove karna ho to uss code ko delete kar dijiye. ! Google Analytics Code Here Kitna Traffic aa raha hai, wo Google Track karne ke liye Google Analytics ka Code iske niche dale. ! Wish Message Here Jo Wish Message hai wo aap yaha Code me change kar sakte hai. Purane message ko delete karke new dal dijiye. Image replace Script me jitni bhi image hai wo bhi aap change kar sakte hai. Agar aapko koi image change karni hai to uska URL Change kar dijiye. Image ko change karne ke liye sabse phele to jo Image abhi hai uska URL copy kare. ab Jo New Image dalna hai, usko New post create karke upload kare usme, uske baad waha se image ka URL copy karke template me purani image ki jagha replace kare. Agar Independence Day ke aalawa kisi or Festival ke liye script use karna hai to inn codes ko bhi edit kare script me. To jitni bhi Code ki editing hai wo sab karne ke baad, apne Code ko Blogger Template me dale or Save kar dijiye. Aapko jis bhi Ad company ke ad lagana ho aap laga sakte hai. Agar aap Adsense use karna chate hai to dhiyan rakhe, jab bhut jada traffic aaye sirf utne time lagaye, q ki ye Adsense ki Policy ko follow nahi karta to adsense account ban bhi ho sakta hai. Aapne Wish website bana to li, par agar aapko usse income karna hai to aapka kaam abhi khatam nah hota. Aapko apni website Viral karni hogi. Website ko Viral karne ke liye aap ek alag number se Whstapp par account banaye, or Google par search kare jo bhi aapki wish site se usse related bhut se Whatsapp Group ki link mil jayegi. jada se jada Group join karke unme apni link share kare. Agar aap website ko thoda or professional banana chate hai to aap Domain register karke add Blogger me Add kare. At Last
lausen men tike. hotal ke thik samane jheel thi. patajhad ke din the, mausam thoda shushk tha lekin pahad sundar dikhate the.

svadisht grin plam, seb aur aaduon ke alava bahut sare falon ke darakht hain. vahan par sabjiyon ke khet bhi the aur vahan khoob sabjiyan ugatin. falon aur sabjiyon ke mausam men ham kahin bhi gaye hote, inaka aanand lene ke lie khas taur par vapis aate. ye lautana tirth yatra kee tarah hota. taires ke samane panch ekad ka lon tha jisamen oonche shanadar darakht the aur vahan se door pahadon aur jheel ka nazara nazar aata.
usase hamen laga ki ham ise apane bajat ke bhitar sanbhal sakate hain. is tarah se ham korsiyar ke ganv men rahane aa gaye. yahan kee kul aabadi 1350 thi.
mainne ek tarah se kshamayachana karate hue kaha,main bahut boodha ho gaya hoon aur ab ye sab badatamijiyan sahan nahin kar sakata.
mainne svitzaralaind men basane ka faisala kar liya hai. hamane hath milaye aur bat vahin khatm ho gayi.

unhonne kaha ki sari aupacharikataon ko poora karane men kam se kam pauna ghanta lagega. kya bakavas hai? mainne oona se kaha,ye ajib bat hai ki isamen itana samay lagana chahiye. main tumhare sath chalata hoon.

koee amerikee jab apani nagarikata chhodata hai to use maloom hona chahiye ki vah kya kar raha hai aur usakee dimagi halat sahi honi chahiye. yahi vajah hai ki hamane prashn poochhane kee yah pranali rakhi hai. yah nagarik ke hiton kee raksha ke liye hai.

ivor montagoo, sar edavard, bedingatanabeharens, donald oldan stivart, ela vintar, graham grin, je bi pristale, maiks renahart aur dagalas feyarabainks jooniyar aadi the. halanki kuchh mitron se ham bahut kam mil pate fir bhi unaka khyal rahat deta tha jaise yah janana sukh deta hai ki kahin koee tat hai aur kabhi ham us port par jahaj se gae to vahan jayenge.

khrushchev! lekin unhonne hath hilakar mana kar diya. ve tang aa chuke the. khrushchev! charli chaiplin!! hamare eskort ne chillakar kaha. bulganin aur khrushchev donon hi ruke aur mude. unake chehare khushi se damakane lage. main bahut khush huaa. kuchalati pisati bhid men hamara parichay karaya gaya. ek dubhashie ke jariye khrushchev ne bataya ki roosi log meri filmen kitani adhik pasand karate hain. isake bad hamen thodi si vodaka pesh kee gayi. mujhe lagata hai ki kali mirch kee pudiya usi men gir gayi thi, lekin oona ko vodaka achchhi lagi.
doosare kamare men chalate hain. khrushchev ne kaha. bhid ko hamare irade ke bare men pata chal gaya aur vahan bhayankar mara mari shuroo ho gayi.
mera beta ganbhir yuvak hai aur vah injiniyaring kee padhaee ke lie bahut mehanat kar raha hai. lekin kabhi-kabhar vah mauj maza kar leta hai. mera to yahi khyal hai.

mujhe kattaee bura nahin lagega. bad men mistar aur misej stasen aur mistar aur misej gromiko ko bhitar laya gaya. khrushchev ne tab kshama mangate hue kaha ki kuchh hi minaton men ve unase furasat pa lenge aur kamare ke doosare kone men stasen aur gromiko se bat karane ke lie chale gaye.

mujhe nahin lagata ki asali amerika nyoo yark men prashant ke taton par hai. vyaktigat roop se mujhe midal vest jyada achchha lagata hai. vahan uttari aur dakshini dekota, minipolis aur sent pol jagahen achchhi lagati hain. mujhe lagata hai ki vahi log sachche amerikee hain.

oh, main kitani khush hoon ki aapane ye kaha. mere pati aur main minesota se hi aaye hain. ve narvas ho kar hansi aur apani bat doharaya,mujhe kitana achchha laga ki aapane yah bat kahi. mera khyal hai ki ve yah soch kar chal rahi thin ki main amerika ke khilaf dher sara zahar ugaloonga aur us desh se mujhe jo ghav mile hain, unase mujhamen kaduvahat bhar gayi hai. aisi bat nahin thi aur agar aisa hota bhi to bhi main misej stasen jaisi aakarshak mahila ke samane apana dukhada to nahin hi rota.
hamare vitarak se yah sandesh mila tha ki ve sar vinstan ko yah film unake ghar par dikhaye jane kee anumati chahate hain.

mujhe bahut adhik khushi huee thi. kuchh hi din bad aabhar dete hue unaka bahut hi pyara patr aaya tha jisamen unhonne likha tha ki film unhen kitani achchhi lagi hai. ab sar vinstan hamari maej ke samane khade the aur hamase kah rahe the,kaho, kaise ho? us kaho, kaise ho men narazagi ka put tha. main turant khada ho gaya aur muskurate hue oona ka parichay karaya. us samay oona khana khane ke bad sone ja hi rahi thi.

krantikari senaon, kamyunist prachar, bhadakaoo bhid jutane ya sadak ke kinare diye gaye bhashanon ka natija nahin hai. ye to shadayantrakariyon ke chhal kapat ka natija hai. ye antarrashtriy vigyapanadata - rediyo, telivijan aur moshan filmen, karen aur traiktar, sains ke naye naye avishkar aur gati badhaye jane aur sanchar kee vazah se huee hai. yahi ve krantikari kadam rahe hain jo samrajyon ke dhahane kee vazahen rahi hain.

ye bharatavasiyon kee behatari ke lie hai. unhonne bataya ki ve pahale hi panchavarshiy yojana shuroo kar chuke hain. neharoo raste bhar bahut samajhadari se bat karate rahe jabaki unaka draivar kam se kam sattar mil prati ghanta ya usase jyada kee spid se tang sadakon aur tikhe modon par hoshiyari se gadi chala raha tha. neharoo bharat kee rajaniti ke bare men samajhane men vyast the aur mujhe ye bat svikar karani hi hogi, main kar kee gati ko dekhata, pichhe kee sit par baitha itana sahama huaa tha ki unakee aadhi baten sun hi nahin paya. kar ke brek lagate, ham aage kee taraf ludhak jate lekin neharoo bina ruke bolate jate. bhagavan ka shukr hai ki kar aakhirakar ek chaurahe par ek pal ke lie rukee jahan unakee putree ko hamase vida hona tha. tabhi mainne dekha ki ve behad pyare aur khyal rakhane vale pita ban gaye. unhonne apani beti ko gale se lagaya aur pyar se kaha,apana khyal rakhana. mujhe lagata hai ki ye shabd putree kee taraf se pita ko kahe jate to jyada achchha lagata.

chini dootavas ne fon karake poochha ki kya main jineva men chau en lai ke samane siti laits ke pradarshan kee anumati doonga? chau en lai yah nirnnay lene valon kee dhuri men the ki yuddh hoga ya shanti sthapit kee jayegi.
ye shor badhata hi gaya. jab chin ke vijeta mao tse tung ne vishal jan samooh dekha to ek pal ke lie khade rah gaye tab unhonne donon hathon se apana chehara dhaka aur foot foot kar roye.
main chini janata aur sab logon ke lie behatar zindagi ke lie unakee aashaon aur ichchhaon men poore dil se unake sath hoon.

ve apane kairiyar ke shikhar par thin aur unhonne yoorop aur amerika donon jagah dhoom macha rakhi thi. lekin 1960 men beljiyam men ve ek tren ke payadan se fisal gayin aur unhen asaptal le jaya gaya jahan par unakee mrityu ho gayi.

pados men bahut sare filmi sitaren aur lekhak raha karate the. ham aksar jorj aur benita saindars se mulakat kar lete hain aur noel kovard bhi hamare padosi hain. vasant ke dinon men hamare kaee amerikee aur angrez dost hamase milane aate hain. troomain kapote, jo kabhi kabhar svitazaralaind men kam karate hain, aksar aa jate hain. eestar kee chhuttion ke dauran ham bachchon ko dakshini aayaralaind le jate hain. ye ek aisi yatra hoti hai jisakee poora parivar har varsh rah dekhata hai.

pres, telivijan aur vanijyik vigyapan baji ne mujhe amerikee jivan shaili se poori tarah se door kar diya hai. main sikke ka doosara paksh chahata hoon. jivan ka aasan vyaktigat bhav chahata hoon. badi badi galiyan aur aakash chhooti imaraten nahin jo hamesha bade karobar aur unakee aur bhi badi upalabdhiyon kee yad dilati rahati hain.
bevarali hils vale ghar kee hamari naukarani ne suna ki ham vapis nahin laut rahe hain to usane ye patr likha.

bekar aur galat hota chala gaya hai ki main in sabase ubar hi nahin pa rahi hoon. aur jab hamen ye dukhad samachar milata hai, hamen ye dar tha ki kabhi n kabhi ye samachar aayega hi ki ham sab kuchh paik kar den - ye bilkul bhi sanbhav nahin hai, aisa ho hi nahin payega, hamane jo bhi saman paik kiya hai, sab kuchh aansuon se dhul gaya hai aur abhi bhi takalif se mera sir dukh raha hai. mujhe nahin pata ki aap log ise kis tarah se lenge. pliz, pliz, misez saiagar aap kuchh kar sakati hain to mistar saiko ye ghar mat bechane dijiye. harek kamara abhi bhi apane vyaktitv ko banaye rakhe hue hai, bhale hi unamen ab kalin aur parde vagairah hi bache hain. main is ghar ko le kar itani jyada apanepan kee bhavana se bhari huee hoon ki main kisi aur ko ye ghar lene hi nahin doongi. kash, mere khud ke pas itane paise hote, lekin ye sochana hi bevakoofi hai. aap sari falatoo chizen aur staf nikal dijiye. agar aap chahen to aisa ho sakata hai. lekin pliz, ghar ko rakh lijiye. main janati hoon ki mujhe ye sab nahin kahana chahiye lekin main apane aapako rok nahin pa rahi hoon. main kabhi bhi ye khyal nahin chhodoongi ki aap sab kabhi to laut kar aayenge. misej saifilahal ke lie itana hi kafi hai. mujhe aapako tin khat bhejane hain lekin unake lie mujhe bade lifafe kee zaroorat padegi. sabako mera pranam kahiyega aur is painsil se likhane ke karan mujhe maf keejiyega. mera pain bhi to kharab ho gaya hai.

mis runsar aur rauli ko hi janata tha. mainne apane lie sabase pichhe vali sit chuni taki main apane khyalon ke sath akele rah sakoon. film vakaee shanadar thi. shayad main sabase jyada oonchi aavaz men hansa hooonga lekin sabase jyada aansoo bhi meri hi aankhon men aaye honge. ye meri dekhi ab tak kee sabase achchhi film thi. ise los enjels men kabhi bhi nahin dikhaya gaya. laim lait ke sangit par aadharit kaee rikard bajaye jate hain. bahut karnnapriy sangit. jab main sunata hoon to jaise badan men bijali daudane lagati hai. lekin ye nahin bataya jata ki ye sangit rachana mistar si kee hai. mujhe ye jan kar sukh mila ki bachchon ko svitzaralaind achchha laga hai. beshak, badon ko kisi doosare desh men ja kar set hone men jyada vakt lagata hai. mera to ye kahana hai ki svitzaralaind duniya ke sabase khoobasoorat deshon men se ek hai. vahan par poori duniya se achchhe skool hain. aur ye sabase purana gannatantr bhi hai 1191 se. jab yahan 4 julaee hoti hai to vahan pahali agast hoti hai. svatantrata divas. halanki chhutti nahin hoti. lekin aap sabhi pahadon ke oopar jalati aag dekhenge. kul mila kar sabase puratanapanthi aur sabase sampann desh. main vahan se dakshin amerika ke lie 1918 men nikala tha. tab se main do bar vapis gaya hoon. mainne svis aarmi men bhi do bar naukari kee hai. mera janm sent gailen, svitzaralaind ke poorvi hisse men huaa tha. barn men mera ek chhota bhaee hai aur ek bhaee sent gailan men hai.

abhi bhi mujhe vetan le rahe the lekin ab mere svitzaralaind ka vasi ban jane ke bad main un sabako vetan dena jari nahin rakh sakata tha. isalie mainne sabake seva tyag vetan ka intazam kiya aur sabako bonas diya. isase mujhe kul 80,000 dolar kharch karane pade. edana purviens apana bonas lene ke alava apani mrityu ke din tak mere rozagar men rahi.

mainne edana ke lie maidam grosane kee mahattvapoorn bhoomika chuni thi. main usase bis baras se nahin mila tha kyonki vah kabhi bhi stoodiyo nahin aati thi aur aofis kee taraf se use saptahik chek bhijava diya jata tha. bad men usane svikar kiya tha ki jab use stoodiyo fon kol mila to vah romanchit hone ke bajaye dar gayi thi.
usakee aankhen chamak rahi thin, beshak ve pahale jaisi to nahin hain lekin ve fir bhi gazab dikhati hain. roli ne bataya ki ve apane dresing room ke bahar lon men intazar kar rahi hain.
mano ham kuchh hi hafte pahale mile hon, are, kaisi ho, aakhir hamane tumhen khoj hi liya, mainne khushi jatate hue kaha.

lekin bat nahin bani. is bhoomika ke lie yooropiy aabhijaty kee zaroorat thi aur ye kabhi bhi edana men nahin tha. usake sath tin ya char din tak kam karane ke bad mujhe ye manane par majaboor hona pada ki vah is bhoomika ke layak nahin thi. edana bhi nirash hone ke bajaye rahat jyada mahasoos kar rahi thi. mujhase vah dobara nahin mili aur n hi usake samachar hi mile jab tak usane apani seva samapti ke vetan ke lie aabhar manate hue svitzaralaind men patr likha
aur mujhe pata hai ki tumhen apani takalifon ka hissa mil chuka hai. mujhe vishvas hai ki behad pyari patni aur parivar ke sath tumhari khushiyon ka pyala bhi chhalak raha hoga.

ye kitane oopar tak ja sakata hai. usase kaha gaya ki vah oonchaee ko napata chale. isalie vah ginata raha, 25000, 30000, 100,000, 500,000. jab vah itane oopar pahunch gaya to usane apane aapase kaha, oh, yishoo masiha tabhi ek bahut hi patali aavaz ne javab diya, yes kahiye????
pliz, pliz mujhe bhavishy men tumhari taraf se zaroor samachar milen. aur suno, yahin vapis aa jao. tum isi jagah se nata rakhate ho.

mujhe jo bimari hai, usaka yahi sabase achchha ilaj bataya jata hai. ummid karati hoon ki saptah ke ant men ghar ja sakoongi aur usake bad aaut peshent hay kitana mazedar. oopar vale ka shukriya ki mere bakee ang thik hain. ye rog lokal hai. ve log to yahi kahate hain. mujhe us shakhs kee yad aati hai jo ek chaurahe par khada kagaz kee chindinya uda raha tha. ek pulis vala aaya aur poochhane laga bhaee majara kya hai? usane javab diya,kuchh khas nahin, bas hathiyon ko door kar raha hoon.
to bande ne javab diya, isaka matalab meri tarakeeb kam kar rahi hai, nahin kya? aaj ke lie mera yahi bevakoofi bhara latifa. mujhe maf karana.
tum aur tumhara parivar khoob achchhe se hain aur us sab ka aanand utha raha hai jisake lie tumane itane papad bele hain.
jo thoda sa jyada ji lete hain, jaise jaise apani yatra par aage badhate hain, thode aur vairagi ho jate hain.

pyar aur nafarat men palata raha hoon. isake bavajood duniya ne mujhe apana jyada pyar aur kam nafarat di hai. meri jo bhi kamazoriyan thin, mera ye manana hai ki bhagy aur durbhagy badalon kee tarah aate jate rahe hain. main is bat ko janata tha isalie kabhi bhi jo kuchh bura huaa mere sath, usase mujhe dhakke nahin lage aur jo bhi achchha hota raha, us par mujhe hairani hoti rahi. mere jivan kee koee lik nahin thi. koee darshan nahin tha. ham sadhu hon ya shaitan, jivan men sangharsh to sabhi ko karana hi padata hai. main viparit paristhitiyon men bhi diga nahin. kaee bar chhoti chhoti baten mujhe vyathit kar jati thin aur kaee bar badi badi ghatanaen bhi mujhe chhoo nahin payin.

mera aaj kee jivan pahale ke jivan se jyada romanchapoorn hai. mera svasthy bahut achchha hai. main abhi bhi srijanashil hoon tatha meri aur filmen banane kee yojana hai. shayad apane lie n bhi banaoon, lekin apane parivar ke doosare sadasyon ke lie likh aur nirdeshit kar sakata hoon. unamen se kaiyon ka thiyetar kee taraf rujhan hai. main abhi bhi bahut mahattvakankshee hoon. main kabhi ritayar ho hi nahin sakata. kaee chizen hain jo main karana chahata hoon. sinema kee apani adhoori patakathaon ko poora karana chahata hoon. mujhe ek natak likhana aur ho sake to opera likhana achchha lagega. dekhen, samay mere lie kya tay karata hai.

khushi ek nakaratmak sthiti hai- lekin main unase sahamat nahin hoon. pichhale bis baras se main janata hoon ki khushi kya hoti hai. main kismat ka dhani raha ki mujhe itani shanadar bivi mili. kash, main is bare men aur jyada likh pata lekin isase pyar juda huaa hai aur parafaikt pyar sari kunthaon se jyada sundar hota hai konki ise jitana jyada abhivyakt kiya jaye, usase adhik hi hota hai. main oona ke sath rahata hoon aur usake charitr kee gaharaee aur saundary mere samane hamesha naye naye roopon men aate rahate hain. yahan tak ki jab vah vevey kee tang galiyon men mere aage aage chal rahi hoti hai to apani sadagi poorn garima ke sath apani dubali patali sidhi kaya ke sath, chal rahi hoti hai, usake lambe kale bal jisamen ekadh safed bal nazar aa jata hai, usakee taraf se pyar aur prashansa kee ek lahar achanak chal kar meri taraf aati hai. vah isi sneh kee hi to moorti hai. aur mera gala rundh jata hai.

kaee bar main sooryast ke samay apane taires par baith jata hoon aur door vistrit lon ke pare jheel men aur usake bhi pare aashvast karate se pahadon kee taraf dekhata hoon aur is mood men kisi bhi chiz ke bare men nahin sochata aur pahadon kee adbhut sthirata ka aanand uthata rahata hoon.

000,000 dolar ke ghate men chal rahi hai. jab isake achchhe din the to har varsh 40,000,000 se 50,000,000 dolar tak ka labh kama kar de rahi thi. lekin mujhe yad nahin aata ki mujhe do se jyada labhansh mile hon. apani samriddhi ke shikhar par yunaited aartists ne char sau angrezi thiyetaron men 25 pratishat hissedari juta li thi aur isake lie use ek paee bhi nahin chukani padi thi. mujhe pakke taur par nahin pata ki ye sab hamane kaise hasil kiya tha. mujhe aisa lagata hai ki ye hamen hamari filmon ke nirman kee garanti dene ke badale diye gaye the. doosari amerikee film kampaniyon ko isi tarah se british sinema men bahut badi rashi ke stok lene pade the. ek aisa vakt bhi aaya tha ki raink sangathan men hamari ikviti ka hissa 10,000,000 dolar ke barabar tha.

000,000 dalar ke ghate men chal rahi thi. mairi pikaford meri partanar thi. usane is tathy kee or dhyan dilate hue chetavani bhara patr likha ki sabhi bainkon ne aur karje dene se mana kar diya hai. mujhe is bat kee jyada chinta nahin thi kyonki ham isase pahale bhi karje men aa chuke the aur safal filmon ne hamen hamesha in sankaton se bahar nikal liya tha. isake alava, mainne abhi abhi monsyor veradaoo poori kee thi aur main ye man kar chal raha tha ki ye boks aofis par khoob safal rahegi. mere pratinidhi aarthar kailli ne kam se kam 12,000,000 dolar kee kamaee ka anuman lagaya tha aur agar ye sach ho jata to ye hamari kampani ke karje to utaregi hi, 11,000,000 dolar ka munafa bhi de jayegi.
thomas man, layan fyooshavengar aur kaee doosari vibhootiyan khadi ho gayin aur ek minat se bhi jyada tak taliyan bajati rahin.

lekin mainne tad liya ki dal men kuchh kala hai. main ek chhoti si mej ke pichhe se ek chhote se manch se bola. main apani aavaz men jitani mishree ghol sakata tha, gholi aur bola,aap log kaise hain, deviyo aur sajjano, main yahan par isalie hazir huaa hoon taki main apani film ke bare men aur apani bhavi yojanaon ke bare men jo bhi tathy aap janana chahen, unake bare men bata sakoon.

lekin unakee gair hazari saf taur par mahasoos kee ja sakati thi. lekin jo vakta khade hue ve apana ovarakot pahane hue maile kuchaile se lagane vale nirih prani the aur ve apane un kagazon par jhuke hue the jinamen se ve padh rahe the.
mainne kaha,aapako fir se padhana padhega, aap jo bhi kah rahe hain, main usaka ek bhi shabd samajh nahin pa raha hoon.
main yahan par kisi kaitholik yuddh ke . varishth bhuktabhogiyon ke savalon ka javab dene ke lie nahin aaya hoon. ye baithak pres ke lie hai.

mainne muskurate hue kaha,agar aap ise aarthik roop se taulana chahate hain to main aapake samane sare aankade ginava deta hoon. mera karobar antarrashtriy svaroop ka hai aur meri kamaee ka sattar pratishat videshon se aata hai. aur maze kee bat, us par sattar pratishat kar ka labh amerika ko milata hai. ab aap hi dekh lijiye, main aapaka kitana achchha peing gest hoon!
aap apana dhan yahan par kamate hain ya nahin, ham log, jinhonne frans ke taton par apane sainik utare hain, is bat par aapase khafa hain ki aap is desh ke nagarik nahin hain.
mainne bataya,mere do bete bhi paitan kee sena men hain aur ekadam morche par hain aur ve n to aapakee tarah tathyon ko bhuna rahe hain aur n hi unaka fayada hi utha rahe hain.

kaisa lagata hai aisa kalakar hona jisane chhote logon kee khushiyon aur samajh ke sath poori duniya ko itana samriddh kiya ho aur amerikee pres ke tathakathit pratinidhiyon kee nafarat aur fatakar ka patr banaya jana aur mazak ka patr banana?

ye aadami to aapake paksh men hi bat kar raha hai. usane bahut hi umda hi bat kee hai. ye amerikee upanyasakar aur kavi jim egi the jo us samay taims maigajin ke lie vishesh fichar lekhak aur samikshak ke roop men kam kar rahe the.

mainne kaha,main to ye man kar chal raha tha ki ye pres sammelan meri film ke bare men sakshatkar hai, isake bajaye, ye to rajanaitik utha patak men badal gaya hai. isalie mujhe aur kuchh nahin kahana hai.

vah pahale kee sari filmon kee kamaee par kar gayi thi aur film ke pradarshit hone se pahale mujhe bahut sare pratikool prachar ka samana karana pada tha. mujhe monsyor veradaoo kee safalata par poora bharosa tha aur yunaited aartists ke staf kee bhi yahi ray thi.

isalie mainne unhen hamare sath 21 par khana khane ke lie aamantrit kiya. mairi dinar par bahut der se pahunchi thin. unhonne bataya ki unhen ek kokatel parti kee vajah se deri ho gayi. vahan se nikalane men unhen bahut mushkil ho rahi thi.

hamane dekha ki ek aadami rediyo par prasaran kar raha hai aur ab charli chaiplin aur unakee patni aa pahunche hain. aaha, aur unake sath unake mehaman ke roop men hain mook filmon ke dinon kee shanadar abhinetree jo abhi bhi poore amerika kee har dil ajij hain. ye hain mis mairi pikaford. mairi, kya aap is shanadar primiyar ke bare men kuchh nahin kahengi?

do hazar sal pahale yishu ka janm huaa tha aur aaj kee rat . ve aage kuchh nahin kah payin. choonki ve abhi bhi mera hath thame hue thin, unhen bhid ke ek dhakke ne maik se pare dhakel diya. main aksar is bat par hairan hota hoon ki ve aage kya kahane vali thin.

bechain pratyasha aur atit ke sukhad ahasas, jinake sath meri filmon ka svagat huaa karata tha, unakee jagah par bich bich men kuchhek sisakariyon ke bich bikhare bikhare, narvas hansi ke pal the. mujhe ye svikar karana hi hoga ki sisakari bhari ye pratikriyaen pres kee sari narazagi se bhi jyada takalif de rahi thin.

meri chinta badhati gayi. hansi ke pal the lekin ye bikhare hue the. ye purane vakt ke, d gold rash ke, ya siti laits ke ya sholdar aarms ke thahake nahin the. ye thiyetar men chal rahi sisakariyon ke khilaf chunautipoorn hansi thi. mera dil doobane laga. main apani sit men aur der tak nahin baith paya. mainne oona se fusafusaya,main bahar lobi men ja raha hoon. ab aur sahan nahin hota mujhase. usane mera hath dabaya. mere hath men muchada huaa karyakram patrak tha, ise main itana jyada tod marod chuka tha ki ye meri hatheliyon ko pasine se gila karane laga. isalie mainne use apani sit ke niche fenk diya. main dabe panv bich vale raste par aaya aur lobi kee taraf nikal gaya. main thahake sunane aur unake bich men se uth kar pare chale aane ke bich bant gaya tha. tab main haule haule chalata huaa bich vali manzil tak yah dekhane ke lie aaya ki vahan par kya chal raha hai. ek aadami bakee aur logon kee tulana men sabase jyada hans raha tha. nishchit taur par mera koee dost raha hoga. lekin ye vikrit aur narvas hansi thi mano vah kuchh siddh karana chahata ho. balkani men bhi yahi hal chal raha tha.

gali men aur thiyetar ke aas pas chahalakadami karata raha aur fir vapis thiyetar men film dekhane aa jata. ye sab bich bich men chalata raha. aakhir film khatm huee. arl vilsan, stambhakar, jo bahut hi pyara aadami tha, mujhase lobi men milane vale logon men sabase pahala tha. mujhe ye bahut achchhi lagi. usane mujhe par bahut zor diya. tab mere pratinidhi aarthar keli bahar aaye. beshak, ye ek karod bis lakh ka dhandha to nahin hi karane ja rahi hai. usane kaha.

jinhen main pasand karata tha aur samajhadar samajhata tha, film ke bare men mere dost don stivart se bahas kar rahe the. svope ko ye pasand nahin aayi thi. us rat kuchh hi logon ne mujhe badhaee di. don stivart, jo meri tarah khud bhi thode nashe men the, bole,charli, aas pas bahut se harami maujood hain jo aapakee film par rajaniti kee rotiyan senkana chahate hain. lekin film bahut oonchi chiz bani hai aur darshak ise pasand karenge.
aapako pata hai ki ye kaun sa kamara hai? ye vahi kamara hai jisamen vo ladaka lej par nikal aaya tha aur kood kar jan dene se pahale vahan par barah ghante tak khada raha tha.
main ye manata hoon ki mainne ab tak jitani bhi filmen banayi hain, unamen se monsyor veradaoo sabase jyada chaturaee aur samajhadari se banayi gayi film hai.

aap jo bhi film banate hain, vah pahale tin ya char hafte tak to bahut achchha karobar karati hai. karan ye hai ki aapake bahut sare purane prashansak hain. lekin unake bad aati hai aam janata. aur sach kahen to pres aapake pichhe kam se kam das baras se latth le kar padi huee hai aur us latthabaji kee kuchh to asar hona hi tha. yahi vajah hai ki karobar men mandi aa gayi hai.

to us vakt thiyetar ke bahar ek bhi darshak nahin tha. mainne mazak men kaha,spasht hi ye tasvir subah panch baje li gayi hogi. alabatta, jahan kahin bhi monsyor veradaoo bina badha ke dikhayi gayi, isane samany kee tulana men behatar hi karobar kiya.

mujhe gret diktetar ko le kar chori ke ilzam men fansa diya gaya tha aur pres aur janata kee bhishan nafarat aur virodh ke charam bindu par pahunchane par aur jab ki sinet men char sinetar hath dho kar mere pichhe pad gaye the, meri is ichchha ke viruddh ki is mamale ko thoda sthagit kar diya jaye, mamale ko joori ke samane le jaya gaya.
lekin ek to main us vakt amerika men alokapriyata ke shikhar par tha aur is tarah ke nyayalay ke dabav men aa gaya tha, main dara huaa tha ki aage n jane kya ho jaye, hamane samajhauta kar liya.

000,000 dolar kamane kee sari ummiden dhool men mil chukee thin. ab to usakee keemat vasool karane ke bhi lale pade hue the. ek bar fir yunaited aartists gahare sankat men pad gayi thi. kifayat karane kee drishti se mairi ne is bat par zor diya ki main apane pratinidhi aarthar kailli kee chhutti kar doon aur jab mainne use yad dilaya ki main bhi kampani ka aadha malik hoon to mohatarama naraz ho gayin.

mairi, to aapaka pratinidhi bhi zaroor jayega. mainne kah diya. isase avarodh paida ho gaya aur mujhe mazabooran kahana pada,ab ham donon men se hi ek kampani kharide aur doosara beche. apani keemat boliye. lekin mairi koee keemat lagane ke lie taiyar nahin thin aur n hi main keemat lagane men pahal kar raha tha.

eestarn sarkit aof thiyetars ka pratinidhitv karane vali vakeelon kee ek farm hamari sankat mochak ban kar samane aayi. ve kampani par niyantran chahate the aur 12,000,000 dolar dene ke lie taiyar the. 7,000,000 dolar nakad aur 5,000,000 dolar sheyaron ke roop men. ye bahut hi achchha sauda tha.
mainne mairi se kaha,aap mujhe abhi nakad 5,000,000 dolar de dijiye aur bakee aap rakh sakati hain. ve is bat se sahamat ho gayin aur kampani ko bhi isamen etaraz nahin tha.

charli, sauda khataee men pad gaya hai. mairi ne pain apane hath men le liya tha aur hastakshar karane hi vali thin ki achanak bolin,nahin, charli ko pachas lakh dolar abhi hi kyon milen aur mujhe do baras tak intazar karana pade!

aapakee tulana men bis lakh dolar jyada. lekin unhonne ye bahana bana diya ki usase unakee aay par taiks ko le kar samasya ho jayegi. ye hamare lie sunahari mauka tha. bad men hamen kampani ko bahut kam keemat par bechane par mazaboor hona pada.

ki ve rajanaitik roop se itane sajag ho sakate hain ki ya hasy se itane hin ho sakate hain ki kisi bhi aise vyakti ka bahishkar kar den jo un hen hansata raha hai. mere pas ek aaidiya tha aur isake dabav ke tale main is bat kee ratti bhar bhi paravah nahin kar raha tha ki natija kya hoga. film banani hi banani thi.

use prem kahani hamesha achchhi lagati hai. jaisa ki haizalit ne kaha hai, sanvedana men medha kee tulana men jyada apil hoti hai aur ki ye kala ke kary men kahin bada yogadan karati hai. is bar mera aaidiya ek prem kahani ka tha. isake alava, ye monsyor veradaoo kee pagalapan bhari nirasha kee tulana men doosari tarah kee film hoti. lekin mahattvapoorn bat ye thi ki isaka aaidiya mujhe uttejit kiye hue tha.

mainne nrity kee mudraon kee kalpana karate hue sare sangit kee rachana kee. lekin jab sangit poora ho gaya to main hairan pareshan tha ki ye baile ke lie mafik baithega ya nahin kyonki nrity kee koriyografi to nartakon dvara khud hi sochi aur pesh kee jayegi.

bailerina melisa hedan aur aandre eglevaskee ye sangit rachana sunane ke lie viman se holivud aaye. jis vakt ve ise sunane ke lie baithe to main bahut jyada narvas tha aur aatm sajag tha. lekin bhagavan ka shukr hai, donon ne ise anumodit kar diya aur bataya ki ye baile ke anuroop hai. mere fil m kairiyar ke palon men se ye sabase jyada romanchak pal the - unhen is dhun par nrity karate dekhana. unhonne isamen jo arth bhare, ve aahlad se bhar dene vale the aur isane sangit ko ek mahakavyatmak mahatta pradan kee.

medha, aur oopar se sanvedanaen prakat kar sakane kee bahut vyapak renj. kaee mahinon tak khojane aur janchane parakhane ke bad bhi nirasha janak natije hi samane aa rahe the. main saubhagyashali tha ki mainne kleyar bloom ko chuna. mere mitr aarthar larents ne usake sifarish kee thi.

maikal, jossi aur vikkee. bevarali hils men ab jivan khushanuma tha. hamane ek sukhad grih vyavastha juta li thi aur sab kuchh thik thak chal raha tha. ravivar ko ham mel-mulakat ka din rakhate aur kaee dost hamase milane aate. unamen jim egi bhi the jo jon hastan ke lie patakatha lekhan ke lie holivud aaye the.

lekhak aur darshanik bhi un dinon holivud men the aur yoosielae men vyakhyan de rahe the. ve mere purane mitr the aur kabhi-kabhar hamare ghar par khana khate. ve bahut shanadar shamen hotin. vil bahut hi utsahi aadami the aur unhen kisi bhi tarah ke nashe kee zaroorat n padati. unake lie zidangi ka nasha hi kafi tha. ek bar unhonne mujhase poochha,sundarata kee aapakee dharana kya hai? mainne kaha ki mere khyal se ye mrityu aur akelepan, muskurati huee udasi kee sarvatr bichhi satta hai jise ham prakriti men aur pratyek vastu men dekhate hain, ek rahasyamay aadhyatmik sanbandh jise kavi mahasoos karata hai, ye soory kee kiran men chamakata kachare ka dibba bhi ho sakata hai ya gatar men gira huaa gulab ka fool bhi ho sakata hai. el greko ne ise hamare sooli par chadhane vale yishoo men dekha tha.

khas taur par tab, jab kaee log vahan par maujood the. lekin jorj bahut hi pyare insan the, unhonne hansate hue javab diya tha,main koyala bechata hoon, apane dost hichakok ke sath thodi-si polo khel leta hoon aur yahan, us vakt main vahin se guzar raha tha, mera dost charli mujhe janata hai. kleyar ke bare men tab se meri dharana badal gayi thi. bad men mujhe ye sun kar bilkul bhi hairani nahin huee thi ki ve kangres men chali gayi thin aur bad men rajadoot ban gayi thin. unhonne amerikee rajaniti ko prakhyat darshanik jumala g lobaloni diya tha.

aadami ko eesaeeyat ka tamaga apane mathe par lagane kee zaroorat nahin hoti. dharm sadhuon aur papiyon, donon men ek jaisa hota hai. pavitr aatma har kahin hoti hai. us rat jab ham vida hue to donon hi asahaj mahasoos kar rahe the.

lekin abhi tak koee uttar nahin aaya tha. isake bavazood, main jane kee taiyariyon men apane karobar ko vyavasthit karane men laga huaa tha. mere taiks kee failen jama kar di gayi thin aur sare mamale nipata diye gaye the. lekin jab aantarik rajasv seva vibhag ko pata chala ki main yoorop ke lie nikal raha hoon to unhonne ye bat khoj nikali ki mainne unhen aur paise dene hain. ab unhonne ek aisi rashi kee gin kar de di jo chhah ankon men jati thi. unhonne mujhase 2,000,000 dolar kee mang kee. yah rashi us rashi se das guna jyada thi jisaka ve dava kar rahe the. meri chhathi indriy ne mujhe chetaya ki kuchh bhi jama mat karao aur mamale ko turant adalat men le jaye jane ke bare men ad jao. isase jaldi hi, mamooli-si rashi par samajhauta ho gaya. ab unhen kuchh aur rashi vasool nahin karani thi isaliye mainne fir se ri-entri ke paramit ke bare men aavedan kiya lekin koee javab nahin diya gaya. isaliye, mainne vashingatan men ek patr bheja aur unhen soochit kiya ki agar ve mujhe ri-entri paramit nahin dena chahate, to bhi main kisi bhi halat men desh se jana chahata hoon.
sidha, dubala-patala aadami tha. mujhe pata tha ki main char ke mukabale ek hoon aur mujhe apane vakeel ko bhi bulava lena chahie tha lekin mujhe kuchh bhi to nahin chhupana tha.
mera nam charls chaiplin hai aur mere pita ka nam bhi charls chaiplin tha aur main ingalaind paida huaa.

mainne javab diya,agar aap mujhe desh se bahar rakhane ke lie koee takanikee karan khoj rahe hain to mujhe bata dijiye. main usi tarah se vyavastha kar loonga kyonki main kahin par bhi avanchhit vyakti ban kar nahin rahana chahata.
main is desh ko pyar karata hoon. ye mera ghar hai. main yahan chalis baras se rah raha hoon, mainne javab diya.

lekin ain mauke par unaka gala kharab ho gaya aur aapakee sarakar ke ek uchch adhikari ne mujhase poochha ki kya main unake sthan par bolane kee meharabani karoonga aur tab se main isamen apani gardan fansaye baitha hoon.

majhauli umr ke ek dayalu shakhs ne mano dilasa dete hue kaha,mujhe khed hai ki aapako hamari vajah se vilanb huaa hai, mistar chaiplin, lekin ab hamane aapravas karyalay kee ek shakha los enjels men bhi kholi hai aur ab aapaka kam jaldi hi ho jaya karega aur aapako apane aavedan patr vashingatan bhejane kee zaroorat nahin padegi. aapase sirf ek saval aur poochhana hai, mistar chaiplin, aap kitana arasa bahar rahenge?

agar aap jyada arase ke lie ja rahe hain to aapako samay vistar ke lie avashy hi anumati leni hogi. unhonne mej par ek dastavej rakh diya aur kamare se bahar chale gaye. mere vakeel ne taeji se dastavej kee taraf dekha,ye huee n bat, kaha usane, unhonne paramit de diya hai.
kya aap yahan hastakshar karenge, mistar chaiplin, aur han, aapako apani yatra ke doosare kagazat lene honge.
ye raha aapaka paramit, main ummid karata hoon ki aapakee yatra sukhad rahegi, charli. jaiye, jaldi ghar jaiye.
itani sari takalifen aur ab ghar kitana shant aur dostana lag raha tha ki mujhe ise chhodate hue takalif ho rahi thi.

hamari naukarani aur henari, hamare batalar ko vida kah dene ke bad main rasoee men lapaka aur apani kuk anna ko vida ke do shabd kahe. main aise maukon par bahut sharmila ho jata hoon aur anna, gol-matol si, bhari bharakam mahila thoda ooncha sunati thi. gud baya mainne kaha aur usakee banh ko chhuaa. oona sabase bad men nikali. usane mujhe bataya ki usane kuk aur naukarani ko rote hue dekha tha. mere asistent dayarektar jeri epsatin hamen steshan par chhodane aaye.

sath hi sath, main chahata hoon ki aap ye samman n len kyonki isaka matalab aapako chhutti se vapis aana pad sakata hai. is tarah se mujhe in aakhiri char dinon ke lie apane kamare me hi band rah jana pada aur main oona aur bachchon ke sath nyoo yark nahin ghoom paya. alabatta, main laimalait ke pres privyoo ke samay maujood rahana chahata tha, samman mile ya nahin!

mere prachar prabandhak ne taim tatha laif patrikaon ke sampadakeey staf ke sath ek lanch ka aayojan kiya tha. ye is tarah ka mauka tha ki khud aage badh kar prachar karaya jay. nangi, safed plastar vali divaron vale unake daftar us lanch ke manahoos mahaul ke lie ekadam mafik seting the. main taim staf ke udas, ghute sir vale logon ke sath mazakiya aur antarang banane kee koshish karata raha. khane men chipachipa, rasedar chikan tha jo bilkul besvad tha lekin jahan tak laimalait ke lie achchhe prachar ka saval tha, n to meri maujoodagi ne, n mere unake nazadik aane kee koshishon ne aur n hi khane ne hi koee fayada pahunchaya. unhonne film ke bare men bahut berahami se likha.
lekin bad men mujhe ye dekhakar sukhad aashchary huaa ki kuchh bade akhabaron ne achchhi samikshaen di thin.

apane aapako suit men band kar loon aur tab tak dek par n aaoon jab tak palayat n utar jaye. mujhe pichhale das baras se har tarah kee kharab baton kee aadat pad chukee thi, isalie mainne usakee bat man li.
dhoop men mujhase door jati hueen aur har pal aur adhik khoobasoorat hoti hueen. vishal mahadvip dhundh men gayab ho raha tha aur mujhe ek ajib ehasas se bhar raha tha.

main sukhad roop se rahat bhi mahasoos kar raha tha. atalantik ka vistar man ko rahat de raha tha. mujhe laga, mano main koee doosara hi vyakti hoon. main ab filmi duniya ka mithak nahin raha tha n hi badanami ka nishana, balki main ek shadishuda aadami tha jo apane bivi-bachchon ke sath chhutti manane nikala hai. bachche oopari dek par khelane men vyast the jabaki main aur oona dek kee kursiyon par baithe hue the aur isi mood men mujhe param prasannata ka anubhav huaa - ye ehasas udasi ke bahut nikat tha.

usane mafi mangi aur mej se uth kar chala gaya. bad men krokar ne mujhe apane kebin men bulaya aur tar padha. tar men likha tha ki mujhe yunaited stets men pravesh karane kee manahi kee ja rahi hai aur desh men fir se pravesh karane se pahale mujhe rajanaitik prakriti aur naitik moolyon ke aaropon ke uttar dene ke lie aapravas vibhag ke janch bord ke samane jana hoga. yunaited pres janana chahati thi ki mujhe kya is bare men kuchh kahana hai.

utana hi behatar hota aur main amerika se mile apaman aur naitik aadambar se thak chuka tha aur ki poora ka poora mamala hi bor karane vala tha. lekin musibat yah thi ki mera jo kuchh bhi tha, vah sab kuchh stets men hi tha aur mujhe dar tha ki ve use jabt karane ka koee tarika n nikal len. ab main kisi bhi shararatapoorn karravaee kee ummid kar sakata tha. isalie mainne aatm pradarshan se bhara ek bayan jari kiya ki main vapis aaoonga aur unake aaropon ka javab doonga aur ki mera ri-entri paramit kagaz ka koee aisa vaisa tukada nahin balki yunaited stets sarakar dvara sadashayata men mujhe diya gaya ek dastavej hai, vagairah vagairah.

devanashayar tatha kornavel kee asim khoobasoorati ke gunnagan karata aaya tha aur ab ham lal eenton vali imaraton aur pahadi par bane ek jaise gharon kee kataron ke pas se guzar rahe the. kaha oona ne,ye sab ek jaisi dikhati hain!
kaha mainne,ham to abhi sauthampatan ke bahar hi hain. aur jaise-jaise ham aage badhate gaye, ilake aur adhik khoobasoorat hote chale gaye.

hamen pyar karane vali bhid abhi bhi vahan juti huee thi aur ve pahale kee hi tarah prem bhav se bhare aur utsah se khade the. jab ham steshan se bahar nikale to ve hath hila rahe the aur khushi se chilla rahe the. kisi ek ne kaha,charli ve tumhara pyar chahate hain, unhen do. sachamuch ye dil ko chhoo lene vala mamala tha.

to ham sevay hotal kee panchavin manzil par apane suit kee khidakee par aa khade hue. mainne naye vataraloo brij kee taraf ishara kiya. halanki ye sundar tha fir bhi ab mere lie bahut mayane nahin rakhata tha, bas ek hi bat thi ki isakee sadak mere bachapan kee or jati thi. ham chupachap khade rahe aur is poori duniya men shahar ke sabase adhik chhoo lene vale drishy ko dekhate hue pite rahe. mainne peris men ples de la konkord kee rumani utkrishtata kee tarif kee hai, nyoo yark men sooryast men hazaron chamakati khidakiyon se rahasyapoorn sandesh mahasoos kiye hain lekin hamare hotal kee khidakee se landan tems ka nazara mere lie in sab drishyon se kahin adhik romani tha - kuchh aisa, jo behad manaviy tha.

dhoop usake kale balon se khel rahi thi. mainne pahali bar usake ek-do safed bal dekhe. mainne kuchh nahin kaha, lekin us vakt mainne apane aap ko usake prati poori tarah se samarpit paya jab usane kaha,mujhe landan achchha laga hai.
aadhunik imaraton se ghir gayi thin aur isase aakash ko chhooti drishyavali kharab lagane lagi thi. mere bachapan ka aadha hissa isake vishal khali hisson kee jhulasati shamon men guzara tha.

lanch kauntaron, hotadog staindon aur milk baron se ati padi thi. hamane paya ki bina hait pahane yuva ladake aur jins pahane ladakiyan vahan tafarih kar rahe the. mujhe yad aaya, jab vest end ke lie main taiyar huaa karata tha aur pile dastane aur chhadi lekar vahan chahal kadami karata tha. ve din ab hava ho gae the aur usakee jagah par aankhen kuchh aur hi dekh rahi thin. hamari bhavanaen doosari thimon par pratikriya deti hain. aadami joj sunakar rote hain aur hinsa kamuk ho gayi hai. samay bitata rahata hai.

unake kamaron men ab nion battiyan jal rahi thin aur klark deskon par kam kar rahe the bakee ghar gira diye gaye the aur unake jagah par glas taink jaisi lambotari imaraten aur oopar kee or uthati machis kee tarah kee siment kee imaraten nazar aa rahi thin. ye sab pragati ke nam par ho raha tha.
oona ko viman se vapis kailiforniya jana hoga aur hamare sef dipazit boks se sab kuchh nikalana hoga.
usakee taraf dekha, vahan se gaya aur baink mainejar ke sath gupachup bat karata raha. oona tab tak bechaini mahasoos karati rahi jab tak unhonne hamara dipazit boks khol nahin diya.
vahin aur usi vakt choor-choor ho gaya. yahan tak ki hamari naukarani hailan oona ke bahar nikalate samay ro rahi thi, usake aansoo bhi oona ko vahan se turant nikalane se rok nahin paye.

ve bahut shanadar aur manaviy hain. lekin lizan ke log jab apane vaidh adhikaron se pare chale jate hain aur deshabhakti ke nam par apani shakti ko doosaron par ladate hain to ve amerikee sarakar ke moolabhoot dhanche ke khilaf aparadh karate hain. is tarah ke mahadeshabhakt amerika ko fasivadi desh men badal sakate hain.

main gair-amerikee gatividhiyon kee samiti ke khilaf tha. agar main beeemani bhare jumale ka istemal karoon to yah kisi bhi aise akele amerikee kee aavaz ko dabane ke lie kafi lachila hai jo apani eemanadar ray men akela pad jata hai.

mainne kabhi bhi amerikee nagarik banane ka prayas nahin kiya. halanki saikadon amerikee bashinde ingalaind men apani rozi-roti kama rahe hain. ve kabhi bhi british nagarik banane ka prayas nahin karate udaharan ke lie, emajiem stoodiyo ka ek amerikee adhikari ingalaind men pichhale paintis baras se rah raha hai aur har hafte char ankon men vetan leta hai. vah kabhi british nagarik nahin bana aur angrezon ne kabhi is bat kee paravah hi nahin kee.

main kabhi bhi nahin roya jaisa ki kisi shararati patrakar ne bataya ki main roya tha. aur agar main roya bhi hooon to kya huaa! agar lekhak apane srijan ke bare men sanvedana mahasoos nahin karata to vah janata se aisa karane kee ummid hi kaise kar sakata hai. eemanadari se kahoon to mujhe apani filmon men janata se bhi jyada maza aata hai.
isane vishv keertiman bhang kar diye aur ise amerika men pratibandhit kiye jane ke bavajood isane meri ab tak kee filmon kee tulana men sabase adhik kamaee karake di.

ingalaind hamesha sabake nishane par bana rahega kyonki ye ek chhota sa dvip hai aur ise rakh ke dher men badal diye jane ke bad kisi bhi kism ka badala koee rahat nahin dila payega. main is bat ko manata hoon ki ingalaind kee raksha ke lie sabase majaboot rannaniti nishpaksh rahane kee hai kyonki paramanu yug men mujhe is bat ka shak hai ki nishpaksh rahane ka ullanghan kiya jayega. lekin mere vichar maurisan ke vicharon se bilkul bhi mel nahin khate the.
vaigyanik aur aarthik roop se ho rahe hain. ham aatm anukoolan ke aur bandishon aur paramiton ke shikar ho rahe hain.
