jisamen hamane apane aapako dhal jane diya hai, isalie ho raha hai ki hamamen sanskritik antardrishti kee kami hai. ham bha pan aur bhid kee taraf andhadhundh chale ja rahe hain aur ham ab is layak nahin rahe ki saundary kee sarahana hi kar saken. hamare jivan kee sanvedanaon ko labh, shakti aur ekadhikar ne bhonthara bana diya hai. hamane in shaktiyon ko apane charon taraf lipat jane diya hai aur is bat kee ratti bhar paravah nahin kee hai ki in sabaka anjam kya hoga.

aur isake bare men jitana kaha jaye, kam hain aur kaee mamalon men unake oopar ungali uthayi ja sakati hai ki ve dharati par sare jivan ko nasht karane vala yuddh chhed sakate hain. fir bhi ham aankhen moonde chale ja rahe hain.

aadami janane kee ichchha se sanchalit hota hai. bahut achchhi bat hai. lekin kaee mamalon men ham parinamon kee paravah hi nahin karate. isase doktar openahaimar sahamat the. kaee vaigyanik dharmik roop se hathadharmi hote hain. ve is vishvas ke sath aage badhate jate hain ki ve jo kuchh bhi khojenge, achchha hi hoga aur janane kee unakee aakanksha hamesha naitik hoti hai.

anu ka vikhandan karake manushy ko kone men dhakel kar sochane par vivash kar diya gaya hai. usake samane do hi vikalp hain apane aapako nasht kar dale ya apana vyavahar sudhare vigyan kee gati use yah nirnnay lene ke lie vivash kar rahi hai. aur in paristhitiyon men mera manana hai ki antat hitavad hi bachega aur manushy kee sadashayata manavata ke lie vijay payegi.

ve un karanon ko nahin janate honge jinakee vazah se ham aapako pyar karate hain aur aapake prashansak hain ve manaviy moolyon ke bhi bahut kharab nirnayak honge aur unhonne un aashirvadon ko ginane ka kasht nahin uthaya hoga jo aapane pichhale chalis baras ke dauran ham par barasaye hain aur n hi unhonne aapakee sikh kee sarahana kee hogi ya un khushiyon tatha bhavanaon kee gunnavatta ko hi dekha hoga jo aapane unake sachche moolyon ke sath ham par nyauchhavar kee hain thode men kahen to ve hamesha kritaghn bane rahe hain.

jiniyas hai. is shabd ka bahut galat arth liya jata raha hai. jiniyas shabd ko tabhi usaka sahi arth milata hai jab ise kisi aise vyakti ke sath joda jata hai jo n keval utkrisht komediyan hai balki ek lekhak, sangitakar, nirmata hai aur sabase badi bat, us vyakti men u shma, udarata aur mahanata hai. aap men ye sare gun vas karate hain aur isase badi bat, ki aap men vah sadagi hai jisase aapaka kad aur ooncha hota hai aur ek garamahat bhari sahaj apil ke darshan hote hain jisamen n to koee hisabi gannana hoti hai aur n hi koee prayas hi aap isake lie karate hain aur inase aap sidhe insan ke dil men pravesh karate hain. insan, jo aap hi kee tarah musibaton ka mara hai. lekin sarahana ke gun ginane ke lie jiniyas hi kafi nahin hoti n hi yah pyar ka pratidan karane ke lie hi kafi hoti hai. aur isake bavajood, pyar hi us sanvedana ke lie akela shabd hai jisakee prerana aap dete hain.
kaee bar dil khol kar aur ham roye, asali aansuon ke sath -aapake aansuon ke sath, kyonki aap hi ne hamen aansuon ka keemati upahar diya hai.

kabhi sir par chadh kar nahin bolati jab ise kisi achchhe karan kee or mod diya jata hai to isamen ek bhavana, ek mooly, ek avadhi aa jati hai. aur aapakee vijay is tathy men hai ki aapamen manaviy udarata aur sahajata hai ki aap niyamon se ya chalakee se bandhe hue nahin hai, balki aap apani oorja apani takalifon se, apani khushiyon se aashaon se aur hatashaon se grahan karate hain vah sab kuchh, jise ve hi samajh sakate hain jo apani shakti se pare takalif uthate hain aur daya kee bhikh mangate hain aur jo lagatar is bat kee aasha karate hain ki unhen santvana mile, ki unhen ek pal ke lie us hansi se sab kuchh bhoolane ka mauka mile jo ilaj karane ka dikhava nahin karati lekin sirf santvana dene ke lie hoti hai.

bhale hi ham ise n janate hon ki hamen hansane aur achanak rulane layak hone ke is shanadar upahar ke lie aapane khud kaun si keemat chukaee hain. ham anuman laga sakate hain aur bahut huaa to soch sakate hain ki aapane svayan kaun kaun si takalifen jheli hongi taki aap barikee se un sari chhoti chhoti chaaajon ko bayan kar saken jo hamen itani gaharaee se chhooti hain aur jinhen aapane apani svayan kee zindagi ke palon se liya hai.

usakee vedana men se kuchh bhi nahin bhulaya hai aapane chaha hai ki aapane jo takalifen bhogi hain, doosaron ko n bhogani paden aur kam se kam aapane itana hi to chaha hi hai ki aap sabako aashavan bane rahane ka karan de saken. aapane apani udas yuvavastha ko kabhi dhokha nahin diya hai aur prasiddhi men kabhi bhi yah takat nahin thi ki vah aapako aapake atit se alag kar sake - kyonki, afasos, is tarah kee baten sanbhav huaa karati hain.

abhineta aur nirdeshak, tinon roopon men aapake sanjhe avadan se jyada manabhavan kuchh nahin ho sakata. aapake roop men ye tinon kalakar, unakee seva men apani sanjhee medha laga dete hain joki manaviy hai aur behatar hai.
ek prarthana hai aur har vyakti aapaka sangi sathi hai kyonki vah vaise hi sochata aur mahasoos karata hai, jaisa ki aap karate hain.

aapane aisa kiya aur ek khas garima banaye rakhi jo hamen museta ke bare men sochane par majaboor karati hai halanki aap n to kisi kee nakal karate hain aur n hi kisi aur jaise lagate hain. yah bhi aapakee garima ka rahasy hai.

aapake un kamon ko bojh badha rahe hain jo aap itani sadashayata se poore karate hain. ham aapako apane bich pakar bahut aatur hain aur aapako batana chahate hain ki ham aapakee kitani sarahana karate hain aur aapako kitana pyar karate hain. aur yah bhi kahana chahate hain ki aap sachamuch hamamen se hi ek hain, kyonki aapakee filmon men kahani mistar chaiplin dvara likhi hoti hai. aur is tarah se sangit bhi unhin ka banaya hota hai aur nirdeshan bhi ve hi karate hain aur komediyan jo hai inake atirikt hota hai aur usaka yogadan uchch shreni ka hota hai.

natakon aur film ke lekhak, sangitakar, nirmata sab upasthit hain. ve sab ke sab aapako pasand karate hain. apane apane tarike se ve us kadi mehanat ke samman aur aatm tyag se achchhi tarah se parichit hain jo aap achchhi tarah se janate hain kyonki aapakee yahi mahattvakanksha rahi hai ki aap janata ko aandolit karen aur unhen khush karen ki aap khoye hue pyar ke dar ko chitrit karen, jo is layak nahin hain un takalifon ke lie daya dikhaen aur aapakee ek ichchha hai ki jo shanti, ummid aur bhaeechare kee bhavana ke raste men aata hai, use thik karen.

mujhe alankrit kiya aur meri agavani kee. us mauke par laim lait ke primiyar men ek mazedar ghatana ghati. fain aarts ke mantree ne mujhe sujhav diya ki main bhid se bachane ke lie manch dvar se aaoon. mujhe mantree mahoday ka sujhav thoda ajib-sa laga aur mainne unhen bataya ki agar logon men mujhase milane ke lie thietar ke bahar khade hone ka dhairy hai to mujhamen kam se kam itani vinamrata to honi hi chahie ki main samane ke dvar se aaoon aur apana chehara dikhaoon. mujhe laga ki unake chehare par us vakt ajib se bhav aaye jab unhonne haule se apani bat ko doharaya ki isase mujhe pichhe vale raste men jane men kam takalif hogi. mainne zid kee to unhonne aur zor nahin dala.

aisa mujhe laga. apani poori vinamrata aur aakarshan ke sath main gadi se bahar nikala, limozin ka chakkar kata aur sadak ke bichon bich aa gaya aur chaundhiyati roshani ke niche khada ho gaya. mainne apani donon banhen da gol kee tarah failate hue chehare par muskan bikheri. tabhi achanak band gobhi aur tamatar meri taraf uchhale jane lage. main tay nahin kar paya ki ve kya the aur kya huaa tha. tabhi mainne apane italavi mitra, dubhashiye ko apane pichhe mimiyate suna, zara sochiye, ye sab mere desh men ho raha hai. alabatta, mujhe kuchh bhi nahin laga aur ham fatafat thiyetar ke andan le jaye gaye. tabhi mujhe paristhiti ka mazak samajh men aaya aur main apani hansi nahin rok paya. yahan tak ki mere italavi dubhashiye mitr bhi mere sath hansane lage.
mainne kaha,ve abhi ladake hi to hain. ve chaudah aur solah baras men ladake the, isalie mamala rafa dafa kar diya gaya.

kavi aur les letars frenchaij ke sanpadak ne fon karake bataya ki jyan pal sartr aur pikaso mujhase milana chahenge. isalie mainne unhen dinar par aamantrit kiya. unhonne kahin shant jagah ka sujhav diya isalie hamane hotal men mere kamaron men khana khaya. jab hairi krokar, mere prachar prabandhak ko isake bare men pata chala to use jaise daura pad gaya, ham jab se stets se chale hain hamane jo bhi achchha kiya hai, ye mulakat un par pani fer degi.

ye yoorop hai, stets nahin aur ye vibhootiyan vishv kee tin mahanatam shakhsiyaton men se hain. mainne kaha. mainne is bat kee savadhani barati thi ki hairi ya kisi ko bhi yah nahin bataya tha ki amerika lautane ka mera koee irada nahin hain. kyonki abhi bhi meri sampatti vahan par thi aur mainne use abhi becha nahin tha. hairi ne mujhe lagabhag vishvas dila diya tha ki aragaun, pikaso aur sartr ke sath mulakat pashchimi lokatantr ko ukhad fenkane ka shadayantr thi. isake bavajood, mazedar kissa ye raha ki usakee chinta ne use apani aotograf buk men unake hastakshar lene se nahin roka. hairi ko dinar ke lie aamantrit nahin kiya gaya tha. hamane use bataya ki ham bad men stalin ke aane kee ummid kar rahe hain isalie ham is bare men koee bhi prachar nahin chahate.

unamen bhitari saundary aur sanvedanashilata thi. sartr ne apane man ko bahut kam khola. us sham parti ke samapt ho jane ke bad pikaso hamen apane laift baink studiyo men lekar gaye. is studiyo ko ve abhi bhi istemal karate hain. jab ham sidhiyan chadh rahe the to hamane unake niche vale apartament ke daravaje par ek bord dekha - ye pikaso ka stoodiyo nahin hai. kripaya ek aur manzil chadhen.

khalihan jaisi duchhatti par pahunche. yahan par chetaratana ne bhi marane se mana kar diya hota. ek bim par ek keel se ek nanga balb lataka huaa tha jisakee roshani men ham ek purana lohe ka jang khaya bistar aur toota foota ek stov dekh paye. divar ke sahare purane dhool bhare kainavas tike rakhe the. pikaso ne ek kainavas uthaya - sizen jo sabase khoobasoorat tha. ve ek ke bad ek kainavas uthate gaye. hamane kam se kam pachas mastar kalakritiyan dekhin. mera bahut man huaa ki unhen is poore dher ke lie ekamusht rashi dene ka prastav karoon, matr is kachare chhutakara pane ke liye. isi dher men asali khajana chhupa huaa tha.

kyonki samoocha siddhant dakshin afrika ke pashchimi tat par moonge kee bhitti dekhane ke bad hi nirdharit huaa tha. ab jivit bhittiyon ko dekhakar isamen kuchh satyapan aur sanshodhan bakee the. par isi bich main dakshin amarika ke bhoo-bhag ke savirami uthan se vahan ke samudr tat par padane vale prabhav ka adhyayan kar raha tha. sath hi, vanon ke nasht hone aur talachhat ke jamav ka adhyayan bhi jari tha. isase main prerit huaa ki adhogaman ke prabhav par bhi kuchh likhoon, kyonki yah anuman lagana aasan tha ki moongon ke oopar uthate jane se talachhat par mitti jamati chali gayi hogi. isake lie mainne uparodhi bhittiyon aur praval dvip moonge ke dvip ke niroopan ka siddhant vyakt kiya tha.

bhookampa aur di farmeshana baya da ejensi aofa arthavarmsa aopa maulda par bhi lekh padhe. main jooloji aofa di vayaja aofa di bigala ke prakashan kee dekharekh bhi kar raha tha. yahi nahin, da orijina aofa spishija se jude tathyon ka sankalan bhi mainne roka nahin tha. jab main bimari ke karan kuchh aur nahin kar pata tha to bas yahi karata rahata tha.

usake shuruaati dinon men sharir men itana dam-kham tha ki main janaral sosayati men ja sakoon. main kaee vaigyanikon tatha any suprasiddh ya alp prasiddh logon se mila. yahan main unamen se kuchh ka zikr karoonga, halanki unake vishay men jyada kuchh nahin kahana hai.

sajagata, vivekashilata aur usake lekhon men maulikata, in sabase to yahi prakat hota tha. main bhoovigyan ke bare men jab bhi usake lekhon ke bare men koee tika tippani kar deta tha to vah tab tak chain nahin leta tha jab tak ki sare mamale ko fir se n dekh le aur kaee bar mujhe bhi pahale ke mukabale adhik dhyan dete hue dekhana pad jata tha. vah mere sabhi sujhavon par har sambhav prativad karata aur sabhi tark khatm ho jane ke bavajood kafi samay tak sandeh se ghira rahata tha. usakee doosari visheshata thi, any vaigyanikon ke kam ke sath usakee hardik sanvedana.

lekin jis manoyog se usane meri baten sunin us par main hairan tha. vigyan men usakee ruchi badi prabal thi, aur manav-matr kee pragati ke bare men usake bade nek vichar the. vah bada hi dayalu aur dharmik vishvason ya kuchhek avishvason ko lekar poori tarah se udar tha lekin tha vah pakka aastik aur bada hi nishpaksha. laimarik ke vicharon ka virodh karane ke karan use badi khyati mili thi. lekin baudhape men usane disenta thyori ko apanaya aur apane charitr kee isi visheshata ka parichay diya.

to isi silasile men mainne kaha tha ki, kya hi behatar ho ki pratyek vaigyanik sath sal ka hote hi chal base, kyonki isake bad vah har nae siddhant ka virodh hi karata rahata hai. yahi bat yad karate hue usane mujhase kaha ki ab use jine kee anumati di ja sakati hai.

utana shayad kisi aur ka nahin, aisa mera manana hai. jis samay main bigal kee yatra par jane kee taiyari kar raha tha, to hensalon us samay any bhoovaigyanikon kee hi tarah se sopanik jal-pralay men vishvas karate the. unhonne mujhe salah di thi ki main di prinsipalsa ka pahala khand padh loon, yah bas, tabhi prakashit hi huaa tha. lekin unhonne yah bhi kaha ki us pustak men batae vicharon ko main svikar karoon, ye zaroori nahin hai. lekin ab dekhen to koee bhi di prinsipalsa ke bare men kitane alag vichar vyakt karega. mujhe yad karake garv ho raha hai ki verade antarip ke dvip-samoohon men sent jego namak jagah thi jisaka mainne pahali bar bhoovaigyanik sarvekshan kiya tha, aur isi sthan par leyel ke vicharon kee advitiy shreshthata siddh ho gayi thi. is tarah ke vicharon ka samarthan kisi aur kitab men mujhe nahin mila.

kretarsa aofa eliveshana enda lainsa aofa eliveshana jisake lie sedavik ne jiolojikal sosayati men tarifon ke pul bandh die the men. aaj ise lagabhag bhula diya gaya hai, isaka shrey bhi leyel ko hi jata hai.

aura saba kuchha unake satha hi kala ke garta men sama gaya, kyonki isa bata se ve bahuta darate the ki kahin koee galati na ho jae. unhonne mujha para apane gyana kee varsha bina bhedabhava ke kee, lekina kaee baton men ve mujhase eershya bhi karate the. bigala kee yatra se pahale main tina bara unase milane gaya. eka bara unhonne mujhe sookshmadarshi ke niche kuchha dikhaya aura poochha ki mainne kya dekha. mainne bata diya ki kya dekha aura mujhe poora vishvasa hai ki kisi vanaspati koshika men pranna dravya kee anokhi dharaen baha rahi thin. jaba mainne poochha ki yaha kya tha, to ve bole, yaha mera chhota-sa rahasya hai.

jaba ve dauda-bhaga ke layaka nahin raha gae the to bhi hookara ne mujhe bataya tha ve kafi doora rahane vale apane naukara ke pasa jakara jo inhin ke sahare tha usaka halachala poochhate aura use kuchha na kuchha padhakara sunate. yaha kisi bhi prakara ke vaigyanika men hardika kangali ya eershya paida karane ke lie kafi hai.

lekina una sabake bare men jyada kuchha likha na paoonga. mere mana men sara je harshela ke prati agadha shraddha thi. aasha antaripa para unake sundara ghara aura bada men unake landana sthita ghara para bhojana karake main ati prasanna hota tha. ve jyada nahin bolate the, lekina jitana bhi bolate the vaha saba sunane layaka hota tha.

jinase main hensalo vejabuda ke ghara para mila tha. bankala ne tathyon ke sangraha ka jo tarika apanaya huaa tha, usase main kafi prabhavita huaa. unhonne mujhe bataya ki jo bhi kitaba ve padhate the, use kharida lete the aura hareka ke satha una tathyon kee soochi bana kara laga dete the jo unhen bada men upayoga men aane layaka lagate the. unhen yahan taka yada rahata tha ki kisa kitaba men unhonne kya padha tha. mainne unase poochha ki ve yaha pata kaise laga lete hain ki koee tathya bada men upayogi rahega. isa para unaka javaba tha ki unhen pata nahin, lekina koee naisargika pravritti hai jo unhen rasta dikhati hai. soochi banane kee isa aadata ke karanna ve sabhi prakara ke vishayon para itane udaharanon ka ullekha kara dete the ki hairani hoti thi. histri aofa sivilaijeshana men yaha dekha ja sakata hai. yaha kitaba mujhe kafi rochaka lagi. mainne ise do bara padha, lekina unhonne jo sadharanikaranna kiya hai, usakee upayogita para mujhe sandeha hai. bankala achchhe vakta the. mainne unake vyakhyana bhi sune the, aura main mantra mugdha-sa sunata raha gaya tha, kyonki vyakhyana men unhonne koee kasara nahin chhodi thi. isi bicha miseja ferera ne gana shuroo kara diya tha, aura main unaka gita sunane ke lie chala diya. jaba main chala gaya to vahin baithe apane dosta se ve bole jise mere bhaee ne suna liya ki, mistara darvina kee kitaben unakee batachita se kahin behatara hain.

aur us vyakhyan se prabhavit hokar us mahila ne apani dost se ek ginni udhar lekar katore men dali. fir ve bole, aam taur par yahi mana jata hai ki in bujurgavar ledi kork par abhi tak usakee nazar nahin padi. aur yah bat unhonne is dhang se kahi ki vahan maujood harek ko turant yah pata chal gaya ki us bujurg aurat par abhi shaitan kee nazar nahin padi hai. unhonne yah kis dhang se kiya mujhe nahin maloom.

lekin jitana bhi mainne unhen jana tha usake aadhar par main unhen bahut pasand karata tha. ve spashtavadi, maze lene vale aur khushamijaz the. unakee shakl soorat kafi alag thi. badami rang ka sharir aur oopar se niche tak badami rang ke kapadon men dhanke the ve. jo doosaron ko avishvasaniy lagata tha, unhen us par bhi bharosa tha. ek din unhonne mujhase kaha tha ki tum yah bhoo-vigyan aur prani-vigyan kee khurafat ko chhod kar guhy-gyan kee sadhana kyon nahin karate? mere itihasakar mitr lard mehon unakee yah bat sunakar hataprabh rah gae aur unakee prasannavadana patni to aur bhi pareshan ho gayi.

jinase main apane bhaee ke ghar par bhi aae. unakee baten badi saras aur rochak hoti thin. thik aisa hi lekhan bhi tha unaka lekin kaee bar ve vishay ko kafi lamba khinch dete the. ek bar mere bhaee ke ghar par dinar men khoob maza aaya. vahan any logon ke alava baibej aur leyel bhi the. donon aapas men baten kar rahe the. dinar ke dauran karlail ne maun kee mahanata par zoradar takarir karate hue lagabhag sabhi ko chup hi rakha. dinar ke bad baibej ne bade hi vichitr roop se karlail ka dhanyavad kiya ki unhonne maun ke bare men bada hi rochak vyakhyan diya.

ek badaboodar daladal jisamen kuchh bhi upayogi nahin. unakee reminisensesa prakashit hone tak main yahi samajhata tha ki unake upahas mahaj mazak honge, lekin ab mujhe sandeh hone laga tha. unakee abhivyaktiyan kisi nirash aur hatash man ko prakat karati thin, lekin ve bahut dayalu bhi the aur apane chhatafad thahakon ke lie badanam the. mujhe vishvas hai ki unakee dayaluta vastavik thi jisamen zara bhi eershya nahin thi. vastuon aur insanon ka chitr banane men unakee maharath par koee shak nahin kar sakata tha. chitrakari men ve maikale se bahut aage the. insanon kee ye tasviren asal thin ya nahin yah prashn alag hai.

unakee vichar dhara badi sankeern thi. yadi unake dvara tiraskrit vigyan kee sabhi shakhaon ko alag kar diya jae to bhi. yah mere lie hairat angej bat thi ki kingsale ne unhen uchchastariy vigyan ke lie ekadam sahi vyakti bataya tha. vah is vichar ko hansi men uda dete the ki vhivel jaise ganitagy bhi prakash ke bare men goyathe ke drishtikon par kuchh vichar kar paenge, jabaki main manata tha ki aisa ho sakata hai. unake vichar se yah bada hi hasyaspad tha ki koee is bat par dhyan de ki koee himanad teji se aage badha ya dhire dhire ya fir hila bhi nahin. jahan tak main vichar karata hoon, to mujhe vaigyanik shodh ko lekar itane bimar dimag ka koee aadami nahin mila. landan men rahane ke dauran main vibhinn vaigyanik sosayatiyon kee sabhaon men jitana ja sakata tha gaya, aur jiolojikal sosayati ke sachiv ke roop men bhi kam kiya. lekin is daud-bhag ne aur aardinari sosayati ne meri sehat par itana ulta asar kiya ki hamen shahar chhod kar gramin ilake men basana pada. ise ham donon ne svikar kiya aur is par hamen kabhi pachhatava bhi nahin huaa.

aur midalaind ilake men jis vatavaran ka main aadi tha, usase alag mahaul tha, to bhi us sthan kee atyadhik shanti aur naisargikata se main abhibhoot tha. jarman patrikaon ne mere ghar ke lie likha tha ki vahan keval tattoo hi pahunch sakate the, lekin mera ghar itane ekant aur durgam sthan par bhi nahin tha. ham kitani achchhi jagah rah rahe the isaka behatar javab hamari santanen de sakati hain, ki vahan bar bar jana aur pahunchana kitana aasan tha.

kuchh log usase bhi jyada ekant men jivan bitate hain. fir bhi apane rishtedaron ke ghar aur samudr kinare ya fir ekadh aur jagah jane ke alava ham kahin nahin gae. yahan nivas ke pahale daur men ham thoda-bahut sosayati men jate the aur kuchh doston ko bula lete the. meri sehat kharab rahati thi, mujhe bar bar daure padate. bhayankar kanpakanpi hoti aur kaee bar ultiyan shuroo ho jati thin. isalie main kaee baras tak dinar partiyon se door raha, aur is tarah kaee chizon se vanchit bhi raha, kyonki ye partiyan mujhamen josh bhar deti thin. is karan se main apane ghar par bhi bahut kam vaigyanik sabhaen kara saka.

aur main aise kam men kuchh is tarah se doobata tha ki samay ka bhan hi nahin rahata tha. yahi nahin, main apani takalif bhi bhool jata tha. shesh bache jivan ke lie kuchh likhane ko nahin, han itana zaroor hai ki meri kuchh kitabon ka prakashan ullekhaniy hai. main yah zaroor bataoonga ki meri kuchh kitabon kee rooparekha kaise bani.

aur jarman men isaka do bar anuvad to huaa hi, french tatha any bhashaon men bhi isake anuvad prakashit hue. yatra vrittant, khasakar vaigyanik koti kee pustak ke pratham prakashan ke itane din bad bhi aisi bikri aashcharyajanak hai. inglaind men doosare sanskaran kee das hajar pratiyan bik gayin. san 1846 men meri kriti jiolojikala aabjarveshansa aona sautha amerika prakashit huee. main hamesha ek dayari likhata tha aur usamen yah darj hai ki meri tinon jiolojikal pustakon koral rifs sahit men sadhe char baras kee mehanat lagi aur inglaind laute hue mujhe das baras ho chuke hain. kitana hi samay mainne bimari men ganvaya. in tinon kitabon ke bare men mujhe aur kuchh nahin kahana. han, inamen se ek ka naya sanskaran aa raha hai, isakee hairani jaroor hai.

aur yah doosare siripediya se itana alag tha ki mujhe isake lie naya anukram banana pada. bad men purtagal ke samudr taton par bhi isi prakar ke samavargi shankh mile. is nae ghonghe kee sanrachana ko samajhane ke lie mujhe kaee samany prakar ke ghonghon kee chirafad karani padi aur isase mainne kramash ek naya samooh hi bana dala. aane vale aath baras tak main isi vishay par ji jan se juta raha aur antat do mote khand prakashit karae, jinamen sabhi jivit prajatiyon ka vivaran tha aur do chhote prakashan vilupt prajatiyon ke bare men the. mujhe sandeh nahin ki sar ee lettan bulavar ne apane ek upanyas men jis profesar lang ka jikr kiya hai, vah main hi hoon. upanyas ka profesar bhi chipakoo ghonghon ke bare men pustakon ke do khand likhata hai.

lekin dayari men mainne bataya hai ki do baras to bimari kee bhent chadh gae. bimari ke hi chalate mainne 1848 men kuchh mah ke lie melavarn men jakar jalachikitsa se ilaj karaya, jisase mujhe kafi fayada bhi huaa. isake bad ghar lautate hi mainne kam sanbhal liya. meri sehat itani kharab thi ki 13 navambar 1848 ko pitaji ka dehant hone par unako dafanane ya bad men vasiyat ka hak lene bhi nahin ja saka.

kyonki isamen is ghonghe ke vibhinn angon kee sajatiyata ka ullekh hai. mainne ghonghe ke khol banane vale angon ko khoja, halanki khol banane vali granthiyon ke bare men mainne bahut badi galati kee thi, aur antat mainne siddh kiya tha ki ghonghon kee kuchh naslon men sookshm naron kee vidyamanata ubhayalingiyon kee anupoorak aur un par parajivi hoti hai. meri antim khoj kee poori tarah se pushti ho chukee hai, halanki ek samay aisa bhi tha jab ek jarman lekhak ne is samoochi khoj ke bare men kaha tha ki yah sab meri kalpana ka vilas hai. is ghonghe kee itani jyada aur alag alag prajatiyan hain ki sabhi ka vargikaran karana bahut kathin hai. mera yah kam us samay mere bahut kam aaya jab mainne aorijina aofa spisheja men prakritik vargikaran par vichar vimarsh prastut kiya. is sabake bavajood mujhe sandeh hai ki is kam men kya itana samay lagana thik raha.

sath hi jiv prajatiyon kee kaya palat ke bare men bhi mainne dhyan diya aur kuchh prayog bhi kie. bigal kee yatra ke dauran mainne pempiyan sanghatana ke jivashm khoje the, jo is samay pae jane vale aarmadilos kee bhanti kathor khal se dhanke hote the doosari bat yah ki usi mahadvip par jaise jaise ham dakshin kee or badhe to badi hi nikat sajatiyata vale jiv ek doosare ka pratisthapan karate dikhaee die. aur tisari bat yah ki dakshin amarikee lakshanon ke mutabik gelapegos dvip samooh ke adhikansh jiv jantu alag hi the. yahi nahin, pratyek dvip par ve apane hi samooh ke jivon se thoda-sa alag the jabaki inamen bhoovaigyanik drishti se koee bhi dvip bahut prachin nahin tha.

lekin isamen paristhitiyon ya jiv kee ichchha khasakar paudhon ke bare men ka koee yogadan nahin hota hai. udaharan ke lie kathafodava ya ped par chadhane vale mendhak ya kanton ya pichchhaparn kee sahayata se door-door tak pahunchane vale bij. main is prakar kee anukoolataon se hamesha hi prabhavit huaa aur mujhe lagata hai ki jab tak inakee vyakhya nahin ho jati hai apratyaksh pramanon se yah siddh karana ki jiv prajatiyon men parivartan hue hain, nirarthak prayas hi kaha jaega.

unakee soochi aur jarnalon tatha tranjakshans kee samoochi shrrinkhala par nazar dalata hoon to apani mehanat par mujhe bhi aashchary hota hai. jald hi mujhe yah aabhas ho gaya ki janavaron aur paudhon kee upayogi nasl taiyar karane men manav kee safalata kee mahattvapoorn kunji hai prajatiyon ka sahi chayan. lekin prajatiyon ka yah chayan prakritik vatavaran men rahane vale jiv jantuon men kis tarah hota hoga. kuchh samay tak yah tathy mere lie rahasy bana raha.

lekin sath hi main poorvagrahon se bachana chahata tha, isalie mainne yah bhi faisala kiya ki kuchh samay tak isake bare men leshamatr bhi nahin likhoonga. joon 1842 men mainne apane siddhanton ka saransh likhane kee shurooaat kee aur lagabhag 35 prishth pensil se likhe aur 1844 kee garamiyon tak mainne 230 prishth likh lie. isake bad mainne inakee saf saf nakal taiyar kee jo abhi tak mere pas hai.

aur yah mere lie acharaj kee bat hai, kyonki kolambas aur usake ande kee kahani vali bat alag thi, yahan mainne apani samasya aur usake samadhan donon kee hi anadekhi kar di thi. samasya yah thi ki jaise jaise sanparivartan hota hai to ek hi vanshamool ke jivon ke lakshanon men antar aana shuroo ho jata hai. ve bade hi vishal star par bantate chale gae hain. yah vibhajan is riti men bhi prakat ho jata hai jisake anusar sabhi naslon ko prajatiyon, prajatiyon ko parivaron, parivaron ko up vibhajanon aur isi prakar aage vargikrit kar diya gaya hai. main sadak par aaj bhi us sthan ko bhoola nahin hoon, jahan par main apani tamatam men baitha tha aur achanak hi mujhe isaka samadhan soojh gaya. yah bat daun aane ke kafi bad kee hai. mere matanusar samadhan yahi hai ki prakriti kee grihasthi men sabhi pramukh aur vriddhishil naslon kee sanparivartit santatiyan anek aur atyadhik vibhedit sthanon ke anusar apane aapako dhalati jati hain.

aur mainne turant hi tin ya char guna bade paimane par lekhan shuroo kar diya jo meri pustak di aorijina aofa spishej men bhi dikhaee dega. to bhi jitani samagri mainne batori thi, usaka saransh tha isamen. aur is roop men main keval aadha kary hi prastut kar paya. lekin meri yojana dhari rah gayi kyonki 1858 kee garmiyon kee shuruaat men hi malay dvip samooh se mistar vailes ne aana di tendensi aofa vairayatija too diparta indaifinetali froma di aorijanala taipa, vishay par ek nibandh bheja. is nibandh men vahi siddhant the jinakee mainne rooparekha banayi thi. mistar vailes ne likha tha ki yadi main unake nibandh ko sahi samajhoon to leyel ke avalokan hetu bhijava doon.

1858, prishth .45 par un paristhitiyon ka jikr kiya hai, jinake karan mainne leyel aur hookar ke is anurodh ko mana tha ki main apane sansmaran vrittant ko 5 sitambar 1857 ko esa gre ke patr sahit bhejoon aur ve bhi vailes ke nibandh ke sath hi chhapen. pahale to main sahamati dene ka ichchhuk hi nahin tha, mujhe lag raha tha ki mistar vailes mere is kam ko anyayapoorn manenge, kyonki main nahin janata tha ki unakee manovritti kitani udar aur dayalutapoorn hai. mere sansmaran vrittant aur esa gre ko likha patr donon hi ko chhapavane ka abhipray to tha hi nahin, aur ye bahut bekar dhang se likhe hue bhi the. doosari or mistar vailes ka nibandh behatarin abhivyakti aur spashtata ke sath likha huaa tha. isake bavajood hamare sanyukt prakashan ne bahut kam logon ka dhyan aakarshit kiya. isake bare men dabalin ke profesar hotan ne hi ekamatr samiksha prakashit karayi thi, aur kul milakar unaka faisala yahi tha ki un aalekhon men jo kuchh naya tha vah asaty tha aur jo kuchh saty tha vah purana tha. isase yahi siddh hota hai ki kisi bhi nae drishtikon kee vyakhya kafi vishad honi chahie taki us par logon ka dhyan bhi jae.

aur pustak kee jatilata ko dekhate hue yah sankhya kafi badi hai. isaka anuvad yoorop kee lagabhag sabhi jubanon men huaa, aur spainish, bohemiyan, polish tatha roosi bhashaon men bhi yah pustak chhapi. mis bard ka kahana tha ki isaka anuvad japani men huaa aur vahan bhi kafi padhi gayi. yahi nahin, hibroo bhasha men bhi ek nibandh prakashit huaa, jisamen yah kaha gaya tha ki yah siddhant to old testament men bhi hai. isakee samiksha bhi jam kar huee. aisa mujhe isalie maloom hai ki di aorijina aur meri any kitabon ke bare men jo samikshaen prakashit hoti thin, unako main ekatr kar leta tha. kul samikshaon kee sankhya akhabaron men chhapi samikshaen shamil nahin 265 thi. bad men mainne yah kam chhod diya, kyonki isaka koee upayog lag nahin raha tha. is vishay par alag se anek nibandh aur pustaken bhi chhapin, aur jarmani men prativarsh ya har doosare varsh darvinavada par pustak ya granthasoochi prakashit hoti thi.

jo apane aap men saransh thi. in upayon se main adhik prabal tathyon aur nishkarshon ka chayan karane layak bana. vigat kaee varsh tak mainne ek svarnim niyam apanae rakha. vah yah ki jab bhi main apana koee tathy prakashit karata aur jaise hi koee aisa vichar mere man men aata jo us samany parinam ka virodhi hota to main bila naga fauran hi use yadadasht ke lie likh leta tha, kyonki apane anubhav se mainne jana tha ki virodhi tathy aur vichar yadadasht men se jaldi nikal jate hain. is aadat ke chalate mere drishtikonon ke virodh men bahut kam aapattiyan huee jin par mainne dhyan n diya ho ya jinaka uttar n diya ho.

is vishay par kafi kanafoosi huee, ya logon ka man isake lie taiyar kiya gaya tha. lekin main ise poorn saty nahin manata, kyonki mainne kisi bhi mauke par ek bhi prakritivadi ko isakee bhanak nahin lagane di, aur kisi aise vyakti se meri bhent bhi nahin huee jo naslon ke sthayitv ke bare men tanik bhi sandeh karata raha ho. yahan tak ki leyel aur hookar jo bade manoyog se meri baten sunate the, bhi sahamat pratit nahin hue. mainne ekadh bar kuchh layak logon ko yah vyakhya batane ka prayas bhi kiya ki prakritik chayan se mera aashay kya hai, lekin main asafal hi raha. han, main jo poorn saty manata hoon vah yah tha ki sabhi prakritivadiyon ke man men suvicharit tathyon kee bharamar thi, aur jaise hi unhen paryapt vyakhya ke sath niyam mila to unake asankhy vicharon ko ek disha mil gayi. is pustak kee safalata ka ek any tattv bhi tha. isaka samany aakar, aur main isaka shrey deta hoon doktar vailes ke nibandh ko. yadi mainne pustak ka aakar vahi rakha hota jis par mainne 1856 men likhana shuroo kiya tha, to yah aorijina jitani badi hoti aur bahut kam logon men ise poora padhane ka dhiraj hota.

lekin isaka prakashan 1859 men ho paya. is deri se mujhe bhi fayada hi huaa, kyonki itane samay men siddhant aur bhi spasht ho gaya. isase mujhe kuchh nahin khona pada balki isamen kuchh logon ne mere ya vailes ke siddhanton men moolaroop se yogadan hi diya. vailes ke nibandh ne to mujhe is siddhant ko apanane karane men bhi madad kee. mainne keval ek hi mahattvapoorn tathy ke bare men poorvanuman lagaya tha, jisake lie mera antarman mujhe dhikkarata bhi raha. vah tathy tha dooravarti parvat shikharon aur aarkatik pradeshon men ek hi nasl ke paudhon aur kuchh pashuon kee maujoodagi himanad-kal ke karan hai. is drishtikon ne mujhe itana prabhavit kiya ki mainne is par vistarapoorvak likha. mujhe yakeen hai ki is vishay par ee forbs ke prasiddh sansmaran prakashit hone se kafi pahale hi hookar mera lekh padh chuke the. main kuchh muddon par asahamat tha, lekin mujhe lagata hai ki main sahi tha. beshak mainne mudrit roop men yah ishara kabhi nahin kiya ki mainne is drishtikon ko svatatr roop se poshit kiya tha.

jinake vayaskon aur unhin ke bhroonon men kafi antar hota hai, aur ek hi varg ke alag alag pashuon ke bhroonon men kafi samanata rahati hai. is spashtikaran ne mujhe itana santosh diya, jitana any kisi tathy ne nahin diya tha. us samay main da orijina par kam kar raha tha. jahan tak main samajhata hoon da orijina kee kisi bhi samiksha men is tathy par dhyan nahin diya gaya tha. mainne esa gre ko likhe patr men is bare men hairani bhi jahir kee thi. kuchh hi varsh men vibhinn samikshakon ne isaka poora shrey fitj myooler aur hekel ko diya, nisandeh yahi kary un donon ne meri tulana men adhik vyapak aur sahi roop men kiya tha. is bare men poora adhyay likhane ke layak samagri mere pas thi, aur mainne vicharon ko thoda aur vistar diya hota to behatar rahata. lekin yah to spasht tha ki main apane pathak ko prabhavit karane men asafal raha aur jo aisa karane men safal huaa, mere matanusar nishchay hi shrey pane ka hakadar hai.

lekin main samajhata hoon ki yah samanyataya sadbhavana se kiya gaya. kul milakar mujhe isamen sandeh nahin ki mere karyon kee to kaee bar zaroorat se jyada tarif huee. mujhe is bat kee bahut khushi hai ki main kabhi vivadon men nahin pada aur isaka shrey leyel ko jata hai, jisane mere bhoovaigyanik lekhan ke bare men mujhe sakht hidayat di thi ki kabhi vivadon men mat pado. isase labh to kuchh hota nahin ulte samay aur svabhav donon bigadate hain.

aur jab bhi bade hi anadarapoorvak meri aalochana huee ya jab kabhi atyadhik tarif ke vashibhoot huaa to main apane aap se bar-bar yahi kah kar khud ko tasalli deta ki main jitani mehanat kar sakata tha, mainne kee, jitani shuddhata la sakata tha, laya, aur doosara koee bhi isase behatar nahin kar sakata. mujhe yad hai jab gud sakses be men, tiyera del fyoogo men jab main soch raha tha mujhe yad hai ki isake bare men ghar par khat bhi bheja tha ki prakritik vigyan men thoda-sa yogadan karane se badh kar mere jivan ka doosara upayog kya ho sakata tha. mainne apani liyakat ke mutabik sarvashreshth kiya. aalochak jo chahen kahate rahen, lekin ve is dridh vishvas ko nasht nahin kar sakate.

aur pichhali garmiyon men mainne keet patangon dvara foolon ke sankar paragan par dhyan diya tha. isase mainne to yahi natija nikala tha ki is prakar ka paragan vishisht prakaron ko sthayi banaye rakhane men mahattvapoorn bhoomika nibhata hai. isake bad pratyek grishm ritu men main kamobesh isi kam par laga raha. yahi nahin rabart braun kee salah par mainne si ke sprengel kee utkrisht pustak dasa entadekte gehimnisa dera nechura mangava kara padhi. is pustak ko padh kar main apane is kam men dooni lagan se jut gaya. san 1862 se pahale mainne kuchh varsh tak apane is british aarchid ke paragan ka adhyayan kiya tha. isase mujhe laga ki main paudhon ke samoohon par behatar se behatar lekh taiyar karoon, bajaye isake ki any paudhon ke bare men dhire-dhire tathy bator kar unake dher ka prayog karoon.

kyonki meri pustak prakashit hone ke bad se sabhi prakar ke foolon men paragan vidhi ke bare men lekhon aur shodh prabandhon ka tanta-sa lag gaya. yah manana padega ki ye sabhi mere kary kee tulana men kafi behatar the. bechare spengel ka jo kam kafi samay tak benami ke gart men pada tha, usakee mrityu ke kaee varsh bad achanak hi sarvamany ho gaya.

jab mainne alasi kee ubhayaroopata par dhyan diya. pahali bar to mainne socha ki yah matr asangat asthirata ka mamala hai, lekin praimula kee samany naslon kee janch karane ke bad mainne paya ki isakee do kismen adhik niyamitata aur nirantarata lie hue thin. isalie main lagabhag yakeen kar chuka tha ki samanyataya pae jane vale pit sevali aur basant gulab donon hi aise paudhe hain jinake nar aur mada fool alag alag lagate hain, yah bhi ki ek kism men chhote stara kesar aur doosari kism men chhote punkesar avardhan kee or agrasar the. isalie in donon paudhon ko isi drishtikon ke tahat parakha gaya lekin jaise hi chhote stara kesar vale foolon men paragan ke bad prajanan huaa to unase adhik bij prapt hue. itane bij any char sambhav paraganon men se kisi men bhi nahin mile, lekin avardhan ka yah siddhant ek sire se hi kharij kar diya gaya. isake bad kie gae kuchh aur prayogon se yah pramanit ho gaya ki isakee donon hi kismon men saf taur par ubhayalingi gun the. isake bavajood inamen aapas men vaise hi paragan hote the jaise samany pashuon ke nar aur mada men sansarg hota hai. rakt kusum layathram ke sath prayog to aur bhi rochak rahe. isakee tinon kismon men ek doosare ka sanyog spasht tha. bad men mainne paya ki ek hi kism ke do paudhon ke sanyog se hone vali santati bhi sanvrit aur prabal sadrishyata rakhati hai. yah sadrishyata do alag alag prajatiyon ke paudhon ke sanyog se utpann sankar kismon jaisi hi hoti hai.

lekin jab isaka proof mujhe mila to meri sehat itani kharab thi ki main ise thik nahin kar paya aur kuchh goodh baton ko sahi taur se samajha bhi nahin saka. is aalekh par kam hi logon ka dhyan gaya, lekin 1875 men jab isi ko sanshodhit roop men prakashit karaya to isakee khoob bikri huee. is vishay kee or mera rujhan esa gre ke lekh ko padh kar huaa tha. yah lekh 1858 men prakashit huaa tha. unhonne mujhe bij bheje aur kuchh paudhe ugane ke bad main paudhe ke tane aur lata tantuon kee ghumavadar badhotari dekhakar hairan pareshan ho gaya. yah badhotari pahali nazar men to kafi jatil pratit huee lekin vastav men kafi saral thi. isake bad hi mainne bahut si lataon ke paudhe lagae aur unaka adhyayan kiya. hensalo ne apane vyakhyanon men judavan banate jane vale paudhon ke bare men jo vyakhya di thi usase asantusht ho kar main is vishay kee or aur bhi aakarshit huaa. unhonne kaha tha ki in paudhon kee konpalon men oopar kee or badhane kee svabhavik pravritti hoti hai. is prakar kee lataon men bhi anukoolan kee pravrittiyan usi prakar rochak hain, jis prakar kee pravritti shatavari men sankar paragan ke dauran dikhaee deti hai.

lekin isake prakashan ka kary 1868 ke shuroo men hi ho paya. yah bahut hi badi pustak thi. isake lekhan men mujhe char baras aur do mah tak kadi mehanat karani padi thi. hamare ghareloo vatavaran men jiv jantuon aur paudhon ke paragan ke bare men vibhinn sroton se batore gae tathyon ko is pustak men mainne vistar se prastut kiya hai. pustak ke doosare khand men parivartanon ke niyamon aur karanon, vanshanukram aadi par vichar kiya gaya hai. han, itana avashy hai ki is vichar vimarsh ka dayara us samay upalabdh janakari ke bhitar hi raha. pustak ke ant men mainne pegnesis ke bare men apani tathakathit badanam parikalpana ka jikr kiya hai. yah dekhate hue ki apramanit parikalpanaon ka kam ya koee mooly nahin hota hai, lekin itana zaroor hai ki yadi in parikalpanaon se prabhavit hokar koee bhi vyakti in par shodhakary karane ke lie pravritt ho jata hai aur inhen pramanit karata hai, to main samajhata hoon ki mainne achchha kary kiya hai. is tarike se bahut sare prachhann tathyon ko aapas men jodate hue unhen buddhiparak roop diya ja sakata hai. san 1875 men isaka doosara aur kafi sanshodhit sanskaran prakashit huaa, jisamen mujhe kafi mehanat karani padi.

to is niyam men manav ka bhi to samavesh hoga. bas isi aadhar par mainne apane santosh ke lie is vishay par tathyon ka sankalan shuroo kar diya, kafi samay tak ise prakashit karane ka mera koee irada nahin tha. halanki da orijina aofa spisheja men kisi prajati vishesh ke mool udbhav par vichar nahin kiya gaya hai, to bhi mainne yah uchit samajha ki, manav ke udgam aur usake itihas par bhi kuchh prakash dala jae, taki koee sajjan mujh par yah aakshep n lagaen ki mainne apane drishtikon ko chhipaya hai. yadi apani pustak men main manav ke udgam ke bare men apani avadharana ke samarthan men koee praman n deta, to yah pustak anupayogi rahati, sath hi safal bhi n ho pati.

jiv jantuon kee santatiyon men badalav ke sath-sath parivartan ke niyamon aur karanon, vanshanukram aur paudhon men sankar paragan mere ekamatr vishay rahe, jinake bare men likhate samay mainne apane pas ekatr samast samagri ka bharapoor upayog kiya. di disenta aofa maina ke lekhan men mujhe tin varsh lage. hamesha kee tarah bimari ne mera pichha yahan bhi nahin chhoda. kuchh samay nae sanskaranon men aur chhitaput lekhan men bhi lag gaya. di disenta aofa maina ka sanshodhit dvitiy sanskaran 1874 men prakashit huaa.
lekin jab mainne sabhi nots batorane shuroo kie to mujhe laga, isake lie alag se prabandh lekh likhana padega.

aur fauran hi mainne usakee sabhi abhivyaktiyon par barikee se dhyan dena shuroo kar diya tha, kyonki mujhe laga ki jin jatil aur utkrisht abhivyaktiyon ko ham bad men dekhate hain, unakee buniyad to jivan kee shuruaat men hi pad jati hai aur bad men unaka kramik tatha prakritik vikas hota chala jata hai. mainne abhivyaktiyon ke bare men sar si bel ka prashansaniy lekh bhi padha tha, aur isase meri ruchi is vishay men badhi, lekin main unakee is dharana se sahamat nahin ho paya ki abhivyakti ke lie sharir men vibhinn peshiyan khas taur par bani huee hain. isake bad main kabhi kabhar manav aur palatoo jivon ke sambandh men isi vishay ko lekar kuchh likh-padh leta tha. meri pustak khoob bikee. prakashan ke pahale hi din isakee 5267 pratiyan bik gayin.

aur meri any pustakon ke prakashan men deri se mujhe labh bhi huaa, kyonki itane antaral ke bad koee bhi apane kam kee aalochana usi tarah se kar sakata hai, jaise kisi doosare ke kam kee karata. uchit tarike se uttejit karane par koee paudha aisa taral padarth bhi nikalata hai jisamen aml aur khamir ho. aisa tattv kisi jiv ke pachakad ras kee tarah hota hai. is tathy kee khoj nishchay hi ullekhaniy khoj hai.

namak pustak prakashit karane ka vichar banaya hai. yah pustak fartilaijeshana aofa aarchid kee anupoorak hogi, jisamen mainne yah darshaya tha ki sankar nishechan ke upay kitane parangat the, aur is pustak men main bataoonga ki inake natije bhi kitana mahattv rakhate hain. gyarah sal kee is avadhi ke dauran main ne jo vibhinn prayog kie unaka ullekh is pustak men hai. vastut is kam kee shuruaat mahaj sanyogavash huee thi, aur aise karyon ke lie ghatana bhi meri aankhon ke samane hi huee, jab mera dhyan bahut hi teji se is or gaya ki sankar nishechan se paida hue bijon kee narsari ke paudhon kee tulana men sv nishechit bijon se taiyar narsari ke paudhe jaldi kamajor padate hain. main yah bhi aasha kar raha hoon ki aarchid ke bare men main apani pustak ka sanshodhit sanskaran prakashit karaoon. isake bad dviroopi aur triroopi paudhon par apane aalekhon ka prakashan karaoon. sath hi isase jude kuchh aur tathy bhi prakashit honge jinhen vyavasthit karane ka samay mujhe nahin mila. yah bhi lag raha hai ki ab kamajori badhati ja rahi hai, aur ab main kisi bhi samay al vida kah sakata hoon.

aur mera vishvas bhi hai ki ek hi prajati ke paudhon men ek paudhe se doosare paudhe tak parag kanon ke abhigaman men kitana sundar kriya vyapar nihit hai. halanki is samay main yah bhi manata hoon ki - khasataur par harmen muler ko padhane ke bad, mujhe sv nishechan par bahut si anukoolataon par adhik dridhatapoorvak likhana chahie tha, halanki main bahut si anukoolataon ke bare men janakari rakhata tha. fartilaijeshana aofa aarchid ka mera kafi bada sanskaran 1877 men prakashit huaa.

aur kuchh aise paudhon ke bare men bhi nishkarsh die gae the, jinamen ek hi paudhe par do kism ke fool paida hote hain. mainne pahale bhi yah ullekh kiya hai ki bhinn paragavahi nalika vale foolon kee chhoti-si khoj ne mujhe jitani khushi di, utani aur kisi bat ne nahin di. aise foolon ke galat dhang se nishechan ke parinam bhi kafi mahattvapoorn honge, kyonki isaka prabhav sankar kismon kee anurvarakata bhi ho sakata hai halanki is prakar ke parinamon par bahut kam logon ne dhyan diya hai.

vahi kuchh sambandh is pustak aur klaimbing plantas men tha kyonki udvikas ke siddhant ke anusar vibhinn vargon men vikasit lataon kee utpatti asambhav hoti, yadi sabhi padapon men samavargiy prakar ka mamooli-sa bhi sancharan n hota. mainne ise siddh kiya aur main ek nae hi prakar ke samanyikaran kee taraf aage badh gaya. aur yah tathy the ki sancharan ke bade aur mahattvapoorn varg, prakash se uttejan, gurutvakarshan ka khinchav tatha any. ye sabhi parivritti ke aadharabhoot sancharan kee hi parivardhit kismen hain. paudhon ko bhi jivit prani manate hue usi prakar se unaka vishleshan mujhe priy raha hai, aur yah batane men khushi hoti hai ki kisi bhi paudhe kee jad ke mool men niche kee hi or badhate jane kee jo anukoolata hai vah kitani prashansaniy hai.

mere pas japan ke bare men likhane ke lie ek bahana hai kyonki main vahan par ajibo-garib halat men pahuncha tha. mainne japan ke bare men lafakadiyo harn kee ek kitab padhi thi aur unhonne japani sanskriti aur unake thiyetar ke bare men jo kuchh likha tha, usase japan jane ke bare men meri ichchha badh gayi thi.

vah tin rat tak chalata raha. kalakaron kee mandali men se jo pramukh abhinetree thi, vah pandrah baras kee ladakee thi aur usane rajakumar ka abhinay kiya tha. vah oonche, uttejanapoorn svar men ga rahi thi. tisari rat klaimeks kee thi. kaee bar ye bahut achchha hota hai ki aap bhasha nahin janate kyonki jitana adhik asar antim ank ne chhoda aur kisi chiz ka utana asar ho hi nahin sakata tha. sangit kee vyangyapoorn dhunen, kanpati taren, aur ghanton kee toofani takarahat aur ekant aakash men krodh men chillati nirvasit yuva rajakumar kee bedhati us vakt kee bhari aavaz jis vakt vah antim roop se manch se jata hai.

pradesh utana hi khoobasoorat hota chala gaya. hare dhan ke kheton ke chandi se chamakate sidhinuma khet hamen ghumavadar jharane kee taraf le gaye. achanak sidani ne mujhe koncha. sadak ke kinare rajasi auraton kee ek pant ja rahi thi. unhonne apani kamar par sirf chhint lapete hue the aur unakee chhatiyan nangi thin. ve apane siron par tokariyan liye hue thin jinamen ve fal lade hue thin. isake bad to ham lagatar ek doosare ko konchate rahe. kuchh to vakaee behad khoobasoorat thin. hamara gaid jo ek amerikee turk tha, aur aage draivar ke sath baitha huaa tha, behad gussa dila raha tha kyonki jab bhi ham koee pratikriya vyakt karate, vah ochhepan ke sath sir ghumata mano usane hamare lie koee sho rakha huaa ho.

amerikee vatar kalar chitrakar aur usakee patni bali men do mahine se rah rahe the aur unhonne apane ghar par hamen aamantrit kiya. vahan par unase pahale maiksikan kalakar miguel kuaaribiyas rah chuke the. unhonne ye ghar bali ke ek mukhiya se kiraye par le rakha tha aur pandrah dolar prati saptah par ghar ke malik kee tarah shano shaukat se rah rahe the. dinar ke bad harchafeld dampatti, sidani aur main tahalane ke lie nikale. rat andhiyari aur namakeen thi. hava nahin chal rahi thi aur patta bhi nahin khadak raha tha. tabhi achanak vahan par juganuon ne hamala kar diya aur dhan ke kheton par ve nili raushani ke utar chadhav vali laharon kee tarah fail gaye. doosari disha se sangitamay aaroh avaroh ke sath ghante bajane aur tam boore bajane kee aavazen aane lagin. kahin dans ho raha hai, harchafeld ne kaha,aao chalen.

sthaniy vasi samoohon men khade the ya aas pas chaukadi mar ke baithe the. ladakiyan pair mode tokariyan aur chhote chhote laimp liye baithi thin aur khane pine kee chizen bech rahi thin. ham bhid men se rasta banate hue nikale. hamane das baras kee umr kee do ladakiyon ko dekha jo qadhaeedar sarong lapete huee thin aur unhonne bahut hi bhavy, sone ke kam vale sir ke dupatte odhe hue the aur ve bade bade pital ke ghanton men se nikalati gahari aavaz kee dhun par sir hilati nach rahi thin. oonche sur men kanpati dhunen baj rahi thin. sangit kee lahariyan kisi toofani lahar kee tarah oopar uthatin aur gambhir nadi men utar kee tarah niche aa jatin. antim pal ek dam hataprabh kar dene vale the. nartakiyan achanak hi ruk gayin aur bhid men gum ho gayin. kisi kis m kee koee taliyan nahin bajin. bali samaj men kabhi tarif men tali nahin bajayi jati, n hi unake pas pyar ya aabhar ke lie shabd hi hain.

sangitakar aur pentar hamase milane aaye aur unhonne hamare sath hotal men lanch liya. ve pandrah baras se bali men rah rahe the aur bali bhasha bolate the. unhonne bali vasiyon ke sangit ke kuchh hisson ko apane lie piaano kee dhunon men dhal liya tha. unhonne ve ansh baja kar sunaye. isaka asar dohare samay men bajaye gaye bakh konsarto kee tarah ka tha. bali vasiyon kee sangit kee abhiruchi kafi parishkrit hai, bataya unhonne. hamare aadhunik jaj ko ve ye kah kar darakinar kar dete hain ki ye dhima aur sust hai. mojart ko ve sanvedanashil manate hain lekin ve sirf bakh ko hi pasand karate hain kyonki usakee paddhatiyan aur dhunen unhen apane khud ke sangit ke nikat jan padati hain.
beraham aur kuchh had tak bechain karane vala laga. yahan tak ki gahare vishadapoorn ansh bhi bhookhe grik dev minotar kee manahoos ubasi kee tarah the.

sundar sarong pahane navayuvatiyan thin vahan. ve apani tokariyon men fal aur ardhy kee doosari vas tuen liye panktiyon men khadi thin aur ek pujari, jo daravesh kee tarah lagata tha, usake chhati tak lambe bal the, aur usane safed choga pahana huaa tha. vah aashirvad de raha tha aur unase pooja archan ka saman le kar vedi par rakh raha tha. jab pujari ne archan kee aarati ga li to khilakhilate yuvakon ne vedi par halla bol diya aur vahan par sari chizen loot lin. unake hath jo bhi aaya, unhonne loota aur pujari un par berahami se apane kode barasane laga. kuchh logon ko loota gaya apana saman lauta dena pada kyonki kode bahut tikhe pad rahe the aur ye manyata thi ki isase unhen un buri aatmaon se mukti mil jayegi jo unhen chori karane ke lie prerit kar rahi thin.

mandir aur ahate ke bhitar chale jate aur bahar aa aate. hamane murgon kee ladaiyan dekhin, melon aur dharmik vidhiyon men shamil hue. vahan rat din anushthan chalate rahate. ek din to main subah panch baje vapis aaya. unake devata mauj masti pasand karate hain aur bali ke log unakee aaradhana dar ke mare nahin balki sneh se karate hain.
apane javab se vah santusht najar nahin aaya isalie aage bola,meri umr do hazar dolar hai. ye is bat kee ghoshana thi ki main apani jindagi men do hajar dolar jitani rakam kharch kar chuka hoon.

yahan ke ahate samuday ke aadhar par chalaye jate hain aur thode se maveshiyon ka niryat karake unhen jo paise milate hain unhen ye bachat khate men dalate rahate hain aur jo vakt bitane ke sath sath bahut badi rakam ho jati hai. ek din karon ka ek hoshiyar selsamain inake pas aaya aur kaidilaik limojin karen kharidane ke bare men bat karane laga. pahale kuchh din to un logon ne karon men khoob maza kiya, aas pas sair sapata kiya, fir unamen petrol khatm ho gaya. isake bad in logon ne paya ki ek din kar chalane ke lie jitane paison ke petrol kee zaroorat padati hai, utani to unakee poore mahine kee kamaee hai. isalie unhonne karon ko ahate men hi chhod diya aur ab unamen murgiyan pali jati hain.
svayan siddh baton kee bharamar hai aur ve shabdon ke sath khilavad karate hain. mainne hotal men ek yuva vetar ke hasy bodh kee pariksha li. murge ne sadak par kyon kee? poochha mainne.
murgi . . anda . . usane apani pagadi pichhe sarakayi, kuchh palon ke lie socha aur poore vishvas ke sath ghoshana kee, anda.

pletafarm khoobasoorat ladakiyon se ate pade rahate aur ve ladakiyan hamen upaharon se lad detin. isaka asar, jis vakt ve kimono men intajar karati khadi hotin, foolon kee pradarshani kee tarah tha. tokiyo men takariban chalis hazar kee bhid hamare svagat ke lie khadi huee thi. bhid kee dhakka mukkee men sidani gir gaya aur use lagabhag kuchal hi dala gaya tha.

ye rahasy vahan kee fijan men tha aur ab tokiyo men ye hamen apani giraft men le raha tha. hotal kee taraf jate samay ham shahar ke ek shant ilake se guzare. achanak kar dhimi ho gayi aur samrat ke mahal ke pas ruk gayi. kono ne chintatur hote hue limojin kee khidakee men se pichhe hamari taraf dekha. tab vah meri taraf muda aur ek ajib sa anurodh karane laga,kya main kar se bahar nikaloonga aur mahal kee taraf dekhate hue jhukoonga?
usane yoon hi javab diya,aapako jhukane kee jaroorat nahin hai, bas kar men se utar bhar jaiye, itani hi kafi hega.

main bahar nikala aur sir jhukaya. jab main kar men vapis aaya to kono ne rahat kee sans li. sidani ko ye ajib sa anurodh laga aur use laga ki kono ne kuchh ajib sa vyavahar kiya hai. jab se ham kobe men pahunche the, kono pareshan lag raha tha. mainne mamale ko rafa dafa kar diya aur kaha ki shayad kono kuchh jyada hi mehanat kar raha hai isalie pareshan lag raha hai.

lekin agali subah sidani meri baithak men aaya. vah abhi bhi uttejit tha. mujhe ye pasand nahin hai, vah bola,mere baigon kee talashi li gayi hai aur mere sare kagajat aage pichhe kar diye gaye hain. mainne use bataya ki bhale hi ye sach ho sakata hai lekin kuchh mayane nahin rakhata. kuchh n kuchh to rahasyamay chal raha hai. sidani ne kaha. lekin main hans diya aur usi par aarop laga diya ki vah hi kuchh jyada hi shakee hota ja raha hai.

jab mera bhaee sidani, kono aur main ek restaran ke praivet roop men dinar le rahe the, chh yuvak bhitar aaye. ek aadami kono ke sath sat kar baith gaya aur apani banhen mod lin. jabaki bakee panch aage pichhe hote rahe aur khade hi rahe. baithe hue aadami ne kono se japani men dabi huee aavaz men bat karani shuroo kar di aur. usane kuchh kaha jisase kono achanak pila pad ho gaya.
aur apane hath ko kot kee jeb men rakhe hue hi us yuvak kee taraf tej nigahon se dekha,ye sab kya ho raha hai? tab mainne sidani se kaha,chalo ham yahan se chalen. aur aap, kono, ek taiksi mangavao.

ek parichar aaya aur usake kandhe par thapathapa kar usake kan men kuchh fusafusaya. ken hamari taraf muda aur mafi mang kar chala gaya ki koee khas bat ho gayi hai aur use jana padega lekin vah bad men jaldi hi laut aayega. kushti khatm hone ke aas pas vah vapis aaya. usaka chehara safed fakk tha aur vah buri tarah se bhayabhit lag raha tha. mainne usase poochha ki usakee tabiyat to thik hai. usane sir hilaya aur achanak donon hathon se apana chehara dhak liya,mere pita ko abhi abhi katl kar diya gaya hai.
mujhe pradhan mantree se ek aadhikarik svagat samaroh men milana tha aur beshak is aayojan ko kainsil kar diya gaya tha.
ye ek sanyog se jyada hi hai ki chh katilon ne pradhan mantree ko mara aur chh hi aadami us rat restaran men aaye the jab ham khana kha rahe the.

poore rahasy par se parda utha diya tha. aisa lagata hai ki blaik draigan nam kee ek sosaiti us samay sakriy thi aur unhonne hi ye mang rakhi thi ki main mahal ke samane sir jhukaoon. jin logon par pradhan mantree ka hatya ke lie mukadama chalaya gaya tha, main yahan par usaka lekha jokha prastut kar raha hoon.

plot ke ring lidar ne bad men adalat ko bataya tha ki shadayantr kariyon ne haus aof riprejentetiv ke bhavan ko uda kar marshal lo lane kee yojana banayi thi. aam aadami jo aasani se bina pahachan men aaye vahan se guzar sakate the, bam fainkate aur yuva adhikari bahar intazar karate rahate aur jis vakt sadasy bahar aate, unhen mar dalate. doosari yojana, behad kroor thi agar poori kee jati, jaisa ki adalat ko bataya gaya tha. ye prastav tha us vakt japan kee yatra par aa rahe charli chaiplin kee hatya ka.

japan men sab kuchh rahasyamay aur apriy hi nahin tha, vahan par mainne apana jyadatar vakt achchha hi guzara. kabukee thiyetar dekhana apane aap men ek sukhad anubhav tha aur ye meri ummidon se kahin adhik tha. kabukee matr aupacharik thiyetar hi nahin hai, balki ye aadhunikata aur puratanata ka mishran hai. vahan par kisi abhineta kee dakshata hi pramukh hoti hai aur natak to matr vah samagri hai jisake sath vah pradarshan karata hai. hamare pashchimi manakon ke anusar, unakee takanik kee tivr simaen hain. jahan par yatharthavad ko prabhavi dhang se prapt nahin kiya ja sakata, vahan par usakee upeksha kar di jati hai. udaharan ke lie, ham pashchimi vasi bina amoort ke sparsh ke talavaron kee ladaee dikha hi nahin sakate kyonki bhale hi ladaee kitani bhi bhishan n ho, samane vale ko satarkata ka thoda bahut pata chal hi jata hai. doosari taraf japani yatharthavad ka koee dikhava nahin karate. ve ek doosare se thodi doori banaye rakhate hue ladate hain aur apani talavaron se tej dhar se kat dalane vali mudraen dikhate hain mano vah samane vale ka sir hi kat dalega aur samane vala apane virodhi ke pair kat dalane ka prayas karata lagata hai. donon hi apane apane dayare men koodate hain, nrity karate hain, aur ek panv par nrity karate hain. ye sab baile kee tarah hota hai. ye sangharsh prabhavavadi hota hai aur isaka samapan vijeta aur parabhoot men hota hai. is prabhavavad men se abhineta mrityu vale drishy ke dauran yatharthavad men ghul mil jate hain.

bahut gahari hai. mata pita jid par ade hue hain. isalie premi yugal tay karata hai ki ve japani paddhati se aatmahatya kar lenge. donon ye faisala karate hain ki foolon kee kaliyon kee kaun si sej par kaun marega. doolha dulhan ko pahale marega aur fir khud ko talavar kee dhar par gira dega.

unase darshakon ke bich hansi fail gayi. mere dubhashie ne bataya ki is tarah kee panktiyon ki is tarah kee pyar bhari rat ke bad jina hataprabh karane vala hoga, ke vyangy par log hanse the. das minat tak ve is tarah kee vyangyapoorn shaili men apani apani ram kahani kahate rahate hain. isake bad dulhan apani foolon kee sej par ghutanon ke bal jhuk jati hai. ye sej doolhe kee sej se zara si doori par hai. vah dulhan ke gale par se kapada hatata hai aur jaise hi doolha talavar nikalata hai aur dhire dhire dulhan kee taraf badhata hai, manch ghoomana shuroo ho jata hai aur us bindu par aane se pahale ki doolhe kee talavar dulhan ke gale ko chhooe, drishy darshakon ke samane se chala jata hai aur ab ghar ke bahar ka drishy dikhaya jata hai. charon taraf chandani faili huee hai. darshak sans roke baithe rahate hain ki pata nahin aage kya hoga. ek dam sannata chha jata hai. aakhirakar aavazen najadik aani shuroo ho jati hain. ye log mritak premi yugal ke mitr log hain jo ye khushakhabari la rahe hain ki unake mata pitaon ne unhen maf kar diya hai. ab unamen ye bahas chhid gayi hai ki premi yugal ko ye khushakhabari kaun dega. isake bad ve aavazen dena shuroo kar dete hain aur koee uttar n pa kar daravaja pitane lagate hain.

unamen se ek kahata hai,ya to ve so rahe hain ya fir bahut vyast hain. isalie ve apane apane raste chale jate hain. ve abhi bhi aavajen de rahe hain aur tik tauk, bakse jaisi aavajen kar rahe hain. ye is bat ka ishara hai ki natak samapt ho raha hai. aur manch par dhire dhire parada niche aane lagata hai.
cheri ko khilate dekhane ke lie jane ke lie tirth kee tarah yatra, chay ke aayojan ka shant dhyan, lagata hai ye sari chijen pashchimi hava ke jhonke ke sath n jane kahan ud jayengi.

kuchh baten hatash karane vali bhi thin. mainne khane ko barabad hote dekha, saman ke dher oopar uthate dekhe lekin logon ko unake aasapas bhookh se mandarate dekha. vahan lakhon log berozagar the aur unakee sevaen bekar ja rahi thin.

halat sudharane vale nahin hain. jab mainne is samasya kee bat kee ki mashinikaran se hath ke kam khatm hote ja rahe hain to kisi ne kaha ki samasya ka samadhan apane aap hi nikal aayega kyonki antat majadoori itani sasti ho jayegi ki vah mashinikaran ka mukabala karane kee halat men aa jayegi. ye hatasha nishchay hi marak thi.

koee bhi us shreni men nahin aati thi aur jo us kism kee shreni men aati bhi thin, ve hi ichchhuk nahin thin. aur ab ek bar fir vapis kailiforniya. main kabr men laut aaya tha. dagalas aur mairi alag ho chuke the isalie ab duniya mere lie bachi hi nahin thi.

gadi chala kar holivud gaya, kar park kee aur holivud kee galiyon men chahalakadami karane laga. mujhe aisa laga ki main yahan se kabhi gaya hi nahin tha. vahan par vahi ek manjila dukanon kee pant thi, purane nazar aate aarmi aur nevi stors the aur aur ghati daron vali voolavarth aur krez nam kee dava kee dukanen thin. ye sab behad hatash karane vala aur bina kisi ruchi sampannata vala mahaul tha. holivud abhi bhi shor sharabe vale shahar men tabdil nahin huaa tha.

main sochane laga ki ab mujhe ritayar ho jana chahiye aur sab kuchh bech bach kar chin kee taraf nikal jana chahiye. ab holivud men bane rahane ka koee lalach nahin raha tha. isamen koee shak nahin tha ki mook filmon ke din lad chuke the aur main savak filmon ke sath sanshargh karane jaisa mahasoos nahin kar raha tha. isake alava, ab meri poochh nahin rahi thi. mainne koshish kee ki kisi aise antarang vyakti ke bare men sochoon jise main fon kar sakoon aur bina pareshan hue dinar ke lie aamantrit kar sakoon. lekin aisa koee bhi nahin tha. jab main ghar lauta to rivz, mere mainejar yah batane ke lie milane ke lie aaye the ki sab kuchh thik thak chal raha hai. lekin aur koee nahin aaya tha.

mujhe ye jan kar khushi huee ki siti laits bahut achchha karobar kar rahi thi. ham ab tak 3,000,000 dolar shuddh kama chuke the aur abhi bhi har mahine 1,00,000 dolar ke chek aa rahe the. rivz ne sujhav diya ki main holivud baink men jaoon aur naye mainejar se mil loon, sirf jan pahachan ke lie, lekin main pichhale sat baras se baink nahin gaya tha, mainne mana kar diya.

kaisar ka pota stoodiyo men milane ke lie aaya aur bad men hamane ghar par ek sath khana khaya. hamamen bahut mazedar batachit huee. rajakumar bahut hi aakarshak aur buddhiman ladaka tha aur vah pahale vishv yuddh ke bad jarman kranti ke bare men bata raha tha ki ye ek komik opera kee tarah hai.mere dada holaind gaye the, bataya usane, lekin hamare kuchh rishtedar potsadam ke mahal men hi rah gaye the. ve itane dare hue the ki vahan se nikale hi nahin. aur aakhirakar jab krantikari mahal men ghuse to unhonne hamare rishtedaron ko ye poochhate hue ek not bheja ki kya unaka svagat kiya jayega aur us mulakat men ye aashvasan diya ki hamare rishtedaron kee raksha kee jayegi aur ki agar unhen kisi chiz kee zaroorat ho to unhen keval samajavadi mukhyalay men fon bhar karana hoga. hamare rishtedar apane kanon par vishvas hi nahin kar sake. lekin jab bad men sarakar ne unakee sampattiyon ke nipatan ke bare men usane sampark sadha to mere rishtedar nakhare karane lage tatha aur jyada mangane lage. apani bat ko khatm karate hue usane bataya,roosi kranti ek trasadi thi aur hamari kranti ek latifa!

beshak bahut tezi se lekin isase amerikee logon kee mahanata ka parichay mil raha tha. halat bad se badatar hote chale gaye the. kuchh stet to yahan tak aage badh gaye the ki unhonne lakadi par amanati mudra chhapani shuroo kar di thi taki bina bika huaa mal becha ja sake. is bich hoovar mahashay munh latakaye baithe aur bisoorate rahe kyonki unakee ye aarthik niti buri tarah se asafal ho gayi thi ki dhan ko oopar vale vargon ke bich vitarit karo to ye niche vale aam aadami ke vargon tak bhi pahunch jayega aur isi sab trasadi men ve janab apani chunavi muhim men hava men mutthiyan bhanjate fir rahe the ki agar frainkalin roozavelt rashtrapati ke pad par chun liye gaye to amerikee pranali, jise us vakt n girane vali pranali samajha ja raha tha, tash ke patton kee tarah dhah jayegi.

frainkalin di ruzavelt vhait haus men pahunche aur desh rasatal men nahin gaya. unakee faragatan main s pich ne amerika ko usakee chidachidahat bhari oongh se uthaya aur amerikee itihas men sarvadhik preranaspad yug men la sthapit kiya. mainne unaka bhashan saim goldavin ke bich haus men rediyo par suna tha. ham kaee log aas pas baithe hue the. inamen kolambiya brodakasting sistam ke bil paile, jo shenk, fred esteyar, unakee patni aur any mehaman the. hamen jis akeli chiz se darana hai vah dar hi hai. ye shabd fizan men soory kee kiranon kee tarah kaundhe. lekin main sandeh kar raha tha jaise ki sabhi kar rahe the. mainne kaha,ye itani achchhi bat hai ki sach ho hi nahin sakati.

use rokane ke lie farm kredit sthapit karana, badi badi sarvajanik pariyojanaon ko dhan upalabdh karana, rashtriy vasooli adhiniyam lagoo karana, nyoonatam mazadoori badhana, kam ke ghante kam karake naye kam muhaiyya karana, aur mazadoor yooniyanon ko protsahit karana jaise krantikari kadam uthaye gaye. aap bahut aage badh rahe hain ye samajavad hai, vipaksh vale chillaye. ye samajavad tha ya nahin, lekin isane poonjivad ko poori tarah se dharashaee hone se rok liya. isane yunaited stets ke itihas men kaee sarvottam sudharon ke lie bhi zamin taiyar kee. ye dekhana behad preranadayak tha ki kis tarah se amerikee nagarikon ne kam karane vali sarakar ka sath diya.

holivud ka aakarshan aur apanapan ja chuke the. raton rat ye thanda aur gambhir udyog ban chuka tha. saund taiknishiyan stoodiyo ko naya roop de rahe the aur bade bade saund upakaran bana rahe the. kamare ke aakar ke kaimare mahadanavon kee tarah manch par jagah ghere rahate. vishalakay rediyo upakaran lagaye ja rahe the jinamen saikadon kee sankhya men bijali ke tar jude hote. in par kam karane vale aadami apane kanon men eeyar fon lagaye, mangal grih se aaye ladakuon kee tarah baithe rahate aur abhineta abhinay karate. maikrofon unake sir ke oopar machhali marane kee rod kee tarah latak rahe hote. ye sab behad jatil tha aur ise dekhana hatash karata tha. is sare tam jham ke bich koee srijanatmak roop se kam hi kaise kar sakata tha. mujhe is sare vichar se hi nafarat thi. tabhi kisi sayane ko pata chala ki is sare tam jham ko idhar udhar le jane layak banaya ja sakata hai, kaimaron ko aur adhik chalit banaya ja sakata hai aur sare upakaranon ko yathochit rashi par kiraye par bhi diya ja sakata hai. in sare sudharon ke bavazood kam dobara shuroo karane men mujhe zara si bhi prerana nahin mil rahi thi.

000 dolar film karobar men nivesh karane ja rahi hai. vah apane sath nav par sare kagazat leti aayi thi jin par bas, hastakshar kiye jane the. mainne use is kam men hath dalane se rokane ke lie ek tarah se usaka gala hi paqad liya tha. jis kampani men vah paisa dalane ja rahi thi vah jahir taur par holivud kee ghumantu kampani thi.

jinake pas sahityik staf tha aur jinakee pahunch amerika kee behatarin kahaniyon tak thi, ne filmo men nivesh karake apane 7,000,000 dolar gavan diye to ve kis khet kee mooli hain. aakhirakar main use isamen hath dalane se rokane men kamayab ho gaya. ye hamari dosti kee shuruaat thi.

kyonki polet saim goldavin kee film men kam kar rahi thi aur main apana karobar dekhata. lekin itavar ka din katane ko daudata. hatasha men ham lambi draiv par nikal jate. sach kahoon to hamane kailiforniya kee poori kee poori tatiy doori hi khangal dali thi. sabase jyada romanchak anubhav hota sain paidro harbar jana aur vahan par mauj masti vali navon ko dekhana. ek nav bikri ke lie khadi thi. pachapan fut lambi motar kroojar jisamen tin rajasi kamare, ek gaili aur ek behad aakarshak vhil haus bana huaa tha. ye us kism kee bot thi jisakee chahat mere man men thi.

polet ne kaha, ham ravivaron ke din khoob mauj maza kar sakate aur kaitelina ja sakate. isalie mainne use kharidane ke bare men poochhatachh karani shuroo kee. isake malik koee mistar mishel the jo moshan pikchar kaimare banaya karate the. unhonne hamen nav par ghumaya firaya aur achchhi tarah se sab kuchh dikhaya. ek hafte ke bhitar hi ham tin bar us nav ko dekhane ke lie pahunch gaye. yahan tak ki vahan par hamari maujoodagi pareshani ka karan banane lagi. alabatta, mistar mishel ne kaha ki jab tak ye bik nahin jati, ham hamesha nav par aa sakate hain aur use dekh sakate hain.

usakee ichchha ke khilaf ki vah nav tak aaye to sahi. kebin ko gulabi aur nile mejaposh se bahut achchhi tarah se sajaya gaya tha aur usake sath mel khate gulabi aur nile chini parade the. gaili se baikan aur ande tale jane kee mast kar dene vali mahak aa rahi thi.

tost aur kofi lenge. polet ne gaili men jhanka to usane hamare rasoiye ko pahachan liya. daraasal, mainne kaha,aap chahati thin n ki ham ravivaron ko kahin jayen to ham log nashte ke bad kaitelina tairakee ke lie ja rahe hain. tab mainne use bataya ki mainne nav kharid li hai.
kaha usane. vah uthi, nav se bahar aayi aur bandaragah par pachas gaj kee daud lagayi, apane hathon se apana chehara dhak liya.
nav ko bandaragah kee taraf le gaye aur fir vahan se bais mil pare kaitelina kee taraf prashant mahasagar men utar gaye. vahan ham nau din tak langar dale pade rahe.

naits spats men aur sarvajanik aayojanon men ghoomata firata rahata. kuchh bhi aisa karata jisase vakt guzar jaye. main n to akele rahana chahata tha aur n hi sochana hi chahata tha. lekin in sari mauj mastiyon men bhitar hi kahin ek bhavana kam kar rahi thi. aparadh bodh ka lagatar ahasas main yahan kya kar raha hoon? main apane kam par kyon nahin hoon?

main ek yuva aalochak kee tippani se bhi hatasha se ghira huaa tha. usane kaha tha ki siti laits bahut achchhi film hai lekin ise sanvedanaon kee sima rekha par banaya gaya hai aur ki bhavishy men mujhe chahiye ki main adhik yatharthavadi filmen banane ke bare men sochoon. mainne apane aapako usase sahamat paya. agar us samay mujhe vah sab maloom hota jo ki ab hai to mainne use bataya hota ki ye jo tathakathit yatharthavad hota hai, aksar nakali, banavati, niras aur sust hota hai aur kisi film men yatharthavad itana mayane nahin rakhata jitana ye ki isamen kalpana se kya kya kiya ja sakata hai.

main achanak ek aur mook film banane ke lie prerit huaa. polet aur main maiksiko men trijuaana resakors men gaye jahan par kaintakee ya aisa hi kuchh nam tha usaka, vijeta ko rajat kap se navaza jana tha. vahan par polet se poochha gaya ki kya vah vijeta jokee ko padak pradan karegi aur dakshini amerika men bole jane vale uchcharan men kuchh shabd bolegi. use prerit karane men thoda sa hi vakt laga. main use laudaspikar par sun kar hairan rah gaya. halanki vah brukalin se hai, usane kisi kentakee sosaiti ladakee kee bahut hi badhiya nakal karake dikhayi. isase main is bat ka kayal ho gaya ki vah abhinay kar sakati hai.
traimp aur sadak chhap ladakee. choonki traimp bahut udar aur bahadur hai, use apani sit de deta hai. ye vo aadhar tha jis par main apani kahani ka dhancha khada karata aur hasy ke pal paida karata.

usane mujhe vahan par faiktari belt sistam ke bare men bataya tha. ye bade udyogon ka ek bhayavah gorakh dhandha tha jo hatte katte kisanon ko unake kheton se lalach de kar lata tha aur kam men jhonk deta tha. char ya panch baras tak belt sistam men kam karane ke bad ye log manasik roop se vikshipt ho jate the.

madarn taims men jivan yapan karane kee koshish karate hain. unhen mandi ka, hadatalon ka, dange ka aur berozagari ka samana karana padata hai. polet lagabhag ro hi padi thi jab mainne use gandi dikhane ke lie usake chehare par rakh pot di thi. ye rakh tumhare byooti spat hain, mainne use samajhaya.

mushkil kam hota hai. gold rash men nayika ke kostyoom taiyar karane men koee samasya nahin aayi thi. lekin madarn taims men polet kee poshakon ke lie faishan dizainar ke banayi poshakon kee tarah bahut sochana vicharana pada. yadi sadak chhap ladakee kee veshabhoosha ke bare men bina soche samajhe faisala kar liya jata to thigaliyan nakali aur avishvasaniy lagatin. gali gali ghoomane vali aavara ladakee ya fool bechane vali ladakee ke roop men nayika ko taiyar karake main kavyatmak prabhav paida karana chahata tha aur use usake vyaktitv se vanchit nahin karana chahata tha.
udar pathakon ne likha ki ye n to samyavad ke paksh men hai aur n hi usake khilaf hi, balki sach to ye hai ki main fens par hi baitha huaa hoon.

film kee khabaron se jitana door ja sakoon, chala jaoon isalie mainne honolulu jane ka faisala kiya. main apane sath polet aur usakee man ko le gaya aur pichhe aofis men ye hidayaten chhod din ki mujhe kisi bhi tarah ka koee bhi sandesh n bheja jaye.

barasat ho rahi thi. alabatta, koee bhi bat hamari himmat par pani nahin fer sakee. hamare pas thoda sa samay tha ki ham shoping kar saken aur nav par laut saken. godamon ke pas se gujarate hue mainne malavahak par likha huaa dekha - china
nav aapako god le leti hai, aur aapakee dekhabhal karati hai, aur aakhirakar jab nav pattan par pahunchati hai to aapako sankoch ke sath hadabadati duniya ko lauta deti hai.

tokiyo men mujhe itana dar nahin laga kyonki kaiptan ne meharabani karake mujhe doosare yatree ke roop men panjikrit kar rakha tha. japani pradhikariyon ne jab mera pasaport dekha to ise mamale ko til ka tad bana diya,aapane hamen bataya kyon nahin ki aap aa rahe hain? kaha unhonne. choonki vahan par kuchh hi din pahale sainy vidroh ho chuka tha jisamen saikadon log mare gaye the, unaka ye poochhana thik hi tha, mainne socha. japan men hamare thaharane ke dauran sarakar kee taraf se tainat ek adhikari ne ek pal ke lie bhi hamen akela nahin chhoda. sain fransisko se chalane se le kar hang kang pahunchane tak hamane kisi bhi yatree se bat nahin kee thi lekin hang kang pahunchate hi ye maun uvapas dhara rah gaya.

ek lambe se, chuppe se dikhane vale vyapari ne mujhase kaha.main kanektikat se nata rakhane vale ek amerikee padari se zaroor miloon. ve pichhale panch baras se kodhiyon kee basti men tike hue hain. fadar ke lie ye akelapan kat khane vala hoga isalie har ravivar ve hang kang apani amerikee navon ko dekhane aate hain.

khoobasoorat, lagabhag saintis baras ke shakhs the. unake gulabi gal the aur bhedane vali muskurahat thi. mainne ek drink mangavaya fir mere dost ne ek drink mangavaya, isake bad fadar ne ek drink ke aardar diya. pahale to ye chhota sa hi samooh tha lekin jaise jaise sham dhalati gayi, jamavade men pachchis aadami ho gaye. har koee doosare ke lie drink mangava raha tha. fir ye sankhya badh kar paintis ho gayi aur abhi bhi drink aa rahe the. kaee logon ko behoshi ke aalam men nav par le jaya gaya. lekin fadar jinhonne ek drink bhi mis nahin kiya tha, abhi bhi hosh men the aur muskura rahe the aur sabase bat kar rahe the. aakhirakar main unhen vidaee dene ke lie utha. aur jab unhonne mujhe aagrahapoorvak thama to mainne unase hath milaya. mainne unaka hath khuradara mahasoos kiya. mainne unaka hath ulat kar dekha aur usakee janch kee. hatheli kati fati thi aur bichon bich ek safed dag tha. mera khyal hai, ye kodh nahin hai, mainne mazak men kaha. ve hanse aur hath milaya. ek baras bad hamane suna tha ki kodh kee vajah se unakee mrityu ho gayi thi.

bas, milate milate rah gaye hain aur ab sauth chaina samudr ke bichon bich mulakat ka ek sunahara mauka hai. hastakshar jyaaan kokateyu . isake bad fir likha tha shayad vah mere kebin men dinar se pahale khana khane se pahale ek aadh paig pine ke lie aaye.
ye bat sach nikali. kyonki koketayu fransisi akhabar figaro ke diye ek kam ko karane ke lie nikala tha.

unake sachiv ko thodi bahut angreji bolani aati thi lekin bahut achchhi tarah se nahin. is tarah se unake sachiv ne hamare lie dubhashie kee tarah kam kiya. us rat ham al subah tak baithe rahe aur zindagi aur kala kee apani apani thyoriyon kee bat karate rahe. hamara dubhashiya dhire dhire aur hichakate hue bat karata tha jabaki kokateyu apani chhati par apane khoobasoorat hath failae, mashin gan kee si teji ke sath bolate. unakee apil karati aankhen ek bar mujh par rahatin aur fir dubhashiye par. dubhashiya sanvedanashoony tarike se bol raha tha. mistar kokateyu - ve kahate hain - aap kavi hain - sooryoday ke kavi - aur ki ve kavi hain - rat ke.

chidiya kee tarah sir hilate aur apani bat jari rakhate. isake bad main bat ka sira aage badhata aur gaharaee se darshan aur kala par apana gyan bagharane lagata. jab ham donon ek doosare se sahamat hote to is dooje ko gale lagate aur hamara dubhashiya thandi thandi aankhon se dekhata rah jata. is tarah se, isi mahan tarike se ham rat bhar baten karate rahe. ham subah char baje tak batiyate rahe aur ye vayada kiya ki ek baje lanch par fir milenge. lekin hamara utsah apane param bindu tak pahunch chuka tha. ham donon hi klaimeks tak pahunch chuke the lekin donon ne hi isaka aabhas nahin hone diya. dopahar ke vakt ham donon ke hi mafi mangate hue patr ek doosare ke pas pahunche. un donon khaton kee vishay sastu ek jaisi hi thi, donon hi kshama yachanaon se bhare hue the ki ham ab aur mil nahin pa rahe hai. ham donon ne ek doosare ko zaroorat se jyada hi dekh parakh liya tha.

fir mude aur hairani dikhayi aur meri taraf ullas ke sath vah patr hilaya jo mainne unhen bheja tha. mainne bhi khushi khushi unaka patr hilaya aur ham donon hi hanse. isake bad ham donon hi ek doosare se nazare hatate hue ganbhirata odhe apane apane menoo men kho gaye. kokateyu ne apana dinar pahale khatm kiya aur jis vakt stivard hamara khana paros hi raha tha, ve hadabadi se hamari mej ke pas se dabe panv guzar kar chale gaye. alabatta, bahar nikalane se pahale ve hamari taraf mude aur bahar kee taraf ishara kiya, ham aapako vahan milenge. mainne sahamati men zor se sir hilaya. lekin bad men ye dekhakar mujhe rahat mili ki ve vahan par nahin the.

achanak hi, ye dekh kar mere aatank kee sima n rahi ki door ke kone se kokateyu ka chehara ubhara aur ve meri taraf chale aa rahe the. he mere bhagavan!! mainne jaldi se aasapas chhupane kee jagah dekhi. tab unhonne mujhe dekha aur tab mujhe bahut rahat mili jab ve mukhy sailoon daravaje se bahar nikal gaye. isake sath hi hamari subah kee chahalakadami khatm ho gayi. din bhar ham ek doosare se bachate hue chor sipahi ka khel khelate rahe. alabatta, jis vakt ham hangakang pahunche, ham itane ubar chuke the ki bich bich men kuchh palon ke lie mil lete, lekin tokiyo aane men abhi bhi char din bakee the.
aur aakhirakar unhonne is bat ko svikar kiya ki unhonne us aadami ko khud nahin dekha tha balki usake bare men suna hi tha.

kabhi milate bhi to batachit kaise hain aur chalate hain se aage n badhati. lekin jab ye khabar faili ki ham donon kee president koolij nam ke jahaj men ek sath yatra karate hue amerika vapis ja rahe hain to ham donon ne hi har man li aur isake bad utsah dikhane ka aur koee prayas nahin kiya.

ye bahut buddhiman hai, ve batate, main jab bhi isase bat karata hoon, ye gata hai. unhonne tidde men itani dichaspi paida kar di ki ab ham usi ke bare men baten karate. aaj piloo kaisa hai? main poochhata,bahut achchha nahin hai, ve udasi se kahate,mainne use dait par rakha hai.
ise amerika achchha laga hai. achanak hi kokateyu ne kar kee khidakee kholi, fir nanhen se pinjare ka daravaja khola aur piloo ko uda diya.

hatash karata tha ye khyal. isake alava, ek ghante aur chalis minat tak mook abhinay chalate rahana, mazak ko ekshan men chalana aur film kee ril men har bis fut par dikhayi dene vale latife paida karana aur vo bhi film kee sat ya aath hazar fut kee lambaee tak, ye sab kar pana ab aasan kam nahin raha tha. ek aur khyal ye bhi tha ki agar main savak film bana loon to bhale hi main kitani bhi achchhi film kyon n banaoon, main mook abhinay kee apana kalatmak oonchaee se aage nahin ja paoonga. mainne traimp ke lie sanbhavit aavazon ke bare men socha tha - chahe vah ek ek akshar ke shabd bole ya sirf honth hila kar fusafusa bhar de, lekin koee fayada nahin tha. agar main bat karata hoon to fir kisi bhi doosare komediyan kee tarah ho jaoonga. ye udas karane vali samasyaen thin jinase main joojh raha tha.

madarn taims kee safalata ne polait ke lie naye dvar khol diye the aur ab usane pairamaunt valon ke lie kaee filmen sain kee thin. lekin main n to kam kar pa raha tha aur n abhinay hi. udasi ke isi aalam men mainne apane dost tim duraint ke sath paibal bich par jane ka faisala kiya. shayad main vahan par behatar tarike se kam kar sakoon.
