janaleva aur thoda manahoos tha. main ise bhatakati aatmaon ka svarga kahata tha. ise satrah mil kee draiv ke nam se bhi jana jata tha hiran vahan par jangal men aaram se vicharate rahate aur vahan par kaee bade bade ghar the jinamen koee nahin rahata tha aur ye bikri ke lie the. jangalon men kaee ped gire hue the jo sad rahe the aur unamen lakadi men ho jane vale keede, zaharili vriksh lataen, kaner kee jhadiyan aur khataratak andhiyare kone the. ye sab pretatmaon ke rahane ke lie badhiya seting rahati. chattanon par bane hue samudr kee taraf khulane vale kaee mahalanuma ghar the jimen karodapati log rahate the. is hisse ko gold kost ke nam se jana jata tha.

bagiche men chahal kadami karata, koee vichar pakadane kee koshish karata. lekin kuchh soojhata hi nahin tha. aakhirakar mainne chinta karana chhod diya. tim ko sath liya aur kuchhek padosiyon se milane chala. main aksar socha karata ki ve chhoti chhoti kahaniyon ke lie bahut achchha masala hai - ekadam gaye de mopasan kee kahaniyon kee tarah. ek bahut bada ghar tha, halanki aaramadayak tha, fir bhi thoda daravana aur udas tha. mejaban bhale aadami the lekin bahut zor se aur lagatar bolate rahate jabaki unakee patni ek shabd bhi bole bina baithi rahati. choonki unakee bachchi panch baras pahale guzar gayi thi, vah shayad hi kabhi hansati ya bat karati. vah sirf do hi shabd bolati - namaskar aur gudanait? samudr kee taraf hi ek oonchi khadi chattan par ek aur ghar bana huaa tha. usamen ek upanyasakar rahate the. unakee patni kee mrityu ho chukee thi. aisa lagata hai ki ve apani bagiche men khadi kaimare se tasviren le rahi hogin. ekadh kadam pichhe kee taraf rakh hoga aur niche khaee men gir gayi hogin. jab unake pati unhen khojane ke lie gaye to unhen sirf kaimare vali tipaee hi mili. patni ko fir kabhi nahin dekha gaya.

jisase main vahin par mila, lal bal vala, achchhe vyavahar vala navayuvak tha. usane mere sath ghulane milane kee bahut koshish kee, lekin mainne hi use kabhi ghas nahin dali. kabhi kabhar ham vik end jon stenabaik dampatti ke sath guzar lete. montere ke pas unaka chhota sa ghar tha. ve abhi prasiddhi kee payadan par hi the aur unhonne toratila flait tatha kahaniyon kee ek shrinkhala hal hi men likhi thi.
aur ausatan vo hazar shabd pratidin likhate the. main unake sath suthare pannon ko dekh kar hairan hota. unamen shayad hi koee galati hoti. main unase eershya karata.

angreji patrakar, pratidin char hajar se panch hazar shabd tak likh dalate the. amerikee samikshak elaikjaindar voolakot ne pandrah minat men sat sau shabd likh mare the aur usake bad pokar khelane valon men shamil ho gaye. jis vakt unhonne aisa karanama kiya, main vahin par tha. harst sham ke vakt do hazar shabdon ka sampadakeey likha karate the. jorjes simenan ne ek hi mahine men ek laghu upanyas likha tha aur ye upanyas utkrisht sahityik star ka tha. jorjes ne mujhe bataya tha ki ve subah panch baje uth jate hain, apani kofi khud banate hain, aur fir apani desk par aa baithate hain, tenis bol ke aakar kee ek sone kee bol ghumate rahate hain aur sochate hain. ve pain se likhate hain. jab mainne unase poochha ki aap itane chhote chhote akshar kyon likhate hain to unhonne bataya,isase kalaee par zor kam padata hai. jahan tak mera khud ka saval hai, main lagabhag ek hazar shabd pratidin kee dikteshan deta hoon. inase meri filmen ke lie taiyar sanvadon ka lagabhag tin sau shabdon ka ausat aata hai.
mainne kaha,bahut kharab huaa. yahi vah akela vyavasay hai jo aapako apane paise kee poori keemat deta hai, aur ye sabase jyada eemanadari ka dhandha hai. ise yooniyan men kyon n le liya jaye?

jisaka pati ghoshit roop se bevafa tha, ne apane bade se ghar men mere sath akeli mulakat ka intazam kiya. main vahan par apani shararatapoorn mansha ke sath gaya. lekin jab aurat ne rote hue mujhase ye rahasy banta ki usaka apane pati ke sath pichhale aath baras se koee sharirik sanbandh nahin raha hai aur vah usase abhi bhi pyar karati hai, to usake aansuon ne mere utsah par pani fer diya aur mainne paya ki main use aadhyatmik salah de raha hoon - sara ka sara mamala hi dimag par chadh jane vala ho gaya. bad men pata chala ki vah samalingi, lesbiyan ho gayi hai.

pebal bich ke pas hi rahate the. pahali bar tim aur main unase ek dost ke ghar par mile. ve chup aur apane aap men khoye hue the. aur jaisi ki meri aadat hai, mainne vakt guzari ke lie unase din bhar kee achchhi aur buri baton ke bare men kuredana shuroo kar diya. lekin jefars ek shabd ni nahin bole. mujhe apane aap par thoda gussa bhi aaya ki main hi sara vakt baten karata raha tha. mujhe laga ki unhonne mujhe pasand nahin kiya. lekin main galati par tha, ek hi hafte bad unhonne tim aur mujhe chay par bulaya.
ve kahin door khyalon men khoye hue hain. mujhe yakeen hai ki robinasan jefars jaisa vyakti mrityu kee kamana to nahin hi kar sakata.

is tarah jahan bhi gandhiji jate, vah bhi unake sath ho lete ek din daftar se bahar jane ke lie gandhiji kot pahan rahe the kailanabaik ka kot bhi pas hi tanga huaa tha gandhiji ne dekha ki unakee jeb bhari hain unako aisa anubhav huaa, jaise usamen rivalvar tha unhonne turant jeb kee talashi li sachamuch usamen rivalvar tha unhonne kailanabaik ko bulaya poochha, yah rivalvar apani jeb men kisalie rakhate hain ? kailanabaik sahasa hataprabh ho uthe lajjit hokar uttar diya, kuchh nahin, aise hi gandhiji hans pade bole, raskin aur tanlsatany kee pustakon men aisa likha hai ki bina karan rivalvar jeb men rakha jaye ? is parihas se kailanabaik aur bhi sharminda hue bole, mujhe pata laga hain ki kuchh gunde aap par hamala karanevale hain aur aap unase meri raksha karana chahate hain ? ji han, main isalie aapake pichhe-pichhe rahata hoon kailanabaik ka yah uttar sunakar gandhiji khoob hanse bole,achchha tab to main nishchint huaa meri raksha karane ka prabhu ka jo uttaradayitv tha, vah aapane le liya hai jab tak aap jivit hain, tabatak mujhe apane aapako surakshit samajhana chahie vah, mere prati sneh ke karan aapane prabhu ka adhikar chhin lene ka khoob sahas kiya yah sunakar kailanabaik vichalit ho uthe unhen apani bhool maloom huee gandhiji fir bole,kya soch rahe ho ? yah bhagavan ke prati shraddha ke lakshan nahin hain meri raksha kee chinta mat karo meri chinta karanevala to vah sarvashaktiman prabhu hai is rivalvar se aap meri raksha nahin kar sakate atyant namr bhav se kailanabaik bole, meri bhool huee main ab aur aapakee chinta nahin karoonga yah kahakar unhonne vah rivalvar fenk diya

parantu bar-bar takada karane par bhi usane bhugatan karane kee jara bhi chinta nahin kee jab polak bahut pareshan ho uthe to unhonne adalat men jane ka nishchay kiya usake lie jaroori kagajat taiyar kiye aur gandhiji ke pas jakar bole,in kagajon par hastakshar kar dijiye gandhiji un kagajon ko padhakar polak se bole, kya aap nahin janate ki main is prakar ke kamon ke lie adalaton ke daravaje nahin khatakhatata? dhamakee dena hinsa hi to hain aur hinsa ke dvara kisi vyakti ko eemanadar nahin banaya ja sakata agar vah vyakti mere paise nahin chukata to mujhe apani moorkhata ka fal bhogana hi chahie maine hi to use chhoot de rakhi thi yadi samay par usase fis leta rahata to yah sthiti paida n hoti aparadh mera bhi hain aur vah adalat men nahin gaye
jisane ve chijen khaee thi, is bat kee soochana gandhiji ko de di sham kee prarthana men gandhiji ne unhen ek-ek karake bulaya aur poochha, kya tumanen vah khana khaya?

unhonne soochana denevale ko jhootha thaharaya isapar gandhiji bade jor se apane galon ko pitane lage aur bole, mujhase sachchaee chhipane men kasoor tumhara nahin, mera hain, kyoki abhi tak maine saty ka gun prapt nahin kiya hai saty mujhase door bhagata hai vah apane ko tadana dete hi rahe yah sthiti kab tak bardasht kee ja sakati thi sare yuvak ek-ek karake unake samane aaye aur unhonne apana aparadh svikar kar liya

tab unake pas jo kuchh bhi apana tha, sab de diya tha svadesh lauter to kuchh bhi sath nahin laye sabaka vahin trast bana diya aur aisa prabandh kar diya ki usaka upayog sarvajanik kary ke lie hota rahe bharat lautane par paitrik sampatti ka prashn samane aaya porabandar aur rajakot men unake ghar the unamen gandhi-vansh ke doosare log rahate the un sabako bulakar gandhiji ne kaha, paitrik sampatti men mera jo kuchh bhi hissa hai, use main aapake lie chhodata hoon vah keval kahakar hi nahin rah gaye, likha-padhi karavane ke bad apane charon putron ke hastakshar bhi un kagajon par karava diye is prakar ve kanooni ho gaye gandhiji kee ek bahan bhi thin unaka nam raliyatabahan tha, lekin sab unako gokeebahan kahakar pukarate the unake parivar men koee bhi nahin tha prashn utha ki unaka kharch kaise chale apane niji kam ke lie gandhiji kisi se kuchh nahin mangate the fir bhi unhonne apane purane mitr dan prannajivanadas mehata se kaha ki vah gokeebahan ko das rupaye masik bhej diya karen bhagy kee vidambana dekhiye! kuchh din bad gokeebahan kee ladakee bhi vidhava ho gaee aur man ke sath aakar rahane lagi us samay bahan ne gandhiji ko likha, ab mera kharch badh gaya hai use poora karane ke liye hamen padosiyon ka anaj pisana padata hain gandhiji ne uttar diya,aata pisana bahut achchha hai donon ka svasthy thik rahega ham bhi aashram men aata pisate hain tumhara jab ji chahe, tum donon aashram men aa sakati ho aur jitani jan-seva kar sako, utana karane ka tumhen adhikar hai jaise ham rahate hain,vaise hi tum bhi rahogi main ghar par kuchh nahin bhej sakata aur n apane mitron se hi kar sakata hoon

tujhe pata chala ya nahin? ba utsuk svar men bolin,kya? gandhiji ne hansate hue kaha, aajatak too meri vivahita patni thi, lekin ab nahin rahi ba ne chakit hokar unakee aur dekha poochha, aisa kisane kaha hain? aap to roj naee-naee baten khoj nikalate hain gandhiji bole, main kahan khoj nikalata hoon yah janaral smats kahata hai ki eesaee vivahon kee tarah hamara vivah sarakari adalat ke rajistar men darj nahin huaa hai, isalie vah gair kanooni mana jayega aur too meri vivahita patni nahin balki rakhail mani jayegi ba ka chehara tamatama utha boli, usaka sir! us nithalle ko aisi baten soojha karati hain gandhiji ne poochha, lekin ab tum striyan kya karogi? ba bolin, aap hi bataiye, ham kya karen? gandhiji to yah sunane ke lie taiyar baithe the turant bole, ham purush jis tarah sarakar se ladate hain, vaise tum striyan bhi lado agar tumhen vivahita patni banana ho aur apani aabaroo pyari ho to tumhe bhi hamari tarah satyagrah karake jel jana chahie ba ne acharaj se kaha, main jel janu! auraten bhi kabhi jel ja sakati hai? gandhiji ekaek gambhir ho uthe bole, auraten jel kyon nahin ja sakatin? ram ke sath sita, harishachandr ke sath taramati aur nal ke sath damayanti--in sabhi ne vano men apar dukh sahe the ba boli, ve sab to devataon- jaise the utani shakti hamamen kahan hai gandhiji ne uttar diya, ham bhi unake jaisa aacharan karen to devata ban sakate hain main ram ban sakata hoon aur too sita ban sakati hai sita ram ke sath n gaee hoti, tara harishachandr ke sath n bikee hoti aure damayanti ne nal ke sath kasht n uthaye hote to unhen koee bhi sati n kahata yah sunakar ba kuchh der chup rahin fir bolin, to mujhe aapako jel men bhejana hi hain jaoongi jel men bhi jaoongi lekin jel ka khana kya mujhe anukul aayega? gandhiji bole, jel ka khana anukul n aave to vahan falon par rahana ba ne poochha, jel men sarakar mujhe fal khane ko degi? gandhiji ne kaha, n de to too upavas karana yah sunakar ba hans padi aur boli, thik hai yah mujhe aapane achchha marane ka rasta bata diya lagata hai ki agar main jel gaee to jaroor mar jaoongi gandhiji khilakhila pade aur kaha, han-han too jelo men jakar maregi to main jagadamba kee tarah teri pooja karoonga ba dridh svar men boli, achchha, tab to main jel jane ko taiyar hoon

bapooji daraban men aaj main khoob ghooma, parantu satyagrah ke baren men mujhe koee utsah nahin dikhaee diya isake viparit adhikansh logon men isake prati ashraddha hi bhari huee hain bahut se log kahate hain ki gandhibhaee vyarth hi pet dabakar dard paida kar rahe hain siddhant aur manapaman kee bat chhodakar jo kuchh ham paida karate hain, use karane den to bahut achchha yadi ham goron ke sath sangharsh karenge to ve hamen aur bhi dukh denge aaj jaisi sthiti hai, usamen rahana hi kya achchha nahin hoga? jara moonchh nichi rakhakar chal lengen yahan ham rupaya kamane ke liye aaye hain, barbad hone ke lie nahin svabhiman kee raksha ke lie jel men jana hota to ham yahan kisalie aate? bapooji, aisi saf-saf baten bahut-se logon ne mujhase kahin main isase bahut dukhi huaa hoon sach to yah hai ki sarakar se ladane ke lie hamare pas kitani shakti prapt huee? kya aapane kabhi hisab lagaya hai ki itani badi sarakar se ladane ke lie hamare pas kitane aadami hain? gandhiji hanse aur bole, main to rat-din hisab lagata rahata hoon, fir bhi chaho to tum gin sakate ho sabhi to hamare parichit hai ravajibhaee ne ginana shuru kiya sankhya chalis par aakar thahar gaee unhonne kaha, bapooji aise chalis vyakti hain gambhir svar men gandhiji ne poochha, parantu ye chalis yoddha kaise hain? ravajibhaee patel is prashn ka arth samajhate the bole,ye chalis to aise hain, jo ant tak joojhenge ye jikar bhi jitenge aur marakar bhi jitenge yah sunakar gandhiji bol uthe, bas aise chalis satyagrahi yoddha-pranon kee baji lagakar ant tak joojhanevale chalis satyagrahi yoddha-kafi hain tum dekh lena, aise chalis yoddhaon ke chalis hajar yoddha ho jayenge yah kahate hue gandhiji bahut hi bhavavesh se bhar uthe unake rongate khade ho gaye usi svar men vah fir bole, ye chalis bhi n hon to main akela hi gokhale ke apaman ka badala lene ko kafi hoon kitani hi badi saltanat kyon n ho, gokhale ke sath vishvasaghat karanevale ke viruddh main akela hi sangharsh karunga jabatak gokhale ko diya vachan poora nahin kiya jata, tabatak pagal banakar main goron ka dvar khatakhataoonga gokhale ka apaman ho hi kaise sakata hai? yah kaise sahan ho sakata hain?

eesaee,gujarati,madrasi sabhi dharm aur pranton ke vyakti hote the gandhiji unake sath kisi tarah ka bhed-bhav nahin rakhate the unhe apane parivar ke rup men hi manate the jis ghar men vah rahate the, usakee banavat pashchimi dhang kee thi kamaron men naliyan nahin thi peshab ke lie khas tarah ke baratan rakhe jate the unhen naukar nahin uthate the yah kam ghar ke malik aur malakin karate the jo munshi ghar men ghul-mil jate the, ven apane baratan svayan hi utha le jate the ek bar ek eesaee munshi unake ghar men rahane ke liye aaya usaka baratan ghar ke malik aur malakin ko hi uthana chahie tha lekin kasturaba gandhi ne is munshi ka baratan uthane se inkar kar diya vah munshi pancham kul men paida huaa tha usaka baratan ba kaise uthati! gandhiji svayan uthaven, yah bhi vah nahin sah sakati thin is bat ko lekar donon men kafi jhagada huaa ba baratan uthakar le to gaee, lekin krodh aur glani se unakee aankhe lal ho aaee gandhiji ko is tarah baratan uthane se santosh nahin huaa vah chahate the ki ba hansate-hansate baratan le jayen, isaliye unhonne oonche svar men kaha, mere ghar men yah kalah nahin chal sakata ye shabd ba ke hriday men tir kee tarah chubh gaye vah tadap-kar bolin,to apana ghar apane pas rakho main jati hoon gandhiji bhi kathor ho uthe krodh men bharakar unhonne ba ka hath pakada aur daravaje tak khinchakar le gaye vah unhen bahar kar dena chahate the, lekin jaise hi unhonne daravaja khola ashrudhara bahati huee ba bolin, tumako to sharm nahin hai, lekin mujhe hai jara to sharmao main bahar nikalakar kahan jaoon yahan mere man-bap bhi nahin hain, jo unake ghar chali jaoon main stree thahari tumhari dhauns mujhe sahani hogi ab sharm karo aur daravaja band kar do koee dekh lega to donon ka hi munh kala hoga yah sunakar man-hi-man gandhiji bahut lajjit hue unhonne daravaja band kar diya socha--agar patni mujhai chhodakar kahin nahin ja sakati to main bhi use chhodakar kahan janevala hoon

gandhibhaee, mujhe bahut thodi tanakhvah milati hai bal-bachchedar aadami hoon utane men gujara nahin hota agar mujhe thodi-si angreji aa jaye to jyada tanakhvah mil sakati hai gandhiji un dinon bairistar the unhonne kshannabhar socha aur fir man-hi-man nishchay karake javab diya, achchha, main tumako angreji padhaoonga batalar chakit hokar gandhiji kee taraf dekhane laga vilayati thath se rahanevala yah bairistar mujhe angreji sikhayega! use bahut khushi huee, lekin usake samane ek aur samasya thi usane vah samasya bhi gandhiji ke samane rakhi aur kaha, aap mujhe padhayenge to yah thik hai, lekin naukari se samay nikalakar main yahan jaldi kaise aa sakata hoon? gandhiji ne turant javab diya, tum isakee fikar mat karo main tumhare ghar aakar padhaya karunga batalar kee aankhe kritagyata se bhig aaeen bairistar gandhi pratidin char mil paidal chalakar usako angreji padhane ke lie jate aur fir usi prakar ghar vapas lautate yah ek-aadh din kee bat nahin thi poore aath mahine tak yahi kram chalata raha

pothiyon se praman padhakar sunaye, lekar sab vyarth ba bolin, koee aapase kahe ki dal aur namak chhod do to aap bhi nahin chhodenge gandhiji ne turant prasann hokar kaha,tum galat samajh rahi ho mujhe koee rog ho aur vaidy kisi vastu ko chhodane ke liye kahen to turant chhod doonga aur tum kahati ho to main abhi ek sal ke lie dal aur namak donon chhodata hoon, tum chhodo ya n chhodo, ye alag bat hai yah sunakar ba bahut dukhi hueen bolin, aapaka svabhav janate hue bhi mere munh se yah bat nikal gaee ab main dal aur namak nahin khanoogi aap pratigya vapas le len gandhiji ne kaha, tum dal aur namak chhod dogi, yah bahut achchha hoga usase tumhen labh hi hoga, lekin kee huee pratigya vapis nahin li jati kisi bhi nimitt se sanyam palan karane par labh hi hota hai mujhe bhi labh hi hoga isalie tum meri chinta mat karo gandhiji apani pratigya par dridh rahe

mere yogy koee ho to bataiye unaka vichar tha ki gandhiji unase angreji men lekh likhane ke lie kahenge, par bat kuchh aur hi huee us samay gandhiji gehoon saf kar rahe the unhonne kaha,vah yah to bahut achchhi bat hai ye gehoon binane hai aap madad karenge? vah bhaee sakapaka gaye achchha mahin laga, parantu mana bhi kaise karate! bole, avashy madad karunga vah gehoon binane lage oopar se shant, man men soch rahe the ki kahan aa fansa! gandhiji kaise hain? itani badhiya angreji jananevale se gehoon binavate hain! kisi tarah ram-ram karake usane ghanta poora kiya fir bola, bahut samay ho gaya, ab jana chahata hoon gandhiji ne kaha, bas ghabara gaye? usane kaha, nahin, ghabaraya to nahin, par ghar par jaroori kam hai gandhiji ne poochha, kya kam hai? vah bhaee bole, ji, rat ko khane men der ho jati hai, isase sandhya ka nashta kar leta hoon, usi ka samay ho raha hai gandhiji hans pade bole, isake liye ghar jane kee jaroorat nahin hai hamara bhojan bhi bas taiyar hone vala hai hamen bhi ek bar apane sath bhojan karane ka maukaa dijiye hamari namak-roti aapako pasand hogi n? main kam men laga huaa tha aapase baten nahin kar saka maf karen,ab khate samay baten bhi kar lenge vah bhaee kya karate! rukana pada kuchh der men khane ka samay ho gaya bhojan ekadam sada rookhi roti,chaval aur dal ka pani n ghee,n achar,n mirch,n masale bapoo ne un bhaee ko apane pas baithaya bade pyar se khana parosa bhojan shuru hote hi baten bhi shuru ho gaee, par un bhaee kee buri halat thi vah thahare meva-mithaee se nashta karane val aur vahan thi rukhi roti ek tukada munh men den aur ek ghoont pani piye tab bhi ek roti poori n kha sake itane par bhi chhutti mil jati to ganimat thi vahan to apane baratan aap manjane ka niyam tha jaise-taise vah kam bhi kiya tab kahin jakar jane ka avasar aaya jate samay gandhiji ne unase kaha, aap desh kee seva karana chahate hain, yah achchhi bat hai aapake gyan aur aapakee soojh-boojh ka achchha upayog ho sakata hai lekin isake lie sharir ka nirog aur majaboot hona jaroori hain aap abhi se usakee taiyari karen yahi aapaka desh-seva kee or pahala kadam hoga

abhi kuchh mehaman aanevale hain unamen pandit motilal neharu bhi hain un sab ke lie khana taiyar karana hai ba subah se kam karate-karate thak gaee hain unhen aaram karane de aur apani madad ke lie kusum ko bula le aur dekh, jo chij jahan se nikale, use vahin rakh dena ladaka kusum bahan ko bula laya aur dono chupachap atithiyon ke lie khana banane kee taiyari karane lage kam karate-karate achanak ek thali ladake ke hath se nicher gir gaee usakee aavaj se ba kee aankh khul gaee socha rasoeeghar men billi ghus aaee hai vah turant uthakar vahan pahunchi, lekin vahan to aur kuchh hi drishy tha bade joron se khana banane kee taiyariyan chal rahi thin vah chakit bhi hueen aur gussa bhi aaya oonchi aavaj men unhonne poochha, tum donon ne yahan yah sab kya dhandhali macha rakhi hain? ladake ne ba ko sab kahani kah sunaee isapar vah bolin, tumane mujhe kyon nahin jagaya? ladake ne turant uttar diya, taiyari karane ke bad aapako jaganevale the aap thak gaee thin, isalie shuru men nahin jagaya ba bolin, par too bhi to thak gaya tha kya too sochata hai, too hi kam kar sakata hain,main nahin kar sakati ? aur ba bhi unake sath kam karane lagin sham ko jab sab atithi chale gaye tab vah gandhiji ke pas gaeen aur ulahana dete hue bolin, mujhe n jagakar aapane in bachchon ko yah kam kyon saunpa? gandhiji janate the ki ba ko krodh aa raha hai isalie hansate-hansate unhonne uttar diya, kya too nahin janati ki too gussa hoti hai, tab main tujhase dar jata hoon? ba bade jor se hans padin, mano kahati hon --aap aur mujhase darate hain!

lekin bechara ladaka kaee ghanton se daravaje par baitha bat joh raha tha vah panch mahine pahale bhi aaya tha us samay usane gandhiji se chhatravriti mangi thi gandhiji ne use vachan diya tha ki yadi vah kalej ke prinsipal ka pramann-patr le aayega to madad ke lie vichar karenge ab vah pariksha pas karake aur prinsipal ka pramann-patr lekar aaya tha jel men milane aane ke lie usane chappal kee jodi kharidi thi badi musibat uthakar usane ye paise ikatthe kiye the mahadevabhaee ne gandhiji se kaha ki vah ladaka ek minat se jyada nahin lega vah itana aashvasan chahata hai ki thakkarabapa usakee bat par dhyan dekar usakee madad karen vah ladaka aaya apane sath vah fool laya tha unhen usane gandhiji ke charanon men rakha lekin jab gandhiji ne use usakee bat thakkarabapa tak pahunchane ka aashvasan diya to usane kaha, main doosaron par vishvas nahin karata mera to aap hi par vishvas hai gandhiji bole,agar mere sathi itane apramanik hain to main sabase jyada apramanik thahara tumhen mujhapar bhi vishvas nahin rakhana chahie yah sunakar ladaka ro pada hichakiyan bharate hue bola, aap hamen chhodakar jane ke lie kisalie taiyar ho gaye hain? aap hi kahate hain ki aapake sathi apavitr hain
aur isalie aap upavas karana chahate hain gandhiji ne kaha, tum jo yah kahate ho ki main tumhen chhaudakar ja raha hoon, so main nahin jaoonga ladaka bola, main kaise manoon?

lekin vahan paharedar the, isalie safal nahin ho saka re din kuchh musalaman bhaiyon ne aakar bataya, vah kabuli pagal maloom hota hai kahata hai ki main gandhiji kee nak katoonga yah sunakar sab log aur bhi ghabaraye, lekin gandhiji se kisi ne kuchh nahin kaha ve usi tarah apana kam karate rahe rat hone par vah apane svabhav ke anusar khule aakash ke niche sone ke lie apane bistar par pahunche unhonne dekha ki unako gherakar charon or kuchh log soye hue hain unhen aashchary huaa poochha, aap sab log to bahar nahin sote the aaj yah kya bat hai? un logon ne us kabuli kee kahani kah sunaee sunakar gandhiji hans pade aur bole, aap mujhe bachane vale kaun hain? bhagavan ne mujhe yadi isi tarah marane ka nishchay kiya hai to use kaun rok sakega? jaiye aap log apane roj ke sthan par jaiye gandhiji ke aadesh kee upeksha bhala kaun kar sakata tha! sab log chale gaye, parantu soya koee nahin vah kabuli pahali rat kee tarah aaj bhi aaya, lekin andar nahin aa saka fir savera huaa prarthana aadi karyon se nibatakar gandhiji katane baithe dekha, vah kabuli fir vahan aakar khada ho gaya hai ek vyakti ne gandhiji se kaha, bapoo, dekhiye, yah vahi kabuli hai gandhiji bole, use roko nahin, mere pas aane do vah gandhiji ke pas aaya unhonne poochha, bhaee, tum yahan kyon khade the? kabuli ne uttar diya, aap ahinsa ka upadesh dete hain main aapakee nak katakar yah dekhana chahata hoon ki us samay aap kahan tak ahinsak rah sakate hain

bas, yahi dekhana hai, lekin sirf nak hi kyon, apana yah dhad aur yah sir bhi main tumhen saunpe deta hoon tum jo bhi prayog karana chaho, bina jhijhak ke kar sakate ho vah kabuli gandhiji ke prem bhine shabd sunakar chakit rah gaya usane aisa nidar vyakti kahan dekha tha! ek kshan vah khada raha fir bola, mujhe yakeen ho gaya hai ki aap saty aur ahinsa ke pujari hain mujhe maf kar dijiye

jab vah juloos gandhiji ke nivas ke pas se hokar gujara to usaka shor sunakar unaka dhyan usakee or gaya pas baithe hue ek karyakarta se unhonne poochha yah kaisa juloos hai? aur ye itana shor kyon macha rahe hain karyakarta pata lagane ke lie bahar aaya hi tha ki utsukatavash vah svayan bhi bahar aa gaye or sidhe juloos ke pas chale gaye unhonne dekha ki sabase aage ek hatta-katta bakara chala ja raha hai usake gale men foolon kee malaen padi huee hain aur mathe par tika laga huaa hai vah samajh gaye ki yah bali ka bakara hai kshann-bhar men andhavishvas men doobe hue in bhole-bhale logon ka sajiv chitr unake mastishk men ubhar aaya hriday karuna se bhig gaya thodi der tak isi vichar men doobe vah juloos ke sath chalate rahe log apani dhun men itane mast the ki ve yah jan hi nahin sake ki gandhiji unake sath-sath chal rahe hain juloos apane sthan par pahuncha bakare ka balidan karane ke lie vidhivat taiyari hone lagi tabhi gandhiji un logon ke samane ja khade hue kuchh log unhen pahachanate the nilahe goronke atyachar ke viruddh vahi to unakee sahayata karane aaye the unhen apane samane dekhakar ve chakit ho uthe tabhi gandhiji ne unase poochha, is bakare ko aap log yahan kyon laye hai? sahasa kisi ko kuchh kahate n bana kshan bhar bad ek vyakti ne sahas karake kaha, devi ko prasann karane ke lie gandhiji bole aap devi ko prasann karane ke lie bakare kee bhent chadhana chahate hain, lekin manushy to bakare se bhi shreshth hai ve kuchh samajh n paye bol uthe,ji han, manushy to shreshth hai hi gandhiji ne kaha,yadi ham manushy ka bhog chadhayen to kya devi adhik adhik prasann nahin hogi? bada vichitr prashn tha un graminon ne is par kabhi vichar nahin kiya tha ve sahasa koee uttar n de sake gandhiji ne hi fir kaha, kya yahan par koee aisa manushy hai, jo devi ko apana bhog chadhane ko taiyar ho? ab bhi unamen se koee nahin bola thoda rukakar gandhiji ne kaha, isaka matalab hai ki aap men se koee taiyar nahin hai tab main taiyar hoon ve sab log ab to aur bhi hakke-bakke ho uthe pagal-se ek-doosare ka munh takane lage unhen soojh nahin raha tha ki ve kya kahen? vimoodh se khade hi rahe gandhiji ne ab atyant vyathit svar men kaha, goonge aur nirdosh prani ke rakt se devi prasann nahin hoti agar yah bat kisi tarah saty bhi ho to manushy ka rakt adhik moolyavan hai vahi devi ko arpan karana chahie, parantu aap aisa nahin karate main kahata hoon ki nirdosh prani kee bali chadhana puny nahin hai, pap hai, adharm hai

lekin n jane kis aatm- shakti ke bal par vah apana kam kar raha tha ek din chalate-chalate usake pairon ke chithade khulakar raste men gir gaye, ghavon se khoon bahane laga, chalana doobhar ho gaya doosare sathi aage badh gaye gandhiji to sabase tej chalate the vah sabase aage the us rogi kee aur kisi ne dhyan nahin diya apane aavas par pahunchakar jab sab log prarthana ke lie baithe to gandhiji ne usako nahin dekha poochha, hamare sath jo majadoor tha, vah kahan hai? ek vyakti ne kaha, vah jaldi chal nahin pa raha tha thak jane se ek ped ke niche baith gaya tha gandhiji chup ho gaye aur hath men batti lekar use khojane nikal pade vah majadoor ek ped ke niche baitha ramanam le raha tha gandhiji ko dekhakar usake chehare par prakash chamak aaya gandhiji ne kaha, tumase chala nahin ja raha tha to mujhe kahana chahie tha, bhaee unhonne usake khoon se sane hue pairon kee or dekha chadar fadakar unhen lapeta fir sahara dekar use apane aavas par le aaye us din usake pair dhokar hi unhonne apani prarthana shuroo kee
lekin gore bade pareshan hue ve ab tak manamani karate aa rahe the koee unakee or ungali uthane vala tak n tha ab is ek aadami ne toofan khada kar diya ve aag-baboola ho uthe

rat ke samay achanak vah us gore kee kothi par ja pahunche gore ne unhen dekha to ghabara gaya usane poochha,tum kaun ho? gandhiji ne uttar diya, main gandhi hoon vah gora aur bhi hairan ho gaya bola, gandhi! han main gandhi hi hoon gandhiji ne uttar diya, suna hai tum mujhe mar dalana chahate ho tumane hatyare bhi tainat kar diye hain gora sann rah gaya jaise sapana dekh raha ho apane marane kee bat koee itane sahaj bhav se kah sakata hai! vah kuchh soch sake, isase pahale hi gandhiji fir bole, mainne kisi se kuchh nahin kaha akela hi aaya hoon bechara gora! usane dar ko jitane vale aise vyakti kahan dekhe the! vah aage kuchh bhi nahin bol saka

tab rajy ke adhikari aur jamindar bhadak uthe us aandolan ke pichhe janata ka bahut bada bal tha gandhiji kee prarthana sabhaon men apar jan-samooh ikattha hota tha adhikariyon ne socha, is jan-samooh ko aatankit kiya jaye unhonne bhade ke badamashon kee ek toli ko lathiyon aur dandon se lais kar prarthana-sthal kee bhid ko titar-bitar karane ka kam saunpa prarthana kee samapti ke bad ve gunde bhid ko chirate hue gandhiji kee or badhe kangres svayam sevakon ne sadaiv kee bhanti ahinsatmak riti se unhen rokane ka prayatn kiya lekin unakee sari koshishen vyarth gaeen gandhiji motar kee or badh rahe the ki un badamashon ne unhen gher liya paristhiti sahasa vikat ho uthi dhakka-mukkee aur thela-theli ke karan gandhiji sankat men pad gaye tabhi sahasa unaka sharir kanpane laga vah dar nahin rahe the lekin us hinsatmak vatavaran kee pratikriya ke karan unaka sharir kanp utha tha upavas ke karan vah durbal bhi ho gaye the vah kisi bhi kshan gir sakate the, lekin usi samay unhonne aankhen moond lin aur bhaktibhav se ramanam ka jap karane lage kaee kshan bit gaye unhonne aankhen kholi ab paristhiti bilakul badal gaee thi unhonne dridhatapoorvak sabhi svayansevakon aur aashramavasiyon se kaha ki ve chale jayen aur unhen gundon kee daya par chhod den ve ab motar se nahin aavenge paidal hi chalakar pahunchenge usake bad unhonne gundon ke mukhiya ke mukhiya ko apane pas bulaya aur kaha, agar tumhari ichchha bahas karane kee hai to main taiyar hoon aur yadi tumhara vichar kuchh aur hai to vah bhi bata do aashchary ki gandhiji ke svar kan men padate hi gundon kee hinsa mom kee tarah pighal gaee unaka saradar hath jodakar gandhiji ke samane khada ho gaya bola mujhe maf kar do, bapooji mujhe aapase kya bahas karani hai! aap apana hath mere kandhe
main aapako surakshit pahuncha doonga aur us sandhya ko gandhiji apana ek hath gundon ke saradar ke kandhe par rakhakar apane dere par laute

unake samane ghee ka ek diya jal raha hai yah naee bat thi vah ekatak usakee or dekhane lage kaee kshan dekhate rahe fir prarthana shuroo huee aur vah usamen lin ho gaye prarthana ke bad pravachan prarambh huaa charon or poorn shanti thi sab log yah janane ke lie utsuk the ki apane janm divas par gandhiji kya kahane vale hain sahasa gandhiji ne poochha, yah diya kaun laya hai? kastooraba pas hi baithi huee thin boli main laee hoon gandhiji ne poochha, kahan se laee? ba ne uttar diya, ganv se laee hoon aaj aapakee varshaganth hai n? gandhiji thodi der ke lie maun ho gaye fir gambhir svar men bole,aaj agar sabase bura koee kam huaa hai to yah ki ba ne ghee ka diya jalaya aaj meri varshaganth hai, isilie diya jalaya gaya hai aasapas ke ganv men log bag rahate hain, ve kaise ganv men log bag rahate hain ve kaise jite hain, yah main roj dekhata hoon un becharon ko jvar-bajare kee sookhi roti par chupadane ke lie tel tak nahin milata aur yahan aaj mere aashram men ghee ka diya jal raha hai! bechare garib kisanon ko jo chij nasib n ho, use ham is tarah barabad kaise kar sakate hain? unake us pravachan men dard jaise sakar ho utha tha

samoohik jivan ka abhyas bhi hota tha lekin yah sab hona chahie, samay-palan, suvyavastha aur shuchita ke sath is or logon ko protsahit karane ke lie gandhiji svayan bhi samoohik rasoeeghar men bhojan karate the bhojan ke samay do bar ghanti bajati thi jo doosari ghanti bajane tak bhojanalay men nahin pahunch pata tha, use doosari pankti ke lie baramade men intajar karana padata tha doosari ghanti bajate hi rasoeeghar ka dvar band kar diya jata tha, jisase bad men aanevale vyakti andar n aane paven ekadin gandhiji pichhad gaye sanyog se us din aashramavasi shree haribhaoo upadhyay bhi pichhad gaye jab ve vahan pahunche to dekha ki baramade men khade hain baithane ke lie n bainch hai, n kursi haribhaoo ne vinod karate hue kaha, bapooji, aaj to aap bhi gunahagaron ke kathaghare men aa gaye hain! gandhiji khilakhilakar hansh pade bole, kanoon ke samane to sab barabar hote hain n? haribhaooji ne kaha, baithane ke lie kursi laoon, bapoo? gandhiji bole, nahin, usakee jaroorat nahin hai saja poori bhugatani chahie usi men sachcha aanand hai

main kisi ke kam nahin aa sakata mera jivan ek bojh ban gaya hai mujhe aap apane pas rakh lijiye gandhiji bole,main har apang ko apane sath kaise rakh sakata hoon! mere lie yah sambhav nahin hai aap kahin aur aasara khojen parantu vah yuvak apani bat par adig raha vah kisi bhi tarah vahan se jane ko raji nahin huaa sham tak barabar ke makan kee sidhiyon par baitha raha ek bhaee ne is bat kee soochana gandhiji ko di kaha, is yuvak ko nikal bahar kiya jaye yah sunana tha ki gandhiji bol uthe,yadi main use nikal bahar karoon to vah aakhir kisake pas jayega? rahane do bechare ko! main sochakar usake yogy kam bata doonga vah yuvak vahin rah gaya gandhiji ne sabase pahale use sag-sabji dhone ka kam bataya shuru- shuru men vah yah kam bhi nahin kar pata tha, lekin vah himmat harane vala nahin tha kam karane kee usake man men badi utkat ichchha thi vah laga raha aur dhire-dhire hath men

sone baithane kee sari vyavastha vahi karata tha vah is bat se bahut prasann tha ki harijan hokar bhi gandhiji kee seva karane ka use saubhagy prapt ho raha hai ek din usane gandhiji se kaha, main thodi der ke lie vardha jana chahata hoon gandhiji ne poochha, kisalie? govind ne uttar diya, mere sir ke bal bahut badh gaye hain vahan jakar unako katavana chahata hoon gandhiji bole kya seganv men naee nahin hain? naee to hain, par ve sab oonchi jati ke hinduon ke hain to kya ve tere bal nahin katate? govind ne kaha, ji nahin, ve harijanon ke bal nahin katate svarn hinduon kee tarah ve bhi hamase nafarat karate hain gandhiji ne poochha, to kya vardha ke savarn naee harijanon ke bal kat dete hain? govind ne jhijhakate hue uttar diya, ji nahin jati batane par ve bhi nahin katate to too jat chhipakar bal katavayega? nahin bapooji, jati chhipakar main apana dharm nahin dubona chahata to fir vardha jakar kya karega? tere bal kaun katega? govind ne kaha, bapooji, vahan ek-do harijan naee bhi hain ve bade prem se mere bal kat dete hain gandhi ji ne gambhir hokar kaha, achchhi bat hai, too ja lekin agar seganv ke savarn naee tere bal nahin kat sakate to main bhi unase bal nahin katavaoonga aur usake bad se gandhiji ne bal katane kee mashin kainchi manga li aur aashram-vasiyon kee madad se apane bal katavane lage

isalie unhonne use le liya lekin gandhiji kee drishti to badi tivr thi khane ke samay unhonne us tharamas ko dekha turant bhanp gaye ki yah naya hai poochha, tumane yah naya tharamas kharida hai? rajakumari ne uttar diya, ji nahin bidalaji ne diya hai hamare pas ek hi tharamas rah gaya tha yah sunakar gandhiji ko bahut dukh huaa bole tum itani garib ho, jo doosaron ka paisa kharch karavati ho! manaliya, unake pas bahut paisa hai, par tumako to adhik samajhadari se kam lena chahie bhagavan ne jise paisa diya hai, vah use dharohar mane usamen se ek kaudi bhi kisi gair-jaroori chij par kharch n kare mahadevabhaee vapas dilli lautane vale the unhin ke hath vah naya tharamas unhonne bidalaji ko lauta diya

main do-tin roj thaharakar yahan sab kuchh dekhana chahata hoon bapooji se milane kee bhi ichchha hai mere pas khane-pine ke lie kuchh bhi nahin hai main yahin bhojan karoonga gandhiji ne use apane pas bulaya poochha, kahan ke rahane vale ho aur kahan se aaye ho? avadhesh ne uttar diya, main baliya jile ka rahane vala hoon karanchi kangres dekhane gaya tha mere pas pesa nahin he isalie kabhi mainne gadi men bina tikat safar kiya, kabhi

tumhare jaise navayuvak ko aisa karana shobha nahin deta agar paisa pas nahin tha to kangres dekhane kee kya jarurat thi? usase labh bhi huaa? bina majadoori kiye khana aur bina tikat gadi men safar karana, sab chori hai aur chori pap he yahan bhi tumako bina majadoori kiye khana nahin mil sakega avadhesh dekhane men utsahi aur tejasvi maloom deta tha kangres ka karyakarta bhi tha usane kaha thik hai aap mujhe kam dijiye main karane ke lie taiyar hoon gandhiji ne socha, is yuvak ko kam milana hi chahie aur kam ke badale men khana bhi milana chahie samaj aur rajy donon ka yah dayitv hai rajy jo aaj paraya hai, lekin samaj to apana hai vah bhi is or dhyan deta, parantu mere pas aakar jo aadami kam mangata hai use main na nahin kar sakata unhonne us yuvak se kaha,achchha, avadhesh, tum yahan par kam karo main tumako khana doonga jab tumhare pas kiraye ke layak paise ho jayen tab apane ghar jana avadhesh ne gandhiji kee bat svikar kar li aur vah vahan rahakar kam karane laga

yahan kisi ke pas koee-n-koee maraham to hoga hi, isalie unhonne maraham manga gandhiji ne kaha,is par mitti lagao usane aisa hi kiya aur use aaram bhi maloom huaa vah kisi patr kee pratinidhi thi aur bharatiy sanskriti ka adhyayan karane ke lie is desh men aaee thi isalie use samajhate hue gandhiji boleganvon men vilayati davaon ka upayog kyaun kiya jaye? agar aisa huaa to hamare log kangal ban jayenge mamooli ghav ka ilaj kya ho sakata hai, yah hamen jan lena chahie usake sthan par jhat se taiyar maraham lagana mere vichar men ek prakar se aalasy ko hi badhava dena hai purane jamane men hamare desh kee boodhi bahanen desi davaiyon ka achchha gyan rakhati thin aaj bhi rakhati hai lekin ab usamen kuchh sudhar hona chahie agar unhen vaigyanik riti se samajhaya jaye to ve ganvon men ledi daktar jaroor ban sakati hain aap ek shikshit mahila hain hamare desh kee sthiti ka adhyayan karane aaee hain, isalie aap in baton kee or khas taur par dhyan dijiyega

balavant, dekho, ye til bahut barik hain aur inamen jo kachara hai, vah bhi bahut barik hai meri aankh se dikhaee nahin deta tum kisi majadoorani se saf kara do to achchha ho balavant sinh ne turant kaha,avashy kara doonga un dinon ek bore kee safaee karane ke lie ek majadoorani do ya char aane leti thi parantu ek majadoorani ko til saf karane ke lie laga diya gaya lekin tabhi gandhiji kisi kam se apane kamare se bahar nikale majadoorani ko til saf karate hue dekhakar bole, is bahan ko kisane lagaya hai? isaka uttar kaun de! ant men balavant sinh ne darate-darate kaha bapuji, mainne lagaya he gandhiji bole, kyon lagaya he? mainne to yah kam ba ko saunpa tha n! tum bich men kyon pade? balavant sinh ne sakuchate hue uttar diya,til bahut barik hain aur unamen kachara bhi barik haiba ko thik-thik dikhaee nahin deta fir isakee safaee men paise bhi jyada nahin lagenge gandhiji sahasa gambhir ho gaye unhonne kaha, thik hai main doosare sab kam chhodakar pahale til saf karoonga ve soop lekar til saf karane lage balavant sinh to jaise pasina-pasina ho uthe pas vale kamare men ba sab sun rahi thin thodi der men ve bahar aaeen aur gandhiji ke hath se soop chhinakar bolin, aap apana kam karen ham saf kar lenge gandhiji chale gaye aur ba til saf karane lagin

tikat kitane hain, yah sab unhonne vistar se janana chaha janch karane par pata laga ki yatree kam hain aur tikat jyada hain shree mahadev desaee ne utane hi vyaktiyon ke lie tikat kharide the, jitane sabaramati se ravana hue the lekin ab pata laga ki do bhaee morabi men hi rah gaye hain unhonne is bat kee soochana nahin di thi aur ve log bhi vapas lautane kee jaldi men poochhana bhool gaye the ab chalati rel men is tathy ka pata laga gandhiji gambhir ho uthe unaka chehara antar kee

n unake sathi hi so sake sari rat unake antar men tivr manthan aur chintan chalata raha, jaise vedana ka koee par hi nahin tha unhonne sara dosh apane oopar le liya ve apane ko hi pratadit karane lage- main itana gafil kyon ban gaya? maine dhyan kyon nahin rakha? ye sab baten mainne gadi par savar hone se pahale hi kyon nahin poochhin? galati meri hai mahadev to abhi bachcha hai, par mujhe budhape men yah kya ho gaya! log meri sachchaee par bharosa karake mujhe paisa dete hain us paise ka thik-thik upayog karana mera kartavy ho jata hai aaj main chook gaya mujhe isaka javab apane sirajanahar ke samane dena hoga aadi-aadi sathiyon ne unako bahut samajhaya mahadevabhaee ne apani asavadhani ke lie kshama mangi vishvas dilaya ki jo paise adhik kharch hue hain, unhen vah aashram ke hisab men nahin dalenge apane pas se de denge lekin gandhiji ko santosh nahin huaa bole tum apane pas se kya doge! tumhare pas rah hi kya gaya hai!tumane apana sabakuchh desh ko diya hai ab alag kamaee kaise karoge? yah to ek bhari bhool ham sabase ho hi gaee hai isaka prayashchit hamen karana hoga

bapooji, nahate samay aap jis patthar ka prayog karate hain, vah main kahin bhool aaee hoon kal jis julahe ke ghar thahare the, shayad vah vahin chhoot gaya hai ab kya karoon? gandhiji kuchh der sochate rahe fir bole, tujhase galati huee, too us patthar ko khud khojakar la sunakar manu sakapaka gaee fir jhijhakate hue poochha,ganv men bahut se svayansevak hain, unamen se kisi ko sath le jaoon? bapoo ne poochha, kyon? manu ko krodh aa gaya bapooji sab kuchh janate hain, fir bhi poochhate hain yahan nariyal aur supari ke ghane jangal hain anajan aadami to usamen kho jaye fir ye toofan ke din hain aadami, aadami ka gala katata hai aadami, aadami kee laj lootata hai raha

akeli hi us rah par chal padi kanp rahi thi, par usake kadam aage badh rahe the pairon ke nishan dekhati jati thi, ramanam leti jati thi aur chalati jati thi aakhir vah us julahe ke ghar pahunch gaee us ghar men keval ek budhiya rahati thi vah kya jane ki vah patthar kitana keemati tha shayad usane to use fenk diya tha manu idhar-udhar dhoondhane lagi aakhir vah mil gaya manu ke aanand ka par n raha khushi-khushi lauti dere par pahunchate-pahunchate ek baj gaya jor kee bhookh lag aaee thi aur is bat ka dukh bhi tha ki is bhool ke karan vah apane bapoo kee seva se vanchit rah gaee isilie vah unhen patthar dete samay ro padi use samajhate hue gandhiji bole, is patthar ke nimitt aaj teri pariksha huee isamen too pas huee isase mujhe kitani khushi ho rahi hai yah patthar mera pachchis sal ka sathi hai jel men, mahal men, jahan bhi main jata hoon, yah mere sath rahata hai agar yah kho jata to mujhe aur mirabahan ko bahut dukh hota toone aaj ek path sikha aise patthar bahut mil jayenge, doosara dhoondh lenge, is khayal se beparavah nahin hona chahie kam kee har chij ko sanbhalakar rakhana sikhana chahie

lekin us din gandhiji ko us kasbe men nahin jana tha par jis samay vah nav unake ghar ke samane pahunchi to andar se ek vyakti vyavasthapak ke pas aaya aur bola,shree ray ke ghar kee mahilaen gandhiji ke darshan karana chahati hain karyakram men is bat kee koee vyavastha nahin thi isalie vyavasthapak mahoday ko yah achchha nahin laga bole,pahale svikriti kyon nahin li thi? kya jagah-jagah roke jane se itane bade neta kee shan fikee nahin padati aap janate hain ki unake oopar kitana bojh hain aur ve kitane vyast rahate hain? ye sab baten gandhiji sun rahe the unhonne kaha, mere pas shan ka kya kam hai, bhaee? apane hi deshavasiyon ke samane apani man-maryada ka vichar kaise kar sakata hoon? chalie ham shree ray ke makan ke andar chalen vahan se lautakar aage badhenge nav rukee gandhiji andar gaye striyon ne unaka yathochit aadar-satkar kiya aur unaka

baje baj rahe hain sochane lage-ye log kya satyagrah karane ja rahe hain? lekin purushon ke hathon men ye fal, fool aur paise kaise hain? sochate-sochate ve jhonpadi se bahar nikal aaye log unakee jayajayakar karane lage pas aakar sabane unako shraddha se pranam kiya aur apane-apane upahar unake charanon men samarpit kar diye gandhiji ne poochha, aap log kaise aaye hain? aur yah baja kisalie baj raha hai? julush ke neta ne kaha,mahatmaji, hamare ganv men hamesha pani ka akal rahata hai garmi ke din aaye ki kuen sookh jate hain, lekin aashchary ki is bar aap aaye to sabakuchh palat gaya ganv men aapake charan padate hi kuon men pani bhar aaya usi ke lie ham apana bhaktibhav pragat karane aaye hain gandhiji ka svar jara kathor ho utha bole, tum log pagal ho kya? mere aane ka aur is pani ka kya sambandh! eeshvar par mera adhikar nahin hai usake lie aapakee vani ka jo mooly hai, vahi meri vani ka hai sunakar bechare ganv ke log lajjit ho uthe ab gandhiji hans pade aur bole,dekho, kisi ped par kauaa baithe aur sanyog se usi ghadi vah dal toot jaye to kya tum kahoge ki kaue ne ped ko tod diya? bahut se karan hote hain tumhare kuen men pani aaya, usaka karan yahi hoga ki dharati ke bhitar kuchh uthal puthal machi hogi aur ek naya jharana foot pada hoga hamen bachchon jaisi kalpanaen nahin karani chahie

lekin usaka hisab vah nahin rakh saka tha isalie jama-kharch thik nahin ho saka tha lagabhag ek hajar rupaye kee kami pad rahi thi usane apane lie ek bhi paisa kharch nahin kiya tha lekin hisab to hona hi chahie karyakarini samiti ne usase kaha, ya to hisab do ya paise bharo mantree ne kaha, main itani rakam kahan se doonga? samiti ka uttar tha, ham kuchh nahin janate sarvajanik paise ka hisab milana hi chahie vah bechara bahut dukhi huaa usane socha, kyon n gandhiji ke pas chala jaye ve to meri bat samajh lenge unake kahane se shayad ye log man jayen bas yahi sochakar vah gandhiji ke pas aaya tha sab baten batakar usane kaha, bapoo, main skool kee naukari chaudakar apane ko kangres kee seva ke lie samarpit kar chuka hoon mainne ek paisa bhi apane kam men nahin liya gandhiji bole, yah sach ho sakata hai, lekin aapako paise to bharane hi honge sarvajanik kam men avyavastha thik nahin hoti mantree ne kaha, lekin main paise kahan se bharoon? gandhiji bole, yah main nahin janata kuchh bhi karake tumhen paise bharane chahie us yuvak kee aankhon men aansoo aa gaye dinabandhu endrayooj pas hi baithe the bole, bapoo yah yuvak pachhata raha hai isase aap itani kathorata se kyon bolate hain? gandhiji ne kaha, pashchatap keval man men hone se kya hota hai! asali pashchatap tabhi hota hai, jab dosh ka parimarjan ho is yuvak ko apani bhool sudharani chahie yah janasevak hai

parantu shikshak ne use rok diya gandhiji sabakuchh dekh rahe the us bachche se bole, tum kuchh kahana chahate ho? vah bachcha bola, aapane kurata kyon nahin pahana? main apani man se kahoonga, vah aapake lie kurata si degi aap pahanenge n? gandhiji bole, jaroor pahanoonga, lekin ek shart hai, bete, main akela nahin hoon bachche ne poochha, tab aapako kitane kurate chahie? do man se kahoonga, vah aapake lie do kurate si degi gandhiji ne uttar diya, do nahin, mere chalis karod bhaee-bahan hain un sabako kurate chahie kya tumhari man chalis karod kurate si sakegi? vah bachcha shayad kuchh samajh nahin saka gandhiji usakee pith thapathapakar chale gaye lekin shikshakon ne to sabakuchh samajh hi liya tha

main aapase milane aaya hoon suna hai, aapako bahut takalif ho rahi hai kya bat hai? fenar brokave ne uttar diya, aap aaye aapakee badi kripa hai main kya kahoon, mujhe badi baichaini anubhav ho rahi hai gandhiji ne poochha, aakhir is bechaini ka kuchh karan to hoga hi fenar brokave ne uttar diya, ji han, karan to hai nind bilakul nahin aati jara nind aa jaye to kitana achchha ho gandhiji bole, yah to aap thik kahate hain nind sachamuch rasayan hai itana kahakar unhonne bade prem-bhav se inake mathe par hath rakha aur aankhen band kar li doosare hi laga, jaise ve samadhisth ho gaye hain aur apane eeshvar se

ab aapako nind aa jayegi aur aap aaram anubhav karenge itana kahakar gandhiji laut aaye fenar brokave ne apani pustak pachas varsh ka samajavadi jivan ka itihas men likha hai,kitana aashchary hai ki gandhiji gaye aur kuchh hi der men mujhe ekadam gahari nind aa gaee nind khuli to main kaisi sfoorti anubhav kar raha tha!

tumhare nanhen-nanhen hathon men itani bhari-bhari choodiyan! ranibala turant unako utarane lagi usake nana ne bhi use protsahit karate hue kaha, han- han, ye choodiyan gandhiji ko de do gandhiji ko laga, jaise yah udarata bahut uchit nahin hai, kyonki aakhir ye choodiyan baboo shyamasundar chakravarti kee to hai nahin chakravarti mahoday shayad gandhiji ke man kee yah bat bhanp gaye bole,aap meri beti aur damad ko nahin janate ranibala ne ye choodiyan aapako de di hain, yah janakar meri beti bahut prasann hogi aur mera damad to bahut udar hai vah garibon kee madad karata hai gandhiji ne yah sab majak men hi kaha tha, par unaka uddeshy gahanon ke prati aruchi paida karana to tha hi vah logon ke man men garibon ko sahayata karane kee ichchha bhi paida karana chahate the fir bhi unhonne choodiyan lautane kee koshish kee, lekin shyamababoo nahin mane tab gandhiji bole,lekin ab rani sone kee naee choodiyan nahin pahanegi han, vah shankh kee choodiyan pahan sakati hai isi shart par main inhen le sakata hoon nanhin ranibala aur usake nana shyamababoo donon ne saharsh unakee yah shart svikar kar li

vah door ho jayegi samay bhi bachega un dinon rasoeeghar kee vyavastha balavantasinh dekhate the unhen yah aadesh bahut achchha nahin laga unhen dar tha ki aisa karane se aur bhi avyavastha failegi gandhiji bole,mera uddeshy avyavastha men vyavastha lana hai achchha, sabase pahale main aur ba hi is kam ka shreeganesh karenge aur ve ba ko lekar turant bartan manjane kee jagah par jakar baith gaye unhonne sabase kaha, aap log apane bartan yahan par rakh den aur hath dhokar chale jayen log ghabaraye, parantu ve janate the ki gandhiji jo kah dete hain, vahi karate hain isalie ve apane-apane bartan vahin chhodakar chale gaye gandhiji aur ba donon bade manoyog se bartan manjane lage balavantasinh barabar soch rahe the ki kaise gadhiji ko yah kam chhodane ke

lekin sath hi unhen aisa bhi lag raha tha ki jab gandhiji aur ba is tarah ka kam kar sakate hain to hamen bhi man men kisi kam ke lie chhote-bade ka bhedabhav nahin rakhana chahie udhar gandhiji aur ba men hod lag rahi thi ki kisaka bartan adhik chamakata hai gandhiji bartan saf karate jate aur kahate, kyon balavant sinh, kaisa saf huaa hai? tum darate kyon ho? aadami nity kare to kya nahin kar sakata? aakhir striyan ghar men sabake jhoothe bartan saf karati hi hain yah aashram hamara bada kutumb hai hamen to stree-purush ka bhed mitana hai isilie to rasoeeghar ka bhar tum par saunpa hai mainne jivan men bahut prayog kiye hain aur main is parinam par pahuncha hoon ki samoohik rasoeeghar kholane men jo kutumb- bhavana badhati hai vah aur kisi prakar nahin badhati jo rasoeeghar chalata hai usaka dayitv bahut adhik hota hai sab chijon ko vyavasthit aur svachchh rakhana aur jitane bhojan karane vale hain, unako bhagavan samajh kar, prem se khilana, yah aadhyatmik pragati kee badi sadhana hai tum isamen pas ho jaoge to main samajhoonga ki tum seva kar sakate ho

kyonki yah to stree -dhan hai isalie der kyon kee jaye? aap sab thode-thode gahane mujhe de sakate hain mere pas aane kee jaroorat nahin hai main hi aapake pas aakar le loonga us din gandhiji ko bahut-kuchh mila, itana ki ve sanbhal bhi n sake kafi kuchh idhar-udhar bikhar gaya isilie sabha se lautate samay unhonne shree mahavir tyagi se kaha, apane samane farsh ko khoob achchhi tarah jhadakar rupaye aur gahane batorana, achchha kahakar ve chale gaye tyagiji ne sabase pahale pandal ko khali karavaya fir mude-tude not, duvanni, athanni aadi sikke aur chhote-chhote gahane-nath, bali, bunde, choodiyan jo idhar-udhar bikhare pade the, un sabako ikattha karake sanbhala aur kaimp men pahuncha diya rat ko prarthana ke bad gandhiji ne tyagiji ko bula bheja tyagiji bahut khush the shayad gandhiji ne shabashi dene ke lie bulaya hai! lekin jab ve vahan pahunche to gandhiji ne kaha, mainne kaha tha ki apane samane dari jhadakar sara paisa ikattha kar lena aisa lagata he ki tumane kisi doosare ko kah diya, kyonki sari chijen nahin aaeen tyagiji bole,nahin bapooji, mainne svayan hi sara pandal jhada tha gandhiji ne dridh svar men kaha,aisa mat kaho, mujhe tumhara vishvas nahin he tumane svayan nahin dekha aisa aadami kis kam ka, jo apani jimmedari doosare par dal de! tumhen svayan dekhana chahie tha maine to tumhare bharose sab kuchh chhod diya tha tyagiji ghabarakar bole,bapu aapase kisane kaha ki main vahan nahin tha? gandhiji ne turant ek sone ka bunda nikal kar tyagiji ko dikhaya aur kaha, yah bunda kahata hai ki tum vahan nahin the bhala koee stree mujhe ek bunda degi aur doosara apane kan men rakhegi? isaka jodidar kahan hai agar aankh kholakar dekhate to milata n! jo janata ke paise ke sath laparavahi vah bharose ka aadami nahin ho sakata mere pas apani koee poonji nahin hai main is nukasan ko kahan se bharoonga jab tak vah bunda nahin milata, vahan jakar jhadoo lagao jao rat ho gaee thi latad khakar tyagiji pandal men pahunche gais ke hande mangavaye tarch li kuchh mitron ko sath liya dari, chataee sab kuchh jhada-buhara bhagy kee bat ki vah bunda mil gaya usake sath mile kuchh not, kuchh rupaye-paise, ek do angoothi, chhalle, chandi ke bale, aadi-aadi lagabhag dhaee sau rupaye ka saman hoga gandhiji kee nigah tej thi!

main nahin ja sakata, lekin tum chale jao aur mera sandesha sabha ko suna do kakasahab taiyar ho gaye, lekin unhen le jane ke lie koee nihin aaya rah dekhate- dekhate ek ghanta bit gaya tabhi gandhiji ne unhen dekh liya unhonne acharaj se poochha, kyon gaye nahin? kakasahab ne kaha main to taiyar baitha hoon koee mujhe le jaye tab n? yah sunakar gandhiji bade naraj hue bole, is tarah se kam nahin hote samay hote hi tumhen paidal chal dena chahie motar n mili to kya huaa, paidal hi chalate do din lagate to lag jate hamara matalab gantavy sthan par pahunchane se nahin he, samay par ravana hone se hai kakasahab bade lajjit hue aur usi kshan chal pade

jaisa ki hota tha, sab log chanda aur bhent lekar aaye prayah sabhi sthanon pararupaya-paisa aur gahane aadi diye jate the, lekin yahan doosara hi drishy dekhane men aaya koee vyakti kumhada laya tha, koee bijora, koee baingan aur koee jangal kee doosari bhaji kuchh garibon ne apane chithadon men se khol kholakar kuchh paise diye kakasahab kalelakar ghoom-ghoomakar ve paise ikatthe kar rahe the un paison ke jang se unake hath hare ho gaye unhonne apane hath bapoo ko dikhalaye ve kuchh kah n sake, kyonki unaka man bhig aaya tha us kshan to gandhiji ne kuchh nahin kaha us drishy ne manon sabhi ko abhibhoot kar diya tha agale din savere ke samay donon ghoomane ke lie nikale rasta chhodakar ve kheton men ghoomane lage usi samay gandhiji gambhir hokar bole,kitana daridry aur dainy hai yahan! kya kiya jaye in logon ke lie ji chahata hai ki apani maran kee ghadi men yahin aakar in logon ke bich men maroon us samay jo log mujhase milane ke lie yahan aayenge, ve in logon kee karun dasha dekhenge tab kisi-n-kisi ka hriday to pasijega hi aur vah inakee seva ke lie yahan aakar bas jayega aisa karun drishy aur kahin shayad hi dekhane ko mile lekin jab ve charabatiya gram pahunche to stabdh rah gaye sabha men bahut thode log aaye the jo aaye the unamen se kisi ke munh par bhi chaitany nahin tha thi bas pret jaisi shoonyata gandhiji ne yahan bhi chande ke lie apil kee un logon ne kuchh-n-kuchh diya hi vahi jang lage paise kakasahab ke hath fir hare ho gaye in logon ne rupaye to kabhi dekhe hi nahin the tanbe ke paise hi unaka sabase bada dhan tha jab kabhi unhen koee paisa mil jata to ve use kharch karane kee himmat nahin kar pate the isilie bahut din tak bandhe rahane ya dharati main gad dene ke karan us par jang lag jata tha kakasahab ne kaha, in logon ke paise lekar kya hoga? gandhiji bole, yahi to pavitr dan hai yah hamare lie diksha hai isake dvara in logon ke hriday men aasha ka ankur uga hai yah paisa usi aasha ka pratik hai inhen vishvas ho gaya hai ki ek din hamara bhi uddhar hoga

jis savari men karodon garib log safar nahin kar sakate, usamen main kaise baithoon? unhonne rel ke tisare darje se hi jana tay kiya manu bahan ko bulakar bole, mere sath sirf tujhako chalana hai saman bhi kam-se-kam lena aur tisare darje ka ek chhote-se-chhota dibba dekh lena saman to manu bahan ne kam-se-kam liya, lekin jo dibba chuna, vah do bhagon vala tha

kahan thi? manu boli,udhar khana taiyar kar rahi thi gandhiji ne kaha, jara khidakee ke bahar to dekh manu ne bahar jhanka kaee log daravaja pakade latak rahe hen vah sabakuchh samajh gaee gandhiji ne use ek mithi-si jhidakee di aur poochha,is doosare kamare ke lie toone kaha tha? manu boli, ji han, mera vichar tha ki yadi isi kamare men sab kam karoongi to aapako kasht hoga gandhiji ne kaha,kitani kamajor dalil hai isi ka nam hai andha-prem yah to toone sirf doosara kamara manga, lekin agar sailoon bhi mangati to vah bhi mil jata magar kya vah tujhako shobha deta? yah doosara kamara mangana bhi sailoon mangane ke barabar hai gandhiji bol rahe the aur manu kee aankhon se pani bah raha tha unhonne kaha, agar too meri bat samajhati hai to aankhon men yah pani nahin aana chahie ja, sab saman is kamare men le aa gadi jab ruke tab steshan mastar ko bulana manu ne turant vaisa hi kiya usake man men dhukad-dhukad mach rahi thi n jane ab gandhiji kya karenge! kahin ve meri bhool ke lie upavas n kar baithe! yah sochate-sochate steshan aa gaya steshanamastar bhi aaye gandhiji ne unase kaha, yah ladakee meri poti hai shayad abhi mujhe samajhee nahin isilie do kamare chhant lie yah dosh isaka nahin hai, mera hai meri sikh men kuchh kami hai ab hamane doosara kamara khali kar diya hai jo log bahar latak rahe hain, unako usamen baithaiye tabhi mera dukh kam hoga steshan mastar ne bahut samajhaya, minnaten kee, par ve tas-se-mas n hue ant men steshan mastar bole, main unake lie doosara dibba lagavaye deta hoon gandhiji ne kaha, han, doosara dibba to lagava hi dijiye, magar isaka bhi upayog keejiye jis chij kee jaroorat n ho usaka upayog karana hinsa hai aap suvidhaon ka durupayog karavana chahate hain ladakee ko bigadana chahate hain bechara steshanamastar! sharm se usakee gardan gad gaee use gandhiji ka kahana manana pada

gandhiji jis pensil se likh rahe hain, vah bahut chhoti hai bal-sulabh utsukata se vah poochh baitha,aap itani chhoti pensil se kyon likh rahe hai?bade aadami to badi pensil se likha karate hain gandhiji hanse aur kaha, mujhe chhoti pensil se likhana achchha lagata hai, lekin kya tumhare pas badi pensil hai? balak bola, hai kyon nahin! meri pensil badi chamakeeli hai laoon? yah kahakar balak bhaga huaa andar gaya aur kuchh hi der bad apani pensil lekar laut aaya bola, dekhie, hai n yah aapakee pensil se badi aur chamakeeli? gandhiji vinod bhare svar men bole, hai to, lekin kya tum ise meri pensil se badaloge? balak ne ek kshan socha fir kaha, nahin, main aapako vaise hi de doonga lekin aap ise kabhi khoiyega mat gandhiji ne uttar diya,tumhari bat manjoor hai jab tak ye pensil kam degi, tab tak main isase likhata rahoonga bahut din bit gaye usi varsh bambaee men kangres ka adhiveshan tha ek din kakasahab kalelakar gandhiji ke pas baithe hue the unhen kahin jana tha desk par rakhi huee sab chijen sanbhalakar rakhane lage sahasa kakasahab ne dekha ki gandhiji koee chij dhoondh rahe hain aur usake n mil pane par ve pareshan ho uthe hain unhonne poochha, bapooji, kya dhoondh rahe hain? gandhiji ne uttar diya, apani pensil dhoondh raha hoon bahut chhoti-si hai kakasahab ne unaka samay bachane kee drishti se apani jeb se ek pensil nikali aur kaha,aap ise le lijiye gandhiji bole,nahin-nahin, mujhe vahi meri chhoti pensil chahie kakasahab ne poochha, us pensil men esi kya visheshata hai, jo aap apana samay is prakar bekar ganva rahe hain? gandhiji bole, tumhen nahin maloom, vah chhoti-si pensil mujhe madras men natesan ke chhote bachche ne di thi bade pyar se vah use le aaya tha use main kaise kho sakata hoon? yah sunakar kakasahab gandhiji ke sath us pensil ko dhoondhane men lag gaye jab tak vah nahin mili gandhiji shant nahin hue vah do inch se bhi kam hi thi

ek din thahar nahin sakate? gandhiji ne kaha,nahin, jana bahut aavashyak hai yah sunakar bidalaji nirash ho gaye gandhiji ne poochha,kyon kya bat hai? bidalaji ne kaha,ghar men koee mrityu-shaiya par hai vah aapake darshan karana chahati hai gandhiji ne turant kaha,to main abhi chalata hoon bidalaji bole, samay bahut thoda hai is jade men le jakar aapako kasht nahin dena chahata un dinon khuli motaren hoti thin khoob thandi hava chal rahi thi fir bhi gandhiji nahin mane unake aagrah karane ke karan bidalaji lachar ho gaye aur unhen apane ghar le gaye vah sthan dilli se koee pandrah mil door tha gandhiji ne rogi ko dekha, use santvana di aur fir dilli chhavani jakar apani gadi pakadi bidalaji chakit rah gaye itana bada vyakti unakee jara-si prarthana par kadake ke jade men itana kasht utha sakata hai! par yah unakee aatmiyata hi to thi, jo logon ke prati pani-pani kar deti thi vah bimar aur koee nahin, shree ghanashyamadas bidala kee dharmapatni thin

lekin fir bhi chalate rahate ek din chalate-chalate ve ruke samane maila pada tha unhonne aasapas se sookhe patte batore aur apane hath se vah maila saf kar diya ganv ke log chakit ho dekhate rah gaye manu kuchh pichhe thi pas aakar usane yah drishy dekha krodh men bharakar boli bapooji, aap mujhe kyon sharminda karate hain? aapane mujhase kyon nahin kaha? apane aap hi yah kyon saf kiya? gandhiji hansakar bole, too nahin janati aise kam karane men mujhe kitani khushi hoti hai tujhase kahane ke bajay apane-aap karane men kam takalif hai manu ne kaha magar ganv ke log to dekh rahe haingandhiji bole,aaj kee is bat se logon ko shiksha milegi kal se mujhe is tarah ke gande raste saf n karane padenge yah koee chhota kam nahin hai manu ne kaha, man lijiye ganvavale kal to rasta saf kar denge fir n karen tab? gandhiji ne turant uttar diya,tab main tujhako dekhane ke lie bhejoonga agar rah isi tarah gandi mili to fir main saf karane ke lie aaoonga doosare din unhonne sachamuch manu ko

lekin manu gandhiji se kahane ke lie nahin lauti svayan use saf karane lagi yah dekhakar ganv vale lajjit hue aur ve bhi usake sat safaee karane lage unhonne vachan diya ki aaj se ve ye raste apane-aap saf kar lenge lautakar manu ne jab yah kahani gandhiji ko sunaee to ve bole, are, to mera puny toone le liya! yah rasta to mujhe saf karana tha khair, do kam ho gaye ek to safaee rahegi, doosare agar log vachan palenge to unako sachchaee ka sabak mil jayega

tumhare aangan men ek mahan sant-purush padhare hain bahar aakar unake darshan to karo lekin manu kee drishti men jo mahan purush the, vahi unakee drishti men dushman the unake man men gandhiji ke lie ranchamatr bhi aadar nahin tha striyon ko samajhane ke bad jab manu bahar aaee to dekha, gandhiji ne ladakee ke bistar kee maili chadar hatakar us par apani odhi huee chadar bichha di hai apane chhote se roomal se usakee nak saf karadi hai pani se usaka munh dho diya hai apana shal use udha diya hai aur kadake kee sardi men khule badan khade-khade rogi ke sir par prem se hath fer rahe hain itana hi nahin bad men dopahar ko do tin bar us ladakee ko shahad aur pani pilane ke lie unhonne manu ko vahan bheja usake pet aur sir par mitti kee patti rakhane ke lie bhi kaha manu ne aisa hi kiya usi rat ko us bachchi ka bukhar utar gaya ab us ghar ke vyakti, jo gandhiji ko apana dushman samajh rahe the, atyant bhaktibhav se unhen pranam karane aaye bole,aap sachamuch khuda ke farishte hain hamari beti ke lie aapane jo kuchh kiya, usake badale men ham aapakee kya khidamat kar sakate hain? gandhiji ne uttar diya, main n farishta hoon aur n paigambar main to ek chhota-sa sevak hoon is bachchi ka bukhar utar gaya, isaka shrey mujhe nahin hai mainne isakee safaee kee isake pet men takat dene vali thodi si khurak gaee, isilie shayad bukhar utara hai agar aap badala chukana chahate hain to nidar baniye aur doosaron ko bhi nidar banaiye yah duniya khuda kee hai ham sab usake bachche hain meri yahi vinati hai ki apane man men tum yahi bhav paida karo ki is duniya men sabhi ko jine-marane ka saman adhikar hai

bapooji, ve to main marammat ke lie mochi ko de aaee hoon manu ne javab diya, aath aane majadoori thaharaee hai, bapooji gandhiji bole, lekin too to ek kaudi bhi nahin kamati aur n main kamata hoon tab majadoori ke aath aane kaun dega? manu soch men pad gayi aakhir mochi se chappalen vapas lane ka nirnnay use karana pada lekin us bechare ko to savere-savere yahi majadoori mili thi isilie vah bola,

ye chappalen mahatma gandhi kee hain tum inhen lauta do bhaee yah sunakar mochi garv se bhar utha bola, tab to main bada bhagyavan hoon aisa mauka mujhe bar-bar thode hi milane vala hai main bina majadoori liye hi bana doonga lekin chappalen lautaoonga nahin kafi vad-vivad ke bad manu chappalen aur mochi donon ko lekar gandhiji ke pas pahunchi aur mochi donon ko lekar gandhiji ke pas pahunchi aur unhen sari kahani sunaee gandhiji ne mochi se kaha, tumhen tumhara bhag hi to chahie n? tum mere guru bano main tumhara chela banata hoon mujhe sikhao ki chappalon kee marammat kaise kee jati hai? aur gandhiji sachamuch us maile-kuchaile mochi ko guru bana kar chappal sine kee kala sikhane lage ve apane milane valon se baten bhi karate jate the aur sikhate bhi jate the guru-chele ka yah drishy dekhakar mulakati chakit rah gaye unhonne janana chaha ki bat kya hai? gandhiji bole,yah ladakee mujhase bina poochhe meri chappalen marammat karane de aaee thi isalie isako mujhe sabak sikhana hai aur is mochi ko isaka bhag chahie, isalie mainne ise apana guru bana liya hai fir hansate hue unhonne kaha, dekhate hain n aap mahatmaon ka maja!

aapako narsing ka ek kors lene kee jaroorat nahin hai? saradar ne achakacha kar unakee or dekha gandhiji usi tarah bole, dekhiye to, aapane chammach oopar se pakadane ke bajaye theth munh ke pas se pakada hai yah sara chammach gilas men jayega, isalie us jagah usako hath se nahin chhoona chahie aur jis roomal se aap apana munh ponchhate hain, usi se aapane is chammach ko saf kiya hai yah bhi nahin hona chahie aap to janate hain ki nars aapareshan ke kamare men kisi bhi chij ko hath nahin laga sakati sab chijon ko vah chimati ya sandasi se hi uthati hai hath se le to use barkhast kar diya jata hai aisi hi safaee hamen bhi rakhani chahie ek kshan rukakar ve fir bole, aur pine ke bad gilas yon hi aundhe nahin rakh dene chahie ham shayad aisa is aasha se karate hain ki ve dhul jate honge,

vo kankrit ke jangalon men hariyali ko harata ja raha hai, tab ravindr vyas kee kalakritiyan darshakon kee aakhon men hariyali kee tripti pradan karati hain. aankhon aur man ko rahat milati hai aur chahunor hariyali ka aabhas sa hota hai. ravindr vyas kee kalakritiyon ka aadhar hi hariyali aur hara rang hai. hare rang ke alava ikka dukka rang hi inakee kalakritiyon men jhalakate hain. ravindr vyas kee kalakritiyon men bhale hi ekarasata monotonas v ek binbata ka ahasas yada kada ho jata ho, magar ye bat bhi tay hai ki aadami hariyali aur jangal kee chhata se kabhi bor nahin hota. ravindr vyas apane chitron ke madhyam se hariyali kee apratim chhata bikherane men bakhoobi safal rahe hain.
ibarat aur kadambini men kahaniyan prakashit. kuchh kavitaen bhi. akhabaron men kavita - kahaniyon ke lie rekhachitra. pichhale aath salon se penting. khasakar hare rang men khoob kam kiya.

sangit, chitrakala au sinema men gahari ruchi rakhate hain. inakee kahani ko kadimbini kee taraf se puraskrit kiya ja chuka hai. chitrakari ke tin grup sho karava chuke ravindr do neshanal aart kainpon men bhagidari bhi kar chuke hain.

samaj v antatah rashtr par padata hai. paramparaon ke nam par ek lokatantrik rashtr men kisi bhi prakar kee hinsa ko uchit nahin thaharaya ja sakata. antatah aajadi ke 59 varshon bad sarakar ko ghareloo mahilaon kee yad aayi aur 26 aktoobar 2006 ko ghareloo hinsa nishedh kanoon-2005 lagoo ho gaya. bharatiy sanskriti men ek or jahan nari ko poojaniy mana gaya hai vahin ghareloo hinsa samet bahut sare anyay vah apani kismat manakar sahati rahi hain. yah anayas hi nahin hai ki ladakiyon ke sath sabase jyada chhedachhad aur balatkar unake parivarik sadasyon aur nikat rishtedaron dvara hi hote rahe hain. yahi nahin bharat men sal bhar men 2,90,000 betiyan kokh men hi mar di jati hain aur isake lie bakayada lagabhag 450 karod roopaye ka bhroon hatya ka karobar chal raha hai. par ab puroosh aham se vashibhoot hokar bat-bat par mahilaon aur bachchon par apana gussa utarane valon kee khair nahin hai. main maike chali jaoongi tum dekhate rahiyo, ab purani bat ho jaegi kyonki mahilayen patiyon se tang aakar apane mata-pita ke pas nahin varan najadikee thane men riport darj karati najar aayengi. is kanoon ke tahat mahilaon ke khilaf ghareloo hinsa ko vyapak arthon men lete hue yaun sambandhi, sharirik, manasik, aarthik, bhavanatmak ke sath-sath maukhik pratadana ko bhi shamil kiya gaya hai aur ghareloo hinsa ko panch vargon men bantakar use aur bhi spasht kar diya gaya hai-
thappad, thokar marana, dant katana, lat marana, mukka marana, dhakka dena, dhakelana, kisi aur tarike se sharirik takalif dena.

ashlil sahity ya koee any ashlil tasviren ya samagri ko dekhane ke lie majaboor karana, kisi doosare ka man bahalane ke lie majaboor karana, durvyavahar karana, apamanit karana ya nicha dikhane ke lie laingik prakriti ka koee doosara karm jo mahilaon ke samman ko kisi n kisi roop men chot pahunchata ho, balakon ke sath yaunik durvyavahar.

galiyan dena, charitr aur aacharan par dosharopann, ladaka n hone ke lie beijjat karana, bachcha n hone par tana dena, dahej ke saval par apamanit karana, skool, kalej ya kisi any shaikshanik sansthan men jane se rokana, naukari karane se rokana, naukari chhodane ke lie majaboor karana, mahila ya usake sath rahane vale kisi bachchebachchi ko ghar se jane se rokana, kisi vyakti vishesh se milane se rokana, ichchha ke khilaf shadi karane par majaboor karana, pasand ke vyakti se shadi karane se rokana, aatmahatya karane kee dhamakee dena, koee aur maukhik ya bhavanatmak durvyavahar.

mahila ya usakee santanon ko khana, kapada aur davaiyan jaisi chijen muhaiya n karana, jis ghar men mahila rah rahi hai usase nikalane par majaboor karana, ghar ke kisi hisse men jane ya kisi hisse ke istemal se rokana, rojagar karane se rokana, kisi rojagar ko apanane men badha pahunchana, mahila ke vetan ya parishramik ko jabaradasti hadap lena, kapade ya doosari rojamarra ke ghareloo istemal kee chijon ke prayog se rokana, agar kirae ke makan men rah rahi ho to kiraye n dena, bina mahila kee soochana aur sahamati ke bagair streedhan ya any moolyavan vastuon ko bech dena ya bandhak rakhana, streedhan ko kharch kar dena, bijali aadi jaise any bilon ka bhugatan n karana.

jo kisi ghar ke dayare men rahati hai, bhale hi vah kisi bhi dharm kee ho. yahi nahin bina vivah ke sath rahane vali mahila, vidhava aur bahanon ko bhi is kanoon ke dayare men liya gaya hai. niyam- kayadon ke ullanghan ko sangyey aur gair jamanati aparadh mana jayega evan doshi paye jane par ek sal kee saja ya 20 hajar roopaye jurmana ya fir donon sajayen ho sakati hain. patni aur bachchon ko jivan nirvah ke liye dhan n dene kee sthiti men adhiniyam kee dhara-18 ke tahat patni apane stree dhan, gahane -jevar aur kapadon ko kabje men le sakegi. sath hi aisi sthiti men bina kort kee ijajat ke sanyukt baink khaton aur baink lokar ka bhi upayog nahin kiya ja sakega. adhiniyam kee dhara-19 ke tahat mahilaon aur bachchon ko ghar men rahane se roka nahin ja sakata aur n hi aise gharon ko becha ja sakata hai. kiraye ka makan hone par usi tarah kee suvidhaon se yukt doosara makan dilana bhi badhyakari hoga. is kanoon ke uchit kriyanvayan ke liye jilon men mahila sanrakshan adhikari kee niyukti bhi kee jayegi.
bhale hi vah pita ya pati dvara ho ek sabhy samaj kee nishani nahin kaha sakata aur ghareloo hinsa nishedh kanoon is sambandh men mil ka patthar sabit hoga.

jismein bhakton ne kaha hai ki baba aaj ke zamane mein bina paisa khilaye koi kaam nahi ho raha . Ab jab aap bhakt musibat mein ho to bhala hum kaise chain se shaant reh sakte hain. Isiliye apne pyaare desh ko aur apne priya bhakton ko bhrshtachar se mukti dilane ke liye humne bhi apne tareeke se in bhrashtachariyon ko saza dene ka nirnay liya hai. Humne ek list banayi hai jismein 3525 bhrasht logon ke naam humne nikale hain. Hum ye maang karenge ki in sabhi 3525 bhrasht logon ko hamare hawaale kiya jaaye taanki hum inhe kholte hue tail mein tal sakein, aur inhe machliyon ko khila sakein.

bhakt jan tatha bhoot pishaach, chudail aadi bhi bhaag lengi. Kyunki desh ke andar jo bhoot bhutaniyan hain unka khaatma karne ke liye humne khaas bhooton aur bhutniyon ki ek sena gathit kee hai. Jo in dushto se inhi hi bhaasha mein baat karenge.

Chandrama TV aur Kal Tak ne dera daal diya hai. Kashmir se kanyakumari tak tatha teeno lokon mein faile hue hamare bhakt jo bhi bhrshtachar se mukti chahte hain hamare aandolan mein jud sakte hain. Aandolan se judi jaankari ke liye hamare paatal lok waale aashram ke darwaaze aapke liye hamesha-hamesha ke liye khule hain. Chaliye hum abhi chalte hain. Bharat TV mein aaj humn aapki pukaar naamak kaaryakram mein sakshaat prakat hone waale hain, aap bhi aaiyega apne dusht saathiyon ko bhi laaiyega aur ye naara zaroor gaiyega Bhrashtachar mitana hai dhongibaba ko agla PM banana hai. Khush Raho. . .

bas jara balla ada bhar diya hota, han thik kah rahe ho sale vigyapanon men hi dabae rahate hain aankhen, kaha dikhegi bol ud gaeen na gilliyan. dekhana ab ye ja raha hai spinar ke samane dekhana kaisa dans karega. poori ganbhirata se koee do tivi ke samane khiladiyon ko khelana sikha rahe the. bharat men yahi to khas bat hai. kriket kee itani prachur matra men pratibhaen padi hueen hain ki jo maidan par nahin hai vo unhen tivi par khelane sikhane ka dayitv nibhate rahate hain. kuchh kaho to kahenge koee paisa thodi na le rahe hain fri men hi bata rahe hain ki is bol par thoda hatakar skvayar kat marana tha. dekhate bhi nahin hain ki kaise to vah aof stanp par ataik rakhe hain. inhen dekho dimag chalate hi nahin hain. sare samay dimag men to ed mani ka jod-ghatana chalata rahata hai. poora khel hi sale paise kee pich par khelate rahate hain.

ye bhi sachin ko ran banana sikha rahe hain. koee poochhe bhaiiya vo to salon se khel raha hai, hajaron ran bana chuka hai. tum kahan tak khele ho, kitane ran banae hain. to dekhie javab kya mil raha hai. kahin khele bhale hi n hon khel to dekhe hain aur sare din dekhe hain. bachapan se aaj tak sirf khel hi to dekhe hain, graund-graund kee khak chhani hai.

ham dekhate hain ham. tabhi to pata chalati hain galatiyan. fir chilla-chilla kar yahan gala fadate rahate hain. sunega thode hi. ab unhen kaun samajhae abe, bavale tivi ke samane chillaoge to kaise to vo sunega, kaise to tumhari bat manega. fir ek nahin saikadon lage pade hain tivi ke samane. sabakee sunega to bahara hi n ho jaega, sachin ko hi kriket kee barikiyan sikhane kee utkantha. ye hi aise nahin hai maichon men to poora stediyam hi shikshak hone ke mahan dayitv ko nibhane lagata hai. ek bar aap maich dekh to lo, aapako pata chal jaega. is rashtr men jigyasu chhatr kam kyon hain? isalie kam hain ki sare ke sare to part taim shikshak hain. akasar maich hote hain. sara jaroori kam chhodakar fir sare sanvida shikshak kee bhoomika men utar aate hain.

poora ghar tivi ke samane. jo jyada premi hai vo to har shot par chikh-chikh kar lotan kabootar hota rahata hai. maichon vale din ghar ke kutte-pillon kee halat kharab rahati hai. unhen bhi malik ke sath bhaunk-bhaunk kar apani khushi prakat karani padati hai. svamibhakti ke shashvat riprajentetiv hone kee paranpara ka palan karana hai. halanki ve tay hi nahin kar pate ki aisa apana malik kahai pagalaut huaa ja raha hai. kaee siniyar kism ke kutte to is sichueshan se tyooning baitha chuka hain. ve malikon kee aisi bhayankar khushi prakat karane ke kshanon men bhi sanyamit bane rahakar sirf poonchh hilakar kam chala dete hain.

malik par najar rakhate hain. kaee mamalon men malik se bhi jyada vyavaharik hote hain. khiladi ko khel ke paise, vigyapan ke paise, jite to janata se paise, hare to kahin aur se bhi paise yani har or se paise milate hain. hamara malik kyon vaisaee begani shadi men abdulla taip divana huaa ja raha hai, is par jyada dimag nahin lagate. is karan ve tivi se jyada malik par najar rakhate hain. malik unake aaeekyoo lebal ko nahin janata. ve batana bhi nahin chahate roti-pani ka jugad bana rahe itana jaroori hai unake lie, isalie chehare par bholepan-moorkhata kee tajagi bhari chamak hamesha rakhate hain. isalie kutton ka vafadari brands sadiyon se sakh kayam rakhe hai.

ve janate hain. kutte hain isalie in fijool kee baton par bhaunkate nahin hain. halkee si poonchh hilakar hi mudda uda dete hain. bat chal rahi hai malikon kee, malik doobe hain kikret men, kriketar doobe hain khel men, khel ugal raha hai paisa, paisa bana raha hai hamen kriket shakti, shakti milane par ham kar sakate hain manamani, manamani karane kee hamari aadat nahin aisa ham klem karate hain, klem ham jitane ka bhi karate hain, is klem ke agenst ham dava karate hain sadiyon se samane vale kee khushi men hamari khushi ka, to use jit jane dete hain, is khel hamare lie jit har se jyada khushi ka mamala hai. aur roti-pani ka jugad chalata rahe kutton kee khushi isamen hai. poore drishy par ham koee tippani nahin kar rahe hain.

jane dijie. samikaranon kee kaun paravah karata hai. samikaran to kitabon ke lie hote hain. lekin bhaee sahab aankadon kee kitab to hamari har ke aankadon se bhari hai, kisi ne kaha. hogi, lekin harakar bhi hamane kitanon ke dil jite hain aapako pata hai ki nahin? pata bhi hoga to aap bologe thodi na, rashtraprem ke nam par to sabakee bolati band nahin ho jati hai. bakee sare mamalon par ham kitana munh chalate hain desh kee bat aate hi chuppi sadh jate hain. are, to hamare in bade khiladiyon ke balle bhi to chuppi sadhe baithe hain, ye tim par bojh ban gae hain bojh. abakee bar pan kee dukan ke pas se eksapart kament aaya. fir doosare ne bola- are, vo ganguli kal kaisa bachchon jaisa shot marakar aaut huaa. nanbari hai nanbari ekadh maich men achchha khel liya agale 5-1 maichon kee vyavastha baitha li fir shuroo kar diya ghatiya shot marana. ise to sanyas dilavao.

thik kah rahe ho bhiya, itane to bahar benchon par baithe hain jab tak ye hatenge nahin doosare ko mauka kahan se milega. ye to patta likhakar lae hain ki lathi tekane kee umar tak maidan men hi dikhenge,bhale hi koee to inhen kandhon par dhokar pich tak chhod jae. pan kee pichakari ke sath visheshagyata kee ugal bhi fachch se bainar roop men divar par ja saji. are,ganguli to fir bhi khelata hai unhen dekho d vol ko divar hi dhasak gaee hai. ve mistar vairi-vairi speshal hain. aam maukon par kam nahin aate, speshal maukon par chalane lagate hain. speshal mauke bhi kaun se jab tim kee har tay ho chukee ho to pich par thaharakar darshakon ko aur rulaenge. har ka antar kam karane men apana speshal tailent dikhaenge.

nahin to kya karega tailent.? bas aisa hote hi ek alag hi yuddh chhid jata hai. sab ek-doosare par rashan pani lekar pil jate hain. un bichare khiladiyon ko to pata tak nahin ki unake pichhe do-char khet rahe. tin-char ke mathe foot gae. in agyat shahidon ko kisi star par samman bhi to nahin milata? lekin majal hai ki samman kee jara si bhi bhavana dikhae ye to nisvarth bhav se apane taraf vale khiladi ke paksh men date rahate hain. udhar van-de shuroo hota hai, idhar ye timen bhi bant jati hain, desh men jagah-jagah test shuroo ho jata hai. logon ka logon se . tim ke lie . har bar yahi kissa. anavarat. aage bhi anavarat
