parantu unhonne jis prakar satyagrah evan shanti v ahinsa ke raston par chalate huye angrejon ko bharat chhodane par majaboor kar diya, usaka koee doosara udaharan vishv itihas men dekhane ko nahin milata. tabhi to prakhyat vaigyanik aainstin ne kaha tha ki -hajar sal bad aane vali naslen is bat par mushkil se vishvas karengi ki had-mans se bana aisa koee insan dharati par kabhi aaya tha. sanyukt ratr sangh ne varsh 2007 se gandhi jayanti ko vishv ahinsa divas ke roop men manaye jane kee ghoshana karake shanti v ahinsa ke pujari mahatma gandhi ke vicharon kee prasangikata ko ek bar punah siddh kar diya hai.

jisake tahat eshiyaee logon ko apani anguliyon ke nishan rajistar karane v apane sath sadaiv pahachan patr rakhana anivary bana diya gaya tha, ke virooddh yah prastav pas kiya ki- ve apana daman karane vale shvet aupaniveshik atyacharon ka pratirodh un par hath uthae bina karenge aur unake kisi bhi julm ke samane sir nahin jhukaenge. yahin par gandhi ji ne logon ko sambodhit karate huye pratham bar satyagrah vicharadhara ka sootrapat kiya. virodh ke is nae hathiyar ko dakshin afrika kee angrej sarakar sahan n kar sakee aur gandhi ji sahit 27 vyaktiyon ko giraftar kar un par mukadama chalaya aur unhen desh chhodane ka aadesh diya. parantu gandhi ji ne us aadesh ka bhi ullanghan kiya aur unhen jel bhej diya gaya. is pratirodh ke chalate dakshin afrikee sarakar ne antatah jhukate huye 1914 men bharatiyon ke viruddh adhikatar vibhedakari kanoon khatm kar diya. yah gandhi ji kee ek badi jit thi aur isi ke sath 18 julaee 1914 ko inglaind hote huye ve bharat ravana ho gaye tatha 1915 men bharat pahunche. is bich 4 agast 1914 ko pratham vishv yuddh aarambh ho chuka tha aur gandhi ji british sarakar ke bina shart ke sahayogi roop men samane aaye. vastutah unhen laga ki angrej is vishv yuddh men uchch siddhanton kee raksharth lad rahe hain aur yuddh pashchat bharat kee svadhinata kee disha men kam karenge. angreji hukoomat ne isake badale men gandhi ji ko kesar-e-hind upadhi se navaja. parantu gandhi ji kee soch antatah svapnabhang hi sabit huee aur asahayog aandolan ke dauran angreji nitiyon ke virodh men unhonne yah upadhi lauta di.

jisakee salana aay karib 5,000 paund thi. bharat kee dharati par pravesh karate hi unhen laga ki angrejon ke daman ka shikar bharatiyon ko kala kot pahane farrate se kort men angreji bolane vale mohanadas karamachand gandhi kee nahin varan ek aise vyakti kee jaroorat hai jo unhin ke pahanave men, unhin kee boli men, unhin ke bich rahakar, unake lie sangharsh kar sake. aise men gandhi ji ne apani pahali upasthiti aprail 1917 men champaran, bihar men nil ke kheton men kam karane vale kisanon hetu satyagrah karake darj karayi par akhil bharatiy star par unaka udbhav 1919 ke khilafat aandolan v fir asahayog aandolan se huaa. 1919 se aarambh is daur ko bharatiy rashtriy svadhinata aandolan men gandhi yug ke nam se jana jata hai. gandhi ji ne n keval us samay chal rahi udar v ugr vicharadharaon ke uttam bhagon ka samanvay kiya balki donon ko ek adhik gatishil aur vyavaharik mod diya. 5 faravari 1922 ko chaurichaura kand ke bad bich men hi asahayog aandolan vapas lekar gandhi ji ne yah jata diya ki ve hinsa kee bajay ahinsak tarikon se bharat kee aajadi chahate hain. asahayog aandolan se jahan janamanas men angreji hukoomat ka khauf khatm ho gaya vahin janasamooh gandhi ji ke pichhe umad pada. isake bad to silasila chal nikal pada, aage-aage gandhi ji aur unake pichhe poora karavan. jati-dharm-bhasha-kshetr se pare is karavan men purush v mahilayen ek svar se judate gaye. 1920-22 ke asahayog aandolan, 1930-34 ke savinay avagya aandolan, 1940-41 ke vyaktigat savinay avagya aandolan aur 1942 ke bharat chhodo aandolan dvara gandhi ji ne angreji hukoomat ko jata diya ki bharat kee svatantrata nyayapoorn hai aur bharat men angreji rajy kee samapti aavashyak hai. 1942 ke bharat chhodo aandolan ne to angreji hukoomat kee choolen hila din. us dauran british pradhanamantree vinstan charchil se varta pashchat samrat jarj shashtham ne apani dayari men darj kiya tha ki- vinstan charchil ne mujhe yah kahakar aashcharyachakit kar diya hai ki unake sabhi sahayogi aur sansad ke tinon dal yuddh ke pashchat bharat ko bharatiyon ke hathon men chhodane ko udyat hain. krips, samachar patr aur amarikee lokamat- sabhi ne unake man men yah bhavana bhar di hai ki hamara bharat par rajy karana galat hai aur sadaiv se bharat ke lie bhi galat raha hai. is prakar 15 agast 1947 ko aajadi prapt kar gandhi ji ne samooche vishv ko dikha diya ki hinsa jo sabhy samaj ke astitv ko nt karane ka khatara utpann karati hai, ka vikalp dhoondhane ke lie svayan kee padatal karane ka bhi ek prayas hona chahie.

ahinsa, svadeshi, svarajy v rachanatmak karyakramon ke kayal the. in sabhi siddhanton ko unhonne n sirf vaicharik dharatal par utara balki unamen antarsambandh bhi sthapit kiya. gandhi ji ko mahatma kee upadhi se sarvapratham vibhooshit karane vale ravindr nath taigor ne kaha tha ki- gandhi ji ek rajanitigya, sangathanakarta, janamanas ke neta aur naitik sudharak ke roop men mahan hain, parantu vah manuy ke roop men usase bhi adhik mahan hain. yadyapi vah asadhy roop se aadarshavadi the aur apane nishchit mapadandon dvara pratyek kary ko mapate the, fir bhi vah manav premi hain n ki khokhale vicharon ke premi. gandhi ji saty ke bahut bade praneta the aur isake liye ahinsa ke tarikon ke pakshapati the. satyagrah unake lie matr niti nahin, siddhant tha. vastutah satyagrah ke madhyam se gandhiji ne mahatma buddh, mahavir v tamam mahapurooshon dvara pratipadit ahinsa ke siddhant ko samajik v rashtriy shakti men tabdil kar diya. pashchaty vicharak thoro kee vyaktigat savinay avagya kee avadharana ko samajik shakti men badalakar aisa bemisal janajagaran paida kiya jo dirghakal tak avashy chalata hai, par asafal nahin hota. svayan gandhi ji ka manana tha ki- satyagrah ek aisa aadhyatmik siddhant hai jo manav matr ke prem par aadharit hai. isamen virodhiyon ke prati ghrina kee bhavana nahin hai. ahinsa gandhi ji ka pramukh satyagrahi hathiyar tha. gandhi ji ke liye ahinsa, hinsa ka nishedh matr nahin thi balki ek jivan paddhati thi. ve aksar kaha karate the ki aaj kee duniya men jitane log jivit hain, ve batate hain ki duniya ka aadhar hathiyar bal nahin hai. isaka sabase bada praman to yahi hai ki duniya itane hangamon ke bad bhi tikee huee hai. gandhi ji kee ahinsa kayarata ka pratik nahin balki antashchetana v aatma men vishvas karane vali virata ka parichayak hai. unhonne ise vyakhyayit karate huye likha ki -yadyapi ahinsa ka arth kriyatmak roop se janaboojhakar kt uthana hai, tathapi yah siddhant durachariyon ke samane hathiyar dalane ka samarthan nahin karata. isake viparit yah durachari ka poorn aatmabal se samana karane kee prerana deta hai. is siddhant ko manane vala vyakti apani ijjat, dharm aur aatma kee raksha ke lie ek anyayapoorn samrajy sahit samast shaktiyon ko bhi chunauti de sakata hai aur apane parakram dvara usake patan ke bij bhi bo sakata hai. batate hain ki jab itali ke tanashah musolini ke aagrah par gandhi ji usase milane gaye, to kaeeyon ne unhen samajhaya ki ek ahinsak vyakti ka hinsak vyakti se milana uchit nahin. par gandhi ji ne javab diya ki hinsak vyakti se hinsa jyada khataranak hai aur hamara uddeshy saty v ahinsa ke madhyam se ahinsa ko khatm karana hai. gandhi ji tin logon ke sath musolini se milane gaye, jab ki vahan kursiyan sirf do thin. jab musolini ne gandhi ji se baithane ka aagrah kiya to gandhi ji ne apane sath aaye tinon logon ko kursi kee taraf ishara karate huye baithane ko kaha. musolini ka sochana tha ki kursi par sirf gandhi ji aur vo baithega, par gandhi ji apane sath ke tin any mehamanon kee khatir kursi par baithane ko raji nahin huye aur antatah musolini ko tin any kursiyan mangavani padi. vakaee yah rochak ghatanakram duniya ke sabase bade tanashah aur ek ahinsak satyagrahi ke bich ghata tha, jisane tanashah ko ek satyagrahi kee bat manane par majaboor kar diya.

jisake aarthik svavalamban kee ridh kutir v laghu udyogon par tikee huyi hai. gandhi ji ka charakha katana pratikatmak roop men svadeshi v svavalamban ka hi pratik tha. svadeshi ko badhava dene ke lie hi ve videshi vastuon ke bahishkar ka aahvan karate the. gandhi ji sirf rajanaitik vyakti nahin balki ek rachanatmak samaj sudharak bhi the. asprishyata, nari sudhar, hindoo-muslim ekata ityadi ke lie unhonne bahut kary kiye. asprishyata ko manavata par kalank batate huye unhonne isake unmoolan par jor diya v tadnusar achhooton ko sammanajanak harijan nam dene, harijan sevak sangh kee sthapana, vibhinn patra-patrikaon men asprishyata ke viruddh likhana evan deshavyapi bhramanon ke dauran achhooton kee bastiyon men jakar unako gale lagakar asprishyata ko avaigyanik v amanaviy siddh karane jaise apratim kadam uthaye. gandhi ji ke man men nari ke prati badi shraddha thi. ve nari ko parda-pratha, bal-vivah v bahu-vivah jaisi manyataon se bahar nikalana chahate the aur unake aahvan par n sirf tamam nariyon ne parda-pratha se bahar nikal kar rashtriy svatantrata aandolan men bhag liya balki auron ko bhi jagrit kiya. nari utthan hetu gandhi ji ne shiksha, antarjatiy vivah v vidhava vivah par jor diya. unaka manana tha ki jab tak nari apane adhikaron hetu svayan aage nahin aayegi, tab tak usakee sthit men parivartan nahin hoga.

ahinsa, tyag, vishvabandhutv, aatmavishvas v naitikata ko jaroori manate the. sadhan aur sadhy donon kee pavitrata par jor dete huye ve kisi bhi prakar ke chhal kapat ya anuchit tarikon ko pasand nahin karate the. angrejon kee foot dalo aur raj karo niti ke viparit gandhi ji hindoo-muslim ekata ke prabal samarthak the. 1919 men khilafat aandolan ke dauran unhonne ise hinduon v musalamanon ke madhy ekata sthapit karane ka aisa suavasar bataya jo ki aage sau varshon tak nahin milega. hindoo-muslim ekata ke prati gandhi ji ka aagrah isi se samajha ja sakata hai ki jab 15 agast 1947 ko sara desh aajadi ke jashn men dooba tha to gandhi ji sampradayik dangon ko khatm karane ke lie noaakhali men pad yatra kar rahe the. vastutah gandhi ji ke lie svatantrata ka svaroop sirf rajanaitik nahin tha, apitu yah logon kee samajik, aarthik v aatmik unnati bhi thi, jise ve ram-rajy kaha karate the.

1938, 1939, 1947 v 1948 men nobel shanti puraskar ke liye namit kiya gaya. yah ek alag bahas ka vishay hai ki kin karanon se unhen nobel puraskar nahin diya gaya par kalantar men gandhi ji ke siddhanton par chalakar unhen apana preranasrot manane vale kaee logon ko nobel shanti puraskar se sammanit kiya gaya. 1989 men nobel shanti samman ke lie dalaee lama ke nam kee ghoshana karate huye nobel kameti ke sadasyon ne gandhi ji ko nobel samman nahin dene par afasos jataya aur kameti ke adhyaksh ne kaha ki dalaee lama ko yah samman diya jana gandhi ji kee smriti ko shraddhanjali dene ka prayas hai. isi prakar 1984 v 1993 men kramashah desamand tootoo v nelsan mandela ko nobel shanti puraskar se sammanit kiya gaya, jinhonne gandhi ji ko preranasrot manate huye dakshin afrika men varnnabhed v rangabhed kee khilafat kee thi.

vah pidhi pashchim men keval hitalar athava stalin kee hi pidhi nahin thi apitu bharat men gandhi ji kee bhi pidhi thi. ham nishchayapoorvak yah bhavishyavani kar sakate hain ki manav itihas par gandhi ji ka prabhav hitalar aur stalin ke prabhav se adhik hoga. aaj kee nayi pidhi gandhi ji ko ek nae roop men dekhana chahati hai. vah unhen ek sant ke roop men nahin varan vyavaharik aadarshavadi ke roop men prastut kar rahi hai. lage raho munna bhaee jaisi filmon kee safalata kahin-n-kahin yuvaon ka unase lagav pratibimbit karati hai. aaj bhi duniya bhar ke sarvekshanon men gandhi ji ko shirsh puroosh ghoshit kiya jata hai. hal hi men hindoo-si0 ena0 ena0- aaee0 vi0 ena0 dvara 30 varsh se kam aayu ke bharatiy yuvaon ke bich karae gae ek sarvekshan men 76 pratishat logon ne gandhi ji ko apana sarvochch rol modal bataya. bi0bi0si0 dvara bharat kee svatantrata ke 60 varsh poore hone par kiye gaye ek sarvekshan ke mutabik aaj bhi pashchaty deshon men bharat kee ek pramukh pahachan gandhi ji hain. yahi nahin tamam pashchaty deshon men gandhivad par vistrit adhyayan ho rahe hain, to bharat men sundaralal bahuguna, megha patekar, aroona ray se lekar sandip pande tak tamam aise samajaseviyon kee pratishtha kayam hai, jinhonne gandhivadi moolyon dvara samajik aandolan khada karane kee koshishenn keen. aankade gavah hain ki vishv bhar men har sal gandhi ji v unake vicharon par aadharit lagabhag do hajar pustakon ka prakashan ho raha hai evam hal ke varshon men gandhi ji kee kritiyon ka adhikar hasil karane ke liye prakashakon v lekhakon ke aavedanon kee sankhya do guni ho gaee hai. vastutah aaj jaroorat gandhivad ko samajhane kee hai n ki use aadarsh manakar pitare men band kar dene kee. svayan gandhi ji ka manana tha ki aadarsh ek aisi sthiti hai jise kabhi bhi prapt nahin kiya ja sakata balki usake lie matr prayasarat raha ja sakata hai.

prem v sahishnuta par aadharit gandhi ji ke satyagrah, ahinsa v rachanatmak karyakram ke achook margon par chalakar hi vishv men vyapt asamanata, shoshann, anyay, bhrashtachar, aatankavad, durachar, naksalavad, paryavaran asantulan v dinon-b-din badhate samajik aparadh ko niyantrit kiya ja sakata hai. gandhi ji dvara rachanatmak karyakram ke jarie vikalp ka nirman aaj poorvottar bharat v jammoo-kashmir jaise kshetron kee samasyaon, naksalavad v ghareloo aatankavad se nipatane men jitane karagar ho sakate hain utana bal-prayog nahin ho sakata. gandhi ji duniya ke ekamatr lokapriy vyakti the jinhonne sarvajanik roop se svayan ko lekar abhinav prayog kie aur aaj bhi sarvajanik jivan men naitikata, aarthik muddon par unakee naitik soch v dharm-sampraday par unake vichar prasangik hain. tabhi to bharat ke antim vayasaray lard mauntaben ne kaha tha - gandhi ji ka jivan khataron se bhari is duniya ko hamesha shanti aur ahinsa ke madhyam se apana bachav karane kee rah dikhata rahega.

panir, ghee, chhachh, rabadi ityadi anek chijon ka nirman hota hai sath hi gaumootr ko bhi anek rogon kee chikitsa men labhakari bataya gaya hai jisake upayog kee salah sab doosaron ko to dete rahate hai par svayan upayog nahin karate hai par bhains naraz hai usaka kahana hai ki usake doodh se bhi vahi sab banata hai jo gay ke doodh se banata hai fir kya bat hai ki gay ko to man ka samman prapt hai aur use kuchh bhi nahin .

hathi , kutte , bailon , sher , bandar , aadi janavaron par mahatvapoorn filmen banaeen hain par us par dhyan nahin diya gaya . ek filmi git men ek bat avashy us ke paksh men film ke hiro ne uthaee hai ki usakee bhains ko danda kyoon mara jabaki usaka kusoor sirf itana hi tha ki vah khet men chara char rahi thi kisi ke bap ka kuchh nahin kar rahi thi jabaki bahut se log to poore ka poora khet hi char jate hain . use shikayat hai ki usake prati rangabhed niti apanaee ja rahi hai jo sarasar galat hai . jagah jagah gau raksha samitiyon ka gathan huaa hai tatha samay samay par gau raksha aandolan bhi chalae jate rahe hain parantu bhains raksha samitiyan ya bhains raksha aandolan kahin bhi kisi ne bhi nahin chalaya .
bail, garood, tatha mor aur yahan tak ki chooha aur ulloo tak shamil hain kintu bhains ke vanshajon ko mrityu ke devata yamaraj ko saunp diya hai.

jo kavita ko geyata pradan karate hain, vah usakee lay men pravahit rahate hain aur lay men pravahit rahana hi unaka achook dharm aur aacharan hai. isalie bina gan ke tatvon kee lay kee kavita git nahin ho sakati. gan ke vah tatv-lay men pravahit vah tattv-git men sannadv shabdon kee vyavastha kayam kiye rahate hain. vah vyavastha svar-mukhar vyavastha hoti hai. us svar-mukhar vyavastha men vyanjanon ke uchcharanon ke roop aakar pratishthit rahate hain.

sadharan kavita se kahin adhik matra men dhvaniparak hokar door-door tak desh-kal aur manav-mastishk men vyapt ho jati hai aur apana chetan aur achetan prabhav dirghakal tak dale rahati hai. nishchay hi git kee gatimayata ka geyata ka sangitamayata ka yah tatv git ke kathy ko vyanjit karane vale shabdon ke sanghatan se nirupit aur nibaddh hota hai.

poora vikas nahin pa sakata. ek ka paryavasan doosare ka paryavasan hota hai. isalie git ke gey-tattv kee, git se alag, usake kathy se alag, vyakhya karana moolabhoot bhool hogi. vaise hi git ke kathy-tatv kee, git se alag, usakee geyata se alag, vyakhya karana moolabhoot bhool hogi. un donon tatvon ka aakalan unake sanyukt aur sanpusht roop men hi karana hoga. git apane jis roop aur arth men aaj git svikar kiya jata hai apane us roop au arth men vah pahale svikar nahin kiya jata tha.
sadharannataya, vastu-sthiti yahi rahati hai ki gitakar apane yug se prabhavit raha karata hai aur jo git vah deta hai apane yugabodh ke anuroop hi deta hai.

yani bahut pahale, hindi men kavita hi gayi jati thi. vah kavita, chahe matrik ho ya varnik, isaka koee asar usake gaye jane men nahin padata tha. use sangitagy gate the. sadharannajan bhi use apani kshamata ke anusar gane kee tarah gunaguna lete the. vadyayantron ke sath bhi vah gayi jati thi.

vachik aur manasik astitv ka khula kamuk pradarshan karati thin. chhand-ke-chhand unake deh-saundary kee yashti ban jate the. prakriti unake raman karane ke lie hi uddipit dikhayi jati thi. yah chhand bhi bade chav se sumadhur kanthon se rajadarabaron men gaye-bajaye jate the.

tulasi, miran aur kabir ke pad bhi gaye-bajaye jate the. vah sab ab bhi lok jivan men, ganv-ganv men, madhur svar se goonjate paye jate hain. in padon ko hi aaj ke git ka poorvaj kahana nyayasangat hoga. ve hi tab gey tatvon ko pakar hava men tairate paye jate the aur ve hi nar-nari donon ke kanthon se nikal kar man kee vyatha-man ka anurag-man kee dinata-aatmasamarpann-aaradhy ke prati aaradhana-aadi sookshm mano-bhavanaen vyakt kar rahe the. ve bhakt ko bhagavan se jodate the. ve din-hin ko jine kee aastha dete the. ram, rahim aur krishn unamen hi niroopit ho-kar jan-manas ke hradayeshvar ban gaye. unakee lilaon se valayit ve pad keval gey hokar hi desh-kal men goonjate rahe.

us yug ke git hain. geyata men unakee barabari chhandon men likhi aur gayi gayi kavitaen nahin kar sakeen-nahin kar sakeen. kavy kee paramparik rudhiyan padon men bhi aayin par us sima tak nahin jis sima tak ve aur kavitaon men aayin. pad fir bhi sahajata, svabhavikata aur nishchhalata se chhalakate rahe. isilie ve janata ke gale lage rahe aur aaj bhi gey bane gunagunaye jate hain. gey pad agey chhand-baddh kavitaon se koee baton men bhinn aur vishisht hote the. gey padon kee bunavat any kavitaon kee bunavat se gajhin kam aur aatmaparak adhik hoti thi. gajhin kam kee bunavat ke pad sadharannataya aadami kee sahaj svabhavik pravrittiyon ke pad hote the. unake banane vale kavy ke siddhanton ke aachary nahin hote the.

sunate, samajhate aur pakadate the aur unhin ke sandarbh men use vishisht bana kar kavita ka roop dete the. is vajah se gey padon men jivan kee jhankee kuchh aur hi hoti thi aur agey chhand-baddh kavitaon men kuchh aur hi hoti thi.

kavy ke siddhant, kavy ke alankarann, kavy ke sanskar-sab kuchh aadami kee sahaj vrittiyon kee prakrit sthiti men moolabhoot parivartan kar dete the. parinam yah hota tha ki aadami kee sahaj vrittiyan vyakt hokar aadami kee sahaj bodhagamyata se door chali jati thin aur vishisht vyaktiyon kee sampreshaniyata pa leti thin. tabhi agey chhand-baddh kavitaon kee sampreshaniyata gunnagy samajikon kee ruchi ko tusht karati thi. padon kee sampreshaniyata jan-sadharan kee ruchi ko pusht karati thi.
manav ko manav kee haisiyat se nahin, balki ek dharmik ko doosare dharmik se jodati rahe. yahi usane kiya bhi. us kiye ka parinam yah huaa ki gey padon ke vibhinn dharmik gey svaroop hue.
sampreshaniy aur sanvedanashil hai bajay us manaviyata ke jo any dharmanuyayi kaviyon ne apane dharmik padon men gey bana kar prastut kee thi.

aadami janavaron jaisa aacharan karata rahe to ise koee khas khabar nahin mana jata.aadami ke sare gunah maf hain, kyonki jurm bhi aadami hi karata hai aur kanoon bhi aadami hi banata hai. .aapako ek bail kee sachchi shree katha suna raha hoon.suniye aur jan-tantrik dhang se guniye.

noton ko bhoose ke dher men daba diya. kisan ji kee vaif ne rojana ke niyamanusar bhoosa bailon ko dala aur sath hi noton kee gaddi bhi bail mahoday ke lanch men chali gaee. bail ji thake mande khet se laute the, so danadan bhoosa khana shuroo kar diya. maloom tab huaa jab yan chare kee jagah kee safaee karate samay noton ke chabaye aur adh chabaye tukade pade mile. bail chupachap jugali kar raha tha aur munh se noton ke tukade bah rahe the. kisan ji matha pit kar rah gaye. bail ji nirdosh khade the.

so main is poore prasang par jara aadhyatmik aur sanskritik chintan kar raha hoon. bail kya hain ?.not kyon hai ?.chara kise kahate hain ? vagaira-vagaira.itana to aapane kitabon men padha hi hoga ki hamara bharat ek krishi pradhan aur rajaniti pradhan desh hai. donon hi kshetron men bailon kee kami nahin hai.bail us pashu ko kahate hain jo chupachap aankhen milaye bagair mal dakar leta hai aur sir jhukaye jugali karata rahata hai.usake sambandh men kaun kya kah raha hai, isaka bail kee sehat par koee asar nahin padata. ekadam nirvikar.sidha sada.kheti se bhootapoorva ho jane ke bad bhi bail sanchit mal kee jugali karata rahata hai.use kisi kee katu aalochanaon kee koee chinta nahin.jo chahe kamishan bitha de.

pichhale 36 varshon ka itihas aur ganit uthakar dekh lo ki kitana kisan ke hisse men aaya, kitana bailon ke ? bail hamesha kisan ke aage-aage chalata hai. aage chalane vale ka hissa bhi jyada ho sakata hai. kisan matha pit kar rah jata hai ki kash vah ek vishesh kism ka safed baila ho jata aur use bhi not chabane kee suvidha rahati.hotal egri-kalchar par nigah dalen, aap! kisan vahin ka vahin hai.jamin vahin kee vahin hain.bail apani ghanti bajata huaa aage badh gaya hai.gramasabha se kameti.kameti se asembali, asembali se sansad.sansad se.jane kitane hi khet-khalihan langh gaya bail. kisan kee aankh men ab bhi utane hi aansoo hain jitane gandhi baba ya lard karjan ke taim men the.balki kuchh jyada hi.

khud ko kisanon ka sachcha hamadard kahata hai.kisan ghabara jata hai ki bailon kee is bhid men sachcha bail kaun hai.usakee aatma janati hai ki chahe koee sa bhi bail kyon n ho chare ke sath usake not jaroor chavayega. fir bhi kisan raili men jata hai aur bhent dekar laut aata hai. vah janata hai ki bailon se usaka janam-maran ka nata hai.bail hi usaka bhagy vidhata hai.

bhind vale bail sahab se poochha ki janab, aapane garib kisan kee sal bhar kee kamaee kyon chaba dali ?.bail sahab muskaraye or bole-chabana aur sing marana hamari aadat hai.ham nahin chabate to koee doosara bail chaba jata.kisan ko noton kee gaddi kee kya jaroorat ? use sirf apana karm karana chahie aur fal bailonke lie chhod dena chahie, yahi krishak dharm hai ! jamindari yug se yahi chala aa raha hai !.kisan ke pas yadi not sahi salamat rah gaye to ham bailon ko poochhega kaun ?.vah traiktar nahin kharid lega ?.shree bail ke aise shreevachan sunakar bailon ke prati meri aastha aur bhi badh gaee!.kisan ka kya? usaka yahi dharm hai ki har subah pipal par ugate sooraj kee roshani men naee fasal ka khvab dekhe aur ham doobate sooraj ke sath apane sapane dafan kar den !.use apani sari umr bailon ke chare ka bandobast karate hue hi gujarani hai !

magar aavaj bulabul ! ve matr van pis tahamad men lipate, stool par ukadoon baithe, bidi ka tota sarthak kar rahe the ! rah-rah kar anguliyon par kuchh gin lete aur bidi ka soonta fefadon tak khinch dalate the! jahan ve baithe the vahan kachchi pili eent ka tin se dhaka bhainson ka ek tavela tha ! n koee khidakee n raushanadan ! shayad unhen dar tha ki bhainsen kahin roshanadan ke raste khisak ne jaen ! subah savere ka taim tha aur bhainsen shayad nashtoparant tahalane ja chukee thin ! tavela khali pada tha ! unhonne mujhe bhar aankh dekha bhi nahin aur bidi choosate hue anguliyon par apana antahin kelkyooleshan jodate rahe !.
jis par gorashahi angreji men koyale se likha tha-di sandalavud childran skool !.pravesh chaloo ! ingalish midiyam se kaksha 6 tak majaboot padhaee ! prinsipal se milen !.

kahin tarapin ya kolatar tak kee boo nahin thi ! meri majaboori apani jagah thi ! muhalle ke ganeshi lal ke pote ke dakhale kee jimmedari mujh par thi ! khud ganeshi lal umr bhar padhaee likhaee kee illat se pak rahe aur apane bete ko bhi pak rakha ! sirf gud kee kismen jan lin aur khandani karobar chalate rahe ! magar pota jyon hi nekar men panv dalane kee umr ko pahuncha, unakee patohoo ne jid pakad li ki chhutakanna padhi hai jaroor, aur vah bhi nikhalis ingalish midiyam se !.usakee najar men hindi midiyam se padhane se behatar hai ki gud bech le !
magar doneshan tin ankon se niche hota hi nahin !.angreji kee gretanes ka pata yahin par chalata hai ! khair.! shiksha sandarbh men yah ek achchhi bat hai ki barish men fooli lakadi par uge

julaee-agast men childran skool bhi danadan ug aate hain ! har gali-muhalle men bhootapoorv lakadi kee talon aur halavaeeyon kee dukanon par narsari montesari skoolon ke bord tang jate hain ! har sain bord ka yahi dava hota hai ki hamare yahan bachcha man kee god jaisa surakshit rahega aur aage chalakar behad nam kamayega !.aise hi durlabh tatha naye uge skoolon men sandal vud childran skoola ka nam bhi mere kan men pada tha !

roshanadan rahit usi skool ke samane khada tha !. bidi tahamad vale thulathul sajjan ne aakhiri kash khinch kar bidi ko sadagati tak pahunchaya, aur tahamad ke svatantr kone se munh ponchh kar aankhon hi aankhon men poochha ki kya chahie ?.mainne donon hathon se bachche ka saij bataya aur dhire se poochha ki prinsipal kahan hain.kab upalabdh honge ? ve bhadak gaye ! gurra kar bole-ham aapako kya najar aave hain ? taee-kamij andar tangi hai to ham prinsipal nahin rahe ? jara badan ko hava de rahe the ! aap bachcha aur fis utha laie ! bharti kar lenge !

unhonne bataya ki bakee ka staf bhi vah khud hi hain ! klas thri staf bhi, aur klas for jhadoo, ponchha, safaee bhi !.do adad ledi tichas bhi hain, jinamen se ek unakee maujooda patni hain aur doosari bhootapoorv ! filahal donon ghar men ladaee-jhagade men masaroof hain ! chat se tiching seshan shuroo hote hi aa jaegi !.abhi kul teees bachche namajad hue hain ! pachchis poore hote hi blaik bord mangava lenge aur padhaee jo hai use shuroo karava denge !.mujhe tasalli huee ! darate-darate poochha-khidakiyan, roshanadanon, pankhon aur bainchon vagaira ka jhanjhat aapane kyon nahin rakha ?.

use kya kahate hain.han.hardaship kee aadat dalani hogi !.fir dhire-dhire sab kuchh ho jaihe !.agale sal roshanadan khulava denge.fir agale sal pankhon vagaira kee dekhi jaegi !.paeesa chahie, ki nahin chahie ?.pachchis bachchon kee fis laeeke suroo men hi aaksaford yoonivarsiti khol den ka ?.taim pas hote-hote sab kuchh huee jayihe !.bachcha le aavo !.do hi siten bachi haingi !.

chandan vud childran skool ke pradhanachary ke shreevachan sunakar main kafi se bhi adhik prabhavit huaa ! sari himmat bator kar ek antim prashn poochha- mahasab ! vaise to apane in diya men chare-bhoose kee kami chahe bhale hi ho, magar bachchon ka tota nahin hai ! fir bhi magar do bachche aur n hath lage to kya aap skool dijalv kar denge ? ve pun bhadak gaye !.aaye gae soobe-soobe nahoosat failane !. jis bhagavan ne teees bachche diye, vah do aur nahin bhejihe ka ? dijalav kar bhi den to kaun si bhus men lathi lag jaeehe ?.pahale is tin men pakke koyala kar gudam raha !.socha ki iskool dal len ! dal liya !.inte padhe likhe hainge ki kaksha 6 tak padhaye le javen ! nahin chal paeehe iskool to koyale ka laisans koee kharij huee gava hai ka ?.lapak ke bachcha lai aao !. main lapak kar chal pada !.

goya kah rahe hon-bachcha laeehe jaroor ! jaeehe kahan ? idhar main yah soch raha tha ki ganeshi lal ke pote ke bhavishy ke lie gud bechana munasib rahega ya sandalavud childran skool men angreji midiyam se shiksha arjit karana ?.

aankhe minchi-minchi ja rahi thi, mutthiyan bhinchi-bhinchi ja rahi thin. thanedari se ritayarament ke bad unaka ye shauk khasa ubalen marane laga tha. poore jivan men unhen kisi kee tabiyat se thukaee karane aur jamakar klasikal sangit sunane men jitane aanand kee anubhooti hoti thi usakee tulana to bakaul ritayard havaladar lapatan chhote har kes men dhara 3 2, 376, 12 , 42 aadi kee gunjaish kee tanmayata ke talash se hi kee ja sakati hai halanki thakur sab prayoriti ke taur par sangit-sadhana, pitaee kee kamana, suvidhashulk kee bhavana ko kramanusar samayojit karate the, jise ve paristhiti v jagah kee suvidhanusar oopar se niche tatha niche se oopar ke kram men vyavasthit karate rahate the.

unaka vanchhit prabhava, usase samane vale ke chehare par ubhari pida kee lakeeren, apane jamane ke kisson ka aartanad in sabaka milajula prabhav usake chehare par har kon se dekh nahin lete hai. usaka chhoot pana asanbhav hi tha.

parapidak jo ritayarament ke bad bhi penshan kee evaj men apani nakari bamulahija baja rahe the. pair men lagi kisi goli ke karan langadate rahane ke chalate door-door tak shikara khojane nahin ja pate the, so najadikee nirih logon par hi julm dha rahe the. balki kuchh atirikt shatiron ka to manana tha ki esapi n ban pane ke malal ke karan ve aaj bhi dyooti bajane men lage hain, taki marate-marate hi sahi dipartament unhen manada esapi kee padavi jaise kuchh vyavastha nikal kar thama sake.

saraunte se supari kat rahe hain. so mutthiyan bhinch nahin pa rahi hain. anguli katane ka dar hai, jis karan aankh bhi minch nahin pa rahi hai. lapatan chhotoo pas men baithe hain, unake jamane se rajadar-sajheedara, vasooli-ejenta, mukhabira, thukaee-pitaee, vasooli ke pratyek maukon ke aayojan ke sanyojanakarta. ritayarament ke bad bhi ve khud ko dyooti men hi manane kee mansha ke tahat thakur sab ke krityon men sahayogi kee haisiyat se aaj bhi khade najar aate hain. shikar kee pakad aur usakee aakarikee men praranbhik parivartan ka mahati dayitv bhi varshon unhin ke pas raha hai. isi ke chalate ve abhi bhi samaj ke dushmanon, rishtedaron men apane virodhiyon ko gahe-bagahe lekar thakur sab ke pas pahunchate rahate hain, taki sammilit aayojan ke madhyam se kisi sima tak apani dyooti bhi poori kar len aur purane jamane ka raub galib kar usake dil men dahashat bhi baithaee ja sake. pas pahunchane valon ke lie thakur sab ke pas apane jamane ke kisson ke alava har mudde par maulik vichar bhi the, jise ve pulisiya vinamrata se prastut kar samane vale ko abhibhoot kara dete the.

jabaki mainabaee rammoo ke sath bhag gaee thi ya jab unhen mile mote mal ka kafi hissa oopar sahab ke lie bhijavana pada tha. don hi avasaron par unaka vairagy jaga tha, sansar nashvar laga tha. tab chhotoo ne hi gam men ghulate sab ke samane do pakada prastut kee thin, jinakee tabiyat se dhulaee karane ke pashchat sab vairagyashram se vapas laut pae the, anyatha to pulis dipartament se ek atyant pratibhashali vyaktitv kee asamay hi rukhasati hoti dikh rahi thi.
gart men hi jaega. isake pahale kee chhotoo poochhate thakur sab bol pade chhotoo ne aankhen failaeen, sir hilaya, bat ka sir pakadane kee asafal koshish kee.
sansadon ko, rupae le lie sansad men gaddiyan lahara din. doosari partiyon par rishvat dene ke aarop laga die. kaisi andheragardi chal rahi hai, thakur sab ne fir kaha.
saba chhotoo ne fir sir ghumaya, gardan hilaee jaisa ve samajh men aane ke bavajood bhi sab kee dyooti poori karane ke lie pahale se fiks aadat ke mutabik karate rahe hain.

aise to len-den se sala bharosa hi uth jaega, len-den ke bad bhi kam kee tasalli nahin rah jaegi. aisa duniya se bharosa vishvas nam kee chij khatm ho jaegi. thakur sab ne kaha. fir bole- tujhe rukkan halavaee yad hai,
vo rukkan aur dammoo teli ne kisi kee pitaee ka theka liya tha, fir dammoo ne paisa lekar bhi pulis ko khabar kar di thi. isi bat par to rukkan ne use khoob mara tha. hain na saba chhotoo bola.

fir rukkan ne thane men is bat ko lekar hangama machaya tha ki dammoo pakshadrohi hai, mukadama usake khilaf hona chahie, ek bar juban dene ke bar usane kam to poora kiya nahin. shikayat kee so alaga. poore thane ne usakee is bat par hami bhari bhi ki nahin?
char sau bisi ka. kam eemanadari se poora n karane ka, dhokha dene aur shantibhang karane ka. chhotoo ne kaha.

ye vale jama karane pahunch gae. abe paisa to lavaris huaa na, lavaris paisa yani jabti banegi, yani pulis kee jaroorata, yani hamari jaroorat aur ham hain ritayard. ab samajha main kyon udas hoon thakur sab ne kuchh tan milane ke andaj men samajhaya.

to jab ham jaise sakriy ko ek umar ke bad aaram ke nam par ghar bitha dete hain, to janata kee chaubis ghante seva karane vale janapratinidhi to hamase jyada nahin thak jate honge. unhen kyon nahin aaram diya jata. ye kyon vilanbit rag sari umar chhedate rahate hain. inake khilaf pablik bhi koee mahaul nahin banati.
visheshagyon kee dukanen hi na band ho jaen. chhotoo ne gale ko sadhakar pet se kamal ka svar nikala.

sab aaf sath rahate-rahate ye komal-madhyama suron kee mamooli samajh baith gaee hai, nahin to mere lie to miyan kee todi aur tang todi ek hi bat thi. chhotoo ne kisi sajinde kee tarah gardan ko halke se jhukakar kaha.

hamin ne tujhe kabil banaya hai. hamare jaise desh ke pratyek afasar ka karttavy hai apane sahayogi ko kabil banana, taki usakee virasat ko aur aage badha sake, hai ki nahin. thakur sab ne gali kee taraf dekhate hue bat poori kee.

so kisi bhi aire-gaire se bhi bina mile nikal jane ko neta men khota, vot men chota kee ukt ke aaine se dekhate the. vahin, mohallevasi the, so janate the ki thakur sab ke radar men aa jane ke bad khisak jane kee kisi kee majal nahin. bina kisi nimantran ke aakar biraj gae.
thakur saba, panv lagan se to jaise aadarabhav chala hi gaya hai. khatiya par baithe-baithe fir bole badari.
paranpara ko gali bhi de raha hai aur panv ko hath bhi nahin laga raha hai, thakur sab kaisit milane kee khushi aur gusse ke mishrit svar men ek sath bole.
ye sansad men kya hangama kar rahe ho tum log. kaisit bajate hi thakur sab ka poochhatachh ka kram bhi shuroo ho gaya.

to tum kis marj kee dava ho, tum jakar baitha aate. yahan to har lebal ke chunav men mamala bithane ka dam bharate ho, jahan jhagada-tanta dikha tumhari soorat jaroor dikh jati hai. thakur sab ne lapatan ko badari kee histishita batana shuroo kee. fir mamala jamane ke nam par donon partiryon se mamala jama lete ho.
badari bhaiya ne dant nipore, vo to ka hai ki is bar mamala jara oonche lebal ka hai. ham thahare jila stariy neta to mamale men inti baith nahin paee.

ham to sare sharifon ko ek hi shreni men rakhakar dhunakate the, kabhi antar nahin kiya, len-den men t apane-parae tak ka lihaj nahin kiya, itane pakke the usoolon ke, ab to usoola, niyam-kayade sabake sab jaise sanvidhana banate ja rahe hain. keval sanshodhan ke lie bhar jaroorat rah gaee hai. ham to jaban ke itane pakke the ki bas kah di so kah di, rupae le lie so le lie. fir bhale hi havaladar ko havalat men kyon n thoonsana pade, ab to log ka vachan-dharam kuchh men bhi yakeen rah hi nahin gaya hai. thakur sab ne kaha fir chhotoo kee taraf sir kiya.
jhagada-fasada, marapita, loot-khasot? jaisa kam vaisa dama, kaee bar to log peshagi de jate the, bakee kam ke bada, koee tanta nahin. molabhav se to hamari shan ghatati thi, kyon? lapatan

ek hi bat se hamen chidh thi kisi mahila kee ijjat aabaroo par hath dalane vale aur usase chhedachhad karane vale ko t ham kisi keemat par nahin bakhshate the. thane men hi ulta tang kar sare kasabal nikal dete the. thakur sab ne hava men hath laharakar ekshan riple kiya.
sadan se sadak tak rajaniti men jo chal raha hai usase to bharatamata kee aankhen jar-jar ho rahi hongi.

ham jaise adham kam karane vale tak man-bahanon kee ijjat sir aankhon par rakhate hain. ek ye hain, duniya hans rahi hai inhen laj nahin aa rahi. thakur sab ne jindagi men pahali bar sachcha sur lagaya.
ek mamala jamane ka kuchh paisa us par bakaya tha, thakur sab aur lapatan kee aisi fijool baten sunane ke bajae ve vot men chota ka khatara uthane ko taiyar the.
rangi shyam ke ranga ka aalap chhede the. lapatan tan ke sath sir hila raha tha, use n jane kyon ye sangit-rag achchha lag raha tha, behad achchha.

Hello Every one, Agar aap ek Indian hai to shidhi si baat hai aapka Aadhaar Card to hoga hi, or aapko pata ho hoga Government ka aadesh ke aanusar har ek mobile number se aadhaar number link hona jaruri hai. Agar aapne abhi tak Apne Mobile Number me aadhaar Number ko Verify nahi karaya hai to aapke pass usse sambandit call or message bhi jarur aate hoge. to chaliye jaan lete hai kaise Aadhaar Number ko Mobile number se link karte hai.
aksar unake murde bhi arthiyon men hi karavaten badalane lagate hain aur unake dah-sanskar ka svarnim divas anishchit kal ke lie tal jata hai.

soch-samajhakar karata hai aur thik karata hai arthat manushy jo kuchh karata hai bina soche-samajhe karata hai aur galat karata hai. isi prasang men paramatma ke doot doktaron ka bhi shukraguzar hoon. unakee samajh men meri bimari nahin aa rahi. yadi unakee samajh men meri bimari aa gaee hoti to ve eeshvariy aadesh ke viruddh mere kan thik kar dete aur mujhe sunani-anasunani sunani padati. log jab kahani-anakahani se baz nahin aayenge, main isi prakar paramatma ka aabhari rahoonga. main doosaron kee suvidha ka bhi poora dhyan rakhata hoon. log meri baten bhi sun saken isalie mainne bahut dhire-dhire bolana aaranbh kar diya. is sabake lie aapako mera aabhari hona chahie.

nak aur gala speshalist se paramarsh lene gaya to vahan oochan sunane valon kee ek lambi kyoo thi. mujhe itani jyada bhid dekhakar prasannata huee. n jane log bhid se ghabarate kyon hain ? goya bhid n ho tataiyon ka koee chhatta ho aur kat khae jane ka dar ho. are bhaee, yahan to bhid pahale se hi mari huee hai, vah kisi ko khak kategi ? at mujhe apane saharogiyon kee bhid dekhakar sahayogiyon ka-sa pyara bhram huaa, fir kuchh udasi mahasoos huee kyonki mainne svayan ko kyoo men sabase pichhe khada huaa paya. abhi poori tarah udas bhi nahin ho paya tha ki samane divar par latakee plet par likha mila-kyoo men khade hone kee aadat daliye garzeki kyoo men shantipoorvak khade rahiye. dhakke khaiye, chhakke chhodiye, hakke-bakke ho jaiye, lekin dhakke khilaiye nahin. auron ko kyoo todakar jine dijiye. mainne isi niyam ke anusar svayan ko santoshapoorvak kyoo men lagaye rakha.

sidhe daktar ke kamare men pravesh karate nazar aate. yah sab mujhe sarasar kyoo-aachar sanhita ko bhang karane tatha usamen dushtata ka rang bharane ke saman laga. mainne zor-zor se ya kahoon shor-shor se oonchi aavaz men bol-bol kar isaka virodh kiya par kisi ne meri ek n suni, kyonki ve log is qadar bahare the ki ooncha bhi nahin sun sakate the. parinam vahi huaa jo hamari rashtriy paranpara ke anusar hona chahie. yani ham us din jyon-ke-tyon kyoo men khade rahe aur daktar apani dyooti poori karake chhoo-mantar ho gae. mere pas koee chara nahin raha. agar rahata bhi to main use kisi ko dalane ke mood men nahin tha. main bas staind par aa gaya aur daftar kee bas kee pratiksha men kyoo men khada ho gaya. ittafaq se mera afasar bhi usi kyoo men khada tha. ab ham ek-doosare se nazaren bacha rahe the. zahir hai, us din afasar ko mere der se daftar pahunchane par kros lagane ka avasar nahin mila. par kyoo men khade-khade usane eesaee padariyon kee shaili men kaee bar kros zaroor banaya.

kyoo men ve khade hon jinhen apane aap par bharosa nahin,kya hamari niyati kyoo men khade rahana hi hain ? isi prakar ke anek nare hain jo hamen gahe-bagahe sunane ko milate hain. yahan har honahar kyoo banane ka nek kam n karane tatha kyoo tod kar bhagane ke lie kuchh vaisa vyavahar kar raha hai jaise bharatiy vidhayak mantrimandal men shamil n kie jane par apana dal chhodane ke lie aur adiyal bail apani rassi todane ke lie karata hai. sare-ka sara desh pradhan mantree banana chahata hai. par logon kee samajh men itani moti bat kyon nahin aati ki sabr se kyoo men lage raho aur jab bhi mauka aaye,use tod do. maf keejiye, main hi galati par tha. moti bat kah kar samajha raha tha, sabako samajh men aa jaegi. par yah bhool gaya tha ki kuchh logon kee samajh itani moti hoti hai ki usamen moti bat bhi nahin aa sakati.

mainne kyoo men khade hone kee aadat dal li hai. subah se sham tak main jo sarvadhik mahatvapoorn kam karata hoon, vah kyoo men khada hona hi hai. subah nau baje jakar daftar kee bas kee kyoo men lag jata hoon aur furasat men kyoo men khada-khada anek yojanaen banakar apani damit ichchhaen poori karata hoon. amuk vyakti se amuk kam nikal sakata hai,amuk vyakti ko kis prakar nicha dikhaya ja sakata hai, amuk vyakti ko kis prakar ooncha uthaya ja sakata hai aadi-aadi. yah aakasmik nahin hai ki aadhunik manushy apani samast mahatvapoorn yojanaen kyoo men khada-khada hi banata hai. fir kyoo men khada-khada akhabar padh leta hoon. aage ya pichhe khadi ladakee se batachit karane ka bahana talashane kee koshish karata hoon, yani apana ishk bhi kyoo men hi ho jata hai. is prakar kyoo men khade-khade kitani bar mujhe aisa avasar mila hai jab maine muhabbat ko nae sire se shuroo kiya hai.

lagatar aur bar-bar khade rahate rahane ka pratap hai ki sinema ke tikat-vikreta se apani dosti hai, rashaning vibhag ke hedaklark apane yar hain, pablik layabreri ka sanchalak mujhe janata hai, post aafis ka vindo klark mera mitr hai. aur in sab sthanon par kyoo men khada nahin hona padata. jis prakar dukh aur jel ka sathi jivan bhar ka sathi bana rahata hai, usi prakar kyoo ka sathi bhi aasani se daman chhodane ko taiyar nahin hota.
tab bhi yah aadat buri nahin rahegi kyonki aapako ek din matadata ke daravaze par ummidavaron kee kyoo men zaroor khada hona hoga.

usaka gunnagan kiya use samast vishishtataon aur kshamataon se yukt srishti ke samast karmon aur marmon kee adhishthatree siddh karane kee garaz se pahala misara likha ya yon kahen ki kaha aur bad men use bevafa kahakar bechari ka patta hi kat diya. ho sakata hai ki vah jamana itana hi kharab ho. apani is qadar chapaloosi karane vale prashansakon, fainon aur adyatan muhavaron men kahen to chamachon se bhi vafa ka vayada n karate hon aur premiyon,aashikon,prashansakon ko vidhvansak virodhiyon kee bhangima apana kar doosari kism kee panktiyan jodani padi ho. isalie us zamane ko yaqinan hi purana zamana karar diya ja sakata hai.

zamane ke taevar badal chuke hain. premi, aashik aur prashansakon ke sath-sath mashook,premika or aaradhy badal chuke hain. ab chahe matr premi ho athava desh-premi yani neta, vayada kuchh is tarah karate hain goya kapade badal rahe hon ya chunav sabha men arzinuma bhashan de rahe hon.

jitani ki aur to tumase kya nahin hota ! vali ukti. is par bhi yadi kya nahin hota par hi vichar kiya jae to kaee nayab nuqa te hath lagenge. yah kya nahin hota lagabhag usi andaz men kaha gaya hai jisamen aksar yah sab kaha-suna jata hai-tyagiyon ke mahal khade hain, brahmachariyon ke bachche kanventon men shiksha prapt kar rahe hain, veshyaen aatmashodh par kavitaen padh rahi hain, akavigan is-us manch se kavitaen padhane ko lalayit hain aur lala jhangoomal aamaran anashan karake bhi har tarah ka chanda kha rahe hain.

kyonki main manata tha, kya hota hai ?meri antaratma aur vivek mujhase kaha karate the amuk ji har kam beeemani se kar rahe hain, dhokhadhadi kar rahe hain, tumhen unaka virodh karana chahie aur main kahata tha ki mere virodh se kya hota hai ? bazar men chizen nahin mil rahi hain, zaroorat se zayada mahangi mil rahi hain,tum to fizool kee chizen kharidani band kar do,zaroorat se zayada kuchh bhi n lo. yahan tak ki apani zarooraten bhi kam kar do,kyonki tumhari hi tarah yadi aur log bhi aisa hi karen, ghar nahin bharen to chizon ke dam khud-b-khud gir jaenge aur desh girane se bach jaega aur main kahata raha ki mere karane se kya hota hai ? log sadi gali laingik sadandh se bharapoor kavitaen sahityik goshthiyon men padhate rahe aur kshamashil sajjanon ne unhen yah soch kar naya kar diya ki hamare karane se kya hota hai. natija yah huaa ki hamare kuchh n karane se kuchh nahin huaa. amuk ji ka lakhon ka bizanes hai aur buddhijiviyon ko buddhoo samajhate hain, mahangaee din-b-din badhati ja rahi hai aur sadiyal kavitaon ke kavi svayan ko hindi hi nahin, sampoorn bharatiy bhashaon ka ezara paund samajh rahe hain.

jinakee manyata hai ki amuk kary ke lie is ya us mantree se kahala dijie, fir dekhate hain yah kam kis tarah nahin hota, is kary ke lie amuk ji ko aaj kisi tarah itani raqam de dijie, kam ho hi jaega are yar, kabhi-kabhi unase milate julate raha karo n, vah khud hi apane yogy seva poochhate najar aayenge. samay chahie, taikal karane ka tarika chahie, vyavahar kushalata chahie kabhi-kabhi zaroorat padane par kakatel parti ka intajam bhi chahie, kya nahin hota ? achchhi-achchhi katavadar, paini aur tani huee moonchhen in karishmon ke samane jhuk jati hain aur poonchhon men parivartit hokar hilati huee najar aane lagati hain. bade-bade hekad miyan aapake lie kuchh bhi karane ko lalayit ho uthate hain aur varshon ka ruka kam minaton ya ghanton men ho jata hai. mazedar bat to yah hai ki is sampraday ke anuyayi athava saraparast chatukar, beeeman aur thag hote hue bhi sampradayikata ke rashtriy rog se poornnat muk t hain.

ladake ka edamishan nahin ho raha hai. aap chahen to kara sakate hain. kaee kalezon men aapake mitr padhate hi hain. nambaron ke bare men poochhatachh kee to maloom huaa ki unaka ladaka bahut kam nambaron se pas huaa tha. mainne kaha, jab nambar hi bahut kam aae hain to main is mamale men kar hi kya sakata hoon ?
aap jaisa vyakti bhi aisi baten karata hai ? aap kisi se zara kah den to kam ho hi jaega. sifarish se kya nahin hota ?

mainen nahin loota. magar sharmaji ne kahin aur se kahalava-sunava kar edamishan kara liya tha. sharmaji isi tarah sifarish karavate rahenge aur bas unaka vah nalayak ladaka sifarishon ke bal par layak banata rahega, apane se yogy chhatron ko nalayak siddh karata rahega, aage badhata rahega, tarakkee karata rahega. fir sifarish karakar achchhi naukari prapt karega athava vyapar men nam roshan karega baink bailens badhayega, kothiyan banayega, chunav jitega tatha sukhi aadami kee tarah jivan-yapan karega. durbhagy se yadi yah kisi sarakari athava gair-sarakari uchch pad ko pane se vanchit bhi rah gaya to is vyakti kee sifarish ka vishesh mahatv hoga.

jo svayan ek dukhad sthiti hai. par samajhadar pathak ve hi mane jaenge jo pida ke is prakaran men bhi kuchh kam kee bat nikal len. masalan mauqa padane par unhen sadhanon ke shubh-ashubh ka dhyan nahin rakhana chahie. chapaloosi, beeemani, dhoorttata se kya nahin hota ? yani sab kuchh ho sakata hai. kaun nahin janata ki aadhunik asar sansar ke nirman tatha utthan men in tattvon ne apani kshudr bhoomika bakhoobi nibhaee hai.

vah rel men muft chalega. is riaayat ke dene se sarakar ko koee hani nahin hogi kyonki lekhak log vaise hi kaun-sa tikat kharidate hain ? isake alava sarakar ko uchit hoga ki vah dadhivan sahityakar kee pustaken prakashan vibhag se chhapavae taki lekhak ko koee prakashak dhokha n de sake.

unakee pustakon ko chhapane kee zimmedari sarakar len. kaun lekhak pratibhavan hai aur kaun nahin, isaka nirnnay doktar namavar sinh karenge. ve aapako agyeya to nahin bana sakate par gyeya jaroor bana sakate hain-aisa mera vishvas hai. dadhi bhi har ek ko nahin fabati. jarj barnard sha kee dadhi unake vyaktitv ko ek vichitr pratibha pradan karati thi jabaki vhitamain kee dadhi thik usi ghas kee yad dilati thi jisaka zikr kavi ne apani pustak livs aof grasa men kiya tha.

sumitranandan pant aur jayashankar prasad dadhi rakhate to kaise lagate ? ye tinon sahityasrashta kuchh bhi chhipana nahin chahate the aur isi karan unhonne dadhi nahin rakhi. ratnakar ji ka chehara zaroor aisa tha jo dadhi kee zaroorat ko yad dilata tha. devakeenandan khatree yadi dadhi rakhate to vah unhen bhi tilasm bana deti. idhar suna hai ki rajendr yadav chandrakanta par apani bhoomika likh rahe hain. kitana achchha ho ki ve chandrakanta kee santati par bhi utana hi dhyan den. han, alabatta bhootanatha par unakee bhoomika kee koee zaroorat nahin. us par unaka chitr bhar chhap jae to kafi hai. is bat ka pata bhi mujhe kabhi nahin laga ki mira, sarojini nayadoo, mahadevi, emili brant, charlot brant aur parl bak ne dadhi kyon nahin rakhi. kuchh log kahenge ki bhala kahin striyan bhi dadhi rakh sakati hain ?

faishan kee intajame safaee ko kya karoon ? mera vichar hai ki kaviyitriyan jo dadhi nahin rakhatin ve shayad faishan kee vajah se nahin rakhatin. nahin to mainne apane is kshannabhangur jivan men aisi deviyon ke darshan kie hain jinake mukharavind dekhakar van mahotsava kee yad aati thi. faishan badi buri chiz hai. karl marks aur enjels-donon dadhi rakhate the aur tabiyat ke sath rakhate the magar bad men chalakar sthiti yah rahi ki lenin ne nam matr ko dadhi rakhi, stalin ne matr moonchhen rakhin. thik vaisi hi jaisi ki kabhi maithalisharan gupt rakhakarate the. aur brejanev ne chehara ekadam saf kar liya. majadooron kee halat duroost karane ke lie ve koee bhi tyag kar sakate the.

main bhi dadhi rakhana chahata hoon mujhako hai apani kavi kee laj nibhani is disha men main bharasak prayatn karunga. main to chahoonga ki chahe to sarakar is sandarbh men matr ek ya do lakh rupayon kee grant mujhe de de taki main adhik ann upajaon kee tarj par adhik dadhi ugaon ka aandolan shuru kar sakoon. main keemati sharab piunga, videsh jaunga, vatanukoolit darje se yatra karoonga aur vakee rashi men se jo bhi sambhav hai, vah dadhi ke lie shat-pratishat karoonga. sthiti yah hogi ki mere kshetr men machchhar to rahega par maleriya nahin rahega kee tarj par dadhi to rahegi par kavi nahin rahega vali bat sach nikalegi. sarvajanik dhan ko gaban karane kee koee sanbhavana huee to main bangala desh chala jaunga aur kazi nazarul islam ka sankshipt banakar vahin kavita likhoonga.

use moorkh samajhana hi uchit hai aur isake khilaf inglaind men ek kahavat abhi bhi prachalit hai jisake anusar matr dadhi rakhana yah hargiz siddh nahin karata ki aadami buddhiman hai ya nahin. sikandar mahan dadhi se badi nafarat karata tha. usakee sena ke sare sipahi aur sipahasalar dadhivihin hi hote the. roman samrat efikenas ko bhi dadhi se behad nafarat thi. is sabake viparit roman samrat hedriyan dadhi ko apani priyatama se bhi zayada pyar karata tha aur use hamesha sine se lagakar rakhata tha.

alabatta is sandarbh men aapako main ek sachchi ghatana jaroor sunaoonga. ek riyasat ke raees the jo gavarnar se milane ja rahe the. lakhanaoo ke charabag steshan par jab ve gadi se utar rahe the tabhi ek dadhi vale vyakti ne unaka pars nikal liya. raees sahab ne us vyakti ka pichha kiya magar kafi bhagane ke bad bhi vah poketamar kee sirf dadhi hi pakad pae. sthiti yah rahi ki dadhi unake hath men rah gaee aur jebakatara bhid men kho gaya. bina dadhi ke to use pahachanana bhi mushkil tha. chor asali tha magar dadhi nakali thi.

sabhi dadhi rakhate the. bhaktikal men bhi dadhi ka prabhav raha. riti-kal men nayak dadhi rakhata tha par nayika chandramukhi hoti thi. dadhi ka nayika ke vishisht angon par prabhava ya dadhi aur hindi kavita men rahasyavada jaise vishayon par thisis likhi ja sakati hai jis par doktaret milegi aur jaroor milegi. bas vidvan navayuvak ritikalin nayika par utana hi parishram karen jitana ki gval kavi ka nayak kiya karata tha. ab bakee kuchh aur kahane ko kya rah gaya ? han, alabatta itani salah jaroor doonga ki parajit pidhi ke mere sahakarmi kam se kam dadhi aur moonchhen jaroor badha len. aisa karane se unaka bhitari khokhalapan to vahin rahega jahan ki vah hai par bahar se dekhane par ve jaroor bahadur lagenge. itana kya kam hai? bas yahi hai ki mere kavi kee antim ichchha.

jo ki unake kam ke the, jaise vhil cheyar, vokar aur folding letrin sit aadi. bhagavan kee kripa se do varsh ke bhitar hi vah ekadam svasth ho gaye, bima nigam kee kripa se upachar men laga kuchh pratishat paisa bhi vapas mil gaya. lekin kulakarni parivar post-aoparetiv keyara par jitana kharch kar chuka tha, usakee aarthik bharapaee bhi sambhav nahin thi, n hi is sambandh men koee sarakari niyam hain.

kyonki sarakari svasthy sevayen bhrashtachar, lalafitashahi aur rajaniti ke chalate lagabhag nishpran avastha men pahunch chukee hain. in niji svasthy sevaon ke sath-sath inase jude do udyog bhi teji se panape hain ve hain dava udyog tatha medikal upakaran udyog. jaisa ki sabhi janate hain ki mahangaee ke karan dhire-dhire svasthy sevayen bhi aam aadami kee pahunch se door hoti ja rahi hain aur kisi vishesh paristhiti men aopareshan ke bad post-aopareshan keyara bhi kafi mahanga hai.

tatha rashtriy-bahurashtriy kampaniyon ke anap-shanap munafe ko niyantrit karane kee ek koshish ke roop men ujjain maharashtr samaj kee ek shakha marathi vyavasayik mandala jo kuchh vyavasayiyon aur gair-sarakari karmachariyon ka ek samooh hai ne ek vishesh samajaseva ka prakalp hath men liya hai. is prakalp ka nam hai do sv vidi mungi seva prakalpa. ham sabhi ko yah maloom hai ki kisi vyakti ke aapat aopareshan ya any bimari ke bad ghar par usakee dekhabhal ke liye bhi kaee bar kaee tarah ke upakaran lagate hain, jaise ki aoksijan silendar, jalane ke marijon ke liye vishesh bistar vatar beda, salain staind, stool pot, yoorin pot, chalane-firane ke liye vokar, chhadi, kamar dard ke marijon ke liye letrin sit, vhil cheyar, strechar aadi kee aavashyakata hoti hai, aur yah sabhi aaeetam behad mahange hote hain. ho sakata hai ki kaee log aasani se inakee keemat chukane kee sthiti men hon, lekin asal men in vastuon ka upayog ek simit samay tak ke liye hi ho pata hai. marij ke thik ho jane kee sthiti men yah chijen un gharon men bekar padi rahati hain aur antatah kharab hokar kabad men jati hain.

kuchh kharid kar aur kuchh parichiton, mitron se dan lekar. jab kabhi kisi vyakti ko is prakar kee kisi vastu kee aavashyakata hoti hai to mandal ke sadasy use vah vastu pradan karate hain. us vastu kee mool keemat ko shuru men jamanata ke taur par jama karavaya jata hai, yadi vastu 1000 rupaye se kam keemat kee hai to filahal isaka shulk 20- mahina rakha gaya hai, jabaki yadi vastu mahangi hai jaise aoksijan silendar aadi to usaka masik shulk n lete hue 5- rupaye dainik ke hisab se liya jata hai, taki vyakti aavashyakata samapt hote hi turant vah vastu vapas kar de aur vah kisi aur ke kam aa sake. vastu vapas kar dene par jamanat rashi vapas kar di jati hai mentenens ya vastu men aaee kisi kharabi ko thik karavane kee jimmedari bhi usi vyakti kee hoti hai, sath hi us vyakti se anurodh kiya jata hai ki is prakar kee koee vastu usake kisi rishtedar ya mitr ke yahan falatoo padi ho to use dan men dene ko protsahit karen. 5-, 10-, 20- kee mamooli rakam se jo bhi rakam ekatrit hoti hai, usase ek aur naee vastu aa jati hai, is prakar vastuen dhire-dhire badh rahi hain, sath hi is seva prakalp ko utsahajanak pratisad mil raha hai. filahal to yah ek chhote star par chal raha hai, lekin jaise-jaise isamen vibhinn vastuen badhengi, jahir hai ki kuchh atirikt jagah, kam se kam ek-do vyakti ka staf, steshanari aadi bhi lagega. dirghakalin yojana hai ki ek embulens aur ek shav vahan kee bhi vyavastha kee jayegi. is prakalp ko nigetiv blad grup donar asosiyeshana se bhi joda gaya hai sabhi janate hain ki nigetiv grup ka khoon badi mushkil se milata hai aur svayan is samooh ke adhyaksh shree abhay marathe 50 se adhik bar raktadan kar chuke hain.

yah ek samajaseva hai aur mamooli shulk bhi isaliye liya ja raha hai taki usase koee any naee vastu li ja sake aur sath hi seva ka upayog karane vala vyakti bhi is seva ko for granteda n lekar ganbhirata se le. main sabhi blogaron, net mitron tatha any sabhi se jo yah lekh padhen, yah anurodh karana chahoonga ki ve log bhi apane-apane shaharon men is prakar ke kuchh logon ko ekatrit karake aisa prakalp shuru karen. jo parivar kisi eksident ya aopareshan se gujarata hai, usakee vyatha vahi jan sakata hai, lekin yadi bhari kharchon ke bich is prakar ka koee madad ka hath jab mil jata hai to use kafi rahat milati hai. aasha hai ki yah lekh adhik se adhik logon tak pahunchega aur usase kafi sare log apane shaharon men yah samajaseva shuru karenge. shiksha aur svasthy, donon kshetr aane vale samay men aam aadami ko sabase jyada aarthik takalif denge, usase nipatane ka ek hi tarika hai aapasi sahakara upayog karane ke bad bachi huee davaeeyon ka baink shuru karen, ya purane kampyootaron se kisi gairaj ya anupayogi kamare men garib chhatron ko padhayen, purane kapade bechakar bartan kharidane kee bajay yoon hi kisi jarooratamand ko de den aadi-aadi. aapasi sahakarita ek tarika hai, mahangi hoti ja rahi svasthy sevaon aur dava kampaniyon se bachane ka

jinase ki unhen takarana tha. aalochana ko ya to rachana ka pichhalaggoo man liya gaya tha ya fir aalochana ke vikas kee simaen avaruddh ho gayin thi. falat aachary ramachandr shukl ne jis aalochana kee buniyad dali thi. usaka tark-sangat vikas nahin ho saka. muktibodh kee chinta svabhavik hai isilie unaka sanket aalochana ke jivan karm kee or hai aur vah yah ki usaka kary jivan kee vastavikata ka sanvedanatmak or gyanatmak vikas karana hai.

aise men aalochana ugr aur katu bhi ho sakati hai. par aisa sarvatr aur sadaiv nahin hota. parantu yadi aalochana apani andh jadata ke aage kavita ke jivan vikas ke sanketon ko grahan karane men asafal siddh hoti hai to kavita bhi usaka javab avashy degi. isaka tatpary yah nahin ki kavita aalochana parampara kee satta ko hi asvikar kar de. muktibodh ne samiksha kee samasyaen, vishay par charcha karate hue in simaon ka spasht ullekh kiya hai. yahan kavi aur samikshak donon kee sthitiyon par vichar kiya gaya hai. nagarjun aisi hi aalochana se kshubdh hokar vyangy ka sahara lete hain. ve poore aalochana karm ke virodhi nahin hain agar keerti ka fal chakhana hai kalakar ne fir-fir socha aalochak ko khush karana hai. nagarjun kee ye panktiyan aalochana kee ek vishesh sthiti kee or sanket karati hai.

n hi rachana ko aalochana ka anuvarti mana ja sakata hai. in donon ka sambandh dvandatmak hai par yah jaroor kahana chahata hoon ki aalochana rachanakar ke jivananubhav ko samajhe, vah jivananubhav jo rachana men jhil-mila raha hai. rachana men vyakt jivan kis prakar ka hai aur usake kaun se karan hain isakee padatal bhi aalochana ka dharm hai. yah svikar karana padega ki rachana men vyakt jivan jaisa bhi hai, usake bhi aitihasik aur bhautik karan hain. isase inkar kar aalochana apane dayitv ka nirvah eemanadari ke sath nahin kar sakati. aalochana par yah aarop lagaya jata hai ki vah rachana ke jivan sanvedana se shoony hokar vichar aur chintan ka sahara leti hai, par yah aarop bebuniyad hai. aisa kahana aalochana matr ko kathaghare men khada karana hai, jabaki aalochana ka kary rachana ko samajhana prakarantar se, sanvedanatmak jivan ko samajhana bhi hai.

rachana ke sanvedanatmak saty ka udghatan karate hue rachanakar ko rachana ke vastu satyon se adhik se adhik parichit karayen. us par naee se naee roshani dale, jisase rachanakar ke lie bhi vah prerak siddh ho sake. rachana bhi aalochana ke lie naee chunauti banakar aaye.

sath hi sanvedanashil mastishk kee aavashyakata hai. use rachana men vyakt khara aur batta lage jivan men fark karana hai. yahi aalochana kee eemanadari hai. vastutah aalochana ka kam keval shabdon kee bajigari dvara ek aise thath ka nirman nahin karana hai jisamen jivan ka ansh hi n ho. aalochana jivan jitane kee prakriya ke marg kee khoj ka nam hai. isi arth men vah rachanatmak prakary hai aaj kee rachanatmak aalochana yah kary bakhoobi kar rahi hai. usamen ek rachana ka aasvad maujood hai. vah rachana ke jivan-saty se parichit karane ke madadagar sabit ho rahi hai.

joojhana padata hai. yah dvandatmak sangharsh jaroori hai shart yahi hai ki vah rachana ko kendr banakar apani paridhi kee sanbhavanaon ka vikas kare. aalochana ke bhitar se rachanakar ko khojana hota hai. isilie rachana or aalochana ko ek doosare ka virodhi nahin, varan sahayogi bhi kaha ja sakata hai. tabhi aalochana rachana ko arajak hone se bacha sakata hai.

in donon ke raste alag hue aur dooriyan aage badhi. itihas kee kuchh paristhitiyon ke karan aisa hona asvabhavik nahin kaha ja sakata . in sthitiyon ne aalochana kee paraspar virodhi paddhatiyon ko janm diya. lekin tab se ab itihas aage badh gaya hai. ab viruddhon ka samanjasy ho gaya hai chahe rachana men ho ya aalochana men ek svasth paranpara pun kayam huee hai. isilie rachana aur aalochana ke antaravalamban ka saval naye sire se uthaya ja raha hai. in donon kee maitree ne vikas kee nayi sanbhavanaon ko janm diya hai. donon ka uddeshy manushy kee sampoornnata kee khoj karana hai. yah bat jaroor hai ki aalochana rachana ke unhin tatvon ko khojane ka kary karati hai jo vikasaman hote hain. isilie vah rachana men jhilamilate gatishil jivan ko pakadati hai.

kalavadi ya shailivadi aalochanaon men hota hai, jinake ki apane poorvagrah hote hain, jinake moolyankan ke manadand rachana se bahar ke hote hain. yadi rachana ke apane aantarik niyam hain to aalochana bhi ek anushasan ka nam hai. yah thik hai ki rachana jivan-sangharsh aur aatmasangharsh ke raste se aati hai to aalochana bhi is sangharsh men rachana ke sath hoti hai. donon ek doosare kee sahayogi banakar aati hai. to fir rachana aalochana kee bhoomika ko aasanin se svikar kyon nahin karati. aalochana apani vastuparak sthiti ke karan rachana ko badhy karati hai. rachana se ek satark vivek kee mang karati hai. muktibodh ne ise hi sanvedanatmak gyan aur gyanatmak sanvedana kaha hai. aalochana ko pata hai ki usaka upajivy rachana hi hai. isalie rachana aur aalochana ka dvandatmak rishta donon ke lie anivary hai. yadi rachanakar rachane ke lie satark aur pratibaddh hai to aalochana use janchane-parakhane ke lie sankalpavan. in donon ke bich ek sahaj sangharsh dekha jata hai. yah sangharsh bhi donon ke lie preranaprad hai.

jo viruddhon ke samanjasy se banati hain. isilie ek rachanakar samay aane par aalochak ke dayitv ka ka nirvah bhi karata hai. aaj aavashyakata rachana aur aalochana ke rishton ko majaboot banane kee hai foot dalane kee nahin kyonki rachana aur donon ko milakar hi sahity poornnata prapt kar sakata hai. isi ke rachanakar ke antarbahy ko janana bhi aalochana ke lie aavashyak hai. isase aalochana ko vishvasaniy banaya ja sakata hai.

jitana aalochana ke lie. siddhanton ka samavesh bhi isi ke antargat hai, isase bahar jakar nahin. faisale dagane se hi sab kuchh nahin ho jata. aalochana ka kam faisala karana nahin hai. vishleshan aur vivechan bhi aavashyak hai. chahe achchhaee ho ya buraee spashtikaran kee aavashkata uchit hai. aatm nirapeksh hona rachana aur aalochana donon ke lie aavashyak hai. aalochana bhi ek tarah ka kalatmak chintan hai aur srijan bhi isalie vastavik manav jivan ka gyan hue bina vah vivek vikasit nahin ho sakata jo rachana to kya aalochana karm ke lie bhi aavashyak hai. aisi aalochana rachana se kam prabhavi nahin hoti. aisi aalochana sar sangrah ka kary karati hai. tabhi rachana men jo avanchhaniy hain, aalochana usaka nishedh aur virodh bhi karati hai. yah virodh bhi rachanatmak hain.

usake pas gyanatmak aur sanvedanatmak prakash hai ki nahin, vah jin aujaron se raksha karana chahati hai ve aujar morche ke lie upayukt bhi hain ya nahin. isaka bahut jyada samanyikaran is lie sanbhav nahin hai kyonki rachana prakriya bhi ek samanyikrit prakriya nahin hai aur n hi rachanaprakriya ko yantreekrit kiya ja sakata hai. vastut rachana prakriya bahut kuchh aatmabaddh kriya bhi ho jati hai parantu aatmakenndrit nahin at usakee samajikata bhi nasht nahin hoti hai. at alag-alag rachanakar rachana prakriya ka bhinn-bhinn anubhav arjit karata hai aur vah sanvedan kee navinata kee khoj karata hai. aalochana ka kam sabhi ko ek lathi se hankane ke saman nahin hai. use apane aujaron ka ek hi anupat aur santulan sarvatr prayog karane kee chhoot nahin di ja sakati. isake parinam kabhi bhi achchhe nahin nikale hain. aisi sthiti rachana ke sath nyay kataee nahin kar sakati.

par isaka yah bhi matalab nahin ki ham is aalochak ke sampoorn aalochana karm ko hi kharij karaden. kaee bar poori aalochana ke bhitar hamen prakash kee ek aisi halkee aur barik kiran mil jati hai ki ham usi kee roshani men rachana kee gaharaiyon tak pahunch jate hain. isalie aalochana se sar sangrah kee mang karana bhi galat nahin kaha jayega. jahan tak rachana ka prashn hai chunav yahan bhi karana padata hai. isalie vahi rachana hamen apani or aakarshit karane men samarth bhi hoti hai, jo navinata ko dharan karati hai, jo jivan ko kavyamay bana deti hai.

is babat khudaee karake dekha jaega ki kahan lupt huee hai. sadachar naitikatayukt jivon kee antim kadi. kahin inake jivashm yahan mil jaen to unake dienae parikshan se pata lagaya jaega ki kaise, kab ye mahatvapoorn prajati in gunon sahit dhara se vilupt huee thi. anyatha to ise prithvi se poornnaroop se luptaprayah hi man liya jaega. fir buraee ko lekar koee paranparagat dukh nahin rahega. is karan poore aayojan ka sanyojan bithaya gaya hai.

vartikal men kaee trenche lagi padi hain. kaee staron par utkhanan ka prayas kiya ja raha hai. filahal pratham star par ek haddi mili hai. vaigyanik isakee napajokh men jute hain. praranbhik nishkarshon ke aadhar par kisi sadachar se paripoorn jiv kee hi ridh kee haddi lag rahi hai.

safed kadak kolar. manushy men svabhiman ka gun tha. ek kadak kolar se itani janakari. ab sidhi gardan par hi to kadak kolar laga hoga. budhaoo vaigyanik ne janakari di. kya kaha aapane budhaoo? saraji aaf in dhrisht vicharon ka hi pratifal hai ye khudaee, dhoondhana pad raha hai sadgunon ko jivashm men.

utana jivashm nikalane ke bad visheshagy bata dete hain. aise hi nahin dhool-garda khate hue pagalon kee bhanti jangalon men lage pade hain. kuchh to hoga hi. aur ye aap kya bar-bar shak kar rahe hain. dikhata hai aaf vishvas kee suee hamesha end par hi lapalapati rahati hai. yahan janakari par janakari die ja rahe hain. aaf nakhare hi nahin sanbhalate, shak hi khatm nahin hota aapaka. bharosa nahin to khud hi kyon nahin aankh khol kar dekh lete. khair aap gussa mat hoie. kahani fir se shuroo karate hain.

bhaee han, aap aisa samajh len. kankal men kot fans gaya hai. kaise fans gaya? are bhaee, vaigyanik ne use dekhate hi chillana isalie shuroo kiya ki marane vala kaee betiyon ka sadachari bap tha, jisane jaroor aatmahatya kee hogi.

bhaeesahab vaigyanik khat yani chehara dekhate hi bata dete hain. kaisi dinata tapak rahi hai. lachari ka kaisa tej hai? poore kankal par, donon vishisht gunon ka aisa adbhut sammishran to lachar bap kee paidayashi pahachan hoti hai, lekin ye to kankal. chehara kahan hai, ki utana kuchh dikh raha hai. bhaee fir vahi shak kee suee. end par lapalapane lagi. bhale hi chehara nahin ho, kankal ho. inhonne to lakhon jivashm urf kankal nikale hain. vivaran diya hai. fir yah to pahunchela vaigyanik hai. itani der aap usakee utkrisht koti ke vivaran ke prasaran ko risiv bhi to kar rahe hain. sadgunon ka laiv prastutikaran dekh rahe hain. fir bhi kuchh der ke lie ye shak vala niji sadgun tak pair nahin rakh sakate aap. isi ke karan to yah khudaee jaroori huee hai. sarakar tak ko dhundhavana pad raha hai sadagunon ka jivashv.

Dosto aaj mai aapke liye ek aisi Trick lekar aaya hu jiske bare me bahut kam log jante hai, is Trick ki Madad se aap kisi bhi app ka nam or icon change Kar sakte hai. Aapko to pata hi hoga ki Android apps ka Icon hamesha Defult hi rahta hai joki ap change nhi kr pate hai. lekin apka btana chahnga ki men eek esi trick khoj nikali h jiski madad se Ham Kisi bhi Android Apps ko Apne hisaab se customize kar sakte hai. Is trick ki sbse khaas bat ye h ki isko use karne ke liye apko apna android mobile root karne ke zarurat nhi hai. Aap Unroot mobile me bhi is trick ko bahut aasani se use kar sakte hai. Is trick ki madad se ap apne personal apps bhi chupa skte h unke nam or icon change krke. Apne app pr kisi settings ki pic lga dijiye fir koi bhi admi us pr jyada dhyan nahi dega or use pta nhi chalega ki ye settings app nhi blki kuch or hai. Agar ap chahte hai ki bhi apne android phone me kisi bhi app ka nam or icon change kr paye to is article poora jarur padhe warna kuch bhi samajh me nhi a payega. Adhiktar log ye hi glti krte hai fir bad me bolte h ki trick kaam nhi kr rhi. Step 1 Sabse pahle aapko apne smartphone me ek Android app install karna hoga jiska naam hai Icon Changer Free . Aap is App ko seedhe play store se Install kar sakte hai. Me aapko niche Link de rha hu aap Download par click karke Apps ko Install Kar sakte hai. Icon Changer Free Step 2 Is app ko open krne ke bad app Icon par click kijiye. Step 3 Ab aapke samne aapke sabhi Apps Show hone lagenge. Unme se aapko jis bhi Android apps ka Naam Aur Icon Change karna hai uspar click kijiye. Step 4 Jaise hi aap kisi App par click krenge to ek new Option aayega usme aapko kuch settings karni hai. Usme Change par click kariye. Or uske baad ek Popup option apki screen pr khulega usme Gallery par click kijiye aur aapke Mobile me se kisi bhi icon ko select karke save kar sakte hai. Step 5 Ab aap wapas Apps me aa jayenge. Aap yaha par dekh sakte hai ki naya icon lag gya hai. Ab aap yaha se Apps ka Naam bhi Change kar sakte hai aap apne se jo bhi nam likhna chahte hai wo likh skhte h. Ab finally OK par click kar dijiye ab kuch seconds me aapka Apps save ho jayega aur aur aapke Home Screen par Show hone lagega. To dosto is traah se aap apne Android Apps ka Naam aur Icon Change kar sakte hai. Ab agr aapko ye jankari acchi lagi ho to apne Dosto ke sath Share kijiye. Aur kisi bhi madad ke liye Niche Comment box me comment kr ske hai. Guest Author Bio I am Nikhil Bansal, I live in jaipur and pursuing B.Tech 1st year. I am the owner of technicalhack.com Agar aapko bhi Guest Post karna hai to uski Jankari yaha hai.

alokatantrik aur tanashahi sarakaron tatha sansthanon ke viruddh sangharsh karate logon ko intaranet ke jarie ek naya hathiyar mil gaya hai. in sarakaron ne jin gopaniy soochanaon aur rahasyon ko bade jatan se chhipakar rakha tha unhen kuchh vebasaiton ke jarie lik kiya ja raha hai. yani karib-karib vahi kam jo khoji patrakar karate rahe hain. lekin khoji patrakaron aur unake sansthanon ka daman apekshakrit aasan hai, soochanaon kee aajadi aur paradarshita men yakeen rakhane vale intaranet yoddhaon ka munh band karana utana saral nahin. aam aadami ke paksh men soochana-yuddh ladti in vebasaiton ko kaun, kahan se sanchalit kar raha hai, unamen gopaniy aankade prakashit karane vale log kaun hain, yah svayan unake alava koee nahin janata. aise men koee trast sarakar unake viruddh koee karravaee kare to kaise?

amerika tak kee sarakar kee nind haram kar di hai. aur sarakaron hi kyon, anek dharmik sangathanon, naukarashahon aur sansthanon ko samajh nahin aa raha ki lohe ke sandookon men barason se dabe unake raj intaranet par kisane fas kar die aur ab ve karen to kya? vikeeliks kee sthapana karane vale ve log hain jo khud sarakari damanachakr aur yatanaon ke shikar ho chuke hain, ya fir is kism ke daman ke dhur-virodhi hain. isilie vishv men kahin bhi hone vali alokatantrik aur manavadhikar-virodhi karravaiyon ke viruddh unake man men gahara aakrosh hai, unase pidit hue logon ke prati sahanubhooti aur judav hai. unaka sidha sa lakshy hai- vishv ko shantipoorn tatha anyay-mukt banane ke lie soochanaon ke hathiyar ka sahasik aur kuchh had tak chalakee bhara istemal.

chini asantushton aur thaee rajanaitik karyakartaon ne shayad hi kalpana kee ho ki do sal ke bhitar unake pas duniya bhar se aae karib 12 lakh sarakari-gairasarakari gopaniy dastavejon ka bhandar hoga. han, unhen is kam men nihit jokhimon ka andaja jaroor tha aur ve yah bhi janate the ki agar unakee vebasait chal nikali to vah sansadon aur adalaton kee bahason ka kendr ban jaegi, vishv kee badi se badi takat bhi gopaniy soochanaon ke mukt prakashan ko bardasht nahin kar sakati. jaldi hi vikeeliks ke khilaf mukadamon kee jhadi lag gaee aur ekadh bar to use intaranet se mita hi diya gaya. lekin doosaron ke sangharshon ko takat deti yah vebasait ab tak hari nahin hai. vah aaghat sahati hai aur fir khadi ho jati hai. vah khud bhi ek jivant vidroh kee misal ban rahi hai.
nagarik adhikar guton kee taraf se machae gae ho-halle ke bad nyayadhish ko apani galati ka ahasas huaa aur unhonne pratibandh ke do saptah bad hi ise fir shuroo kie jane kee anumati de di.

sabase safal aur sabase karagar vebasait hai. isake nam se yah bhram ho sakata hai ki vikeeliks ka intaranet aadharit vishvakosh vikeepidiya se koee sanbandh hoga, lekin aisa nahin hai. vikeepidiya aur is vebasait men nam ke alava sirf ek hi samanata hai ki donon buniyadi roop se ek hi teknoloji vikee ka istemal karati hain. aisi teknoloji ka, jo vishv ke kisi bhi vyakti ko in vebasaiton par soochanaen darj karane ka adhikar deti hain. lekin vikeepidiya par maujood soochanaon ko jahan koee bhi vyakti sanpadit kar sakata hai, vahin vikeeliks ke mamale men aisa nahin hai. is par rakhi samagri poori tarah enakripted koot sanketon men parivartit kar rakhi gaee hai jise sanpadit karana to door, haik karana bhi lagabhag asanbhav hai.
yah jaroori nahin hai. is sandarbh men ve vyaktigat vivek ka havala dete hue kahate hain ki jo dastavej pramanik nahin honge, ve svayan hi pathakon dvara upekshit kar die jaenge.

nirankush sarakaron, damanakari sansthanon aur bhrasht kanpaniyon par is kism ka dabav dalana jaroori hai. jahan anyay aur paradhinata ko kanooni roop de diya gaya ho vahan is tarah kee nagarik avagya vali karravaee kee jaroorat hai. kuchh-kuchh gandhiji vali bhavana lagati hai!

majama jamate the . halanki ab hal badarang hai lekin unakee lakadi kee tal par abhi bhi kuchh chamak bakee hai . ve bhi apane purane rang men badastoor bolane kee mashinagan bane hue hain . yani gali-tala, ve aur unaka majama hamakadam- hamanava taip dikhaee de rahe hain . ve gali ke mod par isalie milate hain ki yahin vo aitihasik thiya hai jahan ve jahira taur par baithakar un- un ko sun-suna aur gariya sakate hain . jinhen ve kaee bar bhopali tahajiba ke karan bakhsha dete the . ab ve jab gali ke mod par takara hi gae to bat jam gaee ki unaka ek intaravyoo hi kar liya jae . kya pata ve kab fir filmon kee or rukh kar len.

tum to bina giyar ke iskootar ho riye ho, voee mane ekadam jhakkas challariya hai . jab se bhopal lauta hoon jindagi men sukoon aariya hai . bodi pe matan ke pilastar chadhariye hain, udar banbe men to bot hi bhannot laif ho ri thi .

tumhare to pilag-pont men garda aariya dikhata hai. banbe men to khopadi shyayali jiro bata sannata ho ri thi . bhan to kanne kat giye the apane, dimag chariya huaa to ravannagi dal li. siti to khan bhopal hai, jannat hai, miyan jannat. voee talaba, voee jheelen, jhan ghusate hi tin roj to birayani kee jagah miyan apan to yahan ki desi hava hi khate rahe .

tum mamoopane kee bat kaun kar rie ho. do lapad lagaunga rakh ke abi naee talim kee charbi rod pe fail ke nali men baith jaegi. tumako jara bitha ke chonch se chonch ka bhidaee. tum to sale serashahar pe bhat-suara chalan lage. dekho pailavan jhan kayade kee bat karana ho to baitho naeen to nikkalalo patali gali se. sale khud se to kuchh ho nahin sakata sera ko kosane chale aariye hain . paile bhi ek khan ne aisaee jurrat kee thi. apan ne rakh ke ek lapad di to sala hiyan paire men gir ke ron laga. bola, soorama bhaee galati ho gaee. hamane bhi kaha abakee ho gaee, so ho gaee, dubara huee to aisi kanapati bajaunga ki m sauth men bodi narth men ghoom jaegi. apane sera kee bejjati pe to apan sale jay-viru ko na bakhshen.
jay-viru kya kar rahe hain aajakala? unakee dosti ka kya huaa? hamen aankhon ke samane shole kee motarasaikil men donon aate sakshat dikhane lage.

aman pathana, tumhari yaddasht ka to kasam se chummi lene ko dil chariya hai. kya bhinnot bat yad dila riye ho miyan, khairiyat se hain donon. vo lanba vala mil gaya tha bhan banbe men viti isateshana para, fir riya tha, hamane bhi lapak kar gireban pe hath dal diya. poochha kaun khan yiha kan tafarih kar rie ho. bola, ganv se viru aa riya hai. hamane bhi rakh ke diya. ka-dhanno ke sath. lanboo bola-naeen soorama bhaee basanti ke sath vaeen ganv men raita hai, kheti karata hai, bich-bich men bhatijon ko dekhane main bhi aata-jata raita hoon. sunake khan apan ne to jay ko bhaeen jhad pila di. ka pathana vo to udhar sait ho gaya, too kyon jhan mar riya hai. bhaeen kyon naeen chala jata. sunakar khan lanboo meri bushshart pakadakar rone laga, bola-jhan budhape men bhi khoob kam mil riya hai, soorama bhaee kaise jaoon.? mainne bhi kai diya, too bhopal aaja bhaeen rahenge, bola-meri to najadikee hai tumhare sera se, tumhari bhabhi bhaeen kee to hain. khoob aaya hoon. kya sera hai, kya log hain, kya tahajib hai, kya jheelen hain, kya kabab hain. vahin bainch pe baitha ke hath nacha-nacha ke lanboo sera ke lie vais ovara karane laga. hamane to use viru kee tren dikhake dudakee mar li. naee to khan shahar ke nam pe itana imosanala ho ke fail riya tha lanboo ki viru ko lene ke bajae doosari tren se hamare sath bhopalaee aa jata. badi mohabbat hai lanboo ke dil men sera ke lie.

abe tum jindagi men kuchh silo chaloge to tab na janoge tahajib ko, urdoo ke shabd rat lie, tahajib-tahajib karane lage. pahale dimag par jhadan firao miyan. ab soorama bhaee nafasat-najakat ka kriya karm karake mujhapar nikalate se dikhe. bole- abe, tahajib koee vilayati food jaisi aisaee-vaisaee chij hai kya ki khaya aur raipara fenka. yihin dil-jigar-fefadon men basi hai tahajib-akhalak-ravayaten. kasam se, kabr men bhi sath jaegi. abakee bar soorama bhaee ke chehare par mujhe dil najar aane laga. ve fir bole tumhari ingalish. chand rupae. rishton ko, bhasha ko bhula denge kya? ab soorama bhaee kee aankhen chhalakane lagin aur mujhe apani bat par afasos sa hone laga. are, isalie nahin ki soorama bhaee imosanala ho rahe hain, balki yoon ki ve ab gyan dene vale the. han-han karane par bhi aur n-n karane par to aur bhi jyada ki shayad main thik se samajh nahin pa raha hoon isalie . samane vale ko ganbhir hota dekh purani bimari kee tarah unakee lidarana pravritti ubharane si lagati thi.

banakababa khao, namakeen chay pio to tumhare bheje kee varjish hogi aur jai aisaee-vaisaee baten bhan se nikalana band hongi. kahakar sooramabhaee fir lapaka lene lage. bole-jan tumhen bata-bata ke halak sukho riya hoon ki ser-sera hai, jafaran jaisa. mahak jati naeen hai, tum ho miyan kee rashan-pani lekar sera par chadhe-daude aarie ho. jinda kaumon kee khushboo se mahakata hai sera . tum to aman kabristan ke chirag horiye ho roshani ke bajae lapalapate hi jariye ho. hamen dekho miyan poori umar sera ke nam khate rahe, bhasha ke nam par roji chalate rahe. man jaisa saira ne sanbhala- bhasha- hunar diya. aaj soorama bhaee ka intaravyoo kar rahe ho khan, kaun soorama bhaee bhi hsti ban gaya hai isalie n. apane log kee duaa se kabiliyat aaee hai. jo log sera men buraiyan dekhate hain . mere kanne ekabar lao to jara sina khol kai dila dikhaega soorama bhaee. naeen to lapada lagakai bheje kee baitari ke vayar tait kar dega.

yoonivarsiti men do varsh sath padhe the. donon men ghanishthata vahin se thi lekin jab donon kee, ek hi daftar men naukari lag gaee to, ham donon ke sanbandh aur pragadh ho gae the. raghu baboo, bade sahayogi prakriti ke aadami the. daftar ka koee bhi aadami, kisi aafat vipatti men fans jae, rog bimari se ghir jae, to raghubaboo, vahan pahale pahunchate the. apana ghar parivar chhod, rat-rat, bimar ke sirahane baithe rahate the. aur kahin, vaisi sthiti mere sath, ya mere patni bachchon ke sath ghat jae, to ve apani patni ko sath lekar mere ghar pahunch jaya karate the aur pati patni, sab kuchh aisa samhal liya karate the jaise koee saga apane ko sanbhalata hai.

ek khasiyat aur bhi thi vah yah ki ve bada haesod aur vinodi tabiyat ke aadami the. unake pas kisse kahaniyon chutakulon aur jumalon ka bahut bada pitara tha. mauka chahe sanjidagi ka ho ya udasi ka ya too too main main ka bich men ve apane jumalon kee aisi futakee fod diya karate the ki, mahaul kee garmi aur kasodh, pal bhar men hi chhoomantar ho jaya karati thi. rote hue ko hansa dena to, raghubaboo kee chutakiyon kee bat thi. nae jumale, ve aanan-fanan men, gadh liya karate the aur use ve, kuchh is andaj men kah dete the, ki use sunakar, hansate hansate logon ke pet men, bal pad jaya karate the. aur maje kee bat to yah thi ki raghubaboo, apani baton se to, logon ko hansa hansa kar lotapot kar diya karate the, lekin kya majal, jo unake chehare par hansi ka, ek chhota sa bhi tukada kahin dikh jae.
