unaka chalana firana kaun kahe, bistare par uthana baithana tak band ho gaya tha. unakee bimari kee khabar, jab mujhe mili to main bhagakar unake ghar pahuncha tha. raghubaboo kee jo hal thi, us samay, use dekh, main buri tarah ghabara gaya tha. raghubaboo, apane bistar par bejan se pade hue the. unaka damakata chehara, ekadam se bujh chuka tha. aankhon men unake, pida mishrit bhishan udasi thi. dadhi unakee kafi badh gaee thi. raghubaboo utan bistare par pade hue the aur unake donon hath, unake sine par bejan se pade hue the. nigahen unakee siling par sthir thin aur ve gahari soch men doobe hue the. patni unakee, unake payatane, bisoorati baithi huee thi. raghubaboo ko us halat men dekh, main thodi der tak to avak khada raha tha, isake bad, apane ko dridh karata, dhire dhire, unake pas pahuncha tha.

apane hathon men lekar, use sahalate hue unase poochha tha, to raghubaboo ne, mujhe koee javab nahin diya tha. javab men, unakee aankhon se jhar jhar jharajhar aansoo jharane lag gae the. raghubaboo kee patni, jo abhi tak, unake payatane bisoorati, udas baithi huee thi mujhe aaya dekh, ve bhi susuk susuk kar rone lag gaee thin. donon ko rota dekh main aur jyada ghabara gaya tha. isaka matalab, ab, raghubaboo ka ant, ekadam najadik aa pahuncha hai aur ve kisi bhi kshan apani ih lila samapt kar, is lok se bida ho lenge. raghubaboo, mujhe hamesha hamesha ke lie, chhod kar chale ja rahe hai, yah bat dimag men aate hi mera dil baithane lag gaya tha. man men aaya tha, ki raghubaboo ko pakad loon jor jor se rokar unase kahoon aap mujhe is tarah akela chhodkar nahin ja sakate bhaee jan, main aapako jane nahin doonga. lekin us samay, mere aisa kuchh karane ka matalab tha, raghubaboo ke marane ke pahale hi, unhen mar dena. main mard hoon aur aise maukon par, mujhe dridh hona hoga. mujhe aisi koee bat nahin karani hai, jisase ki, raghubaboo ke bhitar kee kamajori aur badh jae aur unakee maut unake oopar havi hokar unhen jo do char dinon aur zinda rahana hai, usake pahale hi unhen apane sath le ude. yahi sab soch kar main raghubaboo se lipat kar vilap karane ka apana irada badal diya tha aur dilasa dekar unhen dridh karane kee sochane lag gaya tha. lekin, raghubaboo ko koee dilasa doon, usake pahale, jan to loon, ki aakhir unhen huaa kya hai?

sahalate hue, unase poochha tha to unhonne, apane donon hathon se, aansuon se tar apani aankhen ponchh, apana dahina hath apane sirahane le jakar vahan se ek lifafa nikal mujhe pakada diya tha. lifafe ke bhitar daktar khetan, hriday rog visheshagy ke letar paid par, unaka preskripsan aur sath men do tin janch riport natthi thi. unhen padhakar raghubaboo kee bimari janane kee koshish kiya tha lekin daktar sahab kee likhavat aisi thi ki use padh hi nahin saka tha aur daktari bhasha men likhi janch riport bhi mere palle nahin padi thi. thodi der unhen ulatane palatane ke bad sabhi kagaj vapas lifafe men dalakar mainne raghubaboo se poochha tha, bhaee jan, riport se to meri samajh men kuchh bhi nahin aaya, aakhir huaa kya hai aapako? mere poochhane par, raghubaboo ne jo kuchh mujhe sunaya tha, vah bhi meri samajh men kuchh nahin aaya tha. kyonki, batate samay, raghubaboo ke gale se koee aavaj nahin nikali thi. sirf unake honth hile the aur hothon ke hilane ke sath, kuchh unake sas kee hava bhi nikali hogi lekin vah itani kamajor thi ki mujhe kuchh bhi sunaee hi nahin pada tha.

apana hath le jakar, unhen ishare se samajhaya tha, ki unhonne jo kuchh mujhe bataya hai, mainne use nahin suna. isake bad raghubaboo ne apane donon hathon ke ishare se, mujhe bataya tha ki, unaka dil, jo bade fajali aam ke barabar ka hona chahie tha, vah badhakar, toonbi ke aakar ka ho gaya hai aur vah lagatar badhata hi ja raha hai.

raghubaboo ne apana sir hilakar meri bat par hami bhara tha. abhi char panch din pahale tak, raghubaboo daftar men the, to ve, ekadam svasth aur buland the. isaka matalab us samay unaka dil poori tarah narmal tha aur usaka aakar, bade fajali aam ke barabar ka tha. aur do din, pahale, jab daktar khetan ne usakee janch kiya tha, to us samay tak vah badhakar tunbi kee tarah ho gaya tha. isaka matalab, unaka dil badi teji se badhata ja raha hai, aur jis raftar se vah badh raha hai, to badhate badhate, in do dinon men to vah foolakar gubbara ho chuka hoga. raghubaboo ka dil, jis tarah betahasha badha ja raha tha, usako sochakar hi main, ghabara gaya tha. logon ka dil, badh jata hai, yah bat to main suna tha, lekin, apani paintis sala jindagi men, itani teji se dil ke badhane ka drishtant mere dhyan men nahin tha, isalie main buri tarah ghabara utha tha. jis teji se raghubaboo ka dil badhata ja raha hai is samay tak to vah, itana fool chuka hoga ki ab usakee aur jyada foolane kee kshamata hi khatm ho gaee hogi. raghubaboo, ke badhate dil ke bare men main, jitana sochata ja raha tha, meri ghabarahat utani hi badhati ja rahi thi. raghubaboo ka dil kahin itana to nahin badh gaya hai ki, ab usake badhane ke lie agal bagal koee jagah hi n bach rahi ho. agar kahin aisi sthiti men unaka dil pahunch chuka hoga. tab to vah kisi bhi kshan dagakar raghubaboo kee ih lila hi samapt kar dega.
kahin aisa to nahin ho gaya hai ki, aapake fefade kee hava kee koee nali, sidha aapake dil men khul gaee hai, aur vah lagatar aapake dil ke bhitar hava foonkati ja rahi hai jisake chalate aapaka?

apane sine se apana dahina hath utha, meri bat se, apani sahamati jataya tha. usake bad ve, apane sine ko donon hathon se jor se daba lie the. lekin mujhe, raghubaboo, se aisi koee bat nahin karana chahie, jo unhen, pareshan kar den, yah bat main bhool kaise gaya ki mujhe aise najuk mauke par dridh rahana hai aur unake sath, is tarah kee daravani baten, nahin karana hai. apani galati ka ahasas hote hi mujhe apane par badi koft huee thi.

main raghubaboo ko lekar, unhen dikhane ke lie shahar ke hriday rog ke, namachin daktar, daktar sahana ke yahan gaya tha. daktar sahana ka nam, eshiya ke nami daktaron men, shumar hai. ilaj ke lie, unake pas desh ke kone kone se, marij pahunchate hain. raghubaboo, kee us samay jaisi najuk avastha thi, vaise men, daktar sahana hi aise daktar the, jin par bharosa kiya ja sakata tha. isalie main unhen enbulens par kisi tarah lad fandakar, daktar sahana ke pas le gaya tha.

main daktar sahana ko, daktar khetan kee parchi aur janch riport pakadakar, unhen daktar khetan ne, jo kuchh bataya tha, use bata diya tha. daktar sahana ne jab, daktar khetan kee parchi aur janch riport dekha tha, to unake bhi mathe par bal pad gae the. unhonne raghubaboo, ko, janchakaksh men le jakar, pahale to unakee saghan janch kiya tha. fir, kaiyon tarah kee janch karane ka mashavira likhakar, mujhe pakada diya tha. kushal yah tha ki, jitani tarah kee janch karavane kee, unhonne salah diya tha, sari suvidha, unake klinik men hi maujood thi. isalie mujhe, jyada bhag daud nahin karana pada tha aur sham tak, sari janch riport, hamen mil gayi thi. sham, jab daktar sahana janch riport dekhe the, to unaka chehara khushi se khil utha tha. raghubaboo kee janch riporton men, unake dil ke badhe hone, ya aur bhi kisi tarah kee, dil kee bimari ke sanket nahin the. daktar sahana ne, chahakate hue raghu baboo ko bataya tha ki, mistar raghuraj pratap, aapaka dil poori tarah svasth aur narmal hai. aapake dil men, kisi bhi tarah kee koee bhi bimari nahin hai. aap nishchit hokar ghar jaie aur aaram se apani jindagi bitaie. aapako kuchh bhi nahin huaa hai.

to use sunakar main uchhal pada tha aur raghubaboo se hath milakar, unake gal par ek halaka chapat dekar, mainne da0 sahana ko dhanyavad kaha tha aur raghubaboo ko khinchate hue, unhen klinik ke bahar le aaya tha. lekin jab ham donon, klinik se nikalakar bahar aaye the, to mainne dekha tha ki, raghubaboo ka chehara abhi bhi lataka huaa tha aur ve pahale kee hi tarah udas the.

doosari taraf ghumakar khade ho gae the. raghubaboo kee udasi dekh, mainne anuman lagaya tha ki, ve hafte bhar se jis manasik dabav men the, usase abhi bhi ubar nahin paye hain isalie, is samay unhen chhedna thik nahin hai. main unhen, unake ghar pahunchakar, vahin se daftar men fon karake logon ko bata diya tha ki, raghubaboo ekadam svasth hai. unhen dil kee kisi bhi tarah kee koee bimari nahin hai.

do tin din gujar jane ke bad bhi, jab raghubaboo daftar nahin pahunche the, to ek din sham daftar se nikalakar, main sidha unake ghar pahunch gaya tha. dekha tha, raghubaboo pahale kee hi tarah palang par udas lete hue hai.

aapane meri bat ka koee javab nahin diya? mere dobara poochhane par, raghubaboo poorvavat apana munh dival kee taraf karake lete rahe the jaise ki unhonne, meri bat suna hi n ho. badi khijh huee thi mujhe raghubaboo par. mujhe laga tha, raghubaboo meri bat ka javab n dekar, meri tauhin kar rahe hain. isalie is dafa main unakee banh pakadkar, unhen buri tarah jhakajhor diya tha. raghubaboo aap meri bat sun kyon nahin rahe hain?
sab sun raha hoon, raghubaboo dival kee taraf se apana chehara, meri taraf ghuma lie the aur badi fusafusati aavaj men mujhase kaha tha.
tumane, use, aisa hi kahane ko kah diya hoga. raghubaboo kee bat sunakar mainne apana matha pit liya tha.
aisi bat kah de, to, aadami kisi tarah, apane ko samajha bhi leta hai, lekin raghubaboo jaisa padha likha aur samajhadar aadami aisi behooda bat karane lag jae to aadami use kaise bardasht karega.

satish mere bhaee, tum meri bat par itana khafa mat ho o. daraasal mera dimag is samay, mere kabje men nahin hai isalie mere munh se aisi bat nikal gaee. lekin jo sthiti, is samay meri hai, vah bahut hi kharab hai satish. mujhe jhallaya dekh, badi mushkil se raghubaboo dhire dhire, apane bistar par uthakar baith gaye the aur meri pith par hath fer mujhe samajhane lag gaye the.

aapako daktar sahana par bharosa nahin hai n, to chalie aapako da0 khurana ko dikha lete hain ve bhi hart ke achchhe daktar hai. thik hai n? mainne raghubaboo ko da0 khurana ko dikhane kee salah isalie bhi diya tha ki, agar unake bhitar, do daktaron kee ek doosare ke thik ulat ray se koee bhram paida ho gaya hoga to, unaka vah bhram bhi door ho jayega aur agar ve sachamuch ke bimar hain, to usakee bhi pushti ho jayegi.

pichhale donon daktaron kee janch riport aur parchi nahin dikhaya tha. raghubaboo ko kaisi takalif hai, usi ko, unhen bistar se bataya tha. daktar khurana ne bhi, pahale ke daktaron kee tarah hi, raghubaboo kee saghan janch kiya tha. jitane bhi tarah kee mashini janch kee jaroorat thi, sab karavaya tha aur sari riport dekhane ke bad unhonne bhi raghubaboo, ko ekadam svasth aur nirog hone kee pushti kar diya tha. da0 khurana ke munh se apane svasth hone kee bat sunakar, raghubaboo ke murajhaye chehare par, ek dafa khushi kee lahariyan jaroor uthi thi, lekin ve jis tarah uthi thi usi tarah vahan turant hi gayab bhi ho gaee thi.

poori tarah svasth the. unhen koee bhi rog bimari nahin thi, fir bhi ve daftar nahin aa rahe the. kyon nahin aa rahe the, isake bare men janane kee ab, kisi men koee dilachaspi nahin rah gaee thi. ghar se unake jo samachar milata, vah yah ki, ve abhi bhi pahale kee hi tarah, asakt aur lachar hain isalie daftar nahin ja rahe hain. shuroo shuroo men to log, do char dinon men ekadh dafa, unake ghar men, fon milakar unakee hal chal poochh liya karate the, lekin dhire-dhire unaka vah poochhana bhi band ho gaya tha. raghubaboo ka koee prasang aane par log, chalantoo unake vishay men, jo bhi batiya lete rahe hon, lekin yadi koee unake bare men ganbhir hokar bat karana chahata to log vahan se khisak liya karate the. meri bhi raghubaboo ke bare men ab pahale jaisi n dilachaspi rah gaee thi, aur n hi unase hamadardi hi thi. ulat isake, mujhe unake bare men sochane par, badi khijh hoti thi. sala janaboojh kar badamashi kar raha hai.

jab kafi lanba arasa gujar gaya tha, aur raghubaboo fir bhi daftar nahin aaye the to ek din main raghubaboo ke ghar chala gaya tha unake ghar ka daravaja khatakhataya tha to daravaja raghubaboo ne nahin, balki unakee patni ne khola tha.
vah karan hai hi nahin. jab daktar sahana aur daktar khurana jaise janakar daktar, aapako ekadam thik hone kee garanti de die hai isake bad bhi aap aisi vahiyat kee baten kyon kar rahe hain?

raghubaboo mera dahina hath le jakar apane sine ke baeen taraf jahan pasali aur pet milata hai vahan rakh die the, yah dekho yahan agar sab kuchh thik hota, to yahan ubhara kyon rahata? jara sa hilane dulane par ya chalane par dil kee thaili yahan takarati kaise aa aakar?
aashvast hue the ki sachamuch jahan meri pasaliyan khatm hoti hain vahan usi tarah ka ubhar hai jaisa raghubaboo ke pet par tha.

us samay mujhe aisa nahin lagata tha. mujhe ekadam achchhi tarah khyal hai. yahan koee chij nahin thi lekin ab lagata hai, jaise kisi gubbare men, pani bharakar, lataka diya gaya ho aur thodi si hil dul hote hi, vah pasaliyon par thapar thapar thapathapane lagata hain.

to unhonne yahi kaha tha n ki yah aapake dimag men jo keeda ghus gaya hai vahi vahan jakar thapar thapar thapathapata hai, dil nahin. dil aapaka ekadam narmal hai jis saij ka hona chahie usi saij ka hai aur ekadam svasth hai. bhaee jan jab daktar ne itana kah diya hai to fir aapako kis bat ka dar hai. agar vah thapathapata hai to thapathapane dijie sale ko.

ab yah nautankee band bhi karie. main raghubaboo kee betukee bat sunakar buri tarah jhunjhala utha tha aur vahan se, pov patakata, apane ghar aa gaya tha, aur soch liya tha ki ab main kabhi bhi unake ke pas nahin jaoonga. lekin raghubaboo ko to main kharij kar sakata tha lekin unakee patni aur bachchon ko kis ghoore par fenkata. fenka bhi nahin ja sakata tha unhen, aur n hi unase bacha ja sakata tha. patni unakee akasar hi mere ghar pahunch jaya karati thi, bhaee sahab ab aap hi bataie main kya karoon kahan jaoon? ojha guniya ko bhi dikha liya, koee kahata hai bhoot hai koee kahata hai baram hain

do ek than gahana jevar jo tha, use bhi bech diya. kitani manataen man liya, kahan kahan nahin gaee main, raghubaboo, kee patni kee vyatha sunakar raghubaboo par krodh se man bhar uthata. kitana behooda aadami hai yah? jite ji bachchon ko anath banakar rakh diya hai. patni ko bhoonj bhoonjakar mar raha hai. lekin mere krodh karane se koee labh to nahin tha. kisi ne sujhav diya raghubaboo ko manochikitsak ko dikhaie. use bhi dikhaya do tin mahine lagatar ham logon ne unhen manasik chikitsak ko dikhaya fir bhi koee farak nahin pada raghubaboo par.

raghubaboo ko, manochikitsak ko dikhakar, ham log ghar aa rahe the to, dekha, daktar khetan, jinhonne raghubaboo ko bataya tha ki unaka dil badh gaya hai apani kar men chale aa rahe hain. unhen hath dekar rookane ka ishara kiya tha to ve apani kar rok die the. daktar sahab, ek minat ke lie aap bahar aaie plij. mere nivedan karane par daktar sahab apani kar se bahar nikalakar mere pas aakar khade ho gae the.

khile hue vyakti rahe honge. inaka chehara, seb jaisa lalachhaunha aur khila huaa raha hoga. dadhi nahin rahi hogi inako barabar shev jo kiya karate the. yah aaj se panch chh mahine pahale kee bat hai. in panch-chh mahinon men inhen dekh rahe hain, kya umr hogi inakee?
janate hain kyon? vah isalie ki, aapane ise bata diya tha ki isaka dil badh gaya hai. yah dekhie aap apani janch riport jhole se janch riport nikal main daktar khetan ke hath men thama diya tha.
janch riport par najaren daudakar, daktar khetan ne kaha tha. agar badhe hue dil ke marij ko, mainne bata diya ki usaka dil badha huaa hai to mainne kya galati kiya.
lekin aap is bat par itana tark kyon kar rahe hain? aap logon ko to khush hona chahie ki inhen kuchh nahin huaa hai.
itana sab sunane ke bad raghubaboo badal gae honge. chaitany ho uthe honge, lekin raghubaboo pahale kee tarah hi udas, mayoos aur bimar baithe hue the rikshe men.

daktar khetan kee. sale janate sunate kuchh nahin, sirf apani jamane ke lie aur marijon se paisa ainthane ke lie, use aatankit kar dete hai. aisa karie bhaee jan ham log riksha yahin chhod dete hain chalie ghar paidal hi chalate hain.
bade joron se dhadfadane lag gaya hai. raghubaboo ne apana dil apane donon hathon se kuchh is tarah tham liya tha jaise jis paip se vah baedha huaa hai usase khulakar girane hi vala ho.

raghubaboo ka hath pakad, unhen niche utarane laga tha to, raghubaboo rikshe kee chhad is kadar pakadkar baith gae the ki, jaise vahi chhad, unhen unake dil ke fatane se aur unhen marane se bacha sakata hai. unaka chehara us samay bada dayaniy ho utha tha, itana dayaniy, ki use dekh un par mujhe daya aaee. gussa bhi aaya. jao sale maro. jab tumane marane kee hi than liya hai to main kya kar sakata hoon aur mainne raghubaboo ko unake ghar pahunchakar, fir kabhi, unakee taraf n takane kee kasam kha, apane ghar chala aaya tha.

kuchh kar bhi nahin sakati thi. ghar men jhadoo ponchha ka kam karen ve man hi nahin gavahi deta tha, ki unhen aisi salah doon. aur apane men itani samarthy nahin thi ki, raghubaboo ke parivar ka poora kharch vahan karoon. dost yar log pahale hi se kinara kas lie the raghubaboo se. vaise bhi vipatti men pade aadami se apani parachhaee tak sath chhod deti hai to, yar to badi door kee bat hai. ve to shuroo se hi katarane lage the. lekin, us sthiti men jab, raghubaboo khud hi badamashi kar rahe hon, to unhen to chhodkar hat lene ka sabako bada thos karan mil gaya tha. jab kabhi main raghubaboo kee madad karane ka unase nivedan karata to ve apana hath utha khada ho jate. bhaee sahab doosari kisi bat ke lie kahiega to apani samarthy bhar jitana ban padega kar doonga, lekin raghubaboo ke lie main paee bhi dene vala nahin hoon maf keejiega.

din b din ganbhir hoti ja rahi thi aur hote hote ek samay aisa aaya tha ki vah mere lie asadhy ho uthi thi. mera bhi dhairy mera sath chhod diya tha. thik hai is sale ko marana hai to mar jae, lataka kar kyon rakha hai. isake mar jane ke bad, kanpani men isakee bibi ko, chhoti moti naukari to milegi. roj roj kee jalan se vah bechari mukt to ho sakegi aur mere bhi ji kee roj roj kee kichahin chhoot jaegi.

unaka apane sine par ladakar baith jana asahy ho utha tha aur main, raghubaboo jitana jaldi mar jaen, isakee kamana karane lag gaya tha. lekin meri kamana karane se agar raghubaboo mar jate to ve kabhi ke mar chuke hote. raghubaboo to jaise amar ka chaval chabakar baithe hue the aur ve marane ka nam hi nahin le rahe the.

un logon se, buri tarah aajij aa gaya tha to ek din mere dimag me raghubaboo ko khud hi marakar roj roj kee jillaton se, chhutakara pa lene ka rasta sujhaee pad gaya tha. lekin raghubaboo ko mar dena itana aasan kam nahin tha. sabase badi mushkil isamen jo thi vah yah ki, aisa kar sakane kee mujhamen himmat hi nahin thi. agar is kam ke lie main apane ko kisi tarah taiyar bhi kar loon to isame doosari sabase badi badha unakee patni thi. unakee patni ko vishvas men lie bagair main raghubaboo ko nahin mar sakata tha. kyonki hatya jaisa kam mujhe is barikee aur chalakee se karana padega ki raghubaboo kee hatya bhi ho jae, aur kisi ko mujh par shak bhi n ho. lekin aisa ho sakana ekadam asanbhav si bat thi. kyonki raghubaboo kee patni hi isamen sabase badi badha thi. ve hamesha raghubaboo ke pas ghar men maujood rahati thin. isalie mujhe n sirf, unhen vishvas men lene kee balki unake sahayog kee bhi jaroorat thi. raghubaboo kee hatya se lekar usake bad tak bina unake sahayog ke yah kam sanbhav nahin tha. lekin kya raghubaboo kee patni mera sahayog karane ko taiyar hogi? nahin hogi. koee bhi aurat kabhi yah nahin chahegi ki usaka pati mar jae. raghubaboo kee patni meri bat manegi ya nahin manegi yah to bad kee bat thi sabase pahale to mujhe unase apani mansha jahir karana hoga. thodi der ke lie man loon ki main apani mansha unase ghuma fira kar jahir bhi kar doon aur meri mansha ka kahi ve yah matalab nikal baithi ki mere prati is sakhs ke irade nek nahin hai, yah mere pati ko mar kar mujhe apani rakhail banana chahata hai to aisi sthiti men main to kahi ka nahin rahoonga. aisa hone par n sirf, abhi tak mera sara kiya dhara mitti men mil jaega balki main kisi ke samane apana munh tak dikhane layak nahin rah jaoonga. aur agar kahin raghubaboo kee patni mere khilaf uth khadi huee aur yah bat unhonne logon ko bata diya, aur log is bat ko tool de die to n main sirf apane bibi bachchon se aur apani naukari se hath dho baithoonga balki mujhe jel fansi hone kee naubat tak aa sakati hai.
man bap hain ghar parivar hain, ab mujh se nahin hota. jab main, is samasya se ekadam se aajij aa gaya tha to ek din main raghubaboo kee patni se kah hi diya tha.

yahan koee bhi dhanna seth nahin hai. agar yahi bat mere oopar padti to main to pahale din hi hath jod leti. main to dhany kahati hoon aapakee patni ko, jo aaj tak unhonne ek shabd bhi nahin kaha. aapane ek de diya tab bhi nahin hajar de diya tab bhi nahin lekin bhaiya yah roj roj kee kaurahi mujhase bhi bardasht nahin ho rahi hai.

ki raghubaboo ko aaj nahin to kal to marana hi hai abhi inako kuchh nahin huaa hai, sahi hain, lekin jis tarah unhonne hona hona dhar liya hai, vah ek din ho hi jaega. aur agar nahin bhi huaa to bhi, unakee is samay jo dasha hai vah us hone se bhi badatar hai.

usamen raghubaboo ya to turant mar jaenge ya fir ekadam se thik hi ho jaenge. agar raghubaboo mar gae, aur is bat ko lekar koee bakheda khada ho gaya to, vaise mujhe ummid nahin hai ki inake mar jane se koee bakheda khada hoga kyonki kisi ko inase matalab hi nahin hai aur jinako inase matalab hai sab yahi chahate hain ki jab inhen marana hi hai to jaldi mar jaen to hi achchha, yah roj roj kee tanta to mitegi.

dopahar daftar se nikal kar raghubaboo ke ghar pahunch gaya tha. ghar men us samay raghubaboo kee patni thi aur raghubaboo the. bachche unake mohalle ke aavara bachchon ke sath kanche khelane me mast rahe honge.
bat aisi hai ki, aapako kuchh bhi nahin huaa hai. mainne aage badhakar unaka hath pakad unhen jor se jhakajhor diya tha
main apani paint kee jeb men rakha rivalvar nikal, raghubaboo ke samane usamen goliyan bharane lag gaya tha.
goliyan bharakar rivalvar raghubaboo kee taraf tan main khada ho gaya tha, aapaka dil badh gaya hai n?

jab aapako marana hi hai to main aaj hi aapako mar deta hoon yah roj roj ke narak se to chhutakara mil jaega? aap mar jaenge to aapakee patni ko naukari mil jaegi aur usako bhi is narak se mukti mil jaegi.
yah tum kya kah rahe ho? apani taraf, mujhe rivalvar tane badhata dekh raghubaboo bade joron se chichiyae the.

usase is kamare men, kabhi khatiya ke niche ghusate, to kabhi usaka chakkar lagate aur bachao re bacha bacha -a- -a- -a- -a- o re qigohar lagate bhagate rahe the aur main un par rivalvar tane unhen daudata raha tha. jab mainne dekha tha ki raghubaboo bhagate bhagate ekadam past ho gae hai to mainne hava men ek fayar jhonk diya tha. aavaj sunakar patni unakee, jo bahar se ghar band kar di thi, daravaja khol bhitar aaee thin. patni ko dekhate hi raghubaboo jhapat kar usase lift gae the. dekh n, dekh rahi hai n? yah mujhe mar dena chahata hai kahata hai mujhe jo kal marana hai aaj hi mar jaoon to achchha hai.

aapaka mar jana hi achchha hai, raghubaboo kee patni ne raghubaboo ko jor se dhakke de, unakee pakad se apane ko chhuda liya tha. lekin raghubaboo, usase fir lipat gae the aur khud ko bachane ke lie, use mere samane kar die the. main jhapatakar raghubaboo ka hath pakada tha aur rivalvar pakit kee jeb men dal, raghubaboo kee dahini banh, donon hathon se pakad, unhen kamare men gol gol ghumakar daudane laga tha. aap samajhate hain, bhabhi ji ko pakadkar, apani jan bacha lijiega. aaj main, aapako marakar hi dam loonga. agar main aapako ab nahin marata to aap mujhe fansi dilava dijiega. isalie ab aapako jinda chhodna, apane khud ke gale men fansi ka fanda pahanana hai. isake bad main raghubaboo ko bistare par patak kar unake oopar lad gaya tha.
pad gaee thi isaka fayada uthakar raghubaboo apane donon hathon se jor ka dhakka dekar mujhe bistare par gira die the aur mere girate hi badi furti se ve mere oopar lad gae the.

mainne unakee patni ko pukara tha. meri pukar sunakar, unakee patni, jo vahin kahin thi, daudkar pahunch gaee thi. aisa karie bhabhi ji inhen aap pakadie, mujhe sirf rivalvar nikalane ka mauka chahie, main inaka kam abhi tamam kie deta hoon kar doon n bhabhi ji?
to aap donon pati patni ek ho jaiega aur main jel kee chakkee pisoonga, isalie main aapako bhi inake sath sula doon tabhi achchha hai.

he bhaiya main aapake hath jodti hoon panv pakadti hoon mere bachche anath ho jaenge bhaiya. are maradood too aise hi pila rahega in par ya inase binati aradas karake apani jan bachaega? too kya samajhata hai inhen hara dega? raghubaboo kee patni, dant kitakitati, raghubaboo kee deh pakad joron se unhen jhakajhora tha apane to muaa marega hi bachchon ko bhi anath karavaega.

han us din ke natak ka ek asar yah huaa tha ki ab ve bina kisi naga ke daftar aate hain, sara din apani sit par baithe chupachap apana kam karate hain aur samay hone par ghar chale jate hain. ab ve n kisi se bolate hai n hansate hain aur n hi pahale kee tarah kisi se thaththa aur hansi majak hi karate hain.

Jab Aapka laptop ya PC nya rhta hai tb wo bahut acche tarike se khoob badhiya speed se kaam krta hai. Lekin jaise jaise aapka system purana hota jata hai uski speed km hoti jati hai. Fir aapko compter par kaam krne me problem hone lgti hai. Kabhi kabhi toh itna gussa aata hai ki aap apna system todne ko bhi soch lete hai. Ya fir apne computer ko format karne lgte hai jisse aapka C drive ke data delete ho jate hai. Format karne ke aalawa bhi bhut se tarike hai jinki madad se Computer ki Speed ko badaya ja sakta hai. Computer ki Speed kam hone ke bhut se karan ho sakte hai, or ham apni taraf se badiya setting or rakh rakhab se computer ki speed ko bada sakte hai 300 tak. Computer ki Speed Badane ke kuch Tips hai jo ham janege. Ye Bhi Jarur Pade Computer ki RAM kaise Badhaye 16GB Tak HDD ki Madad Se Haa dosto sbse phle toh aap koi bhi file delete krne ke baad usko recycle bin me naa chhode. Agar important nahi hai toh usko Recycle bin se bhi delete kar de. Kyuki Recycle bin me koi bhi hoti hai toh usse speed kam ho jati hai kyuki wo C drive me hi store hota hai. Waise agar aap kisi file ko ShiftDelete ke sath delete karte hai toh wah file Recycle bin me nhi jata hai. Kabhi kabhi jab hum system par start up program adhik install kr lete hai toh isse hmare system par bahut jyada asar padta hai. Start up programs we hai jo computer ke on hote hi Automatically run ho jate hai jaise screen news feed, Anolog Clock, Bit Torrent, IDM, Skype ,Google Talk, Weather Widget etc. Agar inn sb programs ki jarurat na ho toh aap uninstall kar dijiye. Ya fir task manager se isko start up disable kar skte hai. Yaa fir aap run commond me msconfig type karke enter kre. iske baad aapko start up tab open hoga jaha se aap bekar ke program ko list se hta skte hai. Step 1 Sbse phle Task Manager open kar lijiye. Tip CtrlAltDelete Button daba kar Task Manager open kar sakte hai. Step 2 Task Manager me aapko startup ka option milega uspe open kijiye. Step 3 Ab start up me dekhiye jo bhi faltu ke program hai unko right click karke disable kar dijiye. Jaise maine bluestack ko disable kiya hai. Also Read Pendrive Se Shortcut Virus kaise Htaye Koshish yahi kare aapke c drive me fatu ke documents ya files na rhe. Aur bekar ke softwares ko uninstall kar de. Kyuki C drive aapke computer ki sbse important drive hoti hai. Jisme aapke computer ka Operating System OS Software install hota hai . Step 1 Sbse phle control panel me jaye. Step 2 Fir action center par click kare. Step 3 Action Center me aapko View Performance Information ka option milega. Uspar click kar dijiye. Step 4 Uspe click karne ke baad apko Open Disk Cleanup ka option dikhega. Step 5 Open Disk Cleanup par click karte hi ek dialog box open hoga. Usme OK kar dijiye. Step 6 Iske baad processing hogi jisme error files,temp files aur corrupt files ki calculation hoti hai. Step 7 File calculate hone ke baa dab jitni bhi files hai sbpe tick karne ke baad OK kar dijiye. Step 8 Iss tarah se jitni bhi temp files, corrupt files hai sb delete ho jayegi. Agar aap apne computer par jyada game khelte hai toh aap apne graphics driver ko up to date rkhe .Kyuki updated software me bugs fix hote hai .Jisse chhote mote error dur ho jate hai aur yah aapke computer ki speed badhane me madad karta hai. Graphics driver aapke computer par HD quality ke videos chlane me bhi help karta hai. Apne computer me ek se adhik antivirus ko na install kare . Isse aapke computer ke speed par bahut hi bura asar padta hai . Yah aapke system ko 50 slow kar deta hai . Agar aapke PC me windows 8 ya usse upar ka version pada hai toh aap apne pc me koi antivirus mat install kijiye. Aap apne Windows Defender software ko hi Update karte rhiye . Uska update notification apko milta rhta hai. Apne system se Temporary files aur corrupted files ko time to time delete karte rhe . Aap inn files ko delete krne ke liye Run window se temp type karke enter krke open kar skte hai aur wha se saari files ko delete kar skte hai .Isse aapke computer ki speed increase hoti hai . Step 1 Run Command me TEMP likhiye aur enter kijiye. Step 2 Fir Temporary files ka folder open ho jayega. Step 3 Ab us folder me jitne bhi files hai sabhi ko select kar lijiye aur delete kar dijiye. Step 4 Iss steps ko week me 2-3 baar krne se aapka system hmesha ache se chlta rhega. Time badhne ke sath sath aapke system ka hardware bhi purana hone lgta hai. Jaise Ram ki capacity, Graphic card, Cables etc. Inn sab chizo ko samay samay par dekhte rhe aur jarurat ke hisab se change krwate rhe. Aapke computer ki speed maintain rhegi. Computer ke main screen par aap jarurat icon ke alawa koi aur data ya file mat rkhe . Desktop screen par jitni hi file save rhegi aapke computer ko utni hi slow rkhegi. Kyuki Desktop par saved par file aapke c drive me hi jati hai. Jisse RAM jyada consume hoti hai aur aapka PC slow work karta hai. Also Read Computer ki Fast Screen Shot kaise le uski jankari Agar aap apne PC ke liye koi Anti-virus use karna chahte hai toh free ka anti-virus ya hack kiya hua Anti-Virus kbhi bhi use mat kre . Iss tarah ka anti-virus nahi hota balki wo ek tarah ka virus hi hai . Isliye aap hmesha registered aur Kharida hua hi Antivirus istemaal kare . Jaise - Kaspersky , 360 Security , Quick Heal Etc. Ye Bhi Pade

kyonki aadhunik vetal apane vanshajon kee tulana men khasa edavansa ho gaya hai. use jangal se jyada north-sauth blok kee lootiyansanuma attalikaen pasand hai. aisi kisi bhi imarat kee chhat se chhipakali kee paranpara men chipakakar gopaniy halanki in imaraton men gopaniy jaisa kuchh hota hi nahin kism kee baton ko sunane ka use bada shagal ho gaya h. isakee sakriyata bajat mah men kuchh adhik hi badh jati hai, isalie vikram kee mushkilen badh gaee h. daftaron se use ghrina hai, lekin vetal ka priy sthan yahi hai. vikram mantralay ke bahar kee chhoti thadiyon aur dukanon par vetal ko khojata ghoom raha h. vetal kabhi-kabhi tafariha ke lie kisi thadi par chuskee lene jaroor pahunchata hai. usakee isi aadat ko dhyan men rakhakar vikram khoji abhiyan chala raha hai. hamesha kee tarah abhiyan safal raha aur vah vetal ko kandhe par ladakar galiyaron men nikal pada. kandhe par chadhate hi vetal ne attahas lagaya. ise sunakar purane jamane men log darate the, abhi bachche bhi hansate hain. vetal bhi is tathy se vakif hai, lekin purane rog kee tarah usakee yah aadat jati nahin.

lekin asafal rahane par use aid laga-laga kar tej chalane laga. bat us aitihasik mod par pahunch gaee, jahan vetal use purani ghisi-piti kahani sunane vala tha, lekin vikram ne is bar aankadon ke paiband lage kisse kee bajay thos kahani kee dimand rakh di. thos kahani sunana vetal kee aadat nahin. shuroo se vah tota-maina taip kee kahani ka mastar raha hai. is bar vivash ho vo ek sachchi-muchchi kee kahani sunane par utaroo ho gaya.

ek rajy ke karamantree ke pas anokha chashma tha, jise aankhon par chadhate hi apane-parae ka kuchh adhik hi bhed najar aane lagata tha. chashme ka lefta glas use satta kee majabooriyan dikhata tha, vahin raita glas praja ko pralobhan dene ke aaidie. left glas kaee bar chashme se alag hote-hote bacha, lekin rait glas se dikhane vale pralobhan har bar bat bana dete the. isalie milakar dekhane ka daur chalata raha. ek bar raja ke nirvachan varsh men usane praja ko apane raja ke paksh men khada karane ke lie lagan ke vitaran men keval rait vijana ka hi istemal kiya. bata vikram usane aisa kyon kiya? ab vikram bola- sun vetal! satta hasil karane ke lie vota aur saporta donon kee darakar hoti hai. visheshakar jab kaee davedar hon. aise men us mantree ne jatil paristhitiyon men vot ko variyata di. vetal ne fir attahas lagaya, bola- vikram too hamesha se hai to bada samajhadara, lekin mauke par chooka kar jata hai. toone man ka bhed khola aur main chala. dekhane ki vota jita ki saporta.

madras ho ya rajasthan ya madhyapradesh sabhi jagah yah tyauhar badi dhoomadham aur pavitrata ke sath manaya jata hai. bangal men to yah tyauhar shakti ka pratik mana jata hai. raksha bandhan pramukh roop se bhaee bahan ke atoot rishton aur vishvas ka pavan tyauhar hai. bahan dvara bhaee kee kalaee men bandha gaya raksha kavacha jahan bhaee kee suraksha karata hai vahin unhen bahan kee raksha ke vachan ko smaran karata hai aur is atoot bandhan ko aakhiri kshan tak nibhane ka prayas karata hai. bahanon kee khatir bhaee apane pran tak dene ko tatpar rahata hai. kahana n hoga ki dhage ke bandhan se bhaee bahan ka pyar bandha hota hai, aatma bandhi hoti hain. is tyauhar men rakhi bandhane kee paranpara hoti hai. bahan apane bhaee ko, brahman apane yajaman ko aur prachin kal men rishigan rajaon ko raksha sootr bandhate the jo vyakti vishesh ke prati shubhakamanaon ka pratik hai.

isase balak kee suraksha hogi. tab tak raksha sootr kitane logon ko sarp banakar das chuka tha. balak bharat sher, chita aur any janavaron ke sath khela karata tha. shrap se mukti pakar raja dushyant shakuntala ko khojate kanv rishi ke aashram men pahunche. vahan is adbhut balak ko dekhakar aashchary chakit ho uthe. unhonne dekha ki usake hoth se raksha kavach gir gaya hai. raja use uthakar usake hath men punah bandh diya. rishi kanyaon ne is drishy ko dekhakar yah jan liya ki yahi bharat ke pita raja dushyant hain. is raksha sootr ne bichhade pati patni aur bachche ko mila diya.

kukarm par satkarm aur kashton ke upar sajjanon ka vijay hasil karane ke prayason ka aaranbh ho jata hai. aisa bhi mana jata hai ki lanka par chadhaee karane ke lie shreeramachandr ji ne isi din ko chuna tha isase unhen lanka par vijay mili. yahi karan hai ki log is din varoon dev kee pooja karate hain aur shubh kary kee shuroovat karate hain. dakshin bharat men is din n keval hindoo varan musalaman, sikkh aur eesaee sabhi samudr tat par nariyal aur pushp chadhate hain. isake pichhe manyata hai ki nariyal men tin aankhen hoti hain jo bhagavan shiv ke pratik hain.

sati hoti thi. unhen apane sat par atoot vishvas tha. unhen unaka sat hi shakti pradan karata tha. jab raje-rajavade huaa karata tha tab ladaee men jane ke poorv raniyan raja kee aarati utarakar unhen dhal aur talavar saunpakar unake mastak men tilak lagakar unake dahine hath men raksha sootr bandhakar unake vijay kee kamana karati thi. rannakshetr men jane ke pahale vah apane pati se kahati thi-mere satitv ka pratik yah raksha sootr aapakee raksha hi nahin karegi varan aapako shakti bhi pradan karegi aur aapakee vijay hogi.

sat hi unaka dharm tha, pati unake lie devatuly tha. yahi unaka sanbal tha isalie vah sabala thi. unhen kisi ke sanrakshan kee aavashyakata nahin thi. apane dharm aur satitv se shaktimay sabala apane devatuly pati kee raksha bhi karati thi. bharatiy sanskriti men aise kaee udaharan mil jayenge jahan pati kee raksha prativrata nari ke satitv se huee hai. tab nariyan poojaniya huaa karati thi. sulochana, anusooiya aur sulakshana ka satitv aur satvik oj samaj ke lie raksha kavach ka kam karata tha. tab nari prabala thi. vidya, buddhi, gyan, tap aur pavitrata aadi har drishti se unaka vyaktitv sabal tha. vah raksha ke lie kisi se yachana nahin karati thi apitu raksha ka varadan deti thi.

manobhavon men badalav aaya. videshi aakramann, satta parivartan aur daman chakr men nari pisati chali gayi aur vah poojaniya se bhogya rah gayi. nariyon ka satvik oj samapt hota gaya. sabala nari aaj abala ho gayi aur pratikool paristhitiyan aakhir unhen kamajor bana diya. puroosh pradhan samaj men nari ekadam asurakshit ho gayi aur unakee suraksha ka bhar pita, bhaee aur pati upar aa gaya. pati kee raksha ke lie unakee kalaee men raksha kavach bandhane vali nari aaj svayan kee raksha ke lie bhaiyon kee kalaee par rakhi bandhati hain.

vivah aur raksha bandhan pramukh hai. puratan kal se vrikshon ko raksha sootr bandhane kee paranpara hai. baragad ke vriksh ko striyan dhaga lapetakar roli, akshat, chandan, dhoop aur dip dikhakar pooja kar apane pati ke dirghayu hone kee kamana karati hai. aanvale ke ped par dhaga lapetane ke pichhe manyata hai ki isase unaka parivar dhan dhany se paripoorn hoga.

unakee sanskritik virasat alag-alag hain. unakee bhashaon men pae jane vale shabd bhi saman nahin hain. fir bhi yoorop ke ek desh ka nivasi agar doosare desh men jata hai to bhasha se usaka aparichay, aatmiyata men badhak nahin banata.

bason, sadakon aadi ke nam pahachan leta hai aur thoda prayas karane par bhasha ka bhi kamachalaoo gyan hasil kar leta hai. isake viparit hamare ek rajy ka nivasi matr lipi ke bhed ke karan doosare rajy men ajanabi aur paraya ban jata hai. udaharan ke lie bengaloor men ramanagar ke samane khada vyakti yah nahin jan pata ki vah ramanagar ke samane khada hai. jabaki ramanagar shabd usaka parichit hai keval lipi ke karan vah paraya ho gaya hai.
isake itihas kee khoj kee. vibhinn lipiyon ka tulanatmak adhyayan kiya. isake natijon ne unhen sukhad aash chary se bhar diya. unhonne paya ki
jaise hindi, sanskrit, nepali, marathi aadi bhashaen devanagari lipi men likhi jati hain aur asamiya aur bangala bangala lipi men aur urdoo aur kashmiri arabi lipi men likhi jati hain.

aachary kishori das vajapeyi ne apani vikhyat pustak hindi shabdanushasan men sabit kiya hai ki bharat kee aadhunik bhashaen sanskrit se paida nahin hueen balki isake sath hi bole jane vali kaee doosari bhashaon se vikasit huee hain. lekin agar hamen purane bharat men ek hi bhasha hone ka bhram hota hai to isaka karan vibhinn bhashaon dvara ek hi lipi ka istemal karana hai. aisa bhi nahin hai ki us samay doosari lipiyan nahin thin. parantu us samay ke logon ne desh kee ekata ke lie yah zaroori samajha ki ek hi lipi apanaee jae. aur yah lipi thi- brahmi lipi.
jo hamari aadhunik lipiyan hain. hamare svatantrata sainaniyon ke man men aaya ki agar aaj se 2000 sal pahale is desh kee ek lipi ho sakati thi to aaj kyon nahin ho sakati.

gujarati, telugoo, tamil aadi kee lipi ke roop men devanagari ko apanae jane ke samarthakon sabhi bhashaon kee vibhootiyan shamil thin. jaise gujarati bhashi- mahatma gandhi, marathi bhashi- bal gangadhar tilak, panjabi bhashi- shahid bhagat sinh, bangala bhashi- sharadacharan mitra. par devanagari hi kyon? kyonki devanagari lipi ke ---
gurumukhi aadi lipiyan bhi devanagari se kafi milati hain. atah in bhashaon ko bolane vale log bhi devanagari se aparichit nahin hain.

baboo ramanand chatarji ka patr chaturbhashi jisamen hindi, gujarati, marathi aur bangala ke lekh devanagari lipi men chhapa karate the aazadi ke bad 1953 men hamare pahale rashtr pati do. rajendr prasad ke sanrakshan men devanagar ka punarprakashan aaranbh huaa. isake atirikt gyanapith prakashan aur sahity akademi ne bhi bhinn bhashaon ke sahity ko devanagari men lane ka kam kiya. urdoo ka to sara sahity hi devanagari men chhapata hai. kendriy hindi nideshalay aur rajabhasha vibhag ne bhi aise kaee prayas kie.

jise aap nissankoch apane mitron ko vitarit bhi kar sakate hain. yah sidi soochana praudyogikee men bharatiy bhashaon ke upayog ko badhava dene ke soochana praudyogikee vibhag aur sanchar evan soochana praudyogikee mantralay ke rashtriy prayas ka ek kadam tha. sanchar evan soochana praudyogikee mantree shree dayanidhi maran ke dimag kee upaj yah pariyojana sabhi bharatiy bhashaon ke softaveyar upakaranon ko muft aur mukt upalabdh karane kee hai. jab yah pariyojana poorn hogi to sabhi 22 bharatiy bhashaon men is prakar kee sidiyan jari ho chukee hongi.

jab rashtriy salahakar parishad kee adhyaksha aur bharatiy rashtriy kangres kee adhyaksha shreemati soniya gandhi ne hindi softaveyar upakarann namak sidi ka lokarpan kiya. is avasar par hamare pradhanamantree shree manamohan sinh bhi upasthit the. sanyukt pragatishil gathabandhan ke sajha nyoonatam karyakram ka ek mudda soochana praudyogikee ka vahaniy keemat par prasar karana bhi tha. is sidi par jari apane sandesh men shree dayanidhi maran ne kaha tha mujhe poora vishvas hai ki yadi kanpyootar ke labh aam janata tak pahunchane hon to isaka upayog unakee apani matribhasha men kiya jana anivary hai. isake lie aavashyak font aur bhasha ke softaveyar upakaran logon ko aasani se upalabdh hone chahie. mujhe ummid hai ki hindi bhasha se sanbandhit ye softaveyar upakaran tatha font nihshulk upalabdh hone se aam janata ko bhi kanpyootar ka prayog karane ke nae avasar milenge. aur yah nishchit hi ek nishtha aur samarpan ka mamala hai.

at sanbandhit kunjipatal draivar bhi upalabdh karae gae hain. is taiparaiting tool kee sahayata se deta ka nirman kisi bhi vindoz aadharit anuprayogon arthat vindoz 95, vindoz 98, vindoz 2000, vindoz eksapi men kiya ja sakata hai. yah inskript, taiparaitar aur fonetik tin tarah ke kunjipatal leaaoot upalabdh karata hai.

bahubhashi font vibhinn anuprayogon men tin kunjipatalon dioee, taiparaitar aur egjikyootiv men se kisi ka bhi upayog kar vividh troo taip fonton men hindi men deta taiyar kar sakate hain. maltifont injan kee ek hi jiyooaaee se samuchit injan evan fonton ka chayan is upakaran kee visheshata hai. deta ka nirman kisi bhi vindoj aadharit anuprayog men kiya ja sakata hai, udaharan ke lie emaes aofis 2000 men deta ka nirman karane ke lie vibhinn prakar ke kunjipatalon ka istemal kiya ja sakata hai jaise ki insakript, fonetik tatha taiparaitar jo kisi vishisht softaveyar men upalabdh karae gae hain. deta ka nirman vina98vinaenativina2000vinaeksapi aadi men kiya ja sakata hai.

yahi font vartaman aur bhavishy ka manak hain. isalie yadi aapake pas vindoz 2000 ya vindoz eksapi hai, ya koee any yoonikod samarthak aopareting sistam hai, aur jis anuprayog men aapako kam karana hai, vah yoonikod samarthak hai, to inhin fonton ka istemal karen. inhen instal karane se pahale oopar di gaee vidhi se apane aopareting sistam men hindi ko sakriy kar len. inaka istemal behad aasan aur sarvavyapi hai, intaranet par adhikansh samagri inhin fonton ka istemal karake taiyar kee jati hai. yadi aapane apani vindoz eksapi men hindi ko sakriy nahin kiya huaa hai, aur in font men taiyar koee samagri vaib ya ee-mel se aapako prapt hoti hai to bhi aap use padh paenge, sanrakshit kar paenge aur usaka print bhi le paenge, yani usaka manachaha istemal kar paenge. han, use sanpadit nahin kar paenge. sanpadan karane ke lie aapako keval apani vindoz men hindi ko sakriy bhar karana hai. abhi tak yoonikod men samanyatah ek font upalabdh tha mangal, vindoz eksapi ke sath eriyal yoonikod emaes aaya, ek aadh font aur taiyar kie gae, parantu kul milakar yoonikod men fonton ka abhav tha. is sidi men 160 yoonikod aadharit opanataip font die gae hain. isase yah kami bhi ab door ho gaee hai. soochana-samagri ke nirman tatha pradarshan ke prayojan se in fonton ka vikas sundar roop men kiya gaya hai. font kee glifon ke aakaron kee ekaroopata ke karan font kee pathaniyata kafi adhik ho jati hai. font antarnirmit hain, jisaka tatpary yah hai ki is font ka prayog karake veb par soochana-samagri taiyar kee ja sakati hai aur kisi daunalod ke bina hi braujar men pradarshan ho sakata hai.

aur aap pahale se hi hindi taiping taiparaitar kunjipatal men karate rahe hain ya aap keval angreji men taip karana janate hain aur aapaka kam samagri ka kabhi kabhar thoda bahut sanpadan karana bhar hai, aur aapako inskript kunjipatal men taip karana nahin aata, to ghabaraie mat, aapakee samasyaon ka sath jist-oti taiping tool ko instal karake ho jaega. yah inskript kunjipatal leaaoot ke sath taiparaitar leaaoot aur angreji dhvanyadharit kunjipatal kee suvidha bhi upalabdh karata hai. taiparaitar leaaoot yani mainual taiparaitar vala kunji patal jo kafi sare doosare softaveyaron aur fonton ke sath upalabdh hota hai, ab isakee sahayata se yoonikod ke sath bhi upalabdh ho gaya hai. isake atirikt angreji taiparaitar ke anuroop yani e kunji dabane se a taip ho aur ke kunji dabane se k taip ho, isake lie dhvanyadharit kunjipatal fonetik kee-bord vikasit kiya gaya hai, jist oti taiping tool ko instal karane par is kunjipatal ka istemal bhi kar sakenge.

Most of hindi bloggers sochate hai ki daily post write karane chahiye, jisse traffic badhegi. 10 50-60 , Yeh bilkul sahi hai. But daily post likhane ke chakkar me ham apne old post par dhyan nahi de pate hai. Jo ek time ke bad outdated ho jata hai. Google bhi uski rank down kar deta hai aur traffic automatically down ho jata hai. Shayad Aap iska reason janate hi honge ki Google hamesha Latest Post ko ranking deta hai. Jisse old post ki ranking down ho jata hai. Iske ult, yadi aap regularly old post ko update karte rahe hai to aapke blog ki traffic dugani ho sakti hai Because- 1.Search Engines me index aur click milane se old post ki page authority badhati hai , jo Google ka ek important ranking factor hai. 2.Yadi aapka old post super quality vala hai to use kai natural backlinks mile honge. Jo post me value add karta hai. Isliye aap kuch samay ke liye new post likhna chhodkar old posts update kar de, aapki traffic badh sakti hai. Yaha main aapko two example dena chahunga- 1.Backlinko.com Brien Dean ne is blog ko 2012 me launch kiya tha aur aap jankar hairan rah jayenge ki abtak unhone only 36 post hi likhe hai. Lekin lagbhag unke sabhi post Google ke first page par rank karte hai. Jisse ve daily 1 lakh se jyada traffic pate hai. Backlinko.com Semrush Report 2.Xtremegaminerd.com Yah gaming pc laptop based blog hai. Ise Sarfraz Khan ne February 2015 me banaya tha. In do years me keval 46 posts hi publish kiye hai. But regular old post update karne ke karan Google se achchi traffic pate hai. Jiske karan ve daily Rs 10,000 approx. earn kar lete hai. Xtremegaminerd.com Semrush Report Aise bahut se popular blogger hai jo is method se regularly bahut traffic pate hai. ab apki baari hai, To janiye- Old Post Se Traffic Badhane Ke Tips 1.Update Post Title Aksar aisa hota hai ki Post ko search engines me rank to mil jata hai, lekin achche CTR Rate se traffic nahi mil pata hai . Iska reason hota hai ki post title me use kiye gaye word visitors ko attract nahi kart hai. Isliye post title me 1. Attractive word include kare. 2.Post ko update kiye hai to post title me Updated word include kare. 3. High traffic keyword post title me shamil kare. Ise Keyword Research Tool jaise Semrush se aasani se find kar sakte hai. SEO Optimized Post Title Kaise Likhe 2. Add Latest Information Time ke sath har chij me changes aa jate hai, usi tarah aapne jis topic post likha tha. Usme kafi changes aa jata hai. Jisse aapka post outdated ho jata hai. Jise readers adhura aur outdated samajh kar dusre blog par chale jate hai. Is karan blog ki bounce rate badh jati hai aur traffic down ho jata hai. Isliye us topic se jude naye information ko post me shamil kar update karana chahiye. Iske alava ye tips follow kare- 1. Semrush jaise Keyword Research Tool se high CPC vale keyword find kar aur post me shamil kar, aap post ki adsense CPC badha sakte hai. 2.Post ko new date par publish kare. Note- aapke blog ka permalink domain.compostname jaisa ho to tabhi is tips ko apply karen. 3.Post Title ke niche Last Updated Date show kare. Yadi aap Genesis Theme use karte hai ye tips ko apply karne ke liye Genesis Simple Edit Plugin use kar kar sakte hai. 3.Change Low Quality Image Most of beginner bloggers images ko itna optimize kar dete hai ki image ki quality low ho jati hai. Jo speed aur search engine ke lihaj se achcha hota hai. Par user experience ke lihaj se nahi. Isliye apne old post ke image ko quality image se replace kar den. Yadi aap images aapke blog ko slow kar raha hai to is post ko padhe Ab aap Gravit se low size ki high quality image asani se create kar sakte hai, jo user aur seo friendly hoga. 4. Remove Spam Comment Comment kise pasand nahi, beginner bloggers to comment pane ke liye crazy hote hai. Jiske kar ve spam comment bhi approved kar dete hai. Ye comment automated comment system dvara kiya jata hai, jo SEO friendly nahi hote. Isi tarah one word vale comment bhi blog par koi value add nahi karta hai. Isliye old post update karte time inhen remove kar dena chahiye. Sath hi, aapko koi aisa comment mil jaye, jisko answer dena bhul gaye ho to uska reply bhi de de. Best 13 Proven Tariko Se Traffic Badhayen 5.Share Old Post Yadi aapka blog stories, tutorial, quotes jaise evergreen niche par hai, to aap regularly old post ko social sites par share kar quality traffic pa sakte hai. Aap chahe is work ko automatic kar sakte hai. bas keval aap ko Revive Old Post Plugin install karana hoga. Ye post schedule time ke according Facebook, Twitter jaise social sites par old post ko publish kar deta hai. In Last Word Changes duniya ka rule hai, jiske karan sabhi cheezon me changes aata hai. Isliye duniya ke sath chalane ke liye hame khud me changesfashion, language karne padte hai. Isi tarah Search Engines me blog post ki ranking stable banaye rakhane ke liye latest information ke sath update karana jaruri hai. Hope ye post aapko pasand aaya hoga. Iske bare me jarur bataye aur share kare.

jisase aparadhi lain men rah kar pulis ka hissa daba nahin pate the aur chhatr mastaraji ke lie ghar men bane malapuye lane men kotahi nahin karate the. kuchh lokakathaon men yah mistar indiya kee tarah adrishy hathon men rah kar bhi apana kam karata huaa bataya jata hai.
par jab pota tha tab bhi to sansad bhavan par hamala huaa tha, aksharadham men hamala huaa tha, raghunath mandir men hamala huaa tha.

mohalle-pados men kitane mobail fon the, kitane intaranet kanekshan. jo chizen kuchh hi baras pahale tak bade logon ke visheshadhikar ke durg men surakshit thin, ve aaj sadharan logon tak bhi pahunch rahi hain. ab mobail fon kee numaish ya intaranet kaneksan ka zikr karake koee apane aapako chune hue logon kee shreni men nahin man sakata. ab samaj kanpyootar bhagavan ke apane khas logon aur us bhagavan se vanchit sadharan manushyon ke bich banta huaa nahin rah gaya hai.

utani sasti aur saksham takanika praudyogikee ke itihas men yah lagatar hota aaya hai. lekin keval itana hi hota rahe to ek any prakar ka varg-vibhajan bhi samaj men paida ho jata hai. kuchh log gyan-vigyan ka utpadan karate hain, kuchh log is samoochi prakriya ke hashie par khade ya pade ya to bas upabhog karate rahen ya gyaniyon ka raub khate rahen. apane samaj men aisa vibhajan gyan ke har kshetr men dikhata hai, sirf takanik hi ke kshetr men nahin.

vah mal chahe gahana-kapada jaisa ho chahe film ya siriyal jaisa. isilie prodakt ka vigyapan hindi men hota hai, siriyal hindi men banae jate hain. ek se ek nakachadhe chainal hindi men khud ko lanch karate hain lekin is sab chizon se jude faisale angrezi men lie jate hain. hindi prachar kee bhasha hai --- angrezi faisalon kee.

us par garv bhi karate hain. agyan ke is aatmavish vas ko naee pidhi ke bhi sanskar ka hissa banane ka prayat n ve bade aatmavish vas ke sath karate hain. praudyogikee se vanchit hone ko ve saral hridayata ke praman ke roop men prastut karate hain halanki saral hridayata se unaka sanbandh itana saral hota nahin. sach to yah hai ki dizital vibhajan usi brihattar vibhajan ka ek pahaloo hai, jo gyan par kuchh logon ke ekadhikar ka parinam bhi hai aur karan bhi.

apane aapako svayan sikhaee hai. aisa bahut se log karate hain. ved prakash kee visheshata yah hai ki unhonne kanpyootari ko apani lokatantrik samajik chetana ke sath jod kar apanaya hai. pichhale kaee barason kee lagan aur mehanat se ve svayan to kanpyootari ke ustad ban hi gae hain, is ustadi ko bantana jaise unhonne apana mishan bana rakha hai. is mishan ka prasad bich-bich men mujhe bhi milata rahata hai. bahut hi khushi kee bat hai ki ab ved prakash ne apani janakari aur anubhav ke aadhar par hindi kanpyootari se judi galatafahamiyon aur sankochon ro door karane ka prayat n is chhoti si pustak ke jarie kiya hai.

batiyana zayada lagega. itane saf-suthare dhang se, itane vyavaharik nazarie se ved prakash ne hindi kanpyootari se jude muddon ko samajhaya hai ki bilkul aaranbhik pathak ke lie bhi pustak atyant upayogi ho gaee hai. isi ke sath, ved prakash ne hindi kanpyootari ke vyapak samajik aur saiddhantik pahaluon par dhyan lagatar jamae rakha hai. isilie yah kitab hindi men kanpyootari karana sikhane vali kitab bhar nahin, balki is vishay par lokatantrik dhang se sochane ka nyota dene vali kitab hai.

main bhi hoon. aaj subah ke akhabar men ek film kee vistrit samiksha chhapi hai, padh raha hoon. aap bhi padh len, taki film dekhane ka nirnnay kar saken. main aksar hi logon ko achchhi samikshaen padhavata hoon. taki unake sath film dekhane ka lutf utha sakoon. kya? akhabar jara said men kar loon. aapaka dikh nahin raha, lijie kar diya. ab thik hai.

lekin najuk modon par kahani difarent engal kee mang karati hai. khair, kuchh film purane nirdeshak isamen bhi apani safal filmon kee khoobiyan doharate najar aae. bich v bikani men deshabhakt ke dayalog ke maulik drishy sanyojan kee kalpana film kee vishishtata thi. drishyon men khoe darshak dayalog sun hi nahin pae, jabaki hiro ke abba ke marane ke drishyon men dayalog itane bhari ho gae ki abba darshakon kee hooting se pahale hi unhin ke bojh tale dabakar mar gae. nirdeshak kee klas aaitam sang men ubharakar samane aaee hai, jahan fait ke drishy ke bich hiro doosari manjil se klab ke shishe kee chhat todate hue niche girata hai aur dhool jhadakar aaitam sang men shamil ho jata hai. poore samay usake munh men khoon laga dikhaya gaya hai, jise vo aastin se lagatar ponchhata rahata hai. isi bich dans men vilen ke gurge bhi pahunch jate hain. ve bhi sare vady yantr bajate hue hiro ko gherate hain. thodi der men klab men rakhe hue sare aaitam ek-doosare par fenke jane lagate hain. ladakee aaitam kee tarah khadi hokar tukur-tukur dekhati rahati hai.

kyonki ve gine-chune maulik nirdeshakon men se ek hain. vahin, barf kee vadiyon ke drishy kamal ke hain, itane kamal ke ki pablik ko thand lagane lagati hai. itani barf hai ki sabakuchh jama-jama sa lagata hai. hiro-hiroeen tak ek ped ke ird-gird jame hue se nach rahe hain. aise mausam men jale gora badan haule-haule munh se bhap nikal rahi hai, chehare ke alava poora sharir kapadon ka labada bana ja raha hai. gana jalane-sulagane ka vivaran de raha hai. kantrast ka atyant hi uttam sanyojan bithaya gaya hai. lag shot men filmae gae is drishy men barf hi barf dikhati hai. hiro-hiroeen kahin rengate se dikhaee dete hain. drishy ati uttam hai. barf men hi kahin vilen is gane ke drishyon kee foto khinch raha hai, taki hiroeen ke bap ko dikha sake. usake munh se bhap nikal rahi hai, usake donon gurgenuma doston ke munh se bhi bhap nikal rahi hai. vilen unase kah raha hai is sale ko jinda isi barf men na dafan kiya to kahana, latthe kee tarah chir kar rakh doonga. meri mangetar se aankhen ladata hai. bolate samay drishy men kamal kee editing dikhaee deti hai.

jaise vilen tale hue angare khakar dayalog chhod raha hai. bhap hi bhap, barf hi barf, hol men bhi barf, darshakon ke sine men bhi barf. aadhi film tak to romans ho ya fait sab barfile restorent, khet, pahad, vadiyon men hi chalate dikhae gae hain. ajib jama dene vali film hai, kasam se. aisi sardi se darshakon ke hath poket men hi jam gae to tikat khidakee bhi jam jaegi. fir vitarakon kee sansen bhi jam jaengi. ant men sinema hol kisi barfile registan men badal jaega. halanki nirdeshak kee himmat kee dad deni padegi ki unhonne prayogon ke prati nirantar aagrah rakha hai. isi ke chalate unhonne apani doosari premika ko hiroeen kee bahan aur bhootapoorv premika ko usakee man ke rol men rakha hai. ve aise aagrahon ko lekar behad duragrahi hain. khair, film kee kahani ekadam maulik hai. maulik isalie ki poori film men darshak is maulikata ko bas dhoondhata hi rahata hai. barf men, pani men, charagah men, baganon men yani lagabhag un sabhi jagahon men jahan hiro-hiroeen ka pichha karate hue pahunchata hai. intaraval ke bad kahani men tvist aata hai, jab baikagraund ekadam registani ho jata hai. darshak yahan kisi nae tvist kee ummid karata hai, lekin paranpara ka aagrah yahan bhi rang dikhata hai. barf vale sikvens garm retile registanon men dikhaee dene lagate hain. dayalogon men bhaugolik klaimet parivartan kee ichchhaen dikhane ke vashibhoot aag ugalane, jalane-sulagane ke sthan par do goli tere sine men utarakar apane bap ka kaleja thanda karoonga, numa ho jate hain. baikagraund chenj ke karan ko janane kee utsukata men baitha darshak kafi der bad jan pata hai ki pahale vala hiroeen ka ganv tha, ab vala hiro ka ganv hai.

pravritti ke nahin the, ve karan men fanse rahane ke karan aage kee film men dhyan nahin laga pa rahe the. klaimaiks men hiro hiroeen ke kabile vale bandooken lekar aamane-samane aa jate hain, jise donon bich men khade rahakar talane ka prayas karate hain, lekin golabari shuroo hone par bhag jate hain, lashen girati rahati hain, hiro-hiroeen bhagate rahate hain. drishy parivartan hota hai, abakee bar donon keral men ek nav men dooet ga rahe hain. nav door jati dikh rahi hai, film khatm ho jati hai. kuchh sadama khae darshak abhi pikchar bakee hai, kuchh aur aaega ke intajar men baithe rahate hain. hol vale aakar hi unhen uthate hain, ghar ke lie ravana karate hain. ekting ke nam par poori film men tay karana kafi mushkil raha hai ki kisane achchha kam kiya hai. sabane itani tanmayata se achchha karane ka prayas kiya hai ki charon or ghatiya-ghatiya bikhar gaya hai. darshak kanfyooj ho jate hain ki kisaka prayas sabase achchha raha. hiroeen poore kapadon men rahi, hiro poore samay ganji-pajame men ghoomata raha, jharane se nahane ke charon drishy purushon par hain to kabaddi khelane ke tinon shot mahilaon par filmae gae hain. kabilon ko milane vale nakabaposh ladakee kee man hota hai, jo itana tej ghoda draiv karata hai ki donon kabilon men se koee usaka pichha nahin kar pata. hiroeen poore samay bakariyan charati rahati hai. hiro sigaret-daroo men dhut pada dikhaee deta hai.

taki roj sham ke kote ka jugad kiya ja sake. adhikansh drishyon men janavar baikagraund men maujooda hain. kaee jagah to lagata hai ki janavaron kee kami ke karan insan ko hi unakee khal pahanakar baitha diya gaya ho. hiro kee madad karane bhi aksar janavar pahunchate hain. kahane ka matalab hai, janavar film ka sthayi bhav hai. ek billi jo kuchh jyada hi smart thi, ovar ekting kar rahi thi, ko chhodakar bakee janavaron ne thikathak ekting kee hai. ovar ekting ka iljam insanon par hi aaya hai. poori film men vilen ke chharre behad prabhavit karate hain. shayad unhen vastavik jivan se uthakar sidhe yahan khada kar diya gaya tha. gande badhe bal, pile dant, bajoo men daroo kee botal lie ekadam bhole-bhale haramakhor. khair, hiroeen ka rootin ekadam fiks hai, ghar se bakariyan lekar nikalana. isi bich hiro ke sath ekadh gane men thumake laga lena, vapas aate samay vilen kee tippaniyon par usake munh par thook dena aadi-aadi. usake pita bhi poore samay daroo men tunn dikhae gae hain.

beti kee shadi kee chinta karate hain. isi gam men fir pikar tunn ho jate hain. vaise unaka nam bhi tunni saradar hai. daroo poori film men sarvatr upalabdh hai. aisa lagata hai ki daroo ke dariye bah rahe ho. jahan hath dalo, vahan daroo. har kiradar ya to daroo pi raha hai ya jab nahin pi raha hai to pine ke saiting men laga hai. in kamon se nivritt hone ke pashchat thoda bahut samay kabile ke vikas kee yojanaon arthat kis ladakee ka kis parae kabile ke ladake ke sath nain-matakka chal raha hai, aadi ke vistar men dete hain. is dauran paranparaon ke havale, purakhon dvara kee gaee aisi hi kisi galati ka vivarann, jisake karan ab vartaman rishta sanbhav nahin hai, aadi ke vishleshan men lagata hai. is tarah film men sthapit kiya gaya hai ki patr apane kabile ke hitarth ghor samarpit hain.

agan-aag, mausam-thandak-pani-barish, thandi aahen-barf si yaden arthat donon tasir ke shabdon kee bahutayat hai. sangit bhi baikagraund kee majaboori men jheenga.lala.numa kabilaee hain, jo har gane men itana darata hai ki log usakee bhayanakata se khase prabhavit najar aate hain. koriyografar kee tarif karani hogi ki unhonne dans sikvenson men kisi sharif shaffak kabile hi dresen pahanaee hain, oopar se pattiyan jaroor lapet di hain. anyatha to sin kee dimand to bahut hi jalimana thi. darshak ant tak tay nahin kar pata ki vah sangit kee bhayanakata ya dans ke jangalipane men se kisase jyada prabhavit hai. ganon kee bhayanakata se utpann ifaikt ke karan mahila darshak pikchar ka poora maja nahin le pati kyonki chhote bachche isi dauran soo-soo kee sarvadhik jid karate hain. kabile kee dresen itani khoobasoorat hain ki lagata hai ki samast pratibhashali dres dijainaron ka janm inhin kabilon men hi huaa hoga.

dijainar kabila, saji-dhaji ladakiyon ko dekhakar to kaee log aise kabilon men rahane ke bare men ganbhirata se vichar karana shuroo kar dete hain. ovaraaol ek khas test ke darshakon ke lie yah film banaee gaee hai. bakiyon ka to khana kharab hona tay hi hai. film tikat khidakee par jadoo jaga sakati hai basharte jinake lie yah film banaee gaee hai, ve darshak ve aise khane men apana test dhoondhane men kamayab ho jaen.

jisase ve sichueshan haindil kar lete hain, anyatha to bakee shishyon ke kisi aur gyani sanpraday kee or khisakane ka khatara bhi taiyar rahata hai. filahal ve munbaee ke skaee jon men kuchh thithak gae hain, niche mayanagari asankhy laiton kee aagosh men bhautikavad-aishvary ke shirsh par damak rahi hai. shishyon kee or najar dalate hi samajh gae gyan dene ka adbhut avasar. moodh shishyon ko gyan varsha se sarabor kar snatak hi bana dena chahie.

hamare siddhanton ka bhautik satyapan, is nagari kee or dekho, vilas men doobi nagari kee or chakshu le jao. bolane ko to unhonne bol diya. bhitar hi bhitar kanp gae. bhautik satyapan aisa jatil, shabd is aanglabhashi kapati shishy ke samane. abhi munh chauda karake transaleshan kee mang n kar baithe.

jaise jivan men sukh bhoge hi n hon, fir guru ganbhir hue, bole- naina band kar lo shishyon, kahin netr kotar lolupata men jamin par hi n gir jaen. fir kaha- yahan rahate hain hamare sanpraday ke dhara par sarvashreshth nivasi, nam hi isaka mayanagari hai. sukh-bhogy hi inaka param dhyey hai shishyon.

ye fafoond bhi na jane kahan se paida ho gaee guruji man hi min khijhe. oopar aankhon men vidvat kee chamak bhari, lekin hraday ke jhanjhavaton ke daur men utani anukool chamak paida nahin ho paee, itane se hi kam chala lenge, unhonne socha. isaka kya karoon. sukh-bhogy yani mera vo prachin sarvakalik siddhantah yavajjivet sukhan jived rinnan kritva ghritan pivet.

prabhu! yah aatma n hoti to ise kab ka sir ke bal samandar men faink deta. kuchh log marane ke bad bhi apani aasuri pravritti ke antargat doosaron ko kasht dena nahin chhodate. ve dhire se budabudae. fir sanyat hokar bole- sun, tekan lonan, parachej karan end go for lang draivah, foraget lonan. fir apani hi is medha par girate-girate bache. yoo no chamatkari taip ke to ve hain hi unhen yad aaya.
dis haipand lang baik in maee kantri, bat no badi going too moksha. shishy jigyasu huaa-huaa ja raha tha.
ab guruji ka dhairy maryada kee simaon se bahar jane laga tha. jivan men sukh hi to sachcha moksh hai. dekh nahin raha kaise ham marane ke bad bhi yahan-vahan dol rahe hain.

sanpraday men aise kachche khiladi ka pravesh. guruji chaunke, is fafoon d kee jaden kitani gahari hain. kisakee sifarish se sanpraday men pravesh pa gaya. kahin bakee shishyon ko bhi baragala n de. shishyon ko is dhoort ke changul se door rakhana hi bhala. anyatha to dusht dukan hi baitha dega.

oke- vi vil diskasan it aoftar sam adar avasarah. guruvar ne usase pind chhudane ke lie apani bachi khuchi miks angreji us par de mari. jise unhonne is aadhunik kal kee yatra ke dauran jagah-jagah se batorakar apani smriti kosh men bhar liya tha.
kaisi lipsa hai, shishyon ka aisa nirlajj aacharan dekh ve lage hathon kisi darshanik sanpraday kee or mudane hi vale the ki ekaek sara rishitv, munitv, gurutv yad ho aaya.

kaho guruji. halanki apane netr anveshan ke dauran aaee is karkash aavaj par unakee ichchha to kahane kee ho rahi thi bako garuji. khair guruji ne kaha- dekho siddhannton ko aage bhi jano yani rin lekar kiya kya jana hai.
rin lo, tatkal hi use sukh-suvidhaon men laga do. makan lo,sukh-suvidhaen ka saman jutao,shadi karo fir sukh se jio. rin ko bhool jao.

diskothe, nait klab, deting. ye kya bala hai. hamare jamane men to ye paya nahin jata tha. fir bole- priy shishyon, jin bhautik upadanon ka abhi tumane jikr kiya tha tanik vistar se unake bare men batalao.
vilasita ka itana anugami. ghor kalayug hi hoga. unhonne trikal drishti kee mudra men jakar is babat failen tatolin.
shishyon ko sanbhaloon. manushy kee vilasavriti ke aage purane yug ke ye bichare vilasi to nadan balak sadrishy dikh rahe hain. unhen shishyavrind par daya-neh ek sath aa gaya.
bole-- ye mahanubhav to aishvaryayukt dikhate hain? inhonne to hamare siddhanton ko kisi siddh kee bhanti apanaya huaa jan padata hai?

dhan hai upabhog tak nahin kar pa rahe hain? siddhant ulata to nahin hi pad sakata hai. guruvar chintit hue. ye kaisi jamana hai jahan paisa pas men hai upabhog ke tarike nahin soojh rahe hain. hamar jamane men tatkal shadi-byah, madira-davaten,paryatan aadi men jhonka ja sakata tha aur ghee pina to saraplas tha hi.
asankhy gadiyon ka kafila. ye to nishchay hi hamare sanpraday ke gadipati sadrishy dikhaee de rahe hain. guruji kahate-kahate hanfane se lage.
ye anbani bradars men se bade bhrata hain. dhara par sabase amir aadami. inake to ek-ek sekand kee kamaee lakhon men hai.
vah itana kuchh hai tab to nishchit hi vilas men samay dete honge. guruji ne fir bacha-khucha gyan bantana chaha.

shishyon ne dalal strit ka bhaugolik-aitihasik sandarbh batana shuroo kar diya. yahan manushy ek pal men itana prapt kar leta hai ki use rin jaisi tuchchh vastu kee aavashyakata hi nahin padati. lekin shishyon ko guruvar kahin ekatak drishti ghonpe hue mile. shishy kuchh kah pate isase poorv hi guruvar bole- vo drishy dekho-niche marin draiv ke pas vo lanbi si gadi men baitha manashy khidakee se sir nikale ek maile-kuchaile se vyakti se kya yachana si kar raha hai. kuchh vichitr sa pratit nahin ho raha hai shishyon?

ye to rootin hai. vo gadi men baitha vyakti ek praivet baink ka ekjikyootiv hai. jo rin arthat lon dene ke lie bhikhari se vyakti ke aage gidagida raha hai. abhi to han karavane ke lie ye usake pichhe bhagega bhi. shishyon ne aadhunik yug kee aarthikee guruvar ko bayan kee .

nikal lo yahan se kis jamane men apane siddhanton ka anveshan kar rahe hain. kisi aur pavan si sthali kee or gaman karate hain. fir dekha to shishy tas se mas hue bina ek bangale kee or jhankate se mile. guruvar ne bhi aankhon ka rasta falo karate hue nigahen daudaeen to us bangale men ek kamini- kaya aur asankhy logon kee bhid najar aaee . jo uchak-uchak kar use dekh rahi thi. bhrikutiyan oonchi karake shishyon par garamae- shishyon savadhan, marane ke bad bhi aisa ashobhaniy aacharan ek aatma ko shobha nahin deta. bhautikavad ka ghor upabhog karo parantu maya men aise akanth doobana, chhi. chhi.

shree vi. rajaraman aur shree bi. prasad ne kee-bord aur koding skeem vikasit karane par kam kiya. lekin us samay kanpyootaron kee bhari keematon ke chalate yah matr akadamik prakriya tak hi simit raha. aathaven dashak ke madhy men maikroprosesaron ke vikas ke sath kanpyootaron kee keematon men kami aaee, tab inamen se kuchh vichar staind-elon indiyan laingvez tarminal dizain men falibhoot ho pae shree aar.em.ke. sinha v shree arjun raman.

kanapur shree aar.em.ke. sinha ke nimantran par ilektronikee vibhag do. om vikas, bharat sarakar ne kanpyootar aadharit soochana sistamon men bhashaee nihitarth par ek rashtriy parisanvad aayojit kiya. isane is bare men desh men garmagarm bahas chhed di. lekin asali shurooaat tab huee jab bharatiy praudyogikee sansthan, kanapur shree aar.em.ke. sinha aur shree es.ke. malik ne ekeekrit devanagari kanpyootar ke dizain aur vikas ke projekt ko prayojit kiya. ekeekrit devanagari kanpyootar apane 8 mahine ke rikard samay men taiyar ho gaya tatha dilli men aayojit tisare vishv hindi sammelan men isaka pradarshan kiya gaya. ise maltitasking farmaveyar ke sath intel 8086 prosesar ka upayog karake vikasit kiya gaya tha. is praudyogikee ke anukoolan ke lie is projekt ko 32 bit ke motarola nan. 68000 ke prosesar par vistar diya gaya, jisaka parinam thi jist praudyogikee. jist praudyogikee mohan tanbe ke athak prayason ka parinam thi. jist ka matalaba grafiks end intailijens besd skript taik noloji. is praudyogikee ko kaee kanpaniyon ne kharida. jab is projekt par kary karane vale shodh injiniyar mohan tanbe sentar for devalapament aof edavansd kanpyooting si-dek gaya to si-dek ne jist praudyogikee ko apana liya. jist praudyogikee ne bharatiy bhashaon kee mashin-bhashaee intarafes kee jatil samasya ko sulajha liya.
yani ki n keval bharatiy lipiyon jaise asamiya, udiya, tamil, telugoo, devanagari, ke lie balki tibbati, thaee aur sinhali bhashaon ke lie bhi yah kod saman hai.

chahe unaka likhane ka tarika alag hi kyon n ho. isase ham chahen kisi bhi lipi men taip kyon n kar rahe hon, un aksharon ke likhane ke tarikon men chahe kitana hi antar kyon n ho, unhen taip karane ka tarika ek hi rahega.

man lijie, 184 ke sthan par, jise iskee kod men k ke lie niyat kiya huaa hai, yadi ek softaveyar nirmata ne g rakh de aur doosara softaveyar nirmata ne isi sthan par ch rakh de to kya hoga. pahale nirmata ke softaveyar men taiyar dastavez men jahan-jahan g taip kiya huaa hai, doosare softaveyar men kholane par vahin-vahin ch dikhaee padega. aur manak iskee kod ka istemal karane vale softaveyar men vahan k dikhaee dega yani betaratib, arthahin, aksharon ka samooh skrin par drishtigochar hoga. aur mitro, yahi huaa bhi hai. aaj hindi men kanpyootar par aane vali mahatvapoorn kathinaiyon ka yahi karan hai. intaranet, ee-mel, ee-vanijy aur ee-shasan ke badhate ghode kee lagam hindi softaveyar nirmataon ne isi tarah thami hai. inake kod vyavastha men nit nae prayogon ne bharatiy bhashaon ke upayoktaon ko behad pareshan kiya hai.

iskee apane aap sidhe vindoz jaise aopareting sistam par istemal nahin kiya ja sakata, isake lie ek font kod chahie jisamen hindi ke lie kam se kam 188 kod sthan chahie. iskee ke 128 sthanon kee tulana men. vindoz jaise aopareting sistamon ke lie iskee kod tab tak aparyapt tha jab tak ki aopareting sistam nirmata andar se ise samarthan n den.

nahin to vah sangathan ya kanpani apane vibhinn kanpyootaron men taiyar hindi dastavezon ka aadan-pradan nahin kar paegi. yahi nahin, n keval unhonne apane kod doosare font nirmataon se alag rakhe balki apane hi vibhinn utpadon ke lie bhi vibhinn kod banae taki unake ek utpad ka grahak doosare utpad ke font istemal n kar pae.
jinhen bharatiy bhashaon ke mudran ko gala-kat pratiyogita bhari duniya men tike rahana tha, nit nae fonton ko apanate hue.
jaisaki doosare deshon kee sarakaron ne kiya, to font kod ke karan utpann samasya paida hi nahin hoti.

parantu usakee dadi ko nahin. duniya ke anek deshon kee tarah koriya men kisi bhi softaveyar ke bikane kee buniyadi shart hoti hai ki usamen koriyaee bhasha ka intarafes ho. zahir hai ki usakee dadi koriyaee intarafes ke madhyam se kanpyootar aur intaranet ka upayog karati thi. jab koriyaee chhatra ne amarika se apani dadi ko ee-mel bhejana chaha to vaikalpik bhasha men koriyaee bhasha ke badale arabi bhasha kee maiping dekh kar usaka hath ruk gaya. aur usakee dadi ka bheja ee-mel arabi jank kairektaron men badal chuka tha.

536 kairektar stor kie ja sakate hain. isake pahale 128 kairektar to angrezi ke aaskee kod ke lie niyat hain. yah vish v kee sabhi naee v purani likhit bhashaon ke sabhi kairektaron ko sthan muhayya karata hai. isake atirikt isamen takanikee chih n, viram chih n aur kaee any kairektar bhi die gae hai. yoonikod manak sabhi tarah ke upayok taon karobar se hon ya shiksha vyavasay se, mukhy dhara kee lipiyon ka istemal karane vale hon ya alpasankhyak lipiyon ka sabhi kee jarooraton ko samarthan dene ka prayat n karata hai.

softaveyar v hardaveyar nirmata kanpaniyan, intaranet seva pradata ilektronikee se jude karobari log sabhi poori duniya men yoonikod ko samarthan de rahe hain. pratidin kanpaniyan nae-nae yoonikod samarthit utpad lekar bazar men aa rahi hain. is mamale men opan sors mukt sansadhan samuday bhi pichhe nahin hai.
agar iskee 91 ko aadhar banaya gaya hota to ye mamooli dik katen bhi nahin hotin. khair, der aayad durast aayad.

yah hindi men taip karane ke upakaran to upalabdh karata hi hai, isaka hindi intarafes bhi, yani sari kamande, roop aadi bhi hindi men upalabdh hain. isaka istemal karake fail ka nam aadi bhi hindi men de sakate hain. tatha vindoz ke sarch injan se hindi ke kisi shabd ke aadhar par khoj bhi kar sakate hain. isaka istemal karane se angrezi vindoz eksapi par chal rahe kanpyootaron se kanektiviti kee kinchinmatr bhi samasya nahin hai.

isaka hindi intarafes jise aofis hindi nam diya gaya hai bhi upalabdh hai, jisamen vard, eksel, pavarapvaint, aaootaluk aur ekses hindi men kamandon ke sath upalabdh hain. isakee hindi bahut aasan aur sahaj hai. isake vard men hindi ka vartani janchak, hindi thisaras, hindi shabdavali kee suvidha bhi maujood hai. isake eksel men akaradikram se deta kee chhantaee karane aur soochibaddh karane aur khojane kee suvidha upalabdh hai.

aur any softaveyaron se kanvarzan kee suvidha ka bade zor shor se ullekh karate hain. inhonne pahale to apane softaveyaron men kisi manak ka anupalan n karake hindi kanpyootari ke vikas men rukavaten pahunchaeen aur ab khud ko masiha ke taur par pesh kar rahe hain. aur isake lie ek bar fir in samasyaon se anajan hindi vibhagon se moti kamaee kar rahe hain.

angrezi ke sath kadam mila kar nit nae anuprayog vikasit kar bharat ke lie aur jyada videshi mudra la rahi hoti. sath hi yahan ke vikas karyon, pariyojanaon ko badhane aur soochana praudyogikee ke labh jan sadharan tak pahunchane men bahut aage nikal gaee hoti.

janakari ya aankadon ke inaput, proses, storej aur aaootaput ka aadhar hota hai. parantu ek upayok ta ke lie koding sistam se koee fark nahin padata jab tak ki vah apane dastavejon, failon aadi ko ilektronik roop men vinimay n karana chahe. ek upayok ta ko fark padata hai, fonto se. halanki yoonikod aur aopanataip fonton ko apanane se in sabhi samasyaon se nijat mil jati hai. fir bhi jin samasyaon ne hindi aur bharatiy bhashaee kanpyootari ko ek dashak tak sansat men rakha, un par ek nazar dalana, anupayuk t n hoga.

aaie thoda font ke bare men janen. font kanpyootar skrin, dispale bord ya skrin, printar dvara chhapa kisi akshar ka pradarshit roop hota hai. ek hi akshar ko mote, tirachhe ya rekhankit roop men bhi pradarshit kiya jata hai aur unake likhane ke lie vibhinn shailiyan apanaee jati hain. in vibhinn shailiyon ya roopon men ek glif roopakar hota hai jo us kairektar ke lie niyat kod pvaint ke sath antassanbandhit hota hai. hindi aur bharatiy bhashaon men k sanyuk taksharon ke glif, kh matraon ke vibhinn roopon aur chandrabindu, anusvar aur nuk te ke lie glif aur g ankon aur viram chih non ke lie alag glif istemal kie jate hain. in glifon ko nirdharit karate samay n keval unake tankit roopon ka dhyan rakha jata hai apitu unake vartaman aur paranparagat likhit roopon ka bhi dhyan rakha jata hai. font men di gaee ukt k aur kh kee vishayavastu ko font men glif pratisthapan talika sabastityooshan tebal ka pravadhan karake upayog kiya ja sakata hai. aisi talika bharatiy lipiyon ke lie aparihary hai. aisi lipiyon men glif pozishaning talika nyoonatam apekshit chih nit sthiti ko hasil karane ke lie bhi di jati hai. kuchh fonton ke lie ye talikaen kamobesh saman hoti hain, par hamesha aisa nahin hota. aur yahin se samasya paida hoti hai.
kanpyootar kee memori men sanchit vibhinn glif jud kar dispale skrin par us akshar ko darshate hain. yah poori prakriya kanpyootar kee kritrim buddhimata ke zarie badi teji se kee jati hai.

hindi ka prayog se bahar ho jana. hindi premi softaveyar nirmata is sthiti ko svikar karane ko taiyar nahin the. unhonne eksatendid aaskee kod parivardhit eskee kod men die gae grafik kairektaron ke sthanon par ovaralaiping karake hindi aksharon ke disple ko sanbhav banaya. shuroo men unakee prathamikata thi ki kisi tarah kanpyootar skrin par hindi akshar chamakane lagen. vaise bhi hindi kanpyootari ka bazar sabase pahale ditipi ne banaya. ditipi ne mudran ke purane tarike men aamoolachool badalav la diya tha. mudran kee gati aur gunnavatta bahut achchhi ho gaee thi. isalie sabase pahale mudran softaveyaron ke lie hindi font vikasit kie gae. inhen sthapit aur istemal karane ke lie kanpyootar men edob taip mainejar sthapit karana zaroori tha. in fonton ko post skript fonta sankshep men pies font kahate hain.

vahin hindi men kasht aur badh jata kyonki kabhi hindi taip karate samay kanpyootar svatah angrezi font dene lagata aur jank kairektar dikhane shuroo ho jate ya angrezi taip karate samay hindi font darshane lagata aur jank kairektar dikhane shuroo ho jate. dastavej ko vanchhit sthiti men lane ke lie jagah-jagah samagri silekt kar upayuk t font dena padata.

indeksing aur sarching kee suvidha maujood nahin thi. isalie deta proses karane ke lie angrezi men deta dena aavashyak tha. uk t sabhi samasyaon ke hal ke lie dvibhashik bailingvual fonta vikasit kie gae. yani ki ek hi font talika men hindi aur angrezi donon ke glif shamil kie gae.

yadi kabhi poori samagri angrezi jank ke roop men dikhe bhi to sari samagri ko ek sath silekt kar dvibhashik font chunane se samasya khatm ho jati. lekin ekabhashiy monolinguval font men tankit samagri ke sath yah suvidha nahin thi. in dvibhashik fonton ne hindi jagat kee lanbe samay tak bharapoor seva kee. aam karmachari ko hindi men kam karane par samany taur par koee dik kat nahin aati thi.

parantu bina vah softaveyar hue samagri men badalav ya kuchh jodana sanbhav nahin tha, chahen vah ek shabd hi kyon n ho. vaise yadi vah shabd sanpoorn roop men usi dastavej men kahin pahale hi taip kiya huaa ho to use vahan se kopi zaroor kiya ja sakata tha. sochie, is tarah se ek ek shabd ko dhoondh kar vaky likhana kitani mehanat ka kam tha.

vastav men utani hi jatil. isamen aapakee vaibasait ke kanekt hote hi, ek kanekshan us font nirmata ke sarvar se hota tha jahan se font aapake kanpyootar par lod hota hai. yani ki vaibasait nirmata ko dayanemik font ke lie ye kamand lain apani sait par deni hongi. kahane ka matalab itana hi hai ki yah koee santoshajanak samadhan nahin hai. kyonki yah intaranet ke lie to thik tha par samagriyon ke anyatha aadan-pradan men yah sahayak nahin tha.

chahe aapake pas hindi ka vahi softaveyar hai, vahi font hai, parantu angrezi ke aopareting sistam ke nae sanskaran ke aane se aapakee sari samagri apathaniy. aisi halat men kitani jhunjhalahat hoti hai apani bebasi par.

sarch, faind end riples aadi nahin de sakate the. inhen sort nahin kar sakate the. spailachek, thisaras aadi kee suvidhaen n hona ek alag bat thi. isaka yah matalab nahin hai ki ye suvidhaen thin hi nahin. hindi softaveyar nirmataon ne ye suvidhaen vikasit to kee thin, par ve chalatin thard parti erenjament ke tahat hi thin. isaka matalab yahi ki jab bhi aap apane hardaveyar ya softaveyar ko apagred karenge, to zaroori nahin hai ki ye suvidhaen usi sahajata se chal paen.
