aur behad jatil lipi vali chini aur japani bhashaen bhi thin, lekin vaigyanik varnnamala vali devanagari aadi bharatiy lipiyan nahin thin. eeran irak ke karan arabi lipi to thi parantu urdoo kee zarooraton ke hisab se vah parivardhit nahin thi. isake lie hamari sarakar aur hamara abhijaty varg, jo apana sara kam kaj angrezi ke madhyam se karata hai, jimmevar nahin hai to aur kaun hai. lekin vish vavidyalayon ke hindi pradhyapakon aur hindi bhashi janata ka kya koee uttaradayitv nahin tha ki ve hindi ka upayog kar mang paida karate taki videshi softaveyar nirmata apane softaveyaron ko hamari bhashaon men dene ko badhy ho jate. jo thoda bahut bazar vikasit huaa, use sarakari hindi vibhagon aur ditipi ka kam karane valon ne hi paida kiya.

tivi siriyalon aur kanpyootar par khelon ne hindi shirshakon aur namavaliyon kee jaroorat paida kee. dhire-dhire hamare vyapar, vanijy, manoranjan, bainking aadi sabhi kuchh ka dizitalikaran hone laga. intaranet ne dizitaliy janakariyon ke athah aur abadh pravah tatha intar-ektiv karyakramon ko khoob failaya. aaj sabhi sarakari mantralay aur vibhag apani sari yojanaon, janakariyon, nividaon aadi ko net par jari karane lage hain. shiksha sansthan n keval apane pariksha parinamon ko net par jari karate hain, balki kuchh shiksha sansthan to aon lain pariksha lene tatha prashikshan dene bhi lag gae hain.

nahin, nahin. yadi bharat men soochana praudyogikee ko apani kamaee badhani hai, yadi bharat kee upabhok ta v seva kanpaniyon ko apana intaraneti bazar tezi se failana hai, yadi intaranet ko apani paith door daraj tak karani hai to use hindi aur bharatiy bhashaon ko apanana hi hoga.

roopon, vikalpon aur any pratisthapanon ko samarthan pradan karate hain. ye font do aayami glif pozishan aur glif ataichament ko bhi samarthan pradan karate hain. ye skript prosesing laibreri aur opan taip laibreri seva otielaes ke sath milakar kam karate hain. otielaes taikst prosesing sahayak karyon ka set hai. vindoz aopareting sistam men yooniskraib aur otielaes aopareting sistam laibreri ka ang hain.

deskatop anuprayogon men bharatiy bhashaon ko samarthan pradan karana, yoonikod aadharit bharatiy bhashaon men sarch injan vikasit karana aur vibhinn bhashaon ke lie bharatiy bhasha nidhi vikasit karana hai.

vindoz eksapi, linaks, yooniks, mek oes aadi lagabhag sabhi aopareting sistamon ka hissa hain isalie ye prayok ta ko vahi svatantrata muhaiyya karate hain, jo angrezi ke fonton ke istemal men dekhane men aati hai. inaka upayog karane par aap apane foldar ya kisi fail ka nam hindi men de sakate hain, hindi men fail dhoondh sakate hain. kisi dastavej men koee shabd dhoondh kar badal sakate hain. kisi dastavej ya talika spraidashit ya detabes men hindi akaradikram ke anusar shabdon ko sanyojit, soochibaddh aur sort kar sakate hain.

thisaras, angrezi hindi shabd kosh aadi kee suvidhaen bhi aapako hasil hoti hain. intaranet par googal, mozila ya sifi jaise kisi braoozar men aap hindi men intaraneti samagri ko khoj sakate hain. yadi aap kisi dastavej ya spraidashit men opanataip font jistaoti-yogesh men koee samagri taip karate hain aur jis mashin par aapane samagri flopi ya ee-mel dvara bheji hai, us par yah font nahin hai to ghabarane ya pareshan hone kee koee zaroorat nahin hai, yah svatah hi us kanpyootar ke difalt opanataip font jo vindoz eksapi men mangal hai men badal kar samagri ko pradarshit kar dega. basharte ki vah kanpyootar yoonikod samarthit hona chahie. kisi bhi yoonikod samarthit sistam men hindi ko sakriy karake aap hindi men prapt samagri ko sanpadit kar sakate hain.

bharatiy mudra, bharatiy ankon, unake shabd roopon aadi ko to chun hi sakate hain. spraidashit men aap apani kastam soochi bhi hindi men bana sakate hain. emaes vard men aap aototaikst men manachahe shabd bhar sakate hain.

Internet Aaj Kha phuch chuka hai ye to sab jante hai hoge, Agar hame kuch bhi Jankari Chaiye hoti hai to ham sidhe Google Par search karke pata kar lete hai. Kya aapko Pata hai wo jankari Dalta kon hai, Agar aapki Website ya Blog hai to iska jabab hai Aap. Bhut log Website banana chate hai par paise, ya webdesign naa aane ke karan wo apni website nahi bana pate the, par ab wo Time gaya. Agar aapko webdesign bilkul bhi nahi aati or Aap paise bhi kharch nahi kar sakte fir bhi aap ek badiya site bana sakte hai Blogger.com par jo Google ka Product hai. Agar aapko Blog kaise Banaye Blogger par uski jankari chaiye to aap yaha read kar sakte hai. Aaj is post me apko batuaga ki kyon blogger ek achha aur jana-mana platform hai aur kyon apko ise choose karna hi chahiye. Waise HMH.pe blog WordPress par hai. Lekin agar aap Blogger platform use karte hai tab bhi koi dikkat nahi hai. Kyonki apko aaj me proof karne wala hu ki Blogger platform bhi ek professional blogging platform hai hai. Agar aap thode paise kharch kar sakte hai to aap WordPress par bhi bana sakte hai, WordPress or Blogger me kya antar hai wo mene bataya hai, iske sath sath wordpress par site banane me kitna kharcha aata hai wo aap yaha dekh sakte hai. Blogspot ek blogging platform hai, jise har blogging karne wale issi se sirubad karte hai, aur kai bar blogging expert bhi ise use karte hai. 23 august 1999 me Pyra Labs ne Blogger platform ko launch kiya tha. Aur 2003 ko Google inc. ne ise kharid liya. Agar aap blogger platform par blog banate hai, tab Google apko ek sub domain free deta hai XYZ.Blogspot.com, aur apne ek Google account me ham 100 blogs bana sakte hai. To chaliye ab me apko batata hu 10 reason jiski wajah se Blogger platform popular blogging platform hai aur apko yah platform kyon use karna chahiye. Blogger platform Google ka product hai, jab Blogger platform ka dashboard open karna hai tab ham Google ka account login karte hai jo kaafi secure hota hai. Apka blog hack hone ke chance naa ke barabar hote hai. Simple Sabdo me kahu to dusri kisi bhi site ko hack karne se muskil hai Blogger Blog ko Hack karna naa mumkin hai.

bam mil rahe hain . log mar rahe hain - gir rahe hain, aakroshit ho rahe hain. prashasan- pulis par nakara hone ke aarop lagae ja rahe hain. guptachar ejensiyon ko kosa ja raha hai. svatantrata ke bad unakee 8327vin bar asafalata ghoshit kee ja rahi hai. aise halat men mainne apana patrakariy dayitv samajhate hue is vishay par kuchh risarch-vark karake sabhi pakshon se varjan liya hai. kafi maulik sandarbh samagri jutaee, taki jana ja sake ki ejensiyon v pulis kee karyapranali kya hai, ve kin kamon men biji rahate hain. kis tarah ke tanav-dabav se do-char hote hain. kis karan unake pas mahatvapoorn karyon ke lie jyada vakt nahin nikal pata. taki kadiyon se kadiyan jud saken. jimmedari tay kee ja sake. poori samagri padhakar aap khud hi andaja laga sakate hain ki unake pas itane mahatvapoorn dayitv hain jisake aage chhoti-moti ganbhir laparavahi jyada mayane nahin rakhati. sabhi pakshon ke nam suraksha kee drishti se gopaniy rakhe gae hain . mera nam aap gopaniy rakhen .

rajanitik samikaranon kee vyavastha dekhane, virodhiyon kee gatividhiyon kee padatal, kharide jane, bike jane kee janch ke mahati karyon men jute hain. pablik to samajhe baithi hai jaise ham fokat hain, bakaul ek shirsh adhikari, nam n chhapane kee shart. uparokt karyon se jo thoda bahut samay milata hai usamen pet-parivar ke lie vasooli ka thoda bahut kam karana padata hai . manthali taraget poore karane padate hain . sahab kee bandhi pahunchana hai. thane men aaropiyon ko kootana hai, kuchh jhagadon men madhyasthata karani hai . karyon ka itana bojh hota hai, ek bechari jan, itane kam, thakan nahin hoti hogi? aap bam-bam kar rahe hain. itana bam-bam bhole karate to moksh hi prapt kar lete. bat karate hain aur sunie bhaee sahab pablik ko kya lage hain ham koee jaduee chhalani lekar baithe hain logon ko chhana aur aaropiyon ko kankad-patthar kee tarah bahar fenka. abe, ham bhi insan hain. andaja hi to laga sakate hain, vahi karake itane saron ko koot dala, nikala kya aaropi? fir hamare to tarike hi prachinatam hain. sidhe-sadhe marapit ke alava hamen koee tarika hi nahin maloom sach ugalavane ka. bam rakhane vale shatir hain, ham bhole hain ve aadhunik takanik apana rahe hain, ham paranpara premi hai. kaise karen mukabala.

vo eke-47 late hain, ham thri not thri le jakar intajar karate hain ki kabhi to bachchoo kee goliyan khatm hongi. fir apani 303 ko latth kee tarah bhanj-bhanjakar salon ka khopada fod dalenge. kar to rahe hain mukabala? ab kya goliyan kee bauchhar ke bich jakar unaka kolar pakad len. ham vinamrata se bat karate hain ve goliyon se javab dene lagate hain. oopar se hamare sale havaladar-kanstebal kamachor hain jara sa kahate hain ki pakad lao, ve hamen hi javab dene lagate hain ki aap hi pakad lo jakar. are bhaiya hamin to hain jinane unakee goliyon kee bauchhar men bhi sir nahin nikala. sari goliyan khatm karava din, ab sada sa pakadane ka kam bacha hai inase vo bhi nahin hota. ye sale itane darapok-makkar aa pade hain fors men kaise hoga mukabala?, aap hi dekh lo. fir aap kahate ho ki kam nahin hota, muftakhor hain, tanakha utha rahe hain. are, aap kya jano tanakha se hota hi kya hain, kaise ghar chala rahe hain? kaise to kahin se mang-mag ke chhin-chhan ke ghar chalate hain. usamen bhi sau dikkaten, thelevale tak mantriyon kee dhaunsapatti dete hain.

pakadate kyon nahin? kise pakad len? tad-tad kar ve aisi-aisi chijen bhejate hain ki dipartament hi andar ho jae. pichhale bar to fingar print aise bheje ki milan karane vale havaladar aur thanedar ke fingar printon se hi milane lage, batao to ab unhen andar kar dete kya? badi mushkil se unhen bachaya gaya to ab koee milan karane ko taiyar nahin hota ki kya pata is bar hamare hi mil jaen. pata nahin kahan se aardar dekar aise fingar print banavate hain. pichhali bar sandigdhon ka skaich lekar bhi ek aaya tha. thane men esapi sahab sheving karake baithe hue the. fir lo sahab hoobahoo ekadam judavan shaklen, sahab ne to sheving karana hi bandakar diya. bad men dadhi anushasan se oopar nikalane lagi to skaich ke hi kali lainen khinchavakar dadhi ugavana padi . tab jakar khud sheving kar pae the. aur lo sandigdhon kee batachit ke ee-mel print bhijava die the. inglish men the ek padhe-likhe ko pakad ke lae tab padhava pae char ghante to use khojane men hi lag gae, batao itani vyavasthaon men samay nahin lagega.

kise pakad len! pichhali bar bhi ek sandigdh ko pakad lae the, angreji ke aise-aise hamale kie usane ki poochho mat badi mushkil se do-char sau rupae dekar vida karana pada tha. aur suno pichhale bar to ek bam kee soochana aa gaee thi. dispojal skvayad ko bulaya to pata chala men aadami jim gaya hai. jaise-jaise vahan se pakada to bola helamet lekar beta kriket khelane gaya hai, bina helamet ke bam nahin chhuoonga. helamet aaya to metal ditektar kee baitari ka pani sookha huaa tha. usaka bhi kahin se intajam karavaya to itane men koee bam vala thaila hi uthakar le gaya, bataya gaya ki usamen aam the, bade svadisht the. ab lo batao itani to andheragardi hai, suraksha kee kahin koee chinta hi nahin hai. are bhaee, aam bhi the to kam se kam pulis ke aane tak to rukana hi tha, janch ho jane dete, jabti ban jane dete. aise kya bhookhe mar rahe the ki jan par khel gae, aam uthakar kha gae, besharmi se bata bhi rahe hain ki svadisht the. guthali hi fategi sale ke pet men tab aaega samajh men.

kartavy nibhae pulis, aisa kahan likha hai. ek bar soochana bhej di ki falan-falan makan men chhipe hai sandigdh. chhapa mara to sahab hi nikal aae, vahin beijjat karane lage. bole- salon sharma dipti se paise khakar meri siaar kharab karavana chahate ho. itane naraj the ki do mahine tak vasooli ka 8 pratishat lete rahe tab jakar gussa kuchh kam huaa tha. lo batao aisi kya soochana? bad men bhi kahate rahe ki sandigdh makan tha. kahe ka sandigdh? ab hamare sahab logon ne do-char makan banava bhi lie shahar men to kya sabakee soochana dete firen. fir kirae pe uthakar kuchh rupae kama lie to aaf pet men jalan, ritayarament ke bad kya aapase paise lekar stetas menten karenge, batao bhala. itana tanav hai kee parivar hi tootane kee kagar tak pahunch jae, pichhale bar hi ek sandigdh mahila par najar rakhane ke lie ek ledi kanstebal lagavaee thi, bad men khair mahila to bhag gaee ledi kanstebal ne usake pati se shadi kar li, roj-roj bechari kahan-kahan se kaise-kaise najar rakhati to usane ghar men hi sthayi chaukee kee sthapana kar dali.

ham kyon yahan jan dete pade hain. aisa nahin hai ki sandigdh hamari pakad men aate nahin hain. kaee bar ham kisi ko kisi mamale men pakadakar late hain aur vo batana doosari bat shuroo kar deta hai, to aise bade-bade raj khul jate hain, ham kabhi aapako batate hain ki itane bade iljam ke alava is par mool aarop kisi gadi se petrol chori ka tha. eeshvar aise hi nahin madad karata, prayas karana hota hai. pulis vahi karati hai, pakad lati hai, karm karati hai. tab jakar itane bade-bade mamale samane aate hain, eeshvar par bharosa rakhana hi chahie. sabhi pulis vale rakhate hain. aap bhi rakhie. hamare bharose mat rahie.
nahin to hindi ka bhavishy khatare men pade ya n pade hindi ke lekhakon ka bhavishy zaroor khatare men pad jaega.

puraskar yojanaen, hindi baithaken bhi chalati rahati thin. inake sath hi andar hi andar hindi men kam kee matra dhire-dhire hi sahi badhati ja rahi thi. isi bich karyalay men kanpyootar ka pravesh huaa. shuroo men yah kafi simit tha. kanpyootar par taip matr karane vale log kisi taik nokret ke saman shraddha se dekhe jate the. hindi vibhag ke log to saham kar udhar takate tak n the.
yah unase kafi alag aur kafi simit hai. mere utsah par tusharapat ho gaya. par koee bat nahin. kanpyootar kee pavitra-pavan duniya men hindi ka pravesh to huaa.

isake sath ek aur samasya aaee. jo eelapi softaveyar hamen bheja gaya tha usamen keval inskript kunjipatal tha. choonki vah mainual taiparaitar ke kunjipatal se buniyadi roop se bhinn tha isalie hamari taipatist ne us par taip karane se mana kar diya. is chak kar se nikalane ke lie hamane socha ki ek kunjipatal kharid lete hain jo remingtan ke hindi kunjipatal jaisa ho. taki hamari taipist ko us par kam karane men kathinaee n ho.
softaveyar ka hai, isalie behatar ho ki ham usaka kanpani ka softaveyar kharid len jisamen inskript kunjipatal ke sath-sath remingtan kunjipatal aur egzikyootiv kunjipatal bhi diya gaya hai.

emaes eksel aur emaes pavarapvaint the. angrezi men bani prastutiyon ko dekh kar man salata rahata tha ki yah sab hindi men kab hoga. isase mujhe ahasas ho gaya ki manzil abhi door hai. lekin main yah bhi samajh gaya ki manzil door bhale hi ho, par hasil kee ja sakati hai. lekin kaise? main ek hindi adhikari, bhasha kee barikiyon ko to samajhata tha, sahayogiyon kee angreji manasikata ke danv-pechon se bhi anabhigy nahin tha. parantu kanpyootar kee takanik ka kya karoon? vah kahan se sikhoon?
par vindoz 2000 aur maikrosoft aofis ke dakshin eshiyaee sanskaran men hindi samarthan pradan kar maikrosoft ne apana vada nibhaya.

kabhi font kee samasya, kabhi kunjipatal kee samasya, kabhi purane aankadakoshon kee samasya, par isane aage badhana bhi nahin chhoda. hindi kanpyootari kee kahani janabhasha hindi aur isake samarthakon ke athak prayason kee kahani hai. yah ek zinda bhasha kee pratikool paristhitiyon men date rahane, unaka mukabala karane aur kabhi har n manane kee kahani bhi hai. isake lie hindi bhashi janata aur un sabhi ko jo is prayason men jute rahe, mera shat-shat pranam.

bengaloor ke shree suman sarakar, inhonne har takanikee vishay ko mujhe samajhane ka prayas kiya. takanikee shabdavali ke jal men se sar kaise grahan kiya jata hai, yah sikhaya. kanpyootar kee vyavaharik dik katon ke lie mere bengaloor karyalay kee shreemati es.vijayashree ne mujhe kafi sahayog diya. aur dhairyapoorvak mujh sarikhe takanik anabhigy aadami ko takanik ke sath rahana sikhaya.

bengaloor kee sadasy sachiv shreemati vijaya mallik ne mere kanpyootar sanbandhi lekhon ko chhap kar mera utsah badhaya. mere dhairyavan mitr shree bhoopendr kumar ne mere sath tim bana kar jis tarah hindi kanpyootari ko aage badhaya usase mere vichar moort roop grahan kar sake.

shabdon men unake prati kritagyata gyapit karana kafi kathin kary hai. fir bhi, main bengaloor karyalay ke tatkalin prabhari pi. aar. tirumalai, tatha apane vartaman vibhagadhyaksh shree di.ke. baboota, karyalay prabhari shree o.pi. pandey ji aur sahayogi shree vivek saksena ke prati aabhar vyakt karata hoon.

dilli ke shree jasajit sinh to is pustak ke shabd-shabd men maujood hain. isake draft ko padhakar unhonne apane bahumooly vicharon se is kitab ko sanvarane men jo madad kee hai, use bayan karana sanbhav hi nahin.

em basavanunaiyya, eeem es namboodaripad, eke gopalan, biti rannadive pi ramamoorti, tatha pramod das gupt to kramashah pies, emabi, eeemaes, ekeji, bitiaar, piaar, aur pidiji ke sankshipt namon se jane jate rahe par harakishan sinh surajit aur jyotibasu do aise nam rahe hain jinhen koee sankshipt nam nahin diya gaya.

bhoomigat rahate, sajayen bhugatate 1947 men aajadi ke samay ve avibhajit kamyunisht parti kee panjab ikaee ke rajy sachiv the. aajadi ke bad jab sarakar ne unhen privetiv ditenshan ke arntagat jel men dalana chaha tab eke gopalan to giraftar hokar jel chale gaye par surajit do sal tak bhoomigat rah kar kam karate rahe. 1959 tak unhonne kisanon aur krishi shramikon ke bich men sangathan ka athak kam kiya jisake falasvaroop ve aal indiya kisan sabha ke mahasachiv aur bad men adhyaksh chune gaye. ve apane kam ke aadhar par lagatar parti men jyada jimmevar padon ke or agrasar hote gaye v 1992 men sipiem ke mahasachiv chune gaye tatha 2005 tak bane rahe. desh ke svatantrata sangram men poora jivan arpit kar dene ke bad bhi unhonne kabhi svatantrata sangram senani penshan nahin chahi. unaka kahana tha ki yah to hamari parti ka kam tha jise karane ke lie hi unhonne ek kamyunisht ka jivan jina svikara hai. unhonne shree eeemaes namboodaripad, aur jyotibasu kee tarah apane hisse kee sari sampatti apani parti ko de di thi.

udayan sharma, aur banavari jaise patrakar sammilit the. bakee sare logon ne to puraskar lena svikar kar liya kintu kamared surajit ka kahana tha ki mainne jo kuchh bhi kiya hai vah hamari parti kee soch aur vicharadhara ka hissa hai isalie sarakar ko agar puraskar dena hai to vo hamari parti ko de. smaraniy hai ki unakee parti ke sare sansad apana poora vetan parti chalane ke lie parti ko dete hain tatha usi vetan men gujara karate hain jo unhen poornnakalik karyakarta ke roop men parti se milata raha hai. unakee parti keshasan vale bangal men pichhale pachchis salon se vidhayakon ke vetan men vriddhi nahin kee gayi.

jab aisi mushkilon se parivar ke bujurgon ko do char hona padta hai. deharadoon tatha haridvar ke vriddhashramon men isaka udaharan dekhane ko mil jata hai. varshon pahale kaee bujurgon ke parivar sadasy unhen vriddhashram men chhod gaye, lekin ab unakee sudh lene vala koee nahin hai. ve dobara ghar vapas n laut aaen, isake lie samay par unakee vriddhashram kee shulk kee shulk kee rashi bhi bhej dete hain. bahana yah hota hai ki tabiyat kharab hone ke karan bujurg kee dekhabhal ghar par nahin ho sakati hai. isalie unhen vriddhashram bheja jata hai, lekin tabiyat thik hone ke bad bhi unakee koee sudh lene nahin aata.

lekin vahan bhi unaka dard ek hi hai. koee apane bete ke vyavahar se duhkhi hai, to kisi ke ghar men koee ijjat nahin karata hai. grihaklesh se tang in vriddhon ko yahan aakar samay bitana upayukt lagata hai is sanstha men aane vale vriddhon kee sthiti vastav men vikat hai.

bahoo bhi khari-,khoti sunati hai. apani alag-alag ghareloo samasyaon se kuchh ghanton ke lie hi sahi chhutakara pane ke lie ye yahan aana pasand karate hain. is sansthan men kuchh dene ke bajay har mah inako kharche ke lie pachas roopaye milate hain aur vriddhashram ke karmachari inakee poori ijjat karate hain.
parivar men ab keval apane bachchon kee gannana kee jane lagi hai. bhautik vastuon kee aur badhata aakarshan tatha din-pratidin badhati aavashyakataon ka nidan bahut kathin hai.

aisi soch ke chalate naitik mooly rasatal men ja rahe hain aur in sabaka dosh aaj kee sabhyata tivi filmon par dal diya jata hai. man-bap se ghrina karana marane kee kamana karana, aakhir kyon palane lagi hai dilon men nafarat ka graf din-pratidin badhata ja raha hai. kya isake keetanu dooshit paryavaran kee den hain ya paryavaran ke sath man ka aangan bhi vishakt ho utha hai.

tarah-tarah kee bimari, maut ka bhay aur gahari asuraksha kee bhavana ke chalate man bap kaee bar aatmasamman ko tak par rakhakar bahoo-bete se dabate chale jate hain. beijjati v apaman sahakar bhi unhin ke aasare pade rahate hain. sas bar-bar bahoo ke samane mimiyati rahati hai sasur galat hota dekh kaee bar gusse se bhar jate hain lekin patni kee aankhon kee mook dayaniy yachana unhen kuchh kahane karane nahin deti.

aisi jindagi se ek baragi maut hi kya shreyaskar nahin. koee in bujurgon se poochhakar dekhe. unakee lahooluhan aatma ka mook krandan sune. itana jivan ji lene ke bad bhi kaee martaba ye bujurg nasamajhee ke chalate jite ji apana sabakuchh putron ko dekar apane pairon par kulhadi mar lete hain. yah sab baten aur vikat tab ho jati hain jab jode ke tootane ke bad vriddh mahila jo vidhava jivan vyatit kar rahi hoti hai tatha doosari aur use apane bachchon par aashrit rahana padta hai.

dev rinn, pitri rin kee baten karate the. parantu isake sarvatha viparit ab ham un man bap ko majaboor kar rahe hain dar-dar kee thokaren khane ke lie jo bap hamen har prakar ka madhyam pradan karata hai. vah man hamare lie bojh hoti hai jo bachapan men n jane kitani raten bina soye gujar deti hai. us man ka kharch vahan karana hamen bhari dikhata hai jo man apane bachchon ke sath rat-rat bhar gile bistar men gujarati hai. ek taraf to ham pashchaty sanskriti ko nikrishth manate hain aur apani ko shreshth? kya yahi shreshthata ka praman hai. unako nikrisht kahane se pahale yah sochana chahie ki unake pas to is prakar ke sanskar kabhi rahe hi nahin, hamare pas to the parantu hamane kho die to vastav men nikrisht kaun huaa. boodhe ka sahara budhape kee lakadi yah tamam baten ab kitabi maloom deti hain. sari umr sangharsh ke pashchat yah log majaboor ho ja rahe hain, nimnastar jivan yapan ke lie. inakee aankhon men atit ke sangharsh se lekar vartaman sthiti tak sab kuchh dekha ja sakata hai. chakachaundh ko bhoolakar inhen aavashyakata hai to sirf pyar kee. inhen aavashyakata hai to sirf apanon kee jo inake khalipan ko door sake inake andheron men roshani la sake. inako jaroorat hai apanepan kee.

jismein bhakton ne kaha hai ki baba aaj ke zamane mein bina paisa khilaye koi kaam nahi ho raha . Ab jab aap bhakt musibat mein ho to bhala hum kaise chain se shaant reh sakte hain. Isiliye apne pyaare desh ko aur apne priya bhakton ko bhrshtachar se mukti dilane ke liye humne bhi apne tareeke se in bhrashtachariyon ko saza dene ka nirnay liya hai. Humne ek list banayi hai jismein 3525 bhrasht logon ke naam humne nikale hain. Hum ye maang karenge ki in sabhi 3525 bhrasht logon ko hamare hawaale kiya jaaye taanki hum inhe kholte hue tail mein tal sakein, aur inhe machliyon ko khila sakein.

bhakt jan tatha bhoot pishaach, chudail aadi bhi bhaag lengi. Kyunki desh ke andar jo bhoot bhutaniyan hain unka khaatma karne ke liye humne khaas bhooton aur bhutniyon ki ek sena gathit kee hai. Jo in dushto se inhi hi bhaasha mein baat karenge.

Chandrama TV aur Kal Tak ne dera daal diya hai. Kashmir se kanyakumari tak tatha teeno lokon mein faile hue hamare bhakt jo bhi bhrshtachar se mukti chahte hain hamare aandolan mein jud sakte hain. Aandolan se judi jaankari ke liye hamare paatal lok waale aashram ke darwaaze aapke liye hamesha-hamesha ke liye khule hain. Chaliye hum abhi chalte hain. Bharat TV mein aaj humn aapki pukaar naamak kaaryakram mein sakshaat prakat hone waale hain, aap bhi aaiyega apne dusht saathiyon ko bhi laaiyega aur ye naara zaroor gaiyega Bhrashtachar mitana hai dhongibaba ko agla PM banana hai. Khush Raho. . .

avasar kee samanata v rojagar se jodakar dekhate hain, to kuchh ke lie yah nirnnay men bhagidari se sambandhit hai. vastutah aarakshan kisi n kisi roop men bharatiy samaj men prachin kal se hi maujood raha hai. paramparagat varnn-vyavastha men isake bij khoje ja sakate hain, jahan brahyann-kshatriy vaishy-shoodr sabhi ke karm nirdharit kar die gae the. yahi karan tha ki bhagavan ram ne shambook ka vadh isalie kar diya ki vah shoodr hokar tapasya kar raha tha. mahabharat kal men guroo dronachary ne ekalavy ko shoodr hone ke karan shiksha dene se mana kar diya aur jab unhen ahasas huaa ki ekalavy arjun se bhi bada vir hai, to unhonne guroodakshina kee aad men usake hath ka angootha hi mang liya. spasht hai ki varn vyavastha roopi visheshadhikaron kee aad men pichhadon aur daliton ko shiksha se vanchit karane ka shadayantr racha gaya aur unhen ved gyan tatha aadhunik shiksha se vanchit rakha. kalantar men aise vanchit vargon ko thodi vishesh suvidha dekar vibhinn sarakaron ne unaka jivan star uthane aur any vargon ke samakaksh khada karane ka prayas kiya. svayan mandal aayog ke adhyaksh do0 vi0 pi0 mandal ne kaha tha- yah sach hai ki aarakshan se kuchh logon ka dil jalega. magar kya mahaj dil jalane ko samajik sudhar ke khilaf ek naitik nishedhadhikar mana jaye?

jinaka pratinidhitv rajy kee ray men rajy ke adhin sevaon men paryapt nahin hai, niyuktiyon ya padon ke aarakshan ke lie upabandh karane se nivarit nahin karegi. vastutah sanvidhan ka yah upabandh samajik nyay kee pratishtha sunishchit karata hai. indra sahani banam bharat sangh 1992 ke kes men sarvochch nyayalay ne bhi kaha tha ki- pichhade hue nagarikon ka varg-is pad kee sanvidhan men koee paribhasha nahin di gaee hai. jati, upajivika, nirdhanata aur samajik pichhadapan ka nikat ka sambandh hai. bharat ke sandarbh men nichali jatiyon ko pichhada mana jata hai. jati apane aap hi pichhada varg ho sakati hai. hindoo samaj men pichhade varg kee pahachan jati ke aadhar par kee ja sakati hai. vastutah bharatiy pariprekshy men aarakshan samajik sthiti sudharane ka ek upay hai, n ki aarthik sthiti. aarakshan ka mamala matr rojagar ka nahin varan samajik samanata aur bhagidari ka hai. aarthik sthiti sudharane ke lie to tamam aarthik kalyannakari yojanaon ko eemanadari se lagoo kiya ja sakata hai aur garibi hatao jaise naron ko kriyanvit kiya ja sakata hai. yahan tak ki svayan amerika jaise sarvadhik vikasit desh men bhi dayavarsiti siddhant ke aadhar par ashveton ke lie aarakshan lagoo hai.

unamen barabari kee bat karana hi vyarth hai. kya is nikarsh ko kharij karana sanbhav hai ki uchch v takanikee sansthanon men kuchh jatiyon ka varchasv hai. neshanal sarve aargenaijeshan ke aankadon par gaur karen to gramin bharat men 20 sal se oopar ke snatakon men anusoochit jatiyan, janajatiyon v muslimon ka pratishat mushkil se ek fisadi hai, jabaki savarn snatak panch fisadi se adhik hain. aarakshan virodhi savarn apane paksh men tark de sakate hain ki aisa sirf unakee yogyata ke karan hai. par vastav men yogyata ka rag alapana nimn tabake ko vanchit rakhane kee sajish matr hai kyonki yadi yogyata ek sahaj evan antarjat gun hai to any vargon ke logon men bhi hai, par fir bhi ve is star tak nahin pahunch pae to dal men kuchh kala avashy hai. arthat-ve itane sadhan sampann nahin hain ki pragati kar saken, vibhinn prashasakeey v rajanaitik padon par baithe uchch varnon ke bhaee-bhatijavad ka ve shikar hue hain, prarambhik star par hi unhen samajik hinata ka ahasas karakar aage badhane nahin diya gaya. aise men yadi savarnon ke vichar se yogyata kee nirvivad dharana mahatvapoorn hai, jo us samajik sanrachana kee hi anadekhi karata hai, jisakee badaulat svayan unaka astitv hai, to nimn varg ya aarakshan ke pakshadharon ke anusar yogyata ko hi poornnaroopen se najar andaj kar dena chahie kyonki yah yogyata kee aad men ek vishisht varg ko badhava dene kee niti matr hai. aakhir kya karan hai ki sangh lok seva aayog dvara aayojit parikshaon men aarakshit vargon ko alag kram ke rol nanbar aavantit kie jate hain? kya kisi n kisi roop men yah bhedabhav ka karan n banata hoga? nishchitatah aaj kee yogyata thopi gaee yogyata hai. yogyata ke mayane tab honge jab sabhi ko saman paristhitiyan muhaiya karakar ek nishchit mukam tak pahunchaya jaye evan fir yogyata kee bat kee jae. yogyata kee aad men samajik nyay ko bhothara nahin banaya ja sakata.

kyonki aarakshan sanvidhanasammat prakriya hai. choonki pichhadi aur dalit jatiyan vyavastha men samuchit bhagidari ke abhav men apani aavaj uthane men saksham nahin hain atah kalyannakari rajy kee avadharana ke tahat sarakar ka kartavy hai ki in upekshit vargon ko vyavastha men nirnnay kee bhagidari men uchit sthan dilaye. ise kisi ka adhikar chhinana nahin varan samaj ke har varg ko uchit pratinidhitv dena kaha jayega.

kuchale aur pichhade varg ko apani pratibha ka pradarshan karane ka mauka nahin mila, matr isalie ye varg aksham najar aate hain. inhen sarasari taur par ayogy thaharana samajik nyay ke siddhanton ke pratikool hai. shambook v ekalavy jaise logon kee pratibha ko kutilata se samapt kar unakee keemat par any kee pragati ko uchit nahin thaharaya ja sakata.

sarakari sevaon men avasar kam ho rahe hain, penshan jaisi vyavasthaon ko khatm kar sarakari naukariyon ko aakarshannahin banaya ja raha hai-nishchitatah aise men niji kshetr men bhi aarakshan kee jaroorat mahasoos hone lagi hai. ratr kee itani badi janasankhya ko sansadhan aur adhikaravihin rakhana ratr kee pragati, vikas evan samriddhi ke lie ahitakar hai. takanikee yogyata ke lie kshamatavan vidyarthiyon ke samane uchch shaikshanik sansthaon kee angeraji bhasha v bhari-bharakam kharche aade aate hain, matr isalie ye us vyavastha men pravesh nahin pa pate aur hinata ka anubhav karate hain. ye kahana ki unamen yogyata ka abhav hai, uchit nahin hoga. aisi paristhitiyon men uchch shaikshanik sansthaon men aarakshan kee anivaryata ko samajha ja sakata hai. prakhar rashtravadi vicharak vivekanand ne ek bar kaha tha- jab ve shoodr jagenge aur aap uchch varg dvara apane prati kie gaye shoshan ko samajhenge to apani foonk se ve shoodr aap uchch varg sabako uda denge. yah shoodr ve log hain, jinhonne aapako sabhyata sikhayi aur ye hi log aapaka patan bhi kar sakate hain. vartaman pariprekshy ko in avadharanaon ke bich hi samajhane kee jaroorat hai anyatha samaj kee pratigami shaktiyan to apane paramparagat visheshadhikaron ke lie sadaiv hi samajik nyay jaisi vistrit avadharana ko matr roji-roti se jodakar unaka kshudrikaran karane kee koshish karati rahengi.
us insaan mein inmein se koi bhi baat fit baithti hai to sachet ho jaaiye, jeevan mein mushkilein badh sakti hain
kyunki insaan pyaar karta hai taaki wo ek khushhal zindagi jee sake, par yadi koi aap par baat baat par shak kare to kya aap uske saath khush reh sakoge? Kabhi nahi bachha!
sabhyata hi insaan ki pehchan hoti hai bhakton, Insaan ki pehchan uske kapdon se nah uski baateon se hoti hai.
kabhi bhi unke saath prem sambandh nahi banane chahiye, kyunki jo kisi ki izzat nahi karta wo aapki bhi izzat kabhi nahi karega, ye ek param satya hai bhakton.
chhote se chhote faisle mein bhi jise hamesha doosaron ka muh dekhna achha lagta ho, aise insaan ke saath aap kabhi bhi khush nahi reh sakte bachha.
kintu use aap par yakeen hi nahi hai to bhakton kabhi bhi aap us insaan ke saath khus nahi reh sakoge, kyunki jahan yakeen hi na ho wo rishta kabhi safal nahi ho sakta.
kintu apna matlab nikal jaate hi badal jaata hai, aise insaan se jitna door rho utna hi behtar hai bhakton.

bade hi chalaak hote hain, paise na dene ke tarah-tarah bahane banate rehte hain. Isiliye jab bhi aap apne baap se pasie maangne jaayein to dhyaan rakhein ki jo bahanae pita shree ne pichhli baar banaya tha wo is baar na banane paayein.

unki kuch zyaada hi khatirdari karo. Wo ek glas paani maange to tum do glas paani do. Wo nahane ke liye thanda paani paange to tum usmein baraf daalke do. Aur jaise hi papa tankhwa lekar aayein apne pyare papa se jitna ho sake utna maal nikaal lo.
aur papa ke doston ke saamne hi papa se poorne mahhene ka jeb kharch maang daalo. Phir dekho chamatkar, papa ke doston ke jaane ke baad papa kya kya dete hain.
ki agar unhone muh maangi keemat nahi chukai to papa ki khair nahi, socho mummy papa ka kya haal karegi agar mummy ko pata chala to.
aur papa ki es bhool ka faayda tumhe 100-200 rs papa ki taraf se uphaar ke roop mein milenge aur 500 rs to pehle se hi tum papa ko thag chuke ho, to hui na ek teer se do shikar walli baat
to ek badiya sujhaav hai. Uski contact list mein hahakar macha do. Jaise Saurav ke naam ke aage Dhoni ka no daal do aur Harbhajan ke naam ke aage Sreesanth ka mobile no daal do.
to apne kisi dost se office mein phone karwao. Use kehna chahiye ki use tumse baat karni hai. Aur use har ek ghante baad phone karne ko kaho.
phir dekho unka nritya. Thoda nritya karne ka naatak tum bhi kar lena nahi to kisi ko tum par shak ho jayega.
unhe humne thode par bade achhe tarike diye wo unka barabar istemaal kar rahi hain. Ab ladkon ke liye hum thode aur tarike le aaye hain. Iske baad bhi agar aap asafal rahe to fir umeed chhod dijiye.

to pata karo ki wo kis vishay mein kamjor hai. Use fir batao ki tum us vishay ke sabse bade gyaani ho. Vishay sikhaate sikhaate use apne dil ka haal bata do. Agar wo tumse zyaada akalmand hai, to tum use madad maango kisi vishay ke liye.
aaj kal sadak ke kinaare log badhiya chinese maal bechte hain. Dekhne mein hazaar, daam sirf sau. Kharido aur de do.
pehle ek rakhi to use zaroor bandhwani padegi. Rakhi ki kasam dekar haath mangne se 100 karya safal hoga.
to tum bhi pahunch jao. Jaise wo pahunche tum mandir ki ghanti bajana chalu kar do. Uske dil ki ghanti baj jayegi bhagwaan ke saamne.

Dhishum Dhishum se lekar hasi ke samandar tak, sab kuch hai ismein. Aur phir ek sabse alag tarah ki prem kahani, jise dekhkar koi bhi pathhar dil pighal jaaye. Salmaan bete aur kareena ne jo abhinay dikhaya hai use dekhkar to hamara man bhi aajkal yahi gunguna raha hai ki Aao ji vao ji Dil se dil milao ji Aa gaya hai dekho Bodygaurd

hamara to man prasann ho gaya. Aisa lag raha tha maano ki hum koi sapna dekh rahe hain. Aur jis anzaaz mein Salman bete ne apne shatruon ka naash kiya hai use dekhkar to hum bhi soch rahe hain ki ab hum bhi kisi ke Angrakshak arthaat Bodyguard ban jaayein.

aur uska parinaam dekhiye ki Angrakshak arthaat Bodyguard ne videshon mein kaamyabi ke saare record tod daale hain. Hum to apne bhakton se yahi kahenge ki ab zyaada samay na gavayein aur jaise hi fursat mile to Angrakchak arthaat Bodyguard dekhkar aayein aur sada gungunayein Dhongi baba namo namah.

is nirmanadhin svetar ko utare bagair kyon nikal pade, mirja bamak uthe, tum kya jano ki ruhani ishk kya hota hai ? jo chij itani mehanat aur mohabbat se unhonne ham par chadhaee hai, use utar fenken ? hamen jara bajar se masoor kee dal lane kee jaldi thi. is palle ko utarane men ek umr lag jati. so socha ki lao, palle-gole samet hi bajar ho aaen. jamana dekh le ki shahajahan aur mumataj bivi ka ishk abhi jinda hai. behatar hoga ki gola tum sambhal lo aur hamare pichhe-pichhe bajar tak chale aao. abhi ham gola uthakar jhad-ponchh hi rahe the ki hamari bhavaj begam mirja burke kee chhanv tale taish men funkarati huee dakhil huee aur kichin men dakhil hokar hamari bibi ko bhi ghasit laee. sari prishthabhoomi unhen samajhaee aur mirja ko vo-vo dhuli-punchhi sunaee ki agale ka patiya gul aur dhibari tait ho gaee.

jaldabaji men bachche ke svetar ka palla dat aae the, aur apane svetar ke palle men salaiyon samet bachche ko lapet kar rakh aae the.donon hi andar kanstrakashana svetaron ka dijain ek tha aur purani udhadi huee dhuli oon se ban rahe the. mirja sir jhukae bagalen jhank rahe the, aur main soch raha tha ki jab bachche ke svetar ka palla mirja par fit aa gaya tab mirja ke svetar ka palla bachche par sahi kyon nahi utara ? kya aaj ke daur men bap-beton men palle-bhar muhabbat bhi bakee nahin rah gaee! oont aur oont men koee fark nahin hota.magar bachchon aur bachchon men fark hota hai. bachche amir aur garib hote hain. bhookhe aur saje-dhaje hote hain.magar oont hamesha nanga hota hain! oont amir aur garib kabhi nahin hota!.aajadi ke in mahattvapoorn 36 varshon ka asar bachchon par bhale hi pada ho.oonton par nahin pada.

n pahanane ko.bina vajah prithvi par aane ka pap bhogata hai aadami ka bachcha. .ab aap kripaya oonton aur bachchon kee ek ghatana suno. dilli aur jayapur ke bich rashtriy marg par tooriston ke manoranjan ke lie rajasthan toorist devalapament karaporeshan ne mid ve nam ka ek umda restran banaya huaa hai. yon bhi bhookh ke desh men aalishan restran banana ek achchhi bat hai. yahan bachchon ke lie oont kee savari kee vyavastha hai. yah bhi ek achchhi bat hai. bachapan rahate tak hi bachcha oont kee savari kar sakata hai. bada hone par rajaniti aur vyavastha ke oont aadami kee pith par savar ho jate hain aur desh dhire-dhire aage badhane lagata hai.
n oont ne. donon hi janate the shayad ki bal divasaka svang rachane vale is desh men, bachche aur bachche men jamin aur aasaman ka fark hota hai.

n hi oont kee savari ke yogy hote hain. dilli ke mardan skool ke bachche fir bhi achchhe khate-pite gharanon ke hai.unhen bhi oont kee savari ke aanand se vanchit kar diya afasar shahi ne ab jara us bachche ke bare men sochie jo adhananga hai.bhookha hai.sirf bachcha kahalane ka aparadhi hai. vah sirf door se yah dekh sakata hai ki oont kaisa hota hai aur bade bachche is par kaise savari karate hain.

ve aaj ise do kshan oont kee savari ya mitti kee ek chhoti-si chidiya dene se kyon katarate hain? .kitani bal sansthaen.kitane hi shishu kendr evan bal sudhar grih apane bade-bade bord khokhale dholon jaise latakae baithe hain, par desh ka aam bachcha aaj bhi utana hi rita hai jitana apane bachapan men main tha. bachche ke hisse men, in 36 varshon men sirf tirange jhande kee tasvir aaee hai jisake rang dekhakar vah khush ho leta hai. kahan hain ve log jo kahate hain ki is desh se bal-shrama chaild lebar khatm ho raha hai ? thand men thithurate hajaron masoom aaj bhi eeten dho rahe hai.gadi khinch rahe hai.doosaron ke bartan manj rahe hain. doosaron kee fenkee huee joothan hi in bachchon ke hisse ka prajatantr hai.aajadi hai.

oont bachchon ko dekhata hai. donon ke bich men ek sampoorn samajavad kee doori hai. khuli karon par se sadak ke bachchon par mala fenkana aur bat hai.band kothariyon men unake pet kee bhookh aur tan kee bimari aankana aur bat hai. .madar teresa jaisi hamadard hastiyan sadiyon men kahin ek paida hoti hain.-36 varsh se gal-bajae ja rahe hain bal kalyan ke nam par.majadoor ka beta majadoor aur bhikhari ka beta bhikhari hi paida ho raha hai. bhookh ke dher par bhookh hi janm le rahi hai. adhikaron kee hod-si lagi hai. jisake pas nanhe bachchon ko oont par se utar sakane ka adhikar hai, vah usi ka bharapoor upayog kar raha hai. ek apane bachche kee khushi ke lie kitane hi bachchon kee aankhon se khushi kee chamak chhini ja rahi hai. yah upalabdhi hain neharoo ke sapanon kee

bal udyan, oont aur hathi-ghode hata lo! magar jab tak ye hain, in par sab bachchon ka saman hak hai ! afasar shahi ke panv pasarane ko aur bhi jaminen hain ! chand bachchon ke cheharon kee hansi chhinakar afasarashahi surkharoo nahin hoti.syah aur badanam ho jati hai.bachchon ke bhole man to yon bhi bhi sab kuchh bahut jald bhool jate hain! bachche jo thahare!

keliforniya kee ek ledi kilirin margaret ne marate-marate mera bhram door kar diya. huaa yoon ki, duniya se kharch hote vakt margaret ke pas assi hajar dalar kee rakam thi. aage nath, n pichhe pagaha. so vasiyat kar gaee ki rakam unake antim sanskar men shamil hone valon men bant di jae. kis tarah? jo chupachap shamil hon unhen panch-panch dalar.jo chikh-chikh kar roe aur sina piten, unhen pachas-pachas dalar.margaret gujar gayi.janaje men 500 log sharik hue. sabake sab dahade mar-mar kar sina pitate hue ro rahe the. antat apane aansuon kee nakad keemat vasool kar apane ghar laut gaye.

magar yah nahin suna ki magaramachchh ne kabhi apane aansuon kee keemat mangi ho. insani magaramachchh jyada kalchard hota hai. keemat vasool leta hai.nakali aansoo bad men bahata hai.deshahit men.imej bani rahati hai.

sookha, garibi, badh, durghatanaen, dharmik dange. jahan maut kee khabar aayi, ghar vale bad men rote hain, neta pahale hi aansoo-bhiga stetament jari kar deta hai ki vah bahut dukhi hai. ban gaee imej. khari ho gaee sukh subidha kee karensi .maut ek badi numaish ho gaee is mulk men. aansuon se chhape is numaish ke tikat bechakar kitani hi rakam ugah chuke hain log. margaret ke rone par pachas dalar mile aur silasila khatm ho gaya.yah bhi koee bat huee ? hamare yahan sadhe tin dashakon se ek-ek aansoo kaish ho raha hai. jab-jab kisi trejedi par mulk ka koee rahanuma roya hai, mujhe hansi aayi hai. rota huaa neta ya mantree mujhe achchha nahin lagata. rona hi tha to mantree kahe ko huaa ? matadata kee aankhon men aansoo nechural lagate hain.

aansuon kee tankee ful hoti chali jati hai. deshaprem badhata chala jata hai. margaret kee aatma khush ho rahi hogi ki usake antim sanskar par agalon ko pachas-pachas dalar mil gae. kash, divangat mahila ne bharatiy antim sanskar dekhe hote! kisi pavarafula ke kutte ka bhi antim sanskar hota hai to shraddhalu pahunch jate hain.aansoo bahate hain aur kalantar men kisi n kisi roop men apane bahaye gae aansuon ka poora fayada tip lete hain. ek bhi aansoo fri nahin bahane pata.han, kuchh thard klas aansoo aise jaroor hote jinakee koee keemat nahin hoti.masalan, berojagar naujavan ke aansoo.kvari beti ke bap ke aansoo, luti huee ijjat ke aansoo.dharm ke nam par chali huee goli ke falasvaroop tooti huee choodiyon ke aansoo . kisi bachche ke bhookhe pet ke aansoo.aspatal aur pulis kee yatana jhelane vale ke aansoo.vagairah. main inhen aansoo hi nahin manata. yah to sare jahan se achchha hindostan hamara ka nity kram hai. inakee koee keemat nahin lagati. lagani bhi nahin chahie.

kursi aur inako barakarar rakhati hai aur nakali aansoo dhire-dhire videshi bainkon men dalar kee shakl men badal jata hai. haisiyat ke anusar sabaka videshi bainkon men inhin ghadiyali aansooon ka dipajit hai. rajaniti men ve shahidi aansoo ab rahe hi nahin jo sine kee tahon se nikalakar aankhon tak aate the. unhonne aajadi dilaee aur aankhon hi aankhon men khushk ho gae.

Hello Friends Kya Aap jaante hai QR Code kya hai or QR Code se kya hota hai or ye kis kis kaam aata hai, agar nahi to ye post aapke liye hai. QR Code jiska matlab hota hai Quick Response Code. Ye ek code hota hai jo ham insano ki akho se us message ko nahi pas sakte par ham us code ko Mobile Phone me camera ki madad se aasani se read kar sakte hai. Jo Code hota hai usko ham jese hi Mobile me camera se scan karte hai us code me jo bhi message hota hai to aa jata hai. Abhi ke time me QR Code ka bhut si jagha use ho raha hai, Q ki ham sab jaante hai Mobile to har ek ke pass hai to agar hame kuch information kisi ke mobile me jaldi se deta hai to wo ham QR Code ki madad se kar sakte hai Inke aalawa bhi bhut se tarike hai jinke liye QR code ka istmaal kiya ja sakta hai, QR Code ko Scan karke Whatsapp Hack kar sakte hai. Aapne Paytm ka ads bhi dekha hoga TV par jisme payment karne ke liye ek QR Code scan karna padta hai uske baad payment ho jati hai. issi trha bhut se tariko se ham QR Code ka use kar sakte hai. Sabse main baat QR Code ki wo ye ki ham usko apni akho se nahi pad sakte ki usme kya hai par Mobile se bhut jalti uska message hame pata chal jata hai. jesa ki mene abhi bataya ki ham QR Code ki madad ham kisi bhi information ko Mobile me jaldi se de sakte hai. QR Code ka Istlam ham T-shirt, Mug, Business Card jesi bhut si jagha use kar sakte hai. Ye Aap Dekh sakte hai mere Business Card par bhi mene QR Code use kiya hai jisko scan karne par HindiMeHelp.com open ho jati hai. QR Code Banane ke bhut tarike hai, or usko banane ke liye bhut si sites bhi hai or android ke app bhi hai. Hindi Me Help ka QR Code Generator bhi hai to ham usse hi dekhege kaise QR Code bana sakte hai. QR Code kaise Banaye uske liye Steps ko Follow kare Step 1 Sabse Phele to QR Code Generator ki Site par jaye. QRCode.HindiMeHelp.com Step 2 Ab apni Type select kare ki aap kiske liye QR Code banana chate hai. Abhi aapko dikhane ke liye me URL select kar leta hu. Step 3 Ab hame Apni QR Code ke liye detail bharni hai Step 4 Ab aapka QR Code ban chuka hai QR Code ko scan karne ke liye hamare pass smart phone hona chaiye jisme camera ho. Bhut si Companiya ab Mobile me phele se QR Code scanner deti hai to ho sakta hai aapke mobile me phele se ho. Agar nahi to koi baat nahi hai Aap PlayStore par QR Code Scanner search kare bhut sare aa jayege. Step 1 agar aapke mobile me QR Code Scanner nahi hai to aap yaha se download kar lijiye phele apne moble me. bhut se QR Code scanner hai par mera mand pasand hai QuickMark Android Phone ke liye yaha se download kare Download QR Code Scanner iPhone ke liye yaha se Download kare Download QR Code Scanner Step 2 Ab aapke Mobile me App ko Install karne ke baad usko open kare. Step 3 Ab aap dekhege ki aapke mobile ka camera chalu ho gaya hai or usme scanner aa raha hai. Ab simple jaha bhi QR Code hai uske saamne apne mobile ka camera lejaye. jese hi QR Code camera me aayega, aap dekhege ki jo QR Code me hai wo aapke mobile me aa jayega. abhi ye Qr Code Scan karke dekhe apne mobile se To Friends ab aap jaan chuke hai QR Code kya hai, iska kya istmaal hai, isko kaise istmaal karte hai or QR Code ko kaise banate hai. Fir bhi agar aapka koi sabal hai QR Code se sambandit to aap comment me puch sakte hai.

jise kanban, kabir, akabar, tulasidas, vivekanand aur gandhi pahachan sakenge athava badalakar vah poora-ka-poora amarika aur yoorop ban jaaiga? pichhale sau-dedh sau varshon se bharat aadhunikata kee or badhata aa raha hai, lekin samajha yah jata hai ki bharat ab bhi aadhunik desh nahin hai, vah madhyakalinata se aachchhann hai. svatantrata ke bad se aadhunikata ka prashn atyant prakhar ho utha hai, kyonki chintak yah manate hain ki hamane agar aadhunikata ka varan shighrata ke sath nahin kiya, to hamara bhavishy andhakarapoorn ho jayega. ataev yah prashn vicharaniy hai ki aadhunik banane par bharat ka kaun-sa roop bachane vala hai aur kaun balidan men jayega. naitikata saundary-bodh aur adhyatm ke saman aadhunikata koee shashvat mooly nahin hai.

vah keval samay-sapekshy dharm hai. navin yug, samay-samay par aate hi rahate hai aur jaise aaj ke naye jamane par aaj ke logon ko naj hai, usi tarah har jamane ke log apane jamane par naj karate hai. sansar ka koee bhi samaj kisi bhi samay itana svabhavik nahin raha hai ki vah har aadami ko pasand ho. aur koee samaj aisa bhi nahin bana hai, jisake bad ka kal usaka aalochak nahin huaa ho. vaidik yug bharat ka pray sabase adhik svabhavik kal tha. yahi karan hai ki aaj tak bharat ka man us kal kee or bar-bar lobh se dekhata hai.

yah ham nahin janate, kintu unaka samay hamen svarnnakal ke saman avashy dikhayi deta hain. lekin jab bauddh yug ka aaranbh huaa. vaidik samaj kee pol khulane lagi aur chintakon ke bich usakee aalochana aaranmbh ho gayi. bauddh yug anek drishtiyon se aaj ke aadhunikata-aandolan ke saman tha. brahmanon kee shreshthata ke viruddh buddh ne vidroh ka prachar kiya tha. jati-pratha ke buddh virodhi the aur manushy ko ve janmana nahin karmana shreshth ya adham samajhate the. nariyon ko bhikshuni hone ka adhikar dekar unhone yah bataya tha ki moksh keval purooshon ke hi nimitt nahin hai, usakee adhikarani nariyan bhi ho sakati hain. buddh kee ye sari baten bharat ko yad rahi hain aur buddh ke samay se barabar is desh men aise log utpann hote rahe hain, jo jatipratha ke virodhi the, jo manushy ko janmana nahin karmana shreshth ya adham samajhate the.

to buddh ke yuddh-virodhi vichar bhi aadhunik the. kintu buddh men aadhunikata se bemel bat yah thi ki ve nivritivadi the. grihasthi ke karm se ve bhikshu-dharm ko shreshth samajhate the. unakee prerana se desh ke hajaron-lakhon yuvak, jo hatte-katte the, hal jotane aur gadi hankane ke yogy the. utpadan badhakar samaj ka bharann-poshan karane ke layak the. sannyasi ho gaye aur unakee yuva patniyan jivit vaidhavy kee vedana se kaharane lagin. sannyas kee sanstha samaj-virodhini sanstha hai. hansi-hansi men ek bar svami vivekanand ne bhi kaha tha ki sannyas ka ek bada dosh yah hai ki vah achchhe logon ko samaj se alag kar deta hai. kintu vivekanand fir bhi adhik aadhunik nikale, kyonki apane sannyasiyon ko unhonne samajasevi bana diya.

kintu doosare daravaje se ve sansar men hi vapas aa jate hai apani grihasthi chhodakar ve sabakee grihasthi men sahayata karate hain. kintu buddh kee drishti aihik thi hi nahin. ve manushy ko yah upadesh dete the ki jivan jalata huaa makan hai aur buddhimani kee bat yah hai ki ham is aag se nikal bhagen. jivan dukhapoorn hai aur sare dukhon kee jad manushy ka janm hai. ataev hamen vah rasta pakadana chahie, jisase janm lena hi asanbhav ho jay. srishti ke vishay men buddh kee drishti kya thi, isaka spashtikaran buddh ne kabhi nahin kiya. is par buddh ko kaee nastik athava sandehavadi manate hain. garache adhik sachcha mat yah maloom hota hai ki buddh eganastik the, kyonki unaka vichar tha ki jo tatv bhautikottar aur indriyon kee pahunch ke par hain, unhen buddhi nahin jan sakati hai. aur unakee yahi nastikata aur sandehavadita unhen aadhunik yug ke lie aakarshak bana deti hai.

kintu charvak aur brihaspati bharatiy vicharadhara athava usake drishtikon ka pratinidhitv nahin karate. kintu buddh bharatiy vicharadhara ke bahut bade pratinidhi hai. unaka bharatiy chintan par prabhav hai aur bharatiy sanskriti ke pratinidhi hone ke karan hi ve vishnu ke navam avatar mane jate hain. gautam buddh prachand buddhivadi the. ve janata kee shradva ka shoshan karake us par apana mat ladana chahate the. apane shishyon se bhi unhone kaha tha, aatmadipo bhava. tum apana dipak aap bano. tum meri koee bhi bat isalie mat mano ki vah meri kahi huee hai. tumhen unhin baton men vishvas karana chahie, jo tumhari khud kee samajh men aati hon. jin prashnon ka samadhan buddhi se nahin ho sakata aur jinake uttar pane ya n pane se aadami ka kuchh banata- bigadata nahin, vaise sabhi prashnon ko tathagat ne avayakrit koti men dal diya tha aur unake poochhe jane kee manahi kar di thi diryanikay ke potthapad-sutt men buddh karate hai podvapad! log nity hai, aur doosara mat yah ki lok nirarthak hai, ise mainne avyakrit kathan ka avishay kaha hai. potthapad ke yah poochhane par ki kisalie bhante, bhagavan ne ise avyakrit kaha hai? tathagat ne batalaya ki isalie ki ye prashn n to arthayukt hain, n dharmayukt, n aadi brahmachary ke upayukt, n nirved vairagy ke lie, n nirodh ke lie, n upasham ke lie. arthat in prashnon ke vivechan men padane se manushy ko kuchh bhi prapt hone vala nahin hai.

buddh ka avyakrit charon or se nishchhidr nahin hai, kyoki paralok ko ve manate the, devataon kee yoni men unaka vishvas tha aur, garache aatma ko ve nashavan samajhate the, kintu aavagaman ke sidvant men unaka atal vishvas tha aur ve manate the ki jo aatma sharir ke sath nasht hoti hai, usi ka punarjanm bhi hota hai. ataev janmantaravad aur karmafalavad men unaka poora vishvas tha aur is mamale men unaka darshan vahi tha, jo vaidik dharm valon ka raha hai. buddh ke pahale bharat men sanskriti kee ek hi dhara bahati thi, jise ham vaidik sanskriti ke nam se janate hai. kintu buddh ke aavirbhav ke bad se is desh men sanskriti kee do dharaen bahane lagi hai.

jo varnashram-dharm ka samarthan karati hai, jati-pratha ko kayam rakhana chahati hai, shoodron ko oopar uthane dena nahin chahati chhuaachhoot men vishvas karati hai. aur any dharmon aur sanskritiyon ke prabhav se bachakar jina chahati hai. doosari dhara vah hai, jo buddh ke kamandalu se nikali hai. yah dhara brihat manavata kee dhara hai. ab to is dhara ka bhi eeshvar men vishvas hai aur vah janmantaravad aur karmafalavad ko usi dridhata se manati hai, jis dridhata ke sath vaidik dharm usamen vishvas karata hai, kintu yah dhara varnashram-dharm ke viruddh hai, jat-pat ko vah nahin manati hai, chhuaachhoot ko vah adharm samajhati hai, shoodro aur daliton ke lie usake bhitar khas pakshapat hai tatha any dharmon aur sanskritiyon se vah dvesh nahin, prem karati hai, kam-se- kam unake prati vah poorn roop se sahanashil hai.

kisi any dharm-neta ke karan kam hai. aur koee aashchary nahin ki is desh men dharm ke jo shaktishali thekedar the, unhone bauddh mat ko khadedakar desh se bahar nikal diya. kintu bauddh keval sharir se hi hara hai. man to usaka sanpoorn hindutv ke bhitar aaj bhi jivit aur sachet hai. jyon-jyon samay bitata jata hai ham manu ke paksh men kam, buddh ke paksh men adhik hote jate hain, tulasi kee or kam, kabir kee or adhik jhukate jate hain. lagata hai buddh ne jin baton ke khilaf vidroh kiya tha, hamen bhi unake viruddh aavaj uthani chahie, kyonki vaidik dharm kee jo baten buddh ko napasand thin, ve dharm ke tatv nahin, usake oopar jami huee roodhiyon kee papadiyan hai aur unhen todakar jhade bina bharatadharm navin nahin hoga. jisaka arth yah hai ki vah apane asali svaroop par nahin pahunchega.

kanban aur tulasidas hain? athava vah jisake shastrakar svayan buddh, darshanik nagarjun aur vasubandhu tatha kavi tiroovalluvar, vemanna aur kabir hain? prashn bada hi bihad hai, lekin khairiyat yah hai ki itihas ne use sulajhakar hamare lie aasan kar diya hai. hindu-dharm ab vahin nahin hai, jo kanban aur tulasi athava vemanna aur kabir ke samay tha. yooropiy sanpark ka ek bahut bada shubh parinam ham yah manate hain ki usane hindutatv ko hilakor kar usake bhitar ek kranti utpann kar di aur us kranti ne manu aur buddh vali donon dharaon ko milakar ek kar diya hai.

jo manu kee smriti tatha vidyapati ke ninbadhon men likha milata hai. usaka shashvat, chir-navin aur jagrat roop ab vah hai, jisaka aakhyan paramahans ramakrishn aur svami vivekanand ne kiya hai, aravind aur maharshi raman ne kiya hai, gandhi aur svami dayanand ne kiya hai. yah thik hai ki vivekanand aur gandhi ke bataye hue marg par sari janata abhi nahin chal rahi hai. kintu yah bhi thik hai taki samaj ke agrani log, jinaka aacharan dekhakar samaj apana aacharan badalata hai, purane hindutv ko chhodakar abhinav hindutv par aa gaye hain aur jahan samaj ke agrani log aaj pahunche hai, vahan sara samaj kal pahunchakar rahega.

vivekanand aur gandhi ke is svapn ka kya banane vala hai ki hamen bharatiy paranpara ke shiv-ansh ko kayam rakhana hai, hamen apani paranpara ke sarvashreshth tatvon ko pashchaty sabhyata ke un tatvon se ekakar karana hai, jo us sabhyata ke sarvashreshth ansh hai? aur kahin hamane apani paranpara ka pakshapat karane ke prayas men aadhunikata ka poorn roop, se varan nahin kiya, to isase hamara aur sansar ka koee akalyan to nahin hone vala hai? sansar men jab bhi koee naya yug aaranbh hota hai, vah yuddh ke karan aaranbh nahin hota, parajay ya vijay ke karan aaranbh nahin hota, kranti ke karan aaranbh nahin hota, n desh ka naksha badalane se aaranbh hota hai. naya yug barabar naye prakar ke logon ke janm ke sath udit hota hai.

jisakee arth-vyavastha jatil aur svabhavat hi prasarannashil ho, jo tek-aafa kee sthiti ko par kar chukee ho. band samaj vah hai jo any samajon se prabhav grahan nahin karata jo apane sadasyon ko bhi dhan ya sanskriti ki dirgha men oopar uthane kee khooli chhoot nahin deta, jo jati-pratha aur gotravad se pidit hai, jo andhavishvasi, gatanugatik aur sankeern hai.

us samaj ke log any samajon se milane-julane men nahin ghabarate, n ve unnati ka marg khas jatiyon aur khas gautron ke lie hi simit rakhate hain. aadhunik samaj ka ek lakshan yah bhi hai ki usakee har aadami ke pichhe hone vali aay adhik hoti hai, har aadami ke pas koee dhandha ya kam hota hai, aur avakash kee shikayat pray har ek ko rahati hai. lekin ye aadhunikata ke bahari lakshan hain. yoorop aur amarika ka samaj, sachche arthon men, aadhunik samaj hai aur oopar ke lakshan mainne yooropiy samaj ko hi dekh kar diye hain. kintu udyog aur rojagar, saksharata aur oonchi aay, yadyapi is samaj ke pramukh lakshan hai magar yooropiy samaj ke ve maulik gun nahin hai.

usaka asali karan vaigyanik drishtikon kee prathamikata aur prabaly hai. yah drishti udyog aur teknaloji se nahin utpann huee hai, balki teknaloji aur udyog hi is drishti ke parinam hain. yoorop aur amarika ka sabase bada lakshan vaigyanik drishti hai, nishthur hokar saty ko khojane kee vyakulata hai. aur is khoj ke kram men shradra, vishvas, paranpara aur dharm, kisi bhi badha ko buddhi svikar karane nahin hai. aadhunik munashy ke bare men samany kalpana yah hai ki apane chintan men vah nirmam hota hai, nishthur aur nirbhik hota hai. jo bat buddhi kee pakad men nahin aa sakati, use vah trikal men bhi svikar nahin karega aur jo baten buddhi se sahi dikhayi deti hain, unakee vah khuli ghoshana karega, chahe ve dharm ke viruddh padati hon, naitikata ke khilaf jati hon athava unase manavata ka chiraposhit vishvas khand-khand ho jata ho. isilie log aksar aadhunikata ko nastikata ka paryay samajh lete hain aur yah sochane lagate hain ki aadhunikata ka ek lakshan yah bhi hai ki vah naitik niyamon kee avahelana karati hai. yahi nahin, jinhonne aadhunikata kee rooh ko pahachanane kee koshish nahin kee hain, ve jaja sangit aur trivasta nrity tatha mata-pita ke sath ladakon ke durvyavahar ko bhi aadhunikata ka hi lakshan man lete hain.

uchchhrinkhalata ki nishani hain aur ve aadhunik hon bhi, to mai to unhen aadhunikata kee prakriti nahin, vikriti hi kahoonga. ye kuritiyan aadhunikata kee shobha nahin badhatin, purane deshon men use agrahay bana deti hai. unnisavin sadi men aadhunikata kee lahar bharatavarsh men bade jor se uthi thi aur jahan tak usake moolatattv yani buddhivad ka sanbandh hai, hamare mahapurushon ne use svikar bhi kiya tha.

unase kaee guna adhik log svadhin chintak hone ka svang bharane lage. aise yuvak us samay apane ko yang bangala kahate the. aur apani aadhunikata kee abhivyakti ve sharab pikar, apane dharm kee ninda karake balki mandiron men gomans fenkakar karate the. inase se bahut-se log eesaee bhi ho gaye the or kaee mamalon men dekha gaya tha ki unake dharm-parivartan kee prerana aadhyatmik jigyasa nahin, koee ihalaukik lobh athava prem tha.

jinamen hamen mohabbat nahin, ghrina thin. aadhunikata ke viruddh bharatiy samaj ne jo kathor pratikriya abhivyakt kee thi, usaka praman ham unnisavin sadi men dekh chuke hain. aadhunikata ke chhichhalepan ko dekhakar bharat itana naraj huaa ki yoorop ko svikar karane ke badale usane ek doosari hi rah pakad li. hindoo kahane lage ki hamari sanskriti bahut purani hain, hamara sahity sarvashreshth hai aur dharm ke bare men ham jitana janate hain, usase adhik janakari ka dava yoorop ke log nahin kar sakate, ataev ve hamase chahe to dharm sikh len, ham unakee vichar-paddhati ko kabool nahin karengen. aur musalaman kahane lage ki jo shikshaen hamen yoorop ke log dene aaye hain, ve hamare dharm granthon men pahale se hi maujood hain. nayi duniya se hamen kuchh bhi nahin lena hain. lekin bharat us samay bhram men tha. nayi duniya kee hamane bahut sari baten svikar kar li hain aur bahut-si baton ko svikar karane kee hamari taiyari jari hai.

vah aadhunikata ka parinam hai. kolejon aur yoonivarsitiyon ka aaj ka roop bahar se aaya hain, saksharata ka vikas aadhunikata ke dhakke se ho raha hai. hamare prajatantr kee paddhati yoorop aur amarika se li gayi hain. vyaktivad kee prerana is desh men yoorop aur amarika kee dekha-dekhi badh rahi hai aur sammilit parivar kee paripati par jo khatare mandara rahe hain, ve bhi aadhunikata kee hi den hai. nariyon kee maryada-vriddhi aadhunikata ke karan ho rahi hai aur yadi aadhunikata kee prerana hamare bhitar kam nahin karati hoti, to ham hindoo kod ko kanoon ka roop nahin de sakate the. kuchh baton men aadhunikata ne hamari sahayata paroksh roop se bhi kee hai.

ve buddh men dikhayi padi thin, bhakt aur sant kaviyon men dikhayi padi thi. unhen aadhunikata ne kuchh tej kar diya aur ham asprishyata ko kanooni aparadh ghoshit karane men safal hue. isi prakar hamare sanvidhan men jo yah shart rakhi gayi hain ki nar-nari ke bich koee asamanata nahin barati jayagi tatha unnati ke avasar sabhi jatiyon ke logon ko, bhedabhav ke bina, upalabdh rahenge, vah shart, vaise dekhiye to, manusmriti ke khilaf padati hai. lekin us shart ko janata ne isalie kabool kar liya ki pichhale sau-dedh sau varshon ke bhitar usake kattarata ke bahut-se bhav badal gaye hain ya dhile pad gaye hain aur usaka man dhire-dhire navin ho raha hai.

Sandeep ne Limca Book of World Record se contact kiya, or 10 ghanto me lagatar 100 se jada models ke 10000 photo khich kar World Record bana diya. jisse unki News TV or Paper me aai to wo sabki najro me aa gaye. ab Sandeep ko idea aaya ki wo ek website banaye jisme wo apne khiche hue photo ko online sale kar sake. unhone web Developer se ek website banwai jiska naam tha imagesbazaar.com, jisko pura teyar karne me lagbhag ek saal laga, par ye website apni trha ki pheli website thi jisme Indian Models ke photo the jo kisi bhi Advertisement ya marketing ke liye use kiye ja sakte the. Par yaha Sandeep Maheshwari ne iss idea ko drop karne se phele socha q naa me khud isko solve karu, iske liye unhe programming nahi aati thi to unhone online or books se read karke itni programming sikh li ki kis code ka kya matlab hai samaj me aa jaye. or uske baad kaha kya dikkat thi wo bhi unko samaj me aa gaya.
