Hamesa Yaad rakho, Aap apni Problem se kaiguna bade ho. Aapko khud ki najar me uthna hai, jo insan khud ki najar me uth gaya wo duniya ki najar me apne aap uth jata hai. Jis wait aap uss chij ko dekhte jo jab wo aapke pass nahi hai, uss time aapki kismat buri hoti hai. or jis time aap uss chij ko dekhte ho jis pal wo aapke pass hai, uss time aapki kismat achi hoti hai. Sabse phele aapko apne commitment pure karne hai, Jab aap khud ke commitment pure nahi kar pa rahe ho to dusro ke diye huee commitment kaise pure karoge. Aap apne Dimag ko control kare, nahi to wo aapko control karega. Agar aapne apni aadate badli, to aapki jindgi bhi badlegi. nahi to jindgi me wahi hoga jo hota aaya hai. Kamyabi anubhab se aati hai or anubhav galtiyo se yani kharab anubhav se. Aapko Powerful banna hai, isliye nahi ki kisi ko dawa sake, Aapko powerful banna hai taki koi aapko dawa naa sake. Desire chunna hai to bada chuno, bade se bada. Iss Duniya ka sakbse bada. Jisko pata hai wo kya kaam kar rahe hai, Q kar rahe hai. unko koi nahi hila sakta. ek taraf wo hai jo aap karna chate ho, banna chate ho or dusri taraf wo hai jo duniya aapko banana chaiti hai. Agar koi vyakti aapse ye khe rahe hai aap ye nahi kar sakte, to wo wass ye khena cha rahe hai ki wo ye nahi kar sakte. Jindgi Cricket Ball ki trha hai, jo ek ke baad ek awsar deti hai, Agar ek Ball chut jaye to dusri ball par najar honi chaiye. Har ek ke andar ek aesi sakti hoti hai jo or kisi ke andar nahi hai, wass aapko unko phechanna hai. Har roj apne aap se ye sabal karo ki me abhi kya sikh raha hu, or har roj kuch na kuch naya sikhne ki aadat bana lo. Gyan ko badao par ahnkar ko nahi, yahi ahankar bada to uske baad aap or gyan nahi le paoge. Ek baat hamesa apne aap se bole, Me Puri Duniya ka ek matra Greatest Person hu . Apne aapko apni Filed me Mahan samje, dusre kya samajte hai usse koi fark nahi padta. Duniya aapko Cadayegi or Girayegi, Duniya ka kaam hi ye hai, wass aapko inn bato se fark nahi padna chaiye. jitni bhi chije aapke aaspas hai un sabse sikhe. Apne aapse mukabla karte jao, waha koi risk nahi hai, Hare tab bhi aap jitoge or jite tab bhi. Jisko Sabal karne ki aadat hai wo kisi bhi fild me jaye success hi hoge. 2 Option hai aapke pass Muje Jindgi katna hai ya Muje Jindgi ko Jina hai. Ek daraf Maja hai or dusri taraf dard, inme balance hona jaruri hai. Aap Job karo ya koi Business, ek skill aesi hai unke bina ham aage nahi bad sakte wo hai Communication Skill . Jitna aap Burai ko dekhoge utna hi dukhi houge, or Jitna aap Dukhi houge utna hi dusro ko dukhi karoge. Jine ki bajha agar badi ho, to apne aap bade bade kaam karwate chali jayegi. Duniya ko aap jab tak nahi badal sakte jab tak aap apne aapko nahi badal lete. Agar aapne thaan liya ki muje iss problem ka sloution nikalna hai to Solution khud wa khud aapke pass chal kar aa jayega. Problem me hi Solution chupa hota hai. jindgi me kuch bhi karna hai to Sach bol do . Agar aapke andar dherya hai to apni jindgi me har fesle sahi tarike se lege. Ek war apna Learning Attitude ban gaya. Fir paise ka kya hai aap kitna bhi kama loge. Iss duniya me Magic naam ki koi chij nahi hai. Aapki jindgi ke ware me aapke Maa-Baap se jada acha koi nahi soch sakta. Strongly Recommend by Sandeep Maheshwari, Must Watch Dr APJ Abdul Kalam Biography in Hindi

natyadharmi aur lokadharmi pravritiyon ko bhinn batate unaka ullekh karate hain. mahabharat men vyas ji spasht kar dete hain ki pratyakshadarshi lok hi sare vish v ko sarvaprakar se dekhane vala hota hai, pratyakshadarshi lokanan sarvadarshi bhaventarah. isi prakar gita 15-18 men bhi ved aur lok ka mahatv alag-alag prati-padit kiya gaya hai, ato.smi loke vede ch prachitah purushottamah. bharatiy chintan men loka shabd ke tatpary ko sangat roop se spasht karane vala ek any shabd jana hai.

janan vibhrati bahuya vivachasan. nana dharmannan prithivi yathokasam 45. yahi manav matr kee or ingit karane vala jana shabd, samrat ashok ke saptam aur ashtam shilalekhon men sthan pata hai jahan samrat janapadavasiyon se sampark karane nikalata hai. yah jana us samrajy ke sare nivasi hain jo nagar, gram aadi men basate hain. is vivechan se yah nishkarsh sahaj men hi nikalata hai ki lok aur jan ka arth sare nivasiyon se hai jo kahin bhi basate hon.

vichar, sanskar aur aupacharik bandhanon ke karann, samany jan samaj se alag padata huaa, nagar varga se sanbodhit hone lagata hai. ise aabhijaty varg bhi kah sakate hain. is varg ke lie kuchh kary-kalapon ka khula pradarshan varjit teboo hota hai. yah varg svanirmit anushasan ke niyamon se bandha rahata hai.

bhasha, sahity aur jivanacharya ek vishesh dhanche men bandh jati hai. athach aise varg ka sahity ritibaddh aur shastr sammat hota hai. is aabhijaty sahity ke thik samanantar lok samuday ka sahity bhi pravahit hota rahata hai, jo nisandeh svachchhand, nirankush, sahaj aur naisargik bhavon se ras-sikt rahata hai. sach to yah hai ki lok-sahity koee aabhijaty sahity ke viparit nahin hota hai. vah lok samuday ke ek ghatak ka sahity hai jo shisht varg dvara srijit hota hai. apani ritibaddhata ke karan aabhijaty sahity ke nam se sanbodhit hota hai. is paripatijany vyaktigat sahity se bhinn lokasahity hota hai jo shastr sammat pandity kee chetana athava ahankar se shoony rahata hai. tark aur kasauti se koson door rahata huaa, indriyon ke sabhi sukhon ko bhogata huaa vah yug pravah men bahata rahata hai. paramparagat vish vason v manyataon ko sahaj bhav se svikar karate, apane vicharon ko giton, kathaon tatha pradarshanakari-kalaon ke madhyam se prakat karata rahata hai. is bhanti lok apana gatishil jivan bitata hai, vah kisi aadim bhav ke khoonte se badha nahin rahata hai.

vah ek vishal jivant samooh hai. har yug men hone vale is mridu pari-vartan ko, us yug ke lok sahity men aank sakate hain. parinishthit sahity ke sath-sath lok sahity bhi vismrit hota, khandit hota aur parivarddhit hota pravahaman rahata hai. yah lok sahity aur pradarshanakari-kalaon kee parampara, apane yug ka darpan hoti hai. abhi bharatiy lok sahity ke sangrah aur parichay ka prayas matr huaa hai, usaka yug parak itihas likhana bhavishy ke aadhin hai ?

vah rachana lokarachit hoti hai. is srijan aur srijak kee oohapoh ka samadhan bhi aavashyak hai. lokarachana ka srijak koee samooh nahin ho sakata. bhavonmad men aakar koee srijak apani anubhooti shabdon athava pradarshan dvara vyakt karata hai. vah anubhooti svabhavik, sahaj aur ahaitukee hone par lok samooh dvara apana li jati hai, tab vah srijan, lok-manas kee abhivyakti ban jata hai. usaka uts v srijak vismrit ho jate hain aur sara lok samuday use angikar kar env poornnaroopen apanatv pradan kar, srijak ke sthan par aa baithata hai. aarambh men jo vyaktiparak rachana rahi thi vah fir lok mukh men sthan pakar sarvajanin ban jati hai. fir yug pravah men vah rachana bahati rahati hai. vachik parampara ke karan usake ang sanvardhan dvara pusht hote hain to usake shushk ansh tut bhi girate hain. lokanubhooti aur lokabhivyakti ke karan vah rachana sadaiv hari rahati hai. apane in gunon ke karan vah itani saksham hoti hai ki lok manas ka atoot ang ban jati hai. usake chintan men vah ekakar ho jati hai.

jangali athava aindrik nahin hota hai. vah to gatishil tatha jivant samooh ke karyakalapon ko sanchalit karata hai. usamen sahaj vivek evan mangal kee bhavana bhi rahati hai. vah anayas hi, anajane apana parishkar karata rahata hai. usamen kuchh aise parampara jany vyavahar aur vishvas apana sthan banaye rahate hain jo usakee sahaj prakriti v tark ke abhav men apani sthiti ko kalantar men adhik sudridh bana lete hain. udaharan ke lie shakun ke visvas ko hi len to yah prakat hota hai ki shakun keval vish vas ke karan jivan men jame hue hain jab ki tark se yah sare asangat hain. lok visvason ke aadhar par hi kavi prasiddhiyan tikee hain. n kisi ne chakor ka angar bhakshan karana dekha hai aur n use ratri ko chandr kee or takatakee lagae. sahaj manavi vyavaharon ke karan ritu anukool, parv aur utsavon ka aayojan hota hai jo lok manas dvara sanchalit hota hai. yah sab lok tattv ke parichayak hain jinamen riti-rivajon ke bhoole v vismrit upakaranon ke kuchh avashesh bhi dekhane ko milate hain. lok sahity arthat vachik parampara men jivit rahi rachanaon men aise avashesh v tattv bahulata se milate bhi hain. 5 lok kavy ka shilp.

ter hoti hai aur shabdon kee thumak hoti hai. kya yah gun use jivit nahin rakhate hain ? vah lok ka kanthahar kyon hai ? kya yah gun us naisargik shilp kee or ingit nahin karate hain jisamen maulikata, nootanata aur marmasparshi sanvedana koot koot kar bhari hai ? van pushp kee tajagi sundarata, mohakata evan vichitr agyat suvas ko isalie nahin nakar sakate ki vah kisi vatika athava pushpadan men sthit nahin hai. nagar kee solah shrringar se sajjit sundari ke samakaksh kya kisi alhad agyat yauvana graminn, maili veshabhoosha vali, yuvati ko roop ka patr nahin gin sakate ? saundary athava usaka shilp ritibaddh rachanaon men shastreey hoga parantu lok rachanaon men vah sahaj evan naisargik aabha evan chatak lie hoga jo sadaiv nit nootan hoga. ataev lok sahity niralankrit aur bhale hi anagadh ho parantu usamen manav bhavon kee abhi-vyakti jis saralata aur lay se prakat hoti hai, vah rasatmakata anyatr durlabh hai. sach to yah hai ki lok kavy ka niralankaran hi usaka alankaran hai. kya sachamuch men alankar saundary kee vriddhi karate hain ? yah prashnachihn mahakavi bihari ne laga hi rakha hai. usane apani satasaee men aabhooshanon ke dvara nari kee saundary sadhana ko nakara hai. ataev lok kavy ka shilp-saushthav ka lekhajokha aavashyak aur anivary hai. aisa karate samay aalochana ka mapadand koee ritibaddh shastr to avashy nahin hoga.

sootr men itana hi hai ki poongal ka raja apane desh men akal padane ke karan malava prant men, parivar sahit jata hai. usakee shishu vay kee rajakumari maravani ka bal-vivah, malava ke salhakumar dhola se kar diya jata hai. sukal ho jane se poongal ka raja laut kar ghar aa jata hai. salhakumar vayask hone par apani patni ko livane nahin jata hai. use is bal vivah ka gyan bhi nahin hota hai. is bich salhakumar ka vivah malavani se ho jata hai jo sundar aur pati-anurak ta hai. malavani ko maravani saut ke hone ka gyan hai aur poongal ka koee sandesh apane malava men aane nahin deti hai. kalantar men maravani maroo ankurit yauvana hoti hai. us par yauvan apana rang dikhata hai. idhar svapn men use priy ka darshan bhi ho jata hai. paryavaran se sabhi upakaran use virah ka darun dukh dete hain. papiha, saras evan kungj paksheegan ko vah apani virah vyatha sambodhit karati hai. poongal ke raja ke pas ek ghodon ka saudagar aata hai aur malava ke salhakumar kee bat karata hai. yah soochana sunakar maravani aur vyathit ho jati hai. salhakumar ko bulava dhadhiyon mangannahar ke dvara bheja jata hai. yah gane bajane vale chatur dhadhi gantavy sthan par pahunchakar, salhakumar dhola ko maravani kee sthiti ka poora gyan kara dete hain. dhola poongal hetu prasthan karana chahata hai parantu saut malavani use bahane banakar rokati rahati hai. malavani kee eershya, chinta, unmad, kapat, virah aur asahay avastha ka varnnan doohon men vistar se huaa hai. ant men dhola prasthan kar hi deta hai aur poongal pahunch jata hai. dhola aur maravani ka milan hota hai. sukh vilas men samay vyatit hota hai. fir pati-patni apane desh lautate hain to marg men oomar-soomara ke jal se to bach jate hain parantu ek naee vipada unhen gher leti hai. ratri ko registan ka pivana sarp maravani ko soongh jata hai. maravani ke mrit-pray achetan sharir ko dekhakar sthiti visham ho jati hai. vilap aur krandan se sara vatavaran bhar jata hai. tab shiv-parvati prakat hokar maravani ko jivit karate hain. dhola maroo sakushal apane ghar pahunchate hain. aanand se jivan vyatit karate hain. vahan par chatur dhola, sautiha dah kee nonk jhonk ka samadhan bhi karata hai. maravani ko adhik pyar v sneh samarpit karata hai.

inaka vishay hai. prastavana roop yah dohe maru maravani ke pita pingal raja ke vivah kee katha kahate hain. jalor kee rajakanya sundari uma ka varann, apane paurush se karake gujarat ke rajakumar rannadhaval kee mang ka haran karate hain. jalor ka raja samantasi ka namollekh huaa hai. yah sara varnnan itihas viruddh hai. ek roopantar men pankti aaee hai, dhan bhatiyani maravani, dholo kooram ranna, isase maravani jati men bhati aur dhola kachhavaha vansh ke kahe ja rahe hain, parantu itihas in tathyon ka samarthan nahin karata hai. roopantaron men nishchit samvat aadi ke ullekh bhi hain jo kisi prakar se itihas sammat nahin hai. isi bhanti oomar-soomara ka prasang hai jo mool katha men ghat badhakar sthan pa jata hai. varta kee rochakata, romans, kautoohalata aur chatury ke pradarshan hetu umara soomara ka prasang bhale hi upayogi ho parantu itihas isakee sakshee nahin bharata hai. rajasthan kee kathy parampara athava hastalikhit pratiyon men dhola-maroo kee bat ke roopantar, premakatha ke mool roop ko sthit rakhakar, any kathaon ko jodakar varta ka vistar avashy karate hain. parantu is varta ke jo any pradeshik roop milate hai ve dhola-maravani ke prem katha ke sahare, unake mata-pita, bhaee, sevakon aadi ko bhi patr banakar, katha ka naya tana-bana bichhakar, jadoo, ghat-pratighat, chhal-kapat v shadayantr ka sahara lekar katha ko ek naya roop de dete hain. braj, panjab hariyana sahit, chhattisagadh madhy bharat sahit aur bhojapuri lok sahity men rajasthan kee yah bat apane men bahut kuchh nal damayanti ke prasiddh pauranik kathanak ko bhi samet leti hai. vastav men rajasthan kee yah bat, in pradeshon ke katha sahity men kho-si gaee hai aur keval dhola-maroo ke patr nam, kuchh samy ka aabhas matr dilate hain. sahi arthon men rajasthan men milane vale roopantar hi dhola-maroo kee mool athava aadim katha ke prati nishthavan hain.

naye prasangon athava samanantar kathaon ko jodakar, mool katha ko pusht sanvarddhan matr karati hain. udaharan ke lie oomar-soomara ke prasang ka ullekh oopar kar chuke hain. oomar-soomara ke sanbandh men, ek alag se lok katha hai aur yah aitihasik vyakti bhi hai. vah rasik aur nari saundary ka lubdh bhramar hai. yah oomar-soomara ka vyaktitv chitran hai. hamare kathanak kee maravani advitiy sundari hai aur jab aisa hai to usake saundary kee sarthakata athava sakh kee sakshee hetu oomar-soomara ke aakarshit hone ka prasang jod diya gaya. lok kavy ke kathanakon men aisa sahajata se hota hai. maryadaon men simit shastr sammat prem katha men bhi sundari ke padm svaroop mukhamandal kee saurabh ke karann, kale bhaunron kee panktiyan jaise use aa gherati hain. is katha ke any roopantaron men dhola aur bhat ka sanvad vistar se hai. yahi sthiti dhola aur gadariye ke sanvad kee hai. sandeshavahak dhadhiyon ko salh kumar tak pahunchane hetu kaee avarodhak fandane pade, parae desh men saha-yak khojane pade aadi kee prasang-vartayen hi avantar kathayen hain jo apane aap men poorn hain. unhen hata bhi diya jaai to mool katha ka sootr bhang nahin hota aur sanlagn rakhane se katha ko pushti milati hai.

usaka aadi khojana asambhav-sa hai. parantu prastut dhola-maroo ra dooha namak kriti ke jitane rajasthani parampara ke roopantar mile hain unamen ek laksha-nik tathy ujagar hota jan padata hai. yadi vichararth yah kahen ki yah to prasangatmak giton ka sangrah hai jisamen prasangon ke katha sootr ko ath se iti tak akshunn rakhane ka dhyan rakha gaya hai, to kaisa ? is vicharadhara ko ek any drishtant se bal milata hai. mahakavi sooradas ke padon ko prasanganusar isi shati men jamakar jab prakashit kiya gaya to vah padavali bhagavat puran ka anusaran karane vali dikh padi aur bhavavesh men kuchh kah bhi baithe ki yah bhagavat puran ka ultha hai. hamari is dharana kee sthapana hetu hamen koee hath athava aagrah nahin hai parantu is kriti ka vachik parampara men jab samana hota hai tab maravani ke virah sandesh aur malavani ke virah rudan ke prasang hi upasthit hote hain.

Ye to aap jaante hi hoge ki duniya bhar me bhut si bhasaye boli or likhe jaati hai. par agar ham Mobile Laptop par likhte hai to sabse aasan English me hota hai q ki uske saare sabj Keybord par dikhte hai. issi topic par mene phele ek tool share liye tha Type Hindi in English, usme ham English me type karke hindi type kar sakte the. Aaj ussi ka latest version me aap logo se share kar raha hu. Iski khas baat yaha hai ki ye or bhi bhasa ko support karta hai likhne me. Amharic, Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, Greek, Gujarati, Hindi, Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi, Nepali, Oriya, Persian, Punjabi, Russian, Sanskrit, Serbian, Sinhalese, Tamil, Telugu, Tigrinya, Urdu Is Tool ka aap is page par to istmaal kar hi sakte hai par agar aap isko apni website par jodna chate hai to aap niche diye code ko copy karke apni website par dale. Is code ko copy kare Agar aap WordPress par add karna chate hai to aap Text Widget me iss code ko save kare or agar aap blogger par jodna chate hai to HTMLJavascript widget me add kare. Is tool ko apne blog par lagane ka sabse bada ye faida hai ki aapke blog par agar koi apni bhasa me likh kar comment karna chata hai to bo is tool ki madad se likh sakta hai. Appko ye tool kesa laga, or agar aapko apni website ya blog par jodne me kuch bhi paresani aati hai to aap muje bataiye. Agar aapke kuch sujaab hai is tool ke liye to aap bo hame jarur bataye.

motar-gadi dekhe ja sakate hain. ganv ka gudi chaipal aur amaraee aaj dekhane ko nahin milata. naee pidhi ke logon ko maloom bhi nahin hoga ki ganvon men aisa kuchh raha bhi hoga. hamare poorvajon ne ganv men amaraee lagana, kunaa khudavana aur talab khudavana puny kary samajha aur use karavaya. rasile aur pakke aam ka svad bhi hamane chakha. aaj naee pidhi ke bachche botal men band mengo joos, frooti aur aamaras ka jeli aadi ko sarvottam bhale man le lekin palaee aam ko choosane aur aam ka amasara khane ka maja kuchh aur hi tha. mujhe mere ghar men hamare poorvajon ke dvara kunaa aur khudavane sanbandhi kagajat mile hain jisake evaj men dipti kamishnar, rayapur ke dvara prashasti patr diye gaye hain. arthat! das kal men kunaa aur talab khudavana atyant puny kary tha. talabon ke kinare baragad, pipal aur nim ke ped lagavaye the jisakee chhanv men hamara bachapan gujara tha. meri dadi batati hai ki unakee 5-6 varsh ka bachcha khatm ho gaya jisakee yad men unake sasur ne chhuiya talab ke kinare panch ped lagavaye the jisakee chhaya aaj bhi sabako milati hai. prayah sabhi ganvon men anek talab, talab ke kinare ped aur shiv mandir avashy hote the. isi prakar dharmarth kuen khudavaye jate the. talab vatar harvestinga ka bahut achchha madhyam tha.

panchayat dvara pani saplaee bhi kee jati hai. arthat ghar baithe pani kee suvidha ho gayi hai. isalie talab kee upayogita ya to machhali palan ke lie rah gayi hai ya fir use patakar ko imarat banaye ja rahe hain. ganv se shahar ban rahe kasbon ke talabon men gharon ka ganda pani dala ja raha hai. ratanapur, malhar, kharaud aur adabhar men kabhi 120 se 1400 talab hone kee bat kahi jati hai. rayagadh men itane talab the ki use khaiya ganva ke nam se sanbodhit kiya jane laga tha. lekin aaj vahan kuchh hi talab shesh hain bakee sabako patakar badi badi imaraten, skool-kalej aur sinema hal bana diya gaya hai. kahana n hoga ki talab aur nadiyon ke kinare lage pedon ke jad mitti ko bandhe rakhata tha, jisake katane se nadiyon ka katav badhate ja raha hai aur aane vale samay men samooche ganv ke nadi men sama jane ka khatara banane laga hai.

gobar khad kee jagah yooriya khad le liya hai. pani nahin barasa to nahar se liya jata hai jab nahar se pani nahin mila to tyoob bel khodakar pani khinchakar sinchaee kee jati hai. fasal men keede ho jate hain to keet nashak davaeeyan dali jati hai. bhale hi ab dubaraj chanval men khushaboo nahin hai lekin sarakar ke dvara kam samay men adhik paidavar vale dhan ke bij upalabdh kara diya jata hai.

hotal aur any dukan kholakar jine ke aadi hote ja rahe hain. naee pidhi ke kheti-kisani ke prati aroochi se khet banjar hote ja rahe hain, yah chinta kee bat hai. ghar men khane ko kuchh ho ya n ho lekin ek motar sayakal avashy hona chahiye. isake lie baink aur fainensing kanpaniyan lon dene ko taiyar baithe hain. lon ke karj men ghar bhale hi doob jaye, isase kisi ko kuchh lena dena nahin hota. logon ka manana hai ki karj men ham janm lete hain, karj men jite hain aur karj lie mar jate hain.

vyapariyon ka vyapar badh jayega, makan malikon ko kirayedar mil jayega. chhattisagadh shasan audyogik samoohon ko pratishthan lagane ke lie aamantrit kar rahi hai, yahan unhen bhoomi muhaiya kara rahi hai to svabhavik hai ki yahan audyogik pratishthan lagenge hi. lagate ja rahe hain. akele rayagadh jile ke aasapas lagabhag 150 aayaran aur pavar plant lag chuke hain. chhattisagadh ka sabase bada jindal spanj aur stil plant lag chuka hai aur jald hi unaka pavar plant lagane vala hai. isake lie kelo nadi men unaka pavar plant lagane vala hai. isi prakar anek audyogik pratishthan lag chuke hain aur lagate ja rahe hain. svabhavik roop se in sabhi pratishthanon ko pani kee aavashyakata hogi jisakee poorti nadiyon ke upar bane bandhon se kee ja rahi hai. bandh ke banane se nadiyon men pani hi nahin hai aur hai bhi to audyogik pratishthanon se nikala rasayan yukt ganda pani hai jisase nadiyan pradooshit ho gayi hai.

vahin usake dhuen se khet kee urvara shakti khatm hoti ja rahi hai aur khet banjar hote ja rahe hain. adhikansh nadiyon men bandh banaye ja chuke hain jisase nadiyan sookh gayi hai. usamen jo thoda bahut jal hai usamen audyogik pratishthanon ka rasayan yukt ganda pani pravahit ho raha hai. isase jan jivan ast vyast hote ja raha hai.

pani, bhojan, svasthy, kheti, aavas aadi sabhi ke upar isaka pratikool prabhav padane vala hai. samudri jal star ke badhane se prabhavit hote tatiy kshetr ke log hon ya asamany manasoon athava jal sankat se trast kisan, vinashakari samudri toofan ka kahar jhelate tatavasi hon athava sookhe se trast aur asamany mausam se janit ajibo-garib bimariyan jhelate log ya fir vinashakari badh men apana sab kuchh gavan baithe aur doosare kshetron men palayan karate tamam lo jalavayu parivartan kee mar jhel rahe hain.

to pavar se chalane vali aariyan gadh dalin. san 1950 se 2000 ke bich 50 varsho men duniyan ke lagabhag aadhe jangal kat dale, aaj bhi berahami se kate ja rahe hain. jal sangrahan ke lie talab banaye jate the jisase kheton men sinchaee bhi hoti thi. lekin aaj talab ya to patakar usamen badi badi imaraten banayi ja rahi hai ya usamen keval machhali palan hota hai. machhali palan ke lie kaee prakar ke rasayanon ka upayog kiya jata hai jisaka talabon ka pani anupayogi ho jata hai. isi prakar audyogik dhuon se vayumandal to pradooshit hota hi hai, jamin bhi banjar hoti ja rahi hai. isase prakriti ka santulan bigadane laga hai aur dushparinam ham bhugat rahe hain. aakhir jangal kyon jaroori hai ? ped hamen aisa kya dete hain, jo unhen bachana jaroori hai ? ped hamen fal, fool, jadi-booti, bhojan, rindhan, eemarati lakadi, gond, kagaj, resham, rabar aur tamam duniyan ke adbhoot rasayan dete hain. isalie hamane usaka dohan shoshann to kiya, par yah bhool gaye ki vrikshon ke nahin hone se yah dharati aaj viran banati ja rahi hai. vanon ke is upakar ka roopayon men hi hisab lagayen to ek ped 16 lakh roopaye ka fayada deta hai. ghane jangalon se bhap banakar uda pani varsha banakar vapas aata hai aur dharati ko hara bhara banata hai. ped paudhon kee jaden mitti ko bandhe rahati hai. pedon kee kataee se dharati kee hariyali khatm ho jati hai. dharati kee upajaoo mitti ko tej bauchharon ka pani baha le jati hai. pedon kee dhal ke bina pani kee tej dharaen pahadon se utar kar maidanon ko dubati chali jati hai. har sal badh ka pani apane sath 600 karod tan mitti baha le jata hai. mitti ke is bhayavah katav ko rokane ka ek hi upay hai-vriksharopan. mitti, pani aur bayar, ye tin upakar hain vanon ke ham par. isalie hamare desh men prachin kal se pedon kee pooja hoti aayi hai.
mila mujhe vidya ka dhan ho. prashn uthata hai ki man kee nirmalata se kya tatpary hai aur isakee kya upayogita aur mahattv hai tatha man kee nirmalata kee upama ganga ke jal se kyon di jati hai?

kahin ek sthan par tikata nahin, bhagata rahata hai. isamen paraspar virodhi vicharon ka pravah chalata rahata hai. kabhi achchhe vichar to kabhi bure vichar. man kee isi chanchalata ke karan manushy anek samasyaon aur vyadhiyon se grast rahata hai. vicharon ke anuroop hi hamari aadaton ka vikas hota hai aur vichar hi karm karane ke lie utprerak tattv kee bhoomika ka nirvah karate hain. sakaratmak vichar hamen sahi karm kee or agrasar karate hain to nakaratmak vichar galat karm kee or. hamare achchhe svasthy ke lie sakaratmak soch hi uttaradayi hai to bure svasthy ke lie nakaratmak soch. man kee chanchalata ke karan athava man kee nirmalata ke abhav men hi ham apani chetana se ekakar nahin ho pate hain.

jo apane rashtriy jivan ke aadarshamay sandeshon se paripoorn hai. apani sampadakeey men krishn kumar yadav ne svayan kaha hai ki- bharat ka svadhinata sangram ek aisa aandolan tha jo apane aap men ek mahakavy hai. lagabhag ek shatabdi tak chale is aandolan ne bharatiy rashtriyata kee avadharana se sangathit hue logon ko ekajut kiya. yah aandolan kisi ek dhara ka paryay nahin tha balki isamen samajik- dharmik-sudharak, rashtravadi sahityakar, patrakar, krantikari, kangresi, gandhivadi ityadi sabhi kisi n kisi roop men sakriy the. inhi vicharon ko pramanikata pradan karate hue is shodh sahity men un sabhi vicharakon, chintakon itihasakaron aur amar balidani krantikari shahidon se jude evan unakee lekhani se nikale aitihasik dastavejon ka sankalan kiya gaya hai.

unhen do bhagon men banta ja sakata hai. pratham bhag 1857 ke svatantry sangram kee prishthabhoomi, kranti kee tivrata aur kranti ke nayakon par kendrit hai, to doosare bhag men 1857 kee kranti ke paravarti aandolanon aur nayakon ka chitran hai. pratham svadhinata sangram par svayan sampadak krishn kumar yadav ka likha huaa lekh 1857 kee kranti h prishthabhoomi aur vistara sarvadhik ullekhaniy hai. is aalekh men tatkalin eest indiya kampani kee shoshan niti aur bharatiyon ke prati unakee kroorata ko 1857 kee kranti ka pramukh karan mana gaya hai. isake alava bharatiy paramparaon aur dharmik manyataon ko kuchal kar eesaee dharm ke vistar kee niti ko bhi kranti upajane ka karan mana gaya hai. ghatanaon ka tarkasangat vishleshan karate hue vidvan lekhak ne us kranti ko matr sipahiyon ka vidroha athava samanti virodha ke angrej itihasakaron ke jhoothe prachar ka khandan bhi kiya hai. krishn kumar ne bade nayab tarike se ankit kiya hai ki 1857 kee kranti ko kuchh itihasakaron ne mahasvapn kee shokantika bhale hi kaha ho, par is garvile upakram ke falasvaroop hi bharat ka nayab moti eest indiya kampani ke hathon se nikal gaya aur jald hi kampani bhang ho gaee.

jisamen vishv itihas kee jhalak ke sath tatkalin rashtriy vicharadharaon v unake prabhavon ka sanskritik aur samajik paksh ujagar huaa hai. isamen bharat ke pratham pradhanamantree ne un sabhi pakshon ka varnnan kiya hai, jo janamanas men british shasan ke virooddh upaje aakrosh ka karan the. sangrah men ek aur mahatvapoorn aalekh daae0 ramavilas sharma ka 1857 kee rajy krantihitihasakaron ka drishtikonna hai. 1857 kee kranti ka adhyayan karane ke lie shree sharma ne itihasakar shree majoomadar, shree sen aur shree joshi ke lekhon ka vishleshan kiya hai. makrsavadi drishtikon aur paddhati ko svikar karane vale itihasakaron ne british satta ka paksh liya hai. daae0 sharma ne aise tathyon ka tarkasangat khandan kiya hai.

shasan-sootr ka sahaj svami to puroosh hi hai athava shasan v samar se striyon ka sarokar nahin jaisi tamam purooshavadi sthapanaon ko dhvast karata aakanksha yadav ka lekh viranganaon ne bhi jagaee svadhinata kee alakha svatantry samar men mahilaon kee prabhavi bhoomika ko karine se prastut karata hai. inamen se kaee viranganaon ka jikr to itihas ke pannon men milata hai, par kaee viranganaon kee mahima atit ke pannon men hi dabakar rah gayi. isi kram men aasharani vhora dvara prastut pratham krantikari shahid kishorihpritilata vadedara evan svatantrata senani yuvatiyon men sarvadhik lambi jel saja bhugatane vali nagalaind kee rani gidaloo ke sambandh men lekh bhi mahatvapoorn hain. aajad hind fauj men leftinent rahin manavati aayrya ka manana hai ki bharat apani sajjanata ke vyavahar ke karan samrajyavadi angrejon kee kootanitik chalon v hinsavadi gatividhiyon ka shikar bana tha. apane lekh bharatiy svatantrata kee do sashastr krantiyan men ve 1857 kee kranti v aajad hind fauj kee ladaee ko bharat kee aajadi ke pramukh aadhar stambh ke roop men chinhit karati hain.

bahadur shah jafar, tatya tope, nana sahab, ajimulla khan, maulavi ahamadulla shah, kunvar sinh, rani lakshmibaee jaise krantidharmiyon ke bina adhoora hai. vidvan lekhak shree ram shiv moorti yadav ne 1857 kee kranti ka pratham shahid mangal pande ko manate hue jo tathy prastut kiye hain vah angrejon kee barbarata-tanashahi aur nirankushata ka pardafash karane vale-pramanik-kanooni-pahaloo ko ujagar karate hain. jabalapur ke sena aayudh kor ke sangrahalay men rakhe mangal pande ke fansinama ka hindi anuvad is lekh kee vishishtata hai. vijay narayan tivari dvara atit ke pannon se uddhrit bahadurashah jafar ka aitihasik ghoshana patra sanskritik aur samajik samarasata ko aadhar deta, sabhi bharatiyon ko sangathit hokar aatatayi ke virooddh aandolit hone ka nimantran patr hai. gurilla yuddh men mahir tatya tope ke sambandh men dinesh bihari trivedi ka lekh kaee pahaluon kee padatal karata hai. angrejon ne aise krantidharmi ke lie galat nahin likha tha ki- yadi us samay bharat men aadha darjan bhi tatya tope sarikhe senapati hote to british senaon kee har tay thi. ek hath men kalam, dooje men talavar lekar avadh kshetr men kranti kee alakh jagane vale vilakshan vairagi maulavi ahamadulla shah ne kranti ka anootha adhyay racha. kumar narendr sinh dvara un par prastut aalekh vartaman parivesh men har ghatana ko sampradayik najar se dekhane valon ke lie ek sabak hai.

usane mote taur par pratham svatantrata sangram kee jay-parajay ka lekha-jokha likh diya. aravind sinh ne 1857 aur sanchar tantra men in bhavanaon ko bakhoobi vyakt kiya hai. jaise-jaise logon men svadhinata kee akulahat badhati gayi, vaise-vaise angrejon ne svadhinata kee aakanksha ka daman karane ke lie tamam raste akhtiyar kiye, jinamen sabase bhayanak kalapani kee saja thi. krishn kumar yadav ka lekh krantikariyon ke balidan kee saksheeh selyular jela manavata ke virooddh angrejon ke kukrityon ka amanaviy paksh spasht karata hai. isamen kalapani kee saja ka aatankit karane vala saty aur usase sangharsh karate krantikariyon kee virata-dhirata aur rashtrahit ke lie svatantrata kee balibedi par kurban ho jane kee adamy lalasa ka aatmotsargaparak varnnan prerak shabdavali men vyakt kiya gaya hai. vir savarakar kee aatmakatha se uddhrit kalapani kee yatana ka varnnan to rongate khada kar deta hai.

jati, dharm ya prant kee mohataj nahin hai balki yah sabake sammilit prayason se hi prapt huee. kranti yagya pustak men da0 esa0ela0 nagauri ne svatantrata men jainon ke yogadan, da0 ema0 sheshan ne tamilanadu ke yogadan, ke0 nath ne daliton-pichhadon ke yogadan ko chinhit kiya hai. kahate hai ki itihas unhin ka hota hai, jo satta men hote hain par sattasin log yah bhool jate hain ki itihas apani gatha khud kahata hai. yah sirf pannon par hi nahin balki lokamanas ke kanth men, giton aur kinvadantiyon ityadi ke madhyam se pidhi-dar-pidhi pravahit hota rahata hai. aitihasik ghatanaon ke sarthak vishleshan hetu loketihas ko bhi sametana jaroori hai. da0 suman raje ne apane lekh loketihas aur 1857 kee jan-kranti men ise darshane ka gambhir prayas kiya hai. bharatiy svadhinata ka sangram sirf vyaktiyon dvara nahin lada gaya balki kaviyon aur lok gayakon ne bhi logon ko prerit karane men pramukh bhoomika nibhayi. isi kadi men yuva lekhika aakanksha yadav ke lekh lok kavy men svadhinata men 1857-1947 kee svatantry gatha ka anahad nad sunaee padata hai.

balki sushikshit v vichar sampann the. vichar-sahity-kranti ka yah bejod santulan ramaprasad bismil, roshan sinh, ashafakaulla khan, shachindr nath sanyal, bhagat sinh, bal gangadhar tilak ityadi jaise tamam krantikariyon men mahasoos kiya ja sakata hai. da0 soory prasad dikshit ne krantikari aandolan aur sahity rachana men kranti kee mashal ko jalaye rakhane men lekhani ke yogadan par khoobasoorat roop men prakash dala hai. kanapur se ganesh shankar vidyarthi dvara prakashit pratapa akhabar kee bhoomika svatantrata ke aandolan ko gati dene men rahi hai. is rashtriy asmita ke sanrakshak patr ko tatha usake yashasvi deshabhakt sanpadak ko mahatv dekar samman pradan karana apani sahityik virasat ko samman dena hai. da0 ramesh varma dvara prastut lekh svadhinata aandolan ke itihas men pratap kee bhoomika ko bhi isi pariprekshy men dekha ja sakata hai. yah sahityik kranti ka hi kamal tha ki angrejon ne anek pustakon aur giton ko pratibandhit kar diya tha. madanalal varma kanta ne in durlabh sahityik rachanaon ko anek vismrit aakhyanon aur pannon se dhanoodh nikala hai aur pratibandhit krantikari sahitya men british sarakar dvara jabt kee gayi pustakon evan patra-patrikaon par soochanatmak dhang men mahatvapoorn lekh likha hai.

sukhadev aur durga devi vohara ka janm shatabdi varsh hai. yogy sampadak dvay krishn kumar aur aakanksha yadav kee yah khoobi hi kahi jayegi ki is tathy ko vismrit karane kee bajay unake yogadan ko bhi kranti yagy men unhonne rekhankit kiya. bhagat sinh par unake krantikari sathi shiv varma dvara likha sansmaranatmak aalekh is pustak ko mahatvapoorn banati hai to pahala giramitiya se charchit giriraj kishor ne jab bhagat sinh ne hindi ka nara buland kiya men ek naye sandarbh men bhagat sinh ko prastut kiya hai. koee bhi desh apani bhasha aur sahity ke bina apani pahachan nahin bana sakata aur bharatiy sandarbh men hindi ko pratishthit karane kee bhagat sinh kee svarnim kalpana vartaman pariprekshy men punah prasangik hai. bhagat sinh bhavavesh hone kee bajay tarkik dhang se apani bat kahana pasand karate the. yatindr nath das kee shahadat ke bad madarn rivyoo ke sampadak dvara inkalab jindabada nare kee sampadakeey aalochana ke pratyuttar men bhagat sinh v batukeshvar datt dvara likha gaya aitihasik patr kranti yagya pustak men samahit hai. is patr men kranti shabd ka arth pragati ke lie parirvatan kee bhavana evan aakanksha vyakt kiya gaya tha. krantikari sukhadev par satyakam pahariya ka lekh aur durga devi vohara par aakanksha yadav ka lekh unake vistrit jivan par prakash dalate hain. aakanksha yadav ne is tathy ko bhi udadhrit kiya hai ki ek hi varsh kee vibhinn tithiyon men janmatithi padane ke bavajood bhagatasinh apana janmadin durga devi ke janmadin par unhin ke sath manate the aur unake pati bhagavaticharan vohara sahit tamam krantikari is avasar par apani upasthiti darj karate the.

vatan par marane valon ka yahi bakee nishan hoga kee bhavana ko aatmasat karate hue amit kumar yadav ne svatantrata sangharsh aur krantikari aandolana ke madhyam se krantikari gatividhiyon ko bakhoobi sanjoya hai to satyakam pahariya ne svadhinata men yogadan dene vale tamam manishiyon v krantikariyon kee bhoomikaon ko saheja hai. krantikari manmathanath gupt kee kalam se angreji hukoomat kee choolen hila deni vale kakori kand ka sacha yuva pidhi ka dhyan aakrisht karata hai. chandrashekhar aajad krantikari aandolan men pramukh stambh the. krantikari ramakrishn khatree ka un par likha sansmaranatmak aalekh kaee chhuye-anachhuye pahaluon kee padatal karata hai. aajad ke maujar pistaul kee rochak dastan bhi kranti-yagya men shamil hai. ram prasad bismil kee 110vin jayanti par sankalit lekh kalam aur rivalvar par bismil kee saman jadoogari preranaspad hai. svadhinata aandolan men svarajy, svadeshi v vahishkar kee bhoomika par alagoo ray shastree ka lekh us samay kee bhavanaon ko khoobasoorati se abhivyakt karata hai to da0 badrinarayan tivari ka chetavani bhara aalekh svadhinata sangram kee balidani bhavana ko sahejane aur use banaye rakhane ka sandesh deta hai.

tatya tope v ajimulla khan ne yahin se sare desh men kranti kee alakh jagaee to kalantar men bhagat sinh v aajada jaise tamam krantikariyon hetu yah dharati prerana-bindu bani. aise men jang-e-aajadi kanapura lekh kaee mahatvapoorn ghatanaon ko samane lata hai. ganesh shankar vidyarthi kee supautree daae0 madhulekha vidyarthi ne bhi svadhinata sangram men kanapur kee bhoomika par vistrit prakash dala hai.

rashtragit vandemataram, parshad ji dvara rachit jhanda gita, krantikariyon kee gitah1857-d var aaf indipendens evan bharat-bhraman par nikali aajadi eksapresa jaisi rochak baton ko shamil kar ise jivant v samasamayik banaya gaya hai. aavaran prishth par mashal, top v dhal ke sath aajadi kee ladaee ko dhar dene vale mahapurooshon ke chitron ka ankan is pustak ko aur bhi khoobasoorat banata hai.

sanskritik, sahityik aur rashtriy star par aadarshonmukh hokar prastut ho sakee hai. hamari vartaman pidhi aur aane vale samay aur samaj ke lie yah pustak svabhiman ka, manaviy gunon ka aur rashtraprem ka anupam path prashast karane vali, sandarshika banegi tatha isake sandarbhon se shodh aur chintanaparak sahity ko utkrisht sandarbh prapt ho sakenge. kranti yagya pustak vastutah apani rashtriy asmita ka hi darshan hai.

sanpadan aur chhapaee kee prakriya ke bare men suresh batate hain ki alag alag sthanon se patrakarita men roochi rakhane vale sathi samachar bhej dete hain. main aur samaj ke kuchh log jo ki isamen roochi rakhate hain, sanpadan men sahayog karate hain. shasan kee hamare samaj ke lie banaye gae karyakramon ka vivaran bhi prakashit karate hain taki logon ko isaka labh mil sake.

aise men suresh dukhi ho jata hai. use khushi is bat kee bhi hai ki apane akhabar ke silasile men vah adhikariyon se mel-mulakat karata rahata hai lekin kabhi kisi ne suresh nandamehar ko anadekha nahin kiya balki usake prayas kee sarahana hi huee hai.

is par suresh kahate hain ki dukan band kar diya to mera aur mere bachchon ka kya hoga, unhen khana-kapada kahan se milega.vah kahata hai n to mujhe joota banane men sharm hai aur n batane men.akhabar to madhyam hai mere bhitar ke gusse ko nikalane ka.yah mere jivanayapan ka jariya nahin hai.yah thik hai ki is dhandhe se meri tabiyat par viparit asar ho raha hai lekin isaka koee vikalp bhi to nahin hai.

aur rooth jaati hai. Vaise to mehbooba ko manane mein bada hi maza aata hai, kintu hamari kuch mahila bhakt badi ziddi hain, wo itni aasani se purushon ko maaf nahi karti. Ab purush bechare karein bhi to kya, isiliye hum apne purush bhakton ke liye laaye hain kuch aise tareeke ki ab aapki mehbooba to kya uski amma bhi turant maan jaategi.
kam se kam 420 pano ka prem patra hona chahiye, Aur likhavat aisi honi chahiye ki wo kya tum bhi na samajh sako. Phir dekho, kaise maari firti hai use samajhne ke liye tumhare peeche.
lekin apni mehbooba ki har galti ko apni galti samjho. Use ye yakeen dilao ki duniya mein tumse bada joru ka ghulam na aaj tak paida hua hai na kabhi hoga.
Mujhko pehchanlo Mein Hun Kaun?? yadi use tumhari shakal par hansi aa gayi to samjho tumhara kaam jhat se bana.

yadi tumhari mehbooba ko shayari pasand aa gayi to samjho kaam ban gaya, aur yadi use shayri na pasand aaayi tab to samjho ab tumhara kuch bhi nahi ho sakta, phir to tum sanam bewafa aur dil jale ke geeton ko sunne ki aadat hi daal lo to behtar hoga.
inhe apni mehbooba par aajmao aur khushhali ke saath saath prem leela karo. Aur haan koi baat bigad jaaye to sanyam se kaam lena. Jald baazi mein aksar bane bane kaarya bhi bigad jaate hain. Tathastu

Dosto Agar aapko apni Life me kuch karna hai or aesa karna hai, jisko duniya aapke jane ke baad bhi yaad rakhe, to wass apne aap par bharosa rakho or mera yakin karo aap wo kar sakte hai jo duniya ka koi banda nahi kar paya, wass aap apne aap par bharosa rakho or har naa mano, Wass ek baat ka dhiyan rakho sabkuch Aashan hai , Ye jo bate mene kahi ye meri soch hai or meri iss soch ka credit jata hai Sandeep Maheshwari ji ko. Aaj ham aese bande ki hi baat karne wale hai jisne dikha diya, agar ham than le to sab kuch aashan hai or jab ye baat hamare samaj me aa jaye ki kuch bhi impossible nahi hai to fir hame Success, Naam, Paisa, Health, Love, kisi ke bhi piche bhagna nahi padta, wo hamare piche bhagte hai. Aaj ka Ye article aap Pura jarur read karna, me dabe ke sath khe sakta hu, aap iss article ko read karne ke phele jese hai, isko read karne ke baad apne aap me jarur ek positive badlab mhesus karege. Agar aap inke ware me nahi jante to aapke mind me sabal aa rahe hoge, Kon Hai Sandeep Maheshwari ?, Ye karte kya hai, inhone kiya hai ? to wass aap aage iss article ko read karte jaye. me isme bhut si Motivation Video, Quotes Share karne wala hu. jo aapko jarur boost karegi. to chaliye start karte hai. Sandeep Maheshwari ek India ke Top Entrepreneur hai, jo ki ek Business Man, Motivation Speaker bhi hai. Inhone apni Study bich me se hi chor di jo ki Kirori Mal College se B.Com kar rahe the. Study chorne ke unke kuch personal reasons the, par wo ye jante the ki unko Life me kuch karna hai, or unka motto tha Success hona. Har ek ki life me ek turning point jarur aata hai, or agar ham sirf waha sabhal jaye to ha jo chate hai wo hame naa mile aesa ho hi nahi sakta. Aap kuch bhi kaam kare, usme fail hone se mat daro, q ki agar aap fail ho rahe ho, or uske baad bhi haar nahi maan rahe ho iska matlab hai aap apne aapko or majbut bana rahe ho. Sandeep Maheshwari Aaj ek Successful insan hai, jinko lakho log follow bhi karte hai, par kya aapko pata hai unki iss success ke piche kitne failure hai. chaliye jante hai Sandeep Maheshwari ki Life ke ware me. Inki family ka Aluminum business tha, jo ki puri trha se thap ho gaya, to iska aasar ghar ke 19 saal ke ladke Sandeep par bhi padha. Or Ghar ki iss situation me help karne ke liye ek Multi Level Marketing MLM join ki, jisme wo kuch hadd tak success bhi hue. Par agar aapne kabhi MLM try kiya ho to aapko bhi pata hoga, MLM me ham Long tarm tak kaam nahi kar sakte. aesa hi Sandeep Masheshwari ke sath huaa. Unhone bhi usko chor diya. MLM company ko to unhone chor diya, par jitne time tak wo usme kaam kar rahe the, usme unhone bhut si chije sikhi, or sambe main baat jab wo MLM kar rahe the to unhone Marketing ki bhut books bhi padhi. Marketing ka unko itna knowledge ho gaya tha ki unhone, Marketing ke upar ek Book bhi likh di, lekin Book bhi ek Failure hi sabit hui. Jo sandeep maheshwari book likhi thi, uski bhi ek khas baat thi, wo ulti open hoti thi matlab piche se or uske sabse phele Page par hi likha tha agar aap apne padhne ka tarika nahi badal sakte, to aap apni soch ko kaise badal sakte ho. Ye jo Book likhi, Marketing ke upar bhale wo success nahi hui, par usko likhne se jo Sandeep Maheshwari ko mila wo sabse badke tha. Q ki unhone ek book likhne ke chakkar me pata nahi kitni marketing ki book badh dali, jisse unko marketing ka acha khasa knowlage ho gaya. Sandeep Ka Interest Modeling me bhi tha, to unhone in sab ke baad modeling me try karne ka socha or apna ek portfolio banbaya, Yaha bhi unhe bhut si problem ka samna karna padha q ki koi bhi acha Photographer 50 hajar ke aas pass charge karta hai ek portfolio ke jo ki unke liye bhut jada tha. Fir bhi jese tese banbaya or try kiya par usme bhi unko koi acha response nahi mila. Ab Sandeep ne socha jo mere jese Models hai jo Paise ke karan apna portfolio nahi banwa pa rahe hai, me unki help karu or portfolio banao, or unhone Camera leke ye kaam start kiya. Camera liya or ek photograph ka course kiya. or kisi ka bhi wo portfolio banate to sirf Camera Real ke paise usse lete or thoda bhut extra. Iske baad unhone apne 3 dosto ke sath milke ek company bhi start ki jo 6 mahine me hi band karni padi, q ki unke dost usko chor ke chale gaye. Yani ek or aasafalta hath lagi. Ab Sandeep Maheshwari ne Models ke Photo khichna bhi start kar diya tha, jo advertisement company ko sale karke paise kama sakte hai, or agar koi photo sale hota tha to jo uska model hota tha usko bhi uska percent milta tha. Ab Uske pass clint to aa rahe the, par unko apna business badana tha to unko kuch aesa karna tha jisse wo sabki najar me aa jaye, q ki phele se bhut se photographer the par unko unsab me highlight hona tha. Sandeep ne Limca Book of World Record se contact kiya, or 10 ghanto me lagatar 100 se jada models ke 10000 photo khich kar World Record bana diya. jisse unki News TV or Paper me aai to wo sabki najro me aa gaye. ab Sandeep ko idea aaya ki wo ek website banaye jisme wo apne khiche hue photo ko online sale kar sake. unhone web Developer se ek website banwai jiska naam tha imagesbazaar.com, jisko pura teyar karne me lagbhag ek saal laga, par ye website apni trha ki pheli website thi jisme Indian Models ke photo the jo kisi bhi Advertisement ya marketing ke liye use kiye ja sakte the. Website banne ke baad, ek sabse badi problem aai, wo ye ki website load hone me 2-3 minute laga rahi thi, or itni slow site par koi aake image ko kaise kharid sakta tha. jisse fir ek time aesa aa gaya ki lagne laga ye website ka idea bhi galat hi raha. q ki jo Developer the unhe bhi kya dikkat hai wo samaj nahi aa rahi thi. Par yaha Sandeep Maheshwari ne iss idea ko drop karne se phele socha q naa me khud isko solve karu, iske liye unhe programming nahi aati thi to unhone online or books se read karke itni programming sikh li ki kis code ka kya matlab hai samaj me aa jaye. or uske baad kaha kya dikkat thi wo bhi unko samaj me aa gaya. Ab Sandeep Maheshwari ne jo website ke developer the uske pass gaye or bole, ye hai problem imagesbazaar.com me, karo isko tikh. or uske baad website ki loading speed bhut fast hogai or uspar visitor bhi aane lage. Aaj ImagesBazaar.com India ki Top Image website hai jispar 15 lakh se jada High Quality Photo or Video hai. Is website par duniya bhar se clint image ko kharidte hai jinki sankhiya 7000 hai. Aaj wo ek Successful insan hai or jo dusro ko motivate karke or logo ko bhi Success banane me mission me lage huee hai. Wo India ke Top Motivation Speaker me se ek hai jo Apne seminars ke paise nahi lete or bilkul free seminar karke apne life experience ko logo se share karke motive karte hai or yakin dilate hai ki sabkuch Aasan hai. In short agar ham Sandeep Maheshwari ji ke success hone ke phele ke failures ko dekhe to hame pata chal jata hai jo bhi hota hai ache ke liye hi hota hai, or agar ham kuch bhi karte hai bhale usme fail huee ho uska hame aage fayda jarur milta hai. To Friends mene Sandeep Maheshwari ji ki Life ke Main Points ko cover karne ki kosis to puri ki thi iss article me, ummid hai aapko pasand aai hogi, or agar mene koi or point miss kiya hai to please aap comment karke jarur bataye. Sandeep Maheswari jesa ki mene bataya wo ek Motivational Speaker bhi hai, par wo ab bade envent nahi karte or chote chote sessions rakhte hai, jinke Video aapko unki Youtube Channel par mil jayege. Sandeep Maheswari Youtube Channel Wese to Sandeep Maheswari ji ke har ek Video motivational hota hai, jisko dekhne ke baad aap apne aap ek agal hi energy mhesus karege. unhi Video me se ek Video jo aapko jarur dekhna chaiye. Agar aap Sandeep ji ko phele nahi jante the to ab to aap jaan hi gaye hoge, or upar ka Video dekh kar kesa laga wo comment me batana naa bhule. or Agar aap Apne aapko Sandeep Maheshwari ka Fan khete hai Sandeepian to iss Post ko Sabse share jarur kare. jisse or logo ko bhi motivation mile or wo bhi apni life me kuch badiya kare jo wo karna chate hai. Hamesa Yaad rakho, Aap apni Problem se kaiguna bade ho. Aapko khud ki najar me uthna hai, jo insan khud ki najar me uth gaya wo duniya ki najar me apne aap uth jata hai. Jis wait aap uss chij ko dekhte jo jab wo aapke pass nahi hai, uss time aapki kismat buri hoti hai. or jis time aap uss chij ko dekhte ho jis pal wo aapke pass hai, uss time aapki kismat achi hoti hai. Sabse phele aapko apne commitment pure karne hai, Jab aap khud ke commitment pure nahi kar pa rahe ho to dusro ke diye huee commitment kaise pure karoge. Aap apne Dimag ko control kare, nahi to wo aapko control karega. Agar aapne apni aadate badli, to aapki jindgi bhi badlegi. nahi to jindgi me wahi hoga jo hota aaya hai. Kamyabi anubhab se aati hai or anubhav galtiyo se yani kharab anubhav se. Aapko Powerful banna hai, isliye nahi ki kisi ko dawa sake, Aapko powerful banna hai taki koi aapko dawa naa sake. Desire chunna hai to bada chuno, bade se bada. Iss Duniya ka sakbse bada. Jisko pata hai wo kya kaam kar rahe hai, Q kar rahe hai. unko koi nahi hila sakta. ek taraf wo hai jo aap karna chate ho, banna chate ho or dusri taraf wo hai jo duniya aapko banana chaiti hai. Agar koi vyakti aapse ye khe rahe hai aap ye nahi kar sakte, to wo wass ye khena cha rahe hai ki wo ye nahi kar sakte. Jindgi Cricket Ball ki trha hai, jo ek ke baad ek awsar deti hai, Agar ek Ball chut jaye to dusri ball par najar honi chaiye. Har ek ke andar ek aesi sakti hoti hai jo or kisi ke andar nahi hai, wass aapko unko phechanna hai. Har roj apne aap se ye sabal karo ki me abhi kya sikh raha hu, or har roj kuch na kuch naya sikhne ki aadat bana lo. Gyan ko badao par ahnkar ko nahi, yahi ahankar bada to uske baad aap or gyan nahi le paoge. Ek baat hamesa apne aap se bole, Me Puri Duniya ka ek matra Greatest Person hu . Apne aapko apni Filed me Mahan samje, dusre kya samajte hai usse koi fark nahi padta. Duniya aapko Cadayegi or Girayegi, Duniya ka kaam hi ye hai, wass aapko inn bato se fark nahi padna chaiye. jitni bhi chije aapke aaspas hai un sabse sikhe. Apne aapse mukabla karte jao, waha koi risk nahi hai, Hare tab bhi aap jitoge or jite tab bhi. Jisko Sabal karne ki aadat hai wo kisi bhi fild me jaye success hi hoge. 2 Option hai aapke pass Muje Jindgi katna hai ya Muje Jindgi ko Jina hai. Ek daraf Maja hai or dusri taraf dard, inme balance hona jaruri hai. Aap Job karo ya koi Business, ek skill aesi hai unke bina ham aage nahi bad sakte wo hai Communication Skill . Jitna aap Burai ko dekhoge utna hi dukhi houge, or Jitna aap Dukhi houge utna hi dusro ko dukhi karoge. Jine ki bajha agar badi ho, to apne aap bade bade kaam karwate chali jayegi. Duniya ko aap jab tak nahi badal sakte jab tak aap apne aapko nahi badal lete. Agar aapne thaan liya ki muje iss problem ka sloution nikalna hai to Solution khud wa khud aapke pass chal kar aa jayega. Problem me hi Solution chupa hota hai. jindgi me kuch bhi karna hai to Sach bol do . Agar aapke andar dherya hai to apni jindgi me har fesle sahi tarike se lege. Ek war apna Learning Attitude ban gaya. Fir paise ka kya hai aap kitna bhi kama loge. Iss duniya me Magic naam ki koi chij nahi hai. Aapki jindgi ke ware me aapke Maa-Baap se jada acha koi nahi soch sakta. Strongly Recommend by Sandeep Maheshwari, Must Watch Dr APJ Abdul Kalam Biography in Hindi

are-are aisa hum nahi kehte, aisa is film mein dikhaya gaya hai. Aur is film ki naayika arthaat heroine ne to hamare dil mein chhuriyan chala dee. Na chahte hue bhi hum poore cinema ghar mein akele-akele sitiyan maar rahe the. Kya sundarta hai nayika ke chehre mein, hum to ek dum mantra mugdh ho uthe the bhakton. Aur jab Ranbir beta apna sangeet utpaadak yantra arthaat apna guitar bajata tha to humara bhi man kar raha tha ki hum bhi ab kahin jaakar apna china wala guitar bajayein. Ranbir aur Nargis ne jis tarah ki prem leela ki hai use dekhkar to hame bhi apni pehli waali mehbooba ki yaad aa gayi. Hum bhi aise hi pahadon ki vaadiyon mein raas leela rachaya karte the. Hum bhi kahan apni jawani ke dino mein pahuch gaye.
netaji ne kaha, sasur aata nahin kabhi. ingalis ka tap poyat shakkoopir kuchh kahi gaya hay tumaro kee babat. kya kahi gaya hay kakka jara bataya jay aasootos baboo ko.

si. yamo disapoj hui jai. ek thulathule virodhi ne hansakar kaha. netaji ne thahaka baland kiya. fir thulathule kee tond ko tarjani se konchate hue kaha, hamar si. yam jab giri koodhadan ma, tab tohare taip ke layal ilimant pahile giray ke giri. jamana bhar ka bhrast aachar aur aahar bhakonsi eisan tondan ka gadda rahi to si.yam ke gire par jiyada chot n aayi. bolo ramasukh baboo ke tond ke jai.

hinahinaye athava ji kholakar hanse . fir netaji ne aashutosh baboo ke kandhe par dhaul jamaya aur kaha, bahut sram kiya hay sramik neta aasatos chithiya draft kare men. yahi n hay das-dant ka aspeling janane vala das-dant? bakee inake prerana-srot kendri mantreeji ke lie to vahi bilaik lay-tar ij ikual too bafailo hay. ka likhe ho chithiya men pi.yam ke nam ? she to sikret? kal pi.yam ko dega laitar, tarapor disaid karega pres ko de ya n de. abhi yahi ki karapshan charjej hay siriyas si.em ka khilaf aaur amar nainti et em.el.e sain kiya hay dis letar rikvesting si. em ka rimooval. ek yatim yam yale.aur pakad liya hota, ninanabe ka fer huee jata poora.

bakee sikret vikret kuchchh nahi. si.yam ke khilaf pi.yam ko kya likha jay isaka hamare sastron men vidhan hay. koee si.yam ho koee pi.yam, layatar ka draft ekahi hota hay-astand-ard. pahila paint si.yam apana bhaee-bhatija ko aage badha raha hay, jatavad faila raha hay. dusara paint paisa kha gaya-alan ghotala, falan ghotala. tisara paint la end aadar ka bura hal hay-alan kand falan kand. chautha paint bayaleksan difit-si.yam kee galat nit ke karan alan bayaleksan men hamara lid kam huaa aur falan bayaleksan men hamen difit mila. chauthe se panchavan paint aapane koee likha ho to bataen ! hoie nahin sakata panchavan paint? achchha, ab jara har paint ka tod sun liya jay, paint-bai-paint? apana bhaee-bhatija ka nahi kare aapake bhaee-bhatija ka kare to bhi hoga bhaee-bhatijavade na ? yah kahan likha hay ki apana bhaee-bhatija jogy ho to use is aadhar par kandam kar do ki apana bhaee-bhatija hay. jisaka bhaee-bhatija hona hi kisi ko kandam bana de,vah sasur khud kitana kandam hoga !

aap sarikha pachasiyo chamacha sattifiket diye ko baitha hay evar-rayadi. ab lijie bhrashtachar ka paint? netaji ne jhukakar sab virodhiyon ke charan chhoone ka abhinay kiya aur kaha,aap gurujan hai. bhrashtachar men aap jo keertaman asthapit kiye hai unake samachchh ham ka, si.yamo natamastak hai. failen sari taiyar hain. si.yam nahin chahite ki kisi garib ka tanspot ka dhandha kharab ho, kisi kee nay-pal se asmagling band hui jay, kisi ka gairakanooni khan pakad men aa jay, kisi ke sahakar se nij uddhar ka bhandafod ho, kisi ka jamine hadapane ka karatab jag-ujagar ho. tisara paint la end aadar. samajhiyega ek sanis ka bat la end aadar aur mausam ye do kisi ke bas ka nahin. mausam sasur ek bar bas men aa bhi jaye, la end aadar aap jaise mahanubhavon ke jite ji kisi ke bas ka hay nahin. chautha paint bayaleksan difit? to aasutos baboo aap samajhe rahiyega isamen aapahi dhar liye jayenge.

idhar madanl dada ko aamaran anasan kee sooli par chadha ke aur udhar manejamant se milakar so tred jooniyan ke itihas men svarn akchharo men likha hi ja chuka hay. to lebar ka ot hamen nahin mil paya is bar. kanritatuansi ke dihati ilake men ot mila hamen, indastri-eriyaj men chot kha gaye. agar aap kahite hai ki lebar par hold hay aapaka to mamala aur bhi sangin ho jata hay. aapane sebotaj kiya hoee. tani bataya jay-aapaka lebar lidari fusafus hay ki aap sebotaj kiye rahe mamala? netaji ne aashutosh baboo ke kandhe par dhaul jamaya aur thahaka baland kiya. neta biradari bhi hansi.

je aapani koee salid prapojal laye hai to thik. nahin to eisa mafik falatoo bakabak se to ham log ko kuchh asar hogi nahin. are to kaun aapahi kee bakabak se si.yam ka bal banka hui jayega. kal ke jab aap huaan jayega na dada,tab aapaka vah layatar layatarin men rakh diya jayega !faurin gest log ke lie. aur kis kam ka hay vah sasur. pi.yam kahin bhi dasadans nahin kahati, prayashar men parivartan karana unaka subhav nahin hay. are aap in patrakaron se poochho. bataya jay kakka inhen.

pi.em kya karengi yah kah sakana bahut mushkil hai. jo bhi vah karegi apani marji se karegi kisi ke jor dene se nahin. karekt! netaji ne kaha, jo log yah samajhe hue hai ki ingareji pepar magajin men ulta-sidha chhapavane se si. yam badalavaye ja sakate hai unakee buddhi par tarase khaya ja sakata hay. kyon kakka, hota hay kuchchh akhabaravalo ke kahine-likhane se? ham chup rahe. bhatijaji ne kaha, kuchh nahin na. ham ab jhenpe-jhenpe-se muskara diye.

maun mining aai egri. aur aasutos baboo aapako si.yam ka imej daimej karane ke lie yah likhavane kee ka soojhee ki pooja karite rahite hai. pooja karane se is mulk men imej banata hai, bigadata nahin. thik hay aap log unase milana chahite the, aapako javab mila ki pooja men baithe hai, mulakat ho nahin sakee. isamen kaun aafat aa gayi? ham neta fursat ke samay tin men se ek jagah baitha hota hai is des men-pakhane men,piraivet men ya poojaghar men. fon mila ke dekh lijie chahe jisakee kothi men. hamare si.yam ko bhagavan kee daya se kabj kee sikayat nahin. mahararoo kee sohabat unhonne kendri mantreeji ko mubarak kar rakhi hay, isalie piraivet men baithane kee gunjais nahin. bacha poojaghar to baithate hai usamen thath se. mantr siddh karate hain aap jaiso ko marane ka.

she sab beshi fani end aal dait lekin salid prapojal nahin hone se siriyas negoshiyeshans hone nahin sakata. netaji ne unake dhaul jamaya aur kaha, dada, tum salid aadami hay. aap log karapshan charj se darate nahin. aap logon sen lavalti kee bat karana bekar hay. aap men se kisake lie si.yam ne kab kya kiya yah batana fijool hay. to suniyega ek tho salid bat dihati kahavat men-hamare si.yam ka yah kahana hay aapase ki bhaiyo mujhako sany se furasat na, aap jaisan devar mange chumma! to sany yani kendri mantreeji kee karaie chhutti.

prejant tens men bolane se hoga. aashutosh baboo ne kaha. foochar men salid prapojal prejent men likvid kaish! netaji hinahinaye, sala baboo diya jay. bis-bis hajar. aadha abhi. aadha astetament aane par.

i ka karat aaha. aadha deye ka matalab to i na hoy ki notuve fad-fad ke aadha tukuda dey diha. jab toon log astetament de daive tab aadha tukada uho mil jai, jod ke kam chalay liha. is par thahaka aur dhaul-dhappa huaa. hotal se lautate hue hamane netaji ko apana ad-toriyala sunaya ki neta biradari des ko rasatal men pahuncha rahi hai. netaji bole, are aapako gonsaee tulasidas se jiyada janakari hay das-kal kee? vah kahi gaye hai ki, kalijug men neta kee kvalifikeshan ka honi chahie. suna jay chor chatur, batamar nat, prabhupiy bhanduaa bhand. sab bhachchhak paramarthi kali supanth pashand.

us ghadi to kuchh n poochhie! ab aapase kya chhipayen. itane varsh patrakar rah chukane ke bad bhi samacharon ke prati hamara drishtikon gulashan nanda ko bhagavan mananevali kishori se behatar nahin hai.

pandrah ghayala aur sochane lagate hai ki ve kaun char the jo mare? unake parivaron par kya biti ? yah bhi ki jis pulisakarmi kee goli se ve mare kya bad men vah is ghatana ke bare men sochate-sochate pagala gaya ? ham padhate hai ki amuk neta ne prashasan ko svachchh banane kee pratigya kee hai aur utsahit ho uthate hai. agale din ham padhate hai ki usi neta par karodon ka ghotala karane ka aarop hai aur ham gahan nirasha men doob jate hai. logon ko jado men shit lahara se, garmiyon men loo se, barasat men badh se aur badalate mausam men vishanujany kisi rahasyamay rog se marate dekhakar apane akhabar men, hamara mood matami hota raha hai.

n karane kee salah hamari shreematiji jaise visheshagy dete aaye hai. hamare layak bhatijaji urf netaji abhi us din hamare manas ke isi rahu-kal men prakat hue. kan-sunane kaiset-pleyar se lais. thirakate hue us vishesh shaili men, jisamen pashchaty tvist, panjabi bhangada aur hinjada-thumake ka mishran huaa hai aur jise utsahi baratiyon kee kripa se baharaich se lekar bambaee tak rashtriy nrity ka darja mil chuka hai. is narttan ke sath unaka gayan bhi chal raha tha-kakka ho,ho,ho. nachate-thirakate hi unhonne payalagi kee. hamane anamana-sa aashirvad diya. ab netaji ne hamare kandhe par dhaul jamaya aur kaha, yah aapaka nakse bayasi hay sasur ! baithak men mar tamam haipi noo eeyar kahi majaye hue hai aur soorat roni banaye hue hai. noo eeyar nainti etti too, havaee stil viping yoo ?

ho,ho-aisa koee betuka gana baj raha tha. hamane sunane se inkar kiya. netaji bole, suna jay. kavi ho-ho-ho vadi hay sasur. trastakon pajativ hay usaka. gita ka sandes bhi yahiyai hay. are kuchh keejie, karane se hi hoga na. ab aise hi har karam se saramaiega sarakar tab kaisan huiyai beda par ? fajool kee chinta men ghabarana thik nahin. siyor-saut sayar kahi gaya hay-saban havansin nait-de mosan, disaur dait ij tu happan, havaee vari in antaspesana ? mauj-masti ka rakha chahi mudava samajhe kakka. aap jo necharuva banay liye hai apana vah anti-sosal kaha jata hay. anti sosal ilaments ke sath aap kahin dhar n liye jayan. netaji hinahinaye. fir unhonne tay paya ki kakka ka mood chaitanyachoorn ke abhav men daun hai.

are yah kahe utha laye, isamen salid mal hay sasur ! fir jaise lobh sanvaran n kar pa rahe hon, unhonne usi brifakes ko uthaya aur kholakar dikhaya. bhitar noton kee gaddiyan bhari huee thi. bole, dekh liya jay, nati-poton ko batanevali chij hay kabahun furasat se budhape men. si.yam. ke sala baboo ko pahunchana hay ek pa-rati kee taraf se. apane ram to postafis hai, maniaadar yahan se vahan pahuncha dete hai. kamishan alabatta kat lete hai, dutarafa. fir netaji ne doosare brifakes men se pan masale ka dibba, tambakoo aur choona nikala. chetana kee khurak banayi, aadhi hamen khilayi, aadhi khud khayi. fir khali brifakes hamari or badhate hue bole, grahan kiya jay. noo iyar gift? bhatija ka upahar ank. hamane kaha, hamare pas hai.

ekahi na, are bhatija ke pas aapakee daya se is samay das tho hay. jo aata hay sasur ekahi-sa gift de jata hay. kalendar-dayari layaval dedh duee sau bhagat aaya, fooladan kalamadan layaval nabbe, esatre, chabi guchchha, batuaa layaval pichahattar, nataraj ke moort layaval paitis, laimp layaval pachis ,parakar-shefar pain- sayat layaval vais aur krafakes layaval nau. ek sasuri kardanesan kameti bithani padegi taki har bhagat alag-alag mal laye. rakh liya jay kakka ee brifakes. are koee notuva bharakar thodo de rahe hai jo bhrastachar men sumar ho. aapako jaroorat n ho, kisi ko de dijiyega - firi ka gahak bahoot hay indaya men. ramaraj kee parakalpana indayan haiyai yahi ki har mal milega fokat pen !

is des men kauno itana amir nahi ki firi fand ke mal ke lie nahi kar de! vah kissa sune ho n ki ek indayan foran men gaya. marakit men pensil lene pahuncha. aadha dam karane mol-bhav men juta. dukanadar ne tang hokar kaha, aap firi men rakh lijie-gift ! indayan bola - firi men do nahin doge guru ?

mamala kya hay, aap aaj khus hi nahin ho rahe hain . khush hone kee bat kya hai ? hamane poochha. are koee ek bat hay ! akhabaravalo ke manistar sathe ti.vi. men jahangir bassa banakar jhalak dikha gaye aapako to isi se khus ho jane chahie tha. ti.vi. par pukara film bhi dikhava di ki aapako yad aa jay jahangir kya chij tha. ab aapako koee dukh ho to satheji ke yahan jay ke fariyadi ghanta baja dijie. roni soorat banaye kahe baithe hain. aap neta log kabhi gambhir bhi hote hain. hamane jhidakakar kaha, jab dekho tab kahakahe lagate dikhate ho. desh jal raha hai aur ye sarangi baja rahe hain ! are kakka, aapake samane to ham bhatijavatar men prakat bhaye hain. netavatar men ham bahut sirayas hain. palataks koee hansi-thattha nahin ! bakee yah bataya jay ki des kahan jal raha hay.

isamen to aagajani kee kauno khabar nahin hay. aur kakka, jara paint not kiya jay-agar des jalahi raha hota to ham kakka-bhatija ka bhurata n ban gaya hota ! jal-ul kuchh nahin raha hay - mast hay bilkul fit, ek aur hangama nakse bayasi kee pratichchha men. tumane vah nahin padha jo jila mainapuri men hota raha hai idhar ! are padh liya hay kakka. bagair akhabar padhe neta ko hajat nahin hoti subah, samajhe ! bakee vahan koee des jala nahin hay . dakoo aakar dui-char harijan mari gaye hai. aur saragi koee baja nahin raha hay sasur. aapake atalaji maharaj pad-yatra jaroor kar rahe hai. so belavi men mayadam gajayatra kiye rahin. apane-apane astandard kee bat hay. vaise atalaji paidal chal rahe hain to thik kar rahe hain vides mantree ko bainkvat bahoot khana padata hay. isase atalaji ko kuchh charbi chadh gayi rahi. ab chalihe paidal to binoba ke jaise roop nikhari aaee.

dekhie kakka ! do men se ek bat par han keejiyega. ya to yah des sasur anat kal se jali raha hay. dhadhakana isaka sayakand nechuruva hay. aap jaun taip ka bura samachar aaj kee tarikh men hamen dikhaiyega, ham khojakar barason pahile ka vaisa samachar prastut kar denge seva men. ya fir eisa hay ki des jal-ul kuchh nahin raha hay, des jal raha hay eisa bhi nakshevaji hay. kahie kaun bat janchati hay aapako ? isase yahi prakat hota hay ki desh men vastavik aur buniyadi parivartan nahin ho paya hai. yah bhi ki neta-biradari dhongi hai. ab yahan jaisi hay so seva men hajir haya netaji huchahuchaye, kahie impot karayen ? kuchh nahin aap akhabaravale sanikal hai khud aur sani-sajm faila rahe hai pablik men. sani-sajm rastr ke lie sasur sanigrah se jyada ghatak hai. anastha, patrakar nahin, neta jaga rahe hai! hamane bhatijaji ko jhidaka.

ek-ek se 501 rupiya lena. Dhanda apni jagah, yaari dosti apni jagah. Hamara hissa pura 20 hai, yaad rakhna. Gaddari karne ki bhool na kar baithna kyunki hamare dhongiwindows software mein sab ki khabar hoti hai.
mahine ke ant mein jab tum iska munaafa dekhoge to ulte pair hamare ashram ki taraf mithai ka dabba lekar aaoge, ye vaada hai hamara.

isiliye to wo bewakoofon ki tarah taveez aur angoothiyon mein paisa kharch kiya karte hain. Jald hi mauke ka faayda uthakar ye dhandha apna lo. Hamari tasveer angoothi, taveez aur pendant mein daalkar bechna chalu karo. 25 hissa hamara hoga bachcha. Hamare ashram mein bhi to kharcha hai.
