ki yadi swayam hum bhi tumhare saath saari zindagi gujaar dein to bhi tum amir nahi ban sakte. Ye sab padhne se achha hai ki kahin apne samay ka sahi upyog karo to 2 paise kamao. Chalo humein bhi paise kamane jaana hai -

kya barasana - - kya gokul , kya nandaganv! matalab yah ki brajakshetr kee inch - inch jamin par pativrata sushila kee mahima gaee jati thi. log kahate ki agar sakshat pativrata nari ke darshan karana chahate ho to devi sushila ke darshan karo. thi bhi yahi bat. sushila kee jindagi ka har pal apane pati ke lie tha. pati ke darshan kie bina vah jal n piti. ek bar vah apani ek saheli ke yahan gaee. saheli ka pati kahin parades gaya huaa tha. lekin khane ke lie saheli ne nana prakar ke svadisht vyanjan pakae the. sushila yah dekhakar hakkee - bakkee rah gaee. vah to pati kee anupasthiti men ek boond tak grahan karane kee bat n soch sakati thi. isalie usase n raha gaya. vah boli , bahan , tum kaisi stree ho! tumhare pati to parades men hain aur tumane apane lie itani tarah ke vyanjan pakae hain. bhala ek pativrata ke lie yah sab shobha deta hai! sachchi pativrata to vah hai jo pati ko dekhe bina jal tak n pie.

bahan sushila , yah sab dhakosalebaji mujhase nahin chalati. agar main apane pati ke bahar hone par bhi achchha khana khati hoon to isaka matalab yah to nahin hota ki main unhen nahin chahati. main to jaisi khush unake samane rahati hoon vaisi hi unake pichhe bhi. agar koee mujh par ungali uthane par hi tula hoga to use main rok nahin sakati. bakee yah to sirf main janati hoon ya mere pati , ki ham ek - doosare ko kitana chahate hain. saheli ke is javab se sushila jal - bhunakar rah gaee. usane munh chuniyakar kaha , yah to sab thik hai , lekin tum pativrata nahin ho. pativrata stree ke lie shastron men likha hai ki pati kee gairahajiri men vah jal tak n pie. saheli ne isaka bhi karara javab diya. boli , aise shastr mere thenge se! ant men bat yahan tak badh gaee ki sushila tunakakar apane ghar laut aaee.

lekin sushila har bar khari utarati. kabhi vah snan der se karata , to kabhi khet se dopahar dhale lautata. kabhi - kabhi to aisa hota ki parosi thali tak samane hone par vah bahana banakar bahar nikal jata aur din dhale lautata. lekin sushila ne kabhi bhi pati ke khane se pahale pani tak n piya. ek din sushila ke pati ne kaha , aaj mera man khir aur puaa khane ka ho raha hai. isalie khoob ilayachi gari dalakar pue aur chiraunji , kishamish , kesar dalakar khir bana banao. ye donon chijen sushila ko bhi badi priy thin. isalie khoob man lagakar usane ye chijen banaee. kesar aur ilayachi aur desi ghee kee sugandh se banate samay hi sushila ke munh men pani aane laga. chijen bana chukane ke bad sushila ne apane pati se jhatapat snan kar lene ko kaha.

aakhir men harakar , vah balti - lota aur rassi lekar nahane gaya. nahane men bhi usane kafi der laga di. idhar sushila kee aaten mare bhookh ke kulabulane lagi thi. lekin jaise hi dehari ke bahar use pati ke khadaoon kee aavaj sunaee di , use dilasa bandhi ki ab to khane ka samay aa hi gaya. lekin jaise hi pati ne dehari de andar pair rakhe , dayen pair kee khadaoon se pair aisa fisala ki vah charon khane chit fail gaya. balti - lota hath se chhootakar door ja gire aur aankhen faili kee faili rah gaee. yah dekha to sushila jis halat men thi vaisi hi daudi pas jakar sir hilaya , aavajen din , lekin sab bekar. pati agar jinda hota tab to bolata hi , lekin usake to pran pakheroo ud chuke the , isalie bhala vah kaise bolata.

aas - pados ke log jaroor jud jaenge. aur tab khir - pue khane ka mauka to milane se raha. isalie behatar yah hoga ki pahale main khir - pue kha loon , tab rona - dhona shuroo karoon. yah sochakar vah chupachap gaee aur jaldi - jaldi khir udane lagi. pue agale din ke lie rakh lie , kyonki unake kharab hone ka dar n tha. asaliyat yah thi ki pati mara nahin tha , balki marane ka natak kie pada tha. isalie apani patni kee yah sari harakaten vah dekhata raha. jab sushila khir khoob ji bharakar kha chukee to jhatapat munh dhoya aur lamba - sa ghoonghat nikalakar pati ke pas gaee aur sine se chipatakar rone lagi. rone ke sath - sath vah yah bhi kahati jati thi - -

han baten banane men bada mahir tha. isalie log use shekhachilli kahakar pukarate the. shekhachilli ke ghar kee halat itani kharab thi ki mahine men bis din choolha nahin jal pata tha. shekhachilli kee bevakoofi aur susti kee saja usakee bivi ko bhi bhugatani padati aur bhookhe rahana padata. ek din shekhachilli kee bivi ko bada gussa aaya. vah bahut bigadi aur kaha , ab main tumhari koee bhi bat nahin sunana chahati. chahe jo kuchh karo , lekin mujhe to paisa chahie. jab tak tum koee kamaee karake nahin laoge , main ghar men nahin , ghusane doongi. yah kahakar bivi ne shekhachilli ko naukari kee khoj men jane ko majaboor kar diya. sath men , raste ke lie char rookhi - sookhi rotiyan bhi bandh din. sag - salan koee tha hi nahin , deti kahan se? is prakar shekhachilli ko n chahate hue bhi naukari kee khoj men nikalana pada.

kyonki bivi ne sakht hidayat de rakhi thi ki jab tak naukari n mil jae , ghar men pair n rakhana. din bhar chalate - chalate jab shekhachilli thakakar choor ho gae to socha ki kuchh der susta liya jae. bhookh bhi joron kee lagi thi , isalie khana khane kee bat bhi unake man men thi. tabhi kuchh door par ek kuaan dikhaee diya. shekhachilli ko himmat bandhi aur usi kee or badh chale. kuen ke chabootare par baithakar shekhachilli ne bivi kee di huee rotiyon kee potali kholi. usamen char rookhi - sookhi rotiyan thin. bhookh to itani jor kee lagi thi ki un charon se bhi poori tarah n bujh pati. lekin samasya yah bhi thi ki agar charon rotiyon aaj hi kha dalin to kal - parason ya usase agale din kya karoonga , kyonki naukari khoje bina ghar ghusana namumakin tha. isi soch - vichar men shekhachilli bar - bar rotiyan ginate aur barabar rakh dete. samajh men nahin aata ki kya kiya jae. jab shekhachilli se apane aap koee faisala n ho paya to kuen ke dev kee madad leni chahi. vah hath jodakar khade ho gae aur bole , he baba , ab tumhin hamen aage rasta dikhao. din bhar kuchh bhi nahin khaya hai. bhookh to itani lagi hai ki charon ko kha jane ke bad bhi shayad hi mit pae. lekin agar charon ko kha leta hoon to aage kya karoonga? mujhe abhi kaee dinon yahin aasapas bhatakana hai. isalie he kuaan baba , ab tumhin batao ki main kya karoon! ek khaoon , do khaoon , tin khaoon charon kha jaoon? lekin kuen kee or se koee javab nahin mila. vah bol to sakata nahin tha , isalie kaise javab deta!

taki vah unhen n khae. yah sochakar charon pariyan kuen se bahar nikal aaee. hath jodakar ve shekhachilli se bolin , he danavaraj , aap to bade balashali hain! aap vyarth hi ham charon ko khane kee bat soch rahe hain. agar aap hamen chhod den to ham kuchh aisi chijen aapako de sakati hain jo aapake bade kam aaengi. pariyon ko dekhakar v unakee baten sunakar shekhachilli hakke - bakke rah gae. samajh men n aaya ki kya javab de. lekin pariyon ne is chuppi ka yah matalab nikala ki unakee bat man li gaee. isalie unhonne ek kathaputala v ek katora shekhachilli ko dete hue kaha , he danavaraj , aap ne hamari bat man li , isalie ham sab aapaka bahut - bahut upakar manati hain. sath hi apani yah do tuchchh bhenten aapako de rahi hain. yah kathaputala har samay aapakee naukari bajaega. aap jo kuchh kahenge , karega. aur yah katora vah har ek khane kee chij aapake samane pesh karega , jo aap isase mangenge. isake bad pariyan fir kuen ke andar chali gaee.

isalie shekhachilli pas ke ek ganv men chale gae aur ek aadami se rat bhar ke lie apane yahan thahara lene ko kaha. yah bhi vada kiya ki isake badale men vah ghar ke sare logon ko achchhe - achchhe pakavan v mithaiyan khilaenge. vah aadami taiyar ho gaya aur shekhachilli ko apani baithak men thahara liya. shekhachilli ne bhi apane katore ko nikala aur usane apane karatab dikhane ko kaha. bat kee bat men khane kee achchhi - achchhi chijon ke dher lag gae. jab sare log kha - pi chuke to us aadami kee gharavali joothe baratanon ko lekar nali kee or chali. yah dekhakar shekhachilli ne use rok diya aur kaha ki mera kathaputala bartan saf kar dega. shekhachilli ke kahane bhar kee der thi ki kathaputale ne sare ke sare bartan pal bhar men nipata dale. shekhachilli ke kathaputale aur katore ke yah ajibogarib karatab dekhakar ganv ke us aadami aur usakee bivi ke man men lalach aa gaya shekhachilli jab so gae to vah donon chupake se uthe aur shekhachilli ke katore v kathaputale ko churakar unakee jagah ek nakali kathaputala aur nakali hi katora rakh diya. shekhachilli ko yah bat pata n chali. sabere uthakar unhonne hath - munh dhoya aur donon nakali chijen lekar ghar kee or chal die.

bhagavan , ab tujhe kabhi kisi bat ke lie jheenkana nahin padega. n ghar men khane ko kisi chij kee kami rahegi aur n hi koee kam hamen - tumhen karana padega. tum jo chij khana chahogi , mera yah katora tumhen khilaega aur jo kam karavana chahogi mera yah kathaputala kar dalega. lekin shekhachilli kee bivi ko in baton par vishvas n huaa. usane kaha , tum to aisi dinge roj hi mara karate ho. kuchh karake dikhao to janoon. han , kyon nahin? shekhachilli ne tapak se jabav diya aur katora v kathaputalen men apane - apane karatab dikhane ko kaha. lekin vah donon chijen to nakali thin , at shekhachilli kee bat jhoothi nikali. natija yah huaa ki unakee bivi pahale se jyada naraj ho uthi. kaha , tum mujhe is tarah dhokha dene kee koshish karate ho. jab se tum ghar se gae ho , ghar men choolha nahin jala hai. kahin jakar man lagakar kam karo to kuchh tanakha mile aur ham donon ko do joon khana nasib ho. in jaduee chijon se kuchh nahin hone ka.

hamane to tumako koee bhayanak danav samajha tha. aur isalie khush karane ke lie ve chijen di thin. lekin tum to bade hi bhole - bhale aur sidhe aadami nikale. khair , ghabarane kee jaroorat nahin. ham tumhari madad karengi. tumhara kathaputala aur katora unhin logon ne churaya hai , jinake yahan rat ko tum ruke the. is bar tumhen ek rassi v danda de rahi hain. inakee madad se tum un donon ko bandh v marakar apani donon chijen vapas pa sakate ho. isake bad pariyan fir kuen men chali gayin.

is bar main tumhen kuchh aur naye karatab dikhaoonga. vah aadami bhi lalach ka mara tha. usane samajha ki is bar kuchh aur jaduee chijen hath lagengi. isalie usamen khushikhushi shekhachilli ko apane yahan tika liya. lekin is bar ulta hi huaa. shekhachilli ne jaise hi hukm diya vaise hi us gharavale v usakee bivi ko jaduee rassi ne kas kar bandh liya aur jaduee danda danadan pitaee karane laga. ab to ve donon chikhane - chillane aur mafi mangane lage. shekhachilli ne kaha , tum donon ne mujhe dhokha diya hai. mainne to yah socha tha ki tumane mujhe rahane ko jagah di hai , isalie main bhi tumhare sath koee bhalaee kar doon. lekin tumane mere sath ulta bartav kiya! mere kathaputale aur katore ko hi chura liya. ab jab ve donon chijen tum mujhe vapas kar doge , tabhi main apani rassi v dande ko rukane ka hukm doonga. un donon ne jhatapat donon churaee huee chijen shekhachilli ko vapas kar din. yah dekhakar shekhachilli ne bhi apani rassi v dande ko ruk jane ka hukm de diya.

isalie vah bhi jhunjhalaee huee thi. door se hi dekhakar vah chikhi , kamachor tum fir laut aae! khabaradar , ghar ke andar pair n rakhana! varana tumhare lie belan rakha hai. yah sunakar shekhachilli daravaje par hi ruk gae! man hi man unhonne rassi v dande ko hukm diya ki ve use kaboo men karen. rassi aur dande ne apana kam shuroo kar diya. rassi ne kasakar bandh liya aur dande ne pitaee shuroo kar di. yah jaduee karatab dekhakar bivi ne bhi apane sare hathiyar dal die aur kabhi vaisa bura bartav n karane ka vada kiya. tabhi use bhi rassi v dande se chhutakara mila. ab shekhachilli ne apane kathaputale v katore ko hukm dena shuroo kiya. bas , fir kya tha! kathaputala bartan - bhade v jin - jin chijon kee kami thi jhatapat le aaya aur katore ne bat kee bat men nana prakar ke vyanjan taiyar kar die.

jab is desh men aksharon ka utsav manaya jata hai. aaj savere se menh baras raha tha. kal se sabhyata kee raksha par vichar karane ke lie jo kanfrens shuroo hogi, usake lie mulkon se log aae hue hain, aur ham sab soch rahe the ki is barasate menh men aaj aksharon ka utsav kaise hoga. lekin utsav usi aab-tab se huaa, das baje se lekar sadhe gyarah baje tak, jaise har baras hota hai. har ilake ke saikadon bachchon ne, barasate hue menh men jaloos nikala, lal hari pili aur safed jhandiyan laharaee. jinhonne slav lipi banaee thi, un do vidvanon-krial aur maitovi-kee tasviren laharaeen. aur un aksharon ko istemal karake, jin shayaron aur adibon ne mulk ke gulam sharir men svatantrata kee ruh jagaee thi, un shayaron aur adibon kee tasviren bhi laharaee. main bahut-se shayaron aur adibon ke namon se parichit hoon, imaroj ne bhi inake skaich banae hain, isalie ham donon, juloos ke jhadon par laharaee gaee tasviron se, kaeeyon ke nam pahachanate rahe-vah vapatsarov vah kharisto botef.vah gio milev .vah eevan vajov.vah kharisto samaranainskee . aur itane men samane ek jhande se laharati huee ek tasvir dikhaee di-dora gabe kee. 1966 men main pahali bar dora gabe se mili thi, aur milate hi ham donon ko ek doosare kee aisi pahachan ho gaee ki hamane ek doosare se us kee najmen bhi sunin aur dilon kee baten bhi. aur yah silasila pandrah baras chalata raha. jab 1980 men main balgariya aaee thi, dora gabe se usake ghar milane gaee thi, to ek reshami rumal mere gale men dalakar usane kaha tha, yah hamari aakhari mulakat hai, tum ab agali bar aaogi tab men nahin houngi. mainen usake munh par hatheli rakhi, to usane meri hatheli ko honthon par se hatakar apani chhati par rakh liya, boli, suno ! mainen ek lambi najm likhi hai-samudr se baten . aur is varsh ke aarambh men maine suna tha ki vah samudr se baten karate hue, samudr men lin ho gaee hai. aur dekha samane jo aksharon ka utsav manaya ja raha hai, usamen vah ek tasvir banakar , ek jhade par lahara rahi hai. man kee jis halat men main dilli se aaee thi sirf men janati hoon, ya imaroj aur jaisa ki imaroj ke kaha tha, mainen apane desh kee dahalijon ko par karate samay sari udasi ko kenchuli kee tarah utar diya tha. lekin ab-jab samane aksharon ke utsav men dora bage kee tasvir laharati huee dekhi to aankhon ka pani aankhon ka pani aankhon ke kahane ke bahar ho gaya. honth sisak aae- o khudaya ! yah bhi ek desh hai jo apani ek shayara ke aksharon ko aksharon ke utsav men shamil kar raha hai, aur ek mere aksharon vala panjab hai, jo aaj mere aksharon par faujadariyan kar raha hai. mainen apani aankhon ko saugandh dilaee thi ki rona nahin, lekin do-ek pal ke lie jab meri aankhon ke saugandh ko tod diya, to pas khade imaroj se kuchh takat udhar lene ke lie usakee banh kasakar tham li. usane meri or dekha, aur mere gale kee aavaj chahe gili thi, par hontho par jo lafz aae vah sookhe bhi the, sahaj bhi,-mere bad, shayaron par faujadariyan karane valon, aur pavitr aksharon par goliyan chalane valon se kah dena ki duniya men vah goli kahin nahin bani hai jo sach ko lag sake.

aur sir ke oopar aasaman bhi udasi ke badalon se ghira huaa tha. aur man n jane kaunase patal men utar gaya. aur fir 14 maee kee rat thi jab aadhi nind kee halat men maine ek chikh kee tarah kaha tha-mere nanak, ! maine tumhari kalpana karake dekhi hai, lekin aaj tumhen pratyaksh dekhana chahati hoon.kalpana kee aankhon se nahin, in had-mans kee aankhon se. nahin janati, yah chikh kitani lambi thi-sirf itana janati hoon ki mere sharir ka rom-rom chikh bana huaa tha ki achanak aankhon ke samane ek ujala fail gaya, aur bijali jaisi ek tharatharahat mere sare sharir me utar gaee. koee soorat samane nahin aaee, lekin ahasas jaisi ek aavaz suni-tum ! usake astitv ka saboot mangati thin, saboot mil gaya ? us aadhi nind kee halat men munh se nikala-han, maine unhen dekh liya. aur agale kaee dinon tak, akhabar valon ne jitane intarvyoo mange, main deti rahi aur guroo nanak ke bare men likhi huee meri nazamon par jo faujadari mukadame ka notis tha, usake javab ke lie, ek vakeel ko mukhyaranama bhi likhakar diya, lekin itane dinon si sari uparamata ke sath-chaudah tarikh kee rat vale sapane ne, mere mathe par jaise ek thandi hatheli rakh di. 21 maee kee sham ko balgariya jana tha, chali gaee. 25 maee se 27 maee tak sofiya men ko hi, kangres men sanskritik aur aadhyatmik moolyon ke bare men jo takarir karani thi, vah bhi kee. lekin 28 maee se varna ja kar apani sehat ke lie jo ilaj lena tha, usake lie panch sau kilomitar ka safar karate hue prakriti ka jo manoram drishy dekha, usane faujadari mukadame vali bat kee udasi bhi aur gahari kar di aur 14 maee kee rat vale sapane kee tharatharahat bhi mathe men bhar di. yahi ek tadap thi, ek sukoon tha, jo ek nazam banata gaya-

jisamen muhabbat ko kal-kal karate jharanon kee bhasha men pesh kiya gaya tha. vahan kaee thietar aise hain jahan ek hi film din-bhar chalati rahati hai, aur ek paund ka tikat lekar aagar aap thietar men chale jaen to ek hi film ko, chahen to kaee bar dekh sakate hain. imaroz aur maine bhi vah film us din kaee bar dekhi thi. kahate hain, us film kee kahani ek sachchi ghatana ke aadhar par banaee gaee thi. usamen sarkas men kam karane vali ladakee hai aur fauj ka ek sipahi. donon apane kshetron se bahar nahin aa sakate, lekin donon ko ek doosare se bepanah muhabbat ho jati hai, aur us muhababt ka takaza hai ki donon ko kuchh din sath jaroor jina hai- donon apane-apane kshetr se bahar aa jate hain, aur janate hain ki donon bahut jaldi kanoon kee pakad men aa jaenge, isalie maut se udhar lie hue dinon men, vah har pal foolon kee aab-tab ke saman jite hain. 21 maee ko balgariya aane se pahale dilli men ek afavah suni thi ki aajakal panjab men jaise kaee log goliyon ka nishana ban rahe hain, main bhi vaise hi kisi goli ke nishane ka lakshy hoon. ise afavah kahana hi sahi hai, vaise mainne yah bat ek vishvasaniy sootr se suni thi. balgariya ka nimantran svikar karane kee manasik dasha nahin thi, lekin jitane bhi mere shubh-chintak mere pas aae the, unaka aagrah tha ki main yah nimantran zaroor svikar kar loon. aur us samay gyarah baras pahale dekhi huee skendiviyan film kee kahani mere manas me ghul gaee. aur laga-jindagi kee aakhari sans tak, foolon kee aab kee tarah jina hai.bad men balgariyan doston ka tapak bhi foolon ko pani dene jaisa tha. lekin kabhi-kabhi ghor udasiyan bhi aankhon men jo pani nahin la sakati, kisi dost kee muhabbat us pani ka bandh tod deti hai. aisi ghatana dilli men bhi huee thi jab khushavant sinh ne kaha tha-main tumhen akeli kisi kachahari kee peshi men nahin jane doonga. tumhare sath rahoonga. agar tumhen kisi ne goli marani hai to sath men mujhe bhi mar den. aur thik aisi hi bat haribhajan sinh ne bhi kahi thi-dekho, shayar ke taur par mujhe jo hasil karana tha, kar liya hai. talim ke kshetr men bhi jo pana tha, pa liya hai. aur aalochak ke taur par bhi jo prapti karani thi, kar li hai. ab tumhare sath marane ko taiyar hoon. aur ab ekadam paraye desh men aaj 25 maee kee rat ko jab balga-riya ke sabase pyare shayar lyoobomir laivachail ne apane ghar davat par bulaya hai, to chabhiyon ke guchchhe men se ghar kee chabhi nikal kar mujhe thama di hai-yah tumhara ghar hai, tumhara jab ji chahe, aakar khol liya karana ! laivachaiv ke ghar kee chabhi mainen apane mate se laga kar laivachaiv ko lauta di, aur kaha, dosto ! tumhari bivi chitrakar hai, usase kaho ki is chabhi ka chitr banakar mujhe de de. main jab tak jioongi-tumhare bol kee nishani apane pas rakhoongi. lekin levachaiv ke ghar kee sidhiyan utar kar, jab men aur imaroz apane hotal ke lie kar men baithe, to imaroz ke kandhe se sir laga kar-mujhe rona aa gaya. sofiya,-25 maee, rat sadhe barah baje is bar zindagi kee ganimat vali bat hai ki balgariya ka nimantran sirf mujhe hi nahin tha, imaroz ko bhi tha, isalie safar ka ek-ek pal khushagavar hai. sofiya se varna jate hue panch sau kilomitar raste ka chappa-chappa falon aur foolon se lada huaa dekha, to pata laga ki kaee ujadon ka ek-ek ekad tukada, yahan kee sarakar ne un logon ko bina kisi muly ke, diya hai, jo bhi apani mehanat se aabad karake rakh sakaten hain. shart sirf ek zamin par sari mehanat unhen apane hi hathon se karani hai, kisi majadoor ko ujarat dekar apane khet ya bagiche ka kam nahin karavana hai. maine hans kar kamaroz ke kaha, chalo, yahi bas jaen ! tum to jaton ke putr ho, kheti-badi tumhari nason men hai, tum ek ekad zamin aabad karana, aur main kheton men jhonpadi dalakar rahoongi, tumhara khana pakaya karoongi. yah din lal pakee huee cheriyon ke hain aur hamane cheriyon kee tokari bhar kar kar men rakhi huee thi. imaroz ne kaha,gehoon aur makaee bijane vali mehanat shayad ab mujh se nahin ho sakegi, ham poori ek ekad zamin men cheriyon ke paudhe laga lenge.roj lal pakee huee cheriyan kha liya karenge.tum pakkee cheriyan todati raha karana. main bhi usi rau men thi, kaha han, ham cheriyan chunate rahenge, main kabhi-kabhi nazam bhi likh liya karoongi, tum kabhi-kabhi pent bhi kar liyo karana. aur imaroz ne kaha,fir kabhi koee idhar se guzarega to poochhega,-yahan kahin ek shayara kee jhonpadi hai, jo kabhi hindustan se aaee thi. han, vaise hi jaise hamare damodar ne apani kahani men likha hai ki koee rahi makke kee or ja raha tha. raste men rat ho gaee, lekin us bhookhe-pyase rahi ke pas n roti ka ek tukada tha, n ek ghoont pani, aur n hi rat ka koee thikana. us samay registan men use ek jhonpadi nazar aaee. vahan pahuncha to hir bibi ne use pani ka katora bhar kar diya, aur kaha abhi miyan ranjha bheden chara kar lautega, to tumhen dudh ka katora doongi. aur meri bat abhi muhan men hi thi ki imaroj ne kaha-vah bhi tum aur main the. tab makke ke raste men jakar bas gae the, ab is janm men varna jane vale raste par bas jate hain. aur hansi-hansi kee bat ek thandi sans ka mod mud gaee, mere munh se nikala, yah siyalon aur khedon ke karm hamen har janm men bhugatane hain ?

imaroz kee banh pakad kar kitani hi der tak usakee or dekhati rah gaee ki yah sapana use kaise sunaoon ! kuchh bhi lafjon kee pakad men nahin aa raha tha.haule-haule aadhe-adhoore lafjon men sunane kee koshish kee. kisi divar men ek bahut bada shisha laga huaa hai.achanak mera dhyan shishe kee or jata hai aur dekhati hoon ki sir se pair tak meri soorat kisi mandir men padi huee parvati kee soorat jaisi ho gaee hai.badan par safed dhoti hai jis ka palla sir tak lipata hai sir par lambe balon ka ek jooda hai.naksh isi tarah tarashe hue.par meri soorat, aaj se kuchh baras pahale jaisi hai.chehare par ganbhirata aaj jaisi hai, par nakshon kee javani aaj se kuchh baras pahale jaisi. patthar kee ek gadhi huee moorti kee tarah apane aapako dekhati hoon.aur khud hi kahati hoon-aaj mainne yah kaisa bhes banaya huaa hai ? bilkul shiv kee gauri jaisa. sapane kee hairani aur khumari bataee nahin jati.

Popular Topic Aksar beginner bloggers ek post blog par publish karane ke bad soch me pad jate hai , ab kis topic par post write kiya jaye , jo popular ke sath high traffic vala ho. 10 50-60 , Yadi ham yahi baatein 10 years pahle karte to popular topics khojana behad mushkil hota. Par ab bahut se tools available hai, jinki help se ham popular topic easily find kar sakte hai. Vaise Popular Topics par Post likhane se ye fayade ho sakte hai 1.Bahut jyada traffic milegi, vo bhi post publish karane ke 4-5 hours baad hi. 2.Post shandar hone par dusre blogger se backlink milane ke chances banenge, kyonki aapka quality post unka best source ho sakta hai. 3.Ranking bhi jaldi milti hai, kyonki aksar popular topic keyword low competition vale hote hai. 4.Traffic adhik hone se Google Adsense, affiliated marketing aur other monetization method se income jyada ho sakti hai. Aaj main aapke sath vahi strategy share karne jaa raha hun, jise main apne entertainment blog par apply karta hun. Main is strategy ko follow karte hue popular topic vale post par ek din me 1500-3000 traffic pa leta hun. To aaiye janate hai, aise tools ko jinse ham popular topics jaan sakte hai Kaise Popular Topic Find Kare 1.Google Trends Google ka yah tool popular topic janane ka sabse popular aur accurate tool hai. Yah tool users ke dvara search kiye keyword ke base par work karta hai. Google Trends ki sabse achhi khasiyat hai ki ye search keywords ko categories me divide karata hai, jise aap apne blog ki category se related latest trends ko subscribe bhi kar sakte hai . Yaani aapke matalab ki popular topic ki information sidhe aapke inbox me milegi. Google Trends ki ye categories hai 1.Business 2.Entertainment 3.Health 4.SciTech 5.Sports 6.All Categories Google Trends world ke lagbhag sabhi countries ki hot topics available karta hai, jinme India bhi shamil hai. Yadi aapka blog India based hai to country me India select kare, uske bad blog se related se category select kare aur popular topic par post likhe. 2.Twitter Amuman hindi bloggers kam hi twitter ko use karte hai. Par logon ka present time me kya mizaz hai, ye janane ke liye twitter perfect platform hai. Example Abhi koi player century laga de, vo turant twitter par trend karane lag jayega. Twitter users ke dvara istemal kiye hash tagKeyword ke based par Trend list ready karta hai, jo ki users ko desktop version me left sidebar me top par show hota hai. 3.Facebook Kuch dino pahle hi ham Indian ne Facebook use karne ke mamle me USA ko pichhe chhod diya hai. Ab aap samjh sakte hai, Facebook to Indian ke bedroom se lekar office tak sath sath chalta hai. Isliye Facebook users ki engagement increase karne ke liye Trending column start kiya. Jisme facebook par sabse jyada share kiye News ke based par Hot Topic List show hota hai. In hot topic ko aap category icons par click kar in categories me divide kar sakte hai- 1.Politics 2.Science Technology 3.Sports 4.Entertainment 4.UC News Jab se UC News India me launch hua hai tab se ye pakka tha ki UC News logon ke fingers ke niche rahega. Par jab se UC News ne Monetization Program start kiya hai, tab se logon ke pocket bhi fill up karane laga hai. Is karan UC News India ka NO-1 News App ban chukka hai, jise 15 karore se bhi jyada users daily use karte hai. Isliye UC News ne itne bade readers groups ko latest news available karane ke liye Hotspot feature launch kiya hai. UC News sabse jyada padhe jane vale News ke base par Hot Topic ki list Hotspot par available karti hai, jo har minute me update hoti rahti hai. Par is feature me ek badi khami hai ki Jab kisi Particular Topic par jyada se jyada post submit kiya jaye aur uske mukable kam views mile to bhi, use Hot Topic maan liya jata hai. 5.Popular Blog Aap apne niche ke popular blog par regular rahakar apne blog ko grow karane ke liye bahut se tips jaan sakte hai. Inme us blog par kaunsa post popular hai, yah bhi janana behad jaruri hai. Jise aap sidebar me Popular Post Widget se bhi jaan sakte hai. Lekin ye traffic based post show nahi karta hai. Isliye aap in tool ki help se kisi bhi blog ki traffic based popular posts ke bare me jan sakte hai. 1.Alexa Amazon ki alexa ka sabse jyad use kisi blog ya website ki World aur kisi country specific ranking check karane me hota hai. Iske alava Alexa kisi bhi blog ki top keyword show karta hai. 2.Semrush Semrush world ka no-1 SEO Tool hai, jise duniya bhar ke popular blogger, SEO expert aur SEO agency blog ya website ko grow karane ke liye use karte hai. Inme India ke no-1 Seo and WordPress Blogger Harsh Agrawal bhi hai, jo apne blog ke post ki rainking badhane aur maintain karane ke Semrush use karte hai. Semrush ki help se kisi bhi blog ki top keyword aur top post jan sakte hai. Iske liye 1.Pahle Semrush par Visit Karen 2.URL Box me Url enter kar, Domain Analytics me Organic Research Select kare Iske aap top keyword ke bare me janenge. 3.Popular post janane ke liye Pages par click kare. Most Share Post Janane Ke Liye 3.BuzzSumo BuzzSumo kisi bhi popular blog ki social site par most shared post ke baare me easily jaan sakte hai. Buzzsumo kisi bhi post se related Facebook , Linkedin, Twitter aur Pinterest share number show karta hai. Aap alag alag timeline ke most shared post dekh sakte hai 1.24 Hours 2.Past Week 3.Past Month 4.Past 6 Months 5.Past Year 6.Past 5 Year 7.Specific Range 6.Upcoming Event Yadi aap aise niche me hai, jaha kai event tay date ke sath hote hai. Example Kisi new smartphone ka launching date ya kisi popular person ka birthday. Aap in par advance me post likhkar product launching ke din acha-khasa traffic paa sakte hai. Because post pahle likhane ke karan Google me ranking bhi pahle milati hai. Kuch parameters chod de to Google bhi Pahle Aayo aur Pahle Payo ke base par kaam karta hai. Is tarah ki event ke baare me janane ke liye ye kar sakte hai 1.Aapko Upcoming product ki official website par subscription lena hoga. Jisse aap agle 15-30 din ke upcoming product event ko jaan sakenge. Iske alava aap News Channel, Newspaper se bhi information le sakte hai. 2.Aap kisi festival ya popular vykti par post likhate hai, to behtar hoga aap unke birthday aur anniversary of death day ke kuch din pahle hi blog par post publish kar de. Iske liye aap Calendar aur Celebrity Birthday Website ka sahara le sakte hai. Pro Tip Jis din kisi bhi popular vyakti ki death hoti hai, usi din jarur post likhe. Turant hi traffic milega. 7.News Channels Google Trends se pahle News Channel hi popular topic ke bare me inform karta hai. Isliye ise ignore karana murkhata hoga New Channel se mukhytaur par Entertainment, Tech, Politics, Sports se related hot topic ke bare me jana ja sakta hai. Isliye aaj se News Channels dekhana start karen. 8.Google Keyword Planner Kabhi aisa bhi hota hai, post likhne ke liye kai topics mil jaate hai aur Jyada topic hone ki vajah se confusion bhi ho jata hai ki pahle kis topic par likha jaye, jo sabse jyada popular ho. Is problem ko solve karane ke liye aap Google Keyword Planner use karte hai. In steps ko follow kare 1.Google Adword Account setup karen 2.Tool Keyword Planner par Jaye 3.Second vale box me per line ke hisab keywords ko paste kare de. 4.Submit kare aur Result paye. 9.Keyword Everywhere Maine is kuch dinon pahle hi jana hai. Ye Google Chrome ka bada hi handy Seo Extension hai. Is tool ki sabse badi khasiyat hai ki ye automatic kaam karta hai. Yani aap google par kuch bhi search kare. Ye tool Search Page par aane vale sabhi keyword ki traffic CPC aur competition level batata hai. Jise aap Star par click kar Keyword Everywhere ke database me save kar sakte hai aur bad me us topic ko use kar sakte hai. Google Search Bar Google LSI In Last Word Popular topics ke pas vo power hai, jo aapke blog ki traffic ko bump kar sakta hai. Matlab yadi aap popular topic par post likhte hai to 1-2 din me hi blog ki traffic ko 50-100 tak badha sakte hai. Par kuch samay bad us post par traffic kam ho sakti hai, kyonki lambe samay tak vah topic popular nahi rah sakta. Isliye lagatar popular topic par post likhe, jisse aapki blog ki badhi hui traffic badhati hi rahe. Post pasand aaya ho to jarur share karen

samay ke sapeksh aur jivan-gatikee ke rachanatmak kriyashilanon se bhasaman rahi hai jahan ekangi, adhoore, nishkarshamoolak, khandit aur vakr vicharon ko kabhi spesa nahin mili. unakee aalochana men vishay-vastu aur vichar sahajata kintu samagrata se pravesh pate hain aur ek udar vikasit jivan ke paksh men badi dridhata aur nishpakshata se apani bat pathakon ke samaksh rakhate hain. yah unakee aalochana-vidha ka ek vishesh gun samajha jana chahie jo pathakon ko path ke daramyan us vitrishna aur oob se ubarata hai jo prayah kisi ganbhir lekh ke shastreeyata aur vichar-vithiyon ke adhyayan-kram men anubhavaniy hoti hai aur, pathak lekh ke ant tak aalochy vishay-ras ke aasvadan men apane ko bandhe pate hain. kahana n hoga ki shree sinh aalochy-vastu ke bhitar bade nisprih bhav se apani paith banate hain, usako gunate aur taral banate hain, fir apane manasapatr par sokhakar hamare samay, lok aur sanskriti ke nikash par use dhar dete hain aur jab vah unakee apani vastu ban jati hai to badi sahajata se kagaj par rakh dete hain, jo adhyetaon ko sahaj svikaraniy hoti hai. parantu aisa karate hue unamen apani vidvata ka leshamatr bhi ahamany bhav nahin jhalakata. isi karan da sinh kee kritiyan matr aalochana n hokar, ek rachana ka bhi aabhas de jati hai jisamen kavita kee-si sarasata aur bodhagamyata bhi hoti hai. sanpreshaniyata ke is gun ke karan pathak ke man men unake aalochy-vastu ka vichar gahare utarata hai aur aatmasat ho jata hai. yahi vajah hai ki inakee kavyalochana aur vaicharikee, donon pathakon-kaviyon ko n sirf gahari samajh pradan karate hain, apitu klasikee aur shaili-shilp ke star par bhi usakee samajh ko parimarjit kar use samriddh banate hain. nishchay hi, yah unake satat aalochanabhyas, ganbhir adhyayanashilata aur apratim hunar ka parinam hai jo unake shramafal ke roop men unakee kritiyon men udbhasit hota hai.

jab sanprati rachi ja rahi aadhi-adhoori aur khandit aalochana se sahity ka bhala nahin ho raha, balki apooraniy kshati ho rahi hai, vichar-bodh kee sakaratmak aalochana paranpara, jisamen janapadiy sanskar aur lokajivan ke prati atoot aastha ho, kee mahati aavashyakata mahasoos kee ja rahi hai kyonki dekhane vali bat yah hai ki hindi aalochana ka rachana-sanbandh jyadatar aaj vyakti-sanbandh men badal chuka hai jise aalochana kee girohabandi bhi kahana atyukti n hoga! pahale aalochana vyakti-aachchhann n hokar rachana ke gunn-doshon par kendrit hoti thi. par aaj adhikatar yah prayojit hoti hai jisake pichhe ya to bajar aur poonji ka ganit kam karata hai ya fir sabake apane-apane poorvagrah, aatmamoh aur apane krititv ke prati sammohan hote hain. isaliye door-daraj ke ilakon men, janapadon men jo lekhak-kavi yadi mahatvapoorn bhi siraj rahe hain to unakee rachanaon kee kadr nahin. ve upekshaon kee tokari men pade rahate hain. falatah chije shinakht ke abhav men dhire-dhire apani pahachan kho deti hain aur rachanakar bhi nirash aur shithil ho baithane lagate hain, usakee rachanashilata bhi kramashahkharab hoti chali jati hai. aisa isaliye hota hai kyonki suvidhaon kee trishna bade lekhakon -aalochakon ko nagaron-mahanagaron men khinch lati hai jahan ve janapadiy chetana aur spandan se door rahate hain, ataev janapadon men rache ja rahe mahatvapoorn sahity ke prati anyamanask hote hain. isaliye da. jivan sinh ke shabdakarm kee upadeyata svayansiddh hai, karan ki ve pradhanatah janapad ke hi aalochana paranpara se sarokar rakhate hain aur usi ko apani aalochana ka aadhar banate hain. sath hi un vicharadharaon ka tarkasangat prativad bhi karate hain jinase jivan aur lok ka ahit ho raha ho. shram ke bhavalok kee pratishtha aur poonji ke prabhav se falit roopavad aur nira kalavad ko jivan ka pratipaksh manate hue usaka virodh in prativadon men aasani se lakshit kiya ja sakata hai.

jo vibhinn avasaron par unake dvara diye gaye sahityik-vaicharik vyakhyan hain, jise yahan ek mala ke roop men silasilevar gunthakar prastut kiya gaya hai. samay aur sanskriti ko parat-dar-parat kholate hue, bharatiyata se jude anek mahatvapoorn savalon aur usakee asmita kee gaharaee se padtal karate hue, manavapaksheey saty kee nirantar tatol jari rakhate hue, shram kee bhavabhoomi par janagan ke jivan-sangharsh kee katha ka marm batalate hue, vaishvikaran ke sarvagrasi vichar se hajaron salon kee chintanaparampara se nihsrit apani sanskriti ke vinasht ho jane ke aasann sankaton se savadhan karate hue aur manushyata kee sanskriti ka sabal paksh udghatit karate hue da. sinh ne jin moolyon kee sthapana is aalochy-pustak men kee hai, unakee ninv par hi ab tak kee manav sabhyataen nafasat se tikee huee hai aur usaka astitv har samay vajood men hona jivan ke liye anivary hai jisase jude savalon ka sookshmata se avagahan karane kee jarurat hai kyonki ab ham ek gulami se nikalakar doosari gulami kee or chal rahe hain. yah paratantrata itani prachchhann aur apani bhasha men kahen to kapatapoorn indrajal kee maya hai ki hamen ahasas to hota hai ki is daur men ham sabase jyada unmukt ho gaye hain, par kam karane kee jagah se lekar bistar aur atyant niji antarangata kee jagah tak bhi vah hamen apane lapete men le chukee hai. vaishvikaran kee kokh se udbhoot udarikaran ke nam par sare sansar men failaya gaya bhramapoorn vicharajal hi vastutah vah uttar-aadhunikata hai jisane manav jivan ke chandrama ko rahu kee tarah aaj gras liya hai. isaliye da. sinh ne pustak ke aamukh men hi kaha hai ki - poonji ka paksh itana nirankush hokar hamari chhati par baith chuka hai ki kavita, sanskriti aur svabhashayen jindagi ke sarokaron se lagabhag bahar hote ja rahe hain. ham uttar-aadhunik samay ke ek aise chakravyooh men ghir gaye hain ki isase mukti ke upay dhoondh pana kathin ho raha hai. sare vaikalpik jabab vastusthiti kee aalochana se aage nahin badh pa rahe hain. jo bhi uttar nikalakar aate hain, unamen aagat se jyada vigat kee gandh hoti hai. yadi vikalp kee soch ko koee tek milati hai to le-dekar marks aur gandhi kee vichar paranparaon men. kuchh log donon ko milak bhi sochate hain. fir bhi manushyata ke liye bhavishy ka koee spasht uttar nahin ban pa raha hai. n deshi, n videshi. ek sanbhram jaisi sthiti hai.
#NAME?
soor, tulasi, bihari aur subhadra kumari chauhan ke oopar likhe vichar ka uddeshy svayamev ujagar ho jata hai jisakee charcha main ant men karana chahoonga jisase bat ko rakhane men suvidha hogi.

sankat aur usake satitv ke raksharth un kriyashilanon ko samajhane kee antaradrishti deta hai jisake mool men lok kee ve paranparaen aur jivanonnmukh gatividhiyan hain jo manushy kee aantarik unnati ke dvar kholati hai aur manavata kee sanskriti rachane men sahayy aur agragami hoti hai. is khand ka pahala adhyay prakriti, darshan aur sanskriti hai. yahan sanskriti kee rachana -prakriya ko samajhate hue jivan ji ne prakriti, dharm, paranparaen aur vikas se usake antarsanbandhon aur dvandvon ko itani barikee aur saghanata se chitrit kiya hai ki poora aalekh hi ek shodh-aalekh sa lagata hai. ek udaharan dekhie sanskriti aur paranpara ke antarsanbandhon par -

jo us bandariya men bhi dikhaee deta hai, jo agyanatavash apane mritashishu ke thathari ko apane vakshasthal se chipakaye ghoomati hai. kahane ka matalab yah hai ki ham sanskriti ke karmakand se bachakar hi usake jivit aur svasth paksh ka vikas kar sakate hain. karmakand aur anushthan, sanskriti ke bahari paridhan hote hain usakee aatma nahin. manushy ko sadaiv aatmik vikas kee jarurat hoti hai, n ki bahari vaichitry kee.

vastu aur usake upabhog par kendrit ho gaya hai. poonji ka mahatv har samay raha hai lekin vah pahale kabhi manushy kee sthanapann nahin ban payi thi, jabaki ab vah usaka sthan leti dikhaee de rahi hai, yah sanskriti-premiyon ke liye sabase badi chinta kee bat honi chahie. bhavishy ka sangharsh poonji aur sanskriti ka hi sangharsh hoga. dekha jay ki is sangharsh men manushy kitana vijit aur kitana parajit hota hai!

sanskritik itihas ka vivaranatmak adhyayan bhi karana pada tha. parantu mujhe itihas-vettaon kee moti-moti kitabon se us samay utana labh nahin huaa jitana ki filavakt is chhoti si pustak ke sanskriti khand ke aalekhon se, par afasos ki us vakt tak yah pustak prakash men nahin aayi thi. in aalekhon ke padhane ke uparant agar koee bharat ke sanskritik itihas ka adhyayan kare to mere vichar se vah isake udbhav aur vikas kee jatil-sanshlishth prakriya ko adhik gaharaee se samajh payega kyonki in aalekhon men nihit vichar, sanskriti ke aadhunik bhavabodh ko chetana ke star par jagrat kar hamen us satyanveshan kee or modate hain jahan, vivad kee paridhi se alag, itihas apane mool roop men ghatit huaa hai. isaliye pustak ka yah khand matr sahity-sachetaon ke liye hi nahin, sanskriti aur itihas ke shodharth - vidyarthi ke liye ek mahatvapoorn pustak a manual to understand the cultural heritage in India sabit hogi.

bharatiyata ke jvalant aur behad vivadit, ulajhe hue mudde par bharatiyata ka savala shirshak se likha gaya ek matr itana gahan-ganbhir, bahuprastariy multi layered aur bahuaayami multi dimensional vicharalekh bhi hai ki ise is pustak ka menifesto bhi kaha ja sakata hai jo pustak ko sarvajan hitaya aur keemati banate hain kyonki bakaul samalochak yah ek aisa saval hai jo aasani se pichha nahin chhodta. hajaron salon kee paramparaon ka bal hamare pichhe jo hai. kaisi vidambana hai ki aaj kee bharatiyata men ram kee us sanskriti ko ulata ja raha hai, jisamen kursi lene ke bajay kursi chhod dene kee hod rahi hai.

svavalanban aur aatmanirbharata jaise vichar pichhadepan ke dyottak ho gaye hain jisamen gandhi kee mool avadharana ke ant kar dene ka bhi bigul foonk diya gaya hai kyonki da. sinh ke anusar arthavyavastha men ab sab kuchh itana gadd-madd hai ki deshi-videshi, rashtriy aur antarashtriy, jatiy aur vijatiy shaklon kee pahachan kee sookshm rekhaen tak mitane ko hain. . isase kisi samaj, desh aur rashthr kee bhavasatta kee koee ikahari aur ekarekhiy pahachan nahin hoti. isaliye is kshetr men jo keval bharatiy manisha ne racha hai vah usaka apana hai. vahi hamari bharatiyata hai. vastav men is shodhalekh ke madhyam se bharatiyata kee jo khojabin kee gayi hai, usamen yahan ke darshan, rishi-chintan parampara, sanskriti kee samarasata ka aatmasati charitrik paksha, manav-vyavahar aur sanbandh-bhavana ko bakhoobi samane rakha gaya hai. isake sufal ke roop men bharatiyata ka jo pratiman yahan prastut hai, vah is arth men anyatam hai ki vah hi kal ke pravah men tik saka to tik payega, bakee sab aisa pratit hota hai, tathakathit uttaradhunikata ke prabal veg men bah jayenge, itihas jisaka sadiyon se sakshee raha hai.

udaravad kee aad men shoshan aur kroorata ka ganda khel chand bahurashtriy kanpaniyon ke dvara khela ja raha hai. sath hi yahan, is bahari bayar men bharatiyata kee karunadhara ke ksheen ho jane ke sankat par gahari chinta vyakt kee gayi hai.

isake bad ke aalekh dharm aur sanskriti men dharm ke prati marksavadi drishtikon men sanprati falit ho rahe vivekahin, bhramak vicharon ko aade hathon lete hue jivan ji ne dharm ke mool aur sattatmak, donon pakshon ka vishleshan kiya hai kyonki dharm ke mool men manaviy karuna, sachaee, nishchhalata, sanvedanashilata, aasha jaise hriday ke aatmik bhav hain par jab koee bhi dharm, da. sinh ke anusar sattatmak sthiti men tabdil ho jata hai to apani us manaviy pahunch se door hone lagata hai, jo manav jati ke ek samooh ke liye ek samay shanti ka sandesh lekar aayi thi. tab rah jati hai usakee aanushthanikata, usaka karmakand, usaka sharir. dhire-dhire usakee aatma nasht jati hai aur vah ek dhancha matr banakar rah jata hai. is rahasy ko koee jivan sinh sarikhe samalochak kee kushagrabuddhi hi jan sakati hai ki marks ne dharm kee isi ulti prakriti ko janata ke liye afim bataya tha jo dharm kee manaviy bhoomika ke viparit hai, n ki us dharm ko jo kshudratam prani ke liye bhi karuna aur shil ka vyavahar lekar sansar ke kalyanarth avatarit hota hai. yahan dharm ke sanskritik paksh ke ud ghatan men samalochak kee medha atulaniy pratit hoti hai jo aadami ke vishvas ko dharm se digane se bachati bhi hai.

jaisa ki shirshak se spasht bhi hai, vaishvikaran se sanskriti par aasann khataron kee bahukoniy padatal kee gayi hai. yahan lekhak ne yah sandhan aur sanket karane kee koshish kee hai ki yadi bajar, takanik ityadi aadhunik shodhon ka upayog manaviy gunnavatta ke liye kiye jayen to sthiti badal sakati hai jo ki ek vicharaniy sthapana hai.

vah gahan manaviy prakriya ke marg se hokar jata hai. kis tarah jata hai, yah sudhi pathak aalochana padh kar aasani se samajh sakate hain. is path se gujar kar aise kalavad aur roopavad se mohabhang bhi hota hai jo jivan kee prakriya se bahar hai.

bhasha par is pustak par sat aalekh hai. ye aalekh vishvavidyalayi chhatron aur pratiyogi parikshaon men apane vaikalpik vishay hindi sahity chunane valon ko visheshopayogi pathaniy samagri upalabdh karata hai jo unake bhasha sanbandhi silebas par gahari pakad banane ke kam aa sakata hai. sath hi yahan hindi jati kee sankalpana ko vrihattar, udaravadi pariprekshy men vivechit kiya gaya hai jo hindi kshetr ke alava ahindi kshetron men hindi ke vikas aur prasar kee naee sanbhavanaen aur dishaen kholati hain. sath hi sabhi jatiy bhashaon ke unnayan aur aatm-gaurav ka marg prashast karati hai, hinglisha ke prabhav men din-din nishpran ho rahi janabhasha hindi ko akshunn rakhane ke nihitarth bharatiy aatmabal ko sahi disha aur soch pradan karati hai.

kavita khand ke aalekhon ka bhi abhipret hai. ataev ab main pahala khand, jo kavita vishayak pathon par aadhrit hai par aata hoon. is khand men aath vichar hain, jinamen panch madhyakalin sant -kaviyon ke krititv par, ek riti-kavi bihari, ek svatantrata ke gayak stree-kavi subhadra kumari chauhan aur ek kavita ke gady-roop par hai.

soor, tulasi aur mira ko lok jivan ke atyant pratibhavan kavi ke roop men dekhate hain. yahan lok aur bhakti prithak-prithak nahin hai. in sant-kaviyon ka sabase vilakshan gun yah hai ki ye bhakti men yog-sadhana ke paksh ko jivan aur lok kee gaharaee men utar kar pratipadit karate hain, n ki usakee avahelana kar. aur ek premamay, bhavapoorn sansar kee rachana karate hain. aadikal kee kaviyon kee tarah inamen bhakti ka paksh jivan aur lok se kata huaa nahin hai. samalochana men is vichar ko pratishtha mili hai ki aaj ke kaviyon kee rachanadharmita bhale hi un sant-kaviyon kee rachanadharmita se aage kee ho, par unake srijan ke gahan manaviy arthon ko abhi samagr roop se samajhana bakee hai kyonki unakee kavitaon ka lok-samay ab ke kaviyon se kahin adhik samriddh hai. in lekhon ka sabase mahin aur saghan pahaloo hai unamen vyaiktik bhinnata individual difference, jo bahut rochak bhi hai. jivan ji kee sthapana hai ki kabir sanskriti kee buniyad par khade hain jabaki tulasi usake kangooron par.daraasal, kabir hamare aadhunik bhavabodh ke bahut najadik hain, is mamale men tulasi unase pichhe hain. isaliye tulasi samanjasy aur samanvayavad ke poshak hain. ve toote-foote ko jodane ka kam jyada karate hain.kabir samanvayavad ke poshak nahin hain. ve sanskriti ko antarvastu men badalate hain aur pahale se chali aati huee khand-sanskriti men upekshit ko shamil karate hain. kintu jab sanskriti ke star par stree ka mamala aata hai to kabir bhi pichhad jate hain. kabir ke vyapak jivananubhavon men stree kee pida nahin sama pati. is morche ko sanbhalati hain miran. soor par likhe gaye aalekh ye braj ke loga men ve sabase mahatvapoorn bat kahate hain ki soor ne nagar sabhyata ke oopar gramy sabhyata ko pratishthit kiya hai jinamen prem aur jivan ke rag hain. par kaise? yah sab janane ke liye sinh ji ke priy pathakon ko poore aalekh se gujarana hoga, sab uddharan yahan dena samichin nahin kyonki yah to pustak-charcha hai jisamen mainne matr apani pathakeey samajh hi abhivyakt kee hai.

ek bat aur bhaktikalin kaviyon par, vah yah ki prem-ras ke atyant mahatvapoorn kavi malik mo. jayasi kee kami is khand men khalati hai, jo madhyakalin sant-kaviyon kee ladi ko poori hone se rokati hain. parantu pustak ke aamukh men da. sinh kee svikarokti hai ki jayasi par koee mauka nahin mil paya to ve chahate hue bhi chhoot gaye. par unase aasha kee jani chahie ki is pustak ke aagami sanskaran men is kami ko door kar liya jayega.

to ve sahajata se muskurakar tal gaye. laga ki svamukh prashansa se bachana chahate the. par unako sangopang padhakar svayan yah anubhav kiya ja sakata hai ki unakee soch men pragadh parthivata vidyaman hai jo unakee aalochana ko shreshth aur arthavan banati hai. thik hi kaha hai kisi ne ki shauk-e-didara gar hai to nazar paida kar. unamen yah nazar arthat aalochana -drishti isi parthivata se utpann hoti hai.

sahity ke gady aur pady, donon pathakon ke liye apane lok, vartaman aur bharatiy sanskriti ke samajh ko vikasit karane kee ek anoothi aur anivary pustak sabit hogi- shabd aur sanskriti jo unake sandarbh-granth ke roop men sahayak ho sakati hai.
balki sahity-parisar men apana panv pasarane lagi hai jo sahityalochana ke svasth parampara ke vikas ke ujjval bhavishy kee aashvasti deti hai.

jo likh raha hoon vah kyon likh raha hoon ? kisake lie likh raha hoon ? yah bhi, ki kya likh raha hoon. mere mitr meri is man sthiti par darshanik mudra men muskate hain, fir yakayak ganbhir ho jate hain, aur samajhate hain bachcha ye to buniyadi saval hain, in savalon par to log bahut bahasen kar chuke hain. tumhen apana darshanik star thoda badhana chahie. masalan aajakal uttar aadhunikata par jo bahas ho rahi hai, usamen tumhara kya rol ho, abhi tak tumane uttar aadhunikata par kya likha hai, kuchh nahin n daraasal tum samay se kafi pichhe chal rahe ho. main hin bhavana lie vapas lautata hoon. mera isilie lekhakon kee biradari men koee sammanajanak sthan nahin ban paya hai. koee bhi lekhak mujhe jhidak sakata hai - aakhir mainne likha kya hai ? n to usamen bhasha ke sath khelane ka kaushal hai, n usamen chamatkrit karati sthitiyan hi hain, n patanonmukhi pashchimi lekhakon kee rachanaon ke parishkrit ansh hi usamen hain, n abhadrata, ashlilata aur nagnata usamen hai tab kya hai mere lekhan men ? ab bhaiya ye kyon nahin samajhate ki aadarshavadi aur yatharthavadi lekhan ka bhi ant ho chuka hai. ab jaduee yatharth ka yug hai marks aur lenin aprasangik ho gae hain. ab to ginsabarg kee bat karo, jok derida kee bat karo, striyon kee saundary pratiyogita kee bat karo, amerika ke nachaniya maikel jeksan kee bat karo, bil gets kee bat karo, yani jo bhi aadami ko jins aur aakankshaon ko havas bana sake, us vastu kee bat karo, yahi uttar aadhunikata hai.

bole haikort men pablik intarest litigeshan ke pachas hajar rupaye lagenge. aajakal in netaon ne to desh ko barabad kar rakha hai, sab bhrasht hain bhrashtachar ke khilaf to bas jyoodisiyari hi ekamatr sahara hai. aap pachas hajar rupaye mere asistaint ke pas jama kara dijie aur use poora kes vistar se samajha dijie nishchit hi yah kes ham hi jitenge. aajakal jyoodisiyari janata ke fevar men disijan de rahi hai .

yani uttar aadhunikata ka matalab jyoodisiyari hi samajhaegi. khair mujhe is bade vakeel par n krodh aaya, n daya hi aaee ab mainne socha chalo kisi daktar ya injiniyar se poochhate hain ki uttar aadhunikata kya hai. ek nami daktar ke yahan bhid lagi huee thi at mainne marijon ka samay nasht karana uchit nahin samajha aur klinik se bahar nikal kar sidhe sinchaee vibhag ke adhishasi abhiyanta ke daftar men ghus gaya. pata chala sahab daure par hain, es di o bhi sath gae hain , koee injiniyar hai ? mainne janana chaha tabhi ek lamba sa naujavan mere pas aakar thahara aur poochha kya kam hai ? mainne kaha ek janakari prapt karani hai. vah bola -bataie yah sunishchit ho jane par ki vah injiniyar hai, mainne kaha - main uttar aadhunikata ke bare men aapake vichar janana chahata hoon. vah thoda achakachaya, bola aap kya janana chahate hain. main nahin samajh paya aap kaun hain aur kahan se aae hain ? mainne kaha -ji main ek lekhak hoon aur isi shahar men rahata hoon. aajakal uttar aadhunikata kee badi charcha hai buddhijiviyon ke bich men aur injiniyar intailijainsiya men aate hain at aapake vichar janana chahata tha. vah thoda chakit huaa bola - yoon to main kam se ja raha tha par aapaka kes intaresting hai, aaie baithate hain. usane ghanti bajaee, chaparasi se pani aur fir chay lane ko kaha aur ulte usane mujhase janana chaha ki ye fenomina uttar aadhunikata aakhir kya hai ? mainne kaha - jaise modarnijm matalab aadhunikata purane roodhivadi mahaul men ek khulapan aur sampannata, adhik suvidhaen laya vaise hi ab post modarnijm aa gaya hai, matalab khulepan kee intiha, sampannata kee intiha, aur suvidhaon kee intiha ho gaee hai. aadhunikata ke bad ab uttar aadhunikata ka jamana hai. aap bataen is bare men aap kya sochate hain. vah fir bola its veri intaresting, mainne to is bare men kabhi socha hi nahin aur sahi mayane men to maine kabhi modarnijm ke bare men bhi nahin socha. han kabhi lagata tha ki log padh likh kar modarn ho gae hain. par dekhie hamare desh kee halat to bahut kharab hai. ganvon men to logon ko pine ko saf pani tak nahin hai, sadaken nahin hain, sinchaee kee suvidhaen nahin hain, achchhe skool nahin hain, aspatal nahin hain. sach to ye hai ki in chijon kee kisi ko paravah bhi nahin hai, n sarakar ko, n prashasan ko aur aapake ye buddhijivi, ye lekhak bas baten karate hain, han kuchh achchhi baten bhi karate hain par usase kya hoga ? main to taims aof indiya padhata hoon, usamen kuchh aartikal achchhe aate hain. aapase milakar bahut achchha laga main kisi lekhak se pahali bar mila hoon kabhi fir aaie, kahakar vah uth khada huaa, main bhi uthakar bahar aa gaya.

vyagr tha ki itane men meri najar mere padosi arthashastr ke profesar rasabihari varma par padi. mainne unhen namaskar kiya aur unake sammukh apani jigyasa rakhi. ve thode achakachae par fir sambhalate hue unhonne kaha -dekhie aaj ikonami kee halat kya hai ? hamen gro karane ke lie kepital chahie taki indastriyal devhalapament ho sake sari yojanaen kepital intensiv yojanaen hain, investament karana padega, par paisa nahin hai. ab globalaijeshan se maltineshanalhamare yahan aakrisht hue hain, hamari polisij libaral huee hain isase fark padana chahie tha, par nahin pada sach poochhie to hamari sabase badi kamajori hai ki sab bhrasht hain, beeeman hain. ab dekhie desh men paisa aata hai, neta kamishan kha jate hain, bade-bade afasar lakhon rupaye dakar jate hain to ikonami stebal kaise ho ? blek aur vhait men, blek ka reshyo badh gaya hai amir jyada amir aur garib jyada garib ho gaya hai. lekin fir bhi tarakkee to huee hi hai vaise agar hamare charitr men thodi si eemanadari aa jae to bat hi kuchh or ho han, vo kya kaha hai aapane uttar aadhunikata, han to yahi hai bas, yahi hai madarnijm, postamadarnijm jo kuchh hai.

uttar aadhunikata kya hai ? bas lekhak hi is atyadhunik gyan ke gyata hain at ab kisi lekhak se hi is vishay par bat karani chahie. mainne riksha pakada aur ek kasbaee lekhak mitr ke ghar kee or chal diya. man nahin mana aur mainne rikshevale se bhi poochh hi liya ki bhaee uttar aadhunikata ke bare men janate ho ?
log pahale paidal chalate the fir ghodagadi, bailagadi, riksha aur fir motaragadi aa gaee, to ye huee aadhunikata isake bad kya hoga ?
kisi din bis kisi din chalis, pachas tak mil jate hain. itane men lekhak mitr ka ghar aa gaya, maine riksha rokakar paise die.
babooji aapane bataya nahin havaee jahaj ke bad kya aaega ? mere mool prashn ko yad karate hue budabudaya uttarichchha.

uttaraichchha yani jahan chaho ichchha se udakar chale jao, jahan chaho utar jao koee ghoda nahin, koee gadi nahin, jahaj bhi nahin rikshe vala muskaraya aur rikshe ka haindal pakadakar aage badh liya.

badi bat thi, varana aise avasar birale hi hote the jab ve ghar par milate hon. unhonne bahut garmajoshi aur apanepan se svagat kiya, aakhir kasbaee the ji bhar ke baten karane ke lie arddhapadmasan kee mudra men ek chh inch oonche takht par virajaman ho gae mainne unhen apani pareshani bataee, ve bahut vinamr hokar bole, bandhu aap hi adhik samajhadar hain, main to kasbe se aaya hoon, vahan to aadhunikata hi badi gajab dhane vali huee jise dekho vahi chakkoo, chhuri, tamancha latakae ghoome hai. ek or rajaniti ke akhade hain to doosari or sharirik shakti ke bade shaharon aur ti vi kee chamak-damak se prabhavit naee pidhi. sab kuchh alp samay men pa lene ko aatur thahari dharm-karm ka jvar aata jata rahata hai. kuchh log apani asahayata aur suvidhahinata par dravit hote rahate hain. seth sahookar thasak se rahate hain naukaripesha badhate bhrashtachar aur makkari se sadaiv trast rahate hain. majadoor varg badhati mahangaee se majadoori kee tulana karata rahata hai. is sabake bavajood apanapan hai vahan, par aage badhane ka koee skop nahin hai, isalie log bade shaharon kee or bhagate rahate hain. vahan to aadhunikata hi lanpatapan kee shreni kee aaee hai, ab uttar aadhunikata kya hogi ? badi daravani tasvir banati hai jehan men mujhe laga yahan bat nahin banegi, aage badhana chahie so mainne aagya chahi .
abhi aae, abhi chal die, yahi to shahar valon ka gun hai thik se baithe bhi nahin, sahity aur duniya jahan kee charcha bhi nahin huee, itani jaldi kya hai bandhu ?
fir baithenge, daraasal aaj mujhe uttar aadhunikata par ek raitaap dena hai main chala aaya, ve avak dekhate rahe.

gahe bagahe charcha bhi karate hain, inhin men se kisi ko pakadana chahie mainne ek midiya eksapart se bhent kee. ye bhootapoorv sahityakar aur abhootapoorv marksavadi huaa karate the. unhonne mujhe bataya, aadhunikata ke kansept men yatharthavad urf marksavad ka bahut bada yogadan tha. ab soviyat roos aur madhy yorop men marksavad ke asafal rahane se jaroorat mahasoos hooee ki isake bad kya vicharadhara samichin hai. ab ek atyadhunik aur aashcharyajanak roop se sahi arthon men uttar aadhunik vichar kee jaroorat hai jo uttar marksiy vicharon ko rekhankit kar sake. aaj ka yatharth koee sapat yatharth nahin, jaduee yatharth hai. kahin koee chij yatharth hai. kahin koee aur chij. ab duniya simat gaee hai. hamen kshetreey soch se aage badhakar bhoomandaliy soch kee aavashyakata hai. vicharon kee duniya men naee kranti kee jaroorat hai. naee se naee chij, naya se naya utpadan, naya se naya manushy aur naya se naya vichar aur vyavahar, yahi uttar aadhunikata hai. nishchit hi ab mere gyan chakshu khul gae the.

fir thathakar hanse, pun ganbhir mudra banakar unhonne kahana shuroo kiya, daraasal itana saral nahin hai is vishay ko samajhana. hamen itihas, vartaman aur bhavishy, trikal ka dhyan rakhana hoga. atit men pauranik sandarbhon men dekhen to bramha, vishnu, mahesh ka jo charitr roopak hai usamen vishnu parampara se bandhe dikhaee dete hain, bramha sarjak hain, parampara todate hain yadakada at aadhunik mane ja sakate hain. shiv hamesha parampara aur yug donon se aage chalate hain isalie uttar aadhunik mane ja sakate hain. vartaman men ham dekhate hain ki vishv vikasashil, vikasit aur avikasit tin shreniyon men vibhajit hai. avikasit log atitajivi hote hain vikasashil aadhunik poorn vikasit tatha vikas ko poornnat atikramit karane vale, donon uttar aadhunik hain. ab ham bhavishy kee bat karen, bhavishy men ham kahan honge aur kahan hona chahenge ? ham agar nirantar yatharth kee bat karate rahenge aur aage nahin badhenge, to kuchh bhi hasil nahin kar payenge sach yah hai ki hamare desh kee sath pratishat janata jahil hai, ya kah lijie ashikshit hai, garib bhi ho sakati hai, to inake bharose ham kahan jaenge ? samriddh aur sukhi bhavishy ke lie hamen inakee bat karani chhodani hogi. hamen vishv arthavyavastha ke sandarbh men khud ko dekhana hoga. vikasit deshon ko samajhana hoga. vikas ke aage kee sthitiyon ko samajhana hoga. ham bahut kuchh amerika se sikh sakate hain, kaise vishv ke sabhi deshon par apana samarik, manovaigyanik dabav banaya jaye. bahurashtriy kanpaniyon se sikh sakate hain, kaise duniyabhar men apani aarthik unnati ka netavark sthapit kiya jae ? ham pashchim kee jivanashaili se sikh sakate hain ki kaise sukhi samriddh aur aanandadayi jivan jiya ja sakata hai.

samaj aur rashtr kee simaon se oopar hai, shreshth hai, use apani shreshthata sthapit karani chahie, kisi bhi keemat par sahity men uttar aadhunikata ko lekar badi bhramak sthiti bani hai. sare tutapunjiya lekhak uttar aadhunikata kee baten karane lage hain. ve kuchh janate- samajhte to hain nahin, bas talab ke mendhakon kee tarah tarr-tarr lagae hue hain. lautate samay unhonne mujhe ek aavashyak hidayat di ki aap jo bhi likhen, mere nam ke ullekh ke bina hi likhen kyonki aapake pas tep vagairah nahin hai at aap nishchit hi bat banakar likh denge aur fir mujhe kahi huee baton ko dis-on karana padega.

kah pana mushkil tha ve ek hi samay men dakshin aur vam donon the, balki kaha jae to ek ajib sa ghalamel the. badi ajib bat thi ki ve apane ko dakshin se shuroo manate the par n to ved, puran aur upanishad unhonne padhe the n bharatiy parampara ke vishesh gyata the aur ab ve choonki apane ko vam ke karib pate the lekin marks, engals aur lenin ko padhane kee bhi unhonne koee jahamat nahin uthaee thi. dvandatmak bhautikavad aur aitihasik bhautikavad unhen ubaoo vishay najar aate the. aur n hi vam rajaniti unhen bahut prabhavit karati thi. is sabake bavajood ve khanti uttar aadhunikata virodhi lekhak the. uttar aadhunikata ke virodh men unake tark khase vajanadar aur vamamargi the. mainne jab unhen bataya ki main kaee buddhijiviyon aur a-buddhijiviyon se mil chuka hoon lekin abhi tak nahin samajh paya ki samasamayik sandarbhon men hamare desh men is fenomina kee kya upayogita hai ?

samrajyavad ka virodh hai, maltineshanals ka virodh hai, globalaijeshan ka virodh hai, libarelaijeshan ka virodh hai, apasanskriti ka virodh hai, patanashil moolyon ka virodh hai, aakhir kitane log hain jo ye virodh kar rahe hain ? kitane log is ladaee men shamil hain?

jisakee charcha n hona svabhavik tha mainne naukari se bina batae chhutti kar li thi, kal mujhe isake lie dant sunani hogi. ghar par rashan khatm ho gaya tha, khana banane ke lie bajar se patni do kilo aata aur aadha kilo chaval laee hogi. padosi ke bachche ka eksident ho gaya tha, mujhe aspatal jana tha, nahin pahunch saka yooniyan ke dimand chart banane men mujhe apani ray rakhani thi, vah bhi nahin rakh paya. desh ke maujooda halat par mujhe taras khana tha, vah bhi nahin kha saka. akhabaron men chhapi hatya, balatkar, dakaiti, firauti, pulis julm, netaon kee besharmi aur prashasan kee janavirodhi harakaton par bladapreshar badhana tha, vah bhi nahin badha paya. sampadakon kee foohadata par unhen dantana tha vah bhi nahi dant paya. ek chhoti si sahaj kavita likhani thi, nahin likh paya.

vaise hi jaise ki isaka git-sangitamay hona isakee anokhi khausoosiyat ke roop men sthapit ho chuka hai. aur itani sari filmon ke itane sare giton ke aadhar par ek samajik safar ka khaaaqa pesh karane kee himakat karana - itane chhote-se aalekh men - vaisa hi hai jaisa sanskrit kee vah kahavat ki aap dustar samandar men tairane to nikale hain par bataur sazosaman aapake pas bas ek adad dongi hai! lihaza main apana kam thoda aasan yah kahate hue kie leta hoon ki main sirf ishqiya ganon ke kuchh pahaluon par kuchh sthool baten hi kah paoonga. ab prem giton kee tadad bhi koee kam to nahin hai - kyonki vidhaen hamare yahan aksar nattham-guttha paee jati hain aur har qism kee film men ek prem-kahani, chahe up-plot ke roop men hi sahi, amooman hoti hi hai. nayak-nayika prem se pahale, prem ke dauran, virah kee avastha men tatha shadi v suhagarat aadi ke mauqe par bhi lazimi taur par gate-gunagunate pae jate hain. halanki hamare yahan sanvad ya dayalog bhi khaaase kavyatmak v natakeey hote rahe hain, par jaisa ki prasoon joshi ne hal hi men faramaya, kaee sthitiyon ko bayan karane ke lie gane aam taur par zayada karagar auzar hote hain.

aaj bhi badastoor qaayam hai, aur rahenge, bhale hi dilli ke chand sine-darshak ganon ke dauran hi uthakar farig hona apane vaqt ka behatar istemal samajha karen. aam log yah bhi kahate pae jate hain ki sine-sangit men vah bat nahin rah gaee hai jo pahale huaa karati thi. aaj rimiks ke chalan ke sthapit ho chukane ke bad shastreey mizaj ke rasikon ko ek aur taiyarashuda bahana mil gaya hai adhunatan ko kosane ka ki hay, dekhie kaise ye nae zamane ke nasamajh itani achchhi-achchhi dhunon ko, itane achchhe-achchhe giton ko bhrasht kie de rahe hain, jaise nae ganon ka naganapan kafi nahin tha ki puranon ko bhi buri tarah tod-marod rahe hain. paranpara kee thati bazar ke luteron ke hathon sareaam lut rahi hai aur ham mookadarshak bane hai, afasos hamen ye din bhi dekhana tha!

kinchit nirapeksh bhav se shayad soch sakate hain ki paranpara ko lekar is tarah kee mat-bhinnata utani hi shashvat hai, jitane paranpara ko nae sire se sirajakar samriddh karane men usase hue prasthan. ham sab apane zamane kee chizon se sahaj moh men jite hain, aur nae ko shak kee nigah se dekhate hain. yah sab vaisa hi hai jaisa ki apane skool-kolej ke dinon ya javani ke dinon ko yad karate hue yah kahana ki ab kolej men vah bat nahin rah gaee hai, hamare zamane men yah hota tha, vah hota tha! ajib bat nahin hai, par pareshani tab shuroo hoti hai jab yadon kee rahaguzar se chuninda, behatarin qisse uthate hue vartaman tak aate-aate ham chahe-anachahe patan ka ek afasana, ek achchha-khaaasa vrittant gadh lete hain ki hamare daur ke bad to jo bhi guzara, gaya-guzara hi thahara! ham rachanatmak dharatal par musalasal chhijate hi gae hain. yah pariprekshy filmi itihas-lekhan par, chahe vah patrakari ho ya sanjida, khaaas taur par hal tak havi raha hai. misal ke taur par main filmi duniya ke patrakar-sansmarannakar ramakrishn kee ati-pathaniy kitab se vah ansh uthana chahoonga jab ve sahir ludhiyanavi se ek lanbi-si batachit kar rahe hote hain. gaaur se dekhen to yah muthabhed film kee riyazat karane vale aur film par nuqtachini karane, use puraskrit ya nindit karanevale do alag drishtikonon ke bich kee hai. ramakrishn bar-bar star sistam, vigyapan, blaik mani, asahityik, ashastreey antarvastu aadi kee bat karate hue ghuma-firakar patanonmukh filmi rachanatmata kee bat sahir se manavana chahate hain, lekin sahir hain ki ade hue hain, aur ve hindi filmon ko n duniya kee kisi aur bhasha kee filmon se kamatar manane ko taiyar hain, n hi ve ise ashlil ya foohad manate hain. vaise hamare maujooda muqaam se palatakar dekha jae to ye saval bhi kitane satat aur shashvat rahe hain sochakar hairat hoti hai. lagabhag yahi saval aaj bhi hindi ka koee bhi patrakar filmakaron se karata nazar aata hai, giravat aur milavat kee yahi bhasha koee bhi tippanikar chalate-firate sinema par jad deta hai. dohare maze kee bat yah hai ki ye prashn sinema ke svarnnakal men, use svarnnakalik banane vale se hi kie ja rahe the. chalo suhana bharam to toota ki itihas ke baqisvarnnakalon kee tarah yah suvarnnamay daur bhi thik vaisa hi nahin tha jaisa ki manane ka aam taur par mithakeey rivaj raha hai!

unake sangit se katakar dekhana akshamy hai, par is lekh men main ek aise path kee jurrat karana chahata hoon, jahan shabd hi aham hain, shesh chize gaun. to meri shanka ka pahala karan ye hai ki mujhe us daur ke gane, khaaas taur par prem-git nihayat rondoo jan padte hain. sharad datt ne sahagal kee jivani likhate hue yah dalil di hai ki behatarin git aam taur par karun hue hai. ve viyogi hoga pahala kavi taip ke shlok bhi uddhrit karate hain is siddhant ke samarthan men. khaud is daur ka ek gana to isaka ghoshanapatr jaisa hai hi
tadpati, virahakul ya virahatur kahana mushkil hai par is lanbi vyatha ka ton kundanalal sahagal-shmashad begam-noorajahan ke yug men hi tay ho gaya tha.

vaise talat mahamood aur rafi bhi us yug kee dardili dhara se achhoote nahin rah sakate the. aaie kuchh chuninda hit ganon kee ek pared dekhen, unaka hit hona isalie manikhaez hai ki n sirf in giton ke rachayita balki unake darshak-shrota bhi is samoohik marsiyakhavani men shamil hain.

tanhaiyon ka atoot silasila hai, aansuon ka sailab hai, duniya choonki zalim hai dard samajhana to door ghayal man ka makhaaul udane men zayada dilachaspi leti hai, lihaza bar-bar marane-mitane, duniya chhod jane kee khavahish dikhati hai. ek amar deth-vish! shayad bemani nahin hoga yah kahana ki aazadivibhajan ke bad ka ek-dedh dashak apane ishqiya lahaze men sahity ke mahadevi yug-jaisa tha. ye bhi spasht hai ki roomaniyat ka yah soofi-bhakti tevar zamane kee zayadatiyon kee aalochana gam kee siyahi men doob kar karata hai. samajik vishamataon ke khailaf khule vidroh ke kaee misalen hain par usakee roomani tarjumani men aatmavishvas ka abhav hai. tadabir se taqdir badalane ka, danv lagane ka zikr bhi aata hai, par aavahan ke roop men hi. kuchh apavad hain, par unhen apavad hi mana jana chahie, jaise ki shailendr ka likha aaha ka yah git jisamen virah-vyatha aatmahanta disha men n jakar badi nazuk kavyatmak sthitiyan aur binb rachati hai.

amooman usi anupat men jisamen vah prashansa kee pushp-vrishti kiya karata tha. kahane kee zaroorat nahin ki virah aur vifal pyar ke git abhi-bhi hain par unakee sankhya kafi kam ho gaee hai. sattar ke dashak men jahan mumataz jaisi nayikaen bhi bhang khakar ya bina khae bold ho rahi hainjay-jay shiv shankar, kanta lage n kankararotibindiya chamakegi, choodi khanakegido raste aur khalanayika helen logon ke man men apane mohak ke nrity ke bal par - aaj jise aaitam nanbar kahate hain - piya too ab to aaja, shola sa man dahake aake bujha ja ka mukt nimantran deti hain, to manoj kumar poorab aur pashchim ke sabhyata-vimarsh ke yuddh men shuddh-shashvat bharatiy aadhyatmik prem ke nae manadand rachate hain chal sannyasi mandir men ka javab pap hai tere andar men hi hona tha. dev aanand bhi hippi uchchhrinkhalata ko apane naitik vimarsh se dapatate hain. par jooli, bobi namni aavara isaee ladkiyan hindoo nayakon ka shilabhang karati hi rahin. bich-bich men hira-ranjha, laila-majanoon logon ko purani shaili ke shahidana pyar vale nostailjiya ka sukhad ahasas karane ke sath-sath darate bhi hain. labboluvab yah ki log lav-storiyan banate rahe, sabhyata se bhagakar grihasthiyan basate rahe.

aur unake bich ek saf shram-vibhajan bhi hai, bazar kaun jaega, rasoee kise dikhati hai, aur kaun shaharati hai, jo us biyaban men pani aur bijali khoj rahi hai, aap vakyon ka ling-nirnnay karake samajh gae honge.

khaaamoshi1969 ke lie. par hal ke dinon men aksa ke git bhi unhonne hi likhe, aur banti aur babali tatha satya ke bhi - jinamen kiradaron ke mutabiq sadk-chhap kavita ko bade saliqe se ek vyangyatmak doori banate hue chipakaya gaya hai. par onkara men to khaaas taur ve aise git sirajate hain jo bipasha basu ke kiradar ke sath nyay karate, aayatam hote hue bhi, ishq ke abhinav mizaj kee paribhashaen gadhate hain. namak ishq da aur bidi jalaile donon hi ek sath kinchit karun aur daihik hain. ek mujara karanevali ka bindas vivek abhivyakti pata hai trasad trikon ke bhram ko hava dete padosiyon ke lihaf, unake choolhe se udhar li gaee aag ke binb men.

vah ab 17 aur 21 chunbanon kee aandhi ban gaee hai. kabhi kisi achchhe se lekh men krishn kumar ne kisi filmi gane men nayika dupatte ke udne men stree-mukti ka aagaaaz dekha tha. kabhi aaradhana men bhi kishor kumar ne rajesh khanna ke lie gaya tha.

apani jinsi abhivyakti ko lekar bebak. par ehatiyatan nashe kee sanskritik ot bhi le li gaee hai, zamana to jaise manahi ke andaz men dastak deta hi khada hai, aur jo huaa chahata hai nayak-nayika ke bich, vah to bhool hai hi! ab zara yah ailan sunie.

vahi krish n chandar jinakee ek gadhe kee aatmakatha gadhe kee vapasi ek gadha nefa men jaisi rachanaen hain . pahachan gae aap, shukr hai, main to dar hi gaya tha ki bat aage kaise badhegi . janab, bat aisi hai ki aage jo kissa hai usaka nayak to vahi purana jana pahachana gadha hai . aap kahenge isamen nae aur purane kee bat kahan se aa gaee . ab gadhe to gadhe hi hote hain, yahi unakee vishisht pahachan hai . yahi to, yahan bat hai aur gahari bat hai. purana aur vahi gadha isalie ki isamen kishnachandaranuma farmoole ke antargat kuchh vishisht kism kee budghimatta dali gaee thi anyatha gadhe to sadiyon se ek hi daee se nirmit kie ja rahe hain, nirih kism ke, gadhepan kee chamak lie, kharanuma budghimatta se otaprot . halanki ye bat alag hai ki gadhon ko yah galatafahami hai ki ve imoshanal fool hain - dhobi ke pyar men, ghas ke ikarar men, bojha dhone ke intajar men . aap kahenge ye kis taip ka imoshan hai, ab hai to hai, isalie to ye . ab rahane bhi dijie bar-bar kyon ek hi bat doharaee jae . so, apane nayak ke vyaktitv ka jyada bakhan n karate hue bat ka sira fir se pakada jae .

pyar ya desh ko lekar vichalit nahin hai, balki ve kuchh naya soch rahe hain . badalate vakt ke sath ve bhi kafi fyoochar planing men vishvas rakhane lage hain . unaka vichar hai ki ve apani aane vali santatiyon ke lie aakhir virasat men kya chhodakar ja rahe hain ? us par unakee poori jati kee nigahen jaroor hi tikee hogi . halanki unake pas kafi kuchh hai fir bhi ve nem-fem-gen kee kuchh ekstra vyavastha baithana chahate hain . apani pidhiyon ke lie bhari-kuchh chhodakar jana chahate hain . kya ?.sheyar, nahin janab ye insananuma baten gadhon kee khopadi men nahin samati hain . nivesh-gyan durbhagy se unake pichhale poore anubhav men aasapas se thikathak tarike se bhi nahin gujara hai, anyatha ve ekadh traee to jaroor hi mar lete . khair, arthajagat to is krity men hissa na lie jane par sadiyon tak unaka ahasan utar hi nahin paega. bhari vichar manthan ke uparant ek din unake unnat lalat aur virat khopade men kriket men kairiyar banane ka aaidiya aa gaya . tatkshan unhen apane charon or gardabh jati, apani santati, jayakar kee dhvaniyan sunaee dene lag .

fir khud bhavishy ke rol modal ke roop men apani sthiti ka chintan kar sanyamit mudra dharan kar li. ab ve un upadanon par vichar karane lage jo bhavishy men ek kriketar ke roop men unamen hona chahie the. apani hrisht-pusht kad-kathi par nigah dalate hi unhen is bat ka to poorn santosh ho gaya ki bakiyon kee tulana men filahal sharirik majabooti men to ve uchchastar ko prapt hain . shoroomon ke pas se gujarate samay aksar ve kamentri men manasik majabootinuma baten apane karnnapatal par risiv karate rahe hain . so, ve svatah muskurae fir pichhali panktiyon vali rol modal kee bat yad aate hi danton par oshth ke parde fit karate hue aage vali dulatti se khopade ko thokakar dekha . tann se manasik majabooti ka eekoaane par unhonne is babat bhi itminan ho gaya.

najar dalo. e najaravalo. pratibha ke bajar men taiyar mal pada hai, utha lo. bhijava do kisi bhi desh ke toor par. ve fir apani hi soch par kunthit hue, unhen kaun-kaise utha sakata hai. chintit bhi hue ki vijeta trafi lane par unhen kandhe par kaise uthaya jaega. fir yad aaya ki janata apane kandhon par to un jaise kaee ko barason se . so, ve bhi utha hi lie jaenge. ab ve ruk nahin pa rahe the. sidhe bord ke daftar kee or nikal pade. sochate bhi ja rahe the ki kuchh paise hi rakh liye hote to aoto hi kar leta khair, mahan khiladi-vinamr bhav. paidal hi daftar tak ja pahunche. vahan dekha bhari bhid-bhad sitaron-staron ka joradar jamavada. pichhale anubhav ke aadhar par kaee ko to ve tatkal hi pahachan gae. aavaj dene ko hi the ki yad aaya ki abhi ve sitare nahin hue hain, rukana hi uchit hai.
ummid ka aansoo gira. gardabharaj apani sari masoom beeeman pratibha ke sath vapas mud gae. budghimani kee aisi oonchaee dekhakar unhen apani vyaktipradatt chetana par rulaee aane lagi.

deta hai. usake lie har sthan hi mandir jaisa ho jata hai. har samay hi prarthana ka samay ho jata hai. aur vo har pal hi sukha shanti aur aanand mahasoos karata hai. fir usakee sari khoj khatm ho jati hai. yahi vo kala hai jo manav ko sikhani hai. yahi vo vidya hai jise manav ko prapt karana hai. isake bina har kala bearth hai. isake bina har vidya bekar hai. aaj is kala aur vidya ko samajhane sikhane aur grahan karane vale bahut hi kam hain.
to unhe aap ye gyarah kaaran bata dein. In gyarah kaarano ko sunkar logon ko unke sabhi sawaalon ka jawab mil jayega. Aur wo bhi aapki hi tarah hamare bhakt ban jayenge.
Off Page SEO Blog par traffic drive karane ke liye on page seo hi kafi nahi hai. Agar aapka blog bilkul naya hai to tab to on page seo shuruaati dinon me koi traffic nahi lata hai.

bhai maine post ki puri seo ki aur yoast ki seo signal bhi green ho jati hai. par fir bhi blog par traffic kyon nahi aata hai Is question ka answer aise samjhe Jaise aapne koi khubsurat house banaya hai aur aap chahte hai ki people aapke new house ke bare me jane. Iske liye aapko promotion jaise pamphlets printing aur distribute karana hoga. Yahan new house ki khubsurat On Page SEO hui aur iske liye promotion ki gai hai use Off Page SEO kaha ja sakta hai. yahan aap ek question puch sakte hai bhai, house ki khubsurati ko bhi jankar people house dekhane aa sakte hai ? bilkul sahi, lekin is method me adhik se adhik people ke aane me bahut time lagega. Hamare new blog ke sath on page seo bhi yahi karta hai. Sidhe words me samjhe, off page seo ki help se ek raat me hi bahut se traffic drive kar sakte hai. Yani off page seo fastest traffic pane ka method hai. par iski traffic stable nahi hoti. Par hame isse bahut benefits hote hai, jo hai 1.Kam time me adhik visitors milate hai. Jisme kuch hamare blog ke regular visitor ban jate hai. 2.Isse Google ka dhyan blog par padta hai, because is method se traffic pane se Google ko blog se related kai positive signals milate hai, jo ranking ko increase karne me help karte hai. 3.Isse pane vale traffic ko referral traffic kahte hai. Is traffic se blog ki Domain Authority aur Page Authority increase hoti hai. Jo is traffic ki sabse achchi khasiyat hai. Isse blog ka search engines me trust level badhta hai. 4.Yeh method kuch had tak Advertisement method based hai. Aap janate honge, jo chije five years me nahi hoti . AD method se one year me kiya jaa sakta hai. Off page seo bhi blog ke liye aisa hi kuch karta hai. To ab janate hai Off Page SEO Method 1 Social Marketing Off Page SEO ka sabse hot and entertaining method hai. Entertaining isliye is tarah ke promotion karte hue aap khub enjoy karenge. Yahan Social Marketing ka matlab hai, apne blog ke post ko social sites par share kar readers ko attract karne se. Taki ve aapko blog par aa sake. I am sure, aapne is method ko use kiye honge. Lekin ise aap effective tarike se use kare to bahut fayda hoga. Iske liye in tips ko follow karen 1.Kisi bhi social sites ki hot time me hi post share kare. Jisse maximum traffic milegi. But Every social sites ka hot time aur hot day jab sabse jyada users active hote hai different hota hai. Jaise Facebook ka hot time 2 pm to 10 pm aur hot day Wednesday hai Jabki twitter ka hot time 7pm to 11pm hota hai aur hot day Monday hai aur vahi Google Plus ka hot time 10 am to 5 pm hai aur hot day Monday hai. 2.HD images hi share kare, jo pahli bar me hi people ke najro ko chura le. Isse traffic milane ke sath sharing ke maximum chances ban jate hai. Post Ke Liye HD Image Kaise Create Kare 3.Facebook par blog page ke sath related groups me bhi post ko share kare. 4.Group me kisi ke dvara puche question ka reply kare, jo sabhi group members par positive impact dalta hai. Dhyan rakhe, jis question ka proper answer janate hai, usi ka reply de, otherwise sab kuch ulta ho jayege. 5.Twitter post me important words se pahle hash tag use kare. Koshish karen, twitter par post share karne se pahle twitter par check kare le, kya trend kar raha ? Blog se related word ho to use jarur use kare. Isse aapke post ko big expos mil sakta hai. 6.Google Plus se Facebook aut Twitter ke compare kam hi referral traffic milti hai. Lekin Google Plus par post share karne par Alexa Ranking increase hoti hai aur vahi Google par bhi positive impact padta hai. 7.Social Sites big time consuming hote hai. Agar aap is bare me dhyan nahi dete hai, aapka kafi time lost ho jayega. Isliye kisi bhi blogger ko kisi bhi social sites par 15 minute se jyada time spent nahi karna chahiye. Twitter ke co-founder Jack Dorsey khud twitter ko 15 minutes se jyada use nahi karte hai. Vo is baat ko social marketer ko bhi follow karane ke liye suggest karte hai. 8.Alag alag social site par post share karana time consuming ho sakta hai. isliye Smart bane aur use karen Social Tools jaise buffer . Iski madad se aap ek click me popular social sites par post share kar sakte hai. 2 Email Marketing Email ke dvara visitors ko latest blog post, update etc ke bare me info send kiya jata hai, jismen blog link bhi hota hai. Jispar click kar visitors us post ko read karne ke liye blog par aata hai, ise Email Marketing kahte hai. Is bare me Shoutmeloud.com ke founder Harsh Agrawal kahte hai, bloggers ko pahle din se hi email marketing karani chahiye, jo regular visitors ka base banata hai. Bilkul effective email marketing se aap pahle visitor ko hi regular visitor bana sakte hai, Jisse directly aapki blog ki traffic hi nahi badhegi, balki bounce rate bhi kam hogi. Jo Google ki important ranking factor hai. Effective email marketing ke liye in tips ko follow karen- 1. Google Feedburner Setup karen 2.Feedburner se jyada email collect nahi ho payenge, Isliye Getsitecontrol jaise email collector service ko use karen. Lekin dhyan rahe, Pop up box ko blog loading hone ke 5 second bad hi show ho. Isse mobile user experience par bad impact nahi padega. Is baat ko Google bhi clear kar chukka hai, jo mobile user ki care nahi karega. Uske blog ya website ki rank ko down kar diya jayega. 3.Daily email na bheje, isse reader ko irritation hone lagata hai. Weekly send kare.
