Iske liye aap Mailchimp use kar sakte hai. 4.Effective time 3pm to 7pm ke bich hi mail send kare, is period ke dauran sabse jyada mail ko open kiya jata hai. 5.Every readers ko unke name se hi mail send kare. Isse reader lagata hai, aap unhen name se janate ho. Jo bahut impression create karta hai. Yah feature Mailchimp me mil jayega. 3 Push Mail Marketing Yeh 21th century ki sabse new off page SEO method hai. Jo sabse easy aur sabse jyada effective hai. Aapne smartphone ki screen par kai bar message ke strip ko hataya hoga. Jispar yadi aap click kar dete hai to koi App ya website open ho jati hai. is push mail marketing kaha jata hai. Yah Email Marketing ka improved form hai, jo email marketing se super fast and so easy hai. Aap Apne blog par push mail marketing start karne ke liye One Signal , Pushengage , izooto use kar sake hai. Push mail service ko use karne ke liye effective tips 1.Push mail aise time send kare, jab readers profession work se rest le chuka ho. Yani 3pm to 10pm. 2.Push mail me HD image lagaye. 3.Ek din ek bar hi push mail send kare. Agar is tarah ki jarurat na ho to week me 3-4 bar hi push mail send kare. Jisse user experience achi bani rahegi. 4 Guest Posting kisi topic par other blog par posting karana, guest posting kehlata ha i. Guest posting off page seo ka sabse powerful method hai. Is method se na keval aapke blog ko traffic milati hai, balki quality backlinks bhi milta hai. Kaise effective guest posting kare. Iske liye ye tips follow kare- 1.Niche related popular blog par hi post kare. 2.Popular topic par write kare. 3.Post best of quality ka likhe, jisse us popular blog ke maximum readers ko attract kar sake. 4.Every comment ka reply kare. 5 Blog Directories Phone book ki tarah hoti hai, blog directories. Isme blog ko categoried include kiya jata hai. Blog directories se do fayde hote hai 1.High quality backlink milata hai. 2.Referral traffic milta hai. Popular Blog Directories, jo hindi blog ke liye real me work karta hai. 1. Indiblogger.in 2. Blograma.com 6 Commenting Bolane ke paise lagte hai kya ? nahi na. Aise hi blog par comment karne ke paise nahi lagte hai. Balki isse referral traffic milta hai aur ek nofollow backlink bhi milta hai. Jo SEO ke liye important hota hai. Behatar commenting ke liye in tips ko follow karen- 1.Similar niche vale popular blog par comment kare. 2.Two lines comment naa kare, balki 4-5 lines ka comment kare. 3.Popular blog par kisi user dvara puche question ka i reply kare, jo aapko authentic karta hai. 4.Betuke comment se bache, nahi to aapke Goodwill par bad impact padega. 7 Forum Forum aisa place hai, jahan blogger milte hai, apne problem short out karte hai aur kai topics par discussion karte hai. Jisse every blogger ki identity all blogger ke bich banti hai. Isme bahut learn karne ko bhi milta hai. Aise me yadi koi new blogger in forums ko join kare to use good expos mil sakta hai aur sath hi referral traffic bhi milta hai. Basharte use dusro bloggers ko help karana hoga. Kisi forum se best result pane ke liye ye tips follow kare- 1.Every forums ke terms and conditions hote hai, use strictly follow kare. 2.Unnecessary link post naa kare. Kisi Problem ke sath ya kisi question ke reply me hi link post karen. 3.Real identity ke sath hi forum use kare. Otherwise fake id reveal karane me blogger smart hote hai. 4.Always rich word use kare. Because word hi sole source hai, jisse aap bloggers ke bich apni identity strong kar sakate hai. Mai Shoutmeloud Forum use karta hun, jo Indias No-1 SEO WordPress Forum hai, jahan blogging, social, wordpress, seo, adsense etc se related issues par discussion karte hai. 8 Interview Apne niche ke popular bloggers ka interviews lena bada achcha idea hai. Isse aapko na keval popular bloggers se bahut kuch sikhane ko milega, balki ek hi stroke me bahut se bloggersreaders ko apne blog par visit karane ke liye invite kar sakte hai. Behatar interview ke liye ye kare 1.Interview na short na long ho. Averagely 15-20 questions ka interviews len. 2.Interview hamesha apne se bade blogger ka len, koshish kare apne field ke lead blogger ka interview le. 3.Aajkal video ka jamana hai, kabhi popular bloggers se mile to video interview bhi le. 4.Popular bloggers se unke career se related problem ke bare me question jarur puche, kyonki isse beginner bloggers ko apne problem ka solution mil sakta hai. In Last Word Jab koi big website launch hoti hai, ve traffic pane ke liye sabse off page seo method ko apnate hai aur kuch samay hi big regular visitor base ban lete hai. Isliye hindi bloggers ko bhi On Page SEO ke sath Off Page SEO bhi karani chahiye, jo ki shuruati lahron se paar lagata hai. Hope ye post aapko pasand aaya hoga ? Note- Net par aapko iske alava bhi Off Page SEO methods mil jayenge, par vo sab english blog ke liye work karte hai, hindi blogs ke liye nahi . Maine har method ko test kiya, jo hindi blog ke liye effective paya, use hi keval share kiya hai. Yadi aap hindi blogger hai aur iske alava Off Page SEO method se traffic pate hai to jarur share kare.
aur jaise hi tumhara boss tumhe timepass karta paaye to koi bhi ek bahana de dena. Dhyaan rakhna, ek hi bahana dubaara mat batlana.
apne office ke sabhi computers pe virus chhod do. Virus sab ka kaam tamaam kar dega. Aur tumhe chhutti mil jayegi.

Youtube par account kaise banate hai to bhut aasan hai q ki youtube bhi Google ki service hai to simple hamara jo Gmail Id Hoti hai usse hame youtube par login karna hota hai. Aapke pass agar Google Gmail ID nahi hai to aap yaha dekhe Gmail ID kaise Banate hai Youtube par Gmail Id se login karke login kar sakte hai, isme jo hamari Google ki Profile me jo naam hota hai us naam se channel ban jati hai. Par agar aapko koi dusre naam se Youtube Channel Banani hai to uske liye 2 tarike hai. Phele se agar koi Google Page hai to uski Youtube Channel bana sakte hai ya fir New bhi bana sakte hai. Chaliye dekhete hai. New Channel Banane ke liye Step 1 Google ke Account me Sign in kare. Step 2 Ab Youtube Channel Switcher me jaye. Step 3 Create a new channel ki button par click kare. Note Agar Aapka Phele se Google Page hai or aap ussi naam se Channel banana chate hai to aap uske naam par click karke bhi bana sakte hai, wo aapko list me dikh jayega. Step 4 Ab ek form aayega jese hi finished karege aapki New Youtube Channel Ban jayegi Ab aapki Channel to Ban Chuki hai, To ab aapko agar ek se jada channel chalani hai to aapko alag-alag email id or bar bar login karne ki jarurat nahi hai. Aap Simple Channel Switcher me ja kar apni dusri Channel Select karke usko use kar sakte hai. Youtube ke bare me ham or bhi bhut si jaakari aage janege, taki ham Apni Channel ko or bhatar bana kar badiya paise kama sake. Kuch or jaruri jaankari Youtube ke bare me Agar aapka koi sabal hai to aap comment me puch sakte hai.

jo aapko us bewafa ke diye zakhmo ko bharne mein madad karenge. To bhakton aap inhe us bewafa ko bhejiye aur use uski galti ka ehsaas karaiye. Use dikhaiye ki usne aap jaise insaan ko khokar kitni badi bhool ki hai

chhattisagadh ke dhamatari men tahasiladar hokar aaye. do varsh ve yahan rahe aur sthanantarit hokar shivarinarayan aa gaye. yahan ke nadi-nale aur pahadi ka prakritik saundary unhen bahut bhaya aur yahan rahate hue unhonne kaee granthon kee rachana kar dali. shivarinarayan ko unakee karyasthali kaha jaye to atishyokti nahin hogi. yahan unhonne kashi ke bharatendu mandala kee tarj men jagamohan mandala banakar chhattisagadh ke bikhare sahityakaron ko sametane ka sadprayas kiya jisamen ve safal bhi hue. kadachit yahi karan hai ki shivarinarayan ek sahityik tirtha ke roop men bhi prasiddhi pa saka. pandit hiraram tripathi jagamohan mandal ke ek jagamagate nakshatr the.

nibandh, upanyas aur samalochana ka pravah isi kal men dikhaee deta hai. bharatendu yang ka mahatvapoorn aur ullekhaniy tathy hai- hindi kavita ka kendr sankraman. is yug men hindi kavita vyaktigat aur darabari roochiyon se hatakar nagar roochiyon men sankramit hoti hai. inase kavy sanchetana ke samoohik vikas ke naye kendron ko janm diya. kashi aisa hi ek pramukh kendr tha aur is kendr ke nyookliyas the- baboo bharatendu harishchandr. aalochakon aur itihasakaron ne badi shiddat ke bad is tathy ko svikar kiya hai ki us samay kee sahityik gatividhiyan bharatendu harishchandr kee parishkrit sahityik suroochi evan jagarookata ke falasvaroop kendrit hokar naye vatavaran niyojit karane men pratifalit huee thi. us yug kee sahityik gatividhiyon kee ek jhalak hamen chhattisagadh men bhi dekhane ko milati hai. in sahityik gatividhiyon ka kendr mahanadi ka tatavarti gram shivarinarayan tha aur thakur jagamohanasinh usake nabhikendr the. unhonne yahan ke aath sajjan vyaktiyon ka parichay apani kriti sajjanashtaka men diya hai jinamen pandit yadunath bhogaha, mahant arjunadas, mahant gautamadas, makhan sav, pandit hiraram tripathi, mohan pujari, rishiram aur ramanath pramukh hain. sajjanashtak ke bare men ve likhate hain.
jise vishv ka prachinatam gurookul vishv vidyalay mana jata hai. shabari yahan kee paricharika thi jisake joothe ber khane shreeram aur lakshman yahan aaye the. balmikee ramayan men bhi ullekhit hai-

dvitiy nam ramapur, tritiy nam baikunthapur aur chaturth nam narayannapur yuganukram se janiye. vahan chitrotpala-ganga ke tat par punyaroopi kanan mandit sindooragiri parvat ke nikat sakshat avinashi shree narayan virajaman hain. unakee charan ko sparsh karati huee pavitr rohini kunda sthit hai. suprasiddh sahityakar shree batusinh chaihan ne rahini kund ko ek dham bataya hai- rohini kund ek dham hai, hai amrit ka nira jabaki pandit malikaram bhogaha ne use mokshadayi bataya hai.

usaka svaroop vyapak aandolan ya samajik vyapti men n hokar simit tatha sankeern vyaktigat nishtha par hai. tripathi ji kee bhakti bhavana men aastha ka sanpradayik roop nahin hai. unakee bhakti bhavana men sagun nirgun sabhi ekakar hai. unake jivan kee ramamay jhankee prastut hai.

Instagram Influencer kaise Bane or Kaise Instagram se Paise kama sakte hai agar aap janna chate hai to aap bilkul sahi post par aaye hai. Abhi me aapko Instagram se Paise kamane ke tarike share karne wala hu, jinki madad se aap achi khasi earning kar sakte hai. Me apni Pichli post me share kar chuka hu Whatsapp se Paise kaise kamaye, Facebook se paise kaise kamane ya Youtube or Blogging se paise kaise kamaye. or aaj ke topic me ham abhi ke sabse Hot Topic Instagram ki baat karne wale hai. Instagram se Paise kamane ke liye sabse phele jaruri hai ek Instagram Account or usme bhut sare active Follower, to agar aapke pass ye hai to aap Insta se Paise kamane ke liye teyar hai. par agar nahi hai to bhi tension lene ki jarurat nahi hai. Phele Instagram par Apni ek brand banaye or Follower badaye, uske baad paise kamaye. Instagram hame Direct koi paise nahi deta hai, par agar ham Apni Brand waha banaye jisme bhutse log hame follow kare to ham bhut tariko se paise kama sakte hai. Instagram se paise kamane ke liye sabse phele jaruri hai, Instagram Influencer banna Instagram Influencers ka matlab aesa person jiske bhut sare Follower ho or jo usko Follow karte ho. uski Post ko Like comment karte ho. Agar Instagram par Follower badana hai or ek Influencer banna hai to inn bato ka dhiyan rakhe Select Topic Instagram par agar success hona hai to sabse phela or sabse jaruri kaam hai, jis topic par brand banani hai wo select kare, or sirf uspar focus karke post kare. Yaha aap self Brand bhi bana sakte hai, ya aapki koi company ya service hai to uska account bhi bana sakte hai. Account Bio Instagram par Account banane ke baad Account ki Bio or baki detail or fill kare, or sahi tarike se Fill kare. jisse jo bhi usko dekhe wo samaj sake account kis ware me hai. Take Good Photo Instagram ek Photo or Video share Social Network hai, to logo ko attract karne ke liye jaruri hai High Quality Photo or Video share kiye jaye. jisse log unko pasand kare or hame Follow kare. Regular Post Agar Instagram par Follower badana hai or ek Instagram Influencer banna hai to Badiya post Regular karna bhut jaruri hai, taki logo ke samne hamari post aati rahe. or jada se jada logo tak post phuch sake. Use Hashtag Instagram par Simple post naa kare, jo bhi Topic hai or jo post hai usse related jo bhi Popular Hastags hai wo post me jarur use kare. jisse jo Post hai wo jada se jada logo tak phuch sake jo usme interest rakhte hai. Engage with Follower Agar Instagram Influencer banna hai to uske liye jaruri hai, bhut sare log post ko Like or Comment kare. to iske liye jaruri hai jitne bhi log comment ya post ko like kare unko reply karke ek connection banaye. taki wo aage bhi connect rahe. Iss trha aap inn bato ka dhiyan rakh kar Instagram Follower bada sakte hai or ek Instagram Influencer ban sakte hai. Agar aapka Instagram account nahi hai, or agar aap aaj hi start kare to regular work karke max 2 mahino me aap ache khase follower bada sakte hai. Instagram se bhut log lakho me paise kama rahe hai, jisme agar me aapko ek example du too. Aapne Priya Prakash ka naam to suna hoga, jo matra ek akh maarke popular hogai thi. aapko jaan kar herani hogi, usne ek sponsor post karne ke 8 lakh rupee liye the. Instagram Influencers ke liye jo sabse Popular or sabse aasan tarika hai paise kamane ka Sponsor Post, jisme Paise lekar sirf Instagram par post karna hota hai. Agar aapke bhut se Active follower hai, fir to automatic bhut se Brand aapse contact karege, or kahege ki aap uske ware me post kare jiske badle wo aapko paise dege. Par agar aap abhi New hai or aapke jada Follower nahi hai, to aap khud se bhi Brands se contact karke Sponsor Post kar sakte hai. Instagram Influencers ke liye Ye website, jaha se Sponsor Post li ja sakt hai. Instagram par Ache se ache photo Click karke share karne se usko jada log pasand karte hai ye to aap jante hai, to aese me agar aapke Click kiye kuch bhut badiya photo hai jinki agar kisi Brand ko jarurat hai to wo aapse kharid bhi sakte hai. Jesa ki aap jante hoge, jitni bhi Brand hoti hai wo apne Product ya Services ke liye badiya Photo ki talas me rheti hai, to aese me aap unko apne Photo Sell karke bhi ache khase paise kama sakte hai. Photo Sell karne ki ye kuch badiya website Agar aap ek badiya Instagram Influencers or Brand apne faide ke liye aapko paise dekar apna Promotion karati hai, to aap khud socho. aap apne khud ke bhi kuch Product ko Direct sell karke acha khasa paisa kama sakte hai. Agar Instagram par bhut sare Follower hai to uski madad se aap apne dusre Platform ko bhi promote kar sakte hai. Jese agar aapka Youtube Channel hai ya Website hai to aap Instagram par unko free me promote kar sakte hai. Instagram me jo Story wala option hai wo bhi bhut effective hai apna promotion karne ke liye. Jis trha Sponsor post hoti hai, jisme log hamare khene par product ko kharidte hai. same wahi Affiliate Marketing me bhi kar sakte hai. Affiliate Marketing me jo bhi badiya Product ho jo hamari audience ke liye sahi ho uska Affiliate Link share kar sakte hai. usse hoga ye, jitne bhi log wo product ko kharidege uska commission hame milega. Affiliate Marketing Kya Hai or kaise usse paise kama sakte hai uski jada jankari aapko yaha mil jayegi. At Last To iss trha Aap Instagram se Paise kama sakte hai or ek badiya Instagram Influencers ban sakte hai.

apane hi man ke rahasy khola karata hai. isi aalochana ko, is rahasyoddhatan ko aur manushy ne jagat men jo kuchh saty aur sundar paya hai aur pa raha hai usi ko sahity kahate hain. aur kahani ya aakhyayika sahity ka ek pradhan ang hai. aaj se nahin, aadi kal se hi. han, aajakal kee aakhyayika men samay kee gati aur roochi se bahut kuchh antar ho gaya hai. prachin aakhyayika kutoohal pradhan hoti thi, ya adhyatmavishayak. vartaman aakhyayika sahity ke doosare angon kee bhanti manovaigyanik vishleshan aur manorahasy ke udghatan ko apana dhyey samajhati hai. yah svikar kar lene men hamen sankoch n hona chahie ki upanyason hi kee tarah aakhyayika kee kala bhi hamane pashchim se li hai. magar panch sau varsh pahale yoorop bhi is kala se anabhigy tha. bade-bade uchchakoti ke darshanik tatha aitihasik upanyas likhe jate the. lekin chhoti-chhoti kahaniyon kee or kisi ka dhyan n jata tha. han, kuchh pariyon aur bhooton kee kahaniyan alabatta prachalit thin. kintu isi ek shatabdi ke andar ya usase bhi kam men samajhie, chhoti kahaniyon ne sahity ke aur sabhi angon par vijay prapt kar li hai. koee patrika aisi nahin jisamen kahaniyon kee pradhanata n ho. yahan tak ki kaee patrikaon men keval kahaniyan hi di jati hain.

aur ham vikshipt hue bina nity atharah ghante kam kar sakate to shayad ham manoranjan ka nam bhi n lete. lekin prakriti ne hamen vivash kar diya hai. ham chahate hain ki thode se thode samay men adhik se adhik manoranjan ho jae. isilie sinema grihon kee sankhya din b din badhati jati hai. jis upanyas ko padhane men mahinon lagate usaka aanand ham do ghanton men utha lete hain. kahani ke lie pandrah-bis minat hi kafi hain. ataev ham kahani aisi chahate hain ki vah thode se thode shabdon men kahi jae, usamen ek vaky, ek shabd bhi anavashyak n aane pae, usaka pahala hi vaky man ko aakarshit kar le, aur ant tak hamen mugdh kie rahe, aur isake sath hi kuchh tatv bhi hon. tatvahin kahani se chahe manoranjan bhale ho jae, manasik tripti nahin hoti. yah sach hai ki ham kahaniyon men upadesh nahin chahate, lekin vicharon ko uttejit karane ke lie, man ke sundar bhavon ko jagrit karane ke lie kuchh n kuchh avashy chahate hain. vahi kahani safal hoti hai, jisamen in donon men se ek avashy upalabdh ho.

usamen kahin n kahin devata avashy chhipa hota hai, yah manovaigyanik saty hai. us devata ko khol kar dikha dena safal aakhyayika lekhak ka kam hai. vipatti par vipatti padane se manushy kitana diler ho jata hai. yahan tak ki vah bade bade sankaton ka samana karane ke lie tal thonk kar taiyar ho jata hai. usakee durvasana bhag jati hai, usake hriday ke kisi gupt sthan men chhipe hue jauhar nikal aate hain aur hamen chakit kar dete hain. yah ek mano vaigyanik saty hai. ek hi ghatana ya durghatana bhinn-bhinn prakriti ke manushy ko bhinn-bhinn roop se prabhavit karati hai. ham kahani men isakee safalata ke sath dikha saken to kahani avashy aakarshak hogi. kisi samasya ka samavesh kahani ko aakarshak banane ka sabase uttam sadhan hai. jivan men aisi samasyaen nity hi upasthit hoti rahati hain, aur unase paida hone vala dvandv aakhyayika se chamaka deta hai. satyavadi pita ko maloom hota hai ki usake putr ne hatya kee hai. vah use nyay kee vedi par balidan kar de ya apane jivan siddhanton kee hatya kar dale? kitana bhishan dvandv hai. pashchatap aise dvandvon ka akhand srot hai. ek bhaee ne apane doosare bhaee kee sampatti chhal kapat se apaharan kar li hai. use bhiksha mangate dekh kar kya chhali ko jara bhi pashchatap n hoga? agar aisa n ho to vah manushy nahin hai.

magar kahani men bahut vistrit vishleshan kee gunjaish nahin hoti. yahan hamara uddeshy sanpoorn manushy ko chitrit karana nahin, varan usake charitr ka ek ang dikhana hai. yah paramavashyak hai ki hamari kahani se jo parinam ya tatv nikale vah sarvamany ho, aur usamen kuchh barikee ho. yah ek sadharan niyam hai ki hamen usi bat men aanand aata hai jisase hamara kuchh sambandh ho. juaa khelane valon ko jo unmad aur ullas hota hai, vah darshak ka kadapi nahin ho sakata. jab hamare charitr itane sajiv aur aakarshak hote hain ki pathak apane ko unake sthan par samajh leta hai tabhi use kahani men aanand prapt hota hai. agar lekhak ne apane patron ke prati pathak men yah sahanubhooti nahin utpann kar di to vah apane uddeshy men asafal hai.

yatharth nahin ho sakati. jivan men bahudha hamara ant us samay ho jata hai, jab vah vanchhaniy nahin hota. lekin katha sahity manushy ka racha huaa jagat hai aur parimit hone ke karan sampoornnatah hamare samane aa jata hai aur jahan vah hamari nyay-buddhi ya anubhooti ka atikraman karata huaa paya jata hai, ham use dand dene ke lie taiyar ho jate hain. katha men agar kisi ko sukh prapt hota hai to isaka karan batana hoga. duhkh bhi milata hai to isaka karan batana hoga. yahan koee charitr mar nahin sakata jab tak ki manav buddhi usakee maut n mange. srashta ko janata kee adalat men apani har ek kriti ke lie javab dena padega. kal ka rahasy bhranti hai, par vah bhranti jis par yatharth ka aavaran pada ho.

Kya aapko kisi aise blogger ke bare me pta hai jisne apni whole blogging journey me kabhi bhi koi mistake naa kiya ho. Agar mai honest ke sath kahu to to koi aisa blogger nahi hai jisne apne pure blogging journey me koi mistake naa kiya ho. Kyoki iss dunia me koi bhi Person perfect nahi hai. Har ek person apni life bahut si galtiya karta haior unse sikhta hai. Agar aap kisi bhi chiz me success hona cahte hai to aapke dwara kiye gaye mistake hi aapko safalta dilate hai. Aagr aap apne dwara kiye gaye mistake ko samjh kar uss par kaam karna sure kare to aapke uss chiz me success hone ke chance badh jate hai. Har ek blogger apni blogging life me bahut si mistake karta hai Lekin ek professional blogger wahi banta hai jo apne mistake ko accept karke usko improved karta hai. Blogging me kiye gaye har ek mistake aapko kuch naa kuch learn karati hai. Aaj ke iss post me mai aapko kuch aise tricky point share karuga jisko bahut se blogger blogging me karte hai. Mai ummed karta hu ki aap in point ko dhyanpurwak padhege aur in point par work karke isko improved karne ki kosish karege. Agar aap in point ko ignore kar dete hai to mai yakin ke sath kah sakta hu ki aapke blog ka The End ki taraf ja raha hai. LAZY ka mtlab Aalsi hota hai. Agar aap apne blogging ke work LAZY hokar karte hai to ye aapki ek bahut badi mistake hai kyoki Lazy hokar Blogging karne se aapke blog ka the end ho sakta hai. Bahut se aise blogger hote jo apne sabhi kaam me aalas karte hai. Agar blogging ki baat ki jaaye to kai blogger bahut Lazy hote hai aur Lazy hone ke naate woh apne blogging ke bahut se kaam nahi kar pate hai. Ek Lazy blogger apne blog ko regular basis par update nahi kar pata hai, Great aur helpful content nahi likh pata hai aur bhi bahut se kaam hai jisko ek Lazy blogger karta hai. Ek Lazy person apne har ek kaam ko aasni se karna cahta hai. Lekin aapko iss baat ko bhi janana cahiye ki kisi bhi chiz me success aasni se nahi milta hai. Agar aap Aapne goal ko achieve karna cahte hai to aapko hard work to karna hi hoga. Aap blogging me Easy work karke success nahi ho sakte hai kyoki duare blogger usi kaam ko hard work ke sath kar rahe hai. Isliye apne ander ke aalas ko Avoid kare aur apne work par full focus ke sath hard work kare. Laziness aapke career ko kharab karke aapke online business ko destroy kar sakti hai. Apne mind ko fresh rakh kar apne work par focus kare. Post Frequency ek blog ke liye bahut impotent role play karta hai. Post Frequency ka mtlab hota hai ki hum apne blog article ko kiss Prakar se publish karte hai. Agar aap ek plan ke sath apne blog ko regularly nahi update karege to aapke blog par visit karne wale aapke reader aapke blog ko ignore karne lagege. Aapko apne blog par artical publish karne ka time fix kar lena cahiye aur aapko dialy kam se kam 1 artical publish karna cahiye. Must Read Post Publish Karne Se Pehle Check Kare in 9 Points ko Agar aap daily 1 article ko publish karege to aapke visitor uss 1 article ko padhne ke liye daily aapke blog ko visit karenge. Post Frequency Ko Maintaining Naa rakhne se visitor ke sath sath traffic, revenue and Alexa ranking par bhi prabhao padhta hai. Online business Ke liye Blog Post frequency bahut important hai. Isliye apne Blog Post frequency ko Maintain karke rakhe. Also Read Regularly Blog ko Update karne se Kya Kya faide hote Hai Maine kuch Hindi blogger ko dekha hai woh apne blog par bahut hi defferent tarike se comment ka replay karte hai. Blogging me Commenting ek aisa badiya feature hai jiske dwara aap bahut se kaam kar sakte hai. Agar aap apne blog par badiya tarike se comment ka replay nahi karege to aap apne blog ke regular readers ko khe denge. Aapko apne blog ke comment ek professional blogger ki tarah replay karna cahiye. Agar aap badiya tarike se apne blog par comment ka replay karege to aapka logo ke sath ek bahut badiya relationship banega Aur badiya relationship ke karan aapke reader aapke blog par phir se visit karege. Comment se relationship ke sath sath logo ke ander aapka ek trust bhi banta hai. Isliye kosish kare ki aap apne blog ke har ek comment ko value dekar uska achhi tarah se replay kare. Mai ummed karta hu ki aap apne blog se bahut hi jaldi comment ke mistake ko door karenge. Jarur Padhe Badiya Comment karte Samay Rakhe in Baat ka Dhyan Agar baat kare top English Blogger ki to unke blog ka 20 30 income email marketing se hota hai. lekin Hindi Blogger ko abhi tak email marketing ke power ke bare nahi pta hai. Agar aap apne blog se paisa kamane ke liye affiliate marketing ka upyog karte hai to email marketing aapke affiliate product ke sell ko bahut high kar sakta hai. Google adsense upyog karne wale blogger ko bhi email marketing ka upoyog karna cahiye. Email marketing ek aisa tarika hai jiske dwara aap apne blog ke visitor ko regular reader bana sakte hai. Agar aap ek hindi blogger hai to aapko email list build karne ke liye google ki ek free service feedburner ka upyog karna cahiye. Kaise Add kare uski puri jankari ke liye ye post padhe Email list naa build karna hindi blogger ki ek badi mistake hai. Mai iss baat ko yakin ke sath kah sakta hu ki email marketing se aapke blog ki traffic aur earning dono me ijaafa hoga. Isliye aaj se hi feedbuner par acount bana kar email list build karna start kar de. bahut se blogger Post Ko Properly nahi optimize kar pate hai jiske karan unka blog post search engine me weak ho jata hai. Ek blog post ko badiya tarike se optimize karna SEO ke liye bahut jaruri hai. Ek Naye blogger ke liye sabse jaruri ye hota hai ki woh pahle Seo ke bare me acchi tarah se learn kar uske baad hi woh seo ka upyog apne blog me kare. Must Must Read SEO ki Puri Jankari SEO Full Guide in Hindi SEO ek bahut hi badiya element hai jiske dwara hum apne blog par organic traffic paa sakte hai search engine se. SEO ko learn karna bahut hard baat nahi hai. Ek Blog post ko perfect tarike se optimize karne ke liye aapko kai chizo ke bare me dhyaan dena hoga. Yaha par mai aapko kuch point batata hu jiska upyog aap post ko seo ke liye optimizing karne ke liye kar sakte hai. Jo aapka Main keyword hai usko use kare. Mai ummed karna hu ki agar aap in sabhi point ko post ko optimizing karne ke liye upyog karege to aapka blog post Properly aur perfect tarike se optimize hoga. Guest Posting ek aisa tarika hai jiske dwara aap kam time me apne blog ko improved kar sakte hai. lekin kisi bhi hindi blogger guest posting ke fayda nahi utha paa rahe hai. Iska sabse bada karan ye hai ki hindi bloggers ka mind nahi set hai unko ye nahi dikhai deta hai ki guest posting se kitna fayda hai. Agar aap kisi papular blog par koi Guest Post karte hai to aapko uss blog se bahut sara traffic milta hai aur iske sath sath bahut sare aapke naye reader bhi bante hai. Guest Posting ka ek fayda ye bhi hai ki isse aapko ek High Quality back-link Bhi milta hai. Guest Posting karne se aapka Dusre expert blogger ke sath ek accha relation bhi banta hai jo aapke ane wale blogging ke liye bahut badiya hai. Read Backlink kya hoti hai or uske SEO me Faide Guest Posting se bahut se fayde hai aur aapko in faydo ka laabh lena cahiye. Yadi aap ek hindi blogger hai to mai ummed karta hu ki aap Guest Posting ka mistake ab nahi karege aur aap Dusre papular blog par guest post karke uska laabh lenege. Aapko Sayad Pata ho HMH.pe Guest Post accept ki jati hai. Agar aap Guest Post karna chate to yaha click kare Hindi Me Help ki Guest Post ko padhne ke liye yaha click kare Agar baat kare hindi bloggers ki to aaj hindi blogger me English blogger se jada competition chal raha hai. har ek hindi blogger jaldi se jaldi success hona cahta hai. Agar aapko kisi bhi chiz me success hona hai to aapko step by step work karna hoga. Networking ek aisa tarika hai jiske dwara hum bahut hi long time tak blogging Me success ho sakte hai. Ek blogger ke taur par aapko networking ko smjhna hoga aur Dusre blogger ke sath ek strong network banana hoga. jitna badiya aapka dusre blogger ke sath relationship rahega utna hi badiya tarike se aap Blogging me Aage badhege. Agar aap baat kare ki Dusre bloggers ke sath relationship banane se kya kya fayda hoga to mai aapko bta du ki Dusre blogger ke sath relationship banane se aapko bahut se fayde hai jaise Networking blogging me ek most important element hai. Aap Dusre blogger se relationship banane ke liye Social Media ka upyog kar sakte hai, aap unke blog par regularly comment kar sakte hai, unko email send kar sakte hai ye sabhi chize aapko Dusre blogger ke sath ek badiya relationship banane me kaam ayegi. Yadi aapko blogging me success hona hai to aapko blogging ko ek Business ki tarah dekhna hoga. Bahut se blogger aise hote hai jo blogging ko As a hobby ki tarah dekhte hai. As A Business aur As a hobby dono me antar hai. Yadi aap blogging ko As a Business ki tarah dekhte hai to ye aapke productivity aur branding ko increase karne me help karegi. Agar popular bloggers ki baat kare to sabhi popular blogger blogging ko As a Business ki tarah dekhte hai aur woh isko ek business smjhte hai. Jaise ek business me success hone ke liye plan ki jarurt hoti hai usi prakar blogging me bhi success hone ke liye ek plan ka hona jaruri hai. Agar aap blogging ko ek business ki tarah dkhenge to aapko apne business ko grow karne ke liye aapka mind set ho jayega aur aap iss business ko success karne ke liye bahut se idea aapke dimak me ayenge. Kabhi bhi blogging ko ek hobby ki tarah naa dekhe nahi to ye aapke online business ka the end ho sakta hai. Also Read for More Perfect Planning Ke Sath Popular Blog Kaise Banaye uski Puri Jankari Hum Dusre ke blog post ko kyo read karte hai kyoki Dusre ke blog post se humko kuch nayi jankari mil sake jiska upyog hum apne blog me kar sake. Lekin kai aise blogger hote hai jinko lagta hai ki Dusre new blogger ka blog post padhna ek time ki barbadi hai. Agar aap bhi aisa sochte hai to aapki ye badi galti hai kyoki jitna jyada aap Dusre ke blog post padhege utna hi jyada aapko nayi nayi chiz ki jankari hoti jayegi. Blogging ek aisi chiz hai jisko koi bhi kabhi pura nahi learn kar sakta hai. Dusre Blogger ke Blog Post Ko padhne se aapko knowledge to hota hai lekin knowledge ke sath sath aapko ye bhi pta chalta hai Dusre blogger apne blog par kya kya kar rahe hai. Dusre Blogger ke Blog Post se aapko unke bare me pta chalta hai ki woh apne blog par kya kya kar rahe usi hisab se aap apne blog me changing karke improved kar sakte hai. Sabhi blogger ke ander sabse common mistake ye hoti hai ki woh hmesa paise ke bare me sochte hai. Blogging ek long term investment plan hai jaha par aapko paise kamane ke liye wait karna padega. Yadi aap blogging me work karne ke bajaye hmesa paise kamane ke bare sochenge to ye aapko blog ko bahut hi jaldi khtam kar dega. Blogging ke dwara aap tabhi paise kama sakte hai jab aap iske right direction par kaam karege. Ye koi matter nahi karta hai ki aap kya kar rahe balki matter ye karta hai aap usko kaise kar rahe hai aur uspar kaise kaam kar rahe hai. Blogging me bahut se log ghar par baith par bade bade dream dekhte hai mai un sabhi se yahi kahna cahuga ki dream dekhne se dream pura nahi hota hai balki dream ko pura karne ke liye work karna hota hai. Blogging se paisa kamane ke liye sabse pahle aapko ye janana hoga ki aakhir ye blogging hai kya aur iss par right direction me work kaise karte hai. Jiss din aapko inka jabab mil jayega uss time se aap bahut acche tarike se iske dwara paise kamana statr kar denge. Last me mai aap sabhi se yahi kahna cahuga ki aap blogging me paise se jyada work par dhyaan de Blogging me har ek blogger mistake karta hai. Ek accha blogger wahi hota hai jo apni mistakes se kuch naa kuch sikhe. Maine jitni mistakes ko yaha par bataya hai woh sabhi mistakes bahut se blogger karte hai. Yadi aap ek acche blogger Honege to aap in sabhi mistakes ko improved karne ki puri kosish karenge. Bahut se blogger apna bahut jyada time Dusre ke activities ko dekhne me west kar dete hai. Aap jitna time social media aur dusre ke activities ko dekhne me west karte hai yadi aap utna time apne blog ke work par focuse kare to aapka blog bahut hi teji se grow karenga. Mai ummed karta hu ki aap Aage se ye sabhi galtiya nahi karege aur apne blog par pura focus karenge. Yadi aap ek Blogger hai to aap iss post ko apne blogger friends ko send karke unko bhi in blogging mistakes ke bare me bataye. Mai aapko thanks bolna cahta hu ki aapne apna time nikal kar iss post ko padha. lekin ab aisa nahi hoga. IPL 4 mein aap advertisement ke beech mein match dekhenge. Aapko match se zyaada advertisement ka anand milega.
waise har ek shot ko koi na koi naam de dena chahiye. Jaise haajme ki goli straight drive, majedaar gutka cover drive, thandi lassi square cut, etc.
utni der mein to ek advertisement dikha dalenge. Isiliye fast bowlers ko zyaada mahatva diya jaayega kyunki wo bhagenge tab to lambi ad dikha sakte hain.
waise hi saare samay advertisements ki ek line tv ke nichle hisse mein daudti rahegi. Khub munafa hoga.

samaj ke aise chir-parichit jiv hain, jinase sabhi parichit hain. ye neta, abhineta, gunde, badamashon kee tarah samaj ke anivary tatv hain. inake bina samaj ka poorn nirman nahin ho pata hai, kyonki inake karan hi nari jati se judi dahej kee tarah kee samasya , chhedachhad ka astitv, samaj men maujood rahata hai jo kisi bujurg ke aashirvad kee tarah din doona rat chauguni dar se mahangaee kee tarah badhati chali ja rahi hai. isase ghar kee grihani ho , skool-kalej jati chhatra ho, daftaron men kam karati praudha ho, koee bhi nahin bacha hai. sabhi ko ghar se bahar nikalate hi rod inspektar kee chhedachhad ka shikar hona padata hai.

us din ye upavas dharan kar lete hain, kyonki bina chhedachhad ke inhen khana nahin pachata hai. samaj men inhen talashane ke lie koee vishesh chashma lagane kee jaroorat nahin hai. ye pop star maikal jaikshan kee tarah bal badhaye, apane sharir kee chaudaee ke barabar baigi pent kam paijama pahane govinda chal, amirakhan muskan ke sath alag se sadak par ghoomate najar aa jate hain ye apani upasthiti ka ehasas hamen svayan karate hain jab bhi kisi kanya ko dekhate hai. to apane arddhanarishvar balon ke pichhe hath ferakar apana rod inspektar hone ka parichay dena yah pratham farj samajhate hai.

jitana ki netaon ke pahanane ke lie khadi ke kurtte ke paijama ka, chara surkhiyon men rahane ke lie ghotale ka hai. inakee sari javani pan ke thele par sadak takate hue kat jati hai. ye subah sat baje se rat das baje tak ek aadarsh sipahi kee tarah pan ke thele par dyooti dete hai. jis tarah yatayat sipahi kee najar se koee trak bachakar nikal nahin pata , usi tarah inakee giddh nigahon se koee ladakee bachakar nahin ja sakati hain jo bhi ladakee inhen bhanti hai usake pichhe ye shahad kee makkhi kee tarah lag jate hain aur ek aadarsh parivarik sadasy kee tarah use roj ghar se kalej v kalej se ghar chhodakar aate hai. is bich men jitana bhi samay inhen raste men aasapas kee motar karon, trakon, taimpon se bachane ke bad milata hai, utana samay ye prem ijahar chhedachhad karane men lagate hai. aisa din men ye char -panch ladakiyon ke sath avashy karate hai.

mini skart chhata li oonchi edi vali ladakee ko maharani viktoriya , ghas n dalane vali , patthar ka javab eent se dene vali ladakee ko maharani lakshmibaee, saindil marane vali ko maharani durgavati , jaise aitihasik patron se pukarate hain, inamen kam padhe-likhe aavara navayuvak hi nahin, em.e.bi.e, pi.ech.di. dharak padhe-likhe samajhadar log bhi shamil rahate hain. jo aksar chhedachhad men dushyant kee shakuntala, tulasi kee ratnavali, mahabharat kee panchali , vridavanalal varma kee mriganayani jaise sahityak patron ka istemal karate hain. ye log ladakiyon ke sanbandh men ke.ji.be.ke jasooson kee tarah ghar valon se jyada janakari rakhate hain.

samaj men badanami hona, sar ke balon ka chauraha banavana, ladakiyon dvara ek se ek shabdon -bandar , gadha, khajoor, tingoo, kaddoo jaise shabdon se sanbodhit hona , mar kha jana, aadi ka in par koee asar nahin padata hai.
uske doston se uske baare mein poochti raha karo. Par khud usse kabhi baat mat karna. Wo khud tumse baat karne ko vyakul ho jayega. Fir tum use apne prem jaal mein faans lena.
kabhi kapdon ki to kabhi shareer ki. Ek din keh dena, aaj to bade mustande lag rahe ho. Wo paagal hokar tumhare kadmon mein gir padega.
to use kaho ki tumhe thoda ghumane le jaaye. Kabhi lift maang liya karo. Jhoot-moot ka anand dikhao. Baaton baaton mein use apni mohmaya ke jaal mein fasa lo.
ladkiyon, in dushton se jitna door hi rahogi utni zyaada sukhi rahogi. Lekin fir bhi honhaar ladke to hote hain hamari tarah. Unhe pehchaan lo aur prem jeevan ka anand uthao.

samaj aur parivesh se prapt manas sanvedanon ke sandeshon se jin anubhootiyon kee upalabdhi hoti hai, unake hi vimarsh se naee-naee vyakhyaon ko aadhar milata hai. yuva chintak evan lekhak tatha bharatiy dak seva ke adhikari krishn kumar yadav ka nagarik uttar pradesh, lakhanaoo se prakashit dvitiy nibandh sangrah anubhootiyan aur vimarsh isi chintan, manan aur vivechan ko aadhar deti manasi vritti ka parinam hai, jisamen lekhak ne sahity aur sahityakar, vyakti aur samaj, vigyan aur praudyogikee, vaishvik chetana tatha sanskritik adhyayan ke anek aadhunik aur uttar aadhunik tathyon ko vyakhyayit karane ka prayas kiya hai. lekhak ka isase poorv abhivyaktiyon ke bahane namak nibandh sangrah prakashit ho chuka hai. prashasanik seva men rahakar bhi chintan manan karana evan sahityik lekhan karana apane aap men ek vishisht upalabdhi hai. rajakeey seva ke dayitvon ka nirvahan aur shreshth kritiyon kee sarjana ka yah mani-kanchan yog viral hai. krishn kumar yadav ke nibandhon men unaka bahuaayami chintan mukhar huaa hai.

sanskritik pratimanon par aadharit nibandh evan samasamayik v jvalant muddon par aadharit nibandh. vyaktitv v krititv aadharit lekhon men desh ke moordhany sahityakaron v manishiyon - munshi premachand, rahul sankrityayan, manohar shyam joshi, amrita pritam v da0 ambedakar ke janm se mahaprayan tak ke safar ko kramashah lipibaddh kar bikhare manakon ko ekatr kar mala ke roop men taiyar kar unake jivan-sangharsh v bharatiy samaj men yogadan ko rekhankit karane ka sarthak prayas kiya gaya hai. aaj jab har lekhak pustak ke madhyam se sirf apane bare men batana chahata hai, aise men anubhootiyan aur vimarsh men tamam sahityakaron v manishiyon ke bare men padhakar sukoon milata hai aur is prakar yuva pidhi ko bhi inase jodane ka prayas kiya gaya hai. lekhak kee shreshth-jivan moolyon ke prati prakhand aastha, bharatiy sanskriti ke prati agadh anurag tatha samagrata bharatiyata ke prati ekanishtha kee sprihaniy chetana se prannavan ye nibandh hindi jagat kee sthayi nidhi hain. inamen lekhak ka svadhyay tatha abhivyakti kee nishchhalata apane poorn vaibhav ke sath vidyaman hai. vaigyanik vishleshan kee dakshata lekhak men hai, isalie usaka kathy pratyek pathak ka kathy ban gaya hai.

tab is lekhak kee kahaniyon men vyapt pragatishil vicharon aur janajagriti ke sandeshon se sahity lokahit ke sanvardhan ka ek naya aandolan bana tha. rashtraprem, stree vimarsh, jatipratha, ashiksha, nirdhanata, sadhanahinata, kisan, majadoor,sarakari tantr aadi ke tatkalin svaroop aur unake parinam aur dushparinam premachand ke sahity men kis prakar rache base hain, krishn kumar yadav kee is pustak men gambhir adhyayan ka vishay banakar ubhare hain. premachand ke oopar aaj jis tarah ke aakshep kiye ja rahe hain, unakee rachanayen jalayi ja rahi hain, unakee prasangikata par saval khade kiye ja rahe hain, aise men yah lekh aur bhi mahatvapoorn ho jata hai.

dharm, darshan aur adhyatm ke talasparshi vidvan, yayavar, mahamanav rahul sankrityayan ka sampoorn jivan prayogik gyan ke karmashil chetan ka vikasasaman svaroop tha. unhonne kisi ek dal ke daladal ko kabhi nahin svikara tha. vah vidrohi aatma ke jyortimay pragya puroosh the. vivechana ke kram men shree yadav ne apane kathanon ko rahul ji ke jivan darshan se, unake lekhan se tatha unakee rajanaitik aur pragatishil avadharanaon ke sandarbhon se bahuvidh sanvar kar jis jatil bauddhikata se mukt kiya hai, vah pathak ke man ko samaj, sabhyata, sanskriti, itihas, vigyan ityadi se anupranit manishi ke sanyas se samyavad tak le jakar us bhavabhoomi par pratishthit karane ka prayas hai, jahan lekhak kahata hai- bhago nahin duniya badalo.

unaka aam aadami ke lie lekhan, patrakarita ke uchch aadarsh, hamalog, buniyad, jaise dharavahikon ke sarjak tatha kyap jaise sahityik srijan ke lie akadami puraskar prapt karana sahity ke itihas kee abhootapoorv upalabdhi hain . kho gaya kissagoee shirshak se is pustak ke lekhak ne paramparaon, roochiyon aur vimarshon ke jivant uddharan uddhrit kiye hain, jo joshi ji ke prati shraddhanjali hai. amrita pritam ke yogadan par hindi jagat men sashakt roop men adhik nahin likha gaya hai, aise men amrita pritam ko, jitane najadik se shree yadav ne dekhane ka prayatn gum ho gaya rasidi tikat namak lekh men kiya hai svayan men ek jigyasapoorn satat utsukata ka nirvah karati kahani ka kathanak hi lagata hai.

unase vichalit n hote hue kis prakar shikshavid rajanitigya, arthashastree, vidhivetta aur sanvidhan nirmatree parishad ke mahatvapoorn pad tak pahunchakar ek sarvamany neta banane men safalata paee thi, usaka vivaran bhi anubhootiyan aur vimarsh ke prishthon par ankit hai. do0 ambedakar ke antarvirodhon par charcha ke sath-sath vartaman rajanaitik-samajik parivesh men jis prakar unhen bhunaya ja raha hai, us par bhi charcha karake is lekh ko aur bhi aayam diye ja sakate the.

chahe vah panchayati raj dvara ho ya ghareloo mahila hinsa adhiniyam dvara ho ya roodhivadi varjanaon ke todane dvara ho. deh vimarsh ke daur men yah lekh apani prasangikata sthapit karata hai. itihas ke aayam men lekhak ne aitihasik dharoharon ke mahatv ko paribhashit karate hue, hal ke dinon men itihas purnalekhan ko lekar uthate savalon ke bich itihas kee vibhinn dharaon ko rekhankit kiya hai. bharatiy pariprekshy men dharmanirapekshata lekh men pashchaty v bharatiy sandarbhon men dharm kee tulanatmak mahatta ko rekhankit karate hue bharatiy samaj men dharm ke avadanon v vibhinn samayon men dharmik ekata ko darshate hue antatah sanvaidhanik upabandhon ke madhyam se vartaman samaj men dharm ka vishleshanatmak vivechan kiya gaya hai. lekhak ka kathan bada satik hai ki- tushtikaran kee nitiyon ke bich hamane ek dharmanirapeksh rajy ko to apana liya hai par dharmanirapekshata abhi tak hamare samajik jivan ka ang nahi ban payi hai. bharatiy sanskriti aur tyauharon ke rang is sangrah ka sabase lamba lekh hai. isamen lekhak ne desh ke kone-kone men manaye jane vale mahatvapoorn tyauharon, inake pichhe chhipi manyataon, riti-rivajon aur aitihasik ghatanaon, unako manane ke dhangon men vividhata aur unakee prasangikata par rochak dhang se prakash dala hai. lekhak ne is lekh ke madhyam se antatah samajik samarasata, rashtriy ekata v akhandata evan tyauharon- parvon ko manane kee mool manaviy bhavanaon ko sanjone kee koshish kee hai. yadyapi is lekh men bharatiy tyauharon par vistrit janakari hai lekin pongal aadi dakshinanchal aur uttaranchal ke tyauharon ko jodakar ise aur bhi rochak banaya ja sakata tha. aadhunikata aur uttar aadhunikata ke drutagami vikas ke badhate charan jis prakar nit naye gyan aur vigyan ke aalokamayi jharokhe kholate ja rahe hain, unase hi yuvaman chakachaundh ke bhoolabhulaiya poorn jivan men digabhramit ho raha hai. filmi duniya, usamen vyapt jivan moolyon ko tilanjali deti naee pidhi aur us adhogaman kee or utsukata bhari nigahon men vastavik jindagi se door ke sapane to chinta ka vishay hain hi, vidyarthiyon ka rajanitigyon dvara shoshann, shiksha ka gunatmak avamoolyan, netritv kee akshamata, sahity, kala, sanskriti aur gyan kee avahelana se upaji nakaratmak soch, yuva bhatakav kee sthiti kyon shirshak lekh men bahut satik dhang se ukeri gaee hai. in sabhi lekhon men lekhak kee tathyatmak drishti bina kisi bhavukata ke, bina kisi atyukti ke bharatiy sanskriti kee sachchi nishtha se parichalit hai. poorvagrahon se mukt krishn kumar yadav kee lekhani prachinata evan aadhunikata ka samanvay prakat karate huye ek vimarsh khada karane men safal rahi hai.

fir bhasha aur sahity aprabhavit kaise rah sakate hain? hindi bhasha par isaka kya prabhav huaa hai aur kya hoga, is tathy ko vartaman men dekhate hue atit ke lekhan aur patrakarita ke itihas tak pahunchata lekhak bhoomandalikaran ke daur men hindi dvara anek sarthak prashn karata v unaka uttar dhoondhata pratit hota hai. bhoomandalikaran ke daur men teji se badhate bharatiy kadam men lekhak ne 1990 ke bad arthavyavastha men teji se aaye uchhal ko rekhankit kiya hai aur udghoshana kee hai ki - bharat ko ek bar fir se jagadguru kee bhoomika nibhane ke lie taiyar ho jana chahie. bajarikarann, drishy aur shravy midiya, bahurashtriy kampaniyan, upabhoktavad aadi ka brand imej kee mahatta shirshak lekh men tatha intaranet ka badhata prabhav men vishv-gram kee najadikiyon se bhasha, sanskriti, vyapar, vyavasay, shiksha aur jivan ke sabhi kshetron kee soochanaon ke upalabdh hone ke sadhan roop men bhi is pustak men charcha ka vishay bana hai. koching sansthaon ka failata mayajal bhi lekhak ke drishtipatal se gujara hai aur usane koching sansthanon dvara apanayi jane vali takanikon evan unake mayajal men fansate samany vidyarthiyon kee durdasha par bebakee se prakash dalate hue koching vyavastha ke chalate vidyalayon men adhyapan ke girate star par bhi chinta vyakt kee gayi hai.

drishtant ityadi gady jaisi niras vidha men rochakata ka samavesh karate hain aur lekhan ko tarkapoornn-tathyapoornn-praman sammat banate hain. krishn kumar yadav ne is pustak men sahity aur sahityakar, vyakti aur samaj, vigyan aur praudyogikee, vaishvik chetana tatha sanskritik adhyayan ke anek aadhunik aur uttar aadhunik tatvon ko vyakhyayit karane ka prayas kiya hai. lekhan kala men prabandh ya nibandh ka sahity men mahatvapoorn sthan hota hai. is pustak ke lekhak ne us apeksha kee poorti ka prayatn kiya hai. nibandh ke svaroop vivechan men hi nahin balki unake sampadan men bhi lekhak ne apani shodhaparak drishti dvara vishay-vastu ko aitihasik taratamy kee chasani ke sath paros kar apani lekhani ke kaushal ka parichay diya hai, jo nishchay hi pathakon ke lie upayogi ban pada hai.

vivek aur visheshata ke sath sadhy huyi hai. ek prashasak hone ke sath-sath manaviy sanvedanaon se gahare roop men jude hue krishn kumar yadav ka yah sankalan vaishvik jivan drishti, aadhunikata bodh tatha samajik sandarbhon ko vividhata ke anek staron par samete hindi nibandh ke jis poore paridrishy ka ehasas karata hai vah nibandh kala ke bhavi vikas ka soochak hai. lekhak ne parampara se hatakar ek naye marg ka anusaran karake nibandh vidha ko ek naya aayam dene ka prayas kiya hai. sarvatha naee shabd yojana, naee prasangikata, naee anubhootiyan aur naee vimarsh shaili ke sath yah ek dastaveji nibandh sangrah hai, jo vicharon kee dharohar hone ke karan sangrahaniy bhi hai. kul milakar pratipady, bhasha, shaili-tinon hi drishtiyon se ye nibandh prashansaniy hain. inakee prastuti sarvatha svagat yogy hai.
us tadittarangiy gatimayata men prarambh ho jae aalap, jo dhire-dhire badhata jae, jhala kee nakshatra-mala tak. taramandal khil uthen aur fail jae ujala, guru sharan rani ke nam ka.

1929 ko dilli ke ek jane mane kayasth mathur parivar men huaa. us kayasth parivar men sahity, sangit, kalaon ke prati prem bhav to tha lekin ladakiyan usamen aage badh-chadhakar hissa len isakee manahi thi. dhun kee dhani sharan ji ne pratikool vatavaran ko bachapan se hi anukool bana liya, aur aage bhi sangharsh karati rahin.

par nanhin sharan rani ne dekha ki bhabhi to khan-pan, ghar-parivar aur grihasthi men doobi huee hain, kahan sikhengi. liya ek sikka, chhed die svar, aanand aaya, saragam nikali. sa-re-g-m nikal aae to fir kya tha, vah vady inaka ho gaya aur ye us vady kee ho gaeen.

videsh gaeen. ve pratham mahila thin jinhen sarod ke karan vibhinn prakar ke samman mile. ve pratham mahila thin jinhen sarod par doktaret kee upadhiyon se navaza gaya. ve pratham mahila thin jinhonne pandrahavin shatabdi ke bad bane hue vady yantron ko n keval sangrahit kiya balki rashtriy sangrahalay ko dan men de diya. ve prathamon men pratham thin.
chilam bharani padti thi. rasoee men samay dena hota tha. aur das-das ghante ke riyaz kee pabandi. sanbhrant-raees parivar kee sharan rani ne aughad baba kee sari bat manin.

kya hota hai paranpara pradan karane kee prakriya ka silasila, to baba aur sharan rani ji ke aapasi rishton ko badi gaharaee se samajhana hoga. guru aise hi vidya nahin deta, jab tak ki shishy men poori lagan n ho, nishtha n ho. us nishtha kee pratimoorti banakar sharan rani bar-bar maihar jati rahin. sangit sikhana hai to gurubhakti nishtha se karani hogi. unhonne than liya ki sikhakar hi manengi. gagan ko gunja dengi sarod ke suron se.
agar jivan-sathi sahara n de. pati bhi sarod jaisa hi mila. surila sultan sinh bakalival. unhonne sharan ji ko sada utsahit kiya aur aage lane ke lie pichhe-pichhe rahe.

kahan sitar, kahan bansuri, kahan sarod! ve vilakshan svar-samrat the aur sare vady-yantron se pyar karate the. vadyon ke prati yah prem, paranpara ke roop men sharan rani ji ke pas aaya. ve bhi vadyon se pyar karane lagin. pati sultan sinh bakalival ke sahayog se vady-yantron ka ek vishal bhandar unake pas ikattha ho gaya. kahin vo aadivasi kshetron se anoothe prachin vady lekar aaeen, kahin unako gramin lok vady mile. tarah-tarah ke tantree-vady aur tal vady. ve sab ke sab unhonne bharat sarakar ke adhin rashtriy sangrahalay ko dan men de die. sharan rani bakalival gailari bani, jisaka udghatan kiya tha shreemati indira gandhi ne. is sangrahalay ko sharan ji nirantar sanpann karati rahin. unake vadyon par dak tikat jari hue. sarod par bhi, bansuri par bhi aur mridang par bhi.

tadap thi, ek aakarshan tha, ek chunbak thi jisake pichhe sharan divani si rahati thin. kya chahie kalakar ko? yash. han, yash chahie. kisi ke pichhe daudi nahin sharan ji. do. zakir husain dvara sammanit kiya gaya. aar. ke. narayan dvara unhen padmabhooshan se sammanit kiya gaya. n jane kitane manchon par, n jane kitani bar unhen sammanit kiya gaya. samman sharan ji ke pichhe-pichhe dauda, sammanon ke pichhe sharan ji kabhi nahin daudin.

vahin usake shastreey paksh ko bhi anadekha nahin rakha. unhonne sarod ko lekar kafi shodh-kary kiya. kalidas ke meghadoota se yah sootr nikala ki meghon ne apana rasta badal liya tha choonki unake adhik niche aane par alakapuri men rahane vale sangitakaron ke sazon ke sur utar jate the. yah bat tay hai ki unhin sazon ke sur utarate hain jo chamade se bane hue hote hain. sarod ek aisa hi vady hai jis par chamada laga rahata hai. yani sarod ek prachin bharatiy vady hai. ve kahati thin ki sarod nam ke mool men svarodaya raha hai. sangit ke kuchh vidvan manate hain ki sarod vady madhy eshiya se aaya. ve matabhed rakh sakate hain. shodh aur bhi honi chahie. vaise shodh ho bhi jae to labh kya? ek samachar chainal men sharan ji ke dehavasan kee khabar dete samay unhen sitar-vadika bataya ja raha tha. sarod aur sitar men unake lie koee fark hi nahin hai. kya kahen unako, yad kar liya yahi kya kam hai.

lekin svaron ke bich se shrutiyon kee sahi ladi pakad men nahin aa rahi thi. baba ne apane hukke men gahara kash mara aur chilam se nikali ek laharati huee si chingari. baba ne kaha aise, aise, han aise nikalo. sarod ka tar ungali ke dabav ke sath parade par chingari kee tarah laharaya aur vah nad adhikatam surila hokar nikal aaya.
lekin paranparavadiyon ne mana kar diya. allah ka bheja huaa koee ek maulavi tha jisane kaha ki mitti kee pahali mutthi sharan rani kee hogi.
unase kitane logon ne shrutiyon aur mindon ko pakada hoga. log aankh mind kar aansoo paunchh lenge par vaisi mind kaun nikalega?
aravind rahi,mariyam gazala, ma.na. narahari, shree aar. pi. sharma, ahamad vasi,ram govind, maya govind, rajam ji, niralaprasad ji

2008 ko varishth gazalakar v rachanakar shree khanna muzaffarapuri ke nivas sthan par sanpann huee. varishth gazalakar shree aar. pi. sharma maharsh kee adhyakshata tatha anant shreemali ke sanchalan men aayijit is goshti men padhare anek shair v rachanakar, mukhy mahaman maya govind, ram govind, ke sath sath ma.na. narahari, janab ahamad vasi, gitakar shailendr ji, niralaprasad ji v unake suputra, madhuji, mariyam gazala, ratna jha, raghuvanshi ji, devamani pandey, shabanam kapoor, rajiv sarasvat, aravind rahi, vijay, main- devi nagarani, rajam ji aur svayan khanna sahab. sabhi ne uttam rachanaon ka path kiya.
gitakar shailendr ji,shree aar. pi. sharma maharsh , shree khanna muzaffarapuri, anant shreemali aur devi nagarani,

maya govind aur devi nagarani ji ka fool v shal ke sath sanman kiya. maharsh ji ne adhyaksheey sanbodhan men kavi gan kee rachanaon kee pathaniyata ko saraha aur apani kuchh gazal sunakar sabhi ko aannad vibhor kar diya. ant men khanna ji ne sabhi atithi gan ka sanman sahit aabhar prakat kiya.
tum bhi uspar pyaar nyochavar karo. Jaise hi tumhara mitra koi galti kar baithe aur chappal khaye, tum jaakar us ladki ka dil behla do. Yaari dosti apni jagah, aur pyaar mohabbat apni jagah.

kaafi yogya kanyaayen dikhengi. Dhang se baat karke dosti kar lo. Baat ban jaaye to humein dhanyavaad kar dena. Aisi vaisi baatein ki to hamare shraap se bach nahi paoge. Kaafi jan hamare shraap ka asar dekh chuke hain.
jaakar uski saheliyon ki khoob tareef karo. Wo sochegi ki unmein aisi kya baat hai jo usmein nahi. Aur khud hi tumhari taraf khinchi chali aayegi.
aankhon mein aankhen daalkar hi baat kiya karo. Pet mein titliyan ud rahi ho fir bhi ekdum vishwaas se khade rehna.
shakkar lene ke bahane uske ghar ke chakkar kaatna koi buri baat nahi. Fir ek din use chai peene apne ghar bulake apna dil ka haal bayaan kar do.
kahan kahan jaati hai. Uske baad kam se kam 21 dino tak uske saamne mat aana. Wo khud bechain hokar tumse baat karne ke liye bekaraar ho jaayegi. Dhyan rahe is tarike mein pitaai ka khatra hai.
hamesha uski saheliyon ki tareef karo. Uski tareef mat karna jise tum pasand karte ho. Uske man mein jalan paida karo. Isse wo tumhari taraf aakarshit hogi.
saath mein ghar parivaar ki bhi 2-4 baaten kiya karo. Jitna jyada apnapan dikhaoge utne hi fatafat wo tumhari apni ban jayegi.

Hello Friends, Jese ke aap jante hai 2017 khatam hone ko hai or Iss Saal aapke sath kya kya huaa. Kya acha tha kya bura tha wo sab aapke samne hai. Saal ke starting me kya socha tha kya target rakhe the wo pure huee ya nahi huee sab samne hai. ab 2018 ki wari hai. Me aapko mera exprience share kar raha hu or ummid karta hu iski madad se aap 2018 me kuch acha karege or jo aap chate hai wo aapko jarur milega. Jese mene 2017 start hone par hi kuch target set kiye the mere liye, ki muje HMH me aesa karna hai usko yaha tak phuchana hai. Itni Post karna hai. Itne logo tak phuchana hai. aese bhut se target mene apne liye set kiye the. Par jese ki aap jante hi hai me pichle 2-3 mahino se HMH par active hi nahi tha. q ki kuch aesi chije bhi aa jati hai hamari life me jinke ware me hamne kabhi socha bhi nahi hota hai. or unki baja se me apna target pura nahi kar paya. Life me utar chadav to aate hi hai, or agar kisi ki life me nahi aate to matlab wo kuch kar hi nahi rahe hai. par in sabme sabse main hai ham kaise hamare kharab time me apne aapko shabhale or usse kaise nikle. To Dosto, 2017 kesa raha acha ya bura usko ko ham nahi badal sakte, or uske ware me soch kar ab apna time barwad karne se bhi koi matlab nahi hai, chaliye aane wale saal 2018 ki planing karte hai or Kya kya Karna hai 2018 me uski Planning karte hai. Jese ki aap muje jante hoge, me ek blogger hu to meri planing ussi ke upar hoge, par aap apni jo bhi field hai aap uske liye apne target set kare. target kaise set karna hai uska tarika me aapko batane wala hu. Apne liye koi bhi target set karne se phele aapko apne aapko jaanna hoga ki aapki chamta kitni hai, agar aap kisi dusre ko dekh kar apna target set karege to aapko maja nahi aayega, or ho sakta hai aapme wo khubi na ho to aap apna target pura hi nahi kar paye ya fir badi aasani se pura kar le, isliye aap sabse phele apne aapko dekhe ki aapme kya khubi hai or aap kya kar sakte hai. Jese agar aapka koi blog hai or aapka usme interest hai to aap target set kar sakte hai ki aapko blog me itni post karna hai, blog me naya ye add karna hai, blogging orr acha kar saku uske liye HTML, CSS, JavaScript sikhna hai, iss trha ke target aap set kar sakte hai. Agar aapki youtuber hai to aap usme bhi iss trha ke target set kar sahte hai apne liye jese aapko itne video banana hai, Video or ache bane uske liye kya karna hai. Koi bhi target set karne se phele aap ye jarur dekh le ki aap usko pura kar sakte hai ki nahi. q ki jada bada target bhi agar aapne set kiya to aap usko pura nahi kar payege or bich me hi har maan jayege, or jada chota bhi target set naa kare, nahi to aapko maja nahi aayega or jitna aapko mil sakta tha wo nahi mil payega. To Sabse phele aap ek copy le or usme 2 list banaye. ek me aap wo sab bate likhe jo aapne 2017 me kari, jo aapko aati hai, aapka talent hai, aapa interest hai, or dusri list me wo bate likhe jo aapko kamjor banati hai ya jo aap chate hai usme badha banti hai. isse aapko andaja lag jayega ki aapko konsi chije hai jinpar work karna hai 2018 me. or aap fir badi aasani se apna time table set kar payege or apne aapko badiya kar payege. Jese mera target tha 2017 ka ki muje apni health bhi banani hai, abhi pichle 3 mahino me sab gadwad ho gaya to GYM bhi nhi gaya or health bhi down ho gai. to mera health ka target me achieve nahi kar paya. Blog me bhi regular nahi kar paya. Mera 2018 ke kuch task set kiye hai mere liye Baki koi buri aadate to hai nahi jinko choru jese Drink, Cigarette, or Gali bhi nahi bakta. Inn baat ki khusi hai to aesa to koi target set karne ki jarurat nahi hai muje. par ye me isliye bata raha hu taki aap apne aapko acha banane ki kosis kare or agar aap kuch bhi galat karte hai uski jagha kuch acha kare jisse log aapko or jada pasand kare. To Dosto ye rahe mere task, baki inke aalawa bhi or add ho jayege jaha muje lagega ki mujme ye kami hai. Last me, aapse me ek hi baat khena chahuga, agar aap kuch acha karana chate hai to phele apni khubiya or kamjoriyo ko phechane, uske baad jo kamjoriya hai unko khatam karne ki kosis kare or jo aapne khubiya hai unko or badaye ke liye naya naya usme add kare. To Friends abhi ke liye itna hi, mera 2017 acha hi tha overall dekhe to par last last me bhut si aesi chije hui jo mene nahi sochi thi. jisme muje naya sikhne ko to bhut kuch mila or me strong bhi bhut ho gaya jo aage muje bhut kaam aane wala hai.

samaj ka darpan. gyan rashi ka sanchit kosh yadi manav kalyannakari nahin hai to use men sahity kaise kahoon meri samajh se bahar hai. jivan ke sookshm aur yatharth chintan samajik charitr ka pratipadan karati rachanaon par pratikool ya ashlil tippaniyan kahan tak svagat yogy hai meri samajh se bahar hain .

vah logon kee aatma ko tript kar raha hai aur rachanakar bhram men hai kee keertimanon kee lambi shrankhala men usane ek kadi aur jod di. ashlil tukabandi foohad hasy netaon ko galiyan parosakar kavi samajhata hai kee usane bada tir mar liya. vani aur svatantrata ka duroopayog nahin hona chahie. ijahare khyal bura nahin hota. usakee abhivyakti ailaniyan aur khullam khulla kee ja sakati hai basharte kee khyal garimamay ho bhasha susanskrit aur parimarjit ho bat dushale men lapet kar bhi kahi ja sakati hai

tabhi yah samanjasy sajivata ke sath samakalin srijan ka sakshee ban pata hai. yuva kavi evan bharatiy dak seva ke adhikari krishn kumar yadav ne apane pratham kavy sangrah abhilasha men apane bahuroopatmak srijan men prakriti ke apar kshetron men vistarit aalanbanon ko vishayavastu ke roop men prapt karake hnaday aur mastishk kee rasatmakata se kavita ke anek roop bimbon men sanjone ka prayatn kiya hai. abhilasha ka sangyak sankalan sanskaravan kavi ka inhin visheshataon se yukt kavi karm hai, jisamen vyaktigat sambandhon, samajik, rajanaitik, aarthik samasyaon aur vishamataon tatha jivan moolyon ke sath ho rahe pidhiyon ke atit aur vartaman ke takaravon aur prakriti ke sath paryavaraniy vikshobhon ka khulakar bhavatmak arth shabdon men anugunjit huaa hai. para aur apara jivan darshan, vishv bodh tatha vidvan bodh se upaji anubhootiyon ne bhi kavi ko anek roopon men udvelit kiya hai. in udvelanon men jivan saundary ke sarthak aur sajiv chitr shabdon men arth pa sake hain.

pyar aur dular ke vividh roopon men kathan kee marmasparshi bhangima ke sath kathy ko sidhe-sidhe pathak tak sanpreshit karane ka prayatn banaya hai. shabd jo abhidhatmak shaili men kuchh kah rahe hain vah bahut spasht arthanviti ke parichayak hain, parantu bhavatmakata ka kendr bindu vyanjana kee antashchetana sanbhoot v aatmiyata ka manavi manovigyan banakar ubhara hai. god men bachche ko lekar shubh kee aakankshee man buri najar se bachane ke liye kajal ka tika lagati hai, banh men tabij bandhati hai, skool ja rahe bachche kee bhookh-pyas svayan men anubhav karati hai, padosi bachchon se ladakar aaye bachche ko aanchal men chhipati hai, doolha bane bachche ko bhav men dekhati hai, kalpana ke sansar men shahanaeeyon kee goonj sunati hai, bahoo ko saunpati huee man bhavuk ho uthati hai. najon se pale apane ladale ko jivan dhan saunpati huee man ke ashru, karoona vigalit sneh aur anurag ke moti banakar ludhak padate hain. kavi ka man ke prati bhav abhyarthana aur abhyarchana banakar kavita ka shashvat shabd saundary ban jata hai.

jahan man anek roopon men prakat hoti hai. kabhi patr men utkeern hokar, to kabhi yadon ke jharokhon se jhankati huee bachapan se aaj tak kee upalabdhiyon ke bich ek safal putr ko aashirvad deti huee. kisi nirashrita, abhav grast, kshudhit man aur santati kee kaya ko bhi kavi kee lekhani ka sparsh mila hai, jahan majaboori men chhipi nirihata ko bhookhi kamuk nigahon ke svarthi sansar ke bich ardhaanavrit aanchal se doodh pilati manavi ko amanaviy najaron ka samana karana pad raha hai. man ke vividh roopon ko bhavon ke anek staron par ankit hote dekhana aur kavita ko shabd dena aadarsh aur yatharth kee anubhootiyon ka dil men utarane vala shabd bodh hai.

jyotsana snan prem kee suvistarit rati-rajani ke aagosh men baithe khamosh anrtamilan ke kshanon ko in panktiyon men dekhen-rat ka paharajab main jheel kinare baitha hota hoonchand jheel men utar karanaha raha hota haikuchh der badachand ke sathaek aur cheharamil jata haivah shayad tumhara haipata nahin kyon bar-bar hota hai aisamain nahin samajh patasamane tum naha rahi ho ya chandaaakhirakar jheel menek kankad fenkakarakhamoshi se main vahan se chala aata hoon.

tumhen jita hoon, tumhari khamoshi, bevafa, preyasi, titaliyan, prem, kunvari kiranen, shirshak kavitayen jin vaiyaktik bhavanaon kee mansal abhivyaktiyon ko angadaiyon men umang se bharakar dil ke jharokhon se jhankati sanyog aur viyog kee rasatmakata ka ijahar karati hain, vah gahari sanson ke bich uthati girati janm-janm se pyasi priti payasvini ke tat par baithe yugal kee hnadayaspandon men suni jane vali sharir kee khushaboo aur chhuan ka smriti-sfit sansar hai. inamen aangik cheshtaon aur aindrik aasvadanon kee saundaryamayi kalpana ka kalatmak prannayan hnadayavan rasagyon ke liye rasayan ban sakata hai.

vayaskata, praudhata aur vardhaky kee avasthaon ko langhati kavita kee gambhir dhvani madakata ke unmad ko jivan saty ka darshan karane men saksham bhi ho jati hai. nari ke streetv ko matritv aur preyasi roopon se aage badhata huaa kavi, shoshann, utpidan, anachar, anyay ke paryay ban chuke sandesh se dalit v abala jivan se bhi sakshatkar karata hai, jahan mahiyasi kee mahima, khand-khand ho rahi bhogya banakar deh ban jati hai. stree vimarsh kee in kavitaon men samajik aur vaiyaktik vicharana kee anek sanbhavanaon se sakshatkar karata kavi bhav aur vichar men poojya par ho rahe anant atyacharon ka pardafash karata hai. bahoo ko jalana, havas ka shikar hona tatha vo ban kar sadak ke kinare adhanangi, pagal aur bechari bani becharagi kya kuchh nahin kah jati, jo in kavitaon men beti aur bahoo ke roop men kartavyon kee gathari lade jivan kee dagar par arthahin kadamon se jine ko vivash ho jati hai. stree vimarsh ka yatharth, dalit chetana kee soch in kavitaon men vartaman ka saty ban kar ubhari hain.

balashoshan aur bal manovigyan ko abhilasha kee kavitaon men jin shirshakon men abhivyakt kiya gaya hai, unamen pramukh hain-akhabar kee kataranen, jamun ka ped, bachche kee nigah, vo apane, aatma, bachcha aur manushy tatha bachapan. in rachanaon men bal man kee jigyasa, aakrosh, aatank, masoomiyat, prakriti, paryavaran aadi ka manushy ke sath, ped-paudhon ke sath v jiv-jantuon ke sath nikat sambandh aatmiyata kee kalpana ko sakar karate hue, atit aur vartaman kee sthitiyon se tulana karate hue, aage aane vale kal kee tasvir ke sath vyakt kiya gaya hai. bahudha jivan aur kartavy bodh se anupranit is khand kee kavitaon men kavi ne bachche kee nigah men boodhe chacha ko bhikh ka katora lie hue bhi dikhaya hai aur hudadang machate jamun ke ped tatha mitti kee sodhi gandh men mauj-masti karate bhi smriti ke kotaron men chhipi atit kee tasvir se nikalakar prastut karate paya hai. bachchon ke nishchhal man par chhal kee chhaya ka svarthi prapanch kis prakar havi hota hai aur jhoothe pralobhan v ahankar ke vashibhoot hue log unhen bhay ka bhoot dikhate hain aur jivan bhar ke liye kuritiyon ka gulam bana dete hain, yah bhi in kavitaon men drishtavy huaa hai.

tab sansar ke halachal bhare mahaul se alag, use makhamali ghas aur pedon ke harit sansar men rachi-basi alaukik sundarata ka darshan hota hai aur chidiyon kee chahachahahat sunaee deti hai. vah man kee khidakee khol kar dekhata hai tabhi use apane astitv ke darshan hote hain. akelepan ka ahasas karati niravata, manav jivan kee hakeekat, bachapan se javani aur budhape tak ka safar anek aashaon aur nirashaon ka andhera aur ujala najar aane lagata hai akelepan men. is prakar kee kavitaen bhi is sankalan kee visheshata hain.

adhikari aur karmachari kee jivan dashayen, failen, suvidha shulk tatha farj adayagi shirshakon men niji anubhav aur dainik kriyakalapon ka svanubhoot prastut kiya gaya hai. prakriti ke sath bhi kavi ka sakshatkar huaa hai-pachamadhi, badal, naya jivan tatha prakriti ke niyam shirshakon men. inamen manushy ke bhav lok ko aanubhootik uddipan pradan karati prakriti aur paryavaran kee sukhad smritiyon ko prakritasth hokar jivan ke sath-sath jiya gaya hai.

daya, sahanubhooti ka manav dharm ko anupranit karata charitrik aadarsh bhi nahin bhoolata. vartaman samay men manushy kee sadvrittiyon ko chhal, danbh, dvesh, pakhand aur jhooth ne kitana dhak liya hai, yah kisi se chhipa nahin hai. in manav moolyon ke avamoolyan ko kavi ne shabdon men kavita ka roop diya hai.

jo pragatishilata chetana kee aadhunikata bodh se yukt chittavritti ka pratibimb hai. isamen kavi man bhi hai or jan man bhi. manushy is sansar men samajikata kee simaon men akela nahin rahata. usake sath samaj rahata hai, atah apane samparkon se mili anubhooti ka aabhyantarikaran karate hue kavi ne apani bhavana kee sanvedanatmakata ko vivekajany pahachan bhi pradan kee hai. roodhi aur maulikata ke prashnon se oopar uthakar jab ham in kavitaon ko dekhate hain to lagata hai ki sahaj man kee sahaj anubhootiyon ko kavi ne sahaj roop se samayik-sahityik sandarbhon se yug-bodh bhi pradan karane ka prayas kiya hai. dayitv-bodh aur kavi karm men pandity pradarshan ka koee bhav nahin hai, fir bhi yah to kaha hi ja sakata hai ki vichar ko bhav ke oopar vijay mili hai. kavita samakalin lekhan aur srijan ke samasamayik bodh kee parinnati hai so abhilasha kee rachanaen bhi is tathy se achhooti nahin hain.
ve aur un ka sthan bhi tadbhav roopon ne le liya hai. shree yadav ne bhi anek shabdon ke vyakaraniy roopon ka aadhunikeekaran kiya hai.

aadhunikata bodh tatha samajik sandarbhon ko vividhata ke anek staron par samete prastut sankalan ke adhyayan se aabhasit hota hai ki shree krishn kumar yadav ko vipul sahityik oorja sampann kavi hraday prapt hai, jisase vah hindi bhasha ke vangamay ko smriti pradan karenge.

Dosto aajkal HD Video ka zamana aa gya hai. Sabhi Smartphone ke Camera bhi itne ache aa rahe hai ki HD me hi video bna rha hai. Aise me video ko online share karne me thodi dikkat hoti hai. Kyuki size jyada hone par 2G par jyada size ka video send karna ya fir kahi upload karna Pahad Todne ke barabar hai. Isliye mai apko ek aise AppSoftware ke bare me btaunga jisse aap apne video ka size kam kar skte hai. Yah aisa application hai jisme aap mnchahe sizeMB me video ko convert kar skte hai. Jaise agar koi video 1 GB ka hai aur aap usko 15MB me convert karna chahte hai toh aapko puri video 15 MB me converted milegi. Video ko compress kam size ka karne ke liye ham Android App ka bhi use kar sakta hai ya fir computer me software ki madad se bhi kar sakte hai. ham 2no tariko ko dekhege. Video Size ko kam karne ke liye Android Application ki jarurat hai Step 1 Aap Sbse Phle Apne Android Phone se Video Compressor app download kar lijiye. Video Compressor Step 2 App ko install krne ke baad jb aap app ko open krenge usme Input Video ka option aayega. Step 3 Apko ek Output Directory ka option milega ,jisme aapko yah choose krna hai ki apko video kaha save krna hai. Step 4 Ab jis video ko convert krna hai aap usko input video se select kar lijiye. Step 5 Fir aapko Output Name wale option me video ka naam de dijiye aur Output Size wale option me aapko jitney size ka video chahiye utna daal dijiye. Jaise aapko 20 MB me chahiye toh aap 20 input de dijiye. Step 6 Aur sbse last step , iss step me aap Compress Pr click kar dijiye. Iske baad video thoda time lega aur fir apko kam size ka video aasani se mil jayega. Toh dosto iss tarah se aap apne smartphone me iss app ke help se apne video ka size kam kr skte hai. Wo bhi aap jitna chahe utna size. Agar aap computer par bhi chahte hai video ko compress karna hai to mai ek aise software ke bare me btaunga jiski help se aap apne video ke Resolution Resloution matlab bina quality khoye ko kam kiye bina hi video ke size ko kam kar skte hai. Computer par video ka size km krne ke liye in steps ko follow kare Step 1 Sbse Phle aap google se Handbrake Software download kar lijiye. Download Handbrake Step 2 Install karne ke baad ab software ko open kar lijiye. Step 3 Apko Handbrake ke software me Source option milega jaha se aap apne video ko select kar skte hai. Aur Destination me aap apne Output video ka path de skte hai matlab apko video kaha save karna hai. Step 4 Fir aap output setting me jaiye aur aapko jis Format me video chahiye usme set kar dijiye Step 5 Yah step last step hai , isme aapko Start Par click karna hai . iske baad conversion shuru ho jayega.
dana, fal chunane befikr hokar jangal ka bhraman karake sham ko lautate the. fir rat ko chain ki nind bhi sote the.

pyas aur thakavat ke mare ve nirjiv se ho gaye the. sabhi pakshiyon ne milakar unhen dana-pani khilaya aur thodi der bad unaki moorchha khatm hui. sab yah janane ke lie hairan the ki ye pakshiyan kahan se aai hain?
audyogikaran, praudyogikaran ke karan poora vishv bigad raha hai. prakriti ki sundarata men bhi grahan lag raha hai.
#NAME?

Computer ho ya pyaar. Kam se kam 2-4 logon se pyaar karna aajkal ka rivaaj ban gaya hai. Kyunki agar ek ne dhoka diya to doosara koi to hona chahiye na. Par kuch bhakt 2-4 logon se ek hi samay mein ishq ladate samay pakde jaate hain, aur joote chappal khaakar waapas aate hain, apne bhakton ki isi samasya ko door karne ke liye aaj hum aapko denge kuch aise anmol tareeke jinko amal mein laane ke baad aap 2-4 kya, balki 15-20 logon se ek hi samay mein ishq lada sakte ho, aur pakde bhi nahi jaaoge.

aur na mein tera check karunga. To kehne ka arth hai bhakton ki jab bhi unse milne jaao to bhoolkar bhi apna Chalit Doorbhas yantra arthaat mobile phone na le jaayein. Ye samaj lo ki tumhara sabse bada shatru hai ye.

kahin aisa na ho ki tum kisi ko patane mein laakhon paapad belo aur tumhara mitra use lekar udan chhu hole. Mitrata apni jagah aur prem apni jagah. Zyaada jaankaari ke liye angrakchhak artaat Bodyguard dekh lo bachha, samajh aa jaayega ki aajkal ke mitra kis mitti ke bane hain.
vishesh hai hamare desh men skil ka itana patan. doosara patr bhi fed aof se sin men in ho raha hai.

hamare is mahan desh men sadiyon se len-den kee kala nirantar pratishtha ko prapt hoti rahi ho. vahan, aise nasamajh, lete hi pakad lie jane vale dusht, patak, nark ke bhagi nahin to aur kya hain. patr kutilata se sin men sthapit hone ka prayatn kar raha hai.

shiksha kee kami ke karan se chhoti-chhoti nasamajhiyan kar jate hain. donon patr ab shila par virajaman hain. ikaththe hokar desh men rishvat lene men pakade jane arthat kala men adyohpatan par bhanyakar roop se chintatur dikhaee de rahe hain.
najar ka fer. ab gun grahakata to rahi nahin, samajh hi nahin pate hain dene vale ke mansoobe idhar li nahin, udhar tapp se dhar lie gae.

fir dhire se baig ke andar sarakate the aur baig chaparasi ke hathon men pakadate the. yani range hathon ka koee chakkar hi nahin. aur ab dekho rakam sidhe hathon men lete hain, taki range hathon pakade jane ka sapana poora kar saken.

unhin varmaji ko, rishvat lene valon ke pitamah ko. aaj subah se hi ve ikadam udas hain. jab se akhabar men khabar padhi hai, mishraji ke rishvat lete hue range hathon pakade jane kee, ve udas hain. chay ke sath tin kee jagah dedh hi biskut khae hain. akhabar ko pare rakhakar udas najaron se ghar ke bilaute ko niharane men lage hue h. bilauta bhi unake bache hue biskuton par danv lagane ka paintara dhoondh raha hai. unakee aankhen rishvat lene kee kala ke is bhanyakar patan par sikudi-sikudi si ja rahi thin. mainne dekha ve ganbhir mudra men chhat ko niharane men lage the. rashtriy taur par chintit hone kee paranparik poorn uchchata ko prapt karana chahate the.
gajab to ab suno-ek bar to unhonne rishvat lene vale paise anathalay men dan karavakar usakee rasid mangava li thi.

taki karmiyon ko vidhivat roop se is vishay men daksh kiya ja sake. balki ve karmachariyon ko seva poorv prashikshan men hi is vishay ko rakhavane ke himayati hain. prativedan bhi taiyar kar liya tha.

usake parivesh , desh , kal ,paristhiti ke anuroop hota hai ! subhadra kumari chauhan ek sath hi pragatishil nari , grihini , man , kavi , lekhika , svatantrata sangram senani , jananetree v rajaneta thin ! ve jamin se judi huee thin , atah unake anubhavon ka sansar ati vishal tha ! yahi karan hai ki unake sahity men kahin bhi natakeeyata v banavatipan nahin hai varan vah hriday sparshi abhivyakti ban pada hai ! unaka janm 1904 men ilahabad ke nikat nihalapur namak ganv men ramanathasinh ke jamindar parivar men huaa tha ! itihas vid janate hain ki bisavin sadi ke praranbh men bharatiy samaj men jatigat , vargagat , dharmagat , lingagat roodhiyan apane charam par thin ! bal vivah kee parampara thi ! in kuritiyon ke viruddh hi subhadra kumari chauhan kee katha drishti bhi kendrit thi ! bahumukhi vyaktitv ke chalate v durbhagyavash asamay mrityu ke karan unhonne bahut adhik nahin likha hai , par jo kuchh bhi likha hai vah sab ka sab marmasparshi , uddeshyapoorn v shashvat ban kar hindi sahity kee dharohar ke roop men supratishthit hai!

hindi ke sarvadhik padhe v gaye gaye giton men se ek hai ! yah git svayan men git se adhik vir gatha kee ek sachchi kahani hi hai ! jisamen kavayitree ne rani lakshmibaee ke jivan ke sare ghatana kram ko ek padyatmak kahani ke roop men is sajivata se prastut kiya hai ki pathak ya shrota vir ras se bhav vibhor ho uthata hai ! yah rachana unakee pahachan ban gaee hai !

isamen bhagnavashesh, holi , papipet , manjhalirani , parivartan , drishtikon , kadam ke fool , kismat , machhuye kee beti , ekadashi , aahuti , thati , amaraee , anurodh , v gramina kul 15 ek doosare se badhakar kahaniyan hain ! in kahaniyon kee bhasha saral bolachal kee bhasha hai ! adhikansh kahaniyan nari vimarsh par kendrit hain!

vah mere pas upalabdh bikhare moti kahani sangrah kee prati par ek mitr ke dvara doosare ko pustak bhent karate huye kee gaee tippani hai! jo in kahaniyon kee lokapriyata , upayogita v aam pathak ka sahity anurag pradarshit karati hai ! aaj kitane pathak svayan pustaken kharid kar padhate hain ? bhent karana to bad kee bat hai ! aesi ruchikar hriday sparshi kitani kahaniyan likhi ja rahin hai ki ve pathakon ke bich charcha ka vishay ban javen ?unakee kahaniyan kritrim , saprayas likhi nahin lagati ! ve to aasapas se hi uthaee gaee vishay vastu kee taratib se prastuti hi hain !

asamanjas , abhiyukt , sone kee kanthi , nari hriday , pavitr eershya , angoothi kee khoj , chadha dimag , v veshya kee ladakee kul 9 kahaniyan hain ! in sab kahaniyo ka mukhy svar parivarik samajik paridrishy hi hai!

kailashi nani , biaalha , kalyani , do sathi , profesar mitra , durachari v mangala 8 kahaniyon kee kathavastu nari pradhan parivarik samajik samasyayen hain ! hingavala , rahi , tange vala , evan gulabasinh kahaniyan rashtriy vishayon par aadharit hain
aur apani vyapak katha drishti se ve ek ati lokapriy kathakar ke roop men hindi sahity jagat men supratishthit hain !

vatavaran , bhoogol , sabhyata , sanskriti , parivesh , rahan sahan , samaj vigyan ke adhyayan anveshan men yatraon ka mahatv nirvivad hai . sabhyataon ke aadan pradan , jenetik roop se brids ke sammilan men bhi yatraon ka yog raha hai . itihas men jhanken to bhagavan shree ram kee manav danav sanskritiyon ko milane vali uttar dakshin ko jodne vali yatra ko shanti yatra kaha ja sakata hai .desh bhar men pandavon kee yatraon ke smarak milate hain . samooche bharat ko tirth yatra ke ek sootr men pirone hetu poorab pashchim uttar dakshin men dharm pithon kee sthapana ka abhinav kary vishv itihas ke sanbhavatah sabase kam umr ke yatree , aadi shankarachary ji ne kar dikhaya hai .haj yatra kis musalaman kee hasarat nahin hoti ? sare vishv men bharatiy sanskriti ka paracham laharane ka shrey vivekanand ji kee shikago yatra ko hi jata hai jisane unhen sadhoo se svami ke roop men pratishthit kiya . bairistar gandhi ko rel ke tisare klas ke dabbe men kiye gaye deshatan ne hi mahatma gandhi bana diya . achanak paristhitiyonvash payalat se pradhanamantree bane rajiv gandhi ne rashtravyapi yatraon se hi lokapriyata ka sachcha janadhar paya .

jisane sarvapratham pashchimi sabhyata ko poorvi desho se parichit karavaya. kolambas ne yatra se hi amerika aur vest indij dhoodh nikale . purtagali yatree vaskodigama ne kep aaf gud hop ka naya samudri marg khoja .
en ivaning in peris , lav in tokiyo , bambe too bainkak , etti dej eraund di varld , aadi anek yatra kendrit filmen banaee hain .

relve rijarveshan , polis thana , baink , jalapraday sansthan , aasapas ke udyog , aadi ka bhraman karavane se ve in sansthanon se prayogik roop se parichit ho pate hain . yah parichay unhen inake jivan men ati upayogi hota hai . vigyan ke vartaman yug men jab ham ghar baithe hi ti vi par duniya bhar kee khabaren dekh sakate hain ,tab bhi us varchual varld kee apeksha vastavik paryatan prasangik bana huaa hai . toorijm , chahe vah sportas ko lekar ho , karnivals par kendrit ho ,buk feyar , emyoojament park , neshanal farest par aadharit ho ya any vibhinn karanon se ho badhata hi ja raha hai .
