silikan vaili aaf indiya kahe jane vale shahar bangalor v tin sagaron kee milan sthali kanya kumari kee vigyan kendrit shaikshanik yatra karavaee gaee . is navachar kee vyapak prashansa ho rahi hai . pradesh ke skoolon men kaksha 8, 9, v 11 men adhyayanarat pratibhavan chhatron men se svatantr vigyapan ke dvara aavedan aamantrit kiye gaye . pichhali klas ke praptankon v any mapadandon ke aadhar par visheshagyon ne 1000 bachchon ka chayan kiya . inamen lagabhag 40 pratishat ladkiyan shamil thin . makhanalal patrakarita vishvavidyalay bhopal ke vidyarthi bhi is shaikshanik bhraman men shamil kiye gaye . pratyek 10 bachchon par ek abhivavak shikshak banaya gaya . rajy vigyan shiksha sansthan jabalapur ko naracharing ka kary saunpa gaya . yatra ke dauran bachchon ko vaigyanikon se milavaya gaya , bachchon kee jigyasaon ka samadhan kiya gaya . yatra ke in 10 dinon men rel ka dibba hi chhatron ka ghar tha. kvij ke aayojan huye . yojana hai ki inhin bachchon men se aprail mah men ek pariksha lekar 100 bachchon ka chayan kiya javega , jinhen uchch shiksha hetu chhatravritti di javegi . samagr roop se m.pr. sarakar ka yah aayojan adbhut v prashansaniy raha . jisaka vistar apekshit hai .

jahan par panlimar sains par vishv stariy anusandhan ho rahe hain ka bhraman karavaya gaya . intar yunivarsiti sentar far estronanmi end estrofijiks pune , sentar far develapament aaf edavans kampyooting pune bharatiy egro indastrij faundeshan pune evan E T H risarch leboretari pune bhi bachchon ne vahan jakar dekhe .

indiyan spes risarch aarganaijeshan , vishvaishvaraiya indastriyal end teknalajikal myoojiyam jaise sansthanon ka avismaraniy bhraman aayojit kiya gaya . kanya kumari men bachchon ko desh kee asmita ke pratik svami vivekanand se parichit karavane vishisht kary kiya gaya . itani badi sankhya men bachchon ko suniyojit dhang se samay sima men yatra karavana ek bada chailenj tha , jisakee vyavastha ke liye pratyek sthan par ek edavans tim bheji gaee thi . chhoti moti asuvidhaon ke alava sari yatra nirvighn sanpann huee . yah aayojakon kee ek bahut prashansaniy upalabdhi hai .

mujhe dekho karib aakar ke falasafe par aayojit yah vigyan manthan yatra ne sare pratibhagiyon ko amrit ras pan karavaya hai ,jisaka unake vyaktitv par dirgh kalin sakaratmak prabhav padega aisi aasha hai .

utana hi khoobasoorat unaka dil aur dimag dekhane ko mila tha use dekhakar main chamatkrit tha. lekin usase bhi bada chamatkar meri aankhon ke samane, badi tadad men, tebul par, saje, tarah tarah ke pakavanon aur vyanjanon ke roop men, ghata tha. apane yahan shadi byah jaise samarohon par, vyanjan banane men mahir kaitarars, do din pahale se, apani badi toli ke sath, din rat jutakar kam karate hain tab jakar itane veraiti ke vyanjan taiyar kar pate hain lekin us ladake ke ghar to, n hi koee kaitarar tha n hi malakin ka koee madadagar mujhe kahin dikhaee pada tha, bavajood isake vahan mujhe itane veraiti ke vyanjan taiyar mile, yah kaise sanbhav huaa? yah bat, kisi anaboojh paheli kee tarah, mujhe pareshan kie huee thi lekin mere bhitar kee yah paheli, ek din, khud bakhud sulajh kar, isaka bada sahaj sa hal mujhe samajha gaee thi.

aur usamen aamantriton kee tadad bhi thik vaisi hi thi. apane yahan, chhote se chhote samaroh ke lie log hafton pahale se, kaitarar, tent haus tatha khane pine ke saman tatha sabji bhaji, tel masale ikattha karane men vyast hue rahate hain, lekin mere yahan, yahan ke hisab se, itana bada aayojan tha fir bhi bachchon men kisi bhi tarah ka tanav ya vyastata nahin thi. ek din pahale bahoo beta, dukan gae aur kar men ladakar sara saman ghar le aae. aayojan ke din main kafi tanav men tha kaise bevakoof hain ye bachche inake ghar men itana bada aayojan hai lekin inhen isakee jara si bhi koee paravah hi nahin hai. us din main subah kafi jaldi uth gaya tha aur naha dhokar taiyar ho liya tha lekin bachche subah kafi der tak sote rahe the. dekh rahi ho n, aaj inake ghar men itana bada aayojan hai aur e log abhi tak tang pasare so hi rahe hain mainne patni se unakee shikayat kiya tha to, usane bhi, bachchon ke laparavah rahane kee bat par, unhen kosa tha lekin, jaisa bharatiy bapon kee, be-jaroorat jaisi baton ko bhi jaroori banakar, apane bachchon par bigadane aur apani bagharane kee aadat hoti hai, mera bigada mood dekhakar patni samajhee gayi thi ki main jaroor bachchon ko kuchh n kuchh ulta pulta bolane vala hoon. usane mujhe samajhaya tha ki jhoothamooth ka ham logon ko apana dimag kharab nahin karana chahie, karana aur sanbhalana unako hai isalie yah unaka hedek hai ham log isako lekar bekar ka kyon jhakhen. itana hi nahin subah kafi der so lene ke bad, jab donon uthe the to bhi, beta chay pikar sofe par ladakar pasar gaya tha aur bahoo rasoee men nashta banane chali gaee thi. ajib bat hai aaj inake ghar, sath sattar logon ka khana hai lekin usake lie yahan mujhe taiyari nam kee koee chij hi nahin dikh rahi hai oopar se ve itane sust aur beparavah hai jaise aayojan, inake ghar men nahin balki doosare ke ghar men hain aur e log host nahin, balki apane hi ghar men gest hokar pahunche hon.

unakee laparavahi aur susti dekh, jal bhunakar khak huaa ja raha tha. lekin nirdharit samay se kafi pahale, hamare yahan jab karon men bhar bhar kar log pahunchana shuroo kie the to unake sath sirf unakee patniyan aur bachche nahin the balki sabake sath, bade bade bhagaunon men, ghar men taiyar, tarah tarah ke pakavan aur vyanjan bhi the. jab log use la lakar kichen men rakhana shuroo kie the to vahan itane bhagaune ikattha ho gae the ki utani badi rasoee, unhen rakhane ke lie chhoti padane lag gaee thi. aane valon men apani maon ke sath aae bachche to, dhama chaukadi machane ke lie gemaroom men chale gae the aur unake bap, hal ke kursi, sofe par lad pasarakar, gappe ladane men jut gae the lekin unakee patniyan kichen men, ghar se banakar late late jo saman thande hokar bemaja aur besvad ho jate, kuchh to, aise vyanjan talane, bhoojane aur pakane men jut gaee thin aur kuchh salad aur chatani jaisi chijen katane pitane men vyast ho gaee thin. koee bhi aurat ya mard, kisi doosare ke ghar ya rasoee men ghusega to use, us ghar ke bhitar, ya rasoee men, usakee jaroorat ke saman kahan kahan rakhe hue hai itana tak to, ghar vale se poochhana hi padega. lekin, yahan kichan men juti ladakiyan, apani jaroorat ke saman, kichen ke khanon se is tarah nikal nikal kar le rahi thin jaise vah unaka khud ka kichan ho aur sare saman, unhonne khud se sajakar rakha huaa ho. are vah. ghar ka malik sofe par pasara logon se gappen lagane men juta huaa hai tatha malakin bina kam ke khali baithi hamajoliyon ke sath duniya jahan kee baten batiyane men mashagool hain. yahi hai bharatiy sanskriti men, hamare bujurgon kee samoohikata aur sahayog kee asal parikalpana, jo mujhe usake khanti svaroop men, bharat men to kahin dekhane ko nahin mili thi lekin amarika aakar n sirf mainne, apani aokhon ke samane use usake khanti svaroop men, ghatit hote dekha tha balki yahin par, mainne apani sanskriti men samajik samarasata tatha sah astitv ke lie, samoohikata aur sahayog ke madhyam se hamare manishiyon ne sabako ek mala men goonthane pirone ka jo bada saral sa aur karagar nuskha eejad kiya hai use bhi bade achchhe se jana tha.

do tin ghar hatakar, ek dakshin bharatiy parivar rahata tha. ek din, unake yahan, ham saparivar khane par aamantrit the. apane ghar me, samaroh ke aayojan ke bad, main in logon ke aayojanon ke pichhe ka sara rahasy jan gaya tha. jo ladakee jis tarah ka vyanjan banane men siddhahast hoti hai, jab doosare ke ghar, kisi samaroh ka aayojan hota hai to vah usamen, us vyanjan ko banakar le jati hai main yahi samajhata tha. lekin jab mujhe apane padosi ke ghar par bhi usi tarah, badi tadad men, tarah tarah ke svadisht aur lajij vyanjan khane ko mila to main, fir soch men pad gaya tha. isake yahan to sirf mera hi parivar aamantrit tha aur mere yahan se koee usakee madad men bhi nahin pahuncha tha, fir bhi yahan, itane verayati ke lajij vyanjan, yah kaise sanbhav huaa? khane ke bad, ghar kee malakin kee tarif karate samay, mere man men aaya tha ki usase poochhoon, ki tumhare akele se, itane sare svadisht aur lajij vyanjan taiyar karana sanbhav kaise huaa? lekin mainne usase poochha nahin tha. ghar aakar, bahoo se yah bat poochha, to usane bataya tha ki, panch sat din pahale se hi log ise banane men jut jati hai aur bana banakar frij men rakhati jati hain isalie aisa sanbhav huaa.

ghar kee hi lain ke aakhir ke ghar men, ek malayali parivar rahata tha. un logon ne apane yahan ek din, saty narayan vratakatha ka aayojan kiya huaa tha. jo purohit katha sampann karavane ke lie vahan aae hue the ve dhoti kurta men the aur apani kar se aae the. ghar ka malik, kurta aur pili dhoti pahane tha aur malakin khoobasoorat banarasi sadi men, kisi dulhan kee tarah saji huee thi. pooja ka ghar unhonne kisi mandap kee tarah sajaya huaa tha. pandit ji jab pooja karavane baithe to us bade kamare men sabhi bachche tatha vahan jute aurat mard bhi aakar baith gae the. pooja ke pahale, sanskrit men mantr bolakar kul devata, gram devata se lekar tamam devi devataon aur digapalon tatha navagrah ke devataon ka aavahan karake unako aasan dekar, naivedy samarpit karane ke bad unaka dhoop dip se poojan kiya jata hai, isake bad satyanarayan katha ke panchon adhyay kahe jate hain aur ant men havan aur aarati hoti hai. pandit ji, devataon ke aavahan ke lie sanskrit ke jo bhi shlok bolate the ve, itane spasht aur shuddh hote the, sath hi unakee aavaj aur deh kee bhangima aisi hoti thi jaise sachamuch ke sare devata, aakash men baithe hue ho, aur pandit ji apane mantrochchar se unhen aakash se utarakar, vedi par aa birajane ka nivedan kar rahe ho. unake nivedan par, jab devata vahan aa utarate the to bade aadar ke sath ve unhen, unaka aasan dekar, unake sthan par baitha dete the. iha tishth? saty narayan katha ka panchon adhyay unhonne khud se nahin kaha tha. use kahane ke lie, vahan aae, jitane bhi bachche the, sabako unhonne panch grupon men bant diya tha. isake bad, unhonne, apane baig se, pahale se taiyar rakhi, char panch panno kee natthi kee huee, kaee parchiyan nikala tha aur ek ek adhyay kee parchiyan pancho grup men bant diya tha. un parchiyon men panchon adhyay ke sanskrit ke shlok, roman lipi men likhe hue the. shlok ke bad, unaka arth aur bhav unhonne angreji men anuvad kiya huaa tha. jis grup ke bachchon ko, katha ka jo adhyay kahane ko mila tha ve pahale sanskrit ka shlok poora padhate isake bad usaka angreji men arth kahate. jahan kahin bachche, sanskrit ke shlokon ke uchcharan men galati kar dete pandit ji bade pyar se, use tonk kar, usaka sahi uchcharann, sunakar usase fir se vah shlok bolavate. vahan jitane bachche grupon men baithe hue the unake sanskrit ke shlokon ka gayan sunakar lagata tha ki sabhi shlok pahale se hi, unhen yad hai aur un shlokon ke bhav aur arth ka bhi unhen achchha gyan hai. jitani der tak pooja hoti rahi, sabake sab bade bhaktibhav se vahan baithe usamen shamil rahe the. vahan par bachchon se lekar bado tak men jaisi tanmayata aur shraddha mainne poori pooja ke dauran dekha, vaisa bhav, bharat men mujhe n hi yahan ke purohiton men dekhane ko milata hai aur n hi, katha men pahunche logon men hi.

jab main pati patni, vahan se chalane ko hue, to main ghar ke malik malakin ko talashane lag gaya tha. malakin auraton ke bich ghoom ghoomakar unhen khilane men juti huee thi aur malik khane se nivritt ho chuke apane mitron ke bich baitha, gappen mar raha tha. mainne use bulakar, usase chalane kee ijajat liya tha to usane, mera nihora karate hue mujhase nivedan kiya tha bas ek minat apana samay hamen aur dijie ankal ji, bas ek minat, mujhase itana nivedan karane ke bad, vah bhagata huaa auraton ke bich vyast, apani patni kee banh pakadakar use khinchate ghasitate hamare samane le aakar khadi kar diya tha. main aur patni, agal bagal hi khade the. donon hamare, samane khada hokar apane donon hath apane sine par jod, aankhe band kar, hamari prarthana men kuchh budabudae the isake bad donon hath jode jode hi apane ghutanon par baith gae the aur usi tarah vahan bhi prarthana kie the isake bad donon jamin par dandavat lot gae the aur apane donon hath hamare panvon kee taraf badha kar jamin par kafi der tak usi roop men dandavat pade rahe the.

pranam karane kee bat main kisse kahaniyon men bahut suna tha. chhath jaise parv ke mauke par, kaee aurat mardon ko, jamin par lot lot kar ghat kee taraf jate bhi dekha tha. dev sthanon ko jate raston par bhi dandiroop men, apane isht ke darabar men hajiri lagane jate logon ko bhi mainne dekha tha lekin vah sab, mahaj mere dekhane aur sunane tak hi simit tha. unhen dekhakar agar kabhi kuchh mere dhyan men aaya tha to bas itana hi ki ve, log, kisi uddeshy ke lie mannaten mane rahe honge aur unakee vah mannat poori ho gaee hogi isalie ve is tarah lot lot kar apane aaradhy ke pas ja rahe hai. isake siva, dandavat padakar pranam karane ke pichhe ka asal kya hai isake bare men kabhi mera dhyan hi nahin gaya tha. lekin jab us ghar men, pati patni donon dandavat hokar, apane hath hamare panvon kee taraf badhakar jamin par pad gae the to mera samoocha sharir ganagana utha tha aur mujhe laga tha mere bhitar ka chaitany, un donon kee taraf undelata chala ja raha hai. mere lie, yah bade ajib tarah ka aur alaukik anubhav tha. vahin par, apani sanskriti men, shreshthon aur mahatmaon ke panv chhookar tatha dandavat padakar pranam karake, unaka aashirvad lene ke pichhe ka asal matalab meri samajh men pahali dafa aaya tha. panv chhookar ya dandavat padakar pranam karane ka matalab, hain apane sampoorn ka samarpann, aisa samarpan jisamen do aatmaon ke bich chaitany ke pravah ke marg men, ahankar, jo ek badi divar banakar aa khada hota hai, usake visarjan ka ek bada saral aur karagar nuskha. ahankar ka visarjan hote hi jis tarah pani kee dhar dhalava kee taraf bahane lagati hai thik usi tarah chaitany, pranam karane vale kee taraf pravahit hona shuroo ho jata hai. chaitany ka pravah, ek alaukik ghatana hai, yah yachak aur data ke bich kuchh mangane ya dene ya len den jaisi duniyavi kriya nahin hai. balki donon ka, donon ko, apana sampoorn nyochhavar kar dene jaisa hai. duniya ke sabhi granthon men aur santon aur mahatmaon ne, eeshvar prapti ke lie jis samarpan kee bat kaha hai vah yahi samarpan hai. aisa hi samarpann, do logon ke bich, jab prem hota hai tab bhi dekhane ko milata hai. prem ke hone par, donon men se koee, kisi se n to kuchh mangata hai n hi kisi ko kuchh deta hai, balki donon hi donon par nyochhavar hue rahate hain, vahan donon men lootane aur lutane jaisi koee duniyavi kriya nahin hoti balki donon hi apana sanpoorn doosare par luta dene ko utavale hue rahate hain.

subah, abhi ham log soe hi hue the ki bete ne hamen aakar bataya tha ki mehaman ne apane aane kee soochana kee ghanti baja diya hai. usake aane kee soochana se vah, buri tarah uttejit tha. isake pahale, tisari pidhi ke prasad se dada dadiyon, nana naniyo kee pulak aur unaka kilakana, kudakana main dekh chuka tha lekin isaka anubhav, kitana alaukik aur romanchakari hota hai, vah apane ke aane par hi samajh paya tha. beta, hamen hadabadaya dekh, hamase kaha tha, aap log aaram se taiyar hoie, main patni ko lekar aspatal ja raha hoon aur vah use lekar aspatal chala gaya tha. usake jane ke bad, mainne dekha tha ki aspatal valon ne dilivari ke bad, jachcha aur bachcha donon kee jaroorat kee ek kit, tatha doosare kaee samanon kee list, bete ko, is hidayat ke sath pakadaya huaa tha ki vah unhen, aspatal aate samay, apane sath jaroor lekar aave. lekin beta, hadabadi men, sara saman, ghar par hi chhodakar, aspatal bhag liya tha. usake jane ke bad, patni ne mujhe bataya tha ki, bete ko jo saman lekar aspatal jana tha vah to yahi rah gaya hai. he bhagavan, ab main kya karoon? ek to mere lie yah ekadam anajani jagah, doosare bina kar ke yahan, ek kadam bhi ja sakana namumakin hota hai. ham log kar bhi chalana nahin janate aur agar chalana bhi janate hote to bhi, ham intaraneshanal draiving laisens, kahan se late. khuda n khasta hamare pas vaisa draiving laisens bhi hota to bhi yahan ke yatayat ka jaisa sakht kanoon hai sadakon par sab kuchh jitana svachalit aur haeetek hai, ek sau tis chalis kilomitar se kam kee raftar par sadakon par karen chalaee hi nahin ja sakati aur is sabase oopar, bharat men rod par baen chalane ka niyam hai jabaki yahan sab kuchh dahine chalata hai vaise men bharat ke mahir se mahir draivar tak, yahan kee sadakon par karen chalane kee himmat n kare, to ham jaise kamajoron kee kya majal jo yahan kar chalane kee bat soch bhi len. ham donon ke bich, saman ko lekar, abhi charcha chal hi rahi thi ki isi bich, hamare ghar kee ghanti ghanaghana uthi thi. lo aadhe raste se hi lautana pada n use? beta hadabadi men jo badi chook kar diya tha is par khijh men badabadata main, jakar daravaja khola tha to, mere ghar kee lain kee do ladakiyan mujhe namaste karake, bhadabhadati sidha bahoo ke bedaroom men ghusakar aspatal le jane vale samanon se bhari ataichi uthakar, bahar hal men nikal laee thin aur use kholakar usamen rakhe samanon ka, list se milan karane lag gaee thi. ataichi men, list ke mutabik do tin saman nahin the. itani subah, is samay kahan kahan ke stor khule honge, aur kis stor men, ve saman unhen milenge is par donon ne charcha kiya tha. isake bad ek ladakee, bina mujhase kuchh poochhe ya batae ya paise kee jikr ke, apani kar lekar, use lane ke lie daud padi thi aur doosari ladakee, sara saman ataichi men sahej kar apani kar kee pichhali sit par dala tha aur use lekar aspatal daud gaee thi. isake bad jo mere ghar kee tatha fon kee ghanti ghanaghanana shuroo huee thi aur logon ka, apane gharon se mere ghar aur vahan se fir aspatal ke bich, daudari shuroo huee thi to, jab tak jachcha, bachcha vapas ghar nahin aa gae the tab tak unakee daud chalati hi rahi thi. koee apane ghar se ham donon ke lie khana banakar pahuncha rahi hai to koee nashta koee tharmas bharabharakar chay la rahi hain, to koee bete bahoo ke lie, tifin men bharakar khana aur nashta aspatal pahuncha rahi hai. un logon ne, us samay apana ghar sanbhalane ke sath sath aspatal se lekar, ham donon tak ko jitani kushalata se sanbhalakar hamen nishchit kar diya tha aur is bat ka hamen jara sa kahi, aabhas tak nahin hone diya tha ki ve apane nahin hai use dekhakar main n sirf gahare tak abhibhoot tha balki buri tarah chakit bhi tha. bharatiy samaj men, is tarah ka bahanapa bhaeechara aur parivarikata, aaj kahan kahin dekhane ko milati hai?

ek din, dopahar ke samay main, apane ghar ke makanon kee katar ke charon taraf bane raste par tahal raha tha to, do agal bagal ke gharon kee malakinen, donon bharatiy, apane apane ghar se bahar nikal kar, dhoop senkati huee aapas men gapiya rahi thin. mujhe dekhakar donon apane hath jodakar mujhe pranam kee thi to main, unake karib jakar khada ho gaya tha. daraasal, yahan aakar, jo bharat main, apani aankhon ke samane gujarate dekh raha tha vah mere lie tha to purana hi, lekin usaka roop, arth aur mayane, ekadam naya aur anootha tha. vah isalie ki jo ladakiyan, bharat ke ladakon ke sath byahakar, yahan unakee bahuen banakar aaee hain, ve sabakee sab yunivarsitiyon, teknikal instityooton tatha prabandhan sansthanon se achchhi digriyan lekar nikali ladakiyan hai aur jin gharon se ve aaee hai unake man bap bhi achchhi hi haisiyat rakhate honge. bharat kee is star aur haisiyat vale gharon kee betiyon aur bahuon ko, main kafi karib se dekha tha. kaee men jis tarah ke thasake mainne dekhe, ise dekhakar mujhe laga ki jaise unhen koee surkhab ke par lage hue hon aur prithvi kee duniyadari se unaka koee matalab hi n ho. madarn aur apadet dikhane aur dikhane, ke nashe men koee koee itana choor huee rahati hai aur doosaron ke samane aisi shekhi bagharati hai jaise samoochi duniya unakee jootiyon tale ho. chay banana? na baba na, yah apane bas kee bat hi nahin hai, mujhe to yah tak pata nahin hai ki chay men chini dali jati hai ki namak. o gad. tum rotiyan senkati ho? senkogi hi, kyon ki tum bahin ji jo thahari, mere ghar ke mali, vo, vo, ghasite jaisa koee nam hai n tere bap ka aur teri man ka nam, meri naukarani ramapiyariya jaisa kuchh hai n? kisi ne agar unake samane, choolhe chauke ya duniyadari nibhane kee bat kar diya to us samay, unaka bigada munh dekhane layak hota hai. lekin yahan, jitanon ko mainne dekha sab, kee sab, ko aala darje kee man, patni aur kushal grihasthin dekha. aakhir e ladakiyan bhi to unhin ke bich se aaee huee hai aur yahan aane ke pahale aisa bhi nahin hai ki unake man bapon ne, unhen, kisi achchhe skool men, duniyadari kee, alag se talim dekar bheja ho. fir donon men itana bada antar kaise hai? yah saval mujhe bhitar hi bhitar pareshan kie hue tha. hamare ghar ke bagal kee donon padosinon ne, jab mujhe dekhakar, apane hath jod, mujhe pranam kiya tha to yah sochakar ki, apane prashn ka uttar janane ka mere lie yah ek achchha mauka hai kyon n main in donon se hi jo poochhapachhor karana hai, use karake, apane bhitar kee akulahat shant kar loon. isalie main unake thoda aur karib jakar rook gaya tha. aisa hai bete ki mere bhitar ka ek prashn, mujhe kafi dinon se pareshan kar rakha hai, use main tum donon se poochhana chahata hoon yadi tumhari ijajat ho to.

tum log, jo bharat se yahan byah kar aaee ho sabakee, sab achchhi padhi likhi aur achchhe gharon se bhi ho. tum logon kee jab shadiyan huee hogi to tumamen se koee abhi padh hi rahi hogi aur koee, apani padhaee khatm kee hogi. doosari tamam ladakiyon kee tarah, tum bhi duniyadari ke mamale men ekadam kachchi, anagadh aur anadi hi rahi hogi bavajood isake tum log, sabakee sab, itani achchhi man, patni aur kushal grihasthin hone ke sath sath, tarah tarah ke pakavan tatha vyanjan banane men itani siddhahast aur mahir kaise ho?
bade jor se thaththakar hansi thi aur thoda sochane ke bad, usane mujhe jo javab diya tha use sunakar mera man gadagad ho utha tha.

patni aur kushal grihasthin hona to ham ladakiyon kee sahajavritti hai. alave isake, hamari mane aur ghar parivar, hamare paida lene ke sath hi, sugadh grihini ke sare gunn, hamen hamari ghutti men pilana shuroo kar deti hai aise men, ham duniyadari ke mamale men anagadh aur anadi kaise rah sakate hain? rahi hamari pak kala men siddhahast aur mahir hone kee bat to use ham karate karate sikh jate hain aur jo hamen nahin aata use ham doosaron se pachhakar sikh liya karati hai.

kafi lanbi chaudi jagah men ek bada vishal aur bhavy mandir bana huaa hai. vah mandir yahan ke logon ne apanon ke bich, chande ikattha karake banavaya hai. us mandir ka nirmann, dakshin bharat ke mandiron kee tarj par kiya gaya hai. kahate hain ki is mandir ko banane ke lie, dakshin bharat ke shilpi aur karigar, yahan aae hue the. mukhy mandir ke bhitar, balaji se lekar, bramha, mahesh, durga, kali, hanuman tatha doosare tamam devi devataon kee moortiyan sthapit kee huee hai. mandir se thoda hatakar, ek bada kanfrens hal bana huaa hai. samay samay par bharat se bade bade sant aur mahatma yahan padharate rahate hain aur jab ve padharate hain to isi mandir ke prangan men bane aavason men unhen thaharaya jata hai aur yahan ke bade kanfrens hal men unaka satsang aur pravachan hota hai. bharat ke sabhi pramukh tyoharon ka bhi yahan aayojan kiya jata hai, jisamen yahan ka bharatiy samuday badi, tadad men ikattha hota hai aur sab milakar use vidhivat manate hain.

logon kee ya jiv jagat, kee sabaka sanchalan aur niyantran prakriti karati hai. usi kee yah satta hai aur vahi isaka badashah hai. apani samoochi satta ke kushal sanchalan aur us par majaboot niyantran ke lie, bhay ko usane, vajradand kee tarah apanaya huaa hai. ek ko, doosare ka bhojan banakar, har kisi ke pichhe, usake khane vale ko dauda rakha hai jhapatta maro, nahin mar sakate ho, to fareb karake khao anyatha bhookh tumhen kha jaegi. bhago, nahin bhag sakate ho to chhal, kapat aur pakhand karake, apani jan bacha lo, nahin to tumhare pichhe pada tumhara kal, tumhen kha jaega. yah kha lie jane kee dar, jis tarah sabake pichhe padakar, sabako bhishan roop se aatankit aur asurakshit karake rakhata hai yahi prakriti ka, apane samrajy ko sanchalit aur niyantrit rakhane ka, karagar hathiyar hai. choonki aadami bhi, prakriti ke samrajy ka hi ek jiv hai isalie doosaron dvara kha lie jane ka bhay aur apane jinda rahane ke lie doosaron ko kha lene kee bhookh, usamen bhi vaisi hi hai jaisa ki prakriti ke jiv jagat ke doosare sabhi jivon men hai. lekin aadami aur doosare jivon men ek bada fark hai aur vah fark yah hai ki, aadami doosaron se jyada chatur aur samajhadar hai. sath hi usamen, apani chaturaee aur samajhadari ke behatar istemal ka hunar bhi hai. apane isi hunar ke chalate, aaj vah n sirf, aadami bana huaa hai, balki prakriti ke bad, prithvi ka doosara sabase bada khiladi bhi ban baitha hai, aur usi kee tarah sabal, saksham aur samarth bhi. samajhadari kee apani isi khasiyat ke chalate, usane bhookh ko, usakee samagrata men samajha hai aur apani chaturaee se vah use, palakar apana tahaluaa bana liya hai. usane samajha hai ki bhookh, jo sabhi, utpaton aur upadravon kee jad hai vah usake pet se shuroo hokar dimag aur dil se bhi gahare usake, jivan ke mool tak apane panv pasare baithi huee hai aur use kha jane ke lie kisi bhoodharakar kar rakshas kee tarah, dahadati chinghadati usake pichhe lagi rahati hai, sath hi usane yah bat bhi achchhi tarah samajh liya ki bhookh itani prachand aur shaktishali hai ki usase ladakar ise parast nahin kiya ja sakata. isalie usane use, palatoo banana shuroo kar diya. sabase pahale usane tan aur pet kee bhookh ko, palatoo banane ka vigyan vikasit kiya aur use apane kaboo men karake ek bada aur shaktishali morcha fatah kar liya. fir man kee bhookh aur vahan se chalakar jivan ke mool par kundali marakar baithi bhookh tak ko samajhakar, use bhi palatoo banane ka vigyan vikasit kiya. lekin usane apani samajhadari se deh, man aur jivan ke mool men ladi baithi bhookh ko samajhakar, apani chaturaee ke bal par, us par kaboo rakhane ke vigyan ke vikas se, apane manushy hone ke jis bhi mukam par pahunch liya ho, lekin apane bhitar ke janavar ke, hinsa tatha jhooth fareb ka jal rachakar, apane shikar ko patakhani dekar ya fosakar use marakar kha jane kee apani vritti par kaboo nahin kar saka. isalie, aaj bhi bhitar se, vah janavar ka janavar hi hai, thik usi kee tarah histra, kunabaparast, kabaili tatha vaisa hi, aatankit tatha asuraksha se grast. aisa nahin hai ki vah apane bhitar kee is bhookh ko samajha hi nahin, samajha usane aur achchhi tarah se samajha aur ise samajhane ke bad, ise bhi palatoo banane ke lie usane, doosaron ke dvara khud ko kha lie jane ke dar aur aatank se mukti ke lie, usane, apane ko doosaron ka tatha doosaron ko apana poshak banane ke lie paraspar ke sahayog aur bhaee, chare, ke madhyam se sabako bhay aur aatank se mukt karane ka bada karagar, hathiyar, vikasit kar liya. lekin choonki yah hathiyar usaka khud ka nirmit tha isalie vah, poori tarah khalis aur shuddh hone kee bajae, bhitar se lekar bahar tak, isake reshe reshe men, banatoopana aur dogalapan samaya huaa tha, jisake chalate, usaka yah nirman poori tarah banavati aur dhokhe kee tatti banakar rah gaya. parinam isaka yah huaa, ki isase logon men paraspar vishvas badhane kee bajae, unhen, ek doosare ke prati jyada shankalu aur chaukanna rahane par majaboor kar diya. isilie aaj jindagiyan, chahe aadami kee ho ya deshon kee, prithvi ke doosare jiv jagat kee tarah hi, sab ek doosare se dare sahame rahate hain aur apane bhitar ke isi dar aur aatank ke chalate, ek doosare ko patak pachhadakar parast kar dene ke kam men jute rahate hain. aur is tarah samoochi prithvi par, har samay, ghoshit aur aghoshit yuddh chhida rahata hai. aisa yuddh, jisake lade jane ka n to koee nishchit maidan tay hota hai aur n hi usake lie pahale se nirdharit, koee kayada kanoon hi bana hai. choonki yuddh jitana hi sabaka uddeshy hota hai isalie apane pratidvandi ko gherakar, apane shikanje men le lene ke lie, sab apani apani bisaten bichha kar apani apani goten aur chalen chalate rahate hain, aur kisi ke thoda sa kamajor ya gafil padate hi, us par toot padate hain. jahan tak is sangram men jit ka saval hai to isake lie jaroori nahin hai ki pratidvandviyon men, apane deh se jo sabase jyada majaboot hoga vahi jitega. yahan jit usakee hoti hai jo apani sharir se chattani hone ke sath sath, apane dil aur dimag se bhi jivat vala hota hai jo apane pratidvandi kee kamajor nason ko achchhi tarah pahachanata hai aur use dabakar usase chhadi bulava leta hai. chakama dekar, use hakka bakka kar dene kee kala men mahir hota hai aur usakee majabootiyon ko bhedakar use ghutane tekava dene men saksham hota hai, vahi is yuddh men vijayi hota hai aur is sab men pravin aur samarth vahi ho sakata hai jo dhanabal janabal aur shastrabal ke sath gyan aur vigyan men prabal roop se sanpann hota hai.

ati sampann desh hai ki usake pas tarah tarah ke nayab aur marak hathiyar hai tatha apane gyan aur vigyan se vah antariksh se lekar samudr kee gaharaeeyan tak nap lene men samarth hai. ki usamen itani jivatata hai ki durdant aur durgam tak pahunch lene tatha alanghy ko langh lene ka usamen adamy sahas hai, ki pravah ko manachahe dhang se modakar apani ichchhanukool pravahit kar lene kee usamen prabal kshamata hai. in tamam kshamataon aur dhanasanpada se sampann vah aaj prithvi ka akela desh nahin hai balki us jaisi sampannata aur kshamata ke aur bhi kaee desh isi prithvi par maujood hai. fir aisa khas kya hai, amarika men jisake chalate vah aaj duniya ka ativishisht aur advitiy ka darja prapt desh hai? is prashn par barikee se gaur karane par jo bat meri samajh men aaee vah yah in tamam visheshataon aur kshamataon ke sath sath amarika men mujhe jo sabase alag aur khas dekhane ko mila tha, vah tha prakriti ka apane samrajy ke sanchalan aur niyantran ke lie, maryaditon ke prati vinamrata tatha sahayog tatha amaryaditon ke prati poori tarah kroor aur nishthur ho uthane ka usaka jo vidhan hai thik usi se mel khata unaka samoocha sistam aur vidhan. aisa sistam, jisamen n to kisi laffaj aur khurapanchi ko laffaji aur khurapanch karane kee jara si bhi chhoot hai n hi kisi farebi ko fareb karane kee thodi si bhi jagah di huee hai. kunaba paraston aur kabailiyon ke lie jisamen sans tak lene tak kee gunjaish nahin hai tatha logon kee kamajoriyan aur nakaratmakataon ko bhunakar, apana ulloo sidha karane men mahir logon ko jahan thodi si bhi mohalat n ho, itana nishpaksh aur nishthur sistam ki yadi amarika ka rashtrapati bhi katar men khada ho, to use bhi apana nanbar apane par hi aur vah bhi joote utarane ke bad hi, aage kadam badhane kee ijajat di jati hon aur yadi usane bhi kisi sistam ke ullanghan kee gustakhi kar diya aur vahan tainat adana sa karmi, usakee banh pakad liya to, doosaron kee tarah hi use bhi, usake samane natamastak ho jana hai aur vah sab bhogane ke bad hi usakee mukti hai jo vahan ke vidhan men likha huaa hai. doosari badi khasiyat jo mujhe is mahan desh men dekhane ko mili thi vah tha yahan ke logon ka aatmavishvas! itana prachand aatmavishvas ki dushman se dushman desh ka hi koee kyon n ho, amarika kee dharati par panv rakh diya to vah apana hai. fir n to vah yahoodi hai aur n hi eesaee, ya hindoo ya muslim. n vah roosi hai aur n hi chini vah hai to sirf aur sirf amarikee. aur jis desh ke logon ke bhitar itana aatmavishvas bhara ho ki unhen har chehara, jis bhi roop ya rang ka ho, sabake sab apane aatmiy ke chehare sarikhe dikhen, to vah mahan dharati aur us dharati ke mahan bashinde, anupam aur advitiy ke alave, doosare kuchh ho hi nahin sakate.
kh ke prati aakarshit hai, aur aap ga ke prati aakarshit hai, to ka ke paas kh ke lie behatar sambhaavanae hai jaisee ki aapakee ga ke lie honee chaahie aur akasar kh aur ga ek hee vyakti hota hai.
praaya isake ulaT bhee sahee hota hai yaanee sansaar ka sabase aakarshak purush sansaar kee sabase badasoorat stree se shaadee karata hai.

Dosto aap pendrive toh use krte hi hoge. College ke computer me, office ke computer me ya kisi friend ke computer se koi Data lene ke liye pendrive ka jyadater istemaal hota hai. Aise me kbhi kbhi aapke pendrive me shortcut wala virus aa jata hai. Jo aapke file aur folder ko shortcut bna deta hai. Aur wo file open bhi nahi hoti hai. Aur yah aisa virus hai jo Kisi normal antivirus se bhi delete nahi hota hai. Iss post me aapko btaunga ki aap apne pendrive se shortcut virus kaise remove karenge. Aap apne computer me CMD Command Prompt ke jariye shortcut virus ko remove kar skte hai hain. Iss Method se 95 chances rhte hai virus ko htane me . Step 1 Sbse phle CMD window open kar lijiye. CMD window open karne ke liye Star par click kare aur RUNme jaaye. Fir ek dialog box open hoga usme CMD type kare. Fir Enter par click kare. Step 2 Jab aapka CMD open ho jayega tb aapko C drive ka path milega. Lekin aapko apne pendrive ka shortcut remove krna hai toh aapko Pendrive ka Path dena pdega. Step 3 Pendrive ka path dene ke liye pendrive ke name kea age jo Letter hoga usko likh ke Enter kr dijiye. Jaise maan lijiye mere pendrive ka letter I hai toh maine I likh diya. Step 4 Ab aap pendrive ke path me chle jayenge. Ab aapko type krna hai attrib i. d s -h -r s. Dhyan rhe aap I ke jagah par apna pendrive letter likhe. Step 5 Attib likhne ke baad Enter kar dijiye. Aur wait kijiye jbtk cmd process kar rha hai. Iske baad aapne Pendrive se shortcut virus remove ho jayega. Agar aap kisi software ke help se iss virus ko remove krna chahte hai toh aap ek software ka use krke bhi iss shortcut virus ko remove kar skte hai. iss Software ka naam hai USBFix . Step 1 Sbse phle aap USBFix software yaha se download kar lijiye . Download Here Step 2 USBFix ko install kar lijiye fir apne system ko restart kijiye. Step 3 Fir apne Pendrive ko apne system me connect kr lijiye. Jisme shortcut virus wali file hai. Step 4 USBFix software me aapko ek Clean naam ka option milega. Uspr clik kr dijiye. Step 5 Ab aap wait kijiye jb tk USBFix software aapke shortcut virus ko remove krta hai. Iss tarah se aap apne pendrive ke shortcut virus ko easily remove kar skte hai. Yah dono method bahut hi effective method hai. Agar aapko yah post helpful lga toh kripya apne dosto ke jarur share kare. Ye bhi pade
Agar aapki WebsiteBlog hai to aapka Facebook Page bhi jarur hoga, or jo aapke visitor hai jinhe aapke page ke ware me pata hai wo aapko uspar message bhi karte hoge.

to kya aap prasann nahee honge ? avashy honge aur kyo nahee honge? aakhir, satta-shakti ka svaad jo chakhane ko milega, parantu jara Thaharie, thoDee gambheerata se vichaar keejie. ho sakata hai maamala pooree tarah se prasannata ka na ho. aie jara gambheerata se gaur faramae.

parantu mantree pad aapako aise hee nahee milane vaala. isake lie aapako chunaav laDana hoga. ab agar aapaka bhaagy vaastav me prabal hoga, to aap eemaanadaaree se chunaav jeet sakate hai. varana aaj ke maahaul me to jab tak aap beeemaanee se jaati-dharm ke gaNit nahee lagaenge, chunaav kisee soorat jeet nahee sakate. maan leejie, yah bhee ho gaya. parantu khaalee chunaav jeetane se bhee kuchh haasil nahee hone vaala. aap bane rahenge do Take ke emele aur emapee. asalee, raubadaar mantree pad paane ke lie aapako tamaam joDatoD karana hogee. goTiyaa biThaana hongee. raajayog ka yahaa kya kaam? chalie, maan leejie ki yahaa bhee bhaagy ne saath de diya, magar fir aisa ho sakata hai ki aap mahatvaheen ya bina vibhaag ke hee mantree ban jae aur log-baag aapaka majaak uDaane lage. jaahir hai, mahatvapoorN aur bhaaree bharakam bajaT vaale malaeedaar vibhaag ko paane ke lie aapako kheenchaataanee karanee hogee, laabing karanee hogee, preshar TaikTiks apanaanee hogee. muft me kuchh bhee haasil hone vaala nahee hai. isake lie alag se mehanat mashakkat karanee hogee. alag se, naayaab, kelakuleTeD paanse chalane honge.

maan liya ki aap mantree ban hee ge. dhanyavaad raajayog. parantu aapakee aage kee raah bhee koee aasaan nahee hogee. ho sakata hai ki aapaka ya apake sambandhiyo ka ateet ranga-puta ho. tab aapake virodhee ya bahut sambhav hai aapake neta-sangee-saathee jo mantree pad se maharoom hai khod-khod kar aapake ateet ko ughaaDenge aur is tarah aapake mantree pad par hamesha talavaar laTakatee rahegee. ab yah maan le ki kaanch kee tarah aapaka ateet svachchh hai aur vartamaan paaradarshee hai jo ki bhaarateey raajaneeti me - soory ke ulaTee disha me ugane ke samaan hee saty hai, to bhee bhavishy ke baare me kya kaha ja sakata hai. aapake virodhee jo maatr aapake satta me aane kee vajah se paida hue honge ya doosare satta kaamee aapako yoo hee chain se nahee rahane denge. ve aapakee har baat ko, har kaary ko desh aur janata ke viruddh batala kar aapake viruddh zooThe kaanD-kisse frem karenge aur usame aapako Taangane kee harachand koshish karenge. yah bhee ho sakata hai ki aap apane virodhiyo ko samaapt karane kee aisee hee kisee koshish me khud hee fans jae.

satta milate hee aapakee parsanal laif ka beDa gark ho jaega. aap chaaTukaaro se ghir jaenge. aapake chaaro aur suraksha ka arthaheen ghera khaDa kar diya jaega aur aapako aapake parichito se bhee milane nahee diya jaega.

yah bhee shaasvat saty hai ki jisane bhee satta ka svaad chakha, chaahe vah bhagavaan hee kyo na ho, sarvada sukhee kabhee nahee raha. vah bhee satta praapti ke lie ya satta shakti ke kaaraN ya satta par aasann khataro ke kaaraN dukho se ghira raha.

satta shakti kee yaade aapako jeene nahee dengee aur aapake virodhee aapako fir kabhee na uThane laayak banaane me aapaka pulinda baandhane me kuchh bhee kasar nahee rakhenge. tab, yah sab aur bhee asahaneey ho jaega.
ujjaval, chamakeelee sarjana jo usakee kaalpanikata kee aseemitata ko bakhoobee darshaatee hai - bas kee samay saariNee hai.

sinema aadi men vyapak roochi rahi hai shayad isi ke parinam svaroop dinakar ji ke sahayog se kalej men apavada namak ek prishthiy patrika ka padarpan huaa. bhavishy men is aasha ke sath ki apavad ek apavad nahin rahega, hamane sahity ke safar men ek angreji patrika kranis intaraneshanala ko bhi prakashit kiya. yadyapi sahity ki is anokhi aur dil lubhane vale anubhav ne is kshetr men aage badhane ke lie prerit kiya kintu parivarik jimmedariyon men ulajhakar isamen ek viram chihn lag gaya.

gayan v git rachana, vah bhi itani smaraniy, sanvedanashil v karnnapriy yah bhoopenada ka apana anokha andaj hain. logon ke dil men bhoopenada ka git dil hum hum kare bas gaya. parantu main to usi din unaka bhakt ho gaya jab inaka sangitabadgh kiya huaa git aarop film men nayanon men darapan hai, darapan men koi suna. sach men bhoopenada asam ke gaurav hain, inake vyaktitv ke kuchh anachhue pahaluon ke bare men is pustak ko prakashit karate hue main gauravanvit mahasoos kar raha hoon. bhagavan unhen svasth rakhe aur ve apani dhunon se hamen sada rijhae rakhen, isi aasha ke sath.aasha hai yah aapako pasand aaegi, kripaya apane sujhavon se hamen avagat karaen. ataH is mahan hasti bhoopenada ko mera ek bar fir salama.
aaf aashirvad, prerana, sahabhagita ki apeksha karegi taki bhavishy men bhi any sahity ke nagine aaf samaksh prastut kar saken.

sangitakar, gayak, sahityakar, patrakar, film nirdeshak, patakatha lekhak, chitrakar - aur har roop advitiy hai, anootha hai. asam ki mati ki sondhi mahak ko suron men rupantarit kar unhonne desh-videsh men asam ke sangit ko pracharit kiya hai. ve asam ki janata ki char pidhiyon ke sabase chahete gayak hain. bihoo samarohon men varsha men bhingate hue rat-rat bhar log unako gate hue dekhate-sunate hain. asam ki sanskriti, brahmaputr nadi, lok parampara, samasamayik samasya - jivan ke harek pahaloo ko unhonne giton men roopantarit kiya hai.
mujhe khushi hai ki main apane mohalle ke bihoo utsav men gane ke lie aaya hoon. choonki chandamari ilake men hi unhonne sangharshapoorn jivan ke kai sal gujare hain.
vahi khanak, vahi dil ko chhoo lene vali mithas hai, keval umr ka prabhav najar aane laga hai. pahale ve bihoo utsavon men rat-rat bhar gate rah jate the, parantu ab svasthy thik nahin rahata.

yadiu akano ne bhave . isi git ko ve bangla men bhi gate hain, asamiya men bhi gate hain, hindi men bhi gate hain. fir ve kahate hain, main ek premagit sunana chahata hoon. ve gane lagate hain - shaishavate dhemalite . git ka bhav hai - bachapan men ham sath-sath khelate the. vaishakh men brahmaputr men tairate the. tumane mujhase vada kiya tha ki sath-sath jienge. tumane kaha tha ki tumhare bina ji nahin sakoongi, jan de doongi. magar mere pas dhan nahin tha. tum apana vada bhool gayi aur ek dhanavan ke sath byah kar chali gayin. ek din mainne tumhen mahangi poshakon men dekha. kya tum soch rahi thi ki tumhare bina main apani jan de doonga ? main jan nahin doonga, balki jita rahoonga, taki ek naye samaj ka nirman kar sakoon. yuvavastha men unhonne yah git likha tha, jo aaj bhi sunane valon ke hriday ko sparsh karata hai.

ghar ki ladaki hai. do gane sunaegi. fir main gaunga. damana film ka ek gana bhi sunaegi. damana men bhoopen hajarika ne apane purane lokapriy giton ko naye andaj men pesh kiya hai. gayika ne gana shuri kiya bijulir pohar mot nai, fir gaya - o ram-ram aalata lagaungi . bhoopen hajarika ne tali bajakar gayika ki prashansa ki. ab unhonne fir gana shuroo kiya - sagar sang mat katana satoorilo, tathapito huaa nai klant . yah git unhen bahut pasand hai. is git men unaka jivan darshan chhipa huaa hai - sagar sangam men kitana taira main, fir bhi main thaka nahin. nirantar joojhate rahane ka jivan darshan.

ghan gham-gham kare o aai . gulajar ne film roodali ke lie isaka anuvad kiya hai. hindi men bhi unhonne gaya - dil hoom-hoom kare .. yah git jab khatm huaa to unhonne kaha - ebsatrekt pentings ho sakati hai, ebsatrekt film ho sakati hai to ebsatrekt git kyon nahin ho sakata .. isake sath hi apana mashahoor git gane lage - vimoort mor nishati jen maunatar sootare bovapa ekhani nila chadar . meri vimoort rat mano maun ke dhage se buni hui ek nili chadar hai .

bharatavasiyon ke lie, vishvavasiyon ke lie gana chahata hoon - ve gane lage - vi aar in d sem bot bradar, vi aar in d sem bot bradar . fir isi git ko asamiya men aur bangla men bhi gakar sunaya - aami ekhanare navare yatree, aami yatree ekhanare navare ..

ek praudh mahila ho chuki thi. par jise ham ladaki ke rup men dekh chuke hote hain vah ta-umr ladaki hi najar aati hai. chahe usaki shashthapoorti kyon n ho jae. apani hamaumr striyon se milane par ham pate hain unaki bhav bhangimaen sada vaisi hi lagati hain kisi ladaki ki tarah.

kad, bhare jism v chehare, uthi hui nak aur joode men vah koriyan nasl ki kisi stree ki tarah lagi thi. us par usake hath ki chhatari ne usake vyaktitv men char chand laga die the. yah bat use shayad maloom thi isalie chhaya mil jane ke bad bhi usane chhatari band nahin ki thi. un striyon ki tarah jo haradam apane hath men kuchh n kuchh rakhe rahana chahati hain - chahe pars ya baig, hath ki ungali men koi bachcha ya fir chhatari.

door kee baat hai. parantu jab suna ki miyaa musharraf krikeT dekhane bhaarat aa rahe hai to laga ki krikeT me kuchh to hoga ki log deevaane bane firate hai. to is baar dekha. suna tha ki krikeT ij e fanee gem. yep, iT ij, jenTalamen. sachamuch doosare kisee bhee khel me maje ka ansh utana nahee rahata jitana krikeT me hota hai. hokee, fuTabaal se lekar jimnaasTik, ethaleTiks kisee bhee khel ko leejie, usame khel ka maja hota hai. parantu krikeT me to maja hee maja hota hai. maje ka khel hota hai.

kaafee kuchh dekha, suna aur bahase kee. raashTreey, antarraashTreey, sthaaneey krikeT patr-patrikao tatha krikeT visheshaanko ka adhyayan kiya, inTaraneT kee krikeT se sambandhit tamaam saiTo kee khaak chhaan Daalee, Teevee par laiv maiches dekhe, aur saath hee saath reDiyo par aankho dekha haal bhee suna. yahee nahee, mainne apane muhalle me galee krikeT bhee khelee. pratyek maich ke praarambh hone se pahale, maich ke dauraan aur maich ke baad maich ke baare me visheshajnyo dvaara kie ge vishleshaNo ka gahan chintan-manan aur vishleshaN kiya. krikeT maich kee tarah ye bhee khaase majedaar rahe. is prakaar mere paas krikeT ke baare me Dher saaree, achchhee khaasee jaanakaaree ekatr ho gee jiname mere apane krikeT ke anubhav bhee shaamil hai.

jo kisee jamaane me bahut pahale sirf maidaano me khela jaata tha. ab galee mohallo bheeD bharee saDako se lekar reDiyo, Teevee-prasaaraNo, patr-patrikao ke stambho-visheshaanko, raajaneeti aur saTTe yaanee yatr-tatr-sarvatr khela jaane laga hai. ab to krikeT - khel se bhee aage jaakar krikeT Diplomesee tak pahunch gaya hai, jahaa ek desh ke sambandh krikeT ke kaaraN ek doosare se banate bigaDate rahate hai. parantu krikeT ko lekar ye baate vishv ke kuchh darjan-bhar raashTro me hee laagoo hai, jiname bhaarat-paakistaan pramukh hai.

khel nahee. agar kisee desh kee Teem haar jaatee hai to us Teem ke virooddh unake desh me dharana pradarshan to hote hee hai, gaahe bagaahe dhokhebaajee, bhrashTaachaar aur maich fiksing ke aarop bhee lagae jaate hai. jaanch kee maang kee jaatee hai. Teem ka jo sadasy haar ka jimmedaar maana jaata hai, usaka ghar se nikalana doobhar ho jaata hai, log usake ghar me pattharo kee bauchhaare tak karane lagate hai. maidaano me to pattharabaajee aam baat hai hee. agar Teem jeet jaatee hai to use inaamo se laad diya jaata hai, prashansa ke pul baandh die jaate hai. parantu har doosare maich me haar-jeet kee yah sthiti Togal hotee rahatee hai. yah ekamaatr aisa khel hai, jisake khelane vaalo kee sankhya saikaDo me hai, laakho ise dekhate hai aur isake visheshajny karoDo me yaanee, lagabhag har koee hai. koee bhee apanee visheshajnyta poorN raay de sakata hai ki Tos ka faisala ya pahale khelane ka faisala kuchh doosara liya gaya hota to maich ka pariNaam kuchh doosara hota. yaanee khilaaDee kee kaipebiliTee, Teem kee kaipebiliTee jyaada maayane nahee rakhatee. krikeT me maayane rakhata hai Tos, ampaayar, vikeT, mausam aur saTTa.

tab bhee kayaas lagae jaate hai, poorvaanumaan lagae jaate hai aur vishleshaN kiya jaata hai ki agar paanee gir gaya ya andhera ho gaya to maich rook jaega aur yah Teem ran ausat ke aadhaar par jeet sakatee hai. yoo Teem me pratyek paksh me gyaarah khilaaDee hote hai, parantu kabhee kabhee ampaayar aur refaree bhee kisee Teem kee taraf se khelane lag ge prateet hote hai. krikeT me kaha jaata hai ki jis Teem ne Tos jeet liya, samazo aadha maich jeet liya. par amoonan vah baakee ka aadha maich haar hee jaata hai.
us par vichaar, usake vishleshaNo aur aankaDo par anavarat bahaso me aata hai ki kaun see Teem kaisa khelee, kis khilaaDee ne kitane-kaise chavve maare, kisane kitane kaich Tapakae ityaadi ityaadi.
ye tha mera samathing. aapake paas bhee to krikeT kee jamaapoonjee hogee is baare me. to fir sheeghr bataie taaki unhe bhee evareething ofishiyal abauT krikeT me shaamil kiya ja sake.

ve abhiyaan jaroor safal ho jaate hai. baat bilakul saaf hai kaary ho ya na ho - abhiyaan ke roop me hone vaalee gatividhiyaa jyaada, pooree tarah safal hotee hai. kya aapako nahee lagata ki safaee abhiyaan se lekar satta praapti ke abhiyaan tak me is abhiyaan shabd ke mahatv ko ab kisee soorat nakaara nahee ja sakata.

vidyut maNDal, doorabhaash jaise vibhaago me saal me ek baar graahak seva saptaah ka abhiyaan chalata hai. yaanee saal me sirf ek baar, saptaah bhar abhiyaan ke tahat ve graahako kee seva karate hai. baakee samay kaun graahak aur kaisee seva? sarakaaree upakram hai, kaam karo na karo apanee naukaree pakkee, maheene ke aakheer me apana vetan pakka. usee tarah rel, nagar nigam ityaadi me saal me ek baar, ek saptaah ke lie svachchhata abhiyaan chalaaya jaata hai. baakee samay saDate raho gandagee-badaboo me.

posTaro eva bainaro ke dvaara bataaya jaata hai ki saDak par surakshit chalana chaahie, niyamo ka paalan karana chaahie. keval saptaah bhar yah abhiyaan chalata hai. fir baat vahee kee vahee. saDako me gaDDho kee tarah. abhiyaan khatm to baat khatm. goya saal me bas ek saptaah hee suraksha se, niyamo ka paalan karate chalo, baakee saal bhar aany-baany, asurakshit chalane kee chhooT sabako hai.

vikaraal svaroop me to aa hee jaate hai, ne atikramaN bhee roop le lete hai. isase logo ko atikramaN ke baare me adhik jaanakaaree to ho hee jaatee hai, agale atikramaN virodhee abhiyaan kee pukhta neenv paD jaatee hai.

khaDe-khaDe ya kabhee relo kee chhato par ghanaghor asurakshit hote hue bhee apanee jarooree yaatra pooree kar leta hai. kyonki bheetar jagah nahee aur doosara koee vikalp bhee nahee. vah baink, vidyut vibhaag me apane kaam ke khaatir ghanTo lain me lagakar is aasha me prasann hota hai ki ab usaka kaam ho jaega. fir abhiyaan kee jaroorat hee kya?

is desh ke netao-afasaro ko hai. in abhiyaano ke bagair unakee prasiddhi ka graaf jo oopar nahee chaDhata. ye log abhiyaan chalaane kee nee nee yojanae banaane me lage rahate hai. kahee rN baanTane ka to kahee rN mukti ka. kahee pahale se hee kangaal ho chukee sarakaaree vidyut kampanee ke upabhoktao ke bilo kee maafee ka abhiyaan. jis desh ke bahusankhy aadamee kee pahachaan langoT hai, use kampyooTar janit pahachaan patr pradaan karane ka abhiyaan chalaaya jaata hai. vah us parichay patr ko apanee langoT me baandh kar rakhega, aur koee sarakaaree afasar poochhega abe apanee pahachaan bata to vah zaT apanee langoT me se pahachaan patr nikaal kar bata dega, nahee to use bhee jel kee hava khaanee paDegee.

uchch pado ke lie aparihaary aur anivaary hotee ja rahee hai, doosaree taraf hindee bachao tamil bachao ka abhiyaan badastoor jaaree hai. jahaa desh ke honahaar, bhavishy nirmaata bachcho ke lie buniyaadee shiksha ka Dhaanchaagat akaal hai, vahee baDo-booDho ke lie saaksharata aur uttar saaksharata abhiyaan chalaaya ja raha hai. udaaharaN kam nahee hai. jahaa dekho, vahaa abhiyaan aur abhiyaan abhiyaan hee abhiyaan.
doosare, bhale vichaar me, in abhiyaano me gati laane ke lie bhee koee abhiyaan chalaaya jaana chaahie. kya khayaal hai aapaka. apan bhee shuroo kare koee abhiyaan ?

kyonki main kuchh dinon ke lie asam se bahar jaunga. jo asuvidha ho rahi thi, vah dikha diya gaya tha. jane ke raste men kuchh badhaen thin, unhen hatakar vah kshitij ki or chala gaya. vaisa roothakar mainne likha tha. asam ki mitti ne mujhe kabhi galat nahin samajha. asam ki mitti ne javab diya hai, karodon logon ne javab diya hai, svikar kiya hai, sneh diya hai. vaisa mainne yoon hi kaha tha. jis tarah man se roothakar kaha jata hai. vaisa kahane men koi ghrina ka bhav nahin tha.

shonit kunvari ke gane gavae, indr malati film men mujhe apana git vishv vijayi n jabana gavaya. mujh par prabhav pada ki apani mitti ki gandh se pyar karana chahie. jyotiprasad aagaravala evan vishnuprasad rabha ne bachapan men mujhe yah prerana di. jab main videsh gaya to vahan bhi dekha, pol rabasan jaise kalakar naye-naye prayog kar rahe hain. vahan se lautakar dola he dola aur sagar sangamata jaise giton ki mainne rachana ki. main khud hi git likhata hoon, khud hi dhun taiyar karata hoon, khud hi gata hoon, isilie apane git ki shaili ke bare men khud hi koi ray nahin de sakata. agar meri rachana men kisi ko vishesh shaili najar aati hai to shayad vishayavastu ke karan najar aati hai.

kah nahin sakata. meri aavaj janmajat den hai. sangit sikhe bina main bachapan men gane laga tha - tota ki tarah. panch sal ki umr se hi log mere git ki sarahana karate rahe hain. jab main yuvavastha men pahuncha, tab mainne mahasoos kiya ki mujhe bahut kuchh sikhana hai. aur mainne lagatar sikhane ka prayas kiya hai.

bhavuk ho jata hoon, aise logon ka kahana hai. tab main apane-aap ko bhool jata hoon. gate samay main is kadar ram jata hoon ki sab kuchh bhool jata hoon. git ke ek-ek shabd ko main anubhav karata hoon. mujhe aisa lagata hai ki agar main un shabdon ko mahasoos kar paunga to shrota bhi unako achchhi tarah mahasoos kar paenge.
yahan kyon nahin gaya ? pol rabasan ne kaha tha - git mere lie hathiyar hai. jahan jis hathiyar ki jaroorat hoti hai, usi ka istemal karata hoon.

jisamen mitti ki gandh aur aam aadami ke dil ki bat shamil ho. jin dharmik giton men bhagavan krishn ham jaise manushy ban gaye hain, vaise git mujhe pasand hain. film ke sangitakar ke roop men mera manana hai ki sangit ke jarie mujhe film ko niyantrit nahin karana hai. film ki gati ko aage badhane ke lie main sangit ka istemal karata hoon.

kafi manasik parishram karana padata hai. pratyek git ka aadi, madhy aur ant hota hai. moti ki tarah kisi git ko chamakane ke lie sochane ka vakt chahie. har tarah ka srijan prasav vedana ke saman hota hai.

bhoopen hajarika ke khilaf bhi asam ke akhabaron men kafi kuchh likha jata raha hai. kalpana lajami ke sath unake sambandh ko lekar in akhabaron ne hamesha aakramak tevar apanaya hai. san 1971 men bhoopen aatmaram ki film aaropa men sangit dene ke lie mumbai gaye the. kalpana lajami gita datt ki bahan ki beti hai. tabhi usase unaka parichay huaa tha. pahale shyam benegal ki sahayak thi. bad men bhoopen hajarika ki sthayi sachiva ban gayi. ek pala, roodali, damana jaisi filmon ka nirdeshan karane vali kalpana lajami ne sananda ko diye ek sakshatkar men kabool kiya tha ki vah bhoopen hajarika ke sath liv toogedara ke sidghant ke tahat jivan yapan kar rahi hai. asam ke kala samikshak manate hain ki kalpana lajami ne bhoopen hajarika ko asam se door karane ka prayas kiya hai aur bhoopen hajarika ka adhikadhik vyavasayik upayoga vah karati rahi hai. guvahati men ek sanvadadata sammelan men kalpana aur patrakaron ke bich jhadap bhi ho chuki hai. kalpana apane sakshatkar men kah chuki hai ki vah bhoopen hajarika ki sehat ko dhyan men rakhate hue kuchh bandishen lagati rahi hai, jise lekar asam ke log bura manate rahe hain.

ve git desh-videsh men kafi lokapriy hue hain. bhoopen ne apane purane giton ke dhunon ko kalpana ki filmon men istemal kiya hai. samikshak manate hain ki damana aur bad ke myoojik elabamon men anuvad ka star sahi nahin hai, kyonki stariy gitakaron ne unaka anuvad nahin kiya hai.
yah bat main aaj mahasoos kar raha hoon. ab sochata hoon, mere jaise vyakti ke lie sevanivritt hona jaroori nahin hai.

prasiddh, nijee aspataal me apanee seva dena chaaha. pahale hee din usakee raatrikaaleen DyooTee ke dauraan nagar ke ek pratishThit, sampann parivaar ke mukhiya ko aakasmikata me aspataal laaya gaya. mareej ko dil ka bhayankar daura paDa tha aur mareej ke aspataal pahunchane se pahale hee yamadoot apana kaam kar ge the. usane mareej kee nabj dekhee jo mahasoos nahee huee, dil kee dhaDakane sunee jo gaayab thee aur ghoshit kar diya ki mareej ko aspataal me mart avastha me laaya gaya. mareej ke sampann parivaar jano ko yah khaasa naagavaar gujara aur unhonne halla machaaya ki mareej ka ilaaj uchit prakaar nahee hua aur ek prashikshu ke haatho galat ilaaj se mareej ko bachaaya nahee ja saka.

prasiddh, nijee aspataal me apanee seva dena chaaha. pahale hee din usakee raatrikaaleen DyooTee ke dauraan nagar ke ek pratishThit, sampann parivaar ke mukhiya ko aspataal laaya gaya. mareej ko dil ka bhayankar daura paDa tha aur mareej ke aspataal pahunchane se pahale hee yamadoot apana kaam kar ge the. usane mareej kee nabj dekhee jo mahasoos nahee huee, dil kee dhaDakane sunee jo nahee thee. usaka dimaag tejee se dauDa. mareej ka parivaar shahar ka sampannatam parivaaro me se tha. usane turant imarjensee ghoshit kee, mareej ke munh me okseejan mosk lagaaya, do-chaar eksaparTs ko jagaakar bulaaya, manhage se manhage injekshan Thonke, eeseejee, eeeejee, skain karavaaya, ilekTrik shok dilavaaya aur antat baarah ghanTo ke athak parishram ke pashchaat ghoshit kar diya ki bhagavaan kee yahee marjee thee.
amareeka se aayaatit 75 hajaar rupe ka jeevan-daayinee injekshan bhee lagaaya, par kya kare bhagavaan kee yahee marjee thee.

aksharam dvara hindi bhavan dilli men aayojit, granth akadami dvara sadyaH prakashit vyangy sankalan kaun kutil khal kami ka lokarpan karate hue vyakt kie . unhonne sabase pahale lekhak ko badhai di ki vah rachana ke akal se bahar nikal aaya hai . unhonne lekhak ki is bat ki bhi prashansa ki ki usamen imanadari jinda hai aur isi imanadari ke tahat usane bhoomika men apane rachana-akal se sangharsh karane men ravindr kaliya aur gyan chaturvedi ke sahayog ko rekhankit kiya hai . prem janamejay ke vyangy apane prahar men nishthur hain par unamen manaviyata nirantar bani hui hai . nirmala jen ne prem janamejay ke lekhakiy fakkadpan ki prashansa bhi ki .

bahut sare kam chhodkar, ek hi siting men padh gaya, yah kitab ki takat ko batata hai . prem janamejay ne is kitab ke dvara nai jamin todi hai aur sahi jagah todi hai . prem ne ret men bij dalane ka kam kiya hai . unhonne apani soch ko todkar bahar aane ka prayas kiya hai . pradip pant ne prem janamejay ki muhavaredar bhasha aur vishay vaividhy ki prashansa ki . unhonne kaha ki prem janamejay un gine chune vyangy lekhakon men hain jo tatkalik ghatanaon par matr vyangyatmak tippaniyan nahin karate hain apitu door tak mar karane vali rachana ka srijan karate hain . aur yahi karan hai unaki rachanaon men netaon par vyangy kam hain . harish naval ne kaha ki prem ka vyangy prayojaniy vyangy hai . prem ne bhoomika men apane jis akal ki charcha ki hai, vo akal nahin hai bahut dinon se jis jamin par koi fasal nahin us jamin ke adhik urvar hone ki prakriya hai . ye parati ke bad ki parati-katha hai . prem janamejay jaisa bhashik prayog hamare samay ke vyangyakaron men bahut kam hai . divik ramesh ne kaha ki prem janamejay un gine chune vyangyakaron men se hain jinhonne vyangy ko foohad hone se bachaya hai . bhasha par inaki pakad bahut gahari hai . prem janamejay ki rachanaon men ek tarah ki mahakavyatmakata hai . ye khatara mol lete hue vyangy karate hain aur svayan ko bhi kataghare men rakhate hain . prem ki rachanaon men hasy ki kami hai aur ye vyangy ke sath hasy ka ghalamel kam hi pasand karate hain aur yahi karan hai inaka hasy bhi chutila hota hai .

Ham sabhi chate hai ki hamari ek alag phechan ho or agar koi online hamare bare me search kare to hamara photo bhi aaye. Ye bhut logo ka sabaal hota hai or bo apna Photo Google par dekhna chate hai, par internet ki kam jaankari ki karan samaj nahi aata ki kaise kya kare Google par photo dikhne ke liye. mujse bhut logo ne pucha ki unko apna photo Google par dikhana hai bo kya kare. to aaj me ussi sabaal kal jabab de raha hu. Mene jab Google par search kiya Google par to google ne muje kuch is traha ke result diye bo aap bhi dekhiye. iska matlab hai bhut se log hai to chate hai jo Google par search karte hai apna Photo uspar dekhne ke liye. ye jo search result hai isme ek hai Google par website kaise banaye uske bare me mene phele hi bataya hai Sabse phele me aapko bata du ki aap Google par apni Image upload nahi kar sakte q ki Google ek Search Engine hai, jo dusri site ko search karta hai or unki image ko bhi. Ye bhut saral hai or jab aap ye jaanloge to aap bhi sochoge ki ye kitna saral tha. Google par photo laane ke liye aapko karna ye hai ki aapko apni photo kisi site par upload karni hai. Aapka Facebook, Twitter, ya Google par account to jarur hoga. aapko karna ye hai ki apni photo in sites par upload kare or publicly share kare. Image ko upload karne ke baad us image ka naam or uski puri jaankari jarur like Maanlo aap Facebook par ek photo upload kar rahe hai to jo sabse jaruri baat bo ye ki aapko us image ka naam or us photo ke baare me jarur likhna hai. jabhi bo image search me aa payegi. bo photo jis naam se hogi agar us naam ko ham search karege to bo image bhi google ke image search me aayegi. Agar aap apni jaankari online share karna chate hai to Facebook Twitter to hai or aap Google par apna account banayege or usme apni jaankari or apna photo upload kare. iske baad agar koi aapke naam se search karega Google par to aapka photo google ke Image search me jarur aayega. Image upload karne ke baad thoda time lagta hai search engine me image aane me. thoda intjaar kare. Ye jo tarika hai ye sabse kargar tarika hai Apni Image ko Google me dikhane ka.uske liye kya karna chaliye jaante hai Blogger me sahi se image upload karne ke baad jada chances hai search me aane ke. Thoda time lagta hai. 1 mahina tak lag sakta hai. Ummid hai aap ab samaj gaye hoge ki Image ko kaise Google par daale. or ye kitna saral hai par agar aapko fir bhi koi dikkat aa rahi hai to aap muje comment ke jariye bata sakte sakte hai. Agar aapka Internet se related koi bhi sabaal hai to aap bo bhi puch sakte hai. Internet ki or jaankari ki liye hamara facebook page like jarur kare. Ye Bhi Jarur Padhe
jab aap saarvajanik vaahan se jaate hai to kaar paarking khaalee rahata hai parantu jab aap kaar lekar jaate hai to paarking me jagah nahee rahatee.

ghanaghor baarish rukane ka naam hee nahee letee. jaise hee aap kaar ke bheetar jaise taise tarabatar ghusate hai, baadal chhanT jaate hai, chiDiya chahachahaane lagatee hai, aur aasamaan me indradhanush nikal aata hai.
aashcharyajanak aur naamaaloom tareeke se daag-dhabbe aur DenT to lag hee jaate hai - aur ye aapake kaar kee keemat ke varg ke seedhe anupaat me hote hai.

jo brahmaputr men milati thi. sabako tairate hue dekh bhoopen ka ji chahata ki vah bhi tairen, magar tairana nahin aata tha. ek din bhoopen ne dekha ki ek chhoti ladaki nadi men naha rahi hai. kinare par khade kisi aadami ne kaha ki vah doob jaegi. bhoopen fauran nadi men kood gaye. bachchi ne unhen jakad liya. donon doobane lage. tabhi ek bihari pulisavale ne unhen pani se bahar nikala. bahar nikalane ke bad pulis vale ne bhoopen ko dhamakaya ki aainda is tarah ki harakat nahin kare. usaki dant sunane ke bad balak bhoopen ne tay kar liya ki vah tairana avashy sikhega. agale din vah ek bans ki sahayata se tairana sikhane laga. ek ghante tak koshish karane ke bad vah tairana sikh gaya. jab tairana aa gaya to bhoopen ne tay kiya ki relave ke pul par us samay khada hokar pani men chhalang lagane men bada maja aaega, jab relagadi aa rahi hogi. usane vaisa hi kiya. kamakhya steshan se relagadi guvahati ki taraf aa rahi thi. tabhi bhoopen pani men kood gaya. tairate hue kinare ke ek ped ke pas pahuncha. relagadi aage jakar ruk gayi. gard ne utar kar fatakara, marana chahata hai kya ? bhoopen bhagata huaa nani ke pas pahunch gaya aur sara hal kah sunaya.

usase balak bhoopen naraj ho gaya tha. usane tay kiya ki relagadi ko patari se girana hoga, tab us gard ko saja mil jaegi. agale din bhoopen ne rel ki patari par pattharon ko dher ke roop men rakh diya. isake bad ghar men aakar khat ke niche chhip gaya aur besabri ke sath relagadi ki pratiksha karane laga. relagadi ki aavaj sunai padi. bhoopen ke dil ki dhadakan tej ho gayi. relagadi teji se gujar gayi. patari se relagadi utari nahin. balak bhoopen ne dubara vaisi koshish nahin ki.

parvati prasad baruva jaise gitakar-sangitakar the. in sabake sampark men aane ke sath hi bhoopen ke bhitar ka kalakar pallavit-pushpit hone laga. bangali manch par ravindr sangit pratiyogita hui. tab bhoopen ko keval ek ravindr git gana aata tha, jise gakar bhoopen ne pratham puraskar prapt kiya. puraskar ke roop men sone ka padak mila. panch varsh ki umr se bhoopen haramoniyam bajana sikhane laga tha. tejapur men vishnurabha ne shastreey sangit ki buniyadi baten sikhai.

poovar duvar bheli aahe tai kiran dhali, hiya je mor chamake . bhole din men bijali ki tarah van marati hai, poorab ka daravaja kholakar vah kiranen failati hai, mere dil men roshani fail jati hai. bhoopen chhota tha aur aise giton ka bhavarth samajh pane men asamarth tha. isake bavajood manch par vah gane laga tha. bhavishy ke kalakar ko khad-pani milane laga tha. bhoopen bachapan men hi sochane laga tha ki kya git se samaj ka kuchh upakar kiya ja sakata hai ? skool men chhathi kaksha men padhate hue usane pahala git likha - kusumbar putr shreeshankar guru. 1939 men ek aur git likha - mai agnikumar firingita. fir likha - kanpi uthe kiy tajamahala.

halanki tab tak film pradarshit nahin ho payi thi. jyotiprasad ne van rangamanch ko jivant roop pradan kiya tha. adhikatar log keval unaki ek jhalak dekhane ke lie aate the. jab tak jyotiprasad se parichay nahin huaa tha tab tak bhoopen ke man men badi ichchha thi ki kisi tarah jyotiprasad ke karib pahunch jae.
jab unaka parichay guvahati se aaye kamalanarayan chaudhari se huaa. kamal bahut achchhe gayak the. unhonne bhoopen ko ek gajal gana sikha diya.

jab ek din jyotiprasad agraval, vishnu rabha aur fani sharma bhoopen ke pita se milane aaye. ye tinon vyakti tejapur ke sanskritik aakash ke jhilamilane vale sitare the. unhonne bataya ki bhoopen ko kalakatta le jana chahate hain aur usaki aavaj men rikard taiyar karana chahate hain.

isalie do lakadi ke bakse jodakar bhoopen ko us par khada kar diya gaya tha. jayamati aur shonit kunvari film ke lie nayika ki aavaj men bhoopen ne git rikard karavae. bhoopen ko yangest aartist aof hij mastars vyois aof indiya rikard sangita ka samman mila. gale men sone ka medal pahanakar bhoopen ne jo tasvir khinchavai use bangal ki rikard sangita patrika ne aavaran par prakashit kiya. isase pahale mastar madan ne kam umr men gane ka kirtiman sthapit.

agar aap kisee achchhe khaase laabh ke pad par hai. aapake vishay me aisa kaun kah sakata hai ki aap laabh ke pad par hai? jaahir hai, ye to aapake dhur virodhee chilla chilla kar kahate honge ki aap laabh ke pad par hai. agar aap laabh ke pad par hai, aur kaanoon bhee aisa maanata hai, to bhee koee baat nahee. aise kaanoono kee aisee-taisee aap svaya saksham hai apane lie naya kaanoon banaane-banavaane ke lie, jo puraanee tithi se prabhaavashaalee maana jaega aur jo yah sunishchit karega ki aap koee bhee, kisee bhee laabh ke pad par nahee hai bhale hee us pad par aapako achchha khaasa maanadey, ghar-ofis-kaar-fon, vyaktigat sevako-sachivo kee suvidhae haasil hotee ho.

apane yahaa laabh ke pad par to chaparaasee hota hai. vo subah se lekar shaam tak kaam karata hai subah saahab ke ghar jaakar vahaa ka kaam karata hai din me ofis ka taamazaam dekhata hai baaboo kee faile sarakaata hai aagantuko ko chaay pilaata hai saahab kee ghanTee sunata hai - shaam ko fir apane afasar ke ghar khidamat karata hai, aur ant me thakahaar kar raat ko nau das baje ghar pahunchata hai. badale me use maah ke ant me tanakhvaah milatee hai. sarakaaree Definishan ke hisaab se yah use laabh milata hai. aur is tarah se vah laabh ke pad par hota hai.

kisee sarakaaree sangaThan ya kisee sarakaaree upakram ka adhyaksh kisee laabh ke pad par nahee hota. vah to seva ke lie hota hai. desh kee seva, janata kee seva ke lie hota hai. yoo to use kuchh maanadey milata hai, kaanoonan, parantu yah bhee koee laabh hota hai bhala? use yah maanadey na bhee mile to bhee vah apanee us kursee se baDa prem rakhega aur vahaa baiThe rahane ke tamaam jaddojahad karata firega. maanadey ke rup me milane vaale pratimaah maatr kuchh hajaar rupe bhee bhala laabh kahalaata hai? agar yah laakho karoDo rupayo me hota tab maanate ki laabh ka pad hai!

aur, baDe saahab se milane-milaane ke bataur bakhsheesh ke rup me use nity kuchh rupe laabh ke bataur mil jaate hai. baDa laabh ka pad to un afasaro ka hota hai jin par ve apanee nigaah lagaakar posTing karaate hai hajaaro-laakho rupe kee, aur kuchh maamalo me karoDo rupayo kee saugaate dekar. jaise ki kisee khaas porT par eksaij inspekTar kee posT ya kisee Daansabaar kshetr me pulis inspekTar kee posT ya kisee audyogik ilaake me lebar insapekTar kee posT ya. are! in udaaharaNo se to yah vyangy kolam hee poora bhar jaega aur aise udaaharaN kya aapako nahee pata?.

jara aap dekhie ki aapaka pad bhee laabh ka hai ya nahee. agar aapaka pad laabh ka hai tab to aap is dharatee ke sabase nikarshT kism ke praaNee hai. aapako laabh ke pad par rahane me sharm aanee chaahie. ya to aap apana laabh ka pad chhoD de ya use laabh ke pad ke sarakaaree Definishan se alag haTaane kee koee jugat lagae. ya fir tatkaal kisee baDe laabh ke baDe pad par jaane kee jugat lagae. arth yahee ki ya to aap laabh ke pad par na rahe, aur rahana hee chaahate hai to baDe laabh ke pad par rahe sirf laabh ke pad par nahee! aapaka pad laabh ka na rahe, yahee meree shubhakaamanae.

bhaee jee ko emaTeevee-faishan Teevee dekhana hota hai to bahan jee saanta baarabara - kyonki saas bhee jaise kaaryakramo kee deevaanee hotee hai. bachche kebeesee-2, antaaksharee aur Daans-Daans kee koee kaDee chhoDana nahee chaahate. aapako har aadhe ghanTe par samaachaar apaDeTs dekhana atyant jarooree lagata hai. oopar se krikeT ka miyaadee bukhaar to rahata hee hai.

dekhane vaale kee. har ek kee apanee pasand. ek hee samay me kee-kee chainalo me aane vaale kee-kee pasandeeda kaaryakram. sambhav hai ki praaya kisee ek samay ek chainal par antaaksharee ka fainal raunD chal raha ho aur doosare par emaTeevee ka fainal kaunT Daun. kisee aur chainal par krikeT ka fainal maich dikhaaya ja raha ho, to kisee any chainal par vaarshik vyanjan pratiyogita ka pariNaam dikhaaya ja raha ho. fir ghar me har ek ko doosare ka pasandeeda kaaryakram nihaayat hee ghaTiya, ubaoo, nirarthak aur isee prakaar na jaane kya kya lagata hai. lihaaja ve apane pasandeeda kaaryakram ko hee dekhane aur doosaro ko dikhaane kee jugaaD me lage hue rahate hai. jaahir hai, aisee paristhitiyo me aapake gharo me yada kada mahaasamar bhee to hota hee hoga.

jinhe Teevee ke har kaaryakram me aanand aata hai. antaaksharee bhee achchhee lagatee hai aur rasoee sho bhee. filmee kvij me bhee maja aata hai aur DaakyoomenTree me bhee. Delee seeriyal me to dainik akhabaar kee tarah ka eDikshan hai. film besD kaaryakram aur filmo kee to baat hee kya hai! krikeT, kaar resing, boksing ke thril ka maja Teevee ke alaava kahee nahee hai. ab aisee sthiti me dimaag ke bheetar mahaasamar hota rahata hai ki kaun-sa prograam dekhe aur kaun sa chhoDe kyonki sabhee saale praim Taim me hee, pata nahee kyo dikhaate hai.

usee samay, formoola van kaar resing ka fainal raunD kisee doosare chainal par dikhaaya ja raha hota hai. dono hee kaaryakram apane ko bahut pasand hai. par dono kaaryakramo ko ek saath to nahee dekh sakate. bahut hua to nee takaneek vaalee pip pikchar in pikchar Teevee ya Dabal vijan Teevee laee ja sakatee hai, parantu aavaaj to kisee ek chainal kee hee sunanee paDegee. fir yah bhee to hota hai ki kisee teesare-chauthe chainal par kisee soorat na chhoDane laayak pasandeeda kaaryakram chal raha ho.

kisee bhee chainal ka praim Taim ka koee bhee kaaryakram kisee ke lie bhee chhoDa jaane laayak nahee rahata. sabhee kaaryakramo ko dekhana Teevee chainalo-proDyoosaro ke lie to jarooree hai hee darshako ke lie bhee aavashyak hai. par ek saath itane saare achchhe kaaryakramo ko koee kaise dekh sakata hai. isaka koee hal tatkaal nikaala jaana chaahie.

furasat me dekho. isase aapaka pasandeeda koee prograam chhooTega nahee. par, tab bhaee, aakhir din me chaubees hee to ghanTe hote hai na! mere jaise sabhee chainalo ke sabhee kaaryakramo ke deevaano ke lie to yah aiDiya bhee fel hai! oopar se, har maheene-do-maheene me ek naya chainal aur chala aata hai Dher saare ne, majedaar kaaryakramo ko lekar.

kisee tarah kee koee kasam aapane na kha rakhee ho aur aapake chikitsak ne alag se aapako mana nahee kiya ho to koee agar aapase yah poochhe ki chaay chalegee? to bhale hee aapaka javaab na me ho, us vakt aapake chehare kee chamak se saamane vaale ko yah andaaja ho hee jaata hai ki chaay kee jaroorat aapako kitanee hai. chaay to chaay hai. agar aap daaroo-shaaroo nahee peete hai aur chalo saath me chaay bhee nahee peete hai, tab bhee aap kahalaate hai- Tee-ToTalar. yaanee chaay aapake saath hai, bhale hee aap chaay ke saath nahee hai.

fir akhabaar ke aa jaane ke baad khabaro ke saath chaay, fir subah ke naashte ke saath chaay, fir daftar ya dukaan pahunchane par kaam kee shurooaat ke lie chaay, dopahar kee atiaavashyak chaay, dopahar ke bhojan ke baad jarooree chaay, shaam kee chaay aur is beech Tapak paDe mehamaano ke svaagat satkaar ke lie chaay. yaanee apane jeevan ke ek baDe hisse kee ek baDee jaroorat hai chaay aur sirf chaay.

nirjeev, praaNaheen aur boriyat se paripoorN najar aaya tha, vahee daftar ke paas vaalee chaay kee dukaan jeevanee shakti se paripoorN, sajeev, praaNavaan, oorjaavaan aur rangeeniyat se bharee najar aee thee. aakhir kyo? sirf isalie ki chaay me vah taakat hai jo praaNaheen cheejo me bhee praaN vaayu ka sanchaar kar de. yahee kaaraN hai ki daftaro me failo ke boz se martapraay baabuo ka man chaay kee dukaan par aakar harshollaas se jeevit ho uThata hai. jara yah bhee yaad keejie ki kisee daftar ke kisee baaboo kee ubaasiyaa kaise chhoomantar ho gee thee jab aapane use chaay ke lie aamantrit kiya tha.

to ghoos roopee sirf ek kap chaay se aap apana koee baDa kaam bhee karava sakate hai. namak ka karj ada karane kee baat puraanee ho chukee hai. ab to chaay ka karj chaDhata aur utarata hai. aapase kee dafa logo ne apanee sevao ke badale chaay-paanee ka kharcha chaaha hoga. kabhee aapaka aatmeey aapako chaay ke lie poochhana bhool gaya hoga to bhale hee aap chaay nahee peete ho, aapaka chaay peene ka mooD us vakt bilakul na raha ho, fir bhee aap kahenge saale ne chaay ke lie bhee nahee poochha.

ateev, aseem aanand avarNaneey aur akalpaneey to hai hee, kisee khomache vaale kee chaay ka fursat me baiTh kar peene ka apana aanand hai. chauk par saDak par khaDe rah kar faalatoo kee charcha me chaay paan ka alag aanand hai. akhabaaro me sir ghusaakar suDakee gee chaay ka alag aanand hai, to beevee aur Teevee ke saath Tee ke aanand kee baat hee kya hai. chaay chaahe meeThee ho ya kaDavee, kaalee ho ya khaalis doodh kee, apane hisaab se sabako achchhee lagatee hai, khaasakar tab jab isakee talab tej lagatee hai. iseelie to Treno me bikane vaalee safeda kee chaay bhee bhaee log usame maja DhoonDhakar pee hee lete hai. darasal chaay to hamesha achchhee hee hotee hai, bas kabhee vah thoDee achchhee, jyaada achchhee ya kabhee sabase achchhee ho jaatee hai.

to koee usakee khushaboo meelo door se soongh kar khincha chala aata hai. ho sakata hai chaay ke aapake anubhav bhee aise hee romaanchakaaree ho. mera apana anubhav hai ki subah ka preshar chaay ke bagair banata hee nahee. akasar log subah uThane ke lie chaay peete hai par kee aise bhee hai jo chaay ka ek pyaala halak me utaar kar sone jaate hai.

patana men sanvad prakashan, munbai se prakashit yogendr krishna ke kavy-sankalan bit chuke shahar men ka lokarpan charchit varishth kavi arun kamal ke dvara kiya gaya. samaroh ki adhyakshata samakalin janamat ke pradhan sanpadak ramaji ray ne ki. unaki pratinidhi kavitaon par samalochanatmak tippani karate hue arun kamal ne apane vaktavy men kaha ki yogendr krishna ki kavitaen sanpoorn hindi kavy-paranpara men ek naya adhyay jodati hain. unhonne kaha ki bit chuke shahar men ki kavitaon men aaj ka hinsak hota samajik paridrishy ek nae muhavare men ujagar huaa hai.

hatyare jab buddhijivi hote hain, hatyare jab masiha hote hain, bit chuke apane shahar men, poorvajon ke garbh men thahara samay, kam pad rahin barooden tatha dilli men pahali bar jaisi kavitaon ki vishesh charcha karate hue kaha ki in kavitaon ke madhyam se kavi apane samay ke bade prashnon se muthabhed karata dikhata hai. unhonne kaha ki apani kavitaon men yogendr bilakul hi nae evan maulik muhavare ke sath prastut hue hain. ye kavitaen inhen agrim pankti ke samakalin kaviyon ke bich khada karati hain.

kumar mukul, vinay kumar, sanjay kumar kundan, bhagavati prasad dvivedi, sudhir suman, javed hasan, em ke madhu, musafir baitha, arun narayan samet shahar ke anek sudhi pathak, sahityakar evan buddhijivi upasthit the.

Agar aap Cryptocurrency par kaam karte hai or aapne Bitcoin kharid rakhe hai, par aap Bitcoin ke aalawa bhi market me jo dusri Cryptocurrency hai unko bhi kharidna chate hai, jese Ethereum ETC, Ripple XRP, Litecoin LTC, Dash etc. to aap tension naa le me aapko batane wala hu aap kaise inko kharid sakte hai. Agar aap Cryto currency me abhi new hai, or aapko nahi pata ki kaise Bitcoin ko kharide, to aap Zebpay se Bitcoin kharidne ki Process jarur dekhe. To mera sabse phele to aapse yahi khuga ki aap starting me sirf Bitcoin me apne paise lagaye, fir jab aapko thoda Cryptocurrency ka concept samaj aa jaye uske baad aap dusri crypto currency bhi khari sakte hai. Bitcoin Kharidne ki Trusted or Popular website ki list mene yaha share ki hai aap un sabhi par account bana kar rakhe, taki jo bhi sasta bitcoin de jis time aap kharidna chahe usse kharid sake.
jyeshTh ke maheene me, jab rohiNee nakshatr me soory apanee pooree tapan vaataavaraN me preshit kar raha tha, ek yaachak nange paanv dvaar-dvaar jaakar bhiksha maang raha tha.

karshakaay kaaya asar kar gee aur use kuchh-kuchh kahee se mil bhee gaya. ek ko usaka dopahar kee tapatee dhoop me nange paanv yaachanaarat rahana jara jyaada hee dravit kar gaya aur usane apana faTa puraana joota jo kachare ke Dabbe me Daalane ke lie alag rakh diya tha, nikaala aur yaachak ko de diya, taaki usake paanv ko tapatee dharatee se thoDee raahat to mile.
parantu do dvaaro ke aage jaane ke uparaant usane un jooto ko apane pair se utaara aur apane thaile me rakh liya.

apane satkarm se gadagad us yaachak ko thoDa sa aage jaakar bhee dekh raha tha ki usaka puraana joota bhee kis prakaar ek achchhe prayojan ke lie kaam aa raha hai. parantu jab usane yaachak ko joota utaar kar apane thaile me rakhate dekha to vah pashchaataap se budabudaaya saala ab use kabaaDee me jaakar bech dega.
aur soch raha tha ki agar vah joote pahan kar yaachana karega to fir logo ke man me daya aur karooNa kaise upajegee?

Bitcoin trading ka sabse important step hai Bitcoin ki latest price se updated rahana. Tabhi aap good bitcoin trading kar sakenge aur big profit earn kar sakenge. 10 50-60 , Aaj ham internet par available aise sources jaise App aur Website ki baat karenge, jisse aap Bitcoin ki latest price jan sakenge. Chaliye Jante hai- Bitcoin Cash Kya Hai? Bitcoin Bitcoin Cash Me Kya Antar Hai? Bitcoin Ki Live Price Kaise Jane Bitcoin Price Janane Ke Liye Website 1.Coinmarketcap.com Is website ko 9 May 2013 ko found kiya gaya tha. Is website se aap Bitcoin sahit Ethereum, Ripple jaise 1491 cryptocurrencies ki latest price USD me dekh sakte hai. Iske alava aap Todays Gainers aur Loser cryptocurrencies ko bhi jan sakte hai. Aap is Website se -Crypto currencies ki last 7 days ki price graph dekh sakte hai -Crypto currency ki circulation amount jan sakte hai. -Last 24 hours ki volume jan sakte hai. -Last 24 hours ki price change in percentage jan sakte ahi. -Cryptocurrency ki market cap jan sakte hai. -Kisi crypto currency ki USD ke sath BTC aur ETH me bhi price dekh sakte hai. 2.Coindesk.com Latest bitcoin price dekhane ka yah simple website hai. Ismen aap Bitcoin , Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash , Litcoin, Ripple ki latest price check kar sakte hai.Is website ko 24 march 2004 ko launch kiya gaya tha. Is website se aap -Cryptocurrency ki Todays open price jan sakte hai. Cryptocurrency ki Todays low price dekh sakte hai. Cryptocurrency ki Todays high price jan sakte hai. Cryptocurrency ki Supply, Market Cap aur Change dekh sakte hai. -Iske alava aapko cryptocurrency price ki behatar analysis ke liye depth bitcoin price chart milega. Jismen Last 6 six hours, Last 12 hours, Last day, Last Month, Last 3 month, Last 1 year aur all time basis par price analysis kar sakte hai. -Cryptocurrency ki price in dollar hi dekh sakte hai. Bitcoin Mining Kya Hai Kaise Karte Hai? 3.CCN.com Yah ek behad hi old website hai, jise 5 may 1998 ko launch kiya gaya tha. Isme popular cryptocurrencies ki latest price show ki jati hai. Is website se aap -Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Altcoins jaise popular coin ki latest price jan sakte hai. -Crypto currency ki todays low high price jan sakte hai. -Top gainer aur top loser cryptocurrency ke bare me bhi info milti hai. -Crypto currency ki price USD, Yen, Euro me chart ke sath show kiya jata hai. Is chart se aap last 1 minute se last 1 month tak ke price analysis kar sakte hai. Free Bitcoin Kaise Kamaye 4.Cryptocompare.com Crypto currency ki live price janane ke liye yah best website hai. because is website me kisi bhi cryptocurrency ki Market Capital, Volume of 24 hours, Open Price of 24 hours, LowHigh Price of 24 hours live update hoti hai. Is website ko 23 November 2013 ko found kiya gaya tha.
