Is website se aap -Popular cryptocurrencies se related data jaise price, market capital etc ki live update pa sakte hai. -Every cryptocurrency se related chart bhi milati hai, jo price analysis ke ke liye helpful hoti hai. -Cryptocurrency ki price 50 se adhik currencies jaise USD, INR me jan sakte hai. -Cryptocurrency ki history bhi jan sakte hai. 5.Cryptowat.ch Popular crypto currencies jaise BTC, ETH, BCH, LTC, BCH ki ek sath live price update janane ke liye yah best website hai. Yah website live price ke sath pricing chart bhi show karta hai. Specially cryptocurrency ki price par based is website ko 4 march 2014 ko launch kiya gaya tha. Yah website every cryptocurrency ki values dollar me show karta hai. Best 4 Free Bitcoin Earning Android Apps 6.Tradingview.com Is website par aap BTC aur ETH ki live price ko jan sakte hai, lekin sath me aapko pricing analysis ke liye interactive chart milega. Is website ko 28 November 2003 ko found kiya gaya tha. Is cryptocurrency ki price USD me show kiya jata hai. Bitcoin Price Janane Ke Liye Apps 1.Zebpay India me behtar tarike se bitcoin ki live price janane ke liye Zebpay App best hai. Yah ek Cryptocurrency Exchange bhi hai, jahan se aap bitcoin aur bitcoin cash buy-sell kar sakte hai. But ise app me pricing ki updated chart nahi milta hai aur bitcoin aur bitcoin cash ke alava kisi aur currency ki price nahi dekh sakte. 2.Unocoin Unocoin Zebpay ka best alternative ho sakta hai. Ise 2013 me found kiya gaya. Yah ek bitcoin wallet hai, jo live price updates ke sath updated pricing chart bhi available karta hai. Yah keval bitcoin ke price show karta hai, jo INR me hote hai. 3.Coinsecure Yah India ki tisri sabse popular cryptocurrency exchange hai jo abhi keval bitcoin exchange karti hai. aap is app se bitcoin ki latest price, todays high price, todays low price aur INR volume jan sakte hai. Bitcoin Buy Sell Trading Kaise Kare Highest Profit Trick But ye pricing chart available nahi karta hai, jo pricing analysis me problem laa sakta hai. Hope aapko bitcoin ki latest and live price janane ke liye websites aur apps ki pasand aaya hoge. Is post ko aap jarur Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus aur Whatsapp par share kare.

Hello Blogger, Is Post me ham Blogger ki design par baat karege. Me phele bhi bata chuka hu kaise Navbar hatate hai, kaise Blogger Attribute ko hatate hai. Blogger par ham jo blog banate hai usko bina kisi coding ki jaankari ke ham usko badiya design kar sakte hai. mene yaha bataya hai kaise ham apne blogger ke template ko badal kar badiya design Template use kar sakte hai. Blogger ka sabse badiya future widget hai. ham widget ki madad se jo chahe hai wo add kar sakte hai apne blog me. or agar koi HTML Code ko add karna hota hai to HTMLJavascript widgete ki madad se kar sakte hai. Aapne Agar Blog banaya hai to aapne dekha hoga ki aapke blog ke Home Page me niche likha hota hai Subscribe to Posts Atom or Post page ke niche likha hota hai Subscribe to Posts Comments Atom inki madad se koi bhi hamare blog ki Post or Post Comments ko subscribe kar sakta hai. Par isse hamare blog me badiya look nahi aata hai. Isse Acha hai ham Google Feedburner par apne feed bana kar Email Subscribe widget add kare apne blog me. Subscribe to Posts Atom or Post Comments Atom ko hatane ke 2 tarike hai. Ye Simple tarika hai, isme aapko bas ek CSS ka Code hai jo Blogger template me add karna hai. jiski madad se jo link hai wo hide ho jayegi. Is Code ko add karne ke baad atom links sare pages se hide ho jayegi. Apne Blogger template ko edit kare or usme CtrlF daba kar bskin search kare. Ab is code ko Copy karke bskin ke upar Paste kare. Fir Template Save karde. CSS Code kaise add karte hai blogger me, janna hai to yaha dekh sakte hai. add karne me dikkat aa rahi hai to yaha dekhe Is tarike me ham Subscribe to link ke code ko search karke usko delete karke hata sakte hai Template me se. Template kaise Upload karte hai or kaise Template ko Backup karte hai. To ab aap Jaan Chuke hai kaise ham Subscribe to Posts Atom link ko apne blog se hata sakte hai. Blogger ki sari jaankari ke liye yaha click kare. Ye Kuch Post jo aapko Padni Chaiye Agar aapka koi sabal hai Blogger se Sambandit to Aap Comment karke bilkul puch sakte hai.

aur isee vajah se isase muze lagaav sa ho gaya tha. ise chhoDane ke khayaal se hee muze katee achchha nahee lagata tha isee kaaraN mai ise saalo-saal chalaata raha tha sudharava-sudharava kar. ek din jab mekenik ne apane aujaar neeche dhar die to muze majabooree me nee gaaDee khareedane jaana hee paDa.

aur doosaree or bahut se puraane aur sekaNDs kee gaaDiyaa rakhee thee. mainne nee chamachamaatee gaaDiyo me se ek pasand kee. gajab ka moDal tha aur kam eenghan me jyaada mailej aur jyaada povar deta tha.

achchhe, povaraful moDalo kee gaaDiyaa aarakshit hai aur aarakshit jaatiyo ko hee saplaee kee jaengee. sarakaar ne aadesh to kab se nikaal rakha hai. darasal, nijee kshetr me aarakshaN ke kaaraN jo sekaND greD ke maal ban rahe the unaka levaal koee nahee tha to sarakaar ne unhe anaarakshito me becha jaana anivaary kar diya gaya tha.

sekeNDs kee gaaDiyo ke Dher kee or ishaara kiya usame se chhaanT le, kyonki saaree nee povaraful gaaDiyaa to aarakshito ke lie aarakshit hai. aur jo aarakshit nahee hai, ve janaral klaas hai unhe to sekaNDs me se hee chhaanTana hoga. kaanoon jo ban gaya hai. bechane vaale bech nahee sakate, khareedane vaale khareed nahee sakate.

aur use lekar apane ghar kee or lauT chala. yah gaaDee to meree maujooda gaaDee se bhee khaTaara thee. par, shukr hai, chal to rahee thee. patnee ne aadesh farama rakha tha lauTate me sabjee lete aana. raaste me sabjee baajaar me ruka. vahaa ek insapekTar khaDa tha. usane muzase meree jaati poochhee. mainne kaha bhaee, mai sabjee lene aaya hoo. kisee jaati sammelan me nahee.

nahee to nikal le. mainne use bhee vahee javaab diya- meree jaati maanav jaati hai. vah thoDa bhramit hua. fir kuchh samazata-nahee-samazata hua fir gurraaya abe ye bata rijarv klaas hai ya janaral? mainne use fir samazaana chaaha ki mai maanav hoo aur rijarv ya janaral me koee bhinnata nahee samazata. insapekTar ne apana zanDa ThakaThakaaya aur bola saale janaral! bhaashaN pelata hai. udhar ja vahaa se le. usane ek kone kee or ishaara kiya jahaa baasee, saDatee-galatee sabjiyaa janaral klaas ke lie bik rahee thee. taajee sabjiyaa aarakshit logo ke lie aarakshit thee. jo aarakshit sabjiyaa aarakshito me bik nahee paatee thee, saDane-galane lag jaatee thee, baasee paD jaatee thee to janaral klaas me bikane Daal dee jaatee thee. sarakaaree aadeshaanusaar.

khaee ja sakane vaalee kuchh sabjiyaa chhaanTee, aur ghar kee or chala. chauraahe se ghar kee or Tarn kiya to Traifik pulis ne baDee lambee seeTee bajaee aur haath dekar roka. poochha kaun jaat ba? mainne usase kaha ki meree shaadee ho chukee hai aur mere ghar me koee shaadee yogy var nahee hai jo mai jaat bataoo. jaati-paati to shaadee byaah ke samay hee log baag dekha karate the ab tak. Traifik vaala sajjan purush lag raha tha. vah hansa, bola vo baat nahee ba. baat ee hai ki ee raasta tanik rijarbe hai na. rijarb jaat ke ho to kaunau baat nee. jai sakat hau. par rijarb jaat nee hau to ee raasta me nee ja sakat. kauno cheking me dhara jaoo tau jel ke chakkee peesal paDab.

baDhiya, siks-for len saDake rijarvo ke lie rijarv hai. janaral klaas ko TooTee fooTee galiyo se santosh karana paDega. usane muze ek patalee, gaDDhedaar galee kee or ishaara kiya udhare se jao baaba.

jisakee muze aashanka pahale se hee ho rahee thee. mai apane bahate khoon se Dara hua tha lihaaja sarakaaree kaanoon ke bhay se zooTh bol gaya aarakshite hoo baaba. parantu itane me lain me kisee ne muze pahachaan liya aur chillaaya ee to janaral hai. ee galat hai. isako ihaa se bhagao. jaahir hai, vah naamee, anaarakshit jaati ka eksaparT DokTar aarakshito ke lie aarakshit tha.

duniyaadaaree se, sardee-garmee se bhee koee matalab nahee tha. usane masheenee andaaj me mere ghaav par maraham paTTee kar dee. muze mahasoos hua ki kaash! pooree duniya aisa ho jae to kitana achchha ho.
is baat ko maanegee use hee voT denge. usakee har baat par joro se, poore josho kharosh se taaliyaa baj rahee thee.

aur use saantvana dene kee asafal koshish kar rahe the. mainne jijnyaasa vash logo se poochha ki vah kisalie ro raha hai. logo ne bataaya is aarakshit jaati ke bujurg ne apanee biTiya ke lie ek achchha var talaasha tha. shaadee pakkee kar dee thee. parantu sarakaaree kaanoon ke tahat ise apanee biTiya ko kisee any aarakshit ke saath shaadee karavaana thee, jo is bujurg aur isakee biTiya ke hisaab se usake yogy nahee the. isakee biTiya ne is vajah se khudakushee kar lee. mai bhee jaar jaar rone lag gaya. muze meree beTee yaad aa gee. usake gam me shareek hota hua mai aage baDh gaya. mai kya kar sakata tha? mai kuchh nahee kar sakata tha. pata nahee sarakaar ko kya ho gaya hai. vah aage kya karegee pata nahee.

der se ghar aane me use bhee hamesha lagata rahata tha ki mai apane dosto ke saath kahee baiTh kar jaam uDaata hooonga. par fir meree baanh par paTTee bandhee dekhee to usaka gussa hava ho gaya. haay raam! ye kya ho gaya usake munh se besaakhta nikala. mai past ho chuka tha, aur kuchh bolane bataane ke mooD me nahee tha. bas itana hee kaha kuchh nahee, gaaDee ke ek purje se choT lag gee thee.

fir keTareena aur ab elma ne to amareekee kshetro me taanDav-sa macha diya hai. ek toofaan se nipaTe nahee ki doosara haajir. vah to ganeemat hai ki aadamajaat ne supar kampyooTar naamak aujaar eejaad kar liya hai jisakee vajah se toofaan kab, kahaa se paida hoga, kahaa-kahaa se gujarega aur kahaa jaakar khatm hoga isaka pata vo pahale se laga leta hai aur apane ko tabaahiyo se bachaane kee naakaam koshishe karata hai. toofaan paida hone ke kaaraNo par lagaam lagaane, usake paida hone se rokane ke upaay bhee lagata hai aadamee aaj nahee to kal DhoonDh hee lega.

aajakal ke netao ke to ye haal hai ki na to koee ponga panDit aur na hee koee poliTikal eksaparT aaj kal ke maahaul me yah bata sakane kee koovat rakhata hai ki kis neta ka mijaaj kis din kaisa rahega. baat sirf itanee hee nahee hai, ab to yah ummeed bhee jaahir nahee kee ja sakatee ki kis din kis neta ka kaisa mijaaj ho sakata hai. aur to aur, jo tota-chhaap panDit chauraaho baajaaro me tote se kaarD nikaal kar aapakee saTeek bhavishyavaaNee ka daava karate hai bhale hee ve khud saDako chauraaho me baiThane ko abhishapt ho ve bhee netao ke baare me koee bhavishyavaaNee karate nahee deekhate.

tamaam tarah kee gaNanao ke uparaant bhee aap kisee sthaan vishesh ke mausam ke baare me kuchh nahee kah sakate. kisee din alasubah chaTakhatee huee dhoop khilatee hai to yah aabhaas hota hai ki aaj mausam khula rahega. parantu dopahar aate-aate ya akasar shaam Dhalate-Dhalate ho yah jaata hai ki ya to bhaaree bharakam barasaat ho jaatee hai ya fir kabhee ole bhee paD jaate hai. isake Theek vipareet agar aasamaan me ghanaghor ghaTae ghumaDatee dikhaee detee hai to fir yahee ho jaata hai ki samast poorvaanumaano kee hava nikaalatee huee pooravee havae pashchim kee or hava ho jaatee hai. yahee kaaraN hai ki kisee barasaat me mumbee me jal plavan ho jaata hai jahaa log saDako par hee chaubees-aDataalees ghanTo tak fans jaate hai to kahee maalava me sookha paD jaata hai. baadal vahee hai, maanasoon bhee vahee hai, parantu mumbee aur baDauda me to bhaaree baarish laata hai jaavara aur ujjain me sookha. maanasoon jab aktoobar me bhaarat se pooree tarah vida le chuka hota hai to poorvottar bhaarat aur chennee me baadal faTane lagate hai

doosare din subah uThane par mausam ke badale hue mijaaj kee tarah badalee huee hotee hai, aur nateejatan, kisee any ke prati nishThaavaan hokar vah subah kee angaDaee leta hai. jab tak dopahar kee garamee ka paravaan chaDhata hai, usakee nishTha kisee doosare kee taraf bahane lagatee hai to shaam hote-hote nishTha kee yah bahaar ya to ulaTee lauT paDatee hai ya fir kisee aur poTenshiyal disha kee or bahane lag jaatee hai. subah usake mukhaaravind se jo pravachan nikale hote hai, use shaam ko ya to vah gaTak leta hai ya fir auT of konTeksT kee sanjnya dekar usase peechha chhuDaane kee bharasak koshish karata hai.

pahaaDo me sookha paDane laga tha. satta aur dhan ke prabhaav ke kaaraN apane idhar netao ke saath bhee yahee sthiti hai. koee bhee chhuTabhaiya neta ab paarTee pramukh ko khuleaam Teevee kaimaro ke saamane aankhe tarer deta hai. doosare din paarTee se baahar ho jaata hai. teesare din fir andar ho jaata hai. nahee to apanee nee paarTee khaDee kar ya doosaree paarTee me shaamil ho satta me shaamil ho jaata hai. vahaa se use apanee puraanee paarTee ke pramukh ke kaale dhandhe aur kaala paisa saaf dikhaee dete hai, jo vah jab paarTee ke andar tha, kabhee dikha nahee tha. jo jindagee bhar doosare ko chillaaya aur gariyaaya, ab usakee prashansa ke pul baandh raha hai, use sar aankho par biTha raha hai aur jisake saath usane ab tak ka raajaneetik jeevan jiya, usakee chhatr chhaaya me usane apana yah raajaneetik kad praapt kiya, use vah ek zaTake me chhoD de raha hai. ab yah baat juda hai ki yahee, isee tarah kee baat usake lie doosare log kahate firate hai. par, poliTiks me to bhee, sab chalata hai.

isase pahale ki is lekh ka mijaaj itana badal jae ki aap in vaakyo ko paDhate bor ho jae aur apane baal nochane lage, maamala yahee khatm karate hai aur chaahe jaisa mausam ho, usake maje lete hai netao ke bayaano ka bhee aur mausamee bayaaro ka bhee.

to kya aap prasann nahee honge ? avashy honge aur kyo nahee honge? aakhir, satta-shakti ka svaad jo chakhane ko milega, parantu jara Thaharie, thoDee gambheerata se vichaar keejie. ho sakata hai maamala pooree tarah se prasannata ka na ho. aie jara gambheerata se gaur faramae.

parantu mantree pad aapako aise hee nahee milane vaala. isake lie aapako chunaav laDana hoga. ab agar aapaka bhaagy vaastav me prabal hoga, to aap eemaanadaaree se chunaav jeet sakate hai. varana aaj ke maahaul me to jab tak aap beeemaanee se jaati-dharm ke gaNit nahee lagaenge, chunaav kisee soorat jeet nahee sakate. maan leejie, yah bhee ho gaya. parantu khaalee chunaav jeetane se bhee kuchh haasil nahee hone vaala. aap bane rahenge do Take ke emele aur emapee. asalee, raubadaar mantree pad paane ke lie aapako tamaam joDatoD karana hogee. goTiyaa biThaana hongee. raajayog ka yahaa kya kaam? chalie, maan leejie ki yahaa bhee bhaagy ne saath de diya, magar fir aisa ho sakata hai ki aap mahatvaheen ya bina vibhaag ke hee mantree ban jae aur log-baag aapaka majaak uDaane lage. jaahir hai, mahatvapoorN aur bhaaree bharakam bajaT vaale malaeedaar vibhaag ko paane ke lie aapako kheenchaataanee karanee hogee, laabing karanee hogee, preshar TaikTiks apanaanee hogee. muft me kuchh bhee haasil hone vaala nahee hai. isake lie alag se mehanat mashakkat karanee hogee. alag se, naayaab, kelakuleTeD paanse chalane honge.

maan liya ki aap mantree ban hee ge. dhanyavaad raajayog. parantu aapakee aage kee raah bhee koee aasaan nahee hogee. ho sakata hai ki aapaka ya apake sambandhiyo ka ateet ranga-puta ho. tab aapake virodhee ya bahut sambhav hai aapake neta-sangee-saathee jo mantree pad se maharoom hai khod-khod kar aapake ateet ko ughaaDenge aur is tarah aapake mantree pad par hamesha talavaar laTakatee rahegee. ab yah maan le ki kaanch kee tarah aapaka ateet svachchh hai aur vartamaan paaradarshee hai jo ki bhaarateey raajaneeti me - soory ke ulaTee disha me ugane ke samaan hee saty hai, to bhee bhavishy ke baare me kya kaha ja sakata hai. aapake virodhee jo maatr aapake satta me aane kee vajah se paida hue honge ya doosare satta kaamee aapako yoo hee chain se nahee rahane denge. ve aapakee har baat ko, har kaary ko desh aur janata ke viruddh batala kar aapake viruddh zooThe kaanD-kisse frem karenge aur usame aapako Taangane kee harachand koshish karenge. yah bhee ho sakata hai ki aap apane virodhiyo ko samaapt karane kee aisee hee kisee koshish me khud hee fans jae.

satta milate hee aapakee parsanal laif ka beDa gark ho jaega. aap chaaTukaaro se ghir jaenge. aapake chaaro aur suraksha ka arthaheen ghera khaDa kar diya jaega aur aapako aapake parichito se bhee milane nahee diya jaega.

yah bhee shaasvat saty hai ki jisane bhee satta ka svaad chakha, chaahe vah bhagavaan hee kyo na ho, sarvada sukhee kabhee nahee raha. vah bhee satta praapti ke lie ya satta shakti ke kaaraN ya satta par aasann khataro ke kaaraN dukho se ghira raha.

satta shakti kee yaade aapako jeene nahee dengee aur aapake virodhee aapako fir kabhee na uThane laayak banaane me aapaka pulinda baandhane me kuchh bhee kasar nahee rakhenge. tab, yah sab aur bhee asahaneey ho jaega.
aur paDhane me maja aaya. usane aage yah bhee kaha ki mai bhee soch raha hoo ki tumhaare batae raaste ka koee sankalp loo taaki use nibhaane me aasaanee to rahe hee, maja bhee ae.

bina kisee sampaadakeey kainchee ke bhay se aur bina kisee bhay ke ki yah kahee prakaashit ho paega bhee ya nahee. aapakee rachana prakaashit rahegee aane vaalee peeDhiyo ke upayog ke lie anant kaal tak, jab tak inTaraneT ka vajood rahega.
parantu is blog ke paaThako kee raay jyaada mahatvapoorN hai. kya ve ise nity zel paenge? apanee raay TippaNiyo ke maadhyam se muz tak pahunchae.

jo kharidana chahata tha, magar vah dubara nahin aaya. bhoopen ne unase apani yojana ke bare men bataya. mahadevi ne unako apani kahani ka adhikar de diya. us samay desh men hindi- chini bhai-bhai ka mahaul tha. chin ke kaunsalar ko bulakar bhoopen ne muhurt karavaya tha. lata mangeshakar ko klaipistik dene ke lie aamantrit kiya tha. lata ne majak men kaha tha - bhoopen da, main jis film ke lie klaipistik deti hoon, vah film banati nahin hai. lata ka majak sach sabit huaa. ratonrat bhoopen-hemant prodakshan ki jagah hemant-bela prodakshan ban gaya aur mrinal sen film ke nirdeshak ban gaye. ek tarah se langadi mari gayi thi aur film ke projekt se bhoopen ko bahar kar diya gaya. mrinal sen ne film banayi. jis din film kalakatta men rilij hui, usi din chin ne bharat par aakraman kar diya aur film buri tarah pit gayi.

us ilake men mastana taip ladakon ne unase kaha - ham aapaka bal bhi banka hone nahin denge. hamari lash par chadhakar hi koi aap tak pahunch sakata hai. asam se bhage bangali siyaladah pahunch chuke hain. aapako asali khatara unalogon se hi hai.

main jara bahar se aa rahi hoon. bhoopen ko aashanka hui ki kahin gundon ko bulane ke lie to nahin ja rahi hai ! kuchh der bad vah dher sare rikard lekar lauti. rikard pleyar par vah rikard bajane lagi. pahala gana tha bhoopen ka sagar sangamata, doosara gana tha bhoopen ka, tisara aur chautha gana bhi bhoopen ka hi tha. veshya ne kaha - suna hai asamiya-bangali ke bich kuchh huaa hai ? aisi halat men aapalog yahan kyon aaye hain ? main yah dhandha jaroor karati hoon par aapako door se dekhane ke lie mahajati sadan men jati hoon. aaf gane mujhe bahut achchhe lagate hain. main asam ja chuki hoon. ek chay bagan ke malik ke sath. nam nahin bataungi. asam itana pyara hai. yah sab kya ho raha hai.

usaka gahara prabhav bhoopen par pada. unako film ka kam milana band ho gaya. priyam badauda men thi. bhoopen aur naukar ko gujare ke lie har mahine panch sau rupaye ki jaroorat hoti thi. panch sau rupaye ka jugad kar pana kathin ho jata tha. kafi karj ho gaya tha. guvahati men bhi parivar ko kafi dikkaton ka samana karana pad raha tha.

jisaki shooting unhonne terah dinon men poori ki. bhoopen ko prag jane ka nimantran mila. prag se lautane ke bad bhoopen asam gaye aur hemang vishvas ke sath sanskritik toli banakar jagah-jagah ghoomate hue asamiya-bangali sadbhav ka sandesh dene lage. tatkalin mukhyamantree vimala prasad chaliha ne lagabhag rote hue bhoopen se kaha tha ki ve sthiti ko niyantrit nahin kar pa rahe hain aur unake jaise kalakar hi kuchh kar sakate hain. bhoopen ko kai tarah ki dhamakiyon ka bhi samana karana pada, parantu dhairy khoe bina unhonne apana sanskritik abhiyan jari rakha. utpal datt ne nyoo eja men likha - bhoopen hajarika ki tarah kaun kalakar alpasankhyakon ki suraksha ke lie sadak par utarata hai ? kya ham utarate hain ? kya hamane kalakatta men aisa koi prayas kiya.

10 July ko maine Mahendra Singh Dhoni par ek post UC News par post kiya aur do dino me us post par 5.5 lac views paye. 10 50-60 , Maine income calculation lagaya aur paya $80-$90 ki earning ho gayi hogi. Aap janate honge UC News 12 july 2017 se Daily Revenue Settlement start kiya. So UC News ne meri earning ko bhi update kiya. Jab main Income Report check kiya to main shocked ho gaya! Because 5.5 lac views ke badle only $6 mile. UC News Se Kaise Kamaye? Tab maine Feedback Form ke through UC News Support Team se is baare me bat kiya to unhone kaha, low quality content ke chalate aapki itni kam income hui hai. Yah baat mere gale nahi uttari, aakhir kaise mera post low quality vala ho sakta hai. Jo banda pichale do years se regularly blogging kar raha hai, jiske conten ki praise Achhikhabar.com ke founder Gopal Mishra, HindiZen.com ke Founder Nishant Mishr, SupportmeIndia.com ke Jume Deen Khan aur kai aur popular bloggers kar chuke hai. Lekin in sab ke bich mere mind me ek baat ghum rahi thi, ki Mera ek follower, jo professional journalist hai. ve jab bhi mere UC News Channel ko check karte to unhe Ads nahi milta tha. Tab maine is baare me research kiya. To main paya ki iske piche Limited Revenue Model responsible hai. Is model ko sabse pahle youtube ne apnaya. Is model me post video par ad every timeshow nahi hota hai. balki pure views ke 25-40 hi show hota hai. Bakayada is baare me UC News FAQ me mention kar chukka hai. Why There Is No Ad? UC News The advertisement comes randomly and it depends upon algorithm Calculation Method to Show ADand readers reading habit as well. We request you to write more popular or trending topic articles to increase the chance of showing more advertisements on your content. Is karan Jab 40 views tak ad show hota hai to income acchi hoti, lekin jab 25 views tak ad show hota hai, income behad kam hota hai. Is model ko ham Limited Ad Showing Model bhi kah sakte hai. Is model ke baare me Youtube channel Technical Guruji ke founder Gaurav Chaudhary apne ke video me kahte hai, har ek view par ad nahi milate hai. ye total views ke 25-40 tak hi milata hai. yani aapke kisi video par 1000 view mile hai to 250 se 400 views par hi ad show hoga. Jyada details ke liye ye video dekhen Low Income ka Jawab4th Minutes se milega. to yahan ek question uthata hai, Youtube Ki Tarah UC News Ne Is Model Ko Kyun Apnaya ? Iska jawab hai, UC News se ab bahut se writerblogger jud chuke hai. Jinke work ke liye 100 revenue nahi de sakte hai, because ye unke capacity se jyada ho chuka hai. Yani ham kah sakte hai, UC News par ham jo work karte hai, uska 25-40 hi revenue milta hai. Khair aage badhte hai Ham janane ki koshish kare rahe the ki Kaise Maine UC News Se $470 Kamaye ? UC News hame kam income kyon deta hai ? Bro, iske piche kai reasons hai, jinhe ham details me janenge. 1.Algorithm Iske baare me pahle hi baat kar chuka hun. Algorithm ek mathematical calculation method hota hai, jise computer bhi har second use karta hai. UC News aur YouTube jaisi companies iski help se ad frequency ko control karte hai. Yani kis post par kis time par aur kitni baar ad show hoga, algorithm control karti hai. 2.Post Quality Aap achchi tarah se janate honge ki UC News me ad post ke bottom me show hota hai. Aise me yadi aapka post quality based nahi hai to most of readers post ke bottom tak jayenge hi nahi. Jisse behad kam ad clicks milenge, jisse low income hoga. 3.Timing Algorithm time based hote hai. As a experienced algorithm ad ko pick of time me jyada se jyada show karta hai, because us time sabse jyade benefit hota hai. Maine jaisa experienced kiya hai, UC News ka pick of time 12 PM to 10PM tak hota hai. Yadi is time ke bich aapko achche view naa mile to income low ho sakti hai. . 4.Ad Rate Share market ki tarah every time ad rate change hote rahte. Jo effectively income par impact dalte hai. Mainly low income hone ke main reason high competition ko maan sakte hai. Jaise Market me 50 apples ki jarurat hai, lekin farmer 100 apples send kar de to rates to down ho hi jayega. Yahi aapke aur hamare sath UC News par ho raha hai. Aise me thodi samajhdari ke saath kaam kare to per month $200 kama sakte hai Low Income Ko Badhane Ke Tips 1.Quality Post Quality post hi jo aapko reader ko post ke bottom tak khichkar layega aur ad par click ki opportunity create karega. Isliye kam hi posting karen par quality vala hi kare. Main daily 2-3 se jyada post nahi karta hun. Main aapko suggest karunga ki aap per account 2-3 post hi kare, yadi aap jyada income earn karana chahte hai to new UC News Account create kare. 2.Timing aap post 10 AM se 4 PM ke bich karen, jo approval aur view pane ke hisab se best hai. Iske alava views badhane ke liye ye post padhe UC News 4,57,565 ? Main janana chahta hun ki 1 lac view par aapki average income kitni hoti hai ? Vaise mera income 15-20$ ho jati hai.

aur yadi vah saada bhojan karata hai to usaka jeevan bhee saada, svachchh hoga. ab ye alag baat hai ki saada-bhojan-uchch-vichaar me saade aur taamasee bhojan me kis hisaab se kaisee bhinnata maane - agar menaka gaandhee kee maane to duniya me doodh se baDa maansaahaaree bhojan aur koee hai hee nahee!
samaanata bhale hee na ho, kuchh adhyayano se yah nishkarsh nikaala gaya hai ki aapake mobail fon se aapake vyaktitv ka pata lagaaya ja sakata hai.

seeDee ke dhandhe ka mobail fono se kya sambandh? vah bola - are saahab aap baDe bhole ho. aapako pata nahee hai. hamaara dhandha jo haree-neelee seeDee se chakaachak chalata tha ab vah malTeemeeDiya yukt mobail fono ke kaaraN manda ho gaya hai. log ab seeDee nahee khareedate, balki mobail kee dukaano me jaakar seedhe hee ye filme DaunaloD karava lete hai aur usame hee ye filme dekhate hai. pahale log gem kee seeDee le jaate the vo ab mobailo me gem khelane me vyast rahate hai. usake munh se nikalate bolo kee kaDavaahaT muz tak pahunch rahee thee. muze laga ki yadi usaka bas chalata to vah sampoorN sansaar ke mobail fono par pratibandh laga deta.

Theek hai, chaaro or pragati ho rahee hai. tum bhee takanolaajee ke saath chalate kyo nahee? achaanak vah prasann ho gaya. usane bataaya ki usane bhee ek dukaan dekh liya hai aur aavashyak saamaano ka aarDar de diya hai - usakee bhee mobail DaunaloD shop agale hafte khulane hee vaalee hai. fir usane muzase usee prasannata se kaha - saab, apanee dukaan par aate rahana. aapako baDhiya mobail dilavaenge aur shuroo me maheene bhar ka analimiTeD DaunaloD bilakul muft!

ab vaapas aate hai - aapake mobail fono par - jo aapaka vyaktitv darshaate hai. yadi aapake paas koee smaarT fon hai to bhale hee aapako usaka poora fankshan pata na ho, aap un fankshano ka upayog na kar pae ya aapake lie ve anaavashyak ho, aap us smaarT fon ko haath me lekar apane aap ko achchha khaasa smaarT mahasoos karenge. aur yadi yah kaala bukhaara motee jaisa kuchh ho to kya kahane! ye to sautano ka kaam bhee bakhoobee karane lag gee hai! yadi aapake paas O2 ais jaisa mobail fon haath me nahee hai to aapako sabake saamane apane mobail ko apanee jeb ya pars se baahar nikaal kar baat karane me bhee sharm aatee hai. mobailo ko bhee ab Dres sens aur faishan sTeTamenT me shaamil maan liya gaya hai.

jo shilang men rahati thi. amerika men bhi bhoopen ko us ladaki ki yad aati thi. apane sath bhoopen usake khat lekar gaye the. bich-bich men khat kholakar padhate the. dil men tis hoti thi. mata-pita ki bhi yad aati thi.

jarmani, aastriya aadi deshon ke vidyarthi shamil hue the, usamen bhoopen kis tarah pratham aa gaye the. padhai karate hue bhoopen ko intaraneshanal haus men ek ghanta lift chalane ka kam mil gaya, jisake badale unhen char dolar milate the. isake sath hi bhoopen sviming pul ke bahar kapadon ki paharedari ka bhi kam karate the. garmi ki chhuttiyon men holivud jakar part taim naukari karate the.

jo kamyunist tha. tab bharat men telangana krishi vidroh chal raha tha. rav vidyarthiyon se chanda lekar telangana bhejata tha. bhoopen git gakar paise jutane lage aur rav ke uddeshy ki sahayata karane lage.

ravindr sangit aadi ki taiyari ki gayi thi. bhoopen ne ek asamiya parivar se mekhala-chadar ka jugad kiya taki karyakram ke din priyanvada mekhala-chadar pahanakar nrity pesh kar sake. dhoop-agarabatti jalakar bhoopen ne baragit ka gayan shuroo kiya aur priyanvada nachane lagi. donon pratham sthan par rahe. donon ke nam ki dhoom mach gayi. bharat men ilastreted vikali ne sachitr samachar prakashit kiya.

mere bhavishy ka koi thikana nahin hai. tum chali jaogi. mujhe tin sal aur padhana hoga. isake alava bhoopen ne priyam ko apane khastahal parivar ke bare men bataya. tis rupaye ke kiraye ke ghar men das bhai-bahanon ka parivar gujara karata hai. pitaji ko 145 rupaye penshan ke roop men milate hain.
tum agar aaj bhi us ladaki ko nahin bhool paye ho, vah tumhen milane vali bhi nahin hai. main kisi aur se shadi nahin karoongi.
jisane ek amir ladake se vivah kar liya tha aur havada men rah rahi thi. apane dil ke dard ko bhoopen ne shaishavate dhemalite . git rachakar vyakt kiya tha.

n hi aarthik suraksha de paenge. priyam ko koi etaraj nahin tha. is tarah donon vivah karane ke lie tatpar hue. bharatiy vidyarthiyon ne teparikardar par bismilla khan ki shahanai bajai, bangali ladakiyon ne alpana ankit ki, gujarati ladakiyon ne garaba nrity pesh kiya. ek brahman bangali adhyapak ne mantrochcharan kiya. fir siti kort men jakar donon ne kanooni roop se ek-doosare ko pati-patni man liya. is vivah ke lie n to bhoopen ke mata-pita taiyar the n hi priyam ke mata-pita.
aur desh kee adhisankhy aabaadee mobail hone me juT gee prateet hone lagee to muze bhee antata sharm see aane lagee aur mainne socha ki chalo apan bhee mobail ho hee jae

mainne mobail fono kee ek baDee-see dukaan me kadam rakha. selsamen ne prashn vaachak darshTi se muze dekhate hue meree or musakaraahaT fenkee haa sar, apane puraane mobail ko ne, taaja-tareen behatareen takanolaajee yukt byooTee pees se badalane ka sahee vakt aa gaya hai. aaj hee ek naya moDal aaya hai. vah aapako isee dukaan par milega anyatr aapako kahee nahee milega.
to aap ek atirikt mobail apane ghar ya daftar ke lie lena chaahate hai bahut achchhe. ab to yah nihaayat hee jarooree ho gaya hai- ek atirikt parsanal mobail fon vyaktigat jaroorato ke lie.
to aap mobail kisalie lena chaahate hai? selsamen ne tanik aprasannata se poochha. use laga ki mai shaayad usaka Taim kharaab karane vaala hoo.

lihaaja usane muze ek prashikshu selsamen ke supurd kar diya. prashikshu selsamen ko apana pad pakka karavaana lagata tha atev vah apane seeniyar se bhee jyaada chauDee muskaan meree taraf fenk kar mukhaatib hua. usane muzase fir poochha ki mobail fon ka mai kya karane vaala hoo.
mobail fon kee besik fankshanaliTee to Theek hai, ek hee hai- baat karana. parantu aap ne-aadhunik mobail fono se bahut saare kaam kar sakate hai.

mobail fon ke antarnirmit efem reDiyo se reDiyo sunana, antarnirmit kaimare se foTo kheenchana, emapee3 pleyar fon se sangeet sunana, veeDiyo-malTeemeeDiya inebalD fono se moovee banaana va ple karana, Dabalyooepee jeepeeaares ya seeDeeeme inebalD fono se inTaraneT kee sair karana, ee-mel va esemes-ememes sandesh bhejana-paana ityaadi vah ememes par jara jyaada hee, arthapoorN jor Daal raha tha.
aajakal to haee eND ke mobail fon to sTeTas simbal ke prateek ho chale hai- ab aapakee shakhsiyat ka andaaja is baat se lagaaya jaane laga hai ki aapake haath me kis kism ka-kitane ka mobail fon hai
aur jo paDos ka karapT ofeesar pachaas hajaar vaala mobail laTakae ghoomata hai to vah apana sTeTas zaaDane ke lie hee aise ghoomata hoga.

koee puraana pees hee kahee mil sakata hai- ho sakata hai kabaaDee baajaar me. jamaana ab malTeefankshan Divaiso ka aa gaya hai. mobail me ab batiyaie bhee gapiyaie bhee aur bakhat paDe to pikchar bhee dekhie, gaana bhee sunie, sTeTas bhee banaie.

rangeen lena chaahie ya blaik eND vhaiT, kaimara yukt ya emapee3 pleyar yukt, nokiya ka lena chaahie ki elajee-semasang-moTorola-benakyoo-aur-pata-nahee-kya-kya ka lena chaahie mainne ek mobail fon antata pasand kar hee liya.

do tarah ke plaan hai. ek to posTapeD doosara preepeD. ab yah aap par nirbhar karata hai ki aap kaun sa plaan lena chaahate hai. jaise ki preepeD ka besik plaan do sau rupe ka jisame aapako Taak Taim aadha milega veliDiTee hafte din kee rahegee. isame pals reT rahega do rupe prati minaT. isee ka freeDam plaan lenge paanch sau rupe ka to isakee vaidhata ek maheene kee hogee, TaakaTaim ful milega apane neTavark me baat karane par pals reT pachaas paise doosare ke neTavark par pichahattar paise, lainD lain par ek roopaya bees paise

lainDalain fon par do rupe, esaTeeDee teen rupe prati pals hai. isake eDavaans renTal me aapako pratimaah chha sau rupe dena hoga, badale me aapako teen sau rupe ka TaakaTaim muft milega, pals reT aadhe ho jaenge agar aap jyaada baat karate hai to isaka freeDam plaan Theek rahega aur agar aap inakaming ke lie chaahate hai to isaka laifalaang inakaming free vaala plaan

humare kampani ne Charlie Brown holiday TV specials banane waale kampani mein niyam ki kuch sarkaari kaam kiya tha.1 Main Charles Schulz aur uske banane waale ka dost ban gaya-Peanuts, Charlie Brown, Lucy, Snoopy, aur dusre aschariye kalakaaron ke saath.

Charlie Brown ki basebol ko khelne waale ek zaroori khel rahe the- Lucy daeye feild mein khel rahi thi, aur uske oar ek uchi bol maari gayi. Virothi khilaadi apni sthaan par the, aur yah khel ka aakhri daur tha. Agar Lucy bol ko pakad leti hai, to weh khel jeet jaatey. Agar Lucy bol ko pakad nahi paati, to dusre khilaadi jeet jaatey.
pure khilaadiyon ne Lucy ko gher liya tha jab bol niche ah raha tha. Lucy soch rahi thi ki, Agar maine bol ko pakad liya, mera naam hoga, agar nahi, to badnaami.

aur jabki uske saathi aschariye se dekh rahe the, Lucy ne bol gira diya. Charlie Brown ne apne glove ko dharti par dhul par beeg diya. Lucy ne phir apne saathiyon ki oar dekha, apne haathon ko apne kamar par rakha, aur kaha, Kis tarah tum aasha kartey ho ki main bol ko padak lunga jabki main dusre deshon ke saath apne desh ke anokhe niyam par chintith hoon?
aur uske paas har samay ek bahaana tha.2 Bhale hi humesha mazaakiya, Lucy ke paas bahaane hotey batlaane ke liye weh uske bol na pakadne ke jhootey bahaane hotey.

usne humesha sikhlaya hai ki faeslon par anewaali jiwan nirbhar hota hai.3 Ussi mul ke adhaar aaj raat mera salaaha hai ki bahaane banane chod do jo hume sache faeslon ko banane se rokhtey hain, khaaskar Ishu Maseeh ki sewa karne ki izzat ke saath. Isaiah mein hume sikhlaya gaya hai, hume bure ko tayaagna, aur bhale ko grahan karo. 4

jab Shaitaan ka prabhaao insaan ke hriday mein kai naye aur chaturaai ke tarikon se bhar rahi hai, ki humare chunaao aur faeslein saodhaani se karne chahiye, humesha faeslon aur cheezon ko lekar jis ke dwara hum jeetein hain. Hum aagyaoun ko puri tarah se maanna chahiye aur pavitra vaadon ko nibhaana chahiye. Jab hum bahaane ko bana kar mandir ke endowments nahi pratigya karte, mission par laayak nahi rahatey, aur mandir mein shaadi nahi kartey, weh haanikaarak hain. Yah bahut dukh detein hain jab in faeslon mein vishwaas kartein hain, aur us tarike se nahi rahatey jo zaroori hai in faeslon ko karne ke liye.5

kuch log gativdhiyon mein nahi jaatey! Tum avivaahit purush, jitna der mein tum vivah karoge sahi umar aur bade hone ke baad, tum utna hi avivaahit khush rahoge. Parantu tum aur zyaada peede ko mehsoos karoge! Kripa dhaarmik aur sammilit gatividhiyon mein zaroor shaamil ho 6 apne mandir mein shaadi ke faesle ke saath.
yah faesle mein vishwaas nahi dikhta hai, naye bhavishyevaktaoun ke salaaha ke saath nahi hota, aur yah siddhaanton ke saath laayak nahi hai.

padhaai kare, mandir mein shaadi kare, aur ek vishwaasi khushi se bhara parivaar ho. Main uske faesle se bahut khush tha. Parantu aage vaartalaabh mein, pata chala ki uske faeslon ke anusaar uska sanchaalan aur wah banaaye hue chunaao humesha sahi nahi the. Maine mehsoos kiya ki wah mission par zaroor jana chahata tha aur gambheer bahakaawe se bach raha tha jo mission ki sewa par jaane se rokh sakta hai, parantu uske har din ke kaarye uski madad nahi kar rahe the use use jheltey hue shaaririk, ahessas, janta, dimaagi, aur dhaarmik chunaotiyon mein.7 Usne kaarye ko achchie tarah karna nahi sikha tha. Wah skool ya seminary ke padhaai ko lekar gambheer nahi tha. Wah girjaghar jaata, parantu usne Mormon ki Dharamshaastra nahi padha tha. Wah apna zyaada samay video ke khel mein aur janta ke media ke istamaal mein lagata. Wah sochta tha ki mission par jaana kaafi tha. Jawaan purush, kripa karke humare Prabhu aur Uddhaarkarta , Ishu Maseeh ke laayak sanchaalan karta aur ghambheerta se taeyaar hokar pratinidhitav karein.
hume zaroori hai ki badlaao, baraabri, aur khaas gyaan par zor dein. Yah zaroori hai ki bahaane banana bandh karein aur sahi chunaao ko karein.

baraabri, aur gyaan ka hai Internet ke istamaal ka. Is ke istamaal se prachaar kaarye ho sakta hai, purohiti ke zimmedaariyon mein madad mil sakta hai, mahaan purwajon ko pavitra mandir ke dharam vidhi ke liye dhoondhna, aur bhi zyaada. Achchaai ki chamta mahaan hai. Hum yah bhi jaantein hai ki wah buraai ko faela skati hai, jismein ashlilchitra, electronic vaartalaabh,8 aur chupaap barbarana shaamil hai. Yah paagalpan ke sujhaao aur tarikon mein bhi fasa sakti hai. Jaesa Bhaai Randall L. Ridd ne pichle maha sammelan mein shaktishaali se sikhlaya tha, Internet par baatein kartey hue, Tum bekaar ke cheezon mein fas saktey ho jo tumhare samay ko barbaad karega aur tumhare achche karne ki chamta ko kam karega. 9

Arthur C. Brooks, ne is sthar par zor diya hai. Usne samuhik madhayam ke istamaal par tippani diya hai, hum apne jiwan ke khushi ke pal ko prasaarith kartein hain parantu skool ya kaam ke mushkil samay ka nahi. Hum aadhe jiwan ko dikhlaatein hain- kabhi kabhi jhuti aur jo hum nahi hai. Hum is jiwan ko dikhlaatein hai, aur phir humare samuhik madhyam ke doston ke jhute jiwan ko puri tarah se apnaatein hain. Brook batlaata hai, Zaroor wah tumhe bura mehsoos karega apne samay ke kuch bhaag ko khushi mein mehsoos karne ki jaesa nahi hai, aur tumhare samay ke kuch bhaag yah dikhlaatey hue ki dusre tum se zyaada khush hai? 12

anchaahi musibatein, aur humesha ke jhadon mein fas chuke hain. Jab hum paagalpan se bahar nikaltey aur saaodhaani se apne ird-gird ke sachchaai ko dekhtein hain, yaha bahut kuch nahi hota hai jo hume humare anant tak ke sachche neev ki oar madad kare. Main janta hoon ek pita ko jo unke kai musibaton ke bawajood bhi apne bachchon ke farmaish ko pura karta hai.Wah unse saralta se puchta hai, Kya yah tumhe aur bhi achcha insaan banayega?
bade ya chote, jo punaharsthapit susamachaar ke saath nahi chalta, hum zaroori ashirwaadon aur surakhchaoun ko gawa detein hain aur humesha paap ya apne maargdarshan ko kho detein hain.

gyaan, aur samuhik tarikein Parmeshwar ke khushiyon ke yogna se aur Ishu Maseeh ke khaas kaarye se alag ho jaatein hain, yaha par sangaton mein humesha viyojan ho jata hai.14 Humare dinon mein, kai sthaanon par anmol badhanti ke bawajood, khaaskar vigyan aur vaartalaabh mein, kai khaas mul kamzor pad gaye hain aur khushyaali aur sukh kam ho gaya hai.

usne kuch dimaagi chal aur aaj ke sachche gyaan ki kami ko dekha.15 Acts mein hum padhtey hain Sabhi Athenians aur musaafiron ke liye jo waha the apne samay ko kisi aur cheez mein nahi lagaye, parantu chahe batlaye, ya kuch naye cheez sunne. 16 Paul ka zor tha Ishu Maseeh ke Punaharjiwan par. Jab bheed ne jaati ke is poshan ke uske sadesh ko jana, kuch ne use mara dusron ne use andekha kiya, kahatey hue, Hum is Swami ke vishye mein baad mein sunnege. 17 Paul ne Athens kobina koi safalta ke chod diya. Dean Frederic Farrar ne uske bhent par likha Usne Athens mein girjaghar nahi banaya, aur Athnes ke bagal se guzarne ke baad bhi , wah waha kabhi nahi gaya. 18

behatar, sab se achcha ke matlab se chunaao aur zimmedaariyon ke tarikon ko dekhta hoon. .19 Kai chunaao bure nahi hai, parantu agar weh humara pure samay lele aur sahi chunaao nahi karne de, phir weh khatarnaak ho jaatein hain.

basketbol, basebol, aur daudne waale khel mein bhaag lene ke samay ko lekar na khush tha. Wah un khilaadiyon ko jaanta tha jo shakti, ant tak khel, aur dal ko badhaatey the parantu batlaya ki ek khel par shaayad kuch hi samay tak dhyaan dena achcha hai. Uske nazariye mein khel- kud achcha tha parantu mere liye achcha nahi tha. Uske anusaar kuch khel mein sirf deshi log ya naamchin lambe-samay ke zyaada zaroori kharche ko kartey the.

main ek cheez Lucy ke basebol ke khel mein pasand karta hoon ki, mere pita chahtey the ki, main videshi nitti ko sikhun aur chinta nahi tha ki wah bol pakdun ya nahi. Main yah batlaata hoon ki meri maa ko khel-kud pasand tha. Wah sirf us samay mere khel ko nahi aati agar wah aspataal mein hoti.

Logan Bluebird resturant mein tha. Haath milaane ke baad, usne dobara mujhe se ankh nahi milaya. Usne sidhe Merlin se baatein kiya aur mujhe andekha kar diya. Bhojan ke baad, pehli baar, mere oar muda, parantu wah mera naam bhool gaya tha. Usne phir Merlin ko batlaya, Agar tum Stanford skool ko chuntey ho aur apne mitra ko apne saath lana chahtey ho, uska mark achcha tha aur wah ho sakta hai. Yah anubhao mere liye pakka ho chuka tha ki main apne pita ke achche salaaha par chalun.
barabri, aur gyaan zaroori hai. Jab achchie tarah se istamaal kiya jata hai, weh humare jiwan ko sudhaar deta hai.

main sabhi ko lakhsh aur himmat deta hoon, jawaan aur buzurg, lakhsh aur uddesh aur zyaada achche sudhaar ko nirakhshan karne ke liye.Humare roz ka sanchaalan aur chunnao humare lakhsh ke saath samaan rahana chahiye. Hume zaroori hai ki kamiyon aur manbahalaao se bahar nikalein. Yah zaroori hai ki humesha chunnao ko humare vaadon ke saath sachchaai se Ishu Maseeh ki sewa karein.21 Hume us lakhsh se kisi bhi tarah se bahekna nahi chahiye.

hasmukh log hain. Hum achche mijaaz ke indriyon ke abhaari hain aur doston aur parivaar ke saath bina samay ke mulye ke liye. Parantu hume yahan vichaar par ghambheerta zaroor dena hai jo humare jiwan ko jeene ka neev ho aur humare sabhi chunnao ke. Manbahalaao aur kamiyon jo bahant ko rokhtein hain khatarnaak hotein hain, parantu jab Ishu Maseeh aur Uske Girjaghar ke vishwaas ko kam kartein hain, wah khatarnaak hai.

hum wah kaam ko karenge jo Swami ke sewa karne waalon ke mahaan kaarye mein zaroori hai. Sabhi cheezon mein hume yaad rakhna hai ki Ishu ke gawahi mein himmat rakhne se logon ko celestial aur terrestrial raagye ke mul parinaam mein se alag kiya ja sakta hai.23 Hum chahatein hain ki hum celestial ki oar alag paaye jaaen. Uske ek Devdut ki tarah, Praeshchit aur Ishu Maseeh, humare Uddhaarkarta ke pavitrata ki sachchaai ki zaroor gawahi deta hoon.

Bahan Packer aur main Oxford University gaye the. Hum apne saathwe par-aaja ke suchi ko dhoondh rahe the. Oxford ke Christ ke Kolej ka neta, Dr. Poppelwell, ne dayaluta dikhlaya kolej ke archivist ko suchi lane diya. Waha saal 1853 mein humne apne purwajon ke naam, John Packer ko paya.

maine Topical Guide ko khola aur use ek paat dikhlaya 18 panon ka, bahut hi chote se likha hua, single-spaced, Ishu Maseeh oar likha gaya. Yah Uddhaarkarta par pure dharmshaastra ko saath mein ikatha kiya gaya hua suchi hai jo duniya ke itihaas mein likha gaya hai-Purane aur Naye Niyam, Mormon ki Dharamshaastra, Doctrine aur Covenants, aur the Pearl of Great Price ki gawahi hai.

maine use batlaya, bagal-bagal mein, upar aur niche, kitaab se kitaab, mahatav ke baad mahatav-tum jaanoge ki wah humesha hai, Prabhu Ishu Maseeh ke kaarye mein diviye sundar gawahi ke saath- Uska paydaish, Uska jiwan, Uska shikshan, Uska Suli par chadhna, Uska Pumaharjiwit hona, aur Uska Preashchit karna.
vaatawaran badal gaya, aur usne hume imaarat ko saer karaya, jiske saath Romans ke zamaane ko batlaane waali cheezein.
